○
○[líng]（ㄌㄧㄥˊ）数的空位（同‘零’），多用于数字中 (usu. used in numbers) zero sign; nought ( 同 same as 零 líng)：三○六号 No. 306一九九○年 the year 1990

一
一1[yī]（ㄧ）1.数目，最小的正整数 one; the smallest positive integer; 另见  数字 shùzì 2.同一 same：一视同仁 treat equally without discrimination咱们是一家人。We are of the same family.你们一路走。You are going the same way.这不是一码事。They are not the same thing. 3.另一 also; otherwise：番茄一名西红柿。‘Fanqie’(tomato) is also called‘xihongshi’in Chinese. 4.全；满 whole; all; throughout：一冬 the whole winter; all winter; throughout the winter一生 all one's life一路平安 have a good journey; bon voyage一屋子人 a roomful of people一身的汗 soaked with sweat 5.专一 concentrated; wholehearted：一心一意 single-minded; concentrated 6.表示动作是一次，或表示动作是短暂的，或表示动作是试试的 [used to indicate that an action occurs just once or lasts for a short time, or is being attempted]: (a)用在重叠的动词（多为单音）中间 [used in the middle of a reduplicated verb, oft. a single syllable]：歇一歇 have a rest笑一笑 give a smile让我闻一闻。Let me smell it. (b)用在动词之后，动量词之前 [used between a verb and a verbal measure]：笑一声 give a laugh看一眼 take a look让我们商量一下。Let's talk it over. 7.用在动词或动量词前面，表示先做某个动作（下文说明动作结果）[used before a verb or a verbal measure to indicate an action to be followed by a result]：一跳跳了过去 get over in one jump一脚把它踢开 move it away with one kick他在旁边一站，再也不说什么。He stood by the side, and did not say any more. 8.一旦；一经 once; as soon as：一失足成千古恨。A single slip can cause a lasting sorrow. 9.〈书 fml.〉〈助词 aux.〉用在某些词前加强语气 [used before certain words for emphasis]：一何速也！How fast it is!为害之甚，一至于此！To think that it has caused such serious harm!注意 NOTE：‘一’字单用或在一词一句末尾念阴平，如‘十一、一一得一’，在去声字前念阳平，如‘一半、一共’，在阴平、阳平、上声字前念去声，如‘一天、一年、一点’。本词典为简便起见，条目中的‘一’字，都注阴平。When used alone, or used at the end of a word or sentence, 一 is pronounced with the first tone, e.g. 十一 shíyī and 一一得一 yī yī dé yī; when used before a character with a falling tone, 一 is pronounced with the second tone, e.g. 一半 yíbàn and 一共 yígòng; when used before a character with the first, second or third tone, it is pronounced with the fourth tone, e.g. 一天 yìtiān, 一年 yìnián, and 一点 yìdiǎn; for convenience, 一 in all the entries is marked with the first tone.一2[yī]（ㄧ）我国民族音乐音阶上的一级，乐谱上用做记音符号，相当于简谱的‘(低八度的)7’ note in the traditional Chinese musical scale, corresponding to (ottava bassa)7 in numbered musical notation另见  工尺 gōngchě一[yí]（ㄧˊ）另见  一 yī一[yì]（ㄧˋ）另见  一 yī相关词组不一 | 纯一 | 单一 | 第一 | 封一 | 划一 | 混一 | 平一 | 七一 | 如一 | 十一 | 同一 | 统一 | 万一 | 惟一 | 五一 | 逐一 | 专一 | 超一流 | 第一审 | 第一手 | 多一半 | 进一步 | 老一套 | 留一手 | 露一手 | 清一色 | 同一律 | 统一体 | 单打一 | 不一而足 | 惩一警百 | 第一把手 | 第一产业 | 第一夫人 | 第一世界 | 独一无二 | 挂一漏万 | 划一不二 | 举一反三 | 决一死战 | 捏一把汗 | 杀一儆百 | 数一数二 | 说一不二 | 统一战线 | 以一当十 | 有一得一 | 百无一失 | 百无一是 | 背水一战 | 别具一格 | 别树一帜 | 不拘一格 | 不可一世 | 不名一文 | 不赞一词 | 沧海一粟 | 尝鼎一脔 | 串通一气 | 打成一片 | 大吃一惊 | 当头一棒 | 倒打一耙 | 低人一等 | 独当一面 | 独树一帜 | 多此一举 | 耳目一新 | 付之一炬 | 付之一笑 | 高人一等 | 功亏一篑 | 孤注一掷 | 沆瀣一气 | 焕然一新 | 混为一谈 | 济济一堂 | 加人一等 | 九牛一毛 | 九死一生 | 窥豹一斑 | 聊备一格 | 面目一新 | 莫衷一是 | 目空一切 | 南柯一梦 | 漆黑一团 | 千钧一发 | 千虑一得 | 千虑一失 | 千篇一律 | 千载一时 | 如出一辙 | 三位一体 | 首屈一指 | 太仓一粟 | 昙花一现 | 天各一方 | 铁板一块 | 万无一失 | 万众一心 | 摇身一变 | 有朝一日 | 众口一词 | 自成一家 | 百里挑一 | 背城借一 | 表里如一 | 九九归一 | 心口如一 | 八一建军节 | 二一添作五 | 九一八事变 | 六一儿童节 | 抹一鼻子灰 | 碰一鼻子灰 | 三一三十一 | 五一劳动节 | 更上一层楼 | 平地一声雷 | 八字没一撇 | 天字第一号 | 八一南昌起义 | 第一信号系统 | 第一宇宙速度 | 有一搭没一搭 | 对立统一规律 | 百闻不如一见 | 破题儿第一遭 | 彼一时，此一时 | 吃一堑，长一智 | 此一时，彼一时 | 第一次世界大战 | 第一次鸦片战争 | 牵一发而动全身 | 眉毛胡子一把抓 | 心有灵犀一点通 | 不管三七二十一 | 第一次国内革命战争 | 不经一事，不长一智 | 道高一尺，魔高一丈 | 百尺竿头，更进一步 | 冰冻三尺，非一日之寒一般 | 一斑 | 一半 | 一边 | 一并 | 一刬 | 一朝 | 一筹 | 一从 | 一带 | 一旦 | 一道 | 一定 | 一动 | 一度 | 一端 | 一二 | 一发 | 一概 | 一干 | 一共 | 一贯 | 一行 | 一晃 | 一己 | 一经 | 一径 | 一举 | 一刻 | 一空 | 一口 | 一览 | 一力 | 一例 | 一连 | 一流 | 一路 | 一律 | 一面 | 一旁 | 一偏 | 一瞥 | 一齐 | 一起 | 一气 | 一切 | 一任 | 一如 | 一色 | 一霎 | 一身 | 一审 | 一生 | 一时 | 一世 | 一似 | 一事 | 一手 | 一瞬 | 一丝 | 一体 | 一天 | 一通 | 一同 | 一统 | 一头 | 一味 | 一无 | 一下 | 一线 | 一向 | 一些 | 一心 | 一新 | 一样 | 一一 | 一应 | 一隅 | 一再 | 一早 | 一阵 | 一直 | 一致 | 一准 | 一总 | 一把手 | 一把抓 | 一百一 | 一半天 | 一辈子 | 一边倒 | 一刹那 | 一场空 | 一程子 | 一次性 | 一刀切 | 一点儿 | 一多半 | 一风吹 | 一锅端 | 一锅粥 | 一锅煮 | 一忽儿 | 一会儿 | 一口气 | 一块儿 | 一览表 | 一揽子 | 一连串 | 一零儿 | 一溜儿 | 一溜风 | 一溜烟 | 一米线 | 一年生 | 一盘棋 | 一品锅 | 一品红 | 一清早 | 一神教 | 一水儿 | 一顺儿 | 一死儿 | 一条龙 | 一条心 | 一团糟 | 一窝蜂 | 一席话 | 一系列 | 一小儿 | 一星儿 | 一言堂 | 一元化 | 一元论 | 一阵风 | 一…半… | 一…而… | 一…二… | 一…就… | 一…一… | 一…再… | 一把死拿 | 一败涂地 | 一般见识 | 一板一眼 | 一包在内 | 一暴十寒 | 一本万利 | 一本正经 | 一笔带过 | 一笔勾销 | 一笔抹杀 | 一臂之力 | 一表非凡 | 一表人才 | 一波三折 | 一步登天 | 一差二错 | 一倡百和 | 一唱一和 | 一朝一夕 | 一尘不染 | 一成不变 | 一筹莫展 | 一触即发 | 一触即溃 | 一锤定音 | 一次能源 | 一蹴而就 | 一刀两断 | 一得之功 | 一得之愚 | 一丁点儿 | 一定之规 | 一发千钧 | 一帆风顺 | 一反常态 | 一概而论 | 一个劲儿 | 一股劲儿 | 一股脑儿 | 一鼓作气 | 一国两制 | 一国三公 | 一呼百应 | 一级市场 | 一技之长 | 一家之言 | 一见如故 | 一见钟情 | 一箭双雕 | 一举两得 | 一蹶不振 | 一孔之见 | 一来二去 | 一劳永逸 | 一了百了 | 一连气儿 | 一鳞半爪 | 一溜歪斜 | 一落千丈 | 一马当先 | 一马平川 | 一脉相传 | 一毛不拔 | 一门心思 | 一面儿理 | 一面之词 | 一面之交 | 一鸣惊人 | 一命呜呼 | 一模一样 | 一木难支 | 一目了然 | 一目十行 | 一年到头 | 一念之差 | 一诺千金 | 一拍即合 | 一盘散沙 | 一炮打响 | 一片冰心 | 一贫如洗 | 一气呵成 | 一窍不通 | 一穷二白 | 一丘之貉 | 一仍旧贯 | 一日千里 | 一日三秋 | 一日之雅 | 一如既往 | 一身两役 | 一身是胆 | 一时一刻 | 一事无成 | 一视同仁 | 一手一足 | 一手遮天 | 一丝不苟 | 一丝不挂 | 一丝一毫 | 一塌刮子 | 一塌糊涂 | 一潭死水 | 一天到晚 | 一条藤儿 | 一头儿沉 | 一头雾水 | 一团和气 | 一团漆黑 | 一网打尽 | 一往情深 | 一往无前 | 一望无际 | 一文不名 | 一无是处 | 一无所有 | 一五一十 | 一息尚存 | 一席之地 | 一相情愿 | 一笑置之 | 一泻千里 | 一心一德 | 一心一意 | 一氧化碳 | 一叶蔽目 | 一叶知秋 | 一衣带水 | 一意孤行 | 一隅三反 | 一语破的 | 一针见血 | 一枕黄粱 | 一知半解 | 一纸空文 | 一掷千金 | 一字千金 | 一字一板 | 一…不…. | 一鼻孔出气 | 一锤子买卖 | 一搭两用儿 | 一竿子到底 | 一个心眼儿 | 一棍子打死 | 一时半会儿 | 一退六二五 | 一碗水端平 | 一物降一物 | 一星半点儿 | 一言以蔽之 | 一字长蛇阵 | 一二·九运动 | 一蟹不如一蟹 | 一不做，二不休 | 一步一个脚印儿 | 一朝天子一朝臣 | 一而再，再而三 | 一个巴掌拍不响 | 一失足成千古恨 | 一是一，二是二 | 一个萝卜一个坑儿 | 一波未平，一波又起 | 一人得道，鸡犬升天 | 一言既出，驷马难追

一…一…
一…一…[yī yī]1.分别用在两个同类的名词前面 [used before two nouns of the same kind] (a)表示整个 [indicating the whole] all; the whole：～心～意 wholeheartedly～生～世（人的一生）one's whole life; all one's life (b)表示数量极少 [indicating a very small amount] each; every; single：～针～钱 a single needle or piece of thread～草～木 every grass and tree～言～行 every word and deed 2.分别用在不同类的名词前面 [used before two nouns of different kinds] (a)用相对的名词表明前后事物的对比 [use two relative nouns to indicate contrast]：～薰～莸（比喻好的和坏的有区别）a fragrant herb and a blade of stinking grass; (fig.) there is difference between the good and the bad; (b)用相关的名词表示事物的关系 [use two related nouns to indicate their relationship]：～本～利（指本钱和利息相等）capital and profit; profit proportionate to the capital 3.分别用在同类动词的前面，表示动作是连续的 [used before two verbs of similar meaning to indicate two successive actions]：～瘸～拐 limping along～歪～扭 twist and crook 4.分别用在相对的动词前面，表示两方面的行动协调配合或两种动作交替进行 [used before two relative verbs to indicate the coordination or alternation of the two actions]：～问～答 one asking and the other answering～唱～和 one singing and the other echoing; sing the same tune; collude with each other～起～落 rise and fall in turn; up and down～张～弛 alternate tension with relaxation 5.分别用在相反的方位词、形容词等的前面，表示相反的方位或情况 [used before two opposite nouns of direction or two opposite adjectives to indicate opposite directions or situations]：～上～下 one above, one below～东～西 one east, one west; poles apart～长～短 one long, one short

一…不….
一…不….[yī bù]1.分别用在两个动作前面，表示动作或情况一经发生就不改变 [used before two verbs to indicate the inalterability of a situation]：～定～易 unalterable～去～返 gone never to return～蹶～振 never recover from a setback 2.分别用在一个名词和一个动词前面，表示强调或夸张 [used before a noun and a verb to indicate emphasis or exaggeration] not a single; not the slightest：～言～发 not utter a word～字～漏 without missing a single word～钱～值 not worth a penny; utterly worthless; mere trash～毛～拔 unwilling to give up even a hair; very stingy

一…二…
一…二…[yī èr] 分别加在某些双音节形容词的两个词素前面，表示强调 [used before the two morphemes of certain disyllabic adjectives to indicate emphasis]：～干～净 neat and tidy～清～楚 perfectly clear～清～白 very clean; completely innocent

一…再…
一…再…[yī zài] 分别放在同一个动词前面，表示该动作多次重复 [used separately before the same verb to indicate the repetition of the same action]：～误～误 delay time and again～错～错 keep on making mistakes～拖～拖 postpone again and again

一…半…
一…半…[yī bàn] 分别用在同义词或近义词前边，表示不多或不久 [used with synonymous words, forming a phrase implying not much or many, or not a long time]：～鳞～爪 odd bits; fragments～年～载 in a year or so; in about a year～时～刻 a short time; a little while～星～点儿 a tiny bit～知～解 have a smattering of knowledge; have a little knowledge

一…就…
一…就…[yī jiù] 表示两事时间上前后紧接 [indicating one matter follows the other] no sooner ...than ...; the moment ...; as soon as; at once: (a)同一主语的 [of the same subject]：～学～会 catch on as soon as one learns～开～谢 (of a flower) wither as soon as it blossoms～吃～吐 throw up as soon as one eats; (b)不同主语的 [of different subjects]：～教～懂 learn as soon as one is taught～请～到 arrive as soon as one is invited～说～成 agree upon being persuaded～推～倒 fall upon being pushed

一…而…
一…而…[yī ér] 分别用在两个动词前面，表示前一个动作很快产生了结果 [used before two verbs to indicate that one action follows another as an immediate result]：～哄～散 break up in a hubbub～怒～去 go away in a temper; leave in anger～痛～绝 be deeply grieved～望～知 get to know at a mere glance～扫～光 make a clean sweep of sth.～挥～就。Just one flourish of the pen and it's done.

一一
一一[yī yī] 一个一个地 one by one; one after another：临行时妈妈嘱咐了好些话，他一一记在心里。He remembers everything his mother said to him on his departure.

一丁点儿
一丁点儿[yī dīng diǎn r]〈方 dial.〉极少的或极小的一点儿 a wee bit; a tiny bit

一下
一下[yī xià]（～儿 yīxiàr）1.用在动词后面，表示做一次或试着做 [used after a verb to indicate one action or one try]：看一下儿 have a look打听一下 make some inquiries研究一下 think it over; mull it over 2.表示短暂的时间 in a short while; all at once; all of a sudden：灯一下儿又亮了。After a little while the lights went on again.这天气，一下冷，一下热。Look at this weather. It's cold one moment and hot the next.亦 also 一下子 yīxià·zi

一不做，二不休
一不做，二不休[yī bù zuò，èr bù xiū] 事情已经开始了，就索性干到底 carry sth. through, whatever the consequences; in for a penny, in for a pound

一世
一世[yī shì]1.一辈子 all one's life; lifetime：他一世没出过远门。All his life he's never been far away from home. 2.一个时代 an age：一世之雄 hero of an age

一丘之貉
一丘之貉[yī qiū zhī hé] 同一个山丘上的貉 jackals from the same lair; birds of a feather: 〈比喻 fig.〉彼此相同，没有差别（专指坏人 of bad people）be alike and have no difference

一丝
一丝[yī sī] 形容极小或很少；一点儿 tiny bit; trace：脸上露出了一丝笑容。There is a faint smile on (his) face.

一丝一毫
一丝一毫[yī sī yī háo] 丝毫 a tiny bit; an iota; a trace

一丝不挂
一丝不挂[yī sī bù guà] 形容赤身裸体 not have a stitch on; be stark naked

一丝不苟
一丝不苟[yī sī bù gǒu] 形容办事认真，连最细微的地方也不马虎 not be the least bit negligent; be scrupulous about every detail; be conscientious and meticulous

一个劲儿
一个劲儿[yī ge jìn r] 表示不停地连续下去 continuously; persistently：雨一个劲儿地下。It kept on raining.他一个劲儿地直往前跑。He continuously runs ahead.

一个巴掌拍不响
一个巴掌拍不响[yī ge bā zhang pāi bù xiǎng]〈比喻 fig.〉矛盾和纠纷不是单方面引起的 one hand alone can't clap; it takes two to make a quarrel

一个心眼儿
一个心眼儿[yī ge xīn yǎn r]1.指专心一意 with one's heart set on sth.; devotedly; stubbornly：一个心眼儿为集体 devote wholeheartedly to the collective 2.〈比喻 fig.〉固执不知变通 stubborn; inflexible

一个萝卜一个坑儿
一个萝卜一个坑儿[yī ge luó bo yī gè kēng r]〈比喻 fig.〉每人各有岗位，各有职责 each has his own task, and nobody is dispensable

一举
一举[yī jǔ] 一种举动；一次行动 at one fling; with one effort; in one action; one stroke; one fell swoop：多此一举 make an unnecessary move成败在此一举。Success or failure hinges on this one action.一举捣毁敌人的巢穴 destroy the enemy's lair with one stroke

一举两得
一举两得[yī jǔ liǎng dé] 做一件事情，得到两种收获 gain two ends at once; kill two birds with one stone：荒山造林，既能生产木材，又能保持水土，是一举两得的事。Planting trees on barren hills can both produce timber and conserve water and soil - killing two birds with one stone.

一了百了
一了百了[yī liǎo bǎi liǎo] 由于主要的事情了结了，其余的事情也跟着了结 all troubles end when the main trouble ends

一事
一事[yī shì]〈方 dial.〉业务或组织上有关系的；一起的 be related (organizationally or professionally); belong to the same organization; be one and the same outfit：这家药铺和城里同仁堂药铺是一事。This drug store and the Tongrentang Pharmacy downtown are of the same organization.

一事无成
一事无成[yī shì wú chéng] 连一样事情也没做成；什么事情都做不成 accomplish nothing; get nowhere

一二
一二[yī èr] 一两个；少数 one or two; just a few; just a little：一二知己 a few close friends略知一二（自谦所知不多 term of self-depreciation）know a little about

一二·九运动
一二·九运动[Yī èr Jiǔ Yùn dòng]1935年12月9日，北平（今北京）学生在中国共产党领导下，发动的抗日救国运动。目标是反对日本帝国主义对华北的进一步侵略和国民政府的不抵抗政策，号召全国人民起来抗日救国。运动很快发展到全国各地，为1937年开始的抗日战争准备了条件。December 9th Movement; demonstration staged on December 9, 1935 by Beiping (present-day Beijing) students under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party, the aim being to oppose further invasion of north China by Japanese imperialism and the non-resistance policy of the Kuomintang government, and to call for resistance against Japanese aggression and for national salvation. The movement soon spread across the nation, paving the way for the War of Resistance against Japan that started in 1937.

一五一十
一五一十[yī wǔ yī shí] 数数目时往往以五为单位，一五，一十，十五，二十…数下去，因此用‘一五一十’比喻叙述时清楚而无遗漏 narrate systematically and in full detail. In counting numbers, five is often used as one unit, as five, ten, fifteen, twenty ..., therefore 一五一十 (one five one ten) is used to indicate that every detail is told in one's narration.

一些
一些[yī xiē]1.表示不定的数量 [indicating an indefinite number or quantity] a number of; a certain amount or number of; some; a few; a little：这些活儿你做不完，分一些给我。You can't finish that much work. Give some of it to me. 2.（一些儿 yīxiēr）表示数量少 [indicating a small amount]：只有这一些儿了，怕不够吧？There's only this much left. Is it enough? 3.表示不止一种或一次 [indicating more than one or once]：他曾担任过一些重要的职务。He held some important posts in the past. 4.放在形容词、动词或动词性词组后，表示略微的意思 [used after an adjective, verb or verbal phrase to indicate a slight change in degree]：好一些 a bit better留神一些 be more careful想开一些。Take it easier.

一人得道，鸡犬升天
一人得道，鸡犬升天[yī rén dé dào， jī quǎn shēng tiān]传说汉代淮南王刘安修炼成仙，全家升天，连鸡狗吃了仙药也都升了天（见于汉代王充《论衡·道虚》）。后来用‘一人得道，鸡犬升天’比喻一个人得势，他的亲戚朋友也跟着沾光。when a man attains immortality, even his pets ascend to heaven. Legend goes that when Liu An, Prince of Huainan of the Han Dynasty, cultivated himself and became an immortal, all members of his family ascended to Heaven, and even his chickens and dogs ascended to Heaven by taking his pills of immortality (Discourses Weighed in Balance·On Falsehood by Wang Chong in the Han Dynasty). (fig.) when a man gets to the top, all his friends and relations get there with him；升天 shēng tiān 亦 also 飞升 fēi shēng

一仍旧贯
一仍旧贯[yī réng jiù guàn] 完全按照旧例 stick to the old practice; follow the old routine

一从
一从[yī cóng] 自从 since：一从别后，音信杳然。No word has come from him since he left.

一任
一任[yī rèn]〈书 fml.〉听凭 allow; let

一会儿
一会儿[yī huì r]1.指很短的时间 a little while：一会儿的工夫 a little while咱们歇一会儿。Let's rest for a while. 2.指在很短的时间之内 in a moment; presently：一会儿厂里还要开会。Our factory will have a meeting in a moment.你妈妈一会儿就回来了。Your mother will come back soon.一会儿地上就积起了三四寸厚的雪。Soon the ground was covered with a layer of snow three to four inches thick. 3.叠用在两个反义词的前面，表示两种情况交替 [reduplicated before a pair of antonyms to indicate alternation] now ...now ...; one moment ...the next ...：天气一会儿晴一会儿阴。The weather is one moment clear, the next cloudy.他一会儿出，一会儿进，忙个不停。He is busy all the time, going out one moment and coming in the next.

一似
一似[yī sì]〈书 fml.〉一如；好像 just like; same as

一体
一体[yī tǐ]1.关系密切，如同一个整体 organic or integral whole 2.全体 the whole; all people concerned; to a man：一体周知 be made known to all people concerned一体遵照 be observed by all

一例
一例[yī lì] 一律；同等 same; alike：一例看待 treat in the same way

一倡百和
一倡百和[yī chàng bǎi hè]一人首倡，百人附和。形容附和的人极多。when one starts singing, the others join in; meet with general approval；倡也作 also put as 唱 chàng

一偏
一偏[yī piān] 偏于一方面的 one-sided：一偏之见 one-sided view一偏之论 one-sided argument

一元化
一元化[yī yuán huà]1.由多样向单一发展；由分散向统一发展 integration; centralization 2.指集中统一 centralized; unified：一元化领导 unified (or centralized) leadership

一元论
一元论[yī yuán lùn]认为世界只有一个本原的哲学学说。认为物质是世界本原的是唯物主义的一元论。认为精神是世界本原的是唯心主义的一元论。monism; doctrine that there is only one ultimate substance or principle in the world. The belief that matter is the ultimate substance or principle of the world is materialist monism, and that mind is the ultimate substance or principle is idealist monism.

一共
一共[yī gòng]〈副词 adv.〉表示合在一起 altogether; in all; all told：三个小组一共是十七个人。The three groups have a total of 17 members.

一再
一再[yī zài] 一次又一次 time and again; again and again; repeatedly：一再声明 state again and again一再表示 express again and again

一准
一准[yī zhǔn]〈副词 adv.〉必定 sure; surely; certainly：明儿我一准进城。I'll surely go to town tomorrow.

一刀两断
一刀两断[yī dāo liǎng duàn]〈比喻 fig.〉坚决断绝关系 sever with one stroke; make a clean break

一刀切
一刀切[yī dāo qiē]〈比喻 fig.〉不顾实际情况，用同一方式处理问题 cut it even with one stroke; make everything rigidly uniform regardless of the actual situations; impose uniformity in all cases; prescribe a single solution for diverse problems亦 also 一刀齐 yīdāoqí

一切
一切[yī qiè]1.全部的 all; every：调动一切积极因素 bring every positive factor into play 2.全部的事物 everything; all：人民的利益高于一切。The interests of the people are above everything.夜深了，田野里的一切都是那么静。It was late at night, and all was quiet in the fields.

一刬
一刬[yī chàn]1.〈方 dial.〉一概；全部 all; without exception：一刬都是新的。All are new. 2.一味；总是（多见于早期白话 usu. in early vernacular）always; constantly：一刬地残害忠良 constantly persecute the faithful and the upright

一刹那
一刹那[yī chà nà] 极短的时间 in an instant; in a flash另见  刹那 chànà

一刻
一刻[yī kè] 指短暂的时间；片刻 a short while; an instant：一刻千金（形容时光非常宝贵）。One moment is worth 1,000 pieces of gold. or Time is precious.

一力
一力[yī lì] 尽全力；竭力 do one's best; do all one can：一力成全 do one's best to help (sb. to achieve his aim)一力主持 do one's best to preside over一力承担 do one's best to take charge of sth.

一动
一动[yī dòng]（～儿 yīdòngr）动不动 easily; frequently; at every turn：一动就发脾气 lose one's temper frequently一动儿就哭 weep easily

一劳永逸
一劳永逸[yī láo yǒng yì] 辛苦一次，把事情办好，以后就不再费事了 gain lasting repose by one supreme effort; settle a matter once and for all

一包在内
一包在内[yī bāo zài nèi] 一切都包括在里面 all included：车钱、店钱、饭钱，一包在内，花了五十块钱。I spent 50 yuan, fares, hotel, meals all included.

一半
一半[yī bàn]（～儿 yībànr）二分之一 one half; half：把菜子分给他们一半儿，咱们有一半儿也就够了。Let's give them half the vegetable seeds; half is enough for us.

一半天
一半天[yī bàn tiān] 一两天 in a day or two：过一半天就给你送去。I'll send it to you in a day or two.

一反常态
一反常态[yī fǎn cháng tài] 完全改变了平时的态度 depart from one's normal behaviour; act out of character

一发
一发[yī fā]1.更加 all the more; even more：如果处理不当，就一发不可收拾了。If not handled properly, the situation will become even more hopeless. 2.一同；一并 together; along with all the others：你先把这些急用的材料领走，明天一发登记。You may take these urgent materials first, and register along with all the others tomorrow.

一发千钧
一发千钧[yī fà qiān jūn] 一根头发上系着千钧的重量 a hundredweight hangs by a hair;〈比喻 fig.〉极其危险 be in imminent peril; hang by a thread亦 also 千钧一发 qiān jūn yī fà

一口
一口[yī kǒu]1.纯一（指说话的口音、腔调）(of accent and intonation) pure：这孩子普通话说得很流利，可半年前还是一口的广东话呢。This child speaks fluent putonghua, but half a year ago all he could speak was the Guangdong dialect. 2.表示口气坚决 with certainty; readily; flatly：一口否认 flatly deny一口咬定 cling to one's view; stick to what one says

一口气
一口气[yī kǒu qì]（～儿 yī kǒu qìr）1.一口气息 one breath：只要她还有一口气，就要尽力抢救。As long as there is a breath left in her, we must do our best to save her. 2.不间断地（做某件事）in one breath; without a break; at one go; at a stretch：一口气儿说完 finish a narration without a break一口气跑到家 run home at one go

一叶知秋
一叶知秋[yī yè zhī qiū] 看见一片落叶就知道秋天的来临 falling of one leaf heralds the autumn; it is a straw in the wind;〈比喻 fig.〉发现一点预兆就料到事物发展的趋向 a small sign can indicate a great trend

一叶蔽目
一叶蔽目[yī yè bì mù]《鹖冠子·天则》：‘一叶蔽目，不见太山。’ ‘A leaf before the eye shuts out Mount Taishan.’(Heguanzi·Law of Heaven);〈比喻 fig.〉为局部的或暂时的现象所迷惑，不能认清事物的全貌或问题的本质 be baffled by a local or temporary phenomenon; fail to see the whole picture of a thing or the essence of a question clearly; have one's view of the important overshadowed by the trivial亦 also 一叶障目 yī yè zhàng mù

一同
一同[yī tóng]〈副词 adv.〉表示同时同地做某件事 together; at the same time and place：一同出发 set out together一同欢度新年 spend the New Year's Day together

一向
一向[yī xiàng]1.过去的某一段时期 earlier on; lately：前一向雨水多（指较早的一段时期）。There was quite a lot of rain earlier on (referring to an earlier period).这一向工程的进度很快（指最近的一段时期）。Fast progress has been made in the project lately (referring to a recent period). 2.〈副词 adv.〉(a)表示从过去到现在 [indicating a period from the past to the present] always; consistently：一向俭朴 always thrifty and simple一向好客 always hospitable (b)表示从上次见面到现在 [indicating a period from the last meeting to the present] all along：你一向好哇！How have you been all along?

一味
一味[yī wèi]〈副词 adv.〉单纯地 purely; blindly; persistently：一味迁就 make endless concessions; make one concession after another一味推托 find one excuse after another for not doing sth.

一呼百应
一呼百应[yī hū bǎi yìng] 形容响应的人很多 hundreds respond to a single call; be ready to go into action in their hundreds

一命呜呼
一命呜呼[yī mìng wū hū]指死（含诙谐意 humour.）die; kick the bucket; give up the ghost

一品红
一品红[yī pǐn hóng]落叶灌木，叶子互生，下部的叶子椭圆形或披针形，绿色，顶端的叶片较狭小，鲜红色，很像花瓣。花小，单性，没有花被。供观赏。poinsettia (Euphorbia pulcherrima); deciduous shrub with alternate leaves, the lower leaves being green and elliptical or lanceolate, and the top leaves narrow, red, petal-like, and the flowers small, unisex, and without a perianth, grown as an ornamental plant

一品锅
一品锅[yī pǐn guō]1.一种类似火锅的用具，用金属制成，上面是锅，下面是盛炭火的座子 covered tureen; utensil similar to a hot-pot, made of metal, of which the upper part is a pot, and the lower part a base for holding charcoal 2.菜名，把鸡、鸭、火腿、肘子、香菇等放在一品锅里做成 name of a dish, with chicken, duck, ham, upper leg of pork, mushrooms, etc., cooked in covered tureen

一唱一和
一唱一和[yī chàng yī hè]〈比喻 fig.〉互相配合，互相呼应（多含贬义 oft. derog.）sing in chorus with sb.; chime in with sb.

一团和气
一团和气[yī tuán hé qì] 态度温和，没有原则 keep on good terms with everyone (at the expense of principle); keep on the right side of everyone

一团漆黑
一团漆黑[yī tuán qī hēi]另见  漆黑一团 qīhēi yī tuán

一团糟
一团糟[yī tuán zāo] 形容异常混乱，不易收拾 complete mess; chaotic state

一国三公
一国三公[yī guó sān gōng]《左传》僖公五年：‘一国三公，吾谁适从？’一个国家有三个主持政事的人，我听从谁？后来泛指事权不统一。state with three rulers; (fig.) divided leadership; power that is not unified. The Zuo Commentary·Duke Xi 5th Year:‘In a state with three rulers, whom should I obey?’

一国两制
一国两制[yī guó liǎng zhì]指一个国家，两种制度。是中国共产党于1978年十一届三中全会后提出的完成国家统一的基本国策，在大陆实行社会主义制度，在香港、澳门设立特别行政区，实行资本主义制度。这项政策也适用于台湾。'one country, two systems' policy, China's fundamental state policy set forth by the Communist Party of China after the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Party Committee in 1978 for national unification. This policy calls for maintaining the socialist system on the mainland and establishing special administrative regions in Hong Kong and Macao that retain the capitalist system. This policy also applies to Taiwan.

一场空
一场空[yī cháng kōng] 希望和努力完全落空 all in vain; futile

一块儿
一块儿[yī kuài r]1.同一个处所 at the same place：他俩过去在一块儿上学，现在又在一块儿工作。In the past they studied at the same school, and now they are at the same workplace. 2.一同 together：他们一块儿参军。They joined the army together.

一塌刮子
一塌刮子[yī tā guā zi]〈方 dial.〉1.通通 all; entirely; completely 2.总共加在一起 in all; altogether

一塌糊涂
一塌糊涂[yī tā hú tú] 乱到不可收拾；糟到不可收拾 in a hopeless mess; in an awful (or terrible) state：闹得一塌糊涂 make a terrible row烂得一塌糊涂 totally rotten

一多半
一多半[yī duō bàn]（～儿 yīduōbànr）超过半数；多半 ① the greater part：小组成员一多半是年轻人。Most of the members of this group are young people.

一天
一天[yī tiān]1.一昼夜 a day：一天二十四小时 twenty-four hours a day 2.一个白天 day：一天一夜 one day and one night 3.泛指过去某一天 (in a broad sense) one day (in the past)：一天，他谈起当演员的经过。One day, he talked of how he became an actor. 4.〈方 dial.〉一天到晚 whole day; all (the) day; from morning till night

一天到晚
一天到晚[yī tiān dào wǎn] 整天；成天 from morning till night; from dawn to dusk; all day long

一失足成千古恨
一失足成千古恨[yī shī zú chéng qiān gǔ hèn] 一旦堕落或犯了严重错误，就成为终身的恨事 one false step brings everlasting grief; a single slip may cause lasting sorrow; a moment's error can bring a lifelong regret

一头
一头[yī tóu]1.表示同时进行几件事；一面 [indicating several things being done simultaneously] at the same time; simultaneously：他一头走，一头说。He talked as he walked. 2.表示动作急；径直 [indicating quickness] directly; straightly：打开车门，他一头钻了进去。He opened the door and dived into the car. 3.突然；一下子 all of a sudden; all at once：刚进门，一头碰见了他。I bumped into him the moment I came in. 4.头部突然往下扎或往下倒的动作 headlong：一头扑进水里 plunge headlong into the water一头倒在床上 collapse into the bed 5.（一头儿 yītóur）一端 one end：扁担的一头挑着篮子，另一头挂着水罐。A basket was being carried at one end of the shoulder pole, and a water pitcher at the other. 6.相当于一个头的高度 a head：他比你高出一头。He is a head taller than you are. 7.（一头儿 yītóur）同一个方面；一伙 in a group; on one side：昨天打桥牌，我和老王一头，小张和小李一头。We played bridge yesterday, Lao Wang and I on one side against Little Zhang and Little Li on the other. 8.〈方 dial.〉一块 together：他们是一头来的。They came together.

一头儿沉
一头儿沉[yī tóu r chén]〈方 dial.〉1.书桌或办公桌的一种构造形式，一头有柜子或抽屉，另一头没有。也指这种形式的桌子。heavy-at-one-end; desk or table with a cupboard or drawers at one end 2.〈比喻 fig.〉进行调解时偏袒一方 be partial (in mediation)

一头雾水
一头雾水[yī tóu wù shuǐ] 形容摸不着头脑，糊里糊涂 be unable to make head or tail of sth.; puzzled

一如
一如[yī rú]（同某种情况）完全一样 just like; same as; just as：一如所见 just like what we've seen一如所闻 just as what we've heard一如所请 just as we've requested

一如既往
一如既往[yī rú jì wǎng] 完全跟过去一样 just as in the past; as before; as always

一孔之见
一孔之见[yī kǒng zhī jiàn] 从一个小窟窿里面所看到的 peephole view;〈比喻 fig.〉狭隘片面的见解（多用作谦词 oft. as a self-depreciatory expression）narrow view; very limited outlook

一字一板
一字一板[yī zì yī bǎn] 形容说话从容清楚 speak unhurriedly and clearly

一字千金
一字千金[yī zì qiān jīn]秦相吕不韦叫门客著《吕氏春秋》，书写成后出布告，称有能增减一字的，就赏给千金（见于《史记·吕不韦传》）。后来用‘一字千金’称赞诗文精妙。each word is worth a thousand pieces of gold; highly finished literary product. Lü Buwei, prime minister of the State of Qin in the late Warring States Period, asked his hangers-on to write the Lü's Spring and Autumn Annals. After it was finished, he announced that whoever could add or delete one word, he would be awarded 1,000 pieces of gold (Records of the Historian·Biography of Lü Buwei). Since then,‘each word is worth 1,000 pieces of gold’has been used to praise a fine piece of literary work.

一字长蛇阵
一字长蛇阵[yī zì cháng shé zhèn]排列成一长条的阵势。泛指排列成一长条的人或物。single-line battle array; single-line formation; (in a broad sense) single line of people or things

一定
一定[yī dìng]1.规定的；确定的 fixed; specified; certain; regular：每天工作几小时，学习几小时，休息几小时，都有一定。There are fixed hours for a day's work, study and rest. 2.固定不变；必然 surely; necessarily：文章的深浅跟篇幅的长短，并没有一定的关系。The depth of an article is not necessarily associated with its length. 3.表示坚决或确定；必定 must; certainly：一定要努力工作。It is imperative to work hard.这半天还不回来，一定是没搭到车。He must have missed the train, not to have come back yet all this time. 4.特定的 given; particular; certain：一定的文化是一定社会的政治和经济的反映。A particular culture is the reflection of a particular society's politics and economy. 5.相当的 proper; fair; due：我们的工作已经取得了一定的成绩。We have made some due achievements in our work.他的思想感情起了一定程度的变化。He has experienced changes in his thoughts and feelings to a fair extent.

一定之规
一定之规[yī dìng zhī guī]一定的规则。多比喻已经打定的主意。fixed pattern; (oft. fig.) one's own way; one's set views

一审
一审[yī shěn] 第一审 first instance

一家之言
一家之言[yī jiā zhī yán]指有独特见解、自成体系的学术论述。也泛指一个学派或个人的理论、说法。distinctive doctrine or theory; (in a broad sense) original system of thought of a school or individual

一小儿
一小儿[yī xiǎo r]〈方 dial.〉从小 since childhood：他一小儿就喜欢画画儿。He has loved to paint ever since childhood.

一尘不染
一尘不染[yī chén bù rǎn]1.佛家称色、声、香、味、触、法为六尘，修道的人不被六尘所玷污，叫做一尘不染。泛指人品纯洁，丝毫没沾染坏习气。not soiled by a speck of dust; maintain one's pure character. Buddhists call objects of the senses (form, sound, smell, taste, touch, and perception of character) the‘six worldly environments,’and a Buddhist not contaminated by these six worldly environments is described as 一尘不染. 2.借指环境非常清洁 spotlessly clean; very clean：屋子里窗明几净，一尘不染。The room is spotlessly clean with bright windows and clean tables.

一差二错
一差二错[yī chā èr cuò] 可能发生的意外或差错 possible mistake or mishap：万一有个一差二错，就麻烦了。Just in case there is a slip somewhere, it would be troublesome.

一己
一己[yī jǐ] 自身；个人 oneself; personal：一己之私 one's own selfish interests

一帆风顺
一帆风顺[yī fān fēng shùn]〈比喻 fig.〉非常顺利，毫无挫折 plain sailing; smooth sailing

一带
一带[yī dài] 泛指某处及其附近地方 area around a particular place：北京一带 Beijing area江南一带雨量充足。The area south of the Yangtze River enjoys plentiful rainfall.

一席之地
一席之地[yī xí zhī dì]〈比喻 fig.〉极小的一块地方或极小的一个位置 very small place or position

一席话
一席话[yī xí huà] 一番话 what one says during a conversation：你这一席话对我很有启发。What you said was a great inspiration to me.

一干
一干[yī gān] 所有跟某件事（多指案件）有关的 all those involved：一干人 all those involved一干人犯 the criminals and all those involved in the case

一年到头
一年到头[yī nián dào tóu]（～儿 yī nián dào tóur）从年初到年底；整年 throughout the year; all year round：一年到头不得闲 be busy all year round

一年生
一年生[yī nián shēng] 在当年之内完成全部生活周期的（种子萌发、长出根、茎、叶，开花，结果，植物体死亡），如大豆、花生、水稻等植物都是一年生的 annual (plant); completing the life cycle within a year, e.g. sprouting, growing roots, stems and leaves, blossoming, bearing fruit, and dying. Beans, peanuts, paddy rice, etc., are annual plants.

一并
一并[yī bìng]〈副词 adv.〉表示合在一起 along with all the others; lumped all together：一并办理 be handled together一并报销 be reimbursed together

一应
一应[yī yīng] 所有一切 all; everything：一应俱全。Everything needed is there.一应工具、材料都准备好了。All the tools and materials are ready.

一度
一度[yī dù]1.一次；一阵 once：一年一度的春节又到了。The once-a-year Spring Festival is coming.经过一度紧张的战斗，洪水终于被战胜了。After an intense struggle, the flood was finally beaten off. 2.有过一次 on one occasion; for a time：他一度休学。He stopped going to school for a time.

一往情深
一往情深[yī wǎng qíng shēn] 指对人或事物有深厚的感情，十分向往留恋 be deeply attached; be passionately devoted; be head over heels in love

一往无前
一往无前[yī wǎng wú qián] 指不怕困难，奋勇前进 press forward with an indomitable will

一径
一径[yī jìng]1.径直 straight; directly; straightaway：他没有跟别人打招呼，一径走进屋里。He went straight into the room without so much as to greet anyone. 2.〈方 dial.〉一直；连续不断 always：她一径在微笑。She always has a smile on her face.他一径是做教师的。He has always worked as a teacher.

一律
一律[yī lǜ]1.一个样子；相同 same; alike; uniform：千篇一律 stereotyped; following the same pattern强求一律 seek rigid uniformity 2.适用于全体，无例外 all; without exception：我国各民族一律平等。All peoples of our country are equal.

一得之功
一得之功[yī dé zhī gōng] 一点微小的成绩 occasional, minor success：不能沾沾自喜于一得之功，一孔之见。Don't feel so self-satisfied over a minor success or a narrow view.

一得之愚
一得之愚[yī dé zhī yú]〈谦辞 hum.〉指自己对于某一问题的见解 my humble opinion：这是我的一得之愚，供你参考。This is my humble opinion, for your reference only.另见  千虑一得 qiān lǜ yī dé

一心
一心[yī xīn]1.专心；全心全意 wholeheartedly; heart and soul：一心为公 serve the public wholeheartedly or heart and soul 2.齐心；同心 of one mind; at one：万众一心。The people of the whole country are united as one.全国一心。The whole country is of one mind.

一心一德
一心一德[yī xīn yī dé] 同心同德 be of one heart and one mind; be dedicated to the same cause

一心一意
一心一意[yī xīn yī yì] 心思、意念专一 heart and soul; wholeheartedly

一念之差
一念之差[yī niàn zhī chā]一个念头的差错（引起严重的后果）wrong decision made in a moment of weakness; momentary slip with serious consequences

一忽儿
一忽儿[yī hū r]〈方 dial.〉一会儿 a little while

一总
一总[yī zǒng]1.（一总儿 yīzǒngr）合并（计算）altogether; all told; in all：一总要二十个人才够分配。Altogether, 20 people will be enough for disposition.钱请你再垫一下，过后一总算吧。Please pay the money for me. We'll settle our accounts altogether later. 2.全都 all：这些工作一总交给我们小组去完成。Give all this work to our group.

一息尚存
一息尚存[yī xī shàng cún] 还有一口气儿，表示直到生命的最后阶段 so long as one still has a breath left; till one's last gasp：一息尚存，决不懈怠。I'll never relax my efforts as long as I live.

一意孤行
一意孤行[yī yì gū xíng] 不听劝告，固执地照自己的意思行事 cling obstinately to one's course; act wilfully; refuse to listen to sb.'s advice and insist on having one's own way

一成不变
一成不变[yī chéng bù biàn] 一经形成，永不改变 immutable; invariable; unalterable：任何事物都是不断发展的，不是一成不变的。All matters develop continuously, and nothing is immutable.

一手
一手[yī shǒu]1.（一手儿 yīshǒur）指一种技能或本领 proficiency; skill：留一手 hold back (or retain) one or two tricks 2.（一手儿 yīshǒur）指耍的手段 trick; move：你可不能跟我来这一手。Don't play the trick on me. 3.指一个人单独地 single-handed; all by oneself; all alone：一手造成 of one's own doing一手包办 keep everything in one's own hands; take everything on oneself

一手一足
一手一足[yī shǒu yī zú] 指单薄的力量 one hand and one foot; a single person; a single effort

一手遮天
一手遮天[yī shǒu zhē tiān] 形容倚仗权势，玩弄骗人手法，蒙蔽众人耳目 hide the truth from the masses by relying on one's position and influence; hoodwink the public by deception

一技之长
一技之长[yī jì zhī cháng] 指某一种技术特长 proficiency in a particular line or field; professional skill; specialization; speciality

一把手
一把手[yī bǎ shǒu]1.作为参加活动的一员 party to an undertaking; member; hand：咱们搭伙干，你也算上一把手。Let's pool our efforts, and you're counted in. 2.能干的人 good hand：要说干活儿，他可真是一把手。He is really a good hand at work.亦 also 一把好手 yī bǎ hǎo shǒu 3. 同 same as 第一把手 dì yī bǎ shǒu

一把抓
一把抓[yī bǎ zhuā]1.对一切事都不放手，都要自己管 take everything into one's own hands 2.做事不分轻重缓急，一齐下手 try to tackle all problems at once regardless of their relative importance and urgency

一把死拿
一把死拿[yī bǎ sǐ ná]〈方 dial.〉（一把死拿儿 yī bǎ sǐ nár）形容固执成法，不肯变通 inflexible; stubborn

一拍即合
一拍即合[yī pāi jí hé] 一打拍子就合上了曲子的节奏 beat time to the rhythm of music;〈比喻 fig.〉双方很容易一致 fit in readily; chime in easily

一掷千金
一掷千金[yī zhì qiān jīn] 原指赌博时下一次注就多达千金，后用来形容任意挥霍钱财 stake 1,000 pieces of gold on one throw; throw away money like dirt; spend money like water

一揽子
一揽子[yī lǎn zi] 对各种事物不加区别或不加选择的 wholesale; package：一揽子计划（总的计划）package plan (overall plan)一揽子建议（或者全部接受或者全部拒绝的建议）recommendation package; package deal (to be either totally accepted or totally rejected)

一搭两用儿
一搭两用儿[yī dā liǎng yòng r] 一样东西当两样用 one thing serving two purposes：带件大衣，白天穿，晚上当被盖，一搭两用儿。Take an overcoat with you. It may serve two purposes: you can wear it during the day and use it as a quilt at night.

一文不名
一文不名[yī wén bù míng] 一个钱也没有 not have a penny to one's name; be penniless（名 ming：占有 possess）

一斑
一斑[yī bān] 指豹身上的一块斑纹 one spot (on a leopard);〈比喻 fig.〉相类似的许多事物中很小的一部分 one of a number of similar things：管中窥豹，可见一斑。Look at one spot on a leopard through a bamboo tube and you can visualize the whole animal. (fig.) conjure up the whole thing through seeing a part of it另见  管中窥豹 guǎn zhōng kuī bào

一新
一新[yī xīn] 完全变成新的 become completely new; brand new：整修一新 take on a new look after renovation

一旁
一旁[yī páng] 旁边 one side：站在一旁看热闹 stand by watching the fun

一无
一无[yī wú] 全无；毫无 nothing at all; not in the least：一无所获 achieve nothing; get nothing一无所知 know nothing about; not have the least inkling of; be absolutely ignorant of; be completely in the dark一无所有 not own a thing in the world; not have a thing to one's name

一无所有
一无所有[yī wú suǒ yǒu]什么都没有。多形容非常贫穷。not own a thing in the world; not have a thing to one's name

一无是处
一无是处[yī wú shì chù] 一点对的地方也没有 without a single redeeming feature; devoid of any merit; with no saving grace：不要把人说得一无是处。Don't make him out to be without a saving grace.

一日三秋
一日三秋[yī rì sān qiū]《诗经·王风·采葛》：‘一日不见，如三秋兮。’一天不见，就好像过了三年。形容思念人的心情非常迫切。one day's separation seems as long as three years (from The Book of Songs·Folksongs of the Capital·Picking Vine Flowers); miss sb. very much

一日之雅
一日之雅[yī rì zhī yǎ]一天的交情。指交情不深。a day's acquaintance：无一日之雅 not have the pleasure of knowing sb.

一日千里
一日千里[yī rì qiān lǐ] 形容进展极快 1,000 li a day; at a tremendous pace; with giant strides

一旦
一旦[yī dàn]1.一天之间（形容时间短）in a single day; in a very short time：毁于一旦 be destroyed overnight 2.不确定的时间词，表示有一天 one day: (a)用于已然，表示‘忽然有一天’ [used for one day in the past] in one day：相处三年，一旦离别，怎么能不想念呢？After being together for three years, how can they not miss each other after parting? (b)用于未然，表示‘要是有一天’ [used for one day in the future] some day; once：理论一旦为群众所掌握，就会产生巨大的物质力量。Once grasped by the masses, theory will generate a tremendous material force.

一早
一早[yī zǎo]1.（一早儿 yīzǎor）清晨 early in the morning：今天一早他就下乡去了。He went to the countryside early this morning. 2.〈方 dial.〉很早；早先 long ago; earlier：这是他现在的表现呢，还是一早就如此呢？Has he always behaved like this or differently before?

一时
一时[yī shí]1.一个时期 period of time：此一时彼一时。Times have changed.一时无出其右。For some time nobody could outshine him. 2.短时间；暂时 for a short while; temporary; momentary; ephemeral：一时半刻 a short time; a short while一时还用不着 not needed for the time being这是一时的和表面的现象。This is a transient and superficial phenomenon. 3.临时；偶然 offhand; accidental; by chance：一时想不起他是谁。(I) can't recall who he is for the moment.一时高兴，写了两首诗。(I) happened to be in a good mood and wrote two poems. 4.叠用，跟‘时而’相同 [used reiteratively like 时而 shí'ér] now ...and now ...; this moment ..., and the next ...：高原上气候变化大，一时晴，一时雨，一时冷，一时热。The climate on the highland is changeable: it's now clear and now rainy, now cold and now hot.

一时一刻
一时一刻[yī shí yī kè] 每时每刻 every moment：我一时一刻也不能忘记这个教训。I shall never forget this lesson.

一时半会儿
一时半会儿[yī shí bàn huì r] 指短时间 a short time; a short moment; a short while：这场雨一时半会儿停不了。The rain will not stop for a short while.

一星儿
一星儿[yī xīng r] 极少的一点儿 tiny bit

一星半点儿
一星半点儿[yī xīng bàn diǎn r] 极少 tiny bit; very small amount：为大伙儿做一星半点儿的事情，不值得一提。It's not worth mentioning to do such a tiny bit for the public.

一是一，二是二
一是一，二是二[yī shì yī，èr shì èr]根据事情本来的情况，应该怎样就怎样。多形容对事情认真，一丝不苟。be unequivocal; use plain and blunt words; one is one, and two is two; call a spade a spade

一晃
一晃[yī huǎng]（～儿 yīhuǎngr）很快地一闪 flash：窗外有个人影，一晃儿就不见了。A figure flashed past the window, and disappeared in no time.一晃[yī huàng]形容时间过去得快（有不知不觉的意思）(of time) pass in a flash (without one's realizing it)：一晃就是五年，孩子都长这么大了。Five years passed in a flash, and the children have grown up.

一暴十寒
一暴十寒[yī pù shí hán]《孟子·告子》：‘虽有天下易生之物也，一日暴之（‘暴’同‘曝(pù)’），十日寒之，未有能生者也。’比喻时而勤奋，时而懈怠，没有恒心。Mencius·Gaozi:‘Even with the most easily growing thing in the world, if you let it have one day's genial heat, and then expose it for 10 days to cold, it will not be able to grow.’have one day's sun and then 10 days' cold; (fig.) work by fits and starts; lack in perseverance

一望无际
一望无际[yī wàng wú jì]一眼看不到边。形容辽阔。stretch as far as the eye can see; stretch to the horizon：麦浪翻滚，一望无际。The fields of wheat billowing like waves stretch as far as the eye can see.

一朝
一朝[yī zhāo] 同 same as 一旦 yīdàn

一朝一夕
一朝一夕[yī zhāo yī xī]一个早晨或一个晚上。指非常短的时间。in one morning or evening; overnight; in one day：非一朝一夕之功 not the work of a single day

一朝天子一朝臣
一朝天子一朝臣[yī cháo tiān zǐ yī cháo chén] 指一个人上台，就另换一班人马 new emperor brings in a new court of officials; new boss reshuffles the leadership

一木难支
一木难支[yī mù nán zhī]〈比喻 fig.〉艰巨的事业不是一人之力所能胜任的 a single post cannot support a mansion; it is difficult for a person to do much single-handed：众擎易举，一木难支。With many people it's easy to lift a load; one person cannot do it alone.

一本万利
一本万利[yī běn wàn lì] 形容本钱小，利润很大 a small investment brings a 10,000-fold profit; make big profits with a small capital

一本正经
一本正经[yī běn zhèng jīng] 形容很规矩，很庄重 in all seriousness; in dead earnest

一条心
一条心[yī tiáo xīn] 意志相同 be of one mind; be at one

一条藤儿
一条藤儿[yī tiáo téng r]〈方 dial.〉〈比喻 fig.〉串通一气的一伙儿 gang

一条龙
一条龙[yī tiáo lóng]1.〈比喻 fig.〉一个较长的行列 one continuous line：十几辆汽车排成一条龙。A dozen trucks stood in a long line. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉生产程序或工作环节上的紧密联系和配合 be streamlined; in a streamlined fashion; coordinated process：产运销一条龙 integrate production, transportation and marketing in a streamlined fashion

一来二去
一来二去[yī lái èr qù] 指互相交往、接触后渐渐产生某种情况 in the course of frequent contact; in the course of time：两家住在一个院子里，一来二去地孩子们也都熟了。The two families live in the same courtyard, and over time the children got to know one another quite well.

一板一眼
一板一眼[yī bǎn yī yǎn]〈比喻 fig.〉言语行为有条理，合规矩，不马虎 following a prescribed or set pattern in speech or action; scrupulous and methodical;另见  板眼 bǎnyǎn

一枕黄粱
一枕黄粱[yī zhěn huáng liáng]另见  黄粱梦 huángliángmèng

一样
一样[yī yàng] 同样；没有差别 same; alike; make no difference; as ...as ...：哥儿俩相貌一样，脾气也一样。The two brothers are alike both in appearance and in temperament.他们两个人打枪打得一样准。They both shoot accurately.

一棍子打死
一棍子打死[yī gùn zi dǎ sǐ]〈比喻 fig.〉对人或事物不加分析，全盘否定 knock sb. down with one stroke; finish off with one blow; completely negate

一概
一概[yī gài]〈副词 adv.〉表示适用于全体，没有例外 one and all; without exception; totally; categorically：过期一概作废 become invalid after the specified date without exception

一概而论
一概而论[yī gài ér lùn]用同一标准来对待或处理（多用于否定 usu. used in the negative）treat (different matters) as the same：不能一概而论 not to be lumped together; not to be mentioned in the same breath

一模一样
一模一样[yī mú yī yàng] 形容完全相同，没有什么两样 exactly alike; like two peas in a pod

一次性
一次性[yī cì xìng] 只一次的；不须或不做第二次的 once only; one-time (without a second chance)：发给一次性补助金 subsidy in one lump sum grant对某些滞销商品作一次性削价处理 dispose some unmarketable commodities at a just-for-once discounted price

一次能源
一次能源[yī cì néng yuán] 指存在于自然界的天然能源，如煤炭、石油、天然气、水力、铀矿等 primary energy; energy resources existing in nature, e.g. coal, petroleum, natural gas, waterpower, uranium, etc.

一步一个脚印儿
一步一个脚印儿[yī bù yī gè jiǎo yìn r]〈比喻 fig.〉做事塌实 every step leaves its print; work steadily and make solid progress

一步登天
一步登天[yī bù dēng tiān]〈比喻 fig.〉一下子达到最高的境界或程度。也比喻地位一下子升得很高。reach the sky in a single bound; attain the highest level in one step; experience a meteoric rise

一死儿
一死儿[yī sǐ r]〈方 dial.〉非常固执地（要怎么样）very obstinately; very stubbornly：不让他去，他一死儿要去。He was told not to go, but he insisted.

一毛不拔
一毛不拔[yī máo bù bá]《孟子·尽心》：‘杨子取为我，拔一毛而利天下，不为也。’比喻非常吝啬。unwilling to give up even a hair; very stingy. In Mencius·Exhaustion of Mental Constitution:‘Master Yang is an egotist, unwilling to give up even a hair for the benefit of others in the world.’

一气
一气[yī qì]1.（一气儿 yīqìr）不间断地（做某件事）at one go; without a break; at a stretch：一气儿跑了五里地 run five li at a stretch 2.声气相通；成为一伙（多含贬义 oft. derog.）of the same gang; hand in glove：串通一气 gang up; collaborate他们通同一气。They act in collusion. 3.一阵（多含贬义 oft. derog.）spell; fit：瞎闹一气 raise hell; kick up a row乱说一气 talk nonsense

一气呵成
一气呵成[yī qì hē chéng]1.〈比喻 fig.〉文章的气势首尾贯通 (of writing) form a coherent whole; make smooth reading 2.〈比喻 fig.〉整个工作过程中不间断，不松懈 get sth. done at one go; carry sth. through without stopping

一氧化碳
一氧化碳[yī yǎng huà tàn]无机化合物，化学式CO。无色无味的气体，比空气轻，有剧毒，燃烧时发出蓝色火焰，并放出大量的热。用做燃料，也是化工原料。煤气中含有一氧化碳。carbon monoxide (CO); colourless, odourless, extremely poisonous inorganic compound gas, which is lighter than air, emits a blue flame and gives out plenty of heat when burning, used as a fuel and a raw material for making chemicals. The coal gas contains carbon monoxide.

一水儿
一水儿[yī shuǐ r]〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 一色 yīsè ②：屋里一水儿红木家具。The furniture in the room is made of nothing but mahogany.

一波三折
一波三折[yī bō sān zhé]原指写字笔画曲折多姿，后形容文章结构曲折起伏。也比喻事情进行中阻碍、变化很多。(orig.) written Chinese character with many cranking strokes; (later) article with complicated plots; (fig.) be full of twists and turns, or ups and downs; throw many obstacles in the way; have unexpected changes

一波未平，一波又起
一波未平，一波又起[yī bō wèi píng， yī bō yòu qǐ]〈比喻 fig.〉波折多，一个问题还没有解决，另一个问题又发生了 hardly has one wave subsided when another rises; one trouble follows another

一泻千里
一泻千里[yī xiè qiān lǐ]形容江河水流迅速。也形容文笔奔放、流畅。(of a river) rush down a thousand li; flow powerfully; (of a writing style) bold and flowing

一流
一流[yī liú]1.同一类；一类 a kind; the same kind：他是属于新派一流人物。He belongs to the avant-garde school. 2.第一等 of the best quality; first-class; first-rate; top-notch：一流作品 a first-rate work

一清早
一清早[yī qīng zǎo]（～儿 yīqīngzǎor）清晨 early in the morning

一溜儿
一溜儿[yī liù r]1.一排; 一行 row：这一溜儿十间房是集体宿舍。This row of 10 rooms is the dormitory. 2.附近一带 nearby area; vicinity; neighbourhood：反正就是那一溜儿，准在哪儿我就说不清了。Anyway, it's over there, though I'm not sure exactly where.

一溜歪斜
一溜歪斜[yī liù wāi xié]〈方 dial.〉形容走路脚步不稳，不能照直走 (walk, etc.) unsteadily in a zigzag：他挑着一挑儿水，一溜歪斜地从河边走上来。He staggered up the slope from the river, carrying two buckets of water on a shoulder pole.

一溜烟
一溜烟[yī liù yān]（～儿 yīliùyānr）形容跑得很快 be gone in a blur; streak off; run as quickly as a wisp of smoke：他说了一声再会，就骑上车，一溜烟地向东去了。After saying goodbye, he got on his bicycle and streaked off eastward.

一溜风
一溜风[yī liù fēng] 形容跑得很快 like a gust of wind; very quickly：他一溜风地从山上跑下来。He runs down the hill like a gust of wind.

一潭死水
一潭死水[yī tán sǐ shuǐ]〈比喻 fig.〉没有生气或停滞不前的沉闷局面 pool of stagnant water; stagnant or lifeless condition

一炮打响
一炮打响[yī pào dǎ xiǎng]〈比喻 fig.〉第一次行动就获得很大成功 get sth. done at one fling; accomplish with one effort; be an instant success

一点儿
一点儿[yī diǎn r]1.表示不定的数量 [indefinite amount]：我没活儿做了，你分给我一点儿吧。I have no work to do, so please give me a bit. 2.表示很小或很少 tiny; a little; a bit：我以为有多大呢，原来只有这么一点儿。I had thought it quite big, actually it is so tiny.只有那么一点儿，够用吗？That's all that is left. Is it enough?几年过去了，他的毛病一点儿都没改。Several years have passed, but his shortcomings have not changed a bit.

一片冰心
一片冰心[yī piàn bīng xīn]形容心地纯洁，不羡慕荣华富贵（语本唐王昌龄《芙蓉楼送辛渐》诗：‘洛阳亲友如相问，一片冰心在玉壶’）moral purity; do not envy high position and great wealth. Seeing Off Xin Jian at Furong Tower by the Tang-dynasty poet Wang Changling:‘If relatives and friends in Luoyang ask about me, /I have nothing but a pure heart.’

一物降一物
一物降一物[yī wù xiáng yī wù] 某种事物专门制伏另一种事物，或者某种事物专门有另一种事物来制伏 one thing conquers another; everything has its superior

一生
一生[yī shēng] 从生到死的全部时间 all one's life; throughout one's life

一百一
一百一[yī bǎi yī]〈方 dial.〉形容好到极点，无可挑剔 perfect; faultless; ideal：他是一百一的好人。He is a perfect gentleman.他侍候病人可说是一百一。He attends to the patients with the best of care.

一盘散沙
一盘散沙[yī pán sǎn shā]〈比喻 fig.〉分散的、不团结的状态 a sheet of loose sand; a state of disunity

一盘棋
一盘棋[yī pán qí]〈比喻 fig.〉整体或全局 game of chess or chessboard; overall situation：全国一盘棋 consider the overall situation of the whole country一盘棋观点 overall viewpoint

一目了然
一目了然[yī mù liǎo rán] 一眼就能看清楚 be clear at a glance

一目十行
一目十行[yī mù shí háng] 形容看书极快 take in 10 lines at a glance; read quickly

一直
一直[yī zhí]〈副词 adv.〉1.表示顺着一个方向不变 [indicating one direction] straight：一直走，不拐弯。Go straight ahead. Don't turn.一直往东，就到了。Go straight east, and you'll get there. 2.表示动作始终不间断或状态始终不变 [indicating an uninterrupted action or a constant state]：雨一直下了一天一夜。It had been raining for one day and one night.他干活儿一直很卖力。He has been working very hard. 3.强调所指的范围 [referring to the given limits] all the way：全村从老人一直到小孩都非常热情。The people of the whole village, old and young, are very enthusiastic.

一相情愿
一相情愿[yī xiāng qíng yuàn] 处理彼此有关的事情时，只管自己愿意，不管对方愿意不愿意；泛指办事时全从主观愿望出发，不考虑客观条件 one-sided wish; one's own wishful thinking; in handling matters concerning each other, a person thinks of only his own wish, but not the other's; handle things according to one's subjective wish without taking the objective conditions into account；相 亦 also 厢 xiāng

一瞥
一瞥[yī piē]1.用眼一看 quick glance;〈比喻 fig.〉极短的时间 very short time：就在这一瞥之间，我已看出他那激动的心情。At a quick glance I noticed his agitation. 2.一眼看到的概况（多用做文章题目 oft. used in titles of articles）glimpse; brief survey：边城市场一瞥 A Glimpse of a Border-Town Market

一瞬
一瞬[yī shùn]转眼之间。形容时间极短。an instant; a flash; twinkling of an eye：火箭飞行，一瞬千里。The rocket flies one thousand li in a flash.

一知半解
一知半解[yī zhī bàn jiě] 知道得不全面，理解得不透彻 not know much about; have a smattering of knowledge of; have scanty knowledge of

一碗水端平
一碗水端平[yī wǎn shuǐ duān píng]〈比喻 fig.〉办事公道，不偏袒任何一方 hold a bowl of water level-be impartial

一神教
一神教[yī shén jiào]只信奉一个神的宗教，如基督教、伊斯兰教等（区别于‘多神教’ as compared with‘polytheism’）monotheism; belief that there is only one god, such as Christianity, Islamism, etc.

一程子
一程子[yī chéng zi]〈方 dial.〉一些日子 a number of days：我母亲来住了一程子，昨天刚走。My mother was here with us for a number of days. She left only yesterday.

一穷二白
一穷二白[yī qióng èr bái] 形容基础差，底子薄 poor and blank; poor economic foundation（穷 qiong：指工农业不发达 referring to underdeveloped industry and agriculture；白 bai：指文化科学水平不高 referring to low cultural and scientific levels）

一空
一空[yī kōng] 一点不剩 nothing is left：销售一空 be sold out抢劫一空 be robbed of everything one has

一窍不通
一窍不通[yī qiào bù tōng]〈比喻 fig.〉一点儿也不懂 do not know the first thing about; know nothing about (a subject); be utterly ignorant of; be beyond one's depth when it comes to sth.

一窝蜂
一窝蜂[yī wō fēng] 形容许多人乱哄哄地同时说话或行动 like a swarm of bees

一端
一端[yī duān]（事情的）一点或一个方面 one aspect or side of a matter：此其一端。This is one aspect of the matter.

一竿子到底
一竿子到底[yī gān zi dào dǐ]〈比喻 fig.〉直接贯彻到底 carry (a task or directive) right down to the grass-roots level; carry sth. through to the end亦 also 一竿子插到底 yī gān·zi chā dào dǐ

一笑置之
一笑置之[yī xiào zhì zhī] 笑一笑就把它搁在一旁，表示不拿它当回事 dismiss with a laugh (or smile); laugh off

一笔勾销
一笔勾销[yī bǐ gōu xiāo] 把账一笔抹去 write off at one stroke;〈比喻 fig.〉把一切完全取消 cancel

一笔带过
一笔带过[yī bǐ dài guò] 对事情只简单一提，不着重叙说或描述 mention casually; make a casual remark in passing

一笔抹杀
一笔抹杀[yī bǐ mǒ shā]〈比喻 fig.〉轻率地把优点、成绩等全部否定 blot out at one stroke; condemn out of hand; totally negate

一筹
一筹[yī chóu]计数的一根竹签。借指一着 (zhāo)。chip used as a counter; move：略逊一筹 be slightly inferior他的思维能力比一般人高出一筹。His thinking ability is better than that of ordinary people.

一筹莫展
一筹莫展[yī chóu mò zhǎn] 一点计策也施展不出；一点办法也想不出 can find no way out; be at one's wits' end; be at the end of one's tether

一箭双雕
一箭双雕[yī jiàn shuāng diāo]〈比喻 fig.〉一举两得 shoot two hawks with one arrow; kill two birds with one stone; serve a double purpose

一米线
一米线[yī mǐ xiàn] 银行、机场等距营业窗口或柜台前一米远的地面上划出的横线，正在办理存取款、验证等业务的人站在窗口、柜台前，其他等待办理的人站在线外 one-metre line; horizontal line drawn on the floor which is one metre from the business window or counter in a bank, airport, etc. so that those who are drawing or depositing money in the bank or have their passports examined in the airport stand in front of the window or counter while the others stand in waiting behind the line

一系列
一系列[yī xì liè]许许多多有关联的或一连串的（事物）a series of：一系列问题 a whole series of questions引起了一系列变化 bring about a number of changes采取了一系列措施 have taken a series of measures

一级市场
一级市场[yī jí shì chǎng] 指证券、商品房等首次发行、发售的市场 primary market; market where stocks are issued or houses put up for sale for the first time

一纸空文
一纸空文[yī zhǐ kōng wén] 指没有效用的文书 a mere scrap of paper

一线
一线1[yī xiàn]1.战争的最前线 war front; front line 2.指直接从事生产、教学、科研等活动的岗位 forefront (of production, teaching or scientific research)：深入车间慰问一线工人 go to the workshops and extend solicitude to the workers at the forefront of production一线2[yī xiàn] 形容极其细微 a ray of; a gleam of：一线阳光 a ray of sunlight一线光明 a ray (or gleam) of light一线希望 a gleam of hope一线生机 a slim chance of survival

一经
一经[yī jīng]〈副词 adv.〉表示只要经过某个步骤或者某种行为（下文说明就能产生相应的结果）as soon as; once (a certain step or action is taken to bring about a corresponding result)：一经解释，就恍然大悟。He sees the light as soon as an explanation is made.

一统
一统[yī tǒng]统一（国家）unify (a country)：一统天下 unify the whole country

一网打尽
一网打尽[yī wǎng dǎ jìn]〈比喻 fig.〉全部抓住或消灭 catch the whole lot in a dragnet; round up a whole gang at one fell swoop

一而再，再而三
一而再，再而三[yī ér zài， zài ér sān] 反复多次；再三 again and again; time and again; repeatedly

一股劲儿
一股劲儿[yī gǔ jìn r] 表示从始至终不松劲；一口气 without a break; at one go; at a stretch：一股劲儿地干 do sth. without a break

一股脑儿
一股脑儿[yī gǔ nǎo r]〈方 dial.〉通通 completely; lock, stock and barrel; root and branch：她兴奋得很，把要讲的话一股脑儿都讲出来了。She got so excited that she poured out all she had to say at once. 股也作 also put as 古 gǔ

一脉相传
一脉相传[yī mài xiāng chuán] 由一个血统或一个派别传下来 come down in one continuous line; can be traced to the same origin; be in the same line亦 also 一脉相承 yī mài xiāng chéng

一臂之力
一臂之力[yī bì zhī lì] 指其中的一部分力量或不大的力量 helping hand; part of or small strength：助你一臂之力 lend you a hand

一致
一致[yī zhì]1.没有分歧 showing no difference; identical; unanimous; consistent：看法一致 be of unanimous view; hold identical views步调一致 march in step; act in unison 2.一同；一齐 together：一致对外 unite to deal with outsiders, foreigners, an enemy, etc.

一般
一般[yī bān]1.一样；同样 same as; just like：哥儿俩长得一般高。The two brothers are of the same height.火车飞一般地向前驰去。The train flashed past like lightning. 2.一种 sort; kind：别有一般滋味 have a distinct taste 3.普通；通常 general; ordinary; common：一般性 generality; common quality一般化 generalization一般情况 ordinary circumstances他一早出去，一般要到天黑才回来。He goes out in the early morning, and usually does not return till dusk.一般地说，吃这种药是很见效的。Generally speaking, this type of medicine is very effective.

一般见识
一般见识[yī bān jiàn shi] 不跟知识、修养较差的人争执，叫做不跟他一般见识 lower oneself to the same level as sb. (used negatively when not wanting to argue with sb. less knowledgeable or accomplished)

一色
一色[yī sè]1.一样的颜色 of the same colour：水天一色。The waters and the sky blend in the same colour. 2.全部一样的；不混杂别的种类或式样的 of the same type; uniform：一色的大瓦房 brick-and-tile houses of a uniform style一色的江西瓷器 porcelain ware of the same style from Jiangxi

一落千丈
一落千丈[yī luò qiān zhàng] 形容地位、景况、声誉等下降得很厉害 (of status, situation, reputation, etc.) drop 1,000 zhang in one fall; suffer a drastic decline

一蟹不如一蟹
一蟹不如一蟹[yī xiè bù rú yī xiè]艾子来到沿海的地方，看见一物扁而圆，有很多腿。他不认识，就问当地居民，当地人告诉他那是一种螃蟹。后来艾子又看到了好几种螃蟹，但一种比一种小，艾子叹了口气说：‘怎么一蟹不如一蟹呢！’（见于托名苏轼的《艾子杂说》）后来比喻一个比一个糟。each crab is smaller than the last. When Aizi came to a coastal place, he saw a creature that was flat and round with many legs. He did not know what it was and asked local residents. He was told it was a species of crab. Later, he saw some other species, but each was smaller than the last. Aizi said with a sigh:‘Why is each crab smaller than the last?’(The Miscellanies of Aizi, compiled in the name of Su Shi) (fig.) Each one is worse than the last.

一行
一行[yī xíng]一群（指同行的人）a group (travelling together); party：参观团一行十二人已于昨日起程。A 12-member visiting group left yesterday.

一衣带水
一衣带水[yī yī dài shuǐ]水面像一条衣带那样窄。形容一水之隔，往来方便。narrow strip of water; (of two neighbouring countries) be separated by a narrow strip of water

一表人才
一表人才[yī biǎo rén cái] 形容人相貌英俊、风度潇洒 handsome; of striking appearance and demeanour

一表非凡
一表非凡[yī biǎo fēi fán] 形容人的仪表出众，很不寻常(of appearance) unlike the common run of men; handsome and spirited; impressive-looking

一见如故
一见如故[yī jiàn rú gù] 初次见面就很相投，像老朋友一样 feel like old friends at the first meeting; hit it off right from the start

一见钟情
一见钟情[yī jiàn zhōng qíng] 一见面就产生了爱情 fall in love at first sight

一视同仁
一视同仁[yī shì tóng rén] 同样看待，不分厚薄 treat equally without discrimination

一览
一览[yī lǎn]用图表或简明的文字做成的关于概况的说明（多用做书名 oft. used in book titles）general survey; bird's-eye view：《北京名胜古迹一览》A Guide to the Historical Sites and Scenic Spots of Beijing

一览表
一览表[yī lǎn biǎo] 说明概况的表格 table; schedule：行车时间一览表 (train or bus) timetable

一触即发
一触即发[yī chù jí fā]〈比喻 fig.〉形势非常紧张，马上会发生严重的事情 may break out at any moment; be on the verge of breaking out：矛盾一触即发。A conflict may break out at any moment.

一触即溃
一触即溃[yī chù jí kuì] 一碰就崩溃 collapse at the first encounter：敌军士气涣散，一触即溃。The enemy was demoralized and collapsed at the first encounter.

一言以蔽之
一言以蔽之[yī yán yǐ bì zhī] 用一句话来概括 to sum up in a word

一言堂
一言堂[yī yán táng]1.〈旧时 old〉商店挂的匾额，上写‘一言堂’三个字，表示不二价 horizontal shop signboard inscribed with the words‘no bargaining’2.指领导缺乏民主作风，不能听取群众意见，特别是不能听相反的意见（跟‘群言堂’相对 as opposed to‘conference hall where everybody has a say’）conference hall where one person has all the say; one person alone has the say; one person lays down the law. It implies that the leader adopts an undemocratic style of work and refuses to listen to criticisms and suggestions from his juniors.

一言既出，驷马难追
一言既出，驷马难追[yī yán jì chū， sì mǎ nán zhuī]一句话说出了口，就是套四匹马的车也追不上。形容话说出之后，无法再收回。a word once spoken cannot be taken back even by a team of four horses; what is said cannot be unsaid

一语破的
一语破的[yī yǔ pò dì] 一句话就说明关键 hit the mark with a single comment（的 di：箭靶 target;〈比喻 fig.〉关键 key; crucial point）

一诺千金
一诺千金[yī nuò qiān jīn]《史记·季布栾布列传》：‘得黄金百，不如得季布一诺’。后来用‘一诺千金’形容诺言的信用极高。promise worth 1,000 pieces of gold; promise that can be counted on. Records of the Historian·Biographies of Ji Bu and Luan Bu:‘Obtaining 100 pieces of gold is not as good as obtaining a promise from Ji Bu.’

一败涂地
一败涂地[yī bài tú dì] 形容败得不可收拾 fail completely; suffer a crushing defeat; be routed

一贫如洗
一贫如洗[yī pín rú xǐ] 形容穷得一无所有 penniless; utterly destitute

一贯
一贯[yī guàn]（思想、作风等）一向如此，从未改变 (of thinking, style, etc.) consistent; persistent; all along：谦虚、朴素是他一贯的作风。He consistently maintains a modest and simple style.

一起
一起[yī qǐ]1.同一个处所 in the same place：坐在一起 sit in the same place 2.一同 together; in company：张大叔明天进城，你一起去吧。Uncle Zhang will go downtown tomorrow. You may go along with him. 3.〈方 dial.〉一共 altogether; in all：这几件东西一起多少钱？How much is that altogether?

一路
一路[yī lù]1.在整个行程中；沿路 all the way; throughout the journey：一路平安 bon voyage一路顺风 have a good journey一路上庄稼长势很好，一片丰收景象。The crops along the way are growing well, promising a bumper harvest.一路上大家说说笑笑，很热闹。People chatted cheerfully all the way, and the atmosphere was very lively indeed. 2.同一类 of the same kind, type, category or sort：一路人 the same kind of people; birds of a feather一路货 one of a kind老王是拘谨一路，小张是旷达一路。Old Wang belongs to the category of the overcautious, while Little Zhang belongs to the category of the broad-minded. 3.一起（来、去、走）go the same way; take the same route：咱们一路走。Let's go the same way.我跟他一路来的。He and I came the same way. 4.〈方 dial.〉一个劲儿；一直 continuously; persistently：铝价一路下跌。The price of aluminum keeps dropping.

一蹴而就
一蹴而就[yī cù ér jiù]踏一步就成功。形容事情轻而易举，一下子就能完成。reach the goal in one step; accomplish one's aim in one move

一蹶不振
一蹶不振[yī jué bù zhèn]〈比喻 fig.〉一遭到挫折就不能再振作起来 collapse after a single setback; be unable to recover after a setback

一身
一身[yī shēn]1.全身；浑身 whole body; all over the body：一身是劲 feel vigorous all over the body一身是胆 one's whole body is all pluck -know no fear; be absolutely fearless 2.（一身儿 yīshēnr）一套（衣服）suit (of clothes)：一身工作服 a suit of work clothes 3.一个人 single person：独自一身 solitary; all alone一身二任 hold two posts at the same time

一身两役
一身两役[yī shēn liǎng yì] 一个人同时担任两件工作 hold two jobs at the same time; serve in a dual capacity

一身是胆
一身是胆[yī shēn shì dǎn] 形容胆量极大 one's whole body is all pluck; know no fear; be absolutely fearless

一辈子
一辈子[yī bèi zi] 一生 all one's life; throughout one's life; as long as one lives; a lifetime

一边
一边[yī biān]（～儿 yībiānr）1.东西的一面；事情的一方面 one side; side：这块木料有一边儿不光滑。One side of this piece of wood is not smooth.两方面争论，总有一边儿理屈。In a dispute between two parties, there is always one which is in the wrong. 2.旁边 beside：我们打球，他坐在一边看书。We play ball, and he sits to the side reading a book. 3.表示一个动作跟另一个动作同时进行 at the same time; simultaneously: (a)单用 [used alone]：他慢慢往前走，一边儿唱着歌儿。He sang as he slowly strolled along. (b)连用 [used consecutively]：他一边儿答应，一边儿放下手里的书。He put down the book in his hand as he responded. 4.〈方 dial.〉同样 the same; 同 same as 一般 yībān ①：他俩一边高。The two of them are of the same height.天下乌鸦一边黑。All crows under the sun are black. or Evil people all over the world are bad.

一边倒
一边倒[yī biān dǎo] 指完全倾向于对立双方中的一方 lean to one side; side with sb. without reservation

一连
一连[yī lián]〈副词 adv.〉表示动作继续不断或情况连续发生 in a row; in succession; running：一连下了三天雨。It rained for three days running.今天一连运到了四五批货。Today four or five batches of goods have arrived in succession.

一连串
一连串[yī lián chuàn]（行动、事情等）一个紧接着一个 a succession of (actions, issues, etc.); a series of; a string of; a chain of (events, etc.)：一连串的胜利 a string of victories一连串的打击 a series of blows

一连气儿
一连气儿[yī lián qì r]〈方 dial.〉一连 in a row; in succession; running：一连气儿唱了四五个歌。She sang four or five songs in a row.

一退六二五
一退六二五[yī tuì liù èr wǔ]本是一句珠算斤两法口诀，十六除一是0.0625，借用做推卸干净的意思。‘退’是‘推’的谐音，有时就说成‘推’。‘When one is divided by 16, it is 0.0625,’an abacus rhyme used figuratively to mean‘evade or deny all responsibility.’退 tuì (retreat) is the homophonic sound for 推 tuī (evade)，sometimes it is replaced by 推 tuī.

一通
一通[yī tòng]（～儿 yītòngr）一阵；一次 once; for one time：胡扯一通 shoot (the) bull他和我吵过一通。He quarrelled with me once.这一通打真不轻。The beating this time was not light.

一道
一道[yī dào]（～儿 yīdàor）一同 together; side by side; alongside; 同 same as 一路 yīlù ③：一道走 go together一道工作 work together

一针见血
一针见血[yī zhēn jiàn xiě]〈比喻 fig.〉说话简短而能说中要害 brief and to the point; pierce to the truth with one pertinent remark; hit the nail on the head

一锅煮
一锅煮[yī guō zhǔ]〈比喻 fig.〉不区别情况，对不同的事物作同样的处理 cook all things in one pot; treat different things in the same way亦 also 一锅烩 yī guō huì 或 or 一勺烩 yī sháo huì

一锅端
一锅端[yī guō duān]〈比喻 fig.〉全部消灭或尽其所有 wipe out; get rid of the whole lot; give all one has：把这伙贩毒分子来个一锅端。Wipe out this gang of drug traffickers completely.各种各样的意见，一锅端地往外倒。Various opinions are pouring out without reservation.

一锅粥
一锅粥[yī guō zhōu] 形容混乱的形象；一团糟 a pot of porridge; (fig.) complete mess; all in a muddle：乱成一锅粥 in a mess; in utter confusion

一锤子买卖
一锤子买卖[yī chuí zi mǎi mai] 不考虑以后怎样，只做一次的交易（多用于比喻 oft. used in a figurative way）one-time deal; the one and only business deal to be made with sb. regardless of future consequences

一锤定音
一锤定音[yī chuí dìng yīn]〈比喻 fig.〉凭某个人的一句话做出最后决定 set the tune with one beat of the gong; give the final word; 锤也作 also put as 槌 chuí

一门心思
一门心思[yī mén xīn si] 一心一意；集中精神 heart and soul; wholeheartedly; with great concentration：他一门心思搞技术革新。He throws himself wholeheartedly into technological innovation.老汉在一门心思地磨着镰刀。The old man is sharpening his sickle with great concentration.

一阵
一阵[yī zhèn]（～儿 yīzhènr）动作或情形继续的一段时间 a burst; a fit; a peal：一阵掌声 a burst of applause一阵狂风 a violent gust of wind; a blast (of wind)说一阵笑一阵 now talking, now laughing亦 also 一阵子 yīzhèn·zi

一阵风
一阵风[yī zhèn fēng]1.形容动作快 like a whirlwind：同学们一阵风地冲了上来。The students rushed forth like a whirlwind. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉行动短暂，不能持久 transient; in a flash; very brief：搞科学实验，不能一阵风。Making scientific experiments must not be a transient thing.

一隅
一隅[yī yú]〈书 fml.〉1.一个角落 corner：一隅之地 very small area偏安一隅 be content to exercise sovereignty over only part of the country 2.偏于一方面的 one-sided; limited; narrow：一隅之见 very narrow or limited view

一隅三反
一隅三反[yī yú sān fǎn]另见  举一反三 jǔ yī fǎn sān

一零儿
一零儿[yī líng r]〈方 dial.〉零头 fraction：我知道的这一点儿，连人家的一零儿也比不上啊。What little I know isn't even a fraction of what he knows.

一霎
一霎[yī shà] 一会儿；短时间 in an instant; in a moment：一霎间 in a flash一霎时 quick as flash就一霎工夫 just a moment

一面
一面[yī miàn]1.（一面儿 yīmiànr）物体的几个面之一 one side (of an object)：缎子一面光一面毛。Satin is lustrous on one side and dull on the other.这房子朝北的一面只开了一个小窗。The house has only a small window on the north side. 2.一个方面 one aspect：一面倒 lean to one side一面之词 statement of only one of the parties独当一面 assume responsibility for a certain task or field of work 3.表示一个动作跟另一个动作同时进行 at the same time; simultaneously: (a)单用 [used alone]：说着话，一面朝窗户外面看。So saying, he looked out of the window. (b)连用 [used consecutively]：一面走，一面唱 singing while walking 4.〈书 fml.〉见过一次面 have met once before：一面之识 have met once未尝一面 have never met before

一面之交
一面之交[yī miàn zhī jiāo] 只见过一次面的交情 have met only once; be casually acquainted亦 also 一面之雅 yī miàn zhī yǎ

一面之词
一面之词[yī miàn zhī cí] 争执双方的一方所说的话 statement of only one of the parties

一面儿理
一面儿理[yī miàn r lǐ] 一方面的理由；片面的道理 one party's version; biased account; lopsided or one-sided argument

一顺儿
一顺儿[yī shùn r] 同一个方向或顺序 in the same direction or order：村里新盖的房子，一顺儿都是朝南的瓦房。All the new houses in the village are brick-and-tile ones and they all face south.

一风吹
一风吹[yī fēng chuī]〈比喻 fig.〉一笔勾销 scatter to the winds; dismiss all charges; cancel the whole thing

一马平川
一马平川[yī mǎ píng chuān] 能够纵马疾驰的平地 wide expanse of flat land; wide stretch of flat country：翻过山岗，就是一马平川了。After crossing the ridge there is a wide expanse of flat land.

一马当先
一马当先[yī mǎ dāng xiān]作战时策马冲锋在前。形容领先；带头。gallop at the head; take the lead; be in the forefront

一鳞半爪
一鳞半爪[yī lín bàn zhǎo]〈比喻 fig.〉零星片段的事物 odd bits; fragments亦 also 东鳞西爪 dōng lín xī zhǎo

一鸣惊人
一鸣惊人[yī míng jīng rén]《史记·滑稽列传》：‘此鸟不飞则已，一飞冲天；不鸣则已，一鸣惊人。’比喻平时没有特殊的表现，一干就有惊人的成绩。(of an obscure person) amaze the world with a single brilliant feat; set the world on fire; originally from Records of the Historian·Biographies of Jesters:‘This bird does not fly unless it is able to soar up into the sky in one swoop; and it does not cry unless it is able to amaze the world.’

一鼓作气
一鼓作气[yī gǔ zuò qì]《左传》庄公十年：‘夫战，勇气也。一鼓作气，再而衰，三而竭。’意思是打仗靠勇气，擂一通鼓，勇气振作起来了，两通鼓，勇气就衰了，三通鼓，勇气就完了。后来用来比喻趁劲头大的时候一下子把事情完成。press on to the finish without letup; get sth. done in one vigorous effort. The Zuo Commentary ·Duke Zhuang 10th Year:‘To fight relies on courage. The fighting spirit aroused by the first roll of drum is depleted by the second and exhausted by the third.’

一鼻孔出气
一鼻孔出气[yī bí kǒng chū qì]〈比喻 fig.〉持有同样的态度和主张（含贬义 derog.）breathe through the same nostrils; sing the same tune

一齐
一齐[yī qí]〈副词 adv.〉表示同时 at the same time; simultaneously; in unison：队伍一齐出动。The troops are going into action simultaneously.全场一齐鼓掌。The audience started clapping in unison.人和行李一齐到了。The luggage arrived at the same time as the passengers.

丁
丁1[dīng]（ㄉㄧㄥ）1.成年男子 grown man：成丁 reach manhood; come of age; reach the age of adulthood壮丁 able-bodied man 2.指人口 population：添丁 have a baby born into the family丁口 population人丁 population 3.称从事某些职业的人 person engaged in a certain occupation：园丁 gardener 4.(Dīng) 姓 a surname丁2[dīng]（ㄉㄧㄥ）天干的第四位 4th of the 10 Heavenly Stems另见  干支 gānzhī丁3[dīng]（ㄉㄧㄥ）（丁儿 dīngr）蔬菜、肉类等切成的小块 cube; small cubes of meat or vegetable：黄瓜丁儿 diced cucumber辣子炒鸡丁 diced chicken with hot pepper丁4[dīng]（ㄉㄧㄥ）〈书 fml.〉遭逢；碰到 meet with; run into; encounter; confront：丁忧 encounter a parent's death; in mourning for one's parent丁兹盛世 born into this prosperous age另见  zhēng丁[zhēng]（ㄓㄥ）[丁丁]〈书 fml.〉〈拟声词 onom.〉形容伐木、下棋、弹琴等声音 sound of chopping wood, playing chess, plucking strings (of a musical instrument, etc.)：伐木丁。Clang, clang goes the woodman's axe.另见  dīng相关词组白丁 | 兵丁 | 丙丁 | 补丁 | 布丁 | 抽丁 | 家丁 | 抗丁 | 拉丁 | 冷丁 | 零丁 | 门丁 | 人丁 | 添丁 | 团丁 | 园丁 | 壮丁 | 抽壮丁 | 凡尔丁 | 冷不丁 | 猛不丁 | 猛孤丁 | 尼古丁 | 抓壮丁 | 可丁可卯 | 拉丁字母 | 一丁点儿 | 目不识丁丁坝 | 丁部 | 丁册 | 丁当 | 丁东 | 丁冬 | 丁艰 | 丁零 | 丁宁 | 丁香 | 丁忧 | 丁村人 | 丁点儿 | 丁字尺 | 丁字钢 | 丁字街 | 丁克家庭 | 丁零当啷 | 丁是丁，卯是卯

丁东
丁东[dīng dōng]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容玉石、金属等撞击的声音 tinkle; clink; ding-dong; jingle; sound produced by two pieces of jade, metal, etc., striking against each other：玉佩丁东 tinkling of jade ornaments亦 also 丁冬 dīngdōng

丁克家庭
丁克家庭[dīng kè jiā tíng] 指夫妇都有收入并且不打算生育孩子的家庭 DINK (abbr. for‘double income, no kids’); family of a married couple who both have incomes but have no intention to have children

丁册
丁册[dīng cè]〈旧时 old〉指户口簿 residence booklet

丁冬
丁冬[dīng dōng] 同 same as 丁东 dīngdōng

丁坝
丁坝[dīng bà] 一端跟堤岸连接成丁字形的坝，能改变水流，使河岸不受冲刷 spur dyke; dyke built at a right angle to the bank of a river to reduce erosion of the bank by changing the direction of the water current

丁字尺
丁字尺[dīng zì chǐ] 绘图的用具，多用木料或塑料制成，形状像丁字 T-square; T-shaped ruler used in drawing, oft. made of wood or plastic

丁字街
丁字街[dīng zì jiē] 呈T形的街道 T-junction; T-shaped road junction

丁字钢
丁字钢[dīng zì gāng] 断面呈 T 形的条状钢材 T-steel; steel bar with T-shaped fracture; 通常称作 commonly known as 丁字铁 dīngzìtiě

丁宁
丁宁[dīng níng] 同 same as 叮咛 dīngníng

丁当
丁当[dīng dāng]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容金属、瓷器、玉饰等撞击的声音 jingle; clatter; ding-dong; clink; tinkle; sound made by metal pieces, porcelain ware, jade ornaments, etc., striking against each other：环佩丁当 tinkling of jade ornaments铁马丁当 tinkling of metal chimes hanging from the eaves of pagodas and temples碟子碗碰得丁丁当当的。Dishes and bowls clinked against each other.亦 also 叮当 dīngdāng 或 or 玎珰 dīngdāng

丁忧
丁忧[dīng yōu]〈书 fml.〉遭到父母的丧事 in mourning for one's parent

丁是丁，卯是卯
丁是丁，卯是卯[dīng shì dīng, mǎo shì mǎo] 形容对事情认真，一点儿不含糊、不马虎 keep ding (a Heavenly Stem) distinct from mao (an Earthly Branch) - be strict, precise or unaccommodating亦 also 钉是钉，铆是铆 dīng shì dīng, mǎo shì mǎo

丁村人
丁村人[Dīng cūn rén] 古代人类的一种，生活在旧石器时代中期，化石在1954年发现于山西襄汾县丁村 Dingcun Man, primitive man dating back to the mid-Palaeolithic Age, whose fossil remains were found in Dingcun Village in Xiangfen County, Shanxi Province, in 1954

丁点儿
丁点儿[dīng diǎn r]〈方 dial.〉〈量词 classifier〉表示极少或极小（程度比‘点儿’深 to a larger degree than‘点儿’diǎnr）a tiny bit; a little bit; the tiniest; the slightest：一丁点儿毛病也没有。There isn't the slightest flaw.这丁点儿事何必放在心上。Don't worry yourself over such trifles.

丁艰
丁艰[dīng jiān]〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 丁忧 dīngyōu

丁部
丁部[dīng bù] 集部 collection of literary works

丁零
丁零[dīng líng]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容铃声或小的金属物体的撞击声 tinkle; jingle; ding-a-ling; dingling; ring; sound of a bell or of small objects striking against each other：铜铃丁零丁零地响。The copper bell is ringing.

丁零当啷
丁零当啷[dīng ling dāng lāng]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容金属、瓷器等连续撞击声 jingle-jangle; cling-clang; ding-dong; sound produced by pieces of metal, porcelain, etc., continuously striking against each other

丁香
丁香1[dīng xiāng]1.落叶灌木或小乔木，叶子卵圆形或肾脏形，花紫色或白色，有香味，花冠长筒状。供观赏。lilac (Syringa vulgaris); deciduous shrub or small tree with oval or kidney-shaped leaves and fragrant tubular white or purple flowers, cultivated for ornamentation 2.这种植物的花 flower of this plant亦 also 丁香花 dīngxiānghuā 或 or 紫丁香 zǐdīngxiāng丁香2[dīng xiāng]常绿乔木，叶子长椭圆形，花淡红色，果实长球形。生在热带地方。花可入药，种子可以榨丁香油，用做芳香剂。clove (Eugenia aromatica); tropical evergreen tree with elongated oval leaves, pale-red flowers, and oblong bulb-shaped fruits, the flowers of which are used as medicine, and the seeds for making clove oil, an aromatic

七
七[qī]（ㄑㄧ）1.〈数目 numeral〉六加一后所得 seven; or six plus one; 另见  数字 shùzì 2.〈旧时 old〉人死后每隔七天祭奠一次，直到第四十九天为止，共分七个‘七’ 7th-day mourning period; Chinese custom to hold a memorial service on every 7th day following a person's death until the 49th day注意 NOTE：‘七’字单用或在一词一句末尾或在阴平、阳平、上声字前念阴平，如‘十七、五七、一七得七、七夕、七年、七两’；在去声字前念阳平，如‘七月、七位’。本词典为简便起见，条目中的‘七’字，都注阴平。 The character 七 is pronounced in the high and level tone when it is used independently or at the end of a phrase or sentence, such as in 十七 shíqī, 五七 wǔqī, 一七得七 yī qī dé qī, 七夕 qīxī, 七年 qīnián, 七两 qīliǎng; and it is pronounced in the rising tone when it precedes a character that is pronounced in the falling tone, such as in 七月 qīyuè and 七位 qīwèi. For the sake of convenience, the 七 in all entries of this dictionary is marked with a level tone.七[qí]（ㄑㄧˊ）另见  七 qī相关词组断七 | 横七竖八 | 夹七夹八 | 零七八碎 | 乱七八糟 | 歪七扭八 | 乌七八糟 | 污七八糟 | 杂七杂八 | 五劳七伤 | 二七大罢工 | 不管三七二十一七古 | 七绝 | 七律 | 七七 | 七窍 | 七夕 | 七一 | 七巧板 | 七色板 | 七弦琴 | 七言诗 | 七…八… | 七步之才 | 七老八十 | 七七事变 | 七窍生烟 | 七十二行

七…八…
七…八…[qī bā] 嵌用名词或动词（包括词素），表示多或多而杂乱 [nouns or verbs are inserted in this combination to indicate a large amount or a mess]：～手～脚 with everybody lending a hand～嘴～舌 with everybody talking and nobody listening; with everybody trying to put in a word or two～拼～凑 knock together; scissors-and-paste～颠～倒 at sixes and sevens; topsy-turvy～零～落 scattered here and there; in disarray～上～下 on tenterhooks; on pins and needles～扭～歪 be twisted this way and that; crooked～折～扣（折扣很大）one deduction after another

七一
七一[Qī Yī]中国共产党建党纪念日。1921年7月下旬中国共产党召开第一次全国代表大会，1941年党中央决定以召开这次大会的7月份的第一天，即7月1日，为党的生日。July 1st Party Day; anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China in late July 1921, which is celebrated on the first day of July according to a 1941 Party decision

七七
七七[qī qī] 旧俗人死后每七天祭奠一次，最后一次是第四十九天，叫七七 (old custom) ‘Double Seven’ service; 7th memorial service that falls on the last day of the seven-period, 49-day memorial for a deceased亦 also 尽七 jìnqī, 满七 mǎnqī 或 or 断七 duàn∥qī

七七事变
七七事变[Qī Qī Shì biàn]1937年7月7日，日本侵略军突然向我国北平（今北京）西南卢沟桥驻军进攻，驻军奋起抗击，抗日战争从此开始。这次事变叫做七七事变。July 7th Incident of 1937; on July 7, 1937, the Japanese invaders raided the Chinese garrison at the Lugou Bridge to the southwest of present-day Beijing, known in the West as Marco Polo Bridge, and the Chinese army rose in a counterattack, thus unveiling the War of Resistance against Japan;亦 also 卢沟桥事变 Lúgōuqiáo Shìbiàn

七十二行
七十二行[qī shí èr háng] 泛指工、农、商等各行各业 all professions and trades; all walks of life：七十二行，行行出状元。You can excel no matter what job you do.

七古
七古[qī gǔ] 每句七字的古体诗 classical style of poetry with seven characters to each line另见  古体诗 gǔtǐshī

七夕
七夕[qī xī] 农历七月初七的晚上。神话传说，天上的牛郎织女每年在这天晚上相会。 7th evening of the 7th lunar month, when the legendary Herd Boy joins the Weaving Girl for their annual tryst

七巧板
七巧板[qī qiǎo bǎn] 一种玩具，用正方形薄板或厚纸裁成形状不同的七小块，可以拼成各种图形 tangram; Chinese puzzle square cut into seven pieces to be combined into a variety of patterns

七弦琴
七弦琴[qī xián qín] 古琴 Chinese zither

七律
七律[qī lǜ]律诗的一种。一首八句，每句七个字。eight-line poem with seven characters to each line and a strict tonal pattern and rhyme scheme; septisyllabic (or seven-syllable) regulated verse另见  律诗 lǜshī

七步之才
七步之才[qī bù zhī cái] 指敏捷的文才 seven-step talent; literary genius另见  煮豆燃萁 zhǔ dòu rán qí

七窍
七窍[qī qiào] 指两眼、两耳、两鼻孔和口 seven orifices in the human head, referring to eyes, ears, nostrils and mouth：七窍流血 bleed from every orifice

七窍生烟
七窍生烟[qī qiào shēng yān] 形容气愤之极，好像耳目口鼻都冒火 livid; as if one's ears, eyes, mouth and nostrils are spitting rage

七绝
七绝[qī jué] 绝句的一种。一首四句，每句七个字 four-line poem with seven characters to a line and a strict tonal pattern and rhyme scheme; septisyllabic (or seven-syllable) quatrain另见  绝句 juéjù

七老八十
七老八十[qī lǎo bā shí] 指年纪很老，七八十岁 in late seventies and early eighties; very old：别看他七老八十的，身体硬朗着呢。He looks hale and hearty despite his old age.

七色板
七色板[qī sè bǎn] 光学仪器，是一块涂着红、橙、黄、绿、蓝、靛、紫七种颜色的圆板，固定在横轴上，如果急速旋转，就呈现白色，可以用它证明由七种色光合成白光的原理 Newton's disk; seven-colour disk; optical apparatus in the form of a disk fixed on a horizontal axis and painted red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet, which blend into the colour white when the disk is set to turn around rapidly, thereby justifying the principle that light is the compound of the seven colours

七言诗
七言诗[qī yán shī] 每句七字的旧诗，有七言古诗、七言律诗和七言绝句 poem with seven characters to a line, including the seven-syllable poem, the eight-line poem with seven characters to each line, and the four-line poem with seven characters to each line, with the latter two governed by a strict tonal pattern and a rhyme scheme

万
万[mò]（ㄇㄛˋ）[万俟] (Mòqí) 姓 a surname另见  wàn万[wàn]（ㄨㄢˋ）（萬）1.〈数目 numerical〉十个千 ten thousand 2.形容很多 large number：万国 all nations万事 everything万物 multitude of things on earth万水千山 vastness of a country; a myriad of rivers and a thousand mountains 3.极；很；绝对 absolutely; under all circumstances：万全 foolproof万不得已 last resort万不能行 by no means 4.(Wàn) 姓 a surname另见  mò相关词组百万 | 巨万 | 千万 | 亿万 | 十万火急 | 亿万斯年 | 包罗万象 | 雷霆万钧 | 鹏程万里 | 气象万千 | 千…万… | 日理万机 | 瞬息万变 | 腰缠万贯 | 一本万利 | 遗臭万年 | 成千成万 | 挂一漏万 | 盈千累万 | 十万八千里万般 | 万代 | 万端 | 万恶 | 万方 | 万分 | 万福 | 万贯 | 万国 | 万机 | 万籁 | 万历 | 万民 | 万难 | 万能 | 万年 | 万千 | 万顷 | 万全 | 万世 | 万事 | 万死 | 万岁 | 万万 | 万物 | 万象 | 万幸 | 万一 | 万丈 | 万众 | 万状 | 万户侯 | 万花筒 | 万金油 | 万年历 | 万事通 | 万维网 | 万用表 | 万不得已 | 万儿八千 | 万古长青 | 万劫不复 | 万马齐喑 | 万念俱灰 | 万人空巷 | 万寿无疆 | 万水千山 | 万无一失 | 万有引力 | 万众一心 | 万紫千红 | 万变不离其宗 | 万事俱备，只欠东风

万一
万一[wàn yī]1.万分之一，表示极小的一部分 one in ten thousand; extremely small part：笔墨不能形容其万一。It simply beggars description. 2.指可能性极小的意外变化 eventuality; in case：多带几件衣服，以防万一。Bring more clothes just in case. 3.〈连词 conj.〉表示可能性极小的假设（用于不如意的事 used for an unfavourable thing）in case; if by any chance：万一下雨也不要紧，我带着伞呢。I've brought along an umbrella, so it doesn't matter if it rains.

万万
万万[wàn wàn]1.数目，一万个万，也表示数量大 hundred million; countless 2.绝对；无论如何（用于否定式 used in the negative）absolutely：万万想不到 have never imagined that ...万万不可粗心大意。On no account shall (we) be careless.

万丈
万丈[wàn zhàng] 形容很高或很深 lofty; bottomless; infinite：光芒万丈 shine in full splendour气焰万丈 overweening insolence万丈高楼 towering building万丈深渊 abyss

万不得已
万不得已[wàn bù dé yǐ] 实在没有办法；不得不这样 out of absolute necessity; as a last resort：万不得已，才出此下策 have no choice but to take a stupid step

万世
万世[wàn shì] 很多世代；年代非常久远 all ages; generation after generation：千秋万世 eternity万世师表 model for posterity万世不朽 immortal

万事
万事[wàn shì] 一切事情 everything; all things：万事大吉（一切事情都很圆满顺利）。All's well and propitious.万事亨通（一切事情都很顺利）。Everything goes without a hitch.万事不求人 be self-independent; never turn to anybody for help

万事俱备，只欠东风
万事俱备，只欠东风[wàn shì jù bèi, zhǐ qiàn dōng fēng]三国时周瑜计划火攻曹操，一切都准备好了，只差东风还没有刮起来，不能顺风放火（事见《三国演义》第四十九回）。后比喻样样都准备好了，只差最后一个重要条件。During the Three Kingdoms Period, Zhou Yu, general of the State of Wu planned to attack Cao Cao's army with fire. All was ready except that the east wind hadn't risen (see Romance of Three Kingdoms·Chapter 49). (fig.) All is ready or in hand except what is crucial.

万事通
万事通[wàn shì tōng] 什么事情都知道的人（含讥讽意 derog.）know-all亦 also 百事通 bǎishìtōng

万人空巷
万人空巷[wàn rén kōng xiàng] 家家户户的人都从巷里出来了，多用来形容庆祝、欢迎等盛况 whole town turning out (to celebrate or to welcome sb.)

万代
万代[wàn dài] 同 same as 万世 wànshì：万代传扬 carried forward through the ages千秋万代 eternity

万众
万众[wàn zhòng] 广大群众；千千万万的人 millions of people; the multitude：万众欢腾 millions rejoice万众一心 (of a nation) united as one; of one heart and one mind

万众一心
万众一心[wàn zhòng yī xīn] 千千万万的人一条心 millions of people all of one mind

万儿八千
万儿八千[wàn er bā qiān] 一万或比一万略少 ten thousand or a bit less

万全
万全[wàn quán] 非常周到，没有任何漏洞；非常安全 sure-fire; foolproof：万全之策 foolproof strategy计出万全 work out a perfect plan

万分
万分[wàn fēn] 非常；极其 very much; extremely：万分高兴 feel elated; very happy

万劫不复
万劫不复[wàn jié bù fù] 表示永远不能恢复（佛家称世界从生成到毁灭的一个过程为一劫，万劫就是万世的意思） lost for ever; beyond redemption. In Buddhism, the process of the world from birth to demise is known as a kalpa (epoch), and so 10,000 kalpa means ‘eternity’.

万千
万千[wàn qiān]1.形容数量多 countless; innumerous; myriad：万千的科学家 numerous scientists 2.形容事物所表现的方面多（多指抽象的 oft. of abstract things）multifarious：变化万千 constant changes气象万千 kaleidoscopic scene思绪万千 myriads of thoughts come to mind

万历
万历[Wàn lì] 明神宗（朱翊钧）年号（公元1573-1620） Wanli, title of the reign (1573-1620) of Emperor Shenzong (Zhu Yijun) of the Ming Dynasty

万变不离其宗
万变不离其宗[wàn biàn bù lí qí zōng] 形式上变化很多，本质上还是没有变化 change ten thousand times without leaving the original aim or stand; change time and again, yet stay much the same

万古长青
万古长青[wàn gǔ cháng qīng] 永远像春天的草木一样欣欣向荣 remain forever as fresh as the trees of spring; be everlasting亦 also 万古长春 wàngǔ cháng chūn

万国
万国[wàn guó] 很多的国家；世界各国 all nations in the world：万国博览会 world exposition

万寿无疆
万寿无疆[wàn shòu wú jiāng] 永远生存（祝寿的话） (wish you) boundless longevity

万岁
万岁[wàn suì]1.千秋万世，永远存在（祝愿的话 good wishes）long live ... 2.封建时代臣民对皇帝的称呼 (feudal term of address for an emperor) Your Majesty; His Majesty

万年
万年[wàn nián] 极其久远的年代 eternity：遗臭万年 be consigned to an eternity of notoriety

万年历
万年历[wàn nián lì] 包括很多年或适用于很多年的历书 perpetual calendar

万幸
万幸[wàn xìng] 非常幸运（多指免于灾难 oft. survive a disaster）by sheer luck：损失点儿东西是小事，人没有压坏，总算万幸。How lucky everyone survived the crash! The loss of a few things was nothing in comparison.

万念俱灰
万念俱灰[wàn niàn jù huī]一切想法、打算都破灭了。形容失意或受到沉重打击后极端灰心失望的心情。all hope dashed to pieces; abandon oneself to despair; be utterly despondent

万恶
万恶[wàn è] 极端恶毒；罪恶多端 utterly evil; downright vicious：万恶不赦 iniquitous; be vicious beyond redemption

万户侯
万户侯[wàn hù hóu]汉代侯爵的最高一级，享有万户农民的赋税。后来泛指高官贵爵。marquis with a fief of 10,000 families, the highest ducal rank of the Han Dynasty; (in a broad sense) high officials and noble men

万方
万方[wàn fāng]1.指全国各地或世界各地 every nook and cranny of the country or world 2.指姿态多种多样 rich and variegated：仪态万方 be graceful in a bewitching way

万无一失
万无一失[wàn wú yī shī] 绝对不会出差错 perfectly safe; cannot fail under any circumstances

万有引力
万有引力[wàn yǒu yǐn lì] 物体之间相互吸引的力 universal gravitation; gravitational attraction; 简称 abbr. 引力 yǐnlì

万机
万机[wàn jī] 指当政者处理的各种重要事情 numerous state affairs：日理万机 attend to numerous state affairs on a daily basis

万死
万死[wàn sǐ] 死一万次（夸张说法），形容受严厉惩罚或冒生命危险 die ten thousand deaths; be severely punished; risk one's life：罪该万死 be so guilty as to deserve ten thousand deaths万死不辞 willing to risk a thousand deaths (for a noble cause)

万民
万民[wàn mín] 广大的老百姓 broad masses of populace：万民涂炭（形容广大老百姓陷入极端困苦的境地）entire population in dire misery万民欢呼。The entire nation rejoices.

万水千山
万水千山[wàn shuǐ qiān shān]很多的山和水。形容路途遥远险阻。ten thousand torrents and a thousand crags; trials of a long and arduous journey

万物
万物[wàn wù] 宇宙间的一切事物 multitude of things in universe; all things of creation; all things on earth; myriad things

万状
万状[wàn zhuàng] 很多种样子，表示程度极深（多用于消极事物 of sth. negative）in all manifestations; in every way; extremely：危险万状 hang by a thread; extremely dangerous惊恐万状 utterly frightened痛苦万状 in excruciating pain狼狈万状 be utterly flustered

万用表
万用表[wàn yòng biǎo] 测量电路或元件的电阻、电流、电压等的多量程仪表 avometer; multimeter; universal meter; apparatus for measuring resistance, current and voltage in a circuit or component part亦 also 万能表 wànnéngbiǎo

万福
万福[wàn fú]〈旧时 old〉妇女行的敬礼，两手松松抱拳重叠在胸前右下侧上下移动，同时略做鞠躬的姿势 (of a woman) curtsy; gesture of respect or reverence made by a woman, in which one hand is loosely cupped in another and moves up and down before the lower-right side of the chest, with her head slightly bowed

万端
万端[wàn duān]（头绪）极多而纷繁；各种各样 (of moods) multifarious：感慨万端 a turmoil of feelings wells up in one's mind变化万端 kaleidoscopic changes思绪万端 overwhelmed by a swamp of thoughts

万籁
万籁[wàn lài] 各种声音 all kinds of sounds（籁 lai：从孔穴里发出的声音 sound from a hole）：万籁俱寂。All is quiet in this part of the world.

万紫千红
万紫千红[wàn zǐ qiān hóng] 形容百花齐放，颜色艳丽 (of flowers) in a riot of colour;〈比喻 fig.〉事物丰富多彩或事业繁荣兴旺 (of a cause, undertaking, etc.) thriving; (of things) richly variegated

万维网
万维网[Wàn wéi wǎng] 电子计算机网络的一种信息服务系统，建立在超文本的基础上，方便用户在因特网上搜索和浏览各种信息 World Wide Web (WWW); web; computer web information service system established on the basis of hypertext, for the convenience of users retrieving and reading information on the Internet

万能
万能[wàn néng]1.无所不能 omnipotent; all-powerful：金钱不是万能的。Money cannot always make the mare go. 2.有多种用途的 multi-purpose：万能胶 all-purpose glue万能机床 universal machine tool

万般
万般[wàn bān]1.各种各样 all kinds 2.极其；非常 utterly; extremely：万般无奈（没有一点办法）have no alternative; have no choice

万花筒
万花筒[wàn huā tǒng]圆筒形玩具，两头镶着玻璃，筒的内壁装着玻璃条组成的几面镜子，筒的一端放着各种颜色和形状的碎玻璃。向着亮处转动圆筒，由于镜子的反射作用，可以从筒的另一端看到各种图案。kaleidoscope; tube-shaped toy that is rotated to produce a succession of symmetrical designs by means of mirrors reflecting the constantly changing patterns made by bits of coloured glass at one end of the tube

万象
