According to Chinese railway rules, trains going from Beijing are numbered in odd numbers, such as Train No. 11 and Train No. 103. 另见  上行 shàngxíng 2.船从上游向下游行驶 (of boats) going downstream; downriver 3.公文从上级发往下级 (of official documents) being issued to the lower levels：下行公文 documents issued to lower levels

下议院
下议院[xià yì yuàn]两院制议会的组成部分。原是英国议会中的平民院的别称，后来泛指两院制中议员按人口比例或选区选举产生的议院，如美国的众议院，法国的国民议会，荷兰的二院等。House of Commons or the lower house of the British Parliament; lower house; lower chamber; branch of a bicameral legislature whose members are elected according to size of population or electorate, such as the House of Representatives of the United States, the National Assembly of the French Parliament, and the Second Chamber of the States General (Staten Generral) of the Netherlands;亦 also 下院 xiàyuàn

下课
下课[xià kè] 上课时间结束 finish class; class is dismissed or over[补义 new sense] 指辞职或被撤换 resign; be fired：几个队的主教练先后下课。The head coaches of several teams were fired one after another.

下调
下调[xià tiáo]（价格、利率）向下调整 reduce; lower; cut (price, interest rate, etc.)

下账
下账[xià zhàng] 把账目登记在账本上 enter into the account book

下贱
下贱[xià jiàn]1.〈旧时 old〉指出身或社会地位低下；低贱 of humble origin; low in social status 2.卑劣下流（骂人的话 curse）abject; low; mean; degrading

下跌
下跌[xià diē]（水位、价格等）下降 (of water level, price, etc.) fall; drop; plunge

下身
下身[xià shēn]1.身体的下半部。有时专指阴部。lower part of the body; private parts; genitals 2.（下身儿 xiàshēnr）指裤子 trousers; pants

下车伊始
下车伊始[xià chē yī shǐ] 指官吏初到任所 moment one alights from the official carriage; moment one takes up a post; immediately on arrival at a new post

下载
下载[xià zài]把信息从互联网或其他电子计算机上输入到某台电子计算机上（跟‘上载’相对 as opposed to‘upload’）download; transfer information to a computer from the Internet or another computer

下辈
下辈[xià bèi]（～儿 xiàbèir）1.指子孙 children and grandchildren; offspring 2.家族中的下一代 younger generation of a family

下辈子
下辈子[xià bèi zi] 来世 next life

下边
下边[xià bian]（～儿 xià·bianr） 同 same as 下面 xià·mian

下达
下达[xià dá]向下级发布或传达（命令、指示等）make (an order, instruction, etc.) known (or transmit) to subordinates：下达通知 issue a notice

下酒
下酒[xià jiǔ]1.就着菜把酒喝下去 go with wine 2.适宜于和酒一起吃 go well with wine：这个菜下饭不下酒。This dish goes well with rice but not with wine.

下里
下里[xià li] 用在数目字后面，表示方面或方位 [used after a numeral to indicate direction or position]：把敌人四下里包围起来。Surround the enemy troops on all sides.

下里巴人
下里巴人[xià lǐ bā rén] 战国时代楚国的民间歌曲（下里即乡里，巴人指巴蜀的人民，表明做歌曲的人和地方），后来泛指通俗的普及的文学艺术，常跟‘阳春白雪’对举 popular literature and art; ‘Songs of the Rustic Poor’, title of a folk song of the State of Chu during the Warring States Period（下里 xiali: rural area; 巴人 baren: people of the ancient states of Ba and Shu）; general term oft. set in contrast with ‘The Spring Snow’ (highbrow literature and art)

下野
下野[xià yě] 执政的人被迫下台 (of a ruler) retire from the political arena; be forced to relinquish power

下问
下问[xià wèn] 向地位比自己低、知识比自己少的人请教 stoop to learn from sb. of a lower status or less learned than oneself：不耻下问 do not feel ashamed to ask and learn from the rank and file; be modest enough to consult one's inferiors

下降
下降[xià jiàng] 从高到低；从多到少 descend; go or come down; drop; fall; decline：地壳下降 sinking of earth's crust飞机下降 descend of an aircraft气温下降 drop in the temperature成本下降 drop in production costs

下限
下限[xià xiàn]时间最晚或数量最小的限度（跟‘上限’相对 as opposed to ‘ceiling’）floor; floor level; the latest; minimum

下陷
下陷[xià xiàn] 向下或向内凹进 sunken; hollow：眼眶下陷 sunken eyes地基下陷 subsidence of the foundation of a building

下面
下面[xià mian]（～儿 xià·mianr） 1.位置较低的地方 below; under; underneath：轮船从南京长江大桥下面顺流而下。The steamboat sailed downstream from underneath the Yangtze River Bridge at Nanjing.在山顶远望，下面是一片金黄的麦田。Looking into the distance from the top of the mountain, one sees a reach of golden wheat fields. 2.次序靠后的部分；文章或讲话中后于现在所叙述的部分 (of part of an article or speech) next in order; following; immediately afterwards：请看下面陈列的纺织品。Now take a look at the textiles on display.下面谈的是农业技术革新的问题。In the following let's talk about issues concerning technical renovation in agriculture. 3.指下级 lower level; subordinate：这个指示要及时向下面传达。This instruction should be relayed to the lower levels in time.

下颌
下颌[xià hé] 口腔的下部 lower jaw亦 also 下颚 xià'è; 通称 popularly known as 下巴 xià·ba;另见  颌 gé

下颚
下颚[xià è]1.某些节肢动物的第二对（有的是第三对）摄取食物的器官，生在口两旁的下方，极小，上面长着许多短毛 (of certain arthropods) maxilla, organ for taking food into the mouth; either of the 2nd or 3rd pair of laterally moving appendages, covered with short hair and situated behind the mandibles in certain arthropods 2.脊椎动物的下颌 (of vertebrates) lower jaw or mandible

下风
下风[xià fēng]1.风所吹向的那一方 leeward：工业区设在城市的下风，就不至于污染城市的空气。Urban air pollution can be avoided by building industrial districts to the leeward of the cities. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉作战或比赛的一方所处的不利地位 (in war or competition) be at a disadvantage：处在下风 be at a disadvantage

下饭
下饭[xià fàn]1.就着菜把主食吃下去 (of dishes) go with staple food 2.适宜于和饭一起吃 go well with staple food：这个菜下酒不下饭。This dish goes well with wine but not with rice.下饭[xià fàn]〈方 dial.〉指菜肴 dishes; non-staple food

下首
下首[xià shǒu] 同 same as 下手1  xiàshǒu ①

下马
下马[xià mǎ]〈比喻 fig.〉停止或放弃某项重大的工作、工程、计划等 dismount from a horse; (of a major project, plan, etc.) be discontinued; be given up：由于资金不足，一批建设项目将要下马。A number of construction projects will be abandoned due to financial shortages.

下马威
下马威[xià mǎ wēi] 原来指官吏初到任时对下属显示的威风，后泛指一开头就向对方显示的威力 severity shown by an official on assuming office; show of strength at first contact; deal sb. a head-on blow at the first encounter

下马看花
下马看花[xià mǎ kàn huā]〈比喻 fig.〉较长时间地深入实际，进行调查研究 get off one's horse to look at the flowers; go deep into the realities of life and make thorough investigations

不
不[bú]（ㄅㄨˊ）另见  不 bù不[bù]（ㄅㄨˋ）〈副词 adv.〉1.用在动词、形容词和其他副词前面表示否定 [used before verbs, adjectives, and other adverbs to indicate negation]：不去 not go不能 cannot不多 not many (much)不经济 uneconomic不很好 not very good (well) 2.加在名词或名词性词素前面，构成形容词 [used before certain nouns or nominal morphemes to form an adjective]：不法 lawless; illegal; unlawful不规则 irregular 3.单用，做否定性的回答（答话的意思跟问题相反）[used by itself as a negative answer]：他知道吗？——不，他不知道。Does he know? No, he doesn't. 4.〈方 dial.〉用在句末表示疑问，跟反复问句的作用相等 [attached to the end of a sentence to indicate doubt or question]：他现在身体好不？Is he in good health now? 5.用在动补结构中间，表示不可能达到某种结果 [used between a verb and its complement to indicate that sth. is impossible]：拿不动 find sth. too heavy to carry做不好 cannot do sth. well装不下 cannot hold sth. 6.‘不’字的前后叠用相同的词，表示不在乎或不相干（常在前边加‘什么’usu. preceded by 什么 shén·me）[inserted between repeated words to show one's carelessness or indifference]：什么累不累的，有工作就得做。No matter how tired you are, you must do what comes to you.什么钱不钱的，你喜欢就拿去。Who cares how much it costs? Just take it if you like it. 7.跟‘就’搭用，表示选择 [used correlatively with 就 jiù to indicate alteration]：晚上他不是看书，就是写文章。In the evening he either reads books or writes articles. 8.〈方 dial.〉不用；不要（限用于某些客套话 used in polite formulas only）don't; need not：不谢 don't mention it; not at all; you are welcome不送。Forgive me for not seeing you out.不客气 don't mention it; not at all; you are welcome注意 NOTE： (a)在去声字前面，‘不’字读阳平声，如‘不会’、‘不是’said in rising tone when followed by words with falling tone, e.g. 不会 (can-not), or 不是 (not) (b)动词‘有’的否定式是‘没有’，不是‘不有’negative form of the verb 有 (have) is 没有 (have not) ratherthan 不有 (not have)相关词组好不 | 何不 | 可不 | 莫不 | 无不 | 要不 | 再不 | 巴不得 | 保不定 | 保不齐 | 保不住 | 抱不平 | 备不住 | 背不住 | 差不多 | 差不离 | 吃不服 | 吃不开 | 吃不来 | 吃不上 | 吃不消 | 吃不住 | 吃不准 | 春不老 | 大不了 | 担不是 | 东不拉 | 冬不拉 | 动不动 | 短不了 | 对不起 | 犯不上 | 犯不着 | 赶不及 | 赶不上 | 搁不住 | 挂不住 | 怪不得 | 过不去 | 合不来 | 合不着 | 恨不得 | 划不来 | 架不住 | 见不得 | 金不换 | 禁不起 | 禁不住 | 看不起 | 靠不住 | 来不得 | 来不及 | 了不得 | 了不起 | 冷不丁 | 冷不防 | 两不找 | 落不是 | 忙不迭 | 猛不丁 | 猛不防 | 免不得 | 免不了 | 磨不开 | 抹不开 | 莫不是 | 蔫不唧 | 拗不过 | 派不是 | 赔不是 | 瞧不起 | 认不是 | 三不管 | 三不知 | 少不得 | 少不了 | 舍不得 | 时不时 | 使不得 | 手不稳 | 殊不知 | 数不上 | 数不着 | 说不得 | 说不来 | 说不上 | 四不像 | 下不来 | 先不先 | 想不到 | 想不开 | 信不过 | 要不得 | 由不得 | 怨不得 | 择不开 | 指不定 | 左不过 | 爱不释手 | 白不呲咧 | 扳不倒儿 | 卑不足道 | 兵不血刃 | 兵不厌诈 | 惨不忍睹 | 朝不保夕 | 猝不及防 | 道不拾遗 | 得不偿失 | 罚不当罪 | 防不胜防 | 奋不顾身 | 供不应求 | 寡不敌众 | 果不其然 | 黑不溜秋 | 红不棱登 | 花不棱登 | 滑不唧溜 | 缓不济急 | 灰不溜丢 | 悔不当初 | 魂不附体 | 魂不守舍 | 祸不单行 | 饥不择食 | 积不相能 | 坚不可摧 | 间不容发 | 揭不开锅 | 刻不容缓 | 溃不成军 | 牢不可破 | 乐不可支 | 乐不思蜀 | 力不从心 | 路不拾遗 | 马不停蹄 | 满不在乎 | 漫不经心 | 美不胜收 | 民不聊生 | 名不副实 | 名不虚传 | 漠不关心 | 目不见睫 | 目不交睫 | 目不窥园 | 目不忍睹 | 目不识丁 | 目不暇接 | 目不转睛 | 迫不得已 | 迫不及待 | 气不忿儿 | 泣不成声 | 情不自禁 | 日不暇给 | 入不敷出 | 锐不可当 | 弱不禁风 | 少不更事 | 什不闲儿 | 神不守舍 | 十不闲儿 | 时不我待 | 食不甘味 | 势不可挡 | 势不两立 | 手不释卷 | 数不胜数 | 说不过去 | 死不瞑目 | 酸不溜丢 | 恬不知耻 | 痛不欲生 | 万不得已 | 微不足道 | 文不对题 | 文不加点 | 席不暇暖 | 瑕不掩瑜 | 下不为例 | 小不点儿 | 心不在焉 | 言不及义 | 言不尽意 | 言不由衷 | 夜不闭户 | 衣不解带 | 义不容辞 | 愚不可及 | 指不胜屈 | 中不溜儿 | 罪不容诛 | 爱答不理 | 按兵不动 | 百年不遇 | 百思不解 | 百战不殆 | 百折不挠 | 半…不… | 半大不小 | 半身不遂 | 半生不熟 | 半死不活 | 宝刀不老 | 匕鬯不惊 | 并行不悖 | 层出不穷 | 充耳不闻 | 宠辱不惊 | 出其不意 | 处变不惊 | 川流不息 | 刺刺不休 | 从容不迫 | 存而不论 | 寸草不留 | 措手不及 | 打抱不平 | 大谬不然 | 大逆不道 | 大言不惭 | 待理不理 | 当仁不让 | 道…不… | 滴水不漏 | 颠扑不破 | 分文不取 | 格格不入 | 功成不居 | 攻其不备 | 裹足不前 | 过意不去 | 过犹不及 | 户枢不蠹 | 怙恶不悛 | 划一不二 | 华而不实 | 怀才不遇 | 诲人不倦 | 鸡犬不宁 | 既往不咎 | 接长不短 | 敬谢不敏 | 久假不归 | 举棋不定 | 哭笑不得 | 老大不小 | 乐此不疲 | 雷打不动 | 恋恋不舍 | 良莠不齐 | 六亲不认 | 屡见不鲜 | 屡教不改 | 屡试不爽 | 麻木不仁 | 没齿不忘 | 美中不足 | 闷闷不乐 | 秘而不宣 | 密云不雨 | 苗而不秀 | 拟于不伦 | 念念不忘 | 涅而不缁 | 宁死不屈 | 片甲不存 | 其貌不扬 | 锲而不舍 | 青黄不接 | 求之不得 | 却之不恭 | 忍俊不禁 | 十恶不赦 | 拾金不昧 | 食古不化 | 视而不见 | 述而不作 | 数见不鲜 | 水泄不通 | 说一不二 | 听而不闻 | 玩儿不转 | 玩世不恭 | 万劫不复 | 为富不仁 | 尾大不掉 | 委决不下 | 纹丝不动 | 无恶不作 | 无坚不摧 | 无孔不入 | 无奇不有 | 无所不为 | 无所不在 | 无所不至 | 无往不利 | 无往不胜 | 无微不至 | 习焉不察 | 细大不捐 | 先天不足 | 小小不言 | 形影不离 | 谑而不虐 | 要言不烦 | 一尘不染 | 一成不变 | 一蹶不振 | 一毛不拔 | 一窍不通 | 一丝不苟 | 一丝不挂 | 一文不名 | 引而不发 | 应接不暇 | 饔飧不继 | 永垂不朽 | 有条不紊 | 语焉不详 | 欲罢不能 | 执迷不悟 | 置之不理 | 卓尔不群 | 自顾不暇 | 自强不息 | 八九不离十 | 独木不成林 | 恨铁不成钢 | 换汤不换药 | 杀人不见血 | 杀人不眨眼 | 无风不起浪 | 薰莸不同器 | 一…不…. | 着三不着两 | 何乐而不为 | 皮笑肉不笑 | 十年九不遇 | 无可无不可 | 欲速则不达 | 百闻不如一见 | 井水不犯河水 | 老死不相往来 | 驴唇不对马嘴 | 牛头不对马嘴 | 三寸不烂之舌 | 万变不离其宗 | 无所不用其极 | 迅雷不及掩耳 | 一蟹不如一蟹 | 有眼不识泰山 | 真金不怕火炼 | 风马牛不相及 | 可望而不可即 | 八竿子打不着 | 勿谓言之不预 | 有过之无不及 | 吃不了，兜着走 | 高不成，低不就 | 神不知，鬼不觉 | 一不做，二不休 | 饱汉不知饿汉饥 | 敬酒不吃吃罚酒 | 磨刀不误砍柴工 | 上梁不正下梁歪 | 无事不登三宝殿 | 胳膊拧不过大腿 | 狗嘴吐不出象牙 | 远水解不了近渴 | 远水救不了近火 | 干打雷，不下雨 | 醉翁之意不在酒 | 浪子回头金不换 | 冒天下之大不韪 | 一个巴掌拍不响 | 成事不足，败事有余 | 流水不腐，户枢不蠹 | 皮之不存，毛将焉附 | 前事不忘，后事之师 | 庆父不死，鲁难未已 | 取之不尽，用之不竭 | 桃李不言，下自成蹊 | 百足之虫，死而不僵 | 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧不安 | 不比 | 不必 | 不便 | 不才 | 不测 | 不曾 | 不成 | 不逞 | 不齿 | 不啻 | 不揣 | 不辞 | 不错 | 不逮 | 不待 | 不单 | 不但 | 不惮 | 不当 | 不得 | 不等 | 不迭 | 不定 | 不独 | 不端 | 不断 | 不对 | 不乏 | 不法 | 不凡 | 不犯 | 不妨 | 不忿 | 不服 | 不符 | 不甘 | 不公 | 不苟 | 不够 | 不顾 | 不管 | 不光 | 不轨 | 不过 | 不行 | 不合 | 不和 | 不遑 | 不讳 | 不惑 | 不羁 | 不及 | 不计 | 不济 | 不见 | 不仅 | 不禁 | 不久 | 不拘 | 不堪 | 不可 | 不克 | 不快 | 不愧 | 不赖 | 不了 | 不力 | 不利 | 不良 | 不料 | 不吝 | 不论 | 不满 | 不免 | 不妙 | 不敏 | 不佞 | 不怕 | 不配 | 不平 | 不屈 | 不然 | 不仁 | 不忍 | 不日 | 不容 | 不如 | 不善 | 不胜 | 不时 | 不是 | 不适 | 不爽 | 不遂 | 不特 | 不图 | 不外 | 不惟 | 不韪 | 不谓 | 不无 | 不惜 | 不暇 | 不下 | 不详 | 不祥 | 不想 | 不肖 | 不消 | 不孝 | 不屑 | 不懈 | 不兴 | 不幸 | 不休 | 不朽 | 不许 | 不恤 | 不逊 | 不厌 | 不扬 | 不要 | 不一 | 不依 | 不宜 | 不已 | 不意 | 不用 | 不虞 | 不在 | 不振 | 不争 | 不支 | 不只 | 不止 | 不致 | 不置 | 不中 | 不周 | 不赀 | 不足 | 不成材 | 不成话 | 不成器 | 不成文 | 不大离 | 不带音 | 不倒翁 | 不道德 | 不得劲 | 不得了 | 不得已 | 不等式 | 不定根 | 不动产 | 不冻港 | 不对劲 | 不二价 | 不贰过 | 不敢当 | 不过意 | 不含糊 | 不济事 | 不见得 | 不尽然 | 不经意 | 不景气 | 不离儿太长，超过部分略去

不…不…
不…不…[bù bù]1.用在意思相同或相近的词或词素的前面，表示否定（稍强调）[used before two words or expressions that are the same or similar in meaning to indicate negation (with slight stress)]：～干～净 unclean; filthy～明～白 obscure; dubious～清～楚 not clear～偏～倚 impartial; unbiased～慌～忙 unhurried; calm; leisurely～痛～痒 scratching the surface; superficial; perfunctory～知～觉 unconsciously; unwittingly～言～语 keep silent～声～响 quietly; silently～理～睬 ignore; take no notice of～闻～问 not bother to ask or to listen; show no interest in sth.～依～饶 not let (sb.) off easily～屈～挠 unyielding; indomitable; dauntless～折～扣 hundred per cent; to the letter; out and out 2.用在同类而意思相对的词或词素的前面，表示‘既不…也不…’[used before two words or expressions of the same kind but opposite in meaning to indicate‘neither ...nor ...’]：(a)表示适中，恰到好处 moderate; just right：～多～少 neither too much nor too little; just right～大～小 neither too big nor too small; just right～肥～瘦 neither fat nor thin; (b)表示尴尬的中间状态 awkward intermediate state：～方～圆 neither square nor round～明～暗 neither bright nor dark～上～下 be suspended in midair; be in a fix～死～活 neither dead nor alive; half dead; lifeless 3.用在同类而意思相对的词或词素的前面，表示‘如果不…就不…’[used before words or expression of the same kind but opposite in meaning to indicate‘if not ...then not ...’]：～见～散 be there or be square～破～立 no construction without destruction～塞～流 no flowing without damming～止～行 no motion without rest

不…而…
不…而…[bù ér] 表示虽不具有某条件或原因而产生某结果 gain results though without any condition or cause; do ...without doing ...：～寒～栗 shiver all over though not cold - tremble with fear; shudder～劳～获 reap without sowing; gain without pain～谋～合 agree without prior (or previous) consultation; (of two persons) happen to see eye to eye on sth.～期～遇 chance encounter; meet unexpectedly (or by chance)～言～喻 self-evident～约～同 do or think the same without prior consultation; happen to coincide～翼～飞 (of an object) disappear without trace; vanish into thin air～胫～走 get around fast; spread like wildfire

不一
不一[bù yī]1.不相同（只做谓语，不做定语 only as a predicate, not as an attribute）different; not the same：质量不一 differ in quality长短不一 differ in length 2.书信用语，表示不一一详说 used in letters to indicate deliberate omission of details：匆此不一 without going into details

不一而足
不一而足[bù yī ér zú] 不止一种或一次，而是很多 be not an isolated case; numerous

不三不四
不三不四[bù sān bù sì]1.不正派 dubious; shady：不要跟那些不三不四的人来往。Don't hang around with those dubious characters. 2.不像样子 neither fish nor fowl; nondescript：这篇文章改来改去，反而改得不三不四的。Instead of improving it, the repeated changes turned the article into a mess.

不下
不下[bù xià]1. 同 same as 不下于 bùxiàyú ②; 2.用在动词后，表示动作没有结果或没有完成 [used after a verb to indicate an action is not completed or has not achieved the desired result]：屡攻不下。The repeated attacks did not work.相持不下 be locked at a stalemate放心不下 cannot stop worrying委决不下 hesitate to make a decision

不下于
不下于[bù xià yú]1.不低于；不比别的低 not lower than; not inferior to：这种自来水笔虽是新产品，质量却不下于各种名牌。Although this pen is a new product, its quality is as good as the brand-names. 2.不少于；不比某个数目少 as many as; no less than：新产品不下于二百种。There are no less than 200 new products on show.亦 also 不下 bùxià

不中
不中[bù zhōng]〈方 dial.〉不中用；不可以；不好 no good; won't do：这个法子不中，还得另打主意。This will not work and we must find another way.

不为已甚
不为已甚[bù wéi yǐ shèn] 指对人的责备或处罚适可而止 (of reproach or punishment) not to go too far; refrain from going to extremes; never go beyond reasonable limits（已甚 yishen：过分 undue）

不久
不久[bù jiǔ] 指距离某个时期或某件事情时间不远 soon; before long; not long ago：前不久他曾在电台发表谈话。He made a speech on the radio not long ago.工厂建成，不久即正式投产。The construction of the factory has been completed, and it will soon go into production.

不义之财
不义之财[bù yì zhī cái] 不应该得到的或以不正当的手段获得的钱财 ill-gotten wealth (or gains)

不乏
不乏[bù fá] 不缺少，表示有相当数量 no lack of：不乏其人。Such people are not rare. or There is no dearth of such people.不乏先例。There are no lack of precedents.

不了
不了[bù liǎo]没完（多用于动词加‘个’之后 usu. follow the structure‘verb + 个 gè’）without end; endless：忙个不了 being kept busy大雨下个不了。The rain kept pouring down.

不了了之
不了了之[bù liǎo liǎo zhī] 该办的事情没有办完，放在一边不去管它，就算完事 conclude a matter by leaving it unsettled; end up with nothing definite; fizzle out

不争
不争[bù zhēng] 不容置疑的 unassailable; unarguable; beyond doubt; undoubted：不争的事实 unarguable facts

不二价
不二价[bù èr jià] 定价划一，卖给谁都是一样的价钱 fixed prices; uniform prices; one price：童叟无欺，言不二价。One price for all customers, young or old.

不二法门
不二法门[bù èr fǎ mén]〈佛教用语 Budd.〉‘不二’指不是两极端。‘法门’指修行入道的门径。意思是说，观察事物的道理，要离开相对的两个极端而用‘处中’的看法，才能得其实在。only from the middle path and away from the extremes can one grasp the truth when seeking the law of things（不二 bu er: not the two extremes；法门 famen: way to Buddhism）；〈比喻 fig.〉独一无二的门径 the one and only way; the only proper course to take

不亦乐乎
不亦乐乎[bù yì lè hū]原意是‘不也是很快乐的吗？’（见于《论语·学而》）现常用来表示达到极点的意思 The Analects·Learning:‘Isn't it a pleasure?’; extremely; awfully：他每天东奔西跑，忙得不亦乐乎。On the go day in, day out, he is awfully busy.

不人道
不人道[bù rén dào] 不合乎人道 inhuman另见  人道1  réndào

不仁
不仁[bù rén]1.不仁慈 not benevolent; heartless：为富不仁 rich but heartless 2.（肢体）失去知觉 numb：麻木不仁 apathy手足不仁。The limbs feel numb.

不仅
不仅[bù jǐn]1.表示超出某个数量或范围；不止 beyond a certain quantity or range; not the one alone：这不仅是我个人的意见。I'm not the only one who holds this view. 2.不但 not only：不仅方法对头，而且措施得力。Not only is the approach correct, but the measures are effective.他们不仅提前完成了生产任务，而且还支援了兄弟单位。They not only completed their own production quota ahead of time, but gave support to fellow units.

不以为意
不以为意[bù yǐ wéi yì] 不把它放在心上，表示不重视，不认真对待 pay no attention to; take no notice of; not mind

不以为然
不以为然[bù yǐ wéi rán]不认为是对的，表示不同意（多含轻视意 oft. derog.）not consider sth. to be right; disagree：不以为然地一笑 a smile of denial他嘴上虽然没有说不对，心里却不以为然。Although he did not say so, inwardly he felt it wrong.

不休
不休[bù xiū]不停止（用做补语 used as a complement）endlessly; ceaselessly：争论不休 argue endlessly喋喋不休 talk endlessly; rattle away

不伦不类
不伦不类[bù lún bù lèi] 不像这一类，也不像那一类。形容不成样子或不规范 defy classification; neither fish nor fowl; nondescript：翻译如果不顾本国语言的特点，死抠原文字句，就会弄出一些不伦不类的句子来，叫人看不懂。In translation if one rigidly adheres to the source language in disregard for the peculiarities of the target language, one would end up producing some incomprehensible sentences.

不但
不但[bù dàn]〈连词 conj.〉用在表示递进的复句的上半句里，下半句里通常有连词‘而且、并且’或副词‘也、还’等相呼应 [used in the first half of a complex sentence that is progressive in meaning, and usu. correlated with conjunctives like 而且 érqiě or 并且 bìngqiě, or with adverbs like 也 yě or 还 hái]：不但以身作则，而且乐于助人。He not only lives what he advocates, but also is ready to help others.这条生产线不但在国内，即使在国际上也是一流的。This production line is advanced not only domestically but internationally.这样做不但解决不了问题，反而会增加新的困难。This approach will only bring about new problems rather than solve the problem.

不佞
不佞[bù nìng]〈书 fml.〉没有才能。旧时用来谦称自己。(used in self-deprecation in old times) not capable

不依
不依[bù yī]1.不听从；不依顺 not comply with; not go along with：孩子要什么，她没有不依的。She always lets her child have his way. 2.不允许；不宽容 not let off easily; not let sb. get away with sth.：不依不饶 won't let go or give in你要不按时来，我可不依你。If you don't come on time, I won't let you off so easily.

不便
不便[bù biàn]1.不方便；不适宜 inconvenient; inappropriate; unsuitable：行动不便 have difficulty getting about边远山区，交通不便。Remote mountainous areas have poor transport facilities.他有些不情愿，却又不便马上回绝。He was somewhat unwilling to do it, but felt it inappropriate to flatly refuse. 2.指缺钱用 short of cash; be hard up：你如果一时手头不便，我可以先垫上。If you have no money on hand now, and you can pay me back later on.

不修边幅
不修边幅[bù xiū biān fú] 形容不注意衣着、容貌的整洁 not care about one's appearance; be slovenly（边幅 bianfu：布帛的边缘，比喻仪容、衣着 edge of a piece of cloth, referring to one's appearance and clothing）

不倒翁
不倒翁[bù dǎo wēng] 玩具，形状像老翁，上轻下重，扳倒后能自己起来 self-righting doll; tumbler; roly-poly, old-man-shaped toy that can right itself because its centre of gravity is at the lower half of its body亦 also 扳不倒儿 bānbùdǎor

不假思索
不假思索[bù jiǎ sī suǒ]用不着想。形容说话做事迅速。(act, respond, etc.) readily; offhand; without any thinking; without hesitation

不偏不倚
不偏不倚[bù piān bù yǐ]指不偏袒任何一方，表示公正或中立。也形容不偏不歪，正中目标。even-handed; impartial; unbiased; also hit the bull's-eye

不做声
不做声[bù zuò shēng] 不出声；不说话 keep silent; utter not a word

不像话
不像话[bù xiàng huà]1.（言语行动）不合乎道理或情理 unreasonable：整天撒泼耍赖，实在不像话。The endless quarrels and shameless acts are really intolerable. 2.坏得没法形容 shocking; outrageous：屋子乱得不像话。The room is in a shocking mess.

不光
不光[bù guāng]1.表示超出某个数量或范围；不止 not the only one; beyond a certain number (amount) or range：报名参加的不光是他一个人。He was not the only one to sign up. 2.不但 not only：不光数量多，质量也不错 not only great in quantity, but fine in quality这里不光出煤，而且出铁。This place produces not only coal but also iron.

不克
不克[bù kè]〈书 fml.〉不能（多指能力薄弱，不能做到 usu. of capability）unable to; cannot：不克自拔 unable to get away from不克分身 unable to attend to; not able to get around to (doing sth.)

不免
不免[bù miǎn] 免不了 cannot avoid; cannot help but; inevitably; invariably; bound to; unavoidable：旧地重游，不免想起往事。In revisiting a once familiar place, one would conjure up old memories.

不入虎穴，焉得虎子
不入虎穴，焉得虎子[bù rù hǔ xué, yān dé hǔ zǐ] 不进老虎洞，怎能捉到小老虎 how can you catch tiger cubs without entering the tiger's lair；〈比喻 fig.〉不历艰险，就不能获得成功 no venture, no gain

不公
不公[bù gōng] 不公道；不公平 unjust; unfair：办事不公 unfair in handling matters分配不公 unfair in distribution

不共戴天
不共戴天[bù gòng dài tiān]不跟仇敌在一个天底下活着。形容仇恨极深。will not live under the same sky with one's enemy; absolutely irreconcilable

不兴
不兴[bù xīng]1.不流行；不合时尚 out of fashion; outmoded：绣花鞋这里早就不兴了。Embroidered shoes are no longer in fashion here. 2.不许 impermissible; not allowed：不兴欺负人。(You are) not allowed to bully others. 3.不能（限用于反问句 only used in rhetorical questions）can't：你干吗嚷嚷，不兴小点儿声吗？Why are you shouting, can't you speak more softly?

不冻港
不冻港[bù dòng gǎng] 较冷地区常年不结冰的海港，如旅顺、大连 ice-free ports that don't freeze throughout the year in rather cold regions, e.g. Lüshun Port and Dalian Port

不凡
不凡[bù fán] 不平凡；不平常 out of the ordinary; out of the common run; outstanding; uncommon：出手不凡 make skilful opening moves自命不凡（自以为很了不起）consider oneself no ordinary being; have an unduly high opinion of oneself

不刊之论
不刊之论[bù kān zhī lùn]〈比喻 fig.〉不能改动或不可磨灭的言论 unalterable or irrefutable argument; truth for all times（刊 kan：古代指削除刻错了的字，不刊是说不可更改）(The word 刊 means‘eliminate wrongly inscribed characters’and the expression 不刊 denotes‘unalterable’in ancient times, when words were inscribed on wooden boards instead of written on paper.)

不则声
不则声[bù zé shēng]〈方 dial.〉不做声 keep silent

不利
不利[bù lì] 没有好处；不顺利 unfavourable; disadvantageous; harmful; detrimental：扭转不利的局面 put an end to an unfavourable situation地形有利于我而不利于敌。The terrain is favourable to us and unfavourable to the enemy.

不到黄河心不死
不到黄河心不死[bù dào Huáng Hé xīn bù sǐ]〈比喻 fig.〉不到绝境不肯死心。也比喻不达到目的决不罢休。refuse to give up until all hope is gone; until it's all over, ambition survives; not stop until reaches one's goal

不力
不力[bù lì] 不尽力；不得力 not do one's best; not exert oneself; ineffective：办事不力 not effective in one's work; be slack in one's work打击不力 fail to make effective attacks

不动产
不动产[bù dòng chǎn]不能移动的财产，指土地、房屋及附着于土地、房屋上不可分离的部分（如树木、水暖设备等）fixed assets; immovables; real estate; immovable property, e.g. land, house and the things that cannot be detached from them (e.g. trees, water supply, heating installations, etc.)

不动声色
不动声色[bù dòng shēng sè]不说话，不流露感情。形容态度镇静。not change one's voice and expression because of emotion; maintain one's composure; stay calm and collected; not turn a hair; not bat an eyelid; 亦 also 不露声色 bù lù shēngsè

不劳而获
不劳而获[bù láo ér huò] 自己不劳动而取得别人劳动的成果 reap without sowing; profit by or reap the fruits of other people's toil

不卑不亢
不卑不亢[bù bēi bù kàng]既不自卑，也不高傲。形容言行自然、得体。neither haughty nor humble; neither supercilious nor obsequious; neither overbearing nor servile; (of speech or manner) natural and proper;亦 also 不亢不卑 bù kàng bù bēi

不单
不单[bù dān]1. 同 same as 不止 bùzhǐ ②：超额完成生产任务的，不单是这几个厂。These are not the only factories that have surpassed the production target. 2.不但 not merely; not simply：她不单教孩子学习，还照顾他们的生活。She not only teaches her children to study, but takes care of them in daily life.

不即不离
不即不离[bù jí bù lí] 既不亲近也不疏远 be neither close to nor distant; keep sb. at arm's length

不厌
不厌[bù yàn]1.不厌烦 not mind (doing sth.); be not tired of; not object to：不厌其详 go into details; dwell at length upon 2.不排斥；不以为非 not repel; deem proper：兵不厌诈。There can never be too much deception in war.

不及
不及[bù jí]1.不如；比不上 not as good as; inferior to：这个远不及那个好。This one is far inferior to that one.在刻苦学习方面我不及他。I don't study as hard as he does. 2.来不及 find it too late：后悔不及 too late for regrets躲闪不及 too late to dodge

不变价格
不变价格[bù biàn jià gé]计算或比较各年工、农业产品总产值时，用某一时期的产品的平均价格作为固定的计算尺度，这种平均价格叫不变价格。如我国第一个五年计划时期，用1952年第三季度的产品平均价格为不变价格。fixed price; constant price; average price of products in a given period that serves as a fixed measure to calculate or compare gross annual industrial and agricultural output value, e.g. the average price of products in the third season of 1953 that served as the fixed price for the First Five-Year Plan period;亦 also 比较价格 bǐjiào jiàgé，可比价格 kěbǐ-jiàgé 或 or 固定价格 gùdìng jiàgé

不只
不只[bù zhǐ] 不但；不仅 not only; not merely：不只生产发展了，生活也改善了。Not only has production developed but life has also improved.河水不只可供灌溉，且可用来发电。River water can be used for irrigation and generation of electricity as well.

不可
不可[bù kě]1.不可以；不能够 cannot; should not; must not：不可偏废 not to overlook either of the two不可动摇 unshakable; inflexible二者缺一不可。Neither one shall be neglected. 2.‘非…不可’，表示必须或一定 [used in 非…不可 fēi…bùkě to indicate the necessity to do sth.]：今天这个会很重要，我非去不可。Today's meeting is very important, and I cannot afford not to attend.

不可一世
不可一世[bù kě yī shì]自以为在当代没有一个人能比得上。形容极其狂妄自大。consider oneself unsurpassed in the world; overweening (or insufferable) arrogance

不可同日而语
不可同日而语[bù kě tóng rìér yǔ]不能放在同一时间谈论。形容不能相比，不能相提并论。cannot be mentioned in the same breath; there's no comparison between them; cannot be put on a par with

不可名状
不可名状[bù kě míng zhuàng]不能够用语言形容 beg description; indescribable; beyond description（名 ming：说出 describe）

不可向迩
不可向迩[bù kě xiàng ěr] 不能接近 cannot approach：烈火燎原，不可向迩 cannot approach because of the raging fire

不可告人
不可告人[bù kě gào rén] 不能告诉别人，多指不正当的打算或计谋不敢公开说出来 not to be divulged; hidden; cannot bear the light of day; ulterior

不可开交
不可开交[bù kě kāi jiāo]无法摆脱或结束（只做‘得’后面的补语 used only as a complement after 得 ·de）cannot get rid of or finish off：忙得不可开交 up to one's ears in work; awfully (or terribly) busy打得不可开交 locked in a fierce struggle

不可思议
不可思议[bù kě sī yì] 不可想像，不能理解（原来是佛教用语，含有神秘奥妙的意思 originally a Buddhist term meaning mysterious and profound）inconceivable; unimaginable; unthinkable

不可抗力
不可抗力[bù kě kàng lì]法律上指在当时的条件下人力所不能抵抗的破坏力，如洪水、地震等。因不可抗力而发生的损害，不追究法律责任。(leg.) force majeure; destructive power beyond human control in terms of the consequences brought on by a disaster, e.g. flood, earthquake, etc.; thus ensuing damages are exempted from any investigation into responsibility under the law

不可收拾
不可收拾[bù kě shōu shi]原指事物无法归类整顿。后借指事情坏到无法挽回的地步。(of things) unclassifiable and hard to be sorted out; (later meaning) irremediable; unmanageable; out of hand

不可救药
不可救药[bù kě jiù yào] 病重到已无法救治 (of disease) incurable; beyond cure；〈比喻 fig.〉人或事物坏到无法挽救的地步 incorrigible; hopeless; beyond remedy

不可更新资源
不可更新资源[bù kě gēng xīn zī yuán]经人类开发利用后，在相当长的时期内不可能再生的自然资源。如金属矿物、煤、石油等。unrenewable resources; natural resources that take more than a human lifetime to replenish after exploitation, such as metal ores, coal, and petroleum;亦 also 非再生资源 fēizàishēng zīyuán

不可理喻
不可理喻[bù kě lǐ yù]不能够用道理使他明白。形容愚昧或态度蛮横，不讲道理。cannot make sb. understand by reasoning; foolish or rude, and unreasonable; impervious to reason; won't listen to reason

不可知论
不可知论[bù kě zhī lùn]一种唯心主义的认识论，认为除了感觉或现象之外，世界本身是无法认识的。它否认社会发展的客观规律，否认社会实践的作用。agnosticism; idealist epistemology that holds that nothing can be known about the existence or nature of the world beyond material phenomena. It denies the objective laws of social development and the function of social practice.

不可终日
不可终日[bù kě zhōng rì] 一天都过不下去。形容局势危急或心中惶恐 unable to carry on even for a single day; in a desperate situation：惶惶不可终日 in a constant state of anxiety; on tenterhooks

不合
不合[bù hé]1.不符合 not conform to; be unsuited to; be not in keeping with：不合手续 not conform to the formalities不合时宜 out of place; inopportune or inappropriate 2.〈书 fml.〉不应该 should not; ought not：早知如此，当初不合叫他去。Had we foreseen that, we would not have asked him to go. 3.合不来；不和 not get along well; on bad terms：性格不合 incompatible in disposition

不同凡响
不同凡响[bù tóng fán xiǎng]〈比喻 fig.〉事物（多指文艺作品）不平凡 (usu. of literary and artistic works) outstanding; out of the ordinary; above the common run（凡响 fanxiang：平凡的音乐 ordinary music）

不名一文
不名一文[bù míng yī wén]一个钱也没有（名 ming：占有 possess）without a penny to one's name; penniless亦 also 不名一钱 bù míng yī qián

不名数
不名数[bù míng shù]不带有单位名称的数。如-9，106。abstract number, e.g. -9, 106

不名誉
不名誉[bù míng yù] 对名誉有损害；不体面 disreputable; disgraceful：一时糊涂，做下不名誉的蠢事 commit a folly in a slip of mind

不吐气
不吐气[bù tǔ qì]另见  不送气 bù sòngqì

不吝
不吝[bù lìn]〈客套话 pol.〉不吝惜（用于征求意见 used in asking for advice）not stint; not grudge; be generous with：是否有当，尚希不吝赐教。We hope that you will not spare your comments on this.

不含糊
不含糊[bù hán hu]1.认真；不马虎 careful; not negligent; prudent; cautious：她办起事来丁是丁，卯是卯，一点儿不含糊。She is cautious and conscientious in what she is doing. 2.不错；不一般 really good; extraordinary：他那两笔字还真不含糊。His handwriting is really good.质量是没说的，可是价钱也不含糊。The quality is undisputed, but the price is really amazing. 3.不示弱；不畏惧 not be afraid of：在高手面前，他也不含糊。He's not afraid of master hands.

不周
不周[bù zhōu] 不周到；不完备 not attentive and satisfactory; thoughtless; inconsiderate：考虑不周 not well think out; inconsiderate招待不周 not be attentive enough to guests

不周延
不周延[bù zhōu yán] 一个判断的主词（或宾词）所包括的不是其全部外延，如在‘有的工人是共青团员’这个判断中主词（工人）是不周延的，因为它说的不是所有的工人 non-distributional. What is entailed in the subject or predicate of a judgement does not cover the entirety of its denotation. For example, in the judgemental sentence,‘Some workers are Youth League members’, the subject‘workers’is non-distributional because it does not refer to all the workers.

不和
不和[bù hé] 不和睦 not get along with; at odds：姑嫂不和。A woman and her brother's wife do not get along.感情不和 not get along well

不咎既往
不咎既往[bù jiù jì wǎng]另见  既往不咎 jì wǎng bù jiù

不哼不哈
不哼不哈[bù hēng bù hā] 不言语，多指该说而不说 keep silent, usu. when one should say sth. under the circumstances：有事情问到他，他总不哼不哈的，真急人。Whenever asked for his advice, he would keep silent. He can be really trying!

不啻
不啻[bù chì〈书〉]1.不止；不只 not less than：工程所需，不啻万金。The project requires a tremendous amount of money. 2.如同 as; like; as good as：相去不啻天渊 difference tantamount to that between high heaven and deep sea; a world of difference

不善
不善[bù shàn]1.不好 bad; ill：处理不善 not handle properly; mishandle：来意不善 come with ill intent 2.不长于 not good at（also 不善于 bùshànyú）：不善管理 not good at managing things 3.〈方 dial.〉很可观；非同小可 impressive; considerable（also 不善乎 bùshàn·hu）：别看他身体不强，干起农活来可不善。He may not look strong, but he is an impressive hand in farm work.

不图
不图[bù tú]1.不追求 not seek; not strive for：不图名利 not seek fame or gain 2.〈书 fml.〉不料 unexpectedly; contrary to expectation

不在
不在[bù zài]1.指不在家或不在某处 not at home or a certain place; be out：您找我哥哥呀，他不在。Do you come to see my brother? He is out.他不在办公室，可能是联系工作去了。He's not in the office, probably he's gone out on some business. 2.〈婉辞 euph.〉指死亡（常带‘了’oft. with 了 ·le）died：我奶奶去年就不在了。My grandmother passed away last year.

不在乎
不在乎[bù zài hu] 不放在心上 not mind; not care：自有主张，不在乎别人怎么说。Make up one's mind and don't worry about what others might say.青年人身强力壮，多干点活儿不在乎。It's no problem for young people to work a little more, since they are strong and healthy.

不在话下
不在话下[bù zài huà xià] 指事物轻微，不值得说，或事属当然，用不着说 be nothing difficult; be a cinch; it goes without saying

不堪
不堪[bù kān]1.承受不了 cannot bear; cannot stand：不堪其苦 cannot bear the hardships不堪一击 cannot withstand a single blow; collapse at the first blow 2.不可；不能（多用于不好的方面 usu. referring to sth. undesirable）cannot：不堪入耳 intolerable to the ear; revolting; disgusting不堪设想 too ghastly (or dreadful) to contemplate不堪造就 cannot be trained; unpromising 3.用在消极意义的词后面，表示程度深 [used after words of negative meaning, as an intensifier of degree] utterly; extremely：疲惫不堪 extremely tired; dog-tired破烂不堪 in rags (or tatters)狼狈不堪 in an extremely awkward condition; in a sorry plight; in dire straits 4.坏到极深的程度 extremely bad (or undesirable)：他这个人太不堪了。What an impossible person he is!

不堪回首
不堪回首[bù kān huí shǒu] 不忍再去回忆过去的经历或情景 cannot bear to look back on; find it unbearable to recall

不堪设想
不堪设想[bù kān shè xiǎng]事情的结果不能想像。指会发展到很坏或很危险的地步。(of consequences) too ghastly to contemplate; cannot be imagined; will be extremely bad or dangerous

不外
不外[bù wài] 不超出某种范围以外 not go beyond the scope of; nothing more than：大家所谈论的不外工作问题。What people talked about was no other than work.亦 also 不外乎 bùwài·hu

不够
不够[bù gòu] 表示在数量上或程度上比所要求的差些 not enough; insufficient; inadequate (to what required)：材料不够丰富。Materials are insufficient.分析得还不够深入。The analysis lacks depth.

不大离
不大离[bù dà lí]〈方 dial.〉（不大离儿 bùdàlír）1.差不多；相近 pretty close; just about right：两个孩子的身量不大离。The two children are almost of the same height. 2.还算不错 not bad：这块地的麦子长得不大离。The wheat in this field is not bad.

不失为
不失为[bù shī wéi] 还可以算得上 can be counted as; may as well be accepted：这样处理，还不失为一个好办法。This, after all, is a good way of doing it.

不好意思
不好意思[bù hǎo yì si]1.害羞 shy; embarrassed; bashful：他被大伙儿笑得不好意思了。He felt embarrassed by the laughter of the people around. 2.碍于情面而不便或不肯 refrain from or refuse to do sth. for fear of hurting sb.'s feelings：虽然不大情愿，又不好意思回绝 find it difficult to refuse though unwilling to do sth.

不如
不如[bù rú] 表示前面提到的人或事物比不上后面所说的 not equal to; not as good as; inferior to：走路不如骑车快。Walking is not as fast as riding.论手巧，大家都不如他。Few can equal (or compare with) him in dexterity of hand.

不妙
不妙[bù miào]不好（多指情况的变化 of a turn of events）not too encouraging; far from good; anything but reassuring

不妨
不妨[bù fáng] 表示可以这样做，没有什么妨碍 there is no harm in; might as well：这种办法没有用过，不妨试试。This method hasn't been used before. Why not give it a try?有什么意见，不妨当面提出来。You might as well make comments face to face if you've got any.

不孝
不孝[bù xiào]1.不孝顺 show no filial duty 2.〈旧时 old〉父母丧事中用于自称 (self-effacing phrase used in one's parent's funeral) I, the unfilial son or daughter

不学无术
不学无术[bù xué wú shù] 没有学问，没有能力 have neither learning nor skill; be ignorant and incompetent

不宁唯是
不宁唯是[bù nìng wéi shì]〈书 fml.〉不仅如此 moreover; and what is more

不安
不安[bù ān]1.不安定；不安宁 intranquil; not peaceful; unstable; disturbed：忐忑不安 restless坐立不安 uneasy动荡不安 in turmoil 2.〈客套话 pol.〉表示歉意和感激 expressing regret or thanks：总给您添麻烦，真是不安。I'm sorry to trouble you so often.

不定
不定[bù dìng]〈副词 adv.〉表示不肯定，后面常有表示疑问的词或肯定和否定相叠的词组 [indicating uncertainty, followed by question words or phrases consisting of both affirmative and negative forms of a word] hard to say; hard to predict; indefinite; indeterminate：孩子不定又跑哪儿去了。Who knows where the children have gone.一天他不定要问多少回。I don't know how many times he asks a day.我下星期还不定走不走。It's not at all certain whether I'll go next week.这场球赛不定谁输谁赢呢！It's hard to predict who will win the game.

不定根
不定根[bù dìng gēn]不是从胚轴的下端生出来的根。有的不定根从茎的节上生出来，如禾本科植物的根；有的从叶片上生出来，如秋海棠的根。adventitious root; root that does not derive from the plumular axis, but from joints of the stem, e.g. roots of gramineous plant, some deriving from the leaves, e.g. roots of the begonia

不宜
不宜[bù yí] 不适宜 not suitable; inadvisable：这块地不宜种植水稻。This land is not fit for growing rice.解决思想问题要耐心细致，不宜操之过急。You must be patient in solving ideological problems; impetuosity gets nowhere.

不容
不容[bù róng]不许；不让 not tolerate; not allow; not brook：不容置疑 beyond doubt; undoubtedly不容置喙 allow no chipping in; brook no interposition任务紧迫，不容拖延。This is an urgent task that allows no delay.

不容置喙
不容置喙[bù róng zhì huì] 指不容许别人插嘴说话 not allow others to interpose; tolerate no interruption

不容置疑
不容置疑[bù róng zhì yí] 不容许有什么怀疑，指真实可信 allow for (or admit) no doubt; not be open to doubt; be beyond doubt

不寒而栗
不寒而栗[bù há nér lì]不寒冷而发抖。形容非常恐惧。shudder; shiver all over though not cold - tremble with fear

不对
不对[bù duì] 不正确；错误 incorrect; wrong：数目不对 wrong amount他没有什么不对的地方。He didn't do anything wrong.不对[bù duì]1.不正常 amiss; abnormal; queer：那人神色有点儿不对。That man doesn't quite look his usual self today.一听口气不对，连忙退了出来。The moment he heard the abnormal tone, he beat a quick retreat. 2.不和睦；合不来 in disagreement; at odds：他们俩素来不对。The two of them have always been at odds.

不对劲
不对劲[bù duì jìn]（～儿 bù duìjìnr）1.不称心合意；不合适 not satisfying：新换的工具，使起来不对劲。The newly equipped tool feels awkward. 2.不情投意合；不和睦 in disagreement; at odds：俩人有点儿不对劲，爱闹意见。The two of them are somewhat at odds and often quarrel with each other. 3.不正常 amiss; abnormal; queer：他越琢磨越觉得这事不对劲，其中必有原因。The more he thought about it, the more he felt something was amiss, and figured there must be some reason.他觉得身上有点不对劲就上床睡觉了。He didn't feel well and went to bed.

不对茬儿
不对茬儿[bù duì chá r] 不妥当；跟当时的情况不符合 not proper; not fit for the occasion：他刚说了一句，觉得不对茬儿，就停住了。He had hardly uttered a sentence when he felt he was saying something improper for the occasion, so he stopped short.

不尴不尬
不尴不尬[bù gān bù gà] 左右为难，不好处理 in a dilemma; in an awkward predicament

不尽然
不尽然[bù jìn rán] 不一定是这样；不完全如此 not necessarily so; not exactly like this：要说做生意能赚钱，也不尽然，有时也会亏本。Doing business doesn't necessarily mean making profits; sometimes it loses money.

不屈
不屈[bù qū] 不屈服 unyielding; unbending：坚贞不屈 faithful and unbending宁死不屈 rather die than surrender; unbending

不屑
不屑[bù xiè]1.认为不值得（做）disdain to do sth.; not worth doing; feel it beneath one's dignity to do sth.：不屑一顾 not worth a glance不屑置辩 not worth arguing about亦 also 不屑于 bùxièyú 2.形容轻视 belittle; look down upon：脸上现出不屑的神情。Disdain was written on his face.

不差什么
不差什么[bù chā shén me]1.不缺什么 be short of nothing：原材料已经不差什么了，只是开工日期还没确定。Raw materials are all available, but the start date for construction is yet to be decided. 2.〈方 dial.〉差不多 almost; nearly：这几个地方不差什么我全都到过。I have been to almost all these places. 3.〈方 dial.〉平常；普通 ordinary; common; average：这一袋粮食有二百斤，不差什么的人还真扛不动。One bag of grain weighs as much as 200 jin, which is really hard for ordinary people to carry.

不差累黍
不差累黍[bù chā lěi shǔ] 形容丝毫不差 not a whit (or an iota) of difference; accurate in every particular; without the slightest error（累黍 leishu：指微小的数量 very small amount）

不已
不已[bù yǐ] 继续不停 endlessly; incessantly：鸡鸣不已。The cock kept crowing.赞叹不已 praise again and again

不带音
不带音[bù dài yīn] 发音时声带不振动 vocal cords having no vibration when pronouncing另见  带音 dàiyīn

不平
不平[bù píng]1.不公平 injustice; unfairness; wrong; grievance：看见了不平的事，他都想管。He will not tolerate any injustice that he comes across. 2.不公平的事 thing that is unjust or unfair：路见不平，拔刀相助 stand out boldly to redress an injustice; come to the rescue of a wronged party 3.因不公平的事而愤怒或不满 resentful; indignant about sth. unjust：愤愤不平 boil with resentment or indignation 4.由不公平的事引起的愤怒和不满 indignation or resentment caused by unfairness：消除心中的不平 allay one's resentment

不平则鸣
不平则鸣[bù píng zé míng] 指对不公平的事情表示愤慨 raise outcry against injustice

不平等条约
不平等条约[bù píng děng tiáo yuē]订约双方（或几方）在权利义务上不平等的条约。特指侵略国强迫别国订立的破坏别国主权、损害别国利益的这类条约。unequal treaty, esp. those forced upon a defeated nation by an invading power

不幸
不幸[bù xìng]1.不幸运；使人失望、伤心、痛苦的 unfortunate; despairing and painful：不幸的消息 tragic news 2.表示不希望发生而竟然发生 (referring to) unwished-for or unexpected (events)：不幸身亡。To our great sorrow he died.不幸而言中。Unfortunately the prediction has come true. 3.指灾祸 disaster：惨遭不幸 encounter disaster

不当
不当[bù dàng] 不合适；不恰当 unsuitable; improper; inappropriate：处理不当 not be handled properly用词不当 inappropriate wording不当之处，请予指正。Please point out my mistakes if there are any.

不待
不待[bù dài] 用不着；不必 needless to; it goes without; unnecessary to：自不待言 needless to say; it goes without saying

不得
不得[bu de] 用在动词后面，表示不可以或不能够 [used after a verb to indicate disallowance or forbiddance] must not; may not; not be allowed; cannot：去不得 shouldn't go要不得 be intolerable动弹不得 cannot move老虎屁股摸不得。He's like a tiger whose backside no one dares to touch. or He's not to be provoked.科学上来不得半点虚假。No sophistry is tolerable in science.

不得了
不得了[bù dé liǎo]1.表示情况严重 (of situations) terrible; horrible; desperately serious：哎呀，不得了，着火了！Oh, how awful! Fire! Fire!万一出了岔子，那可不得了。Should any accident happen, that would be terrible. 2.表示程度很深 (of degrees) extremely; exceedingly：热得不得了 awfully hot她急得不得了，可又没办法。She is extremely anxious but of no help.

不得劲
不得劲[bù dé jìn]（～儿 bù déjìnr）1.不顺手；使不上劲 awkward; unhandy：笔杆太细，我使着不得劲。The pen is awkward because its shaft is too thin. 2.不舒适 indisposed; not feel well：感冒了，浑身不得劲。I'm not feeling too well because I've caught a cold. 3.〈方 dial.〉不好意思 feel embarrassed：大伙儿都看着她，弄得她怪不得劲儿的。She was embarrassed by so many guys staring at her.

不得已
不得已[bù dé yǐ] 无可奈何；不能不如此 act against one's will; have no alternative but to; have to; be forced to：万不得已 out of absolute necessity实在不得已，只好亲自去一趟。I had no alternative but to go personally.他们这样做，是出于不得已。They did it that way because they had no choice.

不必
不必[bù bì]〈副词 adv.〉表示事理上或情理上不需要 need not; not have to：不必去得太早 do not have to go there too early慢慢商议，不必着急。Deliberate on it with patience and don't worry.为这点小事苦恼，我以为大可不必。I don't think there is need to worry about such a trifling matter.

不忍
不忍[bù rěn] 心里忍受不了 cannot bear to：于心不忍 not have the heart to不忍释手 (for loving sth.) cannot bear to put it down不忍卒读（不忍心读完，多形容文章悲惨动人）have no guts to finish reading (usu. a tragic or touching story)

不快
不快[bù kuài]1.（心情）不愉快 unhappy; displeased; in low spirits：怏怏不快 unhappy; displeased; depressed; in low spirits 2.（身体）不舒服 indisposed; feel under the weather; be out of sorts：几天来身子不快。I'm not feeling well these days.

不忿
不忿[bù fèn]（～儿 bùfènr）不顺气；不平 not give in to; take offence; be resentful：心中颇有不忿之意 remain very resentful

不怎么样
不怎么样[bù zěn me yàng] 平平常常；不很好 just so-so; not particularly good：这个人不怎么样。This person is pretty mediocre.这幅画儿的构思还不错，就是着色不怎么样。The theme of the painting is quite good, but the colouring is less desirable.

不怕
不怕[bù pà]〈方 dial.〉〈连词 conj.〉用法跟‘哪怕’相同 [same as 哪怕 nǎpà in usage]：不怕天气再冷，他也要用冷水洗脸。However cold it is, he continues to wash his face with cold water.

不恤
不恤[bù xù] 不顾及；不忧虑；不顾惜 disregard; could not care less; not be concerned with：不恤人言（不管别人的议论）disregard sb.'s comments

不情之请
不情之请[bù qíng zhī qǐng]〈客套话 pol.〉不合情理的请求（向人求助时称自己的请求）my presumptuous request

不惑
不惑[bù huò]〈书 fml.〉《论语·为政》：‘四十而不惑。’指人到了四十岁，能明辨是非而不受迷惑。后来用‘不惑’指人四十岁‘At age 40 one becomes free from doubts’(Confucius' The Analects·Governance); referring to the age of 40：年届不惑 turn 40; become 40 years old不惑之年 the age of 40

不惜
不惜[bù xī] 不顾惜；舍得 not stint; not spare：不惜工本 regardless of cost不惜牺牲一切 (do sth.) at all cost倾家荡产，在所不惜 disregard any cost, even the loss of all one's property

不惟
不惟[bù wéi]〈书 fml.〉不但；不仅 not only：此举不惟无益，反而有害。The move will not only be of no good, but will bring harm.

不惮
不惮[bù dàn] 不怕 not fear; not be afraid of：不惮其烦（不怕麻烦）not mind taking the trouble; take great pains; be very patient

不想
不想[bù xiǎng] 不料；没想到 unexpectedly; who would have expected：不想事情结局竟会如此。Who would have expected such a result?

不意
不意[bù yì] 不料；没想到 unexpectedly：出其不意 catch sb. by surprise不意大雨如注，不能起程。This downpour came so suddenly, it was impossible for us to set off right away.

不愧
不愧[bù kuì]当之无愧；当得起（多跟‘为’或‘是’连用 usu. followed by 为 wéi or 是 shì）worthy of; deserve the honour; prove oneself to be：郑成功不愧为一位民族英雄。Zheng Chenggong proved to be a national hero.

不懈
不懈[bù xiè] 不松懈 untiring; unremitting; indefatigable：坚持不懈 persistent不懈地努力 make unremitting efforts进行不懈的斗争 wage an unremitting struggle

不成
不成[bù chéng]1. 同 same as 不行 bùxíng ① ②; 2.〈助词 aux.〉用在句末，表示推测或反问的语气，前面常常有‘难道、莫非’等词相呼应 [attached to the end of a sentence to indicate inference or a rhetorical question, usu. preceded by 难道 nándào or 莫非 mòfēi]：难道就这样算了不成？How can we let it go like that?他还不来，莫非家里出了什么事不成？He hasn't come yet. Something wrong in his family?

不成体统
不成体统[bù chéng tǐ tǒng] 说话、做事不合体制，没有规矩 (of speech or behaviour) most improper; downright outrageous; very rude

不成器
不成器[bù chéng qì] 不成东西 unable to be made into anything；〈比喻 fig.〉没出息 good-for-nothing; worthless; ne'er-do-well

不成文
不成文[bù chéng wén] 没有用文字固定下来的 unwritten; not fixed by written language：不成文的规矩 unwritten customs多年的老传统不成文地沿袭了下来。Unwritten age-old traditions have been carried on.

不成文法
不成文法[bù chéng wén fǎ] 不经立法程序而由国家承认其有效的法律，如判例、习惯法等（跟‘成文法’相对 as opposed to‘written law’）unwritten law; laws recognized as valid by a country without going through legislative procedures, e.g. case law, customary (common) law, etc.

不成材
不成材[bù chéng cái] 不能做材料 unable to be used as material；〈比喻 fig.〉没出息 good-for-nothing; worthless; ne'er-do-well

不成比例
不成比例[bù chéng bǐ lì] 指数量或大小等方面差得很远，不能相比 (of amount, size, etc.) differing greatly and incomparable with sth. else

不成话
不成话[bù chéng huà]另见  不像话 bù xiànghuà ①

不才
不才[bù cái]〈书 fml.〉没有才能，常用做‘我’的谦称 without ability; I [usu. used as a humble address to call oneself]：其中道理，不才愿洗耳聆教。I'm ready to listen to your analysis of it.

不扬
不扬[bù yáng]（相貌）不好看 not good-looking：其貌不扬 not good-looking

不拘
不拘[bù jū]1.不拘泥；不计较；不限制 not stick to; not confine or restrict oneself to：不拘一格 not stick to one pattern; not limited to one type (or style)不拘小节 not bother about trifles; not niggling字数不拘。No limit is set on the number of words.长短不拘。No limit is set on the length. 2.不论 no matter (what, who, etc.); whatever：不拘什么事，我都愿意把它做好。Whatever I do, I would do it well.

不拘一格
不拘一格[bù jū yī gé] 不局限于一种规格或方式 not stick to one pattern; not limited to one type (or style)：文艺创作要不拘一格，体裁可以多样化。Literary and artistic creation should not be limited to any one pattern; it should be diverse in form.

不拘小节
不拘小节[bù jū xiǎo jié] 不为无关原则的琐事所约束，现多指不注意生活小事 not bother about trifles unrelated to principles; (usu.) not care about minor matters in daily life; not niggling

不择手段
不择手段[bù zé shǒu duàn]为了达到目的，什么手段都使得出来（含贬义 derog.）by fair means or foul; by hook or by crook; unscrupulously

不振
不振[bù zhèn] 不振作；不旺盛 listless：精神不振 listless一蹶不振 cannot recover from an upset国势不振。The nation's power is at low ebb.

不揣
不揣[bù chuǎi]〈谦辞 hum.〉不自量，用于向人提出自己的见解或有所请求时 overrate one's abilities (used to put forward one's own opinion or requirement.); I venture to; may I take the liberty of：不揣浅陋 forgive me for being ignorant, but let me ...不揣冒昧（不考虑自己的莽撞，言语、行动是否相宜）I venture to; may I take the liberty of (without considering whether one's speech or behaviour is appropriate)

不摸头
不摸头[bù mō tóu] 摸不着头绪；不了解情况 get no feel of sth. or the situation; not acquainted with the situation; not up on things：我刚来，这些事全不摸头。I'm a newcomer and not familiar with things going on here.

不支
不支[bù zhī] 支持不住；不能支撑下去 cannot sustain any longer; cannot hold up：精力不支 emerge exhausted身体不支 physically exhausted

不敏
不敏[bù mǐn]〈书 fml.〉不聪明。常用来表示自谦。not intelligent (used in self-deprecation)：敬谢不敏。I, the stupid, offer you my thanks.

不敢当
不敢当[bù gǎn dāng]〈谦辞 hum.〉表示承当不起（对方的招待、夸奖等）[used in response to sb.'s hospitality or in reply to a compliment or a complimentary gesture] I really don't deserve this; it's too great an honour; I'm overwhelmed; I'm much obliged; you flatter me

不料
不料[bù liào] 没想到；没有预先料到 unexpectedly; to one's surprise：今天本想出门，不料竟下起雨来。I had planned to go out today, but who would have thought it was raining!

不断
不断[bù duàn] 连续不间断 unceasing; uninterrupted; continuous; constant：接连不断 in succession不断努力，不断进步 make unceasing progress through continuous effort新生事物不断涌现。New things are constantly emerging.

不无
不无[bù wú] 不是没有；多少有些 more or less：不无小补 be of some help不无裨益 be more or less helpful不无关系 be more or less involved不无遗憾 feel somewhat regretful

不日
不日[bù rì]要不了几天；几天之内（限用于未来 in future tense only）within the next few days：不日启程 to set off soon代表团不日抵京。The delegation will arrive in Beijing within days.

不时
不时[bù shí]1.时时；经常不断地 from time to time; frequently; often：一边走着，一边不时地四处张望 look around from time to time while walking在丛林深处，不时听到布谷鸟的叫声。The chirps of cuckoos could be constantly heard in the depth of the forests. 2.随时；不是预定的时间 at any time; at an unexpected moment：以备不时之需 prepare for emergency needs

不明飞行物
不明飞行物[bù míng fēi xíng wù]指天空中来历不明并未经证实的飞行物体。近几十年来屡有这类飞行物体出现的报道，据称形状有圆碟形、卵形、蘑菇形等。UFO; unidentified flying object. Over the past decades there have been frequent reported sightings of UFOs, describing them as disc, oval, or mushroom shaped.亦 also 飞碟 fēidié

不易之论
不易之论[bù yì zhī lùn] 内容正确、不可更改的言论 perfectly sound proposition; undeniable truth; irrefutable argument

不是
不是[bù shi] 错处；过失 fault; blame：好意劝他，反倒落个不是。(I) tried to persuade him out of good intentions, only to get blamed instead.你先出口伤人，这就是你的不是了。It's your fault, because you were the first to speak bitingly.

不是味儿
不是味儿[bù shì wèi r]1.味道不正 not the right flavour; not quite right; a bit off：这个菜炒得不是味儿。This dish doesn't taste quite right.他的民歌唱得不是味儿。The way he sings folk songs is a bit off. 2.不对头；不正常 fishy; queer; amiss：一听这话不是味儿，就反过来追问。Hearing the words and feeling something amiss, he retorted instead of giving an answer. 3.（心里感到）不好受 feel bad; be upset：看到孩子们上不了学，心里很不是味儿。I feel upset as I saw children unable to go to school. 亦 also 不是滋味儿 bù shì zīwèir

不是玩儿的
不是玩儿的[bù shì wán r de] 不是儿戏 it's no joke：多穿上点儿，受了寒可不是玩儿的！It's no joke catching a cold. Better put on more clothes.

不是话
不是话[bù shì huà]（话）没道理；不对头 (of one's words) unreasonable, wrong; absurd; amiss

不景气
不景气[bù jǐng qì]1.经济不繁荣 depression; recession; economic slump 2.泛指不兴旺 in a depressed state

不暇
不暇[bù xiá] 没有时间；忙不过来 have no time (for sth.)：应接不暇 have too much work to cope with自顾不暇 be too busy to attend to oneself

不曾
不曾[bù céng] 同 same as 没有2  méi·yǒu（‘曾经’的否定 negative form of 曾经 céngjīng）never (have done sth.)：我还不曾去过广州。I have never been to Guangzhou.除此之外，不曾发现其他疑点。No questionable points were found except this.

不服
不服[bù fú]1.不顺从；不信服 refuse to obey (or comply); refuse to accept as final; remain unconvinced by; not give in to：不服管教 refuse to obey discipline说他错了，他还不服。He refused to accept that he was wrong. 2.不习惯；不能适应 not accustomed to; not adapted to; not used to：不服水土 not accustomed to the climate of a new place; yet to be acclimatized这种烟我抽不服。I'm not used to this type of cigarette.

不服水土
不服水土[bù fú shuǐ tǔ] 指不能适应某地的气候、饮食等 not accustomed to the climate, food and drink, etc. of a new place; not acclimatized

不期然而然
不期然而然[bù qī rán ér rán] 没有料想到如此而竟然如此 happen unexpectedly; contrary to one's expectations亦 also 不期而然 bù qī ér rán

不期而遇
不期而遇[bù qī ér yù] 没有约定而意外地相遇 meet unexpectedly; have a chance encounter; bump into

不朽
不朽[bù xiǔ] 永不磨灭（多用于抽象事物 oft. for abstract things）immortal：不朽的业绩 immortal deeds人民英雄永垂不朽。Eternal glory to the people's heroes.

不止
不止[bù zhǐ]1.继续不停 incessant; without end：大笑不止 roar with laughter血流不止 incessant bleeding 2.表示超出某个数目或范围 more than; go beyond：他恐怕不止六十岁了。He is probably over 60.类似情况不止一次发生。It happened more than once.

不正当竞争
不正当竞争[bù zhèng dàng jìng zhēng]经营者在经营活动中违反诚、信、公平等原则的竞争行为。如商业贿赂、侵犯商业秘密、虚假广告、倾销等。unfair competition; dishonest and unfair competitive tactics in business operations, such as bribery, fraudulently obtaining commercial information, false advertising, dumping, etc.

不比
不比[bù bǐ] 比不上；不同于 unlike; cannot compare with; no match for：虽然我们条件不比他们，但我们一定能按时完成任务。Although things are not so favourable for us as for them, we can still finish this task on time.海南不比塞北，一年四季树木葱茏，花果飘香。Hainan Province, unlike areas north of the Great Wall, has lush trees and fragrant flowers and fruit throughout the year.

不毛之地
不毛之地[bù máo zhī dì] 不长庄稼的地方，泛指贫瘠、荒凉的土地或地带 barren and bleak land; desert

不求甚解
不求甚解[bù qiú shèn jiě]原指读书要领会精神实质，不必咬文嚼字。现多指只求懂得个大概，不求深刻了解。(formerly) get to the bottom of things without paying too much attention to the wording; not seek deep understanding; be content with a superficial understanding; not seek to understand things thoroughly

不治之症
不治之症[bù zhì zhī zhèng] 医治不好的病 incurable disease；〈比喻 fig.〉去除不掉的祸患或弊端 chronic malady; inveterate bane

不法
不法[bù fǎ] 违反法律的 lawless; illegal; unlawful：不法行为 unlawful practice; illegal act不法分子 lawbreaker; lawless person

不测
不测[bù cè] 没有推测到的；意外 unexpected; unforeseen; accident; mishap; contingency：天有不测风云。A storm may arise from a clear sky - something unexpected may happen any time.提高警惕，以防不测。Sharpen vigilance, and be prepared for any contingency.

不济
不济[bù jì] 不好；不顶用 poor; no good; of no use; not of any help：精力不济 short of energy眼神儿不济。The eyesight is failing.

不济事
不济事[bù jì shì] 不顶事；不中用 not good; of no use：这办法也不济事。This method isn't of any help either.

不消
不消[bù xiāo] 不需要；不用 not necessary; needless：不消说 needless to say; it goes without saying不消一会儿工夫，这个消息就传开了。The news got around in no time.

不满
不满[bù mǎn] 不满意 resentful; discontented; dissatisfied：不满情绪 discontent人们对不关心群众疾苦的做法极为不满。The act of neglecting the masses' weals and woes is bitterly resented by people.

不然
不然[bù rán]1.不是这样 not so：抄抄写写看起来很容易，其实不然。Copying a text may seem an easy job, but actually it is not the case. 2.用在对话开头，表示否定对方的话 [used at the beginning of a sentence to express disagreement] no：不然，事情不像你说的那么简单。No, it is not as simple as what you said. 3.〈连词 conj.〉表示如果不是上文所说的情况，就发生或可能发生下文所说的情况 or else; otherwise; if not：快走吧，不然，就要迟到了。Hurry up, otherwise we'll be late.明天我还有点事儿，不然倒可以陪你去一趟。I've got things to do tomorrow, or I might as well go with you.他晚上不是读书，就是写点儿什么，再不然就是听听音乐。In the evening, he either reads or writes, or listens to music.

不爽
不爽1[bù shuǎng]（身体、心情）不爽快 not well; be out of sorts; be in a bad mood不爽2[bù shuǎng] 没有差错 without discrepancy; accurate：毫厘不爽 not deviate a hair's breadth; be perfectly accurate; be right in every detail屡试不爽 prove to be successful time and again

不特
不特[bù tè]〈书 fml.〉不但 not only

不犯
不犯[bù fàn]〈方 dial.〉犯不着；不值得 need not; not worthwhile：这点小事不犯跟他计较。It's not worthwhile arguing with him over such a trivial matter.

不独
不独[bù dú] 不但；不仅 not only：植树造林不独有利于水土保持，而且还能提供木材。Afforestation not only helps to conserve water and prevent soil erosion, but can provide timber as well.

不甘
不甘[bù gān] 不甘心；不情愿 not reconciled to; not resigned to; unwilling：不甘落后 not content to lag behind不甘示弱 unwilling to be outshone; not to be outdone

不甘寂寞
不甘寂寞[bù gān jì mò]指不甘心冷落清闲、置身事外。指要表现自己或参加某一活动。hate to be neglected or overlooked; display oneself or take part in an activity

不甚了了
不甚了了[bù shèn liǎo liǎo] 不太了解；不怎么清楚 not quite clear (about sth.)

不用
不用[bù yòng] 表示事实上没有必要 need not：不用介绍了，我们认识。There was no need for introduction, because we knew each other already.大家都是自己人，不用客气。We are friends, so don't stand on ceremony.另见  甭 béng

不由得
不由得[bù yóu de]1.不容 cannot help; cannot but：他说得这么透彻，不由得你不信服。He spoke so cogently that you couldn't help being convinced. 2.不禁 cannot help：想起过去的苦难，不由得掉下眼泪来。My tears came down despite myself as I recalled the sufferings in the old days.

不由自主
不由自主[bù yóu zì zhǔ] 由不得自己；控制不了自己 cannot help; involuntarily

不白之冤
不白之冤[bù bái zhī yuān] 指无法辩白或难以洗雪的冤枉 unrighted wrong; unredressed injustice; unexplainable or unrightable wrong：蒙受不白之冤 be grievously wronged

不相上下
不相上下[bù xiāng shàng xià] 分不出高低，形容程度相等 equally matched; about the same; almost on a par：本领不相上下 of equal ability年岁不相上下 of similar age

不省人事
不省人事[bù xǐng rén shì]1.指人昏迷，失去知觉 lose consciousness; be unconscious; be in a coma 2.指不懂人情世故 not know the ways of the world

不着边际
不着边际[bù zhuó biān jì] 形容言论空泛，不切实际；离题太远 not to the point; wide of the mark; neither here nor there; irrelevant

不知凡几
不知凡几[bù zhī fán jǐ]不知道一共有多少。指同类的人或事物很多。can't tell how many there are (there being countless similar cases)

不知天高地厚
不知天高地厚[bù zhī tiān gāo dì hòu] 形容见识短浅，狂妄自大 (fig.) not know the height of the heavens or the depth of the earth - have an exaggerated opinion of one's abilities

不知所云
不知所云[bù zhī suǒ yún]不知道说的是什么。指语言紊乱或空洞。has no idea what one is saying (referring to confused or empty talk)

不知所措
不知所措[bù zhī suǒ cuò]不知道怎么办才好。形容受窘或发急。be at a loss; be at one's wits' end

不知所终
不知所终[bù zhī suǒ zhōng] 不知道结局或下落 not know the outcome or whereabouts

不知死活
不知死活[bù zhī sǐ huó] 形容不知厉害，冒昧从事 act recklessly in disregard of risks

不知进退
不知进退[bù zhī jìn tuì] 形容言语行动冒失，没有分寸 have no sense of propriety; not know where to stop

不祥
不祥[bù xiáng] 不吉利 inauspicious：不祥之兆 an ill (or evil) omen

不祧之祖
不祧之祖[bù tiāo zhī zǔ]〈旧时 old〉〈比喻 fig.〉创立某种事业受到尊崇的人 revered earliest ancestor; patriarch; founder; forefather；（祧 tiao：古代指远祖的祠堂。家庙中祖先的神主，辈分远的要依次迁入祧庙合祭，只有创业的始祖或影响较大的祖宗不迁，叫做不祧。ancestral temple or clan hall for worshipping remote ancestors. Of the ancestors being honoured in the family temple in the form of wooden tablets bearing their names, those of the oldest generations will be moved according to the order of seniority to the tiao or ancestral temple, where they can be collectively worshipped. But the tablets for the founding ancestors of a clan or those of influence will not be moved into the tiao. That is called 不祧 bùtiāo.）

不禁
不禁[bù jīn]抑制不住；禁不住 cannot help (doing sth.); cannot refrain from：忍俊不禁 cannot help laughing读到精彩之处，他不禁大声叫好。He couldn't help shouting‘bravo’as he read the most interesting parts of the book.

不禁不由
不禁不由[bù jīn bù yóu]（～儿的 bùjīn bùyóur·de）不由自主地 cannot help (doing sth.); involuntarily：看着孩子们跳舞，他不禁不由地打起拍子来。He involuntarily started to keep the beat as he watched the children dancing.

不离儿
不离儿[bù lí r]〈方 dial.〉不坏；差不多 not bad; pretty good：你看他画得还真不离儿呢。Look, his drawing is pretty good.

不稳平衡
不稳平衡[bù wěn píng héng] 受到微小的外力干扰就要失去平衡的平衡状态，如鸡蛋直立时的状态 unstable equilibrium; becoming unbalanced under the tiniest effects of outside force, e.g. an egg set on end

不端
不端[bù duān] 不正派 improper; dishonourable：品行不端 bad conduct; ill-behaved

不符
不符[bù fú] 不相合 not agree (or tally, square) with; not conform to; be inconsistent with：名实不符 have an undeserved reputation账面与库存不符。The stock is inconsistent with what appears in the accounts.

不等
不等[bù děng] 不一样；不齐 vary; differ：数目不等 vary in quantity大小不等 differ (or vary) in size水平高低不等 vary in capability

不等式
不等式[bù děng shì]表示两个数（或两个代数式）不相等的算式。两个数或两个代数式之间用不等号连接，如5>2, 3a(math.) inequality; mathematical formula indicating the relation between two quantities (or two algebraic expressions) that are not of equal value or magnitude, separated by a sign of inequality, e.g. 5>2, 3a

不管
不管[bù guǎn]〈连词 conj.〉表示在任何条件或情况下结果都不会改变，后边常有‘都、也’等副词与它呼应 [indicating that sth. will never change in any case, usu. correlated with adverbs like 都 dōu and 也 yě that follow it] regardless of; no matter (what, how, etc.)：不管远不远他都不去。No matter how near or far, he refuses to go.不管困难多大，我们也要克服。We can overcome any difficulties, however great.

不管三七二十一
不管三七二十一[bù guǎn sān qī èr shí yī] 不顾一切；不问是非情由 casting all caution to the winds; regardless of the consequences; recklessly; regardless of right and wrong or how and why

不管不顾
不管不顾[bù guǎn bù gù]1.不照管 won't look after; not mind：他对家里的事全都不管不顾。He doesn't mind or care about anything going on in his family. 2.指人莽撞 rash; crude and impetuous：他不管不顾地冲上去，挥起拳头就打。He rushed forward and struck with his fist.

不管部长
不管部长[bù guǎn bù zhǎng]某些国家的内阁阁员之一，不专管一个部，出席内阁会议，参与决策，并担任政府首脑交办的特殊重要事务 minister without portfolio; member of the cabinet in certain countries who is not designated to a single ministry, but attends cabinet meetings, participates in decision-making and handles important or special affairs assigned by the head of the government

不约而同
不约而同[bù yuē ér tóng] 没有事先商量而彼此见解或行动一致 without prior consultation, (two persons) do or think the same; happen to coincide

不织布
不织布[bù zhī bù] 无纺织布 adhesive-bonded fabric; non-woven fabric

不经一事，不长一智
不经一事，不长一智[bù jīng yī shì, bù zhǎng yī zhì] 不经历一件事情，就不能增长对于那件事情的知识 one cannot gain knowledge of sth. without getting involved in it; wisdom comes from experience

不经之谈
不经之谈[bù jīng zhī tán] 荒诞的、没有根据的话 absurd and groundless remark; cock-and-bull story（经 jing：正常 normal）

不经意
不经意[bù jīng yì] 不注意；不留神 carelessly; not taking care or paying attention to：稍不经意，就会出错。You'll slip the moment you let your mind wander.

不绝如缕
不绝如缕[bù jué rú lǚ]像细线一样连着，差点儿就要断了。多用来形容局势危急或声音细微悠长。hanging by a thread; (of situations) critical; almost fatal; (of sound) linger on faintly

不置
不置[bù zhì]〈书 fml.〉不停止 incessantly; continuously：赞叹不置 admire again and again懊丧不置 endlessly regretting

不置可否
不置可否[bù zhì kě fǒu] 不说对，也不说不对 decline to comment; not express an opinion

不羁
不羁[bù jī]〈书 fml.〉不受束缚 unruly; uninhibited：放荡不羁 unconventional and unrestrained; following one's own inclinations

不翼而飞
不翼而飞[bù yì ér fēi]1.没有翅膀却能飞。比喻东西突然不见了。(of an object) disappear all of a sudden; vanish into thin air 2.形容消息、言论等传布迅速 (of news, words, etc.) spread quickly as if on wings; spread like wildfire

不耻下问
不耻下问[bù chǐ xià wèn] 不以向地位比自己低、知识比自己少的人请教为可耻 not feel ashamed to consult one's subordinates or sb. not as knowledgeable as oneself

不肖
不肖[bù xiào]品行不好（多用于子弟 of children）unworthy：不肖子孙 unworthy posterity

不胜
不胜[bù shèng]1.承担不了；不能忍受 cannot bear (or stand)：体力不胜 be physically unequal to (a task); be physically incapable of coping with (a job)不胜其烦 be bored beyond endurance 2.表示不能做或做不完（前后重复同一动词）[used between two identical verbs to indicate difficulty or impossibility of fulfilment]：防不胜防（防不住）cannot find a foolproof solution; cannot avoid (danger, mistake, etc.) by any means数不胜数（数不完）countless; numerable 3.非常；十分（用于感情方面 used in expressing feelings）very; extremely：不胜感激 be much obliged; be deeply grateful不胜遗憾 be very sorry; much to one's regret 4.〈方 dial.〉不如 less than; worse than：身子一年不胜一年。His health is getting worse with each passing year.

不胫而走
不胫而走[bù jìng ér zǒu]没有腿却能跑。形容传布迅速。be able to run without legs; (fig.) get round fast; spread like wildfire（胫 jing：小腿 lower leg）

不能自已
不能自已[bù néng zì yǐ] 不能控制自己的感情 cannot control oneself; lose self-control; can't help; be beside oneself

不自量
不自量[bù zì liàng] 过高地估计自己 not take a proper measure of oneself; overrate one's own abilities：如此狂妄，太不自量。What an arrogant and overconfident creature!

不自量力
不自量力[bù zì liàng lì]不能正确估计自己的力量（多指做力不能及的事情 oft. things beyond one's capability）not take a proper measure of oneself; overrate one's own abilities亦 also 自不量力 zì bù liànglì

不至于
不至于[bù zhì yú] 表示不会达到某种程度 cannot go so far; be unlikely：他不至于连这一点道理也不明白。He must have more sense than that.两人有矛盾，但还不至于吵架。They are at odds, but won't go so far as to quarrel.

不致
不致[bù zhì] 不会引起某种后果 not in such a way as to; not likely to：事前做好准备，就不致临时手忙脚乱了。If you had arranged everything in advance you wouldn't be in such a rush at the moment.

不良
不良[bù liáng] 不好 bad; harmful; unhealthy：不良现象 unhealthy tendencies消化不良 indigestion存心不良 harbour evil intentions; have ulterior motives

不苟
不苟[bù gǒu] 不随便；不马虎 not lax; not casual; careful; conscientious：不苟言笑 reserved; reticent; taciturn; sober; sedate一丝不苟 not the least bit negligent; scrupulous about every detail; conscientious and meticulous

不落窠臼
不落窠臼[bù luò kē jiù]〈比喻 fig.〉文章或艺术等有独创风格，不落俗套 (of articles, arts, etc.) not follow the beaten track; have an original style; show originality; be unconventional

不蔓不枝
不蔓不枝[bù màn bù zhī] 原指莲茎不分枝杈 (of lotus stems) neither spreading about nor branching out；〈比喻 fig.〉文章简洁 (of articles) concise; succinct

不虞
不虞[bù yú]〈书 fml.〉1.意料不到 unexpected：不虞之誉 unexpected praise不虞之患 unexpected disease 2.出乎意料的事 eventuality; contingency：以备不虞 prepare for contingencies 3.不忧虑 not worry about：不虞匮乏 fear no shortage of material thing; not worry about running out of supplies

不行
不行[bù xíng]1.不可以；不被允许 not to be allowed; will not do; be impossible：开玩笑可以，欺负人可不行。To joke around is all right, but to bully people just won't do. 2.不中用 be no good; will not work：你知道，我在工程技术方面是不行的。You know, I'm not good at engineering. 3.接近于死亡 dying：老太太病重，眼看不行了。The old lady is so ill that it looks like she is dying. 4.不好 be not good; be poor：这件衣服的手工不行。This shirt was poorly made. 5.表示程度极深；不得了（用在‘得’字后做补语 used as a complement after 得 ·de）awfully; extremely：累得不行 awfully tired; be spent大街上热闹得不行。The streets are extremely busy.

不要
不要[bù yào] 表示禁止和劝阻 mustn't：不要大声喧哗。Don't talk loudly.不要麻痹大意。Don't slacken your vigilance.

不要紧
不要紧[bù yào jǐn]1.没有妨碍；不成问题 it's OK; doesn't matter; never mind：这病不要紧，吃点儿药就好。Your illness is not serious, and you will feel better after taking some medicine.路远也不要紧，我们派车送你回去。Never mind the long distance, we will arrange for your drive back. 2.表面上似乎没有妨碍（下文有转折）it may appear all right, but ...：你这么一叫不要紧，把大伙儿都惊醒了。You may think your shouting all right, but you've woken everybody up.

不见
不见[bù jiàn]1.不见面 not see each other; not meet：不见不散 (of appointed meeting, whoever comes first) not to leave without seeing the other这孩子一年不见，竟长得这么高了。It's only a year since I last saw the child, and he's grown so tall. 2.（东西）不在了；找不着（后头必须带‘了’must be followed by 了·le）(of things) lost; out of sight; hard to find：我的笔刚才还在，怎么转眼就不见了？My pen was here just now, and where could it have gone in such a flash?

不见得
不见得[bù jiàn dé] 不一定 uncertain; not necessarily so; not a sure thing：这雨不见得下得起来。The rain may not come down.看样子，他不见得能来。It seems that he may not come.

不见棺材不落泪
不见棺材不落泪[bù jiàn guān cai bù luò lèi]〈比喻 fig.〉不到彻底失败的时候不知痛悔 refuse to repent until failing completely

不见经传
不见经传[bù jiàn jīng zhuàn]经传中没有记载。指人或事物没有什么名气，也指某种理论缺乏文献上的依据。not to be found in the records; (of person or thing) not authoritative; unknown; (of a theory) lack documented support

不解之缘
不解之缘[bù jiě zhī yuán]不能分开的缘分。指亲密的关系或深厚的感情。indissoluble bond; irrevocable commitment; intimate relationship or deep affection

不言而喻
不言而喻[bù yán ér yù] 不用说就可以明白 it goes without saying; it is self-evident

不计
不计[bù jì] 不计较；不考虑 would not mind; be indifferent to; disregard：不计成本 not consider costs不计个人得失 disregard personal gain

不计其数
不计其数[bù jì qí shù]无法计算数目。形容极多。countless; innumerable

不讳
不讳[bù huì]〈书 fml.〉1.不忌讳；无所避讳 without concealing anything：直言不讳 speak without reservation; not mince words; call a spade a spade; talk straight 2.〈婉辞 euph.〉指死亡 die

不许
不许[bù xǔ]1.不允许 be not allowed; must not：不许说谎。(You) must not tell lies. 2.不能（用于反问句 used in rhetorical questions）can't：何必非等我，你就不许自己去吗？Why must you wait for me? You may as well go by yourself.

不论
不论[bù lùn]1.〈连词 conj.〉表示条件或情况不同而结果不变，后面往往有并列的词语或表示任指的疑问代词，下文多用‘都、总’等副词跟它呼应 [get same result in spite of changed conditions or circumstances, usu. followed by coordinate phrases or wh- pronouns with indefinite reference, and often correlated with 都 dōu or 总 zǒng] no matter (what, who, how, etc.); whether ...or ...; regardless of：不论困难有多大，他都不气馁。However great the difficulties, he never loses heart.他不论考虑什么问题，总是把集体利益放在第一位。He always puts the collective interests first no matter what is on his mind. 2.〈书 fml.〉不讨论；不辩论 not to discuss; not to argue：存而不论 leave the question as it is

不识之无
不识之无[bù shí zhī wú]指不识字（‘之’和‘无’是常用的字）illiterate

不识抬举
不识抬举[bù shí tái ju]不接受或不珍视别人对自己的好意（用于指责人）fail to appreciate sb.'s kindness; not know how to appreciate a favour

不识闲儿
不识闲儿[bù shí xián r]〈方 dial.〉闲不住：他手脚不识闲儿，从早忙到晚。He keeps himself busy all day long.

不详
不详[bù xiáng]1.不详细；不清楚 not detailed; not quite clear：言之不详 be stated too briefly; not be given in detail地址不详。The address is not quite clear.历史情况不详。The historical background is not quite clear. 2.不细说（书信中用语 used in letters）wouldn't go into details

不谋而合
不谋而合[bù móu ér hé] 没有事先商量而彼此见解或行动完全一致 agree with each other without prior (or previous) consultation; happen to hold the same view

不谓
不谓[bù wèi]〈书 fml.〉1.不能说（用于表示否定的语词前面 used before a negative phrase）cannot be said：任务不谓不重。The task cannot be said to be unimportant.时间不谓不长。The period of time cannot be said to be not long. 2.不料；没想到 unexpectedly; to one's surprise：离别以来，以为相见无日，不谓今又重逢。I thought that we wouldn't see each other for good after our departure, but unexpectedly we met each other today.

不贰过
不贰过[bù èr guò]〈书 fml.〉犯过的错误不重犯 not repeat a previous mistake

不费吹灰之力
不费吹灰之力[bù fèi chuī huī zhī lì] 形容做事情非常容易，不费什么力气 as easy as blowing off dust; as easy as pie; very easy

不赀
不赀[bù zī]〈书 fml.〉没有限量，表示多或贵重（多用于财物 oft. property）immeasurable; incalculable：价值不赀 invaluable工程浩大，所费不赀。The project is gigantic and costs an awful lot.

不赖
不赖[bù lài]〈方 dial.〉不坏；好 not bad; good; fine：字写得不赖。The handwriting is not bad.今年的庄稼可真不赖。This year's crops are doing really fine.

不赞一词
不赞一词[bù zàn yī cí]《史记·孔子世家》：‘至于为《春秋》，笔则笔，削则削，子夏之徒不能赞一词。’原指文章写得很好，别人不能再添一句话。现在说‘不赞一词’也指一言不发。Records of the Historian·Hereditary House of Confucius:‘In writing The Spring and Autumn Annals the author knew well where to be elaborate and where to be succinct, so that the disciples of Zi Xia could not insert a single word for improvement,’referring to sth. so well written that others could not add a word; (later used to mean) not say a word; keep silent; make no comment

不起眼儿
不起眼儿[bù qǐ yǎn r]不值得重视；不引人注目 not warrant attention; not noticeable; not attractive：不起眼儿的小人物 small potato

不足
不足[bù zú]1.不充足；不满（某个数目）not enough; insufficient; inadequate：先天不足 congenital defect估计不足 underestimate不足三千人 less than 3,000 people 2.不值得 not worth：不足道 not worth mentioning不足为奇 not at all surprising不足挂齿 nothing to speak of 3.不可以；不能 cannot; should not：不足为训 not to be taken as an example非团结不足图存。(We) cannot survive unless we unite.

不足为奇
不足为奇[bù zú wéi qí]不值得奇怪。指事物、现象等很平常。not at all surprising; nothing to be surprised at

不足为训
不足为训[bù zú wéi xùn] 不能当做典范或法则 not good enough to serve as a model; not to be taken as an example; not an example to be followed; not to be taken as authoritative

不足挂齿
不足挂齿[bù zú guà chǐ] 不值得一提 not worth mentioning; nothing to speak of：区区小事，不足挂齿。My paltry efforts are not worth mentioning.

不足道
不足道[bù zú dào] 不值得说 not worth mentioning; inconsiderable; of no consequence：微不足道 too trivial or insignificant to mention个人的得失是不足道的。An individual's gain or loss is not worth mentioning.

不轨
不轨[bù guǐ] 指违反法纪或搞叛乱活动 against the law; breaking discipline; engaging in a rebellion：不轨之徒 lawbreaker; lawless person行为不轨 dishonourable behaviour; bad conduct图谋不轨 plot sth. unlawful; engage in conspiratorial activities

不辞
不辞[bù cí]1.不告别 without taking leave; without saying goodbye：不辞而别 leave without saying goodbye 2.不推脱；不拒绝 not evade; not refuse：不辞辛劳 spare no effort; take pains; take the trouble to; go to the trouble of doing sth.

不辨菽麦
不辨菽麦[bù biàn shū mài]分不清豆子和麦子。形容缺乏实际知识。unable to tell beans from wheat; have no practical knowledge

不过
不过[bù guò]1.用在形容词性的词组或双音节形容词后面，表示程度最高 [attached to adjective phrases or disyllabic adjectives as an intensifier]：再好不过 couldn't be better最快不过 couldn't be faster乖巧不过的孩子 most lovely child 2.〈副词 adv.〉指明范围，含有往小里或轻里说的意味；仅仅 [indicating scope and implying relative smallness (of age) or lightness] only; merely; no more than：当年她参军的时候不过十七岁。She was only 17 when she joined the army. 3.〈连词 conj.〉用在后半句的开头儿，表示转折，对上半句话加以限制或修正 [used at the beginning of the latter half of a compound sentence to indicate a shift in meaning, and to limit or amend the former half] but; however; 同 same as 只是 zhǐshì：病人精神还不错，不过胃口不大好。The patient looked rather good, only without much appetite.

不过意
不过意[bù guò yì] 过意不去 be sorry; feel apologetic：总来打扰您，心里实在不过意。I feel upset to have to trouble you constantly.

不近人情
不近人情[bù jìn rén qíng]不合乎人之常情。多指性情、言行怪僻。not amenable to reason; unreasonable; (usu. of disposition, speech or behaviour) eccentric另见  人情 rénqíng

不迭
不迭[bù dié]1.用在动词后面，表示急忙或来不及 [used after a verb to indicate being late or in a hurry to do sth.] cannot cope; find it too much：跑不迭 run quickly忙不迭 hasten (to do sth.)后悔不迭 too late for regrets 2.不停止 incessantly; profusely：称赞不迭 praise profusely叫苦不迭 complain incessantly

不送气
不送气[bù sòng qì]〈语音学 phonet.〉指发辅音时没有显著的气流出来 unaspirated亦 also 不吐气 bù tǔqì

不适
不适[bù shì]（身体）不舒服 unwell; indisposed：偶感不适 feel a bit unwell

不逊
不逊[bù xùn] 没有礼貌；骄傲；蛮横 rude; impertinent：出言不逊 make impertinent remarks

不逞
不逞[bù chěng] 不得志 discontented; frustrated; disappointed：不逞之徒（因失意而胡作非为的人）desperado; a bundle of resentment (one who behaves badly because of frustration)

不速之客
不速之客[bù sù zhī kè] 指没有邀请而自己来的客人 uninvited (or unexpected) guest; gate-crasher（速 su：邀请 invite）

不逮
不逮[bù dài]〈书 fml.〉不及；不到 beyond one's ability：匡其不逮（帮助他所做不到的）help sb. to do what he cannot do

不遂
不遂[bù suì] 不如愿 fail：谋事不遂 fail to carry out one's plan稍有不遂，即大发脾气 fly into a rage at the slightest setback

不遑
不遑[bù huáng]〈书 fml.〉来不及；没有闲暇（做某事）have no time; be occupied (to do sth.)：不遑顾及 have no time to attend to

不道德
不道德[bù dào dé] 不符合道德标准的 immoral; unethical; not in line with moral standards：随地吐痰是不道德的行为。It is immoral to spit everywhere.

不遗余力
不遗余力[bù yí yú lì] 用出全部力量，一点也不保留 spare no pains (or effort); do one's utmost

不郎不秀
不郎不秀[bù láng bù xiù]〈比喻 fig.〉不成材或没出息（元明时代官僚、贵族的子弟称‘秀’，平民的子弟称‘郎’）(of person) worthless; good-for-nothing (sons of bureaucrats or nobles were called 秀 xiù, and those of the common people 郎 láng in the Yuan and Ming dynasties)

不配
不配[bù pèi]1.不相配；不般配 ill matched; not match; incompatible：上衣和裤子的颜色不配。The coat and the trousers do not match in colour.这一男一女在一起有点儿不配。The man and the woman are not right for each other. 2.（资格、品级等）够不上；不符合 not qualified：我做得不好，不配当先进工作者。My performance is not good enough to qualify me as a model worker.

不锈钢
不锈钢[bù xiù gāng]含铬13%以上的合金钢，有的还含有镍钛等其他元素。具有耐蚀和不锈的特性。多用来制造化工机件、耐热的机械零件、餐具等。stainless steel; iron alloy with at least 13% chromium and sometimes containing nickel, titanium or other elements, and resistant to erosion and rusting, mostly used as a material for the making of chemical machine parts, heat-resistant components, food containers, etc.

不错
不错[bù cuò] 对；正确 correct; right; yes：不错，情况正是如此。Yes, that's the case.不错，当初他就是这么说的。Yes, that's what he said.不错[bù cuò] 不坏；好 not bad; pretty good：人家待你可真不错。They treat you really well.虽然年纪大了，身体却还不错。Old as he is, he is pretty healthy.

不闻不问
不闻不问[bù wén bù wèn]既不听也不问。形容漠不关心。not bother to listen or to ask; show no interest in sth.; be indifferent

不随意肌
不随意肌[bù suí yì jī] 平滑肌 involuntary muscle

不韪
不韪[bù wěi]〈书 fml.〉过失；不对 fault, wrongdoing：冒天下之大不韪 dare do what the whole world considers to be wrong

不顾
不顾[bù gù]1.不照顾 have no consideration for; not concerned with：只顾自己，不顾别人 just think of oneself and have no consideration for others 2.不考虑；不顾忌 in spite of; regardless of; have no regard for; ignore：置危险于不顾 regardless of the danger不顾后果地一味蛮干 persist in acting blindly regardless of the consequences他不顾一切，跳到河里把孩子救了起来。Completely disregarding his own safety, he jumped into the river and saved the child.

不齿
不齿[bù chǐ]〈书 fml.〉不愿意提到，表示鄙视 unwilling to mention; despise; hold in contempt：人所不齿 despised by people

与
与[yú]（ㄩˊ）（與） 同 same as 欤 yú另见  yǔ and yù与1[yǔ]（ㄩˇ）（與）1.给 give; offer：赠与 give; grant与人方便 give help to others; make things easy for others信件已交与本人。The letter has been given to the person concerned. 2.交往 get along with：相与 be on good terms with与国（友邦）friendly country; allied state 3.赞许；赞助 commend; support：与人为善 well-intentioned; well-meaning 4.〈书 fml.〉等待 wait for; await：岁不我与（时光不等我）。Time and tide wait for no man.与2[yǔ]（ㄩˇ）（與）1.〈介词 prep.〉跟 with：与虎谋皮 ask a tiger for its skin; attempt the impossible与困难作斗争 struggle against difficulties 2.〈连词 conj.〉和 and：工业与农业 industry and agriculture批评与自我批评 criticism and self-criticism另见  yú and yù与[yù]（ㄩˋ）（與）参与 take part in; participate in：与会 attend a meeting; be present at a meeting另见  yú and yǔ相关词组参与 | 付与 | 干与 | 施与 | 相与 | 事与愿违 | 无与伦比 | 习与性成 | 羞与为伍 | 虚与委蛇 | 患难与共 | 生死与共与共 | 与会 | 与其 | 与闻 | 与虎谋皮 | 与人为善 | 与日俱增 | 与时俱进 | 与世长辞

与世长辞
与世长辞[yǔ shì cháng cí] 指人去世 depart from the world for ever; pass away

与人为善
与人为善[yǔ rén wéi shàn] 原指赞助人学好，现多指善意帮助别人 well-intentioned; well-meaning; originally meaning to help others learn from good examples, now meaning to help others out of good faith

与会
与会[yù huì] 参加会议 participate in a conference：与会国 countries attending a conference与会人员 conferee; meeting participant

与共
与共[yǔ gòng] 在一起 together：生死与共 share a common destiny; go through thick and thin together朝夕与共 be together from morning till night荣辱与共 share honour and dishonour (or disgrace)

与其
与其[yǔ qí]〈连词 conj.〉比较两件事的利害得失而决定取舍的时候，‘与其’用在放弃的一面（后面常用‘毋宁、不如’呼应）[usu. used consecutively with 毋宁 wúnìng and 不如 bùrú] rather than; better than：与其扬汤止沸，不如釜底抽薪。To stop water from boiling, withdrawing the burning firewood will do better than scooping the water up and pouring it back again.

与日俱增
与日俱增[yǔ rì jù zēng] 随着时间的推移而不断增长 grow with each passing day; be steadily on the increase

与时俱进
与时俱进[yǔ shí jù jìn] 随着时间的推移而不断发展、前进 keep pace with the times; keep on developing and advancing with the passing of time：马克思主义具有与时俱进的理论品格。Marxism possesses the theoretical character of keeping pace with the times.

与虎谋皮
与虎谋皮[yǔ hǔ móu pí] 跟老虎商量取下它的皮来 ask a tiger for its skin;〈比喻 fig.〉所商量的事跟对方（多指坏人）利害冲突，绝对办不到 expect sb. (usu. an evil person) to act against his own interests; attempt the impossible

与闻
与闻[yù wén]参与并且得知（内情）have a participant's knowledge of (an inside story, etc.)：与闻其事 have a participant's knowledge of a matter; be in the know亦 also 预闻 yùwén

丏
丏[miǎn]（ㄇㄧㄢˇ）〈书 fml.〉遮蔽；看不见 sheltered; covered; out of sight

丐
丐[gài]（ㄍㄞˋ）〈书 fml.〉1.乞求 beg 2.乞丐 beggar 3.给；施与 give; grant; bestow相关词组乞丐

丑
丑1[chǒu]（ㄔㄡˇ）1.地支的第二位 second of the twelve Earthly Branches; 另见  干支 gānzhī 2.(Chǒu) 姓 a surname丑2[chǒu]（ㄔㄡˇ）（醜）1.丑陋；不好看（跟‘美’相对 as opposed to‘beautiful’）ugly; unpleasant to look at：丑媳妇 ugly wife长相太丑 bad-looking; (of looks) unpleasant to look at 2.叫人厌恶或瞧不起的 detestable; shameful：丑态 grotesque or ludicrous performance; buffoonery出丑 make a fool of oneself; cut a poor or sorry figure; bring shame on oneself 3.〈方 dial.〉坏；不好 bad; not good：脾气丑 bad temper丑3[chǒu]（ㄔㄡˇ）戏曲角色行当，扮演滑稽人物，鼻梁上抹白粉，有文丑、武丑之分 comedian; clown; comic role in traditional Chinese opera, recognized by the patch of white paint around the nose, subdivided into civil and martial clown亦 also 小花脸 xiǎohuāliǎn 或 or 三花脸 sānhuāliǎn相关词组出丑 | 丢丑 | 家丑 | 露丑 | 文丑 | 武丑 | 献丑 | 小丑 | 遮丑 | 小丑（醜）丑旦 | 丑诋 | 丑恶 | 丑行 | 丑化 | 丑话 | 丑角 | 丑剧 | 丑类 | 丑陋 | 丑时 | 丑史 | 丑事 | 丑态 | 丑闻 | 丑八怪 | 丑表功 | 丑婆子

丑事
丑事[chǒu shì] 丑恶的事情；不光彩的事情 disgraceful affair; scandal

丑八怪
丑八怪[chǒu bā guài] 指长得很丑的人 very ugly person; hideous-looking person

丑剧
丑剧[chǒu jù] 指有戏剧性的丑恶事情 absurd drama; farce

丑化
丑化[chǒu huà] 把本来不丑的事物弄成丑的或形容成丑的 vilify; defame; paint a distorted picture of sth.：丑化现实生活 paint a distorted picture of everyday life人物形象受到丑化。The image of the character has been vilified.

丑史
丑史[chǒu shǐ] 丑恶的历史；不光彩的经历（多指个人的 oft. of an individual）scandalous past; ignoble experience

丑婆子
丑婆子[chǒu pó zi] 戏曲中扮演中老年妇女的丑角 female clown playing the role of a middle-aged or old woman in traditional Chinese opera

丑态
丑态[chǒu tài] 指令人厌恶的样子和举动 abominable appearance and behaviour; ugly or ludicrous performance; buffoonery：丑态百出 cut a despicable figure; put on an abominable show丑态毕露 reveal one's most hideous features; be utterly nauseating

丑恶
丑恶[chǒu è] 丑陋恶劣 ugly; repulsive; hideous：丑恶嘴脸 ugly face; repulsive features

丑旦
丑旦[chǒu dàn] 彩旦 female clown in traditional Chinese opera

丑时
丑时[chǒu shí] 旧式计时法指夜里一点钟到三点钟的时间 period of the day from 1 a.m. to 3 a.m. in old times

丑类
丑类[chǒu lèi] 指恶人，坏人 wicked people; rascals; scoundrels

丑行
丑行[chǒu xíng] 丑恶的行为 disgraceful conduct; shameful or scandalous behaviour; misconduct; misdemeanour：丑行败露。Their scandalous conduct was exposed.

丑表功
丑表功[chǒu biǎo gōng] 不知羞耻地吹嘘自己的功劳 brag shamelessly about one's deeds; claim undeserved merit

丑角
丑角[chǒu jué]（～儿 chǒujuér）1.戏曲角色行当中的丑 role of clown in traditional Chinese opera 2.指在某一事件中充当的不光彩角色 ignoble role in an event

丑诋
丑诋[chǒu dǐ] 用很难听的话骂人 slander; vilify; defame; curse in coarse language

丑话
丑话[chǒu huà]1.粗俗难听的话 vulgar or coarse language：这种丑话不堪入耳。This sort of vulgar language is repulsive to the ear. 2.指不中听的话（多带有提醒、警告的意思）blunt words (to remind or warn sb.)：咱们把丑话说在前头，以后要出了问题，你可别来找我。Let's not mince words; should anything go wrong in the future, don't come to me for help.

丑闻
丑闻[chǒu wén] 指有关人的阴私、丑事的传言或消息 scandal; rumour or revelation about sb.'s privacy：官场丑闻 scandals in officialdom

丑陋
丑陋[chǒu lòu]（相貌或样子）难看 (of appearance or looks) ugly; hideous：相貌丑陋 ugly looks

专
专[zhuān]（ㄓㄨㄢ）（專、耑）1.集中在一件事上的 for a particular person, occasion, purpose, etc.; focusing on one thing; special：专心 concentrate one's attention专题 special subject; special topic专门 special; specialized专业 specialty; discipline专款 special fund专科 special field of study 2.独自掌握和占有 monopolize：专制 autocracy专权 monopolize power专利 patent专卖 monopoly 3.(Zhuān) 姓 a surname另见  耑 duān相关词组大专 | 独断专行 | 君主专制 | 特快专递 | 人民民主专政 | 无产阶级专政专案 | 专差 | 专场 | 专车 | 专诚 | 专程 | 专电 | 专断 | 专访 | 专攻 | 专柜 | 专号 | 专横 | 专机 | 专集 | 专家 | 专刊 | 专科 | 专款 | 专栏 | 专利 | 专列 | 专卖 | 专美 | 专门 | 专名 | 专区 | 专权 | 专人 | 专任 | 专擅 | 专史 | 专使 | 专书 | 专署 | 专题 | 专文 | 专席 | 专线 | 专项 | 专心 | 专修 | 专业 | 专一 | 专用 | 专员 | 专责 | 专长 | 专政 | 专职 | 专制 | 专注 | 专著 | 专卖店 | 专名号 | 专业户 | 专业课 | 专科学校 | 专心致志 | 专员公署

专一
专一[zhuān yī] 专心一意；不分心 single-minded; concentrated：心思专一 with concentrated attention爱情专一 be constant in love

专业
专业[zhuān yè]1.高等学校的一个系里或中等专业学校里，根据科学分工或生产部门的分工把学业分成的门类 special field of study; specialized subject; specialty; discipline：专业课 specialized courses中文系汉语专业 specialty of Chinese language in the Chinese Department 2.产业部门中根据产品生产的不同过程而分成的各业务部分 specialized trade or profession; special line：专业化 specialize专业生产 production along specialized lines 3.专门从事某种工作或职业的 specialized; professional：专业户 specialized household专业文艺工作者 professional literary and art workers; professional writers and artists

专业户
专业户[zhuān yè hù] 我国农村中专门从事某种农副业的家庭或个人 rural family or individual engaged in farming or a sideline occupation along a specialized line; specialized household：养鸡专业户 household that specializes in raising chickens

专业课
专业课[zhuān yè kè] 高等学校中，使学生具有必要的专门知识和技能的课程 specialized course; course provided in schools of higher learning that teaches specialized knowledge and skills

专书
专书[zhuān shū] 就某一专题而编写的书；专著 monograph; book on a specific topic

专人
专人[zhuān rén]1.专门负责某项工作的人 person specially assigned to a task or job 2.临时派遣专办某件事的人 person temporarily assigned to a task

专任
专任[zhuān rèn]专门担任（区别于‘兼任’as compared with ‘part-time’）full-time; regular：专任教员 full-time teacher

专使
专使[zhuān shǐ] 专为某件事而派遣的使节 special envoy; envoy for a special mission

专修
专修[zhuān xiū] 集中学习某种课业 major in; specialize in (a subject)：专修科（大学中附设的实施短期专业教育的班级）crack course (at university)

专刊
专刊[zhuān kān]1.报刊以某项内容为中心而编辑的一栏或一期 special issue or column (of a periodical or newspaper) 2.学术机构出版的以一个问题的研究结果为内容的单册著作 monograph; book published by an academic organization on the research into a specific topic

专列
专列[zhuān liè] 专为某人或某事特别增开的列车 special train (for a person or an assignment)

专利
专利[zhuān lì] 法律保障创造发明者在一定时期内由于创造发明而独自享有的利益 patent; monopoly right granted to an inventor by law to produce, sell or make profit from an invention for a specific number of years：专利权 patent right

专制
