专制[zhuān zhì]1.（君主）独自掌握政权 autocracy：专制政体 autocracy专制帝王 autocratic monarch; despotic emperor君主专制 autocrat 2.凭自己的意志独断独行，操纵一切 autocratic; despotic; act arbitrarily according to one's own will and monopolize all power

专区
专区[zhuān qū]我国省、自治区曾经根据需要设立的行政区域，包括若干县、市。1975年后改称地区。prefecture; administrative region under the jurisdiction of a province or autonomous region, under which are a number of counties and cities; renamed 地区 dìqū after 1975

专卖
专卖[zhuān mài] 国家指定的专营机构经营某些物品，其他部门非经专营机构许可，不得生产和运销 monopoly; exclusive privilege to engage in a particular business or provide a service, granted by the state：烟草专卖公司 tobacco monopoly company

专卖店
专卖店[zhuān mài diàn] 专门出售某一种类或某一品牌商品的商店 franchised shop; shop exclusively selling a certain category or brand of commodities

专史
专史[zhuān shǐ] 各种专门学科的历史，如哲学史、文学史、经济史等 history of a particular subject (e.g. history of philosophy, literature or economics)

专号
专号[zhuān hào] 以某项内容为中心而编成的一期报刊 special issue (of a periodical)：妇女问题专号 special issue on women's problems《红楼梦》研究专号 special issue on research on A Dream of Red Mansions

专名
专名[zhuān míng]指人名、地名、机关团体名之类，如‘鲁迅、长春、北京大学’proper noun; name of a specific individual, place or organization, such as Lu Xun, Changchun, Peking University, etc.

专名号
专名号[zhuān míng hào] 标点符号(——)，用在横行文字的底下或竖行文字的旁边，表示人名、地名、机关团体名之类 line under or beside a word to show that it is a proper noun, such as the name of an individual, place or organization

专员
专员[zhuān yuán]1.省、自治区所派的地区负责人 (administrative) commissioner (of a prefecture assigned by a province or autonomous region) 2.担任某项专门职务的人员 assistant director; attaché; person with special duties

专员公署
专员公署[zhuān yuán gōng shǔ] 我国省、自治区曾经根据需要设置的派出机构 prefectural commissioner's office, set up by a province or autonomous region; 简称 abbr. 专署 zhuānshǔ

专场
专场[zhuān chǎng]1.剧场、影院等专为某一部分人演出的一场 special performance; show intended for a limited audience：学生专场 special show for students 2.一场里专门演出一种类型的若干节目 performance of a certain type of programme：相声专场 special performance of comic dialogues曲艺专场 special performance of quyi

专家
专家[zhuān jiā] 对某一门学问有专门研究的人；擅长某项技术的人 expert; specialist; person very skilled or highly trained and informed in some special field

专差
专差[zhuān chāi]1.指特地出去办某件公事 special mission (or errand)：他专差去北京。He went to Beijing on a special mission. 2.指特地出去办某件公事的人 person sent on a special mission

专席
专席[zhuān xí] 专为某人或某类人设置的席位 special seat：来宾专席 seats especially for the guests孕妇专席 special seats for pregnant women

专心
专心[zhuān xīn] 集中注意力 concentrate one's attention; be absorbed：专心一意 with intense concentration学习必须专心。Study requires undivided attention.

专心致志
专心致志[zhuān xīn zhì zhì] 一心一意；集中精神 complete absorption; with single-minded dedication：要创造条件让科学家专心致志地做研究工作。We must create conditions for scientists to devote wholeheartedly to research.

专擅
专擅[zhuān shàn]〈书 fml.〉擅自做主，不向上级请示或不听上级指示 usurp authority; act without the authorization of one's superior

专攻
专攻[zhuān gōng]专门研究（某一学科）specialize in; do specialized research on：他是专攻水利工程的。He specializes in hydraulic engineering.

专政
专政[zhuān zhèng]占统治地位的阶级对敌对阶级实行的强力统治。一切国家都是一定阶级的专政。dictatorship; rule imposed on an antagonistic class by the ruling class. A state is inevitably the dictatorship of a certain class.

专文
专文[zhuān wén] 专门就某个问题写的文章 article on a certain topic：这一事件的始末另有专文披露。Details of the incident are disclosed in another article.

专断
专断[zhuān duàn] 应该会商而不会商，单独做出决定 make an arbitrary decision; act arbitrarily：专断独行 act arbitrarily regardless of others' opinions

专机
专机[zhuān jī]1.在班机之外专为某人或某事特别飞行的飞机 special plane; plane arranged for a special person, or a special mission 2.某人专用的飞机 private plane

专权
专权[zhuān quán] 独揽大权 arrogate all powers to oneself; monopolize power：专权误国。Autocracy spells danger for a country.

专柜
专柜[zhuān guì] 商店中专门出售某一种类或某一地区商品的柜台 special counter; counter in a store dealing in a specific kind of commodities or commodities from a certain region：床上用品专柜 special counter for bedding

专栏
专栏[zhuān lán] 报刊上专门登载某类稿件的一部分篇幅 special column; special department or feature in a newspaper or a periodical

专案
专案[zhuān àn] 专门处理的案件或重要事件 special case for investigation; case

专横
专横[zhuān hèng] 任意妄为；专断强横 imperious; peremptory; domineering：专横跋扈 imperious and despotic; arrogant and domineering

专款
专款[zhuān kuǎn] 指定只能用于某项事务的款项 special fund; fund earmarked for a special purpose：教育专款 education fund专款专用 earmark a fund for a specific purpose only

专注
专注[zhuān zhù] 专心注意 concentrate one's attention on; be absorbed in; devote one's mind to：心神专注 be wholly absorbed; with single-minded dedication

专用
专用[zhuān yòng] 专供某种需要或某个人使用 for a special purpose or person：专用电话 telephone for special use专款专用 earmark a fund for its specified purpose only

专电
专电[zhuān diàn]记者专为本报社报道新闻而由外地用电话、电报、电传发来的稿子（区别于通讯社供稿 as compared with manuscripts provided by news agencies）special dispatch (sent by a reporter to a newspaper by means of telephone, telegram, or telex)

专科
专科[zhuān kē]1.专门科目 specialty; special field of study; specialized subject：专科医生 medical specialist专科词典 specialized dictionary 2.指专科学校 college for professional training; training school：专科毕业 graduate of a professional training college

专科学校
专科学校[zhuān kē xué xiào]实施专业教育的学校，修业年限一般为二至三年。如农业专科学校、师范专科学校、医学专科学校等。vocational training school; school for professional training, whose courses are gen. two to three years in length, such as agricultural school, normal school, and medical school

专程
专程[zhuān chéng] 专为某事而到某地 special trip：专程看望 make a special trip to visit sb.专程前去迎接客人 make a special trip to greet a guest

专线
专线[zhuān xiàn]1.较大的厂矿铺设的自用铁路线 special-purpose railway line (of a large factory or mine) 2.电话局为重要机关或首长设置的专用电话线 special telephone line; line for the exclusive use of important organs or leading cadres

专署
专署[zhuān shǔ] 专员公署的简称 abbr. for 专员公署 zhuānyuán gōngshǔ

专美
专美[zhuān měi]〈书 fml.〉独自享受美名 have an exclusive claim to fame; be the sole possessor of an honour：青年演员钻研表演艺术，不让上代艺人专美于前。Challenging their predecessors' exclusive claim to fame, young actors now strive to hone their skills.

专职
专职[zhuān zhí] 由专人担任的职务 full-time (position)：专职工会干部 full-time trade union cadre

专著
专著[zhuān zhù] 就某方面加以研究论述的专门著作 monograph; treatise; book on a special subject

专访
专访[zhuān fǎng]1.只就某个问题或对某个人进行采访 special coverage; interview sb. on a certain topic：接受记者专访 accept a reporter's exclusive interview 2.这样采访写成的文章 special feature (written after such an interview)：登载了一篇关于他的模范事迹的专访 carry a special feature about his exemplary deeds

专诚
专诚[zhuān chéng]特地（表示非顺便）for a particular purpose; specially：专诚拜访 pay a special visit to sb.

专责
专责[zhuān zé] 专门担负的某项责任 specific responsibility：分工明确，各有专责。The division of labour is clear-cut, and each is charged with specific responsibilities.

专车
专车[zhuān chē]1.在例行车次之外专为某人或某事特别开行的火车或汽车 special train or car (for a person or a mission out of regular service) 2.机关单位或个人专用的汽车 automobile exclusively used by an organization or an individual

专长
专长[zhuān cháng] 专门的学问技能；特长 speciality; special skill or knowledge：学有专长 have specialized knowledge of a subject; be expert in a particular field of study发挥各人的专长 give full play to each person's professional knowledge or skill

专门
专门[zhuān mén]1.特地 specially：我是专门来看望你的。I come specially to see you. 2.专从事某一项事的 specialized：专门人才 people with professional skill; specialized personnel他是专门研究土壤学的。He specializes in pedology. 3.〈方 dial.〉表示强调经常做某类事情 frequently：他专门会讲风凉话。He often makes sarcastic remarks.

专集
专集[zhuān jí]1.只收录某一作者作品的集子 collection (of a certain author's works) 2.就某一文体或某一内容编成的集子 collection (of writings of a certain literary style or of a particular content)：论文专集 collection of treatises

专项
专项[zhuān xiàng] 特定的某个项目 special item：专项训练 specialized training专项检查 specialized check-up

专题
专题[zhuān tí] 专门研究或讨论的题目 special subject; special topic：专题报告 report on a special topic专题讨论 seminar专题调查 investigation of a special topic

且
且[jū]（ㄐㄩ）1.〈书 fml.〉〈助词 aux.〉相当于‘啊’[equivalent to 啊·a] oh：狂童之狂也且。Oh how crazy the young fool is! 2.用于人名，如范雎，也作范且 [used in the name of a person, e.g. 范雎 Fàn Jū, also written as 范且 Fàn Jū]另见  qiě且1[qiě]（ㄑㄧㄝˇ）1.暂且；姑且 just; for the time being; for a while：且慢 wait a minute; hold it; not go or do so soon你且等一下。Just a minute. 2.〈方 dial.〉表示经久 for a long time; for quite some time：买枝钢笔且使呢。Buy a pen that will last you quite some time.他要一说话，且完不了呢。Once he starts talking, it will be quite a while before he stops. 3.(Qiě) 姓 a surname且2[qiě]（ㄑㄧㄝˇ）〈书 fml.〉〈连词 conj.〉1.尚且 even：死且不怕，困难又算什么？Since even death holds no fear for us, hardship is nothing.君且如此，况他人乎？If even you are in this frame of mind, how can I expect more of others? 2.并且；而且 and; also; both ... and ...：既高且大 both tall and big另见  jū相关词组并且 | 而且 | 苟且 | 姑且 | 况且 | 聊且 | 权且 | 尚且 | 暂且 | 得过且过且慢 | 且说 | 且…且…

且…且…
且…且…[qiě qiě] 分别用在两个动词前面，表示两个动作同时进行 [used before two verbs respectively to indicate two simultaneous actions] while; as：～谈～走 talk while walking～战～退 carry on fighting while retreating

且慢
且慢[qiě màn] 暂时慢着（含阻止意 implying prevention）wait a minute; hold on; don't go (or do) so soon：且慢，听我把话说完。Wait a minute, let me finish what I have to say. or Wait a minute, please hear me out.

且说
且说[qiě shuō]〈旧 old〉小说中的发语词 [used in old Chinese novels] let's begin with

丕
丕[pī]（ㄆㄧ）〈书 fml.〉大 big; great：丕业 great cause丕变 tremendous change

世
世[shì]（ㄕˋ）（）1.人的一辈子 lifetime; life：一生一世 lifetime; one's whole life; throughout one's life; all one's life 2.有血统关系的人相传而成的辈分 generation; seniority in generation hierarchy of a family or clan, passed on through people of the same blood relationship：第十世孙 the 12th in descent; descendant in the 12th generation 3.一代又一代 from generation to generation：世交 long-standing friendship between two families世仇 family feud; vendetta; sworn enemy (in a family feud)世谊 friendship dating back to two or more generations三代祖传世医 doctor of traditional Chinese medicine, with a practice spanning three generations 4.指有世交的关系 of people who maintain good family relations：世兄 father's friend's son who is older than oneself世叔 younger friend of one's father 5.时代 age; time; era：近世 modern times当世 nowadays; at present 6.社会；人间 world; society：问世 be published; come out世人 common people; people at large世道 manners and morals of the time; ways of the world世上 in the world; on earth公之于世 make sth. public; make sth. known to the world 7.(Shì) 姓 a surname相关词组傲世 | 百世 | 半世 | 避世 | 尘世 | 出世 | 处世 | 传世 | 存世 | 遁世 | 盖世 | 感世 | 隔世 | 故世 | 过世 | 后世 | 季世 | 济世 | 家世 | 今世 | 近世 | 警世 | 举世 | 绝世 | 旷世 | 来世 | 累世 | 历世 | 乱世 | 没世 | 媚世 | 面世 | 末世 | 前世 | 去世 | 人世 | 入世 | 上世 | 涉世 | 身世 | 盛世 | 时世 | 逝世 | 晚世 | 万世 | 问世 | 希世 | 稀世 | 下世 | 先世 | 现世 | 谢世 | 宿世 | 厌世 | 阳世 | 一世 | 永世 | 喻世 | 阅世 | 再世 | 在世 | 烛世 | 转世 | 陈世美 | 出世作 | 闯世界 | 观世音 | 见世面 | 救世主 | 满世界 | 现世报 | 中世纪 | 愤世嫉俗 | 盖世太保 | 混世魔王 | 惊世骇俗 | 欺世盗名 | 玩世不恭 | 与世长辞 | 大千世界 | 第二世界 | 第三世界 | 第一世界 | 宏观世界 | 花花世界 | 极乐世界 | 老于世故 | 人情世故 | 生生世世 | 微观世界 | 不可一世 | 恍如隔世 | 立身处世 | 永生永世 | 第二次世界大战 | 第一次世界大战世弊 | 世变 | 世仇 | 世传 | 世代 | 世道 | 世风 | 世故 | 世纪 | 世家 | 世间 | 世交 | 世界 | 世局 | 世面 | 世情 | 世人 | 世上 | 世事 | 世俗 | 世态 | 世袭 | 世系 | 世兄 | 世医 | 世族 | 世纪末 | 世界观 | 世界时 | 世界语 | 世代交替 | 世界市场 | 世态炎凉 | 世外桃源 | 世界贸易组织

世上
世上[shì shàng] 世界上；社会上 in the world; on earth：世上无难事，只怕有心人。Nothing in the world is difficult for those who set their minds on it. or Perseverance is the road to success.

世事
世事[shì shì] 世上的事 affairs of human life; affairs of the world：世事多变 changeable world affairs

世交
世交[shì jiāo]1.上代就有交情的人或人家 old family friends; person or family that has been on friendly terms for over a generation：朱先生是我的老世交。Mr. Zhu and I are old family friends.王家跟李家是世交。The Wangs and the Lis are old family friends. 2.两代以上的交谊 friendship spanning two or more generations

世人
世人[shì rén] 世界上的人；一般的人 common people; people at large

世仇
世仇[shì chóu] 世世代代有仇的人或人家，也指世世代代的冤仇 sworn enemy (in a family feud); person or family against whom one's family has had a grudge for generations; family feud; vendetta; enmity or feud for generations

世代
世代[shì dài]1.（很多）年代 long period of time; many, many years：那些格言不知流传了多少世代。Those adages have been in circulation for God knows how many years. 2.好几辈子 for generations; generation after generation：世代相传 pass on from generation to generation世代务农 from a long line of farmers

世代交替
世代交替[shì dài jiāo tì] 某些植物和无脊椎动物有性生殖和无性生殖交替进行的现象。动物中如水螅，植物中如羊齿都有这种现象。 alternation of generations; alternation of sexual reproduction and asexual reproduction of certain plants and invertebrates, which exists in some animals such as the hydra and some plants such as the fern

世传
世传[shì chuán] 世世代代相传下来 be handed down through generations; be known for generations：世传名医 famous doctor known for generations

世俗
世俗[shì sú]1.流俗 common customs; customs and traditions; social conventions：世俗之见 conventional views 2.非宗教的 secular; worldly; non-religious

世兄
世兄[shì xiōng]〈旧时 old〉对辈分相同的世交（如父亲的门生，老师的儿子）的称呼，对辈分较低的世交也尊称做世兄 father's friend's son who is older than oneself, e.g. father's disciple or teacher's son; son of one's friend or teacher

世医
世医[shì yī] 世代为医的中医 doctor of traditional Chinese medicine with generations' experience in medical practice

世变
世变[shì biàn] 世间的变化、变故 changes in the world; vicissitudes：饱经世变 having experienced the vicissitudes of life

世外桃源
世外桃源[shì wài Táo yuán] 晋陶潜在《桃花源记》中描述了一个与世隔绝的不遭战祸的安乐而美好的地方。后借指不受外界影响的地方或幻想中的美好世界。 Shangri-la; ‘Land of Peach Blossoms’; peaceful, happy and beautiful place isolated from the world and suffering no disaster or war, depicted by Tao Qian of the Jin Dynasty (265-420) in The Story of the Peach Blossom Valley; place unaffected by the external world, or an imaginary beautiful world

世家
世家[shì jiā]1.封建社会中门第高，世代做大官的人家 aristocratic family; noble family; old and well-known family; family of noble origin and a long line of great officials 2.《史记》中诸侯的传记，按着诸侯的世代编排 hereditary house of a duke (in Records of the Historian) 3.指以某种专长世代相承的家族 family in which a special skill has been handed down from generation to generation：游泳世家 family of swimmers梨园世家 family of Chinese opera artists

世局
世局[shì jú] 世界局势 world situation; international situation：世局动荡 turbulent international situation

世弊
世弊[shì bì] 当代的弊病；社会上的弊病 maladies of the present-day world or society

世态
世态[shì tài] 指社会上人对人的态度 ways of the world：世态人情 ways of the world

世态炎凉
世态炎凉[shì tài yán liáng] 指有钱有势时，人就巴结，无钱无势时，人就冷淡 fickle or snobbish ways of the world - people curry favour with one when he has money and power, and are cold towards him when he has neither

世情
世情[shì qíng] 社会上的情况；世态人情 ways of the world：不懂世情 ignorant of the ways of the world; inexperienced in life世情冷暖 fickleness of the world (or human relationships)

世故
世故[shì gù] 处世经验 ways of the world：人情世故 worldly wisdom; ways of the world老于世故 worldly wisdom; versed in the ways of the world世故[shì gu]（处事待人）圆滑，不得罪人 worldly-wise; shrewd; crafty; (of the way one gets along with people and handles one's affairs) smooth and wily, not offending others：这人有些世故，不大愿意给人提意见。This person is of a smooth character. He is reluctant to put forward different opinions.

世族
世族[shì zú] 封建社会中世代相传的官僚地主家族 (in feudal society) bureaucrat-landlord family of generations' standing

世界
世界[shì jiè]1.自然界和人类社会的一切事物的总和 world; sum of all things in nature and the human society：世界观 world outlook世界之大，无奇不有。Nothing is too strange in this big world. 2.〈佛教用语 Budd.〉指宇宙 universe：大千世界 boundless universe 3.地球上所有地方 all over the world：世界各地 all over the world周游世界 travel the whole world over 4.指社会的形势、风气 existing conditions of society; social situation and practice：现在是什么世界，还允许你不讲理？Don't you realize that the present moment does not allow you to be unreasonable? 5.领域；人的某种活动范围 field; scope; sphere; realm：内心世界 inner world主观世界 subjective world科学世界 scientific world儿童世界 children's world

世界市场
世界市场[shì jiè shì chǎng] 国际间进行商品交换的市场的总称 world market; general term for the international market of commodity exchange

世界时
世界时[shì jiè shí] 以本初子午线所在时区为标准的时间。世界时用于无线电通讯和科学数据记录，以便各国取得一致。 universal time; Greenwich Mean Time; time set by the standard of the time zone of the first meridian, used in radio communication and scientific data records so that various countries have identical time-reckoning standards; 亦 also 格林尼治时间 Gélínnízhì shíjiān

世界观
世界观[shì jiè guān] 人们对世界的总的根本的看法。由于人们的社会地位不同，观察问题的角度不同，形成不同的世界观。 world outlook; people's general and basic views of the world coming out of their different social status and perspective; 亦 also 宇宙观 yǔzhòuguān

世界语
世界语[Shì jiè yǔ] 指1887年波兰人柴门霍夫(Ludwig Lazarus Zamenhof)创造的国际辅助语，语法比较简单 Esperanto; international auxiliary language created by a Pole named Ludwig Lazarus Zamenhof in 1887, which uses a simplified grammar

世界贸易组织
世界贸易组织[Shì jiè Mào yì Zǔ zhī]全球性的贸易组织。主要职责是规范、协调、促进世界范围内的贸易活动，消除关贸壁垒，降低关税，处理贸易纠纷等。1995年1月1日成立，总部设在日内瓦。其前身是关税和贸易总协定。WTO; World Trade Organization; global trade organization whose main duties and responsibilities are to standardize, coordinate and promote trade activities worldwide, eliminate tariff and trade barriers, reduce tariffs and handle trade disputes, set up on January 1, 1995 with its headquarters in Geneva. Its predecessor was the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT).

世系
世系[shì xì] 指家族世代相承的系统 pedigree; genealogy; lineage; system that passes on from generation to generation in a family

世纪
世纪[shì jì] 计算年代的单位，一百年为一世纪 century; unit to calculate time, which is equivalent to 100 years

世纪末
世纪末[shì jì mò] 原指 19 世纪末叶，这个时期欧洲资本主义进入腐朽阶段，各方面潜伏着危机。也泛指某一社会的没落阶段。 end of the century; fin-de-siècle; originally referred to the end of the 19th century, during which time European capitalism entered a decadent stage, with hidden crises in various fields; (generally referring to) the declining stage of a society

世袭
世袭[shì xí] 指帝位、爵位等世代相传 hereditary; (of throne, rank or noble title, etc.) passing on from generation to generation

世道
世道[shì dào] 指社会状况 manners and morals of the time; ways of the world

世间
世间[shì jiān] 社会上；人间 world; society：世间的事没有一成不变的。Nothing in the world remains fixed.

世面
世面[shì miàn] 社会上各方面上的情况 various aspects of society; society; world; situation in various segments of society：见过世面（指阅历多） have seen much of the world; be experienced

世风
世风[shì fēng] 社会风气 general mood of society; public morals and mores; morals of the world; common practice of society：世风日下。Public morals are deteriorating day by day.

丘
丘[qiū]（ㄑㄧㄡ）（坵）1.小土山；土堆 mound; hillock; knoll; hummock; rideau：荒丘 barren or desolate hillock沙丘 dune; sand dune; dene; sandbank; sandhill坟丘子 grave mound 2.浮厝 cover with earth, or bricks and stones, prior to burial：先把棺材丘起来。Cover the coffin with earth. 3.〈量词 classifier〉水田分隔成大小不同的块，一块叫一丘 plot (of paddy field bordered by ridges)：一丘田 a plot of paddy field 4.(Qiū) 姓 a surname相关词组比丘 | 沙丘 | 比丘尼 | 一丘之貉 | 狐死首丘丘八 | 丘陵 | 丘墓 | 丘脑 | 丘疹

丘八
丘八[qiū bā]〈旧时 old〉称兵（‘丘’字加‘八’字成为‘兵’字，含贬义） (derog.) soldier (whose Chinese character, 兵 bīng is composed of 丘 qiū and 八 bā, hence the term qiuba)

丘墓
丘墓[qiū mù]〈书 fml.〉坟墓 grave; tomb; sepulchre; last home; tumulus

丘疹
丘疹[qiū zhěn] 皮肤表面由于某些疾病而起的小疙瘩，半球形，多为红色 papule; pimple; small inflamed cabochon elevation of the skin, usu. red in colour, caused by certain ailments

丘脑
丘脑[qiū nǎo]间脑的一部分，椭圆形，左右各一，围成第三脑室。直接与大脑皮层相连，除嗅觉外，人体各部所感受的冲动都经过它传递给大脑皮层。thalamencephalon; thalamus; cerebral ganglion ovoid segment of the diencephalon, on either side of the third ventricle of the brain, which directly joins the cerebral cortex and relays nerve impulses (except olfactory nerve impulses) to it

丘陵
丘陵[qiū líng] 连绵成片的小山 hills：丘陵起伏 a range of undulating hills丘陵地带 hilly land; hilly country

丙
丙[bǐng]（ㄅㄧㄥˇ）1.天干的第三位 3rd of the 10 Heavenly stems；另见  干支 gānzhī 2.〈书 fml.〉丙丁 fire：阅后付丙。Please burn it up after reading it.相关词组付丙丙部 | 丙丁 | 丙纶 | 丙种射线

丙丁
丙丁[bǐng dīng]〈书 fml.〉火的代称 another name for fire：付丙丁 set on fire; burn

丙种射线
丙种射线[bǐng zhǒng shè xiàn]镭和其他一些放射性元素的原子放出的射线，是波长极短的电磁波，穿透力比爱克斯射线更强，能穿透几十厘米厚的钢板。工业上用来探伤，医学上用来消毒、治疗肿瘤等。也叫伽马(gāmǎ)射线。也写作γ射线。gamma ray; γ ray; ray emitted from radium and other radioactive elements; electromagnetic wave with an extremely short wavelength and a higher penetrability than X ray, capable of penetrating a steel plate dozens of centimetres thick, and used in industry to detect defects, and in medicine to sterilize and treat tumours. also called 伽马射线 gāmǎ shèxiàn; 又写作 also written as γ射线

丙纶
丙纶[bǐng lún]合成纤维的一种，质轻，耐磨，吸水性小，制成的衣物不易走样。工业上用来制造绳索、滤布、渔网等。polypropylene fibre; a variety of synthetic fibres which is light, stands hard wear and is not very absorbent. Clothes made of polypropylene fibre do not easily lose their shape. Polypropylene fibre is used in industry to make rope, filter gauze, fishing nets, etc.

丙部
丙部[bǐng bù] 子部 category of philosophy; category under the ancient Chinese method of classification, which includes all works by various schools and scholars of thought

业
业1[yè]（ㄧㄝˋ）（業）1.行业 line of business; trade; industry：工业 industry农业 agriculture林业 forestry畜牧业 animal husbandry饮食业 catering trade各行各业 all trades and professions; all walks of life 2.职业 occupation; profession; employment; job：就业 employment转业 (of armymen) be transferred to civilian work业余 spare time; after-work 3.学业 course of study：肄业 study in school (without graduation)修业 study in school毕业 graduate结业 complete a course 4.事业 cause; enterprise：功业 exploits; achievements创业 start an undertaking; do pioneering work业绩 outstanding achievement 5.产业；财产 estate; property：家业 family property业主 owner (of an enterprise or estate); proprietor 6.佛教徒称一切行为、言语、思想为业，分别叫做身业、口业、意业，合称三业，包括善恶两面，一般专指恶业 (Buddhism) karma; deed, speech and ideology, called the three karmas by Buddhists, including both good and evil; gen. evil 7.从事（某种行业）engage in (a profession)：业农 engage in farming业商 engage in commerce 8.(Yè) 姓 a surname业2[yè]（ㄧㄝˋ）（業）已经 already：业已 already业经 already相关词组霸业 | 百业 | 本业 | 毕业 | 产业 | 创业 | 从业 | 大业 | 待业 | 复业 | 副业 | 改业 | 工业 | 功业 | 行业 | 基业 | 家业 | 结业 | 敬业 | 旧业 | 就业 | 开业 | 课业 | 矿业 | 立业 | 林业 | 农业 | 企业 | 商业 | 生业 | 失业 | 实业 | 始业 | 事业 | 守业 | 受业 | 停业 | 同业 | 伟业 | 无业 | 物业 | 歇业 | 休业 | 修业 | 学业 | 勋业 | 遗业 | 肄业 | 营业 | 渔业 | 在业 | 择业 | 展业 | 正业 | 执业 | 职业 | 专业 | 转业 | 卒业 | 祖业 | 作业 | 从业员 | 工业国 | 工业化 | 行业语 | 农业国 | 农业税 | 企业化 | 商业片 | 小业主 | 营业税 | 营业员 | 职业病 | 专业户 | 专业课 | 工商业 | 轻工业 | 手工业 | 饮食业 | 重工业 | 产业工人 | 创业资金 | 工业产权 | 工业革命 | 农业工人 | 商业银行 | 失业保险 | 同业公会 | 职业高中 | 安家立业 | 安居乐业 | 成家立业 | 第二产业 | 第二职业 | 第三产业 | 第一产业 | 服务行业 | 高空作业 | 高温作业 | 公用事业 | 化学工业 | 流水作业 | 旅游农业 | 名山事业 | 平行作业 | 三资企业 | 生态农业 | 私营企业 | 乡镇企业 | 信息产业 | 有机农业 | 知识产业 | 自由职业 | 农业合作化 | 企业所得税 | 小手工业者业海 | 业绩 | 业界 | 业经 | 业内 | 业师 | 业态 | 业外 | 业务 | 业已 | 业余 | 业障 | 业者 | 业主 | 业余教育

业主
业主[yè zhǔ] 产业或企业的所有者 owner (of an enterprise or estate); proprietor

业余
业余[yè yú]1.工作时间以外的 spare time; after-work：业余时间 spare time业余学校 after-hours school 2.非专业的 nonprofessional; amateur：业余歌手 amateur singer业余剧团 an amateur theatrical troupe业余文艺活动 amateur literary and artistic activities

业余教育
业余教育[yè yú jiào yù] 为提高工人、农民、干部等的政治、文化和科学、技术水平，在业余时间进行的教育 spare-time education; education carried out during after-work hours to raise the political, cultural, scientific and technical level of workers, peasants and cadres

业内
业内[yè nèi] 某种行业或业务范围以内 in the industry; within the scope of a trade, business or profession：业内人士 insider; people in a business circle or profession这家老店在业内有很大影响。This old shop has a great influence in the industry.

业务
业务[yè wù] 个人的或某个机构的专业工作 vocational work; professional work; business：业务能力 professional ability业务学习 vocational study业务范围 scope of business发展业务 develop business

业外
业外[yè wài] 某种行业或业务范围以外 beyond the scope of a certain trade, business or profession：业外人士 outsider; person who does not belong to a business circle or profession

业已
业已[yè yǐ]已经（多见于公文 oft. used in official documents）already：业已调查属实 have already been verified to be true业已准备就绪。Preparations are already complete.

业师
业师[yè shī] 称教过自己的老师 my former teacher

业态
业态[yè tài] 业务经营的形式、状态 form or state of business operation：京城零售业在业态上已形成新的格局。The retail service in the capital city has formed a new business pattern.

业海
业海[yè hǎi]〈佛教 Budd.〉指使人沉沦的无边的罪恶 endless crimes; sea of retribution

业界
业界[yè jiè]〈方 dial.〉指企业界。也指企业界中各行业或某个行业。business circles; various trades or a certain trade in business circles

业经
业经[yè jīng]已经（多见于公文 oft. used in official documents）already：业经呈报在案 have already submitted a report to a higher level for the record

业绩
业绩[yè jì] 建立的功劳和完成的事业；重大的成就 accomplishment; contribution and exploit; outstanding achievement

业者
业者[yè zhě] 从事某种行业的人 practitioner of a certain business

业障
业障[yè zhàng]1.〈佛教 Budd.〉指妨碍修行的罪恶 sin that detracts from one's good deeds 2.〈旧时 old〉长辈骂不肖子弟的话 (used by the elders to curse their juniors) medium of retribution; evil creature

丛
丛[cóng]（ㄘㄨㄥˊ）（叢、樷）1.聚集 crowd together：丛生 grow thickly丛集 crowd together 2.生长在一起的草木 clump; thicket; grove：草丛 a patch of grass树丛 a clump of trees; grove 3.泛指聚集在一起的人或东西 crowd; collection：人丛 a crowd of people论丛 a collection of essays; collected essays刀丛剑树 forest of bayonets and swords - very dangerous situation 4.(Cóng) 姓 a surname相关词组草丛 | 花丛 | 林丛 | 树丛 | 密密丛丛 | 为渊驱鱼，为丛驱雀丛残 | 丛脞 | 丛集 | 丛刊 | 丛刻 | 丛林 | 丛莽 | 丛山 | 丛生 | 丛书 | 丛谈 | 丛杂 | 丛葬 | 丛冢

丛书
丛书[cóng shū] 由许多书汇集编成的一套书，如《知不足斋丛书》、《历史小丛书》 series of books; collection; series, such as Collected Books of the Zhibuzu Studio, Mini-Series of History

丛冢
丛冢[cóng zhǒng]〈书 fml.〉乱葬在一片地方的许多坟墓 mass of unkept grave mounds

丛刊
丛刊[cóng kān] 丛书（多用做丛书的名称 oft. used in series titles）series of books; collection：《四部丛刊》Collected Writings of Four Basic Branches of Literature

丛刻
丛刻[cóng kè] 刻板印刷的丛书（多用做丛书名称 oft. used in series titles）block-printing series

丛山
丛山[cóng shān] 连绵的群山 rolling mountains (hills)：丛山峻岭 undulating high mountains

丛杂
丛杂[cóng zá] 多而杂乱 motley：事务丛杂 have too many things to attend to

丛林
丛林[cóng lín]1.茂密的树林 jungle; forest：热带丛林 tropical forest 2.和尚聚集修行的处所，泛指大寺院。后道教也沿用此名。place where Buddhist monks gather and practise their rituals - Buddhist monastery; later adopted by Taoism to refer to a Taoist temple as well

丛残
丛残[cóng cán]〈书 fml.〉指琐碎的逸闻、遗事 trivial anecdotes and incidents of ages past：掇拾丛残 collect trivial and historical anecdotes

丛生
丛生[cóng shēng]1.（草木）聚集在一处生长 (of plants) grow thickly; overgrow：杂草丛生 growth of weeds荆棘丛生 be infested with brambles 2.（疾病等）同时发生 (of diseases, etc.) break out at the same time：百病丛生 all kinds of diseases and ailments break out百弊丛生 all sorts of corruption creeps in

丛脞
丛脞[cóng cuǒ]〈书 fml.〉细碎；烦琐 trivial; trifling

丛莽
丛莽[cóng mǎng] 大片茂盛的草 large thick growth of grass：密林丛莽 dense forest and thick grass; jungle

丛葬
丛葬[cóng zàng] 许多尸体合葬在一起的埋葬方式，也指这样的坟墓 multiple burial; multiple grave

丛谈
丛谈[cóng tán] 性质相同或相近的若干部分合成的文章或书（多用做篇名或书名 oft. used in book titles）collected writings; essay or book composed of a number of parts that are the same or similar in nature：《掌故丛谈》A Collection of Anecdotes

丛集
丛集[cóng jí]1.（许多事物）聚集在一起 crowd together; pile up; converge：百感丛集 all sorts of feelings welling up诸事丛集。Things are piling up. 2.选取若干种书或其中的一些篇章汇集编成的一套书 collected writings; selected books or articles on a common topic that are published as a series

东
东[dōng]（ㄉㄨㄥ）（東）1.四个主要方向之一，太阳出来的一边 east; one of the four directions, where the sun rises from：东边儿 east side东方 the east东风 east wind东城 eastern part of a city城东 east of a city大江东去。The great river runs eastward. 2.主人（古时主位在东，宾位在西）host (in ancient times, the host sat on the east side, while the guest sat on the west side); master; owner：房东 landlord or landlady股东 shareholder东家 master 3.（东儿 dōngr）东道 host：我做东，请你们吃饭。I'd like to play host and treat you to dinner. 4.Dōng 姓 a surname相关词组宾东 | 财东 | 佃东 | 店东 | 丁东 | 房东 | 股东 | 关东 | 行东 | 华东 | 江东 | 近东 | 辽东 | 远东 | 中东 | 做东 | 赌东道 | 关东糖 | 广东戏 | 坏东西 | 少东家 | 闯关东 | 二房东 | 广东音乐 | 齐东野语 | 山东梆子 | 山东快书 | 声东击西 | 福如东海 | 付诸东流 | 毛泽东思想 | 拆东墙，补西墙 | 失之东隅，收之桑榆 | 万事俱备，只欠东风东北 | 东边 | 东床 | 东道 | 东佃 | 东方 | 东非 | 东风 | 东宫 | 东郭 | 东汉 | 东胡 | 东家 | 东晋 | 东经 | 东南 | 东欧 | 东魏 | 东西 | 东亚 | 东洋 | 东野 | 东瀛 | 东周 | 东半球 | 东不拉 | 东昌纸 | 东道国 | 东道主 | 东南亚 | 东三省 | 东乡族 | 东正教 | 东…西… | 东窗事发 | 东倒西歪 | 东郭先生 | 东鳞西爪 | 东山再起 | 东施效颦 | 东风吹马耳

东…西…
东…西…[dōng xī]表示‘这里…那里…’的意思 ... here ... there：～奔～跑 rush about busily; run to and fro～张～望 look this way and that; peer around; look all around～拼～凑 put all sorts of things together; scrape together～倒～歪 reel right and left; dilapidated; rickety; staggering; tumbling; walk unsteadily～涂～抹 paint casually; paint at random～一句，～一句 talk incoherently

东三省
东三省[Dōng Sān Shěng] 东北辽宁、吉林、黑龙江三省的总称 Three Northeastern Provinces, i.e. Liaoning, Jilin and Heilongjiang in northeast China

东不拉
东不拉[dōng bù lā] 同 same as 冬不拉 dōngbùlā

东乡族
东乡族[Dōng xiāng zú] 我国少数民族之一，主要分布在甘肃 Dongxiang people, one of China's ethnic minority groups, inhabiting parts of Gansu Province

东亚
东亚[Dōng Yà] 亚洲东部，包括中国、朝鲜、韩国、蒙古和日本等国 East Asia, including China, North Korea, South Korea, Mongolia, Japan, etc.

东佃
东佃[dōng diàn] 地主和佃户的合称 landlord or landlady and his or her tenant peasant

东倒西歪
东倒西歪[dōng dǎo xī wāi]1.形容行走、坐立时身体歪斜或摇晃不稳的样子 unsteady; tottering; staggering 2.形容物体杂乱地歪斜或倒下的样子 jumbled; in a mess; rickety; tumbled down

东北
东北[dōng běi]1.东和北之间的方向 northeast：风向东北。The wind comes from the northeast. 2.(Dōngběi) 指我国东北地区，包括辽宁、吉林、黑龙江三省以及内蒙古自治区的东部 Northeast China, which includes the provinces of Liaoning, Jilin and Heilongjiang and the eastern part of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region

东半球
东半球[dōng bàn qiú]地球的东半部，从西经20°起向东到东经160°止。陆地包括欧洲、非洲的全部，亚洲和大洋洲的绝大部分以及南极洲的大部分。eastern hemisphere; eastern half of the globe, from longitude 20°W to 160°E; territorial areas include the entire continents of Europe and Africa, most parts of Asia and Oceania, and the major part of Antarctica

东南
东南[dōng nán]1.东和南之间的方向 southeast 2.(Dōngnán) 指我国东南沿海地区，包括上海、江苏、浙江、福建、台湾等省市 southeast China; southeastern coastal areas in China, including Shanghai, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian, Taiwan, etc.

东南亚
东南亚[Dōng nán Yà] 亚洲的东南部，包括越南、柬埔寨、老挝、泰国、缅甸、马来西亚、新加坡、菲律宾、印度尼西亚和文莱等国 Southeast Asia, including Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Thailand, Myanmar, Malaysia, Singapore, Philippines, Indonesia, Brunei, etc.

东周
东周[Dōng Zhōu] 朝代，公元前770-公元前256，自周平王（姬宜臼）迁都洛邑（在今河南洛阳市西）起，到被秦灭亡止 Eastern Zhou Dynasty (770-256 B.C.), which was established when King Ping of Zhou (Ji Yijiu) moved the capital to Luoyi (west of present-day Luoyang, Henan Province), and ended when it was overthrown by the State of Qin

东宫
东宫[dōng gōng] 封建时代太子住的地方，借指太子 Eastern Palace (the residence of the crown prince), referring to the crown prince

东家
东家[dōng jia] 受人雇用或聘请的人称他的主人；佃户称租给他土地的地主 master; boss; term used by an employee to refer to or address his employer, or by a tenant-peasant to his landlord

东山再起
东山再起[Dōng Shān zài qǐ]东晋谢安退职后在东山做隐士，后来又出任要职 Xie An, an official of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, resigned from office and lived in the Dongshan Mountain as a hermit, then later took an important post again;〈比喻 fig.〉失势之后，重新恢复地位(of one who lost power) resume one's position; stage a comeback; return to power

东床
东床[dōng chuáng]晋代太尉郗鉴派一位门客到王导家去选女婿。门客回来说：‘王家的年轻人都很好，但是听到有人去选女婿，都拘谨起来，只有一位在东边床上敞开衣襟吃饭的，好像没听到似的。’郗鉴说：‘这正是一位好女婿。’这个人就是王羲之。于是把女儿嫁给他（见于《晋书·王羲之传》）。因此，后来也称女婿为东床。son-in-law. In the Jin Dynasty, Xi Jian, a military officer, sent one of his hangers-on to select a son-in-law for him from Wang Dao's family. The hanger-on returned and reported,‘The young men at the Wang's are all very good, but they all acted in a reserved manner when they heard that someone had come to select a son-in-law from among them, except one, who sat bare-chested on the eastern bed, eating his meal as if nothing had happened.’Xi Jian said,‘This one will make a good son-in-law.’This young man was none other than Wang Xizhi, who married Xi Jian's daughter (History of Jin·Biography of Wang Xizhi). Hence the term, referring to son-in-law.

东方
东方[Dōng fāng] 姓 a surname东方[dōng fāng]1. 同 same as 东 dōng ①：东方红，太阳升。As the east turns red, the sun rises. 2.(Dōngfāng) 指亚洲（习惯上也包括埃及）the East; the Orient; referring to Asia (usu. including Egypt)

东施效颦
东施效颦[Dōng shī xiào pín]美女西施病了，皱着眉头，按着心口。同村的丑女人看见了，觉得姿态很美，也学她的样子，却丑得可怕（见于《庄子·天运》）。后人把这个丑女人称做东施。‘东施效颦’比喻胡乱模仿，效果很坏。imitate awkwardly; crude imitation with ludicrous effect. When Xi Shi, a famous beauty, fell ill, she knitted her brows and pressed her chest with her hand. An ugly woman in the same village saw her and found the pose beautiful. So she copied her gestures only to look more ugly (Zhuangzi·The Revolution of Heaven). This ugly woman was later called Dong Shi. The idiom is used to describe one who blindly copies others to only make things worse.

东昌纸
东昌纸[dōng chāng zhǐ] 毛头纸 a kind of coarse soft white paper, used for papering windows or wrapping things

东晋
东晋[Dōng Jìn]朝代，公元317-420，自元帝（司马睿）建武元年起到恭帝（司马德文）元熙二年止。建都建康（今南京）。Eastern Jin Dynasty (317-420), starting from the 1st year of the Jianwu reign of Emperor Yuandi (Sima Rui), and ending in the second year of the Yuanxi reign of Emperor Gongdi (Sima Dewen), its capital being Jiankang (present-day Nanjing)

东欧
东欧[Dōng ōu]欧洲东部，包括罗马尼亚、波兰、捷克、斯洛伐克、匈牙利等国和前苏联的欧洲部分 Eastern Europe, including Romania, Poland, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, and the European part of the former Soviet Union

东正教
东正教[Dōng zhèng jiào]另见  正教 Zhèngjiào

东汉
东汉[Dōng Hàn]朝代，公元25-220，自光武帝（刘秀）建武元年起到献帝（刘协）延康元年止。建都洛阳。Eastern Han Dynasty (25-220), starting from the 1st year of the Jianwu reign of Emperor Guangwu (Liu Xiu), and ending in the 1st year of the Yankang reign of Emperor Xian (Liu Xie), its capital being Luoyang; 亦 also 后汉 Hòu Hàn

东洋
东洋[Dōng yáng] 指日本 Japan：东洋人 Japanese (people)东洋货 Japanese goods

东瀛
东瀛[dōng yíng]〈书 fml.〉1.东海 East China Sea 2.指日本 Japan：留学东瀛 go to study in Japan

东窗事发
东窗事发[dōng chuāng shì fā]传说宋朝秦桧在他家东窗下定计杀害了岳飞，地藏王（神名）化为一个行者到人间作证说东窗事犯了，秦桧不久就死了（见于元孔文卿《地藏王证东窗事犯杂剧》）。明田汝成《西湖游览志余》卷四里说，秦桧死后他老婆请方士做法事，方士看见秦桧在阴间身带铁枷受苦，秦桧对他说：‘可烦传语夫人，东窗事发矣。’后来用‘东窗事发’指罪行、阴谋败露。disclosure of a crime or plot; plot has come to light; secret is out. It is said that in the Song Dynasty, Qin Hui plotted and murdered Yue Fei by the east window in his home, and Ksitigarbha (Overlord of Hell) disguised himself as a monk to bear witness to the east-window plot in the human world, and before long Qin Hui died (Supreme Ruler of Hell Testifying on the East-Window Plot by Kong Wenqing of the Yuan Dynasty). According to Volume 4 of Notes on Touring the West Lake by Tian Rucheng of the Ming Dynasty, after Qin Hui's death, his wife asked a necromancer to hold a religious ceremony for Qin Hui. The necromancer saw Qin bearing an iron cangue and being tortured in Hell, and heard Qin Hui tell him:‘Please tell my wife that the east-window plot has been exposed.’Hence the term, referring to the exposure of a crime or plot; 亦 also 东窗事犯 dōng chuāng shì fàn

东经
东经[dōng jīng] 本初子午线以东的经度或经线 east longitude; longitude or meridian line to the east of the prime meridian另见  经度 jīngdù and 经线 jīngxiàn

东胡
东胡[Dōng Hú] 我国古代民族，居住在今内蒙古东南一带 Donghu, a people in ancient China, living in the southeast of today's Inner Mongolia

东西
东西[dōng xī]1.东边和西边 east and west 2.从东到西（距离）from east to west：这座城东西三里，南北五里。The city is three li across from east to west and five li from north to south.东西[dōng xi]1.泛指各种具体的或抽象的事物 thing; stuff; matter：他买东西去了。He's gone shopping.雾很大，十几步以外的东西就看不见了。The fog is so heavy that one can't see beyond a dozen steps.语言这东西，不是随便可以学好的，非下苦功不可。One can't learn a language well without making painstaking efforts.咱们写东西要用普通话。We should write in standard Chinese. 2.特指人或动物（多含厌恶或喜爱的感情 used to refer to a person or animal in either derogatory or affectionate way）thing; creature：老东西 old thing; useless old thing笨东西 idiot这小东西真可爱。What a cute little thing!

东边
东边[dōng bian]（～儿 dōng·bianr） 同 same as 东 dōng ①

东道
东道[dōng dào]1.请客的主人 host：做东道 play the host; treat略尽东道之谊 perform the duties of a host 2.指请客的事儿或义务 duty of a host; entertaining guests：做东道 play host; stand treat打个东道 play host; stand treat

东道主
东道主[dōng dào zhǔ] 请客的主人 host

东道国
东道国[dōng dào guó] 负责组织、安排国际会议、比赛等在本国举行的国家 host country; country responsible for organizing and arranging an international conference, competition, etc.

东郭
东郭[Dōng guō] 姓 a surname

东郭先生
东郭先生[Dōng guō xiān sheng]明马中锡《中山狼传》中的人物。因救助被人追逐的中山狼，差点儿被狼吃掉，是对坏人讲仁慈的典型。Master Dongguo, a character in The Story of a Wolf in Zhongshan by Ma Zhongxi of the Ming Dynasty, who nearly got eaten by a wolf after he had helped it to hide from a hunter, and hence an example of people who show mercy to evil people

东野
东野[Dōng yě] 姓 a surname

东非
东非[Dōng Fēi] 非洲东部，包括索马里、吉布提、埃塞俄比亚、肯尼亚、乌干达、卢旺达、布隆迪、坦桑尼亚和塞舌尔等 East Africa, including Somalia, Djibouti, Ethiopia, Kenya, Uganda, Rwanda, Burundi, Tanzania, Seychelles, etc.

东风
东风[dōng fēng]1.指春风 east wind; spring wind 2.〈比喻 fig.〉革命的力量或气势 driving force of revolution; revolutionary force：东风压倒西风。The East Wind prevails over the West Wind.

东风吹马耳
东风吹马耳[dōng fēng chuī mǎ ěr]〈比喻 fig.〉对别人的话无动于衷turn a deaf ear to what sb. else says; (of words) go in one ear and out the other

东魏
东魏[Dōng Wèi] 北朝之一，公元534-550，元善见所建 Eastern Wei Dynasty (534-550), one of the Northern Dynasties founded by Yuan Shanjian;另见  北魏 Běi Wèi

东鳞西爪
东鳞西爪[dōng lín xī zhǎo]另见  一鳞半爪 yī lín bàn zhǎo

丝
丝[sī]（ㄙ）（絲）1.蚕丝 silk 2.（丝儿 sīr）像丝的物品 threadlike thing：铁丝 iron wire钢丝 steel wire蜘蛛丝 spider silk萝卜丝儿 radish shreds 3.（某些计量单位的）万分之一 one 10,000th (of a certain unit of measure)：丝米 decimillimetre 4.计量单位名称 si, unit of measure: (a)长度，10忽等于1丝，10丝等于1毫。通称1忽米为1丝。 unit of length, equal to 10 hu or 0.1 hao or 1 centimillimetre; (b)重量，10忽等于1丝，10丝等于1毫 unit of weight, equal to 10 hu or 0.1 hao 5.极少或极小的量 a tiny bit; very small amount：一丝不差 not a bit of difference一丝风也没有。There isn't a single breath of wind.相关词组拔丝 | 蚕丝 | 厂丝 | 刺丝 | 灯丝 | 粉丝 | 钢丝 | 焊丝 | 花丝 | 刻丝 | 拉丝 | 柳丝 | 螺丝 | 铅丝 | 青丝 | 情丝 | 生丝 | 铁丝 | 烟丝 | 一丝 | 游丝 | 雨丝 | 真丝 | 钢丝锯 | 钢丝绳 | 金丝猴 | 辣丝丝 | 冷丝丝 | 凉丝丝 | 螺丝刀 | 螺丝钉 | 螺丝攻 | 螺丝扣 | 螺丝帽 | 螺丝母 | 甜丝丝 | 铁丝网 | 柞丝绸 | 保险丝 | 玻璃丝 | 斗烟丝 | 天然丝 | 烟斗丝 | 走钢丝 | 夹丝玻璃 | 克丝钳子 | 螺丝起子 | 纹丝不动 | 严丝合缝 | 一丝不苟 | 一丝不挂 | 一丝一毫 | 有丝分裂 | 治丝益棼 | 蛛丝马迹 | 藕断丝连 | 地脚螺丝丝绸 | 丝糕 | 丝瓜 | 丝光 | 丝毫 | 丝绵 | 丝绒 | 丝弦 | 丝线 | 丝竹 | 丝锥 | 丝包线 | 丝织品 | 丝丝入扣

丝丝入扣
丝丝入扣[sī sī rù kòu] 织绸、布等时，经线都要从扣（筘）齿间穿过 (of the weaving of clothing, silk fabric, etc.) every warp goes through the groove of the reed;〈比喻 fig.〉做得十分细腻准确（多指文章、艺术表演等 mostly of writings or artistic performances）done with meticulous care and flawless artistry

丝光
丝光[sī guāng] 棉织品在低温和绷紧的情况下，用浓氢氧化钠溶液浸渍，由于纤维结构发生变化，表面产生像丝一样的光彩，称为丝光 silky lustre on cotton fabrics produced by changes in fibre structure after pressure under low temperatures with caustic soda：丝光毛巾 mercerized towel

丝包线
丝包线[sī bāo xiàn] 用丝缠绕着做绝缘层的金属导线，多用来绕制电机和电讯装置中的线圈 silk-covered wire; metal conducting wire wrapped with silk for insulation, usu. used as coils in electric machinery or telecommunication installations

丝弦
丝弦[sī xián]1.用丝拧成的弦 silk string (on a musical instrument) 2.（丝弦儿 sīxiánr）河北地方戏曲剧种之一，流行于石家庄一带 Hebei provincial opera, most popular in the Shijiazhuang area

丝毫
丝毫[sī háo] 极小或很少；一点儿 a bit; the slightest amount or degree：丝毫不差 tally in every detail; be perfectly right

丝瓜
丝瓜[sī guā]1.一年生草本植物，茎蔓生，叶子通常三至七裂，花单性，黄色。果实长形，嫩时可供食用，成熟后肉多网状纤维，叫做丝瓜络(luò)，可入药。sponge gourd (Luffa); vegetable sponge; annual climbing herb that has three to seven decomposite leaves and unisexual yellow flowers, and bears long fruit which are edible when tender, and when ripe can be dried into reticular fibres to be used as sponges, or for medicine 2.这种植物的果实 fruit of this plant; loofah

丝竹
丝竹[sī zhú] 琴、瑟、箫、笛等乐器的总称，‘丝’指弦乐器，‘竹’指管乐器 traditional stringed and wind instruments, e.g. qin (seven-stringed plucked instrument), se (16- or 25-stringed plucked instrument), xiao (vertical bamboo flute), and di (bamboo flute). Si refers to stringed instruments, while zhu refers to woodwind instruments.

丝糕
丝糕[sī gāo] 小米面、玉米面等加水搅拌发酵后蒸成的松软的食品 steamed millet or corn cake; steamed soft food made of fermented millet or corn flour dough

丝线
丝线[sī xiàn] 用丝纺成的线 silk thread (for sewing, embroidery, etc.); silk yarn

丝织品
丝织品[sī zhī pǐn]1.用蚕丝或人造丝织成的纺织品 silk fabrics; any of the various fabrics woven from natural or artificial silk 2.用蚕丝或人造丝编织的衣物 silk knitwear; clothes knitted with natural or artificial silk

丝绒
丝绒[sī róng] 用蚕丝和人造丝为原料织成的丝织品，表面起绒毛，色泽鲜艳、光亮，质地柔软，供制妇女服装、帷幕、装饰品等 velvet; velour; fabric made of natural and artificial silks and characterized by a napped surface, bright colour and lustre, and soft quality, used for womenswear, curtains, decorations, etc.

丝绵
丝绵[sī mián] 剥取蚕茧表面的乱丝整理而成的像棉花的东西，轻软保温，用来絮衣服、被子等 silk floss; silk wadding; floss peeled from silkworm cocoons and rearranged to resemble cotton but lighter, softer and warmer, usu. used as wadding in clothes, quilts, etc.

丝绸
丝绸[sī chóu] 用蚕丝或人造丝织成的纺织品的总称 silk; silk cloth; general term for fabrics woven of natural or artificial silk

丝锥
丝锥[sī zhuī] 一种加工内螺纹的刀具，形状像螺栓，沿轴向开有沟槽 tap; bolt-shaped cutting tool grooved in the axial direction for forming an internal screw thread亦 also 螺丝攻 luósīgōng

丞
丞[chéng]（ㄔㄥˊ）古代辅助的官吏 assistant to an official in ancient China：丞相 prime minister县丞 county magistrate's assistant相关词组丞相

丞相
丞相[chéng xiàng] 古代辅佐君主的职位最高的大臣 prime minister; minister of the highest rank in ancient China

丢
丢[diū]（ㄉㄧㄡ）（丟）1.遗失；失去 lose; forfeit; be missing：钱包丢了 lose a wallet丢了工作 lose a job 2.扔 throw; cast; toss：不要随地丢果皮。Please don't litter the place with fruit peel. 3.搁置；放 toss aside; lay aside; pigeon-hole; put on the shelf：技术丢久了就生疏了。A skill that hasn't been used for a long time will become rusty.只有这件事丢不开。That's the one thing that keeps worrying me.相关词组灰不溜丢 | 酸不溜丢丢丑 | 丢掉 | 丢份 | 丢脸 | 丢弃 | 丢却 | 丢人 | 丢失 | 丢手 | 丢面子 | 丢眼色 | 丢三落四

丢三落四
丢三落四[diū sān là sì] 形容马虎或记忆力不好而好忘事 forgetful; scatterbrained; be always forgetting things because of carelessness or bad memory

丢丑
丢丑[diū chǒu] 丢脸 lose face; be disgraced：他不愿在众人面前丢丑。He doesn't want to be disgraced in public.

丢人
丢人[diū rén] 丢脸 lose face; be disgraced：丢人现眼 make a fool of oneself; make a spectacle of oneself

丢份
丢份[diū fèn]〈方 dial.〉（丢份儿 diū∥fènr）有失身份；丢人 suffer a loss of face; lose one's dignity; be disgraced亦 also 丢份子 diū∥fèn·zi

丢却
丢却[diū què]1.丢弃 abandon; give up; discard：那件心事总丢却不下 cannot take a load off one's mind 2.遗失 lose：书不慎丢却，心里好不懊恼。I lost the book accidentally and am very vexed.

丢失
丢失[diū shī] 遗失 lose：丢失行李 lose one's luggage丢失文件 lose a document

丢弃
丢弃[diū qì] 扔掉；抛弃 abandon; discard; scrap; give up：虽是旧衣服，他也舍不得丢弃。Although the clothes are old, he hates to throw them out.

丢手
丢手[diū shǒu] 放开不管 wash one's hands of; give up：丢手不干 wash one's hands (of sth.)这种事趁早丢开手。It's better to wash your hands of such sort of things.

丢掉
丢掉[diū diào]1.遗失 lose：不小心把钥匙丢掉了 accidentally lose one's key丢掉饭碗（失业）be unemployed; lose one's job 2.抛弃 give up; abandon; discard; throw away; cast away; scrap; shed：丢掉幻想 cast away illusions

丢眼色
丢眼色[diū yǎn sè] 用眼光暗示；使眼色 wink at sb.; give sb. the eye

丢脸
丢脸[diū liǎn] 丧失体面 lose face; be disgraced

丢面子
丢面子[diū miàn zi] 同 same as 丢脸 diū∥liǎn

两
两1[liǎng]（ㄌㄧㄤˇ）（兩）1.〈数目 numeral〉一个加一个是两个。‘两’字一般用于量词和‘半、千、万、亿’前 [usu. used before measure words and before 半 bàn,千 qiān,万 wàn,and 亿 yì] two; one plus one equals two：两扇门 two doors两本书 two books两匹马 two horses两个半月 two and a half months两半儿 two halves两千块钱 2,000 yuan注意 NOTE：‘两’和‘二’用法不全同。读数目字只用‘二’不用‘两’，如‘一、二、三、四’。小数和分数只用‘二’不用‘两’，如‘零点二 (0.2)，三分之二’。序数也只用‘二’，如‘第二、二哥’。在一般量词前，用‘两’不用‘二’。在传统的度量衡单位前，‘两’和‘二’一般都可用，用‘二’为多（‘二两’不能说‘两两’）。新的度量衡单位前一般用‘两’，如‘两吨、两公里’。在多位数中，百、十、个位用‘二’不用‘两’，如‘二百二十二’。‘千、万、亿’的前面，‘两’和‘二’一般都可用，但如‘三万二千’、‘两亿二千万’，‘千’在‘万、亿’后，以用‘二’为常。The uses of 两 liǎng and 二 èr are not entirely the same. When you read the numbers, you use only 二 not 两,as 一,二,三 and 四.In decimals and fractions, use only 二, not 两, as 零点二(0.2) and 三分之二. In ordinal numbers also use 二, as 第二 and 二哥. Before the common measure words, use 两, not 二. Before the traditional measuring units, usually both 两 and 二 can be used, but 二 is used more often (as 二两 cannot be replaced by 两两). Before the new measuring units, usually use 两,as 两吨 and 两公里. In the multi-digit numbers, use 二, not 两 for 百位 (hundreds place),十位(tens place) and 个位(unit place),as 二百二十二. Before 千,万 and 亿, usually both 两 and 二 can be used, but as in 三万二千 and 两亿二千万,when 千 is after 万,亿,二 is more frequently used. 2.双方 both sides; either side：两便 convenient to both sides; make it easy for both两可 both will do; either will do两全其美 satisfactory to both sides; meet the needs of both sides; meet rival claims两相情愿。Both sides are willing. 3.表示不定的数目，和‘几’差不多 [more or less the same as ‘几’jǐ] a few; some：过两天再说。Leave it for a couple of days.他真有两下子。He is really clever and capable. or He is really smart.我跟你说两句话。I'll speak a few words to you.两2[liǎng]（ㄌㄧㄤˇ）（兩）重量单位。10钱等于1两，旧制16两等于1斤，市制10市两等于1市斤 liang, traditional unit of weight; 10 qian equal to 1 liang; in the old system, 16 liang equal to 1 jin; in the current system, 10 shiliang equal to 1 shijin相关词组斤两 | 银两 | 英两 | 小两口 | 有两下子 | 铢两悉称 | 进退两难 | 三三两两 | 三言两语 | 三长两短 | 势不两立 | 首鼠两端 | 一刀两断 | 一国两制 | 一举两得 | 一身两役 | 半斤八两 | 掂斤播两 | 分斤掰两 | 脚踩两只船 | 脚踏两只船 | 三天两头儿 | 一搭两用儿 | 着三不着两 | 此地无银三百两 | 三天打鱼，两天晒网两岸 | 两边 | 两便 | 两抵 | 两广 | 两汉 | 两湖 | 两极 | 两江 | 两晋 | 两可 | 两立 | 两利 | 两面 | 两难 | 两旁 | 两栖 | 两歧 | 两讫 | 两清 | 两全 | 两手 | 两头 | 两厢 | 两性 | 两样 | 两翼 | 两造 | 两边倒 | 两不找 | 两党制 | 两点论 | 两公婆 | 两回事 | 两脚规 | 两口儿 | 两口子 | 两码事 | 两面光 | 两面派 | 两面性 | 两下里 | 两下子 | 两性人 | 两院制 | 两重性 | 两败俱伤 | 两面三刀 | 两栖动物 | 两栖植物 | 两全其美 | 两相情愿 | 两小无猜 | 两性生殖 | 两袖清风

两下子
两下子[liǎng xià zi]1.（动作）几次 (of an action) a few times：轻轻搔了两下子 scratch a few times 2.指本领或技能 a few tricks of the trade; skill：别看他眼睛不好，干活儿可真有两下子。In spite of his eye trouble, he really is a smart worker.他就会这两下子，别的本事没有。He has nothing more than these few tricks of the trade.

两下里
两下里[liǎng xià li]1.双方；两方面 both parties; both sides：这办法对国家对农民两下里都有好处。This practice is good to both the state and the peasants.第三连、第五连都来了，两下里一共二百多人。Both the 3rd and 5th companies have arrived, totalling more than 200 people. 2.两个地方 two places：一家人分在两下里住。Members of the family live in two places.亦 also 两下 liǎngxià

两不找
两不找[liǎng bù zhǎo] 买货时货价与所付货款相当或交换货物时价值相当，彼此不用找补 that's just right (the exact amount in payment for sth. bought)

两便
两便[liǎng biàn]1.彼此方便（多用做套语 oft. as a set expression）be convenient to both; make things easy for both：您甭等我了，咱们两便。Please don't wait for me. That might be more convenient for both of us. 2.对双方或两件事都有好处 benefit both sides or two things; be good for both：两便之法 method to the benefit of both sides公私两便 benefit both the public and the private

两党制
两党制[liǎng dǎng zhì]某些国家两个主要政党交替执政的制度。通常由在议会中，特别是下议院中占有多数议席或在总统选举中获胜的一个政党作为执政党，组织内阁，行使统治权。two-party system; bipartisan system; system by which two major political parties hold power alternately. Usu., the party which has the majority of seats in the parliament, esp. in the lower house, or wins the presidential election, becomes the party in power and forms the cabinet.

两全
两全[liǎng quán] 顾全两个方面 be satisfactory to both parties; have regard for both sides：两全其美 please both sides想个两全的办法 find a measure satisfactory to both sides

两全其美
两全其美[liǎng quán qí měi] 做一件事顾全两个方面，使两方面都很好 satisfy both sides; satisfy rival claims

两公婆
两公婆[liǎng gōng pó]〈方 dial.〉指夫妻俩 husband and wife; married couple

两利
两利[liǎng lì] 两方面都得到便利或利益 benefit both sides; be convenient to both sides：劳资两利 benefit both labour and capital; be beneficial both to labour and capital

两厢
两厢[liǎng xiāng]1.两边的厢房 wing rooms on either side of a one-storey house 2. 同 same as 两旁 liǎngpáng：站立两厢 stand on either side

两口儿
两口儿[liǎng kǒu r] 同 same as 两口子 liǎngkǒu·zi：小两口儿 young couple老两口儿 old couple

两口子
两口子[liǎng kǒu zi] 指夫妻俩 husband and wife; married couple：两口子和和美美地过日子。The couple are leading an amiable life.

两可
两可[liǎng kě]1.可以这样，也可以那样；两者都可以 both will do; either will do; could go either way：模棱两可 ambiguous; equivocal这种会议参加不参加两可。It's all right whether you attend this meeting or not. 2.可能这样，也可能那样；两者都可能 either this or that; both are possible：行不行还在两可哪！Whether it will do or not - either is possible.

两回事
两回事[liǎng huí shì] 指彼此无关的两种事物 two entirely different things; two different matters：善意的批评跟恶意的攻击完全是两回事。Well-meaning criticism and malicious attack are two entirely different things.亦 also 两码事 liǎng mǎ shì

两头
两头[liǎng tóu]（～儿 liǎngtóur）1.这一头和那一头；事物相对的两端 both ends; either end：梭的形状是中间粗，两头儿尖。A shuttle is thick in the middle and pointed at both ends.抓两头儿，带中间 grasp the two ends to bring along the middle; sustain the advanced and help the backward so as to encourage the vast majority to move along 2.双方；两方面 both sides; both aspects：这件事两头都满意。This matter is satisfactory to both sides. 3.两个地方 two places：家里地里两头儿照顾不过来 unable to take care of both household chores and the fields

两小无猜
两小无猜[liǎng xiǎo wú cāi] 男女小的时候在一起玩耍，天真烂漫，没有猜疑 (of a little boy and a little girl) be innocent playmates

两岸
两岸[liǎng àn]1.江河、海峡等两边的地方 on the two sides of a river or strait 2.特指台湾海峡两岸，即我国的大陆和台湾省 esp. both sides of the Taiwan Straits, namely, the mainland and Taiwan Province of China

两广
两广[Liǎng guǎng] 广东和广西的合称 Guangdong and Guangxi

两性
两性[liǎng xìng]1.雄性和雌性；男性和女性 both sexes：两性生殖 bisexual reproduction 2.两种性质 amphiprotic; amphoteric：两性化合物 amphoteric compound氨基酸既有酸性也有碱性，它是两性的。Amino acid is amphiprotic, both acid and basic.

两性人
两性人[liǎng xìng rén] 由于胚胎的畸形发育而形成的具有男性和女性两种生殖器官的人 bisexual person; hermaphrodite; person with both male and female organs as a result of abnormal development of the embryo; 通称 popularly known as 二性子 èrxìng·zi

两性生殖
两性生殖[liǎng xìng shēng zhí] 有性生殖 bisexual reproduction; sexual reproduction

两手
两手[liǎng shǒu]1.（两手儿 liǎngshǒur）指本领或技能 skill：有两手儿 have some tricks留两手儿 hold back some of his tricks给大家露两手 show some of his tricks 2.指相对的两个方面的手段、办法等 dual tactics：领导工作得两手抓 pay attention to both aspects of one's work as a leader; give equal stress to both aspects of one's work as a leader为防不测做两手准备 prepare oneself for eventualities

两抵
两抵[liǎng dǐ] 两相抵消 average out; balance or cancel each other：收支两抵。Income and expenditure balance each other. or The account balances out.

两旁
两旁[liǎng páng] 左右两边 both sides; either side：卫队站在门口两旁。Guards stand on both sides of the gate.马路两旁种着整齐的梧桐树。The road is lined with neat Chinese parasol trees on both sides.

两晋
两晋[Liǎng Jìn] 西晋和东晋的合称 Western and Eastern Jin dynasties

两极
两极[liǎng jí]1.地球的南极和北极 North and South Poles of the earth 2.电极的阴极和阳极；磁极的南极和北极 two poles of a magnet or an electric cell 3.〈比喻 fig.〉两个极端或两个对立面 two extremes or two opposites：两极分化 polarization

两栖
两栖[liǎng qī]1.可以在水中生活，也可以在陆地上生活 amphibious：两栖动物 amphibious animals水陆两栖 amphibious两栖作战 amphibious warfare; amphibious operations 2.〈比喻 fig.〉工作或活动在两种领域 work in two fields：影视两栖明星 amphibious film-TV stars

两栖动物
两栖动物[liǎng qī dòng wù]脊椎动物的一纲，通常没有鳞或甲，皮肤没有毛，四肢有趾，没有爪，体温随着气温的高低而改变，卵生。幼时生活在水中，用鳃呼吸，长大时可以生活在陆地上，用肺和皮肤呼吸，如青蛙、蟾蜍、蝾螈等。amphibious animal; amphibian; a class of oviparous vertebrates, usu. having no scales, no shells and no hair on the skin, the limbs having toes but no claws, their body temperature changing with the rise and fall of the temperature. When they are young, they live in water and breathe with gills. After growing up, they live either in water or on land and breathe with lung and skin, such as frog, toad, salamander, etc.

两栖植物
两栖植物[liǎng qī zhí wù] 既能在陆地上生长又可以在水中生长的高等植物，如水蓼、蕹菜、池杉等 amphibious plant; amphibian; higher plant that can grow both on land and in water, such as water knotweed (Polygonum hydropiper), water spinach (Ipomoea aquatica), pond cypress, etc.

两样
两样[liǎng yàng] 不一样 different：一样的客人，不能两样待遇。Guests of the like should not be treated in different ways.

两歧
两歧[liǎng qí]〈书 fml.〉（两种意见、方法）不统一 (of two opinions or methods) not tally; be inconsistent：办法应该划一，不能两歧。The methods should be standardized, not inconsistent.

两汉
两汉[Liǎng Hàn] 西汉和东汉的合称 Western and Eastern Han dynasties

两江
两江[Liǎng Jiāng] 清初江南省和江西省合称‘两江’，康熙后江南省分为江苏、安徽两省，三省地区仍沿称两江 Jiangnan and Jiangxi provinces in the early years of the Qing Dynasty. Jiangnan Province was divided into Jiangsu and Anhui provinces after the reign of Emperor Kangxi, but the three provinces were still called Liangjiang.

两清
两清[liǎng qīng] 借贷或买卖双方账目已经结清 (of accounts) be settled：谁也不欠谁，咱们两清了。Neither of us owes to the other, and everything is settled.

两湖
两湖[Liǎng Hú] 湖北和湖南的合称 Hubei and Hunan provinces

两点论
两点论[liǎng diǎn lùn] 指辩证法的全面观点，即全面地看问题，分清主次，不但看到事物的正面，也要看到它的反面；不但看到事物的现状，也要看到矛盾的双方经过斗争在一定条件下可以互相转化 dialectical method of observing and analysing problems in an overall way, that is, distinguishing what is principal and what is secondary, seeing not only the positive aspect of a thing, but also its negative aspect; not only the current state of a thing, but also the mutual transformation of the two aspects of a contradiction through struggle under certain conditions

两相情愿
两相情愿[liǎng xiāng qíng yuàn] 双方都愿意 both parties being willing; by mutual consent亦 also 两厢情愿 liǎng xiāng qíngyuàn

两码事
两码事[liǎng mǎ shì] 同 same as 两回事 liǎng huí shì

两立
两立[liǎng lì] 两个方面同时并存 coexist：势不两立 irreconcilable; mutually exclusive; unable to coexist; unable to live together peacefully

两翼
两翼[liǎng yì]1.两个翅膀 both wings：鸟的两翼 both wings of a bird飞机的两翼 both wings of an airplane 2.军队作战时，在正面部队两侧的部队 both wings; both flanks：敌人的正面和两翼都遭到了猛烈的攻击。The front and both flanks of the enemy were fiercely attacked. or The enemy was fiercely attacked in the front and on the flanks.

两脚规
两脚规[liǎng jiǎo guī] 绘图仪器，有两个可以开合的脚，上端固定在一个轴上，有分线规和圆规两种 compasses; dividers; measuring instrument with two arms connected at the upper end by a movable joint

两袖清风
两袖清风[liǎng xiù qīng fēng]〈比喻 fig.〉做官廉洁 (of an official) have clean hands; remain uncorrupted

两讫
两讫[liǎng qì] 商业用语，指卖方已将货付清，买方已将款付清，交易手续已了 (business Chinese) the goods are delivered and the bill is cleared：货款两讫。Both the payment for and the delivery of the goods purchased have been cleared. or Both payment and delivery have been cleared.

两败俱伤
两败俱伤[liǎng bài jù shāng] 争斗的双方都受到损失 both sides suffer; neither side gains

两边
两边[liǎng biān]1.物体的两个边儿 edges of an object：这张纸两边长短不齐。The two edges of this piece of paper aren't even in length. 2.两个方向或地方 two directions; two places：这间屋子两边有窗户，光线很好。This room has windows on both sides and has very good light.老大娘常常两边走动，看望两个外孙女儿。Grandma is always going back and forth, visiting her two granddaughters. 3.双方；两方面 both parties; both sides：两边都说好了，明儿下午赛球。The two teams have agreed to play the match tomorrow afternoon.

两边倒
两边倒[liǎng biān dǎo] 形容动摇不定，缺乏坚定的立场和主张 trim one's sails to the wind; lean now to one side, then to the other; (of one's stand or view) waver

两造
两造[liǎng zào] 指诉讼的双方 both parties to a lawsuit; both plaintiff and defendant：两造具结完案。Both parties have signed the document to bring an end to the suit.

两重性
两重性[liǎng chóng xìng] 同 same as 二重性 èrchóngxìng

两院制
两院制[liǎng yuàn zhì]某些国家议会分设两院的制度。两院议员一般都由选举产生并定期改选，两院都有立法和监督行政的权力，但名称各有不同，如英国叫上议院和下议院，美国、日本叫参议院和众议院，法国叫参议院和国民议会。two-chamber system; bicameral system; bicameralism; political system in some countries, in which all the members of the two chambers are usu. elected and re-elected regularly and both chambers have the power to make laws and exercise supervision over the administration. Their names differ from country to country, such as the Upper and Lower houses in Britain, the Senate and the House of Representatives in the United States and Japan, and the Senate and National Assembly in France.

两难
两难[liǎng nán] 这样或那样都有困难 face a difficult choice; be in a dilemma：进退两难 be in a dilemma去也不好，不去也不好，真是两难。I'm in a dilemma as to whether to go or not.

两面
两面[liǎng miàn]1.正面和反面 obverse side and reverse side：这张纸两面都写满了字。Both sides of the paper are covered with writing. 2. 同 same as 两边 liǎngbiān ②：两面夹攻 attack from both sides; make a pincer attack左右两面都是高山。There are high mountains to the right and to the left. 3.事物相对的两方面 two aspects; two opposites：两面性 dual character两面讨好 please both sides; curry favour with both sides; fawn on both sides问题的两面我们都要看到。We should see the two aspects of the problem.

两面三刀
两面三刀[liǎng miàn sān dāo] 指耍两面手法 double-dealing; double-cross：嘴甜心毒，两面三刀 talk sweetly with a vicious mind and resort to double-dealing

两面光
两面光[liǎng miàn guāng]〈比喻 fig.〉两方面讨好 please both parties：他说两面光的话是怕得罪人。He said something to please both sides for fear of offending people.

两面性
两面性[liǎng miàn xìng] 一个人或一个事物同时存在的两种互相矛盾的性质或倾向 duality; dual nature; duplicity; ambivalence

两面派
两面派[liǎng miàn pài]1.指耍两面手法的人，也指对斗争的双方都敷衍的人 double-dealer 2.指两面手法 double-dealings; be two-faced：耍两面派 resort to double-dealing; be double-faced

严
严[yán]（ㄧㄢˊ）（嚴）1.严密；紧密 tight; close：严紧 strict; stern严戒 strictly forbid谨严 circumspect; scrupulous把瓶口封严了 seal up a bottle他嘴严，从来不乱说。He is tight-lipped and never makes irresponsible remarks. 2.严厉；严格 strict; stern：庄严 solemn威严 dignified; stately严办 deal with sth. sternly严加管束 bring under stern discipline纪律很严 strict in discipline坦白从宽，抗拒从严。Leniency to those who confess and severity to those who refuse to do so. 3.程度深；厉害 severe, heavy; extreme：严冬 severe winter严寒 severe cold严刑 torture 4.指父亲 father：家严 my father 5.(Yán) 姓 a surname相关词组家严 | 解严 | 戒严 | 谨严 | 森严 | 威严 | 庄严 | 嘴严 | 尊严 | 华严宗 | 壁垒森严 | 义正词严严办 | 严惩 | 严词 | 严打 | 严冬 | 严防 | 严格 | 严寒 | 严紧 | 严谨 | 严禁 | 严峻 | 严酷 | 严厉 | 严令 | 严密 | 严明 | 严命 | 严师 | 严实 | 严守 | 严肃 | 严刑 | 严整 | 严正 | 严重 | 严丝合缝 | 严阵以待

严丝合缝
严丝合缝[yán sī hé fèng] 指缝隙密合 fit together perfectly; join tightly; dovetail

严令
严令[yán lìng] 严格命令 give strict orders：严令禁止 issue strict orders to prohibit sth.

严冬
严冬[yán dōng] 极冷的冬天 severe winter; hard winter

严刑
严刑[yán xíng] 极厉害的刑法(xíng·fa)或刑罚 cruel torture; severe punishment：严刑拷打 subject sb. to brutal torture; cruelly beat up

严办
严办[yán bàn] 严厉惩办 deal with severely; punish with severity：依法严办 punish strictly according to law

严厉
严厉[yán lì] 严肃而厉害 stern; severe：严厉打击 telling blow态度严厉 stern attitude措辞严厉 stern verbiage

严命
严命[yán mìng]〈书 fml.〉1. 同 same as 严令 yánlìng：严命缉查 issue strict orders to apprehend the criminal and bring him to justice 2.指父亲的命令 father's instruction：严命难违。Father's word is the final.

严守
严守[yán shǒu]1.严格地遵守 observe strictly：严守纪律 observe strict discipline严守中立 observe strict neutrality 2.严密地保守 guard closely; strictly guard：严守国家机密 strictly guard state secrets

严实
严实[yán shi]〈方 dial.〉1. 同 same as 严密 yánmì ①：门关得挺严实。The door's shut real tight.河里刚凿通的冰窟窿又冻严实了。The hole that had just been bored into the river was frozen solidly again. 2.藏得好，不容易找到 hide sth. carefully so that it is hard to find; hide sth. in safety

严密
严密[yán mì]1.事物之间结合得紧，没有空隙 tight; close：瓶子盖得很严密。The bottle is tightly sealed.小说结构严密，文字流畅。The novel is well-conceived in structure and fluent in language. 2.周到；没有疏漏 well-conceived; tight：消息封锁得很严密。The news blackout is real tight.严密注视形势的发展 closely follow the development of the situation 3.使严密 tighten up：严密规章制度 tighten up the rules and regulations

严寒
严寒[yán hán]（气候）极冷 severe frigidity; bitter cold：天气严寒 frigid weather

严峻
严峻[yán jùn]1.严厉；严肃 stern; severe; rigorous; grim：严峻的考验 severe test; rigorous test严峻的现实 stern reality严峻的神情 stern expression 2. 同 same as 严重 yánzhòng：形势严峻 grave situation

严师
严师[yán shī] 指对学生要求严格的老师 demanding teacher：严师诤友 demanding teacher and friend who gives unpalatable advice严师出高徒。A strict teacher produces outstanding students.

严惩
严惩[yán chéng] 严厉处罚 punish severely：严惩凶犯 mete out stern punishment on a criminal严惩不贷 punish without leniency（贷 dai：宽恕 mercy）

严打
严打[yán dǎ]1.严厉打击 strike severely; deal a telling blow to：严打行业违法行为。Deal a crushing blow to violations of law in various professions and trades. 2.严厉打击刑事犯罪活动的简称 abbr. for 严厉打击刑事犯罪活动 yánlì dǎjī xíngshì fànzuì huódòng：深入开展严打斗争。Deepen the campaign to deal crushing blows to criminal activities.

严整
严整[yán zhěng]1.严肃整齐（多指队伍 usu. of troops）in neat formation：军容严整。The troops are in gallant array. 2.严谨；严密 strict; well-conceived：治家严整 run one's family in a meticulous way画儿的布局严整。The painting has a well-conceived composition.

严明
严明[yán míng]1.严肃而公正 strict and impartial（多指法纪 oft. of law and discipline）：赏罚严明 be strict and impartial in meting out rewards and punishments纪律严明 highly disciplined; well-disciplined; observe strict discipline 2.使严明 tighten up; enforce strictly：严明军纪 tighten up the enforcement of military discipline要严明纪律，制止不正之风。It is imperative to tighten up discipline and check unhealthy trends.

严格
严格[yán gé] 在遵守制度或掌握标准时认真不放松 strict; rigorous; rigid; stringent：严格遵守 observe (discipline, law, etc.) strictly他对自己要求很严格。He is very strict with himself.

严正
严正[yán zhèng] 严肃正当 solemn and just; serious and principled; stern：严正声明 solemn statement严正的立场 solemn stand

严禁
严禁[yán jìn] 严格禁止 strictly forbid or prohibit：库房重地，严禁烟火。Important warehouse. Smoking strictly prohibited.

严紧
严紧[yán jǐn]1.严格；严厉 strict; stern：管得严紧些才对。It's only right to be strict with these people. 2. 同 same as 严密 yánmì：窗户糊得挺严紧。The window is sealed real tight.

严肃
严肃[yán sù]1.（神情、气氛等）使人感到敬畏的 (of expression, atmosphere, etc.) stern; grave; serious; keep a straight face：他是个很严肃的人，从来不苟言笑。A serious man, he is reticent and reserved.会场的气氛既严肃又隆重。The atmosphere of the meeting was both serious and grand. 2.（作风、态度等）严格认真 (of style of work and attitude) strict; earnest：严肃处理 handle sth. in real earnest 3.使严肃 tighten up：严肃党纪 tighten up Party discipline严肃法制 tighten up the legal system

严词
严词[yán cí] 严厉的话 strong terms; stern words：严词拒绝 give a stern rebuff; sternly refuse

严谨
严谨[yán jǐn]1.严密谨慎 rigorous; strict; careful and precise：办事严谨 be meticulous and precise in work 2.严密细致；严格 compact; well-knit：格律严谨 strict tonal pattern and rhyme scheme文章结构严谨。The essay is well-knit.

严酷
严酷[yán kù]1.严厉；严格 implacable; harsh; bitter; grim：严酷的教训 bitter lesson 2.残酷；冷酷 brutal; ruthless：严酷的压迫 brutal oppression严酷的剥削 cruel exploitation

严重
严重[yán zhòng] 程度深；影响大；情势危急 serious; grave; critical：病情严重 be mortally ill问题严重。The problem is serious.严重的后果 grave consequence

严防
严防[yán fáng] 严格防止；严密防备 strictly guard against; take strict precautions against：严防破坏 take strict precautions against sabotage严防事故发生 take strict precautions against accidents

严阵以待
严阵以待[yán zhèn yǐ dài] 摆好严整的阵势，等待来犯的敌人 be in full battle array; be in combat readiness

丧
丧[sāng]（ㄙㄤ）（喪、）跟死了人有关的（事情） funeral; mourning：丧事 funeral arrangements治丧 make funeral arrangement另见  sàng丧[sàng]（ㄙㄤˋ）（喪、）丧失 lose; be bereaved：丧尽天良 inhuman; utterly conscienceless丧权辱国 surrender a country's sovereign rights under humiliating terms另见  sāng相关词组懊丧 | 报丧 | 奔丧 | 出丧 | 初丧 | 除丧 | 嗒丧 | 吊丧 | 发丧 | 服丧 | 国丧 | 号丧 | 居丧 | 沮丧 | 哭丧 | 沦丧 | 守丧 | 送丧 | 颓丧 | 喜丧 | 治丧 | 斲丧 | 哭丧棒 | 哭丧着脸 | 如丧考妣 | 垂头丧气 | 玩物丧志 | 亡魂丧胆 | 闻风丧胆丧胆 | 丧服 | 丧家 | 丧礼 | 丧乱 | 丧命 | 丧偶 | 丧气 | 丧生 | 丧失 | 丧事 | 丧亡 | 丧葬 | 丧志 | 丧钟 | 丧魂落魄 | 丧家之犬 | 丧权辱国 | 丧心病狂

丧乱
丧乱[sāng luàn]〈书 fml.〉指死亡祸乱的事 disturbance and bloodshed; tragic disaster

丧事
丧事[sāng shì] 人死后处置遗体等事 funeral arrangements：办丧事 handle affairs associated with a funeral丧事从简 simplify all the funeral arrangements

丧亡
丧亡[sàng wáng] 死亡；灭亡 demise; death; downfall

丧偶
丧偶[sàng ǒu]〈书 fml.〉死了配偶 be bereaved of one's spouse：中年丧偶 lose one's wife or husband at middle age

丧命
丧命[sàng mìng] 死亡（多指凶死或死于暴病 usu. from violence or of the sudden attack of a severe illness） meet one's death; get killed

丧失
丧失[sàng shī] 失去 lose; forfeit：丧失信心 lose confidence丧失工作能力 lose the ability to work

丧家
丧家[sāng jiā] 有丧事的人家 family of the deceased

丧家之犬
丧家之犬[sàng jiā zhī quǎn]〈比喻 fig.〉失去靠山，到处乱窜，无处投奔的人 (of a person) behave like a disowned dog; homeless dog; stray cur亦 also 丧家之狗 sàng jiā zhī gǒu

丧心病狂
丧心病狂[sàng xīn bìng kuáng] 丧失理智，像发了疯一样。形容言行昏乱而荒谬或残忍可恶到了极点。 in a frenzy; in such violent mental agitation as to be extremely absurd or brutal

丧志
丧志[sàng zhì] 丧失志气；失去进取心 dispirited; demoralized; dejected：玩物丧志 sap one's aspiration by seeking pleasure

丧服
丧服[sāng fú] 为哀悼死者而穿的服装。我国旧时习俗用本色的粗布或麻布做成。 mourning apparel. By an old Chinese custom, mourning apparels are made from coarse cloth or sackcloth in their original colours.

丧权辱国
丧权辱国[sàng quán rǔ guó] 丧失主权使国家蒙受耻辱 surrender a country's sovereign rights under humiliating terms

丧气
丧气[sàng qì] 因事情不顺利而情绪低落 downhearted; dejected; crestfallen：灰心丧气 feel disheartened垂头丧气 feel demoralized丧气[sàng qi] 倒霉；不吉利 be unlucky; be out of luck; have bad luck：丧气话 gloomy talk

丧生
丧生[sàng shēng] 同 same as 丧命 sàng∥mìng

丧礼
丧礼[sāng lǐ] 有关丧事的礼仪 obsequies; funeral

丧胆
丧胆[sàng dǎn] 形容非常恐惧 terrified; terror-stricken：敌军闻风丧胆。The enemy troops panicked at the news.

丧葬
丧葬[sāng zàng] 办理丧事，埋葬死者 burial：丧葬费 funeral expenses

丧钟
丧钟[sāng zhōng]西方风俗，教堂在宣告本区教徒死亡或为死者举行宗教仪式时敲钟叫做敲丧钟。因此用丧钟来比喻死亡或灭亡。 knell; funeral bell; death knell. By the Western custom, a church rings its bells slowly and solemnly by way of announcing the death of a follower in the parish or when holding a religious service for the deceased. Hence the term, knell, referring to death or downfall.

丧魂落魄
丧魂落魄[sàng hún luò pò] 形容非常恐惧的样子 be scared out of one's wits; shaken to the core亦 also 丧魂失魄 sàng hún shī pò

个
个[gě]（ㄍㄜˇ）（個）另见  自个儿 zìgěr另见  gè个1[gè]（ㄍㄜˋ）（個、箇）1.〈量词 classifier〉(a)用于没有专用量词的名词（有些名词除了用专用量词之外也能用‘个’） [used before nouns without a special classifier of their own (some nouns can also use this instead of using their special classifier)]：三个苹果 three apples一个理想 one ideal两个星期 two weeks (b)用于约数的前面 [preceding an approximate number]：哥儿俩也不过差个两三岁。There's only a difference of two or three years between the two brothers.一天走个百儿八十里，不在话下。There is no problem to walk 80 or 100 miles a day. (c)用于带宾语的动词后面，有表示动量的作用（原来不能用‘个’的地方也用‘个’） [used between a verb and its object to indicate momentum; orig. 个 gè was not used]：见个面儿，说个话儿。Let's meet and have a talk. (d)用于动词和补语的中间，使补语略带宾语的性质（有时跟‘得’连用） [used between a verb and its complement sometimes together with 得·de]：吃个饱 eat one's fill玩儿个痛快 have a wonderful time笑个不停。keep laughing雨下个不停。It kept raining.学了个八九不离十 have basically learned the ropes扫得个干干净净 give it a thorough cleaning 2.单独的 individual：个人 individual个体 individual个2[gè]（ㄍㄜˋ）（個、箇）1.量词‘些’的后缀 [used as a suffix after classifier 些 xiē]：那些个花儿 all those flowers这么些个书哪看得完？How can I finish reading so many books?有一些个令人鼓舞的消息。There is some inspiring news. 2.〈方 dial.〉加在‘昨儿、今儿、明儿’等时间词后面，跟‘某日里’的意思相近 [used after 昨儿 zuór，今儿 jīnr，明儿 míngr，etc., similar in meaning to ‘on a certain day’]另见  gě相关词组各个 | 哪个 | 那个 | 谁个 | 些个 | 这个 | 真个 | 整个 | 逐个 | 挨个儿 | 成个儿 | 蹿个儿 | 单个儿 | 翻个儿 | 换个儿 | 是个儿 | 自个儿 | 夜儿个 | 三个代表 | 一个劲儿 | 扛大个儿 | 一个心眼儿 | 一个巴掌拍不响 | 一步一个脚印儿 | 一个萝卜一个坑儿个案 | 个别 | 个儿 | 个股 | 个例 | 个人 | 个体 | 个位 | 个性 | 个展 | 个中 | 个子 | 个体户 | 个头儿 | 个人主义 | 个体经济 | 个人所得税 | 个体所有制 | 个人数字助理

个中
个中[gè zhōng]〈书 fml.〉其中 therein：个中滋味 the feeling of sth.

个人
个人[gè rén]1.一个人（跟‘集体’相对 as opposed to ‘the collective’）individual person：个人利益服从集体利益。Personal interests should be subordinated to the collective interests.集体领导同个人负责相结合 combine collective leadership with individual responsibility 2.自称，我（在正式场合发表意见时用 used on formal occasions to address oneself when one expresses one's opinion）I：个人认为这个办法是非常合理的。In my opinion, this method is very reasonable.

个人主义
个人主义[gè rén zhǔ yì] 一切从个人出发，把个人利益放在集体利益之上，只顾自己，不顾别人的错误思想。个人主义是生产资料私有制的产物，是资产阶级世界观的核心。它的表现形式是多方面的，如个人英雄主义、自由主义、本位主义等。 individualism; erroneous trend of thought that places individual interests above collective interests and cares for oneself to the neglect of others. As an outcome of private ownership of means of production, individualism constitutes the core of the bourgeois world outlook, and manifests itself in many forms, such as individualized heroism, liberalism, and compartmentalism.

个人所得税
个人所得税[gè rén suǒ dé shuì] 国家对公民个人所得征收的税，征收范围主要包括工资、奖金、补贴收入以及个体工商户生产、经营所得的收入 personal income tax; tax imposed by the state on the personal incomes of its citizens, including salaries, bonuses, allowances, and incomes of individual industrial and commercial businesses earned through production and operation

个人数字助理
个人数字助理[gè rén shù zì zhù lǐ]一种手持式电子设备，具有电子计算机的某些功能，可以用来管理个人信息（如通讯录、计划等），也可以上网浏览、收发电子邮件等。一般不配备键盘。personal digital assistant (PDA); hand-held electronic device that performs some of the functions of a computer but has no keyboard, used to manage personal information (such as addresses, telephone numbers, social engagements, etc.), surf the Internet, send and receive e-mails, etc.; 俗称 commonly known as 掌上电脑 zhǎngshàng diànnǎo

个位
个位[gè wèi] 十进制计数的基础的一位。个位以上有十位、百位等，以下有十分位、百分位等。 single digit; basic unit of the decimal system, with tens and hundreds, etc. above it, and tenths percentile and hundredths percentile, etc. below it

个体
个体[gè tǐ]1.单个的人或生物 individual; being 2.指个体户 self-employed worker

个体户
个体户[gè tǐ hù] 个体经营的农民或工商业者 self-employed farmer or businessperson

个体所有制
个体所有制[gè tǐ suǒ yǒu zhì] 生产资料和产品归个体劳动者所有的制度 individual ownership of means of production and products;另见  小生产者 xiǎoshēngchǎnzhě

个体经济
个体经济[gè tǐ jīng jì] 以生产资料私有制和个体劳动为基础的经济形式 individual economy, based on private ownership of means of production, and self-employed labour

个例
个例[gè lì] 个别的、特殊的事例 individual case; exceptional case：此类造假现象，绝非个例。Forgery such as this is by no means an isolated case.

个儿
个儿[gè r]1.身体或物体的大小 size; height; stature：他是个大个儿。He is very tall.棉桃的个儿真不小。What huge cotton balls these are! 2.指一个个的人或物 [persons or things taken singly]：挨个儿握手问好 shake hands with each one买鸡蛋论斤不论个儿。Eggs are sold by the jin, not by the piece. 3.〈方 dial.〉够条件的人；有能力较量的对手 qualified person; capable competitors：跟我摔跤，你还不是个儿。You are not capable enough to wrestle with me.

个别
个别[gè bié]1.单个；各个 individual; specific：个别谈话 private talk个别处理 be treated specially 2.极少数；少有 very few; one or two：这种情况是极其个别的。Such instances are very rare.

个头儿
个头儿[gè tóu r] 身材或物体的大小 size; height：这种柿子个头儿特别大。This type of persimmon is remarkable in size.

个子
个子[gè zi]1.指人的身材，也指动物身体的大小 (of a human being or animal) height; build：高个子 tall person矮个子 short person这只猫个子大。This is a very big cat. 2.指某些捆在一起的条状物 of tied stick-shaped things：谷个子 a bundle of millet麦个子 a sheaf of wheat高粱个子 a bundle of sorghum

个展
个展[gè zhǎn] 个人作品（多为书法、绘画、雕塑等）展览 (usu. of calligraphy, painting or carving) solo exhibition

个性
个性[gè xìng]1.在一定的社会条件和教育影响下形成的一个人的比较固定的特性 individual character; individuality; personality：个性强 strong character这个人很有个性。This man has an unusual character. 2.事物的特性，即矛盾的特殊性。一切个性都是有条件地、暂时地存在的，所以是相对的。 specific characteristic of contradiction; individualities are conditional and temporary, and, therefore, relative

个案
个案[gè àn] 个别的、特殊的案件或事例 particular and special case or instance：作个案处理 be treated specially

个股
个股[gè gǔ] 指某一公司的股票 individual share; shares of an individual company：个股行情 individual company share quotations

丫
丫[yā]（ㄧㄚ）（潠）1.上端分叉的东西 bifurcation (at top end); fork：枝丫 fork of a tree branch 2.〈方 dial.〉女孩子 girl：小丫 little girl相关词组枝丫 | 脚丫子 | 毛丫头 | 撒丫子 | 黄毛丫头丫杈 | 丫鬟 | 丫髻 | 丫头 | 丫巴儿

丫头
丫头[yā tou]1.女孩子 girl 2.丫鬟 servant girl

丫巴儿
丫巴儿[yā ba r]〈方 dial.〉东西分叉的地方 fork; bifurcation; crotch：树丫巴儿 fork of a tree手丫巴儿 crotch between the fingers of a hand

丫杈
丫杈[yā chà] 同 same as 桠杈 yāchà

丫髻
丫髻[yā jì] 女孩梳在头顶两边的发髻 girl's coiffure with a loop on either side of the head

丫鬟
丫鬟[yā huan] 婢女 slave girl; servant girl亦 also 丫环 yā·huan

中
中[zhōng]（ㄓㄨㄥ）1.跟四周的距离相等；中心 centre; middle：中央 centre; middle; midst华中 central China居中 in the middle; at the centre 2.(Zhōng) 指中国 China：中文 Chinese古今中外 at all times and in all countries; in the past or present, in China or anywhere else 3.范围内；内部 in; among; amid; amidst：家中 in the family; at home; in the house水中 in the water山中 in the mountains心中 at heart; in mind; on one's mind队伍中 in the procession; within the ranks 4.位置在两端之间的 middle; mid：中指 middle finger中锋 centre forward中年 middle age; mid-life; middle-aged中秋 Mid-Autumn (Festival)中途 halfway; midway 5.等级在两端之间的 medium; intermediate：中农 middle peasant (political term used before or after the liberation in China to refer to self-sufficient farmers)中学 middle school; high school; secondary school中型 medium; medium-sized中等 medium; moderate; average; secondary 6.不偏不倚 impartial; even-handed; neutral：中庸 mean; middle of the road; middlebrow; golden mean适中 moderate 7.中人 go-between; mediator; middleman：作中 act as an intermediary; be a middleman 8.适于；合于 suitable for; fit for; good for; equal to：中用 be helpful; be of use; be useful中看 be pleasant to the eye; be presentable; look nice中听 be pleasant to the ear 9.〈方 dial.〉成；行；好 all right; okay; OK; fine; good：中不中？Is it all right?这办法中。It works!饭这就中了。Dinner is soon ready. 10.用在动词后表示持续状态（动词前有‘在’字）[with 在 zài before the verb, used after a verb to indicate continuity] in the course of; in the process of：列车在运行中。The train is running.工厂在建设中。The factory is under construction. or The factory is being built.另见  zhòng中[zhòng]（ㄓㄨㄥˋ）1.正对上；恰好合上 fit exactly; hit：中选 be selected; be chosen猜中了 guess right; hit it on the nose三枪都打中了目标。None of the three shots missed the target. 2.受到；遭受 be affected by; be hit by; undergo; suffer：中毒 poisoning; toxication; toxicosis中暑 collapse from sunstroke; heatstroke; sunstroke; insolation; calenture; siriasis; thermic fever胳膊上中了一枪。(He) was shot in the arm.另见  zhōng相关词组暗中 | 便中 | 不中 | 尺中 | 初中 | 从中 | 当中 | 附中 | 高中 | 个中 | 彀中 | 关中 | 华中 | 集中 | 就中 | 居中 | 看中 | 空中 | 郎中 | 命中 | 内中 | 其中 | 切中 | 热中 | 人中 | 日中 | 适中 | 五中 | 相中 | 央中 | 月中 | 折中 | 震中 | 正中 | 卒中 | 半中腰 | 杯中物 | 鼻中隔 | 集中营 | 笼中鸟 | 囊中物 | 排中律 | 肉中刺 | 上中农 | 下中农 | 眼中钉 | 意中人 | 无形中 | 正当中 | 当中间儿 | 风中之烛 | 管中窥豹 | 闳中肆外 | 火中取栗 | 急中生智 | 空中楼阁 | 空中小姐 | 连中三元 | 美中不足 | 目中无人 | 水中捞月 | 瓮中之鳖 | 瓮中捉鳖 | 无中生有 | 胸中无数 | 胸中有数 | 雪中送炭 | 庸中佼佼 | 正中下怀 | 初级中学 | 砥柱中流 | 富裕中农 | 高级中学 | 计算中心 | 如日中天 | 食物中毒 | 外强中干 | 百发百中 | 胎死腹中 | 谈言微中 | 秀外慧中 | 言必有中 | 鱼游釜中 | 职业高中 | 锥处囊中 | 民主集中制中班 | 中饱 | 中保 | 中标 | 中表 | 中波 | 中餐 | 中策 | 中层 | 中常 | 中辍 | 中词 | 中档 | 中道 | 中稻 | 中等 | 中东 | 中毒 | 中断 | 中队 | 中耳 | 中幡 | 中饭 | 中风 | 中锋 | 中缝 | 中伏 | 中耕 | 中古 | 中和 | 中华 | 中级 | 中坚 | 中间 | 中将 | 中奖 | 中焦 | 中介 | 中局 | 中楷 | 中看 | 中考 | 中肯 | 中馈 | 中栏 | 中立 | 中流 | 中路 | 中落 | 中脑 | 中年 | 中农 | 中跑 | 中频 | 中期 | 中气 | 中签 | 中秋 | 中人 | 中伤 | 中士 | 中式 | 中枢 | 中暑 | 中水 | 中堂 | 中听 | 中途 | 中外 | 中卫 | 中尉 | 中文 | 中午 | 中西 | 中线 | 中校 | 中心 | 中型 | 中兴 | 中性 | 中休 | 中选 | 中学 | 中雪 | 中旬 | 中央 | 中药 | 中叶 | 中医 | 中意 | 中庸 | 中用 | 中游 | 中雨 | 中原 | 中允 | 中灶 | 中正 | 中止 | 中指 | 中州 | 中转 | 中装 | 中子 | 中短波 | 中国画 | 中国话 | 中国字 | 中果皮 | 中继线 | 中继站 | 中间儿 | 中间派 | 中间人 | 中立国 | 中拇指 | 中山狼 | 中山装 | 中世纪 | 中提琴 | 中学生 | 中央税 | 中元节 | 中州韵 | 中子弹 | 中子态 | 中子星 | 中不溜儿 | 中产阶级 | 中等教育 | 中华民族 | 中流砥柱 | 中路梆子 | 中篇小说 | 中枢神经 | 中央银行 | 中国同盟会 | 中石器时代 | 中央商务区 | 中国工农红军 | 中文信息处理 | 中国人民解放军

中不溜儿
中不溜儿[zhōng bu liū r]〈方 dial.〉不好也不坏；不大也不小；中等的；中间的 medium (in size, quality, level, etc.) mediocre; middling：成绩中不溜儿 middling score不要太大的，挑个中不溜儿的。I don't want anything too big. Get me one of average size.亦 also 中溜儿 zhōngliūr

中世纪
中世纪[zhōng shì jì] 欧洲历史上指封建社会时代 Middle Ages; period in European history between antiquity and the Renaissance, oft. dated from 476 to 1453

中东
中东[Zhōng dōng] 指亚洲西南部和非洲东北部，包括近东和伊朗、阿富汗 Middle East (Southwest Asia and Northeast Africa, including Near East, Iran and Afghanistan)另见  近东 Jìndōng

中产阶级
中产阶级[zhōng chǎn jiē jí] 中等资产阶级，在我国多指民族资产阶级 middle class; middle bourgeoisie (in China oft. referring to the national bourgeoisie)

中人
中人[zhōng rén]1.为双方介绍买卖、调解纠纷等并做见证的人 middleman; go-between; mediator; intermediary 2.〈书 fml.〉在身材、相貌、智力等方面居于中等的人 ordinary person; average person (in terms of size, appearance, intellect, etc.)：中人以上 (of sb.) above average不及中人 (of sb.) below average

中介
中介[zhōng jiè] 媒介 medium; intermediary; intermedium; agent; vehicle; instrumentality：中介人 agent; intermediary中介作用 function of an agent or intermediary

中伏
中伏[zhōng fú]1.夏至后的第四个庚日，是三伏的第二伏 1st day of the 2nd of the three fu (the three 10-day hottest periods of the year), which starts from the 4th day of geng (day designated by combining the 7th of the 10 Heavenly Stems with one of the Earthly Branches) after the Summer Solstice 2.通常也指从夏至后第四个庚日起到立秋后第一个庚日前一天的一段时间 usu. period of the hot season from the 4th day of geng after the Summer Solstice to the day before the 1st day of geng right after the Beginning of Autumn亦 also 二伏 èrfú另见  三伏 sānfú

中休
中休[zhōng xiū] 在一段工作或一段路程的中间休息 break (taken from work or journey)

中伤
中伤[zhòng shāng] 诬蔑别人使受损害 sling, fling or throw mud at sb.; backbite; slander; calumniate; vilify; traduce; asperse; cast aspersions on; libel：造谣中伤 spread calumnious rumours恶意中伤 calumniate; malign

中保
中保[zhōng bǎo] 中人和保人 middleman and guarantor

中允
中允[zhōng yǔn]〈书 fml.〉公正 fairness; equity; impartiality：貌似中允 seemingly impartial

中元节
中元节[Zhōng yuán Jié] 指农历七月十五日，旧俗有烧衣包、祭祀亡故亲人等活动 Zhongyuan Festival, which falls on the 15th day of the 7th lunar month, when the old custom was to burn paper clothes or spirit money as sacrificial offerings to the dead

中兴
中兴[zhōng xīng]由衰微而复兴（多指国家 oft. of a nation）resurgence; rejuvenation

中农
中农[zhōng nóng]经济地位在富农和贫农之间的农民。多数占有土地，并有部分生产工具，生活来源靠自己劳动，一般不剥削人，也不出卖劳动力。特指介乎上中农和下中农之间的农民。middle peasant; peasant whose economic status is between the rich peasant and the poor peasant, who generally owns land and some means of production, and is self-supporting, neither exploiting nor selling labour; esp. peasant with an economic status between the upper-middle peasant and the lower-middle peasant另见  上中农 shàngzhōngnóng and 下中农 xiàzhōngnóng

中医
中医[zhōng yī]1.中国固有的医学 traditional Chinese medical science 2.用中国医学的理论和方法治病的医生 practitioner of traditional Chinese medicine

中午
中午[zhōng wǔ] 指白天十二点左右的一段时间 noon; midday

中华
中华[Zhōng huá]〈古代 arch.〉称黄河流域一带为中华，是汉族最初兴起的地方，后来指中国 Yellow River Valley, where the Han people originated and flourished; (later) China

中华民族
中华民族[Zhōng huá Mín zú] 我国各民族的总称，包括五十六个民族，有悠久的历史，灿烂的文化遗产和光荣的革命传统 Chinese nation, having 56 ethnic peoples, a long history, a splendid cultural heritage, and a glorious revolutionary tradition

中卫
中卫[zhōng wèi] 足球、手球等球类比赛的后卫之一，位置在中间 (of football, handball, etc.) centre halfback

中原
中原[Zhōng yuán] 指黄河中下游地区，包括河南的大部分地区、山东的西部和河北、山西的南部 Central Plains; middle and lower reaches of the Yellow River, including most of Henan, western Shandong, and southern Hebei and Shanxi provinces

中古
中古[zhōng gǔ]1.较晚的古代，在我国历史分期上多指魏晋南北朝隋唐这个时期 middle ancient period (in Chinese history, from the 3rd to the 9th century, encompassing the Wei, Jin, Southern and Northern, Sui, Tang dynasties) 2.指封建社会时代 period of feudalism

中叶
中叶[zhōng yè] 中期 middle period：唐代中叶 middle period of the Tang Dynasty; mid-Tang清朝中叶 middle period of the Qing Dynasty; mid-Qing20世纪中叶 mid-20th century; middle of the 20th century

中听
中听[zhōng tīng]（话）听起来满意 (of remarks) pleasant to the ear; agreeable：这话中听。His remarks sound agreeable.

中和
中和[zhōng hé]1.酸和碱经过化学反应生成盐和水，如盐酸和氢氧化钠反应生成氯化钠和水，所生成的物质失去酸和碱的性质 neutralization; chemical reaction between an acid and an alkali that yields a salt and water, e.g. the reaction between hydrochloric acid and sodium hydroxide yields sodium chloride and water, substances lacking acidity and alkalinity 2.使中和 neutralize 3.抗毒素或抗毒血清跟毒素起作用，产生其他物质，使毒素的毒性消失 detoxify; (of an antitoxin or antiserum) counteract or destroy the poisonous properties of a toxin 4.物体的正电量和负电量相等，不显带电现象的状态叫中和 neutralization; process occurring when the amount of positive electric charge of an object is equal to that of its negative electric charge, counteracting each other

中国人民解放军
中国人民解放军[Zhōng guó Rén mín Jiě fàng jūn]中华人民共和国的国家武装力量。1927年8月1日开始建军，第二次国内革命战争时期称中国工农红军，抗日战争时期称八路军和新四军，第三次国内革命战争时期改称中国人民解放军。Chinese People's Liberation Army (PLA); national armed force of the People's Republic of China, founded on August 1,1927, which was the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army during the Second Revolutionary Civil War and the Eighth Route Army and the New Fourth Army during the War of Resistance against Japan, and assumed the present name during the Third Revolutionary Civil War

中国同盟会
中国同盟会[Zhōng guó Tóng méng huì]1905年孙中山在日本东京成立的中国资产阶级革命政党。其政治纲领是‘驱逐鞑虏，恢复中华，创立民国，平均地权’。中国同盟会成立后，积极进行反清革命斗争，领导辛亥革命，推翻了清王朝的封建统治，建立了中华民国。1912年中国同盟会改组为中国国民党。United League; Chinese bourgeois revolutionary party founded by Sun Yat-sen in Tokyo in 1905, whose political programme was to ‘expel the Manchus, restore order to China, found the Republic, and redistribute land ownership equally’. Active in the revolutionary struggle against the Qing Dynasty, the United League launched the Revolution of 1911, overthrew the Qing Dynasty and founded the Republic of China. In 1912 it was regrouped and became the Kuomintang of China. 简称 abbr. 同盟会 Tóngménghuì

中国字
中国字[zhōng guó zì] 中国的文字，特指汉字 Chinese written language; esp.Chinese characters

中国工农红军
中国工农红军[Zhōng guó gōng Nóng Hóng jūn]第二次国内革命战争时期，中国共产党领导的人民军队。1928年4月秋收起义部队 —— 工农革命军，与南昌起义的一部分部队在井冈山会师，改称中国工农红军第四军。此后，党所领导的各地武装力量，都改称中国工农红军。抗日战争时期改称八路军、新四军。是中国人民解放军的前身。Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army; Red Army; the people's army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Revolutionary Civil War. In April 1928, the army from the Autumn Harvest Uprising - the Workers' and Peasants' Revolutionary Army - joined forces with a part of the army from the Nanchang Uprising and was renamed the Fourth Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. Henceforth, all the local armed forces led by the CPC were renamed the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, and during the War of Resistance against Japan, the CWPRA was separately renamed the Eighth Route Army and the New Fourth Army. It was the predecessor of the Chinese People's Liberation Army. 简称 abbr. 红军 Hóngjūn

中国画
中国画[zhōng guó huà] 国画 traditional Chinese painting

中国话
中国话[zhōng guó huà] 中国人民的语言，特指汉语 languages used by the Chinese people; esp. Chinese

中坚
中坚[zhōng jiān] 在集体中最有力的并起较大作用的成分 nucleus; spark plug; backbone; hard core：中坚力量 nucleus; hard core; mainstay中坚分子 spark plug; elite

中型
中型[zhōng xíng] 形状或规模不大不小的 medium-sized; medium：中型汽车 medium-sized auto mobile

中堂
中堂[zhōng táng]1.正房居中的一间；堂屋 central room (of a traditional Chinese house) 2.悬挂在客厅正中的尺寸较大的字画 central scroll (of painting or calligraphy) hung in the middle of the wall of the main room中堂[zhōng tang] 明清两代内阁大学士的别称 alternate name for a Grand Secretary in the Ming and Qing dynasties

中士
中士[zhōng shì] 军衔，低于上士，高于下士 (US & Brit. Army, Royal Air Force) sergeant; (US Navy) petty officer 2nd class; (US Air Force) staff sergeant

中外
