中外[zhōng wài] 中国和外国 China and foreign countries：古今中外 at all times and in all over the world闻名中外 be well-known at home and abroad中外人士 Chinese and foreign people

中央
中央[zhōng yāng]1.中心地方 centre; middle：湖的中央有个亭子。There is a pavilion at the centre of the lake. 2.特指国家政权或政治团体的最高领导机构 highest leading body of a state or party：党中央 Party Central Committee团中央 Central Committee of the Youth League

中央商务区
中央商务区[zhōng yāng shāng wù qū] 大城市中地理位置优越，汇集商贸、金融、证券、保险等机构，以互联网为纽带，集中进行商务活动的地区 central business district (CBD); district that is centrally located in a large city and embraces business, trade, financial, securities, insurance and other institutions linked by the Internet for concentrated business activities

中央税
中央税[zhōng yāng shuì] 按照税法规定由中央税务部门征收管理，或由地方征收后划归中央所有的税种 central tax; tax collected by the central taxation department or collected and turned over to the central government by a local tax department亦 also 国家税 guójiāshuì

中央银行
中央银行[zhōng yāng yín háng]一国居主导地位的金融中心机构，是国家干预和调控国民经济的重要工具，负责制定并执行国家货币信用政策，独占货币发行权，实行金融监管等。我国的中央银行为中国人民银行。central bank; leading financial institution of a country, which is an important state apparatus to intervene in and control the national economy and responsible for making and implementing state monetary and credit policies, monopolizing the right to issue a currency and exercising supervision and regulation over financial affairs. The central bank in China is the People's Bank of China. 简称 abbr. 央行 yāngháng

中奖
中奖[zhòng jiǎng] 奖券、有奖储蓄券等的号码跟抽签等所得号码相同，可以获得奖金，叫做中奖 win the jackpot; win a lottery; give a prize to the holder of a lottery ticket ; draw a prizewinning lottery ticket

中子
中子[zhōng zǐ]构成原子核的基本粒子之一，质量约和质子相等。不带电，容易进入原子核，可以用来轰击原子核，引起核反应。neutron; one of the elementary particles composing the atomic nucleus, having a mass approximating that of a proton, and electrically uncharged. The particle can easily enter the structure of the atomic nucleus and bombard the atomic nucleus to produce a nuclear reaction.

中子弹
中子弹[zhōng zǐ dàn]核武器的一种，爆炸时释放大量的高能中子，靠中子辐射起杀伤作用，穿透力较强，冲击波、热辐射和放射性沾染较其他核武器为小。在有效范围内能杀伤一般坦克内或建筑物内的人员。可作战术核武器使用。neutron bomb; nuclear bomb that can produce a great amount of high-energy neutrons to destroy life by neutron radiation. Highly penetrating but producing less blast, heat radiation and radioactive contamination than other nuclear weapons, within its effective range the neutron bomb is capable of destroying enemy personnel inside tanks or buildings, and can be used as a tactical nuclear weapon.

中子态
中子态[zhōng zǐ tài] 物质存在的一种形态，这种形态下的物体密度极大，电子和质子大量结合成中子 neutron state; form of a substance in which an object has a high density, with many of its electrons and protons forming neutrons

中子星
中子星[zhōng zǐ xīng]中子态的恒星，由质量相当大的恒星演变而来。自转速度很快，周期性地发射出脉冲辐射。neutron star; celestial body composed of neutrons, which has evolved from the remains of a massive star that has collapsed. It rotates at a high speed and periodically sends off pulse radiation.

中学
中学1[zhōng xué] 对青少年实施中等教育的学校 middle school; high school; secondary school中学2[zhōng xué] 清末称我国传统的学术 (in late Qing Dynasty) Chinese traditional learning

中学生
中学生[zhōng xué shēng] 在中学读书的学生 middle-school student; high-school student

中将
中将[zhōng jiàng] 军衔，低于上将，高于少将 (US & Brit. Army, US Air Force, US Marine Corps and Royal Marines) lieutenant general; (US & Royal Navy) vice-admiral; (Royal Air Force) air marshal

中尉
中尉[zhōng wèi] 军衔，低于上尉，高于少尉 (military rank) (US Army, Air Force & Marine Corps) 1st lieutenant; (Brit. Army & Royal Marines) lieutenant; (US Navy) lieutenant junior grade; (Royal Navy) sub-lieutenant; (Royal Air Force) flying officer

中局
中局[zhōng jú] 象棋、国际象棋竞赛中指开局与残局之间的比赛阶段 middle phase (of a chess game)

中层
中层[zhōng céng]中间的一层或几层（多指机构、组织、阶层等 oft. of an institution, organization, class, etc.）middle-level; middle-ranking：中层干部 middle-level cadres

中山狼
中山狼[zhōng shān láng]古代寓言，赵简子在中山打猎，一只狼中箭而逃，赵在后追捕。东郭先生从那儿走过，狼向他求救。东郭先生动了怜悯之心，把狼藏在书囊中，骗过了赵简子。狼活命后却要吃救命恩人东郭先生（见于明马中锡《东田集·中山狼传》）。originally from an ancient fable in Ma Zhongxi's The Collected Tales from Dongtian· Wolf of Zhongshan (Ming Dynasty)：While Zhao Jianzi was pursuing a wolf he had wounded with an arrow shot on a hunting tour in a place called Zhongshan, the wolf stopped Master Dongguo, who happened to be walking by, and asked him for help. Master Dongguo had mercy on the wolf and hid it in his book bag, a ploy that fooled Zhao Jianzi and saved the wolf's life. However, no sooner had the hunter gone than the wolf threatened to eat the man who had saved its life.〈比喻 fig.〉恩将仇报，没有良心的人 person who returns evil for good; one who bites the hand that feeds one

中山装
中山装[zhōng shān zhuāng] 一种服装，上身左右各有两个带盖子和扣子的口袋，下身是西式长裤，由孙中山提倡而得名 Chinese suit; Sun Yat-sen uniform; suit with a jacket having two flapped and buttoned pockets, a pair of Western-style trousers, named after Sun Yat-sen, who promoted its wear

中州
中州[Zhōng zhōu]〈旧时 old〉指现在河南省一带 Zhongzhou, the region in and around present-day Henan Province

中州韵
中州韵[zhōng zhōu yùn]我国近代戏曲韵文所根据的韵部。‘中州’指现在的河南省一带，‘中州韵’是以北方话为基础的，分韵的方法各地不完全一样，都跟皮黄戏的‘十三辙’很相近。zhongzhouyun; rhyme schemes for modern Chinese opera verse that are rooted in Zhongzhou (in and around present-day Henan Province) and based on the northern dialects; its methodology may differ in various localities, but it bears a close resemblance to that of shisanzhe, or the 13 rhyme schemes for the pihuang opera另见  十三辙 shísān zhé

中常
中常[zhōng cháng] 中等；不高不低；不好不坏 middling; average; moderate：成绩中常 average score中常年景 average harvest

中幡
中幡[zhōng fān] 杂技的一种，表演时舞弄顶上有幡的高大旗杆 flagpole waving; acrobatic performance waving a high pole with a long narrow flag attached to its top

中年
中年[zhōng nián] 四五十岁的年纪 middle age; mid-life：中年男子 middle-aged man人到中年 (of sb.) reach middle age

中庸
中庸[zhōng yōng]1.儒家的一种主张，待人接物采取不偏不倚，调和折中的态度 golden mean; way of wisdom of the Confucian school, which advocates impartiality, reconciliation and compromise in one's approach to people or matters：中庸之道 golden mean 2.〈书 fml.〉指德才平凡 (of a person) mediocre; average; middling：中庸之才 person of mediocre ability

中式
中式[zhōng shì] 中国式样 Chinese style：中式服装 Chinese-style clothing另见  zhòng∥shì中式[zhòng shì] 科举时代考试合格 (in feudal China) pass the imperial examination另见  zhōngshì

中心
中心[zhōng xīn]1.跟四周的距离相等的位置 centre; middle; heart; core; hub; focus; epicentre：在草地的中心有一个八角亭子。There is an octagonal pavilion in the centre of the lawn. 2.事物的主要部分 main; chief; body：中心思想 main idea中心问题 central issue中心工作 central task 3.在某一方面占重要地位的城市或地区 centre (city or area of certain importance)：政治中心 political centre文化中心 cultural centre 4.设备、技术力量等比较完备的机构和单位（多作单位名称 oft. used in the name of a business or organization）institution or organization with a complete set of facilities, technology, etc.：维修中心 service centre研究中心 research centre科技信息中心 centre of technology and information

中性
中性[zhōng xìng]1.化学上指既不呈酸性又不呈碱性的性质 (chem.) neutral 2.某些语言里名词（以及代词、形容词等）分别阴性、阳性、中性 (neither masculine nor feminine in gender, of a noun, pronoun, adjective, etc.in certain languages) neuter; 另见  性 xìng ⑥; 3.指词语意义不含褒贬色彩 (of a word) neither positive nor negative; neutral; neuter：中性词 neutral word; neuter word; neuter中性注释 neutral note

中意
中意[zhòng yì] 合意；满意 catch sb.'s fancy; be to sb.'s liking; please：这几种颜色的布她都不中意。None of these kinds of colour cloth is to her liking.这件衣服很中她的意。The dress is just to her taste.

中拇指
中拇指[zhōng mu zhǐ] 同 same as 中指 zhōngzhǐ

中指
中指[zhōng zhǐ] 第三个指头 middle finger亦 also 将指 jiàngzhǐ

中提琴
中提琴[zhōng tí qín] 提琴的一种，体积比小提琴稍大，音比小提琴低五度 viola; stringed instrument of the violin family, slightly larger than a violin, tuned a fifth lower

中文
中文[Zhōng wén] 中国的语言文字，特指汉族的语言文字 Chinese language; esp.Chinese, the language of the Han people

中文信息处理
中文信息处理[zhōng wén xìn xī chǔ lǐ] 用电子计算机对中国语言文字（特指汉语言文字）的各种信息（如字、词、短语、句、篇章等）进行识别、转换、压缩、检索、分析、理解和生成等处理的技术 Chinese information processing; processing technology using computers to recognize, convert, condense, retrieve, analyse, comprehend and generate all kinds of information in the written Chinese language, e.g. words, phrases, sentences, articles, etc.

中断
中断[zhōng duàn] 中途停止或断绝 interrupt; discontinue; suspend; intermit; break off：供应中断。The supply was cut.联系中断 lose contact (with sb.); be out of touch (with sb.)中断两国关系 suspend relations between the two countries

中旬
中旬[zhōng xún] 每月十一日到二十日的十天 middle 10-day period of a month

中暑
中暑[zhòng shǔ]患中暑(zhòngshǔ)病。有的地区叫发痧。suffer sunstroke; in some areas known as 发痧 fā∥shā中暑[zhòng shǔ]病，由于长时间受烈日照射或室内温度过高、不通风引起。症状是头痛，耳鸣，严重时昏睡，痉挛，血压下降。heatstroke; sunstroke; insolation; calenture; siriasis; thermic fever; disease caused by overexposure to the sun, or too much heat or absence of draught indoors, characterized by headache, tinnitus, or in severe cases, coma, convulsions, and decline in blood pressure

中期
中期[zhōng qī]1.某一时期的中间阶段 middle period; metaphase：20世纪中期 mid-20th century加强棉花中期管理 strengthen the mid-period management of cotton growth 2.时期的长短在长期和短期之间 medium term：中期贷款 medium-term loan

中果皮
中果皮[zhōng guǒ pí] 果实的中间一层果皮，如桃、梅等多汁可以吃的部分就是中果皮 mesocarp; middle fleshy layer of a fruit, such as the edible flesh of a peach, plum, etc.

中枢
中枢[zhōng shū] 在一事物系统中起总的主导作用的部分 centre; backbone; hub：电讯中枢 telecommunications centre交通中枢 transportation hub

中枢神经
中枢神经[zhōng shū shén jīng] 神经系统的主要部分，包括脑和脊髓，主管全身感觉运动和条件反射、非条件反射等 central nervous system,including the brain and spinal cord, governing body and sensory movements, conditioned and non-conditioned reflexes, etc.另见  脑 nǎo and 脊髓 jǐsuǐ

中标
中标[zhòng biāo] 投标得中 get the bid; win the tender：第一建筑公司夺魁中标。The First Building Company got the tender.

中栏
中栏[zhōng lán] 男女径赛项目之一，规定距离为400米，男子所用栏架高91.4厘米，女子为76.2厘米 intermediate hurdles; 400m track event with 91.4cm-high hurdles for men, and 76.2cm-high hurdles for women

中校
中校[zhōng xiào] 军衔，低于上校，高于少校 (military rank) (US & Brit. Army, US Air Force, US Marine Corps & Royal Marines) lieutenant colonel; (US & Royal Navy) commander; (Royal Air Force) wing commander

中档
中档[zhōng dàng]质量中等，价格适中的（商品）(of a commodity) of middling quality and price：中档茶叶 tea of average quality and price

中楷
中楷[zhōng kǎi] 手写的不大不小的楷体汉字 regular script of medium-sized Chinese characters

中止
中止[zhōng zhǐ]（做事）中途停止 (of work or activity) discontinue; suspend; abate; cease：中止比赛 suspend the game刚做了一半就中止了。The work was suspended halfway.

中正
中正[zhōng zhèng]〈书 fml.〉公正；公平 equity; impartiality; justice

中毒
中毒[zhòng dú]医学上指人或动物由于毒物进入体内而发生组织破坏、生理机能障碍或死亡等现象。症状是恶心，呕吐，腹泻，头痛，眩晕，呼吸急促，瞳孔异常等。poisoning; toxication; toxicosis; (of a person or animal who suffers from) tissue impairment, physiological obstruction or death caused by poison or a toxic substance, characterized by nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, headache, fainting, breathlessness, pupillary abnormality, etc.

中气
中气[zhōng qì]1.太阳每年在黄道上移动360°，从冬至起，每隔30°为一中气。农历把一年二十四节气分为节气和中气两种，雨水、春分、谷雨、小满、夏至、大暑、处暑、秋分、霜降、小雪、冬至、大寒为十二个中气。12 of the 24 solar terms; Every year the sun moves 360 degrees along the ecliptic, with every 30 degrees as a division（中气 zhongqi）starting with the Winter Solstice. According to traditional Chinese lunar calendar, a year is divided into 24 solar terms, with 12 jieqi（节气）, and 12 zhongqi, which are Rain Water, Vernal Equinox, Grain Rain, Small Fullness of Grain, Summer Solstice, Great Heat, Decline of Heat, Autumnal Equinox, Frost's Descent, Small Snow, Winter Solstice and Great Cold. 2.〈中医 Chin. med.〉指中焦脾胃之气，对食物的消化、身体的营养，都有作用 vitality of the cavity between the diaphragm and the umbilicus, housing the spleen, stomach, etc., which facilitates digestion and nutrition 3.戏曲演唱上指呼吸量，唱的时候呼吸量大，能够自由控制，叫做中气足 (in the singing of traditional Chinese opera) volume of breath. If a performer's singing is sufficient in breath and control, he is considered as having enough volume of breath.

中水
中水[zhōng shuǐ]经过处理的生活污水、工业废水、雨水等，水质介于清洁水和污水之间。可以用来灌溉田地、冲洗厕所、回补地下水等。recycled water; water recovered by treating domestic sewage, industrial waste water, rainwater, etc., the quality of which is between clean water and sewage, and which can be used to irrigate farmland, clean toilets, refill groundwater, etc.亦 also 再生水 zàishēngshuǐ

中波
中波[zhōng bō]波长3,000米-200米的无线电波(频率100-1,500千赫)。以地波和天波的方式传播，用于无线电广播和电报通讯等方面。medium wave; radio wave of medium length between 3,000-200 m., with frequency between 100-1,500 kHz. Medium-wave broadcast is transmitted by means of surface waves and airwaves, and used for radio and telegraph communication, etc.

中流
中流[zhōng liú]1.水流的中央 midstream：中流砥柱 tower of strength; mainstay 2. 同 same as 中游 zhōngyóu：长江中流 middle reaches of the Yangtze River 3. 同 same as 中等 zhōngděng：中流社会 middle society

中流砥柱
中流砥柱[zhōng liú Dǐ zhù]〈比喻 fig.〉坚强的、能起支柱作用的人或集体，就像立在黄河激流中的砥柱山（在三门峡）一样 (of a person or group) be an unyielding support just like Mount Dizhu (in the Sanmen Gorge), standing firm in the torrents of the Yellow River; tower of strength; mainstay

中游
中游[zhōng yóu]1.河流中介于上游与下游之间的一段 middle reaches (of a river) 2.〈比喻 fig.〉所处的地位不前不后；所达到的水平不高不低 (of a rank or level) middling; so-so; mediocre：要力争上游，不能甘居中游。Strive for the upper rungs of the ladder, and don't settle for a mediocre position.

中灶
中灶[zhōng zào]集体伙食的标准中的第二级（区别于‘大灶’、‘小灶’as compared with ‘mess’ and ‘special mess’ for ranking officials）canteen for medium-ranking officials

中焦
中焦[zhōng jiāo]〈中医 Chin. med.〉指胃的上下口之间的一段，主要功能是管消化 middle warmer; middle burner; part of the stomach that spans the upper and lower openings, with digestion as its major function

中班
中班[zhōng bān] 幼儿园里由四周岁至五周岁的儿童所编成的班级 middle class in a kindergarten (composed of children four or five years old)

中用
中用[zhōng yòng]顶事；有用（多用于否定 oft. used in the negative）of use; useful：这点事情都办不好，真不中用。Messing up such a small task, you're really useless.

中看
中看[zhōng kàn] 看起来很好 pleasing to the eye; presentable：中看不中吃 look good but taste bad; be pleasing to the eye but not to the tongue

中短波
中短波[zhōng duǎn bō] 波长200米-50米（频率1,500-6,000千赫）的无线电波，以地波和天波的方式传播，用于无线电广播和电报通讯等方面 intermediate wave; medium-short wave; radio wave of intermediate length between 200 m. and 50 m., with a frequency between 1,500-6,000 kHz. Medium-short-wave broadcast is transmitted through surface waves and airwaves, and used for radio and telegraph communication, etc.

中石器时代
中石器时代[Zhōng shí qì Shí dài]旧石器时代和新石器时代之间的石器时代。这时人类使用的工具以打制石器为主，并发明了弓箭。Mesolithic Period; Middle Stone Age; cultural period of the Stone Age between the Palaeolithic and Neolithic periods, marked by the emergence of microlithic tools, bows and arrows

中秋
中秋[Zhōng qiū] 我国传统节日，在农历八月十五日，这一天有赏月、吃月饼的风俗 Mid-Autumn Festival, which falls on the 15th day of the 8th lunar month, when people observe such customs as enjoying the bright full moon and eating moon cakes

中稻
中稻[zhōng dào] 插秧期或生长期和成熟期比早稻稍晚的稻子 semi-late rice; middle-season rice

中立
中立[zhōng lì] 处于两个对立的政治力量之间，不倾向于任何一方 neutral; cross-bench; nonaligned：严守中立 observe strict neutrality

中立国
中立国[zhōng lì guó]1.指在国际战争中奉行中立政策的国家，它对交战国任何一方不采取敌视行为，也不帮助 neutral nation; nation nonaligned with either side in a war 2.由国际条约保证，永远不跟其他国家作战，也不承担任何可以间接把它拖入战争的国际义务的国家 neutral nation that has signed an international treaty never to start a war with any other country, nor take on any international obligations that may indirectly involve it in a war

中等
中等[zhōng děng]1.等级介于上等、下等之间或高等、初等之间的 medium; moderate; middling; average; secondary：中等货 goods of average quality or price中等教育 secondary education; secondary school education 2.不高不矮的（指身材）(of a person) of medium height：中等个儿 be of medium height

中等教育
中等教育[zhōng děng jiào yù] 在初等教育的基础上，培养学生全面发展，或培养学生具有某类专业知识的教育 secondary education; secondary school education designed for the all-round development of students or training them in certain professional know-how

中策
中策[zhōng cè] 不及上策而胜过下策的计策或办法 second best plan or method

中签
中签[zhòng qiān]分期还本的公债券号码跟用抽签办法得出的本期还本的公债券号码相同。中签的公债券可以领取本息。be the lucky number; process in which the number of a treasury bond is chosen at random and the person who gets the chosen number is repaid with the principal and interest

中篇小说
中篇小说[zhōng piān xiǎo shuō] 篇幅介于长篇和短篇小说之间的小说，叙述不很铺张，但是可以对社会生活作广泛的描写 novelette; novella; medium-length novel with limited length of narration but a broad depiction of social life

中级
中级[zhōng jí] 介于高级和初级之间的 intermediate; mid-level：中级人民法院 intermediate people's court

中线
中线[zhōng xiàn]1.三角形的一顶点与对边中点的连线 median; line drawn from an angle of a triangle to the middle of the opposite side 2.球场中间画的一条横线，是双方的界限 (in football) halfway line; (in basketball and volleyball) centre line

中继站
中继站[zhōng jì zhàn]1.在运输线中途设立的转运站 (in transport) relay point; relay station 2.在无线电通讯中，设置在发射点与接收点中间的工作站，作用是把接收的信号放大后再发射出去 (in radio telecommunications) relay station; workstation set up between a transmitting station and a receiving station, which acts to amplify the strength of a transmitted signal and relay it

中继线
中继线[zhōng jì xiàn]接在各个电话交换台之间的导线。例如电话局各个分局之间的连接线、电话局和使用单位总机的连接线以及长途电话局和市内电话局之间的连接线。relay line; junction line; line connecting switchboards, such as any of the connection lines between various branches of a telephone exchange service, between the telephone exchange service and its client units, and between the long distance telephone exchange and the local telephone exchange

中缝
中缝[zhōng fèng]1.报纸左右两版之间的狭长的部分，有的报纸在这里刊登广告或启事等 column on the folding line of a newspaper (reserved for advertisements, notices, etc.) 2.木版书每一页中间的狭长部分，折叠起来是书口 middle strip in the page of a woodblock book, which can be folded to become the fore-edge 3.衣服背部中间的竖缝 line sewn down the middle of the back of a jacket

中考
中考[zhōng kǎo] 高中和高中程度专科学校招收新生的考试 senior middle school or senior middle technical school entrance examination

中耕
中耕[zhōng gēng] 作物生长期中，在植株之间进行锄草、松土叫做中耕 weeding and scarification between crop plants during growth; intertill

中耳
中耳[zhōng ěr]外耳和内耳之间的部分，内有三块互相连接的听骨（锤骨、砧骨和镫骨）eardrum; middle ear; tympanum; space between the outer and inner ear that contains the three auditory ossicles (malleus, anvil and stapes)

中肯
中肯[zhòng kěn]（言论）抓住要点；正中要害 (of a statement or speech) hit the nail on the head; relevant; pertinent; to the point：他的话很中肯。What he said hit the nail right on the head.

中脑
中脑[zhōng nǎo] 脑的一部分，在大脑与后脑之间，包括四叠体和大脑脚，主要作用是纠正身体姿势和掌握头部转动方向 mesencephalon; midbrain; middle portion of the brain between the cerebrum and hindbrain, comprising the corpora quadrigemina and cerebral peduncle, which mainly serves to rectify body posture and direct head movement

中药
中药[zhōng yào] 中医所用的药物，以植物为最多，但也包括动物和矿物 traditional Chinese medicine, generally referring to herbs and plants, but also including animal and mineral substances

中落
中落[zhōng luò]（家境）由盛到衰 (of family fortunes) decline; ebb：家道中落。The family is on the decline.

中表
中表[zhōng biǎo] 跟祖父、父亲的姐妹的子女的亲戚关系，或跟祖母、母亲的兄弟姐妹的子女的亲戚关系 cousins; any children of one's grandfather's or father's sisters, or children of one's grandmother's or mother's sisters or brothers

中装
中装[zhōng zhuāng]中国旧式服装（区别于‘中山装、西装’等 as compared with ‘Sun Yat-sen uniform’ and ‘Western suits’, etc.）traditional Chinese clothing

中西
中西[zhōng xī] 中国和西洋 Chinese and Western：中西合璧 mixture of Chinese and Western styles中西医结合 combine traditional Chinese and Western medicine; combination of traditional Chinese medicine and Western medicine

中词
中词[zhōng cí] 三段论中大前提和小前提所共有的名词 middle term (a term common to both the major premise and minor premise in a syllogism)另见  三段论 sānduànlùn

中跑
中跑[zhōng pǎo]中距离赛跑。包括男子800米、1,500米、3,000米，女子800米、1,500米。middle-distance race (including men's 800m., 1,500m. and 3,000m. races, and women's 800m. and 1,500m. races)

中路
中路[zhōng lù]（～儿 zhōnglùr）质量中等；普通 (of goods) of middling quality; mediocre：中路货 mediocre goods

中路梆子
中路梆子[zhōng lù bāng zi] 同 same as 晋剧 jìnjù

中转
中转[zhōng zhuǎn]1.交通部门指中途转换交通运输工具 transit; change from one station, route, etc. to another on a journey：中转旅客 transfer passengers 2.中间转手 change hands：产销直接挂钩，减少中转环节。A direct channel should be established between production and sales so as to cut down on intermediate links.

中辍
中辍[zhōng chuò]（事情）中途停止进行 cease mid-course; stop (doing sth.) halfway; give up halfway：学业中辍 leave school (before graduation); drop out of school; discontinue one's studies

中选
中选[zhòng xuǎn] 选举或选择时被选上 be chosen; be selected

中途
中途[zhōng tú] 半路 halfway; midway：在回家的中途下开了大雨。He was caught in a heavy rain on his way home.他原先是学建筑工程的，中途又改行搞起地质来了。At first he studied architecture, but later switched to geology.

中道
中道[zhōng dào]1.半路；中途 halfway; midway：中道而废 give up halfway; leave sth. unfinished 2.〈书 fml.〉中庸之道 golden mean; happy medium; middle of the road另见  中庸 zhōngyōng

中锋
中锋[zhōng fēng] 篮球、足球等球类比赛的前锋之一，位置在中间 (as in basketball, football, etc.) centre forward; centre

中间
中间[zhōng jiān]1.里面 among; between：那些树中间有半数是李树。Half of those trees are plum trees. 2. 同 same as 中心 zhōngxīn：湖底像锅底，越到中间越深。The bottom of a lake is like a cauldron, getting deeper towards the centre. 3.在事物两端之间或两个事物之间的位置 between：地球走到太阳和月亮中间就发生月食。When the earth moves between the sun and the moon there will be lunar eclipse.从我家到工厂，中间要换车。I have to change buses to go from my home to the factory.

中间人
中间人[zhōng jiān rén] 同 same as 中人 zhōngrén ①

中间儿
中间儿[zhōng jiān r] 同 same as 中间 zhōngjiān

中间派
中间派[zhōng jiān pài]指动摇于两个对立的政治力量之间的派别。有时也指中间派的人。middle-of-the-roader; fence-sitter

中队
中队[zhōng duì]1.队伍编制，由若干小队（分队）组成，属大队管辖 detachment; unit composed of a number of squads (or branches), under the control of a brigade 2.军队中相当于连的一级组织 squadron; military unit corresponding to a company

中雨
中雨[zhōng yǔ] 指24小时内雨量达10-25毫米的雨 moderate rain (with a precipitation of 10-25mm. in 24 hours)

中雪
中雪[zhōng xuě] 指24小时内雪量达2.5-5毫米的雪 moderate snowfall (a snowfall of 2.5-5mm. in 24 hours)

中频
中频[zhōng pín]1.在超外差收音机中，把射频信号变成预定信号，以便放大，这个预定信号叫做中频 intermediate frequency; predetermined frequency in a superheterodyne receiver, into which signals carried by radio frequency change before they are amplified 2.指300-3,000千赫范围内的频率 frequency between 300-3,000 kHz.

中风
中风[zhòng fēng] 患中风 (zhòngfēng) 病 have a stroke亦 also 卒中 cùzhòng中风[zhòng fēng]病，多由脑血栓、脑溢血等引起。初起时突然头痛，眩晕，短时间内失去知觉。得病后半身不遂或截瘫，严重时很快死亡。apoplexy; stroke; palsy; disease oft. caused by cerebral thrombosis, cerebral haemorrhage, etc., with early symptoms characterized by sudden headache, fainting and temporary loss of consciousness; victims may suffer hemiplegia or paralysis, or even die in severe cases; 亦 also 卒中 cùzhòng

中餐
中餐[zhōng cān]中国式的饭菜（区别于‘西餐’as compared with ‘Western food’）Chinese cuisine; Chinese food

中饭
中饭[zhōng fàn] 午饭 midday meal; lunch

中饱
中饱[zhōng bǎo] 经手钱财，以欺诈手段从中取利 swindle money entrusted to one's care; embezzle：贪污中饱 embezzle中饱私囊 feather one's nest; line one's pockets

中馈
中馈[zhōng kuì]〈书 fml.〉1.指妇女在家里主管的饮食等事 cooking attended to by a housewife：主中馈 do the cooking 2.借指妻 wife：中馈犹虚（没有妻室）(of a man) be unmarried

丰
丰1[fēng]（ㄈㄥ）（豐）1.丰富 rich; abundant; plentiful：丰满 full; plentiful丰盛 rich; abundant; lavish; sumptuous丰收 bumper harvest; big harvest丰衣足食 have ample food and clothing; be well-fed and well-clad 2.大 great：丰碑 monument; monumental work丰功伟绩 magnificent exploits and great feats 3.(Fēng) 姓 a surname丰2[fēng]（ㄈㄥ）美好的容貌和姿态 good looks; graceful carriage：丰采 graceful bearing丰姿 elegant demeanour丰韵 graceful bearing相关词组咸丰 | 打抽丰 | 人寿年丰 | 羽毛未丰丰碑 | 丰采 | 丰产 | 丰登 | 丰富 | 丰厚 | 丰满 | 丰茂 | 丰美 | 丰年 | 丰沛 | 丰饶 | 丰润 | 丰赡 | 丰盛 | 丰收 | 丰硕 | 丰盈 | 丰腴 | 丰裕 | 丰韵 | 丰姿 | 丰足 | 丰功伟绩 | 丰衣足食

丰产
丰产[fēng chǎn] 农业上指比一般产量高 high yield; bumper crop：丰产田 high-yield cropland丰产经验 experience in reaping bumper harvests

丰功伟绩
丰功伟绩[fēng gōng wěi jì] 伟大的功绩 glorious exploits and feats; signal or monumental contributions亦 also 丰功伟业 fēng gōng wěi yè

丰厚
丰厚[fēng hòu]1.多而厚实 rich and thick：海狸的皮绒毛丰厚。Beaver (fur) is rich and thick. 2.丰富；多 rich and generous：收入丰厚 handsome income丰厚的礼品 generous gift

丰姿
丰姿[fēng zī] 同 same as 风姿 fēngzī

丰富
丰富[fēng fù]1.（物质财富、学识经验等）种类多或数量大 (of material wealth, learning, experience, etc.) rich; plentiful; abundant; wealthy：物产丰富 large variety of products丰富多彩 rich and varied; luxuriant and colourful丰富的知识 rich knowledge 2.使丰富 enrich：开展文体活动，丰富业余生活 develop cultural and sports activities to enrich one's leisure time通过实践，丰富工作经验 enrich one's working experience through practice

丰年
丰年[fēng nián] 农作物丰收的年头儿 bumper harvest year; year of abundance; good year：瑞雪兆丰年。A timely snow foretells a bumper harvest.

丰收
丰收[fēng shōu] 收成好（跟‘歉收’相对 as opposed to‘crop failure’or‘bad harvest’）bumper harvest; big harvest：丰收年 bumper harvest year粮食丰收 reap a bumper grain harvest今年的文艺创作获得丰收。There have been many outstanding artistic and literary creations this year.

丰沛
丰沛[fēng pèi]（雨水）充足 (of rain) plentiful; abundant

丰润
丰润[fēng rùn]（肌肤等）丰满滋润 (of skin, flesh, etc.) plump and smooth：两颊丰润 smooth, round cheeks

丰满
丰满[fēng mǎn]1.充足 full; plentiful：今年好收成，囤里的粮食都很丰满。The granaries are full this year from a bumper harvest. 2.（身体或身体的一部分）胖得匀称好看 (of the body or part of it) full and rounded; well-developed; full-grown：他比去年生病的时候丰满多了。He has put on weight and looks much better than last year when he was ill.

丰登
丰登[fēng dēng] 丰收 bumper harvest：五谷丰登 abundant harvest of all crops; bumper grain harvest

丰盈
丰盈[fēng yíng]1.（身体）丰满 (of the body) full; well developed：体态丰盈 full (or well-rounded) figure 2.富裕；丰富 rich; plentiful：衣食丰盈 ample food and clothing; have enough to spare

丰盛
丰盛[fēng shèng]丰富（指物质方面）(of materials) rich; abundant; lavish; sumptuous：丰盛的酒席 lavish feast; sumptuous banquet

丰硕
丰硕[fēng shuò]（果实）又多又大（多用于抽象事物 oft. in the abstract）(of fruits) plentiful and large; abundant; rich：丰硕的成果 rich reward; great success

丰碑
丰碑[fēng bēi] 高大的石碑 tall stone tablet；〈比喻 fig.〉不朽的杰作或伟大的功绩 imperishable masterpiece or great achievement：历史的丰碑 historical monument

丰美
丰美[fēng měi] 多而好 lush：丰美的食品 plentiful and delicious food水草丰美的牧场 lush pasture

丰腴
丰腴[fēng yú]1. 同 same as 丰盈 fēngyíng ①; 2.多而好 rich; plentiful; abundant; fertile：丰腴的酒席 sumptuous feast牧场水草丰腴 lush (or rich) pasture land

丰茂
丰茂[fēng mào] 茂盛；茂密 luxuriant; lush; profuse：树木丛生，百草丰茂 thick trees and luxuriant grass大树长出了丰茂的枝叶。The big tree has put out rich piles of foliage.

丰衣足食
丰衣足食[fēng yī zú shí] 形容生活富裕 well-fed and well-clad; ample food and clothing; be well off

丰裕
丰裕[fēng yù] 富裕；富足 in plenty; well provided for：生活丰裕 live in plenty; be comfortably off

丰赡
丰赡[fēng shàn]〈书 fml.〉丰富；充足 rich; abundant; plentiful：内容丰赡 rich in content

丰足
丰足[fēng zú] 富裕；充足 plentiful; abundant：衣食丰足 plentiful food and clothing

丰采
丰采[fēng cǎi] 同 same as 风采 fēngcǎi ①

丰韵
丰韵[fēng yùn] 同 same as 风韵 fēngyùn

丰饶
丰饶[fēng ráo] 富饶 rich and fertile：物产丰饶 rich and fertile in products辽阔丰饶的大平原 wide, rich and fertile plain

丱
丱[guàn]（ㄍㄨㄢˋ）〈书 fml.〉形容儿童束发成两角的样子 child's hair bunched into two horns

串
串[chuàn]（ㄔㄨㄢˋ）1.连贯 string together：贯串 run through串讲 explain a text sentence by sentence; summarize an article or a book 2.（串儿 chuànr）〈量词 classifier〉用于连贯起来的东西 string：一串珍珠 a string of pearls两串儿糖葫芦 two skewers of caramel haws 3.勾结（做坏事）conspire：串供 collude so as to cover each other when under interrogation串骗 plot to cheat 4.错误地连接 connect wrongly：电话串线 (of telephone lines) get crossed字印得太密，容易看串行。The print is so tight it's easy to skip lines. 5.由这里到那里走动 go from one place to another：串亲戚 go visiting relatives到处乱串 run about串街游乡 rove from village to village 6.担任戏曲角色 play a role in a theatric performance：客串 perform as an amateur or guest actor反串 play a role that is not one's specialty串演 act相关词组反串 | 贯串 | 客串 | 钱串子 | 一连串串案 | 串供 | 串花 | 串换 | 串讲 | 串联 | 串铃 | 串门 | 串皮 | 串骗 | 串气 | 串通 | 串味 | 串戏 | 串线 | 串烟 | 串演 | 串游 | 串珠 | 串子 | 串亲戚 | 串秧儿 | 串通一气

串亲戚
串亲戚[chuàn qīn qi] 到亲戚家看望 call on a relative亦 also 串亲 chuànqīn

串供
串供[chuàn gòng] 互相串通，捏造口供 (of suspects) collude to make consistent confessions：犯人串供。The criminals colluded to make their confessions tally.

串味
串味[chuàn wèi]（～儿 chuàn∥wèir）食品、饮料等同其他有特殊气味的物品放在一起，染上特殊气味 (of foods, drinks, etc.) taint; be tainted by a special smell from close contact with：茶叶切勿与化妆品放在一起，以免串味。Don't store tea with cosmetics to avoid tainting.

串子
串子[chuàn zi] 连贯起来的东西 stringed things：钱串子 a string of coppers (money used in old times each with a hole in the centre)

串戏
串戏[chuàn xì] 演戏，特指非专业演员参加专业剧团演戏 act, especially of an amateur actor playing a part in a professional performance

串换
串换[chuàn huàn]（互相）掉换 exchange：串换优良品种 exchange fine breeds or strains

串案
串案[chuàn àn] 同一系统或单位的人串通一起所作的案 conspiracy; case of crime committed by a number of people of the same affiliation or profession in close collaboration

串气
串气[chuàn qì] 互通声气；串通 keep one another informed; collude：暗中串气 connive in secret

串游
串游[chuàn you] 闲逛；散步 stroll; take a walk：四处串游 idle about

串演
串演[chuàn yǎn] 扮演 act：早年间，她在《天河配》里串演过织女。In her early years she played the role of the Weaving Girl in The Herd Boy and the Weaving Girl.

串烟
串烟[chuàn yān] 用柴灶做饭时，饭菜因受烟熏而有烟味 (of food) tainted with the smell of smoke from burning firewood in a traditional Chinese cooking stove

串珠
串珠[chuàn zhū] 成串的珠子 stringed beads

串皮
串皮[chuàn pí] 指药物或酒类等进入人体后，作用散布到周身皮肤，使皮肤发痒或变红 (of medicine or alcoholic drink) cause the skin to itch or redden

串秧儿
串秧儿[chuàn yāng r] 不同品种的动物或植物杂交，改变原来的品种 (of animals or plants of different species) cross-breed; hybridize

串线
串线[chuàn xiàn] 不同的线路相互连通 (of different lines) linked together：电话串线了。The telephone lines got crossed.

串联
串联[chuàn lián]1.一个一个地联系；为了共同行动，进行联系 link one by one; establish ties for concerted action：串联几户乡亲合办了一个养鸡场。Several villagers pooled their efforts and money to set up a chicken farm. 2.把几个电器或元器件一个接一个相继联接起来，电路中的电流顺次通过，这种联接方法叫串联 series connection; connecting several electric appliances or parts together sequentially so as to allow electric current to run through them one by one亦 also 串连 chuànlián

串花
串花[chuàn huā] 不同品种的作物进行有性杂交，一般指天然杂交 (of different species of plants) sexual or natural hybridization

串讲
串讲[chuàn jiǎng]1.语文教学中逐字逐句解释课文的意思 (in teaching the Chinese language) explain a text sentence by sentence 2.一篇文章或一本书分段学习后，再把整个内容连贯起来做概括的讲述 sum up an article or book after teaching it by the paragraph or section

串通
串通[chuàn tōng]1.暗中勾结，使彼此言语行动互相配合 conspire：串通一气 work hand in glove 2.串联；联系 establish a tie; connect：两家结亲的事，已由老村长串通妥当。The old village head has arranged for a marriage between the two families.

串通一气
串通一气[chuàn tōng yī qì] 暗中勾结，互相配合 hand in glove：他们俩串通一气来算计我。The two of them plotted against me.

串铃
串铃[chuàn líng]1.中空的金属环，装金属球，可以套在手上，摇动发声，走江湖给人算命、看病的人多用来招揽顾客 (in old times) a hollow metal ring containing metal balls, that ring worn on the wrist by a fortune-teller or an itinerant doctor, shaken to attract customers 2.连成串的铃铛，多挂在骡马等的脖子上 string of bells hung around the neck of a horse, mule, etc.

串门
串门[chuàn mén]（～儿 chuàn∥ménr）到别人家去闲坐聊天儿 stop by other people's home to chat：老太太好到四邻串个门儿。The old lady likes to visit her neighbours to chat.亦 also 串门子 chuànmén·zi

串骗
串骗[chuàn piàn] 互相串通，进行诈骗 conspire in a fraud; collude to cheat

临
临[lín]（ㄌㄧㄣˊ）（臨）1.靠近；对着 face; overlook; confront; be close to：临街 be close to the street; overlook or face the street临河 face the river; overlook the river背山临水 with the mountain behind and the water in front居高临下 occupy a commanding position or height如临大敌 be heavily guarded as if faced with a formidable foe 2.来到；到达 arrive; be present：光临 presence (of a guest, etc.)莅临 arrive; be present身临其境 be personally on the scene双喜临门。A double blessing has descended upon the house. 3.将要；快要 about to; going to; on the point of; just before：临别 at parting; just before parting临睡 before going to bed; just before sleeping临产 about to give birth; parturient这是我临离开北京的时候买的。I bought this just before leaving Beijing. 4.照着字画模仿 copy (a model of calligraphy or painting)：临摹 copy (a work of calligraphy or painting)临帖 practise calligraphy after a model临画 copy a painting 5.(Lín) 姓 a surname相关词组濒临 | 登临 | 光临 | 惠临 | 驾临 | 降临 | 君临 | 来临 | 莅临 | 面临 | 迫临 | 亲临 | 照临 | 兵临城下 | 居高临下临别 | 临产 | 临场 | 临池 | 临床 | 临到 | 临风 | 临机 | 临街 | 临界 | 临近 | 临了 | 临门 | 临摹 | 临盆 | 临蓐 | 临时 | 临帖 | 临头 | 临危 | 临刑 | 临月 | 临战 | 临阵 | 临终 | 临渴掘井 | 临深履薄 | 临时代办 | 临危受命 | 临危授命 | 临渊羡鱼 | 临阵磨枪 | 临阵脱逃 | 临终关怀

临了
临了[lín liǎo]（～儿 línliǎor）到最后；到末了 finally; at last; in the end：临了还是决定由老王执笔。In the end, Lao Wang was asked to write it down.亦 also 临末了儿 línmòliǎor

临产
临产[lín chǎn]（孕妇）快要生小孩儿 (of a pregnant woman) about to give birth; parturient; about to deliver

临刑
临刑[lín xíng] 将要受死刑 just before execution

临别
临别[lín bié] 将要分别 at parting; just before parting：临别赠言 parting advice; words of advice at parting临别纪念 parting souvenir; sth. to remember someone by

临到
临到[lín dào]1.接近到（某件事情）just before; on the point of; about to：临到开会，我才准备好。I finished my preparations just as the meeting was about to begin. 2.（事情）落到（身上）befall; happen to：这事临到他的头上，他会有办法。Should this happen to him, he will find a solution.

临危
临危[lín wēi]1.（人）病重将死 be in critical condition; be dying (of serious illness)：这是他临危时留下的话。These are his dying words. 2.面临生命的危险 face death or deadly peril; be in the hour of danger：临危不惧 face danger fearlessly; be courageous in the face of danger; betray no fear in the hour of danger

临危受命
临危受命[lín wēi shòu mìng] 在危难之时接受任命 be entrusted with a mission at a critical juncture; take on a mission in time of danger

临危授命
临危授命[lín wēi shòu mìng] 在危亡关头勇于献出生命 lay down one's life at a critical moment; sacrifice oneself for the greater good：临危授命，视死如归 lay down one's life at a crucial juncture and face death without flinching

临场
临场[lín chǎng]1.在考场参加考试；在竞赛场地参加竞赛 sit an examination (in specific location); enter a competition (in a competition venue)：缺乏临场经验 lack field experience临场要沉着镇静。It's important to remain calm and cool-headed during a competition or an examination. 2.亲自到现场 be personally present：临场指导 render on-the-spot guidance

临头
临头[lín tóu]（为难或不幸的事情）落到身上 (of embarrassment or misfortune) befall; happen; be imminent：大祸临头 faced with imminent disaster事到临头，要沉住气。Now the crisis is impending; one must keep calm.

临帖
临帖[lín tiè] 照着字帖练习写字（多指毛笔字 usu. brush calligraphy）practise calligraphy by following a model

临床
临床[lín chuáng] 医学上称医生给病人诊断和治疗疾病 (med.) clinical; (of a doctor) diagnosis and treatment of patients：临床经验 clinical experience临床教学 clinic; clinical instruction

临战
临战[lín zhàn] 临近或到了战斗、比赛的时候 on the eve of battle or competition; just before battle or competition：临战的气氛十分浓厚。There was great anticipation on the eve of the contest.进入防汛临战状态 be in a state of readiness to prevent and combat flooding运动员以临战的姿态投入赛前训练。The athletes plunged into pre-competition training combat ready.

临摹
临摹[lín mó] 模仿书画 copy (a model of calligraphy or painting)：临摹碑帖 copy a rubbing from a stone inscription

临时
临时[lín shí]1.临到事情发生的时候 moment when sth. happens：临时抱佛脚 embrace the Buddha's feet in one's hour of need - seek help at the last moment or the eleventh hour; make a frantic last-minute effort事先准备好，省得临时着急。Advance preparation helps avoid any last-minute rush. 2.暂时；短期 temporary; provisional; interim; for a short time：临时工 temporary worker; casual labourer; odd jobber; fill-in临时政府 provisional or interim government临时借用一下，明天就还。Let me borrow it awhile, and return it tomorrow.

临时代办
临时代办[lín shí dài bàn] 临时代理大使职务的外交官员 chargé d'affaires ad interim; diplomat temporarily acting for the ambassador

临月
临月[lín yuè]（～儿 línyuèr）妇女怀孕足月，到了产期 date when a baby is due; month when a baby is due after full-term pregnancy

临机
临机[lín jī]掌握时机（行动）(take action) as the occasion requires; on the spur of the moment：临机应变 be resourceful; act according to circumstances; adapt to changing circumstances; suit one's actions to changing conditions; cope with any contingency临机立断 make a quick or prompt decision at the right moment临机制胜 defeat one's opponent in timely fashion

临池
临池[lín chí]〈书 fml.〉相传汉朝有名的书法家张芝，在水池旁边练习写字，经常用池水洗砚台，使一池子的水都变黑了。后人因此称练习书法为临池。practise calligraphy; learn to write a good hand. Legend has it that Zhang Zhi, a famous calligrapher of the Han Dynasty, liked to practise calligraphy by a pond, and often washed his inkslab in the pond, turning it black. The term has since come to mean ‘practise calligraphy’.

临深履薄
临深履薄[lín shēn lǚ bó]《诗经·小雅·小旻》：‘战战兢兢，如临深渊，如履薄冰’。后用‘临深履薄’比喻谨慎戒惧。The Book of Songs·Odes·Angry Heaven: On the brink of a vale;/ I tremble twice or thrice/As if treading on thin ice; (fig.) with great caution and care

临渊羡鱼
临渊羡鱼[lín yuān xiàn yú]《汉书·董仲舒传》：‘临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网’。后用‘临渊羡鱼’比喻只有愿望，不去实干，就无济于事。History of Han·Biography of Dong Zhongshu: ‘Better to return home and make a net than to stand by the pond longing for fish.’ (fig.)It is useless to dream without taking action.

临渴掘井
临渴掘井[lín kě jué jǐng] 感到渴了才掘井 dig a well only when one is thirsty;〈比喻 fig.〉平时没有准备，事到临头才想办法 be unprepared; wait until the last moment; start acting too late

临界
临界[lín jiè] 由一种状态或物理量转变为另一种状态或物理量的 critical; crisis; point at which a state or physical mass changes：临界点 critical point; breakthrough point; point of transition临界角 critical angle

临盆
临盆[lín pén] 同 same as 临产 línchǎn

临终
临终[lín zhōng]人将要死（指时间）on one's deathbed; just before death; last moments：临终遗言 last words; dying will; last dying words

临终关怀
临终关怀[lín zhōng guān huái] 对将要死亡的病人给予心理和生理上的关心照顾，使减轻痛苦，平静地度过人生的最后时间 hospice care; taking care of a dying patient physically and psychologically, so as to reduce his pain and help him live his last days peacefully

临蓐
临蓐[lín rù] 同 same as 临产 línchǎn

临街
临街[lín jiē] 对着街道；靠着街道 face or overlook the street; be close to the street：临街的窗口 window overlooking or facing the street这三间平房临街。These three single-storey houses face the street.临街有三棵柳树。There are three willow trees along the street.

临近
临近[lín jìn]（时间、地区）靠近；接近 (of time or region) close to; close on; proximity：春节临近了。The Spring Festival is drawing near.他住在临近太湖的一所疗养院里。He lives in a sanatorium close to the Taihu Lake.

临门
临门[lín mén]1.来到家门 arrive at the door; on the doorstep：贵客临门。The distinguished guest has arrived.双喜临门。A double blessing has descended upon the house. 2.到达球门前 at the goal：临门一脚 shot on goal

临阵
临阵[lín zhèn]1.临近阵地；临近战斗的时候 on the battlefield; on the eve of battle; at a critical moment：临阵脱逃 desert on the eve of battle; turn tail in the face of danger; sneak away at a critical juncture临阵磨枪 sharpen one's spear just before going into battle; make last-minute preparation; take action in great haste 2.指实地参加战斗 join in actual fighting; fight in the field：临阵指挥 field command他有多年的临阵经验。He has many years of actual battle experience.

临阵磨枪
临阵磨枪[lín zhèn mó qiāng] 到了阵前才磨枪 sharpen one's spear just before going into battle;〈比喻 fig.〉事到临头才做准备 start preparations at the last moment; take action in great haste

临阵脱逃
临阵脱逃[lín zhèn tuō táo]军人临作战时逃跑。也比喻事到临头而退缩逃避。desert on the eve of battle; (fig) turn tail in the face of danger; sneak away at a critical juncture; leave in the lurch

临风
临风[lín fēng]〈书 fml.〉当风；迎风 facing or against the wind：旌旗临风招展。Banners and flags are streaming in the wind.

丸
丸[wán]（ㄨㄢˊ）1.（丸儿 wánr）球形的小东西 ball; pellet：弹丸 pellet; bullet鱼丸 fishball肉丸 meatball泥丸 mud ball 2.丸药 pill; bolus：丸散膏丹 pills, powder, emplastrums and unguent牛黄清心丸 bezoar sedative bolus 3.〈量词 classifier〉用于丸药 pill; bolus：一丸药 a bolus一次吃三丸 take three pills a time相关词组弹丸 | 蜡丸 | 药丸 | 蜜丸子 | 定心丸 | 摇头丸 | 樟脑丸 | 开心丸儿 | 宽心丸儿丸剂 | 丸药 | 丸子

丸剂
丸剂[wán jì]〈中药或西药 Chin. med. or Western med.〉制剂的一种，把药物研成粉末跟水、蜂蜜或淀粉糊混合团成丸状 bolus; round medicinal preparation made by mixing powdered medicine with water, honey or starch

丸子
丸子[wán zi] 食品，把鱼、肉等剁成碎末，加上作料而团成的丸状物 meatball; round food preparation made by mixing minced fish or meat with starch and seasonings

丸药
丸药[wán yào]〈中医 Chin. med.〉指制成丸剂的药物 pill (or bolus)

丹
丹[dān]（ㄉㄢ）1.红色 red：丹砂 cinnabar丹枫 fiery maple trees 2.依成方制成的颗粒状或粉末状的中药（从前道家炼药多用朱砂，所以称为‘丹’） pellet; powder; Chinese medicine prepared according to a prescription (in former times oft. used by Taoist alchemists, hence called‘dan’)：丸散膏丹 pills, powder, extract and pellets灵丹妙药 wonder drug; panacea 3.指丹砂 cinnabar 4.(Dān) 姓 a surname相关词组蔻丹 | 炼丹 | 牡丹 | 契丹 | 书丹 | 苏丹 | 仙丹 | 果丹皮 | 灵丹妙药 | 阴丹士林丹毒 | 丹方 | 丹青 | 丹砂 | 丹田 | 丹心 | 丹顶鹤 | 丹凤眼

丹凤眼
丹凤眼[dān fèng yǎn] 眼角向上微翘的眼睛 almond-shaped eyes; slanting eyes

丹心
丹心[dān xīn] 赤诚的心 loyal heart; bottom of one's heart; loyalty：一片丹心 sheer loyalty

丹方
丹方[dān fāng]1. 同 same as 单方 dānfāng 2.〈书 fml.〉炼丹的方术 alchemy, art or skill of making magical pellets; home remedy; folk prescription

丹毒
丹毒[dān dú] 病，由丹毒链球菌侵入皮肤的小淋巴管引起。最常发病的部位是面部和小腿。症状是突发高热，病变部分呈片状红斑，疼痛，发热，与正常组织之间界限很清晰。 erysipelas; disease caused by the penetration of erysipelatous streptococcus into the minute lymphatic skin vessels, oft. apparent on the face and calf, characterized by a sudden high fever, localized red inflammation, a burning sensation and an appearance distinct from that of uninfected skin

丹田
丹田[dān tián] 指人体脐下一寸半或三寸的地方 (of a human body) region one and half to three inches below the navel; pubic region：气沉丹田 hold a deep breath down in the abdomen; inhale deeply

丹砂
丹砂[dān shā] 朱砂 cinnabar

丹青
丹青[dān qīng]〈书 fml.〉1.红色和青色的颜料，借指绘画 red and green pigments; a borrowed term for painting：丹青手（画师） painter丹青妙笔 magic touch of an artist擅长丹青 excel in painting 2.指史册；史籍 history scrolls or books; historical records; annals

丹顶鹤
丹顶鹤[dān dǐng hè] 白鹤 red-crested white crane

为
为1[wéi]（ㄨㄟˊ）（為、爲）1.做；作为1  do; act：事在人为。It all depends on human effort.敢作敢为 act with courage and determination; make bold to大有可为 have bright prospects; well worth doing青年有为 young and up-and-coming 2.充当 act as; serve as：选他为代表。He was elected a delegate. 3.变成；成 turn; become：一分为二。A whole divides into two.or Everything tends to divide into two.化为乌有 come to naught; turn to dust变沙漠为良田 turn deserts into farmlands 4.是 be; mean：十寸为一尺。Ten cun equal one chi.为2[wéi]（ㄨㄟˊ）（為、爲）〈介词 prep.〉被（跟‘所’字合用）[used with 所 suǒ in passive voice]：这种艺术形式为广大人民所喜闻乐见。The broad masses of the people love to see and hear this artistic form.为3[wéi]（ㄨㄟˊ）（為、爲）〈书 fml.〉〈助词 aux.〉常跟‘何’相应，表示疑问 [oft. used with 何 hé in a rhetorical question]：何以家为（要家干什么）？What do I need a home for? (usu. a remark by a patriot in a national crisis)为4[wéi]（ㄨㄟˊ）（為、爲）1.附于某些单音形容词后，构成表示程度、范围的副词 [used after a monosyllabic adjective to form an adverb to indicate degree or scope]：大为高兴 very happy广为传播 spread far and wide深为感动 be touched deeply 2.附于某些表示程度的单音副词后，加强语气 [used after a monosyllabic adverb for emphasis]：极为重要 extremely important甚为便利 rather convenient颇为可观 rather impressive; considerable尤为出色 rather outstanding另见  wèi为[wèi]（ㄨㄟˋ）（為、爲）1.〈书 fml.〉帮助；卫护 help; defend; protect：为吕氏者右袒，为刘氏者左袒。Those who take sides with Lü please bare your right shoulder, and those take sides with Liu please bare your left shoulder. 2.〈介词 prep.〉表示行为的对象；替 in the interest of; for：为你庆幸 congratulate you为人民服务 serve the people为这本书写一篇序 write a preface for the book 3.〈介词 prep.〉表示目的 for the purpose of; for the sake of：为大家的健康干杯。A toast to everyone's health!为建设伟大祖国而奋斗。Strive to build up the great motherland. 4.对；向 to：不足为外人道 do not mention to others; not breathe about it to others 5.因为 because：为何？Why?另见  wéi相关词组成为 | 大为 | 代为 | 行为 | 极为 | 较为 | 略为 | 难为 | 人为 | 认为 | 稍为 | 特为 | 妄为 | 无为 | 以为 | 因为 | 尤为 | 有为 | 最为 | 作为 | 难为情 | 不失为 | 不为已甚 | 奉为圭臬 | 行为能力 | 好为人师 | 混为一谈 | 勉为其难 | 叹为观止 | 蔚为大观 | 言为心声 | 自为阶级 | 逼良为娼 | 不以为然 | 不以为意 | 不足为奇 | 不足为训 | 步步为营 | 察察为明 | 反客为主 | 各自为政 | 好自为之 | 化险为夷 | 画地为牢 | 狼狈为奸 | 量入为出 | 朋比为奸 | 舍己为公 | 舍己为人 | 无能为力 | 习以为常 | 下不为例 | 先睹为快 | 先入为主 | 相忍为国 | 相依为命 | 羞与为伍 | 以邻为壑 | 与人为善 | 指鹿为马 | 助桀为虐 | 助纣为虐 | 转危为安 | 自以为是 | 大有可为 | 大有作为 | 胆大妄为 | 胡作非为 | 见义勇为 | 事在人为 | 无所不为 | 无所作为 | 何乐而不为 | 化干戈为玉帛 | 识时务者为俊杰 | 巧妇难为无米之炊 | 人为刀俎，我为鱼肉为害 | 为何 | 为患 | 为了 | 为力 | 为难 | 为期 | 为人 | 为生 | 为时 | 为首 | 为数 | 为伍 | 为着 | 为止 | 为什么 | 为非作歹 | 为富不仁 | 为虎傅翼 | 为虎作伥 | 为人作嫁 | 为所欲为 | 为渊驱鱼，为丛驱雀

为了
为了[wèi le] 表示目的 for; for the sake of; in order to：学习是为了工作 study for the sake of work一切为了人民利益 everything for the people's interests为了教育群众，首先要向群众学习。In order to educate the masses, it is, first of all, to learn from the masses.注意 NOTE：表示原因，一般用‘因为’不用‘为了’ to indicate a reason, usu. use 因为 yīn·wèi instead of 为了

为人
为人[wéi rén] 指做人处世的态度 behave; conduct oneself：为人正直 be upright为人忠厚 honest and tolerant; sincerely and kindly大家都了解他的为人。Everybody knows what kind of a man he is.

为人作嫁
为人作嫁[wèi rén zuò jià]唐朝秦韬玉《贫女》诗：‘苦恨年年压金线，为他人作嫁衣裳。’The poem Poor Girl by Qin Taoyu of the Tang Dynasty goes:‘I bitterly hate sewing with gold thread year in year out, just to make bridal clothes for others to wear.’ 后来用‘为人作嫁’比喻空为别人辛苦忙碌 used in later times to liken the hard toil done by a person for others without benefiting himself; sewing somebody else's trousseau - doing work for others with no benefit to oneself

为什么
为什么[wèi shén me] 询问原因或目的 why; why (or how) is it that：为什么群众这么爱护解放军？因为解放军是人民的子弟兵。Why do the masses cherish the People's Liberation Army so much? It's because the People's Liberation Army is an army made up of the sons of the people.他这么做到底是为什么？Why, after all, should he do this?注意 NOTE：‘为什么不’常含有劝告的意思，跟‘何不’相同，如：这种技术很有用处，你为什么不学一学？为什么不 wèi shén·me bù implies an advice. It's the same as 何不 hébù. e.g. This kind of skill is very useful, why don't you learn it?

为伍
为伍[wéi wǔ] 同伙；做伙伴 associate with：羞与为伍 feel ashamed to be associated with sb.

为何
为何[wèi hé] 为什么 why; for what reason：为何一言不发？Why didn't you say a word?

为力
为力[wéi lì] 使劲儿；出力 put forth one's strength; exert oneself：无能为力 can do nothing about it

为害
为害[wéi hài] 造成损害 cause harm; cause damage：黏虫对谷子、玉米等粮食作物为害最烈。Armyworms are particularly destructive to millet, corn and other grain crops.

为富不仁
为富不仁[wéi fù bù rén]靠剥削发财致富的人没有好心肠（见于《孟子·滕文公上》）Those who get rich by exploiting others are heartless, according to Mencius·Duke Wen of Teng (I).

为患
为患[wéi huàn] 造成祸害 bring trouble：洪水为患 suffer from floods

为所欲为
为所欲为[wéi suǒ yù wéi] 想干什么就干什么；任意行事（贬义 derog.）act willfully; do whatever one likes; have one's way

为数
为数[wéi shù] 从数量多少上看 amount to; number：为数不少 amount to a considerable number; amount to quite a lot为数甚微 amount to little为数可观 amount to a considerable number

为时
为时[wéi shí] 从时间的长短、早晚上看 in terms of time：为时过早 premature; too early; too soon为时已晚 too late为时不多 not much time left

为期
为期[wéi qī] 从时间、期限长短上看 for a certain period of time; by a definite date：为期不远 be drawing near为期甚远。There is still a long way to go.

为止
为止[wéi zhǐ] 截止；终止（多用于时间、进度等 of time, progress, etc.）up to; till：到目前为止，报名的人已超过一千。The number of those who have signed up has exceeded 1,000 by now.

为渊驱鱼，为丛驱雀
为渊驱鱼，为丛驱雀[wèi yuān qū yú， wèi cóng qū què]《孟子·离娄上》：‘为渊驱鱼者，獭也；为丛驱爵者，鹯也’（爵：同‘雀’）。意思是水獭想捉鱼吃，却把鱼赶到深渊去了；鹞鹰想捉麻雀吃，却把麻雀赶到丛林中去了。后来用这两句话比喻不善于团结人或笼络人，把可以依靠的力量赶到敌人方面去。Mencius·Li Lou (I):‘It is the otter which drives the fish into deep waters; and it is the hawk that drives the sparrows into the thickets.’It means that the otter wants to eat fish, but it drives the fish into deep water; and the hawk wants to eat sparrow, but it drives the sparrows into the thickets. The two phrases are used later to liken sb. who is not capable of uniting others or winning favour from others, but drives his friends over to the side of the enemy.

为生
为生[wéi shēng]（以某种途径）谋生 eke oneself through a living：捕鱼为生 make a living as a fisherman

为着
为着[wèi zhe] 同 same as 为了 wèi·le

为虎作伥
为虎作伥[wèi hǔ zuò chāng]〈比喻 fig.〉做恶人的帮凶，帮助恶人做坏事 play the jackal to the tiger - help a villain do evil（伥 chang：鬼名 name of a ghost）另见  伥鬼 chāngguǐ

为虎傅翼
为虎傅翼[wèi hǔ fù yì]〈比喻 fig.〉帮助恶人，增加恶人的势力 aid an evildoer; add to the influence of a villain（傅翼 fu yi：加上翅膀 give wings to）; 亦 also 为虎添翼 wèi hǔ tiān yì

为难
为难[wéi nán]1.感到难以应付 feel embarrassed; feel awkward：为难的事 awkward matter叫人为难 embarrass sb.; put sb. in an awkward situation 2.作对或刁难 make things difficult for：故意为难 deliberately make things difficult for sb.

为非作歹
为非作歹[wéi fēi zuò dǎi] 做各种坏事 do evil; commit crimes; perpetrate outrages; commit all sorts of crimes

为首
为首[wéi shǒu] 作为领头人 with sb. as the leader; headed (or led) by：以某某为首的代表团 delegation headed by so-and-so犯罪团伙的为首分子已被抓获。The ringleader of the mobsters has been busted.

主
主[zhǔ]（ㄓㄨˇ）1.接待别人的人（跟‘客、宾’相对 as opposed to ‘guest’ or ‘visitor’）host：宾主 guest and host东道主 host 2.权力或财物的所有者 owner：物主 owner of property车主 owner of a car物归原主 return sth. to its rightful owner 3.旧社会中占有奴隶或雇用仆役的人（跟‘奴、仆’相对 as opposed to ‘slave’ or ‘servant’）master：主仆 master and servant奴隶主 slave owner 4.当事人 person or party concerned：失主 owner of lost property事主 victim of a crime卖主 seller主顾 customer; client 5.基督教徒对上帝、伊斯兰教徒对真主的称呼 (Christ.) God; Lord; (Islam) Allah 6.最重要的; 最基本的 main; primary：主要 main主力 main force; main strength of an army 7.负主要责任；主持 manage; direct; be in charge of：主办 sponsor主讲 give a lecture 8.主张 advocate：主战 advocate war主和 advocate peace; stand for negotiation力主改革 do one's utmost to advocate reform 9.预示（吉凶祸福、自然变化等） indicate; signify (one's fate or changes of nature)：左眼跳主财，右眼跳主灾（迷信 superstition）。Twitching of the left eyelid signifies fortune; and twitching of the right signifies calamity.早霞主雨，晚霞主晴。Rosy morning clouds indicate rain, and a rosy sunset means fine weather. 10.对事情的确定的见解 hold a definite view about sth.：他心里没主。He did not know what to do. 11.从自身出发的 subjective：主动 initiative主观 subjective 12.死人的牌位 memorial tablet of the deceased：神主 spirit tablet木主 sacred wooden tablet 13.(Zhǔ) 姓 a surname相关词组霸主 | 班主 | 帮主 | 宾主 | 财主 | 车主 | 得主 | 地主 | 公主 | 顾主 | 雇主 | 户主 | 火主 | 货主 | 寄主 | 教主 | 君主 | 苦主 | 狼主 | 力主 | 领主 | 买主 | 卖主 | 盟主 | 庙主 | 民主 | 牧主 | 神主 | 失主 | 施主 | 事主 | 天主 | 窝主 | 物主 | 雄主 | 宿主 | 业主 | 原主 | 债主 | 真主 | 自主 | 做主 | 班主任 | 本主儿 | 唱主角 | 打主意 | 大主教 | 君主国 | 民主国 | 拿主意 | 女主人 | 馊主意 | 天主教 | 宗主国 | 宗主权 | 东道主 | 二地主 | 房产主 | 封建主 | 救世主 | 农奴主 | 奴隶主 | 小业主 | 造物主 | 君主立宪 | 君主专制 | 民主党派 | 民主改革 | 民主革命 | 入主出奴 | 爱国主义 | 本本主义 | 本位主义 | 地方主义 | 帝国主义 | 封建主义 | 改良主义 | 个人主义 | 功利主义 | 共产主义 | 古典主义 | 官僚主义 | 国际主义 | 机会主义 | 集体主义 | 教条主义 | 军国主义 | 浪漫主义 | 利己主义 | 列宁主义 | 马列主义 | 蒙昧主义 | 民权主义 | 民生主义 | 民族主义 | 命令主义 | 平均主义 | 人道主义 | 人文主义 | 三民主义 | 沙文主义 | 社会主义 | 实用主义 | 事务主义 | 唯物主义 | 唯心主义 | 现实主义 | 写实主义 | 形式主义 | 修正主义 | 虚无主义 | 折衷主义 | 执行主席 | 殖民主义 | 种族主义 | 资本主义 | 自然主义 | 自由主义 | 宗派主义 | 不由自主 | 独立自主 | 反客为主 | 六神无主 | 先入为主 | 喧宾夺主 | 民主集中制 | 达尔文主义 | 大民族主义 | 法西斯主义 | 马克思主义 | 无政府主义 | 社会主义革命 | 人民民主专政 | 辩证唯物主义 | 地方民族主义 | 官僚资本主义 | 机械唯物主义 | 科学共产主义 | 科学社会主义 | 客观唯心主义 | 历史唯物主义 | 历史唯心主义 | 右倾机会主义 | 共产主义青年团 | 社会主义所有制 | 新民主主义革命 | 马克思列宁主义主办 | 主笔 | 主币 | 主编 | 主场 | 主持 | 主创 | 主词 | 主次 | 主从 | 主打 | 主刀 | 主导 | 主动 | 主队 | 主儿 | 主伐 | 主犯 | 主峰 | 主父 | 主妇 | 主干 | 主根 | 主攻 | 主顾 | 主观 | 主管 | 主婚 | 主机 | 主祭 | 主见 | 主将 | 主讲 | 主角 | 主教 | 主考 | 主课 | 主力 | 主粮 | 主流 | 主楼 | 主麻 | 主谋 | 主脑 | 主权 | 主人 | 主任 | 主食 | 主使 | 主事 | 主诉 | 主题 | 主体 | 主文 | 主席 | 主线 | 主星 | 主刑 | 主演 | 主要 | 主页 | 主义 | 主意 | 主因 | 主语 | 主宰 | 主张 | 主旨 | 主轴 | 主子 | 主动脉 | 主力舰 | 主力军 | 主人公 | 主人翁 | 主视图 | 主题词 | 主题歌 | 主席团 | 主心骨 | 主旋律 | 主板市场 | 主动脉弓 | 主观主义 | 主观能动性 | 主观唯心主义

主义
主义[zhǔ yì]1.对客观世界、社会生活以及学术问题等所持有的系统的理论和主张 -ism; systematic doctrine or theory on the objective world, society, or academic issues：马克思列宁主义 Marxism-Leninism达尔文主义 Darwinism现实主义 realism浪漫主义 romanticism 2.思想作风 ideological style：本位主义 selfish departmentalism自由主义 liberalism主观主义 subjectivism 3.一定的社会制度；政治经济体系 social system; politico-economic system：社会主义 socialism资本主义 capitalism

主事
主事[zhǔ shì]（～儿 zhǔ∥shìr）主管事情 be in charge; take charge：主事人 person in charge当家主事 be the master of one's own house前几年他还主过事。He was in charge several years ago.

主人
主人[zhǔ rén]1.接待客人的人（跟‘客人’相对 as opposed to ‘guest’）host; one that receives guests 2.〈旧时 old〉聘用家庭教师、账房等的人；雇用仆人的人 master; head of a household that hires private tutors, accountants, etc.; one who employs servants 3.财物或权力的所有人 owner (of property or power)：磨坊主人 mill owner

主人公
主人公[zhǔ rén gōng] 指文艺作品中的中心人物 leading character (in a novel, etc.); hero or heroine; protagonist

主人翁
主人翁[zhǔ rén wēng]1.当家做主的人 master：劳动人民成了国家的主人翁。The working people have become the masters of the country. 2. 同 same as 主人公 zhǔréngōng

主从
主从[zhǔ cóng] 主要的和从属的 principal and subordinate：主从关系 relationship between the principal and the subordinate

主任
主任[zhǔ rèn] 职位名称，一个部门或机构的主要负责人 director; head; chairman (of a department or an organization)：办公室主任 office director车间主任 head of the workshop居民委员会主任 chairman of the neighbourhood committee

主伐
主伐[zhǔ fá]砍伐已经长成可以利用的森林。主伐不仅为获取木材，同时还为了森林更新，培育后一代森林。final felling (or cutting). The aim of felling mature trees is not only to gain timber, but also to renew a forest.

主体
主体[zhǔ tǐ]1.事物的主要部分 centrepiece; main body; main part; principal part：工人、农民和知识分子是国家的主体。Workers, peasants and intellectuals constitute the main body of the country.中央的十层大厦是这个建筑群的主体。The 10-storey tower at the centre is the centrepiece of the complex. 2.哲学上指有认识和实践能力的人 (philos.) subject; one that has the capability to understand and practise; 另见  客体 kètǐ ①; 3.法律上指依法享有权利和承担义务的自然人、法人或国家 subject; natural person, legal person or state that enjoys rights and performs duties according to law另见  客体 kètǐ ②

主使
主使[zhǔ shǐ] 出主意使别人去做坏事；指使 instigate; incite; abet：受人主使 under sb.'s instigation; act on sb.'s instigation

主儿
主儿[zhǔ r]1.指主人 master; employer 2.指某种类型的人 person of a specified type：这主儿真不讲理。This guy is utterly unreasonable.他是说到做到的主儿。He is a person who lives up to his word. 3.指婆家 husband or fiancé：她快三十了，也该找主儿了。She is about 30, and it is time she found a husband.

主刀
主刀[zhǔ dāo]（医生）主持并亲自做手术 operate; act as surgeon (in a surgical operation)：由外科主任亲自主刀。The director of the surgical department personally carries out the surgical operation.

主刑
主刑[zhǔ xíng]可以独立应用的刑罚，如有期徒刑、无期徒刑等（区别于‘从刑’as compared with ‘accessory penalty’）principal penalty; penalty that can be meted out independently, such as fixed-term imprisonment, life imprisonment, etc.

主创
主创[zhǔ chuàng] 在文学、艺术作品的创作过程中担负主要工作的 playing a chief role in the creation of a work of literature or art：该剧主创人员赴京进行艺术交流。The main writers of the play went to Beijing to swap experience in creative writing.

主力
主力[zhǔ lì] 主要力量 main force; main strength of an army：主力军 main force主力部队 principal force主力队员 principal member (of a team)球队主力 top player of a ball team

主力军
主力军[zhǔ lì jūn]1.担负作战主力的部队 main force (of an army) 2.〈比喻 fig.〉起主要作用的力量 force that plays a major role

主力舰
主力舰[zhǔ lì jiàn]〈旧时 old〉指海上作战的主力战舰，包括战列舰和巡洋舰 capital ship, including battleships and cruisers

主办
主办[zhǔ bàn] 主持办理；主持举办 direct; sponsor; host：主办世界杯足球赛 host the World Cup football tournament展览会由我们单位主办。The exhibition is sponsored by our unit.

主动
主动[zhǔ dòng]1.不待外力推动而行动（跟‘被动’相对 as opposed to ‘passive’）initiative; act without outside impetus：主动性 initiative主动争取 take the initiative to win over 2.能够造成有利局面，使事情按照自己的意图进行（跟‘被动’相对 as opposed to ‘be thrown into passivity’）take the initiative; do sth. of one's own accord：主动权 initiative争取主动 try to gain the initiative; contend for the initiative处于主动地位 find oneself in an advantageous position

主动脉
主动脉[zhǔ dòng mài]人体内最粗大的动脉，从左心室发出，向上向右再向下略呈弓状，再沿脊柱向下行，在胸腹等分出很多较小的动脉。是向全身各部输送血液的主要导管。aorta; largest artery in the body, arising from the base of the left ventricle of the heart, and turning up, right, and back down in the shape of an arch, running down along the vertebra, branching off to form smaller arteries at the chest and abdomen, and carrying blood to all parts of the body;亦 also 大动脉 dàdòngmài

主动脉弓
主动脉弓[zhǔ dòng mài gōng] 主动脉从左心室向上行，然后向右，再沿脊柱向下行，这一段主动脉略呈弓状，叫主动脉弓 arch of the aorta; aorta that rises from the base of the left ventricle of the heart, turns right, and then downward along the vertebra, in the shape of an arch亦 also 动脉弓 dòngmàigōng

主因
主因[zhǔ yīn] 主要的原因 main cause：骄傲自满是他学习成绩下滑的主因。Self-conceitedness is the main cause for the downslide in his studies.

主场
主场[zhǔ chǎng] 体育比赛中，主队所在地的场地对主队来说叫主场 home court; host arena; arena of the host team in a sports competition

主妇
主妇[zhǔ fù] 一家的女主人 housewife; hostess：家庭主妇 housewife

主婚
主婚[zhǔ hūn] 主持婚礼 preside over a wedding ceremony：主婚人 person who presides over a wedding ceremony

主子
主子[zhǔ zi]〈旧时 old〉奴仆称主人，现多比喻操纵、主使的人 master; boss; (fig.) manipulator

主宰
主宰[zhǔ zǎi]1.支配；统治; 掌握 dominate; dictate; decide：主宰万物 dominate all things in creation迷信的人总以为人的命运是由上天主宰的。The superstitious hold that humankind's destiny is dominated by providence. 2.掌握、支配人或事物的力量 force that dominates the destiny of people or determines the development of matters：思想是人们行动的主宰。A man's actions are determined by his thinking.中国人民已经成为自己命运的主宰。The Chinese people have become masters of their own fate.

主导
主导[zhǔ dǎo]1.主要的并且引导事物向某方面发展的 leading; dominant; guiding：主导思想 dominant ideas; guiding ideology主导作用 leading role 2.起主导作用的事物 leading factor：我国国民经济的发展以农业为基础，工业为主导。Development of our national economy takes agriculture as its base and industry as the leading factor.

主将
主将[zhǔ jiàng]1.主要的将领 chief commander; commanding general：中军主将 commanding general of the middle army 2.〈比喻 fig.〉在某方面起主要作用的人 one who plays the main role in a certain field of endeavour：鲁迅是中国文化革命的主将。Lu Xun was a leading figure in the cultural revolution of China.

主峰
主峰[zhǔ fēng] 山脉的最高峰 highest peak in a mountain range

主币
主币[zhǔ bì]本位货币（跟‘辅币’相对 as opposed to ‘fractional currency’）standard currency; standard money

主席
主席[zhǔ xí]1.主持会议的人 chairman (of a meeting) 2.某些国家、国家机关、党派或团体某一级组织的最高领导职位名称 chairman; president (of an organization, institution, party or state)

主席团
主席团[zhǔ xí tuán] 委员会或会议的集体领导组织 presidium; collective leading body of a committee or conference

主干
主干[zhǔ gàn]1.植物的主要的茎 trunk; main stem of a plant 2.主要的、起决定作用的力量 main force; mainstay：中青年教师是教育战线的主干。Middle-aged and young teachers are the mainstay of the educational front.

主张
主张[zhǔ zhāng]1.对于如何行动持有某种见解 advocate; stand for; maintain; hold：他主张马上动身。He advocates starting immediately. 2.对于如何行动所持有的见解 view; position; stand; proposition：自作主张 act on one's own; decide for oneself这两种主张都有理由。Both propositions are reasonable.

主心骨
主心骨[zhǔ xīn gǔ]（～儿 zhǔxīngǔr）1.可依靠的人或事物 backbone; mainstay; pillar：你来了，我可有了主心骨了！You have come, and now I have someone to depend on. 2.主见；主意 definite view; one's own judgment：事情来得太突然，一时间我也没了主心骨。It happened suddenly, and for a moment I did not know what to do.

主意
主意[zhǔ yi]1.主见 decision; definite view：大家七嘴八舌地一说，他倒拿不定主意了。With so many people trying to get a word in all at once, he was quite at a loss for a definite plan. 2.办法 idea; plan：出主意 offer advice馊主意 stupid suggestion; lousy idea这个主意好。That's a good idea.人多主意多。The more people there are, the greater the ferment of ideas will occur.

主打
主打[zhǔ dǎ]（文艺作品、商品等）在吸引受众、顾客，打开市场上起主要作用的 (of literary and artistic works, commodities, etc.) main hit; sth. that plays the leading role in attracting readership, audience and customers or in taking a market share：主打歌 top song短篇小说是这个刊物的主打栏目。Short stories are the mainstay column of this magazine.本商场以时装为主打商品。This shopping centre features the latest fashion as its major hits.

主持
主持[zhǔ chí]1.负责掌握或处理 take charge (or care) of; manage; direct：主持人 anchorperson; host; hostess主持会议 preside over a meeting; take the chair 2.主张；维护 uphold; stand for：主持公道 uphold justice主持正义 uphold justice

主攻
主攻[zhǔ gōng]集中主要兵力在主要方向上进攻（区别于‘助攻’as compared with ‘holding or secondary attack’）main attack; attack in the main direction along with concentrated main force：主攻部队 main attack force指战员纷纷请战，要求担负主攻任务。Officers and men alike requested battle assignments one after another, demanding to serve as the main attack force.

主教
主教[zhǔ jiào]天主教、东正教的高级神职人员，通常是一个地区教会的首领。新教的某些教派也沿用这个名称。bishop; Anglican, Eastern Orthodox, or Roman Catholic clergyman of a higher order than a priest, that usu. governs a diocese. Certain divisions of the Protestant Church also use this title.

主文
主文[zhǔ wén] 判决书的结论部分 concluding part of a court verdict

主旋律
主旋律[zhǔ xuán lǜ]1.指多声部演唱或演奏的音乐中，一个声部所唱或所奏的主要曲调，其他声部只起润色、丰富、烘托、补充的作用 main melody; main theme within concerted songs or music, to which others are complementary 2.〈比喻 fig.〉主要精神；基本观点 theme; gist of the game：改革是这个报告的主旋律。The theme of this report is reform.

主旨
主旨[zhǔ zhǐ] 主要的意义、用意或目的 purport; substance; gist：文章的主旨不清楚。The gist of this article is not clear.

主星
主星[zhǔ xīng] 双星中较亮的一颗，伴星围绕着它旋转 primary (component); the brighter of a binary star, around which its companion orbits

主机
主机[zhǔ jī]1.长机 (zhǎngjī) lead aircraft; leader 2.成套动力设备中起主要作用的机器，如轮船上的动力系统的发动机、汽轮发电机组中的汽轮发电机 main engine; machine that plays the main role in a complete set of powered equipment, such as the engine in the dynamic system of a ship, and the steam turbine in a steam turbine generating set

主权
主权[zhǔ quán]一个国家在其领域内拥有的最高权力。根据这种权力，国家按照自己的意志决定对内对外政策，处理国内国际一切事务，而不受任何外来干涉。sovereign rights; sovereignty; supreme power of a country exercised within its territory. With this power, the country decides its domestic and foreign policies and handles all domestic and international affairs, free from external interference.

主板市场
主板市场[zhǔ bǎn shì chǎng] 在一国的证券市场体系中居于主导地位的证券交易市场 mainboard market; stock exchange market that plays a leading role in a nation's securities market system

主根
主根[zhǔ gēn] 植物最初生长出来的根，是由胚根突出种皮后发育而成的，通常是垂直向地下生长，并长出许多侧根，组成根系 main root; tap root; primary root that develops from the radicle after breaking through the seed coat, and that grows vertically downward, from which small lateral roots grow outwards to form the root system

主楼
主楼[zhǔ lóu]楼群中主要的一幢楼。楼群中其他楼房的设计、位置等与主楼相配合。main building; main building in a group. The buildings surrounding the main building are required to match it in design and layout.

主次
主次[zhǔ cì] 主要的和次要的 primary and secondary：分清主次 differentiate what is primary from what is secondary

主流
主流[zhǔ liú]1.干流 trunk stream; mainstream 2.〈比喻 fig.〉事情发展的主要方面 essential or main aspect; main trend：我们必须分清主流和支流，区别本质和现象。It is essential to distinguish the main aspect from the minor, and the essence from mere appearance.

主演
主演[zhǔ yǎn]1.扮演戏剧或电影中的主角 act the leading role (in a play or film); star：他一生主演过几十部电影。He starred in dozens of films during his lifetime. 2.指担任主演工作的人 leading performer

主父
主父[Zhǔ fù] 姓 a surname

主犯
主犯[zhǔ fàn]在共同犯罪中起主要和组织作用的罪犯（区别于‘从犯’as compared with ‘accessory’ to a crime）prime culprit; principal criminal (or offender); principal

主祭
主祭[zhǔ jì] 主持祭礼 officiate at funeral or sacrificial rites：主祭人 one who officiates at funeral or sacrificial rites

主笔
主笔[zhǔ bǐ] 指报刊编辑部中负责撰写评论的人，也指编辑部的负责人 chief commentator (of the editorial board of a publication); editor in chief (of an editorial board)

主管
主管[zhǔ guǎn]1.负主要责任管理（某一方面） be responsible for; be in charge of：主管部门 department responsible for the work主管原料收购和产品销售 be responsible for the purchase of raw materials and marketing of products听神经主管听觉和身体平衡的感觉。The sensations of hearing and balance come under the auspices of the acoustic nerve. 2.主管的人员 person in charge：财务主管 treasurer

主粮
主粮[zhǔ liáng] 各地区生产和消费的粮食中占主要地位的粮食，如长江流域的主粮是大米 staple food grain; food grain that occupies the leading position in the production and consumption of grain in a given region, e.g. rice is the main staple food grain of the Yangtze River Valley

主线
主线[zhǔ xiàn]指贯穿事物发展过程的主要线索。特指文艺作品故事情节发展的主要线索。thread; element suggestive of a thread for its continuity; main thread (of a literary work, etc.)

主编
主编[zhǔ biān]1.负编辑工作的主要责任 supervise the publication (of a newspaper, magazine, etc.); edit：他主编一本语文杂志。He edits a Chinese language magazine. 2.编辑工作的主要负责人 chief editor (or compiler); editor in chief：他是这本语文杂志的主编。He is the editor in chief of this Chinese language magazine.

主考
主考[zhǔ kǎo]1.主持考试 be in charge of an examination：校长亲临考场主考。The headmaster personally invigilated the examination. 2.主持考试的人 chief examiner (in a school, etc.)

主脑
主脑[zhǔ nǎo]1.主要的、起决定作用的部分 control centre; centre of operation 2.首领 leader; chief

主要
主要[zhǔ yào] 有关事物中最重要的；起决定作用的 main; chief; principal; major：主要原因 main reason主要目的 major objective主要人物 major character

主见
主见[zhǔ jiàn]（对事情的）确定的意见 ideas or thoughts of one's own; one's own judgment; definite view：众说纷纭，他也没了主见。As general opinions vary, he has no definite views of his own.

主观
主观[zhǔ guān]1.属于自我意识方面的（跟‘客观’相对 as opposed to ‘objective’）subjective; arising from conditions within the brain or sense organs and not directly caused by external stimuli：主观愿望 subjective desire; wishful thinking主观能动性 subjective initiative; conscious activity 2.不依据实际情况，单凭自己的偏见的（跟‘客观’相对 as opposed to ‘objective’）subjective; peculiar to a particular individual：看问题不要主观片面。When considering a problem, try to avoid being subjective or partisan.

主观主义
主观主义[zhǔ guān zhǔ yì]一种唯心主义的思想作风，特点是不从客观实际出发，而从主观愿望和臆想出发来认识和对待事物，以致主观和客观分离，理论和实践脱节。主观主义有时表现为教条主义，有时表现为经验主义。subjectivism; idealist style of thinking that rejects objective realities, understanding and treating matter solely on the basis of idealist wishes and conjecture, resulting in a departure of the subjective from the objective, and of practice from theory. Subjectivism might manifest itself as dogmatism, or as empiricism.

主观唯心主义
主观唯心主义[zhǔ guān wéi xīn zhǔ yì] 唯心主义哲学的一个派别，否认世界的物质性，认为存在只是‘我’的感觉，物质世界只是人的主观意识的体现或产物 subjective idealism; school of idealist philosophy that denies the existence of the material world, regarding existence as nothing but a sensation of ‘ego,’ and a mere reflection or product of human subjective consciousness

主观能动性
主观能动性[zhǔ guān néng dòng xìng]人的主观意识和行动对于客观世界的反作用。辩证唯物主义认为主观能动性是人在实践中认识客观规律，并根据客观规律自觉地改造世界，推动事物发展的能力和作用。subjective initiative; conscious activity; reaction of the human subjective consciousness to the objective world and resultant human action. Dialectical materialists hold that subjective initiative is a human ability and function, through whose practice they come to understand objective laws, according to which they consciously transform the world, and promote the development of things.

主视图
主视图[zhǔ shì tú] 由物体正前方向后做正投影得到的视图 front view; elevation; view obtained by making an orthographic projection of an object from the front

主角
主角[zhǔ jué]（～儿 zhǔjuér）1.指戏剧、电影等艺术表演中的主要角色或主要演员 leading role; lead; protagonist (in a drama or movie) 2.〈比喻 fig.〉主要人物 main personage：那次事变的几个主角已先后去世。The main personages involved in that incident have since died, one after another.

主讲
主讲[zhǔ jiǎng] 担任讲授或讲演 be the speaker; give a lecture：王教授主讲隋唐文学。Professor Wang is to give a lecture on the literature of the Sui and Tang dynasties.这次动员大会由他主讲。He will speak at the mobilization meeting.

主诉
主诉[zhǔ sù] 医疗机构指病人看病时对自己病情的陈述 chief complaint; when a patient describes his or her own ailment to a doctor in a medical institution

主词
主词[zhǔ cí] 一个命题的三部分之一，表示思考的对象，如‘糖是甜的’这个命题中的‘糖’是主词 subject term; subject; one of the three parts of a proposition, indicating the object for thinking. For instance, in the proposition ‘Sugar is sweet,’ sugar is the subject.

主语
主语[zhǔ yǔ]谓语的陈述对象，指出谓语说的是谁或者是什么的句子成分。一般的句子都包括主语部分和谓语部分，主语部分里的主要的词是主语。例如在‘我们的生活很幸福’里，‘生活’是主语，‘我们的生活’是主语部分（有些语法书里称主语部分为主语，称主语为主词）。subject; element of a sentence, about which something is said in the predicate. In general, a sentence comprises a subject part and a predicate part; the major word in the subject part is the subject. For instance, in the sentence ‘Our life is happy,’ ‘life’ is the subject, and ‘our life’ is the subject part. (In some grammar books, 主语部分 is called 主语，and 主语 is called 主词。)

主课
主课[zhǔ kè] 学习的主要课程 major; main subject; major course：语文、数学、政治、外语是中学的主课。Chinese, mathematics, politics and foreign language are the main subjects in a middle school curriculum.

主谋
主谋[zhǔ móu]1.共同做坏事时做主要的谋划者 head a conspiracy; be the chief plotter 2.主谋的人 chief instigator

主轴
主轴[zhǔ zhóu] 指机械中从发动机或电动机接受动力并将动力传给其他机件的轴 principal axis; main shaft; spindle; shaft that receives power from an engine or electric motor and transmits it to other parts of a machine

主队
主队[zhǔ duì] 体育比赛中，和客队比赛的本单位或本地、本国的体育代表队叫主队 home team; host team; team representing a unit, region or country, that plays a visiting team in a sports competition

主页
主页[zhǔ yè] 可以在互联网上进行信息查询的起始信息页 homepage

主顾
主顾[zhǔ gù] 顾客 customer; client：老主顾 regular customer招揽主顾 solicit customers

主题
主题[zhǔ tí]1.文学、艺术作品中所表现的中心思想，是作品思想内容的核心 theme (of a literary or art work); subject; motif; leitmotiv 2.泛指谈话、文件等的主要内容 main contents (of a speech, document, etc.)：主题词 subject term年终分配成了人们议论的主题。Year-end distribution has become the main subject of discussion among the people.

主题歌
主题歌[zhǔ tí gē] 电影、歌剧、话剧、电视剧中能概括地表现主题的歌曲 theme song; song preceding a movie, opera, modern drama or TV play, that epitomizes its theme

主题词
主题词[zhǔ tí cí] 用来标明图书、文件等主题的词或词组 theme word; subject term; word or phrase that indicates the subject of a book or document

主食
主食[zhǔ shí] 主要食物，一般指用粮食制成的，如米饭、馒头等 staple food; principal food, usu. a cereal, such as rice or steamed buns

主麻
主麻[zhǔ má]伊斯兰教徒做集体礼拜，在每周的星期五午后举行，伊斯兰教定星期五为礼拜日，称主麻日。伊斯兰教徒习惯称一周为一个主麻。Djumah (Friday); gathering of Islamic believers each Friday afternoon. Muslims consider Friday as a day of worship (Day of Djumah). By habit Muslims regard a week as a ‘djumah’. [阿拉伯 Arabic：jumaa]

丽
丽[lí]（ㄌㄧˊ）（麗）1.丽水 (Líshuǐ)，地名，在浙江 Lishui, name of a place in Zhejiang Province 2.高丽 (Gāolí)，朝鲜历史上的王朝，我国过去沿用指朝鲜 Korea; Koryo Dynasty in the history of Korea另见  lì丽1[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）（麗）好看；美丽 beautiful; pretty; fine-looking：壮丽 magnificent; imposing; majestic秀丽 beautiful; pretty; handsome风和日丽 gentle breeze and warm sunshine丽2[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）（麗）〈书 fml.〉附着 depend on; attach oneself to：附丽 adhere to; submit to另见  lí相关词组端丽 | 繁丽 | 附丽 | 富丽 | 高丽 | 瑰丽 | 宏丽 | 华丽 | 佳丽 | 亮丽 | 靓丽 | 流丽 | 美丽 | 靡丽 | 明丽 | 绮丽 | 俏丽 | 清丽 | 婉丽 | 鲜丽 | 秀丽 | 绚丽 | 艳丽 | 壮丽 | 大丽花 | 高丽纸丽人 | 丽日 | 丽质

丽人
丽人[lì rén]〈书 fml.〉美貌的女子 beautiful woman; beauty

丽日
丽日[lì rì]〈书 fml.〉明亮的太阳 bright sun

丽质
丽质[lì zhì]（妇女）美好的品貌 beauty (of a woman)：天生丽质 natural beauty

举
举[jǔ]（ㄐㄩˇ）（舉、擧）1.往上托；往上伸 lift; raise; hold up：举重 weightlifting举手 raise one's hand高举着红旗 hold high the red flag 2.举动 act; deed; move：义举 magnanimous act undertaken for the public good壮举 magnificent feat; heroic undertaking一举一动 every act and every move一举两得 gain two ends at once; kill two birds with one stone 3.兴起；起 start：举义 start a revolt举兵 call out the troops举火 light a fire 4.〈书 fml.〉生（孩子）give birth to (a child)：举一男 give birth to a boy 5.推选；选举 elect; choose：推举 elect举代表 elect representatives公举他做学习组长。He was elected by public nomination as the head of the study group. 6.举人的简称 abbr. for 举人 jǔrén：中举 pass the imperial examination at the provincial level武举 (formerly) military officer of second degree in imperial examinations 7.提出 cite; enumerate：举例 give an example列举 list; enumerate 8.〈书 fml.〉全 whole; entire：举座 all those present举家南迁。The whole family moves southward.举国欢腾。The whole nation is in a jubilant mood.举世闻名 of world renown; world-famous相关词组包举 | 保举 | 并举 | 创举 | 措举 | 大举 | 高举 | 公举 | 豪举 | 检举 | 荐举 | 科举 | 列举 | 善举 | 盛举 | 抬举 | 挺举 | 推举 | 选举 | 一举 | 义举 | 应举 | 抓举 | 壮举 | 选举权 | 纲举目张 | 毛举细故 | 轻举妄动 | 一举两得 | 被选举权 | 不识抬举 | 差额选举 | 等额选举 | 多此一举 | 间接选举 | 轻而易举 | 直接选举 | 众擎易举举哀 | 举办 | 举报 | 举步 | 举措 | 举动 | 举发 | 举凡 | 举国 | 举行 | 举火 | 举架 | 举荐 | 举例 | 举目 | 举人 | 举世 | 举事 | 举要 | 举债 | 举证 | 举止 | 举重 | 举案齐眉 | 举棋不定 | 举手之劳 | 举一反三 | 举足轻重

举一反三
举一反三[jǔ yī fǎn sān] 从一件事情类推而知道许多事情 draw inferences about other cases from one instance

举世
举世[jǔ shì] 整个世间；全世界 throughout the world; universally：举世闻名 of world renown; world-famous举世瞩目 attract worldwide attention; become the focus of world attention举世无双 unrivalled; matchless

举事
举事[jǔ shì]〈书 fml.〉发动武装暴动 stage an uprising; rise in insurrection

举人
举人[jǔ rén] 明清两代称乡试考取的人 people who pass the imperial examination at the provincial level in the Ming and Qing dynasties

举例
举例[jǔ lì] 提出例子来 give an example：举例说明 illustrate with examples

举债
举债[jǔ zhài]〈书 fml.〉借债 borrow money; raise (or contract) a loan：举债度日 eke out an existence on borrowed money

举凡
举凡[jǔ fán]〈书 fml.〉凡是（下文大多列举）ranging from ...to ...; all ...such as：戏曲表演的手法，内容非常丰富，举凡喜、怒、哀、乐、惊、恐、愁、急等感情的流露，全都提炼出一套完整的程式。The methods of expression are diverse in theatrical performance. A complete set of stylized moves have been summarized to express many kinds of emotion, such as joy, anger, grief, happiness, surprise, fear, worry, and anxiety.

举办
举办[jǔ bàn]举行（活动）；办理（事业）conduct (activities); hold; run (an undertaking)：举办展览会 hold (or put on) an exhibition举办学术讲座 give an academic lecture举办训练班 conduct a training course举办群众福利事业 conduct welfare projects for the masses

举动
举动[jǔ dòng] 动作；行动 movement; move; act; activity：举动缓慢 move slowly近来他有什么新的举动？Has he engaged in any new activities recently?

举发
举发[jǔ fā]检举；揭发（坏人、坏事）inform against; report (evildoer and evil deed)

举哀
举哀[jǔ āi] 丧礼用语，指高声号哭 wail in mourning

举国
举国[jǔ guó] 整个国家；全国 whole nation：举国欢腾。The whole nation is in a jubilant mood.举国一致 national unanimity举国上下 whole nation from top to bottom; from the leaders of the nation to all the people

举手之劳
举手之劳[jǔ shǒu zhī láo] 形容事情很容易办到；不费事 turn of the hand; as easy as turning one's hands over

举报
举报[jǔ bào]向有关单位检举报告（坏人坏事）inform against; report (evildoer and evil deed to the department concerned)：举报违法犯罪行为 report illegal activities and crimes

举措
举措[jǔ cuò] 举动；措施 move; act：举措失当 make an ill-advised move新举措 new measures

举架
举架[jǔ jià]〈方 dial.〉指房屋的高度 height of a house：这间房子举架矮。This house is quite low.

举案齐眉
举案齐眉[jǔ àn qí méi]后汉梁鸿的妻子孟光给丈夫送饭时，总是把端饭的盘子举得高高的（见于《后汉书·梁鸿传》）。后人用来形容夫妻相敬。holding the tray level with the brow - husband and wife treating each other with courtesy. When Meng Guang, wife of Liang Hong in the Later Han Dynasty, served meals to her husband, she always held the tray level with her brow (see History of Later Han·Biography of Liang Hong).

举棋不定
举棋不定[jǔ qí bù dìng]〈比喻 fig.〉做事犹豫不决 vacillate; shilly-shally; hesitate about (or over) what move to make; be unable to make up one's mind（棋 qi：棋子 piece）

举止
举止[jǔ zhǐ] 指姿态和风度；举动 bearing; manner; mien：举止大方 have poise; have an easy manner; be gentle of mien言谈举止 speech and deportment

举步
举步[jǔ bù]〈书 fml.〉迈步 take a step：举步维艰 have difficulty in taking a step

举火
举火[jǔ huǒ]〈书 fml.〉1.点火 light a fire：举火为号 light a fire as the signal 2.专指生火做饭 light the kitchen fire; light the stove

举目
举目[jǔ mù]抬起眼睛（看）raise the eyes; look：举目远眺 look into the distance举目无亲 be away from all one's kin; be a stranger in a strange land; have no one to turn to (for help)

举荐
举荐[jǔ jiàn]推荐（人）recommend (sb.)：举荐德才兼备的人来校任教 recommend people of both professional ability and moral integrity to teach at this school

举行
举行[jǔ xíng]进行（集会、比赛等）hold (a meeting, contest, etc.)：举行会谈 hold talks举行球赛 hold a ball game展览会在文化宫举行。The exhibition is being held at the Cultural Palace.

举要
举要[jǔ yào]列举大要，多用做书名，如《唐宋文举要》compendium; detailed account of main points, mainly used in titles of books, e.g. Compendium of Tang and Song Prose

举证
举证[jǔ zhèng] 出示证据；提供证据 produce evidence; show evidence：原告、被告先后举证，进行法庭辩论。The plaintiff (or prosecutor) and defendant produced their evidence one after another during the court debate.

举足轻重
举足轻重[jǔ zú qīng zhòng] 所处地位重要，一举一动都关系到全局 hold the balance; prove decisive (to the whole situation)

举重
举重[jǔ zhòng]体育运动项目之一。运动员以抓举、挺举两种举法举起杠铃。weightlifting; sports item where athletes lift barbells in two forms: snatch, or clean and jerk

乂
乂[yì]（ㄧˋ）〈书 fml.〉治理；安定 pacify; govern; administer：乂安（太平无事）peace and stability

乃
乃[nǎi]（ㄋㄞˇ）（迺、廼）〈书 fml.〉1.是；就是；实在是 be：《红楼梦》乃一代奇书。A Dream of Red Mansions is an extraordinary classic for its time.失败乃成功之母。Failure is the mother of success. 2.于是 that is why...; hence; thus：因山势高峻，乃在山腰休息片时。The mountain being high and steep, we took a break midway up the slope. 3.才 unless：惟虚心乃能进步。You cannot make progress unless you remain modest. 4.你；你的 your：乃父 your father乃兄 your elder brother相关词组无乃 | 木乃伊乃尔 | 乃至

乃尔
乃尔[nǎi ěr]〈书 fml.〉如此；像这样 to such an extent; like this：何其相似乃尔！What a striking similarity!

乃至
乃至[nǎi zhì] 甚至 even：他的逝世，引起了全市乃至全国人民的哀悼。His death struck grief into the hearts of the people of the entire city and even the entire country.亦 also 乃至于 nǎizhìyú

久
久[jiǔ]（ㄐㄧㄡˇ）1.时间长（跟‘暂’相对 as opposed to ‘temporary’）for a long time; long：久别重逢 meet again after a long separation; reunite after a long departure久经锻炼 be seasoned 2.时间的长短 of a specified duration：你来了有多久？How long have you been here?这座古墓考古队发掘了两个月之久。The archaeological team has been excavating this ancient tomb for as long as two months.相关词组不久 | 持久 | 好久 | 恒久 | 经久 | 历久 | 良久 | 耐久 | 许久 | 永久 | 悠久 | 长久 | 终久 | 持久战 | 日久天长 | 长治久安 | 旷日持久 | 年深日久 | 天长地久 | 天长日久久别 | 久久 | 久留 | 久违 | 久仰 | 久已 | 久远 | 久而久之 | 久假不归

久久
久久[jiǔ jiǔ]许久；好久（用做状语）[used as adv.] for a long, long time：心情激动，久久不能平静。(He) was so excited; it took him a long time to calm down.

久仰
久仰[jiǔ yǎng]〈客套话 pol.〉仰慕已久（初次见面时说）[to sb. upon first meeting] I've long looked forward to meeting you.

久假不归
久假不归[jiǔ jiǎ bù guī] 长期借去，不归还 put off indefinitely returning sth. one has borrowed; appropriate sth. borrowed

久别
久别[jiǔ bié] 长时间地分别 long separation; long years of departure：久别重逢 meet again after a long separation; reunite after long years of departure

久已
久已[jiǔ yǐ] 很久以前已经；早就 for a long time; long since：这件事我久已忘了。I have long since forgotten it.

久留
久留[jiǔ liú] 长时间地停留 stay long：此地不宜久留。It is not suitable to stay here very long.

久而久之
久而久之[jiǔ ér jiǔ zhī] 经过了相当长的时间 in the course of time; with the lapse of time; as time passes：机器要不好好养护，久而久之就要生锈。Without proper maintenance, the machine will become rusty over time.

久远
久远[jiǔ yuǎn] 长久 far back; ages ago; remote：年代久远 of the remote past; age-old; time-honoured

久违
久违[jiǔ wéi]〈客套话 pol.〉好久没见 I haven't seen you for ages：久违了，这几年您上哪儿去啦？I haven't seen you for ages. Where have you been over the past few years?

乇
乇[tuō]（ㄊㄨㄛ）‘托3 ’旧作乇 old written form of 托3  tuō

么
么[me]（·ㄇㄜ）（麽、末）1.后缀 suffix：这么 in this case那么 in that case怎么 how come多么 how 2.歌词中的衬字 character inserted in a line for balance or euphony：五月的花儿红呀么红似火。Red as fire are the flowers in May!另见  ·ma 嘛 and 吗, yāo 幺, 麽 mó and 末 mò相关词组多么 | 那么 | 什么 | 要么 | 怎么 | 这么 | 那么些 | 那么着 | 什么的 | 怎么样 | 怎么着 | 这么些 | 这么样 | 这么着 | 干什么 | 没什么 | 为什么 | 那么点儿 | 这么点儿 | 不怎么样 | 不差什么

义
义1[yì]（ㄧˋ）（義）1.正义 justice; righteousness：道义 morality and justice大义灭亲 uphold justice and righteousness at the sacrifice of one's blood relations义不容辞 be duty-bound; have an unshirkable duty 2.合乎正义或公益的 righteous; equitable; just：义举 righteous deed; magnanimous act undertaken for the public good义演 benefit performance 3.情谊 human ties; relationship; fraternity; friendship; friendly feelings：情义 friendship; mutual affection between friends, relatives忘恩负义 be ungrateful; show ingratitude for 4.因抚养或拜认而成为亲属的 adopted or adoptive：义父 adoptive father义女 adopted daughter 5.人工制造的（人体的部分）artificial; false：义齿 false teeth义肢 artificial limb 6.(Yì) 姓 a surname义2[yì]（ㄧˋ）（義）意义 meaning; significance：字义 meaning of a word定义 definition相关词组奥义 | 褒义 | 本义 | 贬义 | 词义 | 大义 | 道义 | 定义 | 广义 | 含义 | 涵义 | 讲义 | 教义 | 结义 | 就义 | 名义 | 歧义 | 起义 | 情义 | 仁义 | 释义 | 首义 | 侠义 | 狭义 | 新义 | 信义 | 演义 | 要义 | 疑义 | 意义 | 音义 | 喻义 | 仗义 | 正义 | 忠义 | 主义 | 字义 | 多义词 | 反义词 | 同义词 | 语义学 | 不义之财 | 大义凛然 | 大义灭亲 | 见义勇为 | 礼义廉耻 | 名义工资 | 仗义疏财 | 仗义执言 | 恩断义绝 | 仁至义尽 | 侠肝义胆 | 爱国主义 | 背信弃义 | 本本主义 | 本位主义 | 地方主义 | 帝国主义 | 断章取义 | 方腊起义 | 封建主义 | 改良主义 | 个人主义 | 功利主义 | 共产主义 | 古典主义 | 顾名思义 | 官僚主义 | 广州起义 | 国际主义 | 黄巢起义 | 黄巾起义 | 机会主义 | 急公好义 | 集体主义 | 假仁假义 | 教条主义 | 金田起义 | 军国主义 | 开宗明义 | 浪漫主义 | 利己主义 | 列宁主义 | 绿林起义 | 马列主义 | 蒙昧主义 | 民权主义 | 民生主义 | 民族主义 | 命令主义 | 南昌起义 | 农民起义 | 平均主义 | 秋收起义 | 人道主义 | 人文主义 | 三民主义 | 沙文主义 | 舍生取义 | 社会主义 | 实用主义 | 事务主义 | 疏财仗义 | 宋江起义 | 天经地义 | 忘恩负义 | 望文生义 | 微言大义 | 唯物主义 | 唯心主义 | 武昌起义 | 现实主义 | 写实主义 | 形式主义 | 修正主义 | 虚无主义 | 言不及义 | 折衷主义 | 殖民主义 | 种族主义 | 主观主义 | 资本主义 | 自然主义 | 自由主义 | 宗派主义 | 达尔文主义 | 大民族主义 | 大泽乡起义 | 法西斯主义 | 李自成起义 | 马克思主义 | 无政府主义 | 社会主义革命 | 八一南昌起义 | 辩证唯物主义 | 陈胜吴广起义 | 地方民族主义 | 官僚资本主义 | 机械唯物主义 | 科学共产主义 | 科学社会主义 | 客观唯心主义 | 历史唯物主义 | 历史唯心主义 | 右倾机会主义 | 主观唯心主义 | 共产主义青年团 | 社会主义所有制 | 新民主主义革命 | 马克思列宁主义义仓 | 义齿 | 义地 | 义愤 | 义工 | 义举 | 义军 | 义理 | 义卖 | 义拍 | 义旗 | 义气 | 义赛 | 义师 | 义士 | 义塾 | 义务 | 义项 | 义学 | 义演 | 义勇 | 义战 | 义诊 | 义肢 | 义冢 | 义和团 | 义务兵 | 义勇军 | 义不容辞 | 义愤填膺 | 义无反顾 | 义务教育 | 义形于色 | 义正词严 | 义务兵役制

义不容辞
义不容辞[yì bù róng cí] 道义上不允许推辞 be duty-bound; have an unshirkable duty

义举
义举[yì jǔ] 指疏财仗义的行为 righteous deed; philanthropic act undertaken for the public good; undertaking in the interest of the public

义仓
义仓[yì cāng]〈旧时 old〉地方上为防备荒年而设置的公益粮仓 public granary for storing relief grain in case of a famine

义军
义军[yì jūn] 起义的或为正义而战的军队 uprising army; army fighting for a just cause

义冢
义冢[yì zhǒng]〈旧时 old〉埋葬无主尸骨的坟墓 burial ground for the remains of unidentified persons

义务
义务[yì wù]1.公民或法人按法律规定应尽的责任，例如服兵役（跟‘权利’相对 as opposed to‘right’）duty; obligation; responsibility undertaken by a citizen or legal person according to law, such as serving in the army 2.道德上应尽的责任 moral obligation：我们有义务帮助学习较差的同学。We are duty-bound to help classmates who are not doing well in their studies. 3.不要报酬的 volunteer; voluntary：义务劳动 voluntary labour义务演出 voluntary performance

义务兵
义务兵[yì wù bīng] 按义务兵役制服役的士兵 compulsory serviceman

义务兵役制
义务兵役制[yì wù bīng yì zhì] 公民依照法律在一定年龄内有服一定期限兵役义务的制度 compulsory military service; conscription; military service system under which eligible citizens have the obligation to serve in the army

义务教育
义务教育[yì wù jiào yù] 国家在法律中规定一定年龄的儿童必须受到一定程度的教育 compulsory education; education that a child up to a prescribed age is compelled to receive under the state law

义勇
义勇[yì yǒng] 为正义事业而勇于斗争的 righteous and courageous：义勇军 volunteers; army of volunteers义勇之气 bravery in fighting a just war

义勇军
义勇军[yì yǒng jūn]人民为抗击侵略者自愿组织起来的军队。特指我国抗日时期人民自动组织起来的一种抗日武装。army of volunteers; volunteers; army organized by the people on a voluntary basis for the purpose of fighting against aggressors, esp. the armed anti-Japanese forces during the War of Resistance against Japan

义卖
义卖[yì mài] 为正义或公益的事情筹款而出售物品，出售的物品往往是捐献的，售价比市价高 charity sales; sale of goods for charity or other worthy causes. The goods on sale are often donated and their prices are above the market level.

义和团
义和团[Yì hé tuán] 19世纪末我国北方人民自发组织的反对帝国主义侵略的团体 Yihetuan, anti-imperialist organization formed by peasants and handicraftsmen in north China at the end of the 19th century

义地
义地[yì dì]〈旧时 old〉埋葬穷人的公共墓地。也指由私人或团体购置，专为埋葬一般同乡、团体成员及其家属的墓地。cemetery; public burial ground for the destitute; burial ground bought privately or by an organization for fellow provincials, members and their family dependents

义塾
义塾[yì shú] 同 same as 义学 yìxué

义士
义士[yì shì]〈旧时 old〉指能维护正义的或侠义的人 high-minded or chivalrous person; person who upholds justice; righteous man

义学
