争脸[zhēng liǎn] 争取荣誉，使脸上有光彩 try to win credit or honour：把书念好，给家长争脸。Study well in school and win credit for your parents.亦 also 争面子 zhēng∥miàn·zi

争衡
争衡[zhēng héng]〈书 fml.〉较量高低 scramble for supremacy; strive for mastery; be in rivalry with

争议
争议[zhēng yì] 同 same as 争论 zhēnglùn

争论
争论[zhēng lùn] 各执己见，互相辩论 controversy; dispute; debate：争论不休 endless debate

争辩
争辩[zhēng biàn] 争论；辩论 argue; debate; contend：据理争辩 argue on just grounds

争风吃醋
争风吃醋[zhēng fēng chī cù] 指因追求同一异性而互相忌妒争斗 fight for the affection of a man or woman; be jealous (of a rival in love)

争鸣
争鸣[zhēng míng]〈比喻 fig.〉在学术上进行争辩 contend (over academic issues)：百家争鸣 contentions among the exponents of various schools of thought

事
事[shì]（ㄕˋ）1.（事儿 shìr）事情 matter; affair; thing; business：公事 public affairs家事 family affairs国家大事 state or national affairs新人新事 new people and new things老王有事请假。Lao Wang asked for leave of absence to attend to some personal business.这事儿容易办。This matter is easy to manage. 2.（事儿 shìr）事故 trouble; accident：出事 have an accident平安无事。All is well.别怕，什么事儿也没有。Don't be afraid. There is nothing amiss. 3.（事儿 shìr）职业；工作 job; work：谋事 look for a job找事儿 seek employment 4.关系或责任 responsibility; involvement：回去吧，没有你的事了。You can go home now; we know this is not your responsibility. 5.〈书 fml.〉侍奉 be in the service of sb.; wait upon; attend upon：事父母至孝 attend upon one's parents with great filial piety 6.从事 be engaged in：大事宣扬 actively publicize a major event不事劳动 lead an idle life相关词组碍事 | 暗事 | 白事 | 办事 | 本事 | 边事 | 差事 | 常事 | 尘事 | 成事 | 丑事 | 出事 | 处事 | 炊事 | 蠢事 | 从事 | 大事 | 抵事 | 顶事 | 董事 | 懂事 | 多事 | 发事 | 法事 | 凡事 | 犯事 | 房事 | 费事 | 偾事 | 佛事 | 干事 | 工事 | 公事 | 共事 | 供事 | 故事 | 怪事 | 管事 | 国事 | 海事 | 憾事 | 行事 | 好事 | 恨事 | 横事 | 后事 | 花事 | 坏事 | 绘事 | 婚事 | 混事 | 祸事 | 即事 | 急事 | 记事 | 纪事 | 济事 | 家事 | 监事 | 接事 | 旧事 | 就事 | 举事 | 军事 | 快事 | 来事 | 乐事 | 了事 | 理事 | 领事 | 没事 | 美事 | 蒙事 | 民事 | 谋事 | 拿事 | 难事 | 闹事 | 能事 | 年事 | 农事 | 怕事 | 启事 | 起事 | 亲事 | 情事 | 趣事 | 惹事 | 人事 | 赛事 | 丧事 | 善事 | 生事 | 省事 | 盛事 | 失事 | 师事 | 施事 | 时事 | 实事 | 世事 | 视事 | 受事 | 私事 | 琐事 | 厅事 | 听事 | 通事 | 同事 | 推事 | 外事 | 完事 | 万事 | 往事 | 问事 | 物事 | 误事 | 喜事 | 闲事 | 心事 | 刑事 | 幸事 | 叙事 | 寻事 | 要事 | 一事 | 遗事 | 议事 | 逸事 | 用事 | 韵事 | 杂事 | 战事 | 招事 | 找事 | 肇事 | 正事 | 政事 | 知事 | 执事 | 主事 | 滋事 | 做事 | 百事通 | 办事员 | 大事记 | 当事人 | 董事会 | 故事片 | 和事老 | 记事儿 | 监事会 | 领事馆 | 没事人 | 万事通 | 刑事犯 | 叙事诗 | 不济事 | 尽人事 | 两回事 | 两码事 | 总领事 | 多事之秋 | 故事片儿 | 国事访问 | 好事多磨 | 就事论事 | 军事法庭 | 军事管制 | 军事基地 | 军事科学 | 军事体育 | 民事法庭 | 民事权利 | 民事诉讼 | 实事求是 | 无事生非 | 息事宁人 | 刑事法庭 | 刑事警察 | 刑事拘留 | 刑事判决 | 刑事诉讼 | 刑事责任 | 一事无成 | 遇事生风 | 踵事增华 | 东窗事发 | 公用事业 | 名山事业 | 七七事变 | 情随事迁 | 人身事故 | 无所事事 | 西安事变 | 责任事故 | 置身事外 | 便宜行事 | 不省人事 | 感情用事 | 行若无事 | 红白喜事 | 例行公事 | 人浮于事 | 若无其事 | 煞有介事 | 少不更事 | 无济于事 | 虚应故事 | 意气用事 | 因人成事 | 纪事本末体 | 领事裁判权 | 安全理事会 | 九一八事变 | 卢沟桥事变 | 像煞有介事 | 有志者事竟成 | 无事不登三宝殿 | 成事不足，败事有余 | 前事不忘，后事之师 | 万事俱备，只欠东风 | 不经一事，不长一智事变 | 事典 | 事端 | 事故 | 事后 | 事机 | 事迹 | 事假 | 事件 | 事理 | 事例 | 事略 | 事前 | 事情 | 事权 | 事实 | 事态 | 事体 | 事务 | 事物 | 事先 | 事项 | 事业 | 事宜 | 事由 | 事主 | 事半功倍 | 事倍功半 | 事必躬亲 | 事出有因 | 事过境迁 | 事务主义 | 事与愿违 | 事在人为

事与愿违
事与愿违[shì yǔ yuàn wéi] 事情的发展跟主观愿望相反 things run counter to one's wishes

事业
事业[shì yè]1.人所从事的，具有一定目标、规模和系统而对社会发展有影响的经常活动 cause; undertaking; career：革命事业 revolutionary cause科学文化事业 scientific and cultural undertakings事业心强 dedicated to one's work 2.特指没有生产收入，由国家经费开支，不进行经济核算的事业（区别于‘企业’ as compared with ‘enterprise’） organization, society, foundation, etc., subsidized by the state and with no need of economic accounting; institution; facilities：事业费 operating expenses事业单位 public institution

事主
事主[shì zhǔ]1.某些刑事案件（如偷窃、抢劫等）中的被害人 victim of a crime, e.g. theft, robbery, etc. 2.〈旧指 old〉办理婚丧喜事的人家 household holding a wedding or funeral ceremony

事件
事件[shì jiàn] 历史上或社会上发生的不平常的大事情 (unusual historical or social) event; incident：政治事件 political event

事体
事体[shì tǐ]〈方 dial.〉1. 同 same as 事情 shì·qing ②：出了啥事体？What happened? 2. 同 same as 事情 shì·qing ③：托朋友寻个事体做 ask a friend to find one a job

事例
事例[shì lì] 具有代表性的、可以作例子的事情 example; instance：结合实际事例对学生进行爱国主义教育 teach students to be patriotic by citing actual instances

事倍功半
事倍功半[shì bèi gōng bàn] 形容花费的劳力大，收到的成效小 achieve half the result with twice the effort

事假
事假[shì jià] 因办理个人的事而请的假 leave of absence to attend to private affairs

事先
事先[shì xiān] 同 same as 事前 shìqián：这件事事先我一点也不知道。I knew nothing of this beforehand.

事典
事典[shì diǎn]1.〈书 fml.〉专门辑录有关礼制事件的类书 encyclopaedia (of precedents, events, institutions and laws) 2.指辑录某方面事物的工具书，如《中华人民共和国四十年成就事典》 reference book on special subjects, e.g. Achievements of 40 Years in the People's Republic of China

事出有因
事出有因[shì chū yǒu yīn] 事情的发生有它的原因 sth. for which there is good reason; not without cause; no accident; apparently with cause; no smoke without fire

事前
事前[shì qián] 事情发生以前，也指事情处理、了结以前 before the event; in advance; beforehand：事前一无所知 not have the slightest inkling of an event in advance事前做好充分准备，免得到时忙乱。Make full preparation beforehand so as to avoid chaos and confusion when the time comes.

事务
事务[shì wù]1.所做的或要做的事情 work; affair; routine：事务繁忙 have a lot (of work) to do 2.总务 general affairs：事务科 general affairs section事务员 staff in the general affairs section事务工作 routine work

事务主义
事务主义[shì wù zhǔ yì] 没有计划，不分轻重、主次，不注意方针、政策和政治思想教育，而只埋头于日常琐碎事务的工作作风 routinism; work style of paying excessive attention to daily petty matters instead of making overall plans, to the neglect of policies, principles and political education

事半功倍
事半功倍[shì bàn gōng bèi] 形容花费的劳力小，收到的成效大 achieve twice the result with half the effort

事变
事变[shì biàn]1.突然发生的重大政治、军事性事件 incident; important event in politics or war that takes place suddenly：七七事变 July 7th Incident of 1937西安事变 Xi'an Incident (of 1936) 2.政治、军事方面的重大变化 emergency; exigency; major event in politics or war 3.泛指事物的变化 course of events; events：找出周围事变的内部联系，作为我们行动的向导。Look into the implicit relationship of events occurring around one in all their changing aspects and use the resultant information as our guideline.

事后
事后[shì hòu] 事情发生以后，也指事情处理、了结以后 after the event; afterwards：事后方知其中真相 get to know the truth of the matter after the event事先周密考虑，事后认真总结。Consider the matter carefully before taking action and make a detailed summary after the event.

事在人为
事在人为[shì zài rén wéi] 事情能否成功，取决于人是否努力去做 success hinges on human effort; human effort is the decisive factor

事宜
事宜[shì yí] 关于事情的安排、处理（多用于公文、法令 oft. used in official documents and decrees） matters concerned; arrangements：商谈呈递国书事宜 discuss issues associated with the presentation of diplomatic credentials

事实
事实[shì shí] 事情的真实情况 fact：事实胜于雄辩。Facts are stronger than rhetoric. or Facts speak louder than words.传闻与事实不符。The rumour going around does not tally with the facts.

事必躬亲
事必躬亲[shì bì gōng qīn] 不管什么事一定亲自去做 see (or attend) to everything oneself; give personal attention to everything, big or small

事态
事态[shì tài] 局势；情况（多指坏的 usu. unfavourable） state of affairs; situation：事态严重。The situation is serious.事态扩大 aggravate the situation事态有所缓和。Things have calmed down.

事情
事情[shì qing]1.人类生活中的一切活动和所遇到的一切社会现象 affair; matter; question; business：事情多，忙不过来 busy at work; too much business to attend to 2.事故；差错 trouble; mistake：不能马虎，出了事情就麻烦了。Be very careful, because if anything untoward should happen, you will be in big trouble. 3.职业；工作 work; job：在公司里找了一个事情 find a job with a company

事故
事故[shì gù] 意外的损失或灾祸（多指在生产、工作上发生的 usu. at production and work）accident; mishap：工伤事故 industrial accident责任事故 accident arising from sb.'s negligence防止发生事故 try to avert or prevent accidents

事机
事机[shì jī]1.需要保守机密的事情 affairs that should be kept secret：事机败露 leak out a secret; expose 2.情势；行事的时机 situation; right time to act; opportunity：延误事机 miss an opportunity because of a delay

事权
事权[shì quán] 处理事情的权力；职权 power; authority：下放事权 transfer power to a lower level

事物
事物[shì wù] 指客观存在的一切物体和现象 thing; object; reality

事理
事理[shì lǐ] 事情的道理 reason; logic：明白事理 be reasonable; be sensible

事由
事由[shì yóu]1.事情的原委 origin of an incident; particulars of a matter：把事由交代明白 give all the particulars about the incident 2.公文用语，指本件公文的主要内容 (used in official documents) main content; gist 3.（事由儿 shìyóur）指借口；理由 excuse, pretext：找个事由离开会场 find an excuse to leave the meeting place 4.〈方 dial.〉（事由儿 shìyóur）职业；工作 job; work：找个正经事由干 find a decent job

事略
事略[shì lüè] 传记文体的一种，记述人的生平大概 biographical sketch; short biographical account

事端
事端[shì duān] 事故；纠纷 disturbance; incident：挑起事端 provoke incidents

事过境迁
事过境迁[shì guò jìng qiān] 事情已经过去，客观环境也改变了 that was then, and this is now; the matter is now in the past and the situation has changed; the incident is over and the circumstances are different

事迹
事迹[shì jì] 个人或集体过去做过的比较重要的事情 deed (of a person or a collective); merit; achievement：生平事迹 one's life story模范事迹 exemplary deeds

事项
事项[shì xiàng] 事情的项目 item; matter：注意事项 items for attention; matters needing attention; points for attention

二
二[èr]（ㄦˋ）1.数目，一加一后所得 two; sum of one plus one; 注意 NOTE：‘二’和‘两’用法上的分别， 另见  两 liǎng for difference in usage of the two characters, 二 èr and 两 liǎng 2.两样 different：不二价 no bargaining不二法门 one and only way心无二用 cannot keep one's mind on two things at the same time另见  数字 shùzì相关词组封二 | 一二 | 不二价 | 第二审 | 京二胡 | 十二分 | 店小二 | 不二法门 | 第二产业 | 第二课堂 | 第二世界 | 第二职业 | 接二连三 | 十二指肠 | 别无二致 | 毫无二致 | 哼哈二将 | 七十二行 | 三心二意 | 心无二用 | 一…二… | 一差二错 | 一来二去 | 一穷二白 | 独一无二 | 划一不二 | 数一数二 | 说一不二 | 黄道十二宫 | 一退六二五 | 三下五除二 | 第二信号系统 | 第二宇宙速度 | 一二·九运动 | 九牛二虎之力 | 第二次世界大战 | 第二次鸦片战争 | 不管三七二十一 | 一不做，二不休 | 一是一，二是二 | 第二次国内革命战争二八 | 二房 | 二伏 | 二副 | 二乎 | 二胡 | 二话 | 二黄 | 二婚 | 二老 | 二毛 | 二门 | 二审 | 二手 | 二天 | 二线 | 二心 | 二意 | 二战 | 二英 | 二把刀 | 二百二 | 二百五 | 二部制 | 二地主 | 二房东 | 二锅头 | 二花脸 | 二婚头 | 二极管 | 二进制 | 二郎腿 | 二愣子 | 二流子 | 二拇指 | 二年生 | 二人台 | 二人转 | 二踢脚 | 二五眼 | 二性子 | 二元论 | 二重性 | 二次能源 | 二道贩子 | 二级市场 | 二十八宿 | 二十四史 | 二十五史 | 二氧化碳 | 二七大罢工 | 二十四节气 | 二一添作五

二一添作五
二一添作五[èr yī tiān zuò wǔ] 本是珠算除法的一句口诀，是1/2=0.5的意思，借指双方平分 one of the abacus rhymes, meaning 1/2 equalling 0.5; go halves; share sth. on a fifty-fifty basis

二七大罢工
二七大罢工[?r Qī Dà Bà gōng] 1923年京汉铁路工人在中国共产党领导下举行的反帝、反军阀的政治罢工。2月7日，军阀吴佩孚在汉口、长辛店等地镇压罢工工人，造成流血惨案，所以这次罢工叫二七大罢工。 Great Strike of February 7, 1923; anti-imperialist, anti-warlord strike by the Beijing-Hankou railway workers led by the Chinese Communist Party in 1923. On February 7, 1923, the warlord Wu Peifu masterminded a massacre of the workers on strike in Hankou and Changxindian, hence the term.

二乎
二乎[èr hu]〈方 dial.〉1.畏缩 shrink back in fear; flinch：他在困难面前向来不二乎。He never flinches from hardship. 2.心里犹疑，不能确定 be perplexed; feel uncertain：你越说越把我弄二乎了。The more you talk about it, the more puzzled I am. 3.指望不大 unpromising; of little hope：我看这件事二乎了，你说呢？There's hardly any hope in this matter, you think so?亦 also 二忽 èr·hu

二五眼
二五眼[èr wu yǎn]〈方 dial.〉1.（人）能力差；（物品）质量差 (of a person) incompetent; mediocre; (of things) of low quality; of inferior quality 2.能力差的人 incompetent person

二人台
二人台[èr rén tái]1.流行于内蒙古自治区的一种曲艺，用笛子、四胡、扬琴等乐器伴奏，由二人对唱对舞 popular Inner-Mongolian song-and-dance duet, accompanied by musical instruments such as the flute, sihu, dulcimer, etc. 2.由曲艺二人台发展而成的地方戏曲剧种 local opera based on such song-and-dance duets

二人转
二人转[èr rén zhuàn]1.流行于黑龙江、吉林、辽宁一带的曲艺，用板胡、唢呐等乐器伴奏，一般由二人舞蹈说唱 song-and-dance duet, popular in Heilongjiang, Jilin and Liaoning provinces, accompanied by musical instruments like banhu, suona horn, etc. 2.由曲艺二人转发展而成的地方戏曲剧种 local opera based on such song-and-dance duets

二伏
二伏[èr fú] 中伏 second of the three hottest ten-day periods of summer

二元论
二元论[èr yuán lùn] 一种企图调和唯物主义和唯心主义的哲学观点，认为世界的本原是精神和物质两个实体。二元论实质上坚持精神离开物质而独立存在，归根结底还是唯心的。 dualism; philosophy that tries to compromise materialism with idealism, believing that the origin of the world comprises the two basic entities of spirit and matter. In essence, dualism insists on the existence of spirit independent of matter, so it boils down to nothing more than idealism.

二八
二八[èr bā]〈书 fml.〉指十六岁 16 years old：年方二八 be only 16 years old

二副
二副[èr fù] 轮船上船员的职务名称，职位次于大副 second mate; second officer on a ship, next in command after the first mate;另见  大副 dàfù

二十五史
二十五史[èr shí wǔ shǐ] 二十四史与《新元史》的合称 Twenty-Five Histories; Twenty-Four Histories plus the New History of Yuan

二十八宿
二十八宿[èr shí bā xiù] 我国古代天文学家把天空中可见的星分成二十八组，叫做二十八宿，东西南北四方各七宿。东方苍龙七宿是角、亢、氐(dī)、房、心、尾、箕；北方玄武七宿是斗、牛、女、虚、危、室、壁；西方白虎七宿是奎、娄、胃、昴(mǎo)、毕、觜(zī)、参(shēn)；南方朱雀七宿是井、鬼、柳、星、张、翼、轸(zhěn)。印度、波斯、阿拉伯古代也有类似我国二十八宿的说法。 lunar mansions; 28 constellations; ancient Chinese astronomers divided the stars that they could see into 28 constellations, which were further divided into four major groups, each group taking up one of the four quadrants of the sky, i.e. seven constellations. The eastern quadrant is Blue Dragon (苍龙), which comprises jiǎo (角)，káng (亢), dǐ (氐), fāng (房), xīn (心), wěi (尾) and jī (箕); the northern quadrant is Black Tortoise (玄武), which comprises dǒu (斗), níu (牛), nǚ (女), xǚ (虚), wēi (危), shì (室) and bì (壁); the western quadrant is White Tiger (白虎), which comprises kuí (奎), lóu (娄), wèi (胃), mǎo (昴), bì (毕), zǐ (觜) and shēn (参); and the southern quadrant is Scarlet Bird (朱雀), which comprises jǐng (井), guǐ (鬼), liǔ (柳), xīng (星), zhāng (张), yì (翼) and zhěn (轸). Ancient India, Persia and Arab had similar theories on onstellations.

二十四史
二十四史[èr shí sì shǐ] 指旧时称为正史的二十四部纪传体史书，即：《史记》、《汉书》、《后汉书》、《三国志》、《晋书》、《宋书》、《南齐书》、《梁书》、《陈书》、《魏书》、《北齐书》、《周书》、《隋书》、《南史》、《北史》、《唐书》(旧唐书)、《新唐书》、《五代史》(旧五代史)、《新五代史》、《宋史》、《辽史》、《金史》、《元史》、《明史》 Twenty-Four Histories, which are official history books written in the form of a series of biographies, including Records of the Historian, History of Han, History of Later Han, Records of Three Kingdoms, History of Jin (265-420), History of Song, History of Southern Qi, History of Liang, History of Chen, History of Wei, History of Northern Qi, History of Zhou, History of Sui, History of Southern Dynasties, History of Northern Dynasties, Old History of Tang, New History of Tang, Old History of the Five Dynasties, New History of the Five Dynasties, History of Song, History of Liao, History of Jin(1115-1234), History of Yuan, and History of Ming

二十四节气
二十四节气[èr shí sì jié qì] 指立春、雨水、惊蛰、春分、清明、谷雨、立夏、小满、芒种、夏至、小暑、大暑、立秋、处暑、白露、秋分、寒露、霜降、立冬、小雪、大雪、冬至、小寒、大寒等二十四个节气。二十四节气表明气候变化和农事季节，在农业生产上有重要的意义。 24 seasonal division points by which the solar year is divided according to the Chinese lunar calendar, including Beginning of Spring（立春）, Rain Water（雨水）, Waking of Insects（惊蛰）, Vernal Equinox（春分）, Pure Brightness（清明）, Grain Rain（谷雨）, Beginning of Summer（立夏）, Small Fullness of Grain（小满）, Grain in Ear（芒种）, Summer Solstice（夏至）, Small Heat（小暑）, Great Heat（大暑）, Beginning of Autumn（立秋）, Decline of Heat（处暑）, White Dew（白露）, Autumnal Equinox（秋分）, Cold Dew（寒露）, Frost's Descent（霜降）, Beginning of Winter（立冬）, Small Snow（小雪）, Great Snow（大雪）, Winter Solstice（冬至）, Small Cold（小寒）and Great Cold（大寒）. The 24 solar terms, which indicate the change of climate and timing for agricultural activities, are of great significance to agriculture.

二地主
二地主[èr dì zhǔ] 向地主租入大量土地，自己不耕种，转租给别人，以收取地租为主要生活来源的人 sub-landlord; person who rents land from a landlord and sub-leases it to others instead of tilling it himself so as to live off rent

二天
二天[èr tiān]〈方 dial.〉过一两天；改天 within a day or two; another day; some other time：二天有空我再来看你。I'll come to see you some other day.

二婚
二婚[èr hūn] 再婚（多指妇女再嫁 usu. of a woman） remarry

二婚头
二婚头[èr hūn tóu] 指再嫁的妇女（含轻视意 derog.） remarried woman亦 also 二婚儿 èrhūnr

二审
二审[èr shěn]另见  第二审 dì'èrshěn

二年生
二年生[èr nián shēng] 种子萌发的当年只长出根和叶子，次年才开花结实，然后死亡的，如萝卜、白菜、洋葱等植物都是二年生的 biennial; (of a plant) grow roots and leaves in the first year, flower, fruit and die in the second, e.g. radish, Chinese cabbage, onion, etc.

二心
二心[èr xīn]1.不忠实；异心 two-time; be a two-timer：怀有二心 be disloyal; be unfaithful 2.不专心；三心二意 absent-minded; half-hearted亦 also 贰心 èrxīn

二性子
二性子[èr xìng zi] 两性人的通称 herma-phrodite; general term for bisexual or androgynous person

二意
二意[èr yì] 同 same as 二心 èrxīn：决无二意 with utter devotion; be loyal for ever三心二意 waver and hesitate; be of two minds; be half-hearted

二愣子
二愣子[èr lèng zi] 指鲁莽的人 hothead

二战
二战[?r zhàn] 第二次世界大战的简称 abbr. for 第二次世界大战 Dì ?r Cì Shìjiè Dàzhàn

二房
二房[èr fáng]1.〈旧时 old〉家族中排行第二的一支 second male branch of an extended family; branch headed by the second son 2.小老婆；妾 concubine

二房东
二房东[èr fáng dōng] 指把租来的房屋转租给别人而从中取利的人 sub-landlord; person who rents a room from a landlord and sublets it to make a profit

二手
二手[èr shǒu]（～儿 èrshǒur）指间接的；辗转得来的（事物） second-hand; attained indirectly：二手资料 second-hand materials从国外购进的二手设备 second-hand equipment bought from abroad

二把刀
二把刀[èr bǎ dāo]〈方 dial.〉1.对某项工作知识不足，技术不高 have a smatter of a subject; have half-baked knowledge or skill 2.称某项工作知识不足，技术不高的人 dabbler; smatterer

二拇指
二拇指[èr mu zhǐ] 第二个手指头；食指 forefinger; index finger

二极管
二极管[èr jí guǎn] 有两个电极的电子管或晶体管 diode; electron tube or transistor with two electrodes;另见  晶体管 jīngtǐguǎn and 电子管 diànzǐguǎn

二次能源
二次能源[èr cì néng yuán] 指依靠一次能源来产生或制取的能源，如水力发电产生的电能，分馏石油制取的汽油、柴油等 secondary energy, produced from a primary energy, such as electricity generated from waterpower, gas and diesel produced by distilling oil, etc.

二毛
二毛[èr máo]〈书 fml.〉1.花白的头发 grey or grizzled hair 2.指头发花白的老人 old people with grey hair or greying temples

二氧化碳
二氧化碳[èr yǎng huà tàn] 无机化合物，化学式CO?。无色无臭的气体，比空气重，空气中含量约为0.04%。动物呼吸时吸入氧气，呼出二氧化碳；绿色植物进行光合作用时放出氧气，吸入二氧化碳。用来制纯碱、清凉性饮料等，也用来灭火。 carbon dioxide; carbonic-acid gas; carbonic anhydride; colourless, odourless gas, chemical formula CO?, heavier than the air and occupying 0.04% of the atmosphere, produced during respiration by animals and humans who inhale oxygen and exhale carbon dioxide, and consumed during the photosynthesis of green plants that inhale carbon dioxide and exhale oxygen, used extensively in manufacturing soda ash and soft drinks, and in fire extinguishers as well; 亦 also 碳酐 tàngān 或 or 碳酸气 tànsuānqì

二流子
二流子[èr liú zi] 游手好闲、不务正业的人 loafer; idler; bum

二百二
二百二[èr bǎi èr] 汞溴红的通称 general term for mercurochrome亦 also 二百二十 èrbǎi èrshí

二百五
二百五[èr bǎi wǔ]1.讥称有些傻气，做事莽撞的人 halfwit; person who is a bit stupid and acts rashly 2.〈方 dial.〉半瓶醋 dabbler; smatterer; dilettante

二级市场
二级市场[èr jí shì chǎng] 指对已经售出的证券、商品房等再进行交易的市场 secondary market; market on which secondhand securities，commercial housing, etc. are traded

二线
二线[èr xiàn]1.战争中的第二道防线 second line of defence (in a war) 2.〈比喻 fig.〉不负有直接领导责任的地位 position of less responsibility：退居二线 step down from an important position and take a secondary position

二老
二老[èr lǎo] 指父母 parents：二老双亲 father and mother; parents

二胡
二胡[èr hú] 胡琴的一种，比京胡大，琴筒用木头做成，前端稍大，蒙蟒皮，有两根弦，声音低沉圆润 erhu; two-stringed bowed instrument having a low but mellow sound, slightly larger than Peking Opera fiddle, its resonator being made of wood and covered with boa skin亦 also 南胡 nánhú

二花脸
二花脸[èr huā liǎn] 架子花 erhualian; male role in Peking Opera with a painted face, laying more emphasis on postures and acting rather than on singing

二话
二话[èr huà]别的话；不同的意见（指后悔、抱怨、讲条件等，多用于否定句 referring to regret, complaint or argument; oft. used in the negative） other words; different opinions：二话不提 without much ado; without demur尽管吩咐就是了，我决无二话。If you have any instructions, please let me know. I'll do as told.

二踢脚
二踢脚[èr tī jiǎo] 双响（一种爆竹） double-bang firecracker

二进制
二进制[èr jìn zhì] 一种记数法，采用0和1两个数码，逢二进位。如十进制的2，5在二进制中分别记为10，101。二进制广泛应用在电子计算机的计算中。 binary system; system of numerical notation to the base 2, which uses only two numerals 0 and 1. For example, 2 and 5 in the decimal system are expressed as 10 and 101 respectively in the binary system, which is widely used in computing.

二道贩子
二道贩子[èr dào fàn zi] 指从商店或别人手中买进货物，转手倒卖，从中牟利的人（多含贬义 usu. derog.） scalper; merchant who makes profits by buying cheap and selling dear

二郎腿
二郎腿[èr láng tuǐ] 坐着的时候把一条腿搁在另一条腿上的姿势 cross-legged posture; sitting posture with one leg placed on the other

二部制
二部制[èr bù zhì] 中小学把学生分成两部轮流在校上课的教学组织形式 two-shift system; teaching arrangement where primary and middle school students take turns to come to classes

二重性
二重性[èr chóng xìng] 指事物本身所固有的互相矛盾的两种属性，即一种事物同时具有两种互相对立的性质。如商品，一方面它有使用价值，另一方面它有价值。 dual character; dual nature; duality; two intrinsic contradictory aspects in one thing. In other words, a thing has two opposite natures existing within it at the same time; e.g. merchandise has its value and use value as well.亦 also 两重性 liǎngchóngxìng

二锅头
二锅头[èr guō tóu] 一种较纯的白酒，在蒸馏时，除去最先出的和最后出的酒，留下来的就是二锅头 erguotou; strong, colourless liquor of high purity, produced from the second distillation in the course of brewing

二门
二门[èr mén]（较大的院落等）大门里面的一道总的门 inner gate; (of a big courtyard) second gate leading to the main living quarters

二黄
二黄[èr huáng] 戏曲声腔之一，用胡琴伴奏。跟西皮合称皮黄。 erhuang; a singing style in traditional Chinese opera, usu. accompanied by huqin; called 皮黄 píhuáng together with another singing style 西皮 xīpí; 亦 also 二簧 èrhuáng

二英
二英[èr è yīng]一类有毒的含氯有机化合物，有强烈的致畸和致癌作用。在垃圾焚烧、汽车尾气排放、纸浆漂白和金属热加工过程中都可能产生。进入人体的主要途径是饮食，尤其是受污染的肉类和乳制品。dioxin; toxic organic compound containing chlorine, which can cause malformation and cancer, produced by burning garbage, automobile exhaust emission, bleaching of paper pulp, and heat treatment of metals. It enters the human body mainly through food and drink, particularly contaminated meat and dairy products.

亍
亍[chù]（ㄔㄨˋ）另见  [彳亍] (chìchù)

于
于1[yú]（ㄩˊ）（於）1.〈介词 prep.〉(a)在 in; on; at：她生于1949年。She was born in 1949.黄河发源于青海。The Yellow River rises in Qinghai Province. (b)向 towards; to：问道于盲 ask a blind man for the way; seek advice from an inapt person告慰于知己 console one's friend求救于人 ask sb. for help; (c)给 to：嫁祸于人 shift the blame to others献身于科学事业 dedicate oneself to science; (d)对；对于 to：忠于祖国 be loyal to the motherland有益于人民 be beneficial to the people形势于我们有利。The situation is favourable to us. (e)自；从 from：青出于蓝 the disciple outdoing the master出于自愿 voluntarily; (f)表示比较 [indicating comparison]：大于 bigger than少于 less than; fewer than高于 higher than低于 lower than; (g)表示被动 [in passive voice] by：见笑于大方之家 be laughed at by experts 2.后缀 [postfix; suffix]: (a)动词后缀 [after a verb]：合于 conform to; accord with; tally with属于 belong to在于 lie in至于 as for; (b)形容词后缀 [after an adjective]：勇于负责 dare to be responsible for; have the courage to bear responsibility for善于调度 good at organizing易于了解 easy to understand难于实行 difficult to carry out另见  於 wū and Yū于2[Yú]（ㄩˊ） 姓 a surname相关词组便于 | 濒于 | 处于 | 淳于 | 等于 | 对于 | 甘于 | 敢于 | 工于 | 关于 | 归于 | 过于 | 基于 | 急于 | 见于 | 鉴于 | 居于 | 苦于 | 乐于 | 利于 | 忙于 | 难于 | 期于 | 善于 | 属于 | 位于 | 鲜于 | 限于 | 陷于 | 易于 | 勇于 | 由于 | 寓于 | 在于 | 长于 | 至于 | 忠于 | 终于 | 等于零 | 不下于 | 不至于 | 老于世故 | 拟于不伦 | 疲于奔命 | 轻于鸿毛 | 死于非命 | 伊于胡底 | 溢于言表 | 聊胜于无 | 青出于蓝 | 人浮于事 | 同归于尽 | 问道于盲 | 无动于衷 | 无济于事 | 喜形于色 | 言归于好 | 义形于色 | 千里之堤，溃于蚁穴 | 千里之行，始于足下于今 | 于是 | 于思

于今
于今[yú jīn]1.到现在 up to the present; since：故乡一别，于今十载。It's 10 years since we parted at our native village. 2.如今 nowadays; today; now：这城市建设得非常快，于今已看不出原来的面貌。The city's construction has been going on really fast - it's changed beyond recognition.

于思
于思[yú sāi]〈书 fml.〉形容胡须很多（多叠用 oft. used in a repetitive way）heavily bearded

于是
于是[yú shì]〈连词 conj.〉表示后一事紧接着前一事，后一事往往是由前一事引起的 [indicating that the latter immediately follows the former, and that the latter is oft. led to by the former] so; then; thereupon; hence：大家一鼓励，我于是恢复了信心。With your encouragement, I've regained my confidence.亦 also 于是乎 yúshìhū

亏
亏[kuī]（ㄎㄨㄟ）（虧）1.受损失；亏折 suffer loss; deficit：亏本 lose money in business盈亏 profit and loss亏损 financial loss做生意亏了 lose money in business 2.欠缺；短少 insufficient; shortage：血亏 anaemia理亏 inadequate reason; unreasonable功亏一篑 fail to achieve success for lack of one last effort 3.亏负 disappoint; treat unfairly：亏心 feel guilty人不亏地，地不亏人。Good harvest comes from well-tended farmland.你放心吧，我亏不了你。Rest assured that I'll be fair with you. 4.多亏；幸亏 due to; thanks to：亏他提醒我，我才想起来。I'd have forgotten about it if he had not reminded me. 5.反说，表示讥讽 [expression of irony]：这样不合理的话，倒亏你说得出来。How could you make such unreasonable remarks.亏你还是哥哥，一点也不知道让着弟弟。What an elder brother you are, being so mean to your younger brother.相关词组吃亏 | 初亏 | 得亏 | 多亏 | 减亏 | 理亏 | 扭亏 | 潜亏 | 幸亏 | 血亏 | 盈亏 | 拉亏空 | 哑巴亏 | 眼前亏 | 功亏一篑 | 吃哑巴亏亏本 | 亏产 | 亏秤 | 亏待 | 亏得 | 亏短 | 亏负 | 亏耗 | 亏空 | 亏累 | 亏欠 | 亏蚀 | 亏损 | 亏心 | 亏折

亏产
亏产[kuī chǎn] 没有达到原定生产数量；欠产 fail to reach a production target; fall short of the production quota：上半年亏产原煤500多万吨。Raw coal output for the first six months fell over five million tons short of the quota.改进管理制度，变亏产为超产 improve the managing system and turn losses into profits

亏待
亏待[kuī dài] 待人不公平或不尽心 treat unfairly; treat shabbily：你放心吧，我一定不亏待他。Don't worry. I won't treat him shabbily.

亏得
亏得[kuī de]1.多亏 fortunately; luckily; thanks to：亏得厂里帮助我，才渡过了难关。Thanks to the help from the factory, I overcame the difficulties. 2.反说，表示讥讽 say sth. opposite to express sarcasm：这么长时间才借给我，亏得你还记得。Fancy you still remembering to lend it to me after such a long time.

亏心
亏心[kuī xīn] 感觉到自己的言行违背正理 have a guilty conscience; feel guilty because one's words or acts have been unreasonable or unjust：你说这话，真亏心！Don't you feel guilty for saying that!为人不做亏心事，半夜敲门心不惊。When one doesn't do anything to feel guilty for, one doesn't fear midnight knocks at the door. or A clear conscience sleeps through thunder.

亏折
亏折[kuī shé]损失（本钱）lose money in business; lose one's capital：亏折血本 lose all that one has invested

亏损
亏损[kuī sǔn]1.支出超过收入；亏折 loss; deficit：企业经营不善，亏损很大。The enterprise suffered great losses due to bad management. 2.身体因受到摧残或缺乏营养以致虚弱 fragility; debility; weakness caused by injury to the body or lack of nourishment：气血亏损 deficiency in vital energy and circulation

亏本
亏本[kuī běn]（～儿 kuī∥běnr）损失本钱；赔本 lose one's capital; lose money in business; be in the red：做买卖亏了本 lose money in business; run a business at a loss工厂经营得好，不会亏本。(We) won't lose money if the factory is run well.

亏欠
亏欠[kuī qiàn] 亏空 have a deficit; be in arrears; be in debt

亏短
亏短[kuī duǎn] 数量不足；缺少 not enough in amount or number; deficient; short：亏短分量 give short measure账上亏短1,000元 1,000 yuan short in the accounts

亏秤
亏秤[kuī chèng]1.用秤称东西卖时不给够分量 give short measure：无论老人、小孩儿去买东西，他从不亏秤。He never gives short measure to his customers, be they old or young. 2.折秤 (shé∥chèng) lose weight：青菜水分大，一放就会亏秤。As the greens have a high water content, they will lose weight after being stored.

亏空
亏空[kuī kong]1.支出超过收入，因而欠人财物 have a deficit; be in debt：没有精打细算，上月亏空了100元。(We) had a deficit of 100 yuan last month due to poor planning. 2.所欠的财物 debt; deficit：过日子要是精打细算，就拉不了亏空。If you plan your budget carefully, you won't get into debt.

亏累
亏累[kuī lěi] 一次又一次地亏空 sustain repeated losses; repeatedly come up with deficits：由于经营不善，这个商店连年亏累。The store suffered repeated losses over the years due to bad management.

亏耗
亏耗[kuī hào] 损耗 wastage; spoilage; loss through natural processes：这批水果运输时间长，亏耗很大。This batch of fruit suffered a lot of spoilage in its long course of transportation.

亏蚀
亏蚀[kuī shí]1.指日蚀和月蚀 eclipse of the sun or moon 2.亏本 lose money in business; lose one's capital：资金亏蚀 loss of funds 3.损耗 wastage; loss; wear and tear：瓜果在运输途中总要有亏蚀。Melons and fruits always suffer natural losses in the course of transportation.

亏负
亏负[kuī fù]1.辜负 fail to live up to; fail to measure up to; let sb. down：他亏负了大家的期望。He failed to live up to everyone's expectations. 2.使吃亏 cause sb. to be shortchanged; let sb. down：大家没有亏负你的地方。Nobody has done anything unfair to you.

云
云1[yún]（ㄩㄣˊ）1.说 say; speak：人云亦云 repeat what others say; parrot不知所云 do not understand what other people say or mean 2.古汉语助词 (auxiliary word in classical Chinese)：岁云暮矣。The year is drawing to its end.云2[yún]（ㄩㄣˊ）（雲）在空中悬浮的由水滴、冰晶聚集形成的物体 cloud; airborne matter formed of water droplets and ice particles云3[Yún]（ㄩㄣˊ）（雲）1.指云南 Yunnan Province：云腿（云南宣威一带出产的火腿）Yunnan ham (produced in Xuanwei in Yunnan Province) 2.姓 a surname相关词组彩云 | 愁云 | 低云 | 多云 | 风云 | 浮云 | 红云 | 凌云 | 青云 | 彤云 | 乌云 | 星云 | 烟云 | 疑云 | 阴云 | 战云 | 香云纱 | 火烧云 | 蘑菇云 | 白云苍狗 | 拨云见日 | 愁云惨雾 | 穿云裂石 | 翻云覆雨 | 风云人物 | 耕云播雨 | 行云流水 | 烘云托月 | 密云不雨 | 青云直上 | 人云亦云 | 腾云驾雾 | 闲云野鹤 | 风流云散 | 风起云涌 | 过眼云烟 | 九霄云外 | 判若云泥 | 响彻云霄 | 烟消云散 | 不知所云 | 叱咤风云 | 风卷残云 | 平步青云 | 响遏行云 | 大旱望云霓云板 | 云豹 | 云鬓 | 云彩 | 云层 | 云豆 | 云端 | 云朵 | 云贵 | 云海 | 云汉 | 云集 | 云锦 | 云锣 | 云母 | 云气 | 云雀 | 云散 | 云梯 | 云天 | 云头 | 云图 | 云雾 | 云霞 | 云霄 | 云崖 | 云烟 | 云翳 | 云游 | 云雨 | 云云 | 云片糕 | 云头儿 | 云谲波诡 | 云泥之别 | 云山雾罩 | 云消雾散 | 云蒸霞蔚

云云
云云[yún yún]〈书 fml.〉如此；这样（引用文句或谈话时，表示结束或有所省略）[used at the end of a speech or quotation to indicate an ending or omission] and so on; and so forth; etc.：他来信说读了不少新书，很有心得云云。He wrote to say that he had read many new books and learned a lot in the process, and so on.

云图
云图[yún tú] 云的图片，记录着某时某地云的情况和形状，是气象研究和预报的参考资料 cloud atlas; cloud chart; cloud picture that records the state and shape of clouds at a certain time in a certain place, serving as reference material for weather research and forecasting

云天
云天[yún tiān] 高空；云霄 sky; welkin：响彻云天 sound throughout the sky; make the welkin ring高耸云天 tower into the sky高峰直插云天。The high peaks reached towards the sky.

云头
云头[yún tóu] 看起来成团成堆的云 cloud cluster; cloud; heap of clouds：看这云头像有雨的样子。From the look of the clouds, it is going to rain.

云头儿
云头儿[yún tóu r] 云状的图案花纹 cloud pattern

云层
云层[yún céng] 成层的云 cloud layer：许多山峰高出云层。Many towering peaks reach high above the clouds.灰色的云层低低压在大森林上面。The grey clouds pressed down over the forest.

云山雾罩
云山雾罩[yún shān wù zhào]1.形容云雾弥漫 misty; cloud-enshrouded; enveloped in cloud; permeating mist; under a thickening pall of mist 2.形容说话漫无边际，使人困惑不解 (of speech) make one feel completely at sea; confusing; perplexing; discursive; rambling

云崖
云崖[yún yá] 高耸入云的山崖 steep cliffs towering into the sky

云彩
云彩[yún cai] 云 cloud：蓝蓝的天上没有一丝云彩。There is not a speck of cloud in the blue sky.

云散
云散[yún sàn] 像天空的云那样四处散开 disperse like clouds: (a)〈比喻 fig.〉曾在一起的人分散到各地 (of people) scatter to different places：旧友云散。Old friends scattered like dispersing clouds. (b)〈比喻 fig.〉事物四散消失 disappear; vanish; dissolve：烟消云散 melt into thin air; vanish like smoke; disappear like clouds

云朵
云朵[yún duǒ] 呈块状的云 fluffy cloud; mass of cloud; cloud

云板
云板[yú bǎn]〈旧时 old〉打击乐器，用长铁片做成，两端作云头形，官署和权贵之家多用做报时报事的器具 percussion instrument, made of a pair of long strips of sheet iron with cloud patterns on both ends, and used in the old times to announce time or an event in government offices or influential families亦 also 云版 yúnbǎn

云梯
云梯[yún tī] 攻城或救火时用的长梯 scaling ladder; long ladder used when attacking a city or in fire-fighting

云母
云母[yún mǔ]矿物，主要成分是硅酸盐，白色、黑色，带有深浅不同的褐色或绿色。耐高温，不导电，能分成透明的可以弯曲的薄片，在电力和电子工业中是重要的绝缘材料。mica; mineral, consisting mainly of silicate, which comes in different colours, with white and black tinted with different shades of brown or green. Highly heat-resistant and insulating, it can be made into translucent and flexible sheets, an important insulation material.

云气
云气[yún qì] 稀薄游动的云 thin, floating cloud

云汉
云汉[yún hàn]〈书 fml.〉1.天河 Milky Way 2.指高空 high sky：冉冉入云汉 go slowly up into the sky

云泥之别
云泥之别[yún ní zhī bié]相差像天空的云和地下的泥 as far apart as clouds in the sky and mud on the ground;〈比喻 fig.〉高低差别悬殊 big difference between the high and the low

云海
云海[yún hǎi] 从高处下望时，平铺在下面的像海一样的云 sea of clouds; stretch of clouds that look like a sea from far above：云海苍茫 vast sea of clouds

云消雾散
云消雾散[yún xiāo wù sàn]另见  烟消云散 yān xiāo yún sàn

云游
云游[yún yóu] 到处遨游，行踪无定（多指和尚、道士 oft. of a Buddhist monk or Taoist priest）wander about; roam about：云游四海 roam from place to place; wander the world over

云烟
云烟[yún yān] 云雾和烟气 cloud and mist; mist：云烟缭绕 wreathed in clouds and mists; enveloped in mist云烟过眼（比喻事物很快就消失了）fleeting clouds; (fig.) things passing quickly; transient

云片糕
云片糕[yún piàn gāo] 用米粉加糖和核桃仁等制成的糕，切做长方形薄片 a kind of cake in thin layers, made of glutinous rice, sugar, walnuts, etc.

云端
云端[yún duān] 云里 high in the clouds：飞机从云端飞来。An airplane emerged from the clouds.

云翳
云翳[yún yì]1.阴暗的云 black cloud：清澄的蓝天上没有一点云翳。There was not a speck of cloud in the azure sky.脸上罩上了忧郁的云翳。(His) face became clouded with gloom. 2.眼球角膜发生病变后遗留下来的疤痕组织，影响视力 nebula; scar left by pathological changes to the cornea of an eyeball, affecting eyesight

云蒸霞蔚
云蒸霞蔚[yún zhēng xiá wèi] 形容景物灿烂绚丽 (of scenery) splendid; gorgeous; magnificent; effulgent亦 also 云兴霞蔚 yún xīng xiá wèi

云谲波诡
云谲波诡[yún jué bō guǐ]汉代扬雄《甘泉赋》：‘于是大厦云谲波诡。’形容房屋构造就像云彩和波浪那样千姿百态。后多用来形容事态变幻莫测。Sweet Spring Rhapsody by the Han-dynasty writer Yang Xiong contains this description:‘The structure of the building is as varied in shape and posture as the clouds and waves.’(oft. of an event or situation) unpredictable; capricious; fickle; bewilderingly changeable; 亦 also 波谲云诡 bō jué yún guǐ

云豆
云豆[yún dòu] 同 same as 芸豆 yúndòu

云豹
云豹[yún bào]哺乳动物，四肢较短，尾较长。毛淡黄色，略带灰色。有云块状斑纹，因而得名。毛皮柔软，花纹美观。clouded leopard (Neofelis nebulosa); mammal with fairly short limbs and a long tail, greyish yellow soft fur with cloud-shaped spots and beautiful patterns; 亦 also 猫豹 māobào

云贵
云贵[Yún guì] 云南和贵州两省的合称 Yunnan-Guizhou; combined name for Yunnan and Guizhou provinces：云贵高原 Yunnan-Guizhou Plateau

云锣
云锣[yún luó]打击乐器，用十个小锣编排而成，第一排一个，以下三排各三个，装置在小木架上。各个锣的大小相同而厚薄不同，所以发出的声音不同。最上面的一个不常用，因此也叫九音锣。现在云锣有所发展，已不止十个。chiming gongs; Chinese gong chimes; percussion instrument that used to consist of 10 gong-shaped pieces of brass of the same diameter, one in the first row and three in each of the following three rows. The gongs were hung in a wooden frame and were of varied thickness so that different notes were produced, and because the gong in the first row is seldom used, it is also called 九音锣 jiǔyīnluó. Today, this instrument has been developed using more than 10 gongs.

云锦
云锦[yún jǐn] 我国一种历史悠久的高级提花丝织物，色彩鲜艳，花纹瑰丽如彩云 cloud-pattern brocade; high-quality silk jacquard with a long history in China, of bright colours and magnificent cloud patterns

云雀
云雀[yún què] 鸟，羽毛赤褐色，有黑色斑纹，嘴小而尖，翅膀大，飞得高，叫的声音好听 skylark (Alauda arvensis); russet-feathered bird, having black spots on the body, a small pointed beak, and large wings, flying high and chirping melodiously

云集
云集[yún jí]〈比喻 fig.〉许多人从各处来，聚集在一起 congregate; gather; converge; come to a gathering from all directions：各地代表云集首都。Representatives from every corner of the country gathered in the capital.

云雨
云雨[yún yǔ]宋玉《高唐赋》叙宋玉对楚襄王问，说楚怀王曾游高唐，梦与巫山神女相会，神女临去说自己‘旦为朝云，暮为行雨’Gaotang Rhapsody by Song Yu has this description: Song Yu told King Xiang of Chu that King Huai of Chu once visited Gaotang and had a dream in which he met the Goddess of Wushan Mountain. Before the goddess left, she described herself as‘clouds in the morning and rain in the evening’.后世因以指男女合欢（多见于旧小说）(usu. seen in traditional Chinese fiction) sexual intercourse; lovemaking

云雾
云雾[yún wù] 云和雾。多比喻遮蔽或障碍的东西 cloud and mist; mist; (fig.) veil; coverage; blockade; hindrance：拨开云雾见青天 see blue sky again after the clouds have dispersed

云霄
云霄[yún xiāo] 极高的天空；天际 sky; heaven：响彻云霄 reverberate through the sky; echo to the clouds; make the heavens ring直上云霄 soar to the sky; skyrocket; rise or fly into the sky

云霞
云霞[yún xiá] 彩云 rosy clouds; pink clouds

云鬓
云鬓[yún bìn]〈书 fml.〉妇女多而美的鬓发 thick, beautiful hair over the temples of a woman

互
互[hù]（ㄏㄨˋ）互相 mutually; each other：互访 exchange visits互通有无 make up for each other's deficiencies; each makes up what the other lacks互不干涉 mutual non-interference互敬互爱 respect and love each other相关词组交互 | 相互 | 瑕瑜互见互补 | 互动 | 互感 | 互惠 | 互见 | 互利 | 互让 | 互溶 | 互生 | 互通 | 互相 | 互训 | 互质 | 互助 | 互联网 | 互质数 | 互助会 | 互助组

互利
互利[hù lì] 互相有利 mutually beneficial; of mutual benefit：平等互利 equality and mutual benefit

互动
互动[hù dòng] 互相作用；互相影响 interaction：良性互动 beneficial interaction形成互动效应 produce an interactive effect

互助
互助[hù zhù] 互相帮助 help each other：互助合作 mutual-aid and cooperation互助小组 mutual-aid groups

互助会
互助会[hù zhù huì] 经济上互相帮助的群众性组织，多由基层工会组织领导 non-governmental organizations committed to mutual financial aid, mostly led by trade unions at the grassroots level

互助组
互助组[hù zhù zǔ]1.在生产、工作或学习上互相帮助的小集体 mutual-aid group; group organized for mutual aid in production, work, or study 2.我国农业合作化的初级形式，由若干户农民自愿组织起来，在劳动力、农具、牲畜等方面进行互助合作 mutual-aid team; elementary form of organization in China's agricultural cooperative movement, in which several peasant families shared labour hands, farming tools, draught animals, etc. on a voluntary basis

互惠
互惠[hù huì] 互相给予好处 reciprocal; mutually beneficial：平等互惠 equality and mutual benefit互惠待遇 reciprocal treatment互惠关税 reciprocal preferential tariff

互感
互感[hù gǎn] 由于电路中电流的变化，而在邻近的另一电路中产生感生电动势的现象 mutual inductance; electromotive force induced in an electric circuit due to voltaic changes in a neighbouring circuit亦 also 互感应 hùgǎnyìng

互溶
互溶[hù róng] 一般指两种液体（如水和酒精）能以任何比例互相溶解 (gen. of two liquids, e.g. water and alcohol) mutually dissolvable in any proportion

互生
互生[hù shēng] 叶序的一种，茎的每个节上只长一个叶子，相邻的两个叶子长在相对的两侧，如杨树、桃树等的叶子 alternation; a kind of phyllotaxy in which each of the stem nodes bears only a single leaf, with two nearby leaves growing on the two opposite sides, e.g. the leaves of poplar and peach

互相
互相[hù xiāng]〈副词 adv.〉表示彼此同样对待的关系 mutually; each other：互相尊重 mutually respect互相帮助 help each other互相支持 support each other

互联网
互联网[hù lián wǎng] 指由若干个电子计算机网络相互连接而成的网络 Internet; computer network comprising several interconnected computer networks

互补
互补[hù bǔ]1.互为补角 be at an supplementary angle to each other 2.互相补充 mutually complement：沿海和内地互通有无，互补互利。By supplying what the other needs, the coastal and hinterland areas complement and benefit each other.

互见
互见[hù jiàn]1.（两处或几处的文字）相互说明补充 (of what is written in two or more places) cross-reference 2.（两者）都有；同时存在 (of two contrasting elements) exist side by side：瑕瑜互见 have defects as well as merits

互让
互让[hù ràng] 彼此谦让 yield to each other; give in to each other：互谅互让 understand and yield to each other

互训
互训[hù xùn]（两处或几处的文字）相互注释 (of what is written in two or more places) mutually annotate

互质
互质[hù zhì]两个正整数只有公约数1时，它们的关系叫做互质。如3和11互质。relatively prime; the relationship between two positive integers which have no common divisor except 1, e.g. 3 and 11 are relatively prime with each other

互质数
互质数[hù zhì shù] 只有公约数1的两个正整数叫做互质数，如4和5，7和8 relatively prime numbers; co-prime numbers; two positive integers that have no common divisor except 1, e.g. 4 and 5, or 7 and 8 are relatively prime numbers

互通
互通[hù tōng] 互相沟通、交换 mutually communicate; exchange：互通消息 mutual communication of information互通有无 each supplies what the other needs; supply (or meet) each other's needs

亓
亓[Qí]（ㄑㄧˊ） 姓 a surname

五
五1[wǔ]（ㄨˇ）〈数目 num.〉四加一后所得 five, number obtained by adding one to four另见  数字 shùzì五2[wǔ]（ㄨˇ）我国民族音乐音阶上的一级，乐谱上用做记音符号, 相当于简谱的‘6’ wu, note of the scale of the Chinese traditional music, used as a symbol in the musical score, corresponding to‘6’(la) in numbered musical notation另见  工尺 gōngchě相关词组端五 | 破五 | 重五 | 大五金 | 二五眼 | 小五金 | 二百五 | 第五纵队 | 吆五喝六 | 一五一十 | 二十五史 | 目迷五色 | 三…五… | 三番五次 | 三纲五常 | 三皇五帝 | 三令五申 | 四分五裂 | 四舍五入 | 现代五项 | 学富五车 | 隔三差五 | 攒三聚五 | 三下五除二 | 二一添作五 | 一退六二五 | 和平共处五项原则五爱 | 五彩 | 五代 | 五帝 | 五方 | 五更 | 五古 | 五谷 | 五官 | 五行 | 五荤 | 五金 | 五经 | 五绝 | 五岭 | 五伦 | 五律 | 五内 | 五色 | 五味 | 五香 | 五刑 | 五一 | 五音 | 五岳 | 五脏 | 五指 | 五中 | 五洲 | 五棓子 | 五倍子 | 五分制 | 五花肉 | 五里雾 | 五粮液 | 五线谱 | 五言诗 | 五月节 | 五子棋 | 五大三粗 | 五斗米道 | 五短身材 | 五方杂处 | 五光十色 | 五行八作 | 五湖四海 | 五花八门 | 五花大绑 | 五黄六月 | 五讲四美 | 五角大楼 | 五劳七伤 | 五雷轰顶 | 五马分尸 | 五日京兆 | 五卅运动 | 五四运动 | 五体投地 | 五星红旗 | 五颜六色 | 五四青年节 | 五一劳动节 | 五十步笑百步

五一
五一[Wǔ Yī] 五一劳动节的简称 abbr. for 五一劳动节 Wǔ-Yī Láodòng Jié

五一劳动节
五一劳动节[Wǔ Yī Láo dòng Jié]全世界劳动人民团结战斗的节日。1886年5月1日，美国芝加哥等地工人举行大罢工和游行示威，反对资本家的残酷剥削，要求实行八小时工作制。经过斗争，取得了胜利。1889年在恩格斯组织召开的第二国际成立大会上，决定5月1日为国际劳动节。International Labour Day; May Day; day marking the working people in the world uniting in a common fight. On May 1, 1886, workers in Chicago and other cities in the United States went on a general strike and demonstrated against brutal exploitation by capitalists, demanding an eight-hour daily work system. They won the struggle. At a meeting to found the Second International called by Friedrich Engels in 1889, a decision was made to designate May 1 as International Labour Day. 简称 abbr. 五一 Wǔ-Yī

五中
五中[wǔ zhōng]〈书 fml.〉五脏，指内心 five internal organs (heart, liver, spleen, lungs and kidneys); heart：铭感五中 thank sb. from the bottom of one's heart; be deeply grateful; be deeply indebted to

五代
五代[Wǔ Dài] 唐朝以后，后梁、后唐、后晋、后汉、后周先后在中原建立政权的时期，公元907-960 Five Dynasties (907-960), namely, the Later Liang Dynasty (907-923), Later Tang Dynasty (923-936), Later Jin Dynasty (936-947), Later Han Dynasty (947-950), and Later Zhou Dynasty (951-960)

五伦
五伦[wǔ lún] 封建时代称君臣、父子、兄弟、夫妇、朋友五种伦理关系 five human relationships in feudal times, i.e. between ruler and subject, father and son, husband and wife, brothers, and friends

五体投地
五体投地[wǔ tǐ tóu dì] 指两手、两膝和头着地，是佛教最恭敬的礼节 prostrate oneself with all limbs and the head touching the ground before sb.; most respectful form of etiquette in Buddhism；〈比喻 fig.〉敬佩到了极点 highest form of admiration or esteem for sb.

五倍子
五倍子[wǔ bèi zǐ]五倍子虫寄生在盐肤木上刺激叶细胞而形成的虫瘿，表面灰褐色，含有单宁酸。虫在里面发育繁殖。采集下来，把虫烫死，可入药，也用于染料、制革等工业。(Chinese) gall (Melaphis chinensis); gallnut; greyishbrown gall formed by stimulation of leaf cells by the gall maker living on the Chinese sumac. The gall contains high tannic acid and in which the parasite grows and reproduces its offspring. The gall, after the parasites are killed by heating, can be used for Chinese medicine, and also in the dye making and tanning industries.亦 also 五棓子 wǔbèizǐ

五光十色
五光十色[wǔ guāng shí sè] 形容色彩鲜艳，式样繁多 multicoloured; riot of colour; rich and varied; of all kinds; multifarious：展品五光十色，琳琅满目。There is a great variety of exhibits bright with many colours.

五内
五内[wǔ nèi]〈书 fml.〉五脏，指内心 viscera; heart：五内如焚（形容内心极为焦虑）feel as if one's viscera were burning; one's heart rent with grief; one's heart torn by anxiety (one's heart filled with anxieties and worries)铭感五内 feel deeply indebted to

五分制
五分制[wǔ fēn zhì]学校评定学生成绩的一种记分方法。五分为最高成绩，三分为及格。five-grade marking system, used in schools for the assessment of academic progress made by students, five being the highest mark, and three for pass

五刑
五刑[wǔ xíng] 我国古代的主要刑罚，通常指殷、周时代的墨、劓、剕、宫、大辟 five chief forms of punishment in ancient China (usu. referring to tattooing the face 墨 mò, cutting off the nose 劓 yì, cutting off the feet 剕 fèi，castration 宫 gōng and decapitation 大辟 dàpì in Later Shang and Zhou dynasties)

五劳七伤
五劳七伤[wǔ láo qī shāng]中医学上五劳指心、肝、脾、肺、肾五脏的劳损；七伤指大饱伤脾，大怒气逆伤肝，强力举重，久坐湿地伤肾，形寒饮冷伤肺，忧愁思虑伤心，风雨寒暑伤形，恐惧不节伤志。泛指身体虚弱多病。(of traditional Chinese medicine) five lesions and seven injuries;‘five lesions’as of the heart, liver, spleen, lungs and kidneys, and‘seven injuries’as caused to the spleen by overeating, to the liver by rage, to the kidneys by lifting heavy weights and sitting long on wet grounds, to the lungs by wearing too little and taking cold food and drinks, to the heart by sorrow and anxiety, to the body by abrupt weather changes, and to the consciousness by immoderate fear; (in a broad sense) general debility; poor health and ailments; 劳 láo 也作 also put as 痨 láo

五十步笑百步
五十步笑百步[wǔ shí bù xiào bǎi bù]战国时候，孟子跟梁惠王谈话，打了一个比方，有两个兵士在前线上败下来，一个退了五十步，另一个退了一百步。退了五十步的就讥笑退了一百步的，说他不中用。其实两个人都是在退却，只是跑得远近不同罢了（见于《孟子·梁惠王上》）。Those who retreat 50 paces laugh at those who retreat 100 paces. According to Mencius·Duke Hui of Liang (I), during the Warring States Period, Mencius told Duke Hui of Liang a story by way of analogy, saying that two soldiers were defeated at the battlefront and retreated, one by 50 paces and the other 100 paces. The one who retreated 50 paces laughed at the other who retreated 100 paces, saying that the latter was no good. As a matter of fact, Mencius concluded, they both retreated, the mere difference being only the distance.〈比喻 fig.〉自己跟别人有同样的缺点或错误，只是程度上轻一些，却讥笑别人 the pot calls the kettle black; one who has the same shortcomings or mistakes as another, but to a lesser degree, laughs at the other

五卅运动
五卅运动[Wǔ Sà Yùn dòng]中国人民在共产党领导下进行的反帝运动。1925年5月30日，上海群众游行示威，抗议日本纱厂的资本家枪杀领导罢工的共产党员顾正红，到公共租界时遭到英国巡捕的开枪射击。共产党领导上海各界罢工、罢课、罢市，各地纷纷响应，形成了全国性的反帝高潮。May 30th Movement (1925); anti-imperialist movement launched by the Chinese people under the leadership of the Communist Party of China. People in Shanghai took to the streets on May 30, 1925 in protest against a Japanese cotton mill owner's killing of Gu Zhenghong, a Communist who was leading a strike, and were fired at by British police when the procession marched to the International Settlement. The Communist Party led people in all walks of life in Shanghai on a city-wide strike involving workers, students and shopkeepers. It evoked response from all parts of the country, resulting in a nationwide anti-imperialist upsurge.

五古
五古[wǔ gǔ] 每句五字的古体诗 classical-style poem with five characters to each line另见  古体诗 gǔtǐshī

五味
五味[wǔ wèi]指甜、酸、苦、辣、咸。泛指各种味道。five flavours (sweet, sour, bitter, pungent and salty); (in a broad sense) all sorts of flavours

五四运动
五四运动[Wǔ Sì Yùn dòng]中国人民所进行的反帝、反封建的伟大的政治运动和文化运动。1919年5月4日北京学生游行示威，抗议巴黎和会承认日本接管德国侵占中国山东的各种特权的无理决定，运动很快扩大到全国。在五四运动中无产阶级作为觉悟了的独立政治力量登上政治舞台，马克思列宁主义在全国广泛传播，为中国共产党的成立做了准备。May 4th Movement; great anti-imperialist, anti-feudal, political and cultural movement launched by the Chinese people. The students in Beijing held a parade on May 4 in 1919 in protest against the unjustified decision made at the Paris Peace Conference acknowledging Japan's take-over of Germany's privileges in Shandong, China. The movement quickly spread to the whole country. During the movement, the proletariat mounted the political stage as a conscious, independent political force, and Marxism-Leninism was widely spread in the country, thus paving the way for the founding of the Communist Party of China.

五四青年节
五四青年节[Wǔ Sì Qīng nián Jié]纪念五四运动的节日。在五四运动中，我国青年充分显示了伟大的革命精神和力量。为了使青年继承和发扬这个光荣的革命传统，规定5月4日为青年节。Youth Day (May 4th), a day marking the May 4th Movement of 1919, in which the young people in China fully displayed their great revolutionary spirit and strength. In order to inherit and carry forward this glorious revolutionary tradition, May 4 was designated as Youth Day.

五大三粗
五大三粗[wǔ dà sān cū] 形容人身体高大粗壮；魁梧 big and tall; tall and stalwart; strapping; tall and well-built; tall and brawny：这个五大三粗的青年人，浑身有使不完的力气。The tall and brawny young man is brimming with unbounded energy.

五子棋
五子棋[wǔ zǐ qí] 一种棋类游戏，用围棋子在围棋盘上对下，先把五个棋子连成一条直线的为胜 gobang; renju; gomoku; game of chess played between two people with black and white pieces on a board of 361 crosses and the player who first connects five pieces in a straight line being the winner

五官
五官[wǔ guān] 指耳、目、口、鼻、舌，通常指脸上的器官 five sense organs (ears, eyes, lips, nose and tongue); facial features：五官端正 have regular features

五岭
五岭[Wǔ Lǐng] 指越城岭、都庞岭、萌渚岭、骑田岭、大庾岭，在湖南、江西南部和广西、广东北部交界处 Five Ridges, namely, Yuecheng Ridge, Dupang Ridge, Mengzhu Ridge, Qitian Ridge and Dayu Ridge, across the borders between Hunan and Jiangxi on the southern side and Guangxi and Guangdong on the northern side

五岳
五岳[Wǔ Yuè] 指东岳泰山、西岳华山、南岳衡山、北岳恒山和中岳嵩山，是我国历史上的五大名山 Five Holy Mountains: Mount Taishan, the Eastern Holy Mountain in Shandong Province; Mount Huashan, the Western Holy Mountain in Shaanxi Province; Mount Hengshan, the Southern Holy Mountain in Hunan Province; Mount Hengshan, the Northern Holy Mountain in Shanxi Province; and Mount Songshan, the Central Holy Mountain in Henan Province

五帝
五帝[Wǔ Dì]另见  三皇五帝 Sān Huáng Wǔ Dì

五彩
五彩[wǔ cǎi] 原来指青、黄、赤、白、黑五种颜色，后来泛指多种颜色 (orig.) five colours of blue, yellow, red, white and black; (in a broad sense) multicoloured：五彩缤纷 colourful; blazing with colour

五律
五律[wǔ lǜ]五言律诗。一首八句，每句五个字。classical poem with eight five-character lines, following a strict tonal pattern and rhyme scheme另见  律诗 lǜshī

五指
五指[wǔ zhǐ] 手上的五个指头，就是拇指、食指、中指、无名指、小指 five fingers - thumb, index finger, middle finger, third or ring finger and little finger

五斗米道
五斗米道[Wǔ dǒu mǐ dào] 道教的一派，东汉末年张道陵所创，以入道者须出五斗米而得名 Wudoumi (Five-Dou-of-Rice) sect of Taoism, established by Zhang Daoling towards the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, with each member delivering five dou of rice as membership due, hence the name

五方
五方[wǔ fāng] 指东、西、南、北和中央，泛指各地 five directions (i.e. the four cardinal points, the east, west, south and north, and the centre); (in a broad sense) everywhere

五方杂处
五方杂处[wǔ fāng zá chǔ] 形容某地的居民复杂，从各个地方来的人都有 (of a place) be inhabited by people from all parts; have a mixed or cosmopolitan population

五日京兆
五日京兆[wǔ rì jīng zhào]西汉张敞为京兆尹（官名），将被免官，有个下属知道了就不肯为他办案子，对人说：‘他不过再做五天的京兆尹就是了，还能办什么案子’（见于《汉书·张敞传》）。后来比喻任职时间短或即将去职。According to History of Han·Biography of Zhang Chang, Zhang Chang was a metropolitan governor of the Western Han Dynasty. A subordinate of his refused to handle cases for him upon learning that he would soon be dismissed from his post.‘He will be at the post no longer than five days,’he told others,‘How could he handle any case?’(fig.) (of an official) not expect to remain long in office; hold office only for a brief period

五星红旗
五星红旗[Wǔ xīng Hóng qí]中华人民共和国国旗，旗面红色，长方形，长和宽为三与二之比。左上方缀五角星五颗。一星较大，居左；四星较小，环拱于大星之右，并各有一个角尖正对大星的中心点。Five-Star Red Flag, national flag of the People's Republic of China, red and rectangular, the ratio of length and breadth being three to two. Its upper left is sewn with five five-pointed stars, with the bigger one located on the left and skirted on the right by the four smaller ones each with a point directed to the central point of the bigger star.

五更
五更[wǔ gēng]1.从黄昏到拂晓一夜间分为五更，即一更、二更、三更、四更、五更。five watches (or periods) of the night from dusk to dawn, namely 1st watch, 2nd watch, 3rd watch, 4th watch and 5th watch 2.指第五更 5th watch of the night; just before dawn：起五更，睡半夜 retire at midnight and rise before dawn

五月节
五月节[Wǔ yuè Jié] 端午 Dragon Boat Festival

五棓子
五棓子[wǔ bèi zǐ] 同 same as 五倍子 wǔbèizǐ

五洲
五洲[wǔ zhōu] 指全世界各地 five continents and four oceans; whole world：五洲四海 five continents; whole world; all parts of the world

五湖四海
五湖四海[wǔ hú sì hǎi] 指全国各地 all corners of the land

五爱
五爱[wǔ ài] 指爱祖国、爱人民、爱劳动、爱科学、爱社会主义 ‘Five Loves’, referring to love for the motherland, the people, labour, science and socialism

五短身材
五短身材[wǔ duǎn shēn cái] 指四肢和躯干短小的身材 (of a person) short in body and limbs

五粮液
五粮液[wǔ liáng yè] 四川宜宾市出产的一种白酒，以五种粮食为原料 wuliangye; white spirit distilled from five kinds of grain, produced in Yibin, Sichuan Province

五线谱
五线谱[wǔ xiàn pǔ] 在五条平行横线上标记音符的乐谱 staff; stave; five horizontal lines on and between which notes are written or printed

五经
五经[Wǔ Jīng] 指易、书、诗、礼、春秋五种儒家经书 Five Confucian Classics, namely, The Book of Changes（《易经》）, Classic of Documents（《书经》）, The Book of Songs（《诗经》）, The Book of Rites（《礼记》）, and The Spring and Autumn Annals（《春秋》）

五绝
五绝[wǔ jué]五言绝句。一首四句，每句五个字。classic poem with four five-character lines, following a strict tonal pattern and rhyme scheme另见  绝句 juéjù

五脏
五脏[wǔ zàng] 指心、肝、脾、肺、肾五种器官 viscera; five internal organs - heart, liver, spleen, lungs and kidneys

五色
五色[wǔ sè] 同 same as 五彩 wǔcǎi：五色斑斓 a riot of colour五色缤纷 blazing with colour; colourful

五花八门
五花八门[wǔ huā bā mén]〈比喻 fig.〉花样繁多或变幻多端 multifarious; of a wide (or rich) variety

五花大绑
五花大绑[wǔ huā dà bǎng] 绑人的一种方法，用绳索套住脖子并绕到背后反剪两臂 tie a person's hands behind his back with a rope that is looped round his neck

五花肉
五花肉[wǔ huā ròu]作为食物的肥瘦分层相间的猪肉。有的地区叫五花儿。streaky pork; pork with different layers of lean and fat meat; called 五花儿 wǔhuār in some regions

五荤
五荤[wǔ hūn]〈佛教 Budd.〉指大蒜、韭菜、薤(xiè)、葱、兴渠（根像萝卜，气味像蒜）五种有气味的蔬菜 five strongly flavoured vegetables: garlic, leek, scallion, shallot and xingqu (vegetable with a turnip-like root and the smell of garlic)

五行
五行[wǔ xíng]指金、木、水、火、土五种物质。我国古代思想家企图用这五种物质来说明世界万物的起源。中医用五行来说明生理病理上的种种现象。迷信的人用五行相生相克来推算人的命运。five elements of metal, wood, water, fire and earth. Ancient Chinese thinkers tried to use these five substances to explain the origin of all things in the world. Traditional Chinese medicinal practitioners use the five elements to explain physiological and pathological phenomena. Superstitious people used the principle of the five elements producing and overcoming each other to tell the fate of a person.

五行八作
五行八作[wǔ háng bā zuō] 泛指各种行业 five professions and eight workshops; (in a broad sense) all trades and professions（作 zuo：作坊 workshop）

五角大楼
五角大楼[Wǔ jiǎo Dà lóu] 美国国防部的办公大楼，外形为五角形，常用做美国国防部的代称 Pentagon; a set of five-sided buildings contained one in the other, in which the main offices of the US Department of Defence are located; synonymous to the US Department of Defence

五言诗
五言诗[wǔ yán shī] 每句五字的旧诗，有五言古诗、五言律诗和五言绝句 poem with five characters to each line, including the ancient poem with five characters to each line, classical poem with eight five-character lines and classical poem with four five-character lines, the two latter forms both following a strict tonal pattern and rhyme scheme

五讲四美
五讲四美[wǔ jiǎng sì měi]我国人民在社会生活中总结出来的关于社会主义精神文明的行为规范。‘五讲’指讲文明、讲礼貌、讲卫生、讲秩序、讲道德，‘四美’指心灵美、语言美、行为美、环境美。five emphases and four beauties, norms of conduct for socialist ethics advocated in the social life of the Chinese people. The five emphases refer to emphasis on civility, courtesy, sanitation, orderliness and morality. The four beauties refer to beauty of soul, speech, behaviour and environment.

五谷
五谷[wǔ gǔ] 古书中对五谷有不同的说法，通常指稻、黍、稷、麦、豆，泛指粮食作物 five cereals, of which there were different versions in ancient books, usu. referring to rice, two kinds of millet, wheat and beans; (in a broad sense) food crops：五谷丰登 abundant harvest of all food crops; bumper grain harvest

五里雾
五里雾[wǔ lǐ wù] 据说东汉张楷‘好道术，能作五里雾’（见于《后汉书·张楷传》）。现在比喻迷离恍惚、不明真相的境界 thick fog. According to History of Later Han·Biography of Zhang Kai, Zhang Kai of the Eastern Han Dynasty was good at Taoist magic and capable of creating a thick fog over a distance of five li. The phrase is used figuratively to mean bewilderment：如堕五里雾中 completely mystified; completely bewildered

五金
五金[wǔ jīn] 指金、银、铜、铁、锡。泛指金属或金属制品 five metals (gold, silver, copper, iron and tin); (in a broad sense) metals or hardware：五金商店 hardware store小五金 metal fittings

五雷轰顶
五雷轰顶[wǔ léi hōng dǐng]〈比喻 fig.〉遭到巨大的打击 suffer a severe blow; be thunderstruck：他听到这话犹如五雷轰顶，一下子瘫坐在椅子上。He was struck like a bolt from the blue when he heard the words, and sat in the chair as if paralysed.

五音
五音[wǔ yīn]1.中国五声音阶上的五个级，相当于现行简谱上的1、2、3、5、6。古代叫宫、商、角、徵(zhǐ)、羽。five notes of the ancient Chinese five-tone scale, i.e. gong, shang, jue, zhi, yu, equivalent to 1, 2, 3, 5 and 6 in the numbered musical notation 2.音韵学上指五类声母在口腔中的五类发音部位，即喉音、牙音、舌音、齿音、唇音 five points of consonant articulation in the oral cavity, namely, guttural sounds, dental sounds, apical sounds, dental sounds and labial sounds

五颜六色
五颜六色[wǔ yán liù sè] 指各种色彩 of various (or all) colours; multicoloured; colourful：五颜六色的花布 multicoloured cotton prints五颜六色的彩旗 colourful flags

五香
五香[wǔ xiāng] 指花椒、八角、桂皮、丁香花蕾、茴香子五种调味的香料 five spices (prickly ash, star aniseed, cinnamon, clove and fennel); spices：五香豆 spiced beans

五马分尸
五马分尸[wǔ mǎ fēn shī]〈古代 arch.〉一种残酷的刑罚，用五匹马分别拴住人的四肢和头部，把人扯开 dismemberment of a person by five horses each tied to his head or one of his four limbs, an inhumane punishment；〈比喻 fig.〉把完整的东西分割得非常零碎 divide up; tear sth. to pieces; share out亦 also 五牛分尸 wǔ niú fēn shī

五黄六月
五黄六月[wǔ huáng liù yuè] 指农历五月、六月间天气炎热的时候 hot days in the 5th and 6th months of the lunar calendar

井
井1[jǐng]（ㄐㄧㄥˇ）1.从地面往下凿成的能取水的深洞，洞壁多砌上砖石 well; pit or hole sunk in the earth to reach a supply of water, oft. lined by a brick or stone wall：水井 water well一口井 a well双眼井 twin wells 2.形状像井的东西 sth. in the shape of a well：矿井 mine shaft; mine pit油井 oil well盐井 salt well竖井 vertical shaft探井 exploratory shaft渗井 filter well天井 small courtyard 3.古制八家为一井，后借指人口聚居的地方或乡里 unit of the census register in ancient China, consisting of eight households; later referring to a neighbourhood or a community：乡井 native place; home village市井 marketplace; town井邑 native town背井离乡 leave one's native place; be away from home 4.二十八宿之一 jing, one of the 28 constellations into which the celestial sphere was divided according to ancient Chinese astronomy 5.(Jǐng) 姓 a surname井2[jǐng]（ㄐㄧㄥˇ）形容整齐 neat; orderly：井然 orderly井井有条 in perfect order; shipshape; methodical相关词组暗井 | 管井 | 旱井 | 火井 | 机井 | 坑井 | 枯井 | 矿井 | 立井 | 龙井 | 气井 | 渗井 | 市井 | 竖井 | 水井 | 探井 | 天井 | 乡井 | 窨井 | 盐井 | 油井 | 藻井 | 坎儿井 | 透河井 | 自流井 | 背井离乡 | 从井救人 | 断井颓垣 | 落井下石 | 投井下石 | 坐井观天 | 避坑落井 | 离乡背井 | 临渴掘井井灌 | 井架 | 井喷 | 井然 | 井台 | 井筒 | 井盐 | 井田制 | 井底之蛙 | 井井有条 | 井水不犯河水

井井有条
井井有条[jǐng jǐng yǒu tiáo] 形容条理分明 in perfect order; shipshape; methodical

井台
井台[jǐng tái]（～儿 jǐngtáir）井口周围高出地面的部分 raised platform around a well

井喷
井喷[jǐng pēn] 钻石油井时地下的高压油、天然气等突然从井口喷出 petroleum blowout; high-pressure oil or natural gas blowing out suddenly from the opening of an oil well during the drilling process

井底之蛙
井底之蛙[jǐng dǐ zhī wā] 井底下的青蛙只能看到井口那么大的一块天 frog in a well (that can see only a tiny patch of sky no bigger than the mouth of the well);〈比喻 fig.〉见识狭小的人 person with limited vision

井架
井架[jǐng jià] 矿井、油井等井口竖立的金属架，用来装置天车、支撑钻具等 petroleum derrick; headframe; headgear; pithead frame; metal frame at the opening of an oil well or mine pit, used to install overhead travelling cranes or support drilling apparatus

井水不犯河水
井水不犯河水[jǐng shuǐ bù fàn hé shuǐ]〈比喻 fig.〉两不相犯 well water does not intrude into river water; none may encroach upon the precincts of another

井灌
井灌[jǐng guàn] 用井水灌溉农田 well irrigation; irrigate farmland with well water

井然
井然[jǐng rán]〈书 fml.〉形容整齐的样子 orderly; neat and tidy; shipshape; methodical：秩序井然 in perfect order条理井然 well-organized井然不紊 in an orderly way

井田制
井田制[jǐng tián zhì]我国奴隶社会时期的土地制度。奴隶主为计算自己封地的大小和监督奴隶劳动，把土地划分成许多方块，因像‘井’字形，所以叫做井田制。well-field system; land system supposed to have existed in slave society. In order to calculate the size of a fief and to supervise slaves' work, slave owners divided their fiefs into many squares, making the arable lands look like the Chinese character 井 jǐng, meaning ‘well’. Hence the term.

井盐
井盐[jǐng yán]打井汲取溶有盐质的地下水制成的食盐。我国四川、云南等地都有出产。well salt; salt extracted from salty groundwater from a well. China's Sichuan and Yunnan provinces produce well salt.

井筒
井筒[jǐng tǒng]1.从水井口到井底的筒状四壁或空间 tube-shaped space from the mouth to the bottom of a well 2.采矿、修建长隧道和地下铁道时开凿的联系地面和地下巷道的通道 pit shaft; channel linking earth's surface and underground tunnels during construction of a mine, long tunnel or subway

亘
亘[gèn]（ㄍㄣˋ）（亙）（空间上或时间上）延续不断 (of space or time) extend; stretch：横亘 lie across绵亘 stretch in an unbroken chain亘古 ancient times; antiquity相关词组横亘 | 连亘 | 绵亘 | 盘亘亘古

亘古
亘古[gèn gǔ] 整个古代；终古 ancient times：亘古以来 from remote antiquity亘古至今（从古到今） from time immemorial until now亘古未有 no such thing from time immemorial; unheard of; unprecedented

亚
亚1[yà]（亞）(ㄧㄚ?)1.较差 inferior; shabby：他的技术不亚于你。He's by no means inferior to you in skill. 2.次一等 substandard：亚军 runner-up亚热带 subtropical zone; subtropics 3.原子价较低的；酸根或化合物中少含一个氢原子或氧原子的 of lower atomic valence; acid radical or compound minus one hydrogen or oxygen atom：硫酸亚铁(FeSO?) ferrisulphas亚氨基(=NH) imino group亚硫酸(H?SO?) sulphurous acid亚2[Yà]（ㄧㄚˋ）（亞）指亚洲 Asia相关词组东亚 | 南亚 | 西亚 | 姻亚 | 东南亚 | 马利亚 | 布尔乔亚 | 普罗列塔利亚 | 尼格罗澳大利亚人种亚当 | 亚军 | 亚麻 | 亚健康 | 亚热带

亚健康
亚健康[yà jiàn kāng]指身体虽然没有患病，却出现生理功能减退、代谢水平低下的状态。主要表现是疲劳、胸闷、头疼、失眠、健忘、腰背酸痛、情绪不安、做事效率低下等。因处于健康与疾病之间的状态，所以也叫第三状态。sub-health; 3rd state; grey state; state in which a person is not ill, but his physiological functions have declined and his metabolic level is low. Sub-health is characterized chiefly by fatigue, chest suppression, headache, insomnia, amnesia, back and lumbar sore, inquietude and low work efficiency. As sub-health is a condition between healthiness and illness, it is thus also called the 3rd state.

亚军
亚军[yà jūn] 体育、游艺项目等的竞赛中评比出来的第二名 second place (in a sports contest); runner-up

亚当
亚当[Yà dāng]《圣经》故事中人类的始祖 Adam, the first man according to the Bible [希伯来 Hebrew: ādhām]

亚热带
亚热带[yà rè dài]热带和温带之间的过渡地带。与热带相比，有显著的季节变化，气温比温带高，植物在冬季仍能缓慢生长。subtropical zone; subtropics; semitropics; transitional zone between the tropical and temperate zones, marked for more distinct seasonal changes than the tropical zone and higher temperatures than the temperate zone so that plants can grow slowly in winter;亦 also 副热带 fùrèdài

亚麻
亚麻[yà má]1.一年生草本植物，茎细长，叶子互生，披针形或条形，花浅蓝色，结蒴果，球形。纤维用亚麻的茎皮含纤维很多，可以做纺织原料。flax (Linum usitatissimum); annual herbaceous plant having a slender stem, alternate lanceolate or strip leaves, and pale blue flowers, bearing spherical capsules. The bast of a kind of flax cultivated for its fibre is rich in fibre that can be used as a raw material for the textile industry. 2.纤维用亚麻的茎皮纤维 bast fibre obtained from a kind of flax cultivated for this purpose

些
些[xiē]（ㄒㄧㄝ）1.表示不定的数量；一些 some; indefinite amount：有些 there are some这些 these那么些 those前些日子 several days ago买些东西 do some shopping 2.放在形容词后，表示略微的意思 [used after an adjective] a little more; a little：稍大些 a little bigger更好些 a little better简单些 a little simpler相关词组好些 | 哪些 | 那些 | 险些 | 一些 | 有些 | 这些 | 那么些 | 这么些些个 | 些微 | 些小 | 些须 | 些许 | 些子

些个
些个[xiē ge] 一些 some; several; a few：这些个 these那些个 those吃些个东西 eat some food他是弟弟，你应该让他些个。He is your younger brother, so you should yield to him a little.

些子
些子[xiē zǐ]〈方 dial.〉一点儿；些须 a little; a few

些小
些小[xiē xiǎo]1.一点儿 a little; slightly：些小感慨 sigh slightly with emotion 2.细微；小 small; trivial：些小之事 trivial matters

些微
些微[xiē wēi]1.一点儿 slight：一阵秋风吹来，感到些微的凉意。The autumn wind sprang up, and there was a slight chill in the air. 2.略微 slightly; a bit; a little：肚子些微有点儿痛 feel a slight stomachache字些微大一点儿就好了。It would be better if the character was a bit larger.

些许
些许[xiē xǔ] 一点儿；少许 a little; a few：些许小利 some small benefits

些须
些须[xiē xū]些许（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）a little; a few：些须识得几字 know a few words

亟
亟[jí]（ㄐㄧˊ）〈书 fml.〉急迫地 urgently; anxiously; earnestly：亟待解决 (of a problem) demanding prompt solution亟须纠正 must be speedily put right另见  qì亟[qì]（ㄑㄧˋ）〈书 fml.〉屡次 repeatedly; time and again：亟来问讯 come repeatedly to ask for information另见  jí相关词组亟亟

亟亟
亟亟[jí jí]〈书 fml.〉急迫；急忙 in a hurry; in haste：亟亟奔走 go on errands in a hurry不必亟亟 no need to hurry

亡
亡[wáng]（ㄨㄤˊ）（亾）1.逃跑 abscond; bolt：逃亡 run away流亡 go into exile亡命 flee for life 2.失去；丢失 lose：亡失 missing歧路亡羊。A lamb goes astray on a forked road. 3.死 die; perish：死亡 death伤亡 casualties阵亡 die on the battlefield家破人亡 a broken family, with members missing or dead 4.死去的 deceased：亡友 deceased friend 5.灭亡 doom：亡国 fall of a nation〈古 arch.〉又同 also same as 无 wú相关词组败亡 | 出亡 | 存亡 | 悼亡 | 覆亡 | 救亡 | 流亡 | 沦亡 | 灭亡 | 丧亡 | 伤亡 | 衰亡 | 死亡 | 逃亡 | 危亡 | 消亡 | 兴亡 | 夭亡 | 阵亡 | 死亡率 | 死亡线 | 未亡人 | 脑死亡 | 唇亡齿寒 | 歧路亡羊 | 名存实亡 | 生死存亡 | 心脏死亡亡故 | 亡国 | 亡魂 | 亡灵 | 亡命 | 亡失 | 亡国奴 | 亡魂丧胆 | 亡羊补牢

亡命
亡命[wáng mìng]1.逃亡；流亡 flee; seek refuge; go into exile：亡命他乡 be a fugitive 2.（冒险作恶的人）不顾性命 (of an evildoer) desperate：亡命徒 desperado

亡国
亡国[wáng guó] 国家灭亡；使国家灭亡 conquer a nation; doom of a nation：亡国灭种 national subjugation and genocide亡国[wáng guó] 灭亡了的国家 fallen nation：亡国之君 monarch of a fallen country

亡国奴
亡国奴[wáng guó nú] 指祖国已经灭亡或部分国土被侵占，受侵略者奴役的人 enslaved people of a fallen nation or occupied territory; conquered people

亡失
亡失[wáng shī] 丢失；散失 lost; missing：那套书已亡失多年。That set of books has been missing for years.

亡故
亡故[wáng gù] 死去；故去 die; pass away; decease

亡灵
亡灵[wáng líng] 人死后的魂灵（迷信, 多用于比喻） (superstition) soul of a deceased person; (oft. fig.) spirit; ghost; spectre

亡羊补牢
亡羊补牢[wáng yáng bǔ láo] 羊丢失了，才修理羊圈（语出《战国策·楚策四》：‘亡羊而补牢，未为迟也’） mend the fold after the sheep is lost (according to Intrigues of the Warring States·Intrigues of Chu (IV),‘It is never late to mend the fold after the sheep is lost.’);〈比喻 fig.〉在受到损失之后想办法补救，免得以后再受损失 take remedial measures after loss is done to prevent further losses; better late than never

亡魂
亡魂[wáng hún] 迷信的人指人死后的灵魂（多指刚死不久的 oft. of the newly deceased）soul; ghost

亡魂丧胆
亡魂丧胆[wáng hún sàng dǎn] 形容惊慌恐惧到了极点 be scared to death; be half dead with fright

亢
亢[háng]（ㄏㄤˊ） 同 same as 吭 háng另见  kàng亢[kàng]（ㄎㄤˋ）1.高 high：高亢 resounding; booming 2.高傲 haughty：不亢不卑 neither servile nor overbearing; neither humble nor pert 3.过度；极；很 excessive; extreme：亢旱 severe drought亢奋 feverish 4.二十八宿之一 kang, one of the 28 constellations into which the celestial sphere was divided in ancient Chinese astronomy (consisting of four stars in the shape of a bent bow in Virgo) 5.(Kàng) 姓 a surname另见  háng相关词组高亢 | 不卑不亢亢奋 | 亢旱 | 亢进

亢奋
亢奋[kàng fèn] 极度兴奋 extremely excited; overwrought：精神亢奋 run an adrenaline high; in agitation

亢旱
亢旱[kàng hàn] 长久不下雨，干旱情形严重；大旱 prolonged dry spell; severe drought

亢进
亢进[kàng jìn]生理机能超过正常的情况。如胃肠蠕动亢进、甲状腺机能亢进等。hyperfunction, such as gastrointestinal hyperperistalsis, hyperthyroidism, etc.

交
交1[jiāo]（ㄐㄧㄠ）1.把事物转移给有关方面 hand over sth. to sb.; deliver; hand in; turn over：交活 turn over a finished item交税 pay tax交公粮 deliver grain to the state (as tax in kind)把任务交给我们这个组吧。Leave the task to our team. 2.到（某一时辰或季节 of a time or season）set in; come：交子时 around midnight明天就交冬至了。Tomorrow is the Winter Solstice.交九的天气 very cold weather 3.（时间、地区）相连接 (of points in time or places) meet; join：交界 (of places) be contiguous春夏之交 time of the year when spring gives way to summer太行山在河北、山西两省之交。The Taihang Mountains are located on the boundary between the provinces of Hebei and Shanxi. 4.交叉 cross; intersect：两直线相交于一点。Two straight lines intersect at one point. 5.结交；交往 associate with; befriend; mix with：交朋友 make friends; develop friendships建交 establish diplomatic relations 6.友谊；交情 friendship; friendly relationship：绝交 break up with sb.; break off relations with sb.; break off with sb.; sever, cut off or discontinue a relationship一面之交 mere acquaintance; casual acquaintance 7.（人）性交；（动植物）交配 have sexual intercourse (between humans); mate; copulate; breed (of animals)：交媾 sexual intercourse; coition; copulation杂交 cross-breed; hybridism 8.互相 mutual; reciprocal; each other：交换 exchange; swap; commute交流 exchange; communicate; intercourse; give and take交易 business; deal; transaction; trade交谈 talk (with each other); converse; chat 9.一齐；同时（发生）together; simultaneously：风雪交加 snowing and blowing hard; snowy and windy; snowstorm饥寒交迫 cold and hungry惊喜交集 pleasant surprise; feelings of surprise mixed with joy交2[jiāo]（ㄐㄧㄠ） 同 same as 跤 jiāo相关词组邦交 | 成交 | 初交 | 递交 | 缔交 | 订交 | 断交 | 复交 | 工交 | 故交 | 国交 | 混交 | 建交 | 结交 | 旧交 | 绝交 | 开交 | 立交 | 攀交 | 社交 | 深交 | 神交 | 世交 | 私交 | 提交 | 外交 | 相交 | 新交 | 性交 | 移交 | 杂交 | 择交 | 知交 | 至交 | 转交 | 打交道 | 够交情 | 拉交情 | 立交桥 | 套交情 | 外交团 | 忘年交 | 刎颈交 | 外交辞令 | 外交特权 | 远交近攻 | 悲喜交集 | 觥筹交错 | 环形交叉 | 立体交叉 | 目不交睫 | 内外交困 | 平面交叉 | 犬牙交错 | 失之交臂 | 世代交替 | 水乳交融 | 性命交关 | 八拜之交 | 不可开交 | 经济杂交 | 老实巴交 | 炮舰外交 | 水米无交 | 无性杂交 | 一面之交 | 有性杂交 | 副交感神经交班 | 交办 | 交保 | 交兵 | 交叉 | 交差 | 交错 | 交代 | 交待 | 交道 | 交底 | 交点 | 交恶 | 交锋 | 交付 | 交割 | 交工 | 交媾 | 交关 | 交还 | 交好 | 交合 | 交互 | 交换 | 交汇 | 交会 | 交火 | 交集 | 交际 | 交加 | 交接 | 交结 | 交界 | 交九 | 交卷 | 交口 | 交困 | 交流 | 交纳 | 交配 | 交迫 | 交情 | 交融 | 交涉 | 交手 | 交谈 | 交替 | 交通 | 交往 | 交尾 | 交卸 | 交心 | 交椅 | 交易 | 交谊 | 交游 | 交战 | 交账 | 交织 | 交白卷 | 交杯酒 | 交换机 | 交际花 | 交际舞 | 交流电 | 交通车 | 交通岛 | 交通壕 | 交通线 | 交通员 | 交响乐 | 交易所 | 交战国 | 交感神经 | 交换价值 | 交通工具 | 交头接耳 | 交相辉映

交九
交九[jiāo jiǔ] 进入从冬至开始的‘九’enter the nine periods (of nine days each) following the Winter Solstice;另见  九 jiǔ2.

交互
交互[jiāo hù]1.互相 each other; mutual; one another：教师宣布答案之后，就让同学们交互批改。After he announced the answers, the teacher let the students correct each other's papers. 2.替换着 alternately; in turn：他两手交互地抓住野藤，向山顶上爬。He clutched the creeping vine, and climbed hand over hand towards the top of the cliff.

交付
交付[jiāo fù] 交给 pay; consign (a task) to sb.; entrust sb. with (a task); hand over; deliver：交付定金 place a down payment交付任务 consign a task to sb.新楼房已经交付使用。The new building is already in use.

交代
交代[jiāo dài]1.把经手的事务移交给接替的人 hand over; turn over; transfer; transfer work at hand to a replacement：交代工作 hand over work (to one's successor) 2.嘱咐 tell; give instructions; enjoin; exhort：他一再交代我们要注意工程质量。He repeatedly exhorted us to pay attention to the quality of the project. 3.把事情或意见向有关的人说明；把错误或罪行坦白出来 make clear; brief; account for; explain or clarify to people concerned; confess (error or crime)：交代政策 explain a policy; clarify a policy交代问题 admit one's faults亦 also 交待 jiāodài

交会
交会[jiāo huì] 会合；相交 meet; converge; intersect：郑州是京广、陇海两条铁路的交会点。Zhengzhou is where the Beijing-Guangzhou and Lanzhou-Lianyungang railways intersect.

交保
交保[jiāo bǎo] 司法机关将人犯交付有信用的保人，保证他不逃避侦查和审判，随传随到 post bail; bail out; hand over a criminal to a trustworthy person, or bailsman, who provides bail to guarantee the criminal's availability for further investigation or trial：交保释放 release on bail

交关
交关[jiāo guān]1.相关联 related to：性命交关 matter of life and death; of vital importance 2.〈方 dial.〉非常；很 rather; very：上海今年冬天交关冷。This winter it was rather cold in Shanghai. 3.〈方 dial.〉很多 many：公园里人交关。There are so many people in the park.

交兵
交兵[jiāo bīng]〈书 fml.〉交战 be at war; in a state of belligerence; wage a war; engage in battle：两国交兵 two countries at war

交割
交割[jiāo gē]1.双方结清手续（多用于商业）settle or complete a business transaction：这笔货款业已交割。The money for this consignment has already been paid. 2.移交；交代 hand over; turn over; transfer; deliver：工作都交割清了。The work has been completely transferred.

交办
交办[jiāo bàn] 交给某人办理（多指上级对下级 usu. of sb. in authority to a subordinate）entrust sth. to sb.; assign sb. a task：这是上级交办的任务。This is a task from the superiors.

交加
交加[jiāo jiā]（两种事物）同时出现或同时加在一个人身上 (of two things) occur simultaneously; accompany each other：风雪交加 snowstorm惊喜交加 feelings of surprise mixed with joy拳足交加 alternate punches with kicks; beat up

交卷
交卷[jiāo juàn]（～儿 jiāo∥juànr）1.应考的人考完交出试卷 (of examinee) hand in an examination paper 2.〈比喻 fig.〉完成所接受的任务 fulfil one's task; discharge one's mission：这事交给他办，三天准能交卷。Give him the task and he is sure to finish it in three days.

交卸
交卸[jiāo xiè]〈旧时 old〉官吏卸职，向后任交代 (of official) hand over official duties to one's successor

交叉
交叉[jiāo chā]1.几个方向不同的线条或线路互相穿过 cross; intersect; intercross; crisscross; place where different lines or routes intersect：交叉火力网 crossfire net立体交叉桥 flyover; overpass; interchange公路和铁路交叉 intersection of highway and railway 2.有相同有不同的；有相重的 similar yet not identical; overlapping：交叉的意见 overlapping views交叉学科 overlapping fields of learning; cross-disciplinary science 3.间隔穿插 alternate; stagger; take turns：交叉作业 work alternately

交口
交口[jiāo kǒu]1.众口同声（说）speak with one voice; chorus; say sth. in unison：交口称誉 praise unanimously 2.〈方 dial.〉交谈 converse; talk：他们久已没有交口。They haven't been talking to each other for a long time.

交合
交合[jiāo hé]1.连接在一起 link; combine：悲喜交合 be happy and sad at the same time两旁行道树，枝叶交合。Branches and leaves of the trees on either side of the street interweave with one another. 2.指性交 sexual intercourse

交响乐
交响乐[jiāo xiǎng yuè] 由管弦乐队演奏的大型乐曲，通常由四个乐章组成，能够表现出多样的、变化复杂的思想感情 symphony; symphonic music; sinfonia; extended piece of music for symphony orchestra, usu. in four movements, expressing varied and complex emotions

交困
交困[jiāo kùn] 各种困难同时出现 beset by difficulties：内外交困 be beset by difficulties at home and abroad上下交困。Everyone is facing difficulties.

交头接耳
交头接耳[jiāo tóu jiē ěr] 彼此在耳朵边低声说话 whisper to each other; speak in each other's ears; speak head to head

交好
交好[jiāo hǎo] 互相往来，结成知己或友邦 meet and establish friendship; (of states) be on friendly terms：两国交好。The two countries are on friendly terms.交好有年 be on good terms for years

交媾
交媾[jiāo gòu] 性交 sexual intercourse; copulation; coitus

交尾
交尾[jiāo wěi] 动物交配 (of animals) mate; pair; couple; copulate

交工
交工[jiāo gōng] 施工单位把已完成的工程移交给建设单位 hand over a completed project by the construction unit to the trustor

交差
交差[jiāo chāi] 任务完成后把结果报告上级 report back to one's superior after accomplishing a task：事情不办好，怎么回去交差？How can we report back when things are unfinished?

交底
交底[jiāo dǐ]（～儿 jiāo∥dǐr）交代事物的底细 let in on the secret of sth.; reveal one's real intentions：你不向我交底，我自然不明白其中奥妙。If you keep something back from me, naturally I won't understand all the subtleties.

交往
交往[jiāo wǎng] 互相来往 associate; contact：我跟他没有交往。I have no contact with him.他不大和人交往。He rarely associates with anyone. or He is unsociable.

交待
交待[jiāo dài]1. 同 same as 交代 jiāodài ③ 2.完结（指结局不如意的，含诙谐意）(humor.) come to an unpleasant end：要是飞机出了事，这条命也就交待了。If the plane crashes, I will be a goner.

交心
交心[jiāo xīn] 把自己内心深处的想法无保留地说出来 lay one's heart bare; open one's heart (to sb.)：通过交心，他们相互间加深了了解。After heart-to-heart talks, they now understand each other better.

交恶
交恶[jiāo wù] 互相憎恨仇视 fall foul of each other; become enemies; regard each other with enmity：两国交恶。The two countries regarded each other with hostility. or Hostility flared up between the two nations.

交情
交情[jiāo qing] 人与人互相交往而发生的感情 friendship; friendly relations; fellowship：交情深 on intimate terms他们之间很有交情。They are intimate friends.

交感神经
交感神经[jiāo gǎn shén jīng]从胸部和腰部的脊髓发出的神经，在脊柱两侧形成串状的交感神经节，再由交感神经节发出神经纤维分布到内脏、腺体和血管的壁上。作用跟副交感神经相反，有加强和加速心脏收缩，使瞳孔扩大，使肠蠕动减弱等作用。sympathetic nerve; sympathetic system; nerves extending from the thoracic and lumbar regions of the spinal cord, and forming clusters of ganglia on each side of the spine. Nerve fibres from the ganglia extend to the inner organs, the glands and the vascular system. They function in opposition to the parasympathetic system to strengthen and accelerate systaltic action of the heart, dilate the pupil of the eye and diminish intestinal peristalsis, amongst others.

交战
交战[jiāo zhàn] 双方作战 (of two sides) be at war; fight a war：交战国 belligerent countries; nations at war

交战国
交战国[jiāo zhàn guó] 实际上已交战或彼此宣布处于战争状态的国家 belligerent countries (states, nations or powers); nations at war; countries already at war or declared to be in a state of war

交手
交手[jiāo shǒu] 双方搏斗 fight hand to hand; hand-to-hand combat; clash; come to grips; wrestle with; grapple with：他俩交过三次手都不分高下。They have come to grips on three occasions and neither has won.

交换
交换[jiāo huàn]1.双方各拿出自己的给对方；互换 exchange; interchange; swap; commute：交换纪念品 exchange souvenirs交换意见 exchange views两队交换场地。The two teams changed sides. 2.以商品换商品；买卖商品 exchange of goods; barter; business exchange; commodity exchange

交换价值
交换价值[jiāo huàn jià zhí]某种商品和另一种商品互相交换时的量的比例，例如一把斧子换二十斤粮食，二十斤粮食就是一把斧子的交换价值。商品的交换价值是商品价值的表现形式。exchange value; ratio between quantities of commodities in an exchange, e.g. if one axe can be exchanged for 20 jin of grain, then that is the exchange value of one axe. Exchange value is the expression of the value of a commodity.

交换机
交换机[jiāo huàn jī]设在各电话用户之间，能按通话人的要求来接通电话的机器。交换机有人工的和自动的两大类。(telephone) exchange; switchboard; apparatus that connects individual telephones and puts through a telephone conversation on demand. There are two types of switchboard, manual and automatic.

交接
交接[jiāo jiē]1.连接 join; connect：夏秋交接的季节 when summer changes into autumn 2.移交和接替 hand over and take over：新上任的保管和老保管办理交接手续。The new custodian went through the handover procedures with his predecessor. 2.结交 associate with; mix with; make friends with：他交接的朋友也是爱好京剧的。The friends he mixes with are also fond of Peking Opera.

交易
交易[jiāo yì] 买卖商品 business (deal); bargain; trade; (business) transaction; deal; swap; traffic; exchange：交易市场 market做了一笔交易 complete a transaction不能拿原则做交易 never barter away principles

交易所
交易所[jiāo yì suǒ]进行证券或商品交易的市场，所买卖的可以是现货，也可以是期货。通常有证券交易所和商品交易所两种。exchange; bourse; place where securities and commodities (spot goods or futures) are bought and sold; usu. referring to stock exchange and commodity exchange

交替
交替[jiāo tì]1.接替 give place to; replace; supersede：新旧交替。The new replaces the old. 2.替换着；轮流 alternately; one after another; in turn; by turns：循环交替 go in a cycle; rotate儿童的作业和休息应当交替进行。Children should alternate homework and rest.

交杯酒
交杯酒[jiāo bēi jiǔ] 旧俗举行婚礼时新婚夫妇饮的酒，把两个酒杯用红丝线系在一起，新婚夫妇交换着喝两个酒杯里的酒 (old wedding custom) wine drunk by the bride and groom at a wedding, served in two cups tied together with a red silk thread, which the newly-weds switch around

交椅
交椅[jiāo yǐ]1.〈古代 arch.〉椅子，腿交叉，能折叠 folding chair：坐第一把交椅（指当大头领，现比喻当第一把手）occupy the first chair; be in command; (now fig.) be the No. 1 leader 2.〈方 dial.〉椅子（多指有扶手的）armchair

交汇
交汇[jiāo huì]（水流、气流等）聚集到一起；会合 (of water or air currents) confluence; converge; join; meet：长江口因为咸水和淡水交汇，鱼类资源极为丰富。The mouth of the Yangtze River is rich in fish resources because of the confluence of salty and fresh water.

交流
交流[jiāo liú]1.交错地流淌 cross-flow：涕泪交流 cry and snivel河港交流 river that flows into a bay 2.彼此把自己有的供给对方 swap; exchange; interchange; communicate; interflow：物资交流 exchange of goods and materials文化交流 cultural exchange交流工作经验 exchange work experience

交流电
交流电[jiāo liú diàn]方向和强度作周期性变化的电流。现在使用的交流电，一般是方向和强度每秒改变50次。alternating current (AC); electric current which reverses direction and alters magnitude at regular intervals. The currently used AC is at 50 cycles per second.

交涉
交涉[jiāo shè] 跟对方商量解决有关的问题 discuss in order to solve a problem; negotiate; bargain; make representations (to sb. about sth.); take up (sth. with sb.)：办交涉 take up the matter (with sb.)你去交涉一下，看能不能提前交货。You go and talk to them to see whether the delivery can be made earlier.

交游
交游[jiāo yóu]〈书 fml.〉结交朋友 make friends：交游很广 have many friends; have a large circle of friends

交火
交火[jiāo huǒ] 交战；互相开火 open fire; exchange fire; fight

交点
交点[jiāo diǎn] 线与线、线与面相交的点 intersection; intersection point; point of intersection of lines or line and surface

交班
交班[jiāo bān] 把工作任务交给下一班 hand over to the next shift; change shift

交界
交界[jiāo jiè] 两地相连，有共同的疆界 (of two or more places) have a common boundary; be contiguous：云南省南部跟越南、老挝和缅甸交界。Yunnan Province borders on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar in the south.

交白卷
交白卷[jiāo bái juàn]（～儿 jiāo báijuànr）1.考生不能回答试题，把空白试卷交出去 hand in a blank examination paper without answering any questions 2.〈比喻 fig.〉完全没有完成任务 utterly fail to complete a task：咱们必须把情况摸清楚，不能回去交白卷。We must find out how things stand here so we won't go back empty-handed.

交相辉映
交相辉映[jiāo xiāng huī yìng]（各种光亮、彩色等）相互映照 (of bright lights or colours) add radiance and beauty to each other; enhance each other's beauty：星月灯火，交相辉映。Stars, moon and lights enhance each other's brilliance.

交纳
交纳[jiāo nà] 向政府或公共团体交付规定数额的金钱或实物 hand in; render; pay (to the state or public organization)：交纳会费 pay membership dues交纳膳费 pay for meals交纳农业税 pay agricultural taxes

交织
交织[jiāo zhī]1.错综复杂地合在一起 intertwine; mingle; interweave; interlace：各色各样的烟火在天空中交织成一幅美丽的图画。Colourful fireworks mingled to form a beautiful picture in the sky. 2.用不同品种或不同颜色的经纬线织 interweave with warps and wefts of different texture or colours：棉麻交织 mixed weave of cotton with linen黑白交织 interweave black with white

交结
交结[jiāo jié]1.结交；交往 associate with; mix with; make friends with：交结朋友 make friends他在文艺界交结很广。He has a large circle of friends in the world of art and literature. 2.〈书 fml.〉互相连接 interconnect：交结盘错 intertwine; intermingle

交融
交融[jiāo róng] 融合在一起 mix; blend; mingle：水乳交融 blend like water and milk; in harmony with; in tune with; compatible

交谈
交谈[jiāo tán] 互相接触谈话 come in contact and talk; converse; chat：亲切地交谈 talk warmly; heart-to-heart talk他们用英语交谈起来。They began to converse in English.

交谊
交谊[jiāo yì] 交情；友谊 friendship; friendly relations; companionship

交账
交账[jiāo zhàng]1.移交账务 hand over the accounts 2.〈比喻 fig.〉向有关的人交代自己承担的事情 account for a task entrusted to one：把你冻坏了，我怎么向你哥交账。If you catch cold, what will I say to your brother?

交还
交还[jiāo huán] 归还；退还 give back; return; restore; retrocede：文件阅后请及时交还。Please read the document and return immediately.

交迫
交迫[jiāo pò]（不同的事物）同时逼迫 (of different things) assail at the same time; harass：饥寒交迫 assailed by hunger and cold贫病交迫 beset by poverty and disease

交通
交通[jiāo tōng]1.往来通达 connected; linked; come and go：阡陌交通 criss-cross paths leading to all directions 2.各种运输和邮电事业的总称 general term for transportation, postal and telecommunications services 3.抗日战争和解放战争时期指通信和联络工作 (in the War of Resistance against Japan and the War of Liberation) communication; liaison 4.指交通员 liaison man; underground messenger 5.〈书 fml.〉结交；勾结 associate with; collude with; collaborate with：交通权贵 associate with the rich and powerful交通官府 collaborate with government officials

交通员
交通员[jiāo tōng yuán] 抗日战争和解放战争中担任通讯联络工作的人员 (in the War of Resistance against Japan and the War of Liberation) liaison man; underground messenger

交通壕
交通壕[jiāo tōng háo]阵地内连接堑壕和其他工事以供交通联络的壕沟。在重要地段上有射击设施。communication trench; on the battlefield, trench that provides for communication between defence trenches and other fortifications and is equipped with firearms in important sections; 亦 also 交通沟 jiāotōnggōu

交通岛
交通岛[jiāo tōng dǎo] 道路中间的圆形小平台，警察站在上面指挥交通，有时也用白漆划线表示 traffic island; circular platform or area marked out by white, painted lines at road junctions for policemen to stand on to direct traffic

交通工具
交通工具[jiāo tōng gōng jù] 运输用的车辆、船只和飞机等 means of transportation; vehicle, ship or aircraft used for transport

交通线
交通线[jiāo tōng xiàn] 运输的路线，包括铁路线、公路线、航线等 lines of communication; communication routes, including railways, highways, air routes, etc.

交通车
交通车[jiāo tōng chē] 机关、团体等为公务来往而定时行驶的大型汽车或火车 office bus; shuttle bus; regular train; regular bus or train service provided by a government office, organization, etc. for the purpose of official business

交道
交道[jiāo dào] 指交际来往的事 contact; dealings; come-and-go：打交道 have dealings with; deal with我和他曾有过几次交道。I once had some dealings with him.

交配
交配[jiāo pèi] 雌雄动物发生性的行为；植物的雌雄生殖细胞相结合 (in animals) mating; copulation; (in plants) amphimixis

交锋
交锋[jiāo fēng] 双方作战 cross swords; engage in battle：敌人不敢和我们交锋。The enemy dare not risk engaging us.这两支足球劲旅将在明日交锋。The two strong football teams will confront each other tomorrow.

交错
交错[jiāo cuò]〈书 fml.〉交叉；错杂 interlock; interlace; criss-cross; intersect; alternate：犬牙交错 interlocking; jigsaw-like纵横交错的沟渠 labyrinth of ditches; criss-crossing canals and ditches; interlacing canals and ditches

交际
交际[jiāo jì] 人与人之间的往来接触；社交 socialize; communication：语言是人们的交际工具。Language is a means of communication for human beings.他不善于交际。He is not good at socializing.

交际舞
