交际舞[jiāo jì wǔ] 一种社交性的舞蹈，男女两人合舞 ballroom dance; social dance亦 also 交谊舞 jiāoyìwǔ

交际花
交际花[jiāo jì huā] 在社交场中活跃而有名的女子（含轻蔑意 derog.）social butterfly; hetaera; party girl

交集
交集[jiāo jí]（不同的感情、事物等）同时出现 (of different feelings or things) mix; mingle; occur simultaneously：百感交集 experience mixed feelings惊喜交集 feelings of surprise mixed with joy; joyful surprise雷雨交集 thunderstorm

亥
亥[hài]（ㄏㄞˋ）地支的第十二位 last of the 12 Earthly Branches另见  干支 gānzhī相关词组辛亥革命 | 鲁鱼亥豕亥时

亥时
亥时[hài shí] 旧式计时法指夜间九点钟到十一点钟的时间 period of the day from 9 p.m. to 11 p.m. (based on the old chronometric method)

亦
亦[yì]（ㄧˋ）1.〈书 fml.〉也（表示同样）；也是 also; too：反之亦然 and the reverse is also true; and vice versa人云亦云 repeat what others say; parrot 2.(Yì) 姓 a surname相关词组不亦乐乎 | 人云亦云亦步亦趋 | 亦庄亦谐

亦庄亦谐
亦庄亦谐[yì zhuāng yì xié] 形容既庄重，又诙谐 serious and comical at the same time; seriocomic

亦步亦趋
亦步亦趋[yì bù yì qū]《庄子·田子方》：‘夫子步亦步，夫子趋亦趋。’意思是老师走学生也走，老师跑学生也跑。ape sb. at every step; imitate sb.'s every move; blindly follow suit; Zhuangzi·Tian Zifang:‘When the teacher walks, the students also walk. When the teacher runs, the students also run.’〈比喻 fig.〉自己没有主张，或为了讨好，每件事都顺从别人，跟着人家走 follow sb. in every move for having no idea of one's own or for pleasing others

产
产[chǎn]（ㄔㄢˇ）（産）1.人或动物的幼体从母体中分离出来 give birth to (cubs or babies); deliver; breed; bear：产妇 woman in labour; woman who has just given birth产科 obstetrics; maternity department产卵 lay eggs 2.创造物质财富或精神财富；生产 create wealth for material or cultural progress; produce：产销 production and marketing增产 increase production转产 shift production 3.出产 produce; manufacture：产粮 produce grain产煤 produce coal 4.物产；产品 produce; products：土产 native produce特产 special local product水产 aquatic product 5.产业 property; estate：家产 family property; family possession财产 property破产 bankrupt; broken相关词组包产 | 薄产 | 变产 | 财产 | 超产 | 出产 | 畜产 | 催产 | 单产 | 倒产 | 低产 | 地产 | 动产 | 房产 | 丰产 | 改产 | 高产 | 公产 | 估产 | 国产 | 海产 | 恒产 | 家产 | 减产 | 矿产 | 亏产 | 林产 | 临产 | 流产 | 名产 | 难产 | 逆产 | 平产 | 破产 | 欠产 | 生产 | 盛产 | 水产 | 顺产 | 私产 | 死产 | 特产 | 田产 | 投产 | 土产 | 脱产 | 稳产 | 物产 | 析产 | 小产 | 压产 | 遗产 | 引产 | 渔产 | 早产 | 增产 | 转产 | 资产 | 祖产 | 财产权 | 房产主 | 副产品 | 共产党 | 净产值 | 农产品 | 生产力 | 生产率 | 生产线 | 无产者 | 预产期 | 助产士 | 总产值 | 不动产 | 小生产 | 再生产 | 共产主义 | 生产方式 | 生产工具 | 生产关系 | 生产过剩 | 生产基金 | 生产资料 | 无产阶级 | 中产阶级 | 资产阶级 | 必要产品 | 第二产业 | 第三产业 | 第一产业 | 短线产品 | 工业产权 | 拳头产品 | 剩余产品 | 小生产者 | 信息产业 | 长线产品 | 知识产权 | 知识产业 | 固定资产 | 流动资产 | 倾家荡产 | 清洁生产 | 人工流产 | 商品生产 | 资产负债表 | 半无产阶级 | 小资产阶级 | 劳动生产率 | 流氓无产者 | 游民无产者 | 简单再生产 | 扩大再生产 | 无产阶级专政 | 资产阶级革命 | 官僚资产阶级 | 科学共产主义 | 买办资产阶级 | 民族资产阶级 | 简单商品生产 | 共产主义青年团产程 | 产道 | 产地 | 产儿 | 产房 | 产妇 | 产科 | 产量 | 产品 | 产婆 | 产钳 | 产权 | 产生 | 产物 | 产销 | 产业 | 产院 | 产值 | 产褥期 | 产业工人

产业
产业[chǎn yè]1.土地、房屋、工厂等财产（多指私有的 oft. of private ownership）land, houses, factories, and other properties 2.关于工业生产的（用于定语 oft. used as attributive）industrial：产业工人 industrial worker产业部门 industrial department产业革命 industrial revolution

产业工人
产业工人[chǎn yè gōng rén] 在现代工业生产部门中劳动的工人，如矿工、钢铁工人、纺织工人、铁路工人等 industrial worker; employees working in the production departments of modern industries, such as miners, steel workers, textile workers, railway workers, etc.

产值
产值[chǎn zhí] 在一个时期内全部产品或某一产品以货币计算的价值量 value of output; output value; value of one product or all products calculated in currency within a specified period

产儿
产儿[chǎn ér] 刚出世的婴儿 newborn baby这种工具正是技术革新运动的产儿。This implement is a product of the technical innovation drive.

产品
产品[chǎn pǐn] 生产出来的物品 product; produce：农产品 farm produce畜产品 livestock products产品出厂都要经过检验。All the products shall be examined before they leave the factory.

产地
产地[chǎn dì] 物品出产的地方 place of origin; place where sth. is made

产妇
产妇[chǎn fù] 在分娩期或产褥期中的妇女 puerpera; woman in labour; woman who is in labour or has just given birth

产婆
产婆[chǎn pó]〈旧时 old〉以接生为业的妇女 midwife; woman who makes a living by helping women give birth

产房
产房[chǎn fáng] 供产妇分娩用的房间 delivery room

产权
产权[chǎn quán] 指财产的所有权 property right; title; ownership of property

产物
产物[chǎn wù] 在一定条件下产生的事物；结果 outcome; things produced under certain conditions; result：迷信是愚昧落后的产物。Superstition results from ignorance and backwardness.

产生
产生[chǎn shēng] 由已有事物中生出新的事物；出现 give rise to; bring about; evolve; come into being; emerge：产生矛盾 conflicts emerge在中华民族悠久的历史中，产生了许许多多可歌可泣的英雄人物。A great multitude of laudable heroes emerged in the long Chinese history.

产科
产科[chǎn kē] 医院中专门负责孕妇的孕期保健，辅助产妇分娩等的一科 obstetrics; department of obstetrics; maternity department; department in a hospital that specializes in providing medical care for pregnant women, childbirth, and other related services

产程
产程[chǎn chéng] 分娩的过程 childbirth; parturition; process of giving birth to a child

产褥期
产褥期[chǎn rù qī] 产妇产出胎儿后到生殖器官恢复一般状态的一段时期 puerperium; period of time after a woman gives birth and before her reproductive organs completely recover

产道
产道[chǎn dào] 胎儿脱离母体时所经过的通道，包括骨产道（骨盆）和软产道（子宫颈和阴道）两部分 birth canal; canal through which the foetus passes during delivery, including two parts - bone canal (pelvis) and soft canal (cervix and vagina)

产量
产量[chǎn liàng] 产品的总量 output; yield

产钳
产钳[chǎn qián] 助产用的一种器械，在某些分娩过程中（如难产）用来牵引胎儿 obstetric forceps; medical instrument used to help deliver the baby in case of a difficult labour (dystocia)

产销
产销[chǎn xiāo] 生产和销售 production and marketing：产销结合 coordination between production and marketing产销合同 contract of production and marketing

产院
产院[chǎn yuàn] 为产妇进行产前检查以及供产妇度过分娩期和产后期的医疗机构 maternity hospital; lying-in hospital; medical institution that provides medical care for pregnant women before, during, and after delivery

亨
亨1[hēng]（ㄏㄥ）1.顺利 go smoothly：亨通 go smoothly; be prosperous 2.(Hēng) 姓 a surname〈古 arch.〉 同 same as 烹 pēng亨2[hēng]（ㄏㄥ）亨利的简称 abbr. for 亨利 hēnglì相关词组大亨亨利 | 亨通

亨利
亨利[hēng lì]电感单位，电路中电流强度在1秒钟内的变化为1安培、产生的电动势为1伏特时，电感就是1亨利。这个单位名称是为纪念美国物理学家亨利(Joseph Henry)而定的。henry; actual SI unit of inductance, equal to the self-inductance of a circuit, or the mutual inductance of two circuits, in which the variation of one ampere per second results in an induced electromotive force of one volt; named after American physicist Joseph Henry; 简称 abbr. 亨 hēng in Chinese and‘H’in English

亨通
亨通[hēng tōng] 顺利 smooth; without a hitch：万事亨通。Everything is going smoothly.他这几年青云直上，官运亨通。In recent years he has had a successful official career and a meteoric rise.

亩
亩[mǔ]（ㄇㄨˇ）（畝）地积单位，10分等于1亩，100亩等于1顷。现用市亩，1市亩等于60平方丈，合666.7平方米 mu, unit of land measure; 10 fen equal 1 mu; 100 mu equal 1 qing; currently called shimu, 1 shimu equals 60 square zhang or 666.7 square metres相关词组地亩 | 畎亩 | 田亩

享
享[xiǎng]（ㄒㄧㄤˇ）1.享受 enjoy：享用 enjoy the use of坐享其成 reap where one has not sown有福同享 share weal and woe 2.〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 飨 xiǎng相关词组分享 | 配享 | 坐享其成享福 | 享乐 | 享年 | 享受 | 享用 | 享有

享乐
享乐[xiǎng lè]享受安乐（多用于贬义 usu. derog.）lead a life of pleasure; indulge in creature comforts：享乐思想 hedonist philosophy贪图享乐 seek ease and comfort

享受
享受[xiǎng shòu] 物质上或精神上得到满足 bask in; enjoy; be satisfied materially or spiritually：贪图享受 seek ease and comfort享受权利 enjoy a right享受公费医疗 enjoy public health services吃苦在前，享受在后 be the first to bear hardships and the last to enjoy comforts

享年
享年[xiǎng nián]〈敬辞 pol.〉称死去的人活的岁数（多指老人）(of a deceased, generally elderly person) die at the age of：享年七十四岁 die at the age of 74

享有
享有[xiǎng yǒu]在社会上取得（权利、声誉、威望等）enjoy; attain in society (rights, prestige, reputation, etc.)：享有盛名 enjoy a sterling reputation在我国，男女享有同样的权利。In our country women enjoy equal rights with men.

享用
享用[xiǎng yòng] 使用某种东西而得到物质上或精神上的满足 enjoy; be satisfied materially or spiritually by the use of sth.：享用不尽 enjoy the use of (sth.) endlessly

享福
享福[xiǎng fú] 生活得安乐美好；享受幸福 enjoy happiness; live in ease and comfort

京
京1[jīng]（ㄐㄧㄥ）1.首都 capital of a country：京城 capital city京师 capital of a country 2.(Jīng) 指我国首都北京 Beijing, capital of China：京剧 Peking Opera京腔 Beijing accent京味儿 Beijing flavour 3.(Jīng) 姓 a surname京2[jīng]（ㄐㄧㄥ）〈古代 arch.〉数目名，指一千万 10 million相关词组北京时间 | 北京猿人 | 五日京兆京白 | 京城 | 京都 | 京官 | 京胡 | 京华 | 京畿 | 京剧 | 京派 | 京腔 | 京师 | 京味 | 京戏 | 京族 | 京白梨 | 京二胡 | 京油子 | 京韵大鼓

京二胡
京二胡[jīng èr hú] 胡琴的一种，和二胡相似，音响介于京胡二胡之间，用于京剧伴奏等 a type of Chinese fiddle similar to the two-stringed erhu, producing a musical sound between the jinghu and the erhu, and used to accompany Peking Opera singing亦 also 嗡子 wēng·zi

京剧
京剧[jīng jù]我国全国性的主要剧种之一。清中叶以来，以西皮、二黄为主要腔调的徽调、汉调相继进入北京，徽汉合流演变为北京皮黄戏，即京剧。Peking Opera; one of the main national operas of China. Beginning from the mid-Qing Dynasty, Anhui and Hubei melodies composed mainly of the xipi and the erhuang found their way to Beijing and their fusion resulted in the birth of the pihuang opera of Beijing, or Peking Opera. 亦 also 京戏 jīngxì

京华
京华[jīng huá] 首都 capital of a country：誉满京华 well-known throughout the capital

京味
京味[jīng wèi]（～儿 jīngwèir）北京风味；北京地方特色 special flavour of Beijing; Beijing specialties：京味小吃 Beijing specialty snacks京味十足的电视剧 TV play rich in Beijing flavour

京城
京城[jīng chéng] 指国都 capital of a country

京官
京官[jīng guān]〈旧时 old〉称在京城供职的官员 official with a post in the capital

京师
京师[jīng shī]〈书 fml.〉首都 capital of a country

京戏
京戏[jīng xì] 同 same as 京剧 jīngjù

京族
京族[Jīng zú]1.我国少数民族之一，分布在广西 Jing (Ching) people, or Jings (Chings), one of China's ethnic groups, living in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 2.越南人数最多的民族 most populous ethnic group in Vietnam

京油子
京油子[jīng yóu zi] 指久住北京老于世故而油滑的人 Beijing sharper; worldly and wily person who has lived in Beijing for a long time

京派
京派[jīng pài] 京剧的一个流派，以北京的表演风格为代表 the Beijing style of Peking Opera

京畿
京畿[jīng jī]〈书 fml.〉国都及其附近的地方 capital city and its environs

京白
京白[jīng bái] 京剧中指用北京话念的道白 parts in Peking Opera spoken in Beijing dialect

京白梨
京白梨[jīng bái lí]北京地区产的白梨。果实皮薄，肉厚，味甜多汁，香味浓郁。a kind of fragrant, sweet juicy pear produced in the Beijing area, with a thin peel and thick flesh

京胡
京胡[jīng hú] 胡琴的一种，形状跟二胡相似而较小，琴筒用竹子做成，发音较高，主要用于京剧伴奏 jinghu; Peking Opera fiddle; two-stringed instrument similar to but smaller than the erhu, with a bamboo resonator and a high pitch, used mainly to accompany Peking Opera singing

京腔
京腔[jīng qiāng] 指北京语音 Beijing accent

京都
京都[jīng dū] 京城 capital of a country

京韵大鼓
京韵大鼓[jīng yùn dà gǔ] 曲艺，大鼓的一种，形成于北京，流行北方各地 storytelling in Beijing dialect with drum accompaniment, developed in Beijing and popular in northern China

亭
亭1[tíng]（ㄊㄧㄥˊ）1.亭子 pavilion (in a park or beside a road for people to rest) 2.形状像亭子的小房子 stall; kiosk：邮亭 postal kiosk书亭 book stall亭2[tíng]（ㄊㄧㄥˊ）〈书 fml.〉适中；均匀 well-balanced; in the middle; even：亭午 midday; noon相关词组报亭 | 岗亭 | 凉亭 | 书亭 | 邮亭 | 长亭 | 电话亭亭亭 | 亭午 | 亭匀 | 亭子 | 亭子间 | 亭亭玉立

亭亭
亭亭[tíng tíng]1.形容高耸 erect; upright：早年种的一棵松树已长得亭亭如盖。The pine tree planted many years ago now stands straight under a large canopy of foliage. 2. 同 same as 婷婷 tíngtíng

亭亭玉立
亭亭玉立[tíng tíng yù lì] 形容美女身材细长或花木等形体挺拔 (of a woman) fair, slim and graceful; (of a tree, etc.) tall and straight

亭匀
亭匀[tíng yún] 同 same as 停匀 tíngyún

亭午
亭午[tíng wǔ]〈书 fml.〉正午；中午 midday; noon

亭子
亭子[tíng zi] 盖在路旁或花园里供人休息用的建筑物，面积较小，大多只有顶，没有墙 pavilion (in a park or beside a road for people to rest), usually with a roof, but without walls

亭子间
亭子间[tíng zi jiān]〈方 dial.〉上海等地某些旧式楼房中的一种小房间，位置在房子后部的楼梯中间，狭小，光线较差 cubbyhole; small, dark back room tucked away behind the staircase of an old-style storeyed house in Shanghai or other cities

亮
亮[liàng]（ㄌㄧㄤˋ）1.光线强 bright; light：明亮 bright; brightly-lit; well-lit豁亮 spacious and bright这盏灯不亮。This lamp is not alight. 2.发光 shine; emit light：天亮了。It's dawn. or It's daybreak. or It's light already.手电筒亮了一下。The torch flashed for a second.屋子里亮着灯光。There is light in the room. 3.（声音）强；响亮 (of voice) loud and clear：洪亮 a resonant voice她的歌声脆而亮。She sings clearly and melodiously. 4.使声音响亮 make one's voice loud and clear：亮起嗓子 raise one's voice; lift one's voice 5.（心胸、思想等）开朗；清楚 (of mind, thought, etc.) enlightened：心明眼亮 see and think clearly; be sharp-eyed and clear-minded; have sharp eyes and a clear mind 6.显露；显示 reveal; show：亮相 pose for the audience on the stage before exit or after entrance (as in Peking Opera, dancing, etc.); state one's views; declare one's position把底儿亮出来 show one's cards on the table; reveal one's story; disclose one's stand or views这种热带的蝙蝠，一亮翅膀足有脸盆大。The wings of this kind of tropical bat are as large as a washbasin when they are spread.相关词组白亮 | 敞亮 | 脆亮 | 光亮 | 洪亮 | 豁亮 | 火亮 | 嘹亮 | 明亮 | 漂亮 | 清亮 | 天亮 | 通亮 | 透亮 | 瓦亮 | 乌亮 | 鲜亮 | 响亮 | 雪亮 | 油亮 | 月亮 | 锃亮 | 傍亮儿 | 灯亮儿 | 漂亮话 | 视亮度 | 透亮儿 | 麻麻亮 | 蒙蒙亮 | 诸葛亮 | 月亮门儿 | 高风亮节 | 心明眼亮 | 锃光瓦亮 | 打开天窗说亮话亮底 | 亮点 | 亮度 | 亮儿 | 亮分 | 亮光 | 亮话 | 亮丽 | 亮色 | 亮堂 | 亮相 | 亮光光 | 亮晶晶 | 亮牌子 | 亮闪闪 | 亮堂堂 | 亮眼人 | 亮锃锃 | 亮铮铮

亮丽
亮丽[liàng lì]1.明亮美丽 brilliant; splendid; bright and beautiful：色彩亮丽 vibrant colour亮丽的风景线 brilliant scenery 2.美好；优美 beautiful; graceful; brilliant：他的诗歌很有韵味，散文也写得亮丽。He writes lyrical poems and brilliant proses.

亮儿
亮儿[liàng r]1.灯火 light (of a lamp, candle, etc.)：拿个亮儿来。Bring a light. 2.亮光 light：远远看见有一点亮儿。There is a light in the distance.

亮光
亮光[liàng guāng]（～儿 liàngguāngr）1.黑暗中的一点或一道光 light; beam of light; gleam of light; shaft of light：夜已经很深了，他家的窗户上还有亮光。It is very late in the night, but there is still light on the window of his house. 2.物体表面反射的光 light reflected by the surface of an object：这种布有亮光儿。The cloth is lustrous.

亮光光
亮光光[liàng guāng guāng]（～的 liàngguāngguāng·de）形容物体光亮 shining：一把亮光光的镰刀 a shining sickle

亮分
亮分[liàng fēn]（～儿 liàng∥fēnr）进行某些比赛时，评分的人亮出所评的分数 (of a judge or umpire) give or show marks in a competition：请评委亮分儿。Judges, please show the marks you give.裁判们亮出各人打的分儿。The judges signal the marks given to the competitors.

亮堂
亮堂[liàng tang]1.敞亮；明朗 light; bright：新盖的商场又高大，又亮堂。The newly-built shopping centre is large and bright. 2.（胸怀、思想等）开朗；清楚 (of mind, thought, etc.) clear; enlightened：经过学习，心里更亮堂了。After study, we had a much better understanding of what it's all about. 3.（声音）响亮 (of voice) loud and clear：嗓门亮堂 clear and resonant voice清清嗓子，唱亮堂点儿。Clear your voice and sing louder.

亮堂堂
亮堂堂[liàng tāng tāng]（～的 liàngtāngtāng·de）形容很亮 brightly lit; well lit; brilliant：灯火通明，照得礼堂里亮堂堂的。The auditorium was well lit with blazing lights. or Blazing lights lit up in the auditorium.

亮底
亮底[liàng dǐ]1.把底细公开出来 lay one's cards on the table; reveal frankly one's intentions, schemes, resources, etc.; reveal the whole story：别让大家瞎猜了，你就亮底吧。Don't let the others make a wild guess. Lay your cards on the table. 2.显示出结局 reveal the final result：这场围棋赛还没亮底呢。The final result of the go match is not yet available.

亮度
亮度[liàng dù]发光体或反光体使人眼睛感到的明亮程度。亮度和所看到的物体的大小、发光或反光的强度及距离有关。brightness; brilliance; degree of brightness of the luminous body or the reflector felt by human eyes. The brightness is related to the size of the object seen, the intensity of the light emitted or reflected, and its distance.

亮晶晶
亮晶晶[liàng jīng jīng]（～的 liàngjīngjīng·de）形容物体明亮闪烁发光 glittering; sparkling; glistening：亮晶晶的露珠 glistening dewdrops小星星，亮晶晶。Little stars glitter.

亮点
亮点[liàng diǎn]〈比喻 fig.〉有光彩而引人注目的人或事物 bright spot; person or event that occupies the limelight：在全国排球联赛上，几位再度出山的教练成为亮点。In the national volleyball league competition, it was the returned coaches that stole the limelight.作者亲笔签名的旧书是此次拍卖会的亮点。The old books with the author's autograph were the main focus of attention at the auction.

亮牌子
亮牌子[liàng pái zi] 亮出牌子 lay the cards on the table;〈比喻 fig.〉说出名字、表明身份等 reveal one's name and identity

亮相
亮相[liàng xiàng]1.戏曲演员上下场时或表演舞蹈时由动的身段变为短时的静止的姿势，目的是突出角色情绪，加强戏剧气氛 (of a performer in traditional Chinese opera) strike a pose on the stage after entrance and before exit or when dancing 2.〈比喻 fig.〉公开露面或表演 make one's debut; appear before the public and give performance：刚刚结束冬训的国家女排，今晚在福建省体育馆首次亮相。The national women's volleyball team made its first appearance in the Fujian Provincial Indoor Stadium this evening after finishing their winter training. 3.〈比喻 fig.〉公开表示态度，亮明观点 declare one's position; state one's views

亮眼人
亮眼人[liàng yǎn rén] 盲人称眼睛看得见的人 people with normal sight; bright-eyed ones (blind people's term for those who can see)

亮色
亮色[liàng sè] 明亮的色彩，也用于比喻 [also used in a figurative sense] bright colour; lustre：两个小演员的出色表演为该剧增添了不少亮色。The excellent performance of the two child actors added colour to the drama.

亮话
亮话[liàng huà] 明白而不加掩饰的话 to be frank：打开天窗说亮话 frankly speaking说亮话吧，我不能帮你这个忙。To be frank, I can't give you the help.

亮铮铮
亮铮铮[liàng zhēng zhēng]（～的 liàngzhēngzhēng·de）形容闪光耀眼 shining; gleaming：一把亮铮铮的利剑 a gleaming sharp sword

亮锃锃
亮锃锃[liàng zēng zēng]（～的 liàngzēngzēng·de）形容闪光耀眼 shining; gleaming：亮锃锃的铡刀 shining fodder chopper新买的钢精锅，亮锃锃的。The newly-bought aluminium pot is gleaming.

亮闪闪
亮闪闪[liàng shǎn shǎn]（～的 liàngshǎnshǎn·de）形容闪亮发光 sparkling; glittering：亮闪闪的眼睛 sparkling eyes亮闪闪的启明星 glittering morning star; glittering Venus

亲
亲[qīn]（ㄑㄧㄣ）（親）1.父母 parents：父亲 father母亲 mother双亲 parents 2.亲生的 one's own (flesh and blood)：亲女儿 one's own daughter 3.血统最接近的 related by blood; next of kin：亲弟兄（同父母的弟兄）blood brother亲叔叔（父亲的亲弟弟）first uncle (younger brother of one's father) 4.有血统或婚姻关系的 relative; kin：亲属 relatives; kinsfolk亲戚 relative亲人 family members; parents; spouse, children, etc.; kith and kin亲友 relatives and friends; kith and kin姑表亲 cousinship沾亲带故 have ties of kinship or friendship; be related somehow or other 5.婚姻 marriage; match：结亲 marry; get married定亲 be engaged; be betrothed to亲事 marriage 6.指新妇 bride：娶亲 (of a man) get married送亲 (of a family) escort the bride to the bridegroom's home or the wedding party迎亲 (of the bridegroom's family) send a party to escort the bride to the bridegroom's home or the wedding party 7.关系近；感情好（跟‘疏’相对 as opposed to‘distant’）close; intimate; dear：亲近 be close to; be on intimate terms with; be friendly with亲密 close; intimate; dear亲爱 dear; beloved; cherished亲热 loving; affectionate; intimate; warm-hearted不分亲疏 regardless of close or distant relationship; make no distinction between one's relatives or friends and others 8.亲自 in person; personally：亲身 personal; first-hand; done or made by oneself亲手 personally; oneself; with one's own hands亲口 (say or speak) personally亲眼所见 see with one's own eyes; eyewitness 9.跟人亲近（多指国家 usu. of countries）in favour of; supporting：亲华 pro-Chinese亲美 pro-American 10.用嘴唇接触（人或东西），表示亲热 kiss; touch (sb. or sth.) with the lips as a form of endearment：亲嘴 kiss他亲了亲孩子。He kissed the baby.另见  qìng亲[qìng]（ㄑㄧㄥˋ）（親）另见  见下 below另见  qīn相关词组表亲 | 成亲 | 单亲 | 嫡亲 | 定亲 | 父亲 | 干亲 | 躬亲 | 和亲 | 换亲 | 接亲 | 结亲 | 近亲 | 老亲 | 令亲 | 六亲 | 母亲 | 内亲 | 宁亲 | 攀亲 | 抢亲 | 求亲 | 娶亲 | 舍亲 | 省亲 | 双亲 | 说亲 | 送亲 | 探亲 | 讨亲 | 提亲 | 投亲 | 退亲 | 乡亲 | 相亲 | 血亲 | 姻亲 | 迎亲 | 远亲 | 沾亲 | 长亲 | 招亲 | 至亲 | 尊亲 | 做亲 | 串亲戚 | 母亲河 | 娃娃亲 | 近亲繁殖 | 六亲不认 | 三亲六故 | 食亲财黑 | 旁系亲属 | 直系亲属 | 众叛亲离 | 大义灭亲 | 任人唯亲 | 事必躬亲亲爱 | 亲本 | 亲笔 | 亲传 | 亲代 | 亲等 | 亲故 | 亲家 | 亲近 | 亲眷 | 亲口 | 亲历 | 亲临 | 亲密 | 亲昵 | 亲朋 | 亲戚 | 亲切 | 亲情 | 亲热 | 亲人 | 亲善 | 亲身 | 亲生 | 亲事 | 亲手 | 亲疏 | 亲属 | 亲体 | 亲王 | 亲吻 | 亲信 | 亲眼 | 亲友 | 亲鱼 | 亲缘 | 亲征 | 亲政 | 亲知 | 亲炙 | 亲子 | 亲自 | 亲族 | 亲嘴 | 亲和力 | 亲家公 | 亲家母 | 亲痛仇快 | 亲子鉴定

亲临
亲临[qīn lín] 亲自到（某处） make a personal appearance (at a place); come or go to (a place) in person：亲临其境 make a personal appearance (at a place); come or go to (a place) in person亲临现场 make a personal appearance at the scene亲临指导 be present to give guidance亲临抗洪前线 come to the frontier to fight the floods in person

亲事
亲事[qīn shi] 婚事 marriage：操办亲事 arrange one's marriage

亲人
亲人[qīn rén]1.直系亲属或配偶 kinsfolk; relative; directly related members of one's family or spouse's family; one's family members; one's parents, spouse, children, etc.; one's kith and kin：他家里除母亲以外，没有别的亲人。Besides his mother, he has no other relatives at home. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉关系亲密、感情深厚的人 dear ones; those dear to one

亲代
亲代[qīn dài] 产生后一代生物的生物，对后一代生物来说是亲代，所产生的后一代叫子代 parental generation; organism that produces the later (or filial) generation

亲传
亲传[qīn chuán] 亲身传授 impart (knowledge) or teach personally：亲传弟子 one's own disciple; disciple whom one has taught personally

亲体
亲体[qīn tǐ] 产生后一代生物的雌性个体或雄性个体 parent; male or female individual organism that produces the subsequent generation

亲信
亲信[qīn xìn]1.亲近而信任 be close with and trust：亲信小人 be close with and trust villains 2.亲近而信任的人（多含贬义 usu. derog.）trusted follower; confidant; person with whom one is close to and trusts：培植亲信 cultivate trusted followers

亲切
亲切[qīn qiè]1.亲近；亲密 warm; close; affectionate：他想起延安，像想起家乡一样亲切。Warm feelings surged in him when he recalled Yan'an, the place that felt like home to him. 2.形容热情而关心 kind; hearty; cordial; enthusiastic and caring：老师的亲切教导 teacher's kind guidance

亲历
亲历[qīn lì] 亲身经历 experience personally; be personally on the scene; be involved directly：亲历其境 experience personally; be personally on the scene这是我亲历的事，所以印象极深。I personally experienced it, so the matter has left a deep impression on me.

亲友
亲友[qīn yǒu] 亲戚朋友 relatives and friends; kith and kin

亲口
亲口[qīn kǒu]（话）出于本人的嘴 say (or speak) personally：这是他亲口告诉我的。He told me this himself.

亲吻
亲吻[qīn wěn] 用嘴唇接触（人或物），表示亲热、喜爱 kiss; touch (people or things) with the lips to express one's affection or love

亲和力
亲和力[qīn hé lì] 两种或两种以上的物质结合成化合物时互相作用的力 affinity; force that acts mutually between two or more substances synthesizing chemical compounds

亲善
亲善[qīn shàn] 亲近而友好 (between countries) friendship and goodwill：两国亲善。The two countries have maintained friendly relations.

亲嘴
亲嘴[qīn zuǐ]（～儿 qīn∥zuǐr）两个人以嘴唇相接触，表示亲爱 kiss; (of two persons) touch with the lips to express love or affection

亲子
亲子[qīn zǐ] 人或其他动物的上一代跟下一代 (of human or other animals) parents and children - two immediate generations; the former and later generations：亲子关系 parent-offspring relationship

亲子鉴定
亲子鉴定[qīn zǐ jiàn dìng] 用测试双方DNA（脱氧核糖核酸）或血型的方法，来确定两个人是否为亲生父子（女）或亲生母子（女）的关系 child (or paternity) identification; paternity test; determination of the parent-child relationship between two persons by testing their DNA or blood type

亲家
亲家[qìng jia]1.两家儿女相婚配的亲戚关系 relatives by marriage：儿女亲家 relatives by the marriage of one's children 2.称儿子的丈人、丈母或女儿的公公、婆婆 parents of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law; parents-in-law of one's son or daughter

亲家公
亲家公[qìng jia gōng] 称儿子的丈人或女儿的公公 father-in-law of one's son or daughter; father of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law

亲家母
亲家母[qìng jia mǔ] 称儿子的丈母或女儿的婆婆 mother-in-law of one's son or daughter; mother of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law

亲密
亲密[qīn mì] 感情好，关系密切 close; dear; intimate; of deep emotion and close relations：他俩非常亲密。The two of them are on intimate terms.亲密的战友 close comrade-in-arms

亲属
亲属[qīn shǔ] 跟自己有血统关系或婚姻关系的人 kinsfolk; relatives; person related to oneself by blood or marriage：直系亲属 lineal relatives旁系亲属 collateral relatives

亲征
亲征[qīn zhēng] 指帝王亲自出征 (of an emperor) take command of an expedition in person

亲情
亲情[qīn qíng] 亲人的情义 emotional attachment among family members：父女亲情 affection between father and daughter不念亲情 regardless of the emotional attachment among family members祖国处处有亲情。The warm feeling among the people, like the emotional attachment among family members, may be found everywhere in our motherland.

亲戚
亲戚[qīn qi] 跟自己家庭有婚姻关系或血统关系的家庭或它的成员 relative; family, or a member connected to one's family by marriage or blood relations：一门亲戚 a group of relatives (usu. from the same family or clan)我们两家是亲戚。Our two families are related.他在北京的亲戚不多，只有一个表姐。He has no relative in Beijing except for an elder female cousin.

亲手
亲手[qīn shǒu] 用自己的手（做） (do) with one's own hands; in person; personally; oneself：你亲手种的两棵枣树，现在长得可大啦。The two jujube trees that you planted with your own hands have grown very tall.

亲政
亲政[qīn zhèng] 幼年继位的帝王成年后亲自处理政事 (of a young sovereign who succeeded to the throne in childhood) assume the reins of government upon coming of age; personally manage or attend to government affairs upon coming of age

亲故
亲故[qīn gù] 亲戚故旧 relatives and old friends：遍访亲故 visit all the relatives and old friends

亲族
亲族[qīn zú] 家属和同族；家族 members of the same clan

亲昵
亲昵[qīn nì] 十分亲密 intimate; affectionate; attached：她亲昵地依偎在母亲怀里。She nestled in her mother's arms affectionately.

亲朋
亲朋[qīn péng] 亲戚朋友 relatives and friends; relatives and acquaintances：亲朋好友 relatives and friends

亲本
亲本[qīn běn] 杂交时所选用的父本或母本 parent; selected male or female parent for cross-breeding

亲炙
亲炙[qīn zhì]〈书 fml.〉直接受到教诲或传授 study under sb.'s direct guidance; be directly under sb.'s tutorship

亲热
亲热[qīn rè] 亲密而热情 affectionate; intimate; warm-hearted; loving：大伙儿就像久别重逢的亲人一样，亲热极了。Our faces all beamed with joy and warmth like loved ones meeting again after a long separation.乡亲们围着子弟兵，亲亲热热地问长问短。The villagers mobbed the people's army, making warm-hearted enquiries.

亲爱
亲爱[qīn ài] 关系密切，感情深厚 dear; beloved; cherished; of close relations and deep emotion：亲爱的祖国 one's beloved country or homeland亲爱的同志 dear comrade亲爱的母亲 dear mother

亲王
亲王[qīn wáng] 皇帝或国王的亲属中封王的人 prince; relative of an emperor or a king who is granted the title of prince

亲生
亲生[qīn shēng]1.自己生育 one's own child：小明是她亲生的。Xiao Ming is her own child. 2.自己生育的或生育自己的 one's own (children or parents)：亲生子女 one's own children亲生父母 one's own parents

亲疏
亲疏[qīn shū]（关系）亲近和疏远 (of relationships) close and distant：不分亲疏，一视同仁。We regard all as equals, making no distinction between friends and non-friends.

亲痛仇快
亲痛仇快[qīn tòng chóu kuài] 亲人痛心，仇人高兴 sadden one's own people and gladden the enemy; bring grief to one's own people and joy to the enemy：决不能做亲痛仇快的事。We must not do anything to sadden our friends and delight our enemies.亦 also 亲者痛，仇者快 qīnzhě tòng, chóuzhě kuài

亲眷
亲眷[qīn juàn]1. 同 same as 亲戚 qīn·qi 2.眷属 family members, esp. wife and children

亲眼
亲眼[qīn yǎn] 用自己的眼睛（看） (see) with one's own eyes; (witness) personally：亲眼所见 see with one's own eyes参观的人亲眼看到了这几年农民生活的巨大变化。The visitors have seen for themselves the tremendous changes in peasants' lives over the past few years.

亲知
亲知[qīn zhī] 亲身知道 know at firsthand：真正亲知的是具有实践经验的人。Those who are in possession of real knowledge have acquired it through practice.

亲笔
亲笔[qīn bǐ]1.亲自动笔（写） write in one's own hand; autograph：亲笔信 letter in one's own handwriting; handwritten letter这是他亲笔写的。It is in his own writing. 2.指亲自写的字 one's own handwriting; autograph：这几个字是鲁迅先生的亲笔。These words are in Lu Xun's handwriting.

亲等
亲等[qīn děng] 计算亲属关系亲疏远近的单位，如父母和子女为一亲等，祖父母和孙子女为二亲等 degree of kinship; unit of counting close and distant kinship, e.g. the relationship between parents and children is the first-degree of kinship, and that of grandparents and grandchildren, second-degree of kinship

亲缘
亲缘[qīn yuán] 指血缘关系；亲代遗传关系 affinity; blood relations; consanguinity

亲自
亲自[qīn zì]自己（做）personally; in person; (do sth. by) oneself：你亲自去一趟，和他当面谈谈。Please go there yourself to have a face-to-face talk with him.库房的门总是由他亲自开关，别人从来不经手。He always opens and closes the door of the storeroom himself, never allowing others to handle it.

亲身
亲身[qīn shēn] 同 same as 亲自 qīnzì：亲身经历 personal experience; first-hand experience

亲近
亲近[qīn jìn] 亲密而接近 be close to; be friendly with; be on intimate terms with：这两个小同学很亲近。The two little classmates are on intimate terms.他热情诚恳，大家都愿意亲近他。As he is warm-hearted and sincere, everyone wants to be friends with him.

亲鱼
亲鱼[qīn yú] 指发育到性成熟阶段，有繁殖能力的雄鱼或雌鱼 parent fish; male or female fish that has developed into sexual maturity with reproductive capacity亦 also 种鱼 zhǒngyú

亳
亳[Bó]（ㄅㄛˊ）亳州，地名，在安徽 Bozhou, name of a city in Anhui Province

亵
亵[xiè]（ㄒㄧㄝˋ）（褻）1.轻慢 treat with irreverence; be disrespectful：亵渎 blaspheme; profane; pollute亵慢 show disrespect 2.淫秽 obscene; indecent; salacious：猥亵 abuse sexually; be lewd亵语 obscene utterances; obscenities相关词组猥亵亵渎 | 亵慢

亵慢
亵慢[xiè màn]〈书 fml.〉轻慢；不庄重 show disrespect：言语亵慢 salacious words

亵渎
亵渎[xiè dú]〈书 fml.〉轻慢；不尊敬 show disrespect：亵渎神灵 blaspheme against gods

亶
亶[dǎn]（ㄉㄢˇ）〈书 fml.〉实在；诚然 indeed; truly另见  dàn亶[dàn]（ㄉㄢˋ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 但 dàn ① ②另见  dǎn

亸
亸[duǒ]（ㄉㄨㄛˇ）（嚲、軃）〈书 fml.〉下垂 hang down; droop

亹
亹[mén]（ㄇㄣˊ）亹源(Ményuán)，地名，在青海。今作门源。Menyuan County in Qinghai Province; now written as 门源 Ményuán另见  wěi亹[wěi]（ㄨㄟˇ）[亹亹]〈书 fml.〉1.形容勤勉不倦 diligent 2.形容向前推移、行进 push or move forward另见  mén

人
人[rén]（ㄖㄣˊ）1.能制造工具并使用工具进行劳动的高等动物 humanity; higher animal that can make tools and use them in labour：男人 man女人 woman人们 people人类 human being 2.每人；一般人 everyone：人手一册 a copy to everyone人所共知 be known to all 3.指成年人 adult man or woman：长大成人 grow up; become adult 4.指某种人 certain category of people：工人 worker军人 serviceman主人 host介绍人 matchmaker 5.别人 others; other people：人云亦云 parrot; echo待人诚恳 be sincere to people 6.指人的品质、性格或名誉 personality; character; reputation：丢人 be disgraced; lose face这个同志人很好。The comrade is a good person.他人老实。He is an honest man. 7.指人的身体或意识 one's state of health or mind：这两天人不大舒服 not feel well the last couple of days送到医院人已经昏迷过去了 lose consciousness upon being rushed to the hospital 8.指人手、人才 hand; talent：人浮于事 be overstaffed我们这里正缺人。We are short of hands here.相关词组爱人 | 白人 | 保人 | 报人 | 背人 | 本人 | 鄙人 | 敝人 | 便人 | 别人 | 冰人 | 病人 | 常人 | 超人 | 吵人 | 成人 | 仇人 | 传人 | 蠢人 | 词人 | 粗人 | 大人 | 歹人 | 道人 | 得人 | 敌人 | 丢人 | 动人 | 恶人 | 恩人 | 法人 | 凡人 | 烦人 | 犯人 | 飞人 | 非人 | 废人 | 夫人 | 感人 | 高人 | 个人 | 工人 | 古人 | 故人 | 寡人 | 官人 | 贵人 | 国人 | 过人 | 汉人 | 行人 | 好人 | 黑人 | 恨人 | 红人 | 后人 | 华人 | 坏人 | 佳人 | 家人 | 贾人 | 匠人 | 今人 | 近人 | 惊人 | 举人 | 巨人 | 军人 | 可人 | 客人 | 狂人 | 困人 | 阔人 | 来人 | 老人 | 丽人 | 恋人 | 良人 | 猎人 | 路人 | 盲人 | 媒人 | 美人 | 魅人 | 门人 | 迷人 | 名人 | 明人 | 牧人 | 拿人 | 男人 | 难人 | 恼人 | 内人 | 能人 | 泥人 | 拟人 | 农人 | 侬人 | 女人 | 偶人 | 怕人 | 旁人 | 仆人 | 旗人 | 前人 | 强人 | 亲人 | 情人 | 穷人 | 求人 | 容人 | 孺人 | 骚人 | 商人 | 上人 | 神人 | 生人 | 圣人 | 诗人 | 时人 | 士人 | 示人 | 世人 | 熟人 | 耍人 | 谁人 | 私人 | 俗人 | 损人 | 他人 | 糖人 | 通人 | 同人 | 瞳人 | 头人 | 土人 | 外人 | 完人 | 妄人 | 为人 | 伟人 | 文人 | 闻人 | 吾人 | 武人 | 喜人 | 下人 | 吓人 | 仙人 | 先人 | 闲人 | 贤人 | 线人 | 小人 | 新人 | 羞人 | 学人 | 雪人 | 雅人 | 阉人 | 洋人 | 养人 | 要人 | 野人 | 伊人 | 宜人 | 艺人 | 用人 | 游人 | 友人 | 原人 | 猿人 | 贼人 | 丈人 | 哲人 | 真人 | 证人 | 中人 | 众人 | 主人 | 专人 | 走人 | 族人 | 罪人 | 醉人 | 做人 | 不人道 | 大人物 | 得人儿 | 得人心 | 二人台 | 二人转 | 法人股 | 疯人院 | 害人虫 | 行人情 | 好人家 | 尽人事 | 来人儿 | 老人家 | 老人星 | 泪人儿 | 类人猿 | 卖人情 | 美人蕉 | 面人儿 | 上人儿 | 双人舞 | 送人情 | 燧人氏 | 唐人街 | 托人情 | 仙人球 | 仙人掌 | 小人儿 | 小人物 | 主人公 | 主人翁 | 做人家 | 白相人 | 半边人 | 保护人 | 保证人 | 被害人 | 辩护人 | 场面人 | 出家人 | 茨冈人 | 代理人 | 代言人 | 当事人 | 稻草人 | 底下人 | 第三人 | 丁村人 | 读书人 | 发言人 | 公诉人 | 过来人 | 候选人 | 回头人 | 机器人 | 继承人 | 监护人 | 鉴定人 | 经纪人 | 局内人 | 局外人 | 老好人 | 两性人 | 亮眼人 | 买卖人 | 没事人 | 明眼人 | 纳税人 | 女主人 | 嫂夫人 | 色目人 | 同路人 | 未亡人 | 文化人 | 屋里人 | 心上人 | 意中人 | 阴阳人 | 犹太人 | 有心人 | 债权人 | 债务人 | 植物人 | 中间人 | 著作人 | 庄稼人 | 自己人 | 自然人 | 傍人门户 | 步人后尘 | 成人教育 | 成人之美 | 乘人之危 | 痴人说梦 | 稠人广众 | 出人头地 | 出人意料 | 待人接物 | 低人一等 | 动人心弦 | 发人深省 | 感人肺腑 | 高人一等 | 个人主义 | 工人阶级 | 骇人听闻 | 诲人不倦 | 吉人天相 | 寄人篱下 | 加人一等 | 尽人皆知 | 扣人心弦 | 快人快语 | 盲人摸象 | 盲人瞎马 | 耐人寻味 | 杞人忧天 | 强人所难 | 沁人心脾 | 仁人君子 | 仁人志士 | 任人唯亲 | 任人唯贤 | 杀人越货 | 拾人牙慧 | 耸人听闻 | 损人利己 | 铁人三项 | 万人空巷 | 为人作嫁 | 小人儿书 | 羞人答答 | 言人人殊 | 掩人耳目 | 仰人鼻息 | 贻人口实 | 以人废言 | 因人成事 | 引人入胜 | 庸人自扰 | 有人家儿 | 渔人之利 | 与人为善 | 予人口实 | 正人君子 | 知人之明 | 不近人情 | 不省人事 | 惨绝人寰 | 惨无人道 | 草菅人命 | 差强人意 | 大快人心 | 法定人数 | 反面人物 | 风云人物 | 公教人员 | 狗仗人势 | 好为人师 | 荒无人烟 | 家给人足 | 脍炙人口 | 马翻人仰 | 马仰人翻 | 蒙古人种 | 面无人色 | 渺无人烟 | 木头人儿 | 勤杂人员 | 神职人员 | 事在人为 | 双重人格 | 顺水人情 | 天怒人怨 | 头面人物 | 一表人才 | 有色人种 | 政通人和 | 阿拉伯人 | 悲天悯人 | 北京猿人 | 不可告人 | 产业工人 | 出口伤人 | 从井救人 | 第一夫人 | 咄咄逼人 | 俯仰由人 | 哥萨克人 | 孤家寡人 | 光彩照人 | 含血喷人 | 后发制人 | 吉卜赛人 | 借刀杀人 | 蓝田猿人 | 冷语冰人 | 目中无人 | 泥足巨人 | 农业工人 | 旁若无人 | 平易近人 | 前无古人 | 日耳曼人 | 荣誉军人 | 山顶洞人 | 舍己为人 | 圣诞老人 | 盛气凌人 | 斯拉夫人 | 推己及人 | 未成年人 | 息事宁人 | 下里巴人 | 先发制人 | 先声夺人 | 血口喷人 | 血统工人 | 一鸣惊人 | 以己度人 | 以貌取人 | 印第安人 | 元谋猿人 | 怨天尤人 | 月下老人 | 治病救人 | 自欺欺人 | 个人所得税 | 杀人不见血 | 杀人不眨眼 | 慷他人之慨 | 欧罗巴人种 | 墙倒众人推 | 爱斯基摩人 | 犯罪嫌疑人 | 个人数字助理 | 起死人，肉白骨 | 中国人民解放军 | 赔了夫人又折兵 | 盎格鲁撒克逊人 | 一人得道，鸡犬升天 | 老鼠过街，人人喊打 | 鹬蚌相争，渔人得利 | 尼格罗澳大利亚人种 | 十年树木，百年树人 | 司马昭之心，路人皆知人才 | 人材 | 人参 | 人潮 | 人称 | 人次 | 人大 | 人道 | 人丁 | 人儿 | 人犯 | 人份 | 人夫 | 人格 | 人工 | 人海 | 人和 | 人寰 | 人祸 | 人际 | 人迹 | 人家 | 人间 | 人杰 | 人精 | 人均 | 人口 | 人类 | 人力 | 人流 | 人伦 | 人马 | 人们 | 人民 | 人命 | 人品 | 人气 | 人情 | 人权 | 人群 | 人人 | 人日 | 人蛇 | 人身 | 人生 | 人声 | 人士 | 人氏 | 人世 | 人事 | 人手 | 人梯 | 人体 | 人头 | 人望 | 人为 | 人文 | 人物 | 人像 | 人心 | 人性 | 人选 | 人烟 | 人样 | 人意 | 人鱼 | 人员 | 人猿 | 人造 | 人证 | 人质 | 人治 | 人中 | 人种 | 人贩子 | 人格化 | 人格权 | 人公里 | 人行道 | 人尖子 | 人口学 | 人来疯 | 人类学 | 人力车 | 人马座 | 人民币 | 人民性 | 人情味 | 人身权 | 人生观 | 人性论 | 人影儿 | 人缘儿 | 人造革 | 人造土 | 人道主义 | 人地生疏 | 人定胜天 | 人浮于事 | 人工呼吸 | 人工降雨 | 人工流产 | 人工授精 | 人工智能 | 人行横道 | 人机界面 | 人杰地灵 | 人困马乏 | 人老珠黄 | 人面兽心 | 人民法院 | 人民警察 | 人民团体 | 人民武装 | 人民战争 | 人民政府 | 人莫予毒 | 人情世故 | 人山人海 | 人身事故 | 人身自由 | 人寿年丰 | 人微言轻 | 人文科学 | 人文主义 | 人仰马翻 | 人云亦云 | 人造磁铁 | 人造行星 | 人造石油 | 人造卫星 | 人造纤维 | 人民检察院 | 人民陪审员 | 人民代表大会 | 人民民主专政 | 人民内部矛盾 | 人造地球卫星 | 人同此心，心同此理 | 人为刀俎，我为鱼肉

人丁
人丁[rén dīng]1.〈旧时 old〉指成年人 grown-up person 2. 同 same as 人口 rénkǒu：人丁兴旺 have a growing family

人世
人世[rén shì] 人间；世间 human world; this world亦 also 人世间 rénshìjiān

人中
人中[rén zhōng] 人的上唇正中凹下的部分 philtrum; vertical groove on the median line of the upper lip

人为
人为[rén wéi]1.〈书 fml.〉人去做 human effort：事在人为。It counts on human effort to accomplish something. 2.人造成的（用于不如意的事 refer to sth. undesirable）man-made：人为的障碍 man-made barrier人为的困难 difficulty caused by sb. on purpose

人为刀俎，我为鱼肉
人为刀俎，我为鱼肉[rén wéi dāo zǔ, wǒ wéi yú ròu]〈比喻 fig.〉人家掌握生杀大权，自己处在被宰割的地位 meat on sb.'s chopping block - be at sb.'s mercy

人事
人事[rén shì]1.人的离合、境遇、存亡等情况 occurrences in a person's life, such as partings and reunions, lot, subsistence and death, etc. 2.关于工作人员的录用、培养、调配、奖惩等工作 human resources, including employment, training, deployment, reward and penalty, etc.：人事科 personnel department人事材料 personnel data人事安排 personnel arrangement 3.指人与人之间的关系 interpersonal relation：人事纠纷 interpersonal dispute人事磨擦 interpersonal friction 4.事理人情 ways of the world：不懂人事 have no idea of the ways of the world 5.人力能做到的事 what is humanly possible：尽人事 do one's utmost 6.人的意识的对象 consciousness：他昏迷过去，人事不知。He has lost consciousness. 7.〈方 dial.〉礼物 gift; present：这次回去得给老大娘送点人事，表表我的心意。When I visit my family this time, I'll give the old lady some gifts as a token of my appreciation.

人云亦云
人云亦云[rén yún yì yún] 人家说什么自己也跟着说什么，形容没有主见 parrot; have no views of one's own

人人
人人[rén rén] 所有的人；每人 everybody; everyone：我为人人，人人为我。One for all, and all for one.人人都有一双手，别人能干的活儿我也能干。As everybody has two hands, I can do whatever others are capable of doing.

人们
人们[rén men] 泛称许多人 people; public：草原上的人们 people of the grasslands天冷了，人们都穿上了冬装。It's getting cold and people are putting on their winter clothes.

人仰马翻
人仰马翻[rén yǎng mǎ fān] 形容混乱或忙乱得不可收拾的样子 men and horses thrown off their feet - badly battered; thrown into confusion亦 also 马翻人仰 mǎ fān rén yǎng 或 or 马仰人翻 mǎ yǎng rén fān

人份
人份[rén fèn]〈复合量词 compound classifier〉以一个人需要的量为一人份 person-portion; portion：麻疹疫苗三十万人份 measles vaccines for 300,000 persons; 300,000 measles inoculations

人伦
人伦[rén lún] 封建礼教所规定的人与人之间的关系，特指尊卑长幼之间的关系，如君臣、父子、夫妇、兄弟、朋友的关系 interpersonal relations, esp. those between superior and inferior, and old and young, in feudal ethics, such as the relationship between monarch and court minister, father and son, husband and wife, between brothers and between friends

人体
人体[rén tǐ] 人的身体 human body：人体模型 manikin人体生理学 human physiology

人像
人像[rén xiàng] 刻画人体或相貌的绘画、雕塑等艺术品 portrait; figure; work of art (painting, sculpture, etc.) portraying the body or looks of a human being

人儿
人儿[rén r]1.小的人形 figurine：捏了一个泥人儿 molded a clay figurine with hand 2.〈方 dial.〉指人的行为仪表 behaviour and bearing：他人儿很不错。He's a nice man.

人公里
人公里[rén gōng lǐ]〈复合量词 compound classifier〉运输企业计算客运工作量的单位，把一个旅客 运送一公里为一人公里 passenger-km; unit for counting the number of passengers transported over a distance, with one passenger-km equal to transporting one passenger over one km

人力
人力[rén lì] 人的劳力；人的力量 labour power; manpower：爱惜人力物力 treasure human and material resources用机械代替人力 mechanize physical labour非人力所及 humanly impossible; beyond the ability of human beings

人力车
人力车[rén lì chē]1.由人推或拉的车（区别于‘兽力车’和‘机动车’ as compared with‘animal-drawn cart’and‘power-driven vehicle’）cart drawn or pushed by a man 2.〈旧时 old〉一种用人拉的车，有两个橡胶车轮，车身前有两根长柄，柄端有横木相连，主要用来载人 rickshaw; light passenger vehicle with two rubber wheels and two long handles joined with a crossbar and pulled by one person

人参
人参[rén shēn]多年生草本植物，主根肥大，肉质，黄白色，掌状复叶，小叶卵形，花小，淡黄绿色，果实扁圆形。根和叶都可入药，有滋补作用。ginseng (Panax ginseng); perennial herb, having large and fleshy roots yellowish white in colour, palmately compound leaves small in size and oval in shape, small, light yellowish green flowers, and oval fruit, with both roots and leaves used as tonics

人口
人口[rén kǒu]1.居住在一定地区内的人的总数 population; total number of residents in an area：人口普查 census; population census这个区的人口有一百三十多万。There is a population of more than 1.3 million in this district. 2.一户人家的人的总数 number of mouths to be fed in a family; number of family members：他们家人口不多。There are not many people in their family. 3.泛指人 person; mouth to be fed：添人口 have a newborn baby拐带人口 abduction; human trafficking 4.人的嘴 mouth：脍炙人口 much vaunted

人口学
人口学[rén kǒu xué] 以人口现象、人口发展条件和发展规律为研究对象的学科 demography; study of population-associated phenomena, the conditions for population growth and the norms for it

人同此心，心同此理
人同此心，心同此理[rén tóng cǐ xīn, xīn tóng cǐ lǐ] 指对某些事情，大多数人的感受和想法大致相同 people feel and think alike on certain matters

人员
人员[rén yuán] 担任某种职务的人 personnel; staff：机关工作人员 office worker值班人员 staff member on duty人员配备 deployment of personnel

人命
人命[rén mìng] 人的生命（多用于受到伤害时 oft. used when life is in jeopardy）human life：一条人命 a life人命关天 with human life at stake

人和
人和[rén hé] 指人心归向，上下团结 unity of public will; social stability：人和百事兴。Social stability is the key to prosperity in all walks of life.天时不如地利，地利不如人和。Heaven's favourable weather is less important than Earth's advantageous terrain; and Earth's advantageous terrain is less important than human unity.

人品
人品[rén pǐn]1.人的品质 moral character：人品高尚 of noble character 2.人的仪表 looks：人品出众 of outstanding looks

人困马乏
人困马乏[rén kùn mǎ fá] 形容体力疲劳不堪（不一定有马） men getting weary and their steeds being spent; (of people) spent; dog-tired; exhausted

人地生疏
人地生疏[rén dì shēng shū] 指初到一个地方，对地方情况和当地的人都不熟悉 be unfamiliar with a place and the people there

人均
人均[rén jūn] 按每人平均计算 per capita：人均收入 per-capita income全村栽了四万多株树，人均一百株。The village planted more than 40,000 trees, averaging 100 per person.

人士
人士[rén shì] 有一定社会影响的人物 personage; person with certain social influence：民主人士 democratic personage各界人士 people of all walks of life党外人士 non-Party personage爱国人士 patriotic personage

人声
人声[rén shēng] 人发出的声音 human voice：人声鼎沸 babel of voices; din人声嘈杂 hubbub of voices

人大
人大[rén dà] 人民代表大会的简称 abbr. for 人民代表大会 rénmín dàibiǎo dàhuì：人大代表 deputy to the people's congress省人大 Provincial People's Congress

人夫
人夫[rén fū]〈旧时 old〉指受雇用或被征发服差役的人 corvée labourer; servant;亦 also 人伕 rénfū

人头
人头[rén tóu]1.人的头 (of a person) head 2.指人 people：按人头分 distribute according to the number of people人头税（旧时以人口为课税对象所征收的税）poll tax; (in old days) capitation (tax) 3.（人头儿 réntóur）指跟人的关系 relationship with people：人头熟 know a lot of people 4.〈方 dial.〉（人头儿 réntóur）指人的品质 morality; character：人头儿次（人品差）mean person

人定胜天
人定胜天[rén dìng shèng tiān] 指人力能够战胜自然 man is bound to triumph over nature

人家
人家[rén jiā]（～儿 rénjiār）1.住户 household; resident：这个村子有百十户人家。The village has about 100 households. 2.家庭 family：勤俭人家 thrifty family 3.指女子未来的丈夫家 family of one's husband-to-be：她已经有了人家儿了。She's already betrothed.人家[rén jia]〈代词 pron.〉1.指自己或某人以外的人；别人 [excluding oneself or a certain person] another person; other persons：人家都不怕，就你怕。Nobody is afraid, except you.人家是人，我也是人，我就学不会？They are human, and so am I. Why can't I learn it? 2.指某个人或某些人，意思跟‘他’或‘他们’相近 [referring to a certain person or certain persons] he, she, or they：你把东西快给人家送回去吧。Hurry up and send it back to him. 3.指‘我’（有亲热或俏皮的意味 used lovingly or humorously）me; I：原来是你呀，差点没把人家吓死！It's you - you nearly scared me to death!

人寰
人寰[rén huán]〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 人间 rénjiān：惨绝人寰 most inhuman; be tragic beyond comparison in this world

人寿年丰
人寿年丰[rén shòu nián fēng] 人健康，年成好，形容生活安乐美好 harvest is good and the people healthy; scene of prosperity and contentment

人尖子
人尖子[rén jiān zi] 出类拔萃的人；特殊的人 outstanding person; distinguished figure：要论庄稼活，在村里他是个人尖子。He's the top farmer of the village.亦 also 人尖儿 rénjiānr

人山人海
人山人海[rén shān rén hǎi] 形容聚集的人极多 ocean of people; huge gathering of people：体育场上，观众人山人海。The stadium was packed to overflowing.

人工
人工[rén gōng]1.人为的（区别于‘自然’或‘天然’ as compared with‘natural’）man-made; artificial：人工呼吸 artificial respiration人工降雨 artificial rainfall 2.人力；人力做的工 manpower; manual labour：人工操作 manual operation抽水机坏了，暂时用人工车水。The pump had broken down and we had to draw water by pedalling the waterwheel. 3.工作量的计算单位，指一个人做工一天 man-day; work done by one person in one day：修建这条水渠需用很多人工。Digging this canal calls for a lot of manpower.

人工呼吸
人工呼吸[rén gōng hū xī]用人工帮助呼吸的急救法。一般中毒、触电、溺水、休克等患者，在呼吸停止而心脏还在跳动时可以用人工呼吸的方法来急救。artificial respiration; restore or maintain respiration in a person who has stopped breathing as a result of poisoning, electric shock, drowning or shock by using mechanical, manual or mouth-to-mouth means to force air into and out of the lungs while the heart is still beating

人工授精
人工授精[rén gōng shòu jīng] 用人工方法采取雄性动物的精液，输入雌性动物的子宫里，使卵子受精 artificial insemination; procedure to extract semen from a male animal by artificial means and introduce it into the uterus of a female animal to induce pregnancy

人工智能
人工智能[rén gōng zhì néng] 利用电子计算机模拟人类智力活动的学科 artificial intelligence; branch of computer science concerned with development of machines with the capacity to simulate intelligent human behaviour

人工流产
人工流产[rén gōng liú chǎn] 在胚胎发育的早期，利用药物、物理性刺激或手术使胎儿脱离母体的方法 abortion; induced termination of pregnancy and expulsion of an early embryo or fetus by medication, physical means or surgery亦 also 堕胎 duò∥tāi; 通称 popularly known as 打胎 dǎ∥tāi; 简称 abbr. 人流 rénliú

人工降雨
人工降雨[rén gōng jiàng yǔ] 用人工使还没有达到降雨阶段的云变成雨降下 artificial rainfall; procedure to induce rain from clouds not yet condensing into rain drops

人影儿
人影儿[rén yǐng r]1.人的影子 shadow of a human being：窗帘上有个人影儿。The form of a person was silhouetted against the window curtain. 2.人的形象或踪影 trace of a person's presence：天黑得对面看不见人影儿。It was so dark that you couldn't even see someone standing right in front of you.他一出去，连人影儿也不见了。Once he went out he simply disappeared into nowhere.

人微言轻
人微言轻[rén wēi yán qīng] 指地位低，言论主张不受人重视 words of the lowly carry little weight

人心
人心[rén xīn]1.指众人的感情、愿望等 popular feeling：振奋人心 heartening大快人心 to the immense satisfaction of the people人心所向 accord with public will人心惶惶 public disquiet 2.指人的心地，特指善良的心地 heart, esp. kind-heartedness：人心不古 degeneration of social mores他并不是没有人心的人。He isn't a heartless man.

人性
人性[rén xìng] 在一定的社会制度和一定的历史条件下形成的人的本性 human nature; sum of qualities and traits shared by all human beings under a given social system and historical conditions人性[rén xing] 人所具有的正常的感情和理性 human feelings; reason：不通人性 unfeeling and unreasonable灭绝人性 inhuman

人性论
人性论[rén xìng lùn] 一种主张人具有天生的、固定不变的共同本性的观点 theory of human nature; theory that human beings share the same inherent and unchangeable nature

人情
人情[rén qíng]1.人的感情；人之常情 human feelings; human nature：不近人情 not amenable to reason 2.情面 favour：托人情 seek sb.'s favour不讲人情 lose sight of the human side of things 3.恩惠；情谊 favour：做个人情 do sb. a favour空头人情 lip service 4.指礼节应酬等习俗 etiquette; custom：行人情 follow an established practice尽人情 observe social etiquette 5.礼物 gift; present：送人情 present a gift

人情世故
人情世故[rén qíng shì gù] 为人处世的道理 ways of the world; worldly wisdom：不懂人情世故 be not worldly-wise

人情味
人情味[rén qíng wèi]（～儿 rénqíngwèir）指人通常具有的情感 empathy; normal human feelings：他的话富于人情味。It is really considerate of him to say these words.

人意
人意[rén yì] 人的心愿、意志 wish; expectation：尽如人意 to the satisfaction of sb.

人手
人手[rén shǒu] 做事的人 worker; hand：人手不足 short of hands

人才
人才[rén cái]1.德才兼备的人；有某种特长的人 person of ability and integrity; talent：人才难得。Real talent is hard to come by.人才辈出。People of talent come forth in large numbers. 2.指美丽端正的相貌 good looks：一表人才 man of remarkable looks有几分人才 rather good-looking亦 also 人材 réncái

人文
人文[rén wén] 指人类社会的各种文化现象 cultural activities in human society：人文科学 humanities人文景观 scenes and sights of cultural interest

人文主义
人文主义[rén wén zhǔ yì]欧洲文艺复兴时期的主要思潮，反对宗教教义和中古时期的经院哲学，提倡学术研究，主张思想自由和个性解放，肯定人是世界的中心。是资本主义萌芽时期的先进思想，但缺乏广泛的民主基础，有很大的局限性。humanism; major trend of thought of the Renaissance that is opposed to religious doctrines and scholasticism of the mediaeval times, advocates academic studies, freedom of thought and the emancipation of individuality, and asserts that human beings are the centre of the world; advanced trend of thought that occurred during the infancy of capitalism but rather limited for lack of a broad popular basis;另见  文艺复兴 wényì fùxīng

人文科学
人文科学[rén wén kē xué] 社会科学 social sciences

人日
人日[rén rì]〈旧称 old〉正月初七 7th day of the 1st lunar month

人望
人望[rén wàng] 声望；威望 popularity; prestige：素有人望 be prestigious

人机界面
人机界面[rén jī jiè miàn] 用户界面 human-machine interface; user interface

人权
人权[rén quán] 指人享有的人身自由和各种民主权利 human rights, referring to a citizen's right of person and freedom and democratic rights：侵犯人权 violation of human rights保障人权 guarantee human rights

人材
人材[rén cái] 同 same as 人才 réncái

人来疯
人来疯[rén lái fēng] 指小孩在有客人来时撒娇、胡闹 (of a child) run more wild and prankish than usual in the presence of guests

人杰
人杰[rén jié]〈书 fml.〉杰出的人 outstanding person

人杰地灵
人杰地灵[rén jié dì líng] 指杰出的人物出生或到过的地方成为名胜之区 place renowned for being the birthplace of persons of great merits; place made famous by those who have filled the land with their outstanding deeds

人样
人样[rén yàng]（～儿 rényàngr）1.人的形状；人应具有的仪表、礼貌等 proper human appearance; proper looks, etiquette, etc.：身上脏得不像个人样 person who is awfully dirty把孩子惯得一点人样都没有。The child is terribly spoiled. 2.指有出息的人 person of substance; successful person：不混出个人样来，不要回来见我。Don't come back and see me until you have amounted to something.

人格
人格[rén gé]1.人的性格、气质、能力等特征的总和 integration of a person's personality, temperament and ability, etc. 2.个人的道德品质 moral character：人格高尚 noble character 3.人的能作为权利、义务的主体的资格 person, as an entity with rights and obligations：不得侵犯公民的人格。A citizen's person brooks no violation.

人格化
人格化[rén gé huà] 童话、寓言等文艺作品中常用的一种创作手法，对动物、植物以及非生物赋予人的特征，使它们具有人的思想、感情和行为 personify; personification; method of creative writing in fairy tales, fables, etc. to represent an animal, plant, or inanimate object as having personality or the thoughts, feelings and behaviour of a human being

人格权
人格权[rén gé quán] 人身权的一种，指公民本身固有的权利，包括生命健康权、姓名权、肖像权、名誉权等 rights to human dignity; category of the rights of person, a citizen's rights that include the rights of life, health, name, portrait, reputation, etc.;另见  人身权 rénshēnquán

人梯
人梯[rén tī]1.一个人接一个人踩着肩膀向高处攀登叫搭人梯 human ladder, built by one person standing atop the shoulders of another 2.指为别人的成功而作自我牺牲的人 person who willingly makes self-sacrifices for the success of sb. else：甘当人梯 willing to serve as a human ladder

人次
人次[rén cì]〈复合量词 compound classifier〉表示若干次人数的总和。如以参观为例，第一次三百人，第二次五百人，第三次七百人，总共是一千五百人次。person-time; sum total of persons and per-person presences. Take, for example, admission to an exhibition. If 300 persons visited it the 1st time, 500 the 2nd time, and 700 the 3rd time, then the total admission would be 1,500 person-times.

人氏
人氏[rén shì]人（指籍贯说，多见于早期白话 referring to a person's native place, oft. in early vernacular）native：当地人氏 local; native person你姓什么？哪里人氏？What's your name, and where do you come from?

人民
人民[rén mín] 以劳动群众为主体的社会基本成员 the people; basic members of society consisting mainly of the labouring masses

人民代表大会
人民代表大会[rén mín dài biǎo dà huì]我国人民行使国家权力的机关。全国人民代表大会和地方各级人民代表大会代表由民主协商选举产生。people's congress; people's state apparatus of China, with delegates elected to the National People's Congress and the people's congresses at various local levels through democratic consultations; 简称 abbr. 人大 réndà

人民内部矛盾
人民内部矛盾[rén mín nèi bù máo dùn] 指在人民利益根本一致的基础上的矛盾，是非对抗性的 contradictions among the people; non-antagonistic contradictions based on the fundamental unity of interests of the people

人民团体
人民团体[rén mín tuán tǐ] 民间的群众性组织，如红十字会、中华医学会、中国人民外交学会等 non-government organization; people's organization, such as the Red Cross Society, Chinese Medical Association, the Chinese People's Diplomacy Society, etc.

人民币
人民币[rén mín bì]我国法定货币。以圆为单位。Renminbi (RMB); Chinese currency with yuan as the basic monetary unit

人民性
人民性[rén mín xìng] 指文艺作品中对人民大众的生活、思想、情感、愿望等的反映 (in works of literature and art) affinity to the people; popular feeling; affinity to the people's life, thoughts, feelings and wishes, etc.

人民战争
人民战争[rén mín zhàn zhēng] 以人民军队为骨干、有广大人民群众参加的革命战争 people's war; revolutionary war involving the broad masses of the people and with the people's army as the backbone

人民政府
人民政府[rén mín zhèng fǔ] 我国各级人民代表大会的执行机关和国家行政机关 people's government; executive department of the people's congress at various levels and the state administrative organ of China

人民检察院
人民检察院[rén mín jiǎn chá yuàn] 我国行使检察权的国家机关，分最高人民检察院、地方各级人民检察院和专门人民检察院 people's procuratorate; state procuratorial apparatus of China consisting of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, people's procuratorates at various local levels, and specialized people's procuratorates

人民武装
人民武装[rén mín wǔ zhuāng]属于人民的武装力量。在我国，指人民解放军和民兵等武装组织，特指民兵等群众性武装组织。people's armed forces; referring in China to the People's Liberation Army, the militia and other mass military organizations; special reference to the militia and other mass armed forces

人民民主专政
人民民主专政[rén mín mín zhǔ zhuān zhèng] 工人阶级（经过共产党）领导的、以工农联盟为基础的人民民主政权 people's democratic dictatorship; people's democratic political power led by the working class (through the Communist Party) and based on the worker-peasant alliance

人民法院
人民法院[rén mín fǎ yuàn] 我国行使审判权的国家机关，分最高人民法院、地方各级人民法院和专门人民法院 people's court; judiciary organ of China consisting of the Supreme People's Court, people's courts at various local levels, and specialized people's courts

人民警察
人民警察[rén mín jǐng chá] 我国的公安人员，是武装性质的治安行政力量 people's police; armed public security administrative force of China; 简称 abbr. 民警 mínjǐng

人民陪审员
人民陪审员[rén mín péi shěn yuán]我国司法机关从人民群众中吸收的参加审判的人员。由人民选举产生，在人民法院执行职务期间，同审判员有同等权力。people's assessor; representative elected from among citizens to participate in court trials with equal power as a court judge; 简称 abbr. 陪审员 péishěnyuán

人气
人气[rén qì]1.人或事物受欢迎的程度 popularity of sb. or sth.：由于该影片获奖，扮演女主角的演员人气急升。As the film won the award, the popularity of the leading actress soars. 2.〈方 dial.〉指人的品格 character; quality：这人好人气。The man has a good character.村里谁不知道他的人气！Who in the village doesn't know his character!

人治
人治[rén zhì] 先秦时期儒家的政治思想，主张君主依靠贤能来治理国家 rule by men; pre-Qin Confucian idea that advocates the rule of the country by a monarch relying on men of virtue and talent

人流
人流1[rén liú] 像河流似的连续不断的人群 stream of people：不尽的人流涌向广场。A constant stream of people flocked to the square.人流2[rén liú] 人工流产的简称 abbr. for 人工流产 réngōng liúchǎn

人浮于事
人浮于事[rén fú yú shì] 工作人员的数目超过工作的需要；事少人多 more hands than needed; overstaffed

人海
人海[rén hǎi]1.像汪洋大海一样的人群 ocean of faces; huge crowd of people：人山人海 sea of people 2.〈书 fml.〉〈比喻 fig.〉社会 society：人海沧桑 vicissitudes of human society

人潮
人潮[rén cháo] 像潮水般的人群 constant stream of people：人潮如涌。People come in a constant stream.

人烟
人烟[rén yān] 指人家，住户 people and cooking smoke; signs of human habitation（烟 yan：炊烟 cooking smoke）：人烟稠密 densely populated荒无人烟 desolate and uninhabited

人物
人物[rén wù]1.在某方面有代表性或具有突出特点的人 personage; person of distinction：英雄人物 heroic figure; hero; heroine风流人物 man of the times 2.文学和艺术作品中所描写的人 (in works of literature and art) character 3.以人物为题材的中国画 (of traditional Chinese painting) figure painting

人犯
人犯[rén fàn]〈旧时 old〉泛指某一案件中的被告或牵连在内的人 the accused and those implicated in a crime：一干人犯 defendants and the implicated

人猿
人猿[rén yuán] 类人猿 anthropoid

人生
人生[rén shēng] 人的生存和生活 human existence and life：人生观 outlook on life人生大事 highlight in a person's life; matter of consequence in a person's life人生两件宝，双手与大脑。Hands and brains are the two treasures in a person's life.

人生观
人生观[rén shēng guān]对人生的看法，也就是对于人类生存的目的、价值和意义的看法。人生观是由世界观决定的。outlook on life; person's opinions on life, including the purpose, value and significance of the existence of humanity in the world. A person's outlook on life is decided by his or her outlook on the world.另见  世界观 shìjièguān

人祸
人祸[rén huò] 人为的祸害 man-made disaster：天灾人祸 natural adversities and man-made disasters

人种
人种[rén zhǒng]具有共同起源和共同遗传特征的人群。世界上的人种主要有尼格罗-澳大利亚人种（即黑种），蒙古人种（即黄种），欧罗巴人种（即白种）。race; population distinguished by the same origin and genetically transmitted common physical characteristics, there being three major human races in the world - Negroid-Australoid, Mongoloid and Caucasoid

人称
人称[rén chēng]某些语言中动词跟名词或代词相应的语法范畴。代词所指的是说话的人叫第一人称，如‘我、我们’；所指的是听话的人叫第二人称，如‘你、你们’；所指的是其他的人或事物叫第三人称，如‘他、她、它、他们’。名词一般是第三人称。有人称范畴的语言，动词的形式跟着主语的人称变化，有的语言还跟着宾语的人称变化。person; any of three groups of pronoun forms with corresponding verb inflections that distinguish the speaker (1st person, such as‘I’and‘we’), the individual addressed (2nd person, such as‘you’), and the individual or thing spoken of (3rd person, such as‘he’,‘she’,‘it’,‘they’). Nouns are generally in 3rd person, while the person of a verb follows that of the subject or, as is the case with some languages, that of the object.

人类
人类[rén lèi] 人的总称 humanity：人类社会 human society; society造福人类 work for the benefit of humanity

人类学
人类学[rén lèi xué] 研究人类起源、进化和人种分类等的学科 anthropology; study of the characteristics of humanity such as its origin, evolution, and races, etc.

人精
人精[rén jīng]1.老于世故的人 sophisticate; worldly-wise person 2.特别聪明伶俐的小孩儿 child prodigy

人缘儿
人缘儿[rén yuán r] 跟人相处的关系（有时指良好的关系） relations with other people; popularity：没人缘儿 unpopular有人缘儿 popular人缘儿不错 have a good relationship with others

人群
人群[rén qún] 成群的人 throng; crowd：他在人群里挤来挤去。He elbowed this way and that through the crowd.

人老珠黄
人老珠黄[rén lǎo zhū huáng]〈比喻 fig.〉妇女老了被轻视，像珍珠年代久了变黄就不值钱一样 (of women) no longer be held in esteem in old age, like a pearl whose lustre has faded over time

人莫予毒
人莫予毒[rén mò yú dú] 目空一切，认为没有人能伤害我 who dare harm me - a typical case of biggety（毒 du：伤害 do harm）

人蛇
人蛇[rén shé]〈方 dial.〉指偷渡的人 human snake; illegal immigrant; one who pays highly to a snakehead for illegal passage into a foreign country

人行横道
人行横道[rén xíng héng dào] 大城市马路上划出的供行人横穿马路的一段道，一般画有斑马线的标志 zebra crossing; pedestrian crossing marked with black and white stripes

人行道
人行道[rén xíng dào] 马路两旁供人步行的便道 pavement; sidewalk

人证
人证[rén zhèng] 由证人提供的有关案件事实的证据（区别于‘物证’ as compared with‘material evidence’）eyewitness testimony

人质
人质[rén zhì] 一方拘留的对方的人，用来迫使对方履行诺言或接受某些条件 hostage; person held by one party as security that the opposing party will meet specified terms

人贩子
人贩子[rén fàn zi] 贩卖人口的人 human trafficker

人身
人身[rén shēn] 指个人的生命、健康、行动、名誉等（着眼于保护或损害 when referring to the protection or harm of the person）person; as an entity of life, health, behaviour, reputation, etc.：人身自由 freedom of person人身攻击 personal abuse

人身事故
人身事故[rén shēn shì gù] 生产劳动中发生的伤亡事件 accident involving casualties; death or injury caused in productive labour

人身权
人身权[rén shēn quán] 与公民人身不能分离而又不直接与经济利益相联系的民事权利，分为人格权和身份权两类 right of the person; civil right inseparable from a citizen's person but not directly related to his or her economic interests, in two categories, i.e. the right of personality and the right to identity

人身自由
人身自由[rén shēn zì yóu]指公民的身体不受侵犯的自由。如不得非法逮捕、搜查和拘留等。freedom of person; personal freedom that protects a citizen from illegal arrest, searching, detention, etc.

人迹
人迹[rén jì] 人的足迹 traces of human visitation; human footprints：人迹罕至 (of a place) rarely visited by a soul

人选
人选[rén xuǎn] 为一定目的挑选出来的人 candidate; person chosen for a certain purpose：适当人选 suitable candidate决定秘书长的人选 decide who will be secretary-general

人造
人造[rén zào] 人工制造的，非天然的 man-made; artificial：人造纤维 synthetic fibre人造地球卫星 man-made earth satellite

人造卫星
人造卫星[rén zào wèi xīng] 用火箭发射到天空，按一定轨道绕地球或其他行星运行的物体 man-made satellite; object rocketed into space and orbits around the earth and other planets

人造土
人造土[rén zào tǔ] 用某些废弃物与有机材料研磨混合而成的培养土，重量轻，没有污染，性能良好，可以完全取代自然土壤栽培植物 artificial soil; culture soil made from grinding and blending certain waste materials and organic materials. Light in weight, pollution-free and good in performance, this kind of soil can replace natural soil for plant culture.

人造地球卫星
人造地球卫星[rén zào dì qiú wèi xīng] 用火箭发射到天空，按一定轨道绕地球运行的物体 man-made earth satellite; satellite launched onto earth's orbit with a rocket

人造石油
人造石油[rén zào shí yóu] 从油页岩或煤中提炼的或化工合成的类似天然石油的液体 synthetic oil; oil refined from oil shale or coal or artificially synthesized that resembles crude oil

人造磁铁
人造磁铁[rén zào cí tiě] 以钢或磁合金为原料，经人工磁化而成的磁铁 man-made magnetic steel; artificially magnetized or magnet steel alloy

人造纤维
人造纤维[rén zào xiān wéi]用人工方法制成的纤维，是用天然的高分子化合物为原料制成的，竹子、木材、甘蔗渣、棉子绒等都是制造人造纤维的原料。根据人造纤维的形状和用途，分为人造丝、人造棉和人造毛三种。synthetic fibre; fibre artificially made from natural macromolecular compound such as bamboo, wood, bagasse and cotton linters. There are three categories of synthetic fibre: rayon, artificial cotton and artificial wool, differentiated by their respective shapes and applications.

人造行星
人造行星[rén zào xíng xīng] 用火箭发射到星际空间，摆脱地球的引力，按一定轨道绕太阳运行的物体 man-made planet, rocketed into interplanetary space, where, beyond the earth's gravity, it rotates around the sun along a certain orbit

人造革
人造革[rén zào gé]类似皮革的塑料制品，通常将熔化的树脂加配料涂在纺织品上，经加热处理而成。也有用加配料的树脂经滚筒压制而成的，有的有衬布。imitation or artificial leather; leatherette; leather-like plastics fashioned by coating a fabric with molten resin and heat treatment, or made by rolling a resin preparation into a sheet, sometimes with lining cloth

人道
人道1[rén dào]1.指爱护人的生命、关怀人的幸福、尊重人的人格和权利的道德 humanity; morality of valuing other people's life, caring for other people's happiness, respecting personal dignity and rights 2.〈古代 arch.〉指封建礼教所规定的人伦 human relations based on feudal ethics 3.〈书 fml.〉泛指人事或为人之道 (in a broad sense) moral standards or moral principles人道2[rén dào] 指人性交（就能力说，多用于否定式 oft. in the negative）sexual competence

人道主义
人道主义[rén dào zhǔ yì]起源于欧洲文艺复兴时期的一种思想体系。提倡关怀人、尊重人、以人为中心的世界观。法国资产阶级革命时期，把它具体化为‘自由’、‘平等’、‘博爱’等口号。它在资产阶级革命时期起过反封建的积极作用。humanitarianism; ideological system originating in the European Renaissance that advocates the world outlook of being concerned wholly with the welfare of the human race, respecting people, and always giving centre stage to humanity, a doctrine that boiled down to‘liberty, equality and fraternity’during the French Bourgeois Revolution, and played a positive anti-feudal role during the bourgeois revolution as a whole

人间
人间[rén jiān] 人类社会；世间 world; human world：人间乐园 paradise on earth春满人间 world bathed in the warmth of spring人间地狱 hell on earth; human inferno

人际
人际[rén jì] 指人与人之间 interpersonal：人际关系 human relations人际交往 human communications

人面兽心
人面兽心[rén miàn shòu xīn] 面貌虽然是人，但心肠像野兽一样凶恶残暴 face of a man but the heart of a beast - beast in human form

人马
人马[rén mǎ]1.指军队 forces; troops：全部人马安然渡过了长江。All the troops crossed the Yangtze River in safety. 2.泛指某个集体的人员 (in a broad sense) team; members of a collective：原班人马 original team; old cast我们编辑部的人马比较整齐。Our editorial department is well-staffed.

人马座
人马座[rén mǎ zuò] 黄道十二星座之一 Sagittarius; one of the 12 constellations of the zodiac;另见  黄道十二宫 huángdào shí'èrgōng

人鱼
人鱼[rén yú] 儒艮的俗称 popular term for 儒艮 rúgèn

亿
亿[yì]（ㄧˋ）（億）1.〈数目 numeral〉一万万 hundred million 2.〈古代 arch.〉指十万 hundred thousand相关词组亿万 | 亿万斯年

亿万
亿万[yì wàn] 泛指极大的数目 hundreds of millions; millions upon millions：亿万斯年 (for) billions of years; (for) aeons; time without end; eternity

亿万斯年
亿万斯年[yì wàn sī nián] 形容无限长远的年代 (for) aeons; time without end; eternity

什
什[shén]（ㄕㄣˊ）（甚）另见  见下 below另见  shí and 甚 shèn什[shí]（ㄕˊ）1.〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 十 shí（多用于分数或倍数 oft. used in fractions or multiples）：什一（十分之一） one 10th什九（十分之九） nine 10ths什百（十倍或百倍） 10 fold or 100 fold 2.多种的；杂样的 assorted; varied; miscellaneous; sundry：什物 odds and ends; sundries; articles for everyday use什件 giblets家什 home utensils and furniture另见  shén相关词组家什 | 傢什 | 干什么 | 哈什蚂 | 劳什子 | 牢什子 | 没什么 | 为什么 | 孟什维克 | 不差什么 | 布尔什维克什锦 | 什么 | 什物 | 什件儿 | 什锦锉 | 什么的 | 什不闲儿

什不闲儿
什不闲儿[shí bù xián r] 曲艺的一种，由莲花落发展而成，用锣、鼓、铙、钹等伴奏 shibuxianr, folk art form of ballad-singing to the accompaniment of musical instruments such as gongs, drums, cymbals, developed from popular ballad-singing to the accompaniment of bamboo clappers, with every stanza ending with the wording ‘lianhualao’亦 also 十不闲儿 shíbùxiánr

什么
什么[shén me]〈疑问代词 interrog. pron.〉1.表示疑问 [used in the interrogative] (a)单用，问事物 [used individually to ask what]：这是什么？What is this?你找什么？What are you looking for?他说什么？What did he say?什么叫押韵？What is rhyme? (b)用在名词前面，问人或事物 [used before a noun to ask who or what]：什么人？Who is he?什么事儿？What's the matter?什么颜色？What colour?什么地方？Where? 2.虚指，表示不确定的事物 [used to refer to anything indefinite]：他们仿佛在谈论什么。It seems that they are talking about something.我饿了，想吃点儿什么。I'm hungry. I want to have something to eat. 3.任指 [used to refer to things in general] (a)用在‘也’或‘都’前面，表示所说的范围之内没有例外 [used before 也 yě or 都 dōu to indicate that there is no exception within the limits mentioned]：他什么也不怕。He is afraid of nothing. or He fears nothing.只要认真学，什么都能学会。Only if you learn earnestly, you can learn everything. (b)两个‘什么’前后照应，表示由前者决定后者 [used one 什么 after another 什么 to indicate that the former determines the latter]：想什么说什么。Feel free to say what's on your mind. or Say whatever you like to.你什么时候去，我也什么时候去。Whenever you go, I'll go. 4.表示惊讶或不满 [used to express surprise or discontent]：什么！九点了，车还没有开！What's happened! It's nine. The bus is not yet leaving!这是什么鞋！一只大一只小的！What damned shoes! One is big and the other is smaller. 5.表示责难 [used to express censure]：你笑什么？（不应该笑。） What are you laughing at? (You should not have laughed.)你说呀！装什么哑巴？（不必装哑巴。） Speak up! Stop playing dumb. 6.表示不同意对方说的某一句话 [used to indicate disagreement with what has been said]：什么晒一天？晒三天也晒不干。One day? It won't be dried even in three days. 7.用在几个并列成分前面，表示列举不尽 [used before a number of coordinate elements to indicate an incomplete list]：什么送个信儿啊，跑个腿儿啊，他都干得了。He can do everything, such as sending a message and running errands.

什么的
什么的[shén me de] 用在一个成分或并列的几个成分之后，表示‘…之类’的意思 [used after one element, a number of coordinate elements or items to indicate the meaning of ‘what not’ or ‘things like that’]：他就喜欢看文艺作品什么的。He really likes to read literary works and things like that.修修机器，画个图样什么的，他都能对付。He can manage repairing a machine, drawing a design, and things like that.

什件儿
什件儿[shí jiàn r]1.鸡鸭的内脏做食品时的总称 giblets; food made of a chicken's or duck's internal organs：炒什件儿 fried giblets 2.〈方 dial.〉箱柜、马车、刀剑等上面所附的各样起加固作用的金属装饰品 metal ornaments fixed on trunks, carriages, swords, etc., for consolidation：黄铜什件儿 brass accessories

什物
什物[shí wù] 泛指家庭日常应用的衣物及其他零碎用品 (gen.) odds and ends; sundries; articles for everyday use, such as clothes and other things

什锦
什锦[shí jǐn]1.多种原料制成或多种花样的 assorted; mixed; of various materials or designs：什锦饼干 assorted biscuits什锦糖 assorted candy什锦锉 a set of assorted files 2.多种原料制成或多种花样拼成的食品 foodstuff made of various ingredients or pieced together in different patterns：素什锦 assorted vegetarian delights

什锦锉
什锦锉[shí jǐn cuò] 由各种不同横断面的小型锉刀组成的一组锉，包括扁锉、方锉、圆锉、三角锉、刀锉等 set of assorted files; set of files or rasps of various cross-sections, including flat, square, round, triangular and knife files亦 also 组锉 zǔcuò

仁
仁1[rén]（ㄖㄣˊ）1.仁爱 benevolence：仁心 kind-heartedness仁政 benevolence government仁至义尽 with the utmost decency and kindness 2.〈 敬辞 honor.〉用于对对方的尊称 Your Excellency：仁兄 my respected elder brother仁弟 my respected younger brother仁伯 your honourable father 3.(Rén) 姓 a surname仁2[rén]（ㄖㄣˊ）（仁儿 rénr）果核或果壳最里头较柔软的部分，大多可以吃 kernel; seed of a fruit stone or nut that is usu. edible：杏仁儿 apricot kernel; almond核桃仁儿 walnut meat花生仁儿 shelled peanut虾仁儿 shrimp meat相关词组不仁 | 成仁 | 松仁 | 桃仁 | 同仁 | 瞳仁 | 虾仁 | 杏仁 | 苡仁 | 种仁 | 薏仁米 | 当仁不让 | 假仁假义 | 见仁见智 | 麻木不仁 | 杀身成仁 | 为富不仁 | 一视同仁仁爱 | 仁慈 | 仁弟 | 仁果 | 仁厚 | 仁兄 | 仁义 | 仁政 | 仁人君子 | 仁人志士 | 仁至义尽 | 仁者见仁，智者见智

仁义
仁义[rén yì] 仁爱和正义 benevolence and righteousness：仁义道德 virtue and morality仁义[rén yi]〈方 dial.〉性情和顺善良 amiable; kind

仁人君子
仁人君子[rén rén jūn zǐ] 能热心助人的人，也指心地纯正、道德高尚的人 gentlemen; kindly folk; people who are ready to help others; people with the purity of heart and nobility of morality

仁人志士
仁人志士[rén rén zhì shì] 仁爱而有节操的人 benevolent and righteous person

仁兄
仁兄[rén xiōng] 对朋友的敬称（多用于书信等 polite term in letter writing）my dear friend

仁厚
仁厚[rén hòu] 仁爱宽厚 kind-hearted and tolerant：仁厚待人 treat people with generosity

仁弟
仁弟[rén dì] 对比自己年轻的朋友的敬称，老师对学生也用（多用于书信等 usu. used in a letter to a younger male friend or former male student）my dear friend

仁慈
仁慈[rén cí] 仁爱慈善 benevolent; kind：仁慈的老人 kind old man

仁政
仁政[rén zhèng] 仁慈的政治措施 benevolent government：施行仁政 carry out a policy of benevolence

仁果
仁果[rén guǒ]1.果实的一种，果肉大部分由花托发育而成，如苹果、梨等 false (or accessory) fruit; pseudocarp; fruit with a soft, moist meat that grows out of the thalamus, such as apple and pear 2.〈方 dial.〉落花生 peanut

仁爱
仁爱[rén ài] 同情、爱护和帮助人的思想感情 benevolence; humanity

仁者见仁，智者见智
仁者见仁，智者见智[rén zhě jiàn rén, zhì zhě jiàn zhì]《易经·系辞》：‘仁者见之谓之仁，智者见之谓之智。’指对同一个问题，各人观察的角度不同，见解也不相同。the saying‘the benevolent see benevolence and the wise see wisdom’quoted from The Book of Changes·Great Treatise means that different people have different opinions on the same issue because of different points of view

仁至义尽
仁至义尽[rén zhì yì jìn] 形容对人的善意和帮助已经做到最大的限度 do everything called for by humanity and duty; do what is humanly possible to help; be magnanimous

仂
仂[lè]（ㄌㄜˋ）〈书 fml.〉余数 complement of a number; remainder相关词组仂语

仂语
仂语[lè yǔ] 词组 word group; phrase

仃
仃[dīng]（ㄉㄧㄥ）另见  伶仃 língdīng相关词组伶仃 | 孤苦伶仃

仄
仄1[zè]（ㄗㄜˋ）1.狭窄 narrow：逼仄 narrow; cramped 2.心里不安 disturbed; uneasy：歉仄 feel sorry or apologetic仄2[zè]（ㄗㄜˋ）指仄声 oblique tones相关词组逼仄 | 平仄仄声

仄声
仄声[zè shēng]指古四声中的上、去、入三声（区别于‘平声’as compared with‘level tone’）oblique tones, such as the falling-rising tone, the falling tone and the entering tone in classical Chinese pronunciation

仅
仅[jǐn]（ㄐㄧㄣˇ）（僅）仅仅 only; merely; alone：不仅如此 in addition; not only绝无仅有 one and only; only one of its kind; unique另见  jìn仅[jìn]（ㄐㄧㄣˋ）（僅）〈书 fml.〉将近 nearly; approximately：士卒仅万人。The soldiers numbered nearly 10,000.另见  jǐn相关词组不仅 | 绝无仅有 | 硕果仅存仅见 | 仅仅 | 仅只

仅仅
仅仅[jǐn jǐn]〈副词 adv.〉表示限于某个范围，意思跟‘只’相同而更强调 [similar in meaning to 只 zhǐ but more emphatic] only; merely; alone：这座大桥仅仅半年就完工了。The bridge was completed in only half a year.

仅只
仅只[jǐn zhǐ] 仅仅 only; merely：他家仅只养猪一项，就收入几千元。Raising pigs alone earned his family several thousand yuan.

仅见
仅见[jǐn jiàn] 极其少见 rarely seen：规模之大是历史上所仅见的。It is on a scale so grand as to be rarely seen in history.

仆
仆[pū]（ㄆㄨ）向前跌倒 fall forward; fall prostrate：前仆后继 advance and fill the breach left by fallen comrades; advance wave upon wave另见  pú仆[pú]（ㄆㄨˊ）（僕）1.仆人（跟‘主’相对 as opposite to ‘master’）servant：男仆 manservant女仆 maidservant 2.〈古时 arch.〉男子谦称自己 man's self-deprecating term for himself另见  pū相关词组颠仆 | 公仆 | 奴仆 | 童仆 | 更仆难数 | 前仆后继仆从 | 仆妇 | 仆仆 | 仆人 | 仆役

仆人
仆人[pú rén] 指被雇到家庭中做杂事、供役使的人 servant; person employed to perform services or run errands, esp. household duties for a family

仆仆
仆仆[pú pú] 形容旅途劳累 travel-stained; travel-worn and weary：风尘仆仆 endure the hardship of travel

仆从
仆从[pú cóng]〈旧时 old〉指跟随在身旁的仆人，现比喻跟随别人，自己不能做主的人或集体 footman; retainer; henchman; used to refer to a servant who followed his master all the time, and now referring to a person or a group of people that do not have their own mind：仆从国家 vassal country

仆妇
仆妇[pú fù]〈旧时 old〉指年龄较大的女仆 older female servant

仆役
仆役[pú yì] 同 same as 仆人 púrén

仇
仇[chóu]（ㄔㄡˊ）（讎、讐）1.仇敌 enemy; foe：疾恶如仇 hate evil like an enemy; abhor evil同仇敌忾 share a bitter hatred of the enemy; burning with a common hatred (for the enemy) 2.仇恨 hatred; enmity; grudge：结仇 fall out with each other and become enemies; incur hatred; start a feud血泪仇 hatred filled with blood and tears仇深似海 hatred as deep as the ocean另见  Qiú仇[Qiú]（ㄑㄧㄡˊ） 姓 a surname另见  chóu相关词组报仇 | 复仇 | 国仇 | 记仇 | 结仇 | 寇仇 | 世仇 | 私仇 | 夙仇 | 宿仇 | 血仇 | 冤仇 | 深仇大恨 | 同仇敌忾 | 恩将仇报 | 亲痛仇快 | 公报私仇 | 官报私仇 | 疾恶如仇 | 嫉恶如仇 | 切骨之仇 | 血海深仇仇敌 | 仇恨 | 仇家 | 仇人 | 仇杀 | 仇视 | 仇外 | 仇隙 | 仇冤 | 仇怨

仇人
仇人[chóu rén] 因有仇恨而敌视的人 enemy or foe; person hated or opposed by sb.：仇人相见，分外眼红。When the enemies come face to face, their eyes blaze with hatred.

仇冤
仇冤[chóu yuān] 冤仇 enmity; rancour; hatred：结仇冤 fall out with each other and become enemies; earn sb.'s hatred报仇冤 revenge oneself; avenge a wrong

仇外
仇外[chóu wài] 仇视外国 be hostile to foreign countries：仇外心理 hostile feelings towards foreign countries

仇家
仇家[chóu jiā] 同 same as 仇人 chóurén

仇怨
仇怨[chóu yuàn] 仇恨；怨恨 hatred; grievance; resentment：仇怨极深 inveterate hatred

仇恨
仇恨[chóu hèn]1.因利害冲突而强烈地憎恨 hate bitterly or intensely because of a conflict of interests：热爱人民，仇恨敌人 love the people and hate the enemy 2.因利害冲突而产生的强烈憎恨 hostility; bitter or intense hatred caused by conflicts of interests：民族的仇恨 national hatred

仇敌
仇敌[chóu dí] 仇人；敌人 foe; enemy：视为仇敌 regard sb. as an enemy

仇杀
仇杀[chóu shā] 因有仇恨而杀害 murder committed out of hatred：仇杀案 murder case committed out of revenge

仇视
仇视[chóu shì] 以仇敌相看待 look upon sb. with hostility; be hostile to; look at sb. as an enemy：互相仇视 look at each other with hatred仇视侵略者 harbour hatred for the invaders

仇隙
仇隙[chóu xì]〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 仇恨 chóuhèn：素无仇隙 bear no grudge at all

仉
仉[Zhǎng]（ㄓㄤˇ） 姓 a surname

今
今[jīn]（ㄐㄧㄣ）1.现在；现代（跟‘古’相对 as opposed to ‘ancient’）now; modern; present-day：当今 nowadays今人 modern people厚今薄古 praise the present and belittle the past古为今用 make the past serve the present 2.当前的（年、天及其部分）of today; of this year：今天 today今晨 this morning今春 this spring 3.〈书 fml.〉此；这 this：今番 this time今次 this time相关词组当今 | 而今 | 方今 | 目今 | 迄今 | 如今 | 现今 | 于今 | 至今 | 现如今 | 抚今追昔 | 厚今薄古 | 古往今来 | 博古通今 | 厚古薄今 | 借古讽今 | 震古烁今今草 | 今朝 | 今儿 | 今后 | 今年 | 今人 | 今日 | 今生 | 今世 | 今天 | 今文 | 今昔 | 今译 | 今音

今世
今世[jīn shì]1.当代 contemporary age; present time：今世英杰 hero of the present time; hero of this age 2.今生 this life

今人
今人[jīn rén] 现代的人；当代的人 modern people; contemporaries; people of our era

今儿
今儿[jīn r]〈方 dial.〉今天 today：今儿晚上我值班。I will be on duty this evening. 亦 also 今儿个 jīnr·ge

今后
今后[jīn hòu] 从今以后 from now on; in the days to come; henceforth; hereafter; in future：今后更要加倍努力 work harder in future

今天
今天[jīn tiān]1.说话时的这一天 this day; today：今天的事不要放到明天做。You should not put off till tomorrow what you can do today. 2.现在；目前 present time or age; today：今天的中国已经不是解放前的中国了。China today is no longer what it was before liberation.

今年
今年[jīn nián] 说话时的这一年 this year

今文
今文[jīn wén]汉代称当时通用的隶字。那时有人把口传的经书用隶字记录下来，后来叫做今文经。modern script; another name for lishu, the official script popularly used during the Han Dynasty. People then called the classics passed down orally and later written down in modern script, jinwenjing, or classics in modern script.

今日
今日[jīn rì] 今天 this day; today：从上海来的参观团预定今日到达。The delegation from Shanghai is due to arrive today.

今昔
今昔[jīn xī] 现在和过去 present and past; today and yesterday：今昔对比 compare the present with the past

今朝
今朝[jīn zhāo]1.〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 今天 jīntiān ① 2. 同 same as 今天 jīntiān ②：数风流人物，还看今朝。For truly great men, look to this present age alone.

今生
今生[jīn shēng] 这一辈子 this life：今生今世 this life; as long as one lives

今草
今草[jīn cǎo] 草书的一种，是由章草结合楷书发展而成的，六朝时为与章草区别，叫今草 jincao; cursive handwriting, developed from a combination of the zhangcao cursive handwriting and the regular script, and thus called so as to distinguish it from zhangcao in the Six Dynasties Period

今译
今译[jīn yì] 古代文献的现代语译文 modern translation; modern-language version：古籍今译 modern-language version of ancient books

今音
今音[jīn yīn]1.现代的语音 modern pronunciation of Chinese characters 2.指以《切韵》、《广韵》等韵书为代表的隋唐音，跟以《诗经》押韵、《说文》谐声等为代表的‘古音’（周秦音）区别 Sui- and Tang-dynasty pronunciation of the Chinese language based on the books Rhyming and Tuning (Sui Dynasty) and Comprehensive Phonology (Song Dynasty), as distinguished from the classical (Zhou- and Qin-dynasty) pronunciation represented by The Book of Songs and Discourses on Words

介
介1[jiè]（ㄐㄧㄝˋ）1.在两者当中 between：介绍 introduce媒介 media这座山介于两县之间。The mountain lies between the two counties. 2.介绍 introduce; introduction：内容简介 brief introduction to the contents 3.存留；放在（心里）take to heart：介意 take offence介怀 mind 4.(Jiè) 姓 a surname介2[jiè]（ㄐㄧㄝˋ）甲 armour：介胄 armour介虫 scale insect介3[jiè]（ㄐㄧㄝˋ）〈书 fml.〉耿直；有骨气 upright：耿介 honest and frank介4[jiè]（ㄐㄧㄝˋ）古戏曲剧本中，指示角色表演动作时的用语，如笑介、饮酒介等 term used in ancient opera-play scripts to indicate movements in a performance, e.g. laughing, drinking wine, etc.相关词组刚介 | 耿介 | 婚介 | 简介 | 狷介 | 鳞介 | 媒介 | 评介 | 绍介 | 推介 | 引介 | 中介 | 电介质 | 卡介苗 | 煞有介事 | 像煞有介事介词 | 介怀 | 介壳 | 介入 | 介绍 | 介意 | 介音 | 介质 | 介子

介入
介入[jiè rù] 插进两者之间干预其事 intervene; interpose; get involved：不介入他们两人之间的争端。Don't get involved in the dispute between those two.

介壳
介壳[jiè qiào] 蛤、螺等软体动物的外壳，主要由石灰质和色素构成，质地坚硬，有保护身体的作用 shell; testa; hard exterior skin of molluscs, e.g. clams and snails, etc., composed mainly of lime and pigment, and serves as protection

介子
介子[jiè zǐ]质量介于质量轻的基本粒子（如电子）和质量重的基本粒子（如核子）之间的基本粒子。种类较多，性质不稳定，有的带正电，有的带负电，有的不带电，能用来轰击原子核，引起核反应。meson; mesotron; elementary particle whose mass falls between a light-mass elementary particle (e.g. an electron) and a heavy-mass elementary particle (e.g. a nucleon), of various types, unstable, some carry a positive electrical charge, some a negative, and some are neutral able to be used to bombard the atomic nucleus to cause a nuclear reaction

介怀
介怀[jiè huái] 介意 mind：毫不介怀 not mind at all

介意
介意[jiè yì] 把不愉快的事记在心里；在意（多用于否定词后 oft. in the negative）take offence; mind：刚才这句话我是无心中说的，你可别介意。I didn't mean to say it, so I hope you will not take offence.

介绍
介绍[jiè shào]1.使双方相识或发生联系 introduce; present：介绍信 letter of introduction; reference (letter)介绍人 one who introduces or recommends sb.; referee; sponsor我给你介绍一下，这位是张先生。Let me introduce a new friend to you, this is Mr. Zhang. 2.引进；带入（新的人或事物）recommend; suggest：介绍入会 be sponsored to join a club中国京剧已被介绍到许多国家。The Peking Opera has been introduced into many countries. 3.使了解或熟悉 inform; let know; brief：介绍情况 let (sb.) in on the situation介绍先进经验 give a briefing on advanced experience

介词
介词[jiè cí] 用在名词、代词或名词性词组的前边，合起来表示方向、对象等的词，如‘从、自、往、朝、在、当（方向、处所或时间），把、对、同、为（对象或目的），以、按照（方式），比、跟、同（比较），被、叫、让（被动）’preposition; word that precedes a noun, pronoun or noun phrase to express direction, object, etc., e.g. 从 cóng, 自 zì, 往 wǎng, 朝 cháo, 在 zài, and 当 dāng (indicating direction, location or time); 把 bǎ, 对 duì, 同 tóng and 为 wèi (indicating object or purpose); 以 yǐ, 按照 ànzhào (indicating methods)，比 bǐ, 跟 gēn, 同 tóng (indicating comparison)，and 被 bèi, 叫 jiào and 让 ràng (indicating passive voice)

介质
介质[jiè zhì] 一种物质存在于另一种物质内部时，后者就是前者的介质；某些波状运动（如声波、光波等）借以传播的物质叫做这些波状运动的介质 medium; substance in which another substance exists, or substance through which certain waves (e.g. sound waves, light waves, etc.) travel亦 also 媒质 méizhì

介音
介音[jiè yīn] 韵母中主要元音前面的元音，普通话语音中有‘i、u、ü’三个介音，例如‘天’tiān 的介音是‘i’，‘多’duō 的介音是‘u’，‘略’lüè 的介音是‘ü’medial or semivowel of a final; i, u and ü being the three semivowels in standard Chinese, as in 天 tiān, 多 duō and 略 lüè;另见  韵母 yùnmǔ

仍
仍[réng]（ㄖㄥˊ）1.依照 remain：一仍其旧（完全照旧）remain the same; stay intact 2.〈书 fml.〉频繁 frequently; often：频仍 frequent 3.〈书 fml.〉仍然 still：仍须努力 need to redouble one's effort病仍不见好。His condition is yet to improve.相关词组频仍 | 一仍旧贯仍旧 | 仍然

仍旧
仍旧[réng jiù]1.照旧 remain the same：修订版体例仍旧。The revised edition has maintained the style of the previous edition. 2. 同 same as 仍然 réngrán：他虽然遇到许多困难，可是意志仍旧那样坚强。He's had his fill of twists and turns, yet he remains as determined as ever.

仍然
仍然[réng rán]〈副词 adv.〉表示情况继续不变或恢复原状 [indicating continuity or resumption of a situation] still; yet：他仍然保持着老红军艰苦奋斗的作风。He still maintains the hard-working style of a Red Army veteran.他把信看完，仍然装在信封里。He put the letter back into the envelope after he'd read it.

从
从1[cóng]（ㄘㄨㄥˊ）（從）（⑤ ⑥ ⑦ 旧读 formerly pronounced zòng）1.跟随 follow：从征 go on a military expedition 2.顺从；听从 comply with; obey：胁从 intimidate sb. into obedience力不从心 have the will but not the strength 3.从事；参加 join; be engaged in：从艺 take up art (as a profession)从军 join the army; enlist 4.采取某种方针或态度 in a certain manner; according to a certain principle：从缓办理 postpone working on something一切从简 dispense with all unnecessary formalities坦白从宽，抗拒从严。Leniency towards those who confess and severe punishment to those who refuse to do so. or Those who own up will be leniently treated, and those who don't will be severely punished其余从略。The rest are omitted here. 5.跟随的人 follower; retainer：随从 attendant; retinue侍从 servant 6.从属的；次要的 secondary; accessory：主从 principal and subordinate从犯 accessory to a crime 7.堂房（亲属）relationship between cousins, etc., of the same paternal grandfather, great-grandfather or an earlier common ancestor; of the same clan：从兄 elder male cousin (on the paternal side)从叔 uncle (father's younger male cousin) 8.(Cóng) 姓 a surname〈古 arch.〉又同 also same as 纵 zòng in 纵横 zònghéng从2[cóng]（ㄘㄨㄥˊ）（從）1.〈介词 prep.〉起于，‘从…’表示‘拿…做起点’from (a time, a place, or a point of view)：从上海到北京 from Shanghai to Beijing从这儿往西 go west from here从现在起 from now on从不懂到懂 from ignorance to enlightenment从无到有 grow out of nothing从少到多 from scarcity to abundance 2.〈介词 prep.〉表示经过，用在表示处所的词语前面 via, through, or past (a place)：从窗缝里往外望 peep outside through a crevice in the window你从桥上过，我从桥下走。You go over the bridge, and I'll go under it.从他们前面经过 pass in front of them 3.〈副词 adv.〉从来，用在否定词前面 [followed by a negative] ever：从没有听说过 never heard of it从未看见中国人民像现在这样意气风发，斗志昂扬。The Chinese people have never before been so vigorous and enthusiastic.相关词组打从 | 服从 | 跟从 | 过从 | 护从 | 扈从 | 盲从 | 仆从 | 屈从 | 任从 | 侍从 | 顺从 | 随从 | 听从 | 无从 | 胁从 | 信从 | 一从 | 依从 | 应从 | 主从 | 自从 | 遵从 | 三从四德 | 文从字顺 | 力不从心 | 投笔从戎 | 枵腹从公 | 何去何从 | 鸡尸牛从 | 轻车简从 | 轻装简从 | 无所适从 | 言听计从从此 | 从打 | 从动 | 从而 | 从犯 | 从简 | 从教 | 从军 | 从来 | 从良 | 从轮 | 从略 | 从命 | 从前 | 从权 | 从戎 | 从容 | 从师 | 从实 | 从事 | 从属 | 从俗 | 从速 | 从头 | 从先 | 从小 | 从新 | 从刑 | 从业 | 从艺 | 从影 | 从优 | 从征 | 从政 | 从中 | 从众 | 从业员 | 从井救人 | 从容不迫 | 从善如流 | 从心所欲 | 从长计议

从业
从业[cóng yè] 从事某种职业或行业；就业 obtain employment; take up an occupation; get a job：从业机会 job opening (offer)从业人员 the employed

从业员
从业员[cóng yè yuán] 商业工作人员和服务性行业工作人员的统称 general term for employees of commercial and service industries

从中
从中[cóng zhōng] 在其间；在其中 out of; from among; therefrom：从中取利 reap profits from; profit from; cash in on; seek one's own gain out of从中作梗 place obstacles; come between; create difficulties; hinder sb. from carrying out a plan; make things difficult for sb.; put a spoke in sb.'s wheel

从事
从事[cóng shì]1.投身到（事业中去）pursue; go in for; devote oneself to; throw oneself into; work on; occupy oneself with; take part in; go about; take up; be engaged in; be bound up in：从事革命 devote oneself to revolutionary work从事文艺创作 engage in literary and artistic creation 2.（按某种办法）处理 (in a certain way) deal with：军法从事 deal with according to military law; court-martial sb.

从井救人
从井救人[cóng jǐng jiù rén]跳到井里去救人。原来比喻徒然危害自己而对别人并没有好处的行为，现多用来比喻冒极大的危险去拯救别人。jump into a well to save a drowning person - risk one's own life or compromise one's own interests without doing others any good; (now oft. fig.) take great risk to save others

从众
从众[cóng zhòng] 指按多数人的意见或流行的做法（行事） follow the crowd; follow majority opinion or prevalent practices

从优
从优[cóng yōu] 给予优待 preferential treatment：价格从优 at special or bargain prices

从俗
从俗[cóng sú]1.按照风俗习惯；遵循通常做法 follow local custom; follow tradition; conform to convention：从俗办理 proceed according to local customs从俗就简 conform to conventions while adhering to the principle of simplicity 2.指顺从时俗 follow what the majority is doing：从俗浮沉 experience ups and downs like most people do; live an ordinary life without much of a struggle to better one's situation

从先
从先[cóng xiān]〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 从前 cóngqián：他身体比从先结实多了。He's much stronger than before.

从军
从军[cóng jūn] 参加军队 join the army; enlist; enter the services：少小从军 join the army at a young age

从刑
从刑[cóng xíng]随附主刑的刑罚，包括罚金、剥夺政治权利和没收财产三种（这几种刑罚也可单独施用）accessory penalty; accessory punishment, penalties including fines, removal of political rights and confiscation of property (which can also be imposed separately) that are imposed in addition to the principal punishment亦 also 附加刑 fùjiāxíng

从前
从前[cóng qián] 过去的时候；以前 before; formerly; in the past：想想从前悲惨遭遇，更加感到今天生活的幸福美满。Recalling our miserable life in the past, we more keenly feel the happiness we enjoy now.从前的事儿，不必再提了。Let bygones be bygones.

从动
从动[cóng dòng] 由其他零件带动的 driven (by other parts); slave：从动轮 driven pulley; driven wheel; engaged wheel

从命
从命[cóng mìng] 听从吩咐 do sb.'s bidding; comply with sb.'s wish; obey an order：欣然从命 gladly comply with sb.'s wish恭敬不如从命。It's better to accept deferentially than to decline courteously (in accepting gifts, etc.).or It's better to do as sb. asks than stand on ceremony. or Obedience is a better way of showing respect than outward reverence.

从善如流
从善如流[cóng shàn rú liú] 形容能很快地接受别人的好意见，像水从高处流到低处一样自然 follow what is right as a stream follows its course; readily accept good advice; follow sound opinions or sensible advice as readily as water flows downward

从头
从头[cóng tóu]（～儿 cóngtóur）1.从最初（做）from the beginning; from scratch：从头儿做起 start from the very beginning 2.重新（做）afresh; anew; once again：从头儿再来 start afresh; start all over again

从实
从实[cóng shí] 按真实情况；如实 in the light of the reality; based on the reality：从实回答 answer honestly (frankly)

从容
从容[cóng róng]（旧读 formerly pronounced cōngróng）1.不慌不忙；镇静；沉着 calm; unhurried; leisurely：举止从容 deport oneself in a calm, unhurried manner从容不迫 calm and unhurried从容就义（毫不畏缩地为正义而牺牲）go to one's death unflinchingly; meet one's death like a hero; fearlessly die a martyr; meet death with great composure; tread the path of virtue calmly 2.（时间或经济）宽裕 (of time or financial status) plentiful; sufficient; enough：时间很从容，可以仔仔细细地做。There's plenty of time for you to work on it carefully.手头从容 be quite well off; be not short of money; have enough money to spare

从容不迫
