优遇[yōu yù] 同 same as 优待 yōudài：格外优遇 accord exceptionally good treatment以示优遇 so as to show our preferential treatment (of sb.)

优雅
优雅[yōu yǎ]1.优美雅致 graceful; exquisite; elegant; in good taste：唱词优雅 elegant libretto演奏合拍，优雅动听。The playing was harmonious, beautiful and pleasant to the ear.优雅宽敞的大厅 elegantly furnished and spacious hall 2.优美高雅 beautiful and elegant：优雅的姿态 graceful postures举止优雅 elegant manners; graceful manners

伙
伙1[huǒ]（ㄏㄨㄛˇ）（火）伙食 mess; board; meals; food：起伙 cook meals包伙 get or supply meals at a fixed rate; board伙2[huǒ]（ㄏㄨㄛˇ）（火、夥）1.同伴；伙计 partner; companion：伙伴 companion伙友 partner 2.由同伴组成的集体 partnership; company：合伙 join together入伙 enter into partnership成群搭伙 band together; throng; form crowds 3.〈量词 classifier〉用于人群 group; crowd; band; gang：一伙人 a group of people分成两伙 divide into two groups三个一群，五个一伙 in twos and threes; in small groups 4.共同；联合 combine; join：伙同 join together伙办 join in some action几个人伙着干。Several people work together.相关词组包伙 | 拆伙 | 搭伙 | 锅伙 | 合伙 | 家伙 | 傢伙 | 结伙 | 开伙 | 入伙 | 散伙 | 同伙 | 团伙 | 退伙 | 打伙儿 | 大伙儿 | 小伙子 | 过家伙 | 好家伙 | 小家伙 | 拉帮结伙伙伴 | 伙房 | 伙夫 | 伙耕 | 伙计 | 伙食 | 伙同 | 伙种 | 伙子

伙伴
伙伴[huǒ bàn]〈古代 arch.〉兵制十人为一火，火长一人管炊事，同火者称为火伴，现在泛指共同参加某种组织或从事某种活动的人，写作伙伴 partner; companion; pal; chum. In ancient Chinese military practice, 10 soldiers formed a group to use a cooking fire（火 huǒ）. One soldier of each group was solely responsible for cooking and was titled fire head（火长 huǒzhǎng）; the others were called fire companions（火伴 huǒbàn）. In a broad sense, the phrase now refers to people who join the same organization or take part in the same activity, written as 伙伴.

伙同
伙同[huǒ tóng]跟别人合在一起（做事）(work) with others; join together：老王伙同几个退休工人办起了农机修理厂。Old Wang and some other retired workers have set up a repair shop for farm equipment.

伙夫
伙夫[huǒ fū] 同 same as 火夫 huǒfū ②

伙子
伙子[huǒ zi] 同 same as 伙2  huǒ ③：他们是一伙子。They belong to the same group.

伙房
伙房[huǒ fáng] 学校、部队等集体中的厨房 kitchen of a school or a military unit

伙种
伙种[huǒ zhòng] 同 same as 伙耕 huǒgēng

伙耕
伙耕[huǒ gēng] 共同耕种 collaborate to cultivate land：他们伙耕了十来亩地。Together they cultivated more than 10 mu of land.

伙计
伙计[huǒ ji]1.合作的人；伙伴（多用来当面称对方 form of address oft. used face-to-face）partner; pal; business associate：伙计，咱得加快干。Guys, we've got to hurry up. 2.〈旧时 old〉指店员或长工 salesman; shop assistant; hired hand：当年我在这个店当伙计。I once worked as a shop assistant in this store.

伙食
伙食[huǒ shí] 饭食，多指部队、机关、学校等集体中所办的饭食 mess; food; meals; mostly prepared for a group in a military unit, government organization or school：伙食费 board expenses; money for meals改善伙食 improve the quality of food; have better food

会
会1[huì]（ㄏㄨㄟˋ）（會）1.聚合；合在一起 gather; congregate; assemble：会合 congregate; assemble会齐 join together会诊 medical consultation会审 joint hearing; joint trial 2.见面；会见 meet; see：会面 meet会客 receive a guest昨天没有会着他。I tried but didn't meet him yesterday. 3.有一定目的的集会 rally; assemblage; assembly; congregation; gathering with a specific purpose：晚会 evening party舞会 dance party; ball开会 hold a meeting报告会 meeting; lecture晚上有一个会。There's going to be a meeting tonight. 4.某些团体 association; society; organization：工会 trade union妇女联合会 women's federation 5.庙会 temple fair：赶会 go to a temple fair 6.民间朝山进香或酬神求年成时所组织的集体活动，如香会、迎神赛会等 popular gathering at a temple to worship Buddha or pray for a bumper harvest, e.g. gathering of worshippers, festival to pacify the spirits 7.民间一种小规模经济互助组织，入会成员按期平均交款，分期轮流使用 small credit association, where members regularly contribute an equal amount to a common fund and draw from it by turns 8.主要的城市 main city：都会 capital; metropolis省会 provincial capital 9.时机 chance; opportunity：机会 chance; opportunity适逢其会 happen to be present 10.〈书 fml.〉恰巧；正好 happen; coincide with; it happens ...：会有客来。At that moment, a guest happened to visit. 11.〈书 fml.〉应当 ought to; should：长风破浪会有时。(fig.) There should come a time when you can display all your talents.会2[huì]（ㄏㄨㄟˋ）（會）1.理解；懂得 understand; grasp：体会 realize; grasp误会 misunderstanding心领神会 readily take a hint or cue只可意会，不可言传 can be felt but not expressed; inexpressible in words 2.熟习；通晓 familiar with; acquainted with：会英文 know English会两出京戏 able to sing a few airs from Peking Opera 3.表示懂得怎样做或有能力做（多半指需要学习的事情）able to; can; know how to do sth. or be able to do sth. (esp. sth. learned)：我不会滑冰。I cannot skate.这孩子刚会走路，还不大会说话。The baby has just learned to walk but hasn't learned to speak yet. 4.表示擅长 good at; excel at; skilled in：能说会道 have a glib tongue会写会画的人倒不太讲究纸的好坏。One who writes and paints well does not pay much attention to the quality of the paper. 5.表示有可能实现 likely to; sure to：他不会不来。He's sure to come.树上的果子熟了，自然会掉下来。When the fruit is ripe, it will automatically fall.另见  见能néng 注意中的(a), (b)和 (c)(a), (b) and(c) of 能 néng in the NOTE会3[huì]（ㄏㄨㄟˋ）（會）付账 pay a bill：我会过了。I have paid the bill.会4[huì]（ㄏㄨㄟˋ）（會）另见  会儿 huìr and 会子 huì·zi另见  kuài会[kuài]（ㄎㄨㄞˋ）（會）总计 sum; total：会计 accounting另见  huì相关词组拜会 | 帮会 | 笔会 | 闭会 | 财会 | 茶会 | 常会 | 初会 | 错会 | 大会 | 灯会 | 都会 | 峰会 | 附会 | 复会 | 傅会 | 工会 | 公会 | 国会 | 行会 | 和会 | 花会 | 机会 | 集会 | 际会 | 交会 | 教会 | 酒会 | 聚会 | 开会 | 理会 | 例会 | 莅会 | 领会 | 流会 | 密会 | 庙会 | 年会 | 全会 | 融会 | 赛会 | 散会 | 商会 | 社会 | 省会 | 盛会 | 堂会 | 体会 | 听会 | 晚会 | 舞会 | 误会 | 香会 | 协会 | 兴会 | 幸会 | 休会 | 学会 | 宴会 | 议会 | 意会 | 幽会 | 与会 | 预会 | 约会 | 再会 | 照会 | 知会 | 多会儿 | 哪会儿 | 那会儿 | 社会学 | 一会儿 | 议会制 | 有会子 | 这会儿 | 安理会 | 奥运会 | 博览会 | 茶话会 | 董事会 | 赶庙会 | 哥老会 | 黑社会 | 互助会 | 监事会 | 碰头会 | 片儿会 | 群英会 | 同盟会 | 委员会 | 学生会 | 夜总会 | 营火会 | 游艺会 | 游园会 | 运动会 | 后会有期 | 机会主义 | 融会贯通 | 社会保险 | 社会存在 | 社会工作 | 社会关系 | 社会活动 | 社会教育 | 社会科学 | 社会青年 | 社会形态 | 社会意识 | 社会制度 | 社会主义 | 办公会议 | 成本会计 | 电话会议 | 高峰会议 | 聚精会神 | 联席会议 | 能掐会算 | 能说会道 | 文山会海 | 圆桌会议 | 封建社会 | 红十字会 | 奴隶社会 | 适逢其会 | 同业公会 | 心领神会 | 盂兰盆会 | 原始社会 | 一时半会儿 | 安全理事会 | 中国同盟会 | 社会必要劳动 | 社会主义革命 | 科学社会主义 | 右倾机会主义 | 政治协商会议 | 人民代表大会 | 社会主义所有制 | 奥林匹克运动会会标 | 会餐 | 会操 | 会场 | 会钞 | 会车 | 会党 | 会典 | 会儿 | 会费 | 会攻 | 会馆 | 会合 | 会话 | 会徽 | 会集 | 会计 | 会见 | 会聚 | 会考 | 会客 | 会门 | 会面 | 会期 | 会齐 | 会旗 | 会签 | 会商 | 会审 | 会师 | 会试 | 会首 | 会水 | 会谈 | 会堂 | 会通 | 会同 | 会务 | 会晤 | 会衔 | 会心 | 会演 | 会厌 | 会要 | 会议 | 会意 | 会阴 | 会友 | 会元 | 会员 | 会战 | 会账 | 会诊 | 会众 | 会子 | 会道门 | 会计师 | 会厌软骨 | 会展经济

会众
会众[huì zhòng]1.到会的人；参加开会的人 participants; attendees; audience at a meeting; 2.〈旧时 old.〉指参加某些会道门等组织的人 members of superstitious sect or society

会儿
会儿[huì r] 指很短的一段时间 a moment; a while; a short time：一会儿 a moment这会儿 at this moment等会儿 wait a moment用不了多大会儿。It won't take long.

会元
会元[huì yuán] 明清两代称会试考取第一名的人 (in the Ming and Qing dynasties) candidate who comes first in the provincial imperial examination

会党
会党[huì dǎng]清末以反清复明为宗旨的一些原始形式的民间秘密团体的总称。如哥老会、三合会等。general term for certain secret primitive societies that rose in force towards the end of the Qing Dynasty to overthrow the Qing Dynasty and re-establish the Ming Dynasty, e.g. Gelao Society and Sanhe Society

会典
会典[huì diǎn]记载某一朝代法令制度的书籍，多用做书名，如《明会典》collection; book that records the laws and regulations of a specific dynasty, usu. in book titles, e.g. The Code of Ming

会务
会务[huì wù] 集会或会议的事务 affairs associated with a conference; day-to-day managing of a conference：主持会务 be in charge of day-to-day conference business会务工作 conference administration

会厌
会厌[huì yàn]喉头上前部的树叶状的结构，由会厌软骨和黏膜构成。呼吸或说话时，会厌向上，使喉腔开放；咽东西时，会厌向下，盖住气管，使东西不至进入气管内。epiglottis; leaf-shaped structure at the upper front part of the throat, consisting of cartilage and mucous membrane. When breathing or speaking, the epiglottis rises to let the windpipe open, and, during swallowing, drops to cover the glottis and prevent food from entering the trachea.

会厌软骨
会厌软骨[huì yàn ruǎn gǔ] 构成会厌的软骨，形状扁平，像树叶，下部附着在结喉的内壁上 epiglottic cartilage; flat, leaf-shaped cartilage forming the epiglottis; its lower end attached to the inside of the Adam's apple at one end

会友
会友[huì yǒu]1.指同一个组织的成员 fellow member of the same organization 2.〈书 fml.〉结交朋友 make friends with：以文会友 make friends through literary or academic communication

会合
会合[huì hé] 聚集到一起 join; congregate; assemble; converge; meet：两军会合后继续前进。The two armies joined forces and marched on.黄浦江在吴淞口与长江会合。The Huangpu and the Yangtze rivers converge at the Wusong Estuary.

会同
会同[huì tóng]跟有关方面会合起来（办事）(handle matters) conjointly; jointly with relevant departments：这事由商业局会同有关部门办理。This matter will be dealt with conjointly by the Commercial Bureau and the other departments concerned.

会员
会员[huì yuán] 某些群众组织或政治组织的成员 member of a mass or political organization：工会会员 trade unionist; member of a trade union

会商
会商[huì shāng] 双方或多方共同商量 deliberation; discuss; hold bilateral or multilateral discussion or negotiation：会商大计 hold consultations on major issues

会场
会场[huì chǎng] 开会的场所 venue; place for a meeting

会堂
会堂[huì táng] 礼堂（多用做建筑物名称 usu. part of the name of a building）assembly hall; conference hall; meeting hall; hall：科学会堂 Hall of Science人民大会堂 the Great Hall of the People

会子
会子[huì zi] 指一段时间 a while; a period of time; a moment; some time：说会子话儿 talk for a while喝了会子茶 have some tea来了会子了，该回去了。I've been here for a while. I must go now.

会审
会审[huì shěn]1.会同审理（案件等）conduct a joint trial or hearing 2.会同审查 joint review：会审施工图纸 jointly review the blueprints of a construction project

会客
会客[huì kè] 和来访的客人见面 receive a visitor; receive a guest：会客室 reception room

会展经济
会展经济[huì zhǎn jīng jì] 指以承办各种会议、展览等并为之提供服务为主要内容的经济活动 exhibition economy; economic activities that involve organizing conventions, exhibitions, etc., and providing necessary services

会师
会师[huì shī] 几支独立行动的部队在战地会合 (of two or more armies) combine forces; several independent military units join forces on a battlefield：胜利会师 join forces in victory各地革新能手在首都会师。Innovators and those with creative talent from all over the country converged on the capital.

会徽
会徽[huì huī] 代表某个集会的标志 logo; emblem of a gathering：全国运动会会徽 logo of the National Sports Games

会心
会心[huì xīn] 领会别人没有明白表示的意思 understanding; knowing; perceptive; insightful; understand implied meaning：别有会心 very perceptive会心的微笑 understanding smile

会意
会意1[huì yì]六书之一。会意是说字的整体的意义由部分的意义合成，如‘公’字、‘信’字。‘背私为公’，‘公’字由‘八’字和‘厶’（私）字合成，‘八’表示‘违背’的意思，跟‘自私’相反叫‘公’。‘人言为信’，‘信’字由‘人’字和‘言’字合成，表示人说的话有信用。combined meaning; associative compound; one of the six categories of Chinese character formation. A Chinese character consists of several elements, which combine to give meaning. For example, 公 gōng comprises 八 meaning‘against’, and 厶 meaning‘selfish’, so 公 means‘altruistic’. 信 xìn consists of 人 meaning‘human being’and 言 meaning‘speak’, or‘speech’, so 信 means‘words of a human being are trustworthy’.会意2[huì yì] 同 same as 会心 huìxīn

会战
会战[huì zhàn]1.战争双方主力在一定地区和时间内进行的决战 decisive battle between two main rival forces at a specific place within a specific period 2.〈比喻 fig.〉集中有关力量，突击完成某项任务 launch a mass campaign; pool the efforts of all those concerned to finish a task quickly：石油大会战 great campaign to discover and drill oil

会操
会操[huì cāo] 指会合举行军事或体育方面的操演 joint drill or practice; come together for joint military drill or sports practice：下午两点在大操场会操。There will be a joint drill session on the sports field at two o'clock this afternoon.

会攻
会攻[huì gōng] 联合进攻 joint attack; concerted attack：兵分两路，会攻匪巢。The troops approaches the bandit's lair along two routes and launched a combined attack.

会旗
会旗[huì qí] 某些集会的旗帜 flag of a meeting; conference flag：主席台上高悬着绘有骏马和弓箭的那达慕会旗。Hanging above the rostrum is the Nadam Fair flag emblazoned with steed and arrow.

会晤
会晤[huì wù] 会面；会见 meet; meet with：两国领导人会晤 summit meeting between two countries会晤当地知名人士 meet local celebrities

会期
会期[huì qī]1.开会的日子 time fixed for a conference; date of a meeting：会期定在九月一日。The meeting will be held on September 1. 2.开会的天数 duration of a meeting：会期三天。The meeting is scheduled to last three days.

会标
会标[huì biāo] 代表某个集会的标志 logo; mascot; emblem of a specific gathering

会水
会水[huì shuǐ] 会游泳 know how to swim：他从小就会水。He knew how to swim since he was very young.

会演
会演[huì yǎn]各地或各单位的文艺节目集中起来，单独或同台演出。具有汇报、互相学习、交流经验的作用。joint performance; performance by actors from the same or different places and troupes for the purpose of displaying their skills, learning from each other and exchanging experiences;亦 also 汇演 huìyǎn

会签
会签[huì qiān] 双方或多方共同签署 (of two or more parties) meet and sign a treaty (contract, agreement, etc.); sign sth. jointly

会考
会考[huì kǎo] 统考 general examination

会聚
会聚[huì jù] 聚集 assemble; get together; congregate亦 also 汇聚 huìjù

会衔
会衔[huì xián]（两个或两个以上的机关）在发出的公文上共同具名 joint signature; (of two or more institutions) jointly sign an official document

会要
会要[huì yào]记载某一朝代各项经济政治制度的书籍，多用做书名，如《唐会要》(used in book titles) book of economic and political structures during certain dynasty, e.g. Economic and Political Structures of the Tang Dynasty

会见
会见[huì jiàn] 跟别人相见 meet with sb.：会见亲友 meet one's relatives and friends友好的会见 friendly meeting

会计
会计[kuài jì]1.监督和管理财务的工作，主要内容有填制各种记账凭证，处理账务，编制各种有关报表等 accounting; system of recording, summarizing and verifying business and financial transactions, involving filling out certificates for keeping accounts, handling accounting matters, and making financial statements 2.担任会计工作的人员 accountant; one who is in charge of accounting

会计师
会计师[kuài jì shī]1.企业、机关中会计人员的职务名称之一 certified accountant; chief accountant; chartered accountant; one of the professional titles for accountants of enterprises or institutions 2.〈旧时 old〉由政府发给执照并受当事人委托执行会计业务的自由职业者，主要职务是查核账目，设计会计制度等 government-licensed private accountant who checks accounts and works out an accounting system for clients

会议
会议[huì yì]1.有组织有领导地商议事情的集会 meeting; conference; organized gathering for discussion and consultation：全体会议 plenary session厂务会议 factory management meeting工作会议 working session 2.一种经常商讨并处理重要事务的常设机构或组织 congress; council; conference; standing body that meets regularly to discuss and make decisions on important matters：中国人民政治协商会议 Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference部长会议 council of ministers

会诊
会诊[huì zhěn] 几个医生共同诊断疑难病症 (of several doctors) medical consultation for difficult cases; multi-specialty consultation：他的病明天由内科医生会诊。Physicians will consult on his disease tomorrow.

会试
会试[huì shì] 明清两代各省举人参加的科举考试，每三年在京城举行一次 (during the Ming and Qing dynasties) national imperial civil service examination held once every three years in the capital for those candidates successful in the provincial examination

会话
会话[huì huà] 同 same as 对话 duìhuà ①（多用于学习别种语言或方言时 usu. for learning a foreign language or a dialect）

会谈
会谈[huì tán] 双方或多方共同商谈 bilateral or multilateral talks：两国会谈 talks between two countries

会账
会账[huì zhàng]（在饭馆、酒馆、茶馆、澡堂、理发馆等处）付账（多指一人给大家付账）foot the bill for; pay for; treat (others in restaurant, pub, tea house, bathhouse, or barber's)亦 also 会钞 huì∥chāo

会费
会费[huì fèi] 会员按期向所属组织交的钱 membership dues a member regularly pays to the organization he or she belongs to

会车
会车[huì chē] 相向行驶的列车、汽车等同时在某一地点交错通过 (of trains or motor vehicles going in opposite directions) pass each other at a certain place

会通
会通[huì tōng]〈书 fml.〉融会贯通 achieve thorough understanding through mastery of all relevant materials; achieve mastery throughcomprehensive study

会道门
会道门[huì dào mén]（～儿 huìdàoménr）会门和道门的合称 collective term for superstitious sects and secret societies

会钞
会钞[huì chāo] 同 same as 会账 huì∥zhàng

会门
会门[huì mén]（～儿 huìménr）某些封建迷信的组织 organization based on superstitious beliefs

会阴
会阴[huì yīn] 肛门与外生殖器之间的部分 perineum; area between the anus and the external genitalia

会集
会集[huì jí] 同 same as 汇集 huìjí

会面
会面[huì miàn] 见面 meet; see

会餐
会餐[huì cān] 聚餐 dinner party：节日会餐 dinner party to celebrate a festival

会馆
会馆[huì guǎn] 同省、同府、同县或同业的人在京城、省城或大商埠设立的机构，主要以馆址的房屋供同乡、同业聚会或寄寓 guild; guild hall; institution established in a capital, provincial capital or major commercial port by people coming from the same province, prefecture, county or in the same trade, to provide accommodation or meeting place for fellow countrymen and traders

会首
会首[huì shǒu]〈旧时 old〉民间各种叫做会的组织的发起人 sponsor of an unofficial organization or society亦 also 会头 huìtóu

会齐
会齐[huì qí] 聚齐 assemble; get together：各村参加集训的民兵后天到县里会齐。The militia from all the villages due to undergo military training will assemble in the county seat the day after tomorrow.

伛
伛[yǔ]（ㄩˇ）（傴）曲（背）；弯（腰）bow：伛着背 hunchbacked; humpbacked伛下腰 bow (to show respect)相关词组伛偻

伛偻
伛偻[yǔ lǚ]〈书 fml.〉腰背弯曲 hunchbacked; humpbacked; bow

伞
伞[sǎn]（ㄙㄢˇ）（傘、繖）1.挡雨或遮太阳的用具，用油纸、布、塑料等制成，中间有柄，可以张合 umbrella; device for protection from rain or sun consisting of a collapsible, usu. circular canopy made of oiled paper, cloth, plastic, etc., mounted on a central rod：一把伞 an umbrella旱伞 parasol; sunshade雨伞 umbrella 2.像伞的东西 sth. like an umbrella：降落伞 parachute 3.(Sǎn) 姓 a surname相关词组灯伞 | 旱伞 | 跳伞 | 阳伞 | 雨伞 | 跳伞塔 | 保护伞 | 降落伞 | 阳伞效应伞兵

伞兵
伞兵[sǎn bīng] 用降落伞着陆的空降兵 paratrooper; parachuter

伟
伟[wěi]（ㄨㄟˇ）（偉）1.伟大 great：雄伟 magnificent伟论 great theory伟绩 grand achievement 2.〈书 fml.〉壮美 beautiful and magnificent：伟丈夫 strong and handsome man相关词组瑰伟 | 宏伟 | 魁伟 | 奇伟 | 颀伟 | 雄伟 | 丰功伟绩伟岸 | 伟大 | 伟绩 | 伟力 | 伟论 | 伟人 | 伟业

伟业
伟业[wěi yè] 伟大的业绩 illustrious exploit

伟人
伟人[wěi rén] 伟大的人物 great personage：一代伟人 great man of his generation

伟力
伟力[wěi lì] 巨大的力量 mighty force

伟大
伟大[wěi dà] 品格崇高；才识卓越；气象雄伟；规模宏大；超出寻常，令人景仰钦佩的 great; outstanding; magnificent; grand; extraordinary; awe-inspiring：伟大的领袖 distinguished leader伟大的祖国 great motherland伟大的事业 grand cause伟大的成就 outstanding achievement

伟岸
伟岸[wěi àn] 魁梧；高大 tall and sturdy; stalwart：身材伟岸 of tall and sturdy stature村头有两棵挺拔伟岸的松树。There are two towering pine trees by the entrance to the village.

伟绩
伟绩[wěi jì] 伟大的功绩 great feat：丰功伟绩 grand exploit and achievement

伟论
伟论[wěi lùn] 宏论 grand theory

传
传[chuán]（ㄔㄨㄢˊ）（傳）1.由一方交给另一方；由上代交给下代 pass from one to another; hand down from one generation to the next：流传 pass down由前向后传 pass from front to back古代传下来的文化遗产 cultural legacy bequeathed from ancient times 2.传授 teach：师传 trained by a master把自己的手艺传给人 pass one's skills on to someone else 3.传播 promulgate：宣传 publicize胜利的消息传遍全国。News of victory spread all over the country. 4.传导 transmit：传电 transmit electricity传热 transmit heat 5.表达 express：传神 graphic, lifelike传情 express one's feelings 6.发出命令叫人来 demand the presence of sb.：传讯 summon sb. for interrogation; subpoena把他传来。Call him in. 7.传染 infect：这种病传人。This disease is contagious.另见  zhuàn传[zhuàn]（ㄓㄨㄢˋ）（傳）1.解释经文的著作 commentaries on classics：经传 Confucian classics and commentaries on them《春秋公羊传》The Gongyang Commentary 2.传记 biography：列传 collected biographies of ancient dynastic histories别传 supplementary biography (not contained in official collected biographies)外传 unauthorized biographies自传 autobiography《三国志》上有诸葛亮的传。Records of Three Kingdoms contains a biography of Zhuge Liang. 3.叙述历史故事的作品（多用做小说名称 usu. used in titles）story or novel：《水浒传》 Outlaws of the Marsh《吕梁英雄传》 Heroes of the Lüliang Mountain另见  chuán相关词组别传 | 单传 | 嫡传 | 讹传 | 风传 | 哄传 | 经传 | 拘传 | 口传 | 列传 | 留传 | 流传 | 内传 | 频传 | 评传 | 亲传 | 盛传 | 失传 | 世传 | 外传 | 相传 | 小传 | 心传 | 宣传 | 言传 | 谣传 | 遗传 | 真传 | 自传 | 祖传 | 纪传体 | 热传导 | 宣传弹 | 宣传画 | 宣传品 | 遗传学 | 言传身教 | 遗传工程 | 以讹传讹 | 不见经传 | 名不虚传 | 圣经贤传 | 树碑立传 | 薪尽火传 | 言归正传 | 一脉相传传本 | 传播 | 传布 | 传唱 | 传抄 | 传承 | 传达 | 传代 | 传单 | 传导 | 传道 | 传灯 | 传递 | 传动 | 传粉 | 传告 | 传观 | 传呼 | 传话 | 传唤 | 传记 | 传家 | 传见 | 传教 | 传戒 | 传经 | 传令 | 传流 | 传略 | 传媒 | 传票 | 传奇 | 传情 | 传染 | 传人 | 传神 | 传世 | 传授 | 传输 | 传述 | 传说 | 传送 | 传诵 | 传颂 | 传统 | 传闻 | 传习 | 传檄 | 传写 | 传讯 | 传言 | 传扬 | 传艺 | 传译 | 传语 | 传阅 | 传真 | 传种 | 传动带 | 传感器 | 传家宝 | 传教士 | 传染病 | 传声器 | 传声筒 | 传输线 | 传送带 | 传出神经 | 传呼电话 | 传入神经 | 传宗接代

传世
传世[chuán shì] 珍宝、书画、著作等（多指古代的）流传到后世 (of treasures, calligraphic works, paintings, literary works, etc.) be handed down from ancient times：传世珍品 treasure from ancient times

传习
传习[chuán xí] 传授和学习知识、技艺等 teach and learn knowledge, skills, etc.：传习气功疗法 learn and pass on qigong therapy, a deep breathing exercise

传人
传人[chuán rén]1.传授给别人（多指特殊的技艺）pass on (mostly special skills) to others：祖传秘方向来不轻易传人。As a rule an age-old family recipe is never lightly passed on to outsiders. 2.（疾病）传染给别人 (of disease) infect others：感冒容易传人。Colds are highly contagious. 3.发话叫人来 call sb. over：传人问话 summon sb. for questioning传人[chuán rén] 能够继承某种学术、技艺而使它流传的人 person who is able to inherit and pass on certain scholarship or craft：京剧梅（兰芳）派传人 exponent of the Mei (Lanfang) school of Peking Opera濒于失传的绝技如今有了传人。A unique skill on the brink of extinction has found a worthy successor.

传代
传代[chuán dài] 一代接一代地继续生存或保留下去 survive or pass on from generation to generation

传令
传令[chuán lìng] 传达命令 transmit an order：传令兵 messenger司令部传令嘉奖。The headquarters dispatched a citation.

传入神经
传入神经[chuán rù shén jīng] 把各个器官或外围部分的兴奋传到中枢神经系统的神经 afferent nerve; nerve that transmits excitement from the organs or periphery nerves to the central nervous system亦 also 感觉神经 gǎnjué shénjīng

传写
传写[chuán xiě] 传抄 circulate and copy (a manuscript, document, etc.) by hand：竞相传写 vie to copy and disseminate几经传写，讹误颇多。Repeated copying has led to many errors.

传出神经
传出神经[chuán chū shén jīng] 把中枢神经系统的兴奋传到各个器官或外围部分的神经 efferent nerve or motion nerve; nerve that conducts excitation from the central nervous system to the organs or peripheral parts亦 also 运动神经 yùndòng shénjīng

传动
传动[chuán dòng] 利用构件或机构把动力从机器的一部分传递到另一部分 transmit power from one part to another of a machine through certain components or mechanism：机械传动 mechanical transmission液压传动 hydraulic transmission

传动带
传动带[chuán dòng dài] 机器上传动的环形带，套在皮带轮上 transmission belt; loop-shaped belt fitted on a belt pulley

传单
传单[chuán dān] 印成单张向外散发的宣传品 leaflet; handbill：印传单 print leaflets撒传单 pass out leaflets

传告
传告[chuán gào] 把消息、话语等转告给别人 pass on news or word to others：互相传告 relay (sth.) to each other奔走传告 go around passing on (some news)传告喜讯 disseminate good news

传呼
传呼[chuán hū] 电信局通知受话人去接长途电话；管理公用电话的人通知受话人去接电话 (of a telecommunication office) notify sb. to answer a long distance call; (of a public telephone custodian) call sb. to answer the phone：夜间传呼 answering service at night公用传呼电话 phone booth; public telephone with a custodian providing answering service

传呼电话
传呼电话[chuán hū diàn huà] 指有人管传呼的公用电话 public telephone with a custodian providing answering service

传唤
传唤[chuán huàn]1.传话呼唤；招呼 call (on)：有事传唤一声。Let me know if there's anything I can do. 2.法院、检察机关用传票或通知叫与案件有关的人前来 (of court or procuratorial organ) subpoena or summon those related to a case

传唱
传唱[chuán chàng]（歌曲等）流传歌唱 (of song, etc.) go from lip to lip：传唱千古 be sung throughout the ages这首歌已在群众中广为传唱。This song has been spread extensively among the people.

传声器
传声器[chuán shēng qì] 微音器 microphone

传声筒
传声筒[chuán shēng tǒng]1.话筒 ③ megaphone 2.〈比喻 fig.〉照着人家的话说，自己毫无主见的人 person who can only echo others without any ideas of their own

传奇
传奇[chuán qí]1.唐代兴起的短篇小说，如《李娃传》、《会真记》等 classical-language tale; a genre of short stories originating in the Tang Dynasty, e.g. The Story of Li Wa and A Tale of an Encounter with an Immortal (another name for The Story of Yingying) 2.明清两代盛行的长篇戏曲，一般每本由二十余出至五十余出组成。如明代汤显祖的《牡丹亭》、清代孔尚任的《桃花扇》等。a full-length opera popular during the Ming and Qing dynasties, each consisting of 20 to 50 or more acts, like The Peony Pavilion by Tang Xianzu of the Ming and The Peach Blossom Fan by Kong Shangren of the Qing 3.指情节离奇或人物行为超越寻常的故事 legend; tale with strange plots, or characters with unusual behaviours：传奇式的人物 legendary figure他一生的经历充满了传奇色彩。He had an unusual and colourful life.

传媒
传媒[chuán méi]1.传播媒介，特指报纸、广播、电视等各种新闻工具 media, esp. the news media of newspaper, radio, and TV：国内外数十家新闻传媒对这一有趣的民俗作了介绍。Dozens of domestic and overseas news media reported on the interesting folk custom. 2.疾病传染的媒介或途径 agent or channel for the transmission of a disease：游泳池会成为红眼病的传媒。The swimming pool may become a vehicle of conjunctivitis.

传宗接代
传宗接代[chuán zōng jiē dài] 子孙一代接一代地延续下去 (of a family line) continue generation upon generation; keep the family line alive

传家
传家[chuán jiā] 家庭里世代相传 hand down from generation to generation in a family：传家宝 family heirloom忠厚传家 honesty as a family trait

传家宝
传家宝[chuán jiā bǎo] 家庭里世代相传的宝贵物品 valuables handed down from generation to generation in a family艰苦朴素的作风是劳动人民的传家宝。Hard work and plain living is a cherished tradition of the working people.

传导
传导[chuán dǎo]1.热或电从物体的一部分传到另一部分 transmit or conduct heat or electricity from one part to another 2.神经纤维把外界刺激传向大脑皮层，或把大脑皮层的活动传向外围神经 (of nerve fibres) transmit external stimuli to the cerebral cortex, or the activity of the cerebral cortex to peripheral nerves

传布
传布[chuán bù] 同 same as 传播 chuánbō：传布病菌 diffuse germs传布消息 spread news传布新思想 disseminate new ideas

传情
传情[chuán qíng] 传达情意（多指男女之间 mostly between a man and a woman）express amorous feelings：眉目传情 show one's feelings with one's eyes

传感器
传感器[chuán gǎn qì] 指利用一定规律把被检测量转换成便于处理的其他物理量的器件 sensor; transducer; device that converts an amount of input energy to be tested into another form of physical quantity according to certain laws to facilitate the testing

传戒
传戒[chuán jiè]〈佛教用语 Budd.〉指寺院里召集初出家的人受戒，使成为正式的和尚或尼姑 (of a Buddhist monastery or nunnery) initiate novices into monkhood or nunhood at a ceremony

传扬
传扬[chuán yáng]（事情、名声等）传播 (of an event, one's name, etc.) spread：这事要是传扬出去，他可就被动了。If this is made public, he'll be in an awkward position.他的英雄事迹很快地传扬开了。His heroic deed soon became widely known and applauded.

传承
传承[chuán chéng] 传授和继承 impart and inherit：木雕艺术经历代传承，至今已有千年的历史。The art of woodcarving has been handed down from generation to generation for over 1,000 years.

传抄
传抄[chuán chāo] 辗转抄写 copy and circulate (a manuscript, etc.)：传抄本 hand-copied book

传授
传授[chuán shòu] 把学问、技艺教给别人 pass on knowledge, skill, etc., to others：传授技术 pass on a skill or technique传授经验 share one's experience这门手艺是他祖父传授下来的。The handicraft skill was handed down from his grandfather.

传播
传播[chuán bō] 广泛散布 spread far and wide：传播花粉 pollinate传播消息 propagate news传播先进经验 publicize advanced experience

传教
传教[chuán jiào]1.〈书 fml.〉传播教化 disseminate knowledge; cultivate; educate 2.指宣传宗教教义，劝人信教 do missionary work; propagate religious doctrines in an effort to convert the listener

传教士
传教士[chuán jiào shì] 基督教会（包括旧教和新教）派出去传教的人 missionary of Christianity (both Catholicism and Protestantism)

传本
传本[chuán běn] 书册流传的版本 (of a book) edition in circulation

传染
传染[chuán rǎn]1.病原体侵入生物体，使生物体产生病理反应，叫做传染。有明显症状的叫显性传染，无明显症状的叫隐性传染。infect; contagion; pathological reaction of an organic body to the invasion by a pathogen; known as dominant contagion when obvious symptoms occur, and as recessive contagion when no obvious symptoms occur 2.〈比喻 fig.〉因接触而使情绪、感情、风气等受影响，发生类似变化 influence mood, feelings, or atmosphere through contact：他的不安情绪迅速传染给了在座的人。His restlessness soon affected everyone present.

传染病
传染病[chuán rǎn bìng]由病原体传染引起的疾病。如肺结核、麻风、天花、伤寒等。infectious or contagious disease; disease caused by pathogens, such as TB, leprosy, smallpox, typhoid, etc.

传檄
传檄[chuán xí]〈书 fml.〉传布檄文 promulgate a call to arms or a letter of denunciation：传檄声讨 circulate a letter of condemnation

传流
传流[chuán liú] 同 same as 流传 liúchuán

传灯
传灯[chuán dēng]〈佛教 Budd.〉称佛法能像明灯一样照亮世界，指引迷途，因以传灯比喻传授佛法 teach Buddhism, which is believed to light up the world like a lamp and lead the road for those gone astray：传灯弟子 indoctrinate a disciple with Buddhism

传略
传略[zhuàn lüè] 比较简略的传记 brief biography; biographical sketch：《孙中山传略》A Brief Biography of Sun Yat-sen

传真
传真[chuán zhēn]1.指画家描绘人物的形状 draw the portrait of a person; 同 same as 写真 xiězhēn ① 2.利用光电效应，通过有线电或无线电装置把照片、图表、书信、文件等的真迹传送到远方的通讯方式 facsimile transmission; telecommunication system, wired or wireless, of transmitting a photograph, a chart, a letter, or a document by scanning it photoelectrically and reproducing it xerographically at another location

传神
传神[chuán shén]（优美的文学、艺术作品）描绘人或物，给人生动逼真的印象 (of fine literary or artistic work) give the reader or viewer a true-to-life impression of people or things：他画的马非常传神。The horses he paints are extremely lifelike.这段对话把一个吝啬鬼刻画得如见其人，可谓传神之笔。This passage of dialogue represents a miser so vividly that we seem to see him in person.

传票
传票[chuán piào]1.法院或检察机关签发的传唤与案件有关的人到案的凭证 summons; subpoena 2.会计工作中据以登记账目的凭单 voucher for accounting record

传种
传种[chuán zhǒng] 动植物繁殖后代 (of animals and plants) propagate; reproduce：养马要选择优良的品种来传种。To raise horses, one should select fine breeds.

传粉
传粉[chuán fěn] 雄蕊花药里的花粉借风或昆虫做媒介，传到雌蕊的柱头上或直接传到胚珠上，是子房形成果实的必要条件 pollinate; pollination; the transfer of pollen grains on the anther of the stamen, by wind or insects, to the stigma of the pistil, or directly to the ovule, a prerequisite for the ovary to develop into fruit

传经
传经[chuán jīng]1.传授儒家经典 teach Confucian doctrines 2.传授经验 pass on experience：传经送宝 share one's valuable experience

传统
传统[chuán tǒng] 世代相传、具有特点的社会因素，如文化、道德、思想、制度等 tradition; social factors or elements carried forward from generation to generation and with unique characteristics, such as culture, ethics, ideology, system, etc.：发扬艰苦朴素的优良传统 develop the fine tradition of hard work and plain living传统剧目 traditional drama or opera

传艺
传艺[chuán yì] 传授技艺 impart skills：收徒传艺 train an apprentice

传见
传见[chuán jiàn] 通知人来见面（用于上级对下级）(of superior) summon (subordinate) for an interview：传见学生代表 call in the student representative听候传见 wait to be called in

传观
传观[chuán guān] 传递着看 pass (sth.) round for a look：他拿出纪念册来让我们传观。He took out an autograph album for us to look at.

传言
传言[chuán yán]1.辗转流传的话 hearsay; rumour：不要轻信传言。Don't be credulous of rumours.关于此事，外界传言很多。Rumours run rampant about the incident. 2.传话 pass on a message：传言送语 pass on words

传讯
传讯[chuán xùn]（司法机关、公安机关等）传唤与案件有关的人到案受讯问 subpoena; (of a judicial or public security organization) summon those related to a case for interrogation

传记
传记[zhuàn jì] 记录某人生平事迹的文字 biography; written account of a person's life; life story：名人传记 biographies of famous persons传记文学 biographical literature

传译
传译[chuán yì] 从一种语言、文字翻译成另一种语言、文字 interpret or translate one language into another：学术报告厅有六种语言同声传译系统。The academic auditorium has a system for simultaneous interpretation in six languages.

传话
传话[chuán huà] 把一方的话转告给另一方 pass on a message：他让我给你传个话，他实在帮不了你的忙。He asked me to tell you that he is really unable to help you.

传语
传语[chuán yǔ] 同 same as 传话 chuán∥huà

传说
传说[chuán shuō]1.辗转述说 relay：传说他家有人立功了，不知道是他弟兄俩的哪一位。One of the two brothers of the family is said to have won a merit citation, but we do not know which one. 2.群众口头上流传的关于某人某事的叙述或某种说法 account or description of sb. or sth. passed around by word of mouth：鲁班的传说 the legend of Lu Ban, the Sage Carpenter这种传说并没什么根据。This story proved unfounded.

传诵
传诵[chuán sòng] 辗转传布诵读；辗转传布称道 (of a story, poem, song, etc.) go the rounds：传诵一时 be widely read for a time他的名字在民间广为传诵。His name is widely applauded among the people.

传输
传输[chuán shū]输送（能量、信息等）transmit (energy, information, etc.)：直线传输 rectilinear transmission传输装置 transmission device

传输线
传输线[chuán shū xiàn]传送电能的导线。如传送电力的输电线、有线通讯的电缆和无线电发射机与天线的连线。wire for transmitting electric power, such as transmission line, communication wire, and the line connecting a radio transmitter to an antenna

传达
传达[chuán dá]1.把一方的意思告诉给另一方 pass on the message of one party to another：传达命令 pass on an order传达上级的指示 relay instructions from a higher authority 2.在机关、学校、工厂的门口管理登记和引导来宾的工作 reception and registration of visitors at an organization, school, or factory：传达室 reception room 3.在机关、学校、工厂的门口担任传达工作的人 receptionist

传述
传述[chuán shù] 同 same as 传说 chuánshuō ①：传述故事 retold story

传送
传送[chuán sòng] 把物品、信件、消息、声音等从一处传递另一处 deliver or transmit goods, mail, news, sound, etc., from one location to another：传送电报 transmit a telegraph传送消息 dispatch news

传送带
传送带[chuán sòng dài]1.生产流水线中传送材料、机件、成品等的装置 conveyor belt; device used for transporting materials, parts, finished products, etc. in a production line 2.特指装置上的传送皮带 belt on a conveyor assembly line

传递
传递[chuán dì] 由一方交给另一方；辗转递送 deliver sth. from one party to another; relay：传递消息 transmit news传递信件 deliver mail传递火炬 relay a torch

传道
传道[chuán dào]1.布道 preach 2.〈旧时 old〉指传授古代圣贤的学说 teach the doctrines of ancient sages

传闻
传闻[chuán wén]1.辗转听到 hear indirectly：传闻不如亲见。Seeing is believing.传闻他已出国。It is said that he has gone abroad. 2.辗转流传的事情 hearsay：传闻失实。The rumour is groundless.

传阅
传阅[chuán yuè] 传递着看 pass around (or circulate) for perusal：传阅文件 pass around a document这篇稿子请大家传阅并提意见。Please pass the draft around and make your comments.

传颂
传颂[chuán sòng] 辗转传布颂扬 (of a good deed, act of heroism, etc.) go the rounds：全村人传颂着他英勇救人的事迹。All the villagers are applauding his heroic deed of saving a life.

伡
伡[chē]（ㄔㄜ）另见  大车2  dàchē

伢
伢[yá]（ㄧㄚˊ）〈方 dial.〉小孩儿 child; kid相关词组细伢子

伤
伤[shāng]（ㄕㄤ）（傷）1.人体或其他物体受到的损害 wound; injury：内伤 internal injury虫伤 insect bites探伤 flaw detection; defect detection; fault detection轻伤不下火线 remain at the battlefront despite minor wounds 2.伤害 injure; hurt：伤了筋骨 injure the muscles and bones出口伤人 make offensive remarks; speak offensively伤感情 hurt one's feelings 3.悲伤 be distressed; be grieved：忧伤 grief; sorrow哀伤 grief; sorrow伤感 sentimental; sick at heart 4.因过度而感到厌烦（多指饮食） get sick of sth. (esp. food and drink); develop an aversion to sth.：伤食 be sick from overeating; suffer from indigestion吃糖吃伤了 get sick from eating too many candies 5.妨碍 be harmful to; hinder：无伤大雅 not affect the major principles; not matter much有伤风化 be a moral disgrace相关词组哀伤 | 暗伤 | 悲伤 | 创伤 | 挫伤 | 冻伤 | 负伤 | 感伤 | 工伤 | 毁伤 | 火伤 | 鳞伤 | 内伤 | 杀伤 | 烧伤 | 神伤 | 受伤 | 死伤 | 损伤 | 探伤 | 烫伤 | 外伤 | 误伤 | 养伤 | 忧伤 | 中伤 | 重伤 | 无伤大雅 | 物伤其类 | 出口伤人 | 劳民伤财 | 遍体鳞伤 | 金属探伤 | 救死扶伤 | 两败俱伤 | 五劳七伤伤疤 | 伤悼 | 伤风 | 伤感 | 伤害 | 伤寒 | 伤号 | 伤耗 | 伤痕 | 伤口 | 伤神 | 伤生 | 伤势 | 伤逝 | 伤亡 | 伤心 | 伤员 | 伤脑筋 | 伤风败俗 | 伤天害理 | 伤心惨目

伤亡
伤亡[shāng wáng] 受伤和死亡；受伤和死亡的人 injuries and deaths; casualties：伤亡惨重 suffer heavy casualties交战双方各有伤亡。The two sides at war suffered casualties.

伤势
伤势[shāng shì] 受伤的情况 condition of an injury or wound：伤势严重 be seriously injured or wounded

伤口
伤口[shāng kǒu] 皮肤、肌肉、黏膜等受伤破裂的地方 wound; cut; injury to the skin, muscle or mucous membrane as caused by breaking, cutting, etc.

伤号
伤号[shāng hào]受伤的人（多用于军队 usu. used among army personnel）the wounded

伤员
伤员[shāng yuán] 受伤的人员（多用于军队 usu. used among army personnel） wounded personnel; the wounded

伤天害理
伤天害理[shāng tiān hài lǐ] 指做事残忍，灭绝人性 defy Heaven and reason; atrocious; outrageous; inhuman

伤害
伤害[shāng hài] 使身体组织或思想感情等受到损害 injure; harm; hurt：睡眠过少会伤害身体。Too little sleep is harmful to the health.伤害自尊心 hurt one's pride

伤寒
伤寒[shāng hán]1.急性肠道传染病，病原体是伤寒杆菌，症状是体温持续在39-40℃，脉搏缓慢，脾脏肿大，白细胞减少，腹部出现玫瑰色疹 typhoid fever; typhoid; acute infectious disease caused by a bacillus (Salmonella typhi)and acquired by ingesting contaminated food or water, characterized by a fever of 39-40℃, slow pulse, enlargement of the spleen, decrease of the white cells and rose-coloured rashes on the belly亦 also 肠伤寒 chángshānghán 2.〈中医 Chin. med.〉指外感发热的病，特指发热、恶寒无汗、头痛项僵的病 diseases caused by harmful cold factors; febrile diseases; fevers, esp. characterized by feelings of extreme cold with no sweating, headache and stiff neck

伤心
伤心[shāng xīn] 由于遭受不幸或不如意的事而心里痛苦 sad; grieved; broken-hearted：伤心事 heartbreaking affair; painful memory; old sore伤心落泪 shed sad tears; weep in grief

伤心惨目
伤心惨目[shāng xīn cǎn mù] 非常悲惨，使人不忍心看 too ghastly to look at; tragic (scene)

伤悼
伤悼[shāng dào] 怀念死者而感到悲伤 mourn sorrowfully (for sb.'s death)：顷得噩耗，伤悼不已。I'm greatly grieved to hear the sad news.

伤感
伤感[shāng gǎn] 因感触而悲伤 sentimental; sick at heart：对景思人，无限伤感 feel extremely sorrowful to see the sight and think of someone

伤生
伤生[shāng shēng] 伤害生命 be injurious (or harmful) to life

伤疤
伤疤[shāng bā]1.伤口愈合后留下的痕迹 scar 2.〈比喻 fig.〉过去的错误、隐私、耻辱等 errors, secrets and humiliation of the past：揭伤疤 reveal one's past mistakes, privacy or humiliation

伤痕
伤痕[shāng hén] 伤疤。也指物体受损害后留下的痕迹。 scar; bruise; mark left after an injury heals：伤痕累累 many cuts and bruises

伤神
伤神[shāng shén]1.过度耗费精神 overtax one's nerves; be nerve-racking：做这事真够伤神的。It is really nerve-racking to get this job done. 2.伤心 sad; grieved：黯然伤神 feel depressed (or dejected)

伤耗
伤耗[shāng hao] 损耗 damage

伤脑筋
伤脑筋[shāng nǎo jīn] 形容事情难办，费心思 knotty; troublesome; bothersome：这件事真让人伤脑筋。This matter is really a headache.

伤逝
伤逝[shāng shì]〈书 fml.〉悲伤地怀念去世的人 mourn the death of sb.

伤风
伤风[shāng fēng] 感冒 catch cold; have a cold

伤风败俗
伤风败俗[shāng fēng bài sú]指败坏风俗（多用来谴责道德败坏 oft. used to denounce moral degeneration） offend public decency; corrupt public morals

伥
伥[chāng]（ㄔㄤ）（倀）伥鬼 ghost of a man devoured by a tiger：为虎作伥 ghost of a man devoured by a tiger helps the tiger devour others相关词组为虎作伥伥鬼

伥鬼
伥鬼[chāng guǐ] 传说中被老虎咬死的人变成的鬼，这个鬼不敢离开老虎，反而给老虎做帮凶 Legend has it that a man devoured by a tiger would become a ghost which, daring not leave the tiger, helps to find others for the tiger to devour.另见  为虎作伥 wèi hǔ zuò chāng

伦
伦[lún]（ㄌㄨㄣˊ）（倫）1.人伦 human relations, esp. as conceived by feudal ethics：伦常 feudal order of importance or seniority in human relationships伦理 ethics; moral principles五伦 five cardinal relationships in traditional ethics - between monarch and subject, father and son, husband and wife, among brothers and among friends天伦 natural bonds and ethical relationships between members of a family 2.条理；次序 logic; order：伦次 logical sequence; coherence 3.同类;同等 peer; match：不伦不类 neither fish nor fowl; nondescript; grotesque比拟不伦 incomparable; beyond comparison英勇绝伦 matchlessly brave 4.(Lún) 姓 a surname相关词组噶伦 | 绝伦 | 库伦 | 乱伦 | 人伦 | 天伦 | 五伦 | 不伦不类 | 鄂伦春族 | 无与伦比 | 语无伦次 | 拟于不伦伦巴 | 伦比 | 伦常 | 伦次 | 伦理 | 伦琴 | 伦理学

伦巴
伦巴[lún bā] 交际舞的一种，原是古巴的黑人舞，4/4 拍 rumba (dance); four-four-time ballroom dance of Cuban origin [西 Spanish: rumba]

伦常
伦常[lún cháng]我国封建社会的伦理道德。封建时代称君臣、父子、夫妇、兄弟、朋友五种关系为五伦，认为这种尊卑、长幼的关系是不可改变的常道，称为伦常。feudal order of importance or seniority in human relationships; feudal ethics in China. The relationships between monarch and subject, father and son, husband and wife, among brothers and among friends were called the five cardinal relationships in traditional ethics in the feudal times. They were regarded as normal and constant ethics that must remain unchanged.

伦次
伦次[lún cì] 语言、文章的条理次序 coherence; logical sequence：语无伦次 speak incoherently or illogically文笔错杂，毫无伦次。The writing is tangled, utterly lacking in coherence.

伦比
伦比[lún bǐ]〈书 fml.〉同等；匹敌 match; equal：史无伦比 unrivalled (or peerless, unequalled) in history无与伦比 unmatched; unparalleled

伦理
伦理[lún lǐ] 指人与人相处的各种道德准则 ethics; moral principles for dealing with people

伦理学
伦理学[lún lǐ xué] 关于道德的起源、发展，人的行为准则和人与人之间的义务的学说 ethics; study of the origin and development of the morals, the standards of conduct and the obligations among humans

伦琴
伦琴[lún qín]射线强度单位，1伦琴约等于1居里的放射线在1小时内所放出的射线量。这个单位名称是为纪念德国物理学家伦琴(Wilhelm Konrad R?ntgen)而定的。roentgen; unit of measuring the intensity of rays, named after the German physicist Wilhelm Konrad R?ntgen, with 1 roentgen approximately equal to the quantity of rays emitted by the radioactive rays of 1 curie in one hour

伧
伧[cāng]（ㄘㄤ）（傖）〈书 fml.〉粗野 rough; impolite; uncivil; unpolished; rude：伧父（粗野的人）a rough person; low or vulgar fellow; vulgarian另见  ·chen伧[chen]（·ㄔㄣ）（傖）另见  寒伧 hán·chen另见  cāng相关词组寒伧伧俗

伧俗
伧俗[cāng sú] 粗俗鄙陋 vulgar; inelegant; distasteful; tasteless; in bad or low taste：言语伧俗 use vulgar language

伪
伪[wěi]（ㄨㄟˇ）（偽、僞）1.有意做作掩盖本来面貌的；虚假（跟‘真’相对 as opposed to‘true’）disguise; cover the original look of sth.on purpose; false：伪装 disguise伪造 counterfeit作伪 forge伪钞 counterfeit banknote去伪存真 remove the false and retain the true 2.不合法的；窃取政权、不为人民所拥护的 (of a regime) bogus; puppet：伪政权 puppet regime伪军 quisling army伪组织 bogus organization相关词组敌伪 | 防伪 | 虚伪 | 作伪伪钞 | 伪劣 | 伪善 | 伪书 | 伪托 | 伪造 | 伪证 | 伪装 | 伪足 | 伪作 | 伪君子

伪书
伪书[wěi shū] 作者姓名或著作时代不可靠的书 book of dubious authorship or date

伪作
伪作[wěi zuò]1.假托别人名义写作诗文或制作艺术品 create a piece of writing or art work in the name of someone else 2.假托别人写作的诗文或制作的艺术品 a piece of writing or art work in the name of sb. other than the real author

伪劣
伪劣[wěi liè] 冒牌的、质量低劣的 (of goods) fake or of low quality：伪劣商品 shoddy goods伪劣书画 fake works of painting and calligraphy

伪君子
伪君子[wěi jūn zǐ] 外貌正派，实际上卑鄙无耻的人 hypocrite; person who appears upright but is low in character

伪善
伪善[wěi shàn] 冒充好人 pretend to be good：伪善者 hypocrite伪善的面孔 hypocritical face

伪托
伪托[wěi tuō] 在著述、制造等方面假托别人名义，多指把自己的或后人的作品假冒为古人的 pass off one's writing or work of art in the name of someone else, oft. referring to passing off one's own or later works as classical ones

伪装
伪装[wěi zhuāng]1.假装 pretend; feign：伪装进步 pretend to be progressive 2.假的装扮 disguise：剥去伪装 strip off sb.'s mask 3.军事上采取措施来隐蔽自己、迷惑敌人 camouflage; take measures to hide oneself and confuse the enemy 4.军事上用来伪装的东西 camouflage works

伪证
伪证[wěi zhèng]假造的证据，指案件进行侦查或审理中，证人、鉴定人、记录人或翻译人故意做出的虚假证明、鉴定和翻译。伪证依法构成伪证罪。false evidence, provided by a witness, identifier, note-taker, or translator during investigation or trial of a case. One who supplies such testimony is guilty of perjury.

伪足
伪足[wěi zú] 变形虫等原生动物的运动器官和捕食器官，由身体的任一部分突出而形成，形成后可以重新缩回 pseudopodium; temporary protrusion of the surface of a protist, such as amoeba, for movement and feeding

伪造
伪造[wěi zào] 假造 fabricate：伪造证件 forge a certificate伪造历史 fabricate history

伪钞
伪钞[wěi chāo] 假造的纸币 counterfeit banknote

伫
伫[zhù]（ㄓㄨˋ）（佇、竚）〈书 fml.〉伫立 stand for a long while：伫候 stand waiting伫听风雨声 stand still and listen to the sound of wind and rain相关词组踌伫伫候 | 伫立

伫候
伫候[zhù hòu]〈书 fml.〉站着等候，泛指等候 stand waiting; (in a broad sense) wait：伫候佳音 look forward to your good news伫候光临。I look forward to your coming.

伫立
伫立[zhù lì]〈书 fml.〉长时间地站着 stand still for a long while：凝神伫立 stand still in deep concentration伫立窗前 stand still before the window

伯
伯[bǎi]（ㄅㄞˇ）另见  大伯子 dàbǎi·zi另见  bó伯1[bó]（ㄅㄛˊ）1.伯父 uncle; father's elder brother：大伯 uncle; father's eldest brother表伯 uncle; father's male elder cousin from his father's sister's or mother's brother's or sister's family 2.在弟兄排行的次序里代表老大 the eldest among brothers：伯兄 eldest brother伯2[bó]（ㄅㄛˊ）封建五等爵位的第三等 earl; count; the third of the five ranks of nobility in feudal society：伯爵 earl; count另见  bǎi相关词组笨伯 | 大伯 | 老伯 | 叔伯 | 大伯子 | 锡伯族 | 阿拉伯人 | 阿拉伯数字伯伯 | 伯父 | 伯公 | 伯劳 | 伯乐 | 伯母 | 伯婆 | 伯仲 | 伯祖 | 伯祖母 | 伯仲叔季

伯乐
伯乐[Bó lè] 春秋时秦国人，善于相马 Bo Le, a connoisseur of horses of the State of Qin in the Spring and Autumn Period (770-476 B.C.)；〈比喻 fig.〉善于发现和选用人才的人 talent scout; good judge of talent：各级领导要广开视野，当好伯乐，发现和造就更多的人才。Leaders at all levels should broaden their vision and act like Bo Le to discover and foster more talents.

伯仲
伯仲[bó zhòng]〈书 fml.〉指兄弟的次第 order of seniority among brothers；〈比喻 fig.〉事物不相上下 about the same：伯仲之间 be much the same

伯仲叔季
伯仲叔季[bó zhòng shū jì] 弟兄排行的次序，伯是老大，仲是第二，叔是第三，季是最小的 eldest, second, third and youngest of brothers; order of seniority among brothers

伯伯
伯伯[bó bo] 同 same as 伯父 bófù：二伯伯 second uncle张伯伯 Uncle Zhang

伯公
伯公[bó gōng]〈方 dial.〉1.伯祖 great-uncle; one's paternal grandfather's elder brother 2.丈夫的伯父 elder brother of one's husband's father

伯劳
伯劳[bó láo]鸟，额部和头部的两旁黑色，颈部蓝灰色，背部棕红色，有黑色波状横纹。吃昆虫和小鸟。有的地区叫虎不拉(hù·bulǎ)。shrike; bird of the family Laniidae that has a black forehead, black cheeks, a bluish-grey neck and a reddish-brown back with black undulant bands, feeding on insects and small birds; also called 虎不拉 hù·bulǎ in some regions

伯婆
伯婆[bó pó]〈方 dial.〉1.伯祖母 great-aunt; wife of paternal grandfather's elder brother 2.丈夫的伯母 wife of the elder brother of one's husband's father

伯母
伯母[bó mǔ] 伯父的妻子 aunt; wife of father's elder brother

伯父
伯父[bó fù]1.父亲的哥哥 uncle; father's elder brother 2.称呼跟父亲辈分相同而年纪较大的男子 uncle; term of address for a man of one's father's generation who is older than one's father

伯祖
伯祖[bó zǔ] 父亲的伯父 grand-uncle; great-uncle; paternal grandfather's elder brother

伯祖母
伯祖母[bó zǔ mǔ] 父亲的伯母 grand-aunt; great-aunt; wife of paternal grandfather's elder brother

估
估[gū]（ㄍㄨ）估计；揣测 estimate; appraise; guess：估一估这块地能收多少粮食。Can you estimate how much grain can be harvested from this plot?不要低估他的作用。Don't underestimate his role.另见  gù估[gù]（ㄍㄨˋ）[估衣] (gù·yi) 出售的旧衣服或原料较次、加工较粗的新衣服 second-hand clothes or new clothes poorly tailored and made of inferior material：估铺 second-hand clothes shop另见  gū相关词组粗估 | 低估 | 毛估 | 评估估产 | 估计 | 估价 | 估量 | 估摸 | 估算 | 估堆儿

估产
估产[gū chǎn] 凭生产经验，预先估计农作物等的产量 estimate the yield of a crop in advance based on one's experience in production; appraise the assets; assess

估价
估价[gū jià] 估计商品的价格 estimate the price of a commodity; appraise; evaluate：请给这件古董估个价吧。Please make an estimate of the price of this piece of antique.估价[gū jià] 对人或事物给以评价 evaluate or appraise：对历史人物的估价不能离开历史条件。In evaluating historical personages, we should not forget specific historical conditions.

估堆儿
估堆儿[gū duī r] 估计成堆商品的数量或价格 estimate the quantity or the value of a pile of goods

估摸
估摸[gū mo] 同 same as 估计 gūjì：我估摸着他会来。I surmise he will come.

估算
估算[gū suàn] 大致推算 estimate; appraise; reckon：估算产量 estimate the yield; an estimated yield

估计
估计[gū jì] 根据某些情况，对事物的性质、数量、变化等做大概的推断 make a rough estimate of the nature, quantity or changes of a thing in the light of certain circumstances; estimate; appraise; reckon：估计他今天会来。I reckon he will come today.最近几天估计不会下雨。It is not likely to rain in the next few days.

估量
估量[gū liáng] 同 same as 估计 gūjì：难以估量的损失 inestimable loss

伲
伲[nì]（ㄋㄧˋ）〈方 dial.〉我；我们 I; we

伴
伴[bàn]（ㄅㄢˋ）1.（伴儿 bànr）同伴 companion; partner：搭个伴儿 accompany each other结伴同行 travel in a group让我来跟你做个伴儿吧。Let us be partners. 2.陪伴；陪同 accompany：伴唱 vocal accompaniment伴送 see sb. off相关词组搭伴 | 火伴 | 伙伴 | 结伴 | 就伴 | 老伴 | 侣伴 | 旅伴 | 陪伴 | 同伴 | 舞伴 | 游伴 | 做伴 | 油田伴生气伴唱 | 伴当 | 伴酒 | 伴郎 | 伴侣 | 伴娘 | 伴生 | 伴随 | 伴同 | 伴舞 | 伴星 | 伴宿 | 伴音 | 伴游 | 伴奏

伴侣
伴侣[bàn lǚ] 同在一起生活、工作或旅行的人 companion; mate; partner in work, travel or life：终身伴侣（指夫妻）lifelong companion (esp. husband or wife)长途跋涉中，有他做伴侣，就不寂寞了。With him as a companion, one will not feel lonesome on a long journey.

伴同
伴同[bàn tóng] 陪同；一同 accompany; together：去年他曾伴同我到过这里。Last year he accompanied me here on my visit to this place.蒸发和溶解的过程常有温度下降的现象伴同发生。The process of evaporation and dissolving is often associated with a drop in temperature.

伴唱
伴唱[bàn chàng] 从旁歌唱，配合表演 sing a supporting part in a performance; support singer

伴奏
伴奏[bàn zòu] 歌唱、跳舞或独奏时用器乐配合 musical accompaniment for song, dance or instrumental solo

伴娘
伴娘[bàn niáng] 女傧相 bridesmaid

伴宿
伴宿[bàn sù]〈方 dial.〉出殡的前一天的夜里，亲属守灵不睡 all-night vigil by relatives beside the coffin before the day of burial; all-night wake

伴当
伴当[bàn dāng]〈旧时 old〉指跟随着做伴的仆人或伙伴 follower or companion

伴星
伴星[bàn xīng] 双星中较暗的一颗，围绕着主星旋转 companion (star); faint star seen in the same field with a bright one and revolving around it

伴游
伴游[bàn yóu]1.陪同游览或游玩 escort sb. on a travel 2.指陪同游览或游玩的人 travel companion; escort

伴生
伴生[bàn shēng]（次要的）伴随着主要的一起存在 (secondary) coexists with the principal：伴生树 associated tree钛、铬、钴等常与铁矿伴生。Titanium, chromium and cobalt are often associated with iron mines.

伴舞
伴舞[bàn wǔ]1.陪伴人跳舞 partner sb. to dance：邀她去舞会上伴舞。She is invited to the dance to partner others. 2.从旁跳舞，配合演唱 backup dancer; support dancer

伴郎
伴郎[bàn láng] 男傧相 groomsman; best man

伴酒
伴酒[bàn jiǔ]陪伴人喝酒（多指在酒店或酒吧间里 oft. in a tavern or bar）one who drinks with customers

伴随
伴随[bàn suí] 随同；跟 accompany; follow：伴随左右，不离寸步 be always at sb.'s elbow; follow sb. closely伴随着生产的大发展，必将出现一个文化高潮。An upsurge in culture is bound to follow the rapid advance in production.

伴音
伴音[bàn yīn] 在电影和电视中配合图像的声音 sound track for film or television programme亦 also 伴声 bànshēng

伶
伶[líng]（ㄌㄧㄥˊ）〈旧时 old〉指戏曲演员 actor or actress (in traditional opera)：伶人 actor or actress名伶 famous or popular actor or actress坤伶 actress (in traditional opera)老伶工（年老有经验的演员）old and skilled actor or actress相关词组坤伶 | 名伶 | 女伶 | 优伶 | 孤苦伶仃伶仃 | 伶俐 | 伶俜 | 伶牙俐齿

伶仃
伶仃[líng dīng]1.孤独；没有依靠 lonely; solitary; left alone to fend for oneself：孤苦伶仃 alone and abandoned; friendless and wretched; orphaned and helpless 2.瘦弱 thin and weak：瘦骨伶仃 mere skeleton; all skin and bones亦 also 零丁 língdīng

伶俐
伶俐[líng lì] 聪明；灵活 clever; bright; smart; quick-witted：口齿伶俐 speak intelligently and eloquently; have the gift of the gab; be smart and fluent这孩子真伶俐。What a clever child!

伶俜
伶俜[líng pīng]〈书 fml.〉孤独；孤单 lonely; solitary; all alone：伶俜独居 live alone or in seclusion

伶牙俐齿
伶牙俐齿[líng yá lì chǐ] 形容口齿伶俐，能说会道 eloquent; sharp-tongued; have the gift of the gab; have a glib or ready tongue

伷
伷[zhòu]（ㄓㄡˋ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 胄1  zhòu。多用于人名。oft. used in a person's name

伸
伸[shēn]（ㄕㄣ）（肢体或物体的一部分）展开 (of part of the limbs or sth.) stretch; extend：伸直 straighten伸展 extend延伸 extend; stretch相关词组欠伸 | 延伸 | 能屈能伸伸手 | 伸缩 | 伸腿 | 伸雪 | 伸延 | 伸腰 | 伸冤 | 伸展 | 伸张 | 伸懒腰

伸冤
伸冤[shēn yuān] 同 same as 申冤 shēn∥yuān ①

伸展
伸展[shēn zhǎn] 向一定方向延长或扩展 spread; extend; stretch：金色的麦田一直伸展到远远的天边。Golden wheat fields stretch from horizon to horizon.

伸延
伸延[shēn yán] 延伸 extend; stretch：公路一直伸延到山脚下。The road extends to the foot of the mountain.

伸张
伸张[shēn zhāng]扩大（多指抽象事物 oft. referring to sth. abstract） uphold; promote：伸张正义 uphold justice

伸懒腰
伸懒腰[shēn lǎn yāo] 人疲乏时伸展腰和上肢 stretch oneself; stretch one's limbs

伸手
伸手[shēn shǒu]1.伸出手 stretch (or hold) out one's hand;〈比喻 fig.〉向别人或组织要（东西、荣誉等） beg for sth. or honour from sb. or one's own organization：有困难我们自己解决，不向国家伸手。If there is any difficulty, we'll overcome it by ourselves. We'll not ask the government for help. 2.指插手（含贬义 derog.） have a hand in; meddle in; poke one's nose into

伸缩
伸缩[shēn suō]1.引长和缩短；伸出和缩进 retract; draw and be drawn back：有的照相机的镜头能够前后伸缩。The lenses of some cameras are retractable. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉在数量或规模上作有限的或局部的变动 flexible; elastic; adjustable; limited or partial alteration in quantity or scale：伸缩性 elasticity; flexibility没有伸缩的余地 leave no latitude; leave no room for manoeuvring

伸腰
伸腰[shēn yāo] 挺直身体 straighten one's back; straighten oneself up;〈比喻 fig.〉不再受人欺侮 not to be bullied any more

伸腿
伸腿[shēn tuǐ]1.钻入；插足；占一份好处（含厌恶意 with a sense of disgust） step in to gain an advantage 2.（伸腿儿 shēn∥tuǐr）指人死亡（含诙谐意 humor.） kick the bucket; turn up one's toes

伸雪
伸雪[shēn xuě] 同 same as 申雪 shēnxuě

伺
伺[cì]（ㄘˋ）[伺候] (cì·hou) 在人身边供使唤，照料饮食起居 wait upon sb.; serve：伺病人 take care of a patient另见  sì伺[sì]（ㄙˋ）观察；守候 watch; await：窥伺 peep at伺隙 wait for a chance伺机 watch out for one's chance另见  cì相关词组窥伺伺机 | 伺隙

伺机
伺机[sì jī] 窥伺时机 watch for one's chance：伺机而动 wait for an opportune moment to take action伺机报复 wait for an opportunity to take revenge

伺隙
伺隙[sì xì] 察看可利用的机会；伺机 wait for a chance; watch for an opportunity：伺隙乘虚 wait for an opportunity and catch the opponent off guard伺隙进攻 wait for a chance to attack

伻
伻[bēng]（ㄅㄥ）〈书 fml.〉使者 envoy

似
似[shì]（ㄕˋ）[似的] (shì·de)〈助词 aux.〉用在名词、代词或动词后面，表示跟某种事物或情况相似 [used after a noun, pronoun, or verb to indicate similarity]be like ...; as ... as ...; as if：像雪似那么白 as white as snow仿佛睡着了似 as if asleep乐得什么似 as happy as a lark亦 also 是的 shì·de另见  sì似[sì]（ㄙˋ）1.像；如同 similar; like：相似 resemble; be similar to; be alike近似 approximate; similar类似 similar (to); analogous (to)似是而非 apparently right but actually wrong 2.似乎 seem; appear：似属可行 seem to be feasible似应从速办理。It seems as though the matter should be dealt with as soon as possible. 3.表示超过 [used in a comparative] than：人民生活一年强似一年。People's lives are getting better every year.另见  shì相关词组好似 | 浑似 | 近似 | 酷似 | 类似 | 貌似 | 恰似 | 强似 | 神似 | 胜似 | 宛似 | 相似 | 形似 | 一似 | 疑似 | 近似值 | 相似形 | 如花似锦 | 如饥似渴 | 如胶似漆似乎 | 似…非… | 似是而非

似…非…
似…非…[sì fēi] 嵌用同一个单音名词、形容词或动词，表示又像又不像的意思 (each of these two words followed by the same word to indicate paradox of similarity and dissimilarity) look like but not be; smack of：～绸～绸。It looks like silk but is not.～蓝～蓝 look to be blue but is not～笑～笑 imperceptible smile～懂～懂 have only a hazy notion; not completely understand

似乎
似乎[sì hū]〈副词 adv.〉仿佛；好像 as if; seemingly：他似乎了解了这个字的意思，但是又讲不出来。It seems as though he understands this, but is unable to express it in words.

似是而非
似是而非[sì shì ér fēi] 好像对，实际上并不对 apparently right but actually wrong：这些论点似是而非，必须认真分辨，才不至于上当。These arguments are specious; one can avoid being fooled by them only after making a serious analysis.

伽
伽[gā]（ㄍㄚ）[伽马射线] (gāmǎ shèxiàn) 丙种射线 gamma ray;γ ray亦 also γ 射线 gāmǎ shèxiàn另见  jiā and qié伽[jiā]（ㄐㄧㄚ）[伽倻琴] (jiāyēqín) 朝鲜族的弦乐器，有些像筝 plucked stringed instrument, used by the Korean people另见  gā and qié伽[qié]（ㄑㄧㄝˊ）另见  见下 below另见  gā and jiā相关词组瑜伽伽蓝 | 伽马刀 | 伽南香

伽南香
伽南香[qié nán xiāng] 沉香 agalloch; eagle-wood (Aquilaria agallocha)

伽蓝
伽蓝[qié lán] 佛寺 Buddhist temple［僧伽蓝摩之省 abbr. for 僧加蓝摩；梵 Sanskrit: sam?ghārāma］

伽马刀
伽马刀[gā mǎ dāo]利用伽马射线代替手术刀进行手术的医疗装置。以钴-60作为能源，将多束伽马射线聚焦在病灶并摧毁病灶。主要用来治疗脑血管畸形和颅内肿瘤等。gammaknife; medical device used in surgical operations whereby a gamma ray performs the function of a scalpel. Taking cobalt-60 as its energy source, it concentrates gamma rays on the infected part and eradicates it, mainly used to treat cerebrovascular malformations and intracranial tumours.

伾
伾[pī]（ㄆㄧ）[伾伾]〈书 fml.〉有力气的样子 strong; muscular

佀
佀[sì]（ㄙˋ）1.〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 似 sì 2.(Sì) 姓 a surname

佃
佃[diàn]（ㄉㄧㄢˋ）租种土地 rented land：佃了五亩地 have rented fivemu of land另见  tián佃[tián]（ㄊㄧㄢˊ）〈书 fml.〉1.耕种田地 cultivate farmland 2. 同 same as 畋 tián, 打猎 go hunting另见  diàn相关词组撤佃 | 东佃 | 退佃佃东 | 佃户 | 佃农 | 佃权 | 佃租

佃东
佃东[diàn dōng]〈旧时 old〉佃户称租给他土地的地主 landlord or landlady; name used by tenant farmers to refer to their landlord or landlady

佃农
佃农[diàn nóng] 自己不占有土地，以租种土地为生的农民 tenant-peasant; tenant farmer; person who owns no farmland but lives on tilling land rented from another person

佃户
佃户[diàn hù] 租种某地主土地的农民称为某地主的佃户 tenant farmer (of a certain landlord or landlady)

佃权
佃权[diàn quán] 佃户继续租种土地的权利 tenant right; tenant farmer's right to maintain the renting of a farmland

佃租
佃租[diàn zū] 佃户交纳给地主的地租 land rent; money or produce paid by tenant farmers to their landlord or landlady

但
但[dàn]（ㄉㄢˋ）1.只 merely; only; just：但愿如此。If only it were true.  or May this be true.  or I hope so.不求有功，但求无过 aspire after no merit, praying only to commit no error; aim only at playing safe辽阔的原野上，但见麦浪随风起伏。In the vast fields you see nothing but wheat undulating in the wind. 2.但是 but; yet; still; in spite of：屋子小，但挺干净。The room is small but clean.工作虽然忙，但一点也没放松学习。Although he is tied up with work, he nevertheless maintains the rigour of his studies. 3. (Dàn) 姓 a surname相关词组不但 | 非但 | 岂但但凡 | 但是 | 但书

但书
但书[dàn shū] 法律条文中‘但’字以下的部分，指出本条文的例外 proviso; qualifying clause; article or clause in any legal document, usu. beginning with the word‘Provided’, indicating a condition, qualification or restriction

但凡
但凡[dàn fán] 凡是；只要是 in every case; as long as; without exception：但凡有一线希望，也要努力争取。Try your best to grasp even the slimmest hope.但凡过路的人，没有一个不在这儿打尖的。Whoever passes here always stops for a snack.

但是
但是[dàn shì]〈连词 conj.〉用在后半句话里表示转折，往往与‘虽然、尽管’等呼应 but [used to introduce the next part of a sentence and indicate unexpectedness or exception]：他想睡一会儿，但是睡不着。He wanted to have a nap, but could not sleep.他虽然已经七十多了，但是精力仍然很健旺。Although he is already in his 70s, he is still full of energy.

佉
佉[qū]（ㄑㄩ）〈书 fml.〉驱逐 expel; drive out; banish

佊
佊[bǐ]（ㄅㄧˇ）〈书 fml.〉邪 evil

位
位[wèi]（ㄨㄟˋ）1.所在或所占的地方 place; location：部位 location; place; position座位 seat各就各位 on your marks 2.职位；地位 position：名位 fame and position 3.特指君主的地位 throne：即位 accede to; be enthroned在位 be on the throne; reign篡位 usurp the throne 4.一个数中每个数码所占的位置 place; figure; digit：个位 single digit; unit's place百位 triple digit; hundred's place十位数 two digit number 5.〈量词 classifier〉用于人（含敬意 pol.）[for people]：诸位 everybody各位 everybody家里来了几位客人。We have some visitors at home. 6.(Wèi) 姓 a surname相关词组本位 | 泊位 | 部位 | 仓位 | 舱位 | 潮位 | 车位 | 船位 | 床位 | 篡位 | 错位 | 单位 | 到位 | 地位 | 定位 | 段位 | 吨位 | 方位 | 峰位 | 复位 | 岗位 | 高位 | 个位 | 官位 | 皇位 | 货位 | 即位 | 价位 | 借位 | 进位 | 就位 | 爵位 | 列位 | 灵位 | 禄位 | 锚位 | 名位 | 牌位 | 品位 | 铺位 | 区位 | 权位 | 让位 | 哨位 | 神位 | 尸位 | 数位 | 水位 | 嗣位 | 胎位 | 摊位 | 体位 | 退位 | 脱位 | 王位 | 席位 | 相位 | 穴位 | 学位 | 音位 | 越位 | 在位 | 展位 | 职位 | 诸位 | 坐位 | 座位 | 方位词 | 同位素 | 金本位 | 全方位 | 银本位 | 本位货币 | 本位主义 | 代位继承 | 三位一体 | 尸位素餐 | 同位素量 | 虚位以待 | 复本位制 | 导出单位 | 各就各位 | 基本单位 | 天文单位 | 国际单位制 | 全球定位系统位觉 | 位能 | 位移 | 位于 | 位置 | 位子

位于
位于[wèi yú] 位置处在（某处） be located; be situated; lie：我国位于亚洲大陆东南部。Our country is situated in the southeast of Asia.

位子
位子[wèi zi]人所占据的地方；座位。借指职位。seat; place; position

位移
位移[wèi yí] 物体在运动中所产生的位置的移动 displacement; difference between the later position and the original position

位置
位置[wèi zhi]1.所在或所占的地方 seat; place：大家都按指定的位置坐了下来。Everybody has taken a seat as arranged for him. 2.地位 status：《狂人日记》在我国新文学中占有重要位置。A Madman's Diary occupies an important place in the history of the new Chinese literature. 3.指职位 position：谋了个科员的位置 get a job as a section member

位能
位能[wèi néng] 势能 potential energy

位觉
位觉[wèi jué] 平衡感觉 sense of balance

低
低[dī]（ㄉㄧ）1.从下向上距离小；离地面近（跟‘高’相对，② ③同 as opposed to‘tall’; the same is true for ② and ③）at a short distance from the ground; low：低空 low sky飞机低飞绕场一周。The airplane flew round the airfield at low altitude.水位降低了。The water level dropped. 2.在一般标准或平均程度之下 below average; low：低地 low-lying land声音太低。The voice is too low.眼高手低 have high ambitions but low ability 3.等级在下的 low in grade or rank：低年级学生 junior-grade students我比哥哥低一班。I am one grade below my brother. 4.（头）向下垂 hang down; droop：低着头 hang one's head相关词组贬低 | 高低 | 减低 | 降低 | 新低 | 压低 | 走低 | 超低温 | 高低杠 | 眉高眼低 | 山高水低 | 手高手低 | 眼高手低 | 高不成，低不就低倍 | 低层 | 低产 | 低潮 | 低沉 | 低档 | 低估 | 低谷 | 低徊 | 低缓 | 低回 | 低级 | 低贱 | 低空 | 低栏 | 低廉 | 低劣 | 低龄 | 低落 | 低迷 | 低能 | 低频 | 低热 | 低烧 | 低俗 | 低糖 | 低调 | 低头 | 低洼 | 低微 | 低温 | 低下 | 低压 | 低语 | 低云 | 低能儿 | 低压槽 | 低等动物 | 低等植物 | 低人一等 | 低三下四 | 低声下气 | 低首下心 | 低音提琴 | 低级神经活动

低三下四
低三下四[dī sān xià sì] 形容卑贱没有骨气 abject; subservient; servile; obsequious

低下
低下[dī xià]1.（生产水平、经济地位等）在一般标准之下的 (of living standards, economic status, etc.) sub-par; below average; low; inferior：能力低下 low ability技术水平低下 low technical level 2.（品质、格调等）低俗 (of quality, taste, etc.) lowly; vulgar; cheap：情趣低下 in vulgar taste

低云
低云[dī yún] 距离地面约2公里以下的云 low clouds less than two km. above ground

低产
低产[dī chǎn] 产量低 low yield：低产田 low-yield land低产作物 low-yielding crop

低人一等
低人一等[dī rén yī děng] 比别人低一个等级 of inferior status; inferior to others：职业不同是社会分工不同，不存在哪个行业低人一等的问题。Different jobs are the different divisions of labour in society, in which no job is inferior to others.

低估
低估[dī gū] 过低估计 underestimate; underrate：不要低估群众的力量。Don't underestimate the strength of the masses.

低俗
低俗[dī sú] 低级庸俗 vulgar; low; coarse：言语低俗 vulgar language低俗的格调 low and vulgar style

低倍
低倍[dī bèi] 倍数小的 low power：低倍放大镜 low-power magnifying glass

低劣
低劣[dī liè]（质量）很不好 (of quality) inferior; substandard; low-grade：低劣产品 substandard products品质低劣 inferior quality

低压
低压[dī yā]1.较低的压强 low pressure 2.较低的电压 low voltage 3.心脏舒张时血液对血管的压力 blood pressure on blood vessels when the heart is diastolic

低压槽
低压槽[dī yā cáo]在同高度上低气压中心向外伸展的槽形部分。一般向南或西南方向延伸。(in meteorology) trough; extended trough-shaped sector of central low pressure at the same altitude, usu. extending southward or southwestward

低回
低回[dī huí]〈书 fml.〉1.徘徊(huái) pace up and down 2.留恋 be reluctant to leave; linger：使人低回不忍离去 cause sb. to be reluctant to leave 3.回旋起伏 full of twists and turns; tangled; sentimental：思绪低回 lost in a tangle of thoughts低回婉转的乐曲 sentimental music亦 also 低徊 dīhuí

低声下气
低声下气[dī shēng xià qì] 形容恭顺小心的样子 humble and submissive; humble and meek; servile

低头
低头[dī tóu]1.垂下头 hang or lower one's head：低头不语 hang one's head silently 2.〈比喻 fig.〉屈服 yield; submit：他在任何困难面前都不低头。He never bows to difficulties.

低层
低层[dī céng]1.低的层次 of or on a lower level, floor, layer, etc.：他住在高层，我住在低层。I live on a lower floor than he does. 2.低的等级 low-ranking; lowly; low：低层职员 junior clerk

低廉
低廉[dī lián]（价钱）便宜(pián·yi) cheap; low-priced; low in price：价格低廉。Prices are low.收费低廉。Fees are low.

低徊
低徊[dī huí] 同 same as 低回 dīhuí

低微
低微[dī wēi]1.（声音）细小 (of voice or sound) low; faint：低微的呻吟 faint groans 2.少；微薄 low; little; meagre：收入低微 low income待遇低微 low pay 3.〈旧时 old〉指身份或地位低 lowly; humble：门第低微 low family status

低栏
低栏[dī lán] 女子径赛项目之一，规定距离为80米，栏架高 76.2厘米；规定距离为100米，栏架高84厘米 low hurdles; women's track event with a distance of 80 metres and a hurdle of 76.2 centimetres high, or a distance of 100 metres and a hurdle of 84 centimetres high

低档
低档[dī dàng] 质量差，价格较低的（商品 of goods）low-grade; inferior in quality; cheap：低档服装 low-grade clothes低档食品 inferior-quality food

低沉
低沉[dī chén]1.天色阴暗，云层厚而低 overcast; gloomy 2.（声音）低 (of voice) low and deep 3.（情绪）低落 (of mood) low-spirited; downcast

低洼
低洼[dī wā]比四周低的（地方）low-lying：地势低洼 low-lying land低洼地区必须及时采取防涝、排涝的措施。Timely measures must be taken to prevent waterlogging, and drain flooded fields.

低温
低温[dī wēn] 较低的温度。物理学上指-192到-263℃的液态空气的温度 low temperature, the temperature of liquid-air at -192℃ to -263℃ in physics

低潮
低潮[dī cháo]1.在潮的一个涨落周期内，水面下降的最低潮位 (in a cycle of ebb and flow, the sea's level on a coast gradually reaches its lowest) low tide; low ebb 2.〈比喻 fig.〉事物发展过程中低落、停滞的阶段 lowest point; nadir; at the low, stagnant period in development：那时革命正处于低潮。The revolution was at an ebb at that time.

低烧
低烧[dī shāo]人的体温在37.5-38℃叫低烧 low fever, with body temperature at 37.5-38℃亦 also 低热 dīrè

低热
低热[dī rè] 同 same as 低烧 dīshāo

低空
低空[dī kōng] 距离地面较近的空间 low altitude; low level; space near the ground：低空飞行 low-altitude (or low-level) flight在低空是暖而湿润的西南气流。At low altitudes is found the warm, humid southwest airflow.

低等动物
低等动物[dī děng dòng wù] 在动物学中，一般指身体结构简单、组织及器官分化不显著的无脊椎动物 lower animal form; invertebrate referred to in zoology as having bodies of simple structure, and tissues and organs of indistinct differentiation

低等植物
低等植物[dī děng zhí wù]一般指构造简单,无茎叶分化，生殖细胞多为单细胞结构的植物。旧时的低等植物范围较大，包括苔藓类和蕨类植物。现在以胚的有无作为区分高等植物与低等植物的标准。lower plant; plant with simple structure, no differentiation of stems and leaves, and germinating from a single cell. In the past, lower plant forms covered a wider range, including bryophytes and pteridophytes, but now the standard to differentiate higher and lower plants is based on whether or not they have embryos.

低糖
低糖[dī táng]（食品的）含糖量低 (of food) low sugar：低糖糕点 low-sugar pastry

低级
低级[dī jí]1.初步的；形式简单的 elementary; rudimentary; low; junior 2.庸俗的 vulgar; coarse; low：低级趣味 bad taste; vulgar interests

低级神经活动
低级神经活动[dī jí shén jīng huó dòng] 大脑皮层之下各部位的神经活动，包括以无条件反射为基础的本能活动，是人类和动物所共有的神经活动 activities of the nerves under the cerebral cortex, including instinctive activities based on unconditioned reflexes, common in human beings and other animals

低缓
低缓[dī huǎn]1.（声音）低而缓慢 (of sound or voice) low and slow：他语调低缓，但口气很坚决。He spoke in a low but firm voice. 2.（地势）低而坡度小 (of topography) low-lying and flat：这里地势低缓，气候温和。This place is low-lying with gentle slopes and temperate climate.

低能
低能[dī néng] 能力低下 of low ability; mental deficiency; feeble-mindedness

低能儿
低能儿[dī néng ér]智力不发达、近于痴呆的儿童。也泛指智能低下的人。mentally challenged child; child with mental disabilities; mentally retarded child; imbecile

低落
低落[dī luò] 下降 low; downcast; depressed：价格低落。Prices have fallen.士气低落。The army's morale is low.情绪低落 downcast; depressed

低语
低语[dī yǔ] 低声说话 speak softly; speak in a low voice; whisper：低语密谈 talk in whispers in a secretive manner悄声低语 whisper他在老王耳边低语了几句。He whispered a few words in Old Wang's ear.

低调
低调[dī diào]（～儿 dīdiàor）低的调门儿low-key; low-pitched tune;〈比喻 fig.〉缓和的或比较消沉的论调 mild or low-spirited view

低谷
低谷[dī gǔ]〈比喻 fig.〉事物运行过程中低落或低迷的阶段 doldrums; low ebb; stage in which sth. is in decline, decreasing or weakening：用电低谷 period of low power consumption经济开始走出低谷。The economy has begun to emerge from its low ebb.

低贱
低贱[dī jiàn]1.（地位）低下 (of status) low and degrading; lowly; humble; mean：出身低贱 of humble birth and unworthy of notice 2.（价钱）低 cheap; low in price：谷价低贱 low grain prices; cheap grain

低迷
低迷[dī mí] 低落，多形容经济萧条，不景气 (oft. of an economic depression) sluggish; slumping：销售低迷 sluggish sales低迷的市场 recessed market

低音提琴
低音提琴[dī yīn tí qín] 提琴的一种，体积最大、发音最低 double bass

低频
低频[dī pín]1.一般指低于射频或中频的频率，频率范围与声频相近 low frequency; frequency range that is lower than radio or intermediate frequencies and close to acoustic frequencies 2.指30-300千赫范围内的频率 frequencies within 30-300 kilohertz

低首下心
低首下心[dī shǒu xià xīn] 形容屈服顺从的样子 bow and scrape; obsequiously submissive

低龄
低龄[dī líng]年龄较小的（就一般标准来说）(of age) juvenile; minor：低龄犯罪案件 case of juvenile delinquency低龄老人（指六十岁至七十岁的老人）junior old population (senior citizens aged between 60 and 70)

住
住[zhù]（ㄓㄨˋ）1.居住；住宿 live; reside; stay：你住在什么地方？Where do you live?住了一夜 stay overnight 2.停住；止住 stop; cease：住手 stop; hands off住嘴 shut up雨住了。The rain has stopped. 3.做动词的补语 [used after a verb as complement] (a)表示牢固或稳当 firmly：拿住 hold tight捉住 seize hold of sth. or sb.把住了方向盘 hold the steering wheel firmly牢牢记住老师的教导。Keep firmly in mind the teacher's instructions. (b)表示停顿或静止 to a stop：一句话把他问住了。He was stumped by this question.当时他就愣住了。He was immediately struck dumb. (c)跟‘得’（或‘不’）连用，表示力量够得上（或够不上）；胜任 [used after 得 ·de or 不 bù to express ‘capable’ or ‘incapable’]：支持不住 cannot stand; cannot hold out禁得住风吹雨打 be able to withstand wind and rain相关词组常住 | 打住 | 居住 | 入住 | 站住 | 沉住气 | 站住脚 | 保不住 | 备不住 | 背不住 | 吃不住 | 吃得住 | 搁不住 | 搁得住 | 挂不住 | 架不住 | 架得住 | 禁不住 | 禁得住 | 靠不住 | 靠得住 | 衣食住行住持 | 住处 | 住地 | 住读 | 住房 | 住户 | 住家 | 住居 | 住口 | 住手 | 住所 | 住宿 | 住院 | 住宅 | 住址

住口
住口[zhù kǒu] 停止说话 stop talking：不住口地夸奖孩子 heap praises on a child你胡说什么，快给我住口！Nonsense! Hold your tongue!

住地
住地[zhù dì] 居住的地方 dwelling (place); lodging

住址
住址[zhù zhǐ]居住的地址（指城镇、乡村、街道的名称和门牌号数 of the name of a street, village or town, or house number）address：家庭住址 home address

住处
住处[zhù chù] 住宿的地方；住所 residence; dwelling (place); lodging; quarters

住宅
住宅[zhù zhái]住房（多指规模较大的 oft. on large scale）residence; dwelling：住宅区 residential quarters居民住宅 residences

住家
住家[zhù jiā]1.家庭居住（在某处）(of one's family) live; reside in：他在郊区住家。He lives with his family in the suburbs. 2.（住家儿 zhùjiār）住户 household; resident：楼里不少住家都要求改善环境卫生。A large number of residents in the building demand improvements in environmental sanitation.

住宿
住宿[zhù sù]在外居住（多指过夜 oft. overnight）stay; put up; get accommodation：安排住宿 find lodgings; arrange accommodation今天晚上到哪里住宿呢？Where will we put up tonight?

住居
住居[zhù jū] 居住 live; reside; inhabit：少数民族住居的地区 region inhabited by minority ethnic groups

住户
住户[zhù hù] 定居在某处的家庭或有单独户口的人 household; resident; social unit comprising a family or a person with independently registered permanent residence：院子里有三家住户。There are three households in the compound.

住房
住房[zhù fáng] 供人居住的房屋 housing; lodgings

住所
住所[zhù suǒ]居住的处所（多指住户的 oft. of a family）dwelling place; residence; domicile

住手
住手[zhù shǒu] 停止手的动作；停止做某件事 stay one's hand; stop：他不做完不肯住手。He will not stop until he has finished everything.快住手，这东西禁不起摆弄。Stop what you are doing; this thing cannot withstand any meddling.

住持
住持[zhù chí]1.主持一个佛寺或道观的事务 take charge of affairs in a Buddhist or Taoist temple 2.主持一个佛寺或道观的僧尼或道士 (Buddhist or Taoist) abbot; abbess; highest ranking officiator at a monastery or nunnery

住读
住读[zhù dú]（学生）住在学校里上学 (of a student) board at school：住读生 boarder

住院
住院[zhù yuàn] 病人住进医院治疗 be hospitalized

佐
佐[zuǒ]（ㄗㄨㄛˇ）1.辅佐；辅助 assist：佐理 assist sb. with a task佐餐 be eaten together with rice or bread; go with rice or bread 2.辅佐别人的人 assistant：僚佐 (in old times) assistant in a government office相关词组辅佐 | 官佐 | 僚佐佐餐 | 佐理 | 佐证

佐理
佐理[zuǒ lǐ]〈书 fml.〉协助处理 assist sb. with a task：佐理军务 assist sb. in handling military affairs

佐证
佐证[zuǒ zhèng] 证据 evidence; proof：伪造的单据就是他贪污的佐证。The faked documents are evidence of his corruption. also 左证 zuǒzhèng

佐餐
佐餐[zuǒ cān] 下饭 be eaten together with rice or bread; go with rice or bread：佐餐佳肴 delicacies to go with rice or bread

佑
佑[yòu]（ㄧㄡˋ）（祐）保佑 help; protect; bless相关词组保佑 | 庇佑 | 护佑

体
体[tī]（ㄊㄧ）（體）[体己] (tī·ji) 同 same as 梯己 tī·ji另见  tǐ体[tǐ]（ㄊㄧˇ）（體、躰）1.身体，有时指身体的一部分 body or part of a body：体高 height体重 weight上体 trunk肢体 limb五体投地 throw oneself down at sb.'s feet in admiration 2.物体 substance or state of a substance：固体 solid液体 liquid整体 the whole; totality; entirety集体 collective 3.文字的书写形式；作品的体裁 style; form：字体 style of calligraphy草体 scribble; characters executed swiftly and with flowing strokes; cursive hand文体 literary style旧体诗 old style poetry; classical poetry 4.亲身（经验）；设身处地（着想）personally do or experience sth.; put oneself in another's position：体会 experience; know from experience; feel体验 learn from practice; experience体谅 show understanding and sympathy for身体力行 earnestly practise what one teaches 5.体制 system：政体 system of government国体 system of state 6.一种语法范畴，多表示动词所指动作进行的情况 (gram.) aspect of a verb usu. indicating the progressive nature of an action另见  tī相关词组白体 | 本体 | 笔体 | 病体 | 补体 | 草体 | 垂体 | 磁体 | 大体 | 导体 | 得体 | 胴体 | 繁体 | 刚体 | 个体 | 固体 | 国体 | 合体 | 黑体 | 黄体 | 活体 | 机体 | 肌体 | 基体 | 集体 | 简体 | 解体 | 晶体 | 具体 | 楷体 | 抗体 | 可体 | 客体 | 立体 | 流体 | 柳体 | 裸体 | 落体 | 媒体 | 母体 | 欧体 | 骈体 | 气体 | 亲体 | 球体 | 躯体 | 全体 | 群体 | 人体 | 肉体 | 散体 | 骚体 | 上体 | 身体 | 尸体 | 实体 | 事体 | 水体 | 四体 | 特体 | 天体 | 通体 | 团体 | 文体 | 物体 | 下体 | 星体 | 形体 | 芽体 | 颜体 | 掩体 | 液体 | 一体 | 遗体 | 异体 | 幼体 | 载体 | 赵体 | 整体 | 正体 | 政体 | 肢体 | 主体 | 字体 | 总体 | 繁体字 | 个体户 | 古体诗 | 固体潮 | 集体舞 | 简体字 | 近体诗 | 晶体管 | 立体角 | 立体声 | 立体图 | 膨体纱 | 破体字 | 宋体字 | 俗体字 | 团体操 | 异体字 | 语体文 | 院体画 | 半导体 | 半流体 | 编年体 | 扁桃体 | 病原体 | 玻璃体 | 超导体 | 单晶体 | 多晶体 | 多媒体 | 多面体 | 非导体 | 非晶体 | 共同体 | 几何体 | 纪传体 | 结晶体 | 晶状体 | 绝缘体 | 老宋体 | 立方体 | 螺旋体 | 脑上体 | 配子体 | 胼胝体 | 染色体 | 商籁体 | 噬菌体 | 手写体 | 瘦金体 | 水晶体 | 四叠体 | 四六体 | 统一体 | 椭圆体 | 线粒体 | 叶绿体 | 印刷体 | 有机体 | 章回体 | 长方体 | 正方体 | 遍体鳞伤 | 称体裁衣 | 个体经济 | 集体经济 | 集体主义 | 胶体溶液 | 具体而微 | 具体劳动 | 立体电影 | 立体几何 | 立体交叉 | 量体裁衣 | 软体动物 | 身体力行 | 水体污染 | 五体投地 | 不成体统 | 广播体操 | 经济体制 | 竞技体操 | 军事体育 | 器械体操 | 思想体系 | 心广体胖 | 艺术体操 | 韵律体操 | 自由体操 | 雌雄同体 | 雌雄异体 | 等离子体 | 惰性气体 | 魂不附体 | 人民团体 | 三位一体 | 无定形体 | 稀有气体 | 个体所有制 | 集体所有制 | 纪事本末体 | 立克次氏体 | 自由落体运动 | 计算机体层成像体裁 | 体操 | 体测 | 体察 | 体尝 | 体词 | 体罚 | 体格 | 体会 | 体积 | 体检 | 体力 | 体例 | 体谅 | 体貌 | 体面 | 体能 | 体念 | 体魄 | 体腔 | 体式 | 体态 | 体坛 | 体贴 | 体统 | 体位 | 体味 | 体温 | 体惜 | 体系 | 体现 | 体形 | 体型 | 体恤 | 体验 | 体液 | 体育 | 体针 | 体征 | 体制 | 体质 | 体重 | 体积吨 | 体温计 | 体循环 | 体育场 | 体育馆 | 体大思精 | 体力劳动 | 体外循环 | 体无完肤 | 体育运动

体会
体会[tǐ huì] 体验领会 know (or learn) from experience; feel; understand：只有深入群众，才能真正体会群众的思想感情。Only by maintaining close ties with the masses can you really know their thinking and understand their feelings.座谈会上大家漫谈个人的体会。Everyone talked about their personal experience at the informal meeting.

体位
体位[tǐ wèi] 医学上指身体所保持的姿势 (med.) posture; position

体例
体例[tǐ lì] 著作的编写格式；文章的组织形式 stylistic rules and layout; style; form of organization of an article

体制
体制[tǐ zhì]1.国家机关、企业、事业单位等的组织制度 establishment; institution; system (of organization); structure; organizational system of a government organ, enterprise, institution, etc.：学校体制 school system领导体制 leadership structure 2.文体的格局；体裁 form; pattern：五言诗的体制，在汉末就形成了。The pattern of the five-character poems came into being towards the end of the Han Dynasty.

体力
体力[tǐ lì] 人体活动时所能付出的力量 physical (or bodily) strength; physical power：消耗体力 consume one's physical strength; be a drain on one's physical power他体力好，能耐久。He is strong with enduring stamina.

体力劳动
体力劳动[tǐ lì láo dòng] 主要靠体力进行的生产劳动 physical (or manual) labour; productive labour done mainly by physical strength

体味
体味[tǐ wèi] 仔细体会 appreciate; savour：体味人生苦乐 savour the joys and sorrows of life

体坛
体坛[tǐ tán] 体育界 sports world; sports circles：体坛精英 elite of the sports circles; top athletes国际体坛 international sports circles

体型
体型[tǐ xíng]人体的类型（主要指各部分之间的比例）body type; type of build or figure; somatotype：成年人和儿童在体型上有显著的区别。There are remarkable differences in body form between adults and children.

体外循环
体外循环[tǐ wài xún huán] 应用特殊机械装置把血液从身体内引到体外处理后再送回体内，如心肺体外循环是把静脉血引到体外，用人工肺脏使成为动脉血，再用人工心脏送回体内动脉，从而使全身血液暂时改道，不经过心肺 extracorporeal circulation; blood circulation by using a special mechanical device to draw the blood from inside the body for extracorporeal treatment and then infuse it back into the body. For example, extracorporeal cardiopulmonary circulation means drawing the venous blood from the body, using artificial lungs to turn it into arterial blood, and then using an artificial heart to pump it back into the artery so that the blood flows through a make-shift course instead of the heart and lungs.

体大思精
体大思精[tǐ dà sī jīng] 规模宏大，思虑精密（多形容大部头著作 of a voluminous book）comprehensive in scope and brilliant in conception：这部小说史，体大思精，征引宏富。This book about the history of fiction is extensive in scope, penetrating in thought and comprehensive in reference.

体察
体察[tǐ chá] 体验和观察 experience and observe：体察民情 experience and observe the condition of the people

体尝
体尝[tǐ cháng] 亲身尝试 have personal experience of; experience personally：仔细品味体尝 taste carefully她体尝到了生活给自己带来的欣慰和苦涩。She experienced the joy and bitterness life had brought her.

体式
体式[tǐ shì]1.文字的式样 form of characters or letters：拼音字母有手写体和印刷体两种体式。There are two forms of the Chinese phonetic alphabet, the hand-written and the printed. 2.〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 体裁 tǐcái

体形
体形[tǐ xíng]人或动物身体的形状。也指机器等的形状。bodily form; figure; configuration of the body of a person or an animal; shape of a machine

体征
体征[tǐ zhēng] 医生在检查病人时所发现的异常变化，如心脏病患者心脏的杂音、阑尾炎患者右下腹部的压痛等 sign; abnormal bodily changes discovered by a doctor on checking a patient, such as the heart murmur in a sufferer of heart disease, and pain to the touch on the lower part of the abdomen in a sufferer of appendicitis

体循环
体循环[tǐ xún huán]血液从左心室流出，经过动脉、毛细管，把氧气和养料送到各组织，并把各组织所产生的二氧化碳或废物带走，经过静脉流回右心室。血液的这种循环叫做体循环。systematic circulation; greater circulation; circulation by which the blood flows out from the left ventricle, through the artery and capillaries, sends the oxygen and nutriments to the tissues, takes away the carbon dioxide or wastes, flows through the veins and returns to the right ventricle; 亦 also 大循环 dàxúnhuán

体念
体念[tǐ niàn] 设身处地为别人着想 put oneself in sb. else's place：你要体念他的难处，不要苛求于他。You should understand his difficulties. Don't be so exacting on him.

体态
体态[tǐ tài] 身体的姿态；人的体形 posture; carriage：体态轻盈 have a graceful carriage体态魁梧 big and strong build

体恤
体恤[tǐ xù] 设身处地为人着想，给以同情、照顾 understand and sympathize with; show solicitude for：体恤孤寡老人 show solicitude for old people of no family

体惜
体惜[tǐ xī] 体谅爱惜 understand and sympathize with

体操
体操[tǐ cāo] 体育运动项目，徒手或借助于某些器械进行各种动作操练或表演 gymnastics; sport combining tumbling, exercises and acrobatic feats, usu. done barehanded or with apparatus

体无完肤
体无完肤[tǐ wú wán fū]1.形容浑身受伤 have cuts and bruises all over the body; be a mass of bruises 2.〈比喻 fig.〉论点被全部驳倒或文章被删改得很多 (of an argument) be thoroughly refuted; (of an article) be changed beyond recognition

体格
体格[tǐ gé]1.人体发育的情况和健康的情况 physique; build：检查体格 give or receive a physical check-up体格健全 healthy or strong physique 2.泛指人和动物的体形 (in a broad sense) body form; build：古代的猛犸和现在的象体格大小差不多。The mammoth in ancient times was about the same size as the elephant of today.

体检
体检[tǐ jiǎn] 体格检查 physical examination：每年做一次体检 have a physical examination once a year

体测
体测[tǐ cè] 对身体运动能力进行测试 physical fitness test

体液
体液[tǐ yè] 身体内组织间的液体 body fluid; humour

体温
体温[tǐ wēn]身体的温度。人的正常体温为37℃左右，疾病能引起体温的变化，剧烈运动也能使体温升高。body temperature. The normal temperature of human is around 37℃. Illness can cause changes in the body temperature, and drastic body movement can also cause it to go up.

体温计
体温计[tǐ wēn jì] 测量人或动物体温用的温度计，通常是在很细的玻璃管里装上水银制成，人用的体温计刻度从34℃开始到42℃ clinical thermometer; thermometer used to measure the temperature of a human or animal, usu. a slender glass tube containing mercury, graduated from 34℃ to 42℃ for human use亦 also 体温表 tǐwēnbiǎo

体现
体现[tǐ xiàn] 某种性质或现象在某一事物上具体表现出来 embody; reflect; give expression to; (of certain property or phenomenon) be reflected in a concrete thing：说实话，办实事，体现出了他的务实精神。To be honest and do practical things embodies his pragmatic spirit.

体积
体积[tǐ jī] 物体所占空间的大小 volume; bulk; space occupied by an object

体积吨
体积吨[tǐ jī dūn]水运轻货时，计算运费所使用的一种计算单位。以货物占用货舱容积每1.133立方米折算为一吨，叫做一个体积吨。measurement ton; tonnage; unit of measurement for calculating the freight of light sizeable goods transported by water, with one measurement ton equal to 1.133 cubic metres of freight volume

体系
体系[tǐ xì] 若干有关事物或某些意识互相联系而构成的一个整体 system; setup; set or arrangement of things or thoughts so related or connected as to form an organic whole：防御体系 defence structure工业体系 industrial setup思想体系 ideological system

体统
体统[tǐ tǒng] 指体制、格局、规矩等 decorum; propriety; decency：不成体统 most improper; downright outrageous

体罚
体罚[tǐ fá] 用罚站、罚跪、打手心等方式来处罚儿童的一种教育方法 corporal (or physical) punishment inflicted on school children, such as making them stand or kneel for a long time, beating the palm with a ruler, etc.：废除体罚 abolish corporal punishment

体育
体育[tǐ yù]1.以发展体力、增强体质为主要任务的教育，通过参加各项运动来实现 physical education; physical training; education aimed at developing physical strength and improving the physique by taking part in different kinds of sports：体育课 physical education; PE 2.指体育运动 sports

体育场
体育场[tǐ yù chǎng]进行体育锻炼或比赛的场地。有的设有固定看台。sports field (or ground) where physical exercises or competitions are held; stadium (with seated stands)

体育运动
体育运动[tǐ yù yùn dòng] 锻炼身体增强体质的各种活动，包括田径、体操、球类、游泳、武术、登山、射击、滑冰、滑雪、举重、摔跤、击剑、自行车等各种项目 sports; activities such as athletics, gymnastics, ball games, swimming, wushu, mountaineering, shooting, skating, skiing, weightlifting, wrestling, fencing, cycling, etc.

体育馆
体育馆[tǐ yù guǎn]室内进行体育锻炼或比赛的场所。一般设有固定看台。gymnasium; gym; indoor facility for physical exercises or competitions

体能
体能[tǐ néng] 身体的运动能力，包括耐力和在单位时间内运动的速度等 physical fitness, including stamina, speed of movement per time unit, etc.：体能测试 physical fitness test加强体能训练 intensify physical fitness training

体腔
体腔[tǐ qiāng] 人或脊椎动物的内脏器官存在的空间，分为胸腔和腹腔两部分 body cavity; cavity of humans or vertebrates where internal organs are located, consisting of the thoracic cavity and the abdominal cavity

体裁
体裁[tǐ cái]文学作品的表现形式。可以用各种标准来分类，如根据有韵无韵可分为韵文和散文；根据结构可分为诗歌、小说、散文、戏剧等。genre; form of literature classified by different criteria, for example, verse and prose in terms of rhyme, and poetry, novel, prose and drama in terms of structure

体词
体词[tǐ cí] 语法上名词、代词、数词、量词的总称 substantive; general term for nouns, pronouns, numerals and classifiers

体谅
体谅[tǐ liàng] 设身处地为人着想，给以谅解 show understanding and sympathy by putting oneself in sb. else's position; make allowances for：她心肠好，很能体谅人。She is kind-hearted and quite understanding.

体貌
体貌[tǐ mào] 体态相貌 figure and features; general physical appearance：体貌特征 characteristics of sb.'s figure and appearance

体质
体质[tǐ zhì] 人体的健康水平和对外界的适应能力 physique; constitution; health condition of the human body and its ability to adapt to the outside world：发展体育运动，增强人民体质 promote physical culture and build up people's health各人的体质不同，对疾病的抵抗力也不同。As the physique differs from person to person, so does people's resistance to diseases.

体贴
体贴[tǐ tiē] 细心忖度别人的心情和处境，给予关切、照顾 show consideration for; give every care to：体贴入微（多指对人照顾和关怀十分细致周到）look after with great care; care for with great solicitude; be extremely considerate

体重
体重[tǐ zhòng] 身体的重量 (body) weight

体针
体针[tǐ zhēn] 泛指用针刺身体各部穴位的针刺疗法（区别于‘耳针’、‘鼻针’等 as compared with‘ear acupuncture’,‘nose acupuncture’, etc.）body acupuncture

体面
体面[tǐ miàn]1.体统；身份 dignity; face：有失体面 lose one's face; lose one's dignity 2.光荣；光彩 honourable; creditable; respectable：好吃懒做是不体面的事。It is not respectable to be piggish about food and hate working. 3.（相貌或样子）好看；美丽 good-looking, handsome; beautiful; pretty：长得体面 look pretty; look handsome

体验
体验[tǐ yàn] 通过实践来认识周围的事物；亲身经历 learn through practice; learn through personal experience：作家到群众中去体验生活。Writers live among the masses to observe and learn from real life.他深深体验到了这种工作的艰辛。Personal experience has driven home to him how difficult this kind of job is.

体魄
体魄[tǐ pò] 体格和精力 physique：锻炼体魄 go in for physical training体魄健壮 strong (or powerful) physique; vigorous health

何
何[hé]（ㄏㄜˊ）1.〈疑问代词 interrog. pron.〉(a)什么 what：何人 who何物 what何事 for what reason (b)哪里 where：何往 whither从何而来？Where from? (c)为什么 why：吾何畏彼哉？Why should I be afraid of him? 2.表示反问 [rhetorical question]：何济于事？Of what avail is it?何足挂齿？Is it worth mentioning?谈何容易？It is easier said than done.有何不可？Why not? 3.(Hé) 姓 a surname〈古 arch.〉 同 same as 荷 hè相关词组几何 | 奈何 | 任何 | 如何 | 若何 | 为何 | 无何 | 缘何 | 几何体 | 几何学 | 没奈何 | 无奈何 | 几何图形 | 谈何容易 | 曾几何时 | 解析几何 | 立体几何 | 平面几何 | 无可奈何 | 无论如何 | 成也萧何，败也萧何 | 欲加之罪，何患无辞何必 | 何不 | 何曾 | 何尝 | 何啻 | 何等 | 何妨 | 何故 | 何苦 | 何况 | 何其 | 何如 | 何谓 | 何须 | 何许 | 何以 | 何在 | 何止 | 何首乌 | 何去何从 | 何乐而不为

何不
何不[hé bù] 用反问的语气表示应该或可以，意思跟‘为什么不’相同 [used in rhetorical questions to express‘should’or‘could’] why not：既然有事，何不早说？If you had something on your mind, why didn't you say earlier?他也进城，你何不搭他的车一同去呢？He's also going into town, why don't you get a lift in his car?

何乐而不为
何乐而不为[hé lè ér bù wéi] 用反问的语气表示很可以做或很愿意做 [used in rhetorical questions] why not do it; one would be only too glad to do it：储蓄对国家对自己都有好处，何乐而不为？Putting your savings in a bank is beneficial to both the state and the individual - why not do it?

何以
何以[hé yǐ]1.〈书 fml.〉用什么 with what：何以教我？What do you teach me with?何以为生？What do you live on? 2.为什么 why：既经说定，何以变卦？It has already been settled. What makes you change your mind?

何其
何其[hé qí]多么（多带有不以为然的口气）[used in exclamations to express disapproval] what; how：何其糊涂。What a fool！何其相似。What a striking likeness!

何况
何况[hé kuàng]〈连词 conj.〉用反问的语气表示更进一层的意思 [used in rhetorical questions] much less; let alone：他在生人面前都不习惯讲话，何况要到大庭广众之中呢？He is too shy to speak in front of a stranger, let alone a large audience.

何去何从
何去何从[hé qù hé cóng] 指在重大问题上采取什么态度，决定做不做或怎么做 (when faced with an important question) what course to follow; what attitude to take; what decision to make

何啻
何啻[hé chì]〈书 fml.〉用反问的语气表示不止 [used in rhetorical questions to express‘more than’] for more than：今昔生活对比，何啻天壤之别！There's a world of difference in living standards between the past and the present.

何在
何在[hé zài]〈书 fml.〉在哪里 where：理由何在？What is the reason for it?

何如
何如[hé rú]1.怎么样 how about：你先试验一下，何如？How about you try it out first? 2.怎样的 what kind of：我还不清楚他是何如人。I do not yet know what kind of person he is. 3.用反问的语气表示不如 [used in rhetorical questions] wouldn't it be better：与其靠外地供应，何如就地取材，自己制造。Wouldn't it be better if we make it by using local materials than relying on outside supplies?

何妨
何妨[hé fáng] 用反问的语气表示不妨 [used in rhetorical questions] why not; might as well：何妨试试？Why not have a try? or You might as well have a try.拿出来叫人们见识一下，又何妨呢？Why not take it out and let others have a look?

何尝
