何尝[hé cháng] 用反问的语气表示未曾或并非 [used in rhetorical questions to express‘never’or‘not that’] ever so：我何尝不想去，只是没工夫罢了。Not that I don't want to go, but that I have no time.

何必
何必[hé bì] 用反问的语气表示不必 [used in rhetorical questions] there is no need; why：既然不会下雨，何必带伞！Since it's not going to rain, why bring an umbrella?

何故
何故[hé gù] 为什么；什么原因 why; for what reason：他何故至今未到？Why hasn't he come yet?

何曾
何曾[hé céng] 用反问的语气表示未曾 [used in rhetorical questions to express‘never’] ever：这些年来，他何曾忘记过家乡的一草一木？When has he ever forgotten a single blade of grass or a single tree of his home town all these years?

何止
何止[hé zhǐ] 用反问的语气表示超出某个数目或范围 [used in rhetorical questions] far more than：这个风景区方圆何止十里。This scenic area has a circumference far more than 10 li.厂里的先进人物何止这几个？There are far more advanced workers than these few in this factory.

何等
何等[hé děng]1.什么样的 what kind：你知道他是何等人物？Do you know what kind of person he is? 2.用感叹的语气表示不同寻常；多么 [used in exclamations to express‘extraordinary’] what; how：这是何等巧妙的技术！What consummate skill!他们生活得何等幸福！How happily they are living! or Aren't they leading a happy life?

何苦
何苦[hé kǔ] 何必自寻苦恼，用反问的语气表示不值得 [used in rhetorical questions] why bother; not worth the trouble：你何苦在这些小事上伤脑筋？Why bother about such trifles?冒着这么大的雨赶去看电影，何苦呢？Going to the movies in this heavy rain - is it worth it?亦 also 何苦来 hékǔlái

何许
何许[hé xǔ]〈书 fml.〉何处 where; what kind of; what：何许人（原指什么地方人，后来也指什么样的人）what sort of person (orig. used to ask where the person comes from, later also used to ask what sort of person he or she is)

何谓
何谓[hé wèi]〈书 fml.〉1.什么叫做；什么是 what is meant by：何谓灵感？What is meant by inspiration?何谓幸福？What is meant by happiness? 2.指什么；是什么意思（后面常带‘也’字 oft. followed by 也 yě）what is the meaning of：此何谓也？What does it mean? or What do you mean?

何须
何须[hé xū] 用反问的语气表示不须要 [used in rhetorical questions to express unnecessity] what is the need：详情我都知道了，何须再说！I know all the details. What is the need of repeating?从这里走到车站，何须半个钟头？How does one need half an hour to walk from here to the station?

何首乌
何首乌[hé shǒu wū]多年生草本植物，茎细长，能缠绕物体，叶子互生，秋天开花，白色。根块状，可入药。tuber fleeceflower (Polygonum multiflorum); perennial herb, with thin long stems that climb around other things, alternate leaves, white flowers blooming in autumn, root tuber used as an ingredient for traditional Chinese medicine;亦 also 首乌 shǒuwū

佗
佗[tuó]（ㄊㄨㄛˊ）〈书 fml.〉负荷 carry or bear on the back

佘
佘[Shé]（ㄕㄜˊ） 姓 a surname

余
余1[yú]（ㄩˊ）1.我 I; me 2.(Yú) 姓 a surname余2[yú]（ㄩˊ）（餘）1.剩下 surplus; spare; remaining：余粮 surplus grain余钱 spare money不遗余力 spare no efforts收支相抵，尚余一百元。After paying all the expenses, there is a balance of 100 yuan. 2.大数或度量单位等后面的零头 more than; odd; over：五百余斤 500-odd jin一丈余 more than one zhang 3.指某种事情、情况以外或以后的时间 time beyond or after an event：业余 spare time兴奋之余，高歌一曲 raise one's voice to sing a song in excitement相关词组编余 | 残余 | 词余 | 多余 | 富余 | 工余 | 公余 | 节余 | 结余 | 净余 | 课余 | 空余 | 宽余 | 其余 | 剩余 | 诗余 | 唾余 | 无余 | 业余 | 盈余 | 赢余 | 有余 | 留余地 | 茶余饭后 | 剩余产品 | 剩余价值 | 剩余劳动 | 心余力绌 | 业余教育 | 不遗余力 | 残渣余孽 | 虎口余生 | 目无余子 | 死有余辜 | 心有余悸 | 绰绰有余 | 游刃有余 | 成事不足，败事有余余波 | 余存 | 余党 | 余地 | 余毒 | 余额 | 余风 | 余割 | 余晖 | 余悸 | 余角 | 余烬 | 余力 | 余利 | 余沥 | 余粮 | 余年 | 余孽 | 余切 | 余缺 | 余热 | 余生 | 余剩 | 余数 | 余外 | 余威 | 余味 | 余暇 | 余下 | 余弦 | 余兴 | 余音 | 余裕 | 余韵 | 余震 | 余音绕梁 | 余勇可贾

余下
余下[yú xià] 剩下 remaining：一共一千元，用去六百元，还余下四百元。There was 1,000 yuan in total. After spending 600 yuan, one has 400 yuan left.

余党
余党[yú dǎng] 未消灭尽的党羽 remnants of an overthrown clique; remaining confederates

余兴
余兴[yú xìng]1.未尽的兴致 lingering zest; wish to prolong a pleasant diversion：余兴未尽 have a lingering interest 2.会议或宴会之后附带举行的文娱活动 entertainment after a meeting or a dinner party：会议到此结束，余兴节目现在开始。So much for the meeting. The entertainment now begins.

余切
余切[yú qiē]另见  三角函数 sānjiǎo hánshù

余利
余利[yú lì] 指工商业所得的利润 profit

余剩
余剩[yú shèng] 剩余 surplus：去年收成好，今年有余剩。The harvest last year being good, there is a surplus this year.

余割
余割[yú gē]另见  三角函数 sānjiǎo hánshù

余力
余力[yú lì] 剩余的力量；多余的精力 surplus energy or strength：不遗余力 spare no efforts; spare no pains; do one's utmost没有余力顾及此事 have no more energy to attend to this matter

余勇可贾
余勇可贾[yú yǒng kě gǔ] 还有剩余力量可以使出来 with plenty of mettle left in one; with strength yet to spare

余味
余味[yú wèi] 留下的耐人回想的味道 agreeable aftertaste; pleasant impression：歌声美妙，余味无穷。The beautiful singing left a lasting and pleasant impression.

余地
余地[yú dì] 指言语或行动中留下的可回旋的地步 leeway; margin; room; latitude：不留余地 leave no room; leave no margin有充分考虑的余地 room for full consideration

余外
余外[yú wài]〈方 dial.〉除此之外 besides; apart from this：荒野里只见几个坟头，余外什么也看不到。Nothing but a few graves could be seen in the wilderness.

余威
余威[yú wēi] 剩余的威力 remaining prestige or influence：余威犹存 one's prestige or influence still remaining傍晚，地面仍发散着烈日的余威。The heat of the scorching sun remains on the surface in the evening.

余存
余存[yú cún]（出入相抵后）剩余；结存 balance; remainder：核对销售数量和余存数量 check the amount of sales and stock

余孽
余孽[yú niè] 残余的坏人或恶势力 remaining evil element; surviving supporter of an evil cause：封建余孽 dregs of feudalism铲除余孽 root out the remnant evil elements

余年
余年[yú nián] 晚年 one's remaining years：安度余年 spend one's remaining years in peace

余弦
余弦[yú xián]另见  三角函数 sānjiǎo hánshù

余悸
余悸[yú jì] 事后还感到的恐惧 lingering fear：心有余悸 still have a lingering fear

余数
余数[yú shù]整数除法中，被除数未被除数整除所剩的大于0而小于除数的部分。如27÷6=4…3，即不完全商是4，余数是3。remainder (after division); what is left undivided when one number is divided by another that is not one of its factors, as in 27÷6=4…3, the incomplete quotient being 4 and the remainder 3.

余晖
余晖[yú huī] 傍晚的阳光 sunset glow; evening glow：夕阳的余晖 last rays of the setting sun; afterglow晚霞的余晖 last rays of the setting sun; afterglow亦 also 余辉 yúhuī

余暇
余暇[yú xiá] 工作或学习之外的空闲时间 spare time; leisure time; leisure

余毒
余毒[yú dú] 残留的毒素或祸害 residual poison; vestige of sth. pernicious; pernicious influence：肃清余毒 eliminate the pernicious influence

余沥
余沥[yú lì]〈书 fml.〉剩余的酒 heeltap; leftover liquor；〈比喻 fig.〉分到的一点小利 fringe benefit; small share of profit：分沾余沥 share some fringe benefit

余波
余波[yú bō] 指事件结束以后留下的影响 aftermath; repercussions：纠纷的余波 aftermath of a dispute余波未平。The repercussions are still being felt.

余烬
余烬[yú jìn]1.燃烧后剩下的灰和没烧尽的东西 ashes; embers：纸烟余烬 cigarette ash 2.〈比喻 fig.〉战乱后残存的东西 ruins; wreckage：劫后余烬 ruins of a disaster

余热
余热[yú rè]1.生产过程中剩余的热量 (of a production process) surplus energy：利用余热取暖 use surplus energy for heating purposes 2.〈比喻 fig.〉离休、退休以后的老年人的精力和作用 retired old people's capability for work：老专家要发挥余热，为社会多做贡献。Old experts should do what they can in their old age to make contributions to society.

余生
余生[yú shēng]1.指晚年 remainder of one's life; evening years; one's remaining years：安度余生 spend one's remaining years in peace 2.（大灾难后）侥幸保全的生命 survival (after a disaster)：劫后余生 survive a disaster; survival of a disaster忧患余生 one who has survived a great misfortune虎口余生 survival of a tiger's jaws; have a narrow escape from a misfortune

余粮
余粮[yú liáng] 吃用之外余下的粮食 surplus grain

余缺
余缺[yú quē] 富余和缺欠 surplus and deficiency：互通有无，调剂余缺 each making up the other's deficiency with his own surplus

余裕
余裕[yú yù] 富裕 enough and to spare; ample：余裕的时间 time to spare余裕的精力 ample energy这几年吃穿不但不愁，而且还有余裕。We not only have no worries about food and clothing these years, but have enough and to spare.

余角
余角[yú jiǎo] 平面上两个角的和等于一个直角（90°），这两个角就互为余角 complementary angle; either of two angles whose sum is 90°

余震
余震[yú zhèn]大地震之后紧跟着发生的小地震。较大的余震也能造成破坏。aftershock; minor earthquake immediately following a major one at the same place or nearby. A large aftershock may also cause destruction.

余音
余音[yú yīn] 指歌唱或演奏后好像还留在耳边的声音 lingering sound (of singing or music)：余音缭绕。The music lingered in the air.

余音绕梁
余音绕梁[yú yīn rào liáng]歌唱停止后，余音好像还在绕着屋梁回旋。形容歌声或音乐优美，耐人回味。sound of music lingering around the beams; music lingering in the air long after the performance has ended; singing or music being so beautiful as to leave the listeners a long aftertaste

余韵
余韵[yú yùn] 遗留下来的韵致 remaining grace：饶有余韵 as graceful as before

余额
余额[yú é]1.名额中余下的空额 vacancies yet to be filled 2.账目上剩余的金额 remaining sum; balance; surplus

余风
余风[yú fēng] 遗留下来的风气 lingering remnants of an old custom

佚
佚[yì]（ㄧˋ） 同 same as 逸 yì相关词组辑佚

佛
佛[fó]（ㄈㄛˊ）1.佛陀的简称 abbr. for 佛陀 Fótuó 2.佛教徒称修行圆满的人 one who has attained enlightenment：立地成佛 abruptly change one's ways; become an instant saint 3.佛教 Buddhism：佛寺 Buddhist temple佛家 Buddhist religion; Buddhism佛老 Buddha and Laozi; Buddhism and Taoism 4.佛像 image or statue of Buddha：铜佛 bronze statue of the Buddha大殿上塑着三尊佛。There are three statues of the Buddha in the hall. 5.佛号或佛经 name of the Buddha (Amitabha); Buddhist scripture or sutra; Buddhist sacred literature：念佛 pray to the Buddha诵佛 chant Buddhist scriptures另见  fú佛[fú]（ㄈㄨˊ） 同 same as 拂 fú ③另见  fó相关词组拜佛 | 仿佛 | 活佛 | 礼佛 | 念佛 | 赕佛 | 抱佛脚 | 阿弥陀佛 | 借花献佛 | 放下屠刀，立地成佛佛典 | 佛法 | 佛光 | 佛号 | 佛教 | 佛经 | 佛龛 | 佛老 | 佛戾 | 佛门 | 佛事 | 佛手 | 佛寺 | 佛陀 | 佛像 | 佛学 | 佛牙 | 佛爷 | 佛珠 | 佛祖 | 佛口蛇心 | 佛头着粪

佛事
佛事[fó shì] 指僧尼拜忏的事情 Buddhist ceremony; Buddhist service：做佛事 hold a Buddhist service

佛像
佛像[fó xiàng]1.佛陀的像 image or statue of Buddha 2.泛指佛教供奉的神像 (in a broad sense) sacred images worshipped by Buddhists

佛光
佛光[fó guāng]1.佛教徒指佛带来的光明 glory of the Buddha：佛光普照。The glory of the Buddha shines over the whole world. 2.佛像头上的光辉 Buddha's halo 3.山区的一种自然景象，在与太阳相对方向的云层或雾层上呈现围绕人影的彩色光环，由光线通过云雾区的小水滴经衍射作用而形成 Buddha's halo; anticorona; Brocken bow; Brocken spectre; natural phenomenon frequent in mountainous areas, when a luminous coloured halo around the shadow of an observer is thrown by the sun onto a cloud or fog bank; created by the diffraction of light through water droplets in mist

佛典
佛典[fó diǎn] 佛教的经典 Buddhist scripture or sacred literature

佛口蛇心
佛口蛇心[fó kǒu shé xīn]〈比喻 fig.〉嘴上说得好听，心肠却非常狠毒 duplicitous; deceitful; hypocritical; have the face of the Buddha but the heart of a viper

佛号
佛号[fó hào] 佛的名号，特指信佛的人念的‘阿弥陀佛’名号 name of the Buddha, esp.‘Amitabha’chanted by Buddhists：口诵佛号 chant the name of the Buddha

佛头着粪
佛头着粪[fó tóu zhuó fèn] 佛的塑像上着了鸟雀的粪便 the head of a Buddhist statue smeared with bird droppings；〈比喻 fig.〉好东西上添上不好的东西，把好东西给糟蹋了（含讥讽意 derog.）desecrate; sully; spoil a valuable thing

佛学
佛学[fó xué] 指佛教及其研究的学问 Buddhist learning; Buddhist philosophy

佛寺
佛寺[fó sì] 佛教的庙宇 Buddhist temple

佛戾
佛戾[fú lì]〈书 fml.〉违背；违反 violate; go against; run counter to

佛手
佛手[fó shǒu]1.常绿小乔木，叶子长圆形，花白色。果实鲜黄色，下端有裂纹，形状像半握着的手，有芳香。可入药。fingered citron (Citrus medica var. Sarcodactylis); Buddha's hand; small fragrant, evergreen shrub with oval leaves, white flowers, bright-yellow fruits with lobes that look like a half-open hand, can be used as medicine 2.这种植物的果实 fruit of such plant

佛教
佛教[Fó jiào]世界上主要宗教之一，相传为公元前6-前5世纪古印度的迦毗罗卫国（今尼泊尔境内）王子释迦牟尼所创，广泛流传于亚洲的许多国家。西汉末年传入我国。Buddhism; one of the principal religions of the world that is widespread in Asian countries, allegedly founded by Sakyamuni, prince of the ancient Indian state of Kopilavastu (in present-day Nepal), during the 6th-5th century B.C. Buddhism was first introduced into China towards the end of the Western Han Dynasty.

佛法
佛法[fó fǎ]1.佛教的教义 Buddha's teachings; Buddhist doctrine; dharma 2.佛教徒和迷信的人认为佛所具有的法力 power of Buddha (belief of Buddhists and superstitious people)

佛爷
佛爷[fó ye] 佛教徒对释迦牟尼的尊称 Buddha; honorific title given by Buddhists to Sakyamuni

佛牙
佛牙[fó yá] 佛教徒指释迦牟尼遗体火化后留下的牙齿 Buddha's tooth; tooth sarira of Sakyamuni (left after his cremation)

佛珠
佛珠[fó zhū]（～儿 fózhūr）数珠 beads; rosary

佛祖
佛祖[fó zǔ] 佛教徒指佛和开创宗派的祖师，也专指释迦牟尼 Buddha and founder of a Buddhist sect; (also referring to) Sakyamuni

佛经
佛经[fó jīng] 佛教的经典 Buddhist scripture; Buddhist sutra; Buddhist sacred literature亦 also 释典 shìdiǎn另见  释藏 Shìzàng

佛老
佛老[Fó Lǎo] 佛和老子。也指佛教和道教 Buddha and Laozi; Buddhism and Taoism

佛门
佛门[fó mén] 指佛教 Buddhism：佛门弟子 Buddhist; disciple of the Buddha佛门规矩 Buddhist rules皈(guī)依佛门 convert to Buddhism

佛陀
佛陀[Fó tuó] 佛教徒称释迦牟尼 Buddha (title given by Buddhists to Sakyamuni)；简称 abbr. 佛 fó [梵 Sanskrit: buddha]

佛龛
佛龛[fó kān] 供奉佛像的小阁子，多用木头制成 niche for a statue of Buddha (usu. of wood)

作
作[zuō]（ㄗㄨㄛ）作坊 workshop：石作 stone mason's workshop小器作 workshop for the making of small articles另见  zuò作[zuò]（ㄗㄨㄛˋ）1.起 rise; grow; get up：振作 brace up; cheer up日出而作 begin a day's work at sunrise一鼓作气 press on without a letup; brace one's nerve in one vigorous effort枪声大作。Heavy firing broke out. 2.从事某种活动 engage in certain activity：作孽 do evil; commit a sin自作自受 reap what one sows; suffer the consequences of one's own doing 3.写作 write; compose：著作 write (a book)作曲 compose music作书（写信）write a letter 4.作品 writings; work：佳作 excellent works杰作 masterpiece成功之作 successful work 5.装 pretend; affect：作态 pose; affect; strike an attitude装模作样 act with affected manners; be pretentious; put on a show 6.当作；作为 regard as; take sb. or sth. for：过期作废 cancel after expiration; invalid after the expiry date认贼作父 regard an evildoer as one's father 7.发作 feel; have：作呕 feel sick or nausea; feel like vomiting作怪 make trouble另见  zuō相关词组操作 | 炒作 | 创作 | 大作 | 单作 | 动作 | 发作 | 耕作 | 工作 | 合作 | 画作 | 佳作 | 间作 | 杰作 | 劳作 | 力作 | 连作 | 垄作 | 轮作 | 拟作 | 平作 | 诗作 | 伪作 | 仵作 | 习作 | 细作 | 下作 | 协作 | 写作 | 新作 | 夜作 | 译作 | 原作 | 运作 | 造作 | 振作 | 制作 | 著作 | 做作 | 动作片 | 恶作剧 | 反作用 | 副作用 | 工作餐 | 工作服 | 工作面 | 工作日 | 工作站 | 工作证 | 合作化 | 合作社 | 农作物 | 著作权 | 著作人 | 出世作 | 处女作 | 打夜作 | 代表作 | 小动作 | 小器作 | 操作规程 | 工作母机 | 胡作非为 | 始作俑者 | 天作之合 | 自作聪明 | 自作自受 | 打躬作揖 | 大秋作物 | 大田作物 | 大有作为 | 逢场作戏 | 高空作业 | 高温作业 | 谷类作物 | 光合作用 | 光化作用 | 光解作用 | 过冬作物 | 回嗔作喜 | 技术作物 | 经济作物 | 粮食作物 | 流水作业 | 拿腔作势 | 弄虚作假 | 平行作业 | 认贼作父 | 同化作用 | 推涛作浪 | 晚秋作物 | 为非作歹 | 为虎作伥 | 为人作嫁 | 无所作为 | 惺惺作态 | 兴风作浪 | 兴妖作怪 | 一鼓作气 | 以身作则 | 异化作用 | 油料作物 | 越冬作物 | 装模作样 | 装腔作势 | 自净作用 | 自我作古 | 案头工作 | 暗箱操作 | 规定动作 | 黑箱操作 | 矫揉造作 | 精耕细作 | 社会工作 | 述而不作 | 田野工作 | 无恶不作 | 五行八作 | 野外工作 | 自选动作 | 二一添作五 | 供销合作社 | 农业合作化 | 消费合作社 | 信用合作社 | 拉大旗，作虎皮作案 | 作罢 | 作保 | 作弊 | 作别 | 作成 | 作答 | 作对 | 作恶 | 作伐 | 作法 | 作坊 | 作废 | 作风 | 作梗 | 作古 | 作怪 | 作家 | 作假 | 作价 | 作件 | 作践 | 作客 | 作乐 | 作脸 | 作料 | 作乱 | 作美 | 作难 | 作孽 | 作弄 | 作呕 | 作陪 | 作品 | 作色 | 作势 | 作数 | 作死 | 作速 | 作祟 | 作态 | 作痛 | 作为 | 作伪 | 作文 | 作物 | 作息 | 作兴 | 作秀 | 作业 | 作揖 | 作艺 | 作俑 | 作用 | 作战 | 作者 | 作准 | 作壁上观 | 作法自毙 | 作奸犯科 | 作茧自缚 | 作威作福

作业
作业[zuò yè]1.教师给学生布置的功课；部队给士兵布置的训练性的军事活动；生产单位给工人或工作人员布置的生产活动 homework; assignment given by a teacher to the students; military drill assignment given by a commander to soldiers; production assignment given by a production unit to workers or staff：课外作业 extracurricular work; homework野外作业 field assignment作业计划 work plan 2.从事这种军事活动或生产活动 military operation; production; task; work：高空作业 work high above the ground队伍开到野地上去作业。The troops moved to the fields for operation.

作为
作为1[zuò wéi]1.所作所为；行为 conduct; deed; action：评论一个人，不但要根据他的谈吐，而且更需要根据他的作为。Appraisal of a person should be based not only on what he says, but even more so on what he does. 2.做出成绩 accomplishment; achievement：有所作为 amount to sth.; do sth. useful 3.可以做的事 scope for one's abilities or talents：大有作为 plenty of scope for one's talents; be able to accomplish great things作为2[zuò wéi]1.当做 regard as; look on as; take as：作为罢论 regard sth. as abandoned; let a matter drop作为无效 be declared null and void我把游泳作为锻炼身体的方法。I take swimming as a physical exercise. 2.就人的某种身份或事物的某种性质来说 in the capacity or with the characteristic of; as：作为一个学生，首先得把学习搞好。As a student, you must first do well in your studies.作为一部词典，必须有明确的编写宗旨。To compile a dictionary, there must be a definite purpose.

作乐
作乐[zuò lè] 取乐 make merry; enjoy oneself; have a good time：寻欢作乐 seek pleasure and make merry苦中作乐 seek joy amidst hardships另见  zuòyuè作乐[zuò yuè]1.制定乐律 write music; compose music 2.奏乐 play music另见  zuòlè

作乱
作乱[zuò luàn] 发动叛乱 stage an armed rebellion：犯上作乱 rebel against the emperor; go against one's superiors and make trouble

作件
作件[zuò jiàn] 作为工作对象的零件，多指在机械加工过程中的零件 workpiece; work; mostly pieces processed in metal working亦 also 工件 gōngjiàn 或 or 制件 zhìjiàn

作价
作价[zuò jià] 在出让物品、赔偿物品损失或以物品偿还债务时估定物品的价格；规定价格 evaluate; fix a price for sth. to let, compensation for damages or repayment of a debt in kind：合理作价 reasonable pricing作价赔偿 reasonable compensation

作伐
作伐[zuò fá]〈书 fml.〉做媒 act as matchmaker

作伪
作伪[zuò wěi]制造假的，冒充真的（多指文物、著作等 oft. of cultural relics, works of art, etc.）fake; counterfeit; forge; make an imitation; cheat

作俑
作俑[zuò yǒng]〈书 fml.〉制造殉葬用的偶像 make idols to be buried with the dead;〈比喻 fig.〉倡导做不好的事 initiate an immoral and bad practice; create a bad precedent另见  始作俑者 shǐ zuò yǒng zhě

作保
作保[zuò bǎo] 当保证人 be sb.'s guarantor; vouch for：请人作保 ask a person to be one's guarantor

作假
作假[zuò jiǎ]1.制造假的，冒充真的；真的里头搀假的；好的里头搀坏的 counterfeit; falsify; make false for true; adulterate：弄虚作假 adulterate; practise fraud 2.耍花招；装糊涂 cheat; play tricks：作假骗人 play tricks to cheat people 3.故作客套，不爽直 behave affectedly：没吃饱就说没吃饱，别作假！If you've not had enough, just say it. Don't pretend to be otherwise.

作兴
作兴[zuò xīng]〈方 dial.〉1.情理上许可（多用于否定 usu. used in the negative）there's reason to; it's justifiable (or permissible) to：开口骂人，不作兴！It's impermissible to swear at people. 2.可能；也许 perhaps; possibly; maybe：看这天气，作兴要下雨。It looks it's going to rain. 3.流行；盛行 prevail; prevalent; be in vogue; be common practice：农村过春节，还作兴贴春联。It's still a common practice to have New Year couplets pasted up on doors in the countryside during the Spring Festival.

作准
作准[zuò zhǔn]1. 同 same as 作数 zuò∥shù 2.准许；承认 approve; recognize; acknowledge

作别
作别[zuò bié]〈书 fml.〉分别；分手 bid farewell; take one's leave：拱手作别 bid farewell by cupping one hand in another before one's chest

作势
作势[zuò shì] 做出某种姿态 assume a posture; attitudinize：装腔作势 be pretentious; strike a posture

作古
作古[zuò gǔ]〈书 fml.〉〈婉辞 euph.〉去世 die; pass away

作呕
作呕[zuò ǒu]1.恶心，想呕吐 feel sick; feel like vomiting; be overcome by nausea 2.〈比喻 fig.〉对可憎的人或事非常讨厌 be utterly disgusted by sb. or sth.：令人作呕 be nauseating

作品
作品[zuò pǐn] 指文学艺术方面的成品 works (of literature and art)：绘画作品 paintings诗词作品 poems

作坊
作坊[zuō fang] 手工业工场 workshop：造纸作坊 paper mill

作壁上观
作壁上观[zuò bì shàng guān] 人家交战，自己站在营垒上观看 watch a fight from the ramparts;〈比喻 fig.〉坐观成败，不给予帮助 sit by and watch; be an onlooker or bystander

作奸犯科
作奸犯科[zuò jiān fàn kē] 为非作歹，触犯法令 violate the law and commit crimes; run afoul of law（奸 jian：坏事 evil；科 ke：法令 law）

作威作福
作威作福[zuò wēi zuò fú] 原指统治者擅行赏罚，独揽威权，后来指妄自尊大，滥用权势 abuse one's power tyrannically; ride roughshod over the masses; act like a tyrant; lord it over people

作孽
作孽[zuò niè] 造孽 do evil; commit a sin

作客
作客[zuò kè]〈书 fml.〉寄居在别处 sojourn：作客他乡 sojourn in an alien land

作家
作家[zuò jiā] 从事文学创作有成就的人 writer; author

作对
作对[zuò duì]1.做对头；跟人为难 make things difficult for sb.; set oneself against; oppose：他成心跟我作对。He deliberately set himself against me. 2.成为配偶 pair off in marriage; make a pair：成双作对 in pairs

作废
作废[zuò fèi] 因失效而废弃 become invalid：过期作废 become invalid after the expiry date; cancel after expiry作废的票不能再用。An invalid ticket can't be used again.

作弄
作弄[zuò nòng]（口语中多读 oft. pronounced ‘zuōnòng’ in spoken Chinese）捉弄 tease; make a fool of; play a trick on; poke fun at

作弊
作弊[zuò bì] 用欺骗的方式做违法乱纪或不合规定的事情 practise fraud; cheat; indulge in corrupt practices; do sth. unlawful or against rules by fraud：通同作弊 act fraudulently in collaboration考试作弊 cheat in an examination

作态
作态[zuò tài] 故意做出某种态度或表情 pose; affect; strike an attitude：惺惺作态 be affected忸怩作态 affections; behave coyly

作怪
作怪[zuò guài] 作祟 do mischief; make trouble：兴妖作怪 make trouble; conjure up demons to make trouble

作息
作息[zuò xī] 工作和休息 work and rest：按时作息 work and rest according to schedule作息制度 time schedule; timetable

作恶
作恶[zuò è] 做坏事 do evil：作恶多端 do all kinds of evil; be steeped in iniquity乘机作恶 take a chance to do evil

作成
作成[zuò chéng] 成全 help (sb. to achieve his or her aim)：作成他俩的亲事。(She) helped bringing the two of them together in marriage.

作战
作战[zuò zhàn] 打仗 fight; conduct operations; engage in a battle：作战英勇 fight heroically

作揖
作揖[zuò yī]（口语中多读 oft. pronounced ‘zuō∥yī’ in spoken Chinese）两手抱拳高拱，身子略弯，向人敬礼 make a slight bow with hands folded in front of the chest：打躬作揖 make a slight bow with hands folded in front给老人家作了个揖 make a bow to an old man

作数
作数[zuò shù] 算数儿 count; be valid：你说话作数不作数？Does what you said count?

作文
作文[zuò wén]写文章（多指学生练习写作 of students）write compositions：作文比赛 writing contest作文[zuò wén] 学生作为练习所写的文章 composition; article a student writes for practice：写作文 write a composition他的作文被评为优秀。His composition was rated excellent.

作料
作料[zuò liao]（口语中多读 oft. Pronounced ‘zuó·liao’in spoken Chinese）（作料儿 zuò·liaor）烹调时用来增加滋味的油、盐、酱、醋和葱蒜、生姜、花椒、大料等 condiments; seasonings; dressings such as oil, salt, sauce, vinegar, onion, ginger, Chinese prickly ash, aniseed, etc.

作案
作案[zuò àn] 进行犯罪活动 commit a crime or an offence; take part in a criminal activity

作梗
作梗[zuò gěng] 从中阻挠，使事情不能顺利进行 obstruct; hinder; create difficulties：从中作梗 make things difficult for sb.; create trouble

作死
作死[zuò sǐ]（口语中多读 oft. pronounced ‘zuōsǐ’ in spoken Chinese）自寻死路 seek death; take the road to ruin; look for trouble：酒后开快车，这不是作死吗！Are you seeking death that you drive so fast after drinking?

作法
作法[zuò fǎ]〈旧时 old〉指道士施行法术 (of a Taoist) exercise magic作法[zuò fǎ]1.作文的方法 technique of writing：文章作法 technique of writing; art of composition 2.做法 way of doing things; course of action; practice

作法自毙
作法自毙[zuò fǎ zì bì] 自己立法反而使自己受害 make a law to one's own jeopardy; be hoist with one's own petard; get caught in one's own trap

作物
作物[zuò wù] 农作物的简称 abbr. for 农作物 nóngzuòwù：大田作物 field crops经济作物 cash crops

作用
作用[zuò yòng]1.对事物产生影响 act on; affect：外界的事物作用于我们的感觉器官，在我们的头脑中形成形象。External things act on our sense organs and give rise to impressions in our brains. 2.对事物产生某种影响的活动 action; function：同化作用 assimilation消化作用 digestion光合作用 photosynthesis 3.对事物产生的影响；效果；效用 impact; result; effect：副作用 side effect起作用 be effective积极作用 play a positive role 4.用意 purpose; intention; motive：他刚才说的那些话是有作用的。He had an axe to grind in what he said just now.

作痛
作痛[zuò tòng] 产生疼痛的感觉 have a pain; ache：周身的筋骨隐隐作痛 feel a dull pain all over

作祟
作祟[zuò suì] 迷信的人指鬼神跟人为难 (of ghosts, spirits, etc.) haunt;〈比喻 fig.〉坏人或坏的思想意识捣乱，妨碍事情顺利进行 make mischief; cause trouble; exercise evil influence：防止有人从中作祟 prevent sb. from making trouble

作秀
作秀[zuò xiù]〈方 dial.〉1.表演；演出 perform; show：歌星们依次上台作秀。The singing stars went onstage one after another to make a show. 2.指为了销售、竞选等而进行展览、宣传等活动 hold exhibition and promotion activities for sales, election, etc.：想方设法作秀促销 try every way to promote sales [秀 xiu: show]

作答
作答[zuò dá] 做出回答 answer; reply：听到问话，他没有马上作答。Hearing the questioning, he didn't answer right away.

作罢
作罢[zuò bà] 作为罢论；不进行 drop; relinquish; give up：既然双方都不同意，这件事就只好作罢了。Since neither side agrees, the matter has to be dropped.

作美
作美[zuò měi]（天气等）成全人的好事（多用于否定 usu. used in the negative）(of weather, etc.) help; cooperate; make things easy for：我们去郊游的那天，天公不作美，下了一阵雨，玩得不痛快。The weather didn't cooperate the day we went for an outing. It showered and damped our spirits.

作者
作者[zuò zhě] 文章或著作的写作者；艺术作品的创作者 writer; author; artist

作脸
作脸[zuò liǎn]〈方 dial.〉争光；争气 win honour (or glory) for; try to make a good showing

作色
作色[zuò sè] 脸上现出怒色 show signs of anger; get worked up：愤然作色 flush with indignation

作艺
作艺[zuò yì]〈旧时 old〉指艺人演出 (of artists) perform; put on a show：她从十一岁起就登台作艺。She started her stage life at the age of 11.

作茧自缚
作茧自缚[zuò jiǎn zì fù] 蚕吐丝作茧，把自己包在里面 spin a cocoon around oneself; get enmeshed in a web of one's own spinning;〈比喻 fig.〉做了某事，结果反而使自己受困 do sth. to make it difficult for oneself

作践
作践[zuò jian]（口语中多读 oft. Pronounced ‘zuó·jian’ in spoken Chinese）糟蹋 spoil; waste; violate; run sb. Down：作践粮食 waste good grains; spoil food grains别作践人。Don't run others down.

作速
作速[zuò sù] 赶快；赶紧 lose no time; hasten：作速处理 deal with sth. as soon as possible; settle sth. promptly作速前往 lose no time in going to

作陪
作陪[zuò péi] 当陪客 help entertain a guest of honour; be invited along with the guest of honour

作难
作难[zuò nán] 为难 feel embarrassed; feel awkward; find oneself in a predicament; make things difficult for sb.：从中作难 put a spoke in sb.'s wheel作难[zuò nàn]〈书 fml.〉发动叛乱；起事 start a revolt; rise in revolt

作风
作风[zuò fēng]1.（思想上、工作上和生活上）表现出来的态度、行为 style; style of work; way; attitude; behaviour; conduct (in ideology, work and life)：反对官僚作风 oppose bureaucratic style of work作风正派 be honest and upright in one's conduct; have moral integrity 2.风格 style：他的文章作风朴实无华。His articles are written in a simple and unadorned style.

佝
佝[gōu]（ㄍㄡ）另见  见下 below相关词组佝偻 | 佝偻病

佝偻
佝偻[gōu lóu] 脊背向前弯曲 hunchback; bending forward of the backbone

佝偻病
佝偻病[gōu lóu bìng] 病，患者多为婴幼儿，由缺乏维生素D，肠道吸收钙、磷的能力降低等引起。症状是头大，鸡胸，驼背，两腿弯曲，腹部膨大，发育迟缓。 rickets; rachitis; disease of the skeletal system, chiefly of children, resulting from absence of the normal effect of vitamin D in depositing calcium salts in the bone, and characterized by a softening and, oft., bending of the bones. The symptoms are big head, chicken chest, hunchback, bending of legs, expanded abdomen and slow development. It is also known as osteomalacia (soft-bone disease).亦 also 软骨病 ruǎngǔbìng

佞
佞[nìng]（ㄋㄧㄥˋ）1.惯于用花言巧语谄媚人 given to flattery; smarmy; unctuous：谄佞 flatter; fawn on; adulate; curry favour with奸佞 beguiling佞人 toady; sycophant佞臣 a sycophantic official or courtier 2.〈书 fml.〉有才智 talented; intelligent; wise：不佞（谦称自己 hum. referring to oneself） unintelligent相关词组不佞 | 谗佞 | 奸佞佞笑 | 佞幸

佞幸
佞幸[nìng xìng]〈书 fml.〉1.以谄媚而得到宠幸 win favour with flattery 2.以谄媚得到君主宠幸的人 toady; sycophant; people who win the favour of a king or an emperor with flattery：任用佞幸 assign sycophants to office

佞笑
佞笑[nìng xiào] 奸笑；谄笑 sinister smile; ingratiating smile; sycophantic smile

佟
佟[Tóng]（ㄊㄨㄥˊ） 姓 a surname

你
你[nǐ]（ㄋㄧˇ）〈代词 pron.〉1.称对方（一个人 singular） you;注意 NOTE：有时也用来指称‘你们’ also used plurally sometimes, 如 such as：你校 your school你局 your bureau你军 your army 2.泛指任何人 everyone; anyone（有时实际上指我 sometimes referring to the speaker himself）：他的才学叫你不得不佩服。You cannot but admire him for his talent and learning.这孩子要我给他买手风琴，一天三番五次地老跟你在这个问题上兜圈子。The child wants me to buy him an accordion, and he keeps pestering me about it on a daily basis.注意 NOTE：‘你’跟‘我’或‘他’配合，表示‘这个…’和‘那个…’的意思。 When used correlatively with 我 wǒ or 他 tā, the pair thus formed means ‘each other’, ‘one another’ or ‘one after another’.：三个人你看看我，我看看你，谁也没说话。The three of them kept looking at each other without saying a word.你一条，他一条，一共提出了五六十条建议。With everybody making his or her contributions, they put together a total of 50 or 60 proposals.相关词组迷你你们 | 你死我活

你们
你们[nǐ men]〈代词 pron.〉称不止一个人的对方或包括对方在内的若干人 [2nd person plural] you：你们歇一会儿，让我们接着干。Why don't you take a break and let us keep on with the job?你们几个谁年龄大？Who of you is the oldest?

你死我活
你死我活[nǐ sǐ wǒ huó] 形容斗争非常激烈 (of a fight) life-and-death; fierce

佣
佣[yōng]（ㄩㄥ）（傭）1.雇用 hire：雇佣 hire佣工 hired labourer 2.仆人 servant：女佣 maidservant; woman servant另见  yòng佣[yòng]（ㄩㄥˋ） 同 same as 佣金 yòngjīn另见  yōng相关词组帮佣 | 雇佣 | 回佣 | 雇佣观点 | 雇佣劳动 | 雇佣兵役制佣工 | 佣金 | 佣钱

佣工
佣工[yōng gōng] 受雇为人做工的人 hired labourer; servant

佣金
佣金[yòng jīn] 买卖时付给中间人的报酬 commission; brokerage; middleman's fee

佣钱
佣钱[yòng qian] 同 same as 佣金 yòngjīn

佤
佤[Wǎ]（ㄨㄚˇ）指佤族 Va ethnic minority group相关词组佤族

佤族
佤族[Wǎ zú] 我国少数民族之一，分布在云南 Vas; Va people, an ethnic group inhabiting Yunnan Province

佥
佥1[qiān]（ㄑㄧㄢ）（僉）〈书 fml.〉全；都 unanimous; together：佥同（一致赞成）consensus佥2[qiān]（ㄑㄧㄢ）（僉） 同 same as 签 qiān

佧
佧[kǎ]（ㄎㄚˇ）[佧佤族] (Kǎwǎzú) 佤族的旧称 old name for 佤族 Wǎzú

佩
佩[pèi]（ㄆㄟˋ）（珮）1.佩带 wear; sport：佩刀 wear a sword at the waist腰佩盒子枪 carry a Mauser pistol at the waist 2.〈古时 arch.〉系在衣带上的装饰品 pendant hanging on one's coat belt：玉佩 jade pendant 3.佩服 admire：钦佩 admire这种精神可敬可佩。This spirit is highly adorable.相关词组感佩 | 敬佩 | 钦佩 | 纫佩 | 玉佩 | 赞佩 | 欧佩克佩带 | 佩戴 | 佩服 | 佩兰

佩兰
佩兰[pèi lán] 多年生草本植物，茎直立，叶子披针形，边缘有锯齿，花紫红色。全株有香气，可制芳香油，又可入药。 fragrant thoroughwort (Eupatorium fortunei); perennial herb having upright stems, lanceolate leaves with sawtooth edges, and purplish red flowers, the whole plant being fragrant and used as medical ingredient or for the extraction of perfume; 亦 also 兰草 láncǎo

佩带
佩带[pèi dài]1.（把手枪、刀、剑等）插在或挂在腰部 wear (a pistol, sword, sabre, etc.) at the waist：佩带武器 carry a weapon 2. 同 same as 佩戴 pèidài

佩戴
佩戴[pèi dài]（把徽章、符号等）挂在胸前、臂上、肩上等部位 wear (a badge, insignia, etc.) on the chest, arm, or shoulder：学生出入校门必须佩戴校徽。Students should wear school badges when they enter or leave the school.亦 also 佩带 pèidài

佩服
佩服[pèi fú] 感到可敬可爱；钦佩 admire; think highly of; revere：这姑娘真能干，我不禁暗暗地佩服她。The girl is a crackajack, and I cannot help secretly admiring her.

佫
佫[Hè]（ㄏㄜˋ） 姓 a surname

佬
佬[lǎo]（ㄌㄠˇ）成年的男子（含轻视意 derog.）man; guy; fellow：阔佬 moneybags; rich man相关词组赤佬 | 阔佬 | 乡巴佬儿

佯
佯[yáng]（ㄧㄤˊ）假装 pretend; feign; sham：佯死 feign death; play dead佯攻 feign or simulate an attack; make a feint相关词组打佯儿佯攻 | 佯狂 | 佯言 | 佯装

佯攻
佯攻[yáng gōng] 虚张声势地进攻 feign or simulate an attack; make a feint

佯狂
佯狂[yáng kuáng]〈书 fml.〉假装疯癫 feign madness; pretend to be insane亦 also 阳狂 yángkuáng

佯装
佯装[yáng zhuāng] 假装 pretend; feign：佯装惊诧 pretend to be surprised

佯言
佯言[yáng yán]〈书 fml.〉诈言；说假话 allege falsely; tell lies; lie; pretend

佰
佰[bǎi]（ㄅㄞˇ）‘百’的大写 used for the numeral 百 bǎi为了避免错误和更换而在支票等上面注明数字 on cheques, etc. to avoid mistakes or alterations

佳
佳[jiā]（ㄐㄧㄚ）美；好 good; fine; beautiful：佳句 good sentence佳音 good news成绩甚佳 get excellent marks; achieve very good results身体欠佳 not feel well相关词组上佳佳宾 | 佳话 | 佳绩 | 佳节 | 佳境 | 佳丽 | 佳酿 | 佳偶 | 佳期 | 佳人 | 佳肴 | 佳音 | 佳作

佳丽
佳丽[jiā lì]1.（容貌、风景等）美丽；美好 (of looks, scenery, etc.) beautiful 2.〈书 fml.〉美貌的女子 beautiful woman in love

佳人
佳人[jiā rén]〈书 fml.〉美人 beautiful woman; beauty：才子佳人 marriage between a brilliant man and a beautiful woman; ideal couple; gifted scholars and beautiful ladies绝代佳人 beauty of beauties; peerless beauty

佳作
佳作[jiā zuò] 优秀的作品 good piece of writing; excellent work：影视佳作 good film and TV production

佳偶
佳偶[jiā ǒu]〈书 fml.〉感情融洽、生活美满的夫妻；美好的配偶 happily married couple

佳境
佳境[jiā jìng]1.风景优美的地方 enjoyable or pleasant scenic sites：西山佳境 beautiful scenic sites of the Western Hills 2.美好的境界；美好的意境 good state of mind：渐入佳境 have a better state of mind; become more and more delightful

佳宾
佳宾[jiā bīn] 同 same as 嘉宾 jiābīn

佳期
佳期[jiā qī]1.结婚的日期 wedding (or nuptial) day 2.相爱着的男女幽会的日期、时间 date of a rendezvous between a man and a woman in love

佳绩
佳绩[jiā jì] 优秀的成绩；优良的业绩 outstanding achievement：再创佳绩 make another outstanding achievement

佳肴
佳肴[jiā yáo] 精美的菜肴 delicacies：佳肴美酒 delicious food and excellent wine

佳节
佳节[jiā jié] 欢乐愉快的节日 happy festive time; festival：中秋佳节 joyous Mid-Autumn Festival每逢佳节倍思亲。More than ever we think of the parents or children (also close friends) far away on a happy festival.

佳话
佳话[jiā huà] 流传一时，当做谈话资料的好事或趣事 talk of the town; deed praised far and wide; story on everybody's lips：传为佳话 become the talk of the town千秋佳话 story passed down throughout the ages

佳酿
佳酿[jiā niàng] 美酒 good wine; excellent wine：名酒佳酿 good wine with a famous brand

佳音
佳音[jiā yīn]〈书 fml.〉好消息 good news; welcome news：静候佳音 wait for the news of your success

佴
佴[èr]（ㄦˋ）〈书 fml.〉停留；置 stay for a time; sojourn; place; set另见  Nài佴[Nài]（ㄋㄞˋ） 姓 a surname另见  èr

佶
佶[jí]（ㄐㄧˊ）〈书 fml.〉健壮 robust and sturdy相关词组佶屈聱牙

佶屈聱牙
佶屈聱牙[jí qū áo yá]（文章）读起来不顺口 (of a piece of writing) difficult to read or comprehend（佶屈 jiqu：曲折 complicated；聱牙 aoya：拗口 difficult to read）; 亦 also 诘屈聱牙 jíqū áoyá

佹
佹[guǐ]（ㄍㄨㄟˇ）〈书 fml.〉1.乖戾 perverse; unreasonable; freak 2.奇异 queer; odd; singular; whimsical; fantastic 3.偶然 accidental; fortuitous：佹得佹失 accidentally gained, accidentally lost

佺
佺[quán]（ㄑㄩㄢˊ）偓佺 (Wòquán)〈古代 arch.〉传说中的仙人 mythical fairy

佻
佻[tiāo]（ㄊㄧㄠ）轻佻 frivolous：佻薄 frivolous;skittish; giddy相关词组轻佻 | 儇佻佻 | 佻薄 | 佻巧

佻巧
佻巧[tiāo qiǎo]〈书 fml.〉1.轻佻巧诈 frivolous and crafty 2.（文辞）细巧而不严肃 (writing) full of crafty words and frivolous expressions; flowery and flippant

佻薄
佻薄[tiāo bó]〈书 fml.〉轻佻 frivolous

佻
佻[tiāo tà]〈书 fml.〉轻薄 frivolous; skittish; giddy; given to philandering：心性佻 be frivolous by nature

佼
佼[jiǎo]（ㄐㄧㄠˇ）〈书 fml.〉美好 handsome; beautiful相关词组庸中佼佼佼佼

佼佼
佼佼[jiǎo jiǎo]〈书 fml.〉胜过一般水平的 above average; outstanding：庸中佼佼 outstanding among the mediocre

佽
佽[cì]（ㄘˋ）〈书 fml.〉帮助 help; aid：佽助 help

佾
佾[yì]（ㄧˋ）〈古代 arch.〉乐舞的行列 procession of singers and dancers in a performance

使
使1[shǐ]（ㄕˇ）1.派遣；支使 send; have (sb. do sth.)：使唤 order about or around使人去打听消息 send sb. to make enquiries 2.使用 use; employ; apply; exert：使拖拉机耕地 use a tractor to plough the fields这支笔很好使。This pen writes nicely.使上点肥料 use a little fertilizer 3.让；叫；致使 make; cause; enable; help：办事使群众满意 work to satisfy the masses加强质量管理，使产品合格率不断上升 tighten up quality control to ensure steady improvement in the acceptance rate of products 4.〈书 fml.〉假如 if; supposing使2[shǐ]（ㄕˇ）奉使命办事的人 envoy; emissary; messenger：使节 diplomatic envoy; envoy大使 ambassador公使 minister特使 special envoy学使（科举时代派到各省去主持考试的官员） study emissary; official sent to the provinces as the chief examiner during the period of the imperial civil service examination相关词组差使 | 出使 | 促使 | 大使 | 奉使 | 公使 | 行使 | 即使 | 假使 | 密使 | 迫使 | 强使 | 驱使 | 设使 | 嗾使 | 唆使 | 倘使 | 特使 | 天使 | 向使 | 信使 | 役使 | 支使 | 指使 | 致使 | 主使 | 专使 | 纵使 | 祈使句 | 鬼使神差 | 神使鬼差 | 借风使船 | 看风使舵 | 如臂使指 | 白衣天使 | 神差鬼使 | 颐指气使使得 | 使馆 | 使坏 | 使唤 | 使假 | 使节 | 使劲 | 使命 | 使然 | 使性 | 使役 | 使用 | 使者 | 使绊儿 | 使不得 | 使眼色 | 使用价值

使不得
使不得[shǐ bu de]1.不能使用 useless; cannot be used：这支笔坏了，使不得。This pen is broken - it can't be used.情况改变了，老办法使不得。Since circumstances have changed, the old approach no longer works. 2.不行；不可以 be undesirable or impermissible; must not be done：病刚好，走远路可使不得。You've just recovered from a disease, and mustn't walk too far.

使假
使假[shǐ jiǎ] 以次充好；搀假 pass off inferior goods as good ones; practise fraudulence：搀杂使假 mix up products of different qualities and engage in fraud

使劲
使劲[shǐ jìn]（～儿shǐ∥jìnr）用力 exert oneself; exert all one's strength; make efforts：使劲划船 exert oneself to row a boat我们俩使足了劲儿才把这块石头搬开。Only by straining every muscle did we move the stone out of the way.

使命
使命[shǐ mìng] 派人办事的命令，多比喻重大的责任 mission; order that sends sb. to do sth.; (oft. fig.) important duty：历史使命 historical mission神圣使命 sacred mission

使唤
使唤[shǐ huan]1.叫人替自己做事 order about or around; have sb. do sth.：孩子大了，使唤不动了。The child has grown up, and refuses to be ordered about. 2.使用（工具、牲口等 of tools, draught animals, etc.）use; handle; manage：新式农具使唤起来很得劲儿。The new types of farm implements are fit for use.这匹马不听生人使唤。This horse won't obey a stranger.

使坏
使坏[shǐ huài] 出坏主意；耍狡猾手段 be up to mischief; play a dirty trick：暗中使坏 play a dirty trick on the sly

使役
使役[shǐ yì] 使用（牲畜等） work (an animal); use (livestock)：使役耕牛要得当。Farm cattle must be used properly.

使得
使得1[shǐ de]1.可以使用 usable; can be used; will work：这支笔使得使不得？Does this pen work all right? 2.能行；可以 workable; feasible; will do：这个主意倒使得。This is quite a good idea.你不去如何使得？I don't think it will do if you don't go.使得2[shǐ de]（意图、计划、事物）引起一定的结果 make; cause; render; (of an intention, plan, matter) bring about (a result)：科学种田使得粮食产量有了大幅度提高。Scientific farming has resulted in a great increase in grain output.这个想法使得他忘记了一切困难。This thought made him forget all the difficulties.

使性
使性[shǐ xìng] 由着脾气；任性 lose one's temper; fly off the handle; throw a tantrum：任情使性 throw a tantrum wilfully你可不能使性胡来。You should not fly off the handle and behave recklessly.亦 also 使性子 shǐxìng·zi

使然
使然[shǐ rán]（由于某种原因）致使这样 make it so (due to some reason); it's because：他之所以离去，实为当时处境使然。His departure was really due to the situation at that time.

使用
使用[shǐ yòng] 使人员、器物、资金等为某种目的服务 use; employ; apply; make use of; resort to; (of personnel, implements, capital, etc.) serve some purpose：使用干部 use cadres合理使用资金 make rational use of the capital

使用价值
使用价值[shǐ yòng jià zhí] 物品所具有的能够满足人们某种需要的属性，如粮食能充饥，衣服能御寒等 use value; property of an article that satisfies some need of people, e.g. grain can appease hunger, and clothes can keep out the cold

使眼色
使眼色[shǐ yǎn sè] 用眼睛向别人暗示自己的意思 wink; give hints to sb. with one's eyes

使绊儿
使绊儿[shǐ bàn r]1.摔跤时用腿脚勾住对方的腿脚使跌倒 (in wrestling) trip the opponent with a leg trick 2.〈比喻 fig.〉用不正当手段暗害别人 injure others by devious (oft. covert) means; put a spoke in sb.'s wheel; try to trip sb. up：嘴上说话比蜜甜，暗中使绊儿算计人 talk with honey on one's lips while scheming against sb. in secret║亦 also 使绊子 shǐ∥bàn·zi

使者
使者[shǐ zhě] 奉使命办事的人（现多指外交人员 usu. referring to diplomats） emissary; envoy; messenger; person who handles affairs under orders

使节
使节[shǐ jié] 由一个国家派驻在另一个国家的外交代表，或由一个国家派遣到另一个国家去办理事务的代表 diplomatic envoy; envoy; diplomatic representative accredited by one country to another, or a representative sent by one country to another to handle affairs

使馆
使馆[shǐ guǎn] 外交使节在所驻国家的办公机关。外交使节是大使的叫大使馆，是公使的叫公使馆。 diplomatic mission; embassy; administrative office of a diplomatic envoy in a foreign country, such as an embassy, whose diplomatic envoy is an ambassador, and a legation, whose diplomatic envoy is a minister

侁
侁[shēn]（ㄕㄣ）[侁侁]〈书 fml.〉形容众多 myriad; a great number of; multitude

侂
侂[tuō]（ㄊㄨㄛ）（、仛）〈书 fml.〉委托；寄托 ask; entrust

侃
侃1[kǎn]（ㄎㄢˇ）〈书 fml.〉1.刚直 upright and outspoken 2.和乐的样子 look amiable侃2[kǎn]（ㄎㄢˇ）〈方 dial.〉闲谈；闲扯 chat idly：两人侃到深夜。The two of them chatted deep into the night.相关词组调侃 | 调侃儿侃儿 | 侃侃 | 侃大山

侃侃
侃侃[kǎn kǎn]〈书 fml.〉形容说话理直气壮，从容不迫 (speak) with assurance and composure：侃侃而谈 speak with great ease and confidence

侃儿
侃儿[kǎn r]〈方 dial.〉隐语；暗语 code word; enigmatic language：调(diào)侃儿 exchange in enigmatic language; speak code words这是他们那一行的侃儿。This is the jargon of their trade.亦 also 坎儿 kǎnr

侃大山
侃大山[kǎn dà shān]〈方 dial.〉 漫无边际地聊天；闲聊 shoot the bull亦 also 砍大山 kǎn dàshān

侄
侄[zhí]（ㄓˊ）（姪）（侄儿 zhír）侄子 brother's son; nephew：表侄 son of a male cousin on the woman's side; nephew内侄 son of one's wife's brother; wife's nephew相关词组表侄 | 内侄 | 子侄 | 表侄女 | 内侄女侄妇 | 侄女 | 侄孙 | 侄子 | 侄女婿 | 侄孙女 | 侄媳妇

侄女
侄女[zhí nǚ]（～儿 zhí·nǚr）弟兄或其他同辈男性亲属的女儿。也称朋友的女儿。brother's daughter; niece; also referring to a friend's daughter

侄女婿
侄女婿[zhí nǚ xu] 侄女的丈夫 husband of one's brother's daughter; niece's husband

侄妇
侄妇[zhí fù]〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 侄媳妇 zhíxí·fu

侄媳妇
侄媳妇[zhí xí fu]（～儿 zhíxí·fur）侄子的妻子 wife of one's brother's son; nephew's wife

侄子
侄子[zhí zi]弟兄或其他同辈男性亲属的儿子。也称朋友的儿子。brother's son; nephew; also used to call a friend's son

侄孙
侄孙[zhí sūn] 弟兄的孙子 brother's grandson; grand-nephew

侄孙女
侄孙女[zhí sūn nǚ]（～儿 zhísūn·nǚr）弟兄的孙女 brother's granddaughter; grandniece

侈
侈[chǐ]（ㄔˇ）〈书 fml.〉1.浪费 waste：奢侈 extravagant豪侈 extremely luxurious; extravagant 2.夸大 exaggerate：侈谈 talk glibly about; prate about; prattle about; brag about相关词组奢侈 | 穷奢极侈侈靡 | 侈谈

侈谈
侈谈[chǐ tán]〈书 fml.〉1.夸大而不切实际地谈论 talk glibly about; prate about; prattle about 2.夸大而不切实际的话 empty and unfounded talk

侈靡
侈靡[chǐ mí]〈书 fml.〉奢侈浪费 extravagant and wasteful; excessively extravagant亦 also 侈糜 chǐmí

侉
侉[kuǎ]（ㄎㄨㄚˇ）（咵）〈方 dial.〉1.语音不正，特指口音跟本地语音不同 (speak) with an accent (esp. a non-local accent) 2.粗大；不细巧 big and clumsy; unwieldy：几年不见，长成个侉大个儿。I haven't seen you for several years, and you've grown into a strapping young man.这个箱子太侉了，携带不方便。The suitcase is too big and clumsy to carry.相关词组侉子

侉子
侉子[kuǎ zi]〈方 dial.〉指口音跟本地语音不同的人 person who speaks with an alien accent

例
例[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）1.用来帮助说明或证明某种情况或说法的事物 example; instance：举例 give an example; cite an instance; take an example (or instance)例证 illustration; example; case in point 2.从前有过，后来可以仿效或依据的事情 precedent：援例 cite a precedent先例 precedent史无前例 unprecedented in history 3.调查或统计时指合于某种条件的事例 case; instance：病例 case十五例中，八例有显著进步，四例进步不明显，三例无变化。Of the 15 cases, eight have made marked progress, four have made insignificant progress and three have remained the same. 4.规则；体例 rule; regulation：条例 regulations; rules发凡起例 introduction; preface; write an introduction 5.按条例规定的；照成规进行的 regular; routine：例会 regular meeting例行公事 routine; mere formality相关词组按例 | 案例 | 比例 | 病例 | 常例 | 成例 | 定例 | 凡例 | 范例 | 个例 | 公例 | 惯例 | 禁例 | 旧例 | 举例 | 开例 | 老例 | 判例 | 破例 | 前例 | 润例 | 实例 | 示例 | 事例 | 特例 | 体例 | 条例 | 通例 | 图例 | 违例 | 先例 | 向例 | 循例 | 沿例 | 一例 | 引例 | 援例 | 月例 | 战例 | 照例 | 比例尺 | 反比例 | 正比例 | 比例税制 | 不成比例 | 国际惯例 | 史无前例 | 下不为例例规 | 例会 | 例假 | 例禁 | 例句 | 例如 | 例题 | 例外 | 例言 | 例证 | 例子 | 例行公事

例会
例会[lì huì] 按照规定定期举行的会 regular meeting

例假
例假[lì jià]1.依照规定放的假，如元旦、春节、五一、国庆等 official holiday; legal holiday, as New Year's Day, Spring Festival, May Day, National Day 2.〈婉辞 euph.〉指月经或月经期 menstrual period; period

例句
例句[lì jù] 用来作为例子的句子 illustrative sentence; example sentence

例外
例外[lì wài]1.在一般的规律、规定之外 be an exception：大家都得遵守规定，谁也不能例外。Everyone must obey the rules. There are no exceptions. 2.在一般的规律、规定之外的情况 exception：一般讲，纬度越高，气温越低，但也有例外。Generally speaking, the higher the latitude, the lower the temperature, but there are also exceptions.

例如
例如[lì rú] 举例用语，放在所举的例子前面，表示下面就是例子 for instance; for example (e.g.); such as：田径运动的项目很多，例如跳高、跳远、百米赛跑等。There are many track and field events, such as high jump, long (or broad) jump, 100-metre dash, etc.

例子
例子[lì zi] 同 same as 例 lì ①：举个例子 cite an example; give an example

例禁
例禁[lì jìn]〈书 fml.〉法规明令禁止的事情 decreed prohibitions; what is prohibited under laws and regulations：有干例禁 break or offend decreed prohibitions

例行公事
例行公事[lì xíng gōng shì]按照惯例处理的公事。多借指只重形式，不讲实效的工作。routine; routine business; mere formality; oft. referring to work done for formality's sake, to the neglect of actual results

例规
例规[lì guī]1.沿袭下来一贯实行的规矩；惯例 convention; usual practice 2.〈旧时 old〉指按照惯例给的钱物 customary dues：交例规 pay customary dues 3.法例规章 rules; regulations

例言
例言[lì yán] 书的正文前头说明体例等的文字；凡例 introductory remarks; notes on the use of a book

例证
例证[lì zhèng] 用来证明一个事实或理论的例子 illustration; example; case in point

例题
例题[lì tí] 说明某一定理或定律时用来做例子的问题 example; problem designed to illustrate a principle or method

侍
侍[shì]（ㄕˋ）陪伴侍候 wait upon; attend upon; serve：服侍 wait upon; attend to侍立一旁 stand at sb.'s side in attendance相关词组伏侍 | 服侍 | 陪侍侍从 | 侍奉 | 侍候 | 侍郎 | 侍立 | 侍弄 | 侍女 | 侍卫 | 侍养 | 侍者

侍从
侍从[shì cóng] 指在皇帝或官员左右侍候卫护的人 attendants; retinue (of an emperor or official)

侍候
侍候[shì hòu] 服侍 wait upon; look after; attend upon：侍候父母 look after one's parents侍候病人 look after a patient

侍养
侍养[shì yǎng] 奉养 support and wait upon (one's elders)：侍养老人 support and wait upon elders

侍卫
侍卫[shì wèi]1.卫护 bodyguard 2.在帝王左右卫护的武官 imperial bodyguard

侍奉
侍奉[shì fèng] 侍候奉养（长辈） support and wait upon (one's elders)：侍奉父母 support and wait upon one's parents侍奉老人 look after old people

侍女
侍女[shì nǚ]〈旧时 old〉供有钱人家使唤的年轻妇女 maidservant; maid

侍弄
侍弄[shì nòng]1.指经营、照管、喂养 tend with care (crops, domestic animals, etc.)：侍弄猪 take care of pigs把荒地侍弄成了丰产田 turn wasteland into high-yielding cropland 2.摆弄；修理 repair; fix：侍弄锄头 fix a hoe侍弄机器 repair a machine

侍立
侍立[shì lì] 指恭敬地站在上级或长辈左右侍候 stand in attendance (on seniors or elders); stand by respectfully：垂手侍立 stand at sb.'s side respectfully in attendance

侍者
侍者[shì zhě]侍候人的人。旧时也特指旅馆、饭店中接待顾客的人。 attendant; servant; waiter; (old) page; hotel attendant

侍郎
侍郎[shì láng]〈古代 arch.〉官名。明清两代是政府各部的副长官，地位次于尚书。 (official title of the Ming and Qing dynasties) vice minister, second in rank to shangshu or minister

侏
侏[zhū]（ㄓㄨ）[侏儒] (zhūrú) 身材异常矮小的人。这种异常的发育多由脑垂体前叶的功能低下所致。dwarf; midget; manikin; gnome; pygmy; Lilliputian; abnormally small person, oft. due to the hypofunction of the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland

侑
侑[yòu]（ㄧㄡˋ）〈书 fml.〉劝人（吃、喝）press sb. to eat or drink; urge：侑食 press sb. to eat侑觞（劝人饮酒）urge sb. to drink more

侔
侔[móu]（ㄇㄡˊ）〈书 fml.〉相等；齐 equal; match：相侔 match each other

侗
侗[Dòng]（ㄉㄨㄥˋ）侗族 the Dongs, an ethnic minority people另见  tóng and tǒng侗[tóng]（ㄊㄨㄥˊ）〈书 fml.〉幼稚；无知 childish; ignorant另见  Dòng and tǒng侗[tǒng]（ㄊㄨㄥˇ）另见  [侗] (lǒngtǒng)另见  Dòng and tóng相关词组侗剧 | 侗族

侗剧
侗剧[dòng jù] 侗族戏曲剧种，流行于贵州、广西等地侗族聚居的地区 Dong opera; a kind of drama of the Dong people, popular in Guizhou and Guangxi where the Dongs live in compact communities

侗族
侗族[Dòng zú] 我国少数民族之一，分布在贵州、湖南和广西 Dong people, one of China's ethnic minority groups inhabiting in Guizhou and Hunan provinces, and the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region

侘
侘[chà]（ㄔㄚˋ）[侘傺] (chàchì)〈书 fml.〉失意的样子 frustrated or disappointed look

供
供[gōng]（ㄍㄨㄥ）1.供给；供应 supply; feed：供不应求 supply falls short of demand 2.提供某种利用的条件（给对方利用）provide for use or convenience：供读者参考 for readers' reference供旅客休息 (place) for passengers to rest in另见  gòng供1[gòng]（ㄍㄨㄥˋ）1.把香烛等放在神佛或先辈的像（或牌位）前面表示敬奉；祭祀时摆设祭品 present joss sticks and candles before the Buddha, the portrait of an ancestor (or a memorial tablet); lay up offerings at a rite or service：遗像前供着鲜花。Fresh flowers were laid out before the portrait of the deceased. 2.陈列的表示虔敬的东西；供品 goods displayed to show reverence; offerings：蜜供 sweetened fried narrow dough strips offered as a sacrifice上供 offer a sacrifice; lay offerings on the altar供2[gòng]（ㄍㄨㄥˋ）1.受审者陈述案情 statement made by the person on trial：供认 confess供出作案同伙 give the name of an accomplice 2.口供；供词 confession：录供 take down confession问不出供来。No confession was obtained.另见  gōng相关词组逼供 | 笔供 | 串供 | 翻供 | 画供 | 口供 | 录供 | 攀供 | 清供 | 上供 | 提供 | 诱供 | 招供 | 自供供案 | 供词 | 供奉 | 供稿 | 供给 | 供品 | 供求 | 供认 | 供事 | 供销 | 供需 | 供养 | 供应 | 供职 | 供状 | 供桌 | 供给制 | 供求率 | 供应舰 | 供不应求 | 供销合作社

供不应求
供不应求[gōng bù yìng qiú] 供应的东西不能满足需求 supply falls short of demand; in short supply

供事
供事[gòng shì] 担任职务 take a post

供养
供养[gōng yǎng] 供给长辈或年长的人生活所需；赡养 provide for (one's parents or elders); support：供养老人 support elders另见  gòngyǎng供养[gòng yǎng] 用供品祭祀（神佛和祖先） make offerings to the gods, the Buddha and ancestors另见  gōngyǎng

供品
供品[gòng pǐn] 供奉神佛祖宗用的瓜果酒食等 offerings; melons, fruits, wine and food offered to the gods, the Buddha and ancestors

供奉
供奉[gòng fèng]1.敬奉；供养 make offerings to; offer sacrifices to：供奉神佛 make or present offerings to the gods or the Buddha供奉父母 provide for one's parents 2.以某种技艺侍奉帝王的人 person who served the emperor with a certain skill：老供奉 old attendant内廷供奉 inner court attendant

供应
供应[gōng yìng] 以物资满足需要（有时也指以人力满足需要） supply goods and materials (sometimes human resources) to meet the demand：供应站 supply station计划供应 planned supply农业用粮食和原料供应工业。Agriculture supplies industry with grain and raw materials.发展生产才能够保证供应。Only through developing production can supply be guaranteed.

供应舰
供应舰[gōng yìng jiàn] 专门担负海上补给、修理任务的军舰 cockboat, responsible for maritime supply and repair; refuelling barge亦 also 补给舰 bǔjǐjiàn

供案
供案[gòng àn] 供桌 altar table：雕花供案 carved altar table

供桌
供桌[gòng zhuō] 陈设供品的桌子 altar table; table where offerings are laid

供求
供求[gōng qiú] 供给和需求（多指商品 usu. of goods）supply and demand：供求关系 the relationship between supply and demand调剂物资，使供求平衡 redistribute goods and materials to strike a balance between supply and demand

供求率
供求率[gōng qiú lǜ] 社会总商品量与社会有支付能力的需求量之间的比率。它是商品的生产和消费之间的关系在市场上的反映。 ratio between aggregate commodity supply and demand with purchasing power; market reflection of the relationship between commodity production and consumption

供状
供状[gòng zhuàng] 指书面的供词 written confession

供稿
供稿[gōng gǎo] 提供稿件 contribute a piece of writing：本版诗文、照片均由运动会宣传组供稿。The poems, articles and photographs on this page have been provided by the public relations department of the games.

供给
供给[gōng jǐ] 把生活中必需的物资、钱财、资料等给需要的人使用 supply or provide necessary goods, money, materials, etc. for people in need：学习用品由训练班免费供给。Stationery is provided free by the training class.

供给制
供给制[gōng jǐ zhì] 按大致相同的标准直接供给生活资料的分配制度 supply system; a system of payment in kind, whereby daily necessities are supplied to all in roughly equal quantities

供职
供职[gòng zhí] 担任职务 hold office; take up a post：在海关供职三十年。I have held office in the Customs for 30 years.

供认
供认[gòng rèn] 被告人承认所做的事情 (of a defendant) admit what he has done：供认不讳 confess candidly; confess everything

供词
供词[gòng cí] 受审者所陈述的或所写的与案情有关的话 confession; statement made by sb. on trial during interrogation

供销
供销[gōng xiāo] 供应生产资料和消费品，以及销售各种产品的商业性活动 supply and marketing：供销合同 supply and marketing contract供销部门 supply and marketing department

供销合作社
供销合作社[gōng xiāo hé zuò shè] 为满足农村生产和生活需要而设立的销售生产工具、生活用品和收购农产品、副业产品的商业机构 rural supply and marketing cooperative that meets the needs of production and daily life by selling tools and daily necessities, and purchases farm produce and sideline products；简称 abbr. 供销社 gōngxiāoshè

供需
供需[gōng xū] 同 same as 供求 gōngqiú：避免供需脱节 avoid a break between supply and demand

侜
侜[zhōu]（ㄓㄡ）〈书 fml.〉诳 deceive; cheat; befool：侜张 defraud相关词组侜张

侜张
侜张[zhōu zhāng]〈书 fml.〉欺骗；作伪 deceive; beguile; defraud; hoodwink; fake：侜张为幻 mislead; entrap亦 also 诪张 zhōuzhāng

依
依[yī]（ㄧ）1. 同 same as 依靠 yīkào ①：唇齿相依 depend on each other like lips and teeth; share a common fate 2.依从；同意 comply with; listen to; yield to：劝他休息，他怎么也不依。No matter how I asked him to have a rest, he didn't listen. 3.按照 according to; in the light of; judging by：依次前进 advance in order依法惩处 punish according to law依样画葫芦 draw a gourd according to the model; copy mechanically依我看，这样办可以。I would say it's okay to do it this way. 4.(Yī) 姓 a surname相关词组傍依 | 不依 | 归依 | 凭依 | 偎依 | 相依 | 布依族 | 相依为命 | 唇齿相依 | 辅车相依依傍 | 依次 | 依从 | 依存 | 依法 | 依附 | 依归 | 依旧 | 依据 | 依靠 | 依赖 | 依恋 | 依凭 | 依然 | 依顺 | 依随 | 依托 | 依偎 | 依违 | 依稀 | 依循 | 依依 | 依允 | 依仗 | 依照 | 依样葫芦

依从
依从[yī cóng] 顺从 comply with; yield to：万难依从 be impossible to comply with

依仗
依仗[yī zhàng] 倚仗 rely on; count on

依依
依依[yī yī]1.〈书 fml.〉形容树枝柔弱，随风摇摆 (of tree branches and twigs) frail and tender, swaying in the wind：杨柳依依。The twigs of the willows are swaying in the gentle breeze. 2.形容留恋，不忍分离 be reluctant to separate or part：依依不舍 be reluctant to part; cannot bear to part依依惜别 be reluctant to say goodbye依依之感 feel reluctant to part

依偎
依偎[yī wēi] 亲热地靠着；紧挨着 snuggle up to; lean close to：孩子依偎在奶奶的怀里。The child snuggled up to her grandmother.

依傍
依傍[yī bàng]1. 同 same as 依靠 yīkào ①：无可依傍 with nobody to rely on 2.摹仿（多指艺术、学问方面 oft. concerning art, scholarship, etc.）imitate; model oneself on：依傍前人 model oneself on one's predecessors

依允
依允[yī yǔn] 依从；应允 assent; consent：他点头依允了孩子的要求。He nodded assent to the child's demand.

依凭
依凭[yī píng]1.依靠 rely on; depend on：孤身在外，无所依凭。He lives away from home, alone and helpless. 2.指证据；凭证 evidence; certificate; voucher

依存
依存[yī cún]（互相）依附而存在 depend on sb. or sth. for existence; be interdependent

依归
依归[yī guī]1.出发点和归宿 starting point and destination; what one turns to for guidance or support：以民族的利益为依归 take the interests of the nation as the starting point and the end for one's work 2.依托；依靠 dependence; reliance：无所依归 with no one to depend on; be helpless

依循
依循[yī xún] 依照；遵循 follow; abide by

依恋
依恋[yī liàn] 留恋；舍不得离开 be reluctant to leave; feel regret at parting from：依恋故园 be reluctant to leave one's native place依恋之情 feeling of attachment

依托
依托[yī tuō]1.依靠 rely on; depend on：无所依托 with no one or nothing to depend on 2.为达到一定目的而假借某种名义 pretext; excuse：依托古人 in the name of ancients依托鬼神，骗人钱财 use ghosts or gods to cheat people of their money

依据
依据[yī jù] 根据 according to; in the light of; on the basis of; judging by

依旧
依旧[yī jiù] 照旧 remain the same：风物依旧。The landscape remains unchanged.别人都走了，他依旧坐在那里看书。He still sat there reading after everybody had left.

依样葫芦
依样葫芦[yī yàng hú lú] 照葫芦的样子画葫芦 draw a gourd according to the model;〈比喻 fig.〉单纯模仿，不加改变 copy mechanically亦 also 依样画葫芦 yī yàng huà húlú

依次
依次[yī cì] 按照次序 in proper order; successively：依次入座 take their seats in proper order依次就诊 consult doctors in proper order

依法
依法[yī fǎ]1.按照成法 according to fixed rule：依法炮制 prepare a Chinese medicine according to a prescribed method 2.按照法律 according to law; in conformity with legal provisions; in accordance with the law：依法惩办 punish according to law; deal with in accordance with the law; bring to justice

依然
依然[yī rán] 依旧 still; as before：依然如故 remain as before; remain the same风景依然。The landscape is just the same as before.

依照
依照[yī zhào] 以某事物为根据照着进行；按照 according to; in accordance with; in the light of：依照他说的去做 do as he says依照原样复制一件 make a copy of the original

依稀
依稀[yī xī] 模模糊糊 vaguely; dimly：依稀可辨 dimly discernable依稀记得 vaguely remember远处楼台，依稀可见。The buildings in the distance are faintly visible.

依赖
依赖[yī lài]1.依靠别的人或事物而不能自立或自给 rely on; be dependent on：依赖性 dependence不依赖别人。Do not rely on others. 2.指各个事物或现象互为条件而不可分离 be interdependent：工业和农业是互相依赖、互相支援的两大国民经济部门。Industry and agriculture are the two major sectors of the national economy which depend on and support each other.

依违
依违[yī wéi]〈书 fml.〉依从或违背。指模棱、犹豫。comply with or go against; be equivocal; be undecided：依违两可 be equivocal; be ambiguous依违不决 be undecided; shilly-shally

依附
依附[yī fù]1.附着 be attached to：凌霄花依附在别的树木上。Chinese trumpet creepers grow attached to other trees. 2. 同 same as 依赖 yīlài ①；从属 depend on; attach oneself to; become an appendage to：依附权贵 attach oneself to bigwigs

依随
依随[yī suí] 顺从 agree to; yield to; comply with：丈夫说什么她都依随。She agrees to whatever her husband says.

依靠
依靠[yī kào]1.指望（别的人或事物来达到一定目的）fall back on; rely on (other people or things to reach certain purpose); depend on：依靠群众 depend on the masses依靠组织 depend on the organization 2.可以依靠的人或东西 person or thing on whom or which one can depend：女儿是老人唯一的依靠。The daughter is the only support of the old man.

依顺
依顺[yī shùn] 顺从 be obedient; comply with：他说得有理，也就依顺了他。What he said was reasonable and I complied with him.

侠
侠[xiá]（ㄒㄧㄚˊ）（俠）1.侠客 knight-errant：游侠 roaming swordsman武侠 chivalrous man 2.侠义 chivalrous：侠士 gallant行侠仗义 perform chivalrous deeds and uphold justice相关词组豪侠 | 剑侠 | 武侠 | 游侠 | 武侠小说侠客 | 侠义 | 侠肝义胆

侠义
侠义[xiá yì] 指讲义气，肯舍己助人的 having a high sense of justice and ready to help the down and under：侠义心肠 chivalrous temperament侠义行为 gallant deed

侠客
侠客[xiá kè]〈旧时 old〉指有武艺、讲义气、肯舍己助人的人 person adept in martial arts and given to chivalrous conduct

侠肝义胆
侠肝义胆[xiá gān yì dǎn] 指讲义气，有勇气，肯舍己助人的气概和行为 chivalrous deeds and fearless spirit

侣
侣[lǚ]（ㄌㄩˇ）同伴 companion; associate：伴侣 companion; mate; partner旧侣 old friends情侣 lovers相关词组伴侣 | 俦侣 | 情侣 | 僧侣侣伴

侣伴
侣伴[lǚ bàn] 伴侣 companion; mate; partner

侥
侥[jiǎo]（ㄐㄧㄠˇ）（僥）[侥幸] (jiǎoxìng) 由于偶然的原因而得到成功或免去灾害 lucky; by luck; by a fluke; succeed or avoid disaster by chance：心存侥 want to try one's luck侥心理 try-your-luck mentality; dependence on luck亦 also 儌倖 jiǎoxìng or 徼倖 jiǎoxìng另见  yáo侥[yáo]（ㄧㄠˊ）（僥）另见  僬侥 jiāoyáo另见  jiǎo

侦
侦[zhēn]（ㄓㄣ）暗中察看；调查 detect; scout; investigate：侦探 spy; do detective work侦查 investigate相关词组刑侦侦办 | 侦查 | 侦察 | 侦获 | 侦缉 | 侦结 | 侦破 | 侦探 | 侦探小说

侦办
侦办[zhēn bàn]侦查并办理（案件）investigate and handle (a case)

侦察
侦察[zhēn chá] 为了弄清敌情、地形及其他有关作战的情况而进行活动 reconnoitre; scout; gather intelligence about the enemy, including the topography of the enemy's position and strategy：侦察兵 scout火力侦察 reconnaissance by firing侦察飞行 reconnaissance flight

侦探
侦探[zhēn tàn]1.暗中探寻机密或案情 do detective work; spy：侦探敌情 spy on the enemy 2.做侦探工作的人；间谍 detective; spy

侦探小说
侦探小说[zhēn tàn xiǎo shuō] 描写刑事案件的发生和破案经过的小说 detective story; detective fiction; crime novel

侦查
侦查[zhēn chá] 检察机关或公安机关为了确定犯罪事实和犯罪人而进行调查 investigate a crime or criminal act through a procuratorial organ or public security organ：侦查案情 investigate a case立案侦查 enter a case on file for investigation

侦破
侦破[zhēn pò] 侦查并破获 investigate and crack; break：这是一个没有线索、难于侦破的案件。This is a case without clues, therefore very hard to break.

侦结
侦结[zhēn jié] 侦查终结 conclusion of an investigation：这一特大经济案件经检察院侦结后向法院提起诉讼。This extraordinary economic case has been submitted to the court for legal proceedings after the procuratorate concluded its investigation.

侦缉
侦缉[zhēn jī] 侦查缉捕 track down and arrest：侦缉队 tracking team侦缉盗匪 track down and arrest bandits

侦获
侦获[zhēn huò] 侦查破获；侦破 investigate and crack

侧
侧[cè]（ㄘㄜˋ）1.旁边（跟‘正’相对 as compared with‘front’）side (a lateral position or space)：左侧 left side侧面 side公路两侧种着杨树。Poplars are planted on both sides of the highway. 2.向旁边歪斜 incline to one side：侧耳 incline one's ear侧着身子进去 enter by walking sideways另见  zè and zhāi侧[zè]（ㄗㄜˋ） 同 same as 仄2  zè另见  cè and zhāi侧[zhāi]（ㄓㄞ）〈方 dial.〉倾斜；不正 lean; tilt; slant：侧歪 incline另见  cè and zè相关词组反侧 | 攲侧 | 倾侧 | 翼侧 | 清君侧 | 旁敲侧击 | 辗转反侧侧扁 | 侧耳 | 侧根 | 侧击 | 侧记 | 侧近 | 侧棱 | 侧门 | 侧面 | 侧目 | 侧身 | 侧室 | 侧歪 | 侧线 | 侧芽 | 侧翼 | 侧影 | 侧泳 | 侧枝 | 侧重 | 侧足 | 侧视图

侧击
侧击[cè jī] 从侧面攻击 attack the side of; make a flank attack

侧室
侧室[cè shì]1.房屋两侧的房间 side room 2.〈旧时 old〉指偏房；妾 concubine

侧影
侧影[cè yǐng] 侧面的影像 profile; silhouette：在这里我们可以仰望宝塔的侧影。We can view the profile of the pagoda from here.通过这部小说，可以看到当时学生运动的一个侧影。The novel reflected one aspect of the student movement at the time.

侧扁
侧扁[cè biǎn] 从背部到腹部的距离大于左右两侧之间的距离，如鲫鱼的身体 laterally flat; distance between the back and belly exceeds that between the two sides, like the body of a crucian

侧枝
侧枝[cè zhī] 由主枝周围长出的小枝 small branches around the trunk; lateral branch; side shoot

侧根
侧根[cè gēn] 从主根向周围长出来的根 lateral root; roots growing around the main root

侧棱
侧棱[zhāi leng]〈方 dial.〉向一边斜 lean; incline; slant：侧棱着耳朵听 prick up one's ears侧棱着身子睡 sleep on one's side

侧歪
侧歪[zhāi wai]〈方 dial.〉倾斜 tilt; slant; incline：车在山坡上侧歪着开。The vehicle tilted while moving forward on a hillside.帽子侧歪在一边儿 wear one's hat tilted to one side

侧泳
侧泳[cè yǒng] 游泳的一种姿势，身体侧卧水面，两腿夹水，两手交替划水 sidestroke; do the sidestroke; swimming stroke performed, while lying sideways in the water, by working the arms alternately backward and forward while executing a scissor-kick with the legs

侧目
侧目[cè mù] 不敢从正面看，斜着眼睛看。形容畏惧而又愤恨 cast sidelong glances, not dare to look directly (with fear and indignation)：侧目而视 look askance at sb.世人为之侧目 be resented by the common people

侧线
侧线[cè xiàn]鱼类身体两侧各有一条由许多小点组成的线，叫做侧线。每一小点内有一个小管，管内有感觉细胞，能感觉水流的方向和压力。lateral line; (of fish) a row of sensory organs along both sides of the head and body for detecting the direction and pressure of currents

侧翼
侧翼[cè yì] 作战时部队的两翼 flank; either side of an army in battle

侧耳
侧耳[cè ěr] 侧转头，使一边的耳朵向前边歪斜。形容认真倾听 turn the head and incline the ear; strain one's ears; listen attentively：他探身窗外，侧耳细听。He leaned out of the window and listened attentively.

侧芽
侧芽[cè yá] 在叶子和茎相连的部分生长出来的芽 auxiliary bud; buds growing on the joint between a branch and the stem of a leaf亦 also 腋芽 yèyá

侧视图
侧视图[cè shì tú] 由物体的一侧向另一侧做正投影得到的视图 lateral view; side view

侧记
侧记[cè jì] 关于某些活动的侧面的记述（多用于报道文章的标题 oft. used in news headlines）sidelight; incidental information on a subject：《全市中学生运动会侧记》‘Sidelights of the Municipal Games for Middle School Students’

侧足
侧足[cè zú]〈书 fml.〉1.两脚斜着站，不敢移动。形容非常恐惧。stand in fear, not dare to move; horrified; panic-stricken：侧足而立 stand in fear 2. 同 same as 厕足 cèzú

侧身
侧身[cè shēn]1.歪斜身子 turn or move sideways：他一侧身躲到树后。He turned and hid himself behind the tree. 2. 同 same as 厕身 cèshēn

侧近
侧近[cè jìn] 附近 nearby：找侧近的人打听一下 consult somebody nearby

侧重
侧重[cè zhòng] 着重某一方面；偏重 lay special emphasis on one aspect; lay particular stress on：侧重农业 lay special emphasis on agriculture这几项工作应有所侧重。Special emphasis shall be laid on these tasks.

侧门
侧门[cè mén] 旁门 side door; side entrance

侧面
侧面[cè miàn] 旁边的一面（区别于‘正面’as distinguished from‘front’）side; flank：从侧面打击敌人 made a flank attack on the enemy小门在房子的侧面。The small door is at the side of the house.从侧面了解 learn from indirect sources注意正面的材料，也要注意侧面和反面的材料。When studying the materials, note should be taken of positive and negative views as well as those with indirect relevance.

侨
侨[qiáo]（ㄑㄧㄠˊ）（僑）1.侨居 live abroad; reside in a foreign country：侨民 national of a particular country residing abroad侨胞 countrymen or nationals living abroad 2.侨民 person living abroad; national residing in a foreign country：华侨 Chinese nationals living abroad; overseas Chinese外侨 foreign residents; aliens; expatriates相关词组归侨 | 华侨 | 外侨侨胞 | 侨汇 | 侨居 | 侨眷 | 侨民 | 侨务

侨务
侨务[qiáo wù] 有关侨民的事务 affairs concerning nationals living abroad：侨务工作 work on affairs concerning nationals living abroad

侨居
侨居[qiáo jū] 在外国居住，古代也指在外乡居住 live abroad; (in ancient China) reside in a strange land：侨居海外 reside abroad; sojourn in a foreign land

侨民
侨民[qiáo mín] 住在外国而保留本国国籍的居民 national of a particular country residing abroad

侨汇
侨汇[qiáo huì] 侨民汇回国内的款项 overseas remittance; remittance from nationals living abroad

侨眷
侨眷[qiáo juàn] 指侨民在国内的家眷 relatives of nationals living abroad who remain in the homeland

侨胞
侨胞[qiáo bāo] 侨居国外的同胞 countrymen or nationals living abroad

侩
侩[kuài]（ㄎㄨㄞˋ）（儈）〈旧指 old〉以拉拢买卖从中取利为职业的人 middleman; broker; commission merchant：市侩 sordid merchant牙侩 broker驵侩 (zǎngkuài) horse dealer相关词组市侩 | 文侩 | 牙侩 | 驵侩

侪
侪[chái]（ㄔㄞˊ）（儕）〈书 fml.〉同辈；同类的人 people of the same generation; fellow; associate：吾侪 we as a group; people like us侪辈 people of the same generation同侪 contemporaries相关词组同侪 | 吾侪侪辈

侪辈
侪辈[chái bèi]〈书 fml.〉同辈 contemporaries; people of the same generation

侬
侬[nóng]（ㄋㄨㄥˊ）（儂）1.〈方 dial.〉你 you 2.我 I（多见于旧诗文 oft. in old-style poems and writings）3.(Nóng) 姓 a surname相关词组侬人

侬人
侬人[Nóng rén] 指居住在广西和云南交界地区的壮族 the Zhuangs inhabiting the area bordering the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region and Yunnan Province

侮
侮[wǔ]（ㄨˇ）欺负；轻慢 insult; bully：欺侮 bully外侮 foreign aggression御侮 resist aggression; resist invasion相关词组凌侮 | 欺侮 | 轻侮 | 外侮 | 戏侮 | 御侮侮慢 | 侮蔑 | 侮辱

侮慢
侮慢[wǔ màn] 欺侮轻慢 slight; treat disrespectfully：肆意侮慢 be brazenly disrespectful to sb.

侮蔑
侮蔑[wǔ miè] 轻视；轻蔑 despise; look down on

侮辱
侮辱[wǔ rǔ] 使对方人格或名誉受到损害，蒙受耻辱 insult; humiliate; subject sb. to indignities：侮辱人格 affront to one's dignity遭受侮辱 be insulted; be humiliated

侯
侯[hóu]（ㄏㄡˊ）1.封建五等爵位的第二等 second of the five ranks of nobility in feudal China：侯爵 marquis公侯 duke 2.泛指达官贵人 (in a broad sense) nobleman or high official：侯门似海 (of a rich man's home) be inaccessible to the common people 3.(Hóu) 姓 a surname另见  hòu侯[hòu]（ㄏㄡˋ）闽侯(Mǐnhòu)，地名，在福建 Minhou, name of a place in Fujian Province另见  hóu相关词组王侯 | 夏侯 | 诸侯 | 万户侯

侵
侵[qīn]（ㄑㄧㄣ）1.侵入 invade; intrude into; infringe upon; encroach on：侵害 invade; encroach on; make inroads on入侵 invade; make inroads into 2.接近（天明） approaching (daybreak)：侵晓 approaching daybreak侵晨 towards daybreak; at the approach of dawn相关词组海侵 | 入侵侵晨 | 侵夺 | 侵犯 | 侵害 | 侵凌 | 侵略 | 侵权 | 侵扰 | 侵入 | 侵蚀 | 侵吞 | 侵袭 | 侵越 | 侵早 | 侵占

侵入
侵入[qīn rù]1.用武力强行进入境内 invade; intrude into; make incursions into; make inroads into; cross the border by force：侵入边境 intrude into the border frontiers 2.（外来的或有害的事物）进入内部 (of extraneous or harmful things) invade the interior：由于冷空气侵入，气温急剧下降。The temperature dropped drastically owing to the intrusion of a cold front.

侵凌
侵凌[qīn líng] 侵犯欺负 encroach; infringe; bully and humiliate; browbeat and insult

侵占
侵占[qīn zhàn]1.非法占有别人的财产 seize or take illegal possession of another's property; occupy by force 2.用侵略手段占有别国的领土 invade and occupy another country's territory

侵吞
侵吞[qīn tūn]1.暗中非法占有（别人的东西或公共的财物、土地等） embezzle; misappropriate (others' belongings or public property, land, etc.)：侵吞公款 embezzle public funds 2.用武力吞并别国或占有其部分领土 swallow up; annex; forcibly seize another country's territory or occupy territory in part

侵夺
侵夺[qīn duó] 凭势力夺取别人财产 violate; encroach upon; take away; seize another's property by force

侵害
侵害[qīn hài]1.侵入而损害 invade; encroach on; make inroads on：防止害虫侵害农作物 prevent pests from harming farm crops 2.用暴力或非法手段损害 harm or damage by force or by illegal means：不得侵害人民群众利益。The interests of the people must not be harmed.

侵扰
侵扰[qīn rǎo] 侵犯骚扰 invade and harass：侵扰边境 harass a country's border frontiers; make border raids

侵早
侵早[qīn zǎo] 同 same as 侵晨 qīnchén

侵晨
侵晨[qīn chén] 天快亮的时候 towards daybreak; at the approach of dawn

侵权
侵权[qīn quán] 侵犯、损害他人的合法权益 tort; violate or infringe upon others' lawful rights or interests

侵犯
侵犯[qīn fàn]1.非法干涉别人，损害其权利 encroach on; infringe upon; violate; interfere with others illegally to infringe upon their rights：侵犯版权 infringe copyright; piracy侵犯农民利益 infringe upon peasants' interests 2.侵入别国领域 invade the territory of another country; make inroads on; encroach or infringe on：侵犯领空 violate a country's territorial skies or airspace

侵略
侵略[qīn lüè] 指一个国家（或几个国家联合起来）侵犯别国的领土、主权，掠夺并奴役别国的人民。侵略的主要形式是武装入侵，有时也采用政治干涉、经济和文化渗透等方式 aggression; invasion; (of one nation or several allied nations) act of invading the territory, infringing upon the sovereignty, and plundering and enslaving the people of another country by resorting to the use of force in the main and at times by such means as political interference, and economic and cultural infiltration：侵略战争 war of aggression; invasive war文化侵略 cultural invasion

侵蚀
侵蚀[qīn shí]1.逐渐侵害使变坏 corrode; erode; eat into：病菌侵蚀人体。Germs serve to destroy the human body gradually. 2.暗中一点一点地侵占（财物） misappropriate or embezzle (property) bit by bit：侵蚀公款 misappropriate or embezzle public funds bit by bit

侵袭
侵袭[qīn xí] 侵入并袭击 make inroads into; make incursions into; invade and attack; hit; assault：侵袭领空 invade (another country's) airspace沿海一带常遭台风侵袭。The coastal areas are often hit by typhoons.

侵越
侵越[qīn yuè] 侵犯（权限） encroach; trespass; exceed or overstep one's power or authority; ultra vires

侷
侷[jú]（ㄐㄩˊ）[侷促] 同 same as 局促 júcù

侹
侹[tǐng]（ㄊㄧㄥˇ）〈书 fml.〉平而直 smooth and straight

侻
侻[tuì]（ㄊㄨㄟˋ）〈书 fml.〉美好；相宜 beautiful; handsome; fine; agreeable; suitable另见  tuō侻[tuō]（ㄊㄨㄛ）〈书 fml.〉1.简易 simple; easy 2.适当；应当 proper; appropriate; suitable 3.另见  通侻 tōngtuō另见  tuì相关词组通侻

便
便1[biàn]（ㄅㄧㄢˋ）1.方便；便利 convenient; handy：轻便 light; portable近便 close and convenient旅客称便。Travelers appreciate such convenience. 2.方便的时候或顺便的机会 when an opportunity arises; when it is convenient：便中 at one's convenience; when it is convenient得便 whenever it is convenient搭便车 hitchhike one's way to somewhere; get a lift to somewhere 3.非正式的；简单平常的 informal; simple：便饭 homely meal; simple meal便条儿 note 4.屎或尿 shit or piss; stool or urine：粪便 excrement; night soil 5.排泄屎、尿 excrete; relieve oneself：大便 shit; defecate; evacuate bowels小便 piss; urinate便桶 commode; chamber pot便血 haematochezia; have or pass blood in one's stool便2[biàn]（ㄅㄧㄢˋ）1.〈副词 adv.〉就 then; in that case：没有各方面的通力合作，任务便无法顺利完成。Without the full cooperation of all quarters concerned, the task cannot be accomplished smoothly.这几天不是刮风，便是下雨。These days the weather is either windy or wet. 2.〈连词 conj.〉表示假设的让步 [indicating a hypothetical concession] even if：只要依靠群众，便是再大的困难，也能克服。As long as we rely on the people, we can overcome all difficulties, no matter how great.注意 NOTE：‘便’是保留在书面语中的近代汉语，它的意义和用法基本上跟‘就’相同。便 is a formal modern Chinese character andmeans almost the same as 就 jiù.另见  pián便[pián]（ㄆㄧㄢˊ）另见  见下 below另见  biàn相关词组不便 | 趁便 | 称便 | 乘便 | 搭便 | 大便 | 得便 | 方便 | 粪便 | 告便 | 活便 | 即便 | 简便 | 近便 | 就便 | 两便 | 灵便 | 轻便 | 请便 | 任便 | 省便 | 顺便 | 随便 | 溏便 | 听便 | 童便 | 妥便 | 未便 | 稳便 | 小便 | 以便 | 自便 | 方便面 | 讨便宜 | 占便宜 | 行方便 | 大腹便便 | 家常便饭 | 有奶便是娘便便 | 便步 | 便餐 | 便当 | 便道 | 便饭 | 便服 | 便函 | 便壶 | 便笺 | 便捷 | 便览 | 便了 | 便利 | 便帽 | 便门 | 便秘 | 便民 | 便溺 | 便盆 | 便桥 | 便人 | 便士 | 便所 | 便条 | 便桶 | 便鞋 | 便血 | 便宴 | 便衣 | 便宜 | 便于 | 便中 | 便装 | 便携式 | 便宜行事

便中
便中[biàn zhōng] 方便的时候或有顺便的机会 at one's convenience; when it is convenient：你家里托人带来棉鞋两双，请你便中进城来取。Your family sent someone with two pairs of cloth shoes for you, so whenever it's convenient, please come to town and collect them.

便了
便了[biàn liǎo]〈助词 aux.〉用在句末，表示决定、允诺或让步的语气，跟‘就是了’相同（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）[used at the end of a sentence to indicate determination, promise or concession] same as the meaning of 就是了 jiùshì·le：如有差池，由我担待便了。I will be responsible for any mistake; you can be sure.

便于
便于[biàn yú]比较容易（做某事）easy to; convenient for：便于计算 be easy to calculate; be easily calculable便于携带 easy to carry

便人
便人[biàn rén] 顺便受委托办事的人 sb. who happens to be on hand for an errand：托便人给他带去一本词典。I'll send a dictionary to you by someone going your way.

便便
便便[pián pián] 形容肥胖 bulging; swelling; fat：大腹便便 potbellied

便函
便函[biàn hán]形式比较简便的、非正式公文的信件（区别于‘公函’as compared with‘official letter’）short non-official letter

便利
便利[biàn lì]1.使用或行动起来不感觉困难；容易达到目的 not difficult to use or act upon; suitable for the purpose：交通便利 have convenient communications; have good transport facilities; be conveniently located附近就有百货公司，买东西很便利。Shopping here is easy as there is a department store nearby. 2.使便利 facilitate：扩大商业网，便利群众。More shops should be built for the convenience of the people.

便士
便士[biàn shì] 英国等国的辅助货币 pence or penny; fractional currency in the United Kingdom, Ireland and other countries

便壶
便壶[biàn hú] 男人夜间或病中卧床小便的用具 bed urinal; chamber pot (used by men at night or when confined to bed due to illness)

便宜
便宜[biàn yí] 方便合适；便利 convenient; advantageous另见  pián·yi便宜[pián yi]1.价钱低 cheap; at a bargain price 2.不应得的利益 unearned gains; unmerited advantages：占便宜 gain extra advantage by unfair means 3.使得到便宜 let sb. off lightly; give sb. unmerited advantages：便宜了你。You have been let off lightly.另见  biànyí

便宜行事
便宜行事[biàn yí xíng shì] 经过特许，不必请示，根据实际情况或临时变化就斟酌处理 (authorized to) act on one's discretion; act as one sees fit亦 also 便宜从事 biànyí cóng shì

便宴
便宴[biàn yàn]比较简便的宴席（区别于正式宴会 as compared with formal banquet）informal dinner：家庭便宴 family dinner设便宴招待 give a dinner for sb.

便帽
便帽[biàn mào]日常戴的帽子（区别于‘礼帽’等 as compared with‘cap’or‘hat’that goes with formal dress）informal cap or hat

便当
便当[biàn dang] 方便；顺手；简单；容易 convenient; handy; easy：这里乘车很便当。Transportation here is very convenient.东西不多，收拾起来很便当。There isn't too much stuff here, so it will be easy to tidy up.

便所
便所[biàn suǒ] 厕所 lavatory; toilet; WC

便捷
便捷[biàn jié]1.直捷而方便 direct and simple; convenient; easy：比较起来，这种方法最为便捷。This method is the simplest of all. 2.动作轻快敏捷 (of action) quick; nimble：行动便捷。There is freedom of movement.

便携式
便携式[biàn xié shì]（形体）便于携带的 portable：便携式计算机 laptop; portable computer便携式罐装燃料 portable canned fuel

便服
便服[biàn fú]1.日常穿的服装（区别于‘礼服、制服’等 as compared with‘ceremonial robes’,‘full dress’,‘formal attire’, or‘uniform’）everyday clothes; informal dress 2.专指中式服装 Chinese-style clothes

便条
便条[biàn tiáo]（～儿 biàntiáor）写上简单事项的纸条；非正式的书信或通知 brief written record; informal letter or notice

便桥
便桥[biàn qiáo] 临时架设的简便的桥 temporary or makeshift bridge

便桶
便桶[biàn tǒng] 供大小便用的桶 commode; chamber pot

便步
便步[biàn bù]队伍行进的一种步法，随意行走的姿势（区别于‘正步’as compared with‘parade step’or‘goose step’）a marching step, march at ease; route step

便民
便民[biàn mín] 便利群众 for the convenience of the people：便民措施 facilities for the convenience of the people便民商店 convenience shop

便溺
便溺[biàn ni]1.排泄大小便 urinate or defecate; relieve oneself：不许随地便溺。Don't relieve yourself in the street. 2.屎和尿 excrement：这种动物的便溺，有种特殊的气味。The excrement of this animal has a special odour.

便盆
便盆[biàn pén]（～儿 biànpénr）供大小便用的盆 bedpan

便秘
便秘[biàn mì] 粪便干燥，大便困难而次数少的症状 constipation; condition of the bowels in which the faeces are dry and hardened and evacuation is difficult and infrequent

便笺
便笺[biàn jiān]1.便条 informal note 2.供写便条、便函用的纸 notepaper; memo; memo pad

便血
便血[biàn xiě] 粪便中带血或只排出血液而没有粪便 haematochezia; have or pass blood in one's stool

便衣
便衣[biàn yī]1.平常人的服装（区别于军警制服 as compared with military and police uniform）civilian clothes; plain clothes 2.（便衣儿 biànyīr）身着便衣执行任务的军人、警察等 plainclothes soldier or policeman on duty

便装
便装[biàn zhuāng] 同 same as 便服 biànfú ①：身着便装 dressed in everyday clothes

便览
便览[biàn lǎn]总括说明；一览（内容多为交通、邮政或风景）(generally of transport, posts and telecommunications or scenery) brief guide; general survey; overview：《邮政便览》A Guide to Posts and Telecommunications

便道
便道[biàn dào]1.近便的小路；顺便的路 shortcut; shorter and quicker way：地里一条小道，是贪走便道的人踩出来的。A path had been trodden through the field by people taking the shortcut. 2.马路两边供人行走的道路；人行道 pavement; sidewalk; walk-way on the two sides of a street or road：行人走便道。Pedestrians walk on the pavement. 3.正式道路正在修建或修整时临时使用的道路 road made available when the official road is under construction or repair; makeshift road

便门
便门[biàn mén]（～儿 biànménr）正门之外的小门 side door; wicket door

便鞋
便鞋[biàn xié] 轻便的鞋，一般指布鞋 cloth shoe; slipper

便餐
便餐[biàn cān] 同 same as 便饭 biànfàn

便饭
便饭[biàn fàn]1.日常吃的饭食 everyday meal; ordinary meal; simple meal; potluck：家常便饭 home-style food; homely meal 2.吃便饭 have a simple meal：明晚请来舍下便饭。Come to my home tomorrow evening and take potluck with us.

促
促[cù]（ㄘㄨˋ）1.时间短 (of time) short; hurried; urgent：短促 of very short duration急促 hurried; pressing; brief 2.催；推动 urge; promote：催促 urge; press; hasten督促 supervise and urge促进 promote 3.〈书 fml.〉靠近 close to; near：促膝谈心 sit close for a heart-to-heart talk相关词组仓促 | 匆促 | 催促 | 督促 | 短促 | 敦促 | 慌促 | 急促 | 窘促 | 局促 | 跼促 | 力促促成 | 促进 | 促请 | 促声 | 促使 | 促膝 | 促狭 | 促销 | 促织

促使
促使[cù shǐ] 推动使达到一定目的 precipitate; impel; urge; spur：促使发生变化 engineer changes促使生产迅速发展 press for the rapid development of production

促声
促声[cù shēng] 指入声（跟‘舒声’相对 as opposed to‘level tone’）entering tone

促成
促成[cù chéng] 推动使成功 help to bring about; facilitate; help to materialize; favour：这件事是他大力促成的。The deal was clinched thanks to his great efforts.

促狭
促狭[cù xiá]〈方 dial.〉刁钻，爱捉弄人 mischievous：促狭鬼（促狭的人）mischievous person; mischief; practical joker; person who likes to play jokes on others

促织
促织[cù zhī] 蟋蟀 cricket

促膝
促膝[cù xī] 膝盖对着膝盖，指两人面对面靠近坐着 sit knee to knee; sit close, face-to-face：促膝谈心 sit side by side and talk intimately; have a heart-to-heart talk; have an intimate chat together; draw close together and chat

促请
促请[cù qǐng] 催促并请求 petition and urge：促请上级早作决定 petition and urge the higher authorities to make a decision as soon as possible

促进
促进[cù jìn] 促使前进；推动使发展 promote; advance; accelerate; boost; facilitate; encourage; further; gear up：促进派 progressive; promoter of progress促进工作 push ahead with the work促进两国的友好合作 promote friendship and cooperation between the two countries

促销
促销[cù xiāo] 推动商品销售 promote sales：利用广告促销 promote sales by advertising促销手段不力 ineffective marketing strategy

俄
俄1[é]（ㄜˊ）〈书 fml.〉时间很短；突然间 in a short time; suddenly; all of a sudden：俄顷 soon; presently; shortly俄而阴云密布。The sky was soon covered with dark clouds.俄2[?]（ㄜˊ）1.指俄罗斯帝国 Russian Empire (1721-1917) 2.指俄罗斯联邦 Russian Federation 3.〈旧时 old〉指苏联 another name for the Union of the Soviet Socialist Republics相关词组帝俄 | 沙俄俄而 | 俄尔 | 俄顷 | 俄延 | 俄罗斯族

俄尔
俄尔[é ěr] 同 same as 俄而 é'ér

俄延
俄延[é yán]〈书 fml.〉拖延；迟延 delay; put off

俄罗斯族
俄罗斯族[? luó sī zú]1.我国少数民族之一，主要分布在新疆 Russian people, a minority ethnic group in China, mainly inhabiting the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 2.俄罗斯联邦的人数最多的民族 Russians, who comprise the overwhelming majority of the population of the Russian Federation

俄而
俄而[é ér]〈书 fml.〉不久；一会儿 soon afterwards; then; presently：俄而日出，光照海上。Presently the sun rose and shone over the sea.

俄顷
俄顷[é qǐng]〈书 fml.〉很短的时间 all of a sudden; presently; suddenly

俅
俅1[Qiú]（ㄑㄧㄡˊ）俅人，我国少数民族‘独龙族’的旧称 old name for the Dulong people, one of China's minority ethnic groups俅2[qiú]（ㄑㄧㄡˊ）[俅俅]〈书 fml.〉恭顺的样子 deferentially; in a respectful and submissive manner

俊
俊[jùn]（ㄐㄩㄣˋ）（隽、儁）1.相貌清秀好看 cute; handsome; pretty; beautiful：俊秀 pretty; of delicate beauty俊俏 pretty and charming这个孩子长得好俊呀！What a pretty child! 2.才智出众的 outstanding; talented：俊杰 person of outstanding talent; hero英俊 handsome俊士 outstanding personage另见  隽 juàn相关词组英俊 | 忍俊不禁 | 识时务者为俊杰俊杰 | 俊美 | 俊俏 | 俊秀

俊俏
俊俏[jùn qiào]（相貌）好看 (of appearance) pretty and charming：模样俊俏 look pretty and charming

俊杰
俊杰[jùn jié] 豪杰 person of exceptional ability; hero：识时务者为俊杰。The person who understands the times is a hero.

俊秀
俊秀[jùn xiù] 清秀美丽 pretty; of delicate features：容貌俊秀 delicate features

俊美
俊美[jùn měi] 俊秀 pretty; handsome; beautiful：容貌俊美 look pretty

俍
俍[liáng]〈书 fml.〉完美；良好 perfect; good

俎
俎[zǔ]（ㄗㄨˇ）1.〈古代 arch.〉祭祀时盛牛羊等祭品的器具 sacrificial vessel 2.〈古代 arch.〉割肉类用的砧板 chopping block used in slaughtering 3.(Zǔ) 姓 a surname相关词组刀俎 | 樽俎 | 越俎代庖 | 折冲樽俎 | 人为刀俎，我为鱼肉俎上肉

俎上肉
俎上肉[zǔ shàng ròu]〈书 fml.〉〈比喻 fig.〉任人欺压蹂躏的人或国家 meat on a chopping block; helpless victim; person or country subject to bullying, oppression and trampling by others

俏
俏[qiào]（ㄑㄧㄠˋ）1.俊俏；样子好看; 动作灵活 pretty; handsome; good-looking; smart; dexterous and quick to act：打扮得真俏 be smartly dressed走着俏步儿 have a mincing gait 2.指货物的销路好 sell like hot cakes; sell well; be saleable; be in great demand：俏货 goods that sell well; commodities in great demand行情看俏。The market is going strong. 3.〈方 dial.〉烹调时加上（俏头） seasoning; season a dish when cooking：俏点儿韭菜 season a dish with leeks相关词组紧俏 | 俊俏 | 卖俏 | 讨俏 | 走俏俏货 | 俏丽 | 俏皮 | 俏式 | 俏头 | 俏销 | 俏皮话

俏丽
俏丽[qiào lì] 俊俏美丽 handsome; pretty; charming：容貌俏丽 look pretty or handsome

俏头
俏头[qiào tou]1.烹调时为增加滋味或色泽而附加的东西，如香菜、青蒜、木耳、辣椒等 seasoning; things added when cooking dishes to improve their tastes or colour and lustre, e.g. coriander, garlic shoots, edible black fungus, hot pepper 2.戏曲、评书中引人喜爱的身段、道白或穿插 tidbits (e.g. crowd-pleasing postures, spoken parts or interludes in operas and storytelling)

俏式
俏式[qiào shi]〈方 dial.〉俊俏 pretty; handsome; charming

俏皮
俏皮[qiào pi]1.容貌或装饰好看 (of sb.'s features or decorations) beautiful; handsome; stylish; smart 2.举止活泼或谈话有风趣 lively (manners); witty (talk)：俏皮话 witty remark; witticism; wisecrack

俏皮话
俏皮话[qiào pi huà]（～儿 qiào·pihuàr）1.含讽刺口吻的或开玩笑的话 wisecrack; sarcastic or ironical remark; joking words 2.歇后语 two-part allegorical saying, with the 1st part describing the situation and the 2nd part (oft. implied) carrying the message

俏货
俏货[qiào huò] 畅销的商品 goods that sell well; commodities in great demand

俏销
俏销[qiào xiāo] 畅销 sell well; good seller：各种披肩俏销沈阳。All kinds of capes and shawls sell well in Shenyang.

俐
俐[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）另见  伶俐 líng·lì相关词组伶俐 | 伶牙俐齿

俑
俑[yǒng]（ㄩㄥˇ）〈古代 arch.〉殉葬的偶像 wooden or earthen human figure buried with the dead in ancient times; tomb figure; figurine：陶俑 pottery figurine女俑 terracotta female figurine相关词组作俑 | 兵马俑 | 始作俑者

俗
俗[sú]（ㄙㄨˊ）1.风俗 custom; convention：土俗 local custom移风易俗 transform social traditions入境问俗。On entering a country, enquire about its customs. 2.大众的；普遍流行的 popular; common：俗名 popular name俗话 proverb; old saying通俗 popular 3.庸俗 vulgar：俗气 in poor taste俗不可耐 unbearably vulgar 4.指没出家的人（区别于出家的佛教徒等 as compared with ‘Buddhist monks’）secular; lay：僧俗 clergy and laity相关词组拔俗 | 鄙俗 | 伧俗 | 超俗 | 尘俗 | 从俗 | 粗俗 | 低俗 | 恶俗 | 凡俗 | 返俗 | 风俗 | 还俗 | 婚俗 | 旧俗 | 礼俗 | 俚俗 | 流俗 | 陋俗 | 媚俗 | 免俗 | 民俗 | 僧俗 | 时俗 | 世俗 | 释俗 | 随俗 | 通俗 | 土俗 | 脱俗 | 习俗 | 庸俗 | 风俗画 | 民俗学 | 通俗歌曲 | 雅俗共赏 | 村夫俗子 | 约定俗成 | 超尘拔俗 | 愤世嫉俗 | 惊世骇俗 | 入境问俗 | 伤风败俗 | 未能免俗 | 移风易俗俗称 | 俗话 | 俗家 | 俗讲 | 俗名 | 俗气 | 俗曲 | 俗人 | 俗尚 | 俗套 | 俗语 | 俗子 | 俗字 | 俗体字 | 俗文学

俗人
俗人[sú rén]1.世俗的人；一般人（对僧、尼、道士等出家人而言 as compared with monks, nuns and priests）layman; laity 2.庸俗的人 vulgar person; philistine

俗体字
俗体字[sú tǐ zì] 指通俗流行而字体不合规范的汉字，如‘菓’（果）、‘唸’（念）、‘塟’（葬）等 nonstandard forms of Chinese characters, such as 菓（果）, 唸（念）, and 塟（葬）亦 also 俗字 súzì

俗名
俗名[sú míng]1.通俗的名称，不是正式的名称（多有地方性） popular name; local name：阑尾炎俗名盲肠炎。The popular name for appendicitis is 盲肠炎 (mángchángyán) in Chinese. 2.僧人、道士等出家前的名字（跟‘法名’相对 as opposed to ‘clerical name’）(of Buddhist monks or Taoist priests) secular name

俗套
俗套[sú tào]1.习俗上常见的使人感到无聊的礼节 boring conventional formalities 2.陈旧的格调 conventional pattern; convention：不落俗套 depart from convention亦 also 俗套子 sútào·zi

俗子
俗子[sú zǐ] 俗人 ordinary people：凡夫俗子 common herd

俗字
俗字[sú zì] 同 same as 俗体字 sútǐzì

俗家
俗家[sú jiā]1.僧尼道士等称其父母的家 (used by a monk, nun or Taoist priest) my parents' home 2.指没出家的人（对僧人道士等而言） layman (to Buddhist monks and Taoist priests)：俗家打扮 dressed in lay attire

俗尚
俗尚[sú shàng] 习俗所崇尚的风气 prevailing customs：不拘俗尚 not confined by prevailing customs

俗文学
俗文学[sú wén xué] 指我国古代的通俗文学，包括歌谣、曲子、讲史、话本、变文、弹词、宝卷、鼓词、民间传说、笑话、谜语及宋元以来南北戏曲、地方戏等 popular literature in ancient China, such as ballads, songs, history, stories in the vernacular, Buddhist tales (vernacular stories with a Buddhist theme), Suzhou ballad singing (storytelling to the accompaniment of stringed instruments), precious scroll (long prosimetric narrative text with Buddhist inspirations), drum rhymes (versified story sung to the accompaniment of a small drum and other instruments), folk tales, jokes, riddles, local operas, etc.

俗曲
俗曲[sú qǔ]〈旧指 old〉民间的通俗歌曲 folk song亦 also 俚曲 lǐqǔ

俗气
俗气[sú qi] 粗俗；庸俗 vulgar; in poor taste：这块布颜色素净，花样也大方，一点不俗气。The pattern on this piece of cloth is subdued, in good taste, and not at all vulgar.

俗称
俗称[sú chēng]1.通俗地叫做 commonly called：马铃薯俗称土豆儿。Potato is commonly called 土豆儿(tǔdòur) in Chinese. 2. 同 same as 俗名 súmíng ①

俗讲
俗讲[sú jiǎng] 唐代寺院中用于讲解佛教经义的一种说唱形式，以佛教经义为根据，增加一些故事性成分，吸引听众 Tang-dynasty Buddhist ballad-singing; genre of entertainment in Tang-dynasty monasteries consisting mainly of talking and singing when expounding on Buddhist scriptures, plus elements of fiction, to attract an audience

俗话
俗话[sú huà]（～儿 súhuàr） 同 same as 俗语 súyǔ

俗语
俗语[sú yǔ]通俗并广泛流行的定型的语句，简练而形象化，大多数是劳动人民创造出来的，反映人民的生活经验和愿望。如：天下无难事，只怕有心人。common saying; folk adages that gen. reflect the experiences, desires and beliefs of the labouring people, one example being, ‘Nothing is impossible to a willing heart’; 亦 also 俗话 súhuà

俗语
俗语[sú yǔ]通俗并广泛流行的定型的语句，简练而形象化，大多数是劳动人民创造出来的，反映人民的生活经验和愿望。如：天下无难事，只怕有心人。common saying; folk adages that gen. reflect the experiences, desires and beliefs of the labouring people, one example being, ‘Nothing is impossible to a willing heart’; 亦 also 俗话 súhuà

俘
俘[fú]（ㄈㄨˊ）1. 同 same as 俘虏 fúlǔ ①：俘获 capture被俘 be taken prisoner 2. 同 same as 俘虏 fúlǔ ②：战俘 prisoner of war遣俘（遣返战俘）repatriate prisoners of war相关词组生俘 | 战俘俘获 | 俘虏

俘
俘[fú]（ㄈㄨˊ）1. 同 same as 俘虏 fúlǔ ①：俘获 capture被俘 be taken prisoner 2. 同 same as 俘虏 fúlǔ ②：战俘 prisoner of war遣俘（遣返战俘）repatriate prisoners of war相关词组生俘 | 战俘俘获 | 俘虏

俘获
俘获[fú huò] 俘虏和缴获 capture：俘获甚众 capture many enemy soldiers; take many prisoners

俘获
俘获[fú huò] 俘虏和缴获 capture：俘获甚众 capture many enemy soldiers; take many prisoners

俘虏
俘虏[fú lǔ]1.打仗时捉住（敌人）capture; take prisoner：俘虏了敌军师长 capture the enemy division commander 2.打仗时捉住的敌人 captive; captured personnel; prisoner of war：释放俘虏 release the captives

俘虏
俘虏[fú lǔ]1.打仗时捉住（敌人）capture; take prisoner：俘虏了敌军师长 capture the enemy division commander 2.打仗时捉住的敌人 captive; captured personnel; prisoner of war：释放俘虏 release the captives

俚
俚[lǐ]（ㄌㄧˇ）俚俗 vulgar; rustic; unrefined：俚语 slang俚歌 folk song相关词组鄙俚俚歌 | 俚曲 | 俚俗 | 俚语

俚曲

俚歌

俚语
俚语[lǐ yǔ]粗俗的或通行面极窄的方言词，如北京话里的‘撒丫子’（放开步子跑）、‘开瓢儿’（打破头）slang; vulgar or rustic dialect, as 撒丫子 sā yā·zi (running with big strides), and 开瓢儿 kāi∥piáor (break the head) in the Beijing dialect

俚语

俛
