保
保[bǎo]（ㄅㄠˇ）1.保护；保卫 protect; defend：保健 health care保家卫国 protect our homes and defend our country 2.保持 keep; maintain; preserve：保温 heat preservation保鲜 preserve freshness 3.保证；担保做到 guarantee; ensure：保质保量。Quality and quantity are both guaranteed.这块地旱涝保收。This plot produces stable yields despite drought or excessive rain. 4.担保（不犯罪、不逃走等）stand guarantor (or surety) for; bail：保释 release on bail取保候审 (allow defendant) to obtain a guarantor and await trial out of custody 5.保人；保证人 guarantor：作保 be sb.'s guarantor交保 release on bail 6.〈旧时 old〉户籍的编制单位 bao; administrative system organized on the basis of households, with each 保 bǎo consisting of several 甲 jiǎ; 另见  保甲 bǎojiǎ 7.(Bǎo) 姓 a surname相关词组承保 | 担保 | 地保 | 分保 | 管保 | 环保 | 交保 | 具保 | 劳保 | 难保 | 铺保 | 取保 | 确保 | 投保 | 植保 | 中保 | 准保 | 作保 | 再保险 | 吃劳保 | 连环保 | 朝不保夕 | 旱涝保收 | 环境保护 | 劳动保护 | 劳动保险 | 明哲保身 | 社会保险 | 失业保险 | 水土保持 | 植物保护 | 盖世太保 | 自然保护区保安 | 保本 | 保膘 | 保镖 | 保藏 | 保持 | 保存 | 保单 | 保底 | 保固 | 保管 | 保护 | 保皇 | 保甲 | 保价 | 保驾 | 保荐 | 保健 | 保洁 | 保结 | 保举 | 保留 | 保媒 | 保密 | 保苗 | 保命 | 保姆 | 保票 | 保全 | 保人 | 保山 | 保墒 | 保释 | 保守 | 保送 | 保卫 | 保温 | 保鲜 | 保险 | 保修 | 保养 | 保有 | 保佑 | 保育 | 保障 | 保证 | 保值 | 保重 | 保状 | 保准 | 保安队 | 保安族 | 保不定 | 保不齐 | 保不住 | 保护国 | 保护鸟 | 保护人 | 保护伞 | 保护色 | 保健操 | 保健球 | 保龄球 | 保税区 | 保温杯 | 保温瓶 | 保险刀 | 保险灯 | 保险法 | 保险柜 | 保险丝 | 保险箱 | 保育员 | 保育院 | 保证金 | 保证人 | 保证书 | 保护关税 | 保留剧目 | 保外就医 | 保外执行

保
保[bǎo]（ㄅㄠˇ）1.保护；保卫 protect; defend：保健 health care保家卫国 protect our homes and defend our country 2.保持 keep; maintain; preserve：保温 heat preservation保鲜 preserve freshness 3.保证；担保做到 guarantee; ensure：保质保量。Quality and quantity are both guaranteed.这块地旱涝保收。This plot produces stable yields despite drought or excessive rain. 4.担保（不犯罪、不逃走等）stand guarantor (or surety) for; bail：保释 release on bail取保候审 (allow defendant) to obtain a guarantor and await trial out of custody 5.保人；保证人 guarantor：作保 be sb.'s guarantor交保 release on bail 6.〈旧时 old〉户籍的编制单位 bao; administrative system organized on the basis of households, with each 保 bǎo consisting of several 甲 jiǎ; 另见  保甲 bǎojiǎ 7.(Bǎo) 姓 a surname相关词组承保 | 担保 | 地保 | 分保 | 管保 | 环保 | 交保 | 具保 | 劳保 | 难保 | 铺保 | 取保 | 确保 | 投保 | 植保 | 中保 | 准保 | 作保 | 再保险 | 吃劳保 | 连环保 | 朝不保夕 | 旱涝保收 | 环境保护 | 劳动保护 | 劳动保险 | 明哲保身 | 社会保险 | 失业保险 | 水土保持 | 植物保护 | 盖世太保 | 自然保护区保安 | 保本 | 保膘 | 保镖 | 保藏 | 保持 | 保存 | 保单 | 保底 | 保固 | 保管 | 保护 | 保皇 | 保甲 | 保价 | 保驾 | 保荐 | 保健 | 保洁 | 保结 | 保举 | 保留 | 保媒 | 保密 | 保苗 | 保命 | 保姆 | 保票 | 保全 | 保人 | 保山 | 保墒 | 保释 | 保守 | 保送 | 保卫 | 保温 | 保鲜 | 保险 | 保修 | 保养 | 保有 | 保佑 | 保育 | 保障 | 保证 | 保值 | 保重 | 保状 | 保准 | 保安队 | 保安族 | 保不定 | 保不齐 | 保不住 | 保护国 | 保护鸟 | 保护人 | 保护伞 | 保护色 | 保健操 | 保健球 | 保龄球 | 保税区 | 保温杯 | 保温瓶 | 保险刀 | 保险灯 | 保险法 | 保险柜 | 保险丝 | 保险箱 | 保育员 | 保育院 | 保证金 | 保证人 | 保证书 | 保护关税 | 保留剧目 | 保外就医 | 保外执行

保不住
保不住[bǎo bu zhù]1.难免；可能 most likely; more likely than not; probably：这个天儿很难说，保不住会下雨。The weather is rather uncertain; most likely it's going to rain. 2.不能保持 unable to maintain：以前要是遇到这样的大旱，这块地的收成就保不住了。In the past, such a serious drought would have badly affected the yield of this plot of land.

保不住
保不住[bǎo bu zhù]1.难免；可能 most likely; more likely than not; probably：这个天儿很难说，保不住会下雨。The weather is rather uncertain; most likely it's going to rain. 2.不能保持 unable to maintain：以前要是遇到这样的大旱，这块地的收成就保不住了。In the past, such a serious drought would have badly affected the yield of this plot of land.

保价
保价[bǎo jià]一种加收费用的邮递业务，用于寄递较贵重物品、有价证券、包裹等。如有遗失，邮电部门按保价金额负责赔偿。(value) insured; category of registered mail for sending valuables, securities, parcels, etc. If lost, the postal department is responsible for compensating the sender for the insured value：保价信 insured letter保价包裹 insured parcel

保价

保修
保修[bǎo xiū]1.商店或工厂售出的某些商品，在规定限期内免费修理 sales warranty; guarantee by shop or factory to provide free repair service within a certain period of time：本店所售钟表，保修一年。Clocks and watches sold in this shop have a one year's guarantee. 2.保养修理；维修 maintenance; repair：超额完成车辆保修任务 over-fulfil the quota of vehicle maintenance

保值

保健操
保健操[bǎo jiàn cāo] 综合运用我国医学中推拿、穴位按摩等方法而编制的一种健身运动，如眼睛保健操等 setting-up exercises; exercises worked out according to massage and pressure point techniques of traditional Chinese medicine, e.g. setting-up exercises for the eyes

保健操
保健操[bǎo jiàn cāo] 综合运用我国医学中推拿、穴位按摩等方法而编制的一种健身运动，如眼睛保健操等 setting-up exercises; exercises worked out according to massage and pressure point techniques of traditional Chinese medicine, e.g. setting-up exercises for the eyes

保健球
保健球[bǎo jiàn qiú]放在手里来回转动的小铁球。一般为两个。也有用玉、石等做成的。health preservation balls; small iron balls to be rolled in the palm. Generally they come in pairs, and are sometimes made of jade or stone.

保健球

保全
保全[bǎo quán]1.保住使不受损失 save from damage; preserve：保全性命 preserve life保全名誉 preserve one's reputation 2.保护、维修机器设备，使正常使用 maintain; keep in good working order (machines, equipment)：保全工 maintenance worker

保全
保全[bǎo quán]1.保住使不受损失 save from damage; preserve：保全性命 preserve life保全名誉 preserve one's reputation 2.保护、维修机器设备，使正常使用 maintain; keep in good working order (machines, equipment)：保全工 maintenance worker

保养
保养[bǎo yǎng]1.保护调养 take good care of one's health：保养身体 health preservation 2.保护修理，使保持正常状态 maintain; keep in good repair：保养车辆 maintenance of vehicles机器保养得好，可以延长使用年限。Keeping machinery in good repair can prolong its service life.

保养

保温瓶
保温瓶[bǎo wēn píng]日常用品，外面有竹蔑、铁皮、塑料等做成的壳，内装瓶胆。瓶胆由双层玻璃制成，夹层中的两面镀上银等金属，中间抽成真空，瓶口有塞子，可以在较长时间内保持瓶内的温度。盛热水的通常叫暖水瓶；盛冷食的通常叫冰瓶。vacuum flask (or bottle); thermos; article of daily use composed of an outer shell made of plaited bamboo, iron sheeting or plastic, with a cylindrical container inside made of double-layered glass with a vacuum in between and plated with silvery on both sides. The flask is closed with a stopper and can maintain a constant temperature inside for considerable periods of timúhuàr） 同 same as 俗语 súyǔ

保温瓶
保温瓶[bǎo wēn píng]日常用品，外面有竹蔑、铁皮、塑料等做成的壳，内装瓶胆。瓶胆由双层玻璃制成，夹层中的两面镀上银等金属，中间抽成真空，瓶口有塞子，可以在较长时间内保持瓶内的温度。盛热水的通常叫暖水瓶；盛冷食的通常叫冰瓶。vacuum flask (or bottle); thermos; article of daily use composed of an outer shell made of plaited bamboo, iron sheeting or plastic, with a cylindrical container inside made of double-layered glass with a vacuum in between and plated with silvery on both sides. The flask is closed with a stopper and can maintain a constant temperature inside for considerable periods of time. These for storing hot water are called 暖水瓶 nuǎnshuǐpíng, and those for cold food are called 冰瓶 bīngpíng.

保状
保状[bǎo zhuàng]〈旧时 old〉法庭要保证人填写的有一定格式的保证书 pledge form filled out by a guarantor as required by the court

保甲
保甲[bǎo jiǎ]〈旧时 old〉统治者通过户籍编制来统治人民的制度，若干户编作一甲，若干甲编作一保，甲设甲长，保设保长，对人民实行层层管制 bao-jia system; administrative system organized on a households basis, with each jia made up of a set number of households, headed by the chief of jia, and a number of jia made up a bao, headed by the chief of bao, for governing the population at different levels

保留
保留[bǎo liú]1.保存不变 remain as before; retain：遵义会议会址还保留着它当年的面貌。The site of the Zunyi Meeting looks the same as it did in the past. 2.暂时留着不处理 lay aside for future solution; put on hold：不同的意见暂时保留，下次再讨论。Let's hold these different ideas for discussion next time. 3.表示不赞同或有异议 have reservations; disagree：他对这个决议持保留态度。He has reservations about this resolution. 4.留下，不拿出来 retain：他的藏书大部分都赠给国家图书馆了，自己只保留了一小部分。He has donated most of his book collection to the National Library, keeping only a small part for himself.有意见尽量谈出来，不要保留。Please speak frankly without reservation.老师把宝贵的经验和知识毫无保留地教给学生。The teacher has passed all of his valuable experience and knowledge on to his students without withholding anything.

保留剧目
保留剧目[bǎo liú jù mù] 指某个剧团或主要演员演出获得成功的并保留下来以备经常演出的戏剧 repertory; repertoire; drama, opera, or episode that is successfully performed by a company or a leading actor and retained for frequent performance

保皇

保税区
保税区[bǎo shuì qū] 一个国家或地区在其管辖范围内划出的特定区域，境外商人和商品可以自由进出，并在区内享受税收优惠政策 bonded zone; bonded area; designated area in a country or a region where international business people and commodities can come and go freely, within whose limits preferential tax policies apply

保管
保管[bǎo guǎn]1.保藏和管理 take care of; store and manage：图书保管工作 storage of library books这个仓库的粮食保管得很好。The grain in this barn is well stored. 2.在仓库中做保藏和管理工作的人 warehouse keeper; custodian：老保管 veteran custodian这个粮库有两个保管。This grain depot has two warehousemen. 3.完全有把握；担保 for certain; assure：只要肯努力，保管你能学会。I assure you that you will learn if you make the effort.

保结

保育院

保膘

保苗
保苗[bǎo miáo] 采取措施，使地里有足够株数的幼苗，并使茁壮生长 ensure a full stand of sturdy seedlings：灌溉保苗，战胜旱灾。Irrigate to maintain a full stand of seedlings and overcome the drought.

保荐
保荐[bǎo jiàn]负责推荐（人）recommend sb. (for a job, etc.)：保荐贤能 recommend worthy and capable persons

保藏
保藏[bǎo cáng] 把东西藏起来以免遗失或损坏 keep in store; preserve：保藏手稿 preserve the original manuscripts把选好的种子好好保藏起来。Store the selected seeds carefully.

保证
保证[bǎo zhèng]1.担保，担保做到 pledge; guarantee; assure; ensure：我们保证提前完成任务。We pledge to fulfil our tasks ahead of schedule. 2.确保既定的要求和标准，不打折扣 guarantee; promise to meet requirements and standards to the letter, without reservation：保证产品质量 guarantee the quality of products保证科研时间 guarantee the time needed for scientific research 3.作为担保的事物 that which guarantees：安定团结是我们取得胜利的保证。Stability and unity are the guarantees of our victory.

保证书
保证书[bǎo zhèng shū] 为了保证做到某件事情而写成的书面材料 written pledge; guarantee; guaranty; letter of guarantee

保证人
保证人[bǎo zhèng rén]1.保证别人的行为符合要求的人 guarantor; one who guarantees another's actions 2.担保被告人不逃避审讯并随传随到的第三人 guarantor; third party who guarantees the due appearance of the accused in court 3.法律上指担保债务人履行债务的第三人 guarantor; third party who guarantees the debtor will repay the debt

保证金
保证金[bǎo zhèng jīn]1.为了保证履行某种义务而缴纳的一定数量的钱 earnest money; cash deposit; payment to guarantee the performance of certain obligations 2.〈旧时 old〉被告人为了保证不逃避审讯而向法院或警察机关缴纳的一定数量的钱 bail; payment by the accused to court or police to guarantee due appearance in court

保送
保送[bǎo sòng] 由国家、机关、学校、团体等保荐去学习 (of government departments, schools, organizations) recommend sb. for admission to school (without taking the entrance examination)：保送留学生 student recommended for study abroad

保释
保释[bǎo shì]（犯人）取保获释 release on bail; bail：保释出狱 release on bail

保重
保重[bǎo zhòng]（希望别人）注意身体健康 (to express concern about sb. else's health) take care (of oneself)：保重身体。Take good care of yourself.只身在外，请多保重。Take care, as you are away from home all alone.

保镖
保镖[bǎo biāo]1.会技击的人佩带武器，为别人护送财物或保护人身安全 (an armed person) charged with guarding another or escorting property 2.指做这种工作的人 bodyguard; armed escort

保险
保险[bǎo xiǎn]1.集中分散的社会资金，补偿因自然灾害、意外事故或人身伤亡而造成的损失的方法。参加保险的人或单位，向保险机构按期缴纳一定数量的费用，保险机构对在保险责任范围内所受的损失负赔偿责任。insurance; system for pooling scattered social resources to compensate people for losses caused by natural disasters, accidents, personal injuries or death. The insured individual or organization pays a regular premium, and the insurance company is responsible for indemnifying them for losses within the specified contingencies. 2.稳妥可靠 sure; safe：这样做可不保险。It's not safe to do this. 3.担保 assurance; for sure：你依我的话，保险不会出错。If you follow my advice, I can assure you nothing will go wrong.

保险丝
保险丝[bǎo xiǎn sī]电路中保险装置用的导线，一般用铅、锡等熔点低的合金或细铜丝、铜银合金丝制成。当电路中的电流超过限度时，丝就烧断，电路也就断开了，可以防止发生火灾或烧毁电器。fuse; fuse-wire; electric circuit safety device consisting of a metal conductor of low melting point, such as lead or tin, thin wire of copper, or alloy of copper and silver, that melts and interrupts the circuit to prevent fires or burnout of electric appliances when the current exceeds a particular amperage

保险刀
保险刀[bǎo xiǎn dāo]（～儿 bǎoxiǎndāor）刮胡子的用具，刀片安在特制的刀架上，使用时不会刮伤皮肤 safety razor; razor provided with a guard for the blade to prevent cutting the skin亦 also 安全剃刀 ānquán tìdāo

保险柜
保险柜[bǎo xiǎn guì] 用中间夹有石棉的两层铁板做成的并装有特制的锁的柜子，可以防盗、防火 strongbox; safe; fire- and theft-proof chest made from two layers of iron plate with asbestos in between, and equipped with special locks

保险法
保险法[bǎo xiǎn fǎ] 有关保险的机构、管理和保险关系当事人权利、义务等方面的法规 insurance law; laws governing the organization and management of insurance, and stipulating the rights and obligations of parties entering into insurance contracts

保险灯
保险灯[bǎo xiǎn dēng]1.一种带灯罩的大型手提煤油灯 safety lamp; large portable kerosene lamp with a lamp shade 2.〈方 dial.〉汽灯 gas lamp

保险箱
保险箱[bǎo xiǎn xiāng] 小型的保险柜，样子像箱子 strongbox; small safe that looks like a box

保障
保障[bǎo zhàng]1.保护（生命、财产、权利等），使不受侵犯和破坏 protect (life, property, rights, etc.) from damage or violation：保障人身安全 ensure personal safety保障公民权利 guarantee citizen's rights 2.起保障作用的事物 guarantee：安全是生产的保障。Safety is the guarantee of production.

保驾
保驾[bǎo jià]〈旧指 old〉保卫皇帝，现泛指保护某人（多用于开玩笑的场合 usu. humor.）protect the emperor; (in a broad sense) look after sb.：有老张给你保驾，你怕什么？With Old Zhang escorting you, what are you worried about?

保鲜
保鲜[bǎo xiān] 保持蔬菜、水果、肉类等易腐食物的新鲜 preserve freshness; keep vegetables, fruit, meat, etc. fresh：保鲜纸 plastic clingfoil; handi-wrap食品保鲜 keep foodstuffs fresh改进水产品保鲜技术 improve the technology for keeping aquatic products fresh

保龄球
保龄球[bǎo líng qiú]1.室内体育运动项目之一。球场是用硬质木料铺成的细长水平滑道。在滑道终端设10个大瓶柱，摆成三角形。比赛者在投掷线上投球撞击瓶柱。tenpins; bowling; indoor sport in which a ball is rolled down an alley made of hardwood at 10 pins arranged in a triangle array at the end of the alley 2.保龄球运动使用的球，用硬质胶木制成，空心 bowling ball; hollow ball used in bowling, made of hard bakelite亦 also 地滚球 dìgǔnqiú

俞
俞[shù]（ㄕㄨˋ）另见  俞 yú俞[yú]（ㄩˊ）1.文言叹词，表示允许 [an interjection in classical Chinese indicating consent] all right 2.(Yú) 姓 a surname另见  shù 腧相关词组俞允

俞允
俞允[yú yǔn]〈书 fml.〉允许 accede to (a request); consent; approve; permit; allow

俟
俟[qí]（ㄑㄧˊ）另见  [万俟] (Mòqí)另见  sì俟[sì]（ㄙˋ）（竢）〈书 fml.〉等待 wait：俟机进攻 wait for an opportunity to attack另见  qí

信
信1[xìn]（ㄒㄧㄣˋ）1.确实 true; real：信史 true history; authentic history; true historical account信而有征 be reliable and borne out by evidence 2.信用 confidence; trust; faith：守信 keep one's promise; live up to one's word; keep faith失信 break faith; go back on one's word; break one's word威信 prestige言而有信 be as good as one's word 3.相信 believe：信托 trust信任 trust; have confidence in信仰 believe in别信他的话。Don't trust what he said. 4.信奉（宗教）profess faith in; believe in：信教 believe in a religion信徒 religious follower; religious believer 5.听凭；随意；放任 at will; at random; without plan：信步 take a stroll; walk leisurely信口开河 talk at random; speak irresponsibly 6.凭据 sign; evidence：信号 signal信物 keepsake印信 official seal 7.按照习惯的格式把要说的话写下来给指定的对象看的东西；书信 letter; missive; mail; something written down in a customary form for a designated person to know：送信 send a letter or message介绍信 letter of introduction证明信 certificate 8.（信儿 xìnr）信息 message; word; information：音信 information口信儿 oral message通风报信 inform sb. of sth. secret; divulge secret information 9.引信 fuse：信管 fuse 10. 同 same as 芯 (xìn) 11.(Xìn) 姓 a surname〈古 arch.〉又同 also same as 伸 shēn信2[xìn]（ㄒㄧㄣˋ）信石 arsenic：红信 red arsenic白信 white arsenic相关词组报信 | 采信 | 潮信 | 诚信 | 宠信 | 电信 | 笃信 | 复信 | 贺信 | 黑信 | 花信 | 荒信 | 谎信 | 回信 | 家信 | 坚信 | 口信 | 快信 | 来信 | 盲信 | 迷信 | 平信 | 凭信 | 亲信 | 轻信 | 取信 | 确信 | 深信 | 失信 | 守信 | 书信 | 死信 | 听信 | 通信 | 透信 | 威信 | 瞎信 | 相信 | 凶信 | 音信 | 引信 | 印信 | 置信 | 准信 | 资信 | 自信 | 公信力 | 民信局 | 明信片 | 送信儿 | 通信兵 | 通信员 | 公开信 | 航空信 | 鸡毛信 | 匿名信 | 背信弃义 | 将信将疑 | 通信卫星 | 电子信箱 | 善男信女 | 消费信贷 | 语音信箱 | 空间通信 | 轻诺寡信 | 数字通信 | 通风报信 | 卫星通信 | 移动通信 | 有线通信 | 无线电通信 | 第二信号系统 | 第一信号系统 | 中文信息处理信笔 | 信步 | 信差 | 信从 | 信贷 | 信访 | 信风 | 信封 | 信奉 | 信服 | 信鸽 | 信函 | 信号 | 信笺 | 信件 | 信据 | 信赖 | 信念 | 信任 | 信石 | 信实 | 信史 | 信使 | 信士 | 信手 | 信守 | 信条 | 信筒 | 信徒 | 信托 | 信望 | 信物 | 信息 | 信箱 | 信心 | 信宿 | 信仰 | 信义 | 信意 | 信用 | 信誉 | 信札 | 信纸 | 信众 | 信不过 | 信得过 | 信号弹 | 信号灯 | 信号枪 | 信皮儿 | 信瓤儿 | 信天游 | 信息论 | 信用卡 | 信而有征 | 信口雌黄 | 信口开河 | 信马由缰 | 信任投票 | 信赏必罚 | 信誓旦旦 | 信手拈来 | 信息产业 | 信息科学 | 信用合作社 | 信息高速公路

信不过
信不过[xìn bu guò] 不相信 distrust; have no trust in：他一向多疑，对谁都信不过。He is always dubious. He doesn't trust anyone.

信义
信义[xìn yì] 信用和道义 good faith; faith：不守信义 be perfidious

信从
信从[xìn cóng] 信任听从 trust and follow the advice of：盲目信从 trust blindly

信仰
信仰[xìn yǎng] 对某人或某种主张、主义、宗教极度相信和尊敬，拿来作为自己行动的榜样或指南 faith; belief; conviction; firmly believe in and respect sb. or a certain view, doctrine, religion, etc. and take it as a model or guidance for one's actions：宗教信仰 religious belief

信件
信件[xìn jiàn] 书信和递送的文件、印刷品 letters, papers, printed matter, etc.

信任
信任[xìn rèn] 相信而敢于托付 trust; have confidence in：她工作一向认真负责，大家都信任她。She has always been responsible for her work. Everyone trusts her.

信任投票
信任投票[xìn rèn tóu piào]某些国家的议会对内阁（即政府）实行监督的方式之一。议会在讨论组阁或政府政策时，可用投票方式表示对内阁信任或不信任。vote of confidence; form of supervision exercised by a parliament over the cabinet (government) in some countries. When discussing about the formation of a cabinet or the government's policy, a parliament can express their confidence or non-confidence in the cabinet by vote.

信众
信众[xìn zhòng] 信仰某种宗教的人 believer in a certain religion

信使
信使[xìn shǐ] 奉派传达消息或担任使命的人 courier; messenger; messenger sent in haste or on a regular schedule with important or urgent messages or missions：信使往来，络绎不绝。Messengers come and go in a constant stream.

信函
信函[xìn hán] 书信 letters：私人信函 personal letters信函往来 exchange of letters

信口开河
信口开河[xìn kǒu kāi hé] 随口乱说一气 talk irresponsibly; wag one's tongue too freely; talk at random；河 也作 also put as 合 hé

信口雌黄
信口雌黄[xìn kǒu cí huáng] 不顾事实，随口乱说 make irresponsible remarks; wag one's tongue too freely另见  雌黄 cíhuáng

信史
信史[xìn shǐ] 记载确实的历史 true (or authentic) history; faithful historical account

信号
信号[xìn hào]1.用来传递消息或命令的光、电波、声音、动作等 signal; sign given by light, electric wave, sound, gesture, etc. to convey information or a command：信号灯 signal lamp信号枪 signal pistol打信号 send a signal; signal发信号 give a signal 2.电路中用来控制其他部分的电流、电压或无线电发射机发射出的电波 electric current and voltage used to control other parts of a circuit; electric wave from a radio transmitter

信号弹
信号弹[xìn hào dàn] 一种发射后产生有颜色的光或烟的弹药，用于发布信号或通讯联络 signal flare; shot that produces colour light or smoke after being fired, used to give a signal or for liaison purposes

信号枪
信号枪[xìn hào qiāng] 发射信号弹的枪，形状像手枪 flare pistol; signal pistol; special gun in the shape of a pistol used to give signals

信号灯
信号灯[xìn hào dēng] 利用灯光发出各种信号的灯，多用于交通设施、电子设备等 signal lamp; semaphore; lamp that uses light to give a signal, usu. used in transport facilities, electronic devices

信士
信士[xìn shì]1.指信仰佛教而未出家的男人 male Buddhist devotee 2.〈书 fml.〉诚实的人；守信用的人 man (woman) of his (her) word; man of honour

信天游
信天游[xìn tiān yóu]陕北民歌中一类曲调的总称。一般是两句一段，短的只有一段，长的接连数十段。用同一曲调反复演唱，反复时曲调可以灵活变化。rambles in the sky - the name of a number of tunes used for the folk songs of northern Shaanxi. Usually two sentences in a paragraph, a short tune has only one paragraph, while a long one may have scores of paragraphs, sung to the same tune repeatedly. When it is repeated, the tune may change flexibly.

信奉
信奉[xìn fèng]1.信仰并崇奉 believe in：基督教徒信奉上帝。Christians believe in God. 2.相信并奉行 believe in and follow：信奉和平共处五项原则 believe in and adhere to the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence

信守
信守[xìn shǒu] 忠诚地遵守 abide by; follow loyally：信守诺言 keep one's promise to the letter

信实
信实[xìn shí]1.有信用；诚实 trustworthy; honest; reliable：为人信实 be honest and reliable 2.真实可靠 true and reliable：史料信实 true and reliable historical data

信宿
信宿[xìn sù]〈书 fml.〉连宿两夜，表示两夜的时间 stay of two nights; two nights' time：流连信宿 stay two successive nights信宿可至 be expected to arrive in two days

信封
信封[xìn fēng]（～儿 xìnfēngr）装书信的封套 envelope; folded paper container as for a letter, usu. with a gummed flap for sealing

信差
信差[xìn chāi]1.〈旧时 old〉称被派递送公文信件的人 courier; messenger sent in haste or on a regular schedule with important or urgent messages 2.〈旧时 old〉称邮递员 postman

信徒
信徒[xìn tú] 信仰某一宗教的人。也泛指信仰某一学派、主义或主张的人 believer; disciple; follower; adherent; devotee; a person who believes in a certain religion or an advocate of a certain school, doctrine, theory or a view：佛教信徒 Buddhist达尔文的信徒 Darwinist

信得过
信得过[xìn de guò] 相信；可以信任 trust; trustworthy; dependable：我们信得过你。We trust you.这家商店货真价实，信得过。This shop sells quality goods at a fair price. It is trustworthy.

信心
信心[xìn xīn] 相信自己的愿望或预料一定能够实现的心理 confidence; faith; belief that one's wish or expectation is sure to come true：满怀信心 full of confidence信心百倍 fully confident; full of confidence

信念
信念[xìn niàn] 自己认为可以确信的看法 faith; belief; conviction：坚定信念 firm conviction必胜的信念 conviction that one is sure to win

信息
信息[xìn xī]1.音信；消息 information; news; message：数月来一直没有得到有关他的信息。For months, we haven't had any information about him. 2.信息论中指用符号传送的报道，报道的内容是接收符号者预先不知道的 (of information theory) information transmitted by signals with the content not previously known to the recipient

信息产业
信息产业[xìn xī chǎn yè]从事信息生产、流通和应用的产业。通常包括计算机产业、软件业、通信业以及信息服务业等。information industry; industry for information production, circulation and application, usu. including the computer, software, telecommunications and information service industries

信息科学
信息科学[xìn xī kē xué] 研究信息的产生、获取、存储、传输、处理和使用的科学 information science; science dealing with the occurrence, collection, storage, transmission, processing, and retrieval of information

信息论
信息论[xìn xī lùn]研究信息的计量、传递、变换和储存等的科学。通过数学运算可以计算出信息传递的能力和效率，应用在通讯、生理学、物理学等学科中。information theory; branch of study dealing with the measurement, transmission, transformation and storing of information. Through mathematical operation, one can calculate the capability and efficiency of information transmission and apply it to telecommunications, physiology, physics, etc.

信息高速公路
信息高速公路[xìn xī gāo sù gōng lù] 指能够高速运行的通信网络，可以迅速地传送文字、图像、声音等信息 information superhighway; telecommunications network capable of high-speed operation, which can transmit text, picture, sound and other information rapidly

信意
信意[xìn yì] 任意；随意 at random; at will; as one pleases：信意胡闹 be given to making troubles

信手
信手[xìn shǒu] 随手 do sth. spontaneously or without much thought or effort：信手挥霍 squander money at will; spend money wastefully and extravagantly信手写来 write without much thought; have the words at hand; have materials, etc. at one's fingertips

信手拈来
信手拈来[xìn shǒu niān lái]随手拿来。多形容写文章时词汇或材料丰富，不费思索，就能写出来。obtain off-handedly, referring to writing a paper or article with great ease because one has full command of the language or relevant information

信托
信托[xìn tuō]1.信任人，把事情托付给他 trust; entrust：大伙儿信托你，你就大胆去办吧。We all trust you. Go ahead and do it. 2.经营别人委托购销的业务的 do some business on trust：信托部 trust department信托公司 trust company

信据
信据[xìn jù] 确凿可信的证据 reliable evidence; authentic evidence; absolute proof

信服
信服[xìn fú] 相信并佩服 completely accept; be convinced：这些科学论据实在令人信服。These scientific arguments are really convincing.

信望
信望[xìn wàng] 威信和声望 prestige and reputation：信望卓著 enjoy high prestige and reputation

信札
信札[xìn zhá] 书信 letters

信条
信条[xìn tiáo] 信守的准则 article of creed (or faith); creed; precept; tenet

信步
信步[xìn bù] 随意走动；散步 take a leisurely walk; stroll; wander：江边信步 take a walk by the riverside信步而行 stroll along信步来到花坛前 stroll to a flower bed

信物
信物[xìn wù] 作为凭证的物件 authenticating object; token; keepsake：定情信物 keepsake for engagement; object confirming one's engagement

信瓤儿
信瓤儿[xìn ráng r]〈方 dial.〉装在信封里的写好了的信 letter in an envelope

信用
信用[xìn yòng]1.能够履行跟人约定的事情而取得的信任 trustworthiness; credit：讲信用 keep one's word丧失信用 lose one's credit 2.不需要提供物资保证，可以按时偿付的 credit：信用贷款 credit loan; unsecured loan; loan on credit 3.指银行借贷或商业上的赊销、赊购 bank credit; credit selling and buying 4.〈书 fml.〉信任并任用 trust and appoint：信用奸臣 trust a treacherous court official and install him in an important position

信用卡
信用卡[xìn yòng kǎ]由商业银行发行，专供消费者购买商品和支付费用的信用凭证。上面有持卡人姓名、签字和号码等信息。持卡人可在指定的银行、商店等处凭卡签字支取现金、购买商品等，有的可以透支小额现金。credit card; card issued by a commercial bank as a credit certificate to pay for one's purchases. The card bears the name of the holder, his signature and number and enables him to draw money from designated banks or buy commodities in designated shops on the strength of the card and signature. Some cards permit the holder to overdraw a small amount of money.

信用合作社
信用合作社[xìn yòng hé zuò shè] 劳动人民或居民联合起来经营信贷业务的组织，通过储蓄、借贷调剂资金，解决社员生活和生产上的困难 credit cooperative; credit organization run by working people or residents to solve financial difficulties in livelihood or production by regulating funds through savings and credit

信皮儿
信皮儿[xìn pí r] 同 same as 信封 xìnfēng

信石
信石[xìn shí] 砒霜，因产地信州（即今江西上饶一带）得名 arsenic; stone of Xinzhou; arsenic named after Xinzhou, an area in present-day Shangrao, Jiangxi Province

信笔
信笔[xìn bǐ]没有多加考虑，随意（写或画）write at random; write without premeditation：信笔涂鸦 scribble along; write at random信笔写来，直抒胸臆 write as one's heart dictates

信笺
信笺[xìn jiān] 同 same as 信纸 xìnzhǐ

信筒
信筒[xìn tǒng] 邮局在路旁等处设置的供寄信人投信的筒状设备 mailbox; pillar-box; roadside box installed by the post office, into which mail is put for collection亦 also 邮筒 yóutǒng

信箱
信箱[xìn xiāng]1.邮局设置的供人投寄信件的箱子 post box; mailbox; box set up by the post office, into which letters are put for collection 2.设在邮局内供人租来收信用的编有号码的箱子，叫邮政专用信箱。有时某号信箱只是某个收信者的代号。post office box (PO Box). A numbered box for rent for receiving letters is called a special post office box. Sometimes a numbered box is just a code assigned to a certain recipient of letters. 3.收信人设在门前用来收信的箱子 letter box; box put up on the door of a house for receiving letters

信纸
信纸[xìn zhǐ] 供写信用的纸 letter paper; writing paper

信而有征
信而有征[xìn ér yǒu zhēng] 可靠而且有证据 borne out by evidence; be reliable and borne out by evidence

信誉
信誉[xìn yù] 信用和名誉 prestige; credit; reputation：信誉卓著 outstanding prestige or reputation

信誓旦旦
信誓旦旦[xìn shì dàn dàn] 誓言诚恳可信 pledge in all sincerity; vow solemnly

信访
信访[xìn fǎng]指人民群众来信来访（多用于机关团体）letters and visits (i.e. letters of complaint from the masses and the calls they make to lodge complaints)：信访工作 work related to dealing with letters and calls of complains from the people信访部门 department dealing with letters and calls of complaints from the people

信贷
信贷[xìn dài]银行存款、贷款等信用活动的总称。一般指银行的贷款。credit; general term for deposits and loans in a bank; usu. bank loans

信赏必罚
信赏必罚[xìn shǎng bì fá]该奖赏的一定奖赏，该处罚的一定处罚。形容赏罚严明。Due rewards and punishments will be meted out without fail.

信赖
信赖[xìn lài] 信任并依靠 trust; count on; have faith in：他是个值得信赖的朋友。He is a trustworthy friend.

信风
信风[xìn fēng] 在赤道两边的低层大气中，北半球吹东北风，南半球吹东南风，这种风的方向很少改变，叫做信风 trade winds; trades. In the lower atmospheric layer, a wind blows steadily towards the equator from the northeast in the tropics north of the equator and from the southeast in the tropics south of the equator. 亦 also 贸易风 màoyìfēng

信马由缰
信马由缰[xìn mǎ yóu jiāng] 骑着马不拉缰绳，任其自由行动 ride a horse without holding the reins；〈比喻 fig.〉漫无目的地闲逛或随意行动 stroll about aimlessly; act as one pleases

信鸽
信鸽[xìn gē] 专门训练来传递书信的家鸽 carrier pigeon; homing pigeon; homer; pigeons specially trained to carry messages

俣
俣[yǔ]（ㄩˇ）[俣俣]〈书 fml.〉身材高大 of large and tall stature

俤
俤[dì]（ㄉㄧˋ） 同 same as 弟 dì; 用于人名 used as a person's name

俦
俦[chóu]（ㄔㄡˊ）（儔）〈书 fml.〉1.伴侣 companion：俦侣 companion俦伴 comrade; mate; companion 2.等；辈 class; generation：俦类 the same generation; peers; the same kind相关词组鸾俦俦类 | 俦侣

俦侣
俦侣[chóu lǚ]〈书 fml.〉伴侣 companion

俦类
俦类[chóu lèi]〈书 fml.〉同辈的人；同类 peers; of the same class or generation亦 also 畴类 chóulèi

俨
俨[yǎn]（ㄧㄢˇ）（儼）〈书 fml.〉1.庄重 majestic; solemn; dignified 2.很像 just as; like相关词组俨然 | 俨如

俨如
俨如[yǎn rú] 十分像 just like：日光灯下俨如白昼。Under the fluorescent lamp it looks as bright as day.

俨然
俨然[yǎn rán]〈书 fml.〉1.形容庄严 solemn; dignified：望之俨然 look dignified 2.形容齐整 neat：屋舍俨然 houses laid out neatly 3.形容很像 just like：这孩子说起话来俨然是个大人。This child speaks just like a grown-up.

俩
俩[liǎ]（ㄌㄧㄚˇ）（倆）1.两个 two：咱俩 we two; both of us; the two of us你们俩 you two; the two of you, both of you一共五个，我吃了俩，他吃了仨。There are five in all. I ate two and he ate three. 2.不多；几个 some; several; a few：就是有俩钱儿，也不能乱花呀。Even if you have some money, you can by no means squander it.一共只有这么俩人，恐怕还不够。There are only a few people. I'm afraid this is not enough.注意 NOTE：‘俩’后面不再接‘个’字或其他量词 No 个 gè or other classifier is added after 俩.另见  liǎng俩[liǎng]（ㄌㄧㄤˇ）（倆）另见  伎俩 jìliǎng另见  liǎ相关词组伎俩 | 公母俩

俪
俪[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）（儷）1.成对的；双的 paired; parallel：骈俪 parallelism俪句 parallel sentences 2.指夫妇 married couple：俪影 photograph of a couple相关词组伉俪 | 骈俪

俭
俭[jiǎn]（ㄐㄧㄢˇ）（儉）俭省 thrifty; frugal：勤俭 diligent and frugal; hardworking and frugal节俭 thrifty省吃俭用 live frugally; live a frugal life俭以养廉。Frugality makes incorruptibility.相关词组节俭 | 勤俭 | 省俭 | 勤工俭学 | 克勤克俭俭朴 | 俭省 | 俭约

俭朴
俭朴[jiǎn pǔ] 俭省朴素 thrifty and simple; economical：服装俭朴 dress simply生活俭朴 lead a thrifty and simple life

俭省
俭省[jiǎn shěng] 爱惜物力；不浪费财物 economical; thrifty; careful management of one's money and resources：精打细算，过日子俭省 live a frugal and simple life through careful management of one's money

俭约
俭约[jiǎn yuē]〈书 fml.〉俭省 thrifty; economical

修
修1[xiū]（ㄒㄧㄡ）1.修饰 embellish; decorate：装修 paint and decorate; fit up a house or apartment; fit up the interior of a house; fix up; interior decoration修辞 rhetoric 2.修理；整治 repair; mend; overhaul：修车 repair a vehicle修桥补路 build bridges and repair roads一定要把淮河修好。We must harness the Huai River. 3.写；编写 write; compile：修函 write a letter修史 compile history修县志 compile the history and other records of a county 4.（学问、品行方面）学习和锻炼 (of learning, character, conduct, etc.) study; cultivate：修养 cultivate修业 study at school进修 receive further (usu. on-the-job) education 5.修行（迷信 superstition）practise Buddhism or Taoism：修炼 (of Taoists) practise austerities; practise asceticism修仙 train and cultivate oneself to attain immortality 6.兴建；建筑 build; construct：修建 build修水库 build a reservoir新修了一条铁路。A new railway has been built. 7.剪或削，使整齐 trim; prune：修树枝 prune a tree修指甲 trim (or manicure) fingernails 8.指修正主义 revisionism：反修防修 fight and prevent revisionism 9.(Xiū) 姓 a surname修2[xiū]（ㄒㄧㄡ）〈书 fml.〉长；高 long; tall and slender：修长 tall and slender修竹 tall bamboo相关词组保修 | 报修 | 必修 | 大修 | 翻修 | 返修 | 辅修 | 副修 | 回修 | 机修 | 检修 | 进修 | 免修 | 抢修 | 失修 | 岁修 | 维修 | 小修 | 兴修 | 选修 | 整修 | 重修 | 专修 | 装修 | 自修 | 不修边幅 | 重修旧好 | 偃武修文 | 明修栈道，暗度陈仓修补 | 修辞 | 修订 | 修短 | 修复 | 修改 | 修盖 | 修函 | 修行 | 修好 | 修剪 | 修建 | 修脚 | 修浚 | 修理 | 修炼 | 修面 | 修明 | 修女 | 修配 | 修葺 | 修缮 | 修身 | 修史 | 修士 | 修饰 | 修书 | 修仙 | 修养 | 修业 | 修造 | 修长 | 修整 | 修正 | 修筑 | 修辞格 | 修辞学 | 修道院 | 修旧利废 | 修正主义

修业
修业[xiū yè]（学生）在校学习 study at school：修业期满 have completed one's term of schooling

修书
修书[xiū shū]〈书 fml.〉1.编纂书籍 compile a book 2.写信 write a letter：修书一封 write a letter

修仙
修仙[xiū xiān]炼丹服药，安神养性，以求长生不老（迷信 superstition）make pills and take them orally, calm the nerves and cultivate oneself to attain immortality

修养
修养[xiū yǎng]1.指理论、知识、艺术、思想等方面的一定水平 accomplishment; training; mastery in theory, knowledge, art, ideology, etc.：理论修养 attainments in theories文学修养 grounding in literature; literary taste他是一个很有修养的艺术家。He is an artist of high accomplishment (or a highly accomplished artist). 2.指养成的正确的待人处事的态度 accomplishment in self-cultivation; self-possession：这人有修养，从不和人争吵。This man is really self-possessed, and never argues or quarrels with others.

修函
修函[xiū hán]〈书 fml.〉写信 write a letter

修剪
修剪[xiū jiǎn]1.用剪子修（枝叶、指甲等）prune; trim; clip (trees, fingernails, etc.)：修剪果树 prune fruit trees 2.修改剪接 change and cut：修剪影片 film editing; montage

修史
修史[xiū shǐ]〈书 fml.〉编写史书 compile or write history：直笔修史 write history in a straightforward (or unprejudiced) way

修士
修士[xiū shì] 天主教或东正教中出家修道的男子 monk (of the Roman Catholic and Greek Orthodox churches); brother; friar

修复
修复[xiū fù]1.修理使恢复完整（多指建筑物 buildings）repair; restore; renovate：修复河堤 repair a river dyke修复铁路 repair a railway修复两国关系 patch up relations between two countries 2.有机体的组织发生缺损时，由新生的组织来补充使恢复原来的形态 repair (of damaged cells or tissues); replacement of damaged cells or tissues by new cells or tissues to restore it to the original form

修女
修女[xiū nǚ] 天主教或东正教中出家修道的女子 (of Roman Catholic and Greek Orthodox churches) nun; sister

修好
修好[xiū hǎo]〈方 dial.〉行好；行善 do good deeds：修好积德 do good deeds你修修好吧，再宽限几天。Do me a favour by giving me a few more days' grace, won't you?修好[xiū hǎo]〈书 fml.〉亲善友好 foster cordial relations between states：两国修好 cultivate cordial relations between two countries

修建
修建[xiū jiàn]（土木工程）施工 build; construct; erect (civil engineering projects)：修建铁路 build (or construct) a railway

修改
修改[xiū gǎi] 改正文章、计划等里面的错误、缺点 revise; modify; amend; alter; correct the mistakes, errors or defects in an article, plan, etc.：修改初稿 revise a draft修改章程 revise a charter修改计划 revise a plan

修整
修整[xiū zhěng] 修理，整治 repair and maintain：修整农具 repair and maintain farm implements修整果树 prune fruit trees

修旧利废
修旧利废[xiū jiù lì fèi] 修理和利用废旧物品，使再发挥作用 repair and recycle; repair and utilize worn-out or discarded things

修明
修明[xiū míng]〈书 fml.〉指政治清明 (of a government) honest and enlightened

修正
修正[xiū zhèng]1.修改使正确 revise; amend; correct：修正错误 correct one's mistakes最后核对材料，修正了一些数字 revised some figures on the final check of the data 2.篡改（马克思列宁主义）revise; mutilate Marxism-Leninism

修正主义
修正主义[xiū zhèng zhǔ yì] 国际共产主义运动中披着马克思主义外衣的反马克思主义的思潮 revisionism; anti-Marxist trend in the disguise of Marxism in the international communist movement

修浚
修浚[xiū jùn] 修理疏通 dredge：修浚河道 dredge a river

修炼
修炼[xiū liàn] 指道家修养练功、炼丹等活动 (of Taoists) practise austerities; practise asceticism; engage in alchemy to make pills of immortality

修理
修理[xiū lǐ]1.使损坏的东西恢复原来的形状或作用 repair; mend; overhaul; fix：修理厂 repair shop; fix-it shop修理机车 overhaul a locomotive 2. 同 same as 修剪 xiūjiǎn ①; 同 same as 整治 zhěngzhì ①：修理树木 prune a tree 3.〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 整治 zhěngzhì ②：把他修理一顿。He was given a scolding. or He was taken to task.

修盖
修盖[xiū gài]修建（房屋）build (houses)：修盖教学楼 build a classroom building

修短
修短[xiū duǎn]〈书 fml.〉长短 length：修短合度 of moderate height; neither too tall nor too short

修筑
修筑[xiū zhù]修建（道路、工事等 of roads, tools, etc.）build; construct; put up：修筑机场 build an airport修筑码头 build a dock修筑拦河坝 build a dam across a river

修缮
修缮[xiū shàn]修理（建筑物）repair; renovate：修缮厂房 repair workshops

修脚
修脚[xiū jiǎo] 修剪脚趾甲或削去脚上的趼子 pedicure; trim the toenails or cut off the thick callus on the feet

修葺
修葺[xiū qì] 修缮 repair; renovate：房屋修葺一新。The house has taken on a new look after renovation. or The house has been completely renovated.

修行
修行[xiū xíng] 佛教徒或道教徒虔诚地学习教义，并照着教义去实行 practise Buddhism or Taoism by studying and following the tenets piously：出家修行 become a Buddhist or Taoist monk or nun

修补
修补[xiū bǔ]1.修理破损的东西使完好 do up; mend; fix up; patch up; repair; revamp：修补轮胎 mend a tyre修补渔网 mend a fishing net 2.有机体的组织发生损耗时，由体内的蛋白质来补充叫修补 repair; when a loss is caused to the tissues of an organism, it is replenished by the protein in its body

修订
修订[xiū dìng]修改订正（书籍、计划等）amend; revise (books, plans, etc.)：修订本 revised edition修订教学计划 revise a teaching plan

修身
修身[xiū shēn] 指努力提高自己的品德修养 cultivate one's moral character：修身养性 cultivate one's moral character and develop one's temperament

修辞
修辞[xiū cí] 修饰文字词句，运用各种表现方式，使语言表达得准确、鲜明而生动有力 rhetoric; effective use of words to make the language accurate, clear-cut, vivid and forceful by various ways of expression

修辞学
修辞学[xiū cí xué] 语言学的一个部门，研究如何使语言表达得准确、鲜明而生动有力 rhetoric; branch of linguistics dealing with the accurate, clear, vivid and effective use of words in writing and speaking

修辞格
修辞格[xiū cí gé] 各种修辞方式，如比喻、对偶、排比等 figures of speech, such as metaphor, antithesis, parallelism, etc.

修造
修造[xiū zào]1.修理并制造 build and repair：修造农具 build and repair farm tools修造船只 build or repair ships 2.建造 build：修造厂房 build factory premises修造花园 build a garden

修道院
修道院[xiū dào yuàn]天主教和东正教等教徒出家修道的机构。在天主教会中，也指培养神甫的机构。monastery or convent; establishment where Catholics and followers of the Eastern Orthodox Church cultivate themselves in the religions. In the Catholic Church, these places are also where priests are trained.

修配
修配[xiū pèi] 修理机器等的损坏部分和配齐其中残缺的零件 make repairs and supply replacements

修长
修长[xiū cháng] 细长 tall and thin; slender：修长身材 slender figure

修面
修面[xiū miàn]〈方 dial.〉刮脸 shave; have a shave

修饰
修饰[xiū shì]1.修整装饰使整齐美观 decorate; adorn; embellish：修饰一新 newly decorated 2.梳妆打扮 make up and dress up：略加修饰，就显得很利落。(You would) look quite neat with a little touch-up. 3.修改润饰，使语言文字明确生动 polish (a piece of writing)：你把这篇稿子再修饰一下。Please polish this piece of writing again.

俯
俯[fǔ]（ㄈㄨˇ）1.头低下（跟‘仰’相对 as opposed to‘face upward’）bow (one's head); bend forward or down：俯首 stoop; bow one's head俯视 overlook; look down at俯冲 nose dive 2.〈敬辞 pol.〉〈旧时 old〉公文书信中用来称对方对自己的行动 [used in official documents or letters] deign to; condescend to：俯允 condescend to grant; deign to approve相关词组俯察 | 俯冲 | 俯伏 | 俯角 | 俯就 | 俯瞰 | 俯念 | 俯视 | 俯首 | 俯卧 | 俯仰 | 俯允 | 俯视图 | 俯卧撑 | 俯拾即是 | 俯首帖耳 | 俯仰由人 | 俯仰之间

俯仰
俯仰[fǔ yǎng]〈书 fml.〉1.低头和抬头 bend and lift one's head：俯仰之间 in the twinkling of an eye; in an instant 2.指一举一动 action：俯仰由人 be at sb.'s beck and call

俯仰之间
俯仰之间[fǔ yǎng zhī jiān] 形容时间很短 in the twinkling of an eye; in an instant：俯仰之间，船已驶出港口。Very quickly, the ship sailed out of the harbour.

俯仰由人
俯仰由人[fǔ yǎng yóu rén]〈比喻 fig.〉一切受人支配 completely controlled by another; be at sb.'s beck and call

俯伏
俯伏[fǔ fú] 趴在地上（多表示屈服或崇敬 in subservience or respect）lie prostrate：俯伏听命 humbly take orders

俯允
俯允[fǔ yǔn]〈敬辞 pol.〉称对方或上级允许 (of sb. or one's superior) condescend to grant; deign to approve：承蒙俯允所请，不胜感激。My gratitude knows no bounds at your kind granting of my request.

俯冲
俯冲[fǔ chōng]（飞机等）以高速度和大角度向下飞 (of plane, etc.) dive; nosedive：俯冲轰炸 dive-bombing老鹰从天空俯冲下来。The eagle dived from the sky.

俯卧
俯卧[fǔ wò] 脸朝下躺着 lie prostrate; lie on one's stomach：战士一动也不动地俯卧在地上。The soldier lay on his stomach motionless.

俯卧撑
俯卧撑[fǔ wò chēng] 增强臂力的一种辅助性体育运动。两手和两前脚掌撑地，身体俯卧，连续平起平落。 press-up; push-up; exercise to increase arm strength, in which one keeps a prone position with hands and balls of the feet on the ground, and pushes up and down by bending and straightening the arms

俯察
俯察[fǔ chá]〈书 fml.〉1.向低处看 look down：仰观俯察 look up and down 2.〈敬辞 pol.〉称对方或上级对自己理解 (of sb. or one's superior) deign to examine; kindly understand：所陈一切，尚祈俯察。I hope you will be so kind as to look into what I have described.

俯就
俯就[fǔ jiù]1.〈敬辞 pol.〉用于请对方同意担任职务 condescend to take or accept (a position, etc.)：经理一职，尚祈俯就。I hope you will condescend to accept the position of manager. 2.迁就；将就 tolerate; make do with; put up with：事事俯就 tolerate everything

俯念
俯念[fǔ niàn]〈敬辞 pol.〉称对方或上级体念 (of sb. or one's superior) kindly bear in mind; be kind enough to consider：俯念群情 give sympathetic consideration to public sentiment

俯拾即是
俯拾即是[fǔ shí jí shì]只要弯下身子来捡，到处都是。形容地上的某一类东西、要找的某一类例证、文章中的错别字等很多。not uncommon; (there are so many examples, objects on the ground, or wrongly written Chinese characters in an article that) one only has to stoop to pick them up; 亦 also 俯拾皆是 fǔ shí jiē shì

俯瞰
俯瞰[fǔ kàn] 俯视 overlook; look down at

俯视
俯视[fǔ shì] 从高处往下看 overlook; look down at：站在山上俯视蜿蜒的公路 look down from a hilltop at a meandering road

俯视图
俯视图[fǔ shì tú] 由物体上方向下做正投影得到的视图 vertical view; view of an object from above; bird's-eye view亦 also 顶视图 dǐngshìtú

俯角
俯角[fǔ jiǎo] 视线在水平线以下时，在视线所在的垂直平面内，视线与水平线所成的角叫做俯角 angle of depression; angle between a horizontal line and a line of vision below it, in the vertical plane

俯首
俯首[fǔ shǒu]1.低下头 bow one's head; stoop：俯首沉思 bow one's head in thought 2.〈比喻 fig.〉顺从 obey：俯首听命 obey submissively; be at sb.'s beck and call

俯首帖耳
俯首帖耳[fǔ shǒu tiē ěr] 形容非常驯服恭顺（含贬义 derog.）docile and obedient; servile；帖 tiē 亦 also 贴 tiē

俱
俱[Jū]（ㄐㄩ） 姓 a surname另见  jù俱[jù]（ㄐㄩˋ）〈书 fml.〉全；都 all; complete：百废俱兴。All that was left undone is now being undertaken.面面俱到 attend to each and every aspect of a matter另见  Jū相关词组百废俱兴 | 两败俱伤 | 面面俱到 | 泥沙俱下 | 声泪俱下 | 万念俱灰 | 与日俱增 | 与时俱进 | 玉石俱焚 | 万事俱备，只欠东风俱全 | 俱乐部

俱乐部
俱乐部[jù lè bù]进行社会、文化、艺术、娱乐等活动的团体和场所  club; association of persons for a common cause, e.g. social, cultural, artistic or recreational activities; meeting place of a club[日，从英 club]

俱全
俱全[jù quán] 齐全；完备 complete in all varieties：一应俱全。Everything needed is there.样样俱全。Everything necessary is available.麻雀虽小，五脏俱全。Small as it is, a sparrow has all the vital organs - small but complete.

俳
俳[pái]（ㄆㄞˊ）1.〈古代 arch.〉指滑稽戏 comedy 2.〈书 fml.〉诙谐；滑稽 comical; funny：俳谐 humorous相关词组俳句 | 俳谐 | 俳优

俳优
俳优[pái yōu]〈古代 arch.〉指演滑稽戏的艺人 comedian

俳句
俳句[pái jù] 日本的一种短诗，以十七个音为一首，首句五个音，中句七个音，末句五个音 haiku; form of Japanese verse containing three lines in a total of 17 syllables - five in the 1st line, seven in the 2nd line, and five in the 3rd line

俳谐
俳谐[pái xié]〈书 fml.〉诙谐 humorous：俳谐文（古代指隐喻、调笑、讥讽的文章）writing that is metaphorical, funny or sarcastic

俵
俵[biào]（ㄅㄧㄠˋ）〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 俵分 biàofēn相关词组俵分

俵分
俵分[biào fēn] 按份儿或按人分发 distribute according to the number of portions or persons

俶
俶[chù]（ㄔㄨˋ）〈书 fml.〉1.开始 begin 2.整理 sort out：俶装（整理行装）pack (things for travel)另见  tì俶[tì]（ㄊㄧˋ）[俶傥] (tìtǎng) 同 same as 倜傥 tìtǎng另见  chù相关词组俶尔

俶尔
俶尔[chù ěr]〈书 fml.〉忽然 suddenly：鱼游水中，俶尔远逝。The fish was swimming in the water, but disappeared all of a sudden.

俸
俸[fèng]（ㄈㄥˋ）1.俸禄 salary; pay; stipend：薪俸 salary (usu. of ranking government employee) 2.(Fèng) 姓 a surname相关词组薪俸俸禄

俸禄
俸禄[fèng lù] 封建时代官吏的薪水 official's emolument in feudal times

俺
俺[ǎn]（ㄢˇ）〈方 dial.〉〈代词 pron.〉1.我们（不包括听话的人） we or our (the person spoken to not included)：你先去，俺几个随后就到。You go first - we'll be there right away. 2.我 I or me：你们都走吧，就俺一个人留下。Go, all of you, and I'll stay behind by myself.

俾
俾[bǐ]（ㄅㄧˇ）〈书 fml.〉使（达到某种效果）in order to; so that; so as to：俾众周知 so as to make sth. known to all (or everyone); for the information of all俾有所悟 in order to understand; so as to realize

倅
倅[cuì]（ㄘㄨㄟˋ）〈书 fml.〉副；副职 deputy; assistant

倌
倌[guān]（ㄍㄨㄢ）（～儿 guānr）1.农村中专管饲养某些家畜的人员 man or boy whose work is tending and feeding domestic animals; keeper of domestic animals; herdsman：羊倌儿 shepherd猪倌儿 swineherd 2.〈旧时 old〉某些行业中被雇用专做某种活计的人 hired hand in certain trade：堂倌儿 waiter磨倌儿（磨面的人）miller相关词组马倌 | 堂倌 | 羊倌 | 猪倌

倍
倍[bèi]（ㄅㄟˋ）1.跟原数相等的数，某数的几倍就是用几乘某数 times; fold; number equal to the original; n times a number meaning to multiply it by n：二的五倍是十。Five times two is ten. 2.加倍 double; redouble：事半功倍 half the work with twice the results勇气倍增 redouble one's courage相关词组百倍 | 低倍 | 高倍 | 加倍 | 五倍子 | 事倍功半 | 事半功倍倍道 | 倍儿 | 倍加 | 倍率 | 倍式 | 倍数 | 倍增

倍儿
倍儿[bèi r]〈方 dial.〉非常；十分 very; terribly：倍儿新 awfully new倍儿亮 awfully bright倍儿精神 very energetic; full of vim and vigour

倍加
倍加[bèi jiā] 指程度比原来深得多 all the more：倍加爱惜 take extra care of雨后的空气倍加清新。After a rainfall, the air is all the more fresh.

倍增
倍增[bèi zēng] 成倍地增长 double; redouble; multiply：信心倍增 double one's confidence勇气倍增 redouble one's courage

倍式
倍式[bèi shì]一个整式能够被另一整式整除，这个整式就是另一整式的倍式。如a2 -b2 是a+b和a-b的倍式。multiple formula; If one integral expression can be exactly divided by another, it is known as its multiple formula (e.g. a2 -b2  is the multiple formula of a+b and a-b).

倍数
倍数[bèi shù]1.一个数能够被另一数整除，这个数就是另一数的倍数。如15能够被3或5整除，因此15是3的倍数，也是5的倍数。multiple; number that exactly contains another integral number of times (e.g. 15 can be exactly divided by 3 or 5, so 15 is a multiple of both 3 and 5) 2.一个数除以另一数所得的商。如a÷b=c，就是说a是b的c倍，c是倍数。quotient of one number divided by another; times (e.g. if a÷b=c, a is c times b, and c is the multiple)

倍率
倍率[bèi lǜ] 望远镜、显微镜的物镜焦距和目镜焦距的比值，比值越大，放大的倍数越大 magnifying power; ratio between the focuses of the object lens and the sight lens of a telescope or microscope, and the bigger the ratio, the bigger the magnifying power

倍道
倍道[bèi dào]〈书 fml.〉兼程 travel at double speed

倏
倏[shū]（ㄕㄨ）（倐）〈书 fml.〉极快地 suddenly; quickly：倏已半年。Six months passed in a flash.相关词组倏地 | 倏忽 | 倏然

倏地
倏地[shū dì] 极快地；迅速地 suddenly; quickly：倏地闪过一个人影。A shadow flashed past.

倏忽
倏忽[shū hū] 很快地；忽然 suddenly; quickly：倏忽不见 suddenly (or quickly) disappear山地气候倏忽变化，应当随时注意。The weather in mountainous regions changes quickly, and provision must be made for this.

倏然
倏然[shū rán]〈书 fml.〉1.忽然 suddenly：倏然一阵暴雨。A rainstorm came on suddenly. 2.形容极快 swiftly; quickly：一道流星，倏然而逝。A meteor shot across the sky and vanished.

倒
倒1[dǎo]（ㄉㄠˇ）1.（人或竖立的东西）横躺下来 fall; topple; tumble down：摔倒 slip and fall down卧倒 lie down风把树刮倒了。The gale uprooted the tree. 2.（事业）失败；垮台 collapse; fail; go bankrupt; go out of business：倒闭 go bankrupt倒台 fall打倒 defeat (sb. or sth.); put down; down with 3.进行反对活动，使政府、首脑人物等垮台 wage a movement to overthrow a government or a political leader：倒阁 overturn a cabinet倒袁（世凯）campaign against Yuan Shikai 4.（戏曲演员的嗓子）变低或变哑 (of an opera singer) become hoarse; lose one's voice：他的嗓子倒了，不再登台。He has lost his voice and will not perform again. 5.（食欲）变得不好 spoil (appetite)：倒胃口 have no appetite; lose one's appetite倒2[dǎo]（ㄉㄠˇ）1.转移；转换 transfer; shift：倒车 change bus or train倒班 change shifts倒手 do sth. through a third party 2.腾挪 make room for; move around：地方太小，倒不开身儿。This place is so small, there is no room to move around. 3.出倒 sell out：铺子倒出去了。The shop has been sold. 4.倒买倒卖 profiteer; speculate：倒汇 profiteer through foreign exchange倒粮食 profiteer from trades in food grains 5.指倒爷 scalper; speculator; profiteer另见  dào倒1[dào]（ㄉㄠˋ）1.上下颠倒或前后颠倒 inverted; upside down; inverse：倒影 inverted image; inverted reflection in water倒悬 hang by the feet倒数第一行 first line from the bottom这几本书次序放倒了。These books have been placed in the reverse order. 2.反面的；相反的 reverse; converse：倒彩 booing; hooting; catcalls倒算 counter-attack to settle old scores倒找钱 pay instead of receiving money 3.使向相反的方向移动或颠倒 move backward; turn upside down; reverse; invert：倒车 back a car倒退 go backwards; fall back; regress; retrogress 4.反转或倾斜容器使里面的东西出来；倾倒 tip; pour; dump：倒茶 pour tea倒垃圾 dump rubbish; empty out the garbage他恨不能把心里的话都倒出来。He wanted to pour out everything that was on his mind.倒2[dào]（ㄉㄠˋ）〈副词 adv.〉1.表示跟意料相反 [contrary to what is expected or thought]：(a)相反的意思较明显 [the opposite meaning being obvious]：本想省事，没想倒费事了。He thought it would be easy, but it was more difficult than he had expected.你太客气，倒显得见外了。You are so polite that you make me feel like a stranger. (b)相反的意思较轻微 [mildly contrary meaning]：屋子不宽绰，收拾得倒还干净（没想到）。The room isn't large but it is kept (unexpectedly) clean and tidy.你有什么理由，我倒要听听（我还以为你没有什么可说了呢）。What are your reasons? I have to hear them. (I thought you would have nothing to say.)说起他来，我倒想起一件事来了（你不说我不会想起来）。Speaking of him, I am reminded of something.注意 NOTE：a 类可以改用‘反倒’，b 类不能 In the case of（a） 倒 dào can be replaced with 反倒 fǎndào, but In the case of（b） it cannot be replaced. 2.表示事情不是那样，有反说的语气 [used to indicate the contrary]：你说得倒容易，可做起来并不容易。It's easier said than done. 3.表示让步 [ used to indicate concession]：我跟他认识倒认识，就是不太熟。I know him all right, but not very well. 4.表示催促或追问，有不耐烦的语气 [used to urge sb. to respond quickly, indicating impatience]：你倒说呀！Out with it! or Well, say it then!你倒去不去呀？So are you going or not?另见  dǎo相关词组拜倒 | 驳倒 | 出倒 | 打倒 | 颠倒 | 反倒 | 官倒 | 绝倒 | 拉倒 | 潦倒 | 倾倒 | 推倒 | 压倒 | 帮倒忙 | 不倒翁 | 喝倒彩 | 开倒车 | 路倒儿 | 两边倒 | 随风倒 | 一边倒 | 颠倒黑白 | 颠倒是非 | 东倒西歪 | 横倒竖歪 | 扳不倒儿 | 颠来倒去 | 颠三倒四 | 翻江倒海 | 翻箱倒柜 | 反攻倒算 | 解民倒悬 | 排山倒海 | 轻重倒置 | 倾箱倒箧 | 太阿倒持 | 投机倒把 | 移山倒海 | 穷途潦倒 | 墙倒众人推 | 树倒猢狲散 | 竹筒倒豆子倒把 | 倒班 | 倒板 | 倒闭 | 倒毙 | 倒彩 | 倒仓 | 倒茬 | 倒产 | 倒车 | 倒风 | 倒伏 | 倒戈 | 倒挂 | 倒灌 | 倒换 | 倒汇 | 倒剪 | 倒嚼 | 倒噍 | 倒立 | 倒流 | 倒卖 | 倒霉 | 倒赔 | 倒嗓 | 倒是 | 倒手 | 倒数 | 倒算 | 倒塌 | 倒台 | 倒腾 | 倒替 | 倒贴 | 倒头 | 倒退 | 倒休 | 倒序 | 倒叙 | 倒悬 | 倒牙 | 倒烟 | 倒仰 | 倒爷 | 倒影 | 倒映 | 倒运 | 倒灶 | 倒账 | 倒找 | 倒置 | 倒转 | 倒插门 | 倒春寒 | 倒读数 | 倒儿爷 | 倒过儿 | 倒好儿 | 倒计时 | 倒卵形 | 倒轮闸 | 倒牌子 | 倒胃口 | 倒栽葱 | 倒座儿 | 倒背如流 | 倒打一耙 | 倒海翻江 | 倒行逆施 | 倒买倒卖

倒买倒卖
倒买倒卖[dǎo mǎi dǎo mài] 低价买进，高价卖出以取利的投机活动 buy low and sell high to make profit by using the rise and fall in prices

倒产
倒产[dào chǎn] 同 same as 逆产2  nìchǎn

倒仓
倒仓1[dǎo cāng]1.把仓里的粮食全取出来，晾晒之后，再装进去 take grain out of a granary to sun, and then put it back 2.把一个仓里的粮食转到另一个仓里去 transfer grain from one granary to another倒仓2[dǎo cāng] 指戏曲演员在青春期发育时嗓音变低或变哑 (of a young opera singer) change of voice (in puberty)

倒仰
倒仰[dào yǎng]〈方 dial.〉（倒仰儿 dàoyǎngr）仰面跌倒 fall backwards

倒伏
倒伏[dǎo fú] 农作物因根茎无力，支持不住叶子和穗的重量而倒在地上 (of a farm crop) lay flat; lodge; collapse because stems and roots are too weak to hold up leaves and ears

倒休
倒休[dǎo xiū]（职工）掉换工作日和休息日 (of workers and staff) exchange working days and holidays; stagger holidays

倒儿爷
倒儿爷[dǎo r yé] 同 same as 倒爷 dǎoyé

倒剪
倒剪[dào jiǎn] 反剪 with one's hands clasped or tied behind one's back：倒剪双手 with hands clasped at the back

倒卖
倒卖[dǎo mài] 低价买进，高价卖出。多指投机倒把 speculative buying and selling; buy at low price and sell at high price; engage in speculation and profiteering：转手倒卖 resell at a profit; speculate倒卖粮食 secretly hoard and sell food grain; scalp food grain

倒卵形
倒卵形[dào luǎn xíng] 叶子的一种形状,跟鸡蛋相似，较窄的一端靠近叶柄 (of leaves) obovate; shaped like an upside-down egg

倒叙
倒叙[dào xù]文章、电影等的一种艺术手法。先交代故事结局或某些情节，然后回过来交代故事的开端和经过。flashback; artistic method in writing, film-making, etc., where usu. a story's ending or some later episodes come before earlier scenes in due course

倒台
倒台[dǎo tái] 垮台 fall from power; fall down; collapse

倒嗓
倒嗓[dǎo sǎng] 指戏曲演员嗓音变低或变哑 (of an opera singer) lose one's voice; have one's voice become hoarse

倒噍
倒噍[dǎo jiào] 同 same as 倒嚼 dǎojiào

倒嚼
倒嚼[dǎo jiào] 反刍的通称 general term for 反刍 fǎnchú;亦 also 倒噍 dǎojiào

倒塌
倒塌[dǎo tā]（建筑物）倒下来 (of buildings) collapse; topple over; cave in：房屋倒塌。The house collapsed.

倒头
倒头[dǎo tóu]1.躺下 lie down; touch the pillow：倒头就睡 fall asleep the moment one touches the pillow 2.〈方 dial.〉指人死（常用做咒骂的话 oft. used as a curse）die

倒好儿
倒好儿[dào hǎo r] 对艺人、运动员等在表演或比赛中出现差错，故意喊‘好’取笑，叫‘喊倒好儿’ catcall; boo; hoot; what audiences mockingly shout when stage artists or athletes make mistakes during performance

倒序
倒序[dào xù] 逆序 backward sequence

倒座儿
倒座儿[dào zuò r]1.四合房中跟正房相对的房屋 rooms opposite the principal rooms in a quadrangle courtyard：一进大门，左手三间倒座儿是客厅。Just inside the main gate, the three rooms on the left and opposite the main rooms are the reception rooms. 2.车船上背向行驶方向的座位 seats in a bus or ship facing the direction opposite to the direction of navigation

倒彩
倒彩[dào cǎi] 倒好儿 booing; hooting; catcalls：喝倒彩 make catcalls; boo and hoot

倒影
倒影[dào yǐng]（～儿 dàoyǐngr）倒立的影子 inverted image; inverted reflection in water：湖面映着峰峦的倒影 inverted reflection of the mountain peaks on the lake石拱桥的桥洞和水中的倒影正好合成一个圆圈。The opening of the stone arched bridge and its reflection in the water form a perfect circle.

倒悬
倒悬[dào xuán]〈书 fml.〉头向下脚向上地悬挂着 hang by the feet; 〈比喻 fig.〉处境异常困苦、危急 be in dire straits：解民于倒悬 retrieve ordinary people from their dire predicament

倒戈
倒戈[dǎo gē] 在战争中投降敌人，反过来打自己人 change sides in a war; transfer one's allegiance; surrender to the enemy during a war, and then turn back to fight against one's own people

倒手
倒手[dǎo shǒu]1.把东西从一只手转到另一只手 shift or move from one hand to the other：他没倒手，一口气把箱子提到六楼。He carried the suitcase all the way to the sixth floor without so much as to shift hands. 2.把东西从一个人的手上转到另一个人的手上（多指货物买卖） change hands (of merchandise, etc.)：倒手转卖 resell from one hand to another

倒打一耙
倒打一耙[dào dǎ yī pá]〈比喻 fig.〉不仅拒绝对方的指摘，反而指摘对方 make countercharges; recriminate

倒找
倒找[dào zhǎo] 本应对方付给钱物，反倒付给对方钱物 reversal of payment; instead of getting paid by sb. as expected, one has to pay them

倒把
倒把[dǎo bǎ] 利用物价涨落，买进卖出取利 buy low and sell high to make profit by using the rises and falls in price：投机倒把 engage in speculation and profiteering

倒挂
倒挂[dào guà]1.上下颠倒地挂着 hang upside down：崖壁上古松倒挂。Old pine trees hang downwards from the precipice. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉应该高的反而低，应该低的反而高 be contrary to the natural order of things; be in an inverted order：购销价格倒挂（指商品收购价格高于销售价格）inverted purchasing and selling prices (with purchasing price higher than selling price)

倒换
倒换[dǎo huàn]1.轮流替换 rotate; take turns：几种作物倒换着种 rotate several crops 2.掉换；交换 rearrange (sequence, order, etc.); replace; exchange：倒换次序 rearrange the order倒换麦种 exchange wheat seeds

倒插门
倒插门[dào chā mén]（～儿 dàochāménr）俗称男子到女方家里结婚并落户 (of a man) marry into and reside with the wife's family

倒数
倒数[dào shǔ] 逆着次序数(shǔ)；从后向前数(shǔ) count backwards; count from bottom to top, or from rear to front：倒数计时 countdown倒数第一名（最后一名）first from the bottom (last one)倒数[dào shù]如果两个数的积是1，其中一个数就叫做另一数的倒数。如2的倒数是1/2，1/5 的倒数是5。reciprocal. If the product of two numbers is 1, each number is the reciprocal of the other, e.g. the reciprocal of 2 is 1/2, and the reciprocal of 1/5 is 5.

倒映
倒映[dào yìng] 物体的形象倒着映射到另一物体上 reflection; inverted image of one object reflected on another：垂柳倒映在湖面上。Swaying willows are reflected in the lake.

倒春寒
倒春寒[dào chūn hán] 春天的一种反常现象，早春回暖后，由于寒潮侵入，气温下降到正常年份同期平均值以下 unusual cold spell in an otherwise warm early spring

倒是
倒是[dào shì]〈副词 adv.〉1.表示跟一般情理相反；反倒 [used to indicate contrast to what is usu. true] but instead：该说的不说，不该说的倒是说个没完没了 harp on what one shouldn't instead of speaking what one should 2.表示事情不是那样（含责怪意） [used to indicate what is contrary to facts, with a touch of criticism]：说的倒是容易，你做起来试试！Though it's easy to say, would you try to do it yourself? 3.表示出乎意料 [used for sth. unexpected]：还有什么理由，我倒是想听一听。If you have any other reasons, I would certainly like to hear them. 4.表示让步 [used to indicate concession]：东西倒是好东西，就是价钱太贵。This thing may be good, only it is too expensive. 5.表示转折 [used to indicate a turn in meaning]：屋子不大，布置得倒是挺讲究。Though the room may not be very big, it is beautifully decorated. 6.用来缓和语气 [used to modify or tone down a preceding statement]：如果人手不够，我倒是愿意帮忙。If there really are not enough people, then I would like to go and help. 7.表示催促或追问 [used to press or question sb.]：你倒是快说呀！Out with it then!你倒是去过没去过，别吞吞吐吐的。So did you go there or not? Don't mince your words.

倒替
倒替[dǎo tì] 轮流替换 take turns; work in turn：两个人倒替着看护病人。The two took turns looking after the patient.

倒板
倒板[dǎo bǎn] 戏曲唱腔的一种特定板式，一般作为成套唱腔的先导部分 daoban; stylized tune in traditional Chinese opera, usu. preceding an integrated singing part.亦 also 导板 dǎobǎn

倒栽葱
倒栽葱[dào zāi cōng] 摔倒时头先着地 fall head over heels; fall headlong; nose-dive：一个倒栽葱，从马鞍上跌下来 fall headlong from horseback风筝断了线，来了个倒栽葱。The kite fell headlong after the thread broke.

倒毙
倒毙[dǎo bì] 倒在地上死去 drop dead (on the ground)：倒毙街头 drop dead in the street

倒汇
倒汇[dǎo huì] 倒买倒卖外汇 deal illegally in foreign currencies; speculate in foreign currencies

倒流
倒流[dào liú]1.向上游流 flow backwards：河水不能倒流。Rivers don't flow backwards. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉向跟正常流动相反的方向流动 flow in the opposite direction：商品倒流 flow of goods back to their places of origin人口倒流 backward flow of population; reverse migration时光不会倒流。Time can't go backwards.

倒海翻江
倒海翻江[dǎo hǎi fān jiāng]另见  翻江倒海 fān jiāng dǎo hǎi

倒灌
倒灌[dào guàn] 河水、海水等因潮汐、台风等原因由低处流向高处 (of river or sea water, etc.) flow from a lower to a higher place due to the morning and evening tides, typhoon, etc.：海水倒灌。The sea water is flowing up towards the highlands.江水倒灌市区。The river water is flooding the urban areas.

倒灶
倒灶[dǎo zào]〈方 dial.〉1.垮台；败落 decline; collapse 2.倒霉 be down on one's luck; be out of luck：背时倒灶 be behind the times; at the wrong time and unlucky

倒烟
倒烟[dào yān] 指烟不从烟筒正常排出，而从炉灶口冒出 smoke going down a chimney (not coming up out of the chimney as usual but coming out from the mouth of the stove)

倒爷
倒爷[dǎo yé] 指从事倒买倒卖活动的人（含贬义 derog.）scalper; speculator; profiteer;亦 also 倒儿爷 dǎoryé

倒牌子
倒牌子[dǎo pái zi] 指产品或服务质量下降，失去信誉 ruin one's established trade name; lose or spoil one's good reputation

倒牙
倒牙[dǎo yá]〈方 dial.〉吃了较多的酸性食物，牙神经受过分刺激,咀嚼时感觉不舒服 (of sour food) set or put one's teeth on edge

倒班
倒班[dǎo bān] 分班轮换 work in shifts：倒班生产 work by turns昼夜倒班 work in shifts round the clock

倒立
倒立[dào lì]1.顶端朝下地竖立 stand upside down：水中映现出倒立的塔影。The pagoda is reflected upside down in the water. 2.武术用语，指用手支撑全身，头朝下，两腿向上。有的地区叫拿大顶。 (in martial arts) handstand; 同 also 拿大顶 ná∥dàdǐng in some regions

倒算
倒算[dào suàn] 指地主向农民夺回由革命政权分给的土地、财产等，这种活动大多依靠反革命武装进行 settle old scores; retaliate; referring to the activity of landlords who, usu. by relying on counter-revolutionary armed forces, seize back from the peasants the land and properties distributed by a revolutionary political power

倒置
倒置[dào zhì] 倒过来放，指颠倒事物应有的顺序 place upside down; invert - mess up the order of things：本末倒置 placing the superficial above the essential轻重倒置 putting the trivial before the important

倒胃口
倒胃口[dǎo wèi kou]1.因为腻味而不想再吃 spoil one's appetite; upset one's stomach：再好吃的吃多了也倒胃口。Too much food, no matter how good, will spoil one's appetite. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉对某事物厌烦而不愿接受 (of things) be so disgusting as to kill one's interest or dampen one's spirits：啰啰唆唆，词不达意，让人听得倒胃口。His speech, repetitive and pointless, is very distasteful.

倒背如流
倒背如流[dào bèi rú liú] 倒着背诵像流水那样顺畅。形容诗文等读得很熟 can fluently recite sth. backwards; know sth. by heart (e.g. a poem or an article)

倒腾
倒腾[dǎo teng]1.翻腾；移动 rummage; move; shift：把粪倒腾到地里去 carry manure to the fields 2.掉换；调配 replace; exchange; rearrange：人手少，事情多，倒腾不开。It is hard to cope, with so few hands and so much to do. 3.买进卖出；贩卖 buy low and sell high; deal in; trade in：倒腾牲口 trade in cattle倒腾小买卖 deal in a small business亦 also 捣腾 dǎo·teng

倒茬
倒茬[dǎo chá] 轮作 rotation of crops

倒行逆施
倒行逆施[dào xíng nì shī] 原指做事违反常理，现多指所作所为违背社会正义和时代进步方向 behave counter to normal practices; go against the trends of the times; try to put the clock back; push a reactionary policy

倒计时
倒计时[dào jì shí]从未来的某一时点往现在计算时间，用来表示距离某一期限还有多少时间（多含有时间越来越少，越来越紧迫的意思）countdown; counting off, in reverse order, of units of time on schedule (to show the urgency of an operation)：倒计时牌 countdown billboard工程已进入倒计时阶段。The project has entered the countdown stage.

倒读数
倒读数[dào dú shù] 人造卫星、宇宙飞船等在发射前几十秒钟时倒着读出数字，如 5、4、3、2、1，读完最后一个数发射 countdown before the launching of a satellite, spaceship, etc., e.g. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1

倒账
倒账[dǎo zhàng]1.欠账不还；赖账 evade or repudiate a debt：倒账卷逃 evade debts by disappearing and taking all the money and valuables 2.收不回来的账 debt that cannot be recovered; bad debt

倒贴
倒贴[dào tiē] 泛指该收的一方反向该付的一方提供财物 lose money instead of making a profit; pay instead of getting paid：这东西别说卖钱，就是倒贴些钱送人都没人要。Nobody would want this even with an accompanying gift of money, to say nothing of buying it.

倒赔
倒赔[dào péi] 指不但不赚，反而赔本 lose instead of making money：经营不善，倒赔了两万元。He lost 20,000 yuan due to his poor management.

倒车
倒车[dǎo chē] 中途换车 transfer：现在这里可以直达北京，不用到省城再倒车了。We can now take a direct train from here to Beijing, instead of making a transfer in the provincial capital.另见  dào∥chē倒车[dào chē] 使车向后退 back; drive a vehicle backwards另见  dǎo∥chē

倒转
倒转[dào zhuǎn]1.倒过来；反过来 turn the other way round; reverse：倒转来说，道理也是一样。The same reasoning is true the other way round. 2.〈方 dial.〉反倒 (contrary to reason or one's expectations)：你把字写坏了，倒转来怪我。You messed up your writing badly, but now you put the blame on me.倒转[dào zhuàn] 倒着转动 turn backwards; go backwards：历史的车轮不能倒转。You can never turn back the clock of history.

倒轮闸
倒轮闸[dào lún zhá] 自行车上的一种刹(shā)车装置，脚向后登时，车就停住 back-pedalling brake (of a bicycle); coaster brake

倒过儿
倒过儿[dào guò r] 颠倒；使颠倒 transpose; switch the order：这两个字写倒了过儿了。The order of the two characters is wrong.把号码倒个过儿就对了。These two numbers should be transposed.

倒运
倒运[dǎo yùn]〈方 dial.〉倒霉 have a run of bad luck; be unlucky; be out of luck; be down on one's luck倒运[dǎo yùn]1.把甲地货物运到乙地出卖，再把乙地货物运到甲地出卖（多指非法活动） buy sth. at a low price in one place and sell it at a high price in another place; profiteer 2.把货物从一地运到另一地；转运 ship from one place to another; tranship

倒退
倒退[dào tuì]往后退；退回（后面的地方、过去的年代、以往的发展阶段）go backwards; regress; fall back (into an old place, old times, or past development period)：迎面一阵狂风把我刮得倒退了好几步。A gust of strong wind pushed me a few steps backwards.倒退三十年，我也是个壮小伙子。Thirty years back, I was a strapping young fellow too.

倒闭
倒闭[dǎo bì] 工厂、商店等因亏本而停业 close down; go bankrupt; go into liquidation, such as a factory being closed down or an enterprises going bankrupt due to losses

倒霉
倒霉[dǎo méi] 遇事不利；遭遇不好 have bad luck; be out of luck; be down on one's luck：真倒霉，赶到车站车刚开走。What lousy luck! When I reached the station, the train had just left.亦 also 倒楣 dǎo∥méi

倒风
倒风[dào fēng] 风从烟筒出口灌入，烟气排不出去，叫做倒风 wind blowing in through a chimney choked with smoke

倓
倓[tán]（ㄊㄢˊ）〈书 fml.〉安静。多用于人名。tranquil; calm; usu. used in names

倔
倔[jué]（ㄐㄩㄝˊ）义同‘倔’(juè)，只用于‘倔强’having the same meaning as 倔 juè, used only in the phrase 倔强 juéjiàng另见  juè倔[juè]（ㄐㄩㄝˋ）性子直，态度生硬 gruff; surly; blunt：倔头 surly person倔脾气 rebellious temper; unyielding temper另见  jué相关词组倔巴 | 倔强 | 倔头倔脑

倔头倔脑
倔头倔脑[juè tóu juè nǎo] 形容说话、行动生硬的样子 blunt of manner and gruff of speech

倔巴
倔巴[juè ba]〈方 dial.〉倔 gruff; surly：这人有点倔巴。This person is rather surly.

倔强
倔强[jué jiàng]（性情）刚强不屈 (of character) stubborn; unbending; tenacious：性格倔强 of a tenacious character他有股倔强劲儿。He is a man of tenacity. 亦 also 倔犟 juéjiàng

倘
倘[cháng]（ㄔㄤˊ）[倘佯] (chángyáng) 同 same as 徜徉 chángyáng另见  tǎng倘[tǎng]（ㄊㄤˇ）（儻）倘若 if; supposing; in case：倘有困难，当再设法。If you have any difficulty, we'll find a way to help.另见  cháng相关词组倘或 | 倘然 | 倘若 | 倘使 | 倘来之物

倘使
倘使[tǎng shǐ] 同 same as 倘若 tǎngruò

倘或
倘或[tǎng huò] 同 same as 倘若 tǎngruò

倘来之物
倘来之物[tǎng lái zhī wù] 无意中得到的或不应得而得到的钱财 windfall; sudden, unexpected piece of good fortune or personal gain

倘然
倘然[tǎng rán] 同 same as 倘若 tǎngruò

倘若
倘若[tǎng ruò]〈连词 conj.〉表示假设 if：你倘若不信，就亲自去看看吧。If you don't believe it, you can go and take a look.

候
候1[hòu]（ㄏㄡˋ）1.等待 wait; await：候车 wait for the bus你稍候一会儿，他马上就来。Please wait a moment, he'll be right here. 2.问候；问好 enquire after; greet：致候 pay one's respect to敬候起居。How's your life going?候2[hòu]（ㄏㄡˋ）1.时节 time; season：时候 time气候 climate候鸟 migratory bird 2.〈古代 arch.〉五天为一候，现在气象学上仍沿用 every five days; a term still used in meteorology today：候温 five-day air temperature 3.（候儿 hòur）情况 condition; state：征候 sign; symptom火候 duration and degree of heating, cooking, smelting, etc.; level of attainment相关词组病候 | 测候 | 斥候 | 等候 | 恭候 | 火候 | 季候 | 敬候 | 立候 | 气候 | 时候 | 侍候 | 守候 | 天候 | 听候 | 问候 | 物候 | 迎候 | 征候 | 症候 | 伫候 | 冬候鸟 | 夏候鸟 | 症候群 | 成气候 | 大气候 | 全天候 | 小气候 | 小时候 | 季风气候 | 大陆性气候 | 海洋性气候候补 | 候场 | 候车 | 候虫 | 候光 | 候教 | 候鸟 | 候审 | 候温 | 候诊 | 候选人 | 候风地动仪

候光
候光[hòu guāng]〈书 fml.〉〈敬辞 pol.〉等候光临（多用于请帖 usu. used in invitations）await the honour of your presence：洁樽候光。We have had the wine goblets cleaned, and await your presence.

候场
候场[hòu chǎng]等候上场（演出）(of an actor or actress) wait to go onstage：演员按时到后台候场。The performers waited backstage as scheduled.

候审
候审[hòu shěn]（原告、被告）等候审问 (of a plaintiff or defendant) await trial：出庭候审 appear in court and await trial

候教
候教[hòu jiào]〈敬辞 pol.〉等候指教 await your instructions：本星期日下午在舍下候教。I'll be expecting you at my place Sunday afternoon.

候温
候温[hòu wēn] 每候（五天）的平均气温 average air temperature of every five days

候虫
候虫[hòu chóng] 随季节而生或鸣叫的昆虫，如夏天的蝉、秋天的蟋蟀等 insects that are born or chirp seasonally, e.g. cicada in summer, cricket in autumn, etc.

候补
候补[hòu bǔ] 等候递补缺额 be a candidate (for a vacancy); be an alternate：候补委员 alternate committee member

候诊
候诊[hòu zhěn]（病人）门诊时等候诊断治疗 (of patients) wait to see the doctor：候诊室 waiting room (in a hospital)

候车
候车[hòu chē] 等候乘车 wait for a train, bus, etc.：候车室 waiting room

候选人
候选人[hòu xuǎn rén] 在选举前预先提名作为选举对象的人 candidate; one that is nominated or qualified for a position to be elected

候风地动仪
候风地动仪[hòu fēng dì dòng yí] 我国东汉时天文学家张衡创制的世界上最早的地震仪 seismograph as invented by the Eastern Han astronomer Zhang Heng in 132, the earliest of its kind in the world; 简称 abbr. 地动仪 dìdòngyí

候鸟
候鸟[hòu niǎo] 随季节的变更而迁徙的鸟，如杜鹃、家燕、鸿雁等 migratory bird, e.g. cuckoo, barn swallow, wild goose, etc.另见  冬候鸟 dōnghòuniǎo and 夏候鸟 xiàhòuniǎo

倚
倚[yǐ]（ㄧˇ）1.靠着 lean on or against; rest on or against：倚门而望 lean against the door and look into the distance倚马千言 dash off 1,000 words at the side of a horse 2.仗恃 rely on; count on：倚势欺人 take advantage of one's position to bully people倚老卖老 flaunt one's seniority 3.〈书 fml.〉偏；歪 biased; partial：不偏不倚 impartial相关词组徙倚 | 不偏不倚倚傍 | 倚靠 | 倚赖 | 倚仗 | 倚重 | 倚老卖老 | 倚马可待 | 倚马千言

倚仗
倚仗[yǐ zhàng] 靠别人的势力或有利条件；依赖 rely on; count on：倚仗权势 rely on one's power and position; count on one's powerful connections倚仗力气大 rely on one's physical strength

倚傍
倚傍[yǐ bàng] 同 same as 依傍 yībàng

倚老卖老
倚老卖老[yǐ lǎo mài lǎo] 仗着年纪大，卖弄老资格 take advantage of one's seniority or old age (to ignore manners, regulations, etc.); flaunt one's seniority

倚赖
倚赖[yǐ lài] 同 same as 依赖 yīlài

倚重
倚重[yǐ zhòng] 依靠，器重 rely heavily on sb.'s service：倚重贤才 rely on the able people

倚靠
倚靠[yǐ kào]1.依赖；依靠 rely on; depend on 2.身体靠在物体上 lean on or against; rest on or against

倚马千言
倚马千言[yǐ mǎ qiān yán]晋朝桓温领兵北征，命令袁虎靠着马拟公文，一会儿就写成七张纸，而且作得很好（见于《世说新语·文学》）。形容文思敏捷，写文章快。dash off 1,000 words at the side of a horse - write with great facility. According to A New Account of Tales of the World·Letters and Scholarship, during a northern expedition the Jin-dynasty commander Huan Wen asked a man by the name of Yuan Hu to draft a document. The man, leaning against his horse, dashed off seven pieces of paper in no time, and came up with a good piece of writing. Hence the phrase.

倚马可待
倚马可待[yǐ mǎ kě dài] 形容文思敏捷，写文章快 can write at the side of a horse; be nimble-minded and write fast另见  倚马千言 yǐ mǎ qiān yán

倜
倜[tì]（ㄊㄧˋ）另见  见下 below相关词组倜然 | 倜傥

倜傥
倜傥[tì tǎng]〈书 fml.〉洒脱；不拘束 elegant in a casual way; free and easy of manner; unrestrained：风流倜傥 unrestrained and overflowing with talent; unconventional and romantic亦 also 俶傥 tìtǎng

倜然
倜然[tì rán]〈书 fml.〉1.超然或特出的样子 aloof; detached; distant; uncommon; extraordinary; outstanding 2.疏远的样子 drift apart; become estranged; keep distant

倞
倞[jìng]（ㄐㄧㄥˋ）〈书 fml.〉强 strong另见  liàng倞[liàng]（ㄌㄧㄤˋ）〈书 fml.〉索取 claim; ask for; request； 同 same as 求 qiú ③另见  jìng

借
借1[jiè]（ㄐㄧㄝˋ）1.暂时使用别人的物品或金钱；借进 borrow (things or money)：向图书馆借书 borrow a book from the library跟人借钱 borrow money from sb.把笔借给我用一下。Could you lend me your pen? 2.把物品或金钱暂时供别人使用；借出 lend：借书给他 lend him a book借钱给人 lend money to others借2[jiè]（ㄐㄧㄝˋ）（藉）1.假托 on the pretext of：借故 find an excuse借端 use as a pretext 2.凭借；利用 make use of; take advantage of：借助 have the aid of; draw support from借手（假手）do sth. by another's hand借着灯光看书 read under a lamp相关词组拆借 | 筹借 | 出借 | 典借 | 告借 | 假借 | 挪借 | 凭借 | 求借 | 摘借 | 转借 | 租借 | 租借地 | 背城借一借词 | 借代 | 借贷 | 借读 | 借端 | 借方 | 借故 | 借光 | 借火 | 借鉴 | 借景 | 借镜 | 借据 | 借口 | 借款 | 借条 | 借调 | 借位 | 借问 | 借宿 | 借以 | 借用 | 借喻 | 借阅 | 借债 | 借账 | 借支 | 借重 | 借助 | 借刀杀人 | 借风使船 | 借古讽今 | 借花献佛 | 借尸还魂 | 借题发挥

借代
借代[jiè dài]修辞方式，不直接把所要说的事物名称说出来，而用跟它有关系的另一种事物名称代替它。如‘红领巾参加植树劳动’中的‘红领巾’就是代替‘少先队员’。metonymy; rhetorical device of indirectly referring to one thing by substituting the name of another related one, e.g. ‘The Red Scarves took part in planting the trees’，in which ‘Red Scarves’ refers to the ‘Young Pioneers’

借以
借以[jiè yǐ] 作为凭借，以便做某事 so as to; for the purpose of; by way of：略举几件事实，借以证明这项工作的重要性。Provide a few facts in order to prove the importance of the work.

借位
借位[jiè wèi] 减法运算中，被减数的某一位数不够减时向前一位借一，化成本位的数量，然后再减 borrow in and carry one in subtraction. When a number in the minuend is smaller than the corresponding number in the subtrahend, one place value is borrowed from the next column to the left to enable the computation.

借债
借债[jiè zhài] 借钱 borrow money; raise (or contract) a loan

借光
借光[jiè guāng]1.分沾他人的利益、好处；沾光 benefit from association with other people：能来这里参观，是借了他哥的光。It is thanks to his elder brother that he can visit here. 2.〈客套话 pol.〉用于请别人给自己方便或向人询问 excuse me：借光让我过去。Would you mind stepping to one side, please?借光，百货大楼在哪儿？Excuse me, but can you tell me where the department store is?

借刀杀人
借刀杀人[jiè dāo shā rén]〈比喻 fig.〉自己不出面，利用别人去害人 kill sb. by another's hand; use another to harm a person

借助
借助[jiè zhù] 靠别的人或事物的帮助 fall back on; have the aid of; draw support from：要看到极远的东西，就得借助于望远镜。One needs the aid of a telescope to see something extremely far away.

借口
借口[jiè kǒu]1.以（某事）为理由（非真正的理由）use as an excuse or pretext：不能借口快速施工而降低工程质量。Accelerating construction cannot be used as an excuse for lowering quality. 2.假托的理由 excuse; pretext：别拿忙做借口而放松学习。Don't slacken your studies under the pretext of being too busy.

借古讽今
借古讽今[jiè gǔ fěng jīn] 假借评论古代某人某事的是非，影射现实 use the past to disparage the present

借喻
借喻[jiè yù]比喻的一种，直接借比喻的事物来代替被比喻的事物，被比喻的事物和比喻词都不出现。如‘天下乌鸦一般黑’，‘乌鸦’比喻旧时官吏。metonymy; type of metaphor that directly uses figurative object to refer to the thing to be compared without mentioning the name of the latter or using comparison words. For instance, in the sentence ‘Crows are black the world over’, the word ‘crows’ is a metaphor for corrupt officials in old times.

借宿
借宿[jiè sù] 借别人的地方住宿 stay overnight at sb. else's place; put up for the night：勘探队在老乡家里借宿了一夜。Members of the prospecting team stayed for the night in the homes of some villagers.

借尸还魂
借尸还魂[jiè shī huán hún] 迷信传说人死以后灵魂可能借别人的尸体复活 (superstition) (of a dead person's soul) find reincarnation through sb. else's corpse;〈比喻 fig.〉某种已经消灭或没落的思想、行为、势力等假托别的名义重新出现 (of dying, disappearing thought, behaviour, force, etc.) revive in a new guise

借据
借据[jiè jù] 借用别人的钱或器物时所立的字据，由出借的人保存 IOU (I owe you); receipt for a loan of money or things

借支
借支[jiè zhī] 先期支用工资 ask for an advance on one's pay

借故
借故[jiè gù] 借口某种原因 find an excuse：借故拖延 find an excuse to stall for time他不愿意再跟他们谈下去，就借故走了。He was unwilling to talk with them any more, and found an excuse to leave.

借方
借方[jiè fāng]另见  收方 shōufāng

借景
借景[jiè jǐng] 园林艺术中指借取园外之景或使园内各风景点互相衬托，联成一体 (in landscaping) borrowed scenery; view borrowing; use the scenery of the surroundings to set off the scenic spots in a garden

借条
借条[jiè tiáo]（～儿 jiètiáor）便条式的借据 IOU (I owe you); receipt for a loan

借款
借款[jiè kuǎn] 向人借钱或借钱给人 loan; borrow or lend money; ask for or offer a loan借款[jiè kuǎn] 借用的钱 money borrowed; loan：一笔借款 a sum of borrowed money; a loan

借火
借火[jiè huǒ]（～儿 jiè∥huǒr）吸烟时向别人借用引火的东西或利用别人点燃的烟来引火 ask for a light (for a cigarette)

借用
借用[jiè yòng]1.借别人的东西来使用 borrow; have the loan of：借用一下你的铅笔。May I use your pencil? 2.把用于某种用途的事物用于另一种用途 use sth. for another purpose：‘道具’这个名词原来指和尚念经时所用的东西，现在借用来指演戏时所用的器物。The Chinese term daoju originally meant the ritual objects a monk used when chanting incantations, but today it means ‘stage property’.

借端
借端[jiè duān] 借口某件事 use as a pretext：借端生事 find an excuse to make trouble; avail oneself of a pretext to stir up trouble借端推托 use a pretext to get out of sth.

借花献佛
借花献佛[jiè huā xiàn fó]〈比喻 fig.〉拿别人的东西做人情 borrow a flower to present to the Buddha; make a gift of sth. that belongs to sb. else

借词
借词[jiè cí] 从另一种语言中吸收过来的词 loanword; loan; word borrowed from another language;另见  外来语 wàiláiyǔ

借读
借读[jiè dú]没有本地区正式户口的中、小学生在本地区中、小学就读，叫做借读。没有某校学籍的学生，因故在某校就读，也叫借读。study at a school on a temporary basis, either because the student lacks a local permanent residence permit, or is not registered as a regular student

借调
借调[jiè diào] 一个单位临时借用另一单位的工作人员，而不改变其隶属关系 temporarily transfer; (of a person) temporarily transfer from one work unit to another without changing his or her administrative affiliation

借账
借账[jiè zhàng] 同 same as 借债 jiè∥zhài

借贷
借贷[jiè dài]1.借（钱）borrow (money)：借贷无门 find no one to borrow money from 2.指簿记或资产表上的借方或贷方 debit and credit sides in an accountant's book or balance sheet

借重
借重[jiè zhòng]指借用其他的（力量）（多用做敬辞 oft. pol.）rely on sb. for support; enlist sb.'s help：借重一切有用的力量 rely on all useful forces敝公司以后借重您的地方还很多，还要常来麻烦您。Our company will need a lot more of your help in the future. I'm afraid we'll come to trouble you quite often.

借鉴
借鉴[jiè jiàn] 跟别的人或事相对照，以便取长补短或吸取教训 (when comparing with other people or events) use for reference; draw lessons from; draw on the experience of：可资借鉴。(We) can use it for reference.

借镜
借镜[jiè jìng] 同 same as 借鉴 jièjiàn

借问
借问[jiè wèn]〈敬辞 pol.〉用于向人打听事情 may I ask：借问这里离城还有多远？May I ask how far it is from here to the town?

借阅
借阅[jiè yuè] 借图书、资料等来阅读 borrow books or reading materials：借阅图书要如期归还。Borrowed books must be returned on time.

借题发挥
借题发挥[jiè tí fā huī] 借谈论另一个题目来表达自己真正的意思 use the subject under discussion to express one's own ideas; seize on an incident to exaggerate matters

借风使船
借风使船[jiè fēng shǐ chuán]〈比喻 fig.〉借用别人的力量以达到自己的目的 sail the boat with the help of the wind - achieve one's ends through the agency of sb. else亦 also 借水行舟 jiè shuǐ xíng zhōu

倡
倡[chāng]（ㄔㄤ）〈书 fml.〉1.指以演奏、歌舞为业的人 singer, dancer or musician 2. 同 same as 娼 chāng另见  chàng倡[chàng]（ㄔㄤˋ）1.带头发动；提倡 initiate; advocate：倡导 initiate and lead倡议 propose 2.〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 唱 chàng另见  chāng相关词组首倡 | 提倡 | 一倡百和 | 反腐倡廉倡办 | 倡导 | 倡首 | 倡言 | 倡议 | 倡优

倡优
倡优[chāng yōu]1.〈古代 arch.〉指擅长乐舞、谐戏的艺人 entertainers specialized in singing, dancing, and comedies 2.〈书 fml.〉娼妓和优伶 prostitutes; actors or actresses

倡办
倡办[chàng bàn] 带头开办；创办 initiate (an activity etc.); start or initiate the organization of (an undertaking etc.)：联合倡办文化活动中心 jointly initiate to set up a culture centre倡办单位多达十几家。More than a dozen units joined in the proposition.

倡导
倡导[chàng dǎo] 带头提倡 initiate; propose; promote：倡导新风尚 initiate new trend or practices

倡言
倡言[chàng yán] 公开地提出来 propose; initiate; advocate：倡言革命 advocate a revolution

倡议
倡议[chàng yì]1.首先建议；发起 propose; launch (an activity)：倡议书 (written) proposal我们倡议开展劳动竞赛。We propose launching a labour emulation drive. 2.首先提出的主张 first proposal：这个倡议得到了热烈的响应。The proposal is greeted with warm welcome.

倡首
倡首[chàng shǒu] 带头做某事或提出某种主张；首倡 initiate; lead the way; take the lead in：此事由他倡首，我们附议。This matter was initiated by him and we seconded it.

倢
倢[jié]（ㄐㄧㄝˊ）〈书 fml.〉1. 同 same as 捷 jié 2. 同 same as 婕 jié相关词组倢伃

倢伃
倢伃[jié yú] 同 same as 婕妤 jiéyú

倥
倥[kōng]（ㄎㄨㄥ）[倥侗] (kōngtóng)〈书 fml.〉蒙昧无知 benighted; unenlightened另见  kǒng倥[kǒng]（ㄎㄨㄥˇ）[倥偬] (kǒngzǒng)〈书 fml.〉1.（事情）急迫匆忙 (of matters) pressing; urgent：戎马倥 be occupied with military duties 2.穷困 poverty-stricken; go broke另见  kōng

倦
倦[juàn]（ㄐㄩㄢˋ）1.疲乏 weary; tired：疲倦 tired; fatigued人有点倦，想睡觉。I am a little tired; I think I'll go to sleep. 2.厌倦 be sick of; be tired of; feel bored：孜孜不倦 indefatigably诲人不倦 teach tirelessly; teach with tireless zeal相关词组惫倦 | 困倦 | 劳倦 | 闷倦 | 疲倦 | 厌倦 | 诲人不倦倦怠 | 倦容 | 倦色 | 倦游

倦容
倦容[juàn róng] 疲倦的脸色 tired look：面带倦容 wear a tired expression

倦怠
倦怠[juàn dài] 疲乏困倦 tired and sleepy：倦怠无力 languid

倦游
倦游[juàn yóu]〈书 fml.〉游玩的兴趣已尽 be weary of wandering and sightseeing：倦游归来 return home satiated after a pleasure excursion

倦色
倦色[juàn sè] 同 same as 倦容 juànróng

倨
倨[jù]（ㄐㄩˋ）〈书 fml.〉傲慢 haughty; arrogant：前倨后恭 first supercilious and then deferential; change from arrogance to humility相关词组倨傲

倨傲
倨傲[jù ào] 骄傲；傲慢 haughty; arrogant：倨傲无礼 arrogant and rude此人态度倨傲，大家都不理他。This man is so arrogant, no one is willing to approach him.

倩
倩1[qiàn]（ㄑㄧㄢˋ）〈书 fml.〉美丽 beautiful; pretty; attractive; handsome：倩装 beautiful attire or costume; handsome dress倩影 beautiful figure; well-proportioned form or photo (of a beautiful woman)倩2[qiàn]（ㄑㄧㄢˋ）请人代替自己做 ask sb. to do sth. in one's name：倩人执笔 employ a person to write an article in one's name相关词组倩影

倩影
倩影[qiàn yǐng] 美丽的身影（多指女子 usu. of a woman）beautiful figure; well-proportioned form

倪
倪[ní]（ㄋㄧˊ）1.另见  端倪 duānní 2.(Ní) 姓 a surname相关词组端倪

倬
倬[zhuō]（ㄓㄨㄛ）〈书 fml.〉显著；大 notable; striking; great; marked; remarkable

倭
倭[wō]（ㄨㄛ）我国古代称日本 ancient Chinese name for Japan相关词组老倭瓜倭瓜 | 倭寇

倭寇
倭寇[Wō kòu] 14-16世纪屡次骚扰抢劫朝鲜和我国沿海的日本海盗 Japanese pirates that frequently robbed ships in Chinese and Korean coastal waters from the 14th to the 16th century

倭瓜
倭瓜[wō guā]〈方 dial.〉南瓜 pumpkin (Cucurbita pepo); cushaw

倮
倮[luǒ]（ㄌㄨㄛˇ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 裸 luǒ

倴
倴[bèn]（ㄅㄣˋ）倴城(Bènchéng)，地名，在河北 Bencheng, a place in Hebei Province

倷
倷[nǎi]（ㄋㄞˇ）〈方 dial.〉 你 you

债
债[zhài]（ㄓㄞˋ）欠别人的钱 debt：借债 borrow money欠债 be in debt; get into debt还债 pay (back) one's debts公债 government bond血债要用血来偿。Debts of blood must be paid in blood.相关词组背债 | 笔债 | 抵债 | 躲债 | 放债 | 负债 | 公债 | 国债 | 还债 | 借债 | 举债 | 内债 | 逃债 | 讨债 | 外债 | 宿债 | 血债 | 公债券 | 三角债 | 资产负债表债户 | 债利 | 债权 | 债券 | 债务 | 债主 | 债权人 | 债务人 | 债台高筑

债主
债主[zhài zhǔ] 借给别人钱财收取利息的人；放债的人 creditor; person who draws interests by lending money or property to others

债利
债利[zhài lì] 放债所得的利息 interest on loans

债券
债券[zhài quàn]1.公债券 public or government bond 2.企业、银行或股份公司发行的债权人领取本息的凭证 bond; debenture; voucher issued by enterprises, banks or stock companies to creditors for reclaiming principal and interest

债务
债务[zhài wù] 债户所负还债的义务。也指所欠的债 debt; liabilities：偿还债务 pay back a debt; meet one's debts

债务人
债务人[zhài wù rén] 根据法律或合同的规定，对债权人承担义务的人 debtor; person who fulfils his or her obligations to a creditor according to laws or contracts

债台高筑
债台高筑[zhài tái gāo zhù]战国时代周赧(nǎn)王欠了债，无法偿还，被债主逼得逃到一座宫殿的高台上。后人称此台为‘逃债之台’（见于《汉书·诸侯王表序》及颜师古引服虔注）。后来就用‘债台高筑’形容欠债极多。be heavily in debt; be up to one's ears (or neck) in debt; be saddled with huge debts; be debt-ridden. According to History of Han·Preface to Biographies of Princes and Vassals, during the Warring States Period, King Nan of the Zhou Dynasty was unable to meet his debts and was cornered by creditors on a high deck in his palace.‘Deck of the Dodging Debtor’thus came to mean‘heavily in debt’.

债户
债户[zhài hù] 借别人钱财付给利息的人；借债的人 debtor; one who borrows money or property and pays interest on it

债权
债权[zhài quán] 依法要求债务人偿还钱财和履行一定行为的权利 creditor's rights; legal rights to demand payment of a debt and fulfilment of certain obligations on the part of a debtor

债权人
债权人[zhài quán rén] 根据法律或合同的规定，有权要求债务人履行义务的人 creditor; person who has the right to demand fulfilment of certain obligations by the debtor according to law or contract

倻
倻[yē]（ㄧㄝ）另见  伽倻琴 jiāyēqín

值
值[zhí]（ㄓˊ）1.价格；数值 value：币值 currency value比值 ratio; specific value总产值 total output value 2.货物和价钱相当 be worth; what a specific sum of money can buy：这双皮鞋值五十块钱。This pair of leather shoes is worth 50 yuan. 3.用数字表示的量或数学运算所能得到的每一个结果，如a取值10，b取值8，则代数式ab的值为10×8=80 value; particular magnitude, number, or amount, or the result of a mathematical calculation, e.g. if the value of a is 10 and the value of b is 8, then the algebraic expression ab stands for the value 80, i.e. 8×10＝80 4.指有意义或有价值；值得 worth; worthwhile：不值一提 not worth mentioning走一趟，值了。It has been a worthwhile trip. 5.遇到；碰上 happen to：正值国庆，老友重逢，真是分外高兴。It's a delight to see an old friend, and even more so on National Day. 6.轮流担任一定时间内的工作 be on duty; take one's turn at sth.：值班 be on duty; be on shift值日 be on duty相关词组案值 | 保值 | 比值 | 币值 | 贬值 | 产值 | 峰值 | 价值 | 净值 | 均值 | 轮值 | 面值 | 升值 | 市值 | 适值 | 数值 | 调值 | 音值 | 增值 | 价值观 | 价值量 | 增值税 | 近似值 | 净产值 | 期望值 | 总产值 | 价值规律 | 价值形式 | 交换价值 | 票房价值 | 剩余价值 | 使用价值值班 | 值当 | 值得 | 值钱 | 值勤 | 值日 | 值守 | 值星 | 值夜 | 值遇

值勤
值勤[zhí qín] 部队中的人员或负责治安保卫、交通等工作的人员值班 (of army, police, etc.) be on duty; be on point duty：值勤人员 personnel on duty今天晚上该我值勤。It's my turn to be on duty tonight.

值夜
值夜[zhí yè] 夜间值班 be on night duty; be on the night shift：分组轮流值夜 be divided into groups and be on night duty by turns

值守
值守[zhí shǒu] 值班看守 be on duty and on guard：无人值守公用电话 unguarded public telephone保安人员在厂区巡察值守。Security guards were patrolling the factory.

值当
值当[zhí dàng]〈方 dial.〉值得；合算；犯得上 be worthwhile; be worth the effort：为些鸡毛蒜皮的事生气，太不值当。It is not worth getting angry over such trifling matters.

值得
值得[zhí dé]1.价钱相当；合算 be worth the money：这东西买得值得。It is worth buying.东西好，价钱又便宜，值得买。The stuff is nice and cheap. It's a bargain. 2.指这样去做有好的结果；有价值，有意义 be worth; merit; deserve：不值得 not worthy值不得 not worthwhile值得研究 deserve to be studied值得推广 deserve to be promoted

值日
值日[zhí rì] 在轮到负责的那一天执行任务 be on duty for the day; be one's turn to be on duty：值日生 student on duty今天该谁值日？Who is on duty today?

值星
值星[zhí xīng] 部队中各级行政负责干部（营里由连长，连里由排长），在轮到负责的那一周带队和处理一般事务 (of a company commander in a battalion, or a platoon leader in a company) be on duty for the week：值星排长 platoon leader on duty this week本周是王连长值星。Company commander Wang is the officer of the week.

值班
值班[zhí bān]（轮流）在规定的时间担任工作 be on duty (in turn)

值遇
值遇[zhí yù]〈书 fml.〉遭逢 meet with; come across; encounter：值遇不幸 encounter disaster; come upon misfortune

值钱
值钱[zhí qián] 价钱高；有价值 costly; valuable; of great value; expensive：把值钱的东西交给柜台保管 entrust valuables to the counter这只戒指很值钱。The ring is valuable.

倾
倾[qīng]（ㄑㄧㄥ）1.歪；斜 slant; incline; bend; be askew：倾斜 incline; slant; lean; tilt; fall away身子向前倾着 lean forward; bend forward 2.倾向 tendency; trend; inclination; proclivity; propensity; preference; proneness; liability：左倾 Left deviation右倾 Right deviation 3.倒塌 collapse; topple; fall down; break down; founder; tumble：倾覆 collapse; overturn大厦将倾。The building is about to crumble. 4.使器物反转或歪斜，尽数倒出里面的东西 overturn and pour out; dump; empty：倾箱倒箧 search in all trunks; empty out all the boxes and suitcases倾盆大雨 downpour; torrential rain; cloudburst; drencher; soaker 5.用尽（力量） use up (one's energy)：倾听 be all ears; listen attentively to; lend an attentive ear to倾诉 pour out倾全力把工作做好 make every effort to do a good job; do all one can for the job; exert oneself to the utmost to do a good job 6.〈书 fml.〉压倒 overwhelm; overbear; overpower：权倾朝野 hold sway in the whole nation相关词组内倾 | 右倾 | 左倾 | 反倾销 | 右倾机会主义倾侧 | 倾巢 | 倾倒 | 倾动 | 倾覆 | 倾角 | 倾慕 | 倾盆 | 倾情 | 倾诉 | 倾塌 | 倾谈 | 倾听 | 倾吐 | 倾向 | 倾销 | 倾斜 | 倾泻 | 倾心 | 倾轧 | 倾注 | 倾城倾国 | 倾家荡产 | 倾箱倒箧

倾侧
倾侧[qīng cè] 同 same as 倾斜 qīngxié：塔身倾侧。The tower is tilted.身子稍一倾侧就倒在地上 bend slightly and fall down to the ground

倾倒
倾倒[qīng dǎo]1.由歪斜而倒下 topple over; tumble; collapse 2.十分佩服或爱慕 greatly admire; adore; prostrate oneself：他的演技，令全场观众为之倾倒。All the audience are overwhelmed by his acting.倾倒[qīng dào] 倒转或倾斜容器使里面的东西全部出来 tip; dump; empty; pour out：他猛一使劲儿就把一车土都倾倒到沟里了。With a heave he emptied a wheelbarrow of earth into the ditch.在诉苦会上她把那一肚子的苦水都倾倒出来了。She poured out all her bitterness at the grievance meeting.

倾动
倾动[qīng dòng] 使人佩服感动 win admiration and create a sensation：倾动一时 cause a great sensation; create a furore; have convulsive effect on one's mind

倾吐
倾吐[qīng tǔ] 同 same as 倾诉 qīngsù：倾吐衷肠 pour oneself out; speak one's heart freely; share one's innermost feelings; confide in sb.; get sth. of one's chest; unburden oneself

倾向
倾向[qīng xiàng]1.偏于赞成（对立的事物中的一方） prefer; be inclined to; be in favour of; lean towards (one party of a contradiction)：两种意见我比较倾向于前一种。Between the two opinions I prefer the former. 2.发展的方向；趋势 tendency; trend; inclination; proclivity; propensity; preference; proneness; liability; direction：纠正不良倾向 rectify unhealthy trends

倾听
倾听[qīng tīng] 细心地听取（多用于上对下） heed; (of a superior) listen attentively to; lend an attentive ear to; be all ears for; give audience to; give ear to; hearken (to)：倾听群众的意见 heed public opinions

倾城倾国
