充实[chōng shí]1.丰富；充足（多指内容或人员物力的配备）rich; abundant; (of content or supply of labour force and materials) substantial：库存充实 abundant stocks文字流畅，内容充实 fluent language and substantial content 2.使充足；加强 substantiate; enrich; replenish：选拔优秀干部充实基层 select outstanding civil servants to strengthen grass-roots organizations

充当
充当[chōng dāng] 取得某种身份；担任某种职务 serve as; act as; play the part of; assume the office of：充当调解人 act as a mediator充当大会主席 act as chairman of a conference

充数
充数[chōng shù] 用不胜任的人或不合格的物品来凑足数额 make up numbers by including incompetent or unqualified people or things：滥竽充数 pass oneself off as a player in an ensemble; serve as a stopgap要是人手实在不够，就由我去充个数吧。If you're really short of hands, I'll serve as a stopgap.

充斥
充斥[chōng chì] 充满；塞满（含厌恶意 derog.）fill; fill up; be full of; be flooded with：不能让质量低劣的商品充斥市场。Shoddy commodities should not be allowed to inundate the market.

充沛
充沛[chōng pèi] 充足而旺盛 plentiful; abundant; energetic：精力充沛 energetic雨水充沛 abundant rainfall充沛的感情 passionate feelings

充溢
充溢[chōng yì] 充满；流露 be filled to overflowing; brim with; be permeated with; be imbued with; overflow with：诗里充溢着江南的田园情趣。The poem is imbued with a pastoral aura evocative of the region south of the Yangtze River.孩子们的脸上充溢着幸福的笑容。The faces of the children were wreathed in happy smiles.

充满
充满[chōng mǎn]1.填满；布满 cram; be full of; be filled with; bristle with：眼里充满了泪水 eyes filled with tears欢呼声充满了会场。The assembly hall resounded with loud cheers. 2.充分具有 be brimming with; be permeated or imbued with; be saturated with; be full of：充满激情 overflow with passion歌声里充满着信心和力量 songs brimming with confidence and strength; songs imbued with confidence and strength

充电
充电[chōng diàn] 把直流电源接到蓄电池的两极上使蓄电池获得放电能力 charge a battery; store energy in a battery by linking a direct current to its two poles[补义 new sense]〈比喻 fig.〉通过学习补充知识、提高技能等 supplement one's knowledge and improve one's skills by further study：为了适应形势的发展，每个人都需要通过不断充电来提高自己的能力。To adapt to the developing circumstances, everyone needs to improve their abilities through further study.

充畅
充畅[chōng chàng]（商品的来源、文章的气势）充沛畅达 (of supply of commodities) plentiful and constant; (of style of writing) vigorous and fluent：货源充畅 plentiful and constant supply of goods

充盈
充盈[chōng yíng]1. 同 same as 充满 chōngmǎn：泪水充盈 be filled with tears山谷里充盈着清越的歌声。The valley echoes with a clear and melodious song. 2.（肌肉）丰满 (of muscle) full and round：肌肤充盈 (of muscle) well-developed

充磁
充磁[chōng cí]使磁性物质磁化或使磁性不足的磁体增加磁性。一般是把要充磁的物体放在有直流电通过的线圈所形成的磁场里。magnetize an object or increase the properties of a magnet, usu. by putting it into a magnetic field of coils through which a direct current passes

充耳不闻
充耳不闻[chōng ěr bù wén]塞住耳朵不听。形容不愿听取别人的意见。stuff one's ears and refuse to listen; turn a deaf ear to sb.'s opinion

充血
充血[chōng xuè]局部组织或器官，因小动脉、小静脉以及毛细血管扩张而充满血液。如消化时的胃肠、运动时的肌肉都有充血现象。congestion; hyperaemia, an abnormally large amount of blood in any part of the body, caused by the dilatation of arteriole, vein or blood capillary. This symptom is also found in the stomach and intestines as food is digested, and in muscles while being exercised.

充裕
充裕[chōng yù] 充足有余；宽裕 abundant; ample; plentiful：经济充裕 be well-off时间充裕 have plenty of time

充足
充足[chōng zú] 多到能满足需要 ample; abundant; enough to satisfy the demand：光线充足 abundant light经费充足 have sufficient funds理由充足 with sufficient reasons

充饥
充饥[chōng jī] 解饿 stave off hunger; allay or appease one's hunger：他带了几个烧饼，预备在路上充饥。He brought a few pancakes with him in case he would feel hungry on the trip.

兆
兆1[zhào]（ㄓㄠˋ）1. 同 same as 预兆 yùzhào ①：征兆 sign; omen; portent不吉之兆 ill (or bad) omen 2.预示 augur; portend; foretell：瑞雪兆丰年。A timely snow augurs a good harvest. 3.(Zhào) 姓 a surname兆2[zhào]（ㄓㄠˋ）数目 number; amount; (a)一百万 million; mega; (b)〈古代 arch.〉指一万亿 million million; trillion相关词组噩兆 | 吉兆 | 前兆 | 先兆 | 凶兆 | 预兆 | 朕兆 | 征兆 | 五日京兆兆头

兆头
兆头[zhào tou] 同 same as 预兆 yùzhào ①：好兆头 good omen坏兆头 bad omen暴风雨的兆头 signs of an impending storm

先
先[xiān]（ㄒㄧㄢ）1.时间或次序在前的（跟‘后’相对 as opposed to ‘later’）earlier：先进 advanced先例 precedent事先 beforehand领先 take the lead争先恐后 rush off to the front; strive to be the first and fear to lag behind有言在先 make it clear beforehand 2.祖先；上代 ancestor; elder generation：先人 ancestors 3.〈尊称 honor.〉死去的人 the late ...：先父 the late father先烈 martyrs先哲 great thinker of yore 4.先前 earlier; past：小王的技术比先强多了。Xiao Wang's skill is much better than before.你先怎么不告诉我？Why didn't you tell me beforehand? 5.(Xiān) 姓 a surname相关词组从先 | 当先 | 尽先 | 领先 | 率先 | 起先 | 抢先 | 事先 | 首先 | 头先 | 优先 | 预先 | 原先 | 在先 | 早先 | 占先 | 争先 | 祖先 | 打先锋 | 急先锋 | 少先队 | 小先生 | 承先启后 | 身先士卒 | 争先恐后 | 笨鸟先飞 | 东郭先生 | 好好先生 | 捷足先登 | 未卜先知 | 一马当先 | 有言在先 | 少年先锋队先辈 | 先导 | 先端 | 先锋 | 先行 | 先河 | 先后 | 先觉 | 先进 | 先决 | 先例 | 先烈 | 先期 | 先前 | 先遣 | 先秦 | 先驱 | 先人 | 先容 | 先生 | 先声 | 先世 | 先是 | 先手 | 先天 | 先头 | 先贤 | 先兆 | 先哲 | 先知 | 先祖 | 先不先 | 先行官 | 先行者 | 先验论 | 先睹为快 | 先发制人 | 先见之明 | 先来后到 | 先礼后兵 | 先入为主 | 先声夺人 | 先天不足 | 先意承志 | 先斩后奏 | 先天性免疫

先不先
先不先[xiān bu xiān]〈方 dial.〉首先（多用于申说理由 oft. used when presenting reasons）first of all：香山，这个礼拜去不成了，先不先汽车就借不到。We cannot make it to the Fragrant Hills this week. The primary reason for this is that we have failed to borrow a coach.

先世
先世[xiān shì] 祖先 forefathers; ancestors

先人
先人[xiān rén]1.祖先 ancestor; forefather 2.指已死的父亲 my late father

先例
先例[xiān lì] 已有的事例 precedent：史无先例 unprecedented in history

先兆
先兆[xiān zhào] 事先显露出来的迹象 omen; portent; sign; indication

先入为主
先入为主[xiān rù wéi zhǔ] 先接受了一种说法或思想，以为是正确的，有了成见，后来就不容易再接受不同的说法或思想 first impressions are the strongest; prejudices diehard; preconceived ideas keep a stronghold; after taking preconceived ideas as the correct, one finds it hard to accept different ideas or views

先决
先决[xiān jué] 为了解决某一问题，必须先解决的 prerequisite：先决条件 prerequisite; precondition

先前
先前[xiān qián] 时间词，泛指以前或指某个时候以前 before; previously：先前我和他同过学。He and I were classmates in the past.我们煤矿的机械化程度比先前高多了。The degree of mechanization in our coal mine is much higher than before.注意 NOTE：‘以前’可以用在动词后面表示时间，例如‘吃饭以前要洗手’，‘先前’不能这样用。以前 yǐqián can be used after a verb to indicate time, such as 吃饭以前要洗手 chī∥fàn yǐqián yào xǐ∥shǒu (wash your hands before having a meal), but 先前 cannot be used like this.

先发制人
先发制人[xiān fā zhì rén] 先动手以制伏对方 gain the initiative by striking the first blow; forestall an opponent

先后
先后[xiān hòu]1.先和后 being early or late; priority; order：要办的事情很多，应该分个先后缓急。There are many matters to be tackled, but they should be taken up in order of priority. 2.前后相继 successively; one after another：新出土的文物已经先后在国内外多次展出。The newly unearthed relics have been repeatedly displayed at home and abroad.

先哲
先哲[xiān zhé]〈书 fml.〉指已经去世的有才德的思想家 great thinker of the past; sage

先声
先声[xiān shēng] 指发生在重大事件之前的性质相同的某项事件 first signs; herald; harbinger; another event of the same nature that takes place before an important event：1789年的法国大革命是十九世纪各国资产阶级革命的先声。The French Revolution of 1789 heralded other bourgeois revolutions in the 19th century.

先声夺人
先声夺人[xiān shēng duó rén] 先张大声势以压倒对方，多用于比喻 demoralize one's opponent by a show of strength; overawe people by displaying one's strength; usu. used in metaphors

先天
先天[xiān tiān]1.人或动物的胚胎时期（跟‘后天’相对 as opposed to ‘postnatal’）congenital; inborn：先天的（胚胎时期的，生来就具有的）congenital; inborn 2.哲学上指先验的 (in philosophy) priori; innate

先天不足
先天不足[xiān tiān bù zú] 指人或动物生下来体质就不好，也泛指事物的根基差 (of human or animal) congenital deficiency; inborn weakness：先天不足，后天失调 born weak and ill cared for after birth

先天性免疫
先天性免疫[xiān tiān xìng miǎn yì] 生来就具有的对某种疾病的抵抗能力，如婴儿出生后六个月内很少得麻疹等传染病 congenital immunity; inborn resistance to certain diseases, e.g., an infant seldom contracts measles or other infectious diseases in the six months after birth

先头
先头[xiān tóu]1.位置在前的（多指部队 usu. of troops）ahead; in front; in advance：先头骑兵连 advance cavalry company 2.（先头儿 xiāntóur）时间在前的；以前 before; formerly; in the past：先头出发 set out earlier; leave ahead of others怎么先头我没听他说过。Why haven't I heard it from him before? 3.前头；前面 front; in the front：首长走在队伍的先头。The senior officials walked ahead of the troops.

先容
先容[xiān róng]〈书 fml.〉事先为人介绍、吹嘘或疏通 speak for sb. beforehand; introduce and praise in advance：为之先容 put in a good word for sb. in advance恳为先容 requested sincerely to put in a good word in advance

先导
先导[xiān dǎo]1.引导；引路 guide 2.引路者；向导 guide; forerunner; precursor

先意承志
先意承志[xiān yì chéng zhì] 原指不待父母明白说出就能迎合父母的心意做事，后来泛指揣摩人意，极力逢迎 anticipate and attend to the wishes of another to please him; (orig.) ability to attend to the wishes of one's parents before they say anything; fathom the intention of another to curry favour with him

先手
先手[xiān shǒu]下棋时主动的形势（跟‘后手’相对 as opposed to ‘defensive position’）offensive position (in chess)：先手棋 offensive move占先手 take an offensive position

先斩后奏
先斩后奏[xiān zhǎn hòu zòu]封建时代臣子把人杀了再报告皇帝。现在多比喻自行把问题处理了，然后报告上级或当权者。execute sb. first and report to the emperor afterwards; (fig.) handle a matter on one's own first and report it to the authorities or the person in power afterwards

先是
先是[xiān shi] 原先 before this; originally：先是承认，后又反悔。He admitted it at first, but later he went back on his word.

先期
先期[xiān qī] 在某一日期以前 earlier than a date scheduled; earlier on; in advance：代表团的部分团员已先期到达。Some members of the delegation had arrived at an earlier date.

先来后到
先来后到[xiān lái hòu dào]（～儿 xiān lái hòu dàor）按照来到的先后而确定的次序 in the order of arrival; first come, first served

先河
先河[xiān hé] 古代帝王先祭祀黄河，后祭祀海，以河为海的本源（见《礼记·学记》）。后来称倡导在先的事物为先河 originating river of the sea; the beginning of sth.; sth. that is first proposed or initiated. According to the rites of ancient times, the emperors or kings offered sacrifices first to the Yellow River and then to the sea, regarding the river as the origin of the sea (The Book of Rites·Rites of Education)：他主演《茶花女》等西洋名剧，开国人演话剧之先河。He starred in Camille and other Western classics to be a forerunner of the Chinese in performing the modern drama.

先烈
先烈[xiān liè] 对烈士的尊称 martyr：革命先烈 revolutionary martyr

先生
先生[xiān sheng]1.老师 teacher 2.对知识分子的称呼 (of intellectuals) Mister (Mr.); gentleman; sir 3.称别人的丈夫或对人称自己的丈夫（都带人称代词做定语 always preceded by a personal pronoun as the attribute）one's husband：她先生出差去了。Her husband is away on business.等我们先生回来，我让他马上去找您。When my husband is back, I'll ask him to see you at once. 4.〈方 dial.〉医生 doctor 5.〈旧时 old〉称管账的人 bookkeeper：在商号当先生 serve as bookkeeper in a trading company 6.〈旧时 old〉称以说书、相面、算卦、看风水等为业的人 people engaged in storytelling, fortune-telling, feng shui, etc.：算命先生 fortune-teller

先睹为快
先睹为快[xiān dǔ wéi kuài] 以先看到为快事 consider it a pleasure to be among the first to read or see sth.

先知
先知[xiān zhī]1.对人类或国家的大事了解得较早的人 person of foresight; person who foresees the great events of mankind or a nation before others 2.犹太教、基督教指受上帝启示而传达上帝旨意或预言未来的人 (Judaism, Christianity) religion prophet; person who speaks for God, or as though under divine guidance

先礼后兵
先礼后兵[xiān lǐ hòu bīng] 先讲礼貌，行不通时再使用强硬的手段 take strong measures only after courteous ones fail; try peaceful means before resorting to force

先祖
先祖[xiān zǔ]〈书 fml.〉1.祖先 my forefathers 2.称已故的祖父 my late grandfather

先秦
先秦[Xiān Qín] 指秦统一以前的历史时期，一般指春秋战国时期 pre-Qin period, i.e., before 221 B.C. when Qinshihuang (First Emperor of Qin) united China; usu. referring to the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period：先秦史 the pre-Qin history of China先秦诸子（指孔子、老子、墨子、庄子、孟子、荀子、韩非子等）exponents of different schools of thought in the pre-Qin times (referring to Confucius, Laozi, Mozi, Zhuangzi, Mencius, Xunzi, Hanfeizi, etc.)

先端
先端[xiān duān] 叶、花、果实等器官的顶部 tip (of a leaf, flower, fruit, etc.)

先行
先行[xiān xíng]1.走在前面的 go ahead of the rest; start off before the others：先行者 forerunner先行官 commander of an advance unit or vanguard 2.先进行；预先进行 beforehand; in advance：先行试办 run on a trial basis先行通知 notify in advance 3.指先行官 commander of an advance unit or vanguard

先行官
先行官[xiān xíng guān] 戏曲小说中指指挥先头部队的武官 commander of an advance unit or vanguard铁路运输是国民经济的先行官。Railway transportation is the vanguard of the national economy.

先行者
先行者[xiān xíng zhě] 首先倡导的人 forerunner：中国民主主义革命的先行者孙中山先生 Dr. Sun Yat-sen, forerunner of the Chinese democratic revolution

先见之明
先见之明[xiān jiàn zhī míng] 事先看清问题的眼力；预见性 prophetic vision; foresight

先觉
先觉[xiān jué] 在政治、社会改革方面觉悟得较早的人 person with foresight (in political and social reforms); advanced thinker：先知先觉 person with foresight

先贤
先贤[xiān xián]〈书 fml.〉已经去世的有才德的人 sages of the past：先贤祠 temple of sages

先辈
先辈[xiān bèi]1.泛指行辈在先的人 (in a broad sense) elder generation; ancestors 2.指已去世的令人钦佩值得学习的人 forefathers; forerunners; sb. who is deceased but is still held in high esteem and as a fine example to learn from：继承革命先辈的事业 carry on with the cause of the older generation

先进
先进[xiān jìn]1.进步比较快，水平比较高，可以作为学习的榜样的 advanced; fast or ahead in progress or level and to be emulated：先进工作者 advanced worker先进水平 most advanced level 2.先进的人或集体 advanced individual or unit：后进赶先进 those behind trying to catch up with those ahead

先遣
先遣[xiān qiǎn]行动前先派出去担任联络、侦察等任务的（人员或组织）sent in advance; (people or group) sent in advance to do liaison or reconnaissance work：先遣队 advance party; advance group先遣部队 advance troops (or force)

先锋
先锋[xiān fēng] 作战或行军时的先头部队，旧时也指率领先头部队的将官，现在多用于比喻 vanguard; van; vanguard unit in a battle or march; officers who led the vanguard in the old times; usu. used in metaphors：先锋队 vanguard开路先锋 path-breaker; pioneer打先锋 fight in the van; be a pioneer

先驱
先驱[xiān qū]1.走在前面引导（多虚用 oft. in abstract sense）harbinger：先驱者 pioneer; forerunner; harbinger 2.先驱者 pioneer; forerunner; harbinger：革命的先驱 revolutionary forerunner

先验论
先验论[xiān yàn lùn]唯心主义的认识论。同唯物主义的反映论相对立。认为人的知识（包括才能）是先于客观存在、先于社会实践、先于感觉经验的，是先天就有的。apriorism; transcendentalism; priori principle or method of reasoning; idealistic theory of knowledge. Opposed to the materialistic theory of knowledge, apriorism argues that the knowledge (including ability) of a person is prior to objective being, to social practice, and to perception and experience, or, to put it in a single word, innate.

光
光[guāng]（ㄍㄨㄤ）1.通常指照在物体上，使人能看见物体的那种物质，如太阳光、灯光、月光等。可见光是波长0.77-0.39微米的电磁波。此外还包括看不见的红外光和紫外光。因为光是电磁波的一种，所以也叫光波；在一般情况下光沿直线传播，所以也叫光线。 light; electromagnetic radiation that acts upon the retina of the eye, optic nerve, etc., making sight possible; matter that shines over an object, making it visible to the eye, such as sunlight, lamplight, and moonlight. The wavelength of the visible light is a electromagnetic wave 0.77-0.39 micrometres in length. Besides, there are infrared light and ultraviolet light. As light is one of the electromagnetic waves, it is also called light wave. In normal conditions, light is transmitted along a straight line, and is therefore called ray. 另见  红外线 hóngwàixiàn and 紫外线 zǐwàixiàn 2.景物 sights：风光 scenery春光明媚 sunlit and enchanting spring scenery 3.光彩；荣誉 lustre; splendour; honour; glory：为国增光 bring honour to the country; do credit to one's country honour 4.〈比喻 fig.〉好处 benefit; good; advantage：沾光 benefit from the support or influence of someone叨光 much obliged to you借光 excuse me 5.〈敬辞 pol.〉表示光荣，用于对方来临 honour; pleasure：光临 your presence光顾 patronize; patronage (used in polite formulas) 6.光大 glorify; bring honour to：光前裕后 glorify the forefathers and provide for the descendants 7.明亮 bright; lustre：光明 bright; light; open-hearted光泽 lustre 8.光滑；光溜 smooth; slippery; glossy; sleek; polished：磨光 polish这种纸很光。This paper is very glossy. 9.一点儿不剩；全没有了；完了 nothing left; all gone; used up：精光 with nothing left用光 use up把敌人消灭光 wipe out the enemy 10.（身体）露着 bare：光膀子 be stripped to the waist光着头 bare-headed 11.只；单 only; alone：任务这么重，光靠你们两个人恐怕不行。The task is quite demanding. I'm afraid just the two of you cannot do it. 12.(Guāng) 姓 a surname相关词组暴光 | 背光 | 不光 | 采光 | 蟾光 | 辰光 | 晨光 | 春光 | 叨光 | 道光 | 灯光 | 电光 | 对光 | 耳光 | 反光 | 风光 | 佛光 | 感光 | 观光 | 寒光 | 黑光 | 候光 | 弧光 | 灰光 | 火光 | 激光 | 极光 | 借光 | 精光 | 开光 | 老光 | 冷光 | 亮光 | 磷光 | 灵光 | 溜光 | 流光 | 漏光 | 镁光 | 目光 | 逆光 | 年光 | 抛光 | 跑光 | 平光 | 曝光 | 日光 | 荣光 | 容光 | 散光 | 色光 | 闪光 | 赏光 | 韶光 | 生光 | 时光 | 曙光 | 丝光 | 天光 | 霞光 | 星光 | 眩光 | 眼光 | 验光 | 阳光 | 荧光 | 油光 | 圆光 | 月光 | 增光 | 沾光 | 折光 | 争光 | 重光 | 反光灯 | 感光片 | 感光纸 | 弧光灯 | 回光镜 | 激光刀 | 激光器 | 聚光灯 | 聚光镜 | 亮光光 | 曝光表 | 青光眼 | 穷光蛋 | 屈光度 | 趋光性 | 日光灯 | 日光浴 | 闪光灯 | 剃光头 | 曳光弹 | 夜光表 | 荧光灯 | 荧光屏 | 有光纸 | 表面光 | 可见光 | 两面光 | 自然光 | 打光棍儿 | 刀光剑影 | 浮光掠影 | 和光同尘 | 红光满面 | 湖光山色 | 回光返照 | 激光电视 | 激光武器 | 吉光片羽 | 目光短浅 | 目光如豆 | 目光如炬 | 韬光养晦 | 五光十色 | 血光之灾 | 锃光瓦亮 | 珠光宝气 | 发扬光大 | 视频光盘 | 鼠目寸光 | 外面儿光光斑 | 光波 | 光彩 | 光赤 | 光宠 | 光大 | 光刀 | 光度 | 光复 | 光顾 | 光棍 | 光华 | 光滑 | 光环 | 光辉 | 光火 | 光洁 | 光景 | 光缆 | 光亮 | 光临 | 光溜 | 光芒 | 光明 | 光能 | 光年 | 光谱 | 光圈 | 光荣 | 光润 | 光束 | 光速 | 光趟 | 光头 | 光鲜 | 光线 | 光绪 | 光学 | 光压 | 光艳 | 光焰 | 光洋 | 光耀 | 光阴 | 光源 | 光泽 | 光栅 | 光照 | 光针 | 光柱 | 光子 | 光板儿 | 光灿灿 | 光电池 | 光杆儿 | 光棍儿 | 光洁度 | 光溜溜 | 光谱仪 | 光荣榜 | 光闪闪 | 光通量 | 光秃秃 | 光照度 | 光彩照人 | 光导纤维 | 光风霁月 | 光怪陆离 | 光合作用 | 光化作用 | 光解作用 | 光明磊落 | 光明正大 | 光前裕后 | 光天化日 | 光学玻璃 | 光宗耀祖

光临
光临[guāng lín]〈敬辞 pol.〉称宾客来到 presence of a guest; honour sb. with one's presence：敬请光临。Your presence is cordially requested. or It's a pleasure to have your presence. or It's an honour to have your presence.欢迎光临指导。We welcome you and would appreciate your advice. or Your visit and advice would be deeply appreciated.

光亮
光亮[guāng liàng]1.明亮 bright：光亮的窗子 bright window这套家具油漆得挺光亮。This set of furniture has a very shiny coat of paint. 2.亮光 light：山洞里一点儿光亮也没有。There is not a flicker of light in the mountain cave.

光刀
光刀[guāng dāo]1.利用激光代替钢制手术刀进行手术的装置 laser scalpel; device for surgical operation using laser instead of steel scalpel 2.这种装置的光束 light beam of this device

光前裕后
光前裕后[guāng qián yù hòu] 给前人增光，为后代造福（多用来称颂别人的功业 oft. in praise of one's achievements）bring honour to one's ancestors and prosperity to one's descendants

光化作用
光化作用[guāng huà zuò yòng] 物质由于光的照射而产生化学变化的作用，包括光合作用和光解作用两类 photochemical action; chemical action of a substance due to irradiation of light, including photosynthesis and photolysis

光华
光华[guāng huá] 明亮的光辉 brilliance; splendour：日月光华 brilliance of the sun and the moon

光压
光压[guāng yā] 射在物体上的光对物体所产生的压力。彗星的尾巴背着太阳就是太阳的光压造成的。 light pressure; pressure given to an object by the light shed on the object; the phenomenon in which the tail of a comet points away from the sun exactly results from the light pressure of the sun

光合作用
光合作用[guāng hé zuò yòng] 光化作用的一类，如绿色植物的叶绿素在日光照射下把水和二氧化碳合成有机物质并排出氧气 photosynthesis; production of organic substances and oxygen from carbon dioxide and water occurring in green plant cells supplied with enough sunlight to allow chlorophyll to aid in the process

光圈
光圈[guāng quān] 摄影机等光学仪器的镜头中改变通光孔径的大小、调节进入光量的装置 device in the lens of a camera and other optical instruments for changing the diameter of the hole, through which light passes into the lens; diaphragm; aperture; stop亦 also 光孔 guāngkǒng 或 or 光阑 guānglán

光复
光复[guāng fù] 恢复（已亡的国家）；收回（失去的领土） recover (lost territory); restore the sovereignty of a conquered nation：光复旧物 recover what has been lost (to an invader)光复河山 recover lost land

光大
光大[guāng dà]〈书 fml.〉1.使显赫盛大 glorify; carry forward; develop：光大门楣 bring glory to one's family; win honour and distinction for one's family发扬光大 carry forward 2.广大 wide; extensive; vast

光天化日
光天化日[guāng tiān huà rì]〈比喻 fig.〉大家看得很清楚的地方 evidently, obviously：光天化日之下 in broad daylight; the light of day

光头
光头[guāng tóu] 头上不戴帽子 bare one's head：他不习惯戴帽子，一年四季总光着头。He is not used to wearing a hat and goes bareheaded all year round.光头[guāng tóu] 剃光的头；没有头发的头；秃头 shaved head; head without hair; bald head

光子
光子[guāng zǐ] 构成光的基本粒子，具有一定的能量，是光能的最小单位。光子的能量随着光的波长而变化，波长愈短，能量愈大。 quantum of light; photon; fundamental particles that form light. A photon has a certain amount of energy and is the smallest unit of light energy. The energy of a photon varies with the wavelength of the light: the shorter the wavelength, the more energy;亦 also 光量子 guāngliàngzǐ

光学
光学[guāng xué] 物理学的一个分支，研究光的本性、光的发射、传播和接收规律，以及光跟其他物质的相互作用等 optics; branch of physics dealing with the nature and properties of light and vision, the law of emission, transmission and reception of light, and the interaction between light and other substances

光学玻璃
光学玻璃[guāng xué bō lí] 用来制造光学仪器的高级玻璃，具有良好的光学性能。摄影机、经纬仪、望远镜等的镜头都用光学玻璃制成。 optical glass; high-grade glass used to make optical instruments, having good optical properties. The lenses for camera, theodolite and telescope are all made of optical glass.

光宗耀祖
光宗耀祖[guāng zōng yào zǔ] 指为祖先、宗族增添光彩 glorify or bring honour to one's ancestors or family clan

光宠
光宠[guāng chǒng]〈书 fml.〉（赐给的）荣耀或恩惠 honour or favour (granted)

光导纤维
光导纤维[guāng dǎo xiān wéi] 一种能够导光的纤维。用玻璃或塑料制成。光线在纤维中可以弯曲传导，并能改变像的形状。用于医疗器械、电子光学仪器、光通讯线路等方面。 optical fibre; a kind of fibre capable of conducting light, made of glass or plastic. Light can be conducted in the fibre in a curved way and change the shape of images. It is used in medical instruments, electron optical instruments, optical fibre communications, etc.亦 also 光学纤维 guāngxué xiānwéi；简称 abbr. 光纤 guāngxiān

光年
光年[guāng nián] 天文学上的一种距离单位，即以光在1年内在真空中走过的路程为1光年。光速每秒约30万公里，1光年约等于94，605亿公里。 light year; unit of distance equal to the distance that light travels in a vacuum in a year, c. ≈9,460,500,000,000 km.; the speed of light is 300,000 km. per second

光度
光度[guāng dù]1.光源所发的光的强度。通常以烛光为单位。 luminosity; intensity of light produced by a light source, usu. using candle light as a unit 2.恒星的真实亮度，用整个恒星的表面每秒钟放出的能量来表示 true luminosity of a star, indicated by the energy released by the surface of the whole star per second

光彩
光彩[guāng cǎi]1.颜色和光泽；光辉 colour and lustre; splendour; radiance; brilliance：大放光彩 shine with dazzling splendour橱窗里面摆着光彩夺目的各色丝绸。Silk fabrics radiate a brilliant riot of colour in the shop window. 2.光荣 honourable; honoured; glorious; honour：小张当了劳动模范，咱全村都很光彩。The whole village felt honoured to have Xiao Zhang named as a model worker.

光彩照人
光彩照人[guāng cǎi zhào rén] 形容人或事物十分美好或艺术成就辉煌，令人注目、敬仰 (of personality, good things, achievements) shine with brilliance or splendour

光怪陆离
光怪陆离[guāng guài lù lí] 形容现象奇异、色彩繁杂 grotesque and gaudy; grotesque in shape and gaudy in colour; bizarre

光斑
光斑[guāng bān] 太阳表面上特别明亮的纤维状斑点，是太阳活动比较剧烈的部分 bright areas visible on the surface of the sun; facula

光明
光明[guāng míng]1.亮光 light：黑暗中的一线光明 a streak of light in the darkness 2.明亮 bright：这条街上的路灯，一个个都像通体光明的水晶球。The street lights down this road all look like bright crystal balls. 3.〈比喻 fig.〉正义的或有希望的 righteous; promising：光明大道 bright road光明的远景 bright prospect 4.（胸襟）坦白；没有私心 honest and above board; selfless; open-hearted; guileless：光明正大 honest; just and upright光明磊落 selfless; honest and above board; open and above board心地光明 open-hearted; upright and pure in mind

光明正大
光明正大[guāng míng zhèng dà] 形容襟怀坦白，行为正派 honest; just and upright; just and honourable; open and above board亦 also 正大光明 zhèngdà guāngmíng

光明磊落
光明磊落[guāng míng lěi luò] 形容没有私心，胸怀坦白 selfless; honest and above board; open and above board

光景
光景[guāng jǐng]1.时光景物 scene：好一派草原光景。What a magnificent grassland! 2.境况；状况；情景 situation; circumstances; condition：他家的光景还不错。His family is quite well-off.我们俩初次见面的光景，我还记得很清楚。I can still clearly remember the scene when we first met. 3.表示估计 prospects (a)一般的情况 general situation：今天太闷热，光景是要下雨。It's stifling. It looks like raining. (b)时间或数量（用在表时间或数量的词语后面） [used after time and numerical expressions] about; around：半夜光景起了风。A wind sprang up around midnight.里面有十几个小孩子，大都只有五六岁光景。There are a dozen or so children inside, mostly five or six years old.

光杆儿
光杆儿[guāng gǎn r]1.指花叶尽落的草木或没有叶子衬托的花朵 bare trunk; bare stalk; flower on a bare stalk：光杆儿牡丹 peony on a bare stalk高粱被雹子打得成了光杆儿。The sorghum was stripped to the stem by a hail. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉孤独的人或失去群众、没有助手的领导 man who has lost his family; person without followers; leader without followers：光杆儿司令 general without an army; leader without followers; commander without an army他家只剩下他一个光杆儿。He has been left alone in the family.

光束
光束[guāng shù] 呈束状的光线，如探照灯的光 light beam; beam of light, such as the light from a searchlight

光板儿
光板儿[guāng bǎn r]1.磨掉了毛的皮衣服或皮褥子 worn-out fur 2.指没有轧上花纹和字的铜元 copper coin without a distinctive stamp

光柱
光柱[guāng zhù] 同 same as 光束 guāngshù：探照灯的光柱划破长空。The night sky was pierced by searchlight rays.

光栅
光栅[guāng shān] 能产生衍射现象的光学器件，光线透过它或被它反射时就形成光谱，一般用玻璃或金属制成，上面刻有很密的平行细纹 grating; diffraction grating; plate of glass or polished metal ruled with a series of very close, equidistant, parallel lines, used to produce a spectrum by the diffraction of reflected or transmitted light

光棍
光棍[guāng gùn]1.地痞；流氓 ruffian; hoodlum 2.〈方 dial.〉指识时务的人 clever (or wise) person：光棍不吃眼前亏。A wise man doesn't fight against impossible odds.

光棍儿
光棍儿[guāng gùn r] 没有妻子的成年人；单身汉 unmarried man; bachelor：打光棍儿（过单身汉的生活）live a bachelor's life

光波
光波[guāng bō] 同 same as 光 guāng ①

光泽
光泽[guāng zé] 物体表面上反射出来的亮光 light reflected from the surface of a substance：脸盘红润而有光泽。His face is glowing with health.

光洁
光洁[guāng jié] 光亮而洁净 bright and clean：在灯光照耀下，平滑的大理石显得格外光洁。In the lamp light the smooth marble looks particularly bright and clean.

光洁度
光洁度[guāng jié dù]〈旧称 old〉机器零件、工件等的表面粗糙程度 smooth finish (of the surface of machine parts, work pieces); degree of finish

光洋
光洋[guāng yáng]〈方 dial.〉银圆 silver dollar

光润
光润[guāng rùn] 光滑润泽（多指皮肤 usu. referring to skin）smooth

光源
光源[guāng yuán] 发光（通常指可见光）的物体，如太阳、灯、火等 luminous substance (usu. emitting visible light), such as the sun, lamp, fire, etc.; light source; illuminant

光溜
光溜[guāng liu] 光滑；滑溜 smooth; glossy; slippery：这种道林纸比电光纸还光溜。The Dowling paper is even glossier than glazed paper.

光溜溜
光溜溜[guāng liū liū]（～的 guāngliūliū·de）1.形容光滑 smooth; slippery：她走在光溜溜的冰上有点害怕。She was a bit nervous walking on the slippery ice. 2.形容地面、物体、身体上没有遮盖的样子 bare; naked：院子里种上点花儿，省得光溜溜的不好看。Grow some flowers in the compound to offset the dullness of the bare ground.孩子们脱得光溜溜的在河里洗澡。The children stripped off their clothes and swam naked in the river.

光滑
光滑[guāng huá] 物体表面平滑；不粗糙 smooth; glossy; sleek：皮肤光滑 smooth skin大理石的桌面很光滑。The surface of the marble table is very smooth.

光火
光火[guāng huǒ]〈方 dial.〉发怒；恼怒 flare up; fly into a rage; lose one's temper

光灿灿
光灿灿[guāng càn càn]（～的 guāngcàncàn·de）形容光亮耀眼 shining; dazzling; bright：光灿灿的秋阳 dazzling autumn sun

光焰
光焰[guāng yàn] 光芒；光辉 radiance：万丈光焰 boundless radiance光焰耀目 radiance dazzling to the eye

光照
光照[guāng zhào]1.光线的照射。是生物生长和发育的必要条件之一。 illumination; one of the essential conditions for the growth and development of living things 2.光辉照耀（多用于比喻 oft. fig.）shine with radiance：光照人间 shine over the world; benefit humanity with one's achievements

光照度
光照度[guāng zhào dù] 物体单位面积上所得到的光的量，用来表明物体被照亮的程度。单位是勒克斯。 intensity of illumination; quantity of light obtained over a unit area of a substance, used for indicating the degree of illumination over the substance; the unit of illumination is lux; luminosity；简称 abbr. 照度 zhàodù

光环
光环[guāng huán]1.某些行星周围明亮的环状物，由冰和铁等构成，如土星、天王星等都有数量不等的光环 aureole; ring of light around a planet, which is composed of ice and iron, such as the different number of rings of light around Saturn, Uranus, etc. 2.发光的环子 luminous ring：霓虹灯组成了象征奥运会的五彩光环。The neon lights form the five coloured rings symbolic of the Olympic Games. 3.特指神像或圣像头部周围画的环形光辉；灵光 ② halo; aureole; symbolic ring of light shown around the head of a god or saint, etc.

光电池
光电池[guāng diàn chí] 利用光的照射产生电能的器件，用光电效应强的物质如硒、氧化铜等制成。摄影上测量光度的光度计就是用光电池做成的。 photoelectric cell, whose electric state is changed by the effect of light, made of material with a strong photoelectric effect such as selenium, copper oxide. etc. The photometer used in photography for measuring luminosity is made of photoelectric cells.

光秃秃
光秃秃[guāng tū tū]（～的 guāngtūtū·de）形容没有草木、树叶、毛发等盖着的样子 without the natural or customary covering (grass, leaves, hair, etc.); bare; bald：冬天叶子全掉了，只剩下光秃秃的树枝。All leaves fell in the winter, leaving the branches and twigs bare.

光线
光线[guāng xiàn] 同 same as 光 guāng ①

光绪
光绪[guāng xù] 清德宗（爱新觉罗载湉）年号（公元1875-1908） reigning title of Emperor Dezong (Aisin-Gioro Zaitian) of the Qing Dynasty, whose reign lasted from 1875 to 1908

光缆
光缆[guāng lǎn] 由许多根经过技术处理的光导纤维组合而成的缆，用来传输光信号 optical cable, composed of many processed optical fibres used for the transmission of light signals

光耀
光耀[guāng yào]1. 同 same as 光辉 guānghuī ①：光耀夺目 dazzling; dazzlingly brilliant 2.荣耀 honour; glory; credit：立功是光耀的事。It's glorious to render meritorious service. 3.光大 glorify; carry forward; develop：光耀门庭 glorify a family 4.光辉照耀（多用于比喻 oft. fig.）shine with brilliance：光耀史册 shine with brilliance in history

光能
光能[guāng néng] 光所具有的能 light energy

光艳
光艳[guāng yàn] 鲜明艳丽 bright and colourful

光芒
光芒[guāng máng] 向四面放射的强烈光线 rays of light：光芒万丈 shining with boundless radiance; gloriously radiant; resplendent光芒四射 shining with radiance in all directions

光荣
光荣[guāng róng]1.由于做了有利于人民的和正义的事情而被公认为值得尊敬的 respected for doing sth. good for the people and justice; honourable; honoured; glorious：光荣之家 honoured family光荣牺牲 die a glorious death 2.荣誉 honour; glory; credit：光荣归于祖国。Glory (honour, credit) goes to the motherland.

光荣榜
光荣榜[guāng róng bǎng] 表扬先进人物的榜，榜上列出姓名，有时加上照片和先进事迹 honour roll; roster of honour; roll of names of persons cited for their outstanding deeds, sometimes with photos and brief introductions attached

光解作用
光解作用[guāng jiě zuò yòng] 光化作用的一类，如照相材料在可见光的照射下感光，碘化氢在紫外线的照射下分解成氢和碘 photolysis; photochemical action, such as the sensitization of photographic materials due to the action of a visible light and the decomposition of hydrogen iodide into hydrogen and iodine due to the action of ultraviolet light

光谱
光谱[guāng pǔ] 复色光通过棱镜或光栅后，分解成的单色光按波长大小排成的光带。日光的光谱是红、橙、黄、绿、蓝、靛、紫七色。 spectrum; series of coloured bands dispersed and arranged in the order of their respective wavelengths by the passage of white light through a prism or other dispersing device and shading continuously from red (produced by the longest wave visible) through violet (produced by the shortest)：the main colours of the spectrum are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet

光谱仪
光谱仪[guāng pǔ yí] 把成分复杂的光分解为光谱线的仪器，用棱镜或衍射光栅等构成 spectrograph; instrument for decomposing the complex light into spectrum lines, composed of a prism or a diffraction grating

光赤
光赤[guāng chì]（身体）露着 naked; stark naked

光趟
光趟[guāng tang]〈方 dial.〉光滑；不粗糙 fine and smooth：席子编得又细密又光趟。The mat is well woven and feels so smooth.

光辉
光辉[guāng huī]1.闪烁耀目的光 radiance; brilliance; glory：太阳的光辉 brilliance of the sun 2.光明, 灿烂 bright; brilliant; magnificent; splendid：光辉前程 bright future

光通量
光通量[guāng tōng liàng] 单位时间内通过某一面积的光的量。单位是流明。 flow of light measured in lumens; luminous flux

光速
光速[guāng sù] 光波传播的速度，在真空中每秒约30万公里，在空气中也与这个数值相近 velocity of light; speed of the transmission of light wave, about 300,000 km. per second in vacuum, and also close to this numerical value in the air

光针
光针[guāng zhēn]1.利用激光代替毫针进行针灸的装置 laser needle; device using a laser beam as an acupuncture needle 2.这种装置的光束 beam produced by such a device; laser needle beam

光闪闪
光闪闪[guāng shǎn shǎn]（～的 guāngshǎnshǎn·de）形容光亮闪烁 bright and glistening：光闪闪的珍珠 glistening pearl

光阴
光阴[guāng yīn]1.时间 time available; time：光阴似箭。Time flies like an arrow. or How time flies!青年时代的光阴是最宝贵的。Time in the youth is most precious.一寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴。An inch of time is an inch of gold, but an inch of gold can hardly buy an inch of time. 2.〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 日子 rì·zi ③

光顾
光顾[guāng gù]〈敬辞 pol.〉称客人来到，商家多用来欢迎顾客 [term of respect for customers patronizing one's shop] welcome

光风霁月
光风霁月[guāng fēng jì yuè] 雨过天晴时风清月明的景象 clear moon and a light breeze after a rain;〈比喻 fig.〉开阔的胸襟和坦白的心地，也比喻太平清明的政治局面 open and above board; open-hearted and above board; peaceful, uncorrupted political situation亦 also 霁月光风 jì yuè guāng fēng

光鲜
光鲜[guāng xiān]1.明亮鲜艳；整洁漂亮 bright and new; clean and beautiful：衣着光鲜 be dressed in a bright new suit 2.〈方 dial.〉光彩；光荣 lustrous; glorious：总想把事情办得光鲜体面一点儿 always want to handle affairs in a lustrous and respectable way

克
克1[kè]（ㄎㄜˋ）（剋、尅）1.能 can; able to; capable of：克勤克俭 practise diligence and thrift不克分身 have one's hands full 2.克服；克制 restrain：克己 self-restraint; self-abnegation以柔克刚 overcome the tough with the mild 3.攻下据点；战胜 conquer; subjugate：克复 recapture; recover克敌 beat or defeat an enemy攻必克 invincible 4.消化 digest; absorb：克食 help digestion克化 digest克2[kè]（ㄎㄜˋ）（剋、尅）严格限定（期限）set a strict time limit：克期 schedule克日 set a deadline亦 also 刻 kè另见  剋（尅）kēi克3[kè]（ㄎㄜˋ）国际单位制、公制的质量单位，1克等于1千克（公斤）的千分之一 gramme, the basic unit for measuring weight in the international unit system and metric system. 1 gramme equals one 1,000th of 1 kg. [法 French: gramme]克4[kè]（ㄎㄜˋ）1.藏族地区容量单位，1克青稞约重25市斤 ke, a Tibetan unit of volume or dry measure (1 ke equals approximately 12.5 kg. of qingke barley) 2.藏族地区地积单位，播种1克（约25市斤）种子的土地称为1克地，1克约合1市亩 ke, a Tibetan unit of land area (an acreage of land large enough for the sowing of 12.5 kg. of seeds), equal to about 1 mu相关词组不克 | 攻克 | 夹克 | 夸克 | 马克 | 扑克 | 千克 | 茄克 | 坦克 | 休克 | 勒克斯 | 麦克风 | 巧克力 | 萨克管 | 坦克兵 | 马赛克 | 欧佩克 | 丁克家庭 | 麦克斯韦 | 鄂温克族 | 反坦克炮 | 哥萨克人 | 哈萨克族 | 塔吉克族 | 罗曼蒂克 | 孟什维克 | 相生相克 | 爱克斯射线 | 立克次氏体 | 马克思主义 | 柯尔克孜族 | 乌孜别克族 | 布尔什维克 | 马克思列宁主义 | 奥林匹克运动会 | 盎格鲁撒克逊人克服 | 克复 | 克化 | 克己 | 克扣 | 克拉 | 克朗 | 克隆 | 克期 | 克日 | 克食 | 克星 | 克制 | 克格勃 | 克郎球 | 克敌制胜 | 克己奉公 | 克勤克俭 | 克丝钳子 | 克里姆林宫

克丝钳子
克丝钳子[kè sī qián zi] 一种手工工具，钳柄上包有绝缘保护套，电工常用，主要用来剪断导线或金属丝 combination pliers; cutting pliers; electrician's tool for cutting leads or other metal wires, with both handles covered with insulating sheaths

克制
克制[kè zhì] 抑制（多指情感 oft. one's emotions）restrain; exercise restraint：采取克制的态度 show restraint (in handling a matter)他很能克制自己的情感，冷静地对待一切问题。He knows perfectly about how to control his own feelings and always stays cool in handling problems.

克勤克俭
克勤克俭[kè qín kè jiǎn] 既能勤劳，又能节俭 industry and frugality：克勤克俭是我国人民的优良传统。Industry and frugality is a fine tradition of the Chinese people.

克化
克化[kè huà]〈方 dial.〉消化（食物） digest (food)

克复
克复[kè fù] 经过战斗而夺回（被敌人占领的地方） recover; recapture：克复失地 recover lost territory

克己
克己[kè jǐ]1.克制自己的私心；对自己要求严格 restrain oneself：克己奉公 exercise self-restraint and be dedicated to the public interest 2.商店自称货价便宜，不多赚钱 (oft. a store's proclamation) cut-rate sales 3.节俭；俭省 be thrifty; be frugal：自奉克己 live a Spartan life

克己奉公
克己奉公[kè jǐ fèng gōng] 严格要求自己，奉行公事 be restrict with oneself and dedicated to one's public duty; work selflessly for the public interest

克扣
克扣[kè kòu] 私自扣减应该发给别人的财物，据为己有 embezzle part of what should be issued to others：克扣粮饷 dock soldiers' living allowances

克拉
克拉[kè lā] 宝石的重量单位，1克拉等于200毫克，即0.2克 karat, unit of weight for diamond; 1 carat equals 0.2 gramme [法 French: carat]

克敌制胜
克敌制胜[kè dí zhì shèng] 打败敌人，取得胜利 vanquish (or conquer) an enemy and emerge victorious

克日
克日[kè rì] 同 same as 克期 kèqī：克日动工 start a project on a chosen date亦 also 刻日 kèrì

克星
克星[kè xīng] 迷信的人用五行相生相克的道理推论，认为有些人的命运是相克的，把相克的人叫做克星 jinx; nemesis; natural enemy. According to the theory of the relationship of mutual promotion and restraint between the Five Elements in Chinese horoscope, some people are ill-matched in their lives' destinations and therefore should never come together in marriage or other relationships. Thus a man may be regarded as the nemesis of a woman, and vice versa.猫头鹰是鼠类的克星。The owl is a natural enemy of mice and rats.

克服
克服[kè fú]1.用坚强的意志和力量战胜（缺点、错误、坏现象、不利条件等） overcome (difficulties, shortcomings, etc.); correct (a mistake)：克服急躁情绪 overcome impetuosity; rein in one's rashness克服不良习气 overcome undesirable tendencies群策群力，克服重重困难 overcome one difficulty after another by collective wisdom and effort 2.克制；忍受（困难）put up with (difficulty)：这儿的生活条件不太好，请诸位克服一下。Living conditions here are not so good and we'll appreciate it if you could put up with it.

克朗
克朗[kè lǎng] 瑞典、挪威、冰岛、丹麦等国家的本位货币 Krona, unit of money in Sweden, Norway, Iceland and Denmark, etc.

克期
克期[kè qī] 约定或限定日期 set a date; set a time limit：克期完工 set a deadline for the completion of a project克期送达 deliver a message, etc., on time亦 also 刻期 kèqī

克格勃
克格勃[kè gé bó]原苏联‘国家安全委员会’的俄文(Комитет государственной безопасности)缩写(КГБ)的音译。也指克格勃的人员。KGB; transliteration of the Russian term for the former Soviet State Security Committee; also a KGB member

克郎球
克郎球[kè láng qiú] 康乐球 carom billiards

克里姆林宫
克里姆林宫[Kè lǐ mǔ lín gōng]俄国沙皇的宫殿，在莫斯科市中心。十月革命后是原苏联最高党政机关的所在地。常用做原苏联官方的代称。Kremlin; imperial palace of Tsarist Russia in downtown Moscow, converted into the site of the supreme Party and government headquarters of the former Soviet Union after the October Revolution of 1917; synonymous to the former Soviet government [从俄 Russian: Кремль]

克隆
克隆[kè lóng]1.生物体通过体细胞进行无性繁殖，复制出遗传性状完全相同的生命物质或生命体 clone; process in which an organism regenerates asexually a group of genetically identical cells descended from a single common ancestor 2.〈比喻 fig.〉复制（强调跟原来的一模一样）(emphasizing the identity of the original) clone; copy; duplicate

克食
克食[kè shí] 帮助消化食物 facilitate digestion：山楂能克食。Haws help digestion.

免
免[miǎn]（ㄇㄧㄢˇ）1.去掉；除掉 exempt; dispense with; excuse sb. from sth.：免税 tax-free; exempt someone from tax免费 free; free of charge任免名单 namelist of appointments and removals俗礼都免了。(We)'ll dispense with all unnecessary formalities. 2.避免 avoid; avert; escape：免疫性 immunity事前做好准备，以免临时忙乱。Get things ready in advance so as to avoid confusion and rush at the last moment. 3.不可；不要 be not allowed：闲人免进。No admittance except on business.免开尊口 keep quiet; keep one's mouth shut相关词组罢免 | 避免 | 不免 | 黜免 | 豁免 | 减免 | 蠲免 | 难免 | 任免 | 赦免 | 未免 | 幸免 | 以免 | 罢免权 | 天然免疫 | 未能免俗 | 先天性免疫免除 | 免得 | 免费 | 免冠 | 免检 | 免考 | 免票 | 免试 | 免税 | 免俗 | 免刑 | 免修 | 免验 | 免役 | 免疫 | 免职 | 免罪 | 免不得 | 免不了 | 免战牌

免不了
免不了[miǎn bu liǎo] 不可避免；难免 be unavoidable; be bound to：在前进的道路上，困难是免不了的。There are bound to be difficulties in the course of our advance.刚会走的孩子免不了要摔跤。A baby who has just started learning to walk is liable to fall or trip.

免不得
免不得[miǎn bu de] 免不了 be unavoidable; be bound to：在这个问题上他们的看法分歧很大，免不得有一场争论。They differ greatly on this question, so a dispute is unavoidable.

免俗
免俗[miǎn sú] 言行不拘于世俗常情（多用于否定式 oft. used in the negative）words and acts not confined to common practice：未能免俗 be unable to break away from convention

免修
免修[miǎn xiū]允许不学习（某种课程）be exempt from (a course)：免修外语 be excused from the foreign language course

免冠
免冠[miǎn guān]1.脱帽，古时表示谢罪，后来表示敬意 take one's hat off (in salutation) 2.不戴帽子 bareheaded; without a hat on：交一寸半身免冠相片两张。Two half-length, bareheaded, full-faced photos required.

免刑
免刑[miǎn xíng] 经法院审判决定，免予刑事处分 be exempt from criminal sanction by a court decision

免役
免役[miǎn yì] 免除某种规定的服役，如兵役、劳役 exempt from compulsory services, such as military service and corvée

免得
免得[miǎn de] 以免 so as not to; so as to avoid：多问几句，免得走错路。Make some more enquiries so as not to go the wrong way.我再说明一下，免得引起误会。Let me explain once again to avoid misunderstanding.

免战牌
免战牌[miǎn zhàn pái] 向对方表示不应战的牌子（多见于旧小说、戏曲 oft. in old novels, operas, etc.）sign used to show refusal to accept a challenge

免检
免检[miǎn jiǎn] 免除检查 exempt from inspection or examination：免检物品 goods (or articles) exempt from inspection (or examination)

免疫
免疫[miǎn yì] 由于具有抵抗力而不患某种传染病，有先天性免疫和获得性免疫两种 immunity (from disease); congenital immunity or acquired immunity from certain infectious disease

免票
免票[miǎn piào]1.不收费的票 free pass; free ticket：每人发一张火车免票。Everyone is given a free train ticket. 2.（入场、乘车等）不要票 free of charge：儿童身高不满一米的坐公共汽车免票。Children under one metre in height take a bus free of charge.

免税
免税[miǎn shuì] 免缴税款 exempt from taxation：海关免税放行。The customs office grants duty-free clearance.

免罪
免罪[miǎn zuì] 不给予法律处分 exempt from punishment：免罪释放 be exempted from punishment and released

免考
免考[miǎn kǎo] 同 same as 免试 miǎnshì ①

免职
免职[miǎn zhí] 免去职务 remove from office; relieve sb. of his post：由于贪污而被免职 be removed from office due to corruption他被免了职后做别的工作去了。He took another job after he was removed from office.

免试
免试[miǎn shì]1.允许不经过考试（升学或晋职等）be allowed not to take an examination (for enrolment or promotion);亦 also 免考 miǎnkǎo 2.免除测试 be exempted from a test

免费
免费[miǎn fèi] 免缴费用；不收费 free; gratis; free of charge：免费医疗 free medical service展览会免费参观。Admission to the exhibition is free.

免除
免除[miǎn chú] 免去；除掉 prevent; avoid：兴修水利，免除水旱灾害 build irrigation works to prevent droughts and floods

免验
免验[miǎn yàn] 免除检验 exempt from customs examination：免验产品 goods exempt from examination

兑
兑1[duì]（ㄉㄨㄟˋ）1.用旧的金银首饰、器皿向银楼换取新的 exchange (old jewellery, gold or silverware for new); convert 2.凭票据支付或领取现款 honour (a bill, etc.); cash (a money order, cheque, etc.)：兑付 cash (a cheque)汇兑 remittance兑2[duì]（ㄉㄨㄟˋ）八卦之一，卦形是，代表沼泽 one of the Eight Trigrams in the shape of , standing for marsh;另见  八卦 bāguà相关词组拆兑 | 搀兑 | 勾兑 | 汇兑 | 挤兑 | 商兑 | 匀兑 | 折兑兑付 | 兑换 | 兑奖 | 兑现 | 兑换券

兑付
兑付[duì fù] 凭票据支付现款 cash (a cheque, etc.)

兑奖
兑奖[duì jiǎng] 凭中奖的彩票或奖券兑换奖品 claim a prize; cash in a lottery ticket (that has won a prize)

兑换
兑换[duì huàn] 用证券换取现金或用一种货币换取另一种货币 exchange; convert (currencies)：兑换现金 convert (a bill, money order, gold or silver, etc.) into cash用美圆兑换人民币 convert U.S. dollars into Renminbi

兑换券
兑换券[duì huàn quàn] 旧时地方政府或没有纸币发行权的银行，以及银号、钱庄、商号为了资金周转或补助市面货币不足而发行的周转券或流通券，可以向发行处兑换现金 bank certificates convertible into cash at their bank of issue, used in former times by a local government or by banks unauthorized to issue paper money

兑现
兑现[duì xiàn]1.凭票据向银行换取现款，泛指结算时支付现款 cash (a check, etc.); pay a dividend, bonus or balance in cash (when the accounts have been finalized)：这张支票不能兑现。This cheque cannot be cashed.年终兑现时，共收入近三千元。When the accounts were settled at the year-end, the income totalled nearly 3,000 yuan. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉诺言的实现 honour (a promise, etc.); fulfil; make good：答应孩子的事，一定要兑现。One must honour a promise made to a child.

兒
兒1[Ní]（ㄋㄧˊ）（郳） 周朝国名，在今山东滕州东南 Ni, name of a state during the Zhou Dynasty, located to the southeast of present-day Tengzhou, Shandong Province兒2[Ní]（ㄋㄧˊ） 姓 a surname; 同 same as 倪 ní另见  儿 ér

兔
兔[tù]（ㄊㄨˋ）（兎）（兔儿 tùr）哺乳动物，头部略像鼠，耳大，上唇中间分裂，尾短而向上翘，前肢比后肢短，善于跳跃，跑得很快。有家兔和野兔等种类。肉可以吃，毛可供纺织，毛皮可以制衣物。rabbit; hare; mammal whose head slightly resembles that of a rodent, with long ears, a split upper lip, a short cocked tail, and forelimbs much shorter than its hind legs, enabling it to jump and run swiftly. Rabits are either domestic or wild, their meat is edible, their wool is a textile material, and their fur can be used to make clothes. 通称 generally called 免子 tùzi相关词组脱兔 | 野兔 | 玉兔 | 狡兔三窟 | 乌飞兔走 | 狮子搏兔 | 守株待兔兔唇 | 兔毫 | 兔脱 | 兔子 | 兔儿爷 | 兔崽子 | 兔起鹘落 | 兔死狗烹 | 兔死狐悲

兔儿爷
兔儿爷[tù r yé] 中秋节应景的兔头人身的泥制玩具 clay toy for the Mid-Autumn Festival, with a rabbit's head and a human body

兔唇
兔唇[tù chún] 唇裂 harelip; cleft lip

兔子
兔子[tù zi] 兔的通称 general term for 兔 tù

兔崽子
兔崽子[tù zǎi zi]幼小的兔子。多用做骂人的话。(oft. offens.) brat; bastard

兔死狐悲
兔死狐悲[tù sǐ hú bēi]〈比喻 fig.〉因同类的灭亡而感到悲伤 like grieves for like; experience grief at the death of sb. of the same category：兔死狐悲，物伤其类。Just as the fox grieves for the death of the hare, so one feels for one's own kind.

兔死狗烹
兔死狗烹[tù sǐ gǒu pēng]《史记·越王句践世家》：‘蜚（飞）鸟尽，良弓藏；狡兔死，走狗烹。’鸟没有了，弓也就收起来不用了；兔子死了，猎狗也就被煮来吃了。Records of the Historian·Hereditary House of Gou Jian, King of Yue:‘When birds disappear, pack the bows away; and when all hares have been killed, stew and eat the hounds.’〈比喻 fig.〉事情成功以后，把曾经出过大力的人杀掉 kill trusted aides once they have outlived their usefulness

兔毫
兔毫[tù háo] 用兔毛做笔头的毛笔 calligraphy brush made of rabbit hair

兔脱
兔脱[tù tuō]〈书 fml.〉〈比喻 fig.〉很快地逃走 take flight; run as fleet as a hare; escape; flee

兔起鹘落
兔起鹘落[tù qǐ hú luò] 兔刚跑动，鹘就扑下去 the moment the hare runs out, the falcon swoops down；〈比喻 fig.〉动作敏捷。也比喻作画、写字、写文章等下笔迅速，没有停顿。be agile; move rapidly; rapid, flowing style (of a painter, calligrapher or writer).

兕
兕[sì]（ㄙˋ）〈书 fml.〉雌的犀牛 female rhinoceros

兖
兖[yǎn]（ㄧㄢˇ）兖州 (Yǎnzhōu)，地名，在山东 Yanzhou, name of a place in Shandong Province

党
党[dǎng]（ㄉㄤˇ）（黨）1.政党，在我国特指中国共产党 party; political party; (in China) the Communist Party; the Party：党章 Party Constitution党校 Party school入党 join the Party; become a Party member 2.由私人利害关系结成的集团 clique; faction; clan; junto; ring; crew; gang; horde; circle or group of people whose association stems from a common interest：死党 sworn followers结党营私 clique; band together for clandestine and illegal activities 3.〈书fml.〉偏袒 be partial to; favour; side with：党同伐异 support only those with the same ideas and attack the others; be narrowly partisan 4.〈书 fml.〉指亲族 kinsfolk; relatives：父党 father's kinsfolk母党 mother's kinsfolk妻党 wife's kinsfolk 5.(Dǎng) 姓 a surname相关词组白党 | 会党 | 朋党 | 私党 | 死党 | 余党 | 政党 | 两党制 | 拆白党 | 反对党 | 共产党 | 国民党 | 三K党 | 结党营私 | 上党梆子 | 民主党派 | 狐群狗党党报 | 党阀 | 党费 | 党纲 | 党锢 | 党棍 | 党国 | 党籍 | 党纪 | 党课 | 党魁 | 党龄 | 党派 | 党旗 | 党徒 | 党团 | 党委 | 党务 | 党项 | 党校 | 党性 | 党羽 | 党员 | 党章 | 党证 | 党同伐异

党务
党务[dǎng wù] 政党内部有关组织建设等的事务 party work; party affairs; work, affairs, etc., associated with the organizational construction of a political party

党同伐异
党同伐异[dǎng tóng fá yì] 跟自己意见相同的就袒护，跟自己意见不同的就加以攻击。原指学术上派别之间的斗争，后用来指一切学术上、政治上或社会上的集团之间的斗争。 shield those who agree and attack those who differ; originally referring to conflicts between various academic schools, later referring generally to conflicts among academic schools or political and social groups

党员
党员[dǎng yuán] 政党的成员，在我国特指中国共产党的成员 member of a political party; (in China) member of the Chinese Communist Party

党团
党团[dǎng tuán]1.党派和团体的简称，在我国特指共产党和共青团 political party and its affiliated organizations for short; (in China) the Chinese Communist Party and the Chinese Communist Youth League; the Party and the League 2.某些国家议会中，属于同一政党的代表的集体 (in some parliaments) caucus; parliamentary group that belongs to or stands for the same party

党国
党国[dǎng guó] 国民党统治时期指国民党及其所掌握的国家政权 (used by the KMT during its regime) reference to the Kuomintang (KMT) and its government

党委
党委[dǎng wěi] 某些政党的各级委员会的简称，在我国特指中国共产党的各级委员会 committees of a political party at different levels for short; (in China) committees of the CPC at different levels; Party committee

党徒
党徒[dǎng tú] 参加某一集团或派别的人（含贬义 derog.）henchman; partisan; follower; adherent; person who joins a clique or clan

党性
党性[dǎng xìng]1.阶级性最高最集中的表现。不同的阶级或政党有不同的党性。 party character; highest epitome of class character or spirit. Different classes or political parties each have a different party character 2.特指共产党员的党性，就是无产阶级的阶级性最高最集中的表现，是衡量党员阶级觉悟的高低和立场是否坚定的准绳 Party spirit; Party character, referring specifically to the Party spirit of a CPC member that epitomizes the character of the proletarian class, and is the criterion that indicates the class awareness and stand of a Party member

党报
党报[dǎng bào] 政党的机关报，是政党的纲领、路线和政策的宣传工具 party organ; newspaper serving as the mouthpiece of a political party and its programme, line and policy

党旗
党旗[dǎng qí] 代表一个政党的旗帜。中国共产党的党旗是左上角有金黄色的镰刀和铁锤的红旗。 party flag; flag that represents a political party. The CPC party flag is a red flag emblazoned with a golden hammer and sickle in its upper left-hand corner.

党校
党校[dǎng xiào] 共产党培养、训练党的干部的学校 Party school; school set up by the CPC to prepare members for leading posts or to train cadres

党棍
党棍[dǎng gùn] 政党中依仗权势作恶多端的人 corrupt and tyrannical party boss; person from a political party who abuses power for personal gain

党派
党派[dǎng pài] 各政党或政党中各派别的统称 clans; factions; cliques; party groupings; general term for various political parties or different groups within a party

党章
党章[dǎng zhāng] 一个政党的章程，一般规定该党的总纲、组织机构、组织制度及党员的条件、权利、义务和纪律等项 constitution of a political party, which generally prescribes its programme, organizational structure, organizational system as well as qualifications, rights, obligations, and discipline for members

党籍
党籍[dǎng jí] 申请入党的人被批准后取得的党员资格 party membership; party affiliation; party membership granted to an applicant after he or she is recruited

党纪
党纪[dǎng jì] 一个政党所规定的该党党员必须遵守的纪律 party discipline; rules of conduct or discipline stipulated by a political party

党纲
党纲[dǎng gāng] 党章的总纲，是一个政党的最基本的政治纲领和组织纲领 party programme; platform, general programme of a party's constitution; fundamental political and organizational programme of a political party

党羽
党羽[dǎng yǔ] 指某个派别或集团首领下面的追随者（含贬义 derog.）adherent; henchman; partisan; protégé; follower of a party or clan chief

党证
党证[dǎng zhèng] 政党发给党员的证明其党籍的证件 party membership card; certificate that verifies party membership issued by a political party

党课
党课[dǎng kè] 中国共产党的组织为了对党员进行党章教育而开的课，有时也吸收申请入党的人听课 party lesson; party lecture; lecture arranged by the Party to educate its members and aspiring members on the Party Constitution

党费
党费[dǎng fèi]1.政党的活动经费 fund needed for the operation of a political party 2.党员按期向所在的党的基层组织交纳的钱 membership dues; money paid periodically by a member to a party's grass-roots organization

党锢
党锢[dǎng gù]〈古代 arch.〉指禁止某一集团、派别及其有关的人担任官职并限制其活动 party sanction; prevention of a certain clique or clan from assuming office or pursuing more activities than allowed

党阀
党阀[dǎng fá] 指政党内把持大权、专横跋扈、进行宗派活动的头目 party bigwig; party tyrant, despotic political party leader who wields power clannishly

党项
党项[Dǎng xiàng]〈古代 arch.〉羌族的一支，北宋时建立西夏政权，地区包括今甘肃、陕西、内蒙古的各一部分和宁夏 Tanguts; branch of the Qiang tribe that, during the Northern Song Dynasty, set up the Western Xia regime that encompassed present-day Ningxia and parts of Gansu, Shaanxi and Inner Mongolia

党魁
党魁[dǎng kuí] 政党的首领（多含贬义 oft. derog.）party boss; chieftain; chief

党龄
党龄[dǎng líng] 党员入党后经过的年数 party membership seniority, length of time as a party member

兜
兜1[dōu]（ㄉㄡ）1.（兜儿 dōur）口袋一类的东西 bag; pocket; sack; pouch：网兜儿 string bag裤兜儿 trouser pocket中山服有四个兜儿。A Sun Yat-sen uniform has four pockets. 2.做成兜形把东西拢住 wrap; envelop; enfold：小女孩儿的衣襟里兜着几个海棠果儿。The little girl is carrying some crab apples wrapped in the turned-up front of her jacket.老大娘用手巾兜着几个鸡蛋。The old woman carries a few eggs wrapped up in a towel. 3.绕 move around; circle; revolve：兜抄 round up; envelop兜圈子 circle许多感想兜上心头。All sorts of feelings welled up in my mind. 4.招揽 solicit; canvass：兜销 drum up trade兜生意 canvass business; solicit business 5.承担或包下来 take upon oneself; take care of; take the responsibility for：没关系，有问题我兜着。Don't worry. I'll take care of things if there's any problem. 6.兜底 expose; disclose; reveal：把他的老底全给兜出来 bring up everything about his past 7.正对着；冲着 towards; against; on：兜头盖脸 straight on the head; right in the face 8. 同 same as 篼 dōu兜2[dōu]（ㄉㄡ） 同 same as 蔸 dōu相关词组插兜 | 裤兜 | 漏兜 | 贴兜 | 网兜 | 衣兜 | 吃不了，兜着走兜抄 | 兜底 | 兜兜 | 兜肚 | 兜翻 | 兜风 | 兜揽 | 兜鍪 | 兜售 | 兜销 | 兜子 | 兜嘴 | 兜圈子 | 兜兜裤儿 | 兜头盖脸

兜兜
兜兜[dōu dou] 兜肚 undergarment covering the chest and abdomen

兜兜裤儿
兜兜裤儿[dōu dou kù r] 小孩儿夏天穿的带兜肚的小短裤儿 sunsuit (for a child)

兜售
兜售[dōu shòu] 同 same as 兜销 dōuxiāo

兜嘴
兜嘴[dōu zuǐ]〈方 dial.〉1.围嘴儿 bib 2.笼嘴 muzzle (for a draught animal)

兜圈子
兜圈子[dōu quān zi] 绕圈儿 go around in circles; circle：飞机在树林子上空兜了两个圈子就飞走了。The airplane circled over the forest a couple of times and then left.别跟我兜圈子，有话直截了当地说吧。Stop talking in circles, and get straight to the point.

兜头盖脸
兜头盖脸[dōu tóu gài liǎn] 正对着头和脸 direct to one's head and face; right in the face：一盆水兜头盖脸全泼在他身上。A basin of water was poured right on him.亦 also 兜头盖脑 dōu tóu gài nǎo

兜子
兜子[dōu zi]1.口袋一类的东西 pocket; bag; sack; pouch：车兜子 bicycle pouch裤兜子 trouser pocket 2. 同 same as 篼子 dōu·zi

兜底
兜底[dōu dǐ]（～儿 dōu∥dǐr）把底细全部揭露出来（多指隐讳的事 usu. of sth. disreputable）reveal all the details：他的事儿全让人兜了底。His hanky-panky was all exposed.

兜抄
兜抄[dōu chāo] 从后面和两旁包围攻击 round up; envelop; close in on sb. or sth. from the rear and both flanks

兜揽
兜揽[dōu lǎn]1.招引（顾客） canvass; solicit：兜揽生意 solicit customers; drum up trade 2.把事情往身上拉 take upon oneself：他就爱兜揽个事儿。He likes taking things upon himself.

兜翻
兜翻[dōu fan]〈方 dial.〉1.翻弄（旧存的东西）rummage through (old things)：老太太又在开箱子兜翻她那点儿绣花的活计。The old lady is rummaging through the chest for her embroidery work again. 2.重新提起（旧事旧话）dig up (old stories); bring up again; mention again：过去的那些事别兜翻了。Don't dig up the past. 3.揭穿（隐讳的事情）expose; disclose; reveal (disreputable things)：把他的老底都给兜翻出来了。His past has been revealed.

兜肚
兜肚[dōu du] 贴身护在胸部和腹部的像菱形的布，用带子套在脖子上，左右两角钉带子束在背后 diamond-shaped undergarment covering the chest and abdomen, with straps around the neck and waist

兜鍪
兜鍪[dōu móu]〈古代 arch.〉作战时戴的盔 helmet (worn in ancient battles)

兜销
兜销[dōu xiāo]到处找人购买（自己手上的货物）peddle; hawk：兜销存货 hawk the goods in stock

兜风
兜风[dōu fēng]1.（船帆、车篷等）挡住风 (of sails, hoods, etc.) catch the wind：破帆不兜风。Torn sails don't catch the wind. 2.坐车、骑马或乘游艇兜圈子乘凉或游逛 go for a drive, ride or sail; go for a spin：他开着车兜风去了。He's gone for a spin in his car.

兢
兢[jīng]（ㄐㄧㄥ）[兢兢业业] (jīngjīngyèyè) 小心谨慎，认真负责 cautious and conscientious：他工作一向兢，任劳任怨。He always works hard, and never complains no matter how heavy his workload is.相关词组战战兢兢

入
入[rù]（ㄖㄨˋ）1.进来或进去（跟‘出’相对 as opposed to‘go out’）come into; enter：投入 input入冬 winter has set in由浅入深 from the easy to the difficult纳入正轨 set sth. on the right track 2.参加到某种组织中，成为它的成员 enrol; become member of an organization：入学 enrol in a school入团 be admitted into the Communist Youth League入伍 be conscripted 3.收入 income：岁入 state revenue in a fiscal year入不敷出 spend more than one earns量入为出 live within one's means 4.合乎 agree with; conform to：入时 stylish入情入理 fair and just 5.入声 entering tone：平上去入 the level, rising, falling and entering tones of classical Chinese pronunciation相关词组出入 | 淡入 | 加入 | 键入 | 介入 | 进入 | 阑入 | 录入 | 纳入 | 潜入 | 切入 | 侵入 | 深入 | 渗入 | 收入 | 输入 | 岁入 | 投入 | 陷入 | 悖入悖出 | 病入膏肓 | 传入神经 | 恨入骨髓 | 量入为出 | 深入浅出 | 先入为主 | 想入非非 | 鞭辟入里 | 超凡入圣 | 出将入相 | 出神入化 | 出生入死 | 登堂入室 | 对号入座 | 泥牛入海 | 请君入瓮 | 升堂入室 | 丝丝入扣 | 随乡入乡 | 引狼入室 | 引人入胜 | 白色收入 | 单刀直入 | 格格不入 | 国民收入 | 黑色收入 | 灰色收入 | 四舍五入 | 无孔不入 | 长驱直入 | 可吸入颗粒物 | 不入虎穴，焉得虎子入超 | 入定 | 入耳 | 入伏 | 入港 | 入彀 | 入股 | 入骨 | 入画 | 入伙 | 入寂 | 入境 | 入口 | 入寇 | 入殓 | 入列 | 入流 | 入垄 | 入梅 | 入寐 | 入门 | 入梦 | 入迷 | 入眠 | 入魔 | 入侵 | 入神 | 入声 | 入时 | 入世 | 入手 | 入睡 | 入土 | 入托 | 入网 | 入微 | 入围 | 入闱 | 入味 | 入伍 | 入席 | 入绪 | 入选 | 入学 | 入眼 | 入药 | 入夜 | 入院 | 入账 | 入住 | 入赘 | 入坐 | 入座 | 入不敷出 | 入国问禁 | 入境问俗 | 入木三分 | 入情入理 | 入乡随乡 | 入主出奴

入不敷出
入不敷出[rù bù fū chū] 收入不够开支 having difficulty making ends meet; falling short of expenditure

入世
入世[rù shì] 投身到社会里 become a member of society：入世不深 be inexperienced in society

入主出奴
入主出奴[rù zhǔ chū nú]韩愈《原道》：‘入于彼，必出于此；入者主之，出者奴之；入者附之，出者污之。’意思是说崇信了一种说法，就必然会排斥另一种说法；把前者奉做主人，把后者当做奴仆；附和前者，污蔑后者。后来用‘入主出奴’比喻在学术上持门户之见。On the Origin of the Way by Han Yu: Once one has adopted one idea he is bound to reject another, regard the former as the master and the latter as the slave, and chime in with the former and sling mud at the latter. Hence the phrase,‘espouse one idea to the expulsion of another’, which refers to academic sectarianism.

入乡随乡
入乡随乡[rù xiāng suí xiāng]另见  随乡入乡 suí xiāng rù xiāng

入伍
入伍[rù wǔ] 参加部队 enlist in the armed forces; join up：应征入伍 be conscripted

入伏
入伏[rù fú] 进入伏天；伏天开始 beginning of the hottest days of the year

入伙
入伙1[rù huǒ] 加入某个集体或集团 join a gang; join in partnership入伙2[rù huǒ] 加入集体伙食 have one's meals at a cafeteria

入住
入住[rù zhù] 住进去 move into：小区八月竣工，年底入住。The residential quarter will be completed in August, and dwellers will be able to move in towards the end of the year.代表团抵京后，入住北京饭店。The delegation moved into the Beijing Hotel after arriving in Beijing.

入侵
入侵[rù qīn]（敌军）侵入国境 invade; intrude：全歼入侵之敌 annihilate the invaders lock, stock and barrel; wipe out the aggressors

入列
入列[rù liè] 出列的或迟到的人进入队伍行列 (of sb. who is late or who has come out of the line) take one's place in a line; fall in; join the ranks

入口
入口[rù kǒu]1.进入嘴中 enter the mouth 2.外国的货物运进来，有时也指外地的货物运进本地区 import; (of goods from other areas) transported into (a local area)入口[rù kǒu] 进入建筑物或场地所经过的门或口儿 entrance to a building or site：入口处 entrance车站入口 entrance to a railway or bus station

入味
入味[rù wèi]（～儿 rùwèir）1.有滋味 delectable; toothsome; yummy：菜做得很入味。The dish is pleasing to the palate. 2.有趣味 interesting：这出戏我们越看越入味。As we watched the drama we became increasingly enraptured by it.

入围
入围[rù wéi] 经选拔进入某一范围 be included among those selected; qualify：中国象棋锦标赛八强产生，广东两名选手入围。Two players from Guangdong were among the eight qualified for the quarter-finals at the Chinese Chess Championships.经过评选，这部长篇小说入围茅盾文学奖。This novel was selected and nominated for the Mao Dun Literature Award according to the decision of a selection panel.

入国问禁
入国问禁[rù guó wèn jìn] 进入别的国家，先问清他们的禁令 enquire about its prohibitions before entering a country;另见  入境问俗 rù jìng wèn sú

入土
入土[rù tǔ] 埋到坟墓里 be entombed：入土为安 bury the remains and bring peace to the deceased老人说自己是个半截儿入土的人了。The old man described himself as having one foot in the grave already.

入坐
入坐[rù zuò] 同 same as 入座 rù∥zuò

入垄
入垄[rù lǒng]〈方 dial.〉（交谈）投机 (of conversation) congenial; agreeable

入境
入境[rù jìng] 进入国境 enter a country：入境签证 entry visa办理入境手续 go through entry formalities

入境问俗
入境问俗[rù jìng wèn sú]《礼记·曲礼》：‘入竟（境）而问禁，入国而问俗。’进入别国的境界，先问清他们的禁令；进入别国的都城，先问清他们的风俗。现在说成‘入国问禁’和‘入境问俗’。The Book of Rites·Rites of Discretion: On crossing the border into another country, make sure to enquire about the local taboos; when entering its capital, make sure to ask about the local customs and habits. Put separately as 入国问禁 rù guó wèn jìn and 入境问俗 in contemporary use.

入声
入声[rù shēng]古汉语四声之一。普通话没有入声，古入声字分别读成阴平（如‘屋、出’）、阳平（如‘国、直’）、上声（如‘铁、北’）、去声（如‘客、绿’）。有些方言有入声，入声字一般比较短促，有时还带辅音韵尾。entering tone, one of the four tones in classical Chinese pronunciation, which is extinct in standard Chinese - the high and level tone（as in 屋 wū and 出 chū）, the rising tone（as in 国 guó and 直 zhí）, the falling-rising tone（as in 铁 tiě and 北 běi）, and the falling tone（as in 客 kè and 绿 lǜ）. The entering tone is retained in some dialects, where it is usu. brief and sometimes carries a terminal nasal consonant.

入夜
入夜[rù yè] 到了晚上 as night falls; at nightfall：入夜时分 at nightfall入夜灯火通明。The place is ablaze with light when night falls.

入学
入学[rù xué]1.开始进某个学校学习 enrol in a school：入学考试 entrance exam明天检查体格，后天就入学。Physical checkup is scheduled for tomorrow, and school begins the day after tomorrow. 2.开始进小学学习 (of a child) start school：入学年龄 school age

入定
入定[rù dìng] 佛教徒的一种修行方法，闭着眼睛静坐，控制身心各种活动 (of Buddhists) sit in meditation with eyes closed and physical and mental activities under control, as a form of mental cultivation

入寂
入寂[rù jì]〈佛教用语 Budd.〉称僧尼死亡 (of monks or nuns) pass away; die; nirvana

入寇
入寇[rù kòu]〈书 fml.〉同 same as 入侵 rùqīn：入寇边关 invade a frontier pass

入寐
入寐[rù mèi] 入睡 fall asleep：思绪万千，辗转不能入寐。It was all so mixed up in her mind that she tossed and turned in bed.

入席
入席[rù xí] 举行宴会或仪式时各就位次 (at a banquet, ceremony, etc.) take one's seat：来宾入席。Time for the distinguished guests to be seated.依次入席 be seated one after another

入座
入座[rù zuò] 就位 be seated; take one's seat：宾主入座。Both the host and his guests have taken their seats.对号入座。Take your seat according to the number on the ticket.亦 also 入坐 rù∥zuò

入彀
入彀[rù gòu]〈书 fml.〉1.唐太宗在端门看见新进士鱼贯而出，高兴地说，‘天下英雄入吾彀中矣。’（见于《唐摭言·述进士》）‘彀’是使劲张弓，‘彀中’指箭能射及的范围。后来用‘入彀’比喻受人牢笼，由他操纵。(fig.) under one's thumb. According to Collected Phrases of Tang·Accounts of Metropolitan Graduates, on seeing successful candidates in the highest imperial examinations coming out of the Gate of Correct Demeanour one after another, Emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty said in delight,‘All the heroes under heaven are now under my thumb.’‘彀 gòu’means drawing a bow to the full, and‘彀中 gòuzhōng’means the range of an arrow shot. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉合乎一般程式或要求 conform to general formalities and requirements 3.投合；入神 absorbed：听得入彀 be absorbed in what one's hearing两人谈得入彀。The two of them were absorbed in a congenial conversation.

入微
入微[rù wēi] 达到十分细致或深刻的地步 in minute detail; in every possible way：体贴入微 take care of sb. the best one could演员的表情细腻入微。The actor performed through the nuance of his facial expressions.

入情入理
入情入理[rù qíng rù lǐ] 合乎情理 fair and reasonable：他说得入情入理，大家听得心服口服。Everybody was sincerely convinced by his fair and reasonable explanations.

入手
入手[rù shǒu] 着手；开始做 start with; set one's hand to：从调查研究入手 start with investigation and study音乐教育应当从儿童时代入手。Education in music should begin with the children.

入托
入托[rù tuō]（小孩儿）送入托儿所 (of small children) be sent to a nursery

入时
入时[rù shí] 合乎时尚（多指装束 usu. of dressing）hip; trendy; stylish：打扮入时 fashionably attired穿着入时 be modish in one's attire

入木三分
入木三分[rù mù sān fēn]相传晋代书法家王羲之在木板上写字，刻字的人发现墨汁透入木板有三分深（见于唐代张怀瓘 《书断》）。后用来形容书法有力，也用来比喻议论深刻。According to Appraisal of Calligraphy by Zhang Huaiguan of the Tang Dynasty, when an engraver was working on a piece of calligraphy written by the celebrated Jin-dynasty calligrapher Wang Xizhi on a piece of wood, he found that the strokes were so forceful that the ink had penetrated the wood board by 3 fen. Hence the phrase,‘penetrating the board by three fen’, referring to forceful handwriting, or the profundity of a viewpoint or an observation.

入梅
入梅[rù méi] 进入黄梅季 rainy season begins;另见  黄梅季 huángméijì

入梦
入梦[rù mèng] 进入梦境，指睡着(zháo)，有时也指别人出现在自己的梦中 fall asleep; (of a person) appear in one's dream

入殓
入殓[rù liàn] 把死者放进棺材里 put a corpse in a coffin; encoffin

入流
入流[rù liú]1.封建王朝把官员分成九品（九个等级），九品以外的官员进入九品内叫入流 (of feudal government hierarchy) make the high officialdom; enter into one of the nine ranks of officialdom 2.泛指进入某个等级 be qualified for a certain rank：他演技拙劣，是个不入流的演员。Judging from his lamentable performance he is not a qualified actor.

入港
入港[rù gǎng]（交谈）投机（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）(talk or chat) in full agreement：二人说得入港。The two of them were immersed in a congenial conversation.

入画
入画[rù huà] 画入画图，多用来形容景物优美 suitable for painting; picturesque：桂林山水，处处可以入画。Every bit of the landscape of Guilin is worthy of a painter's brush.

入眠
入眠[rù mián]1.入睡 fall asleep：由于过度兴奋，久久不能入眠。He was so excited that sleep eluded him. 2.蚕在每次蜕皮的时候不动不吃叫入眠 (of an exuviating silkworm) neither eat nor move

入眼
入眼[rù yǎn] 中看 pleasing to the eye：看得入眼 pleasing to the eye看不入眼 not to one's liking其他裙子都不怎么样，只有这条还入眼。None of the skirts look good - only this one is somewhat pleasing to the eye.

入睡
入睡[rù shuì] 睡着(zháo) fall asleep

入神
入神[rù shén]1.对眼前的事物发生浓厚的兴趣而注意力高度集中 with rapt attention (to what is going on)：他越说越起劲，大家越听越入神。As he talked with more and more gusto, we came more and more under his spell. 2.达到精妙的境地 enthralling; enchanting：这幅画画得很入神。The painting is enthralling in its presentation.

入绪
入绪[rù xù] 有了头绪 take shape：这项工作刚刚入绪。The project has just taken shape.

入网
入网[rù wǎng] 指手机、寻呼机等加入某个通信网，也指电子计算机加入某个网络 (of a mobile phone, beeper, etc.) access a telecommunications network; (of a computer) link with a network

入耳
入耳[rù ěr] 中听 pleasant to the ear：不堪入耳 offensive to the ear这句话十分入耳。The remark was rather pleasant to the ear.

入股
入股[rù gǔ] 加入股份 become a shareholder：踊跃入股 vying with one another to buy a share

入药
入药[rù yào] 用做药物 be used as medicine：龟甲中医入药。Tortoise shell is used for medication in traditional Chinese medicine.

入账
入账[rù zhàng] 记入账簿中 enter into an account book：货款已经入账。The money for buying goods has been entered into the account book.昨天送来的礼物尚未入账。The gifts received yesterday are yet to be entered into the account book.

入赘
入赘[rù zhuì] 男子到女家结婚并成为女家的家庭成员 (of a man) marry into the bride's family

入超
入超[rù chāo] 在一定时期（一般为一年）内，对外贸易中进口货物的总值超过出口货物的总值（跟‘出超’相对 as opposed to‘favourable balance of trade’）unfavourable balance of trade within a period of time (usu. a year); import surplus

入迷
入迷[rù mí] 喜欢某种事物到了沉迷的程度 be enamoured; be enraptured：老爷爷讲故事，孩子们听得入了迷。The children listened to grandpa's story with rapt attention.

入选
入选[rù xuǎn] 中选 be chosen; be selected

入门
入门[rù mén]（～儿 rù∥ménr）得到门径；初步学会 learn the basics of sth.：入门既不难，深造也是办得到的。Rudimentary knowledge is easy to obtain, and complete mastery of it is manageable as well.入门[rù mén] 指初级读物（多用做书名 oft. used as part of a book title）ABC; learner's; beginner's; primer：《摄影入门》A Learner's Book on Photography《国际象棋入门》An Introduction to Chess

入闱
入闱[rù wéi] 科举时代应考的或监考的人进入考场 (of examinees or invigilators in an imperial civil service examination) enter the examination hall

入院
入院[rù yuàn]（需要住在医院里治疗的人）进入医院 (of a patient who needs to stay in a hospital for treatment) be hospitalized：办理入院手续 go through the formalities for hospitalization

入骨
入骨[rù gǔ] 形容达到极点 to the marrow：恨之入骨 hate sb. or sth. to the marrow

入魔
入魔[rù mó] 迷恋某种事物到了失去理智的地步 be hypnotized; be infatuated with sth.

全
全[quán]（ㄑㄩㄢˊ）1.完备；齐全 all ready; complete：这部书不全。This book is not complete.东西预备全了。Everything is ready at hand.棉花苗已出全。All the cottonseeds have sprouted. 2.保全；使完整不缺 save sth. from damage; keep sth. intact or complete：两全其美 satisfy both sides; have it both ways 3.整个 whole; entire; all：全神贯注 concentrate on; be preoccupied with; be deeply absorbed in全家光荣 glory of the whole family全书十五卷。The whole book comes in 15 volumes. 4.完全；都 completely; entirely; wholly：他讲的话我全记下来了。I took down all he said.一声巨响，大家全被吓住了。All of us were shocked by the blasting sound. 5.(Quán) 姓 a surname相关词组安全 | 保全 | 成全 | 大全 | 苟全 | 顾全 | 健全 | 俱全 | 两全 | 齐全 | 求全 | 十全 | 双全 | 瓦全 | 完全 | 万全 | 圆全 | 周全 | 安全岛 | 安全灯 | 安全门 | 安全套 | 安全电压 | 安全剃刀 | 安全系数 | 两全其美 | 求全责备 | 十全十美 | 完全小学 | 百科全书 | 面目全非 | 目无全牛 | 委曲求全 | 安全理事会 | 牵一发而动全身全般 | 全豹 | 全本 | 全部 | 全才 | 全称 | 全程 | 全都 | 全份 | 全副 | 全乎 | 全会 | 全集 | 全局 | 全开 | 全力 | 全貌 | 全面 | 全民 | 全能 | 全盘 | 全票 | 全勤 | 全球 | 全权 | 全然 | 全身 | 全盛 | 全食 | 全数 | 全速 | 全体 | 全托 | 全文 | 全息 | 全线 | 全休 | 全音 | 全职 | 全等形 | 全方位 | 全家福 | 全色片 | 全天候 | 全武行 | 全科医师 | 全劳动力 | 全能运动 | 全权代表 | 全神贯注 | 全始全终 | 全息照相 | 全心全意 | 全知全能 | 全民所有制 | 全球定位系统

全乎
全乎[quán hu]（～儿 quán·hur）齐全 complete; all ready：这家商店虽小，货物倒是很全乎。Small as it is, the shop has a full range of goods in stock.

全份
全份[quán fèn]（～儿 quánfènr）完整的一份儿 complete set：全份茶点 whole set of refreshments全份表册 complete set of lists and forms

全休
全休[quán xiū] 指职工因病在一定时期内不工作 (of an employee) take full sick leave：医嘱全休两周。The doctor prescribed complete rest of two weeks.

全会
全会[quán huì]（政党、团体）全体会议的简称 plenary session; plenum (of a political party or group)：中央全会 the Plenary Session of the Central Committee (of the CPC)全会公报 bulletin of a plenary session

全体
全体[quán tǐ]1.各部分的总和；各个个体的总和（多指人 oft. of people）all; whole; total number：全体会员 all the members全体出席。All are present.看问题不但要看到部分，而且要看到全体。When approaching a problem, one should see the whole as well as the parts. 2.全身 all over (the body)：被雨淋得全体透湿 be wet all over; be soaked through; be soaked to the skin

全副
全副[quán fù] 整套；全部（多用于精神、力量或成套的物件 usu. of energy, strength, or a set of sth.）complete; full：全副精力 full energy全副武装 be fully armed; be in full battle gear

全力
全力[quán lì] 全部力量或精力 full energy or strength：用尽全力 exert all one's strength; spare no effort全力支持 all-out support; do all one can to support全力以赴 go all out; spare no effort; put one's best leg forward; make an all-out effort; pull out all stops; put one's back into sth.; to the best of one's ability or power

全劳动力
全劳动力[quán láo dòng lì] 指体力强能从事轻重体力劳动的人（多就农业劳动而言 usu. a farm worker）able-bodied person;亦 also 全劳力 quánláolì

全勤
全勤[quán qín] 指在一定时期内不缺勤 full attendance during a certain period：出全勤 have recorded full attendance他这个月全勤。He had perfect attendance this month.

全天候
全天候[quán tiān hòu] 不受天气限制的，在任何气候条件下都能使用或工作的 usable or operative in all kinds of weather; all-weather：全天候公路 all-weather road全天候飞机 all-weather aircraft

全始全终
全始全终[quán shǐ quán zhōng]（做事）从头到尾都很完美一致 stick to a duty or undertaking till the end; see sth. through; start well and end well

全家福
全家福[quán jiā fú]1.一家大小合拍的相片儿 photo of the whole family 2.荤的杂烩 hotchpotch (Chinese dinner delicacy for family gatherings)

全局
全局[quán jú] 整个的局面 general or overall situation; situation as a whole：全局观念 overall point of view胸怀全局 with the whole picture in mind

全开
全开[quán kāi] 印刷上指整张的纸 (of printing) standard-sized sheet of paper：全开宣传画 full-size poster

全心全意
全心全意[quán xīn quán yì] 用全部的精力 wholeheartedly; heart and soul：全心全意为人民服务。Serve the people wholeheartedly.

全息
全息[quán xī] 反映物体在空间存在时的整个情况的全部信息 holographic information; information that records the complete situation of an object's existence

全息照相
全息照相[quán xī zhào xiàng]记录被物体反射或透射的波的全部信息的技术。全息照相有光学、声学、X射线、微波等多种。用这种技术照的相富有立体感。在某些检验技术和信息存储、立体电影等方面有广泛的用途。holography; 3-D film technique of making a three-dimensional image of an object by recording the interference patterns formed by a split laser beam, which is applied in optics, acoustics, X-rays, microwave, etc.; holograms produced by this technique are three-dimensional and are widely used in such fields as inspection, data storage, vectorgraph, etc.

全才
全才[quán cái] 在一定范围内各方面都擅长的人才 versatile person who is expert at many things; all-rounder：文武全才 be versatile in both civil and military services在文娱体育活动方面他是个全才。He is an all-rounder in both entertainment and sports.

全托
全托[quán tuō] 把幼儿交给托儿所或幼儿园昼夜照管，只在节假日接回家，叫全托（区别于‘日托’as compared with ‘day care’）boarding nursery (in which babies are taken home only during holidays); total childcare

全数
全数[quán shù] 全部（可以计数的东西） total amount or number; whole sum：借款全数归还。The loan is totally paid back.

全文
全文[quán wén] 指文章、文件的全部文字 full text：全文转载 be reprinted in full

全方位
全方位[quán fāng wèi] 指四面八方；各个方向或位置 omnidirectional; all-round：全方位外交 all-round diplomacy全方位出击 hit out in all directions全方位经济协作 all-round economic cooperation

全本
全本[quán běn]1.（全本儿 quánběnr）指演出时间较长、故事情节完整的（戏曲） complete version of a full-length opera：全本《西游记》complete version of Journey to the West 2.足本 unexpurgated version (of a book, etc.)

全权
全权[quán quán]（处理事情的）全部的权力 full powers; full authority; plenary powers：全权大使 ambassador plenipotentiary全权代表 plenipotentiary

全权代表
全权代表[quán quán dài biǎo]对某件事有全权处理和决定的代表。外交上的全权代表须持有国家元首的全权证书。plenipotentiary; representative fully authorized to handle an issue or make a decision. A diplomatic plenipotentiary must have the certification authorized by his head of state.

全武行
全武行[quán wǔ háng]1.戏曲中指规模较大的武打 full-scale acrobatic fight in traditional opera：排演一出全武行好戏 rehearse a wonderful opera of acrobatic fighting 2.指打群架，泛指进行暴力行动 gang war; punch-up; (gen.) violence

全民
全民[quán mín] 一个国家内的全体人民 all the people (within a country); whole people; entire people：全民公决 referendum全民动员 mobilization of a whole nation

全民所有制
全民所有制[quán mín suǒ yǒu zhì] 生产资料和产品归全体人民所有的制度，是社会主义所有制的高级形式 ownership by the whole people; social system according to which all means of production and products are owned by the people as a whole

全然
全然[quán rán] 完全地 completely; utterly：他一切为了集体，全然不考虑个人的得失。He does everything for the collective, utterly disregarding personal gains.

全球
全球[quán qiú] 整个地球；全世界 whole world; entire globe

全球定位系统
全球定位系统[quán qiú dìng wèi xì tǒng]通过导航卫星对地球上任何地点的用户进行定位并报时的系统。由导航卫星、地面台站和用户定位设备组成。用于军事，也用于其他领域。global positioning system (GPS); system for pinpointing the position of subscribers and giving the correct time at any location on the globe through a navigational satellite. The GPS consists of a navigational satellite, ground stations and subscribers' positioning equipment, used either for military or other purposes.

全盘
全盘[quán pán] 全部；全面（多用于抽象事物 oft. of abstract things）whole; all; overall; total：全盘计划 overall plan全盘考虑 give total consideration

全盛
全盛[quán shèng] 极其兴盛或强盛（多指时期） florescence; prime; heyday：唐朝是律诗的全盛时期。The lüshi poetry was in its prime during the Tang Dynasty.

全知全能
全知全能[quán zhī quán néng] 无所不知，无所不能 omniscient and omnipotent

全神贯注
全神贯注[quán shén guàn zhù] 全副精神高度集中 concentrate on; be absorbed in; be preoccupied with

全票
全票[quán piào]1.全价的车票、门票等 full-price ticket 2.指选举中的全部选票 all the votes in an election：他以全票当选为职工代表。He was unanimously elected deputy to the workers' congress.

全科医师
全科医师[quán kē yī shī] 指掌握医学各科知识的医师，他们主要在社区进行疾病的预防、诊断和治疗，必要时再转给相应的专科做进一步诊治 general practitioner; doctor with the general knowledge of all medical subjects, who is mainly responsible for the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of diseases in a community and, when necessary, for the transfer of patients to a medical specialist

全称
全称[quán chēng] 名称未简化前的完整形式 full name; unabbreviated form：少先队的全称是少年先锋队。The full name of Young Pioneers is Chinese Young Pioneers.

全程
全程[quán chéng] 全部路程 entire journey; whole distance：运动员都坚持跑完全程。All the runners stuck it out to the end.

全等形
全等形[quán děng xíng] 各部分能够完全重合的两个或几个几何图形叫做全等形 congruent figures

全线
全线[quán xiàn]1.全部战线 all along the front line (of a war)：全线反攻 launch a counter-attack on all fronts全线出击 launch an attack on all fronts 2.整条路线 whole line; entire length：这条铁路已全线通车。The whole railway line has been opened to traffic.全线工程，克期完成。The whole length of the project has been completed within the deadline.

全职
全职[quán zhí] 专门担任某种职务的（区别于‘兼职’as opposed to‘part-time’）full-time：全职教师 full-time teacher

全能
全能[quán néng] 在一定范围内样样都擅长 all-round; versatile：全能冠军 all-round champion十项全能运动员 decathlete

全能运动
全能运动[quán néng yùn dòng] 某些运动项目（如田径、体操、游泳）中的综合性比赛项目，要求运动员在一天或两天内把几个比赛项目按照规定的顺序比赛完毕，按各项成绩所得分数的总和判定名次 composite athletic contest, e. g. track-and-field events, gymnastics, swimming, etc., in which each contestant participates in all the required events in a prescribed sequence within one or two days, and the overall winner is judged by adding up all scores from these events

全般
全般[quán bān] 整个；全面 whole; entire; all; complete; full：全般工作 entire work

全色片
全色片[quán sè piàn] 对全部可见光都能感受的胶片 panchromatic film

全豹
全豹[quán bào]〈比喻 fig.〉事物的全部 whole picture; panorama; the all and the one; overall situation; 另见  管中窥豹 guǎn zhōng kuī bào

全貌
全貌[quán mào] 事物的全部情况；全部面貌 complete picture; panorama; full view：先弄清楚问题的全貌，再决定处理办法。Get a complete picture of the problem before you decide on a solution.仅据一点，难以推想全貌。You cannot conjure up a complete picture merely by seeing one bit of it.

全身
全身[quán shēn] 整个身体 all over (the body); from head to foot; from tip to toe：用尽了全身的力气 exert all one's strength

全速
全速[quán sù] 所能达到的最高速度 full speed; maximum speed; full split; full tilt：全速航行！Steer at full throttle! or Full speed ahead! or Full steam ahead!部队全速前进。The troops are advancing at full speed.

全部
全部[quán bù] 各个部分的总和；整个 all; entire; whole; complete; total; full; a whole lot of; the all and the one：全部力量 every bit of one's strength工程已全部竣工。The project has been entirely completed.问题全部解决。All the problems have been resolved.

全都
全都[quán dōu] 全；都 all; every; without exception：人全都到齐了。All have come.去年种的树全都活了。All the trees planted last year have survived.

全集
全集[quán jí] 一个作者（有时是两个或几个关系密切的作者）的全部著作编在一起的书（多用做书名 usu. used in titles of books）complete works; complete edition; collected works; collected edition:《列宁全集》Collected Works of Lenin《鲁迅全集》Collected Works of Lu Xun《马克思恩格斯全集》Complete Works of Marx and Engels

全面
全面[quán miàn] 各个方面的总和（跟‘片面’相对 as opposed to ‘partial’）overall; general; all-sided; full-scale; comprehensive; all-round; whole; total; complete; entire：全面性 comprehensiveness照顾全面 take everything into consideration全面情况 overall picture全面发展 all-round or full-scale development

全音
全音[quán yīn] 包括两个半音的音程叫全音 musical interval of two semitones; whole tone; tone; whole step另见  半音 bànyīn

全食
全食[quán shí] 日全食或月全食的简称 abbr. for 日全食 rìquánshí or 月全食 yuèquánshí另见  日食 rìshí and 月食 yuèshí

八
八[bā]（ㄅㄚ）数目，七加一后所得 eight; a numeral that is the result of seven plus one.注意 NOTE：‘八’字单用或在一词一句末尾或在阴平、阳平、上声字前念阴平(bā)，如‘十八、一八得八、八十、八百’；在去声字前念阳平(bá)，如‘八岁、八次’。When used alone, or at the end of a word or a sentence, or before a character pronounced with the first, second or third tone, e.g. 十八 shíbā, eighteen; 一八得八 yī bā dé bā, one times eight is eight; 八十 bāshí, eighty; 八百 bābǎi, eight hundred. When before a character pronounced with the fourth tone, 八 bā changes to the second tone: 八岁 básuì, eight years old, 八次 bácì, eight times. 本词典为简便起见，条目中的‘八’字，都注阴平。For the sake of convenience, in all the following entries 八 bā is marked in the first tone.另见  数字 shùzì八[bá]（ㄅㄚˊ）另见  八 bā相关词组二八 | 腊八 | 丘八 | 王八 | 丑八怪 | 腊八粥 | 仰八叉 | 老八板儿 | 老八辈子 | 十八罗汉 | 百儿八十 | 半斤八两 | 二十八宿 | 胡说八道 | 块儿八毛 | 零七八碎 | 乱七八糟 | 七…八… | 七老八十 | 千儿八百 | 三灾八难 | 四…八… | 四面八方 | 四平八稳 | 万儿八千 | 乌七八糟 | 污七八糟 | 五行八作 | 五花八门 | 正经八百 | 横七竖八 | 夹七夹八 | 歪七扭八 | 杂七杂八 | 三八妇女节 | 十八般武艺 | 九一八事变 | 十万八千里八成 | 八方 | 八哥 | 八股 | 八卦 | 八角 | 八节 | 八路 | 八旗 | 八仙 | 八字 | 八宝菜 | 八宝饭 | 八辈子 | 八斗才 | 八分书 | 八卦教 | 八行书 | 八进制 | 八路军 | 八下里 | 八仙桌 | 八音盒 | 八月节 | 八拜之交 | 八国联军 | 八面玲珑 | 八仙过海 | 八字帖儿 | 八九不离十 | 八一建军节 | 八字没一撇 | 八竿子打不着 | 八一南昌起义

八一南昌起义
八一南昌起义[Bā Yī Nán chāng Qǐ yì]中国共产党为了挽救第一次国内革命战争的失败，于1927年8月1日在江西南昌举行的武装起义，领导人有周恩来、朱德、贺龙、叶挺等。起义部队于1928年4月到达井冈山，和毛泽东领导的秋收起义部队胜利会师，组成了中国工农红军第四军。August 1st Nanchang Uprising. To save the First Revolutionary Civil War from defeat, the Chinese Communist Party staged an armed uprising on August 1, 1927 in Nanchang, Jiangxi Province; the leaders were Zhou Enlai, Zhu De, He Long and Ye Ting. The troops then marched to Jinggang Mountains in April 1928, and joined the troops of the Autumn Harvest Uprising led by Mao Zedong, to form the Fourth Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

八一建军节
八一建军节[Bā Yī Jiàn jūn Jié]中国人民解放军建军的节日。1927年8月1日，中国共产党领导了南昌起义，从此建立了中国人民的革命军队。Army Day (August 1, anniversary of the founding of the Chinese People's Liberation Army). On August 1, 1927, the Chinese Communist Party led the Nanchang Uprising, and founded the revolutionary army of the Chinese people.

八下里
八下里[bā xià li]〈方 dial.〉指方面太多（多表示照顾不过来）too many aspects (to be taken into account)

八九不离十
八九不离十[bā jiǔ bù lí shí]几乎接近（实际情况）about right; pretty close (to reality); very near：我虽然没有亲眼看见，猜也能猜个八九不离十。Although I did not see it with my own eyes, I can make a pretty close guess.

八仙
八仙[bā xiān]1.古代神话中的八位神仙，就是汉钟离、张果老、吕洞宾、李铁拐、韩湘子、曹国舅、蓝采和、何仙姑。旧时常作为绘画的题材和美术装饰的主题。Eight Immortals, i.e. Han Zhongli, Zhang Guolao, Lü Dongbin, Li Tieguai, Han Xiangzi, Cao Guojiu, Lan Caihe, and He Xiangu, who in Taoist mythology frequently appeared in painting and other forms of art in old times 2.〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 八仙桌 bāxiānzhuō

八仙桌
八仙桌[bā xiān zhuō]（～儿 bāxiānzhuōr）大的方桌，每边可以坐两个人 Eight Immortals table; old-fashioned square table seating eight people

八仙过海
八仙过海[bā xiān guò hǎi]谚语‘八仙过海，各显神通（或“各显其能”）’from the saying‘The Eight Immortals cross the sea, each demonstrating their special skills’；〈比喻 fig.〉各自有一套办法，或各自显示本领，互相竞赛 each displays his talent or skills to outwit others

八分书
八分书[bā fēn shū] 汉字的一种字体，即汉隶 lishu; clerical script; a style of calligraphy dating back to the Han Dynasty (206 B.C.-A.D. 220).

八卦
八卦[bā guà]我国古代的一套有象征意义的符号。用‘—’代表阳，用‘’代表阴，用三个这样的符号组成八种形式，叫做八卦。每一卦形代表一定的事物。为乾，代表天；为坤，代表地；为坎，代表水；为离，代表火；为震，代表雷；为艮，代表山；为巽，代表风；为兑，代表沼泽。八卦互相搭配又得六十四卦，用来象征各种自然现象和人事现象。例如上面，下面，‘地中有水’是师卦，上面，下面，‘地上有水’是比卦。在《易经》里有详细的论述。八卦相传是伏羲所造，后来用来占卜。Eight Trigrams; a set of symbolic signs created by ancient Chinese. A solid line‘—’represents yang, the masculine or positive principle in nature; a broken line‘’represents yin, the feminine or negative principle in nature. Eight combinations of three lines - all solid, all broken, or a combination of solid and broken lines - form the Eight Trigrams, and each trigram represents a certain kind of matter.  (乾 Qián), represents heaven;  (坤 Kūn), represents earth;  (坎 Kǎn), represents water;  (离 Lí), represents fire;  (震 Zhèn), represents thunder;  (艮 Gèn), represents mountain;  (巽 Xùn), represents wind;  (兑 Duì), represents marsh. These are paired to form 64 hexagrams, representing various natural and social phenomena. For instance, the 师 Shī hexagram is formed by the 坤 Kūn trigram over the 坎 Kǎn trigram, meaning water under the ground; and the 比 Bǐ hexagram is formed by reversing these trigrams, meaning water above ground. The theory is expounded in detail in The Book of Changes. Said to be invented by Fuxi, the Eight Trigrams were used in divination.

八卦教
八卦教[Bā guà jiào] 天理教的别称 another name for Tianli Sect.另见  天理教 Tiānlǐjiào

八哥
八哥[bā ge]（～儿 bā·ger）鸟,羽毛黑色，头部有羽冠，吃昆虫和植物种子。能模仿人说话的某些声音。crested mynah (Acridotheres cristatellus); crested bird with black feathers, lives off insects and seeds, can imitate certain sounds of human speech; 亦 also 鸲鹆 qúyù

八国联军
八国联军[Bā guó Lián jūn]1900年英、美、德、法、俄、日、意、奥八国为了扑灭我国义和团反对帝国主义的运动而组成的侵略军队。八国联军攻占了天津、北京等地，于1901年强迫清政府签订《辛丑条约》。Eight-Power Allied Forces; invading troops sent by Britain, the United States, Germany, France, Russia, Japan, Italy and Austria in 1900, to suppress the popular Chinese anti-imperialist Yihetuan Movement, known in the West as the Boxer Rebellion. The Eight-Power Allied Forces attacked and occupied Tianjin and Beijing, and in 1901 forced the Qing government to sign the‘Treaty of 1901’.

八字
八字[bā zì]（～儿 bāzìr）用天干地支表示人出生的年、月、日、时，合起来是八个字。迷信的人认为根据生辰八字可以推算出一个人的命运好坏。Eight Characters; characters in four pairs, indicating the year, month, day and hour of a person's birth, each pair consisting of one Heavenly Stem (天干) and one Earthly Branch (地支), used in fortune-telling

八字帖儿
八字帖儿[bā zì ti ěr] 旧俗订婚时写明男方或女方生辰八字的帖子 (old custom) card written with the horoscope of a young man or woman sent as a proposal for betrothal亦 also 庚帖 gēngtiě

八字没一撇
八字没一撇[bā zì méi yī piě]〈比喻 fig.〉事情还没有眉目 not even the first stroke of the character 八 bā; (sth.) not even begin yet; no sign of success yet

八宝菜
八宝菜[bā bǎo cài] 由核桃仁、莴笋、杏仁、黄瓜、花生米等混合在一起的酱菜 eight-treasure pickles; assorted walnut meats, asparagus lettuce, almonds, cucumber and peanuts, etc. pickled in soy sauce

八宝饭
八宝饭[bā bǎo fàn] 糯米加果料儿、莲子、桂圆等多种食品蒸制的甜食 eight-treasure rice pudding; glutinous rice steamed with preserved fruits, sweetened bean paste, lotus seeds, longan, etc.

八成
八成[bā chéng]1.十分之八 80 per cent：八成新 80 per cent new; practically new事情有了八成啦。Things are as good as settled. 2.（八成儿 bāchéngr）多半；大概 most probably; most likely：看样子八成儿他不来了。He is probably not coming.

八拜之交
八拜之交[bā bài zhī jiāo] 拜把子的关系 sworn brotherhood

八斗才
八斗才[bā dǒu cái]〈比喻 fig.〉高才。唐李商隐《可叹》诗：‘宓妃愁坐芝田馆，用尽陈王八斗才’（三国时，魏曹植，字子建，曾封为陈王）。宋无名氏《释常谈》：‘谢灵运尝曰：“天下才有一石，曹子建独占八斗，我得一斗，天下共分一斗。”’unusual literary talent; superb talent. From the poem Regrettable by Li Shangyin, a celebrated poet of the Tang Dynasty:‘Concubine Mi sat worriedly in Zhitian Hall, /Depleted of the superb talent of Prince Chen.’(During the Three Kingdoms Period, Cao Zhi, alias Zijian, was given the title Prince Chen.)
