兼[jiān]（ㄐㄧㄢ）1.两倍的 double; twice：兼程 travel at double speed兼旬 twenty days 2.同时涉及或具有几种事物 simultaneously; concurrently：兼而有之 have both兼收并蓄 take in everything; incorporate things of different nature品学兼优 have good character and scholarship兼听则明，偏信则暗。You will know the truth if you listen to both sides, and be cheated if you heed to only one side. or Listen to both sides and you will be enlightened; heed to only one side and you will be benighted.他是副厂长兼总工程师。He is deputy factory director and concurrently chief engineer.相关词组软硬兼施兼备 | 兼并 | 兼差 | 兼程 | 兼顾 | 兼毫 | 兼课 | 兼任 | 兼容 | 兼祧 | 兼之 | 兼职 | 兼容并包 | 兼收并蓄

兼之
兼之[jiān zhī] 同 same as 加以 jiāyǐ ②：人手不多，兼之期限迫近，紧张情形可以想见。There are not many people, and moreover, the deadline is getting close, so the strain is obvious.

兼任
兼任[jiān rèn]1.同时担任几个职务 hold two or more posts concurrently：总务主任兼任学校工会主席 serve concurrently as director of general affairs and chairman of the school trade union 2.不是专任的 part-time：兼任教员 part-time teacher

兼备
兼备[jiān bèi] 同时具备几个方面 have both ... and ...：德才兼备 have both good moral character and professional ability; have both ability and moral integrity文武兼备 be adept in both the pen and the sword形神兼备 have both the form and the spirit

兼容
兼容[jiān róng] 同时容纳几个方面 compatible; capable of living together or getting along well together (with); work well together; combine well：兼容并包 all-inclusive善恶不能兼容。Good and evil can never be mutually containing.

兼容并包
兼容并包[jiān róng bìng bāo] 把各个方面或各种事物都容纳进去 all-embracing; all-inclusive

兼差
兼差[jiān chāi]〈旧时 old〉称兼职 do two or more jobs concurrently

兼并
兼并[jiān bìng] 把别的国家的领土并入自己的国家或把别人的产业并为己有 annex (territory, property, etc.)

兼收并蓄
兼收并蓄[jiān shōu bìng xù] 把内容不同、性质相反的东西都吸收进来 incorporate things of different nature; take in everything亦 also 兼容并蓄 jiān róng bìng xù

兼毫
兼毫[jiān háo]用羊毫和狼毫在一起制造的毛笔（羊毫较软，狼毫较硬，兼毫适中）Chinese writing brush made of a mixture of goat's and yellow weasel's hair (the goat's hair is too soft; the yellow weasel's is too hard, and the mixture of the two is just good)

兼祧
兼祧[jiān tiāo]〈书 fml.〉宗法制度下一个男子兼做两房或两家的继承人 be appointed heir to one's uncle as well as to one's father; under the patriarchal clan system, a man can be appointed heir to two families or two branches of one clan

兼程
兼程[jiān chéng] 一天走两天的路；以加倍的速度赶路 travel at double speed：兼程前进 advance on (or at) the double日夜兼程 travel night and day

兼职
兼职[jiān zhí] 在本职之外兼任其他职务 moonlight; hold two or more posts concurrently：身兼数职 hold several posts concurrently兼职教师 part-time teacher兼职[jiān zhí] 在本职之外兼任的职务 concurrent post; part-time job：辞去兼职 resign one's concurrent job

兼课
兼课[jiān kè] 在本职以外兼任教课工作 do some teaching apart from one's main occupation; hold two or more teaching jobs at the same time

兼顾
兼顾[jiān gù] 同时照顾几个方面 give due consideration to all the quarters concerned：统筹兼顾 make overall planning and give consideration to the interests of all sides公私兼顾 take both public and private interests into account

兽
兽[shòu]（ㄕㄡˋ）（獸）1.哺乳动物的通称。一般指有四条腿、全身生毛的哺乳动物。general term for 哺乳动物 bǔrǔ dòngwù; (in a broad sense) four-footed mammal with hair or fur all over：野兽 wild animal禽兽 birds and beasts走兽 beast 2.〈比喻 fig.〉野蛮；下流 beastly; bestial：兽心 wolfish heart兽行 brutal act相关词组海兽 | 害兽 | 猛兽 | 禽兽 | 吻兽 | 野兽 | 仔兽 | 子兽 | 走兽 | 鸟兽散 | 腽肭兽 | 鸭嘴兽 | 困兽犹斗 | 人面兽心 | 如鸟兽散 | 洪水猛兽 | 衣冠禽兽兽行 | 兽环 | 兽王 | 兽性 | 兽医 | 兽疫 | 兽欲 | 兽力车

兽力车
兽力车[shòu lì chē] 用牛、马、驴、骡等牲口拉的车 animal-drawn vehicle (or cart); cart drawn by an ox, horse, donkey or mule

兽医
兽医[shòu yī] 治疗家畜家禽等疾病的医生 veterinary surgeon; veterinarian; vet

兽性
兽性[shòu xìng] 形容极端野蛮和残忍的性情 brutish nature; barbarity

兽欲
兽欲[shòu yù] 指野蛮的性欲 animal (or bestial) desire

兽王
兽王[shòu wáng] 指狮子 king of beasts - the lion

兽环
兽环[shòu huán] 旧式大门上装的用铜或铁制成的兽头和环子，敲门或锁门时用 animal-head knocker made of iron or copper, on doors of old-style houses, used for knocking at or locking the door

兽疫
兽疫[shòu yì] 家畜、家禽等的传染病，如牛瘟、猪瘟、口蹄疫、鸡新城疫等 epizooty disease; epizooty, such as rinderpest, swine fever, foot-and-mouth disease, Newcastle disease, etc.

兽行
兽行[shòu xíng]1.指极端野蛮、残忍的行为 brutal act; brutality 2.指发泄兽欲的行为 act of letting off one's bestial lust

冀
冀1[jì]（ㄐㄧˋ）〈书 fml.〉希望；希图 hope; long for; look forward to：希冀 hope for; wish for冀求 seek for; hanker after冀盼 look forward to冀其成功 look forward to the success of sb. or sth.冀2[Jì]（ㄐㄧˋ）1.河北的别称 another name for Hebei Province 2.姓 a surname相关词组希冀冀图 | 冀望

冀图
冀图[jì tú] 希图 try to; long for：冀图东山再起 hope for a comeback

冀望
冀望[jì wàng]〈书 fml.〉希望 hope for; long for

冁
冁[chǎn]（ㄔㄢˇ）（囅、辴）〈书 fml.〉笑的样子 the way one smiles：冁然而笑 break into a smile

内
内[nèi]（ㄋㄟˋ）1.里头；里头的（跟‘外’相对 as opposed to ‘out’） in; inside：内衣 underwear内部 interior室内 indoors国内 at home年内 before the year-end 2.指妻或妻的亲属 [referring to wife or wife's relative]：内人 wife内侄nephew; son of wife's sister内弟 (a husband's) younger brother-in-law 3.指内心或内脏 heart; internal organ：内省 introspection内疚 twinge of guilt; compunction五内俱焚 stricken with grief and mortification 4.〈书 fml.〉指皇宫 imperial palace：大内 residential quarters of the imperial palace〈古 arch.〉又同 also same as 纳 nà相关词组大内 | 分内 | 关内 | 海内 | 惧内 | 日内 | 五内 | 衙内 | 业内 | 以内 | 白内障 | 局内人 | 绿内障 | 室内乐 | 走内线 | 过渡内阁 | 看守内阁 | 色厉内荏 | 外圆内方 | 影子内阁 | 一包在内 | 人民内部矛盾 | 第二次国内革命战争 | 第三次国内革命战争 | 第一次国内革命战争内部 | 内场 | 内臣 | 内传 | 内存 | 内地 | 内弟 | 内定 | 内耳 | 内封 | 内服 | 内阁 | 内功 | 内海 | 内涵 | 内行 | 内耗 | 内河 | 内讧 | 内画 | 内踝 | 内急 | 内奸 | 内艰 | 内景 | 内疚 | 内眷 | 内科 | 内裤 | 内涝 | 内里 | 内力 | 内敛 | 内乱 | 内幕 | 内难 | 内能 | 内皮 | 内亲 | 内勤 | 内倾 | 内情 | 内热 | 内人 | 内容 | 内伤 | 内省 | 内室 | 内水 | 内胎 | 内廷 | 内退 | 内外 | 内务 | 内线 | 内详 | 内向 | 内销 | 内心 | 内兄 | 内秀 | 内需 | 内衣 | 内因 | 内应 | 内忧 | 内在 | 内脏 | 内宅 | 内债 | 内障 | 内争 | 内政 | 内侄 | 内痔 | 内中 | 内助 | 内资 | 内子 | 内出血 | 内分泌 | 内骨骼 | 内婚制 | 内寄生 | 内聚力 | 内流河 | 内陆国 | 内陆湖 | 内胚层 | 内燃机 | 内斜视 | 内掌柜 | 内侄女 | 内顾之忧 | 内外交困

内中
内中[nèi zhōng] 里头 inside; interior：内中情形非常复杂。The situation there is very complicated.你不晓得内中的事。You know nothing about the inside story.

内乱
内乱[nèi luàn] 指国内的叛乱或统治阶级内部的战争 civil strife; internecine disorder of the ruling class：发生内乱 be caught in a civil strife平定内乱 quell an internecine war

内争
内争[nèi zhēng] 内部斗争 infight

内亲
内亲[nèi qīn] 和妻子有亲属关系的亲戚的统称，如内兄、连襟等 in-laws of a man; wife's relatives

内人
内人[nèi rén] 对人称自己的妻子 my wife

内传
内传[nèi zhuàn]1.一种传记小说，以记载人物的遗闻逸事为主 biography based on the life and anecdotes of a person 2.〈古代 arch.〉指专门解释经义的书 books on exegesis of classics

内伤
内伤[nèi shāng]1.〈中医 Chin. med.〉指由饮食不适、过度劳累、忧虑或悲伤等原因引起的病症 physiological disorder caused by improper diet, fatigue, worry or sorrow 2.泛指由跌、碰、挤、压、踢、打等原因引起的气、血、脏腑、经络的损伤 internal injury; fracture or injury inflicted on vital energy, blood, viscera, channels or collaterals as a result of fall, concussion, crushing, pressure, kicking, strike, etc.

内侄
内侄[nèi zhí] 妻子的弟兄的儿子 son of wife's brother; nephew

内侄女
内侄女[nèi zhí nǚ] 妻子的弟兄的女儿 daughter of wife's brother; niece

内债
内债[nèi zhài] 国家向本国公民借的债 internal debt; domestic loan

内倾
内倾[nèi qīng] 指人性格沉静，说话含蓄，做事谨慎，不喜欢社交活动，比较关心内心世界 introvert; tendency to be quiet of character, reserved of words, and prudent of deeds, dislike socializing and direct one's thoughts and interests mostly toward oneself

内兄
内兄[nèi xiōng] 妻子的哥哥 wife's elder brother; husband's elder brother-in-law

内出血
内出血[nèi chū xuè] 出血的一种，流出血管的血液停留在身体内部而不排至体外，如脑出血、肾上腺出血、胰出血等 internal haemorrhage; bleeding inside the body, such as cerebral haemorrhage, adrenal haemorrhage, pancreas bleeding, etc.

内分泌
内分泌[nèi fēn mì] 人或高等动物体内有些腺或器官能分泌激素，不通过导管，由血液带到全身，从而调节有机体的生长、发育和生理机能，这种分泌叫做内分泌 endocrine; internal secretion; hormones secreted by some organs and glands of humans and other higher animals, transmitted directly, not via any ducts, to the entire body by blood to regulate the growth, maturity and physiological functions of the body

内力
内力[nèi lì] 指一个体系内各部分间的相互作用力。把宇宙看做一个体系，星体间的相互作用力就是内力；把原子看做一个体系，电子与原子核的相互作用力就是内力。 internal force; reciprocal force between different parts within a system. For instance, interplanetary forces are regarded as the internal forces of the universe, and interaction between the electron and the nucleus may be seen as the internal force of the atom.

内功
内功[nèi gōng] 锻炼身体内部器官的武术或气功（区别于‘外功’ as compared with ‘external kung fu’）internal kung fu; wushu or qigong exercises to benefit the internal organs[补义 new sense] 指人的内在的能力及修养 ability and self-cultivation; professional skill or ability：驾御重大历史题材，编剧、导演首先要练好内功。To handle a major historical subject, a playwright or director should, first of all, acquire his professional ability.公司苦练内功，重新赢得了市场。The company regained its market share by working hard to improve the professional skills of its employers.

内务
内务[nèi wù]1.指国内事务（多指民政 oft. of civil affairs）internal affairs：内务部 Ministry of Internal Affairs 2.集体生活室内的日常事务，如整理床铺、按规定放置衣物、做清洁卫生等 routine domestic work in collective life, such as making bed and putting things in their proper places, to keep a dormitory, barracks, etc., clean and tidy

内助
内助[nèi zhù]〈书 fml.〉指妻子 wife：贤内助 virtuous wife; one's better half

内勤
内勤[nèi qín]1.部队以及有外勤工作的机关、企业称在内部进行的工作 (of the army, an organization or an enterprise) office work (as opposed to ‘field work’)：内勤人员 office staff 2.从事内勤工作的人 office staff

内向
内向[nèi xiàng]1.面向国内 home-oriented：内向型经济 domestic-oriented economy 2.（性格、思想感情等）深沉、不外露 (of temperament) introverted; withdrawn：小王性格内向。Xiao Wang is somewhat introverted.他是内向人，不轻易发表意见。He's a kind of withdrawn, and seldom speaks his mind.

内因
内因[nèi yīn] 事物发展变化的内部原因，即事物内部的矛盾性。内因是事物发展的根本原因。 internal cause; internal cause for the development or change of sth., i.e. contradictory nature of things. Internal causes are fundamental reasons for the development of things.

内在
内在[nèi zài]1.事物本身所固有的（跟‘外在’相对 as opposed to ‘extrinsic’） inherent; intrinsic：内在规律 inherent law内在因素 intrinsic factor 2.存于内心，不表露在外面 innermost; inner：感情内在 be introverted

内地
内地[nèi dì] 距离边疆（或沿海）较远的地区 hinterland; inland; area far from a country's frontier (or coast)

内场
内场[nèi chǎng] 戏曲舞台桌子后面的区域 (in a theatre) inner stage; space behind a table onstage：内场椅（设在舞台桌子后面的坐椅） chair behind a table onstage

内外
内外[nèi wài]1.内部和外部；里面和外面 inside and out：内外有别 distinguish what's for domestic information from what's for publicity长城内外 north and south of the Great Wall; regions on both sides of the Great Wall 2.表示概数 approximately; about; around：一个月内外 about a month's time五十岁内外 around 50 years old

内外交困
内外交困[nèi wài jiāo kùn] 国内的政治经济等方面和对外关系方面都处于十分困难的地步 in dire straits at home and abroad; beset with internal political and economic troubles and foreign relations

内奸
内奸[nèi jiān] 暗藏在内部做破坏活动的敌对分子 mole; secret enemy agent：铲除内奸 ferret out enemy agents

内婚制
内婚制[nèi hūn zhì] 原始社会的一种婚姻形式,部落内若干氏族互相通婚 (of the primitive society) intermarriage system; system whereby members of different clans in the same tribe are allowed to marry each other亦 also 族内婚 zúnèihūn

内子
内子[nèi zǐ]〈书 fml.〉内人 my wife

内存
内存[nèi cún] 电子计算机内存储器的简称。也指内存储器的存储量。 internal memory; storage or storage capacity as of a computer; abbr. for 电子计算机内存储器 diànzǐ jìsuànjī nèicúnchǔqì

内宅
内宅[nèi zhái] 指住宅内女眷的住处 inner chamber; housing for female members of a family

内定
内定[nèi dìng] 在内部决定（多指人事安排） decide (oft. regarding personnel arrangement) by authorities in private：出场队员已经内定。The starting lineup for the game has been decided in private.

内室
内室[nèi shì] 里间，多指卧室 inner room; oft. referring to bedroom

内容
内容[nèi róng] 事物内部所含的实质或存在的情况 content; essence; what is contained in sth.：这次谈话的内容牵涉的面很广。The conversation covered a wide range of topics.这个刊物内容丰富。The magazine has got lots of stuff in it.

内寄生
内寄生[nèi jì shēng] 一种生物寄生在另一种生物的体内，叫做内寄生。如蛔虫寄生在人的肠子里。 endoparasitism, the biological phenomenon of an organism living parasitically within another organism, such as the bellyworm living in a human body's guts

内封
内封[nèi fēng] 扉页 title page

内幕
内幕[nèi mù] 外界不知道的内部情况（多指不好的 oft. scandalous）inside story：揭开内幕 uncover an inside story; let the cat out of the bag

内应
内应[nèi yìng]1.隐藏在对方内部做策应工作 collaborate from within the opponent's side with sb. from without：内应外合 strike from within and without 2.指做内应的人 planted agent; plant

内廷
内廷[nèi tíng] 帝王的住所 imperial residence

内弟
内弟[nèi dì] 妻子的弟弟 wife's younger brother

内心
内心[nèi xīn]1.心里头 bottom of the heart; innermost world; soul：内心深处 in one's heart of hearts发自内心的笑 a heartfelt smile 2.三角形三个内角的平分线相交于一点，这个点叫做三角形的内心。内心也是三角形内切圆的圆心。 incentre; intersection of bisectors of the three internal angles of a triangle; also the center of the inscribed circle in a triangle

内忧
内忧[nèi yōu]1.内部的忧患，多指国家内部的不安定 domestic unrest：内忧外患 domestic unrest and foreign invasion 2.〈书 fml.〉内心忧虑 anxiety 3.〈书 fml.〉指母丧 loss of one's mother in death

内急
内急[nèi jí] 指急着要解手 urgent call of nature

内情
内情[nèi qíng] 内部情况 inside story：熟悉内情 be in the know; be an insider

内掌柜
内掌柜[nèi zhǎng guì] 指‘掌柜’的妻子 wife of a shopkeeper亦 also 内掌柜的 nèizhǎngguì·de

内政
内政[nèi zhèng] 国家内部的政治事务 internal affairs：不干涉别国内政 non-interference in other countries' internal affairs; refrain from interfering in the internal affairs of a foreign country

内敛
内敛[nèi liǎn]1.（性格、思想感情等）深沉，不外露 (of one's character, thoughts, feelings, emotions, etc.) self-restraint; self-restrained; reserved; introvert：班长一向少言寡语，性格内敛。The squad leader is always taciturn and keeps to himself. 2.（艺术风格）含蓄，耐人寻味 (of an artistic style) implicit and intriguing; worth pondering：她的诗像清清的流水，内敛而平静。Her poems are implicit and calm, like the flow of a clear and limpid stream.

内斜视
内斜视[nèi xié shì] 病，一眼或两眼的瞳孔经常向中间倾斜 strabismus; cross-eye; disease that causes one or both eyes to turn inwards towards the nose; 通称 popularly known as 对眼 duìyǎn 或 or 斗眼 dòuyǎn;另见  斜视 xiéshì

内景
内景[nèi jǐng] 戏剧方面指舞台上的室内布景，电影、电视方面指摄影棚内的布景 indoor setting; indoor scene; stage setting of the interior of a house; interior setting of a film or TV studio

内服
内服[nèi fú] 把药吃下去（区别于‘外敷’as compared with ‘external administration’）oral administration; to be taken orally

内水
内水[nèi shuǐ] 一个国家领陆范围以内的河流、湖泊和领海基线向陆一面的内海、海港、海湾、海峡内的水域 territorial waters; rivers, lakes on the territorial land of a country as well as the water surfaces of inland seas, harbours, bays and straits at the continental side of the baseline of the territorial seas

内河
内河[nèi hé] 处于一个国家之中的河流叫做该国家的内河 inland river; river situated within the territory of a country

内流河
内流河[nèi liú hé] 不流入海洋而注入内陆湖或消失在沙漠里的河流，如我国的塔里木河 continental river; river that empties itself into an inland lake or disappears in desert, such as the Tarim River of China亦 also 内陆河 nèilùhé

内海
内海[nèi hǎi]1.除了有狭窄水道跟外海或大洋相通外，全部为陆地所包围的海，如地中海、波罗的海等 continental sea; sea surrounded by land and with or without a narrow river to link with an outer sea or ocean, such as the Mediterranean and the Baltic Sea亦 also 内陆海 nèilùhǎi 2.沿岸全属于一个国家因而本身也属于该国家的海，如渤海是我国的内海 inland sea; sea with its shoreline belonging entirely to one nation, such as the Bohai Sea of China

内涝
内涝[nèi lào] 由于雨量过多，地势低洼，积水不能及时排除而造成的涝灾 waterlogging; disaster caused by failure to divert excessive rainfall from a low-lying place

内涵
内涵[nèi hán]1.一个概念所反映的事物的本质属性的总和，也就是概念的内容。例如‘人’这个概念的内涵是能制造工具并使用工具进行劳动的动物。 intension; connotation; sum total of the essential properties of matter as reflected by a definition; content of a definition. For example, the connotation of the concept of ‘man’ is ‘the animal that can make and use tools to engage in physical labour’. 另见  外延 wàiyán 2.内在的涵养 self-cultivation：他是个内涵很深厚的青年。He's a profoundly self-cultivated young man.

内热
内热[nèi rè]1.〈书 fml.〉内心焦灼 internal heat 2.〈中医 Chin. med.〉指由阴虚或阳盛而导致的病理现象，患者有心烦、口渴、便秘、口舌生疮等症候 physiological disorder caused by insufficiency of body fluid or excessive vital energy, with symptoms of irritability, thirst, constipation, mouth ulceration, etc.

内燃机
内燃机[nèi rán jī] 热机的一种，燃料在汽缸里燃烧，产生膨胀气体，推动活塞，由活塞带动连杆转动机轴。内燃机用汽油、柴油或煤气做燃料。 internal-combustion engine; engine in which fuel petrol, diesel or gas is burned within the cylinder to produce compressed gas that propels the piston to move the crankshaft through a connecting rod

内画
内画[nèi huà] 在以玛瑙、玻璃、水晶等为原料的透明或半透明器皿内壁绘制的图画。是我国独有的一门艺术。 inside painting; unique Chinese art of painting on the insides of a transparent or translucent container of agate, glass, crystal, etc.

内疚
内疚[nèi jiù] 内心感觉惭愧不安 feel the stab of conscience; remorse：内疚于心 have a guilty conscience

内痔
内痔[nèi zhì] 肛门内部黏膜上长的痔疮 piles; internal haemorrhoids

内皮
内皮[nèi pí] 医学上指覆盖在血管、淋巴管、心脏等内部表面的上皮组织 endothelium; thin layer of epidermis tissue that lines blood vessel, lymphatic, heart, etc.

内省
内省[nèi xǐng] 在心里进行反省 introspect; self-search

内眷
内眷[nèi juàn] 指女眷 female family member

内秀
内秀[nèi xiù] 外表似乎粗鲁或笨拙但实际上聪明而细心 great wisdom or aptitude camouflaged by outward clumsiness or crudity

内科
内科[nèi kē] 医院中主要用药物而不用手术来治疗内脏疾病的一科 internal medicine; department of a hospital where ailing internal organs are treated mostly with medication rather than surgery

内线
内线[nèi xiàn]1.安置在对方内部探听消息或进行其他活动的人，也指这种工作 undercover agent; sb. planted among the ranks of an enemy or adversary to spy or carry out other activities; spying of this nature 2.处在敌方包围形势下的作战线 interior front; front within an enemy-controlled area：内线作战 fight in the heart of an enemy-occupied area 3.一个单位内的电话总机所控制的、只供内部用的线路 intercom; telephone lines controlled by the switchboard of an organization and for internal use only 4.指内部的关系或门路 clout; connection：走内线 get sth. done through one's connection

内耗
内耗[nèi hào]1.机器或其他装置本身所消耗的没有对外做功的能量 internal friction; energy wasted by the friction inside a machine or installation without doing work 2.〈比喻 fig.〉社会或部门内部因不协调、闹矛盾等造成的人力物力的无谓消耗 infight; waste of human or material resources due to discord within an organization or society

内耳
内耳[nèi ěr] 耳朵最里面的一部分，是由复杂的管状物构成的，分为半规管、前庭和耳蜗三部分，主管听觉和身体的平衡 internal ear; inner ear; the portion of the ear including the semicircular canals, vestibule, and cochlea, and functioning to keep hearing and body in balance亦 also 迷路 mílù;另见  半规管 bànguīguǎn，前庭 qiántíng 和 and 耳蜗 ěrwō

内聚力
内聚力[nèi jù lì] 同种物质内部相邻各部分间的吸引力 cohesion; mutual attraction to hold neighbouring elements within a matter together

内胎
内胎[nèi tāi] 轮胎的一部分，用薄橡胶制成，装在外胎里边，充气后产生弹性 inner tube, made of thin rubber, fixed inside a tyre, and inflated to acquire a springiness; 通称 popularly known as 里带 lǐdài

内胚层
内胚层[nèi pēi céng] 胚胎的内层。肠、胃、消化腺、肺等是由内胚层形成的。 endoderm; the innermost layer of an embryo, where intestines, stomach, digestive gland, and lungs are formed; 亦 also 内胚叶 nèipēiyè

内能
内能[nèi néng] 物体内部分子无规则运动产生的动能和分子间相对位置所决定的势能的总称 potential energy determined by the kinetic energy engendered in the irregular movement of molecules in an object and by the relative positions between the molecules

内脏
内脏[nèi zàng] 人或动物胸腔和腹腔内器官的统称。内脏包括心、肺、胃、肝、脾、肾、肠等。 viscera; internal organs of a human being or an animal, such as the heart, lungs, stomach, liver, spleen, kidney, intestines, etc.

内臣
内臣[nèi chén]1.宫廷的近臣 chamberlain 2.指宦官 eunuch

内艰
内艰[nèi jiān]〈书 fml.〉母亲的丧事 mother's funeral：丁内艰 during one's mother's funeral

内行
内行[nèi háng]1.对某种事情或工作有丰富的知识和经验 know the ropes; be knowledgeable about or experienced in an issue or certain work：他对养蜂养蚕都很内行。He knows the ropes of apiculture and silkworm breeding. 2.内行的人 old hand; master; maestro：向内行请教。Learn from the experts.

内衣
内衣[nèi yī] 指衬衣、衬裤等贴身穿的衣服 underwear; undergarment

内裤
内裤[nèi kù] 贴身穿的单裤 briefs; panties; underpants

内讧
内讧[nèi hòng] 集团内部由于争权夺利等原因而发生冲突或战争 internecine strife; internal conflict or war precipitated by scramble for power or interest亦 also 内哄 nèihòng

内详
内详[nèi xiáng] 在信封上写‘内详’或‘名内详’，代替发信人的姓名地址 [in lieu of sender's name and address on an envelope] ‘see inside’; ‘name and address of sender enclosed’

内资
内资[nèi zī] 国内的资本 domestic capital; domestic investment：内资企业 domestic-funded enterprise; enterprise run with domestic investment

内踝
内踝[nèi huái] 踝部内侧的突起部分，是由胫骨下端构成的 internal malleolus; medial malleolus, protrusion inboard the ankle, consisting of the lower end of the tibia

内退
内退[nèi tuì] 不到国家规定的退休年龄，在单位内部办理手续，享受退休人员待遇，叫内退 internal retirement; internally retire; retire under the legal age, but be entitled to all privileges as a normal retired person

内部
内部[nèi bù] 某一范围以内 within：内部联系 internal relations内部消息confidential information; inside story

内里
内里[nèi lǐ]〈方 dial.〉内部；内中 interior：这件事儿内里还有不少曲折。There are still quite a few complications in this matter.

内销
内销[nèi xiāo] 本国或本地区生产的商品在国内或本地区市场上销售（对‘外销’而言 as opposed to ‘export’） (of commodities) domestic sale; for sale on the local market：内销商品 commodities for the home market出口转内销 sell export goods on the home market

内阁
内阁[nèi gé]1. 某些国家中的最高行政机关，由内阁总理（或首相）和若干阁员（部长、总长、大臣或相）组成 Cabinet, the supreme executive organ in some countries, consisting of a prime minister (or premier) and a number of cabinet members (ministers) 2.明清两代的中央政务机构 Grand Secretariat, central administrative organ during the Ming and Qing dynasties

内陆国
内陆国[nèi lù guó] 周围与邻国土地毗连，没有海岸线的国家，如亚洲的蒙古，非洲的乌干达等国就是内陆国 landlocked country; country without a coastline, such as Mongolia of Asia and Uganda of Africa

内陆湖
内陆湖[nèi lù hú] 在大陆内部不通海洋的湖，湖水含盐分和矿物质较多，如我国的青海湖 inland lake; lake that has no outlet to the sea and whose water has a high content of salt and minerals, such as the Qinghai Lake of China

内障
内障[nèi zhàng] 主要发生在瞳孔和眼内的疾病，如白内障、青光眼等 diseases that affect the pupil and the eye, such as cataract, glaucoma, etc.

内难
内难[nèi nàn] 国内的灾难或变乱 domestic turmoil or calamity

内需
内需[nèi xū] 国内市场的需求（区别于‘外需’ as opposed to 'foreign demand'） domestic demand： 扩大内需，拉动经济增长 increase the domestic demand in order to pull up economic growth

内顾之忧
内顾之忧[nèi gù zhī yōu] 在外对家事或国事的忧虑 internal distresses or troubles; trouble on the home front; family trouble：无内顾之忧 free from domestic worries

内骨骼
内骨骼[nèi gǔ gé] 人或高等动物体内的支架，是由许多块骨头和软骨组成的 endoskeleton; internal supporting skeleton in human beings or higher animals, consisting of a number of bones and cartilages;另见  骨骼

冇
冇[mǎo]（ㄇㄠˇ）〈方 dial.〉没有 not have; there is not; be without

冈
冈[gāng]（ㄍㄤ）（岡）较低而平的山脊 relatively low and even ridge of a hill：山冈 low hill景阳冈 Jingyang Ridge相关词组青冈 | 山冈 | 茨冈人冈陵 | 冈峦

冈峦
冈峦[gāng luán] 连绵的山冈 serpentine hills：冈峦起伏 undulating hills

冈陵
冈陵[gāng líng] 山冈和丘陵 ridges and hills; rolling country

冉
冉[Rǎn]（ㄖㄢˇ）（冄） 姓 a surname相关词组冉冉

冉冉
冉冉[rǎn rǎn]〈书 fml.〉1.（毛、枝条等）柔软下垂 (of hair, tree branches, etc.) droop softly 2.慢慢地 gradually; slowly：冉冉而来 come unhurriedly月亮冉冉上升。The moon rose slowly.

册
册[cè]（ㄘㄜˋ）（冊）1.册子 volume; book：名册 register; roll画册 an album of paintings纪念册 commemorative album 2.〈量词 classifier〉册 volume：这套书一共六册。This book is in six volumes. 3.〈书 fml.〉皇帝封爵的命令 imperial decree to confer a title：册封 confer a title upon sb.相关词组表册 | 簿册 | 底册 | 丁册 | 分册 | 画册 | 另册 | 名册 | 清册 | 史册 | 手册 | 书册 | 相册 | 在册 | 账册 | 注册 | 花名册 | 集邮册 | 纪念册册封 | 册立 | 册页 | 册子

册子
册子[cè zi] 装订好的本子 a set of blank or printed sheets bound in a tablet; book; volume：相片册子 photo album户口册子 household register写了几个小册子（书）wrote a number of booklets

册封
册封[cè fēng] 帝王通过一定仪式把爵位、封号赐给臣子、亲属、藩属等 (of an emperor) confer title or rank on officials, royal family members or nobility through special ceremonies

册立
册立[cè lì] 帝王确定皇后、太子等的身份 (of an emperor) crowns sb. as empress or prince

册页
册页[cè yè] 分页装裱的字画 album of paintings or calligraphy亦 also 册叶 cèyè

再
再[zài]（ㄗㄞˋ）1.〈副词 adv.〉(a)表示又一次（有时专指第二次 sometimes meaning esp. the ‘2nd time’）once more; again; one more time：再版 2nd impression of printing; 2nd edition再接再厉 work ceaselessly一而再，再而三 over and over again; time and again; again and again学习，学习，再学习。Study, study, and study again.注意 NOTE：表示已经重复的动作用‘又’，表示将要重复的动作用‘再’又 yòu is used to indicate a repeated action, while 再zài is used to indicate an action that is to be repeated in future, 如 e.g. 这部书前几天我又读了一遍，以后有时间我还要再读一遍。I read the book once more several days ago, and I'll read it again when I have time.(b)表示更加 to a greater extent or degree：高点儿，再高点儿 higher, still higher再多一点儿就好了。It would be great if there was more. (c)表示如果继续下去就会怎样 [indicating what will happen if a condition is allowed to continue]：学习再不努力，就得留级了。You'll fail to go up to the next grade if you still don't study hard.离开车只剩半个钟头了，再不走可赶不上了。There is only half an hour left. We'll miss the train if we don't start at once. (d)表示一个动作发生在另一个动作结束之后 [indicating one action taking place after the completion of another]：咱们看完了这个节目再走。We'll leave after watching this performance.你把材料整理好再动笔。Sort out the materials before setting pen to paper. (e)表示另外有所补充 [indicating additional information]：再则 moreover; in addition; furthermore; besides再不然 or; or else院子里种着迎春、牡丹、海棠、石榴，再就是玫瑰和月季。The garden has been planted with winter jasmine, peonies, Chinese flowering crab-apple trees, pomegranates, as well as roses and Chinese roses. 2.〈书 fml.〉再继续；再出现 continue; return; reappear：青春不再。One's youth never returns.良机难再。Opportunity knocks but once.相关词组一再 | 东山再起 | 恩同再造 | 一…再… | 非再生资源 | 可再生资源 | 简单再生产 | 扩大再生产 | 一而再，再而三再版 | 再不 | 再次 | 再度 | 再会 | 再婚 | 再嫁 | 再见 | 再醮 | 再三 | 再审 | 再生 | 再世 | 再说 | 再现 | 再造 | 再则 | 再者 | 再保险 | 再生产 | 再生水 | 再接再厉 | 再生父母 | 再衰三竭

再三
再三[zài sān] 一次又一次 over and over again; time and again; again and again; repeatedly：再三再四 over and over again言之再三 repeat sth. time and again考虑再三 consider over and over again再三挽留 repeatedly urge sb. not to quit; repeatedly persuade sb. to stay on

再不
再不[zài bu] 要不然 if not; or else; or：我打算让老吴去一趟，再不让小王也去，俩人好商量。I'm thinking of sending Lao Wu there; or, let Xiao Wang go too, so that they can consult each other.

再世
再世[zài shì]1.来世 next life 2.〈书 fml.〉再次在世上出现 同 same as 再生 zàishēng ①; reappear; reincarnate; revive：华佗再世 Hua Tuo reincarnated

再会
再会[zài huì] 再见 goodbye; see you (again); adieu; farewell; until we meet again

再保险
再保险[zài bǎo xiǎn] 保险人把所承担的保险业务的部分或全部分给其他保险人承保，以分散风险和责任的一种保险形式 reinsurance; insure again, esp. under a contract by which an insurer transfers all or part of the risk and responsibilities to other insurers亦 also 分保 fēnbǎo

再则
再则[zài zé] 表示更进一层或另外列举原因、理由 moreover; furthermore; besides; in addition：兴修水利可灌溉农田，再则还能发电。The construction of water conservancy works can irrigate the farm fields, and in addition, generate electricity.他学习成绩差，原因是不刻苦，再则学习方法也不对头。The reasons for his low grades lie not only in his laziness but also his improper methods.

再婚
再婚[zài hūn] 离婚或配偶死后再结婚 remarry; marry again

再嫁
再嫁[zài jià]（妇女）再婚 (of a woman) remarry

再审
再审[zài shěn]1.重新审查 review; examine again 2.法院对已经审理终结的案件依法重新审理 retrial; reopening of a case; fresh trial

再度
再度[zài dù] 第二次；又一次 once more; 2nd time; once again：机构再度调整 readjust the structure谈判再度破裂。Negotiations broke down once again.

再接再厉
再接再厉[zài jiē zài lì] 一次又一次地继续努力 make persistent efforts; continue to exert oneself; work ceaselessly and unremittingly

再次
再次[zài cì] 第二次；又一次 2nd time; once more; once again：再次获奖 win awards once again

再版
再版[zài bǎn]（书刊）第二次出版。有时也指第二次印刷。 (of books) 2nd edition; 2nd printing; 2nd impression

再现
再现[zài xiàn]（过去的事情）再次出现 (of a past event) reappear; be reproduced

再生
再生[zài shēng]1.死而复生 revive; rise again 2.机体的组织或器官的某一部分丧失或受到损伤后，重新生长。如创口愈合，水螅被切成两段后长成两个水螅等。 regenerate; reproduce; regrow, or cause new tissue to regrow to replace lost or injured tissue, e.g. the healing of a wound or a polypus, which if cut into two, will grow into two polypi 3.对某种废品加工，使恢复原有性能，成为新的产品 reprocess; recycle; regenerate; restore waste to its former property and convert it into reusable material：再生纸 recycled paper再生橡胶 regenerated or reclaimed rubber再生材料 recycled material

再生产
再生产[zài shēng chǎn]指生产过程不断重复和经常更新。有两种形式，即按原规模重复的简单再生产和在扩大的规模上进行的扩大再生产。reproduction; continuously repeat or renew production. Reproduction comes in two forms: simple reproduction, which is to repeat the previous scale, and extended reproduction, which is carried on an expanded production scale.

再生水
再生水[zài shēng shuǐ] 中水 recycled water

再生父母
再生父母[zài shēng fù mǔ]指对自己有重大恩情的人。多指救命的恩人。one's great benefactor; one's 2nd parent, said with gratitude, oft. a person who has saved one's life, or showed great kindness;亦 also 重生父母 chóngshēng fùmǔ

再者
再者[zài zhě] 同 same as 再则 zàizé

再衰三竭
再衰三竭[zài shuāi sān jié]《左传》庄公十年：‘一鼓作气，再而衰，三而竭’The Zuo Commentary·Duke Zhuang 10th Year：‘The morale of warriors is aroused at the 1st roll of drums, dwindles at the 2nd, and depletes at the 3rd.’ 形容士气低落，不能再振作 be dispirited; be weakened and demoralized

再见
再见[zài jiàn]〈客套话 pol.〉用于分手时 goodbye; see you again; so long

再说
再说[zài shuō]1.表示留待以后办理或考虑 talk about sth. later; not deal with sth. till later; put off until later：这事先搁一搁，过两天再说。Let's put the matter aside for a couple of days. 2.表示推进一层 what's more; besides：去约他，来不及了，再说他也不一定有工夫。It's too late to make an appointment with him; besides, he may not have time.

再造
再造[zài zào]重新给予生命（多用来表示对于重大恩惠的感激 oft. used to express one's gratitude for a major favour bestowed）give sb. a new lease of life：恩同再造 favour tantamount to giving (me) a new lease of life

再醮
再醮[zài jiào]〈旧时 old〉称寡妇再嫁 (of a widow) remarry

冏
冏[jiǒng]（ㄐㄩㄥˇ）〈书 fml.〉1.光 light 2.明亮 bright

冒
冒[mào]（ㄇㄠˋ）1.向外透；往上升 belch; emit; evaporate：冒烟 belch smoke冒泡 bubbling冒汗 sweating热气直往外冒。The steam kept evaporating.墙头冒出一个人头来。The head of a person emerged over the top of the wall. 2.不顾（危险、恶劣环境等）risk; brave (danger, harsh condition, etc.)：冒险 run a risk冒雨 brave the rain冒天下之大不韪 fly in the face of the will of the public; risk public condemnation 3.冒失；冒昧 imprudently; recklessly; venture to do sth.：冒进 premature development; impatience for success看见那人好像是他，我冒喊一声。I wasn't sure it was him but I called him anyway. 4.冒充 falsify one's identity; pass off：冒领 claim ownership of sth. that belongs to sb. else冒认 lay a false claim to谨防假冒。Beware of fakes. 4.(Mào) 姓 a surname另见  mò冒[mò]（ㄇㄛˋ）冒顿(Mòdú)，汉初匈奴族一个单于(chányú)的名字 Modu, name of a chieftain of Xiongnu or the Huns in the early Han Dynasty另见  mào相关词组仿冒 | 感冒 | 假冒 | 火冒三丈冒场 | 冒充 | 冒顶 | 冒渎 | 冒犯 | 冒功 | 冒号 | 冒火 | 冒尖 | 冒进 | 冒昧 | 冒名 | 冒牌 | 冒失 | 冒头 | 冒险 | 冒失鬼 | 冒天下之大不韪

冒充
冒充[mào chōng] 假的充当真的 pass off as genuine：冒充内行 pass oneself off as an expert用党参冒充人参 pass dangshen off as ginseng

冒功
冒功[mào gōng] 把别人的功劳说成自己的功劳 claim someone else's credit for oneself：冒功请赏 ask for a reward by claiming someone else's credit for oneself

冒号
冒号[mào hào] 标点符号(：)，主要用在提示性话语之后，用来提示下文 [punctuation mark mainly used after a word to introduce what is to follow in a text] colon (：)

冒名
冒名[mào míng] 假冒别人的名义 assume someone else's name：冒名顶替 assume the identity of another person; take someone else's place by pretence

冒场
冒场[mào chǎng] 戏剧演出时，演员没到该上场时而上场 (of a performer during a theatrical show) go onstage before one's cue

冒天下之大不韪
冒天下之大不韪[mào tiān xià zhī dà bù wěi] 不顾天下人的反对，公然做罪恶极大的事 risk public condemnation and do sth. outrageous; fly in the face of public opinion

冒失
冒失[mào shi] 鲁莽；轻率 indiscreet; harebrained：冒失鬼 madcap说话不要太冒失。Don't be too blunt in speech.

冒失鬼
冒失鬼[mào shi guǐ] 做事莽撞的人 hotspur; wild person：这个冒失鬼差点儿把我撞倒。This impetuous chap almost knocked me down.

冒头
冒头[mào tóu]1.露出苗头 (sign or symptom) show up; emerge; show signs of：骄傲情绪已经冒头了。Signs of conceitedness have become obvious. 2. 同 same as 出头 chū∥tóu ④：看上去他的年纪有三十冒头。He looks to be on the wrong side of 30.

冒尖
冒尖[mào jiān]（～儿 mào∥jiānr）1.装满而且稍高出容器 packed; piled high with sth.; near overflowing：筐里的菜已经冒尖了。The basket is heaped to overflowing with vegetables. 2.稍稍超过一定的数量 a little more than：弟弟十岁刚冒尖。My younger brother is a little over 10. 3.突出 top-notch; preeminent; outstanding：他在班上学习冒尖。He is a top student in the class. 4.露出苗头 occur; come to light：问题一冒尖，就要及时加以解决。Problems should be solved as soon as they occur.

冒昧
冒昧[mào mèi]（言行）不顾地位、能力、场合是否适宜（多用做谦辞 usu. hum.）venture; make bold; take the liberty; (speak or act) without regard for appropriateness, status, ability or place：不揣冒昧 May I take the liberty to ...冒昧陈辞 make bold to present one's opinion

冒渎
冒渎[mào dú]〈书 fml.〉冒犯亵渎 offend; blaspheme; desecrate：冒渎神灵 blaspheme against the deities

冒火
冒火[mào huǒ]（～儿 mào∥huǒr）生气；发怒 flare up; become angry：他气得直冒火。He was beside himself with anger.有话好好说，冒什么火！Calm down, no point in getting angry!

冒牌
冒牌[mào pái]（～儿 mào∥páir）（货物）冒充名牌 bogus; counterfeit：冒牌货 counterfeit; fake; imitation

冒犯
冒犯[mào fàn] 言语或行为没有礼貌，冲撞了对方 offend; displease sb. by improper word or deed; tread on sb's toes：冒犯尊严 affront sb.'s dignity孩子不懂事，对您多有冒犯，请原谅。The child doesn't know any better. Please forgive him for offending you.

冒进
冒进[mào jìn] 超过具体条件和实际情况的可能，工作开始得过早，进行得过快 rash advance; premature step; jump the gun; start doing sth. too soon, or when and where conditions do not permit

冒险
冒险[mào xiǎn] 不顾危险地进行某种活动 risk; take a chance on：冒险家 adventurer冒险行为 risky behaviour冒险突围 break through enemy encirclement at great risk

冒顶
冒顶[mào dǐng] 地下采矿时，矿井中的顶板塌下来 cave-in; roof fall; collapse of a mining pit's ceiling

冓
冓[gòu]（ㄍㄡˋ）〈书 fml.〉宫室的深处 secluded place in the palace

冕
冕[miǎn]（ㄇㄧㄢˇ）天子、诸侯、卿、大夫所戴的礼帽，后来专指帝王的礼帽 crown or coronet (worn by an emperor, prince, duke, etc., later referring esp. to an emperor's crown)：加冕礼 coronation相关词组冠冕 | 加冕 | 日冕 | 卫冕 | 冠冕堂皇 | 无冕之王冕旒

冕旒
冕旒[miǎn liú] 天子的礼帽和礼帽前后的玉串 jade ornaments hanging on the front and back of an emperor's ceremonial hat

冗
冗[rǒng]（ㄖㄨㄥˇ）（宂）1.多余的 superfluous; redundant：冗员 surplus staff members; surplus workers冗词赘句 wordiness and long-winded expression; verbosity 2.烦琐 over-elaborate and tedious：冗杂 superfluous and complicated 3.繁忙的事 busy schedule：希拨冗出席。Please find time from your busy schedule and honour us with your presence.相关词组拨冗 | 烦冗 | 繁冗冗笔 | 冗繁 | 冗务 | 冗员 | 冗杂 | 冗长

冗务
冗务[rǒng wù] 繁杂的事务 miscellaneous chores; fussy affairs：冗务缠身 weighed down by tons of trivia

冗员
冗员[rǒng yuán] 指机关中超过工作需要的人员 redundant personnel (in an organization)：裁减冗员 cut down on surplus personnel

冗杂
冗杂[rǒng zá]（事务）繁杂 (of things to be tackled) miscellaneous

冗笔
冗笔[rǒng bǐ] 指文章或图画中多余无用的笔墨 superfluity in writing or painting; unnecessary touches or strokes

冗繁
冗繁[rǒng fán] 同 same as 冗杂 rǒngzá：他整天被冗繁的琐事拖住了腿。He gets tied up dealing with a miscellany of trivial matters all day long.

冗长
冗长[rǒng cháng]（文章、讲话等）废话多，拉得很长 (of writing or speech) tedious; lengthy; long-winded

写
写[xiě]（ㄒㄧㄝˇ）（寫）1.用笔在纸上或其他东西上做字 write; use a pen or brush to make characters on paper or other things：写草字 write Chinese characters in a cursive hand写对联 write couplets 2.写作 compose; write (an article, book, etc.)：写诗 compose a poem写文章 write an article 3.描写 describe; depict：抒写 write to express one's feeling写景 describe a scenery写实 write realistically 4.绘画 paint; draw：写生 sketch from nature写真 draw a portrait另见  xiè写[xiè]（ㄒㄧㄝˋ）（寫）另见  见下 below另见  xiě相关词组编写 | 采写 | 草写 | 抄写 | 传写 | 大写 | 复写 | 改写 | 简写 | 刻写 | 连写 | 描写 | 摹写 | 模写 | 默写 | 拼写 | 谱写 | 缮写 | 手写 | 书写 | 抒写 | 速写 | 缩写 | 特写 | 誊写 | 题写 | 填写 | 听写 | 涂写 | 小写 | 撰写 | 复写纸 | 手写体 | 书写纸 | 誊写版 | 誊写钢版 | 轻描淡写写本 | 写法 | 写景 | 写生 | 写实 | 写意 | 写照 | 写真 | 写作 | 写字间 | 写字楼 | 写字台 | 写实主义

写作
写作[xiě zuò]写文章（有时专指文学创作）writing; esp. creative writing：写作技巧 writing technique写作水平 writing level

写字台
写字台[xiě zì tái] 办公、写字等用的桌子，一般有几个抽屉，有的还带小柜子 writing desk; desk for writing, handling official affairs, etc., generally with several drawers, and some with a small cabinet

写字楼
写字楼[xiě zì lóu]〈方 dial.〉办公楼，多指配备现代化设施的商用办公楼 office building, oft. commercial office building equipped with modern facilities

写字间
写字间[xiě zì jiān]〈方 dial.〉1.办公室 office 2.书房 study

写实
写实[xiě shí] 真实地描绘事物 write or paint realistically

写实主义
写实主义[xiě shí zhǔ yì] 现实主义的旧称 old name for 现实主义 xiànshí zhǔyì

写意
写意[xiě yì]国画的一种画法，用笔不求工细，注重神态的表现和抒发作者的情趣（区别于‘工笔’ as distinguished from‘meticulous painting’）freehand brushwork in traditional Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes and stress on spiritual resonance and the painter's emotions另见  xièyì写意[xiè yì]〈方 dial.〉舒适 comfortable; enjoyable另见  xiěyì

写景
写景[xiě jǐng] 描写景物 describe scenery：这篇散文写景抒情都有独到之处。This piece of prose is distinctive in both description of scenery and expression of emotions.

写本
写本[xiě běn] 抄本 handwritten copy

写法
写法[xiě fǎ]1.写作的方法 style of writing; literary style 2.书写文字的方法 style of handwriting; penmanship

写照
写照[xiě zhào]1.画人物的形象 portray (a person or character)：传神写照 give a vivid and lifelike portrayal 2.描写刻画 portrayal; portraiture：‘无风三尺土，有雨一街泥’，这就是旧北京街道的真实写照。‘A thick layer of dust covers the ground even if there's no wind, and any rainfall will turn the streets muddy.’ This is a true-to-life portrayal of the streets in old Beijing.

写生
写生[xiě shēng] 对着实物或风景绘画 paint or sketch from nature; do a painting of an object or a landscape：静物写生 still-life painting室外写生 outdoor sketch

写真
写真[xiě zhēn]1.画人像 portray a person; draw a portrait 2.画的人像 portrait 3.对事物的如实描绘 true-to-life depiction of sth.; faithful representation

军
军[jūn]（ㄐㄩㄣ）1.军队 armed forces; army; troops：我军 our troops陆军 infantry; ground force; army解放军 People's Liberation Army (PLA)参军 join the army裁军 disarmament军地两用人才 people competent in both military and productive skills生产大军 labour army; contingent of labour forces劳动后备军 labour reserves 2.军队的编制单位，下辖若干师 army; unit of military force with several divisions under its command：第一军 First Army敌人的兵力估计有两个军。It is estimated that the enemy troops consist of two armies.相关词组败军 | 裁军 | 参军 | 撤军 | 充军 | 川军 | 从军 | 大军 | 殿军 | 督军 | 孤军 | 冠军 | 海军 | 行军 | 红军 | 季军 | 将军 | 进军 | 禁军 | 空军 | 扩军 | 劳军 | 联军 | 领军 | 陆军 | 配军 | 荣军 | 三军 | 随军 | 铁军 | 投军 | 亚军 | 义军 | 友军 | 援军 | 驻军 | 冠军赛 | 海军呢 | 行军床 | 将军肚 | 八路军 | 常备军 | 常行军 | 方面军 | 国防军 | 后备军 | 火头军 | 急行军 | 集团军 | 解放军 | 娘子军 | 强行军 | 生力军 | 铁将军 | 同盟军 | 新四军 | 野战军 | 义勇军 | 御林军 | 正规军 | 志愿军 | 主力军 | 异军突起 | 拥军优属 | 北洋军阀 | 狗头军师 | 荣誉军人 | 八国联军 | 溃不成军 | 八一建军节 | 中国工农红军 | 中国人民解放军军备 | 军操 | 军车 | 军刀 | 军队 | 军阀 | 军法 | 军费 | 军服 | 军港 | 军工 | 军功 | 军官 | 军管 | 军号 | 军徽 | 军婚 | 军火 | 军机 | 军籍 | 军纪 | 军舰 | 军阶 | 军垦 | 军乐 | 军礼 | 军力 | 军粮 | 军龄 | 军令 | 军旅 | 军马 | 军民 | 军品 | 军棋 | 军旗 | 军情 | 军区 | 军权 | 军人 | 军容 | 军嫂 | 军师 | 军士 | 军事 | 军属 | 军团 | 军务 | 军衔 | 军饷 | 军校 | 军械 | 军心 | 军需 | 军训 | 军医 | 军营 | 军用 | 军邮 | 军政 | 军种 | 军装 | 军令状 | 军国主义 | 军事法庭 | 军事管制 | 军事基地 | 军事科学 | 军事体育

军乐
军乐[jūn yuè] 俗称用管乐器和打击乐器演奏的音乐，因为军队中常用而得名 martial or military music, usu. performed with brass, wind and percussion instruments：军乐队 military band; marching band

军事
军事[jūn shì] 与军队或战争有关的事情 military affairs：军事工作 military work军事行动 military movement军事基地 military base军事科学 military science

军事体育
军事体育[jūn shì tǐ yù] 有关军事知识和技能的体育运动，如跳伞运动、航空模型运动、摩托车运动等 military sports; sports concerning military knowledge and skills, such as parachuting, model aircraft competition and motorcycling

军事基地
军事基地[jūn shì jī dì] 为军事上的进攻或防守而驻扎军队并储备军火和军事物资的地区 military base; area where troops are stationed and ammunitions and military matériel stored

军事法庭
军事法庭[jūn shì fǎ tíng] 军队系统中的专门法庭，或由军事机关临时组织的审判机构 military tribunal; military court; special military court or temporary judicial organ set up by the relevant military organs

军事科学
军事科学[jūn shì kē xué] 研究战争和战争指导规律的科学 military science; research of war and military strategies

军事管制
军事管制[jūn shì guǎn zhì] 国家在战争或其他特殊情况下采取的一种措施，由军事部门暂时接管特定的单位、局部地区，以至国家政权 martial law; measure taken by a country at war or in other special circumstances, allowing the army to temporarily take control of a designated unit, area, and sometimes even of state power

军人
军人[jūn rén] 有军籍的人；服兵役的人 soldier; serviceman; army man

军令
军令[jūn lìng] 军事命令 military order：军令状 military pledge军令如山。Military orders must be obeyed unconditionally. or A military order has the momentum of an avalanche.

军令状
军令状[jūn lìng zhuàng] 戏曲和旧小说中所说接受军令后写的保证书，表示如不能完成任务，愿依军法受罚 (in old novels and dramas) military pledge; guarantee written by a warrior after receiving a military order, in which he expresses his willingness to be court-martialled should he fail to carry out the mission

军刀
军刀[jūn dāo]〈旧时 old〉军人用的长刀 soldier's sword; sabre; scimitar

军力
军力[jūn lì] 兵力 military strength

军功
军功[jūn gōng] 战功；武功 military merit; military exploit：军功章 medal for military merit

军务
军务[jūn wù] 军队的事务；军事任务 military affairs; military tasks：军务繁忙 be busy with military affairs督理军务 supervise military affairs

军区
军区[jūn qū]根据战略需要划分的军事区域。设有领导机构，统一领导该区域内军队的作战、训练、政治、后勤，以及卫戍、兵役、民兵等工作。military area command; military area divided in line with strategic requirements, with a body of leadership in charge of the army's campaigning, drilling, politics, logistics, defence, military service and militias in the area

军医
军医[jūn yī] 军队中有军籍的医生 medical officer; military surgeon

军号
军号[jūn hào] 军用的一种喇叭，用来传达简短号令、发布警报等 bugle; brass wind instrument used to pass short orders and signal alarms

军品
军品[jūn pǐn] 军用物品（区别于‘民品’as distinguished from ‘civilian products’）military products; products for military use

军团
军团[jūn tuán]我国红军时期相当于集团军的编制单位。某些国家的军团相当于我国的军。army group, unit of the Chinese Red Army in the 1930s; army corps in some countries, equivalent to army in China

军国主义
军国主义[jūn guó zhǔ yì] 某些帝国主义国家为了加紧对外侵略，把国家置于军事控制之下，实行法西斯军事独裁，强迫人民接受军事训练，向人民灌输侵略思想，使政治、经济、文化等为侵略战争服务的反动政策 militarism; reactionary policy adopted by some imperialist countries for the purpose of foreign invasion, including placing the whole country under military control, exercising fascist military dictatorship, imposing mandatory military training and instilling ideas of aggression in its citizenry, and putting political, economic and cultural activities in the service of warmongering

军垦
军垦[jūn kěn] 部队开荒搞生产 reclamation of wasteland by an army unit：军垦农场 army farm; army reclamation farm

军士
军士[jūn shì] 高于兵，低于尉官的军人 noncommissioned officer, of a rank higher than private and lower than lieutenant

军备
军备[jūn bèi] 军事编制和军事装备 military organization and armament; arms：裁减军备 disarmament扩充军备 engage in arms expansion

军婚
军婚[jūn hūn] 指夫妻一方为现役军人的婚姻 marriage where one or both partners are in active military service

军嫂
军嫂[jūn sǎo] 对军人妻子的尊称 (honor.) soldier's wife

军官
军官[jūn guān]被授予尉官以上军衔的军人的统称。也指军队中排长以上的干部。officer; general term of address for army officer holding the rank of lieutenant or above, or above the rank of platoon leader

军容
军容[jūn róng] 指军队和军人的外表、纪律、威仪等 soldier's discipline, appearance and bearing：整饬军容 enforce army discipline and maintain the required standards of appearance and bearing军容严整。Army discipline and its standards of appearance and bearing are strictly observed.

军属
军属[jūn shǔ] 现役军人的家属 soldier's dependants; armyman's family

军工
军工[jūn gōng]1.军事工业 defence industry 2.军事工程 military project

军师
军师[jūn shī]1.〈古代 arch.〉官名。掌管监察军务。military counsellor; army adviser; title of a military official in charge of military affairs 2.〈旧时 old〉小说戏曲中所说在军中担任谋划的人，现泛指给人出主意的人 (in stories and dramas) person who works out plans and strategies; now referring to one who offers advice to others：狗头军师 inept adviser; vicious adviser你要下象棋，我来给你当军师。I'll serve as your adviser if you want to play Chinese chess.

军徽
军徽[jūn huī]军队的标志。中国人民解放军的军徽是五角红星镶金黄色边，当中嵌金黄色的‘八一’两字。army emblem. The emblem of the People's Liberation Army of China is a red five-pointed star with gilded edge, and with the two golden characters 八一 (meaning ‘August 1st’) at its centre.

军心
军心[jūn xīn] 军队的战斗意志 army morale：振奋军心 boost or heighten the soldiers' morale动摇军心 shake the army's morale

军情
军情[jūn qíng] 军事情况 military movement; war situation：刺探军情 collect military intelligence; spy on military movements

军操
军操[jūn cāo] 军事操练 military drill

军政
军政[jūn zhèng]1.军事和政治 military affairs and politics 2.军事上的行政工作 military administration 3.指军队和政府 army and government

军旅
军旅[jūn lǚ]〈书 fml.〉军队，也指军事 army; troop; military affairs：军旅生涯 life in the army

军旗
军旗[jūn qí]军队的旗帜。中国人民解放军军旗为红地儿，左上角缀金黄色五角星和‘八一’两字。army flag; ensign. The military banner of the People's Liberation Army, which is red, and in its upper left corner bears a yellow five-pointed star and the two characters 八一 (meaning ‘August 1st’)

军服
军服[jūn fú] 军人穿的制服 military uniform; army uniform

军机
军机[jūn jī]1.军事机宜 military plan：贻误军机 delay or frustrate the fulfilment of a military plan 2.军事机密 military secret：泄漏军机 leak a military secret

军权
军权[jūn quán] 兵权 military leadership; military power

军校
军校[jūn xiào] 专门培养军事干部的学校 military school; military academy

军械
军械[jūn xiè] 各种枪械、火炮、弹药及其备件、附件等的统称 ordnance; armaments; general term for a variety of guns, cannons, ammunitions, accessories, etc.

军棋
军棋[jūn qí]棋类游艺的一种。有陆军棋和陆海空军棋，棋子按照军职和军械定名。两人对下，双方按照规则走棋，最后以夺得对方军旗者为胜。military chess; infantry or infantry-navy-airforce military chesses, in which the chess pieces are marked with military ranks and names of weapons, played by two persons, with the player who seizes the army flag of the other side declared as the winner

军民
军民[jūn mín] 军队和人民 army and people; soldiers and civilians; military and civilian：军民鱼水情。The army and the people are as close to each other as fish and water.

军法
军法[jūn fǎ] 军队中的刑法 military criminal code; military law：违反军纪者将按军法处置。Those who flout military discipline will be court-martialled.

军港
军港[jūn gǎng]军用舰船专用的港口。通常有各种防御设施。naval port; port used by military vessels, usu. with various defence facilities

军火
军火[jūn huǒ] 武器和弹药的总称 general term for arms and ammunition; ammunitions：军火库 arsenal

军用
军用[jūn yòng] 军事上使用的 for military use; military：军用物资 military supplies军用地图 military map军用飞机 warplane; military aircraft

军礼
军礼[jūn lǐ] 军人的礼节 military salute：行军礼 give a military salute; salute

军种
军种[jūn zhǒng]军队的基本类别。一般分为陆军、海军、空军三个军种。每一军种由几个兵种组成。armed services, usu. divided into infantry, navy and air force, each being further divided into several arms of services

军管
军管[jūn guǎn] 军事管制的简称 abbr. for 军事管制 jūnshì guǎnzhì

军籍
军籍[jūn jí] 原指登记军人姓名等的簿册，转指军人的身份 master roll for registering the names of soldiers; later came to refer to identity of a serviceman

军粮
军粮[jūn liáng] 供应部队食用的粮食 army provisions; grain for the army

军纪
军纪[jūn jì] 军队的纪律 military discipline：军纪严明 strict and impartial military discipline

军舰
军舰[jūn jiàn] 有武器装备能执行作战任务的军用舰艇的统称，主要有战列舰、巡洋舰、驱逐舰、航空母舰、潜艇、鱼雷艇等 warship; naval vessel; general term for armed ships that could participate in military operations, including warships, cruisers, chasers, aircraft carriers, submarines, torpedo boats, etc.亦 also 兵舰 bīngjiàn

军营
军营[jūn yíng] 兵营 military camp; barracks

军衔
军衔[jūn xián]区别军人等级的称号。如元帅、将官、校官、尉官等。military rank, such as marshal, general, captain, lieutenant, etc.

军装
军装[jūn zhuāng] 军服 military uniform; army uniform; uniform

军训
军训[jūn xùn] 军事训练 military training

军费
军费[jūn fèi] 国家用于军事方面的经费 military expenditure

军车
军车[jūn chē] 军用机动车辆 military vehicle

军邮
军邮[jūn yóu] 军队系统里的邮政 army postal service; army post or mail

军阀
军阀[jūn fá]1.〈旧时 old〉拥有武装部队，割据一方，自成派系的人 warlord; military commander with his own armed forces, who exercises administrative power over a region independently：北洋军阀 Northern Warlords 2.泛指控制政治的反动军人 (in a broad sense) reactionary military man who controls politics

军队
军队[jūn duì] 为政治目的服务的武装组织 armed forces; army; troops; armed organization established to serve political purposes

军阶
军阶[jūn jiē] 军衔的等级 military rank; grade

军需
军需[jūn xū]1.军队所需要的一切物资和器材。特指给养、被服等。military supplies of various materials and equipment, esp. provisions, beddings and clothing 2.〈旧时 old〉军队中指办理军需业务的人员 quartermaster; officer responsible for the troops' supplies

军饷
军饷[jūn xiǎng] 军人的薪俸和给养 soldier's pay and provisions

军马
军马[jūn mǎ]1.军用的马 army horse：军马场 army horse ranch; army horse-breeding farm 2.〈书 fml.〉兵马，泛指军队 troops; soldiers：各路军马 all military units; various forces

军龄
军龄[jūn líng] 军人在军队中已服役的年数 years of service done in the army

农
农[nóng]（ㄋㄨㄥˊ）（農、辳）1.农业 agriculture; farming：务农 be engaged in agriculture农具 farm tools农田水利 irrigation and water conservancy农林牧副渔 farming, forestry, animal husbandry, sideline production and fishery 2.农民 peasant; farmer：老农 old peasant茶农 tea grower菜农 vegetable grower 3.(Nóng) 姓 a surname相关词组菜农 | 蚕农 | 茶农 | 佃农 | 富农 | 雇农 | 瓜农 | 果农 | 花农 | 蕉农 | 老农 | 粮农 | 林农 | 棉农 | 贫农 | 神农 | 务农 | 小农 | 烟农 | 药农 | 蔗农 | 中农 | 加农炮 | 上中农 | 下中农 | 自耕农 | 工农联盟 | 小农经济 | 旅游农业 | 生态农业 | 有机农业 | 半自耕农 | 富裕中农 | 加农榴弹炮 | 中国工农红军农场 | 农村 | 农夫 | 农妇 | 农耕 | 农工 | 农户 | 农活 | 农机 | 农家 | 农具 | 农垦 | 农历 | 农忙 | 农民 | 农奴 | 农人 | 农舍 | 农时 | 农事 | 农田 | 农闲 | 农械 | 农学 | 农谚 | 农药 | 农业 | 农艺 | 农用 | 农产品 | 农奴主 | 农业国 | 农业税 | 农作物 | 农家肥料 | 农贸市场 | 农民起义 | 农民战争 | 农业工人 | 农业合作化

农业
农业[nóng yè] 栽培农作物和饲养牲畜的生产事业。在国民经济中的农业，还包括林业、渔业和农村副业等项生产在内。 agriculture; farming; enterprise of growing crops and raising livestock. As a part of the national economy, it also includes forestry, fishery and rural sideline occupations.

农业合作化
农业合作化[nóng yè hé zuò huà] 用合作社的组织形式，把个体的、分散的农业经济改变成比较大规模的、集体的社会主义农业经济 cooperative transformation of agriculture; agricultural cooperative movement; transforming an individual, scattered agricultural economy into a larger-scale, collective socialist agricultural economy through organized cooperatives亦 also 农业集体化 nóngyè jítǐhuà

农业国
农业国[nóng yè guó] 工业不发达、国民经济收入中以农业收入为主要部分的国家 agricultural country; country with an undeveloped industrial base, where agricultural income constitutes the major part of the national revenue

农业工人
农业工人[nóng yè gōng rén] 在农场从事农业生产的工人 agricultural labourer; farm labourer; farm worker; 简称 abbr. 农工 nónggōng

农业税
农业税[nóng yè shuì] 国家对从事农业生产、有农业收入的单位或个人所征收的税 agricultural tax; tax levied by the state from units or individuals engaged in agricultural production and having agricultural incomes

农事
农事[nóng shì] 农业生产中的各项工作 farm work; farming：农事繁忙 busy with farm work

农产品
农产品[nóng chǎn pǐn] 农业中生产的物品，如稻子、小麦、高粱、棉花、烟叶、甘蔗等 agricultural products; farm produce, e.g. rice, wheat, sorghum, cotton, tobacco, sugarcane, etc.

农人
农人[nóng rén] 同 same as 农民 nóngmín

农作物
农作物[nóng zuò wù] 农业上栽种的各种植物，包括粮食作物、油料作物、蔬菜、果树和做工业原料用的棉花、烟草等 crop; cultivated plants or agricultural produce, e.g. grain, oil plants, vegetables, fruit, and industrial crops, e.g. cotton, tobacco, etc.; 简称 abbr. 作物 zuòwù

农具
农具[nóng jù] 进行农业生产所使用的工具，如犁、耙、耧等 farm implements; farm tools, e.g. plough, rake, drill, etc.

农历
农历[nóng lì]1.阴阳历的一种，是我国的传统历法，平年12个月，大月30天，小月29天，全年354天或355天（一年中哪一月大，哪一月小，年年不同）。由于平均每年的天数比太阳年约差11天，所以在19年里设置7个闰月，有闰月的年份全年383天或384天。又根据太阳的位置，把一个太阳年分成24个节气，便于农事。纪年用天干地支搭配，60年周而复始。这种历法相传创始于夏代，所以又称夏历。 lunar calendar; traditional Chinese calendar, according to which a common year has 354 or 355 days, 12 months which may have 30 days or 29 days (the number of days in a month varies from year to year). As the average number of days in a lunar year is 11 days shorter than a solar year, seven leap months are added every 19 years, so a leap year has 383 or 384 days. According to the position of the sun, a solar year is divided into 24 seasonal points to facilitate farming. The years are designated by pairing items from the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches respectively so that 60 years form a cycle. The lunar calendar was allegedly created during the Xia Dynasty. Hence the term, xiali, or Xia calendar.亦 also 旧历 jiùlì; 通称 generally called 阴历 yīnlì 2.农业上使用的历书 farmers' almanac; almanac for agricultural production

农场
农场[nóng chǎng] 使用机器、大规模进行农业生产的企业单位 farm; enterprise engaged in large-scale mechanized agricultural production

农垦
农垦[nóng kěn] 农业垦殖 land reclamation and cultivation：农垦事业 the cause of land reclamation and cultivation

农夫
农夫[nóng fū]〈旧时 old〉称从事农业生产的男子 farmer; peasant; ploughman

农奴
农奴[nóng nú] 封建社会中隶属于农奴主或封建主的农业生产劳动者。在经济上受剥削，没有人身自由和任何政治权利。 serf; agricultural labourer owned by a lord in feudal society, who was deprived of personal freedom and all political rights and suffered economic exploitation

农奴主
农奴主[nóng nú zhǔ] 占有农奴和生产资料的人 serf owner; one who owns serfs and the means of production

农妇
农妇[nóng fù] 农家妇女 peasant woman; farm woman

农学
农学[nóng xué] 研究农业生产的科学，内容包括作物栽培、育种、土壤、气象、肥料、农业病虫害等 agronomy; agriculture; science of agricultural production, including the planting and breeding of crops, soil, meteorology, fertilizers, plant diseases and pests, etc.

农家
农家[nóng jiā] 从事农业生产的人家 peasant family：农家生活 rural life农家子弟 children from peasant families农家[Nóng jiā] 先秦时期反映农业生产和农民思想的学术派别。著作目录见于《汉书·艺文志》，多已失传。 school of Agriculturists; pre-Qin academic school which reflects agricultural production and peasant ideology. The writings of this school are listed in History of Han·Records of Art and Literature, most of which have been lost.

农家肥料
农家肥料[nóng jiā féi liào] 农家自己生产的肥料，如粪肥、绿肥等（区别于作为商品的化学肥料 as compared with ‘chemical fertilizer’ as a commodity） manure; farmyard manure; homemade fertilizer, e.g. muck, green manure, etc.

农工
农工[nóng gōng]1.农民和工人 peasants and workers：扶助农工 support the peasants and workers 2.农业工人的简称 farm worker; farm labourer; abbr. for 农业工人 nóngyè gōngrén

农忙
农忙[nóng máng] 指春、夏、秋三季农事繁忙（时节） farming season; busy season (in farming) in spring, summer and autumn

农户
农户[nóng hù] 从事农业生产的人家 peasant household

农时
农时[nóng shí] 农业生产中，配合季节气候，每种作物都有一定的耕作时间，称为农时 farming season; time of the year in which a certain farm crop has to be sown or planted according to changes in the climate of a given region：不误农时 sow or grow a farm crop in the proper season

农机
农机[nóng jī] 农业机械 agricultural machinery; farm machinery：农机部门 department of agricultural machinery农机工业 agricultural machinery industry

农村
农村[nóng cūn] 以从事农业生产为主的人聚居的地方 rural area; countryside; country; place where people are engaged in agricultural production

农械
农械[nóng xiè] 喷农药用的器械，如喷雾器、喷粉机等 apparatus for spraying pesticides, e.g. sprayer, duster, etc.

农民
农民[nóng mín] 在农村从事农业生产的劳动者 farmer; peasant; peasantry; one who is engaged in agricultural production in rural areas

农民战争
农民战争[nóng mín zhàn zhēng] 封建社会农民为反对地主阶级的反动统治而进行的革命战争。一般有鲜明的战斗口号，活动范围较大，例如清代的太平天国革命。 peasant war; revolutionary war waged by peasants against the reactionary rule of the landlord class during feudalism, generally with distinct rallying calls and spreading to a large area, e.g. the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom Rebellion

农民起义
农民起义[nóng mín qǐ yì] 农民为了反抗地主阶级的政治压迫和经济剥削而进行的武装斗争 peasant uprising; peasant revolt; armed struggle waged by peasants against political oppression and economic exploitation of the landlord class

农活
农活[nóng huó]（～儿 nónghuór）农业生产中的工作，如耕地、播种、施肥、收割等 farm work; farm chores; work in agricultural production, e.g. tilling, sowing, fertilizing, reaping, etc.

农用
农用[nóng yòng] 指为农业或农民所使用 farm-oriented; agricultural; (of things) used in agriculture or by farmers：农用物资 farm-oriented commodities

农田
农田[nóng tián] 耕种的田地 farmland; cultivated land; cropland：农田水利 irrigation and water conservancy

农耕
农耕[nóng gēng] 农业耕种；农作 farming; husbandry：不事农耕 not be engaged in farm work农耕劳作 do farm work

农舍
农舍[nóng shè] 农民住的房屋 farmhouse; cottage; dwelling of a farmer

农艺
农艺[nóng yì] 指作物的栽培、选种等技术 agriculture; technology of crop growing, seed selection, etc.

农药
农药[nóng yào] 农业上用来杀虫、杀菌、除草，毒杀害鸟、害兽以及促进作物生长的药物的统称 agricultural chemical; pesticide; farming chemical; general name for chemicals used to kill pests, germs and harmful birds and animals, and for weeding, and promoting crop growth

农谚
农谚[nóng yàn] 有关农业生产的谚语，是农民从长期生产实践中总结出来的经验，对于农业生产有一定的指导作用。如‘谷雨前后，种瓜点豆’，‘头伏萝卜二伏菜’。 farmers' sayings; peasants' proverb; sayings about agricultural production which have been summarized by farmers through long years of productive practice and serve as useful guide for agricultural production, e.g. ‘Around Grain Rain, grow melons and peas,’ and ‘Grow turnips in the 1st period of the hot season, and cabbages in the 2nd’.

农贸市场
农贸市场[nóng mào shì chǎng] 以农副业产品贸易为主的个体摊贩市场 market of farm produce; market where individual traders sell farm and sideline products; commonly called 自由市场 zìyóu shìchǎng

农闲
农闲[nóng xián] 指冬季农事较少（时节） slack season in farming

冠
冠[guān]（ㄍㄨㄢ）1.帽子 hat：皇冠 crown桂冠 laurels衣冠整齐 be neatly dressed怒发冲冠 bristle with anger 2.形状像帽子或在顶上的东西 sth. shaped like a hat or on the top of sth. else; corona; crown：鸡冠 cockscomb树冠 crown of a tree.另见  guàn冠[guàn]（ㄍㄨㄢˋ）1.〈书 fml.〉把帽子戴在头上（古代男子二十岁举行冠礼，表示已成年） put on a hat; come of age (in ancient times a man began to wear a hat at 20 to show that he had grown up)：未冠（不到二十岁）(of a boy) under 20 2.在前面加上某种名号或文字 put a title and some words before; precede; crown with：县名前冠上省名 put the name of the province before the name of the county 3.居第一位 take (or win) the first place; rank first：冠军 champion; first place 4.指冠军 champion：夺冠 win the championship三连冠（连续三次获得冠军） win the championship three times on end 5.(Guàn) 姓 a surname另见  guān相关词组夺冠 | 凤冠 | 挂冠 | 桂冠 | 花冠 | 皇冠 | 鸡冠 | 及冠 | 林冠 | 免冠 | 肉冠 | 弱冠 | 树冠 | 王冠 | 羽冠 | 衣冠冢 | 弹冠相庆 | 峨冠博带 | 衣冠楚楚 | 衣冠禽兽 | 张冠李戴 | 沐猴而冠 | 怒发冲冠冠盖 | 冠军 | 冠冕 | 冠子 | 冠军赛 | 冠冕堂皇 | 冠状动脉

冠冕
冠冕[guān miǎn]1.古代帝王、官员戴的帽子 crown; official hat 2.冠冕堂皇；体面 ② elegant and stately; high-sounding; ceremonious：尽说些冠冕话有什么用？What's the good of so much high-sounding talk?

冠冕堂皇
冠冕堂皇[guān miǎn táng huáng] 形容表面上庄严或正大的样子 superficially dignified or upright; highfalutin; high-sounding

冠军
冠军[guàn jūn] 体育运动等竞赛中的第一名 champion; first place in a competition

冠军赛
冠军赛[guàn jūn sài] 锦标赛 championship

冠子
冠子[guān zi] 鸟类头上红色的肉质突起 crest; comb; red fleshy outgrowth on the top of the head of a bird：鸡冠子 cockscomb

冠状动脉
冠状动脉[guān zhuàng dòng mài] 供给心脏养分的动脉，起于主动脉，分左右两条，环绕在心脏的表面，形状像王冠 coronary artery; one of two arteries supplying blood to the heart, stemming from the aorta, and branching out around the heart to form a crown-shaped network

冠盖
冠盖[guān gài]〈古代 arch.〉官吏的帽子和车盖，借指官吏 official hats and canopies; (metaphor for) officials：冠盖相望 constant exchange of visits of ranking officials between nations冠盖云集 large gathering of dignitaries; large meeting of ranking officials

冢
冢[zhǒng]（ㄓㄨㄥˇ）（塚）坟墓 tomb; grave; last home; sepulchre; narrow cell; narrow house; urn：古冢 ancient tomb荒冢 abandoned tomb衣冠冢 tomb containing personal effects of the deceased相关词组丛冢 | 义冢 | 衣冠冢

冤
冤[yuān]（ㄩㄢ）（寃）1.冤枉；冤屈 wrong; injustice; grievance：冤情 truth or facts of an injustice鸣冤 call to redress a wrong; complain of an injustice伸冤 redress a grievance; right a wrong含冤负屈 be wronged; be unfairly treated 2.冤仇 grievance; hatred; enmity; rancour：冤家 opponent and foe; enemy结冤 start a feud; become foes; incur hatred 3.上当；吃亏 swallow a bait suffer a loss：花冤钱 spend money in vain白跑一趟，真冤！I went all the way there for nothing. What a waste of time! 4.〈方 dial.〉欺骗 cheat; deceive：你别冤人！Don't kid me!相关词组抱冤 | 沉冤 | 仇冤 | 含冤 | 喊冤 | 蒙冤 | 鸣冤 | 申冤 | 伸冤 | 诉冤 | 衔冤 | 雪冤 | 不白之冤 | 覆盆之冤冤案 | 冤仇 | 冤魂 | 冤家 | 冤孽 | 冤情 | 冤屈 | 冤头 | 冤枉 | 冤狱 | 冤大头 | 冤枉路 | 冤枉钱 | 冤家路窄

冤仇
冤仇[yuān chóu] 受人侵害或侮辱而产生的仇恨 hatred resulting from being harmed or insulted

冤大头
冤大头[yuān dà tóu] 枉费钱财的人（含讥讽意 satirical）blockhead in money matters; foolish spender

冤头
冤头[yuān tóu] 仇人 enemy; foe

冤孽
冤孽[yuān niè] 冤仇罪孽 enmity and sin

冤家
冤家[yuān jia]1.仇人 enemy; foe：冤家对头 opponent and foe; enemy 2.称似恨而实爱、给自己带来苦恼而又舍不得的人（旧时戏曲或民歌中多用来称情人 term used to address one's sweetheart in traditional Chinese operas or folk songs）one's destined love; sweetheart; lover; term to address a lover who has brought agony and whom one is reluctant to part with

冤家路窄
冤家路窄[yuān jiā lù zhǎi] 仇人或不愿意相见的人偏偏容易相逢，无可回避 The road of enemies is narrow. or One can't avoid one's enemy as much as one wants to.

冤屈
冤屈[yuān qū]1. 同 same as 冤枉 yuān·wang① ②; 2.不公平的待遇；不应受的损害 unfair treatment; injustice：受冤屈 be wronged; be unfairly treated; suffer an injustice

冤情
冤情[yuān qíng] 受冤枉的情况 facts or truth of an injustice：冤情大白。The truth of the injustice eventually came to light.申诉冤情 appeal to sb. to redress a wrong

冤枉
冤枉[yuān wang]1.受到不公平的待遇；被加上不应有的罪名 be treated unfairly; be wronged with fabricated charges：冤枉官司 unjust verdict; uncalled-for lawsuit把这过错加在我头上，真是冤枉。It's so unfair to blame me for this mistake. 2.使无罪者有罪；没有事实根据，给人加上恶名 treat sb. unfairly or unjustly; wrong; charge an innocent person with fabricated crimes：别冤枉好人。Don't wrong an innocent person. 3.不值得；吃亏 not worthwhile; not being repaid for effort; in vain; for nothing：这个钱花得真冤枉！I really didn't get my money's worth!

冤枉路
冤枉路[yuān wang lù] 本来不必走而多走的路 vain trip; roundabout way

冤枉钱
冤枉钱[yuān wang qián] 本来不必花而花的钱 money spent in vain; not worth the money spent

冤案
冤案[yuān àn] 误判的冤屈案件；被人诬陷，妄加罪名的案件 unjust case; injustice; wrong：平反冤案 overturn a wrong verdict; redress an injustice; right a wrong

冤狱
冤狱[yuān yù] 冤屈的案件 unjust charge or verdict; miscarriage of justice; frame-up：平反冤狱 redress a wrong; right a wrong; reverse an unjust verdict

冤魂
冤魂[yuān hún] 称死得冤枉的人的魂灵（迷信 superstition）spirit of someone who died of an injustice

冥
冥[míng]（ㄇㄧㄥˊ）1.昏暗 dark; obscure：幽冥 dark; obscure晦冥 dark and gloomy 2.深奥；深沉 deep; profound：冥思 be deep in thought冥想 reverie; deep thought 3.糊涂；愚昧 dull; stupid：冥昧 stupidity冥顽 thickheaded; dull and stubborn 4.迷信的人称人死后进入的世界；阴间 underworld; nether world：冥府 underworld; nether world相关词组幽冥 | 苦思冥想冥暗 | 冥钞 | 冥府 | 冥茫 | 冥蒙 | 冥器 | 冥寿 | 冥顽 | 冥想 | 冥衣 | 冥王星 | 冥思苦索

冥器
冥器[míng qì] 同 same as 明器 míngqì

冥寿
冥寿[míng shòu] 指已经死去的人的寿辰 birthday anniversary of the dead

冥府
冥府[míng fǔ] 迷信的人指人死后鬼魂所在的地方 underworld; nether world

冥思苦索
冥思苦索[míng sī kǔ suǒ] 深沉地思索 think hard; rack (or cudgel) one's brains亦 also 冥思苦想 míng sī kǔ xiǎng

冥想
冥想[míng xiǎng] 深沉的思索和想像 meditation; reverie; deep thought：歌声把我们带到对蒙古大草原的美丽的冥想中去了。On hearing the song, I fell into a reverie about the Mongolian grasslands.

冥暗
冥暗[míng àn] 昏暗 dark; dim; dusky：日落西山，天渐冥暗。The day turns dim as the sun sets in the west.

冥王星
冥王星[míng wáng xīng]太阳系九大行星之一，按离太阳由近而远的次序计为第九颗，公转周期约为248年，自转周期约6.4天。是九大行星中最小的行星。Pluto; smallest one of the nine planets of the solar system, of the farthest mean distance from the sun, with its period of revolution being about 248 years and period of rotation being about 6.4 days

冥茫
冥茫[míng máng]〈书 fml.〉苍茫；迷茫 indistinct; dusky; vast and hazy：夜色冥茫。The dusk is gathering.亦 also 溟茫 míngmáng

冥蒙
冥蒙[míng méng] 同 same as 溟濛 míngméng

冥衣
冥衣[míng yī] 迷信的人给死人烧的纸衣 clothes made of paper and burned for the dead

冥钞
冥钞[míng chāo] 迷信的人给死人烧的假钞票 paper made to resemble bank notes and burned for the dead

冥顽
冥顽[míng wán]〈书 fml.〉昏庸顽钝 thickheaded; stupid：冥顽不灵 dull and stupid; impenetrably thickheaded

冬
冬1[dōng]（ㄉㄨㄥ）1.冬季 winter：隆冬 midwinter冬耕 winter ploughing冬眠 hibernation在北京住了两冬 have passed two winters in Beijing 2.(Dōng) 姓 a surname冬2[dōng]（ㄉㄨㄥ）（鼕）〈拟声词 onom.〉形容敲鼓或敲门等声音 rub-a-dub; rat-tat; rat-a-tat; sound of beating a drum, knocking at a door, etc.相关词组帮冬 | 初冬 | 丁冬 | 过冬 | 寒冬 | 立冬 | 隆冬 | 孟冬 | 暖冬 | 严冬 | 越冬 | 仲冬 | 过冬作物 | 寒冬腊月 | 十冬腊月 | 越冬作物冬菜 | 冬耕 | 冬菇 | 冬瓜 | 冬灌 | 冬烘 | 冬季 | 冬节 | 冬令 | 冬眠 | 冬青 | 冬笋 | 冬天 | 冬瘟 | 冬闲 | 冬学 | 冬训 | 冬衣 | 冬泳 | 冬月 | 冬运 | 冬蛰 | 冬至 | 冬装 | 冬不拉 | 冬候鸟 | 冬小麦 | 冬至点 | 冬至线 | 冬虫夏草

冬不拉
冬不拉[dōng bù lā] 哈萨克族的弦乐器，形状略像半个梨加上长柄，一般有两根弦或四根弦 tamboura; stringed musical instrument with a half pear-shaped body and two or four strings, used by the Kazak people亦 also 东不拉 dōngbùlā

冬令
冬令[dōng lìng]1.冬季 winter 2.冬季的气候 winter weather：春行冬令（春天的气候像冬天）wintry weather in spring; harsh spring

冬候鸟
冬候鸟[dōng hòu niǎo]冬季在某个地区生活，春季飞到较远而且较冷的地区繁殖，秋季又飞回原地区的鸟。如野鸭、大雁就是我国的冬候鸟。winter bird; bird living in a certain area in winter, flying to a remote and cold region in spring and returning in autumn, like the wild duck and wild goose

冬天
冬天[dōng tiān] 同 same as 冬季 dōngjì

冬季
冬季[dōng jì] 一年的第四季，我国习惯指立冬到立春的三个月时间，也指农历‘十、十一、十二’三个月 winter; last season of the year from the 19th solar term to the 1st solar term, or the 10th, 11th and 12th lunar months in China另见  四季 sìjì

冬学
冬学[dōng xué] 农民在冬季农闲时学习文化的组织 organization where farmers learn to read and write in the slack winter season

冬小麦
冬小麦[dōng xiǎo mài] 指秋天播种第二年夏天收割的小麦 winter wheat (Triticum), sowed in autumn and harvested the following summer亦 also 冬麦 dōngmài

冬月
冬月[dōng yuè] 指农历十一月 eleventh month of the lunar calendar

冬泳
冬泳[dōng yǒng] 冬季在江河湖海里游泳 winter outdoor swimming (in a river, lake or sea)：冬泳比赛 winter swimming contest不畏严寒，坚持冬泳 defy severe cold and keep on swimming in winter

冬灌
冬灌[dōng guàn] 冬季往田里灌水，使土壤储水，防止春旱 winter irrigation; irrigate fields in winter to increase the water content of the soil and avoid spring drought

冬烘
冬烘[dōng hōng]（思想）迂腐，（知识）浅陋（含讽刺意 sarcastic）(of sb.'s thinking and knowledge) shallow but pedantic：冬烘先生 pedant头脑冬烘 with a pedantic mind

冬瓜
冬瓜[dōng guā]1.一年生草本植物，茎上有卷须，能爬蔓，叶子大，开黄花。果实球形或长圆柱形，表面有毛和白粉，是普通蔬菜。皮和种子可入药。wax gourd (Benincasa hispida); winter gourd; white gourd; herbaceous; annual climbing plant with tendrils, big leaves, yellow flowers and round- or cylinder-shaped edible fruits covered with hair, skin and seeds are used as medicine 2.这种植物的果实 fruit of this plant

冬瘟
冬瘟[dōng wēn]〈中医 Chin. med.〉称冬季流行的瘟病 winter epidemic febrile disease

冬眠
冬眠[dōng mián] 某些动物对不利生活条件的一种适应。如蛙、龟、蛇、蝙蝠、刺猬等，冬季僵卧在洞里，血液循环和呼吸非常缓慢，神经活动几乎完全停止 hibernation; hibernate; winter sleep; way some animals, e.g. frogs, turtles, snakes, bats and hedgehogs, etc., adjust themselves to adverse conditions by lying motionless in caves in a torpid state, their blood circulation and respiration very slow, and almost no nerve activity

冬笋
冬笋[dōng sǔn]冬季挖的毛竹的笋。生长在向阳而温暖的地方，肉浅黄色，质嫩可食。winter bamboo shoots; pale-yellow tender edible shoots of moso bamboo, which grow in warm, sunny places, dug up in winter for consumption

冬耕
冬耕[dōng gēng] 为保墒、除虫、培养地力，在冬季翻松土地 winter ploughing; plough the field in winter to preserve the moisture of the soil, get rid of insects, and increase soil fertility

冬至
冬至[dōng zhì]二十四节气之一，在12月21，22或23日。这一天太阳经过冬至点，北半球白天最短，夜间最长。Winter Solstice; one of the 24 solar terms, when the sun is the farthest south of the celestial equator on about Dec. 21, 22 or 23, which is the shortest day of the year in the Northern Hemisphere另见  节气 jié·qi 和 and 二十四节气 èrshísì jiéqì

冬至点
冬至点[dōng zhì diǎn] 黄道上最南的一点，冬至这天太阳经过这个位置 winter solstice point; the farthest south point of the celestial equator which the sun passes at winter solstice

冬至线
冬至线[dōng zhì xiàn] 南回归线 tropic of Capricorn另见  回归线 huíguīxiàn

冬节
冬节[dōng jié] 同 same as 冬至 dōngzhì

冬菇
冬菇[dōng gū] 冬季采集的香菇 dried mushrooms (picked in winter)

冬菜
冬菜[dōng cài]1.用白菜或芥菜叶腌制成的干菜 preserved, dried Chinese cabbage or mustard greens 2.冬季贮存、食用的蔬菜，如大白菜、胡萝卜等 winter vegetables; vegetables stored as food in winter, e.g. Chinese cabbage, carrot, etc.

冬虫夏草
冬虫夏草[dōng chóng xià cǎo]真菌的一种，寄生在鳞翅目昆虫的幼体中，被害的幼虫冬季钻入土内，逐渐形成菌核，夏季从菌核或死虫的身体上长出菌体的繁殖器官来，形状像草，所以叫冬虫夏草。可入药。Chinese caterpillar fungus (Cordyceps sinensis); a kind of parasite fungus in the larvae of lepidopteran insects that burrow into the earth to winter; the insects die and in summer the sclerotia in the dead insects grows into fungi resembling grass, hence the name, meaning‘winter insect and summer grass’; 简称 abbr. 虫草 chóngcǎo

冬蛰
冬蛰[dōng zhé] 同 same as 冬眠 dōngmián

冬衣
冬衣[dōng yī] 冬季穿的御寒的衣服 winter clothes

冬装
冬装[dōng zhuāng] 冬季穿的御寒的服装 winter dress (or clothes)

冬训
冬训[dōng xùn] 冬季训练 winter training：篮球队即将投入冬训。The basketball team is going to start its winter training.

冬运
冬运[dōng yùn] 运输部门指冬季的运输业务 winter transportation

冬闲
冬闲[dōng xián]指冬季农事较少（时节）slack winter season (in farming)：利用冬闲做好室内选种工作 make use of the slack winter season to do a good job in selecting seeds

冬青
冬青[dōng qīng] 常绿乔木，叶子长椭圆形，前端尖，花白色，雌雄异株，果实球形，红色，种子和树皮可入药 holly (Ilex aquifolium); Chinese ilex; dioecious evergreen tree with sharp oblong leaves, white flowers and clusters of bright-red berries, the seed and bark are used as herbal medicine

冮
冮[gāng]（ㄍㄤ） 姓 a surname

冯
冯[Féng]（ㄈㄥˊ） 姓 a surname另见  píng冯[píng]（ㄆㄧㄥˊ）1. 另见  暴虎冯河 bào hǔ píng hé 2.〈古 arch.〉 同 same as 憑（凭）píng另见  Féng相关词组暴虎冯河

冰
冰[bīng]（ㄅㄧㄥ）（氷）1.水在0℃或0℃以下凝结成的固体 ice; solid form of water at or below 0℃：湖里结冰了。The water was frozen over. 2.因接触凉的东西而感到寒冷 feel cold from contact with cold things：刚到中秋，河水已经有些冰腿了。It is only mid-autumn, yet the river is already a little iced over. 3.把东西和冰或凉水放在一起使凉 put sth. on the ice or in cold water to make it cool; ice：把汽水冰上 get the soda iced 4.像冰的东西 sth. resembling ice：冰片 borneol冰糖 crystal sugar; rock candy相关词组棒冰 | 干冰 | 滑冰 | 溜冰 | 刨冰 | 电冰柜 | 电冰箱 | 间冰期 | 冷冰冰 | 破冰船 | 小冰期 | 冷若冰霜 | 冷语冰人 | 一片冰心 | 玉洁冰清 | 滴水成冰冰棒 | 冰雹 | 冰川 | 冰床 | 冰镩 | 冰袋 | 冰刀 | 冰灯 | 冰点 | 冰雕 | 冰冻 | 冰毒 | 冰峰 | 冰糕 | 冰镐 | 冰挂 | 冰柜 | 冰花 | 冰窖 | 冰晶 | 冰冷 | 冰凉 | 冰凌 | 冰轮 | 冰排 | 冰瓶 | 冰期 | 冰橇 | 冰球 | 冰人 | 冰山 | 冰释 | 冰霜 | 冰炭 | 冰糖 | 冰坨 | 冰箱 | 冰鞋 | 冰镇 | 冰砖 | 冰锥 | 冰碴儿 | 冰川期 | 冰棍儿 | 冰激凌 | 冰淇淋 | 冰清玉洁 | 冰糖葫芦 | 冰天雪地 | 冰消瓦解 | 冰冻三尺，非一日之寒

冰人
冰人[bīng rén]〈书 fml.〉称媒人 matchmaker; go-between

冰冷
冰冷[bīng lěng]1.很冷 ice-cold：手脚冻得冰冷。My hands and feet are freezing.不要躺在冰冷的石板上。Don't lie on that ice-cold slab of stone. 2.非常冷淡 very cold; indifferent; apathetic：表情冰冷 cold expression

冰冻
冰冻[bīng dòng]1.水结成冰 (of water) become hardened into ice; freeze 2.〈方 dial.〉冰 ice

冰冻三尺，非一日之寒
冰冻三尺，非一日之寒[bīng dòng sān chǐ, fēi yī rì zhī hán]〈比喻 fig.〉事物变化达到某种程度，是经过日积月累、逐渐形成的 it takes more than one cold day for the river to freeze three feet deep; Rome was not built in a day; the trouble is deep-rooted

冰凉
冰凉[bīng liáng]（物体）很凉 ice-cold：浑身冰凉。He was ice-cold all over.冰凉的酸梅汤 ice-cold sweet-sour plum juice

冰凌
冰凌[bīng líng] 冰 ice

冰刀
冰刀[bīng dāo]装在冰鞋底下的钢制的刀状物。有球刀、跑刀和花样刀三种。ice skate blade; steel blades fitted to ice skates, of three broad types: for ice hockey skates, racing skates and figure skating skates

冰坨
冰坨[bīng tuó] 水或含水的东西冻结成的硬块 lump of ice; block of ice

冰天雪地
冰天雪地[bīng tiān xuě dì] 形容冰雪漫天盖地，非常寒冷 world of ice and snow; wide tracts of ice-bound and snow-covered country

冰山
冰山[bīng shān]1.冰冻长年不化的大山 ice-covered mountain; icy mountain; mountain covered with ice all the year round 2.浮在海洋中的巨大冰块，有时长到几里，高到一百米左右，是两极冰川末端断裂，滑落海洋中形成的 iceberg; large floating mass of ice, sometimes several kilometres long and about 100 metres tall, that has become detached from glaciers in the polar regions and carried out to sea 3.〈比喻 fig.〉不能长久依赖的靠山 individual or group not to be relied upon for long

冰峰
冰峰[bīng fēng] 冰冻长年不化的山峰 mountain peak capped by ice all the year round; icy mountain peak

冰川
冰川[bīng chuān] 在高山或两极地区，积雪由于自身的压力变成冰块（或积雪融化，下渗冻结成冰块），又因重力作用而沿着地面倾斜方向移动，这种移动的大冰块叫做冰川 glacier; extended mass of ice formed from snow falling and accumulating over the years that moves very slowly; found on high mountains and at the north and south polar regions亦 also 冰河 bīnghé

冰川期
冰川期[bīng chuān qī] 地质上的一个时期，在新生代的第四纪，当时气候非常寒冷，欧洲和美洲北部都被冰川所覆盖 ice age; glacial epoch; geological period in the Quaternary Period of the Cenozoic Era, when temperatures were sub-freezing and Europe and the northern part of America were covered by glaciers亦 also 冰河时代 bīnghé shídài

冰床
冰床[bīng chuáng] 冰上滑行的交通运输工具，形状像雪橇，可坐六七个人，用竿子撑，也可用人力或畜力推拉 sled; sledge; sleigh; vehicle like a sleigh that is drawn or pushed by men or drawn by draft animals and can be ridden by six or seven people when sliding over ice

冰挂
冰挂[bīng guà] 雨凇的通称 general term for 雨凇 yǔsōng

冰排
冰排[bīng pái] 大块浮冰 ice raft; ice floe

冰晶
冰晶[bīng jīng] 在0℃以下时空气中的水蒸气凝结成的结晶状的微小颗粒 ice crystal; precipitation consisting of small crystals of ice that occurs when the temperature drops below 0℃

冰期
冰期[bīng qī]1.冰川期 glacial epoch; ice age 2.指一次冰期中冰川活动剧烈的时期 active period of a glacial epoch

冰柜
冰柜[bīng guì] 电冰柜的简称 abbr. for 电冰柜 diànbīngguì

冰棍儿
冰棍儿[bīng gùn r] 一种冷食，把水、果汁、糖等混合搅拌冷冻而成，用一根小棍做把儿 popsicle; ice-sucker; ice lolly; frozen sucker; frozen food made of flavoured ice, a mixture of water, fruit juice, sugar, etc. on a stick

冰棒
冰棒[bīng bàng]〈方 dial.〉冰棍儿 popsicle; ice lolly

冰橇
冰橇[bīng qiāo] 雪橇 sled; sledge; sleigh

冰毒
冰毒[bīng dú]有机化合物，成分是去氧麻黄素。白色结晶，很像小冰块，对人的中枢神经和交感神经有强烈刺激作用，常用成瘾。因用做毒品，所以叫冰毒。ice; organic compound comprising methamphetamine, with its crystalline form closely resembling that of ice. A highly addictive stimulant that works on the central and sympathetic nervous systems, ice is used as a narcotic drug.

冰消瓦解
冰消瓦解[bīng xiāo wǎ jiě]〈比喻 fig.〉完全消释或崩溃 melt like ice and break like tiles - disintegrate; dissolve; be dispelled

冰淇淋
冰淇淋[bīng qí lín] 同 same as 冰激凌 bīng·jilíng

冰清玉洁
冰清玉洁[bīng qīng yù jié]另见  玉洁冰清 yù jié bīng qīng

冰激凌
冰激凌[bīng ji líng] 一种半固体的冷食，用水、牛奶、鸡蛋、糖、果汁等调和后，一面加冷一面搅拌，使凝结而成 ice cream; soft frozen food made by stirring the mixture of water, milk, egg, sugar, fruit juice, etc. at freezing temperature to attain a light, smooth texture

冰灯
冰灯[bīng dēng] 用冰做成的供人观赏的灯，灯体多为各种动植物、建筑物的造型，内装电灯或蜡烛，光彩四射 ice lantern; coloured ice of various shapes (usu. of animals, plants or buildings) enclosing a light

冰炭
冰炭[bīng tàn]〈比喻 fig.〉互相对立的两种事物 ice and burning coals; mutually exclusive：冰炭不相容（比喻两种对立的事物不能并存）as incompatible or irreconcilable as ice and hot coals

冰点
冰点[bīng diǎn] 水凝固时的温度，也就是水和冰可以平衡共存的温度 freezing point; temperature at which water freezes and water and ice coexist

冰球
冰球[bīng qiú]1.一种冰上运动，用冰球杆把球打进对方球门得分，分多的为胜 ice hockey; game played on ice between two teams of six skaters using hockey sticks to score goals by shooting a puck into the opponent's cage 2.冰球运动使用的球，饼状，用黑色的硬橡胶做成 puck; black disk of vulcanized rubber to be hit into the goal in ice hockey

冰瓶
冰瓶[bīng píng] 大口的保温瓶，通常用来盛冰棍儿等冷食 vacuum bottle or flask for keeping popsicles and other frozen food;另见  保温瓶 bǎowēnpíng

冰砖
冰砖[bīng zhuān] 一种冷食，把水、奶油、糖、果汁等物混合搅拌，在低温下冻成的砖形硬块 ice cream brick; frozen food made by freezing a mixture of water, cream, sugar, fruit juice, etc.; ice cream in the shape of a brick

冰碴儿
冰碴儿[bīng chá r]〈方 dial.〉冰的碎块或碎末；水面上结的一层薄冰 ice chip; thin coat of ice on water surface

冰窖
冰窖[bīng jiào] 贮藏冰的地窖 ice house; cellar for storing ice

冰箱
冰箱[bīng xiāng]1.冷藏食物或药品用的器具，里面放冰块，保持低温 refrigerator; freezer; fridge; icebox; cabinet or chest with a partition for ice, used for keeping food, medicine, etc. cool 2.电冰箱的简称 abbr. for 电冰箱 diànbīngxiāng

冰糕
冰糕[bīng gāo]〈方 dial.〉1.冰激凌 ice cream 2.冰棍儿 ice lolly; popsicle; ice-sucker; frozen sucker

冰糖
冰糖[bīng táng]一种块状的食糖，用白糖或红糖加水使溶化成糖汁，经过蒸发，结晶而成。透明或半透明，多为白色或带黄色。crystal sugar; rock candy; white or yellowish transparent or semi-transparent edible lumps of sugar crystallized by evaporation; dissolved white or brown sugar

冰糖葫芦
冰糖葫芦[bīng táng hú lu]（～儿 bīngtáng hú·lur）糖葫芦 candied haws or other fruits pierced together on a stick

冰花
冰花[bīng huā]1.指凝结呈花纹的薄薄冰层（多在玻璃窗上）ice-flake (as on a window pane in winter) 2.把花卉、水草、水果、活鱼等实物用水冻结，形成冰罩的艺术品 iced object of art (such as iced flowers, water plants, fruit, live fish, etc., as ornaments) 3.雾凇 frost flower; frost; rime：路旁树上的冰花真是美。The frost flowers on the trees lining the road are very beautiful.

冰袋
冰袋[bīng dài]装冰块的橡胶袋。装上冰块后，敷在病人身上某一部位，使局部的温度降低。ice bag; rubber bag for holding ice that is applied to the part of a patient's body that needs to be cooled

冰轮
冰轮[bīng lún]〈书 fml.〉指月亮 the moon

冰释
冰释[bīng shì] 像冰一样溶化 thaw or melt like ice；〈比喻 fig.〉嫌隙、怀疑、误会等完全消除 (of ill feeling; suspicions, misunderstandings, etc.) disappear; vanish; be dispelled：涣然冰释 melt away like ice; vanish like air; clear up

冰锥
冰锥[bīng zhuī]（～儿 bīngzhuīr）雪后檐头滴水凝成锥形的冰 icicle; pendant, tapering mass of ice formed from frozen dripping water亦 also 冰锥子 bīngzhuī·zi, 冰柱 bīngzhù 或 or 冰溜 bīngliū

冰镇
冰镇[bīng zhèn] 把食物或饮料和冰等放在一起使凉 ice; iced; cool food or beverages kept in ice, or with ice cubes added：冰镇西瓜 iced watermelon冰镇汽水 iced soda water

冰镐
冰镐[bīng gǎo] 凿冰用的工具，多用于攀登冰峰 ice axe; tool for cutting ice, used mostly when climbing an icy mountain peak

冰镩
冰镩[bīng cuān] 凿冰工具，头部尖，有倒钩 ice chisel; tool with a pointed tip and barb for cutting ice

冰雕
冰雕[bīng diāo] 用冰雕刻形象的艺术。也指用冰雕刻成的作品 ice carving; carved ice; ice sculpture; skill of fashioning or cutting ice to produce work of art：冰雕展览 ice sculpture exhibition

冰雹
冰雹[bīng báo] 空中降下来的冰块，多在晚春和夏季的午后伴同雷阵雨出现，给农作物带来很大危害 hail; hailstone; precipitation in the form of pellets or balls of ice that usu. fall during afternoon thundershowers in spring and autumn亦 also 雹 báo；通称 commonly known as 雹子 báo·zi；有的地区叫冷子 in some places also called 冷子 lěng·zi

冰霜
冰霜[bīng shuāng]〈书 fml.〉1.〈比喻 fig.〉有节操 moral integrity 2.〈比喻 fig.〉神情严肃 austere manner; stern countenance; austerity：凛若冰霜 be awe-inspiring; look frosty and stern

冰鞋
冰鞋[bīng xié] 滑冰时穿的鞋，皮制，鞋底上装着冰刀 skating boots; ice-skates; leather shoe fitted with a metal blade for skating on ice

冱
冱[hù]（ㄏㄨˋ）（沍）〈书 fml.〉1.冻 frozen：冱寒 cold 2.闭塞 out-of-the-way

冲
冲1[chōng]（ㄔㄨㄥ）（沖、衝）1.通行的大道；重要的地方 thoroughfare; important spot：要冲 place of strategic importance首当其冲 bear the brunt; be the first to be affected (by a disaster, etc.) 2.很快地朝某一方向直闯，突破障碍 storm; make a swift charge in one direction and break through a barrier：横冲直撞 push or shove one's way through; jostle and elbow one's way; dash around madly; barge about冲出重围 break through a tight encirclement直冲云霄 soar into the sky冲口而出 blurt out 3.猛烈地撞击（多用于对对方思想感情的抵触方面 mostly used to describe conflicting feelings and thoughts）clash; collide：冲突 conflict; collision冲犯 offend 4.指冲喜 arrange a wedding for a young man who is mortally ill, in the hope that the joyous occasion will ward off imminent death 5.太阳系中，除水星和金星外，其余的某一个行星（如火星、木星或土星）运行到跟地球、太阳成一条直线而地球正处在这个行星与太阳之间的位置时，叫做冲。这时，太阳从地平线升起，这个行星从西边落下；太阳下山时，这个行星从东方升起。opposition; situation of two heavenly bodies when their longitudes or right ascensions differ by 180 degrees. In the solar system, all planets (such as Mars, Jupiter and Saturn) other than Mercury and Venus arrive on the same line as the earth and the sun, at which time the earth is directly between them and the sun. When the sun rises from the horizon, the planets set in the west, and when it sets, the planets rise in the east.冲2[chōng]（ㄔㄨㄥ）（沖、衝）1.用开水等浇 pour boiling water on：冲茶 make tea冲鸡蛋 pour boiling water into a bowl of raw egg 2. 同 same as 冲洗 chōngxǐ ①；冲击 rinse; flush：用水把碗冲干净 rinse the bowl大水冲坏了河堤。The floods washed away the dam. 3.互相抵消 offset; cancel out; counteract：冲账 strike a balance; reverse an entry; balance an account冲3[chōng]（ㄔㄨㄥ）（沖）〈方 dial.〉山区的平地 level land in mountainous areas：冲田 cultivated level land in hilly areas韶山冲 Shaoshan Terrace翻过山就有一个很大的冲。There's an expanse of level land on the other side of the mountain.另见  chòng冲1[chòng]（ㄔㄨㄥˋ）（衝）1.劲头儿足；力量大 vigorously; with plenty of dash：这小伙子干活儿真冲。This young man works with vim and vigour.水流得很冲。The water is torrential. 2.气味浓烈刺鼻 (of smell) strong and pungent：酒味儿很冲。This liquor smells pungent. 3.〈方 dial.〉斥责 scold; reprimand; chide; revile：他一说话就冲人。Whenever he speaks he tends to offend people.冲2[chòng]（ㄔㄨㄥˋ）（衝）1.向着或对着 towards; facing：他扭过头来冲我笑了笑。He turned around and smiled at me. 2.凭；根据 because of; on the basis of; according to：就冲着这几句话，我也不能不答应。On hearing this statement, I had no recourse but to comply.冲他们这股子干劲儿，一定可以提前完成任务。Working with such vigour, they are bound to finish the task ahead of time.冲3[chòng]（ㄔㄨㄥˋ）（衝）冲压 punch; press：冲床 punching machine冲模 punching mould另见  chōng相关词组大冲 | 俯冲 | 缓冲 | 脉冲 | 要冲 | 折冲 | 打冲锋 | 反冲力 | 怒冲冲 | 气冲冲 | 喜冲冲 | 兴冲冲 | 横冲直撞 | 气冲牛斗 | 气冲霄汉 | 折冲樽俎 | 怒发冲冠 | 首当其冲冲程 | 冲冲 | 冲床 | 冲刺 | 冲淡 | 冲抵 | 冲顶 | 冲动 | 冲犯 | 冲锋 | 冲服 | 冲击 | 冲积 | 冲剂 | 冲决 | 冲扩 | 冲浪 | 冲力 | 冲凉 | 冲量 | 冲龄 | 冲模 | 冲破 | 冲杀 | 冲刷 | 冲腾 | 冲天 | 冲田 | 冲突 | 冲洗 | 冲喜 | 冲销 | 冲压 | 冲要 | 冲账 | 冲撞 | 冲子 | 冲盹儿 | 冲锋枪 | 冲击波 | 冲劲儿 | 冲锋陷阵

冲冲
冲冲[chōng chōng] 感情激动的样子 excited; emotional：兴冲冲 in a state of excitement; in high spirits怒气冲冲 in a rage; furiously

冲决
冲决[chōng jué]1.水流冲破堤岸 (of water) burst through：冲决河堤 breach a dyke 2.突破某种束缚、限制 cast off shackles; break through limitations：冲决罗网 smash the trammels

冲凉
冲凉[chōng liáng]〈方 dial.〉洗澡 take a shower

冲击
冲击[chōng jī]1.（水流等）撞击物体 (of water) break against an object; collide with; pound; lash：海浪冲击着石崖。Ocean waves pounded against the rocks. 2. 同 same as 冲锋 chōngfēng：向敌人阵地发起冲击 launch an attack on the enemy position 3.〈比喻 fig.〉干扰或打击使受到影响 interfere or attack to exert an influence; come under fire：在外国商品冲击下，当地一些工厂停止生产。Some local factories stopped operation with an influx of foreign commodities.

冲击波
冲击波[chōng jī bō]1.通常指核爆炸时，爆炸中心压力急剧升高，使周围空气猛烈震荡而形成的波动。冲击波以超音速的速度从爆炸中心向周围冲击，具有很大的破坏力，是核爆炸重要的杀伤破坏因素之一。shock wave; blast; sudden increase in pressure caused by an (usu. nuclear) explosion which makes the surrounding air vibrate and causes destruction, as it radiates in all directions at a speed faster than sound; one of the fatal elements of a nuclear explosion;亦 also 爆炸波 bàozhàbō 2.指由超音速运动产生的强烈压缩气流 strong compressed air flow caused by a body moving faster than sound 3.〈比喻 fig.〉使某种事物受到影响的强大力量 powerful strength that exerts great influence on certain things

冲刷
冲刷[chōng shuā]1.一面用水冲，一面刷去附着的东西 wash off dirt; wash down：把汽车冲刷得干干净净 give the car a thorough wash-down 2.水流冲击，使土石流失或剥蚀 (of soil and stone) eroded or scoured through water flow：岩石上有被洪水冲刷过的痕迹。The rocks still bear the marks left by scouring floods.

冲刺
冲刺[chōng cì] 跑步、滑冰、游泳等体育竞赛中临近终点时全力向前冲 (of sports competition, such as running, ice-skating or swimming, etc.) make a final dash for the finishing line; sprint

冲剂
冲剂[chōng jì] 中药剂型的一种，把药材煎汁、浓缩加糖等制成，颗粒状，用开水冲服 sweetened Chinese herbal concoction condensed into tiny grains, taken after being mixed with boiling water

冲力
冲力[chōng lì] 运动物体由于惯性作用，在动力停止后还继续运动的力量 thrust; momentum; inertial force compelling an object to move continuously forward after driving force ceases

冲动
冲动[chōng dòng]1.能引起某种动作的神经兴奋 impulse; impetus; a wave of excitement that will bring on certain action：创作冲动 impulse to write 2.情感特别强烈，理性控制很薄弱的心理现象 strong emotional impulse defying sensible reasoning：不要冲动，应当冷静考虑问题。Don't act on impulse; calm down and think it over.

冲劲儿
冲劲儿[chòng jìn r]1.敢做、敢向前冲(chōng)的劲头儿 drive; bold spirit; drive and vigour：这姑娘挺有冲劲儿，一个人干了两个人的活儿。The girl worked with such drive that she single-handedly finished the work of two people. 2.强烈的刺激性 strongly stimulating：这酒有冲劲儿，少喝点儿。This liquor is pretty strong, so don't drink too much. or This liquor has a kick; don't drink too much.

冲压
冲压[chòng yā] 用冲床进行金属加工 punching press; process metal with a punching machine

冲喜
冲喜[chōng xǐ]〈旧时 old〉迷信风俗，家中有人病重时，用办理喜事（如迎娶未婚妻过门）等举动来驱除邪祟，希望转危为安 benevolent or happy event (such as a wedding) arranged in the hope that the joyous occasion might ward off evil and bring a mortally ill person in the family back to health

冲天
冲天[chōng tiān] 冲向天空 soar into the sky;〈比喻 fig.〉情绪高涨而猛烈 (of mood) highflying; violent; soaring：怒气冲天 flare up; explode; lose control; fly into a rage冲天的干劲 boundless enthusiasm

冲子
冲子[chòng zi] 用金属做成的一种打眼器具 punching pin; puncher; metal tool used to punch holes亦 also 铳子 chòng·zi

冲床
冲床[chòng chuáng]冲压使金属板成型或在金属板上冲孔的机器。汽车外壳等就是用冲床加工制成的。punching machine; machine for embossing a design or punching holes in a metal board. The exterior frame of a car is made with a punching machine.亦 also 冲压机 chòngyājī 或 or 压力机 yālìjī

冲扩
冲扩[chōng kuò]冲洗并扩印（照片） develop and print (photographs)：冲扩机 developing machine冲扩彩照 develop colour photographs

冲抵
冲抵[chōng dǐ] 同 same as 冲销 chōngxiāo

冲撞
