出圃[chū pǔ] 指苗木长到一定阶段从苗圃移植别处 remove saplings from a nursery for transplanting：苗圃施了大量肥料，树苗长得旺，出圃早。Saplings of the nursery have grown very well due to rich fertilization; they can be transplanted elsewhere at an early date.

出圈
出圈[chū juàn] 同 same as 起圈 qǐ∥juàn

出圈儿
出圈儿[chū quān r]〈比喻 fig.〉越出常规、范围 go beyond common rules or limits：这样做就出圈儿了。This goes too far.话说得出了圈儿了 speak improperly

出土
出土[chū tǔ]（古器物等）被发掘出来 (of antiques) be unearthed; be exhumed：出土文物 cultural relics excavated from underground这一批铜器是在寿县出土的。These bronze wares were dug up in Shouxian County.

出场
出场[chū chǎng]1.演员登台（表演）(of actors) come onstage (to perform) 2.运动员进入场地（参加表演或竞赛）(of athletes) enter the arena (to perform or compete)

出境
出境[chū jìng]1.离开国境 leave the country：驱逐出境 deport办理出境手续 go through exit formalities 2.离开某个地区 leave an area：这条河是县界，过了河就出境了。The river is the border; you are in a different county once you cross it.

出处
出处[chū chǔ]〈书 fml.〉出仕和退隐 take up and retire from an official post出处[chū chù]（引文或典故的）来源 source (of a quotation or allusion)：文章中的引文应注明出处。The sources of quotations in an article should be noted.

出外
出外[chū wài] 到外地去 leave one's home town for another place：出外谋生 make a living away from home

出头
出头[chū tóu]1.从困苦的环境中解脱出来 be freed from a miserable condition：盼到了出头之日 see the end of bitter days 2.（物体）露出顶端 (of things) show the top：出头的椽子先烂（比喻冒尖的人最容易受到打击）。Rafter that protrudes rots first.or(fig.) Those in the fore are most vulnerable to attack.堆放杉篙，不能出头太多。When you pile up fir logs, make sure that not many of them stick out. 3.出面；带头 do sth. in person; take the lead：出头露面 be active in public我们厂的体育活动，是他出头搞起来的。It was he who initiated sports activities in our factory. 4.（出头儿 chū∥tóur）用在整数之后表示有零数 [used after an integer to indicate a remainder after that]：小麦亩产八百斤出头。The output of wheat per mu was more than 400 kg.你已是三十出头的人了，该成家了。It's time for you to get married now that you are over 30 years old.

出头露面
出头露面[chū tóu lòu miàn]1.在公众的场合出现 appear in public：他不爱出头露面。He doesn't like to be in the limelight. 2.出面（做事）take the lead in doing sth.：大家推他出头露面去商谈这件事。We all recommended him to negotiate the matter.

出奇
出奇[chū qí] 特别；不平常 particular; unusual：今年早春真暖得出奇。The weather was unusually warm for early spring this year.山村的夜，出奇的安静。Such a serene night is unusual in a mountain village.

出奇制胜
出奇制胜[chū qí zhì shèng] 用奇兵或奇计战胜敌人 defeat the enemy by a surprise move or strategy;〈比喻 fig.〉用对方意想不到的方法来取胜 gain the upper hand by taking an opponent unawares

出奔
出奔[chū bēn] 同 same as 出走 chūzǒu：仓促出奔 run away in great haste出奔他乡 leave one's homeland for somewhere else

出嫁
出嫁[chū jià] 女子结婚 (of a woman) get married

出家
出家[chū jiā] 离开家庭到庙宇里去做僧尼或道士 renounce the family to become a monk, nun, or Taoist：出家修行 live and cultivate oneself as a monk or Taoist出家为尼 be tonsured to become a nun

出家人
出家人[chū jiā rén] 指僧尼或道士 monk, nun, or Taoist

出将入相
出将入相[chū jiàng rù xiàng]出战可为将，入朝可为相。旧时指人文武兼备。也指官居高位。be a general in the battlefield or a minister at court; (in old times) a man with both military and administrative competence; hold high office

出尔反尔
出尔反尔[chū ěr fǎn ěr]《孟子·梁惠王》：‘出乎尔者，反乎尔者也。’原意是你怎么做，就会得到怎样的后果。今指说了又翻悔或说了不照着做，表示言行前后自相矛盾，反复无常。 Mencius·Duke Hui of Liang:‘You will reap what you have sowed.’It originally meant that one must take the consequences of what one has done. The present-day sense of this idiom is to go back on one's word, fail to do what one has promised, contradict one's word with one's deed, or be inconsistent.

出尖
出尖[chū jiān]（～儿 chū∥jiānr）1.超出一般；拔尖儿 better than usual; be the top or best：出尖露众 distinguish oneself 2.〈方 dial.〉装满而且稍高出容器 be full to the brim：碗里的米饭已经出尖了。The bowl is filled to the brim with rice.

出局
出局[chū jú] 指棒球、垒球比赛击球员或跑垒员在进攻中因犯规等被判退离球场，失去继续进攻机会 be out of the game. In baseball or softball, a batter or fielder is ousted and loses his chance to attack when he fouls.[补义 new sense] 1.泛指在体育比赛中因失利而不能继续参加后一阶段的比赛 be knocked out; be out; fail to qualify for the next round of matches： 经过预赛，有三支球队被淘汰出局。Three teams were knocked out after the preliminary matches. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉人或事物因不能适应形势或不能达到某种要求而无法在其领域继续存在下去 (of a person or a thing) be unable to survive in a certain field due to failure to adapt to the situation or meet the requirements： 粗制滥造的产品必然被淘汰出局。Slipshod products will inevitably be eliminated from the market.

出展
出展[chū zhǎn]1.到外地展览 put on an exhibition away from home：新产品出展欧洲获得好评。The new product drew raves while on display in Europe. 2.展出 exhibit; display：优秀美术作品即将在京出展。Fine works of art will be put on show in Beijing soon.

出山
出山[chū shān]〈比喻 fig〉出来做官，也泛指出来担任某种职务，从事某项工作 take up an official post (a career, or a job)：他这次任篮球教练，已是二度出山。This is his second term as a basketball coach.

出岔子
出岔子[chū chà zi] 发生差错或事故 go wrong; have an accident：手术中千万不能出岔子。We cannot afford anything to go wrong in a surgical operation.

出巡
出巡[chū xún] 出外巡视 make an inspection tour：出巡江南 go to areas south of the Yangtze River on an inspection tour

出工
出工[chū gōng] 出发上工；出勤 go to work; show up for work：时间快到，就要出工了。It'll soon be time for work.他每天出工，从不请假。He goes to work everyday, never asking for a leave.

出差
出差[chū chāi]1.（机关、部队或企业单位的工作人员）暂时到外地办理公事 (of employees from a government department, enterprise or organization, or of servicemen) go on a business trip：去北京出差 go on a business trip to Beijing出了一个月的差 be on a business trip for a month 2.出去担负运输、修建等临时任务 be assigned a temporary transportation or building task away from one's normal work place

出师
出师1[chū shī]（徒弟）期满学成 (of an apprentice) complete the term of learning with the master：学徒三年出师。The apprenticeship is three years.出师2[chū shī]〈书 fml.〉出兵打仗 dispatch troops into battle：出师讨伐 send troops on a punitive expedition出师不利 be thwarted in the first battle

出席
出席[chū xí] 有发言权和表决权的成员（有时也泛指一般人）参加会议 be present at a meeting, with or without the right to present a speech or to vote：出席代表大会 take part in a congress报告出席人数 report the number of participants

出店
出店[chū diàn]〈方 dial.〉〈旧时 old〉商店中担任接送货物等外勤工作的人员 shop assistant responsible for receiving and delivering goods and for running errands

出庭
出庭[chū tíng] 诉讼案件的关系人（如原告人、被告人、辩护人、代理人、律师等）到法庭上接受审讯或讯问 (of people related to a case, such as the plaintive, defendant, defender, agent, lawyer, etc.) appear in court for questioning

出彩
出彩[chū cǎi]1.〈旧时 old〉戏曲表演杀伤时，涂抹红色表示流血，叫出彩 apply red colour to indicate injury in traditional Chinese opera 2.指出丑（含诙谐意 humor.）make a fool of sb. or oneself：我揭了老底，让他当场出了彩。I embarrassed him on the spot by pulling the skeleton out of his closet.

出征
出征[chū zhēng] 出去打仗 go out to fight：率兵出征 lead troops on an expedition

出徒
出徒[chū tú]（徒工）期满学成；出师 complete one's apprenticeship; finish learning with one's master：我刚进厂两年，还没出徒呢！I've been in the factory for only two years and am still an apprentice.

出恭
出恭[chū gōng] 排泄大便 go to the lavatory (for a bowel movement)

出息
出息[chū xi]1.指发展前途或志气 prospect or aspiration：不管做什么工作，只要对人民有贡献，就有出息。Whatever we do is meaningful as long as it contributes to the welfare of the people.懦夫懒汉是没出息的。There's no future for cowards and lazybones. 2.〈方 dial.〉长进；出落 make progress; become prettier：这孩子比去年出息多了。The child is doing much better than last year.那姑娘出息得更漂亮了。The young woman has turned even more beautiful. 3.〈方 dial.〉培养使有出息 train (a person) to become more able：这个学校就是出息人。This school is indeed an incubator of talents. 4.〈方 dial.〉收益 income：咱这儿种稻子比种高粱出息大。We make more money planting paddy rice than sorghum in this area.

出战
出战[chū zhàn] 出兵打仗；跟进攻的敌人作战 send troops into battle; fight against an offensive enemy：出战失利 lose a battle中国足球队出战世界杯外围赛。The Chinese Football Team took part in the preliminary heat of the World Cup.

出手
出手[chū shǒu]1.卖出货物（多用于倒把、变卖等）sell goods (for profiteering, etc.); dispose of; 同 same as 脱手 tuō∥shǒu ②：那批货急于出手。The stock needs to be cleared away as soon as possible.货物很快就出了手。The goods were snatched up pretty soon. 2.拿出来 give：一出手就给他两千块钱。(Someone) gave him 2,000 yuan offhand.出手[chū shǒu]1.指袖子的长短 length of a sleeve 2.开始做某件事情时表现出来的本领 skill displayed upon doing sth.：我跟他下了几着，就觉得他出手的确不凡。I found him an excellent player after only a few moves.另见  打出手 dǎ chūshǒu

出挑
出挑[chū tiāo]（青年人的体格、相貌、智能向美好的方面）发育、变化、成长 (of young people) grow better or mature (in physique, appearance, and intelligence)：这姑娘出挑得越发标致了。The young girl has turned even more beautiful.不满一年，他就出挑成师傅的得力助手。He became a competent assistant to his master within a year.

出摊
出摊[chū tān]（～儿 chū∥tānr）在路旁、广场或集市上摆出货摊（售货）put up a stall by the road, on a public square, or in a market place (to sell goods)：这家饭馆一直坚持出摊卖早点，方便过路群众。The restaurant has been serving simple breakfast by the road, to the convenience of passers-by.

出操
出操[chū cāo] 出去操练 go out for drill：他脚崴了，今天出不了操。He's sprained his ankle and so cannot drill today.

出数儿
出数儿[chū shù r] 产生的数量大 become larger in number or size：机米做饭出数儿。Long-grained non-glutinous rice rises well when cooked.

出月
出月[chū yuè] 过了本月 after the end of the month：这个月没时间，出月才能把稿子写完。I have no time this month. I won't be able to finish writing the paper until next month.

出月子
出月子[chū yuè zi] 指妇女生育满一个月 (of a woman who has given birth) complete a full month of maternity confinement

出来
出来[chū lái]1.从里面到外面来 move from inside to outside：出得来 be able to come out出不来 be unable to come out你出来，我跟你说句话。Come out please. I have a word with you. 2. 同 same as 出现 chūxiàn：经过讨论，出来两种相反的意见。The discussion led to two opposite views.出来[chū lái]1.用在动词后，表示动作由里向外朝着说话的人 [used after a verb to indicate an act directed from inside a place towards the speaker]：拿出来 take out拿得出来 be able to take out拿不出来 be unable to take out从屋里走出一个人来。Someone comes out of the room. 2.用在动词后，表示动作完成或实现 [used after a verb to indicate completion or realization of an action]：开出很多荒地来。Much wasteland has been reclaimed.创造出新产品来。A new product has been developed. 3.用在动词后，表示由隐蔽到显露 [used after a verb to indicate sth. coming to light or being driven home]：我认出他来了。I recognized him.听着听着渐渐听出点意思来了。(I) gradually made out the meaning as (I) listened.天黑了，字都看不出来了。It's so dark, the characters are hardly discernible.

出栏
出栏[chū lán]1.猪羊等长成，提供屠宰叫出栏 (of livestock) grow big enough for slaughtering：今年养猪十万多头，卖给国家六万多头，出栏率达百分之六十。We raised more than 100,000 pigs this year and sold 60,000, or 60%, to the state. 2.〈方 dial.〉起圈 clean up a domestic animal's place：出栏垫土 remove manure and dirt from a pen and cover it with new earth

出格
出格[chū gé]1.言语行动与众不同；出众 extraordinary in word and deed; outstanding：在这一带，他的才学是出格的。He is prominent for his learning in the area. 2.越出常规；出圈儿 over-the-top; go beyond what is proper; be bad：这孩子淘得出了格。The child is exceedingly naughty.

出梅
出梅[chū méi] 出了黄梅季；黄梅季结束 over with or end of the rainy season亦 also 断梅 duàn∥méi;另见  黄梅季 huángméijì

出榜
出榜[chū bǎng]1.贴出被录取或被选取人的名单 publish the names of successful examinees or candidates：考试后三日出榜。The names of successful examinees will be published three days after the test. 2.旧时指贴出大张的文告 (in old times) put up a public notice written on a large piece of paper：出榜安民 put up a notice to reassure the public

出殡
出殡[chū bìn] 把灵柩运到安葬或安厝的地点 carry a coffin to the cemetery or a temporary burial site

出毛病
出毛病[chū máo bìng] 出差错；出故障；出事故 go wrong; be out of order; have an accident：机器要保养好，免得出毛病。The machine needs to be well maintained to avoid malfunction.

出气
出气[chū qì] 把心里的怨愤发泄出来 give vent to one's anger：在外面受了委屈，不该拿家人出气。You should not take it out on your family when you have been wronged elsewhere.

出气筒
出气筒[chū qì tǒng]〈比喻 fig.〉被人用来发泄怨气的人 punching bag

出没
出没[chū mò] 出现和隐藏 appear and disappear：出没无常 come and go unpredictably森林里常有野兽出没。The forest is the haunt of wild animals.

出洋
出洋[chū yáng] 指到外国去 go abroad：出洋考察 make a study tour abroad

出洋相
出洋相[chū yáng xiàng] 闹笑话；出丑 make a laughing stock of oneself; be held up for mockery (in front of a crowd); be disgraced; lose face

出活
出活[chū huó]（～儿 chū∥huór）1.干出活儿 get work done：有了新式机器，干活又轻巧，出活又快。With the new machine, we can do our work with much ease and efficiency. 2.单位时间内干出较多的活 have a large amount of work done per unit time：下午虽然只干了两个钟头，可是很出活。We worked only two hours in the afternoon, but we accomplished a lot.

出海
出海[chū hǎi]（船只）离开停泊地点到海上去；（海员或渔民）驾驶船只到海上去 (of a ship) leave the port for the sea; (of sailors or fishermen) put to sea：出海打鱼 go fishing on the sea

出游
出游[chū yóu] 出去游历 go on a sightseeing tour：出游未归 (of a person) has yet to return from a sightseeing trip

出溜
出溜[chū liu]〈方 dial.〉滑；滑行 slip; slide：脚底下一出溜，摔了一跤 slip and fall他从沙堆上出溜下来。He slipped down the sand dune.这孩子的学习近两个月有点往下出溜。The child's been doing less well in his study the past two months.

出演
出演[chū yǎn] 演出；扮演 perform; act; be cast as：在这出戏里他出演包公。He plays the role of Lord Bao in the play.

出炉
出炉[chū lú] 取出炉内烘烤、冶炼的东西 remove sth. from an oven or furnace：刚出炉的烧饼 freshly baked cakes一号高炉准时出炉。No.1 Blast Furnace began the tapping on time.

出版
出版[chū bǎn] 把书刊、图画等编印出来；把唱片、音像磁带等制作出来 edit and publish books, periodicals, pictures, etc.; produce records, audio and visual tapes, etc.：出版社 press; publishing house出版物 publication那部书已经出版了。That book has been published.录音录像制品由音像出版单位出版。Audio and visual products are published by specialized publishers.

出猎
出猎[chū liè] 出去打猎 go hunting

出现
出现[chū xiàn] 显露出来；产生出来 materialize; come into sight：比赛前半小时运动员已经出现在运动场上了。The athletes appeared on the sports ground half an hour before the competition.近年来出现了许多优秀作品。Many fine works have come to the fore in recent years.

出生
出生[chū shēng] 胎儿从母体中分离出来 (of a baby) come out of its mother's body：出生地 birthplace爷爷1900年出生于北京。Grandpa was born in Beijing in 1900.

出生入死
出生入死[chū shēng rù sǐ] 形容冒着生命危险 brave the risk of one's life; go through thick and thin

出生率
出生率[chū shēng lǜ] 每年出生婴儿数在总人口中所占的比率，通常用千分率来表示 birth rate; ratio of the number of newborn babies in a year to the total population, usu. on a per thousand basis

出界
出界[chū jiè] 越出界线；越过边界 exceed the boundary; cross the border

出盘
出盘[chū pán]〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 出倒 chūdǎo

出示
出示[chū shì]1.拿出来给人看 take sth. out to show others：出示手稿 display one's manuscripts出示乘车月票 show one's metro pass出示黄牌警告 show a yellow card 2.〈书 fml.〉贴出布告 post a bulletin：出示安民 put up a notice to reassure the people

出神
出神[chū shén] 因精神过度集中而发呆 be spellbound because of high concentration：孩子们听故事，听得出了神。The children were totally absorbed in the story.上课的铃声响了，他还对着窗口出神。He was still staring out of the window in a trance, oblivious to the bell for class.

出神入化
出神入化[chū shén rù huà] 形容技艺达到了绝妙的境界 (of skills) reach the acme：这一支曲子演奏得出神入化，听众被深深地吸引住了。The audience was mesmerized by the enchanting performance of the number.

出科
出科[chū kē] 指在科班学戏期满 complete the term of learning or training at a professional theatrical school

出租
出租[chū zū] 收取一定的代价，让别人暂时使用 let; rent out; hire out; give sth. to sb. for temporary use in return for rent：出租图书 rent out books

出租汽车
出租汽车[chū zū qì chē] 供人临时雇用的汽车，多按时间或里程收费 taxi; vehicle for hire, mostly charged by the hour or mileage亦 also 出租车 chūzūchē

出笼
出笼[chū lóng]1.馒头等蒸熟后从笼屉取出 remove buns, etc., from the steamer when they are done 2.〈比喻 fig.〉囤积居奇的货物大量出售，通货膨胀时钞票大量发行。也比喻坏的作品发表或伪劣商品上市等。hoard up goods and subsequently sell them in large quantities; issue a huge amount of banknotes during an inflation; publish a bad work; market shoddy goods

出类拔萃
出类拔萃[chū lèi bá cuì]《孟子·公孙丑》：‘出于其类，拔乎其萃。’后来用‘出类拔萃’形容超出同类之上。 Mencius·Gongsun Chou:‘Be of but above the same kind.’(fig.) excel one's fellow beings;亦 also 出类拔群 chū lèi bá qún 或 or 出群拔萃 chū qún bá cuì

出粜
出粜[chū tiào]卖出（粮食）sell (grain)：把粮食运到外地出粜 transport grain to other places to sell

出纳
出纳[chū nà]1.机关、团体、企业等单位中现金、票据的付出和收进 (of an organization or enterprise) payment and receipt of cash or bills：出纳科 cashier's section 2.担任出纳工作的人 cashier 3.泛指发出和收进的管理工作，如图书馆有出纳台 (in a broad sense) management of loaning and returning, such as the circulation desk in a library

出线
出线[chū xiàn] 在分阶段进行的比赛里，参赛的人员或团体取得参加下一阶段比赛的资格，叫做出线 (of an individual or team) qualify for the next round of competition

出继
出继[chū jì] 过继给别人做儿子 be adopted as a son

出缺
出缺[chū quē] 因原任人员（多指职位较高的）离职或死亡而职位空出来 (oft. of a high post) fall vacant due to resignation or death of the person concerned

出聘
出聘[chū pìn]1. 同 same as 出嫁 chū∥jià：她的闺女去年出聘了。Her daughter got married last year. 2.〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 出使 chūshǐ

出脱
出脱[chū tuō]1.货物卖出 (of merchandise) sell out; get rid of; 同 same as 脱手 tuō∥shǒu ② 2.出落 become prettier：这孩子的模样出脱得更好看了。The child has become even prettier. 3.开脱（罪名）find excuse (for a criminal charge)：他的诡辩不过是自我出脱。He resorted to sophistry in the hope of exonerating himself.

出航
出航[chū háng]（船或飞机）离开港口或机场去航行 (of a ship or plane) set out from a port or airport

出色
出色[chū sè] 特别好；超出一般的 excellent; top-notch; extremely good：表演出色。The performance was superb.他们出色地完成了任务。They have done an extraordinary job.

出芽
出芽[chū yá]1.抽芽 sprout 2.某些低等动物或植物生出芽体 (of certain lower animals or plants) gemmate

出苗
出苗[chū miáo]另见  露苗 lòu∥miáo

出落
出落[chū luo] 青年人（多指女性）的体态、容貌向美好的方面变化 (of young people, esp. females) grow prettier in body shape and looks：半年没见，小妞儿出落得更漂亮了。The little girl has turned even more beautiful since I saw her half a year ago.

出虚恭
出虚恭[chū xū gōng]〈婉辞 euph.〉指放屁 break wind

出蛰
出蛰[chū zhé] 动物结束冬眠，出来活动 (of certain animals) wake up from hibernation and become active

出血
出血[chū xiě]〈方 dial.〉〈比喻 fig.〉拿出钱或拿出东西 give out money or things

出行
出行[chū xíng] 外出；到外地去 take to the road; go to another place：这次出行，跑了不少地方。We've been to quite a few places on this trip.

出言
出言[chū yán] 说出话来 say; speak：出言有章（说话有条理）talk with logic出言不逊（说话不客气）speak impolitely

出警
出警[chū jǐng] 出动警察到案件或事故发生的地方 dispatch policemen to the scene of a crime or accident：巡警及时出警，制止了一场械斗。The police were sent to the scene in time to prevent an armed gang fight.

出让
出让[chū ràng] 不以谋利为目的而卖出（个人自用的东西 of things for one's own use）sell, but not for profit：出让家具 sell one's furniture廉价出让 sell one's stuff at low prices

出访
出访[chū fǎng] 到外国访问 go on a visit abroad：出访欧美 go on a tour of Europe and America

出诊
出诊[chū zhěn] 医生离开医院或诊所到病人家里去给病人治病 (of a doctor) leave the hospital or clinic to see a patient at home; go or make one's rounds

出语
出语[chū yǔ] 说出话语 say; speak：出语惊人 make electrifying remarks

出谋划策
出谋划策[chū móu huà cè] 出主意，定计策 offer advice; work out a strategy

出账
出账[chū zhàng] 把支出的款项登上账簿 enter an item of expenditure in the accounts：这笔开支违反规定，不能出账。We can't enter this payment into the accounts, as it is against the rules.出账[chū zhàng]〈方 dial.〉支出的款项；开支 item of expenditure; expense：这个月出账太多。We've spent too much this month.

出资
出资[chū zī] 拿出钱财 provide funding：这次比赛是由几家企业出资赞助的。The competition was sponsored by several enterprises.

出走
出走[chū zǒu] 被环境逼迫不声张地离开家庭或当地 be forced by circumstances to leave one's home or place of living in secret：仓促出走 leave in haste离家出走 run away from home

出超
出超[chū chāo] 在一定时期（一般为一年）内，对外贸易中出口货物的总值超过进口货物的总值（跟‘入超’相对 as opposed to‘import surplus’）export surplus; situation in which the total value of export surpasses that of import within a certain period (usu. a year)

出路
出路[chū lù]1.通向外面的道路 way out：在森林里迷失方向，找不到出路 lose one's way in a forest 2.〈比喻 fig.〉生存或向前发展的途径；前途 ways and means for survival or making progress; future：另谋出路 find a different way out农业的根本出路在于机械化。Mechanization is the fundamental way out for agriculture. 3.〈比喻 fig.〉销售货物的去处 sales outlet for commodities：品质优良的产品，不愁没有出路。We can always find a market for quality products.

出身
出身[chū shēn]1.指个人早期的经历或由家庭经济情况所决定的身份 one's identity as related to one's early experience or family background, especially financial status：店员出身 be from a shop assistant's family工人家庭出身 come of a worker's stock 2.〈旧时 old〉指做官的最初资历 initial status of an official：翰林出身 begin one's official career as a member of the Imperial Academy赐进士出身 confer the status of palace graduate on sb.

出车
出车[chū chē]开出车辆（载人或运货）drive a vehicle (to transport passengers or cargo)：你出趟车送他们去机场。Please drive them to the airport.

出轨
出轨[chū guǐ]1.（火车、有轨电车等）行驶时脱离轨道 (of a train, tramcar, etc.) derail亦 also 脱轨 tuō∥guǐ 2.〈比喻 fig.〉言语行动出乎常规之外 (of speech and behaviour) improper：这话说得出轨了。What you say goes too far.

出逃
出逃[chū táo]逃出去（脱离家庭或国家）flee (one's home or country)：仓皇出逃 run away in panic; flee helter-skelter离家出逃 escape from home

出道
出道[chū dào] 学徒学艺期满，开始从事某项工作或事业 begin a job or launch a career after completing the term of one's apprenticeship

出镜
出镜[chū jìng] 指在电影或电视中露面 star in a film or a TV drama：青年演员频频出镜，演技提高很快。The young actors and actresses have starred frequently in several films and their acting has rapidly improved.

出门
出门[chū mén]1.（出门儿 chū∥ménr）外出 go out：他刚出门，你等一会儿吧。He's just gone out. Please wait a little while. 2.（出门儿 chū∥ménr）离家远行 leave home for a long journey：出门在外 be away from home出门后时常接到家里来信 receive frequent correspondence from one's family while away from home 3.〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 出嫁 chū∥jià

出门子
出门子[chū mén zi]〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 出嫁 chū∥jià

出阁
出阁[chū gé] 同 same as 出嫁 chū∥jià

出阵
出阵[chū zhèn]1.上战场打仗 go into battle 2.〈比喻 fig.〉参加某种活动 take part in an activity：这场拔河比赛，连退休老人都出阵了。Even retirees joined in the tug-of-war competition.

出院
出院[chū yuàn]（住院病人办理手续后）离开医院 (of an inpatient) be discharged from hospital after going through necessary procedures

出险
出险[chū xiǎn]1.（人）脱离险境 (of a person) escape from a dangerous situation：他一定有办法保护你出险。He's definitely able to come to your rescue. 2.（堤坝等工程）发生危险 (of a dam or other engineering projects) be in peril：加固堤坝，防止出险 reinforce the dam to ensure safety

出面
出面[chū miàn]以个人或集体的名义（做某件事）(do sth.) in the name of a person or collective：这事你出面交涉吧。You can be the negotiator for this matter.由工会出面，组织这次体育比赛。The sports meet was organized under the auspices of the trade union.

出顶
出顶[chū dǐng]〈方 dial.〉指把自己租到的房屋转租给别人 sublease a house or room

出项
出项[chū xiàng] 支出的款项 expenses：这几年家里人多了，出项也增加了不少。With the increase of members in recent years, the family expenditures are also on the rise.

出风头
出风头[chū fēng tou] 出头露面显示自己 show off：他就是爱出风头。He likes to seek the limelight.出够了风头 attract more than enough attention

出饭
出饭[chū fàn] 做出来的饭多 (of rice) rise well when cooked：这种米比别的米出饭。This rice swells larger than other kinds.

出首
出首[chū shǒu]1.检举、告发别人的犯罪行为 report a crime to the authorities 2.自首（多见于早期白话 mostly in early vernacular）turn oneself in

出马
出马[chū mǎ]1.原指将士上阵作战，今多指出头做事 (orig. of officers and men) take to the battlefield; take the lead in doing sth.：老将出马，一个顶俩。A veteran is better than two novices.那件事很重要，非你亲自出马不行。That is a very important matter and you have to attend to it personally. 2.〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 出诊 chū∥zhěn

击
击[jī]（ㄐㄧ）（擊）1.打；敲打 strike; beat：击鼓 beat a drum击掌 applaud; clap one's hands旁敲侧击 make oblique reference to; innuendo 2.攻打 attack：袭击 raid; attack游击 guerrilla warfare声东击西 make a feint to the east but attack in the west 3.碰；接触 contact; touch：冲击 attack; pound against撞击 slam into目击（亲眼看见）witness (see with one's eyes)相关词组搏击 | 侧击 | 冲击 | 出击 | 打击 | 点击 | 反击 | 伏击 | 攻击 | 还击 | 合击 | 轰击 | 回击 | 技击 | 夹击 | 歼击 | 截击 | 进击 | 狙击 | 抗击 | 拦击 | 雷击 | 目击 | 排击 | 炮击 | 抨击 | 钳击 | 枪击 | 拳击 | 闪击 | 射击 | 痛击 | 突击 | 围击 | 袭击 | 邀击 | 要击 | 迎击 | 游击 | 撞击 | 追击 | 阻击 | 冲击波 | 歼击机 | 强击机 | 闪击战 | 游击队 | 游击战 | 打游击 | 打击乐器 | 摩肩击毂 | 声东击西 | 肩摩毂击 | 旁敲侧击 | 无懈可击击败 | 击毙 | 击发 | 击毁 | 击剑 | 击节 | 击溃 | 击落 | 击破 | 击赏 | 击水 | 击掌

击剑
击剑[jī jiàn] 体育运动项目之一，比赛时运动员穿着特制的保护服装，用剑互刺或互劈 swordplay; art or sport event with bouts taking place between two athletes wearing protective gear attacking each other using the sabre, the foil or the epee

击发
击发[jī fā] 射击时用手指扳动扳机 pull the trigger of a gun

击掌
击掌[jī zhǎng]1.拍手 clap one's hands：击掌称好 applaud击掌为号 signal by clapping hands 2.双方相互拍击手掌，表示对所立誓言，永不反悔 (of two persons) clap each other's hands by way of an oath：击掌为盟 clap each other's hands to vow alliance

击毁
击毁[jī huǐ] 击中并摧毁 hit and smash：击毁敌方坦克三辆。Three enemy tanks were destroyed.建筑物被雷电击毁。The building was destroyed by a thunderbolt.

击毙
击毙[jī bì] 打死（多指用枪 oft. with a gun）shoot dead

击水
击水[jī shuǐ]1.拍打水面 pat water surface; (of a swimmer) strike the water with both arms：举翼击水 raise the oars to strike the water surface 2.指游泳 swim

击溃
击溃[jī kuì] 打垮；打散 rout; thrash：击溃敌军一个师 put an enemy division to rout

击破
击破[jī pò] 打垮；打败 crush; defeat：各个击破 defeat (enemy troops, etc.) one at a time

击节
击节[jī jié] 打拍子，表示得意或赞赏 beat time; clap and applaud：击节叹赏（形容对诗文、音乐等的赞赏）show admiration for a poem or a piece of music by clapping one's hands to the rhythm of it

击落
击落[jī luò]打下来（天空的飞机等）down; shoot down (an airplane, etc.)

击败
击败[jī bài] 打败 defeat; beat：击败对手，获得冠军 become the champion after beating one's opponent

击赏
击赏[jī shǎng]〈书 fml.〉击节称赏；赞赏 admire; applaud rhythmically (during a concert or recital)

凼
凼[dàng]（ㄉㄤˋ）（氹）〈方 dial.〉水坑；田地里沤肥的小坑 water hole; compost pit in the fields：水凼 pond粪凼 cesspool相关词组凼肥

凼肥
凼肥[dàng féi] 我国南方把垃圾、树叶、杂草、粪尿等放在坑里沤制成的肥料 wet compost or water-logged compost. In South China, wet compost is made by putting organic waste, leaves, weeds, night soil, etc. into a pool.

函
函[hán]（ㄏㄢˊ）（圅）1.〈书 fml.〉匣；封套 case; casket; envelope：石函 stone casket镜函 dressing case这部《全唐诗》分成十二函。This set of Complete Tang Poetry comes in 12 cases. 2.信件 letter：公函 official letter来函 incoming letter函授 teach by correspondence函购 mail order相关词组便函 | 公函 | 贺函 | 来函 | 书函 | 调函 | 信函 | 修函 | 唁函 | 电子函件函电 | 函告 | 函购 | 函件 | 函授 | 函售 | 函数 | 函索 | 函授教育

函件
函件[hán jiàn] 信件 letter; printed material

函告
函告[hán gào] 用书信告诉 inform by letter：行期如有变化，当及时函告。I shall write to you in time should my date of departure change.

函售
函售[hán shòu] 用通信方式联系的销售 mail order; sales by mail：函售保健品 sell health products by mail order

函授
函授[hán shòu] 以通信辅导为主的教学方式（区别于‘面授’ as compared with‘face-to-face instruction’）correspondence course：函授生 correspondence (or postal) course student函授教材 correspondence textbooks

函授教育
函授教育[hán shòu jiào yù]以通讯方式开展教学的教育。学生以自学函授教材为主，并由函授学校给以辅导和考核。correspondence education; education conducted via correspondence, where students study the correspondence textbooks mainly by themselves while the correspondence school provides tutorship and examinations

函数
函数[hán shù]在某一变化过程中，两个变量 x、y，对于某一范围内的 x 的每一个值，y 都有确定的值和它对应，y 就是 x 的函数。这种关系一般用 y=f(x) 来表示。function; two variables x and y related to each other so that for each value assumed by x there is a value determined for y, and y is called a function of x, usu. expressed in the equation y=f(x)

函电
函电[hán diàn] 信和电报的总称 general term for letter and telegram

函索
函索[hán suǒ]用通信方式索取（宣传品、资料等）request (brochures, ads, etc.) by letter：本公司备有产品说明书，函索即寄。A catalogue of our products is available upon request.

函购
函购[hán gòu] 用通信方式向生产或经营的单位购买 purchase by mail; mail order：函购电视英语教材 purchase TV English textbooks by mail开展函购业务 start a mail-order service

凿
凿1[záo]（ㄗㄠˊ）（鑿）1.凿子 chisel：扁凿 flat chisel; plain chisel圆凿 circular chisel 2.打孔；挖掘 bore a hole; chisel; dig：凿井 dig, sink or bore a well凿一个窟窿 bore a hole凿2[záo]（ㄗㄠˊ）（鑿）（也有读 also pronounced zuò）〈书 fml.〉卯眼 mortise; hole：方枘圆凿 square peg in a round hole; incompatible凿3[záo]（ㄗㄠˊ）（鑿）（也有读 also pronounced zuò）〈书 fml.〉明确；真实 certain; sure; authentic：确凿 irrefutable; beyond doubt相关词组穿凿 | 斧凿 | 开凿 | 确凿 | 枘凿 | 旋凿 | 圆凿方枘 | 方枘圆凿凿空 | 凿枘 | 凿凿 | 凿子 | 凿岩机

凿凿
凿凿[záo záo]（也有读 also pronounced zuòzuò）〈书 fml.〉确切；确实 authentic; reliable; true; certain; verified：言之凿凿 say sth. With certainty凿凿有据 supported by irrefutable evidence

凿子
凿子[záo zi]手工工具，长条形，前端有刃，使用时用重物砸后端。用来挖槽或打孔。chisel; long hand tool with a blade at the front to chamfer or bore a hole by using a hammer to hit its back end

凿岩机
凿岩机[záo yán jī]在岩石中开凿深孔用的风动工具，利用压缩空气做动力使活塞往复运动，冲击钎子。多用于打炮眼。rock drill; charge; tool used to drill holes in rocks, powered by compressed air to make pistons move back and forth, oft. used to make holes for dynamite;亦 also 风钻 fēngzuàn

凿枘
凿枘[záo ruì]（也有读 also pronounced zuòruì）〈书 fml.〉1.凿是卯眼，枘是榫头，凿枘相应 mortise and tenon;〈比喻 fig.〉彼此相合 compatible; in harmony 2.圆凿方枘的略语，比喻格格不入 abbr. for 圆凿方枘 yuán záo fāng ruì; (fig.) incompatible; square peg in a round hole; at variance with each other亦 also 枘凿 ruìzáo

凿空
凿空[záo kōng]（也有读 also pronounced zuòkōng）〈书 fml.〉穿凿 forced; far-fetched; implausible：凿空之论 far-fetched argument; irrelevant talk

刀
刀[dāo]（ㄉㄠ）1.古代兵器，泛指切、割、削、砍、铡的工具,一般用钢铁制成 ancient weapon; generally referring to steel tools for cutting, mowing, hacking or chopping：菜刀 kitchen knife; butcher knife军刀 soldier's sword; sabre铡刀 folder chopper; hand hay cutter铣刀 milling cutter 2.形状像刀的东西 sth. shaped like a knife：冰刀 ice skates双刀电闸 twin-knife main switch; twin-knife master switch 3.〈量词 classifier〉计算纸张的单位，通常一百张为一刀 [unit for counting sheets of paper that entails 100 sheets of paper] 4.(Dāo) 姓 a surname相关词组宝刀 | 冰刀 | 菜刀 | 吃刀 | 刺刀 | 锉刀 | 单刀 | 刮刀 | 光刀 | 火刀 | 尖刀 | 剪刀 | 绞刀 | 戒刀 | 军刀 | 开刀 | 砍刀 | 镰刀 | 麻刀 | 马刀 | 刨刀 | 跑刀 | 劈刀 | 剃刀 | 屠刀 | 瓦刀 | 錾刀 | 铡刀 | 战刀 | 主刀 | 捉刀 | 滚刀肉 | 剪刀差 | 软刀子 | 一刀切 | 保险刀 | 二把刀 | 伽马刀 | 花样刀 | 激光刀 | 螺丝刀 | 指挥刀 | 拔刀相助 | 宝刀不老 | 大刀阔斧 | 单刀直入 | 风刀霜剑 | 借刀杀人 | 牛刀小试 | 一刀两断 | 火海刀山 | 安全剃刀 | 两面三刀 | 笑里藏刀 | 快刀斩乱麻 | 割鸡焉用牛刀 | 磨刀不误砍柴工 | 人为刀俎，我为鱼肉 | 放下屠刀，立地成佛刀背 | 刀笔 | 刀兵 | 刀儿 | 刀锋 | 刀具 | 刀锯 | 刀口 | 刀螂 | 刀片 | 刀枪 | 刀刃 | 刀子 | 刀俎 | 刀把儿 | 刀马旦 | 刀削面 | 刀子嘴 | 刀耕火种 | 刀光剑影 | 刀山火海

刀俎
刀俎[dāo zǔ]〈书 fml.〉刀和砧板 butcher's knife and chopping block;〈比喻 fig.〉宰割者或迫害者 oppressor; persecutor：人为刀俎，我为鱼肉。I am at other people's mercy (like fish or meat on a chopping board).

刀儿
刀儿[dāo r] 小的刀 small knife; pocket knife：小刀儿 small knife剃刀儿 razor铅笔刀儿 pencil sharpener; pen-knife

刀光剑影
刀光剑影[dāo guāng jiàn yǐng] 形容激烈的厮杀、搏斗或杀气腾腾的气势 glint and flash of steel; fierce fighting; under the flashes of knives and the shadows of swords

刀兵
刀兵[dāo bīng] 泛指武器，转指战事 generally refers to weapons or arms; in a roundabout way also refers to fighting or war：动刀兵 resort to arms; resort to force刀兵相见 meet in battle; declare war on sb.; fight each other刀兵之灾 calamities of war

刀具
刀具[dāo jù] 切削工具的统称，包括车刀、铣刀、刨刀、钻头、绞刀等 general term for all cutting tools, including lathe tool, milling cutter, planer, drill bit, reamer, etc.;亦 also 刃具 rènjù

刀刃
刀刃[dāo rèn]（～儿 dāorènr） 同 same as 刀口 dāokǒu ① ②：好钢用在刀刃上 use the best steel to make the best blade; use resources where they are needed most

刀削面
刀削面[dāo xiāo miàn] 一种面食，先用面加水和成较硬的面团，再用刀削成窄而长的面片儿，煮着吃 shaved noodles; after a fairly hard dough is made with wheat flour and water, a knife is used to whittle off strips of it into a pot of boiling water;亦 also 削面 xiāomiàn

刀口
刀口[dāo kǒu]1.刀上用来切削的一边 blade; knife edge; side of a knife used to cut：刀口锋利 sharp edge of a knife 2.〈比喻 fig.〉最能发挥作用的地方 crucial point; right spot; where sth. can be put to best use：钱要花在刀口上。Use your money where it is most needed.把力量用在刀口上。Focus your efforts on the crucial point. 3.动手术或受刀伤时拉开的口子 cut; incision：刀口尚未愈合。The cut hasn't healed yet.

刀子
刀子[dāo zi] 小刀儿 small knife; pocket knife

刀子嘴
刀子嘴[dāo zi zuǐ] 形容说话尖刻，也指说话尖刻的人 sharp tongue; bitter tongue; person with a sharp or bitter tongue

刀山火海
刀山火海[dāo shān huǒ hǎi]〈比喻 fig.〉非常艰险和困难的地方 mountain of swords and sea of flames - most dangerous places; most severe trials;亦 also 火海刀山 huǒ hǎi dāo shān

刀把儿
刀把儿[dāo bà r]1.〈比喻 fig.〉权柄 military power; power 2.〈方 dial.〉〈比喻 fig.〉把柄 evidence against sb.亦 also 刀把子 dāobà·zi

刀枪
刀枪[dāo qiāng] 刀和枪，泛指武器 sword and spear; (in a broad sense) weapons：刀枪剑戟 swords, spears, sabres and halberds刀枪入库，马放南山（形容战争结束，天下太平） with weapons put back in the arsenal and battle horses let out to graze on the hillside (referring to war being over and there being peace throughout the land)

刀片
刀片[dāo piàn]1.装在机械、工具上，用来切削的片状零件 cutter blade; fly bar; sharp flat spare parts set in machines for cutting or paring 2.（刀片儿 dāopiànr）夹在刮脸刀架中刮胡须用的薄钢片 razor blade

刀笔
刀笔[dāo bǐ]〈古代 arch.〉在竹简上记事，用刀子刮去错字，因此把有关公文案卷的事叫做刀笔，后世多指写状子的事（多含贬义 oft. derog.）In ancient times people wrote on bamboo slips and scraped out wrong words with a knife, so documents and files were called‘knife and brush’- the writing of indictments and appeals：刀笔吏 petty official who draws up indictments, etc.; official pettifogger刀笔老手 old hand in drawing up indictments; seasoned pettifogger长于刀笔 good at drawing up indictments and appeals

刀耕火种
刀耕火种[dāo gēng huǒ zhòng] 一种原始的耕种方法，把地上的草木烧成灰做肥料，就地挖坑下种 slash-and-burn cultivation; primitive farming method of burning the grass and plants on the land to use the ashes as fertilizer, digging holes in the ground, and sowing the seeds

刀背
刀背[dāo bèi]（～儿 dāobèir）刀上与刀口相反、不用来切削的一边 opposite side of a knife blade, the side not for cutting; back of a knife

刀螂
刀螂[dāo lang]〈方 dial.〉螳螂 mantis

刀锋
刀锋[dāo fēng] 刀尖；刀刃 point of a knife; knife edge

刀锯
刀锯[dāo jù] 刀和锯，古代的刑具，用于割刑和刖刑。旧时泛指刑罚。 knife and saw; ancient instruments of torture; formerly referring to punishment

刀马旦
刀马旦[dāo mǎ dàn] 戏曲中旦角的一种，扮演熟习武艺的妇女，着重唱、念和做工 (in Chinese opera) the role of warrior woman with emphasis on singing, monologue or dialogue and acting

刁
刁[diāo]（ㄉㄧㄠ）1.狡猾 tricky; artful; sly：放刁 make difficulties for sb.; act in a rascally manner逞刁 act cunningly 2.〈方 dial.〉挑食过分 be picky over food：嘴刁 be picky (or particular) about food 3.(Diāo) 姓 a surname相关词组放刁 | 撒刁 | 嘴刁刁悍 | 刁滑 | 刁难 | 刁顽 | 刁钻

刁悍
刁悍[diāo hàn] 狡猾凶狠 cunning and fierce; crafty and fierce; wicked and ferocious：性情刁悍 be of cunning and fierce disposition

刁滑
刁滑[diāo huá] 狡猾 cunning; guileful; crafty; crooked; insidious

刁钻
刁钻[diāo zuān] 狡猾；奸诈 tricky; cunning; artful; wily; crafty; deceitful; guileful：刁钻古怪 sly and capricious; cranky

刁难
刁难[diāo nàn] 故意使人为难 make things difficult for sb.; deliberately cause trouble for sb.：百般刁难 create all kinds of difficulties; make it hard for sb.; put up innumerable obstacles

刁顽
刁顽[diāo wán] 狡猾顽固 cunning and self-willed

刃
刃[rèn]（ㄖㄣˋ）（刄）1.（刃儿 rènr）刀剪等的锋利部分；刀口 blade：刀刃 blade of a knife这把斧子锩了刃了。This axe has become blunted. 2.刀 knife：利刃 sharp knife白刃战 bayonet fighting 3.〈书 fml.〉用刀杀 kill with a knife or sword：自刃 kill oneself with a knife手刃奸贼 kill a traitor with one's own hand相关词组白刃 | 刀刃 | 利刃 | 白刃战 | 开刃儿 | 迎刃而解 | 游刃有余 | 兵不血刃刃具

刃具
刃具[rèn jù] 同 same as 刀具 dāojù

分
分[fēn]（ㄈㄣ）1.使整体事物变成几部分或使联在一起的事物离开（跟‘合’相对 as opposed to‘join’or‘combine’）divide; separate; split; divide an entirety into several parts：分裂 split; divide; break up分散 scatter; disperse; diffuse分离 separate; sever一个瓜分两半 divide a melon into half 2.分配 assign; distribute; allot：这个工作分给你。This job is assigned to you. 3.辨别 tell; distinguish; differentiate：分清是非 distinguish between right and wrong不分皂白 make no distinction between black and white (or right and wrong) 4.分支；部分 branch (of organization); part：分会 branch (of society, committee, association, etc.)分局 sub-bureau; out-station; minor office第三分册 Book Three 5.分数 fraction：约分 reduce a fraction通分 reduce fractions to a common denominator 6.表示分数 express fractions and percentages：二分之一 one-half; 50 per cent百分之五 five per cent 7.（某些计量单位的）10分之1 one-10th of (certain units of measurement)：分米 decimetre (dm.)分升 decilitre (dl.) 8.计量单位名称 name of unit of measurement (a)长度，10厘等于1分，10分等于1寸 fen, a unit of length (1 fen＝1/3 centimetre or 1/10 cun) (b)地积，10厘等于1分，10分等于1亩 fen, a unit of area (1 fen＝ 1/10 mu) (c)重量，10厘等于1分，10分等于1钱 fen, a unit of weight (1 fen＝ 1/10 qian) (d)货币，10分等于1角 fen, a fractional unit of currency of China (1/10 of jiao) (e)时间，60秒等于1分，60分等于1小时 (of time) minute (＝60 seconds or 1/60 of an hour) (f)弧或角，60秒等于1分，60分等于1度 (of arc or angle) minute (＝60 seconds or 1/60 of a degree) (g)经度或纬度，60秒等于1分，60分等于1度 (of longitude or latitude) minute (＝60 seconds or 1/60 of a degree) (h)利率，年利一分按十分之一计算，月利一分按百分之一计算 of interest rate (1/10 of annual interest rate or 1/100 monthly interest rate) (i)（分儿 fēnr）评定成绩等 mark; point：考试得了一百分 get full marks in the exam这场球赛双方只差几分。There is only a difference of a few points between the two sides in the ball game. 9.〈方 dial.〉指钞票或十元的人民币 bank note; 10-yuan note：捞分（赚钱）make money赚了十张分 earn 10 10-yuan notes另见  fèn分1[fèn]（ㄈㄣˋ）1.成分 component; element：水分 moisture content盐分 salt; salt content养分 nutrient 2.职责、权利等的限度 limit of one's right or obligation：本分 one's duty过分 excessive; too much; go too far恰如其分 appropriate; just right非分之想 excessive ambition or desire 3.情分；情谊 affection; friendly feeling：看在老朋友的分上，原谅他吧。For old friends' sake, please forgive him. 4. 同 same as 份 fèn分2[fèn]（ㄈㄣˋ）〈书 fml.〉料想 expect; think; know：自分不能肩此重任 be well aware of one's inability to shoulder such a heavy responsibility; know one's limits另见  fēn相关词组安分 | 辈分 | 本分 | 比分 | 俵分 | 部分 | 才分 | 成分 | 充分 | 处分 | 春分 | 得分 | 多分 | 非分 | 肥分 | 福分 | 工分 | 股分 | 瓜分 | 过分 | 毫分 | 划分 | 灰分 | 积分 | 记分 | 均分 | 考分 | 亮分 | 林分 | 馏分 | 满分 | 名分 | 判分 | 平分 | 评分 | 情分 | 秋分 | 区分 | 身分 | 生分 | 十分 | 时分 | 食分 | 水分 | 天分 | 通分 | 万分 | 学分 | 盐分 | 养分 | 应分 | 逾分 | 缘分 | 约分 | 职分 | 自分 | 组分 | 八分书 | 百分比 | 百分表 | 百分尺 | 百分点 | 百分号 | 百分率 | 百分数 | 百分制 | 春分点 | 复分解 | 坏分子 | 内分泌 | 千分表 | 千分尺 | 千分点 | 千分数 | 秋分点 | 外分泌 | 五分制 | 小分队 | 十二分 | 安分守己 | 百分之百 | 难分难解 | 平分秋色 | 四分五裂 | 条分缕析 | 争分夺秒 | 定量分析 | 定性分析 | 化学分析 | 积极分子 | 泾渭分明 | 劳燕分飞 | 五马分尸 | 有丝分裂 | 知识分子 | 坐地分赃 | 句子成分 | 恰如其分 | 入木三分 | 有口难分 | 精神分裂症分保 | 分贝 | 分辨 | 分辩 | 分别 | 分兵 | 分布 | 分餐 | 分册 | 分成 | 分爨 | 分寸 | 分担 | 分店 | 分队 | 分发 | 分肥 | 分付 | 分割 | 分隔 | 分工 | 分管 | 分毫 | 分号 | 分红 | 分洪 | 分化 | 分机 | 分际 | 分家 | 分解 | 分界 | 分居 | 分句 | 分开 | 分类 | 分离 | 分力 | 分量 | 分裂 | 分流 | 分馏 | 分袂 | 分泌 | 分蜜 | 分娩 | 分秒 | 分明 | 分母 | 分内 | 分蘖 | 分派 | 分配 | 分片 | 分歧 | 分清 | 分群 | 分润 | 分散 | 分设 | 分身 | 分神 | 分式 | 分手 | 分数 | 分说 | 分摊 | 分头 | 分外 | 分文 | 分析 | 分享 | 分晓 | 分心 | 分野 | 分阴 | 分忧 | 分赃 | 分张 | 分账 | 分针 | 分支 | 分子 | 分节歌 | 分界线 | 分镜头 | 分厘卡 | 分列式 | 分色镜 | 分数线 | 分水岭 | 分税制 | 分析语 | 分至点 | 分子量 | 分子筛 | 分子式 | 分崩离析 | 分道扬镳 | 分斤掰两 | 分门别类 | 分秒必争 | 分庭抗礼 | 分文不取

分享
分享[fēn xiǎng]和别人分着享受（欢乐、幸福、好处等）share (joy, happiness, benefit, etc.); partake of：晚会中老师也分享着孩子们的欢乐。At the evening party the teacher also shared in the joy of the children.

分付
分付[fēn fù] 同 same as 吩咐 fēn·fù

分保
分保[fēn bǎo] 再保险 re-insurance

分兵
分兵[fēn bīng] 分开或分散兵力 separate or disperse armed forces：分兵而进 divide troops into separate advancing columns分兵把守要隘 divide one's forces to defend strategic passes

分内
分内[fèn nèi] 本分以内 (within) one's job or duty：关心学生是教师分内的事。It is a teacher's duty to care about the students.

分册
分册[fēn cè] 一部篇幅较大的书，按内容分成若干本，每一本叫一个分册 fascicle; long book published in separate parts according to content

分列式
分列式[fēn liè shì] 军队等按照不同的兵种或编制排列成一定的队形，依次走正步、行注目礼通过检阅台，这种队形叫分列式 march past; pass in view; ceremonial march; (of troops, etc.) formations of different military branches or units marching in parade step and saluting with the eyes when passing the reviewing stand

分别
分别1[fēn bié] 离别 part; leave; bid farewell：暂时分别，不久就能见面。It's only a temporary separation. We'll soon meet again.他们分别了好多年啦。They have been parted for years.分别2[fēn bié]1.辨别 distinguish; differentiate：分别是非 distinguish between right and wrong分别轻重缓急 set priorities 2.不同 difference：分别对待 handle each case on its own merits分别处理 treat differently看不出有什么分别。No difference is visible. 3.分头；各自 respectively; separately：会议商定，几个人分别去做动员工作。At the meeting they agreed to fan out and mobilize the people in their respective places.部队到达前沿，分别进入阵地。The troops have each taken up their respective posts after reaching the front.

分割
分割[fēn gē] 把整体或有联系的东西分开 separate; (of a whole or of related aspects) cut apart; carve up; break up：民主和集中这两方面，任何时候都不能分割开。Democracy and centralism should never be separated from each other.

分力
分力[fēn lì] 几个力同时对某物体的作用和另外一个力对该物体的作用效果相同，这几个力就是那一个力的分力 component. When the effect of several forces on an object is the same as that of one other single force, the former are the components of the latter.

分化
分化[fēn huà]1.性质相同的事物变成性质不同的事物；统一的事物变成分裂的事物 (of similar or integrated matters) break up; split up：两极分化 polarization; division (of a group, society, etc.) into two opposite extremes有些字，古代本是一个，由于后来加上了不同的偏旁，就分化成几个。There are some characters which were one and the same in ancient times, but later evolved into several different forms as different radicals were added. 2.使分化 divide：分化瓦解 disintegrate; split分化敌人 split and demoralize the enemy (forces) 3.在生物个体发育的过程中，细胞向不同的方向发展，在构造和机能上，由一般变为特殊的现象，例如胚胎时期的某些细胞分化成为肌细胞，另一些细胞分化成为结缔组织 (of cells) differentiate; develop in different orientations by changing from general to special structures and functions during an organism's development. For example, in the embryo, some cells differentiate into muscle cells and others into connective tissue.

分厘卡
分厘卡[fēn lí kǎ]另见  百分尺 bǎifēnchǐ

分发
分发[fēn fā]1.一个个地发给 distribute; hand out; issue (to individuals)：分发慰问品 distribute gifts of appreciation; distribute relief materials 2.分派（人员到工作岗位）assign (to post); appoint (to job)

分句
分句[fēn jù]语法上指复句里划分出来的相当于单句的部分。分句和分句之间一般有停顿，在书面上用逗号或者分号表示。分句和分句在意义上有一定的联系，常用一些关联词语（连词、有关联作用的副词或词组）来连接，如：天晴了，雪也化了。clause; part of a compound sentence equivalent to a simple sentence usu. divided by a pause indicated by a comma or semicolon. Clauses in a sentence are associated in meaning and oft. linked by connectives (conjunctions, adverbs or phrases with connective functions), e.g.‘The sky cleared, and the snow melted away.’另见  复句 fùjù

分号
分号1[fēn hào] 标点符号(；)，表示一句话中间并列分句之间的停顿 semi-colon; punctuation mark (;) marking the pause between coordinate clauses of a sentence分号2[fēn hào] 分店 branch (of a shop, etc.)：本店只此一家，别无分号。We have only this shop and no branches.

分外
分外[fèn wài]1.超过平常；特别 especially; particularly：分外高兴 particularly happy月到中秋分外明。The moon at the Mid-autumn Festival is especially bright. 2.本分以外 beyond one's duty or job; beyond one's due：他从来不把帮助别人看做分外的事。He never thinks helping others is too much for him.

分头
分头1[fēn tóu]若干人分几个方面（进行工作）handle separately by several people：分头办理 handle separately大家分头去准备。Everyone made their separate preparations.分头2[fēn tóu] 短头发向两边分开梳的式样 hairstyle with a part：他留着分头。He has parted hair.

分娩
分娩[fēn miǎn]1.生小孩儿 childbirth; delivery; labour; parturition 2.生幼畜 (of animals) give birth

分子
分子[fēn zǐ]1.另见  分数 fēnshù ②; 2.物质中能够独立存在并保持本物质一切化学性质的最小微粒，由原子组成 molecule; the smallest independent unit of matter that retains its chemical properties, made up of atoms另见  fènzǐ分子[fèn zǐ] 属于一定阶级、阶层、集团或具有某种特征的人 person belonging to a class, stratum, group, or showing certain characteristics：资产阶级分子 bourgeois element知识分子 intellectual; educated person; intelligentsia积极分子 activist; active member另见  fēnzǐ

分子式
分子式[fēn zǐ shì]用元素符号表示物质分子组成的式子，如水的分子式是H?O，氧的分子式是O? molecular formula; chemical formula denoting molecular composition, written with chemical element symbols, e.g. molecular formula for water is H?O and oxygen, O?

分子筛
分子筛[fēn zǐ shāi]用吸附性很强的物质（如硅铝酸盐）塑成的物体。具有许多孔径大小均一的微孔，能有选择地吸附某种小于孔径的分子。用于液体和气体的干燥、分离、净化。molecular sieve; made of a strong absorbent with tiny pores (e.g. siallitic acid salt), which can selectively absorb smaller molecules; used in drying, separation and purification of liquids and gases

分子量
分子量[fēn zǐ liàng]分子的相对质量。是一个分子中各原子的原子量的总和，如水(H?O)的分子量约为18，氢(H?)的分子量约为2。molecular weight; molecular mass. The sum weight of all atoms of a molecule; e.g. the molecular weight of H?O is 18, of hydrogen, 2.

分家
分家[fēn jiā]1.原来在一起生活的亲属把共有的家产分了，各自成家过活 (of family members, usu. grown-up and married children) divide up family property to live apart：分家单过 split the family property and live apart 2.泛指一个整体分开 (of an entirety) split up; break up：鞋底和鞋帮分了家。The shoe sole and upper have separated.

分寸
分寸[fēn cun] 说话或做事的适当限度 proper limits for speech or action; sense of appropriateness：有分寸 have a sense of propriety没分寸 have no sense of propriety注意说话的分寸 pay attention to the appropriateness of speech

分居
分居[fēn jū] 一家人分开生活 separated; (of married couple) live apart：分居另过 live separated他们夫妻两地分居。The husband and wife live in two separate places.

分崩离析
分崩离析[fēn bēng lí xī] 形容集团、国家等分裂瓦解 (of a group, country, etc.) disintegrate; crumble; come or fall apart

分工
分工[fēn gōng] 分别从事各种不同而又互相补充的工作 engage in different but related work：社会分工 social division of labour分工合作 share the work and help one another; divide the work and cooperate他分工抓生产。He is responsible for production.这几件事，咱们分分工吧。Let's divide up these tasks.

分布
分布[fēn bù]散布（在一定的地区内）be distributed (over an area)：人口分布图 map of population distribution商业网点分布得不均匀。The commercial outlets are unevenly distributed.

分店
分店[fēn diàn] 一个商店分设的店 branch of (a shop)：这家商行去年又开设了两家分店。The trading company established two branches last year.

分庭抗礼
分庭抗礼[fēn tíng kàng lǐ]原指宾主相见，站在庭院的两边，相对行礼。现在用来比喻平起平坐，互相对立。host and guest salute each other from opposite sides of the courtyard; (oft. fig.) stand up to sb. as an equal; make rival claims as an equal

分开
分开[fēn kāi]1.人或事物不聚在一起 (of persons or things) be apart; part：弟兄两人分开已经三年了。The two brothers have been separated for three years.这些问题是彼此分开而又联系着的。These problems are separate yet also linked. 2.使分开 (cause to) separate or part：老赵用手分开人群，挤到台前。Separating the crowd with his hands, Old Zhao pushed his way to the platform.这两件事要分开解决。The two matters should be resolved separately.

分式
分式[fēn shì]有除法运算，而且除式中含有字母的有理式。如1/x，a/(b-c2 )。fraction; rational expression of a fraction containing letters, such as 1/x and a/(b-c2 )

分张
分张[fēn zhāng]〈书 fml.〉分手；离别 part company; bid farewell; take leave

分心
分心[fēn xīn]1.分散注意力；不专心 divert or distract one's attention：孩子的功课叫家长分心。Parents are distracted by their children's schoolwork. 2.费心 claim attention：分心劳神 tax one's mind这件事您多分心吧。May I trouble you to attend to this matter?

分忧
分忧[fēn yōu] 分担别人的忧虑；帮助别人解决困难 share sb.'s worries; help solve difficult problems：分忧解愁 share and reduce sb.'s worries为国分忧 do one's bit for the country in times of trouble or crisis

分成
分成[fēn chéng]（～儿 fēn∥chéngr）按成数分钱财、物品等 (money, property, goods, etc.) share; divide into tenths：四六分成 split 10 into four and six三七分成 split 10 into three and seven

分手
分手[fēn shǒu] 别离；分开 part; part company; say goodbye：我要往北走了，咱们在这儿分手吧。I'm heading north so let's say goodbye here.他们两人合不到一起，早分了手。They did not get along and parted long ago.

分担
分担[fēn dān] 担负一部分 share (part of sth.)：分担任务 share a task分担责任 share responsibility for

分摊
分摊[fēn tān]分担（费用）(of expenses) share; apportion：聚餐的钱，大家分摊。The cost of the dinner will be shared between us.

分支
分支[fēn zhī] 从一个系统或主体中分出来的部分 branch (of a system or main body)：分支机构 branch; affiliate; affiliated agency

分散
分散[fēn sàn]1.散在各处；不集中 scatter; decentralize：分散活动 carry out individual (or small group) operations; act on one's own山村的人家住得很分散。Families of mountain villages live far scattered. 2.使分散 disperse; divert：分散注意力 distract (or divert) one's attention 3.散发；分发 distribute; hand out：分散传单 distribute leaflets

分数
分数[fēn shù]1.评定成绩或胜负时所记的分儿的数字 mark; grade; score; number recorded when grading, or determining winning or loss：三门功课的平均分数是87分。The average mark for the three subjects is 87.鞍马，他得的分数是9.5分。He got 9.5 for the pommel horse. 2.把一个单位分成若干等份，表示其中的一份或几份的数，是除法的一种书写形式，如2/5（读作五分之二），23 /?（读作二又七分之三）。在分数中，符号‘-’叫做分数线，相当于除号；分数线上面的数叫做分子，相当于被除数，如2/5中的2；分数线下面的数叫做分母，相当于除数，如2/5中的5。fraction; number expressing one or several parts of a unit; a way of writing the operation of division (e.g. 2/5 and 23 /?). In a fraction, the symbol‘-’is called the fraction line, equivalent to a division sign; the number above it, the numerator, equivalent to a dividend (e.g. 2 in 2/5); the number below it, the denominator, equivalent to a divisor (e.g. 5 in 2/5).

分数线
分数线[fēn shù xiàn]1.另见  分数 fēnshù ②; 2.考生被录取的最低分数标准 bottom or minimum mark for enrolment：他的考试成绩超过了本市录取分数线。His marks for the examination are higher than the minimum for enrolment set by the city.

分文
分文[fēn wén] 指很少的钱 little money：分文不值 worthless; not worth a farthing身无分文 penniless分文不取 gratis; free of charge

分文不取
分文不取[fēn wén bù qǔ] 一个钱也不要（多指应给的报酬或应收的费用 usu. of due reward or charges）gratis; not take or charge a single cent：我要是治不好你的病，分文不取。I will not charge you a cent if I cannot cure your disease.

分斤掰两
分斤掰两[fēn jīn bāi liǎng]〈比喻 fig.〉过分计较小事 be over-concerned with minor matters

分明
分明[fēn míng]1.清楚 clear; obvious：黑白分明 as clear as black and white爱憎分明 know what to love and what to hate; be clear whom to love and whom to hate 2.明明；显然 obviously; clearly; evidently：他分明朝你来的方向去的，你怎么没有看见他？He was clearly walking towards you, how come you didn't see him?

分晓
分晓[fēn xiǎo]1.事情的底细或结果（多用于‘见’后 oft. used after 见 jiàn see）outcome; result; solution：究竟谁是冠军，明天就见分晓。We'll see who is the champion after tomorrow's results. 2.明白；清楚 see or understand clearly：问个分晓 make thorough enquiries; find out the whys and wherefores of sth.且看下图，便可分晓。Look at the diagram below and you'll understand everything. 3.道理（多用于否定式 usu. used in the negative）reason：没分晓的话 unreasonable remark这个人好没分晓，信口乱说。This person is really unreasonable and talks irresponsibly.

分机
分机[fēn jī] 需通过总机才能接通电话的通话装置 (telephone) extension; subsidiary telephone that gets into connection through a switchboard

分析
分析[fēn xī]把一件事物、一种现象、一个概念分成较简单的组成部分，找出这些部分的本质属性和彼此之间的关系（跟‘综合’相对 as opposed to‘summarize’）analyse; separate a matter, phenomenon or concept into simple constituent parts to identify their basic properties and links：化学分析 chemical analysis分析问题 analyse problems; reason things out分析目前国际形势 analyse (or size up) the current international situation

分析语
分析语[fēn xī yǔ]语言学上指词与词间的语法关系主要不是靠词本身的形态变化，而是靠词序、虚词等来表示的语言。一般认为汉语是典型的分析语。(linguis.) analytical language; language where grammatical relations are expressed by word order or function words, instead of changes to the word form. Chinese is commonly regarded as a typical analytical language.

分歧
分歧[fēn qí]（思想、意见、记载等）不一致；有差别 (of ideas, opinions, records, etc.) difference; divergence; dispute：分歧点 difference; point of divergence理论分歧 theoretical difference消除分歧 eliminate (or iron out) differences

分母
分母[fēn mǔ]另见  分数 fēnshù ②

分毫
分毫[fēn háo] 指很少的数量；些微 fraction; iota; of little quantity：分毫不爽 be correct in every detail不差分毫 without an iota of discrepancy

分水岭
分水岭[fēn shuǐ lǐng]1.两个流域分界的山脊或高原 watershed; divide; ridge or high plateau dividing two drainage areas亦 also 分水线 fēnshuǐxiàn 2.〈比喻 fig.〉不同事物的主要分界 major dividing line between different things

分泌
分泌[fēn mì]1.从生物体的某些细胞、组织或器官里产生出某种物质。如胃分泌胃液，花分泌花蜜，病菌分泌毒素等。secrete; production of a substance in certain cells, tissues or organs of an organism, e.g. stomach secreting gastric juices, flowers secreting nectar and germs secreting toxins, etc. 2.岩石中的裂隙逐渐被流动的矿物溶液填满。也指这样形成的矿物。(of cracks in rocks) gradually fill up with liquefied minerals; minerals thus formed

分洪
分洪[fēn hóng] 为了使某些地区不遭受洪水灾害，在上游适宜地点，把一部分洪水引入别的地方，这种措施叫做分洪 flood diversion; divert some of the flood waters at certain sites on the upper reaches of a river so that areas lower down will not be devastated

分派
分派[fēn pài]1.分别指定人去完成工作或任务 assign work, task：分派专人负责 assign a specific person to take charge 2.指定分摊；摊派 apportion (money); share (expenses)：这次旅游的费用，由参加的人分派。The expenses for this trip will be shared among the participants.

分流
分流[fēn liú]1.从干流中分出一股或几股水流注入另外的河流或单独入海 distributary; split-flow; one or several streams flowing away from the mainstream into another river or separately into the sea 2.（人员、车辆等）分别向不同的道路、方向流动 diversion; (of crowds and vehicles) split flow：人车分流 diversion of pedestrians and vehicles消费资金分流 split-flows of consumption funds

分润
分润[fēn rùn]分享利益（多指金钱 usu. of money）share the profits or benefits

分清
分清[fēn qīng] 分辨清楚 distinguish; draw a clear distinction between：分清是非 distinguish between right and wrong一片汪洋，分不清哪是天哪是水。In the wide expanse the sky is indistinguishable from the water.

分爨
分爨[fēn cuàn]〈书 fml.〉分家过日子 (of brothers) divide family property and live apart：兄弟分爨。The brothers live separately.

分片
分片[fēn piàn]（～儿 fēn∥piànr）根据工作需要，把较大的地区或范围划分成若干小的区域或范围 divide a large area or task into several smaller ones in accordance with the work requirements：分片包干 sub-divide the task and assign a part to each (individual or group)

分界
分界[fēn jiè] 划分界限 demarcate; have as the boundary：分界线 boundary; line of demarcation河北省和辽宁省在山海关分界。Hebei and Liaoning provinces are demarcated by Shanhai Pass.分界[fēn jiè] 划分的界线 dividing line; line of demarcation：赤道是南半球和北半球的分界。The equator is the dividing line between the northern and southern hemispheres.

分界线
分界线[fēn jiè xiàn]1.划分开地区的界线 boundary; line of demarcation：过了河北河南两省的分界线，就进入了豫北。After crossing the boundary between Hebei and Henan provinces, you will enter the northern part of Henan Province. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉界限 bound; dividing line; demarcation line：是非的分界线不容混淆。Confusing right and wrong is inexcusable.

分神
分神[fēn shén] 分心 divert one's attention; be distracted：要集中注意力，不要分神。Please focus, and not get distracted.那本书请您分神去找一找，我们等着用。Would you please help find the book? We are waiting to use it.

分离
分离[fēn lí]1.分开 separate; sever：理论与实践是不可分离的。Theory and practice are inseparable.从空气中分离出氮气来 separate nitrogen from air 2.别离 leave; part：分离了多年的兄弟又重逢了。The brothers met again after years of separation.

分秒
分秒[fēn miǎo] 一分一秒。指极短的时间 minute and second; very short time：分秒必争 seize every minute and second; not a second to be lost时间不饶人，分秒赛黄金。Time flies! Time is money.

分秒必争
分秒必争[fēn miǎo bì zhēng] 一点儿时间也不放松 seize every minute and second; not a second to be lost

分税制
分税制[fēn shuì zhì] 根据中央政府和地方政府的职能和事权范围，按税种、税源将全部税收划分为中央税、地方税和中央地方共享税的制度 system of tax division; system of dividing revenues from taxes between the central and local governments according to their respective functions and administrative scopes. Taxes are designated according to type and source into central taxes, local taxes, as well as taxes shared by a locality and the central authorities.

分管
分管[fēn guǎn]分工管理（某方面工作）be in charge of; assume personal responsibility for (specific job)：他分管农业。He is in charge of agriculture.这是老张分管的地段。This area is Old Zhang's responsibility.

分类
分类[fēn lèi] 根据事物的特点分别归类 sort out or classify things according to their characteristics：图书分类法 classification of books把文件分类存档。File the documents under different classifications.

分红
分红[fēn hóng]1.指人民公社时期社员定期分配工分值 (in the people's communes) periodical distribution of the cash value of workpoints to commune members 2.企业分配盈余或利润 (of an enterprise) share surplus or profits; distribute bonuses：年终分红 distribute the year-end bonus按股分红 dividends on share; pay dividends to shareholders

分群
分群[fēn qún] 养蜂业中指新的母蜂产生后两三天内，旧的母蜂和一部分工蜂离开原来的蜂巢，到另一个地方组成新的蜂群 (apiculture) hive off; swarm to form a subcolony - the old queen bee and a number of worker bees leaving the original hive to form a new colony somewhere else two or three days after a new queen bee hatches

分肥
分肥[fēn féi]分取利益（一般指不正当的）share ill-gotten gains; divide booty

分至点
分至点[fēn zhì diǎn] 春分点、秋分点、夏至点、冬至点的合称 general term for the Vernal Equinox, Autumnal Equinox, Summer Solstice and Winter Solstice

分色镜
分色镜[fēn sè jìng] 一种专用镜片，能反射某种色光，而透过其他色光 colour selective lens; special lens which reflects a certain colour and allows the other colours through

分节歌
分节歌[fēn jié gē]指用几段歌词配同一曲调的歌曲。各段歌词在字数、韵律方面大致相同。民歌和群众歌曲中常见，如《兰花花》、《绣金匾》、《三大纪律八项注意》等。folk or popular song with several verses set to the same melody, each verse having a similar number of characters and a similar rhyme scheme, e.g. Lan Huahua, Embroidering a Silk Banner with Golden Thread, Three Main Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention, etc.

分蘖
分蘖[fēn niè]稻、麦、甘蔗等植物发育的时候，在幼苗靠近土壤的部分生出分枝。有的地区叫发棵。tiller; (of plants such as rice, wheat, sugarcane, etc.) grow lateral shoots from the base of the stem during its development; also called 发棵 fākē in some places

分蜜
分蜜[fēn mì] 制糖的一道工序，把熬出来的糖膏里的糖蜜和糖的结晶分离开 extraction of molasses and crystallized sugar from massecuite, a process of sugar production

分袂
分袂[fēn mèi]〈书 fml.〉离别；分手 part; bid farewell to each other

分裂
分裂[fēn liè]1.整体的事物分开 (of a whole) division; fission：细胞分裂 cell division 2.使整体的事物分开 split; divide; break up：分裂组织 split an organization

分解
分解[fēn jiě]1.一个整体分成它的各个组成部分，例如物理学上力的分解，数学上因式的分解等 (of a whole) separate into parts; break up; break down, e.g. in physics resolution of force, in mathematics, resolve into factors 2.一种物质经过化学反应而生成两种或两种以上其他物质，如碳酸钙加热分解成氧化钙和二氧化碳 decompose; resolve; break up; split; (of a substance) break up into two or more substances through chemical reaction. For example, when heated, calcium carbonate breaks up into calcium oxide and carbon dioxide. 3.排解（纠纷）；调解 mediate; make peace：难以分解 difficult to mediate让他替你们分解分解。Let him help you sort things out. 4.分化瓦解 disintegrate：做好各项工作，促使敌人内部分解。We should do everything to hasten the enemy's disintegration from within. 5.解说；分辩 recount; disclose; defend oneself：且听下回分解（章回小说用语）will be disclosed in the following chapter (an expression used in novels in which chapter division is a required formality)不容他分解，就把他拉走了。He was allowed no explanation before being taken away.

分设
分设[fēn shè] 分别设置 set up or establish as separate units：局下面分设三个处。The bureau has three departments under it.

分说
分说[fēn shuō]分辩（多用在‘不容、不由’等否定语之后 usu. used in the negative, following negative expressions such as 不容 bùróng not allow, 不由 bùyóu not tolerate, etc.）defend oneself (against a charge)

分贝
分贝[fēn bèi]计量声音强度或电功率相对大小的单位，它的数值等于音强或功率比值的常用对数的10倍。当选定一个基准音强或功率时，分贝数也表示音强或功率的绝对大小。decibel (db); unit of measurement for the relative intensity of sound or electric power, equivalent to 10 times the common logarithm of the ratio of sound intensity or power. Relative to a base intensity of sound or electric power, the decibel count also indicates the absolute value of the sound intensity or electric power.

分账
分账[fēn zhàng] 按照一定比例分钱财 divide money according to a set ratio：三七分账 divide the money 3 to 7

分赃
分赃[fēn zāng]1.分取赃款赃物 divide the spoils; share the booty or loot：坐地分赃 take a share of the spoils without participating in the crime 2.〈比喻 fig.〉分取不正当的权利或利益 get a share of ill-gotten power or gains

分身
分身[fēn shēn]抽出时间去照顾其他方面（多用于否定式 usu. with a negative）spare time (from one's main work to attend to sth. else)：难以分身 hard to be in two places at once无法分身 cannot attend to many things at the same time一直想去看看您，可总是分不开身。I have been thinking of coming to see you, but couldn't find the time.

分辨
分辨[fēn biàn] 辨别 distinguish; differentiate：分辨香花和毒草 distinguish fragrant flowers from poisonous weeds天下着大雨，连方向也分辨不清了。The rain is so heavy; it's hard to see where we are going.

分辩
分辩[fēn biàn] 辩白 defend oneself (against a charge); offer an explanation：证据俱在，无需分辩。The evidence is all here; no excuse is acceptable.他们说什么就是什么，我不想分辩。They can say what they like; I will not argue.

分道扬镳
分道扬镳[fēn dào yáng biāo] 指分道而行 separate and go different ways；〈比喻 fig.〉因目标不同而各奔各的前程或各干各的事情 each going his own way or doing his own business because of different objectives

分配
分配[fēn pèi]1.按一定的标准或规定分（东西）distribute; allocate; allot sth. according to certain criteria：分配宿舍 allot dormitories分配劳动果实 distribute the fruits of labour 2.安排；分派 assign：服从组织分配 accept an organizational assignment合理分配劳动力 rational disposition of manpower 3.经济学上指把生产资料分给生产单位或把消费资料分给消费者。分配的方式决定于社会制度。mode of distribution or allocation of means of production to production units, or means of consumption to consumers, which is determined by the social system

分野
分野[fēn yě] 划分的范围 dividing line; line of demarcation; 同 same as 界限 jièxiàn ①：政治分野 political dividing line思想分野 ideological dividing line

分量
分量[fèn liàng] 重量 weight：这个南瓜的分量不下二十斤。This pumpkin weighs at least 20 jin.话说得很有分量。These words carry weight.

分针
分针[fēn zhēn] 钟表上指示分数的指针，比时针长 minute hand (of watch or clock, longer than the hour hand)

分镜头
分镜头[fēn jìng tóu] 导演将整个影片或电视片的内容按景别、摄法、对话、音乐、镜头长度等分切成许多准备拍摄的镜头，称为分镜头 storyboard; (of a director) cut film or TV play into many sequences according to different scenes, filming methods, dialogues, music, length of shot, etc.

分门别类
分门别类[fēn mén bié lèi] 根据事物的特性分成各种门类 separate into different categories according to certain properties：把收集的标本分门别类地摆列起来 separate and classify a collection of samples

分队
分队[fēn duì] 一般指军队中相当于营到班一级的组织 detachment; troop unit corresponding to a level from platoon to squad

分阴
分阴[fēn yīn] 日影移动一分的时间。指极短的时间 time it takes for the shadow cast by the sun to move one fen; very short time：惜分阴 treasure every second

分际
分际[fèn jì]1.合适的界限；分寸 proper limits; sense of propriety：说话做事严守分际 strictly observe the proper limits of speech and action 2.地步 condition; extent; state：想不到他竟胡涂到这个分际。I can't believe he can be so muddle-headed.

分隔
分隔[fēn gé] 在中间隔断 separate; partition：夫妻分隔两地。Husband and wife live separately in two places.垒了一道墙，把一间房子分隔成两间。The room was partitioned into two by a wall.

分餐
分餐[fēn cān]1.集体吃饭的时候，把菜肴分开吃 meal served individually; (when a group of people eat together) each person has a separate portion of food (instead of sharing from common dishes)：我因为有病，跟家里人分餐。Because I am ill, I have my own separate portions at family meal time. 2.指把菜肴分开吃的吃饭方式 sharing a meal by dividing the dishes among the eaters：吃分餐 eat individual portions

分馏
分馏[fēn liú] 液体中含有几种挥发性不同的物质时，蒸馏液体，使它所含的成分互相分离 fractionation; fractional distillation; separation of a liquid containing several substances with different volatility into ingredients by distillation：分馏石油可以得到汽油、煤油等。Gasoline and kerosene can be obtained through the fractionation of oil.

切
切[qiē]（ㄑㄧㄝ）1.用刀把物品分成若干部分 cut; slice; chop; divide a thing into several parts with a knife：把瓜切开 slice up a melon把肉切成肉丝儿 shred meat切断敌军退路 cut off the enemy's retreat 2.直线、圆或面等与圆、弧或球只有一个交点时叫做切 tangency; contact at a single point of a straight line, circle or plane, etc., with a circle, arc or sphere另见  qiè切[qiè]（ㄑㄧㄝˋ）1.合；符合 correspond to; conform to or with; accord with：文章切题。The article keeps to the point.说话不切实际 unrealistic or impractical speech; one's talk does not correspond to reality 2.贴近；亲近 close to; warm：切身 of immediate concern or interest to oneself亲切 warm; kind; affectionate 3.急切；殷切 eager; keen; anxious：迫切 urgent; pressing; imperative; compelling恳切 sincere and earnest回国心切 eager to be home; anxious to return to one's native land 4.切实；务必 must; have to：切记 be sure to remember切忌 avoid by all means切不可骄傲。One must not be conceited. 5.用在反切后头，表示前两字是注音用的反切。如‘塑，桑故切’。 used after 反切 fǎnqiè, a Chinese way of pronunciation in which two preceding characters indicate the pronunciation of a given character (e.g. the pronunciation of 塑 sù is indicated as 桑故切 sāng gù qiè, i.e., the combination of the consonant s in 桑 sāng and the vowel u in 故 gù )另见  反切 fǎnqiè另见  qiē相关词组哀切 | 悲切 | 操切 | 反切 | 关切 | 激切 | 急切 | 恳切 | 密切 | 迫切 | 凄切 | 綦切 | 亲切 | 清切 | 确切 | 热切 | 深切 | 贴切 | 痛切 | 心切 | 一切 | 殷切 | 余切 | 真切 | 正切 | 一刀切 | 咬牙切齿 | 目空一切 | 望闻问切切齿 | 切除 | 切磋 | 切当 | 切点 | 切割 | 切合 | 切花 | 切换 | 切汇 | 切记 | 切忌 | 切近 | 切口 | 切脉 | 切面 | 切末 | 切片 | 切切 | 切入 | 切身 | 切实 | 切题 | 切线 | 切削 | 切要 | 切音 | 切中 | 切磋琢磨 | 切肤之痛 | 切骨之仇

切中
切中[qiè zhòng]（言论或办法）正好击中（某种弊病） hit (the mark); (of an opinion or a method) happen to hit (some vulnerable point)：切中要害 strike home; hit the nail on the head; hit the mark切中时弊 strike hard at current social evils; criticize the ills of society sharply

切入
切入[qiē rù]（从某个地方）深入进去 go deep into; penetrate：切入点 penetration point写到这里，文章已切入正题。By this paragraph, the article comes straight to the main theme.

切切
切切[qiè qiè]1.千万；务必（多用于书信中 used mostly in letters）be sure to; must (do)：切切不可忘记 be sure not to forget 2.用于布告、条令等末尾，表示叮咛 used at the end of a public notice, regulation, etc., to express exhortation or warning：切切此布。This notice is to be regarded in all seriousness. 3.恳切；迫切 eagerly; earnestly; imperatively：切切请求 request earnestly 4. 同 same as 窃窃 qièqiè ①

切削
切削[qiē xiāo] 利用机床的刀具或砂轮等削去作件的一部分，使作件具有一定形状、尺寸和表面光洁度 cut; cutting; cut a part of sth. with the cutting tool, grinding wheel, etc., of a machine tool to make a regular shape and size and a smooth finish

切割
切割[qiē gē]1.用刀等把物品截断 cut; carve up; cut off sth. using a knife 2.利用机床切断或利用火焰、电弧烧断金属材料 cut; cut through metal objects using a machine tool, flame or electric arc亦 also 割切 gēqiē

切口
切口[qiē kǒu] 书页裁切一边的空白处 margin; blank space on the cut side of a book page另见  qièkǒu切口[qiè kǒu] 帮会或某些行业中的暗语 jargon; cant; password; secret language of underground gangs or some trades另见  qiēkǒu

切合
切合[qiè hé] 十分符合 suit; fit in with; correspond to; accord with：切合实际 fit in with the reality; be practical; suit the actual condition of

切实
切实[qiè shí] 切合实际；实实在在 down-to-earth; practical; realistic; in earnest：切实可行 feasible; workable; realistic or practical切实改正 correct (one's mistakes) in real earnest切切实实地做好工作 do one's job in a down-to-earth way

切当
切当[qiè dàng] 恰当 suitable; proper; appropriate; to the point：用词切当 use a proper word; use the right word in the right place; be properly worded

切忌
切忌[qiè jì] 切实避免或防止 must guard against; avoid by all means; must not do in any circumstance：切忌滋长骄傲情绪。Be careful to avoid becoming conceited.

切换
切换[qiē huàn] 影片、电视片等从某一镜头或画面迅速转换到另一镜头或画面，也泛指转换 cut; make a sudden shift from one scene or frame to another in a film, TV, etc.; (in a broad sense) shift：这部影片采取同期录音，现场切换镜头的方法摄制。This film was shot through synchronized recording and on-the-spot cutting.股市在调整中完成热点的切换。The stock market completed the shift of its hot spots in the course of its readjustment.

切末
切末[qiè mo]戏曲舞台上所用的简单布景和大小道具。名称起于元曲，原作砌末。simple stage property; simple settings and props of various sizes used on opera stages, originating from 砌末 qiè·mo in Yuan opera

切汇
切汇[qiē huì] 指在外汇黑市交易中，买进外汇的人用手法骗过卖主，暗中扣下一部分应付的钱 (of a person who deals in foreign exchange) secretly deduct a sum of money payable by deceit and fraud in black market deals involving foreign exchange

切点
切点[qiē diǎn] 直线与圆、直线与球、圆与圆、平面与球或球与球相切的交点 point of tangency; point of contact; point of tangency of a straight line and a circle or sphere, two circles, a plane and a sphere, or two spheres

切片
切片[qiē piàn] 把物体切成薄片 slice; cut sth. into slices切片[qiē piàn]用特制的刀具把生物体的组织或矿物切成的薄片。切片用来在显微镜下进行观察和研究。section; slice of a tissue of an organism or mineral cut with a special cutting tool, used for observation and study under a microscope

切磋
切磋[qiē cuō] 切磋琢磨 carve and polish - learn from each other by exchanging views; compare notes：切磋学问 compare notes when studying

切磋琢磨
切磋琢磨[qiē cuō zhuó mó]〈古代 arch.〉把骨头加工成器物叫‘切’，把象牙加工成器物叫‘磋’，把玉加工成器物叫‘琢’，把石头加工成器物叫‘磨’ processing bones into a utensil was called 切 qiē; 磋 cuō, processing ivory; 琢 zhuó, processing jade; and 磨 mó , processing stone;〈比喻 fig.〉互相商量研究，学习长处，纠正缺点 learn from each other by comparing notes in order to redress one's shortcomings

切线
切线[qiē xiàn] 平面内和圆只有一个交点的直线叫做圆的切线；和球面只有一个交点的直线叫做球的切线 tangent (line); straight line that has a single point of intersection with a circle on a plane or a spherical surface

切肤之痛
切肤之痛[qiè fū zhī tòng] 切身感受到的痛苦 keenly felt pain; agony; acute pain

切脉
切脉[qiè mài]〈中医 Chin. med.〉指诊脉 feel the pulse

切花
切花[qiē huā] 从植株上剪下供瓶养或装饰等用的花枝 cut flowers off a plant for cultivation in a bottle or as decoration, etc.：鲜切花 freshly cut flowers一束切花 a bouquet of cut flowers

切要
切要[qiè yào] 十分必要；紧要 vital; essential; indispensable：切要的知识 essential knowledge眼前切要解决的是原材料问题。For the time being raw materials are a problem that cries for a solution.

切记
切记[qiè jì] 牢牢记住 keep firmly in mind; be sure to remember; must always remember：遇事切记要冷静。When something unexpected happens, you must always remember not to panic.

切身
切身[qiè shēn]1.跟自己有密切关系的 of immediate concern or interest to oneself：切身利益 one's immediate or vital interests这事跟我有切身关系。This matter is of immediate concern to me. 2.亲身 personal：切身体验 one's own or personal experience他说的是个人切身的体会。He talked about his intimate knowledge.

切近
切近[qiè jìn]1.贴近；靠近 near; nearby：远大的事业要从切近处做起。A great cause must begin with what is ordinary and close by. or A grand undertaking always has a humble beginning. 2.（情况）相近；接近 similar; close to：这样注解比较切近原作之意。The explanatory note seems to be close to the meaning of the original work.

切除
切除[qiē chú] 用外科手术把身体上发生病变的部分切掉 remove; resect; excise; cut off a pathological part of one's body through a surgical operation：切除肿瘤 remove a tumour他最近做了一次外科切除手术。He recently had a surgical excision.

切面
切面1[qiē miàn] 切成的面条 cut noodles; machine-made noodles切面2[qiē miàn]1.剖面 section 2.和球面只有一个交点的平面叫做球的切面；只包含圆柱、圆锥的一条母线的平面叫做圆柱或圆锥的切面 tangent plane; plane that has a single point of intersection with a spherical surface; plane that contains a single generatrix of a cylinder or circular cone

切音
切音[qiè yīn] 用两字拼成另一个字的音 use two Chinese characters to represent the pronunciation of a third character另见  反切 fǎnqiè

切题
切题[qiè tí] 切合题目，没有离题 keep to the point; be relevant to the subject; stick to the topic; be related to the topic under discussion

切骨之仇
切骨之仇[qiè gǔ zhī chóu] 形容极深的仇恨 bitter enmity; strongly felt hatred; profound animosity

切齿
切齿[qiè chǐ] 咬紧牙齿，形容非常愤恨 grind one's teeth; gnash one's teeth; hate bitterly：切齿痛恨 grind one's teeth in hatred; nurture a bitter hatred

刈
刈[yì]（ㄧˋ）〈书 fml.〉割（草或谷类）mow; cut down (grass or grain crops)：刈麦 reap wheat; cut down wheat刈草 mow grass

刊
刊[kān]（ㄎㄢ）（栞）1.古时指书版雕刻，现在也指排印出版 (old) engrave wooden plates for block-printing; (now) print; publish：刊行 print and distribute创刊 launch a magazine or newspaper停刊 (of a periodical, etc.) stop publication 2.刊物，也指在报纸上定期出的有专门内容的一版 periodical; column in a newspaper：周刊 weekly月刊 monthly副刊 supplement (to a newspaper, journal, etc.) 3.削除；修改 delete; correct：刊误 correction刊谬补缺 correct mistakes and make up for deficiencies相关词组报刊 | 创刊 | 丛刊 | 复刊 | 副刊 | 集刊 | 季刊 | 期刊 | 书刊 | 特刊 | 停刊 | 校刊 | 选刊 | 旬刊 | 月刊 | 增刊 | 周刊 | 专刊 | 创刊号 | 发刊词 | 半月刊 | 双月刊 | 不刊之论 | 机关刊物刊本 | 刊布 | 刊登 | 刊行 | 刊刻 | 刊落 | 刊授 | 刊头 | 刊物 | 刊印 | 刊载

刊刻
刊刻[kān kè]刻（木板书）cut or inscribe printing blocks

刊印
刊印[kān yìn] 刻板印刷或排版印刷 cut blocks and print; compose and print

刊头
刊头[kān tóu] 指报纸、刊物上标出名称、期数等项目的地方 (of a newspaper or magazine) masthead：刊头题字 masthead inscription刊头设计 masthead design

刊布
刊布[kān bù]〈书 fml.〉通过印刷品来公布 publish (in print)

刊授
刊授[kān shòu] 以刊物辅导为主的教学方式 teach a course through a periodical

刊本
刊本[kān běn] 刻本 block-printed edition：原刊本 original or master copy of a block-printed edition宋刊本 Song-dynasty block-printed edition

刊物
刊物[kān wù] 登载文章、图片、歌谱等定期的或不定期的出版物 publication：定期刊物 periodical内部刊物 periodical for limited circulation文艺刊物 literary journal

刊登
刊登[kān dēng] 刊载 publish in a newspaper or magazine; carry：刊登广告 carry an advertisement刊登消息 carry news

刊落
刊落[kān luò]〈书 fml.〉删除；删削 strike out; delete：刊落文字 strike out redundant words刊落陈言 delete platitudes

刊行
刊行[kān xíng]出版发行（书报）print and publish (books and newspapers)：此书年内将刊行问世。The book will be available by the end of the year.

刊载
刊载[kān zǎi] 在报纸刊物上登载 publish (in a newspaper or magazine); carry：报纸上刊载了许多有关技术革新的文章。The newspaper carried quite a few articles about technical renovation.

刌
刌[cǔn]（ㄘㄨㄣˇ）〈书 fml.〉割；截断 cut; sever

刍
刍[chú]（ㄔㄨˊ）（芻）〈书 fml.〉1.喂牲口用的草 hay：刍秣 fodder反刍 ruminate 2.割草 cut grass：刍荛 cut grass and firewood 3.〈谦辞 hum.〉称自己的（见解等）[refer to one's own opinion]：刍言 (my) humble remark刍见 (my) humble comment相关词组反刍刍秣 | 刍荛 | 刍议

刍秣
刍秣[chú mò]〈书 fml.〉草料 fodder

刍荛
刍荛[chú ráo]〈书 fml.〉1.割草打柴 gather grass and firewood：刍荛有禁。Cutting grass and firewood is prohibited. 2.指割草打柴的人 person who gathers grass and firewood：询于刍荛 enquire of a woodcutter 3.〈谦辞 hum.〉在向别人提供意见时把自己比作草野鄙陋的人 [refer to oneself as a rustic person when offering comments]：刍荛之言（浅陋的话）(my) shallow remark

刍议
刍议[chú yì]〈书 fml.〉〈谦辞 hum.〉指自己的议论 referring to one's own opinion

刎
刎[wěn]（ㄨㄣˇ）用刀割脖子 cut one's throat：自刎 cut one's own throat相关词组自刎刎颈交

刎颈交
刎颈交[wěn jǐng jiāo] 指同生死共患难的朋友 friends that are ready to die for each other亦 also 刎颈之交 wěn jǐng zhī jiāo

刑
刑[xíng]（ㄒㄧㄥˊ）1.刑罚 punishment (inflicted for a crime); penalty; sentence：死刑 death sentence徒刑 imprisonment缓刑 probation量刑 measurement of penalty判刑 pass a sentence 2.特指对犯人的体罚 torture; corporal punishment：动刑 torture; subject to torture受刑 be tortured; be put to torture 3.(Xíng) 姓 a surname相关词组熬刑 | 处刑 | 从刑 | 电刑 | 定刑 | 动刑 | 毒刑 | 非刑 | 服刑 | 宫刑 | 行刑 | 缓刑 | 极刑 | 减刑 | 绞刑 | 苦刑 | 酷刑 | 量刑 | 临刑 | 流刑 | 免刑 | 墨刑 | 判刑 | 肉刑 | 受刑 | 私刑 | 死刑 | 徒刑 | 五刑 | 严刑 | 用刑 | 主刑 | 罪刑 | 附加刑 | 明正典刑 | 无期徒刑 | 有期徒刑刑场 | 刑罚 | 刑法 | 刑房 | 刑警 | 刑具 | 刑律 | 刑名 | 刑期 | 刑辱 | 刑事 | 刑庭 | 刑讯 | 刑侦 | 刑种 | 刑事犯 | 刑事法庭 | 刑事警察 | 刑事拘留 | 刑事判决 | 刑事诉讼 | 刑事责任

刑事
刑事[xíng shì] 有关刑法的 criminal; penal：刑事犯罪 criminal offence; criminal act刑事案件 criminal case刑事法庭 criminal court

刑事判决
刑事判决[xíng shì pàn jué] 法院就被告人是否犯罪、应否处刑、如何处刑所作的决定 court decision on a criminal case of whether the defendant is guilty and should be sentenced and how

刑事拘留
刑事拘留[xíng shì jū liú] 公安机关在紧急情况下依法暂时限制现行犯或重大嫌疑分子人身自由的一种强制措施 criminal detention or custody; compulsory measure taken by a public security organ to restrict the personal freedom of an active criminal or a major criminal suspect according to law in an emergent situation

刑事法庭
刑事法庭[xíng shì fǎ tíng] 负责审理刑事案件的法庭 criminal court; court handling criminal cases；简称 abbr. 刑庭 xíngtíng

刑事犯
刑事犯[xíng shì fàn] 触犯刑法，负有刑事责任的罪犯 criminal offender; criminal

刑事警察
刑事警察[xíng shì jǐng chá] 刑事侦查工作人员和刑事科学技术工作人员的总称 criminal police (collect.)；简称 abbr. 刑警 xíngjǐng

刑事诉讼
刑事诉讼[xíng shì sù sòng] 关于刑事案件的诉讼 criminal procedure; criminal suit

刑事责任
刑事责任[xíng shì zé rèn] 触犯刑法所必须承担的法律后果 criminal responsibility; legal consequences one has to bear after violating the criminal law

刑侦
刑侦[xíng zhēn] 刑事侦查 criminal investigation：刑侦人员 criminal investigator

刑具
刑具[xíng jù] 用来限制自由、逼问口供或执行刑罚的器具，如手铐、脚镣、夹棍、绞架等 instruments of torture; implements of punishment used to restrict freedom, interrogate for confessions or inflict penalties, as handcuffs, shackles, clamping rods, gallows, etc.

刑名
刑名[xíng míng]1.〈古代 arch.〉指法律 law (esp. criminal law)：刑名之学 philosophy of the legal school 2.刑罚的名称，如死刑、徒刑等 names of punishments (e.g. death sentence, imprisonment, etc.) 3.清代主管刑事的（幕僚）(in the Qing Dynasty) yamen secretary handling criminal cases：刑名师爷 law secretary

刑场
刑场[xíng chǎng] 处决犯人的地方 executioner's ground; place where criminals sentenced to death are executed

刑庭
刑庭[xíng tíng] 刑事法庭的简称 abbr. for 刑事法庭 xíngshì fǎtíng

刑律
刑律[xíng lǜ] 刑法 (xíngfǎ) criminal law：触犯刑律 violate the criminal law

刑房
刑房[xíng fáng]1.〈旧时 old〉掌管刑事案牍的官吏 official in charge of criminal archives 2.用刑的房子（多指非法的 oft. illegal）torture chamber：私设刑房 set up an illegal torture chamber

刑期
刑期[xíng qī] 服刑的期限 term of imprisonment; prison term

刑法
刑法[xíng fǎ] 规定什么是犯罪行为，犯罪行为应受到什么惩罚的各种法律 penal code; criminal law; body of law dealing with various crimes or offences and their legal penalties刑法[xíng fa] 对犯人的体罚 corporal punishment; torture：动刑法 administer corporal punishment

刑种
刑种[xíng zhǒng]刑罚的种类。一般分为主刑和从刑两大类。categories of punishment. There are two categories: principal punishment and accessory punishment.

刑罚
刑罚[xíng fá] 国家依据刑事法律对罪犯所施行的法律制裁 penalty (for a criminal offence); punishment

刑警
刑警[xíng jǐng] 刑事警察的简称 abbr. for 刑事警察 xíngshì jǐngchá

刑讯
刑讯[xíng xùn] 用刑具逼供审讯 inquisition by torture; extort a confession by torture

刑辱
刑辱[xíng rǔ]〈书 fml.〉用刑法残害凌辱 persecute and humiliate

划
划1[huá]（ㄏㄨㄚˊ）拨水前进 paddle; row：划船 row a boat划桨 paddle划2[huá]（ㄏㄨㄚˊ）合算 pay; be to one's profit：划得来 worth it划不来 not worth it划得着 worth it划不着 not worth it划3[huá]（ㄏㄨㄚˊ）（劃）用尖锐的东西把别的东西分开或在表面上刻过去、擦过去 scratch or cut the surface of sth. with a sharp object：划玻璃 cut glass划根火柴 strike a match手上划了一个口子 get a scratch on the hand另见  huà and·huai划1[huà]（ㄏㄨㄚˋ）（劃）1.划分 delimit; differentiate：划界 delimit a boundary划定范围 delimit scope 2.划拨 transfer; assign：划付 transfer money划款 transfer money划账 transfer an account 3.计划 plan：筹划 plan and prepare策划 plan划2[huà]（ㄏㄨㄚˋ）（劃） 同 same as 画2  huà另见  huá and·huai划[huai]（·ㄏㄨㄞ）（劃）另见  [划] ( bāi·huai)另见  huá and huà相关词组摆划 | 策划 | 筹划 | 规划 | 计划 | 谋划 | 企划 | 区划 | 计划经济 | 出谋划策 | 计划单列市划拨 | 划策 | 划分 | 划粉 | 划价 | 划拉 | 划拳 | 划算 | 划一 | 划子 | 划不来 | 划得来 | 划时代 | 划一不二

划一
划一[huà yī]1.一致；一律 standardized; uniform：整齐划一 neat and uniform 2.使一致 standardize：划一体例 standardize the style

划一不二
划一不二[huà yī bù èr]1.不二价；照定价不折不扣 unalterable; fixed price 2.（做事）一律；刻板 uniform; stereotyped：写文章，可长可短，没有划一不二的公式。There are no hard-and-fast rules for the length of a piece of writing.

划不来
划不来[huá bu lái] 不合算；不值得 not worth it：为这点儿小事跑那么远的路划不来。It doesn't pay to walk such a long way for such a trifle.

划价
划价[huà jià]（医院药房）计算患者药费和其他医疗费用，把款额写在处方上 (in a hospital dispensary) have a prescription priced

划分
划分[huà fēn]1.把整体分成几部分 divide：划分行政区域 divide (a country) into administrative regions 2.区分 differentiate; tell the difference：划分阶级 classify classes划分人民内部矛盾和敌我矛盾 differentiate contradictions among the people, and those between ourselves and the enemy

划子
划子[huá zi] 用桨拨水行驶的小船 small rowboat

划得来
划得来[huá de lái] 合算；值得 pay; worth it：花这么点儿钱，解决那么多问题，划得来！It pays to solve so many problems by spending so little money!

划拉
划拉[huá la]〈方 dial.〉1.用拂拭的方式除去或取去；扫；掸 sweep; brush away; whisk away or off：把身上的泥土划拉掉 brush dirt off one's body你没事把里外屋划拉划拉。If you are free, you'd better sweep the inner and outer rooms. 2.寻找；设法获取 look for; try to get：从仓库里划拉些旧零件凑合着用。Look for some old spare parts in the storehouse to make do with. 3. 同 same as 搂 lōu ①：在山上划拉干草 rake up hay on the hill划拉几个钱花 earn some extra money 4.随意涂抹；潦草写字 scrawl; scribble

划拨
划拨[huà bō]1.（款项或账目）从某一单位或户头转到另一单位或户头 transfer (money or accounts) from one account to another, or from one unit to another：这笔款子由银行划拨。The money will be transferred through the bank. 2.分出来拨给 assign; allocate：划拨钢材 allocate steel划拨物资 allocate goods and materials

划拳
划拳[huá quán] 饮酒时两人同时伸出手指并各说一个数，谁说的数目跟双方所伸手指的总数相符，谁就算赢，输的人喝酒 finger-guessing game played by two drinkers, each extending a number of fingers and announcing a number at the same time, with the man whose announced number tallies with the sum of fingers extended by both sides declared the winner, and the loser taking a drink：划拳行令 play a drinking game亦 also 豁拳 huá∥quán 或 or 搳拳 huá∥quán

划时代
划时代[huà shí dài] 开辟新时代（多做定语用 usu. as attribute）epoch-making：划时代的作品 work that is a landmark in history划时代的事件 epoch-making event划时代的文献 epoch-making document

划策
划策[huà cè] 出主意；筹谋计策 plan; scheme：出谋划策 give advice and suggestions亦 also 画策 huàcè

划算
划算[huá suàn]1.计算；盘算 calculate; weigh：划算来，划算去，半夜没有合上眼。I was still wide awake in the small hours weighing the pros and cons. 2.上算；合算 be to one's profit; pay：这块地还是种麦子划算。It pays to grow wheat on this field.

划粉
划粉[huà fěn] 裁剪衣服时用来划线的粉块 tailor's chalk

刓
刓[wán]（ㄨㄢˊ）1.〈书 fml.〉削去棱角 round off; cut off edges or angles：刓方以为圆 cut a square into a round 2.（用刀子等）挖；刻 carve with a knife; cut

刖
刖[yuè]（ㄩㄝˋ）（跀）〈古代 arch.〉砍掉脚的酷刑 cruel punishment of chopping off the feet

列
列[liè]（ㄌㄧㄝˋ）1.排列 arrange; line up; put in order：罗列 set out; list; enumerate列队 line up按清单上列的一项一项地清点 check the listed items one by one 2.安排到某类事物之中 list; enter in a list; rank：列入议程 place on the agenda把发展教育事业列为重要任务之一 rank education as one of our priorities 3.行列 rank; row; file：出列 step out of the ranks站在最前列 stand in the front row or in the forefront 4.〈量词 classifier〉用于成行列的事物 [used for a series or row of things]：一列火车 a train 5.类 sort; kind; category：不在此列 not in this category 6.各；众 various; each and every：列国 various countries列位观众 dear audience 7.(Liè) 姓 a surname相关词组摆列 | 编列 | 并列 | 陈列 | 出列 | 单列 | 队列 | 行列 | 开列 | 胪列 | 罗列 | 平列 | 前列 | 入列 | 上列 | 数列 | 系列 | 下列 | 序列 | 专列 | 分列式 | 前列腺 | 战列舰 | 一系列 | 马列主义 | 名列前茅 | 磁悬浮列车 | 计划单列市 | 普罗列塔利亚 | 马克思列宁主义列兵 | 列车 | 列传 | 列当 | 列岛 | 列队 | 列国 | 列举 | 列强 | 列位 | 列席 | 列车员 | 列宁主义

列举
列举[liè jǔ] 一个一个地举出来 list; enumerate：列举事实 cite facts指示中列举了各种具体办法。Specific measures are laid out in the instructions.

列传
列传[liè zhuàn]纪传体史书中一般人物的传记，如《史记·廉颇蔺相如列传》biography; biographical account of common people in Chinese historiography, e.g. Records of the Historian·Biographies of Lian Po and Lin Xiangru

列位
列位[liè wèi] 同 same as 诸位 zhūwèi：列位请坐。Everyone, be seated, please.

列兵
列兵[liè bīng] 军衔，兵的最低一级 private; lowest enlisted rank in the military

列国
列国[liè guó] 某一时期内并存的各国 number of states or countries coexisting during a certain period：列国相争。The states vied with each other for supremacy.周游列国 travel to many countries

列宁主义
列宁主义[Liè níng zhǔ yì]帝国主义和无产阶级革命时代的马克思主义。列宁(Владимир Ильич Ленин)在领导俄国革命的实践中，在同第二国际修正主义的斗争中，继承、捍卫了马克思主义，并在关于帝国主义的理论，关于社会主义可能首先在一国取得胜利，关于建立无产阶级新型政党，关于无产阶级革命和无产阶级专政等问题上，发展了马克思主义。Leninism; Marxism belonging to the age of imperialism and the proletarian revolution. During the course of leading the Russian Revolution and in the struggle against revisionist theories of the Second International (1889-1914), Lenin carried forward and defended Marxism, and he expanded it with his theories on imperialism, on the possible establishment of socialism in one country first, on the formation of a new kind of political party of the proletariat, and on the revolution and dictatorship of the proletariat.

列岛
列岛[liè dǎo] 群岛的一种，一般指排列成线形或弧形的，如我国的澎湖列岛、嵊泗列岛等 archipelago; island chain; chain of islands; group of islands strung out in a line or over an arc, e.g. the Penghu and Shengsi islands of China

列席
列席[liè xí] 参加会议，有发言权而没有表决权 attend a meeting with the right to speak but not to vote

列强
列强[liè qiáng]〈旧时 old〉指世界上同一时期内的各个资本主义强国 powers; big powers; strong capitalist countries of a certain historical period

列当
列当[liè dāng]一年生草本植物，多寄生在菊科植物的根上。茎肉质，叶子鳞片状，黄褐色，花紫色。全草入药。broomrape (Orobanche Coerulescens); brown annual parasitic herb living on the roots of plants of the composite family, with a fleshy stem, scale-shaped leaves, and purple flowers, the whole herb used as medicine; 亦 also 草苁蓉 cǎocōngróng

列车
列车[liè chē] 配有机车、工作人员和规定信号的连挂成列的火车 train; connected group of railroad cars pulled by a locomotive, serviced by a train crew and stipulated signals：国际列车 international train旅客列车 passenger train15次列车 train No.15

列车员
列车员[liè chē yuán] 在客运列车上服务的人员 carriage attendant; train attendant; train crew; people working on a passenger train

列队
列队[liè duì] 排列成队伍 line up; form into lines：列队游行 line up for a parade群众列队欢迎贵宾。The well-wishers lined up to welcome the honoured guest.

刘
刘[Liú]（ㄌㄧㄡˊ）（劉） 姓 a surname相关词组刘海儿

刘海儿
刘海儿[Liú Hǎi r] 传说中的仙童，前额垂着短发，骑在蟾上，手里舞着一串钱 Liu Hair, legendary child fairy with short hair cut in bangs across his forehead, who rode a toad, while playing with a string of money刘海儿[liú hǎi r] 妇女或儿童垂在前额的整齐的短发 bang; fringe; (of women or children) well-groomed short hair cut straight across the forehead

则
