则1[zé]（ㄗㄜˊ）1.规范 standard; norm; criterion：准则 criterion; standard以身作则 set an example by one's own conduct 2.规则 rule; decree; regulation：总则 general rules细则 procedural provisions法则 law; rule 3.〈书 fml.〉效法 take as an example; imitate; emulate; follow 4.〈量词 classifier〉用于分项或自成段落的文字的条数 item; paragraph or piece of writing：试题三则 three examination questions新闻两则 two news items寓言四则 four fables则2[zé]（ㄗㄜˊ）〈书 fml.〉1.〈连词 conj.〉(a)表示两事在时间上相承 [indicating one action follows another]：每一巨弹堕地，则火光迸裂。Each fall of the huge bomb was accompanied by an explosion of light and fire. (b)表示因果或情理上的联系 [indicating causal relationship ]：欲速则不达。More haste, less speed. or Haste makes waste.物体热则胀，冷则缩。Objects expand when heated and contract when cooled. (c)表示对比 [indicating contrast]：旧的制度已经腐朽，新的制度则如旭日东升。The old system is decaying, while the new one is rising like the morning sun in the eastern sky. (d)用在相同的两个词之间表示让步 [used between two identical words to indicate concession]：好则好，只是太贵。Good as it is, it's too expensive. 2.用在‘一、二（再）、三’等后面，列举原因或理由 [used after 一 yī, 二（再）èr (zài) and 三 sān to enumerate causes or reasons]：墨子在归途上，是走得较慢了，一则力乏，二则脚痛，三则干粮已经吃完，难免觉得肚子饿，四则事情已经办妥，不像来时的匆忙。Mozi slowed down his pace on his way back because, first, he was tired; second, his feet hurt; third, he was running out of solid food and naturally felt hungry; and fourth, he was not in as much a hurry as when he came because he had finished his task. 3.是；乃是 be：此则余之过也。This is my fault.相关词组法则 | 否则 | 附则 | 规则 | 或则 | 简则 | 然则 | 实则 | 守则 | 税则 | 四则 | 虽则 | 通则 | 细则 | 原则 | 再则 | 章则 | 准则 | 总则 | 不则声 | 不平则鸣 | 闻过则喜 | 以身作则 | 欲速则不达 | 水至清则无鱼 | 和平共处五项原则则声

则声
则声[zé shēng] 做声 make a sound; utter a word：不敢则声 dare not utter a word

刚
刚1[gāng]（ㄍㄤ）（剛）1.硬；坚强（跟‘柔’相对 as opposed to‘soft’）hard; firm; strong; indomitable：刚强 unyielding刚直 upright and outspoken他的性情太刚。He's too strong-minded. 2.(Gāng) 姓 a surname刚2[gāng]（ㄍㄤ）（剛）〈副词 adv.〉1.恰好 just; exactly：不大不小，刚合适 Just the right size, neither too big nor too small. 2.表示勉强达到某种程度；仅仅 barely; only; just：清早出发的时候天还很黑，刚能看出前面的人的背包。It was still dark when I set out in the early morning, so I could just make out the backpack of the person ahead of me. 3.表示行动或情况发生在不久以前 only a short while ago; just now：他刚从省里回来。He just came back from the provincial capital.那时弟弟刚学会走路。At that time, my younger brother had just learned to walk. 4.用在复句里，后面用‘就’字呼应，表示两件事紧接 [for use in a compound sentence, followed by 就 jiù to indicate close succession of two events] as soon as：刚过立春，天气就异乎寻常地热了起来。Spring had hardly begun when it became unusually hot.相关词组才刚 | 金刚 | 阳刚 | 金刚砂 | 金刚石 | 金刚钻 | 金刚努目刚愎 | 刚才 | 刚度 | 刚风 | 刚刚 | 刚好 | 刚健 | 刚介 | 刚劲 | 刚烈 | 刚毛 | 刚强 | 刚巧 | 刚体 | 刚性 | 刚毅 | 刚玉 | 刚正 | 刚直 | 刚柔相济

刚介
刚介[gāng jiè]〈书 fml.〉刚强耿介 be bold and honest

刚体
刚体[gāng tǐ] 物理学上指任何情况下各点之间距离都保持不变，即形状和大小始终不变的物体 (phys.) rigid body; objects impermeable to any change in shape or size

刚健
刚健[gāng jiàn]（性格、风格、姿态等）坚强有力 (of character, style, posture, etc.) vigorous; energetic; robust：画风刚健质朴 simple but vigorous style of painting

刚刚
刚刚[gāng gāng] 刚2  just; only; exactly：不多不少，刚刚一杯。It's a cup, neither more nor less.箱子不大，刚刚装下衣服和书籍。The suitcase is just the right size for clothes and books.他刚刚走，你快去追吧！He left just a minute ago; see if you can catch him.

刚劲
刚劲[gāng jìng]（姿态、风格等）挺拔有力 (of posture, style, etc.) bold; vigorous; sturdy：笔力刚劲 write in a bold hand枣树伸出刚劲的树枝。The date tree has sprouted sturdy boughs.

刚好
刚好[gāng hǎo]1.正合适 just; exactly：这双鞋他穿着不大不小，刚好。This pair of shoes fits him perfectly. 2.恰巧；正巧 by chance; by coincidence：他们两个人刚好编在一个小组里。The two of them just happened to be in the same group.刚好大叔要到北京去，信就托他捎去吧。My uncle happens to be going to Beijing; you can ask him to take your letter along with him.

刚巧
刚巧[gāng qiǎo] 恰巧；正凑巧 by chance; by coincidence：你算赶上了，明天刚巧有车进城。You're in luck. It just so happens that there's a bus going to town tomorrow.

刚度
刚度[gāng dù] 工程上指机械、构件等在受到外力时抵抗变形的能力 (of engineering) toughness; stiffness; resistance (of machinery or components) to deformation under the impact of outside force

刚强
刚强[gāng qiáng]（性格、意志）坚强，不怕困难或不屈服于恶势力 (of character, willpower) firm; staunch; unyielding：刚强不屈 iron-willed and unyielding; unconquerable; indomitable

刚性
刚性[gāng xìng]1.坚强的性格；刚强的气质 fortitude; firmness; unyieldingness：一个男子汉应该有刚性。A man should be firm and strong. 2.坚硬不易变化的（跟‘柔性’相对 as compared with‘flexible’）rigid; stiff：刚性物体 rigid object 3.不能改变或通融的（跟‘柔性’相对 as compared with‘flexible’）inflexible; compulsory：刚性指标 inflexible target; compulsory quota

刚愎
刚愎[gāng bì] 倔强固执，不接受别人的意见 headstrong; opinionated：刚愎自用 be obstinate and self-opinionated

刚才
刚才[gāng cái] 指刚过去不久的时间 a moment ago; just now：他把刚才的事儿忘了。He forgot what happened just now.刚才他在车间劳动，这会儿开会去了。He was working in the workshop just a moment ago and is now at a meeting.

刚柔相济
刚柔相济[gāng róu xiāng jì] 刚强的和柔和的互相补充，使恰到好处 couple hardness with softness (in dealing with people); temper toughness with gentleness

刚正
刚正[gāng zhèng] 刚强正直 upright; honourable; principled：为人刚正 upright personality

刚毅
刚毅[gāng yì] 刚强坚毅 resolute and steadfast：刚毅的神色 an expression of fortitude

刚毛
刚毛[gāng máo] 人或动物体上长的硬毛，如人的鼻毛、蚯蚓表皮上的细毛 (of human or animals) bristle; seta; chaeta; vibrissa

刚烈
刚烈[gāng liè] 刚强有气节 fiery and forthright; upright and unyielding：禀性刚烈 of an upright and unyielding disposition

刚玉
刚玉[gāng yù]矿物，成分是三氧化二铝，晶体，有玻璃光泽，硬度仅次于金刚石。红色透明的叫红宝石，蓝色透明的叫蓝宝石，是贵重的装饰品。刚玉可用作精密仪器的轴承，也用作研磨材料。 corundum; very hard mineral (Al?O?) that consists of aluminum oxide of a hardness second only to diamond, occurring in massive and variously coloured crystal form, including ruby of red colour and sapphire of blue colour (both being precious stone), that may be used as an abrasive or as a material for making bearings for precision apparatuses

刚直
刚直[gāng zhí] 刚正 upright and outspoken：刚直不阿 be upright and never stooping to flattery

刚风
刚风[gāng fēng] 同 same as 罡风 gāngfēng

创
创[chuāng]（ㄔㄨㄤ）（創）创伤 wound：创口 open wound予以重创 deal a heavy blow创巨痛深 deep wound causing great pain另见  chuàng创[chuàng]（ㄔㄨㄤˋ）（創、、剙）开始（做）；（初次）做 begin (to do sth.); do sth. for the first time：创办 set up首创 launch创新记录 set a new record另见  chuāng相关词组编创 | 草创 | 初创 | 独创 | 开创 | 首创 | 原创 | 重创 | 主创创办 | 创编 | 创痕 | 创汇 | 创获 | 创见 | 创建 | 创举 | 创刊 | 创口 | 创立 | 创利 | 创面 | 创伤 | 创设 | 创始 | 创收 | 创税 | 创痛 | 创新 | 创业 | 创痍 | 创议 | 创意 | 创造 | 创制 | 创作 | 创刊号 | 创牌子 | 创造性 | 创业资金

创业
创业[chuàng yè] 创办事业 start an undertaking：创业史 history of pioneering work创业守成 establish a cause and maintain it艰苦创业 pioneer an enterprise with arduous efforts

创业资金
创业资金[chuàng yè zī jīn] 风险资金 start-up funds; risk capital; venture capital

创举
创举[chuàng jǔ] 从来没有过的举动或事业 unprecedented undertaking or cause

创伤
创伤[chuāng shāng]1.身体受伤的地方；外伤 trauma; part of the body that is injured：腿上的创伤已经治愈。The wound on the leg has healed. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉物质或精神遭受的破坏或伤害 material or spiritual injury, or suffering：战争的创伤 the trauma of war精神上的创伤 mental scar; traumatic experience

创作
创作[chuàng zuò]1.创造文艺作品 create literary and art works：创作经验 creative experience 2.指文艺作品 works of literature and art：划时代的创作 epoch-making works

创刊
创刊[chuàng kān] 开始刊行（报刊） start publishing (a newspaper or a journal)：创刊号 first issue《人民日报》于1948年6月15日创刊。People's Daily was first published on June 15, 1948.

创刊号
创刊号[chuàng kān hào] 报刊开始刊行的一期 the first issue of a newspaper or a journal

创利
创利[chuàng lì] 通过经营工商业等活动，创造利润 make profits through industrial or commercial activities：增收创利 increase income and make a profit该厂人均创利超万元。The average profit per capita of the factory is over 10,000 yuan.

创制
创制[chuàng zhì] 初次制定（多指法律、文字等） institute (a law); formulate (a written language, etc.)：帮助没有文字的少数民族创制文字 help minority ethnic groups to create a written form for their spoken language

创办
创办[chuàng bàn] 开始办 begin to do sth.：创办学校 set up a school创办杂志 start a magazine许多乡镇都创办了农机修造厂。Many townships have set up farm machine repair shops.

创口
创口[chuāng kǒu] 伤口 open wound; cut

创始
创始[chuàng shǐ] 开始建立 initiate：创始人 founder中国是联合国的创始国之一。China is a founding member of the United Nations.

创建
创建[chuàng jiàn] 同 same as 创立 chuànglì：创建学校 establish a school

创意
创意[chuàng yì]1.有创造性的想法、构思等 creative concept; original thinking and concept：颇具创意 rather original in concept这个设计格调单一，毫无创意可言。The style of this design is insipid and has no originality to speak of. 2.提出有创造性的想法、构思等 create a new concept; break fresh ground; be original in thinking and concept：这项活动由工会创意发起。This activity was initiated by the trade union.

创收
创收[chuàng shōu] 学校、科研机关等非营业单位利用自身条件投入社会创造收入 (of non-profit organizations, such as schools and scientific research institutes) make money by investing their resources in society

创新
创新[chuàng xīn]1.抛开旧的，创造新的 blaze a new trail：要有创新精神。We should have a pioneering spirit. 2.指创造性；新意 creativity; new idea：那是一座很有创新的建筑物。The architecture of that building is quite original.

创汇
创汇[chuàng huì] 使成品出口的外汇净收入多于外汇支出，叫做创汇 foreign export earning; earn favourable balance in foreign exchange through exports

创牌子
创牌子[chuàng pái zi] 以产品质量或服务质量赢得顾客信任，从而提高产品或企业的知名度 win customer trust and make the brand name of a product better known by providing quality product or service

创痍
创痍[chuāng yí] 同 same as 疮痍 chuāngyí

创痕
创痕[chuāng hén] 伤痕 scar

创痛
创痛[chuāng tòng] 因受创伤而感到的疼痛；痛苦 feel painful from a wound; hurt：忍受着腿部中弹的剧烈创痛 endure the severe pain from the bullet wound in the leg她用歌声安慰母亲心灵上的创痛。She sang to comfort her mother's aching heart.

创税
创税[chuàng shuì] 纳税单位向国家财政部门交纳税款叫创税 (of firm, enterprise, etc.) pay taxes to the state financial department：这家公司一年为国家创税上百万元。This company pays up to a million yuan in taxes to the state each year.

创立
创立[chuàng lì] 初次建立 found; initiate; establish：创立信用合作社 set up a credit cooperative创立新的学术体系 initiate a new academic system

创编
创编[chuàng biān] 创作（剧本、体操、舞蹈等） write or choreograph (script, gymnastic or dance routine, etc.)：创编历史剧 write a historical play

创获
创获[chuàng huò] 过去没有过的成果或心得；第一次发现 new achievement or idea; new discovery：在技术革新中，许多技术人员、工人有不少的创获。Many technicians and workers have made new contributions to technical renovation.

创见
创见[chuàng jiàn] 独到的见解 original idea：他对明清文学的研究很有创见。His study of the Ming and Qing literature is very original.

创议
创议[chuàng yì]1.倡议 propose：创议开展劳动竞赛 initiate a labour emulation campaign 2.首先提出的建议 initial proposal：这一创议得到了全厂工人的热烈响应。The proposal met with warm response from the workers of the factory.

创设
创设[chuàng shè]1. 同 same as 创办 chuàngbàn：创设研究所 establish a research institute 2.创造（条件）create (conditions)：为技术攻关创设有利的条件 provide favourable conditions for tackling technical problems

创造
创造[chuàng zào] 想出新方法、建立新理论、做出新的成绩或东西 create a new procedure, theory, or thing, achieve sth.：创造性 creativity创造新记录 chalk up a new record劳动人民是历史的创造者。The working people are the creators of history.

创造性
创造性[chuàng zào xìng]1.努力创新的思想和表现 creativity：充分调动广大群众在劳动中的积极性和创造性。We should bring into full play the initiatives and creativity of the people in their work. 2.属于创新的性质 of innovative quality：创造性的劳动 creative work

创面
创面[chuāng miàn] 创伤的表面 surface of a wound

刜
刜[fú]（ㄈㄨˊ）〈书 fml.〉用刀砍；击 hit; cut with a knife

初
初[chū]（ㄔㄨ）1.开始的；开始的部分 beginning; initial part：初夏 early summer年初 commencement of a year 2.第一个 first one：初伏 first ten days of the hot season初旬 first ten days of a month初一（农历每月的第一天，等于‘第一个一’，区别于‘十一、二十一’）first day of a month on the Chinese lunar calendar, or the‘very first day’(as compared with the‘11th day’and the‘21st day’)初十（农历每月的第十天，等于‘第一个十’，区别于‘二十、三十’）tenth day of a month on the Chinese lunar calendar, or the‘first 10th day’(as compared with the‘20th day’and the‘30th day’) 3.第一次；刚开始 first time; very beginning：初试 initial test初次见面 meet for the first time初学乍练 begin to learn or do sth. 4.最低的（等级）primary (grade)：初级 rudimentary level初等 primordial grade 5.原来的；原来的情况 original; earliest condition：初心 initial feelings初志 aspiration to begin with和好如初 (of a relationship) become as good as before 6.(Chū) 姓 a surname相关词组当初 | 开初 | 年初 | 起初 | 如初 | 岁初 | 原初 | 月初 | 最初 | 情窦初开 | 悔不当初 | 本初子午线初版 | 初步 | 初潮 | 初创 | 初春 | 初等 | 初冬 | 初度 | 初犯 | 初伏 | 初稿 | 初花 | 初会 | 初婚 | 初级 | 初交 | 初亏 | 初恋 | 初民 | 初年 | 初评 | 初期 | 初秋 | 初赛 | 初丧 | 初审 | 初时 | 初试 | 初速 | 初岁 | 初探 | 初头 | 初夏 | 初小 | 初心 | 初学 | 初雪 | 初旬 | 初叶 | 初夜 | 初愿 | 初月 | 初战 | 初诊 | 初志 | 初中 | 初衷 | 初出茅庐 | 初等教育 | 初级小学 | 初级中学 | 初来乍到 | 初露锋芒 | 初露头角 | 初生之犊

初丧
初丧[chū sāng] 家中刚发生丧事的一段时期 early in the mourning period of a family that has recently lost a member

初中
初中[chū zhōng] 初级中学的简称 abbr. for 初级中学 chūjí zhōngxué

初亏
初亏[chū kuī]日食或月食过程中，月亮和太阳圆面或地球阴影和月亮圆面第一次外切时的位置关系，也指发生这种位置关系的时刻。初亏是日食或月食过程的开始。1st contact, beginning of a solar or lunar eclipse; during a solar or lunar eclipse, the relative position between the moon and the sun or between the shadow of the earth and the moon when they first become tangential; moment when this occurs

初交
初交[chū jiāo] 认识不久或交往不久的人 person of new acquaintance：我们是初交，对他不太了解。We've just got acquainted, so I don't know much about him.

初伏
初伏[chū fú]1.夏至后的第三个庚日，是三伏头一伏的第一天 the 3rd day of geng after the Summer Solstice, or the 1st day of the 1st of the three 10-day periods of the hot season 2.通常也指从夏至后第三个庚日起到第四个庚日前一天的一段时间 usu. the period from the 3rd day of geng to the day before the 4th day of geng after the Summer Solstice亦 also 头伏 tóufú;另见  三伏 sānfú

初会
初会[chū huì] 第一次见面 meet for the first time：我们是初会，彼此都有点儿拘束。We were both a little ill at ease at our first meeting.

初冬
初冬[chū dōng] 冬季的一段时间，即农历十月 early winter; part of the winter season, i.e. the 10th lunar month

初出茅庐
初出茅庐[chū chū máo lú]〈比喻 fig.〉刚进入社会或刚到工作岗位上来，缺乏经验 just enter society or take up a new job; without experience

初创
初创[chū chàng] 刚刚创立 newly established：初创阶段 beginning stage (of an enterprise, etc.); in infancy

初叶
初叶[chū yè] 指某一历史时期的最初一段 first phase of a historical period：20世纪初叶 early 20th century明朝初叶 beginning of the Ming Dynasty

初夏
初夏[chū xià] 夏季的一段时间，即农历四月 a period of time in the summer season, i.e. the fourth month of the Chinese lunar calendar

初夜
初夜[chū yè]1.指进入夜晚不久的时候 not long after nightfall 2.指新婚第一夜 wedding night

初头
初头[chū tóu]〈方 dial.〉一年或一月开始不久的日子 beginning days of a year or month：1947年初头 early 19478月初头 early August

初婚
初婚[chū hūn]1.第一次结婚 first marriage 2.刚结婚不久 newly married

初学
初学[chū xué] 刚开始学或学习不久 just begin to learn or be in the early stage of learning：初学乍练 begin to learn or practise sth.这本书对初学的人很合适。This book is appropriate for beginners.

初审
初审[chū shěn]1.初次审查 first examination：初审合格 pass the first quality or qualification check 2.初步审问 initial interrogation：经过初审，案犯供认了犯罪事实。The suspect pleaded guilty at the preliminary trial.

初小
初小[chū xiǎo] 初级小学的简称 abbr. for 初级小学 chūjí xiǎoxué

初岁
初岁[chū suì]〈书 fml.〉指一年刚开始的时候 beginning of a year

初年
初年[chū nián] 指某一历史时期的最初一段 first few years of a historical period：民国初年 early years of the Republic

初度
初度[chū dù]〈书 fml.〉原指初生的时候，后称生日为初度 (orig.) time when one was born; birthday：四十初度 fortieth birthday

初心
初心[chū xīn] 最初的心愿 original wishes：不改初心。The early aspiration remains unchanged.

初志
初志[chū zhì]〈书 fml.〉最初的志向 earliest aspiration：初志既定，终生不变。I will never change my ambition set early in my life.

初恋
初恋[chū liàn]1.第一次恋爱 first love 2.刚恋爱不久 recently fall in love

初愿
初愿[chū yuàn] 起初的志愿或愿望 original aspiration or wishes：他的初愿是当个中学教师，没想到后来成了大学教授。At first he wanted to become a middle school teacher, but ended up a university professor.

初战
初战[chū zhàn] 战争或战役开始的第一仗 first battle in a war or campaign：初战告捷 win the first battle亦 also 序战 xùzhàn

初探
初探[chū tàn] 初步探索或探讨（多用做书名或论文标题 oft. used in a book or thesis title）initial exploration or discussion of a topic：《大陆架成因初探》An Initial Discussion on Formation of the Continental Shelf

初旬
初旬[chū xún] 每月的第一个十天 first 10 days of a month

初时
初时[chū shí] 起先，起初 at the beginning：初时我只当他说说而已，岂知他当真去了。I thought he didn't mean it, and never expected him to really go there.

初春
初春[chū chūn] 春季的一段时间，即农历正月；早春 early spring; part of the spring season, i.e. the first month of the Chinese lunar calendar

初月
初月[chū yuè] 农历月初形状如钩的月亮 waxing moon at the beginning of a month of the Chinese lunar calendar

初期
初期[chū qī] 开始的一段时期 beginning period：抗战初期 early phase of the War of Resistance against Japan这病的初期症状是厌食。The initial symptom of the disease is loss of appetite.

初来乍到
初来乍到[chū lái zhà dào] 初次来到某个地方 be a newcomer to a place：初来乍到，不周之处请多包涵。I'm a newcomer, so please bear with me if I make a slip or two.

初步
初步[chū bù] 开始阶段的；不是最后的或完备的 of the initial stage; not final or complete：提出初步意见 make a tentative comment这些问题已经得到初步解决。These problems have been initially solved.

初民
初民[chū mín] 指远古时代的人 primitive men in remote antiquity

初潮
初潮[chū cháo] 指女子第一次来月经 referring to a girl's first menses

初版
初版[chū bǎn]1.（书籍）出第一版 (of a book) be published for the first time：本书1956年初版。The book was first published in 1956. 2.（书籍的）第一版 (of a book) first edition：这部书初版印了两万册。The first edition of the book had a print run of 20,000 copies.

初犯
初犯[chū fàn] 第一次犯罪或犯错误、过失等 commit a crime or make a mistake for the first time：因是初犯，还能原谅。(You) may be excused as this is (your) first offence.

初生之犊
初生之犊[chū shēng zhī dú] 刚生出来的小牛。俗语说：‘初生之犊不畏虎。’newborn calf, as in the idiom‘A newborn calf is not afraid of the tiger’;〈比喻 fig.〉青年人勇敢大胆，敢作敢为 dauntless young people; young daredevil

初秋
初秋[chū qiū] 秋季的一段时间，即农历七月 a period of the autumn season, i.e. the seventh month of the Chinese lunar calendar

初稿
初稿[chū gǎo] 第一次的稿子，也泛指未定稿 first draft; general term for any draft

初等
初等[chū děng]1.比较浅近的 of a simple level：初等数学 elementary mathematics 2.初级 elementary：初等小学（旧称）(old name for) primary school初等教育 elementary education

初等教育
初等教育[chū děng jiào yù]小学程度的教育。是对少年儿童实施的全面基础教育和对成人实施的相当于小学程度的教育。elementary education; education at the primary level; education that provides a general basic school training for children or adults

初级
初级[chū jí] 最低的阶段 beginner's stage：初级读本 primer初级形式 initial form

初级中学
初级中学[chū jí zhōng xué] 我国实施的前一阶段的中等教育的学校 junior middle school; 简称 abbr. 初中 chūzhōng

初级小学
初级小学[chū jí xiǎo xué] 我国实施过的前一阶段的初等教育的学校 junior primary school once in practice in China; 简称 abbr. 初小 chūxiǎo

初花
初花[chū huā]1.植株在一年中第一次开花 (of plant) blossom for the first time in the year：刺槐在云南3月15日初花，北京4月29日初花。Locust begins to bloom on March 15 in Yunnan Province and on April 29 in Beijing. 2.植物最早开出的花 earliest flowers of a plant

初衷
初衷[chū zhōng] 最初的心愿 original intention：有违初衷 be against the initial intent虽然经过百般挫折，也不改初衷 stick to one's goal despite many setbacks

初评
初评[chū píng] 初次或初步评比或评选 first or initial evaluation or screening

初诊
初诊[chū zhěn] 医院或诊疗所指某个病人初次来看病 a patient's first visit to the doctor at a hospital or clinic

初试
初试[chū shì]1.初次试验 first test 2.分两次举行的考试的第一次 primary of a two-phase examination;另见  复试 fùshì

初赛
初赛[chū sài] 多轮次的体育、文艺等竞赛的第一轮比赛 (of multi-round sport or artistic contest) the first round

初速
初速[chū sù]1.运动物体在一个特定运动过程开始时的速度 initial speed of an object in a given process of motion 2.特指弹头脱离枪、炮口瞬间的运动速度 speed of a bullet or cannonball leaving the muzzle

初雪
初雪[chū xuě] 入冬后第一次下的雪 first snowfall in winter

初露头角
初露头角[chū lù tóu jiǎo]〈比喻 fig.〉刚显露出某种才华 begin to show certain talent：这次展出的作品，作者大多是初露头角的青年画家。The works on show are mostly by budding young painters.

初露锋芒
初露锋芒[chū lù fēng máng]〈比喻 fig.〉刚显露出某种力量或才能 display certain ability or talent for the first time

删
删[shān]（ㄕㄢ）（刪）去掉（文辞中的某些字句） delete; strike out：删繁就简 simplify by striking out the superfluous这一段可以删去。This paragraph may be deleted.相关词组增删删除 | 删改 | 删节 | 删略 | 删秋 | 删汰 | 删削 | 删节号 | 删繁就简

删削
删削[shān xuē] 删改削减（文字） delete; cut out; strike out

删改
删改[shān gǎi] 删削并改动 delete and change; revise：删改原稿 revise and cut down on a manuscript

删汰
删汰[shān tài] 删削淘汰 blot out; cut down on; delete：原文过繁，略加删汰。The original text was too long-winded, and slight deletion had to be made.

删略
删略[shān lüè] 删节省略 leave out; omit：文章转载时作了删略。The article was shortened when it was republished.

删秋
删秋[shān qiū] 同 same as 芟秋 shānqiū

删繁就简
删繁就简[shān fán jiù jiǎn] 删去多余的文字或内容使简明扼要 simplify by cutting out the superfluous：教材要删繁就简。A textbook should avoid the superfluous and adopt the succinct.

删节
删节[shān jié] 删去文字中可有可无或比较次要的部分 expurgate; abridge：删节本 expurgated version; abridged version文章太长，发表时作了一些删节。The article was too long and some deletion was made before it was published.

删节号
删节号[Shān jié hào]另见  省略号 shěnglüèhào

删除
删除[shān chú] 删去 delete; strike, cut or cross out：删除多余的文字。Cut out the unnecessary words.

判
判[pàn]（ㄆㄢˋ）1.分开；分辨 tell apart; tell the difference：判别 differentiate判断 judge; pass a judgement判明 issue a verdict 2.明显（有区别）(differ) apparently; evidently：新旧社会判然不同。The new society is worlds apart from the old one.前后判若两人 become a totally different person; no longer one's old self 3.评定 judge; decide：裁判 referee; umpire评判 pass judgement on sth. or sb.判卷子 mark exam papers 4.判决 pass a verdict：审判 put sb. on trial判案 pass a verdict on a legal case公判 announce the verdict on a case in public相关词组裁判 | 改判 | 公判 | 批判 | 评判 | 审判 | 谈判 | 宣判 | 研判 | 刑事判决 | 国际裁判 | 国家裁判 | 和平谈判 | 领事裁判权判别 | 判处 | 判词 | 判定 | 判读 | 判断 | 判罚 | 判分 | 判官 | 判决 | 判例 | 判明 | 判刑 | 判罪 | 判决书 | 判若鸿沟 | 判若云泥

判例
判例[pàn lì] 已经生效的判决，法院在判决类似案件时可以援用为先例，这种被援用的先例叫做判例。判例有时具有与法律同等的效力。 legal precedent; judicial precedent; concluded case to be cited as an example - oft. as legally binding as law - in deciding a similar case

判决
判决[pàn jué]1.法院对审理结束的案件做出决定 (of the court) pass judgment on a case：判决书 court verdict; court decision; court ruling 2.判断，决定 judgment; decision：比赛中队员要服从裁判的判决。In sports competition the athletes should obey the referee's decisions.

判决书
判决书[pàn jué shū] 法院根据判决写成的文书 court verdict; written judgment

判分
判分[pàn fēn]（～儿 pàn∥fēnr）对试卷或参加比赛人员的表演、动作等判定分数 mark (exam paper, etc.); give scores to an examination paper or a contestant according to his or her performance and execution：判分严 (of a judge or referee) be strict in meting out points判分标准 standards for scoring

判刑
判刑[pàn xíng] 判处刑罚 pass a sentence on (a convict); sentence (a convict) to (death, imprisonment, etc.)

判别
判别[pàn bié] 辨别（不同之处） differentiate：判别是非 tell right from wrong提高判别能力 enhance one's sense of judgement

判处
判处[pàn chǔ] 判决处以某种刑罚 condemn sb. to a certain penalty：判处有期徒刑一年 sentenced to one year's imprisonment

判官
判官[pàn guān] 唐宋时期辅助地方长官处理公事的人员，迷信传说中用来指阎王手下管生死簿的官 (in Tang and Song dynasties) magistrate's assistant in handling government affairs and trying legal cases; (of superstition or mythology) judge in Hades

判定
判定[pàn dìng] 分辨断定 determine; judge：判定去向 determine the whereabouts of从一句话里很难判定他的看法。It's hard to tell from just a single remark what stand he takes.

判断
判断[pàn duàn]1.思维的基本形式之一，就是肯定或否定某种事物的存在，或指明它是否具有某种属性的思维过程。在形式逻辑上用一个命题表达出来。 judge; basic form of thinking, i.e., the process of thinking to confirm or negate the existence of sth. or determine if it possesses certain property, expressed as a proposition in formal logic 2.断定 judgement：你判断得很正确。You've made a sound judgement.正确的判断 sound judgement 3.〈书 fml.〉判决（案件）pass a verdict on a legal case

判明
判明[pàn míng] 分辨清楚；弄清楚 verify; ascertain：判明是非 make a clear distinction between right and wrong判明真相 verify the facts

判罚
判罚[pàn fá] 根据有关规定加以处罚 penalize：违反交通规则的司机将被判罚。Drivers who have violated traffic rules will be penalized.运动员在禁区犯规，判罚点球。One of the football players committed a foul in the penalty area, and a penalty kick was awarded to the opposite team.

判罪
判罪[pàn zuì] 法院根据法律给犯罪的人定罪 (of a court judge) declare sb. guilty

判若云泥
判若云泥[pàn ruò yún ní] 高低差别好像天上的云彩和地下的泥土的距离那样远 be as far apart as the clouds in the sky are from the land on earth; be worlds apart亦 also 判若天渊 pàn ruò tiān yuān

判若鸿沟
判若鸿沟[pàn ruò Hóng gōu] 形容界线很清楚，区别很明显 (of a boundary or distinction) clearly cut; (of difference) conspicuous; as different as poles apart另见  鸿沟 Hónggōu

判词
判词[pàn cí]1.判决书的旧称 old term for 判决书 pànjuéshū 2.断语；结论 judgement; conclusion

判读
判读[pàn dú] 利用已知的视觉信息符号来判断新获得的视觉信息的含义 interpret; read and make a judgement; make use of visual data in hand to determine the implication of newly-acquired visual data：卫星照片判读 interpretation of satellite photos通过图像分析，把断层的活动性质判读出来 interpret the nature of a fault movement through graphical analyses

刨
刨[bào]（ㄅㄠˋ）（鉋、鑤）1.刨子或刨床 plane; planer; planing machine：刨刃儿 plane iron牛头刨 shaping machine平刨 flat plane槽刨 grooving plane 2.用刨子或刨床刮平木料或钢材等 make wood or steel smooth by use of a plane or planing machine：刨木头 plane a wood这张桌面没有刨平。The surface of this table has not been planed smooth.另见  páo刨[páo]（ㄆㄠˊ）1.挖掘 dig; unearth：刨土 dig earth刨坑 dig a pit 2.从原有事物中除去；减去 substract; minus：十五天刨去五天，只剩下十天了。Fifteen minus five - there are only ten days left.另见  bào相关词组龙门刨 | 牛头刨刨冰 | 刨除 | 刨床 | 刨刀 | 刨工 | 刨花 | 刨子 | 刨根儿 | 刨花板 | 刨根问底儿

刨冰
刨冰[bào bīng] 一种冷食，把冰刨成碎片，加上果汁等，现做现吃 ice shavings; cold snack of shaved ice flavoured with fruit juice：菠萝块儿刨冰 ice shavings with pineapple cubes

刨刀
刨刀[bào dāo]1.刨床上用的刀具，结构跟车刀相似 planer tool, similar to a lathe tool in structure 2.木工用的机械刨的刀具，片状，扁长 flat, narrow and long cutting tool of carpenter's planing machine 3.刨子上刮削木料的部分 plane iron亦 also 刨铁 bàotiě 或 or 刨刃儿 bàorènr

刨子
刨子[bào zi] 刮平木料用的手工工具 plane; carpenter's tool for shaving a wood surface in order to make it smooth or level

刨工
刨工[bào gōng]1.用刨床切削金属材料的工种 planing; process of operating a planing machine to cut metal material 2.做上述工作的技术工人 planing machine operator; planer

刨床
刨床[bào chuáng]1.金属切削机床，用来加工金属材料的平面和各种直线的成型面 planer; planing machine; metal cutting machine, used to process the surface of metal materials and flat shapes 2.刨子上的木制部分 the wooden part of a plane

刨根儿
刨根儿[páo gēn r]〈比喻 fig.〉追究底细 get to the bottom of things; look deeply into：这件事带出了另一件事，可非刨刨根儿不可。Something else emerged in the wake of what happened, and we need to get to the bottom of it.

刨根问底儿
刨根问底儿[páo gēn wèn dǐ r] 追究底细；寻根究底 get into the whys and wherefores of things

刨花
刨花[bào huā] 刨木料时刨下来的薄片，多呈卷状 wood shavings; thin layers planed off wood, usu. in rolls

刨花板
刨花板[bào huā bǎn] 用刨花和经过加工的碎木料拌以胶合剂压制成的板材，可以制造家具、包装箱等 shaving board; board made by pressing wood shavings and pulverized wood mixed with adhesive, used as a material for making furniture, packaging crates, etc.

刨除
刨除[páo chú] 从原有的事物中除去；减去 leave out; exclude; minus

利
利[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）1.锋利；锐利（跟‘钝’相对 as opposed to ‘blunt’）sharp：利刃 sharp knife; sharp sword利爪 sharp claws 2.顺利；便利 smooth; favourable; advantage：不利 unfavourable; disadvantage成败利钝 successes and failures, advantages and disadvantages 3.利益（跟‘害’或‘弊’相对 as opposed to ‘harm’or ‘disadvantage’）benefits; interests：利弊 advantages and disadvantages; plusses and minuses有利 be advantageous to; be favourable to兴利除害 promote what is useful and abolish what is harmful 4.利润或利息 profit; interest：暴利 sudden huge profits; exorbitant profits薄利多销 small profits but quick turnover本利两清。Both the capital and interest have been cleared up. 5.使有利 benefit：毫不利己，专门利人 bring benefit (or do good) to other people without any thought of oneself 6.(Lì) 姓 a surname相关词组薄利 | 暴利 | 本利 | 便利 | 不利 | 创利 | 纯利 | 单利 | 地利 | 锋利 | 福利 | 复利 | 高利 | 功利 | 股利 | 亨利 | 红利 | 厚利 | 互利 | 吉利 | 尖利 | 监利 | 净利 | 两利 | 流利 | 麻利 | 毛利 | 名利 | 牟利 | 年利 | 权利 | 让利 | 锐利 | 舍利 | 胜利 | 失利 | 势利 | 爽利 | 水利 | 税利 | 顺利 | 私利 | 微利 | 犀利 | 盈利 | 营利 | 赢利 | 有利 | 余利 | 渔利 | 月利 | 债利 | 重利 | 专利 | 发利市 | 氟利昂 | 负利率 | 高利贷 | 马利亚 | 名利场 | 势利眼 | 战利品 | 功利主义 | 权利能力 | 胜利果实 | 水利工程 | 水利枢纽 | 惟利是图 | 兴利除弊 | 名缰利锁 | 损人利己 | 修旧利废 | 因势利导 | 综合利用 | 急功近利 | 民事权利 | 无往不利 | 一本万利 | 渔人之利 | 争权夺利 | 政治权利 | 普罗列塔利亚 | 尼格罗澳大利亚人种 | 鹬蚌相争，渔人得利利弊 | 利导 | 利钝 | 利多 | 利害 | 利金 | 利空 | 利口 | 利禄 | 利落 | 利率 | 利尿 | 利器 | 利钱 | 利权 | 利刃 | 利润 | 利市 | 利税 | 利索 | 利息 | 利益 | 利用 | 利诱 | 利于 | 利嘴 | 利滚利 | 利己主义 | 利令智昏 | 利欲熏心 | 利息所得税

利于
利于[lì yú] 对某人或某事物有利 be of advantage to; benefit：忠言逆耳利于行。Frank words offend the ear but are good for improving one's conduct.

利令智昏
利令智昏[lì lìng zhì hūn] 贪图私利使头脑发昏，忘掉一切 be blinded by lust for gain

利刃
利刃[lì rèn]1.锋利的刀刃 sharp blade; sharp edge 2.指锋利的刀、剑 sharp knife or sword：手持利刃 hold a sharp sword

利口
利口[lì kǒu]1.能说会道的嘴 glib tongue：一张利口 a glib tongue亦 also 利嘴 lìzuǐ 2.〈方 dial.〉爽口 tasty and refreshing：这几道凉菜，吃起来真利口。These cold dishes are quite tasty and refreshing.

利嘴
利嘴[lì zuǐ] 同 same as 利口 lìkǒu ①：一张利嘴 a glib tongue利嘴不饶人。A person with a sharp tongue never gives way to others.

利器
利器[lì qì]1.锋利的兵器 sharp weapon：精兵利器 good troops and sharp weapons 2.有效的工具 good tool：计算机是统计工作的利器。Computers are good tools for statistical work.

利多
利多[lì duō] 指对市场行情有利，可能引起价格上涨的消息 favourable information for the market, which may lead to a rise in prices亦 also 利好 lìhǎo

利害
利害[lì hài] 利益和损害 advantages and disadvantages; gains and losses：不计利害 regardless of gains or losses利害得失 gains and losses利害攸关（利害所关，指有密切的利害关系）concern someone's vital interests利害[lì hai] 同 same as 厉害 lì·hai

利导
利导[lì dǎo]另见  因势利导 yīn shì lì dǎo

利尿
利尿[lì niào] 促进排尿 diuresis：吃西瓜利尿。Eating watermelon helps to promote diuresis.

利己主义
利己主义[lì jǐ zhǔ yì] 只顾自己利益而不顾别人利益和集体利益的思想 egoism; tendency to consider only oneself and one's own interests without any thought of others and others' interests and the collective interests

利市
利市[lì shì]1.〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 利润 lìrùn：利市三倍 threefold profits 2.〈方 dial.〉买卖顺利的预兆 omen of good business; omen of good market：发个利市 do a good business 3.〈方 dial.〉吉利 lucky：讨个利市 seek good luck 4.〈方 dial.〉送给办事人的赏钱 tips

利弊
利弊[lì bì] 好处和害处 advantages and disadvantages; pros and cons：权衡利弊 weigh the advantages and disadvantages两种方法各有利弊。There are both advantages and disadvantages about the two methods.

利息
利息[lì xī]因存款、放款而得到的本金以外的钱（区别于‘本金’differentiated from ‘principal’ or ‘capital’） (on a deposit or loan) interest

利息所得税
利息所得税[lì xī suǒ dé shuì] 国家对个人存款、有价证券等所得的利息征收的所得税 interest tax; tax the state imposes on the interest accrued on personal deposits, negotiable securities, etc.

利权
利权[lì quán]经济上的权益（多指国家的 oft. of countries）economic rights and interests：利权外溢 lose economic rights and interests to foreigners挽回利权 recover economic rights and interests

利欲熏心
利欲熏心[lì yù xūn xīn] 贪财图利的欲望迷住了心窍 be blinded by greed; be obsessed with the desire for gains; be overcome by covetousness

利润
利润[lì rùn] 经营工商业等赚的钱 profit

利滚利
利滚利[lì gǔn lì] 高利贷的一种，利息变作本金再生利息，利上加利，越滚越多 at compound interest; a kind of usurious loan in which interest is tuned into capital for added interest like a snowball亦 also 利上滚利 lì shàng gǔn lì

利率
利率[lì lǜ] 利息和本金的比率 interest rate; ratio between interest and capital in a bank account

利用
利用[lì yòng]1.使事物或人发挥效能 use; utilize; make use of：废物利用 make use of the waste materials利用当地的有利条件发展畜牧业 make use of the favourable local conditions to develop husbandry 2.用手段使人或事物为自己服务 use sb. or sth. for one's own ends; take advantage of：互相利用 each using the other for his own ends

利益
利益[lì yì] 好处 interest; benefit; profit：物质利益 material benefits个人利益服从集体利益。Subordinate the personal interests to the collective interests.

利禄
利禄[lì lù]〈书 fml.〉（官吏的）钱财和爵禄 rank and wealth：功名利禄 high official positions and riches利禄小人 villain bent on positions and riches

利税
利税[lì shuì] 利润和税金 profits and taxes：造纸厂已向国家上缴利税一千万元。The paper mill has paid 10 million yuan to the state in the form of profits and taxes.

利空
利空[lì kōng] 指对市场行情不利，可能引起价格下跌的消息 unfavourable information for the market, which may lead to a fall in prices亦 also 利淡 lìdàn

利索
利索[lì suo] 同 same as 利落 lì·luo：手脚利索 nimble把屋子收拾利索了。The room (or house) has been tidied.

利落
利落[lì luo]1.（言语、动作）灵活敏捷，不拖泥带水 (of speech and movement) agile; nimble; dexterous：说话利落 speak clearly动作挺利落 very agile movements 2.整齐有条理 neat; orderly：身上穿得干净利落 neatly dressed 3.完毕 be over; finish; be settled：事情已经办利落了。The matter is all settled.病还没有好利落 not yet recovered completely from illness

利诱
利诱[lì yòu] 用利益引诱 lure by promise of gain：威逼利诱 coerce and lure; alternate intimidation and bribery; combine threats with inducements

利金
利金[lì jīn]〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 利息 lìxī

利钝
利钝[lì dùn]1.锋利或不锋利 sharp or blunt：刀剑有利钝。The swords are either sharp or blunt. 2.顺利或不顺利 smooth going or rough; smoothness and ruggedness; fortune and misfortune：成败利钝 successes and failures; advantages and disadvantages

利钱
利钱[lì qian] 同 same as 利息 lìxī

别
别1[bié]（ㄅㄧㄝˊ）1.分离 leave; part：告别 say goodbye to sb.; leave, take leave of; part from临别纪念 parting souvenir; sth. to remember one by; memento久别重逢 meet again after a long separation 2.另外 other; another：别人 someone else; other people; another person; others别称 another name; alternative name别有用心 have ulterior motives; have an axe to grind 3.〈方 dial.〉转动；转变 turn; change：她把头别了过去。She turned her head.这个人的脾气一时别不过来。His temper is difficult to change in a short time. 4.(Bié) 姓 a surname别2[bié]（ㄅㄧㄝˊ）1.区分；区别 differentiate; distinguish：辨别 differentiate; distinguish鉴别 discern; discriminate; differentiate; distinguish分门别类 classify; put into different categories 2.差别 difference; distinction：天渊之别 a world of difference; poles apart 3.类别 classification; category：性别 sex distinction; sex职别 official rank派别 faction; group; school of thought级别 rank; level; grade; scale别3[bié]（ㄅㄧㄝˊ）1.用别针等把另一样东西附着或固定在纸、布等物体上 fasten sth. with a pin or clip to a piece of paper, cloth, etc.：把两张发票别在一起 pin or clip the two invoices together胸前别着一朵红花 with a big red flower pinned to one's breast 2.插住；用东西卡住 stick in; insert in order to inhibit the movement of sth. or sb.：皮带上别着一支枪 with a gun stuck in one's belt把门别上。Bolt the door. 3.摔跤时用腿使绊把对方摔倒 (in wrestling) cause sb. to stumble by a swinging movement of one's leg; trip up 4.两个人朝同一方向行车时，一方故意用车阻碍另一方车的前轮，使不能正常行进 (when two bikes or cars are advancing in the same direction) deliberately hinder the advance of a bike or car with one's own：别车 stop an advancing bike or car with one's own别4[bié]（ㄅㄧㄝˊ）1.表示禁止或劝阻，跟‘不要’的意思相同 [used in giving commands or advice] don't; had better not (the meaning same as 不要 bùyào)：别冒冒失失的。Don't act rashly.你别走了，在这儿住两天吧。Don't leave. Stay here for a couple of days. 2.表示揣测，通常跟‘是’字合用（所揣测的事情，往往是自己所不愿意的）[usu. followed by 是 shì, indicating conjecture of sth. against one's own wish]：约定的时间都过了，别是他不来了吧？He agreed to be here by now. I hope he hasn't changed his mind.另见  biè别[biè]（ㄅㄧㄝˋ）（彆）〈方 dial.〉改变别人坚持的意见或习性（多用于‘别不过’usu. used in the phrase 别不过 biè·bu guò）persuade sb. to change his opinion or give up his idea：我想不依他，可是又别不过他。I don't want him to get his way, but I can't talk him round.另见  bié相关词组辨别 | 差别 | 辞别 | 道别 | 分别 | 告别 | 个别 | 各别 | 话别 | 级别 | 饯别 | 鉴别 | 久别 | 诀别 | 暌别 | 阔别 | 类别 | 离别 | 临别 | 留别 | 流别 | 派别 | 判别 | 区别 | 识别 | 送别 | 特别 | 握别 | 惜别 | 细别 | 性别 | 叙别 | 永别 | 长别 | 甄别 | 职别 | 作别 | 错别字 | 闹别扭 | 曲别针 | 特别快车 | 分门别类 | 三大差别 | 生离死别 | 云泥之别 | 特别行政区 | 乌孜别克族别称 | 别处 | 别传 | 别管 | 别号 | 别集 | 别家 | 别价 | 别离 | 别论 | 别名 | 别扭 | 别情 | 别人 | 别史 | 别是 | 别墅 | 别提 | 别绪 | 别针 | 别致 | 别子 | 别字 | 别嘴 | 别动队 | 别出心裁 | 别具匠心 | 别具一格 | 别具只眼 | 别开生面 | 别树一帜 | 别无二致 | 别无长物 | 别有洞天 | 别有风味 | 别有天地 | 别有用心

别人
别人[bié rén] 另外的人 someone else：家里只有母亲和我，没有别人。There are only my mother and I in our family - nobody else.别人[bié ren] 指自己或某人以外的人 other people; others：别人都同意，就你一人反对。All others agree; only you do not.把方便让给别人，把困难留给自己 leave the easy part of a job to others while taking the difficult part oneself; making things convenient for others at one's own expense

别价
别价[bié jie]〈方 dial.〉表示劝阻或禁止 indicating an attempt to prevent or forbid; please don't：您别价，等等再说。Don't go. Please wait a bit longer.

别传
别传[bié zhuàn] 记载某人逸事的传记 anecdotage; biography about one's anecdotes; informal biography; anecdotal biography

别具一格
别具一格[bié jù yī gé] 另有一种风格 have a style of one's own; have a unique or distinctive style

别具匠心
别具匠心[bié jù jiàng xīn] 另有一种巧妙的心思（多指文学、艺术方面创造性的构思 mostly in creating literary and artistic works）show ingenuity; have originality

别具只眼
别具只眼[bié jù zhī yǎn] 另有一种独到的见解 see what others fail to see; see what others cannot; have an original view; have a special or unique insight

别出心裁
别出心裁[bié chū xīn cái] 独创一格，与众不同 adopt an original approach; try to be different

别动队
别动队[bié dòng duì] 指离开主力单独执行特殊任务的部队 special detachment; commando; military unit designed to carry out special tasks independent of the main force

别史
别史[bié shǐ] 编年体、纪传体以外，杂记历代或一代史实的史书 history books other than those written in a biographical or annalistic style; unofficial history; separate history (i.e. privately compiled history)

别号
别号[bié hào]（～儿 biéhàor）名、字以外另起的称号 alias; another name (in addition to one's official and courtesy names)：李白字太白，别号青莲居士。Li Bai, whose courtesy name was Taibai, was also known as the Green Lotus Hermit.

别名
别名[bié míng]（～儿 biémíngr）正式名字以外的名称 another name; alternative name; name other than the official one

别嘴
别嘴[biè zuǐ]〈方 dial.〉绕嘴 a bit of a mouthful; tongue-twister：这段文字半文不白，读起来别嘴。This paragraph is a bit of a mouthful (or a tongue-twister) as it is partly literary and partly in the vernacular.

别墅
别墅[bié shù] 在郊区或风景区建造的供休养用的园林住宅 villa; large and imposing garden residence built in suburbs or scenic spots

别处
别处[bié chù] 另外的地方 other place; elsewhere：这里没有你要的那种鞋，你到别处看看吧。We don't have the shoes you want. Try somewhere else.

别子
别子[bié zǐ]〈古代 arch.〉指天子、诸侯的嫡长子以外的儿子 younger son(s) of an emperor or lord别子[bié zi]1.线装书的套子上或字画手卷上用来别住开口的东西，多用骨头制成 pin (usu. made of bone) for holding fast an old-fashioned hard-covered book, or a painting or calligraphy scroll 2.烟袋荷包的坠饰 pipe pouch pendant

别字
别字[bié zì]1.写错或读错的字，比如把‘包子’写成‘饱子’，是写别字；把‘破绽’的‘绽’(zhàn)读成‘定’，是读别字 incorrectly written or mispronounced character; malapropism, e.g. writing 包子 as 饱子 and pronouncing 绽 zhàn in 破绽 pò·zhàn as 定 dìng亦 also 白字 báizì 2.别号 another name (in addition to one's official and courtesy names); alias

别家
别家[bié jiā] 另外的人家或企业 other households, enterprises; etc.：我不是这里人，你到别家打听一下看。I am new here; you had better ask somebody else.别家商店都关门了，只有这一家还在营业。All stores except this one are closed.

别开生面
别开生面[bié kāi shēng miàn] 另外开展新的局面或创造新的形式 be an eye-opener; break a new trail; break ground：在词的发展史上，苏轼和辛弃疾都是别开生面的大家。Su Shi and Xin Qiji were both great masters that opened new vistas in the history of ci poetry.

别情
别情[bié qíng] 离别的情怀 sorrow of separation; sentiment felt at parting：老友重逢，畅叙别情。When the old friends met, they talked of their sad feelings after their previous parting.

别扭
别扭[biè niu]1.不顺心；难对付 awkward; difficult; uncomfortable：这个天气真别扭，一会儿冷，一会儿热。The weather is unpredictable: cold one minute and hot the next.他的脾气挺别扭，说话要注意。He is of uncertain temper; keep this in mind when you talk to him. 2.意见不相投 not see eye to eye; disagree：闹别扭 be at odds; fall out两个人有些别别扭扭的，说不到一块儿。The two of them are often at loggerheads; they simply don't see eye to eye with each other. 3.（说话、作文）不通顺；不流畅 (of speech or writing) unnatural; awkward

别提
别提[bié tí] 表示程度之深不必细说 no need to mention; needless to say; you can well imagine：他那个高兴劲儿啊，就别提了。You can well imagine how happy he was.

别无二致
别无二致[bié wú èr zhì] 没有两样；没有区别 without the slightest difference; just the same; identical：这两个人的思想别无二致。They are no different in their thinking.

别无长物
别无长物[bié wú cháng wù]没有多余的东西。形容穷困或俭朴。be in possession of nothing other than (is absolutely necessary); be in reduced circumstances（长 cháng，旧读 formerly pronounced zhàng）

别是
别是[bié shì] 莫非是 used in expressing anxiety about sth. untoward：他这时还没来，别是不肯来吧！He hasn't come yet. I hope he is not unwilling to come.

别有天地
别有天地[bié yǒu tiān dì]另有一种境界。形容风景等引人入胜。place of unique charm and beauty; scenery of exceptional charm; altogether different world

别有洞天
别有洞天[bié yǒu dòng tiān]另有一种境界。形容景物等引人入胜。place of unique charm and beauty; scenery of exceptional charm; altogether different world

别有用心
别有用心[bié yǒu yòng xīn] 言论或行动中另有不可告人的企图 have ulterior motives; have an axe to grind

别有风味
别有风味[bié yǒu fēng wèi] 另有一种趣味或特色 have a distinctive flavour or feature：围着篝火吃烤肉，别有风味。It is really special to have a barbecue over a campfire.

别树一帜
别树一帜[bié shù yī zhì] 形容与众不同，另成一家 set up a new banner; found a new school of thought; have a style of one's own

别离
别离[bié lí] 离别 leave; take leave of：别离了家乡，踏上征途 leave home and start out on a long journey

别称
别称[bié chēng] 正式名称以外的名称，如湘是湖南的别称，鄂是湖北的别称 name other than formal one; another name; alternative name, e.g. Xiang is another name for Hunan, and E is another name for Hubei

别管
别管[bié guǎn]〈连词 conj.〉跟‘无论’相同 no matter (who, what, etc.), having the same meaning as 无论 wúlùn：别管是谁，一律按规章办事。No matter who it is, we shall act according to principle.

别绪
别绪[bié xù] 离别时的情绪 surge of sentimental feeling at parting; sorrow of separation：离愁别绪 parting sorrows

别致
别致[bié zhì] 新奇，跟寻常不同 original; novel; exquisite：这座楼房式样很别致。The building is exquisite.

别论
别论[bié lùn] 另外的对待或评论 another or a different matter; different story：如果他确因有事，不能来，则当别论。If he really is detained by urgent business, that makes it a different matter.

别针
别针[bié zhēn]（～儿 biézhēnr）1.一种弯曲而有弹性的针，尖端可以打开，也可以扣住，用来把布片、纸片等固定在一起或固定在衣物上 safety pin; flexible bent pin with a pointed tip which can be opened and clicked shut, for holding pieces of cloth, paper, etc., or fastening them to clothing 2.别在胸前或领口的装饰品，多用金银、玉石等制成 brooch; ornament generally made of gold, silver or jade, pinned to the clothing for ornamentation

别集
别集[bié jí]收录个人的作品而成的诗文集，如白居易《白氏长庆集》（区别于‘总集’as compared with‘anthology’）collected works of an individual, e.g. Bai Juyi's Changqing Collected Works of Bai Juyi

刬
刬[chǎn]（ㄔㄢˇ）（剗） 同 same as 铲 chǎn ②：刬除 eradicate; eliminate另见  chàn刬[chàn]（ㄔㄢˋ）（剗）另见  一刬 yīchàn另见  chǎn相关词组一刬

刭
刭[jǐng]（ㄐㄧㄥˇ）（剄）〈书 fml.〉用刀割脖子 cut (or slit) the throat：自刭 commit suicide by cutting one's throat相关词组自刭

刮
刮1[guā]（ㄍㄨㄚ）1.用刀等贴着物体的表面移动，把物体表面上的某些东西去掉或取下来 remove sth. by rubbing over the surface of it with sth. sharp or rough; scrape; shave：刮胡子 shave the beard刮锅 scrape a pot clean刮垢磨光 scrape the dirt and polish - improve oneself 2.在物体表面上涂抹（多用于糨糊一类稠东西） spread over the surface of sth. (paste, etc.); smear with (paste, etc.)：刮糨子 size; stiffen (cloth) by spreading paste over it 3.搜刮（财物） plunder; fleece; extort 4.〈方 dial.〉训斥 reprimand; rebuke刮2[guā]（ㄍㄨㄚ）（颳）（风）吹 (of the wind) blow：又刮起风来了！It's blowing again!相关词组搜刮 | 耳刮子 | 雨刮器 | 搜肠刮肚 | 一塌刮子刮刀 | 刮宫 | 刮脸 | 刮目 | 刮痧 | 刮削 | 刮鼻子 | 刮地皮 | 刮刮叫 | 刮胡子 | 刮脸皮 | 刮舌子 | 刮目相看

刮刀
刮刀[guā dāo] 手工工具，条形，横截面有扁平形、半圆形、三角形等不同形状。主要用来刮去工件表面的微量金属，提高工件的外形精度和光洁度。 scraper; scraping knife; hand tool, flat, semi-circular or triangular in shape, mainly used to polish the surface of a workpiece so as to improve its precision and smooth finish

刮刮叫
刮刮叫[guā guā jiào] 同 same as 呱呱叫 guāguājiào

刮削
刮削[guā xiāo]1.用刀子一类的工具把物体表面的东西去掉 scraper; remove sth. from the surface of an object with a sharp tool 2.〈比喻 fig.〉克扣或盘剥 embezzle or practise usury：刮削钱财 embezzle money from others

刮地皮
刮地皮[guā dì pí]〈比喻 fig.〉搜刮民财 extort money from the people; bleed sb. white

刮宫
刮宫[guā gōng] 把子宫口扩大，用特制的医疗器械去掉胚胎或子宫的内膜。刮宫手术多用于人工流产。 D and C; dilatation and curettage; gynaecological procedure in which the cervix is dilated and the embryo or endometrium is scraped away, mostly used for abortion

刮痧
刮痧[guā shā] 民间治疗某些疾病的方法，用铜钱等物蘸水或油刮患者的胸、背等处，使局部皮肤充血，减轻内部炎症 popular folk treatment for certain illnesses by scraping the forehead, neck, chest or back of the patient with a copper coin, etc., to cause congestion in the skin vessels to alleviate pain or inflammation

刮目
刮目[guā mù] 指彻底改变眼光 view things in a completely new light：令人刮目 be marvelled at刮目相看 marvel at a person's progress or achievements

刮目相看
刮目相看[guā mù xiāng kàn] 用新的眼光来看待 treat a person with increased respect; look at a person with new eyes亦 also 刮目相待 guāmù xiāng dài

刮胡子
刮胡子[guā hú zi]〈方 dial.〉〈比喻 fig.〉训斥 reprimand; rebuke

刮脸
刮脸[guā liǎn] 用剃刀等把脸上的胡须和寒毛刮掉 shave; remove the beard and hair from one's face with a razor

刮脸皮
刮脸皮[guā liǎn pí]〈方 dial.〉用手指头在脸上划，表示对方不知羞耻 rub one's own cheek with a finger to shame a person

刮舌子
刮舌子[guā shé zi] 刮除舌面污垢的用具 tongue scraper; implement for cleaning the tongue

刮鼻子
刮鼻子[guā bí zi]1.用食指刮对方的鼻子，表示处罚对方（多用在玩牌游戏时） rub the nose of a person with one's forefinger as a punishment (in playing cards) 2.刮自己的鼻子，表示使对方感到羞臊或难为情 rub one's own nose to embarrass a person 3.〈方 dial.〉〈比喻 fig.〉训斥或斥责 reprimand; rebuke：他让连长狠狠地刮了顿鼻子。The company commander reprimanded him severely.

到
到[dào]（ㄉㄠˋ）1.达于某一点；到达；达到 get to a place; arrive; reach：到期 become due; mature; expire迟到 be late火车到站了。The train has arrived at the station.从星期三到星期五 from Wednesday to Friday 2.往 go to; leave for：到郊外去 go to the suburbs到群众中去 go to the masses (people) 3.用做动词的补语，表示动作有结果 [as the complement of a verb indicating the result of an action]：看到 have seen sth.办得到 can do sth.说到一定要做到。One must do what one says; be as good as one's word想不到你来了。I didn't expect that you would come. 4.周到 considerate; thoughtful; thorough：想得很到。You have thought of everything.有不到的地方请原谅。Hope you will forgive me if I have not been thoughtful enough. 5.(Dào) 姓 a surname相关词组报到 | 迟到 | 达到 | 得到 | 等到 | 独到 | 感到 | 画到 | 驾到 | 精到 | 老到 | 临到 | 签到 | 直到 | 周到 | 想不到 | 想得到 | 马到成功 | 手到擒来 | 水到渠成 | 一年到头 | 一天到晚 | 初来乍到 | 面面俱到 | 先来后到 | 一竿子到底 | 不到黄河心不死 | 车到山前必有路 | 打破沙锅问到底到案 | 到场 | 到处 | 到达 | 到底 | 到点 | 到顶 | 到家 | 到来 | 到手 | 到头 | 到位 | 到职 | 到了儿 | 到头来

到了儿
到了儿[dào liǎo r]〈方 dial.〉到终了；到底 at last; in the end; finally：我这样为你卖命，到了儿还落个不是。I worked myself to the bone for you, and in the end I was still in the wrong.今天盼，明天盼，到了儿也没盼到他回来。(She) longed for him day after day, and in the end still did not get to see his return.

到位
到位[dào wèi] 到达适当的位置或预定的地点 be in place or position; reach the designated place： 传球到位。The ball is passed where it is needed.资金到位。The capital is in place.发电机组已安装到位。The generating set has been entirely installed.

到场
到场[dào chǎng] 亲自到某种集会或活动的场所 turn up; show up; be present：展览会开幕的时候，许多专家学者都到场表示祝贺。When the exhibition opens, many experts are present to express their congratulations.

到处
到处[dào chù] 各处；处处 all about; at all places; everywhere：祖国到处是欣欣向荣的景象。Signs of prosperity are everywhere in our motherland.到处找也没有找到。I looked all around for it but still could not find it.

到头
到头[dào tóu]（～儿 dào∥tóur）到了尽头 to the end; at an end

到头来
到头来[dào tóu lái]〈副词 adv.〉到末了儿；结果（多用于坏的方面 mostly used in the negative）in the end; only to; finally：倒行逆施，到头来只能搬起石头砸自己的脚。You are trying to put the clock back and go against the tide. In the end it amounts to lifting a rock only to drop it on your own foot.

到家
到家[dào jiā] 达到相当高的水平或标准 consummate; reach a rather high level or standard：把工作做到家 do the work perfectly他的表演还不到家。His performance is still far from perfect.

到底
到底[dào dǐ] 到尽头；到终点 to the end; to the finish：一竿子到底 get to the bottom of the matter将革命进行到底 carry the revolution through to the end到底[dào dǐ]〈副词 adv.〉1.表示经过种种变化或曲折最后实现的情况 at last; eventually; finally：新方法到底试验成功了。The new method has finally proved to be a success.我想了好久，到底明白了。After thinking for a long while, I finally saw the point. 2.用在问句里，表示深究 [used in an interrogative sentence for emphasis] after all：火星上到底有没有生命？Is there any life on Mars after all?你跟他们到底有什么关系？What relations do you really have with them? 3.毕竟 after all; when all is said and done：到底还是年轻人干劲大。It is the young people who have the greatest vigour after all.南方到底是南方，四月就插秧了。After all, the south is the south, so though it is still April, rice seedlings have already been transplanted.

到手
到手[dào shǒu] 拿到手；获得 in one's hands; in one's possession：眼看就要到手的粮食，决不能让洪水冲走。The grain is nearly in our hands. We mustn't allow the flood to carry it away.

到来
到来[dào lái]来临（多用于事物）arrival; advent：在雨季到来之前做好防汛准备。All preparations for flood prevention must be completed before the arrival of the monsoon season.生产建设的新高潮已经到来。A new upsurge in production and construction has been reached.

到案
到案[dào àn] 审理案件时，与案件有关的人出庭 (of those involved in a case) appear in court

到点
到点[dào diǎn] 达到规定的时间 fixed time (is up)：商店到了点就开门。The shop is open at a fixed time.快到点了，咱们赶紧进场吧。It is almost time. Let's hurry up and get in.

到职
到职[dào zhí] 接受任命或委派，来到工作岗位 assume office; take up one's post

到达
到达[dào dá] 到了（某一地点、某一阶段） arrive; get to; reach (a place or a period)：火车于下午3时到达北京。The train arrived in Beijing at 3∶00 in the afternoon.

到顶
到顶[dào dǐng] 到顶点；到了尽头 reach the limit; for all there is in it; go as far as possible：要破除增产到顶的思想。We must get rid of the idea that production has reached its limit.

刲
刲[kuī]（ㄎㄨㄟ）〈书 fml.〉割 cut; reap

刳
刳[kū]（ㄎㄨ）〈书 fml.〉剖开；挖空 hollow out：刳木为舟 hollow out a tree trunk to make a canoe; fashion a canoe out of a tree trunk

刵
刵[èr]（ㄦˋ）〈古代 arch.〉割耳朵的酷刑 savage torture by cutting off one's ears

制
制[zhì]（ㄓˋ）（製）1.制造 make; manufacture; produce; turn out; fabricate：制版 plate making制革 leather making制图 charting; drawing; mapping; cartography炼制 refine; melt; temper by fire缝制 tailor 2.拟订；规定 work out; draw up or out; mark out; formulate; stipulate; prescribe：制定 constitute; establish; frame; formulate; map; lay down; set down因地制宜 adjust measures to local conditions 3.用强力约束；限定；管束 rule; control; inhibit; restrict; restrain; limit; hold in：压制 inhibit; suppress; stifle; put a lid on限制 restrict; limit; confine管制 control; put under surveillance节制 abstain from; deny oneself; refrain from; abstinence; continency; abstention; sobriety; temperateness制伏 fight down; tame; overwhelm; overmaster; override; subdue 4.制度 system; institution：全民所有制 ownership by the whole people民主集中制 democratic centralism相关词组币制 | 编制 | 采制 | 创制 | 抵制 | 帝制 | 扼制 | 遏制 | 法制 | 仿制 | 复制 | 改制 | 公制 | 管制 | 灌制 | 规制 | 绘制 | 机制 | 挟制 | 监制 | 建制 | 节制 | 精制 | 旧制 | 巨制 | 克制 | 控制 | 卤制 | 录制 | 美制 | 米制 | 炮制 | 配制 | 牵制 | 钳制 | 强制 | 鞣制 | 赛制 | 摄制 | 市制 | 试制 | 守制 | 受制 | 数制 | 税制 | 特制 | 提制 | 体制 | 调制 | 统制 | 辖制 | 限制 | 形制 | 学制 | 熏制 | 压制 | 研制 | 抑制 | 译制 | 英制 | 应制 | 专制 | 转制 | 自制 | 半制品 | 粗制品 | 禁制品 | 八进制 | 百分制 | 包乘制 | 代议制 | 二部制 | 二进制 | 分税制 | 父权制 | 公有制 | 共和制 | 供给制 | 股份制 | 国际制 | 家长制 | 井田制 | 联合制 | 两党制 | 两院制 | 母权制 | 募兵制 | 内婚制 | 十进制 | 实名制 | 双轨制 | 私有制 | 所有制 | 五分制 | 议会制 | 粗制滥造 | 控制数字 | 预制构件 | 出奇制胜 | 后发制人 | 经济制度 | 克敌制胜 | 社会制度 | 先发制人 | 因地制宜 | 比例税制 | 程序控制 | 复本位制 | 国际公制 | 鸿篇巨制 | 经济体制 | 军事管制 | 君主专制 | 如法炮制 | 市场机制 | 数字控制 | 一国两制 | 志愿兵制 | 自动控制 | 调制解调器 | 个体所有制 | 雇佣兵役制 | 国际单位制 | 国家所有制 | 集体所有制 | 民主集中制 | 全民所有制 | 义务兵役制 | 社会主义所有制制版 | 制备 | 制裁 | 制导 | 制订 | 制定 | 制度 | 制伏 | 制服 | 制衡 | 制剂 | 制件 | 制冷 | 制品 | 制钱 | 制胜 | 制图 | 制约 | 制造 | 制止 | 制作 | 制动器 | 制服呢 | 制高点 | 制海权 | 制空权 | 制式教练

制件
制件[zhì jiàn]另见  作件 zuòjiàn

制伏
制伏[zhì fú] 用强力压制使驯服 fight down; tame; overwhelm; overmaster; override; check; subdue; bring under control亦 also 制服 zhì∥fú

制作
制作[zhì zuò] 同 same as 制造 zhìzào：制作家具 make furniture

制冷
制冷[zhì lěng] 用人工方法取得低温 refrigeration

制剂
制剂[zhì jì] 生药或化学药品经过加工制成的药物，如水剂、酊剂、血清、疫苗 preparation; medicament prepared from raw medicinal herbs or chemical pharmaceuticals, e.g. aqua, tincture, blood serum, and vaccine

制动器
制动器[zhì dòng qì] 使运行中的运输工具、机器等减低速度或停止运动的装置 brake; device designed to make a vehicle or machine in motion slow down or stop; 通称 popularly called 闸 zhá

制品
制品[zhì pǐn] 制造成的物品 products; goods; wares：乳制品 dairy products塑料制品 plastic articles; plastic wares化学制品 chemical products

制图
制图[zhì tú]把实物或想像的物体的形象、大小等在平面上按一定比例描绘出来（多用于机械、工程等设计工作 oft. used in mechanical design, engineering, etc.）charting; drawing; mapping; cartography; protraction

制备
制备[zhì bèi] 化学工业上指经过制造而取得 (in chemical industry) preparation

制定
制定[zhì dìng]定出（法律、规程、计划等）establish; map out; formulate; institute; lay down; set down：制定宪法 establish a constitution制定学习计划 work out a study plan制定学会章程 formulate the constitution for an association, society, etc.

制导
制导[zhì dǎo] 通过无线电装置，控制和引导导弹等，使其按一定轨道运行 control and guidance of a missile, etc., by means of remote control, so that it follows a certain course

制度
制度[zhì dù]1.要求大家共同遵守的办事规程或行动准则 system; institution; rules; regulations：工作制度 work rules and regulations财政制度 fiscal regulations 2.在一定历史条件下形成的政治、经济、文化等方面的体系 system; institution formed under certain historical conditions in the political, economic and cultural fields：社会主义制度 socialist system封建宗法制度 patriarchal clan system of feudalism

制式教练
制式教练[zhì shì jiào liàn] 按照条令规定进行的军人队列动作的教练 formation drill master

制服
制服[zhì fú] 同 same as 制伏 zhì∥fú制服[zhì fú] 军人、机关工作者、学生等穿戴的有规定式样的服装 uniform (as worn by an army personnel, office worker, student, etc.)

制服呢
制服呢[zhì fú ní]用粗毛纱织成的呢子。多半是斜纹的，质地紧密，两面都有绒毛，主要用来做秋冬季制服。woollen uniform coating, made with woollen yarn, diagonal and firm textured, having fuzzy surfaces on both sides, mostly used to make autumn and winter wear

制止
制止[zhì zhǐ]强迫使停止；不允许继续（行动）prevent; stop; deter; check; interdict; refrain; curb; hold out; put down; put a stay on; put a stop to：制止侵略 put an end to aggression我做了一个手势，制止他再说下去。I made a gesture to restrain him from saying any more. or I motioned for him to stop talking.

制海权
制海权[zhì hǎi quán] 海军兵力在一定时间、一定海区所掌握的主动权 thalassocracy; command of the seas; mastery of the seas

制版
制版[zhì bǎn] 制造各种印刷上用的版 plate making：制版车间 plate-making workshop

制空权
制空权[zhì kōng quán] 空军兵力在一定时间、一定空间范围内所掌握的主动权 air supremacy; mastery of the sky; control of the air

制约
制约[zhì yuē] 甲事物本身的存在和变化以乙事物的存在和变化为条件，则甲事物为乙事物所制约 condition; restrict; restrain; limit：互相制约 condition each other; interact

制胜
制胜[zhì shèng] 取胜；战胜 gain or get the upper hand; subdue; beat; ace：出奇制胜 win by surprise; have an ace in the hole制胜敌人 subdue the enemy; defeat the enemy

制衡
制衡[zhì héng] 相互制约，使不偏移 check and balance; check each other to balance：董事会和经理分权制衡。The board of directors and the manager have a division of power in a check and balance relationship.

制裁
制裁[zhì cái] 用强力管束并惩处，使不得胡作非为 apply or impose sanctions against; crack down on：法律制裁 legal sanction; punishment by law经济制裁 economic sanctions

制订
制订[zhì dìng] 创制拟定 draw up; work out; formulate; map out; stipulate for; block in (or out)：制订汉语拼音方案 work out the Scheme for the Chinese Phonetic Alphabet

制造
制造[zhì zào]1.用人工使原材料成为可供使用的物品 make; manufacture; produce; fabricate; turn out：制造机器 manufacture machines制造化肥 produce (chemical) fertilizer 2.人为地造成某种气氛或局面等（含贬义 derog.）concoct; stir up; create：制造纠纷 make trouble; give rise to dissension制造紧张气氛 create tensions

制钱
制钱[zhì qián] 明清两代称由本朝铸造通行的铜钱 copper coins made in the Ming and Qing dynasties

制高点
制高点[zhì gāo diǎn] 军事上指能够俯视、控制周围地面的高地或建筑物等 (in military affairs) commanding elevation or height; high point, e.g. highland or building from which one can have a bird's-eye view and control of the surroundings

刷
刷1[shuā]（ㄕㄨㄚ）1.（刷儿 shuār）刷子 brush：牙刷 toothbrush鞋刷子 shoe brush 2.用刷子清除或涂抹 brush; scrub; clean or paint with a brush：刷牙 brush one's teeth刷鞋 brush shoes刷锅 clean (or scour) a pot用石灰浆刷墙 paint the wall with limewash; whitewash a wall 3.〈比喻 fig.〉除名；淘汰 eliminate (through selection or competition); remove：由于他不守劳动纪律，让厂里给刷了。He was dismissed from the factory due to his failure to follow labour discipline.今年高考他被刷了下来。He flunked this year's college entrance examination.刷2[shuā]（ㄕㄨㄚ）（唰）〈拟声词 onom.〉形容迅速擦过去的声音 swish; rustle; quick sweeping sound：风刮得树叶子刷刷地响。The leaves of the trees rustled in the wind.刷刷地下起雨来了。The rain came down with a swooshing sound.另见  shuà刷[shuà]（ㄕㄨㄚˋ）〈方 dial.〉挑拣 select; pick out：打这堆梨里头刷出几个好的给奶奶送去。Select a few good pears from this pile and give them to grandma.另见  shuā相关词组板刷 | 冲刷 | 粉刷 | 洗刷 | 牙刷 | 印刷 | 雨刷 | 振刷 | 水刷石 | 印刷品 | 印刷体 | 活字印刷刷白 | 刷卡 | 刷拉 | 刷洗 | 刷新 | 刷子

刷卡
刷卡[shuā kǎ]把磁卡放在磁卡机上，使磁头阅读、识别磁卡中的信息，以确认持卡人的身份或增减磁卡中的储存金额。因有的磁卡需在磁卡机上移动，类似刷的动作，所以叫刷卡。swipe one's card; swipe a magnetic card on a magnetic card reading machine so that the magnetic head can read and recognize the information in the card in order to identify the card holder or increase or decrease the amount of money deposited in the card

刷子
刷子[shuā zi] 用毛、棕、塑料丝、金属丝等制成的清除脏物或涂抹膏油等的用具，一般为长形或椭圆形，有的带柄 brush; utensil composed of natural, plastic or metal bristles, and used esp. for sweeping, smoothing, scrubbing, or painting, usu. long or oblong, sometimes with a handle：一把刷子 a brush鞋刷子 shoe brush

刷拉
刷拉[shuā lā]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容迅速擦过去的短促的声音 swishing sound：刷拉一声，柳树上飞走了一只鸟儿。Swish! A bird flew out of the willow.

刷新
刷新[shuā xīn] 刷洗使焕然一新 refurbish; scrub until it looks like new;〈比喻 fig.〉突破旧的而创出新的（记录、内容等）outdo; break through the old and make a new (record, contents, etc.)：在这次运动会上她刷新了一万米赛跑的世界记录。At this sports meet, she broke the world record in the 10,000-metre race.

刷洗
刷洗[shuā xǐ] 用刷子等蘸水洗；把脏东西放在水里清洗 scrub; scour：刷洗地板 scrub the floor刷洗锅碗 scour the pots and pans

刷白
刷白[shuà bái]〈方 dial.〉色白而略微发青 palely white; pale：月亮升起来了，把麦地照得刷白。The cornfield turned white under the moon.一听这话，他的脸立刻变得刷白。Blood drained from his face immediately after he heard these words.

券
券1[quàn]（ㄑㄩㄢˋ）票据或作为凭证的纸片 certificate; ticket; bill; note; warrant; voucher; credence：公债券 government bond入场券 admission ticket券2[quàn]（ㄑㄩㄢˋ）‘券’xuàn 的又音 alternate pronunciation for 券 xuàn另见  xuàn券[xuàn]（ㄒㄩㄢˋ）亦 also quàn 拱券 arch：发券 build an arch (into a wall)打券 build an arch另见  quàn相关词组彩券 | 拱券 | 奖券 | 库券 | 礼券 | 胜券 | 债券 | 证券 | 左券 | 兑换券 | 公债券 | 国库券 | 金圆券 | 可操左券 | 稳操胜券 | 有价证券

刹
刹[chà]（ㄔㄚˋ）佛教的寺庙 Buddhist monastery or temple：古刹 Buddhist temple or monastery; ancient Buddhist temple［刹多罗之省，梵 abbreviation of 刹多罗 chàduōluó, Sanskrit: ksetra］另见  shā刹[shā]（ㄕㄚ）止住（车、机器等） stop (a vehicle); put on the brakes; turn off a machine：把车刹住 stop a car by applying the brakes刹住不正之风 stem all unhealthy social trends另见  chà相关词组宝刹 | 梵刹 | 一刹那刹车 | 刹那

刹车
刹车[shā chē]1.用闸等止住车的行进 stop a vehicle by applying the brakes; put on the brakes 2.停止动力来源，使机器停止运转 stop a machine by cutting off the power; turn off a machine 3.〈比喻 fig.〉停止或制止 check; stem：浮夸风必须刹车。The tendency to boast and exaggerate one's achievements should be checked.亦 also 煞车 shā∥chē刹车[shā chē] 使汽车、摩托车等停止前进的机件、装置 brake; device for slowing or stopping motion, as of a vehicle, especially by contact friction亦 also 煞车 shāchē

刹那
刹那[chà nà] 极短的时间；瞬间 instant; a split second：一刹那 in an instant; in a flash; in a blink of an eye［梵 Sanskrit: ksana］

刺
刺[cī]（ㄘ）〈拟声词 onom.〉sound of slipping：刺的一声，滑了一个跟头 slipped and fell with a swish花炮点着了，刺刺地直冒火星。The firecracker crackled and sparkled when ignited.另见  cì刺[cì]（ㄘˋ）1.尖的东西进入或穿过物体 stab; prick; pierce; thrust：刺伤 stab and wound刺绣 embroider 2.刺激 irritate; stimulate：刺耳 harsh; grating on the ear 3.暗杀 assassinate：遇刺 be assassinated被刺 be assassinated 4.侦探；打听 detect; pry; spy：刺探 make secret enquiries 5.讽刺 criticize：讥刺 ridicule; satirize 6.（刺儿 cìr）尖锐像针的东西 thorn; splinter：鱼刺 fish bone手上扎了个刺 get a thorn (splinter) in one's hand话里别带刺儿。Take the sting out of your words. 7.〈书 fml.〉名片 visiting card：名刺 visiting card另见  cī相关词组冲刺 | 穿刺 | 粉刺 | 讽刺 | 骨刺 | 行刺 | 讥刺 | 棘刺 | 马刺 | 毛刺 | 名刺 | 劈刺 | 拼刺 | 枪刺 | 鱼刺 | 遇刺 | 草刺儿 | 带刺儿 | 挑刺儿 | 肉中刺 | 芒刺在背 | 针刺麻醉 | 条件刺激 | 非条件刺激刺柏 | 刺刀 | 刺耳 | 刺骨 | 刺槐 | 刺激 | 刺客 | 刺啦 | 刺棱 | 刺溜 | 刺目 | 刺挠 | 刺配 | 刺杀 | 刺丝 | 刺探 | 刺猬 | 刺绣 | 刺眼 | 刺痒 | 刺针 | 刺字 | 刺儿话 | 刺儿头 | 刺细胞 | 刺刺不休

刺丝
刺丝[cì sī] 腔肠动物刺细胞内丝状的管子，捕食或自卫时立刻射出来，刺入对方体内并分泌毒液 ecthoraeum; stinging thread; threadlike tube in the nematocysts of coelenterates which, when catching prey or in self-defence, projects and penetrates the prey or offender, and secretes venom

刺儿头
刺儿头[cì r tóu]〈方 dial.〉遇事刁难，不好对付的人 fastidious person; fault-finder; person who is hard to deal with; hard nut to crack

刺儿话
刺儿话[cì r huà] 讥讽人的话 scathing or sarcastic remarks; biting words; vinegary remarks：说刺儿话 speak sarcastically; carry a sting in one's words

刺刀
刺刀[cì dāo] 枪刺 bayonet

刺刺不休
刺刺不休[cì cì bù xiū] 说话没完没了；唠叨 talk incessantly; chatter on and on; chatter like a magpie; gabble on and on; repeat endlessly; keep on clamouring; run off at the mouth; talk one's head off; talk a leg off a donkey

刺啦
刺啦[cī lā]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容撕裂声、迅速划动声等 sound of tearing or scratching：刺啦一声，衣服撕了个口子。The garment was ripped open with a sharp sound.刺啦一声划着了火柴。The match was struck with a rasping sound.

刺字
刺字[cì zì] 在皮肤上刺文字，古代特指在罪犯脸上刺文字 mark the skin with characters; (in ancient times) brand a prisoner by tattooing or other means

刺客
刺客[cì kè] 用武器进行暗杀的人 assassin; murderer (who kills with a weapon)

刺挠
刺挠[cì nao]〈方 dial.〉很痒 itchy：有好些天没洗澡了，身上刺挠得很。I haven't had a shower for days and am itching all over.

刺探
刺探[cì tàn] 暗中打听 make indirect or secret enquiries; detect; pry; spy：刺探军情 spy out military secrets; gather military intelligence

刺杀
刺杀[cì shā]1.用武器暗杀 assassinate; kill sb. (esp. an important politician, ruler) treacherously and violently：被人刺杀 be assassinated 2.用上了枪刺的步枪同敌人拼杀的技术 bayonet charge：练刺杀 practise bayoneting

刺柏
刺柏[cì bǎi]另见  桧 guì

刺棱
刺棱[cī lēng]〈拟声词 onom.〉动作迅速的声音 sound of quick movement：猫刺棱一下跑了。The cat scampered away in no time.

刺槐
刺槐[cì huái] 落叶乔木，枝上有刺，羽状复叶，花白色，有香气，结荚果 locust (tree) (Robinia pseudoacacia); tall deciduous tree with thorny branches, pinnate compound leaves, drooping racemes of white fragrant flowers, and pods亦 also 洋槐 yánghuái

刺溜
刺溜[cī liū]〈拟声词 onom.〉脚底下滑动的声音；东西迅速滑过的声音 sound of slipping or rapid sliding：不留神，刺溜一下滑倒了。(He) carelessly slipped and fell.子弹刺溜刺溜地从耳边擦过去。A bullet whistled past (his) ear.

刺激
刺激[cì jī]1.现实的物体和现象作用于感觉器官的过程；声、光、热等引起生物体活动或变化的作用 stimulation; stimulus; incitation; incitement; fillip; stimulation of sensory organs by material things and phenomena through which activity is evoked; sound, light, heat, etc., that produces a temporary increase of physiological activity in an organism or in any of its parts 2.推动事物，使起积极的变化 give fillip to; stimulate; goad; excite; animate; whet; encourage; urge on：刺激食欲 whet one's appetite刺激生产力的发展 stimulate the development of productivity 3.使人激动；使人精神上受到挫折或打击 excite; provoke; irritate; upset：多年的收藏毁于一旦，对他刺激很大。He was terribly upset after his collection of many years was destroyed overnight.

刺猬
刺猬[cì wei]哺乳动物，头小，四肢短，身上有硬刺。昼伏夜出，吃昆虫、鼠、蛇等，对农业有益。hedgehog (Erinaceus earopaeus); nocturnal mammal with a small head, short limbs and sharp spines standing out from its back, beneficial to agriculture since it feeds on insects, rats and snakes;亦 also 猬 wèi

刺痒
刺痒[cì yang] 痒 itchy：蚊子咬了一下，很刺痒。This mosquito bite is very itchy.

刺目
刺目[cì mù] 同 same as 刺眼 cìyǎn

刺眼
刺眼[cì yǎn]1.光线过强，使眼睛不舒服 dazzling; (of light) too bright to see clearly 2.惹人注意并且使人感觉不顺眼 offensive to the eye; hard to look at：他这身大红大绿的穿戴，显得特别刺眼。He is brightly dressed in loud red and green.

刺细胞
刺细胞[cì xì bāo] 腔肠动物身体表面的一种特殊细胞，内有刺丝，外有刺针，是捕食和自卫的器官 cnidoblast; nematocyst; trichocyst; nettle cell; stinging cell; sting cell; special type of cell for catching prey and self-defence on the surface of coelenterates, with ecthoraeum inside and aculeus outside

刺绣
刺绣[cì xiù]1.手工艺的一种，用彩色丝线在纺织品上绣出花鸟、景物等 embroider, a type of handiwork using needle and coloured silk threads to embroider colourful flowers, birds and scenes on cloth 2.刺绣工艺的产品，如苏绣、湘绣等 embroidery; embroidered needlework, such as Suzhou embroidery and Hunan embroidery

刺耳
刺耳[cì ěr] 声音尖锐、杂乱或言语尖酸刻薄，使人听着不舒服 jangling; grating on the ear; irritating (unpleasant) to the ear; jarring; ear-piercing; harsh：刺耳的刹车声 screeching of a car braking他这话听着有点儿刺耳。What he said sounds a bit too sarcastic.

刺配
刺配[cì pèi]〈古代 arch.〉在犯人脸上刺字，并发配到边远地方，叫做刺配 brand the face of a prisoner and send him into exile

刺针
刺针[cì zhēn] 腔肠动物刺细胞外面的针状物，是感觉器官 aculeus; acicular sense organ on the surface of the nematocysts of coelenterates

刺骨
刺骨[cì gǔ] 寒气侵人入骨，形容极冷 piercing to the bone; cut to the bone; piercing; biting：寒风刺骨。The cold wind chills one to the bone.

刻
刻[kè]（ㄎㄜˋ）1.用刀子在竹、木、玉、石、金属等物品上雕成花纹、文字 carve; cut; engrave patterns, inscriptions, etc., with a knife in bamboo, wood, jade, stone, metal, etc.：雕刻 carve; sculpt篆刻 engrave a seal刻石 carve an inscription on a stone刻字 engrave letters; cut stencils刻图章 engrave a seal 2.〈古代 arch.〉用漏壶记时，一昼夜共一百刻。ke, unit of time measured by the regulated flow of water through a clepsydra; with a day and night divided into 100 ke; 另见  漏壶 lòuhú 3.用钟表计时，以十五分钟为一刻 quarter (of an hour)：下午五点一刻开车。The bus (or train) sets off at a quarter past five in the afternoon. 4.时间 time：顷刻 in no time立刻 at once即刻 immediately此刻 at this moment 5.形容程度极深 to the highest degree or extent：深刻 profound刻苦 very diligent; hardworking 6.刻薄 harsh：尖刻 sarcastic; acrimonious苛刻 harsh; extremely demanding 7. 同 same as 克2  kè相关词组版刻 | 碑刻 | 此刻 | 丛刻 | 寸刻 | 雕刻 | 翻刻 | 即刻 | 忌刻 | 尖刻 | 镌刻 | 刊刻 | 苛刻 | 立刻 | 镂刻 | 铭刻 | 摹刻 | 木刻 | 片刻 | 顷刻 | 缺刻 | 啬刻 | 少刻 | 深刻 | 石刻 | 时刻 | 蚀刻 | 谿刻 | 崖刻 | 一刻 | 竹刻 | 篆刻 | 木刻水印 | 立时三刻 | 无时无刻 | 一时一刻刻板 | 刻薄 | 刻本 | 刻毒 | 刻度 | 刻工 | 刻骨 | 刻画 | 刻苦 | 刻期 | 刻日 | 刻书 | 刻丝 | 刻下 | 刻写 | 刻意 | 刻不容缓 | 刻骨铭心 | 刻舟求剑

刻下
刻下[kè xià] 目前；眼下 at present; at the moment：刻下家里有事，暂时不能离开。I can't leave now because something has just happened in my family.

刻不容缓
刻不容缓[kè bù róng huǎn] 片刻也不能拖延。形容形势紧迫。 afford no delay; demand immediate action; of great urgency

刻丝
刻丝[kè sī] 同 same as 缂丝 kèsī

刻书
刻书[kè shū]指刻版印刷出版书籍。旧时有书商刻书、官府刻书和私人刻书等。cut blocks for printing a book; carve printing blocks. In times of yore block-printed books were made by booksellers, governments or individuals.

刻写
刻写[kè xiě] 把蜡纸铺在誊写钢版上用铁笔书写 use a stylus to cut a piece of waxed paper in preparation for producing mimeographed copies：刻写蜡纸 cut on waxed paper; stencil

刻工
刻工[kè gōng]1.雕刻的技术 skill of a carver; carving skill：刻工精细 exquisite chisel work 2.从事雕刻工作的工人 sculptor; engraver; carver

刻度
刻度[kè dù] 量具、仪表等上面刻画的表示量（如尺寸、温度、电压等）的大小的条纹 graduation; marks on a vessel or instrument for the measurement of length, temperature, voltage, etc.

刻意
刻意[kè yì] 用尽心思 take pains; be meticulous about：刻意求工 seek perfection sedulously; be a scrupulous craftsman刻意经营 spare no pains in managing a business

刻日
刻日[kè rì] 同 same as 克日 kèrì

刻期
刻期[kè qī] 同 same as 克期 kèqī

刻本
刻本[kè běn] 用木刻版印成的书籍 block-printed edition：宋刻本 (of a book) Song-dynasty block-printed edition

刻板
刻板[kè bǎn]1.在木板或金属板上刻字或图（或用化学方法腐蚀而成），使成为印刷用的底版 engrave, or use chemical erosion to prepare, blocks for printing; carve printing blocks亦 also 刻版 kèbǎn 2.〈比喻 fig.〉呆板没有变化 stiff; inflexible：别人的经验是应该学习的，但是不能刻板地照搬。Other people's experience should be learned from, but it is not to be mechanically copied.

刻毒
刻毒[kè dú] 刻薄狠毒 venomous; spiteful：为人刻毒 malicious person; mean and spiteful in dealing with other people刻毒的语言 noxious remarks

刻画
刻画[kè huà]1.刻或画 engrave or draw：不得在古建筑物上刻画。No graffiti on ancient buildings. 2.用文字描写或用其他艺术手段表现（人物的形象、性格）depict; portray (sb.'s image, character)：刻画入微 depict sb. or sth. in minute detail鲁迅先生成功地刻画了阿Q这个形象。Lu Xun vividly portrayed the character of Ah Q.

刻舟求剑
刻舟求剑[kè zhōu qiú jiàn]楚国有个人过江时把剑掉在水里，他在船帮上剑落的地方刻上记号，等船停下，从刻记号的地方下水找剑，结果自然找不到（见于《吕氏春秋·察今》）nick the boat to seek the sword; Lü's Spring and Autumn Annals·On Current Affairs by Lü Buwei goes as follows: A man from the state of Chu dropped his sword in the river while aboard a boat. He immediately made a notch on the side of the boat from where his sword dropped. When the boat reached the bank, he jumped into the river from where he marked the boat and, of course, failed to retrieve his sword.〈比喻 fig.〉拘泥成例，不知道跟着情势的变化而改变看法或办法 do sth. in disregard of changed circumstances

刻苦
刻苦[kè kǔ]1.肯下苦功夫；很能吃苦 assiduous; hardworking：刻苦钻研 study assiduously学习刻苦 study hard 2.俭朴 simple and frugal：他生活一向很刻苦。He always lives a frugal life.

刻薄
刻薄[kè bó]（待人、说话）冷酷无情；过分的苛求 unkind; harsh; mean：尖酸刻薄 caustic

刻骨
刻骨[kè gǔ]〈比喻 fig.〉感念或仇恨很深，牢记不忘 deeply ingrained; heartfelt：刻骨铭心 engrave on one's bones and heart; unforgettable刻骨的仇恨 inveterate hatred; deep-seated hatred

刻骨铭心
刻骨铭心[kè gǔ míng xīn]〈比喻 fig.〉牢记在心上，永远不忘（多用于对别人的感激 oft. of a debt of gratitude）inscribed in one's heart亦 also 镂骨铭心 lòu gǔ míng xīn 或 or 铭心刻骨 míng xīn kè gǔ

刽
刽[guì]（ㄍㄨㄟˋ）（劊）〈书 fml.〉割断 cut off; chop off相关词组刽子手

刽子手
刽子手[guì zi shǒu]1.〈旧时 old〉执行死刑的人 executioner; headsman; hangman 2.〈比喻 fig.〉屠杀人民的人 slaughterer; butcher

刿
刿[guì]（ㄍㄨㄟˋ）（劌）〈书 fml.〉伤；割 wound; stab; cut

剀
剀[kǎi]（ㄎㄞˇ）（剴）[剀切] (kǎiqiè)〈书 fml.〉1.跟事理完全相合 true and pertinent：剀详明 true and clear in every detail 2.切实 in real earnest：剀教导 teach earnestly

剁
剁[duò]（ㄉㄨㄛˋ）（刴）用刀向下砍 chop; cut：剁排骨 cut spareribs饺子馅儿剁得很细 chop the stuffing for dumplings real fine他把柳条剁成了三段。He chopped a willow branch into three pieces.相关词组剁斧石

剁斧石
剁斧石[duò fǔ shí] 一种人造石料，制作过程是用石屑、石粉、水泥等加水拌和，抹在建筑物的表面，半凝固后，用斧子剁出像经过细凿的石头那样的纹理 artificial stone made of stone powder and chips mixed with cement, with stone-like grains hacked out with an axe as it solidifies after being plastered on the walls of a building亦 also 剁假石 duòjiǎshí 或 or 斩假石 zhǎnjiǎshí

剂
剂[jì]（ㄐㄧˋ）（劑）1.药剂；制剂 pharmaceutical or other chemical preparation：针剂 injection麻醉剂 anaesthesia; narcotic 2.指某些起化学作用或物理作用的物质 substance which produces a chemical or physical action：杀虫剂 insecticide; pesticide冷冻剂 coolant 3.（剂儿 jìr）剂子 small pieces of dough：面剂儿 small pieces of dough 4.〈量词 classifier〉用于若干味药配合起来的汤药 dose; decoction of medicinal ingredients：一剂药 a dose of medicine亦 also 服 fù相关词组冲剂 | 酊剂 | 锭剂 | 毒剂 | 方剂 | 粉剂 | 膏剂 | 焊剂 | 合剂 | 溶剂 | 熔剂 | 乳剂 | 散剂 | 试剂 | 栓剂 | 调剂 | 丸剂 | 醑剂 | 药剂 | 酏剂 | 针剂 | 制剂 | 催化剂 | 腐蚀剂 | 胶粘剂 | 麻醉剂 | 强心剂 | 添加剂 | 氧化剂 | 镇静剂 | 注射剂 | 合成洗涤剂剂量 | 剂型 | 剂子

剂型
剂型[jì xíng] 药物制成的形状，例如片状、丸状、膏状等 form of a drug (e.g. pill, bolus, plaster, etc.)

剂子
剂子[jì zi] 做馒头、饺子等的时候，从和好了的长条形的面上分出来的小块儿 small pieces cut from a long strip of dough for making dumplings and buns

剂量
剂量[jì liàng]医学上指药品的使用分量。也指化学试剂和用于治疗的放射线等的用量。dosage; exact amount of medicine given or taken at one time; amount of chemical reagent or radiation delivered to a given part of the body

剃
剃[tì]（ㄊㄧˋ）用特制的刀子刮去（头发、胡须等）shave; cut off (hair, beard, etc.) with a special cutting instrument：剃刀 razor; shaver剃光头 have one's head shaved剃胡子 have a shave; shave oneself相关词组鬼剃头 | 安全剃刀剃刀 | 剃度 | 剃头 | 剃光头

剃光头
剃光头[tì guāng tóu] 用剃刀刮去全部头发 have one's head shaved；〈比喻 fig.〉考试中一个没取或比赛中一分没得 with no one passing an examination; score no points in a match

剃刀
剃刀[tì dāo] 剃头或刮脸用的刀子 razor; cutting instrument used to shave one's head or cheeks

剃头
剃头[tì tóu] 剃去头发，也泛指理发 have one's head shaved; have one's hair cut; have a haircut

剃度
剃度[tì dù]〈佛教用语 Budd.〉指给要出家的人剃去头发，使成为僧尼 tonsure; have one's head shaved upon entering monkhood or nunhood

剅
剅[lóu]（ㄌㄡˊ）（）〈方 dial.〉堤坝下面排水、灌水的口子；横穿河堤的水道 opening under a dam or dyke for irrigation and drainage; water course through a dyke：剅口 mouth of a water course under a dyke剅嘴 mouth of a water course under a dyke

剉
剉[cuò]（ㄘㄨㄛˋ）1.〈书 fml.〉折伤 break and hurt 2. 同 same as 锉 cuò

削
削[xiāo]（ㄒㄧㄠ）用刀斜着去掉物体的表层 peel; pare the surface layer of an object sideways with a knife：削铅笔 sharpen a pencil削苹果皮 peel an apple另见  xuē削[xuē]（ㄒㄩㄝ）义同‘削’(xiāo)，专用于合成词，如剥削、削减、削弱 having the same meaning as 削 xiāo, used in compound words, e.g. 剥削 bōxuē, 削减 xuējiǎn and 削弱 xuēruò另见  xiāo相关词组笔削 | 剥削 | 车削 | 斧削 | 刮削 | 减削 | 切削 | 删削 | 瘦削 | 铣削 | 朘削 | 刀削面 | 剥削阶级削壁 | 削发 | 削价 | 削减 | 削面 | 削平 | 削弱 | 削足适履

削价
削价[xuē jià] 减价；降价 cut the price; lower the price：削价处理 disposal of goods at reduced prices; clearance sale

削减
削减[xuē jiǎn] 从已定的数目中减去 cut down; reduce; slash; whittle down from a fixed number：削减不必要的开支 cut down unnecessary expenditures

削发
削发[xuē fà]剃掉头发（出家做僧尼）tonsure; cut off one's hair (as a symbol of renouncing worldly life to become a nun or monk)

削壁
削壁[xuē bì] 直立的山崖，像削过的一样 precipice; cliff：悬崖削壁 overhanging cliff

削平
削平[xuē píng]〈书 fml.〉消灭；平定 wipe out; suppress; subdue：削平叛乱 quell a rebellion

削弱
削弱[xuē ruò]1.（力量、势力）变弱 (of strength and power) weaken; die down; enfeeble：几名主力队员离队后，这支球队实力有所削弱。The strength of the football team has been sapped since several top players left. 2.使变弱 weaken; cripple; enfeeble; undermine：削弱敌人的力量 cripple or weaken an enemy

削足适履
削足适履[xuē zú shì lǚ] 鞋小脚大，为了穿上鞋把脚削小 cut one's feet to fit shoes;〈比喻 fig.〉不合理地迁就现成条件，或不顾具体条件，生搬硬套 unreasonably conform to existing conditions; mechanically imitate regardless of specific conditions

削面
削面[xiāo miàn]另见  刀削面 dāoxiāomiàn

剋
剋[kēi]（ㄎㄟ）（尅）1.打；打架 beat：挨了一顿剋，鼻青脸肿的 be beaten black and blue吵着吵着，俩人动手剋起来了。The two of them kept quarrelling and finally came to blows. 2.骂；申斥 scold：你做错了事，妈妈剋你几句还不应该吗？Shouldn't mom scold you a bit since you've made a mistake?另见  克 kè相关词组剋架

剋架
剋架[kēi jià]〈方 dial.〉打架 come to blows; fight; scuffle

剌
剌[là]（ㄌㄚˋ）〈书 fml.〉乖戾；乖张 brusque; nasty：乖剌 peevish另见  lá 拉相关词组乖剌 | 泼剌 | 瓦剌剌戾

剌戾
剌戾[là lì]〈书 fml.〉（性情、言语、行为）别扭，不合情理 (of temperament, language, behaviour) disagreeable：秉性剌戾 of a surly temperament

前
前[qián]（ㄑㄧㄢˊ）1.在正面的（指空间，跟‘后’相对 referring to space, as opposed to ‘behind’）front：前门 front door村前村后 around the village 2.往前走 straight ahead：勇往直前 forge ahead畏缩不前 hang back in fear; recoil from (danger, a heavy task, etc.) 3.次序靠近头里的（跟‘后’相对 as opposed to ‘behind’）first; front：前排 front row前三名 the top three 4.过去的；较早的（指时间，跟‘后’相对 of time, as opposed to ‘later’）ago; before：前天 the day before yesterday从前 in the past前功尽弃。What was done has come undone.前所未有 unprecedented前无古人，后无来者 unparalleled in the past nor to be matched in the future; unique 5.从前的（指现在改变了名称的机构等 of an institution having changed its name now）former; formerly：前政务院 former State Administrative Council 6.指某事物产生之前 earlier; prior to：前科学（科学产生之前）pre-science前资本主义（资本主义产生之前）pre-capitalism 7.未来的（用于展望） future; prospect：前程 future前景 prospects往前看，不要往后看。Look forward, rather than look backward. 8.前线；前方 front; forefront：支前 support the forefront相关词组超前 | 此前 | 从前 | 当前 | 跟前 | 近前 | 空前 | 面前 | 明前 | 目前 | 日前 | 生前 | 史前 | 事前 | 提前 | 头前 | 无前 | 午前 | 先前 | 眼前 | 以前 | 雨前 | 之前 | 打前失 | 打前站 | 大前年 | 大前提 | 大前天 | 老前辈 | 马前卒 | 小前提 | 学前班 | 学前期 | 眼前亏 | 眼面前 | 鞍前马后 | 跋前疐后 | 承前启后 | 惩前毖后 | 光前裕后 | 空前绝后 | 思前想后 | 学前教育 | 瞻前顾后 | 马失前蹄 | 名列前茅 | 舌面前音 | 史无前例 | 裹足不前 | 一往无前 | 勇往直前 | 后浪推前浪 | 车到山前必有路 | 长江后浪推前浪前辈 | 前臂 | 前边 | 前尘 | 前程 | 前导 | 前敌 | 前额 | 前儿 | 前方 | 前房 | 前锋 | 前夫 | 前汉 | 前后 | 前脚 | 前襟 | 前进 | 前景 | 前科 | 前例 | 前列 | 前面 | 前脑 | 前年 | 前妻 | 前期 | 前愆 | 前驱 | 前人 | 前任 | 前日 | 前晌 | 前哨 | 前身 | 前生 | 前世 | 前台 | 前提 | 前天 | 前庭 | 前头 | 前途 | 前往 | 前卫 | 前夕 | 前贤 | 前嫌 | 前线 | 前言 | 前沿 | 前夜 | 前瞻 | 前站 | 前兆 | 前肢 | 前缀 | 前奏 | 前半晌 | 前半天 | 前半夜 | 前臼齿 | 前列腺 | 前奏曲 | 前…后… | 前车之鉴 | 前赴后继 | 前功尽弃 | 前后脚儿 | 前仆后继 | 前所未有 | 前无古人 | 前仰后合 | 前因后果 | 前怕狼后怕虎 | 前事不忘，后事之师

前…后…
前…后…[qián hòu]1.表示两种事物或行为在空间或时间上一先一后 one after another：～街～巷 streets and back alleys～因～果 cause and effect～思～想 mull over sth. time and again～呼～拥 with a large retainers swarming around～倨～恭（形容对人态度前后截然不同 indicating a complete change in attitude；倨 ju：傲慢 arrogance）let one's arrogance give way to humility; revert from arrogance to humility 2.表示动作的向前向后 backward and forward：～俯～仰 bowing forward and leaning backward～仰～合 double over with (laughter); stagger forward and back

前世
前世[qián shì] 迷信指人生的前一辈子 (superstition) previous existence; previous life

前事不忘，后事之师
前事不忘，后事之师[qián shì bù wàng， hòu shì zhī shī]《战国策·赵策一》：‘前事之不忘，后事之师。’指记住过去的经验教训，可以作为以后的借鉴 ‘Past experience, if not forgotten, is a guide for the future’ - lessons learned from the past can serve as a guide for the future (Intrigues of the Warring States·Intrigues of Zhao (I))

前人
前人[qián rén] 古人；以前的人 forebears; forefathers; predecessors：前人种树，后人乘凉。When earlier generations plant trees, posterity shall enjoy the cool under the shade - enjoy the fruits of the labour of one's ancestors or predecessors; profit by the labour of one's forefathers; toil for the benefit of one's descendants我们现在进行的伟大事业，是前人所不能想像的。The great undertakings in which we are engaged today were beyond our forefathers' imaginations.

前仆后继
前仆后继[qián pū hòu jì]前面的人倒下，后面的人继续跟上去。形容英勇奋斗，不怕牺牲。take up the positions of the fallen and rise to fight one after another; as one falls, others step into the breach; advance fearlessly; struggle bravely, ready to lay down one's life

前仰后合
前仰后合[qián yǎng hòu hé] 形容身体前后晃动（多指大笑时 usu. when laughing）rock forwards and backwards; sway to and fro亦 also 前俯后合 qián fǔ hòu hé 或 or 前俯后仰 qián fǔ hòu yǎng

前任
前任[qián rèn] 在现在担任某项职务的人之前担任这个职务的 predecessor; person who held a post before the incumbent one：前任部长 former minister他是工会的前任主席。He was the ex-president of the trade union.

前例
前例[qián lì] 可以供后人援用或参考的事例 precedent; case that can be cited or referred to by later generations：史无前例 unprecedented in history; without any parallel in history这件事情有前例可援。This case has a precedent to go by.

前儿
前儿[qián r]〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 前天 qiántiān; 亦 also 前儿个 qiánr·ge

前兆
前兆[qián zhào] 某些事物在将要暴露或发作之前的一些征兆 omen; forewarning; foreshadow; premonition; augury; signs of what will be revealed later or is to come：由于地球内部地质结构千差万别，各地出现的地震前兆也不尽相同。Because the inner geological structures of the earth vary greatly, earthquake warning signs in different places are not exactly the same.

前列
前列[qián liè] 最前面的一列 forefront; front row or rank;〈比喻 fig.〉带头的地位 in the van of; vanguard; leading position：站在斗争的最前列 be in the van of the struggle

前列腺
前列腺[qián liè xiàn] 男子或雄性哺乳动物生殖器官的一个腺体，人体在膀胱的下面，大小和形状跟栗子相似，所分泌的液体是精液的一部分 prostate (gland); gland of the reproductive organs of a man or male mammal, which is under the bladder of the human body, resembling a chestnut both in size and shape, whose secretions are a part of semen

前功尽弃
前功尽弃[qián gōng jìn qì] 以前的成绩全部废弃 one's past merits will count for nothing; all one's labour has been in vain

前半夜
前半夜[qián bàn yè] 从天黑到半夜的一段时间 first half of the night (from nightfall to midnight)亦 also 上半夜 shàngbànyè

前半天
前半天[qián bàn tiān]（～儿 qiánbàntiānr）上午 before noon; in the morning亦 also 上半天 shàngbàntiān

前半晌
前半晌[qián bàn shǎng]〈方 dial.〉（前半晌儿 qiánbànshǎngr）上午 before noon; in the morning

前卫
前卫[qián wèi]1.军队行军时在前方担任警戒的部队 advance guard; vanguard; outpost troops on march at the front 2.足球、手球等球类比赛中担任助攻与助守的队员，位置在前锋与后卫之间 halfback; player who assists in attack or defense in ball games such as soccer, handball, etc., and plays between the vanguard and fullback[补义 new sense]具有新异的特点而领先于潮流的 avant-garde; having originality and leading in a field：前卫作品 avant-garde works前卫的服装 avant-garde clothes

前台
前台[qián tái]1.剧场中在舞台之前的部分。借指演出的事务工作。 proscenium; part in the front of a theatre stage; routine work of performance 2.舞台面对观众的部分，是演员表演的地方 stage; downstage; part of a stage that faces the audience 3.〈比喻 fig.〉公开的地方（含贬义 derog.）onstage; in public：他只是在前台表演，背后还有人指挥。He was acting onstage, while others were pulling the strings behind the scenes.[补义 new sense] 指酒店、旅馆、歌舞厅等负责接待、登记、结算工作的柜台 front desk; front counter in a restaurant, hotel, song and dance hall, etc. for reception, registration and accounts settlement

前后
前后[qián hòu]1.比某一特定时间稍早或稍晚的一段时间 around; about：国庆节前后 around the National Day 2.（时间）从开始到末了 (of time) from beginning to end; altogether：这项工程从动工到完成前后仅用了半年时间。It only took six months altogether to bring this project to completion. 3.在某一种东西的前面和后面 in front and behind：村子的前后各有一条公路。There is a highway running in front of the village and another one behind it.

前后脚儿
前后脚儿[qián hòu jiǎo r] 指两个人或几个人离去或到来的时间很接近 almost at the same time; one close behind another：我们俩前后脚儿进的门。The two of us stepped in the door at almost the same time.

前哨
前哨[qián shào] 向敌军所在方向派出的警戒小分队 outpost; advance guard; security detachment dispatched in the direction where enemy troops are stationed

前因后果
前因后果[qián yīn hòu guǒ] 事情的起因和其后的结果，指事情的全过程 cause and effect; entire process

前夕
前夕[qián xī]1.前一天的晚上 eve; evening of the previous day：国庆节的前夕 on the eve of National Day 2.〈比喻 fig.〉事情即将发生的时刻 eve; moment before sth. is going to happen：大决战的前夕 on the eve of a great decisive battle

前夜
前夜[qián yè] 同 same as 前夕 qiánxī：激战前夜 on the eve of fierce fighting

前天
前天[qián tiān] 昨天的前一天 day before yesterday

前夫
前夫[qián fū] 死去的或离了婚的丈夫（区别于现在的丈夫 as compared with ‘present husband’）ex-husband; former husband; husband who has died or divorced

前头
前头[qián tou] 同 same as 前面 qián·mian

前奏
前奏[qián zòu]1. 同 same as 前奏曲 qiánzòuqǔ 2.〈比喻 fig.〉事情的先声 prelude; preliminary preparations; harbinger of sth.

前奏曲
前奏曲[qián zòu qǔ] 大型器乐曲的序曲，是为大型器乐创造气氛的短小器乐曲，一般跟整部乐曲有统一的情调 prelude; overture for a grand instrumental composition; short instrumental composition creating the atmosphere for the grand one, usu. sharing a unified atmosphere with the entire composition

前妻
前妻[qián qī] 死去的或离了婚的妻子（区别于现在的妻子 as compared with ‘present wife’）former wife; ex-wife; wife who has died or divorced

前嫌
前嫌[qián xián] 以前的嫌隙 old grudges; past grievances; previous feeling of animosity：前嫌冰释。The old grievance has melted like ice.捐弃前嫌 discard past enmity

前导
前导[qián dǎo]1.在前面引路 lead the way 2.在前面引路的人 guide; person who leads the way

前尘
前尘[qián chén]〈书 fml.〉指从前的或从前经历的事 what happened in the past：回首前尘 look back on the past

前年
前年[qián nián] 去年的前一年 year before last

前庭
前庭[qián tíng]内耳的一部分，在半规管和耳蜗之间，外侧和下侧都有孔，内部有两个囊状物，囊内有听神经。可维持身体平衡。vestibule; part of the inner ear between the semicircular canal and cochlea, with holes on the outer and lower sides, and two cystidiums inside, in which there is the auditory or acoustic nerve, that maintains balance in the body

前往
前往[qián wǎng] 前去；去 go to; leave for; proceed to：启程前往 leave for陪同前往 escort sb. to (somewhere)

前怕狼后怕虎
前怕狼后怕虎[qián pà láng hòu pà hǔ] 形容顾虑重重，畏缩不前 fear wolves ahead and tigers behind - be full of fear; be overcautious; be plagued by all sorts of fears; be so full of apprehension that one recoils in fear亦 also 前怕龙后怕虎 qián pà lóng hòu pà hǔ

前愆
前愆[qián qiān]〈书 fml.〉以前的过失 past faults; past wrongdoings

前房
前房[qián fáng] 称死去的妻子（区别于现在的妻子 as compared with ‘present wife’）ex-wife; reference to one's deceased wife

前所未有
前所未有[qián suǒ wèi yǒu] 历史上从来没有过 hitherto unknown; unprecedented; never existed in history：前所未有的规模 unprecedented scale

前提
前提[qián tí]1.在推理上可以推出另一个判断来的判断，如三段论中的大前提、小前提 premise; condition that can draw other inferences, e.g. the major and minor premises in syllogism 2.事物发生或发展的先决条件 prerequisite; presupposition; predicate; precondition of the occurrence and development of sth.

前敌
前敌[qián dí] 前方面对敌人的地方 front line：身临前敌 come personally to the front

前方
前方[qián fāng]1. 同 same as 前面 qián·mian ①：左前方 ahead to the left右前方 ahead to the right他的目光注视着前方。He fixed his eyes straight ahead of him. 2.接近战线的地区（跟‘后方’相对 as opposed to ‘rear area’）front：支援前方 support the fighting in the front开赴前方 march towards the forefront

前无古人
前无古人[qián wú gǔ rén] 前人从来没有做过的；空前 unprecedented in history; have no parallel in history：他们创造了前无古人的奇迹。The miracle they created had no parallel in history.

前日
前日[qián rì] 同 same as 前天 qiántiān

前晌
前晌[qián shǎng]〈方 dial.〉上午 before noon; in the morning

前景
前景1[qián jǐng] 图画、舞台、银幕、屏幕上看上去离观者最近的景物 foreground; closest aspects to the viewer of a picture, stage or screen前景2[qián jǐng] 将要出现的景象 prospect; vista; perspective; future：大丰收的前景令人欣喜。The prospect of a great harvest filled people with joy.

前期
前期[qián qī] 某一时期的前一阶段 early stage; early days; former stage of some period：前期工程 front-end engineering

前汉
前汉[Qián Hàn] 西汉 Western Han Dynasty

前沿
前沿[qián yán] 防御阵地最前面的边沿 forward position; front edge; foremost edge of a defensive position：前沿阵地 forward position前沿科学 frontier science

前生
前生[qián shēng] 同 same as 前世 qiánshì

前瞻
