前瞻[qián zhān]1.向前面看 look ahead：极目前瞻 look as far as one's eyes can reach; stretch one's eyes over many a mile of terra incognita 2.展望；预测 forecast; predict; outlook：前瞻性 foresightedness

前科
前科[qián kē] 曾被判处有期徒刑刑罚并已执行完毕的人又犯新罪，其前罪的处刑事实叫做前科 criminal past; criminal record; facts of previous term(s) of imprisonment imposed on a criminal who has committed a new offence

前程
前程[qián chéng]1. 同 same as 前途 qiántú：锦绣前程 bright future前程远大 promising future 2.〈旧时 old〉指读书人或官员企求的功名职位 desired career or rank sought after by an intellectual or official

前站
前站[qián zhàn] 行军或集体出行时将要停留的地点或将要到达的地点 next point at which a travelling party is to stop; next stop on a march另见  打前站 dǎ qiánzhàn

前线
前线[qián xiàn] 作战时双方军队接近的地带（跟‘后方’相对 as opposed to ‘rear’）front; frontline; battlefront; region where the troops of the two parties are close to each other in a battle企业的领导身临前线，跟工人群众打成一片。The leaders of the enterprise went to the workshops in person, identifying themselves with the workers and masses.

前缀
前缀[qián zhuì] 加在词根前面的构词成分，如‘老鼠、老虎’里的‘老’,‘阿姨’里的‘阿’ prefix; word-formation element added before the root, such as 老 lǎo in 老鼠 lǎo·shǔ and 老虎 lǎohǔ, and 阿 ā in 阿姨 āyí亦 also 词头 cítóu

前肢
前肢[qián zhī] 昆虫或有四肢的脊椎动物身体前面靠近头部的两条腿 foreleg; forelimb; two front legs close to the head of an insect or a vertebrate with four limbs

前脑
前脑[qián nǎo] 脑的一部分，由大脑两半球和间脑构成 forebrain; part of the brain composed of its two hemispheres and the diencephalon

前脚
前脚[qián jiǎo]（～儿 qiánjiǎor）1.迈步时在前面的一只脚 the forward foot in a step：前脚一滑，后脚也站不稳。When I slipped on my front foot, I lost my balance on the other foot. 2.与后脚连说时表示在别人前面（时间上很接近）(used along with 后脚 hòujiǎo) no sooner ... than：我前脚进大门，他后脚就赶到了。No sooner had I stepped into the door than he arrived.

前臂
前臂[qián bì] 胳膊上由肘至腕的部分 forearm; the part of the arm between the wrist and the elbow

前臼齿
前臼齿[qián jiù chǐ] 位置在犬齿的后面、臼齿的前面的牙齿，人类的前臼齿上下颌各四个，齿冠的咀嚼面上有两个或三个突起，适于磨碎食物 premolar teeth; teeth behind the canine teeth and before the molars; humans have four such teeth on the upper and lower jaws respectively, with two or three protuberances on the mastication surface of its corona, which are suitable for grinding food

前襟
前襟[qián jīn] 上衣、袍子等前面的部分 front part of a robe or jacket

前言
前言[qián yán]1.写在书前或文章前面类似序言或导言的短文；引言 preface; foreword; introduction; short passage written at the front of a book or an article, similar to a preface or foreword 2.前面说过的话 words said earlier; previous statements：前言不搭后语 speak incoherently; utter words that do not hang together; talk disjointedly; babble in disconnected phrases

前贤
前贤[qián xián]〈书 fml.〉有才德的前辈 sages; wise and virtuous elders

前赴后继
前赴后继[qián fù hòu jì]前面的人上去，后面的人就跟上去。形容踊跃前进，连续不断。advance wave upon wave; fight unremittingly

前身
前身[qián shēn]1.本为佛教用语，指前世的身体，今指事物演变中原来的组织形态或名称等 predecessor; body of the previous life (formerly a term of Buddhism); original organizational form, name, etc. of sth. during the process of its development：人民解放军的前身是工农红军。The People's Liberation Army grew out of the Workers' and Peasants' Red Army. 2.（前身儿 qiánshēnr）上衣、袍子等前面的部分；前襟 front part of a Chinese robe, jacket, etc.

前车之鉴
前车之鉴[qián chē zhī jiàn]《汉书·贾谊传》：‘前车覆，后车诫。’ History of Han·Biography of Jia Yi: ‘The overturned cart ahead is a warning to the cart behind’;〈比喻 fig.〉当做鉴戒的前人的失败教训 lesson drawn from sb. else's mistake

前辈
前辈[qián bèi] 年长的，资历深的人 member of the older generation; elder; senior

前边
前边[qián bian]（～儿 qián·bianr） 同 same as 前面 qián·mian

前进
前进[qián jìn] 向前行动或发展 advance; go forward; march on; forge ahead; move forward; develop

前途
前途[qián tú] 原指前面的路程 journey ahead;〈比喻 fig.〉将来的光景 future prospect：光明的前途 bright future前途远大 (have a) bright future; be of great promise

前锋
前锋[qián fēng]1.先头部队 vanguard：红军的前锋渡过了大渡河。The vanguard of the Red Army had crossed the Dadu River. 2.篮球、足球等球类比赛中主要担任进攻的队员 (in basketball, soccer, etc.) forward; player whose task is to attack or score

前面
前面[qián mian]（～儿 qián·mianr）1.空间或位置靠前的部分 in front; at the head; ahead; forward：亭子前面有一棵松树。There is a pine tree in front of the pavilion.前面陈列的都是新式农具。The exhibits ahead are all new-style farm implements. 2.次序靠前的部分；文章或讲话中先于现在所叙述的部分 above; proceeding; afore-mentioned; forepart：这个道理，前面已经讲得很详细了。The reason has already been stated exhaustively above.

前额
前额[qián é] 额，因额在头的前部，所以叫前额 forehead; part of the face between the eyebrows, the normal hairline, and the temples

前驱
前驱[qián qū] 在前面起引导作用的人或事物 forerunner; precursor; pioneer; progenitor：革命前驱 revolutionary forerunner (or predecessor)

剐
剐[guǎ]（ㄍㄨㄚˇ）（剮）1.割肉离骨，指封建时代的凌迟刑 cut to pieces; dismember a body (a form of capital punishment in feudal times)：千刀万剐 cut to pieces 2.尖锐的东西划破 cut; slit：手上剐了一个口子 have a cut on the hand

剑
剑[jiàn]（ㄐㄧㄢˋ）（劍、劒）〈古代 arch.〉兵器，长条形，一端尖，两边有刃，安有短柄。现在击剑运动用的剑，剑身是长而宽的钢条，无刃，顶端为一小圆球。sword; sabre; ancient hand weapon having a long, sharp-pointed blade with a sharp edge on both sides, set in a hilt; swords used in the modern fencing sport having long and broad steel strips with round ball tips but no sharp edges相关词组宝剑 | 击剑 | 舌剑唇枪 | 刀光剑影 | 唇枪舌剑 | 风刀霜剑 | 刻舟求剑 | 口蜜腹剑 | 上方宝剑 | 尚方宝剑 | 项庄舞剑，意在沛公剑客 | 剑眉 | 剑术 | 剑侠 | 剑拔弩张

剑侠
剑侠[jiàn xiá] 精于剑术的侠客（多见于旧小说 oft. in old novels）chivalrous swordsman

剑客
剑客[jiàn kè]〈旧指 old〉精于剑术的人；剑侠 (in old novels) chivalrous swordsman

剑拔弩张
剑拔弩张[jiàn bá nǔ zhāng] 形容形势紧张，一触即发 with swords drawn and bows bent; (fig.) at daggers drawn; very critical situation; ready for fighting

剑术
剑术[jiàn shù] 武术或击剑运动中用剑的技术 swordsmanship; fencing skills

剑眉
剑眉[jiàn méi] 较直而末端翘起的眉毛 straight eyebrows slanting upwards and outwards; dashing eyebrows

剒
剒[cuò]（ㄘㄨㄛˋ）（斮）〈书 fml.〉斩；割 chop; scrape off

剔
剔[tī]（ㄊㄧ）1.从骨头上把肉刮下来 scrape meat from a bone with a fleshing knife; pick：把骨头剔得干干净净 pick the bones clean 2.从缝隙里往外挑(tiǎo) pick (as from a fissure or crack)：剔牙缝儿 pick one's teeth剔指甲 clean the fingernails; pick one's fingernails 3.剔除 pick out (the useless); reject; get rid of：挑剔 picky; be fastidious把烂了的果子剔出去。Pick out the rotten fruit. 4.汉字的笔画，即挑(tiǎo) ⑤ rising stroke (in Chinese characters)相关词组挑剔 | 玲珑剔透剔除 | 剔红 | 剔透 | 剔庄货

剔庄货
剔庄货[tī zhuāng huò]廉价出售的次货；处理品（多用于百货和服装）goods (usu. daily necessities or clothing) sold at reduced prices; shopworn or substandard goods

剔红
剔红[tī hóng] 雕漆的一种 carved lacquer ware亦 also 雕红漆 diāohóngqī

剔透
剔透[tī tòu] 明澈 bright and limpid：晶莹剔透 be sparklingly bright; crystal clear玲珑剔透 exquisitely carved; beautifully wrought

剔除
剔除[tī chú] 把不合适的去掉 reject; get rid of：剔除糟粕 reject the dross

剕
剕[fèi]（ㄈㄟˋ）（）〈古代 arch.〉砍掉脚的酷刑 punishment by amputating the feet

剖
剖[pōu]（ㄆㄡ）1.破开 cut open; rip open：解剖 dissect; anatomy剖腹 lay open the bowel; disembowel横剖面 cross section 2.分辨；分析 analyse; examine; dissect：剖析 analyse; dissect剖明事理 explain the reason相关词组解剖 | 横剖面 | 摧心剖肝剖白 | 剖腹 | 剖解 | 剖面 | 剖视 | 剖析 | 剖视图 | 剖腹藏珠

剖析
剖析[pōu xī] 分析 analyse; dissect：这篇文章剖析事理十分透彻。This article made a thorough analysis of the way things are.

剖白
剖白[pōu bái] 分辩表白 explain oneself; vindicate oneself：剖白心迹 lay one's heart bare总想找个机会向他剖白几句。I am trying to find an opportunity to explain myself to him.

剖腹
剖腹[pōu fù] 破开腹腔 lay open the bowel; disembowel：剖腹自尽 commit suicide by disemboweling oneself; (commit) hara-kiri剖腹手术 laparotomy

剖腹藏珠
剖腹藏珠[pōu fù cáng zhū] 剖开肚子来藏珍珠 rip (or cut) open the stomach to hide a pearl;〈比喻 fig.〉为物伤身，轻重倒置 hold on to sth. trivial for dear life

剖视
剖视[pōu shì] 剖析观察（多用于抽象事物 usu. sth. abstract）analyse and look into：剖视人物的精神境界 analyse and look into a person's inner world

剖视图
剖视图[pōu shì tú] 用一假想平面剖切物体的适当部分，然后把观察者与剖开平面之间的部分移开，余下部分的视图叫剖视图 cut-open view; cutaway view; view of the section of an object being cut through by an imagined surface

剖解
剖解[pōu jiě] 分析（道理等） analyse (reasons, etc.)：剖解细密 make a minute analysis

剖面
剖面[pōu miàn] 物体切断后呈现出的表面，如球体的剖面是个圆形 section; plane surface exposed by cutting, e.g. the section of a ball is circular亦 also 截面 jiémiàn, 切面 qiēmiàn 或 or 断面 duànmiàn

剚
剚[zì]（ㄗˋ）（倳）〈书 fml.〉用刀刺进去 pierce with a knife, dagger, etc.; stab

剜
剜[wān]（ㄨㄢ）（用刀子等）挖 gouge out (with a knife, etc.); dig out：剜野菜 dig for wild vegetables相关词组剜肉医疮

剜肉医疮
剜肉医疮[wān ròu yī chuāng]〈比喻 fig.〉只顾眼前，用有害的方法来救急 cut flesh to cure a boil; use a stopgap to the jeopardy of one's long-term interests（疮 chuang：伤口 wound）; 亦 also 剜肉补疮 wān ròu bǔ chuāng 或or 挖肉补疮 wā ròu bǔ chuāng

剞
剞[jī]（ㄐㄧ）[剞劂]（jījué）〈书 fml.〉1.雕刻用的弯刀 graver; carving knife 2.雕版；刻书 engraving; block-print

剟
剟[duō]（ㄉㄨㄛ）〈书 fml.〉1.刺；击 stab; attack 2.削；删除 cut; delete 3.割取 cut down and take

剡
剡[Shàn]（ㄕㄢˋ）古县名，在今浙江嵊县 Shanxian, ancient county in present-day Shengxian County, Zhejiang Province另见  yǎn剡[yǎn]（ㄧㄢˇ）〈书 fml.〉1.削尖 sharpen：剡木为楫 fashion an oar out of wood 2.锐利 sharp; pointed另见  Shàn

剥
剥[bāo]（ㄅㄠ）去掉外面的皮或壳 shell; peel; skin：剥花生 shell peanuts剥皮 peel另见  bō剥[bō]（ㄅㄛ）义同‘剥’(bāo)，专用于合成词或成语，如剥夺，生吞活剥 same as 剥 bāo; only used in compound words or idioms, such as 剥夺 bōduó and 生吞活剥 shēng tūn huó bō另见  bāo相关词组盘剥 | 吞剥 | 生吞活剥剥夺 | 剥离 | 剥落 | 剥蚀 | 剥削 | 剥啄 | 剥削阶级

剥削
剥削[bō xuē] 无偿地占有别人的劳动或产品，主要是凭借生产资料的私人所有权来进行的 exploit; seize or grab sb.'s labour or products without paying compensation usu. through private ownership of the means of production

剥削阶级
剥削阶级[bō xuē jiē jí] 在阶级社会里占有生产资料剥削其他阶级的阶级，如奴隶主阶级、地主阶级和资产阶级 exploiting class; class of people in a class society that exploit other classes by possessing the means of production, such as the slave owner class, the landlord class, and the capitalist class or the bourgeoisie

剥啄
剥啄[bō zhuó]〈书 fml.〉〈拟声词 onom.〉形容轻轻敲门等的声音 sound of tapping gently on a door, or similar sounds

剥夺
剥夺[bō duó]1.用强制的方法夺去 rob sb. of sth.; take away by force：剥夺劳动成果 expropriate the fruits of sb.'s labour 2.依照法律取消 deprive by law：剥夺政治权利 deprive sb. of political rights

剥离
剥离[bō lí]（组织、皮层、覆盖物等）脱落；分开 (of tissue, skin, coverings, etc.) come off; strip off; peel off：岩石剥离 rock stripping; rock fall-offs胎盘早期剥离。The placenta came off prematurely.

剥落
剥落[bō luò] 一片片地脱落 peel off; come off in pieces：门上的油漆剥落了。The paint on the door has peeled off.

剥蚀
剥蚀[bō shí]1.物质表面因风化而逐渐损坏 erode; wear away; corrode; denude; (of the surface of things) be gradually worn away because of weathering：因受风雨的剥蚀，石刻的文字已经不易辨认。The weather-beaten inscriptions on the stone are barely legible. 2.风、流水、冰川等破坏地球表面，使隆起的部分逐渐变平 (of the earth's surface) be levelled because of the erosion caused by wind, water, glacier, etc. 3.侵蚀 embezzle or seize bit by bit

剧
剧1[jù]（ㄐㄩˋ）（劇）1.戏剧 drama; opera：演剧 stage a drama话剧 modern drama独幕剧 one-act play惨剧 tragic event丑剧 farce 2.(Jù) 姓 a surname剧2[jù]（ㄐㄩˋ）（劇）猛烈；厉害 acute; severe; intense; fierce：剧烈 violent剧痛 acute pain剧饮 drink like a horse剧变 sweeping changes; drastic change病势加剧。(His) disease worsened.相关词组悲剧 | 惨剧 | 潮剧 | 丑剧 | 楚剧 | 川剧 | 傣剧 | 滇剧 | 侗剧 | 赣剧 | 歌剧 | 桂剧 | 国剧 | 汉剧 | 沪剧 | 话剧 | 淮剧 | 徽剧 | 激剧 | 吉剧 | 急剧 | 加剧 | 晋剧 | 京剧 | 陇剧 | 吕剧 | 苗剧 | 闽剧 | 默剧 | 闹剧 | 评剧 | 蒲剧 | 黔剧 | 琼剧 | 曲剧 | 趣剧 | 绍剧 | 史剧 | 苏剧 | 舞剧 | 婺剧 | 锡剧 | 喜剧 | 戏剧 | 芗剧 | 湘剧 | 笑剧 | 谐剧 | 哑剧 | 扬剧 | 彝剧 | 邕剧 | 豫剧 | 越剧 | 粤剧 | 杂剧 | 正剧 | 戏剧性 | 影剧院 | 悲喜剧 | 电视剧 | 独幕剧 | 多幕剧 | 恶作剧 | 肥皂剧 | 歌舞剧 | 广播剧 | 活报剧 | 历史剧 | 连续剧 | 龙江剧 | 秧歌剧 | 保留剧目 | 电影剧本剧本 | 剧变 | 剧场 | 剧烈 | 剧目 | 剧情 | 剧团 | 剧务 | 剧院 | 剧照 | 剧种

剧务
剧务[jù wù]1.指剧团里有关排演、演出的各种事务 stage management; various affairs concerning troupe rehearsal and performance 2.担任剧务工作的人 stage manager

剧变
剧变[jù biàn] 剧烈的变化 violent or drastic change：形势发生剧变。The situation has changed dramatically.

剧团
剧团[jù tuán] 表演戏剧的团体，由演员、导演和其他有关人员组成 troupe; performance troupe consisting of actors, directors and other relevant personnel

剧场
剧场[jù chǎng] 供演出戏剧、歌舞、曲艺等用的场所 theatre; place where plays, operas and other forms of art performances are staged

剧情
剧情[jù qíng] 戏剧的情节 plot：剧情介绍 synopsis of a play

剧本
剧本[jù běn] 戏剧作品，由人物对话或唱词以及舞台指示组成 script; scenario; theatrical writing consisting of dialogue or libretto and stage directions

剧烈
剧烈[jù liè] 猛烈 violent; acute; severe：饭后不宜做剧烈运动。It is inadvisable to take strenuous exercise soon after a meal.

剧照
剧照[jù zhào] 戏剧中某个场面或电影、电视中某个镜头的照片 stage photo; still; photo capturing a scene from a play, a film or a TV drama

剧目
剧目[jù mù] 戏剧的名目 programme; list of plays：传统剧目 traditional play保留剧目 repertory; repertoire

剧种
剧种[jù zhǒng]1.戏曲的种类，如京剧、汉剧、川剧、越剧、豫剧等 type or genre of traditional Chinese opera, such as Peking Opera, Hubei Opera, Sichuan Opera, Shaoxing Opera, Henan Opera, etc. 2.戏剧艺术的种类，如话剧、戏曲、歌剧、舞剧等 genre of performing art, such as modern drama, traditional Chinese opera, opera and dance drama

剧院
剧院[jù yuàn]1.剧场 theatre; playhouse 2.用作较大剧团的名称 referring to a large troupe：北京人民艺术剧院 Beijing People's Art Troupe青年艺术剧院 Youth Art Troupe

剩
剩[shèng]（ㄕㄥˋ）（賸）剩余 surplus; remnant; leftover：剩饭 leftovers; swill; remains of a meal剩货 surplus wares or goods大家都走了，只剩下他一个人。With all the others gone, he was left alone.相关词组过剩 | 下剩 | 余剩 | 残羹剩饭 | 生产过剩剩磁 | 剩余 | 剩余产品 | 剩余价值 | 剩余劳动

剩余
剩余[shèng yú] 从某个数量里减去一部分以后遗留下来 surplus; remainder; residue; what remains after deducting a part from a total：剩余物资 surplus goods and materials不但没有亏欠，而且还有些剩余。Instead of a deficit, there is a small surplus.

剩余产品
剩余产品[shèng yú chǎn pǐn] 由劳动者的剩余劳动生产出来的产品（跟‘必要产品’相对 as opposed to ‘necessary product’） surplus product; product produced by the surplus labour of workers

剩余价值
剩余价值[shèng yú jià zhí] 由工人剩余劳动创造的完全被资本家所占有的那部分价值 surplus value; value created by the surplus labour of workers and fully taken by capitalists

剩余劳动
剩余劳动[shèng yú láo dòng] 劳动者在必要劳动之外所付出的劳动 surplus labour; labour expended over and above necessary labour

剩磁
剩磁[shèng cí] 磁性物质在外界磁场消除后保留的磁性。永久磁铁的磁化和磁性录音都是剩磁作用的应用。 residual magnetism; remanence; remanent magnetism; magnetism retained in magnetic substances after the external magnetic field is dissipated. For example, the magnetization of a permanent magnet and magnetic recording are the applications of residual magnetism.

剪
剪[jiǎn]（ㄐㄧㄢˇ）1.剪刀 scissors; shears; clippers 2.形状像剪刀的器具 instruments in the shape of scissors：夹剪 tweezers; tongs火剪 fire-tongs 3.用剪刀等使东西断开 cut (with scissors); clip; trim：剪裁 tailor clothing; cut out dresses剪纸 paper-cuts剪指甲 trim one's nails剪羊毛 shear a sheep剪几尺布做衣服 buy several chi of cloth for making clothes 4.除去 wipe out; exterminate：剪除 wipe out; exterminate; annihilate剪灭 annihilate; wipe out剪草除根 cut the grass and remove its root; cut the weeds and dig the roots; wipe out all and everything; stamp out the source of trouble相关词组背剪 | 裁剪 | 倒剪 | 反剪 | 火剪 | 夹剪 | 疏剪 | 修剪剪报 | 剪裁 | 剪彩 | 剪除 | 剪床 | 剪刀 | 剪辑 | 剪接 | 剪灭 | 剪票 | 剪贴 | 剪影 | 剪纸 | 剪子 | 剪刀差 | 剪纸片 | 剪纸片儿

剪刀
剪刀[jiǎn dāo] 使布、纸、绳等东西断开的铁制器具，两刃交错，可以开合 scissors; shears; iron tool for cutting cloth, paper, rope and string, etc., consisting of two blades joined in a cross so that they can be opened or shut freely

剪刀差
剪刀差[jiǎn dāo chā]一般指工业品的价格比农业品的价格高时，两者之间的差额。用统计图来表示这种差额时，图上形成剪刀张开的形状，因此称为剪刀差。scissors movement of prices; scissors differential (or difference); price scissors; difference between industrial products and agricultural products when the price of the former is higher than that of the latter. When a statistical table or chart is used to indicate the difference, the figure of a pair of open scissors is found on it, hence the term.

剪子
剪子[jiǎn zi] 剪刀 scissors; shears; clippers

剪床
剪床[jiǎn chuáng]剪金属薄板用的机床。所用的刀具由两片合成，刀片的一边有刃，作用跟剪刀相同。shearing machine; machine tool made up of a pair of shears for cutting sheet metal，functioning in the same way as scissors

剪彩
剪彩[jiǎn cǎi] 在新造车船出厂、道路桥梁首次通车、大建筑物落成或展览会等开幕时举行的仪式上剪断彩带 cut the ribbon to inaugurate a new car, ship, building, an exhibition or to open a new road or bridge to traffic

剪影
剪影[jiǎn yǐng]1.照人脸或人体、物体的轮廓剪纸成形。也指剪出的作品。paper-cut silhouette; cut the silhouette of a human face, a human body or an object out of a paper 2.〈比喻 fig.〉对于事物轮廓的描写 outline; sketch：京华剪影 sketch of life of Beijing

剪报
剪报[jiǎn bào] 把报纸上有参考价值的文字剪下来 newspaper clipping剪报[jiǎn bào] 从报纸上剪下来的文章等 clippings：她积累的剪报有两万多张。She has collected more than 20,000 clippings.

剪接
剪接[jiǎn jiē] 同 same as 剪辑 jiǎnjí ①

剪灭
剪灭[jiǎn miè] 剪除；消灭 wipe out; exterminate; annihilate：剪灭群雄 eliminate the warlords

剪票
剪票[jiǎn piào] 铁路或公路上查票时，用钳状器具在车票的边缘剪出缺口，表示经过查验 check train or bus passengers by punching their tickets

剪纸
剪纸[jiǎn zhǐ]民间工艺，用纸剪成人物、花草、鸟兽等的形象。也指剪成的工艺品。paper-cut; folk art of cutting figures, flowers, birds, animals, etc. out of paper

剪纸片
剪纸片[jiǎn zhǐ piàn] 美术片的一种，把人、物的表情、动作、变化等剪成许多剪纸，再用摄影机拍摄而成 paper-cut film; animated film made by filming successive paper-cuts of human beings, objects, etc., to create an illusion of changes of expression and movement when the film is shown

剪纸片儿
剪纸片儿[jiǎn zhǐ piān r] 剪纸片 paper-cut film

剪裁
剪裁[jiǎn cái]1.缝制衣服时把衣料按照一定尺寸剪断裁开 cut out (a garment); tailor 2.〈比喻 fig.〉做文章时对材料的取舍安排 cut out unwanted material (from a piece of writing); prune：把情节复杂的小说改编成电影是需要很好地加以剪裁的。Adapting a novel with a complicated plot to a film calls for a good deal of pruning.

剪贴
剪贴[jiǎn tiē]1.把资料从书报上剪下来，贴在卡片或本子上 paste newspaper clippings in a scrapbook or on cards 2.一种手工工艺，用彩色纸等剪成人或东西的形象，贴在纸或别的东西上 handcraft art; cutting coloured paper into figures and paste them on a sheet of paper or other things

剪辑
剪辑[jiǎn jí]1.影片、电视片的一道制作工序，按照剧本结构和创作构思的要求，把拍摄好的许多镜头和声带，经过选择、剪裁、整理，编排成结构完整的影片或电视片 film montage; film editing; process of film or telefilm production as required by the scenario structure and conception. Large footages of shots and sound tapes produced are arranged into a complete film or telefilm through selection, cutting and editing. 2.经过选择、剪裁，重新编排，也指这样编排的作品 select, cut and rearrange a work; work produced through such process：剪辑照片 photo montage新闻图片剪辑 news photo editing话剧录音剪辑 highlights of a live recording of a play

剪除
剪除[jiǎn chú]铲除（恶势力）；消灭（坏人）wipe out (an evil force); annihilate (an evildoer); exterminate：剪除奸宄 wipe out malefactors or evildoers

副
副1[fù]（ㄈㄨˋ）1.居第二位的；辅助的（区别于‘正’或‘主’as compare with‘chief, prime, principal’or‘principal, main’）deputy; assistant; vice-：副主席 vice-chairman副班长 deputy class monitor副食品 non-staple food or foodstuffs 2.辅助的职务；担任辅助职务的人 assistant post or position; assistant：团副 subsidiary regimental commander二副 second mate 3.附带的 complementary; auxiliary; secondary：副业 sideline; side occupation副作用 side-effect; by-effect; secondary action 4.符合 fit; correspond to：名副其实 correspond with reality; in reality as well as in name名不副实 name falls short of the reality; in name but not in fact; unworthy of the name副2[fù]（ㄈㄨˋ）〈量词 classifier〉(a)用于成套的东西 set; pair：一副对联 a pair of antithetical couplets一副手套 a pair of gloves一副象棋 a set of chess全副武装 fully armed; in full battle array; armed to the teeth (b)用于面部表情 [indicating facial expression]：一副笑脸 a smiling face一副庄严的面孔 solemn looks; a solemn face相关词组大副 | 二副 | 全副 | 三副 | 名副其实 | 名不副实 | 盛名之下，其实难副副本 | 副词 | 副官 | 副虹 | 副净 | 副刊 | 副科 | 副品 | 副肾 | 副食 | 副手 | 副题 | 副修 | 副业 | 副职 | 副标题 | 副产品 | 副教授 | 副热带 | 副神经 | 副性征 | 副油箱 | 副作用 | 副交感神经

副业
副业[fù yè] 主要职业以外，附带经营的事业，如农民从事的编席、采集药材等 sideline; side occupation; supplementary occupation in addition to the major one, e.g. straw mat-weaving and picking medicinal herbs by grain farmers

副交感神经
副交感神经[fù jiāo gǎn shén jīng]植物神经系统的一部分，上部从中脑和延髓发出，下部从脊髓的最下部（骶部）发出，分布在体内各器官里。作用跟交感神经相反，有抑制和减缓心脏收缩，使瞳孔收缩、肠蠕动加强等作用。parasympathetic nerve; part of the automatic nervous system, spreading out from the deutocerebrum and medulla oblongata, and the sacrum, to all organs of the body. Its functions are opposite to the sympathetic system, and it acts to inhibit and reduce heartbeat, contract the pupil of the eye, and strengthen peristalsis of the intestine, etc.

副产品
副产品[fù chǎn pǐn] 制造某种物品时附带产生的物品，如炼焦的副产品是苯、蒽、萘等 by-product; side products produced during manufacture, e.g. benzene, anthracene and naphthalene are the by-products of coking亦 also 副产物 fùchǎnwù

副作用
副作用[fù zuò yòng] 随着主要作用而附带发生的不好的作用 side effect; harmful or unwanted effect that accompanies the main effect：这种药没有副作用。The drug has no side effects.

副修
副修[fù xiū]主修以外，附带学习（某门课程或专业）minor; study in a subject or speciality in addition to the major subject：副修课 minor courses

副净
副净[fù jìng] 架子花的旧称 old term for 架子花 jià·zihua

副刊
副刊[fù kān] 报纸上刊登文艺作品、学术论文等的专页或专栏 supplement; special page or column publishing literary writings, academic treatises, etc.

副品
副品[fù pǐn] 质量没达到标准要求的产品 seconds; products that do not meet the required standards; substandard goods

副官
副官[fù guān]〈旧时 old〉军队中办理行政事务的军官 adjutant; aide-de-camp; army officer in charge of administrative affairs

副性征
副性征[fù xìng zhēng]人和动物发育到一定阶段表现出来的与性别有关的特征。如男子长胡须、喉结突出、声调低；女子乳房发育、声调高等。secondary sex characters; characteristics of human beings and animals specific to either sex at a certain stage of development, e.g. beard growth, protruding Adam's apple, and low voice pitch in men; breast development, high voice pitch, etc. in women

副手
副手[fù shǒu] 助手；帮手 assistant; helper

副教授
副教授[fù jiào shòu] 高等学校中职别次于教授的教师 associate professor; teacher of an institute of higher learning whose rank is just below that of professor

副本
副本[fù běn]1.著作原稿以外的誊录本 transcript; transcribed manuscript other than the master copy：《永乐大典》副本 transcript of The Great Encyclopaedia of Emperor Yongle 2.文件正本以外的其他本 duplicate; copy other than the original document：照会的副本 copy of a (diplomatic) note

副标题
副标题[fù biāo tí] 同 same as 副题 fùtí

副油箱
副油箱[fù yóu xiāng] 装在飞机体外的油箱，用来增加飞机的航程，必要时可以抛掉 auxiliary tank; drop tank; fuel tank installed outside the fuselage of an aircraft to increase its flight range, which can be jettisoned if necessary

副热带
副热带[fù rè dài] 亚热带 subtropics; subtropical zone; subtropical belt

副神经
副神经[fù shén jīng]第十一对脑神经，从延髓发出，分布在颈部和胸部的肌肉中。主管咽部和肩部肌肉的运动。accessory nerve; either one of the 11th pair of cranial nerves from the spinal cord extending through the muscles of the neck and chest, controlling movement of the pharynx and shoulder muscles

副科
副科[fù kē] 所学课程中的次要科目 (in a course of study) minor subject; secondary course：学校设置课程不能重主科，轻副科。The school curriculum should not stress major courses at the expense of minor ones.

副职
副职[fù zhí] 副的职位 deputy position：副职干部 cadres in deputy positions担任副职 hold the deputy post

副肾
副肾[fù shèn] 肾上腺 adrenal gland

副虹
副虹[fù hóng]另见  霓 ní

副词
副词[fù cí] 修饰或限制动词和形容词，表示范围、程度等，而不能修饰或限制名词的词，如‘都、只、再三、屡次、很、更、越、也、还、不、竟然、居然’等 adverb; word that modifies or restricts a verb or an adjective but not a noun, to indicate limit, degree, etc., e.g. all, only, time and again, repeatedly, very, more, more and more, also, still, not, and even unexpectedly

副题
副题[fù tí] 加在文章、新闻等标题旁边或下面作为补充说明的标题 subtitle; subheading; title printed beside or beneath the main title of an article, piece of news, etc. as supplementary explanation亦 also 副标题 fùbiāotí

副食
副食[fù shí] 指下饭的鱼肉蔬菜等 non-staple food; fish, meat and vegetables, eaten with staple starch foods：副食品 non-staple food or foodstuffs副食店 grocery; grocer's

割
割[gē]（ㄍㄜ）1.用刀截断 cut with a knife：割麦子 cut wheat割肉 cut meat 2.分割；舍弃 cut apart; give up：割地 cede territory割爱 give up what one treasures相关词组分割 | 交割 | 脔割 | 气割 | 切割 | 收割 | 阉割 | 氧割 | 余割 | 宰割 | 正割 | 封建割据 | 联合收割机割爱 | 割除 | 割地 | 割断 | 割胶 | 割据 | 割礼 | 割裂 | 割蜜 | 割漆 | 割弃 | 割枪 | 割让 | 割肉 | 割舍 | 割席 | 割线 | 割鸡焉用牛刀

割地
割地[gē dì] 割让领土 cede territory：割地求和 cede territory for peace

割席
割席[gē xí]〈书 fml.〉三国时管宁跟华歆同学，合坐一张席读书，后来管宁鄙视华歆的为人，把席割开分坐（见于《世说新语·德行》）。后世指跟朋友绝交。 breaking off relations between friends. During the Three Kingdoms Period, Guan Ning and his classmate Hua Xin shared a reading mat, and later Guan Ning was so disgusted with Hua Xin's conduct that he cut the mat and sat separately from Hua Xin (A New Account of Tales of the World·Virtue).

割弃
割弃[gē qì] 割除并抛弃；舍弃 cut off and throw away; give up; abandon：与主题无关的情节，就应割弃。We should eliminate those scenes irrelevant to the theme.

割据
割据[gē jù] 一国之内，拥有武力的人占据部分地区，形成分裂对抗的局面 nation torn apart by armed separatist forces：封建割据 feudal separatism割据称雄 nation torn apart by rival principalities

割断
割断[gē duàn] 截断；切断 sever; cut off：割断绳索 cut a rope历史无法割断。You cannot separate one part of history from the continuum.

割枪
割枪[gē qiāng] 气割用的带活门的工具，形状略像枪，前端有喷嘴 burning torch; gun-like tool with valve and spray head on the front end, used for gas cutting亦 also 割炬 gējù

割漆
割漆[gē qī] 把漆树干的表皮割开，使漆树的树脂流出来 tap a lacquer tree for latex to flow out of its inner bark

割爱
割爱[gē ài] 放弃心爱的东西 give up what one cherishes：忍痛割爱 endure pain silently in giving away what one loves

割礼
割礼[gē lǐ] 犹太教、伊斯兰教的一种仪式，把男性教徒的生殖器包皮割去少许。犹太教在婴儿初生时举行，伊斯兰教在童年举行。 circumcision; religious ceremony in Judaism and Islam, cutting off the prepuce of a male believer, performed on newborn babies in Judaism, and children in Islam

割线
割线[gē xiàn] 通过圆周或其他曲线上任意两点的直线 secant; intersecting line across a curve, esp. a circle, at two points

割肉
割肉[gē ròu]〈比喻 fig.〉赔钱卖出（多用于证券交易 oft. of stock market dealing）sell sth. at a price lower than its original price：现在割肉，得赔30%。To sell the shares right now means a loss of 30 per cent.

割胶
割胶[gē jiāo] 把橡胶树干的表皮割开，使胶乳流出来 tap latex by cutting the bark of a rubber tree

割舍
割舍[gē shě] 舍弃；舍去 give up; part with：割舍旧情 part with an old flame; give up an old-time friendship

割蜜
割蜜[gē mì] 旧法养蜂的取蜜法，把蜂巢中储存蜜的部分用刀割下来 (old) bee-keeping practice of cutting off the honey comb in order to get honey

割裂
割裂[gē liè] 把不应当分割的东西分割开（多指抽象的事物 usu. abstract facts）cut apart or separate sth. that should not be isolated

割让
割让[gē ràng] 因战败或受侵略，被迫把一部分领土让给外国 cede; be forced to cede territory after being defeated or invaded

割除
割除[gē chú] 割掉；除去 cut off; remove; excise：割除肿瘤 remove a tumour

割鸡焉用牛刀
割鸡焉用牛刀[gē jī yān yòng niú dāo] 杀个鸡何必用宰牛的刀 no need to use an ox cleaver to kill a chicken;〈比喻 fig.〉做小事情不值得用大的力量 a trifle is not worth endowing with great efforts

剺
剺[lí]（ㄌㄧˊ）〈书 fml.〉用刀划 cut with a knife

剽
剽[piāo]（ㄆㄧㄠ）1.抢劫；掠夺 rob; hijack; plunder：剽掠 plunder剽窃 plagiarize 2.动作敏捷 (of movement, action, etc.) nimble; swift：剽悍 quick and fierce相关词组剽悍 | 剽窃 | 剽取 | 剽袭

剽取
剽取[piāo qǔ] 同 same as 剽窃 piāoqiè plagiarize

剽悍
剽悍[piāo hàn] 敏捷而勇猛 agile and brave; quick and fierce亦 also 慓悍 piāohàn

剽窃
剽窃[piāo qiè] 抄袭窃取（别人的著作） plagiarize (works by other people)：剽窃行为 plagiarism; plagiary

剽袭
剽袭[piāo xí] 剽窃; 抄袭 plagiarize

剿
剿[chāo]（ㄔㄠ）（勦）〈书 fml.〉抄取；抄袭 plagiarize; copy另见  jiǎo剿[jiǎo]（ㄐㄧㄠˇ）（勦）剿灭；讨伐 (send armed forces to) suppress; put down：围剿 encircle and annihilate剿匪 suppress bandits另见  chāo相关词组包剿 | 清剿 | 搜剿 | 围剿剿除 | 剿灭 | 剿说 | 剿袭

剿灭
剿灭[jiǎo miè] 用武力消灭 exterminate; wipe out; annihilate by armed force：剿灭土匪 defeat and wipe out the bandits

剿袭
剿袭[chāo xí]〈书 fml.〉抄袭1  plagiarize

剿说
剿说[chāo shuō]〈书 fml.〉因袭别人的言论作为自己的说法 plagiarize; use and pass off the ideas or writings of others as one's own

剿除
剿除[jiǎo chú] 同 same as 剿灭 jiǎomiè

劀
劀[guā]（ㄍㄨㄚ）〈书 fml.〉刮去 scrape off

劁
劁[qiāo]（ㄑㄧㄠ）阉割 geld; castrate：劁猪 castrate a pig

劂
劂[jué]（ㄐㄩㄝˊ）另见  [剞劂] (jījué)

劄
劄[zhā] 同 same as 扎 zhā ① ③另见  zhá劄[zhá]（ㄓㄚˊ） 同 same as 劄子 zhá·zi另见  zhā相关词组马劄劄记 | 劄子

劄子
劄子[zhá zi]〈古代 arch.〉一种公文，多用于上奏。后来也用于下行。official documents (used to refer to documents submitted to one's superior and later also to documents issued to subordinates)

劄记
劄记[zhá jì] 同 same as 札记 zhájì

劈
劈[pī]（ㄆㄧ）1.用刀斧等砍或由纵面破开 slit; chop; cleave (with a sword or an ax)：劈木柴 chop wood劈成两半 cleave sth. in two劈风斩浪 plough the wind and the waves 2.（木头等）裂开 (of wood) crack：板子劈了。The wooden board has cracked.钢笔尖写劈了。The pen nib has split. 3.〈方 dial.〉（嗓音）嘶哑 (of voice) hoarse：他喊了半天，声音都快劈了。He shouted until his voice was hoarse. 4.正对着；冲着（人的头、脸、胸部）right against (one's face, head, chest, etc.)：劈头 straight on one's head劈脸 right in the face 5.雷电毁坏或击毙 be destroyed or struck by lightning：老树让雷劈了。The old tree was struck by lightning. 6.简单机械，由两个斜面合成，纵剖面呈三角形，如楔子和刀、斧等的刃儿就属于这一类 wedge; simple device consisting of two inclined planes that take the shape of a triangle in vertical section, e.g. chock, sword blade, ax blade, etc.另见  pǐ劈[pǐ]（ㄆㄧˇ）1.分开；分 divide; split：劈成三股 split sth. into three strands 2.分裂；使离开原物体 break sth. off sth. else; strip off：劈莴苣叶 strip off the outer leaves of a lettuce 3.腿或手指等过分叉开 spread legs or fingers out widely另见  pī相关词组劈叉 | 劈柴 | 劈刺 | 劈刀 | 劈脸 | 劈面 | 劈啪 | 劈杀 | 劈山 | 劈手 | 劈头 | 劈胸 | 劈账 | 劈波斩浪 | 劈里啪啦 | 劈头盖脸

劈刀
劈刀1[pī dāo] 刀背较厚的刀，用来劈竹子、木头等 ax; chopper; tool with a bladed head mounted on a handle, usu. used for splitting bamboo or wood劈刀2[pī dāo] 用军刀劈杀的技术 saber fighting

劈刺
劈刺[pī cì] 军事上劈刀和刺杀的统称 (mil.) saber or bayonet fighting

劈叉
劈叉[pǐ chà] 体操、武术等的一种动作，两腿向相反方向分开，臀部着地 the splits; exercise in gymnastics or martial arts that requires one's two legs to split in opposite directions and one's bottom on the ground

劈啪
劈啪[pī pā]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容拍打或爆裂的声音 sound of crackling, slapping, etc.：劈啪的枪声 crackling of gunfire孩子们劈劈啪啪地鼓起掌来。The children began clapping their hands.亦 also 噼啪 pīpā

劈头
劈头[pī tóu]1.正冲着头；迎头 straight on the head; right in the face：走到门口劈头碰见老王从里边出来。As he arrived at the entrance he bumped straight into Lao Wang, who was on his way out. 2.开头；起首 at the very beginning：他进来劈头第一句话就问试验成功了没有。The moment he came in he asked whether or not the experiment had been successful. 亦 also 辟头 pītóu

劈头盖脸
劈头盖脸[pī tóu gài liǎn] 正对着头和脸盖下来，形容来势凶猛 directly to sb.'s head and face (oft. used to describe a ferocious oncoming force)：瓢泼似的大雨劈头盖脸地浇下来。The rain poured down.亦 also 劈头盖脑 pī tóu gài nǎo 或 or 劈头盖顶 pī tóu gài dǐng

劈山
劈山[pī shān] 用人力或爆破等方式开山 level off hilltops; blast cliffs; cut into a mountain using human labour or explosives：劈山引水 cut through a mountain to let in water劈山造田 level off hilltops and turn the land into farmlands劈山筑路 blast cliffs to build highways or railways

劈手
劈手[pī shǒu] 形容手的动作迅速，使人来不及防备 (of one's hand) make a sudden snatch by taking sb. unawares：劈手一巴掌 slash out at sb.劈手夺过球拍 snatch a racket (from sb.)

劈杀
劈杀[pī shā] 用刀砍杀（多指军人骑在马上用军刀杀敌 usu. of a soldier on horseback）slash at sb. with a sabre

劈柴
劈柴[pǐ chái] 木头劈成的木块或小木条，供烧火做饭、取暖用，小块的多用来引火 firewood; narrow strips or small blocks of wood, usu. used as fuel for cooking or heating, while the smaller pieces are generally for kindling

劈波斩浪
劈波斩浪[pī bō zhǎn làng] 船只行进时冲开波浪 (of ships) cleave through the waves;〈比喻 fig.〉排除前进中的困难和障碍 overcome difficulties and clear away obstacles

劈胸
劈胸[pī xiōng] 对准胸前 right on the chest：劈胸一把抓住 grasp sb. by the front of his coat

劈脸
劈脸[pī liǎn] 正冲着脸；迎面 right in the face：劈脸就是一个大嘴巴 slap sb. across the face

劈账
劈账[pǐ zhàng] 拆账 share out proceeds at a certain ratio：三七劈账 profits shared in a three-seven split

劈里啪啦
劈里啪啦[pī li pā lā]〈拟声词 onom.〉形容连续不断的爆裂、拍打等的声音 continuous sounds of crackling, slapping, etc.：窗外传来劈里啪啦的鞭炮声。Firecrackers spluttered outside the window.掌声劈里啪啦地响起来。Continuous applause ensued.亦 also 噼里啪啦 pī·lipālā

劈面
劈面[pī miàn] 同 same as 劈脸 pīliǎn

劐
劐[huō]（ㄏㄨㄛ）1.用刀尖插入物体然后顺势拉(lá)开 slit or cut with the point of a knife：把鱼肚子劐开 slit open the fish belly用刀一劐，绳子就断了。The knife sliced the rope in two. 2. 同 same as 耠 huō

劓
劓[yì]（ㄧˋ）〈古代 arch.〉割掉鼻子的酷刑 punishment of cutting off the nose

劘
劘[mó]（ㄇㄛˊ）〈书 fml.〉削；切 cut

劙
劙[lí]（ㄌㄧˊ）〈书 fml.〉刺破；割破 pierce; cut

力
力[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）1.物体之间的相互作用，是使物体获得加速度和发生形变的外因。力有三个要素，即力的大小、方向和作用点。force; interaction between or among things that is the external cause for the acceleration and deformation of a body. The three elements of force are magnitude, direction and the point to which the force is applied. 2.力量；能力 power; strength; ability：人力 manpower物力 material power目力 sight; vision脑力 brains; mental capability药力 efficacy of a drug理解力 faculty of understanding说服力 convincing战斗力 fighting power 3.特指体力 esp. physical power; physical strength：大力士 man of great physical strength四肢无力 feel weak in the limbs用力推车 push a cart forcefully 4.尽力；努力 exert one's efforts; do one's best; make every effort：力争上游 aim high; strive for the best维护甚力 safeguard or uphold effectively 5.(Lì) 姓 a surname相关词组暴力 | 笔力 | 臂力 | 兵力 | 并力 | 不力 | 才力 | 财力 | 吃力 | 斥力 | 冲力 | 出力 | 畜力 | 磁力 | 大力 | 胆力 | 弹力 | 得力 | 地力 | 电力 | 鼎力 | 动力 | 独力 | 耳力 | 乏力 | 法力 | 肥力 | 费力 | 分力 | 奋力 | 风力 | 浮力 | 工力 | 功力 | 骨力 | 国力 | 合力 | 核力 | 活力 | 火力 | 极力 | 角力 | 脚力 | 接力 | 竭力 | 尽力 | 精力 | 警力 | 酒力 | 军力 | 苦力 | 拉力 | 劳力 | 量力 | 膂力 | 马力 | 卖力 | 魅力 | 绵力 | 勉力 | 民力 | 魔力 | 目力 | 耐力 | 脑力 | 内力 | 能力 | 扭力 | 努力 | 魄力 | 气力 | 潜力 | 强力 | 权力 | 全力 | 热力 | 人力 | 升力 | 实力 | 势力 | 视力 | 水力 | 死力 | 肆力 | 体力 | 听力 | 通力 | 推力 | 外力 | 腕力 | 威力 | 为力 | 伟力 | 握力 | 无力 | 武力 | 物力 | 吸力 | 惜力 | 效力 | 协力 | 心力 | 学力 | 压力 | 眼力 | 药力 | 一力 | 毅力 | 引力 | 应力 | 勇力 | 用力 | 有力 | 余力 | 运力 | 张力 | 着力 | 致力 | 智力 | 重力 | 主力 | 助力 | 资力 | 阻力 | 坐力 | 磁力线 | 电力网 | 电力线 | 动力机 | 好力宝 | 火力点 | 火力圈 | 接力棒 | 拉力器 | 拉力赛 | 卖力气 | 派力司 | 人力车 | 生力军 | 兽力车 | 压力锅 | 主力舰 | 主力军 | 助力车 | 阻力臂 | 阻力点 | 爆发力 | 反冲力 | 公信力 | 购买力 | 后坐力 | 记忆力 | 劳动力 | 离心力 | 摩擦力 | 内聚力 | 黏着力 | 凝聚力 | 牵引力 | 巧克力 | 亲和力 | 生产力 | 生命力 | 想像力 | 向心力 | 续航力 | 原动力 | 战斗力 | 自然力 | 工力悉敌 | 火力发电 | 接力赛跑 | 戮力同心 | 脑力劳动 | 扭力天平 | 体力劳动 | 眼力见儿 | 自力更生 | 筋疲力尽 | 精疲力竭 | 年富力强 | 身体力行 | 声嘶力竭 | 势均力敌 | 武装力量 | 心余力绌 | 有生力量 | 半劳动力 | 表面张力 | 不可抗力 | 不遗余力 | 不自量力 | 吹灰之力 | 地心引力 | 度德量力 | 行为能力 | 权利能力 | 全劳动力 | 群策群力 | 同等学力 | 万有引力 | 无能为力 | 一臂之力 | 有气无力 | 自食其力 | 热力学温标 | 热力学温度 | 无后坐力炮 | 不费吹灰之力 | 九牛二虎之力 | 手无缚鸡之力力巴 | 力避 | 力持 | 力畜 | 力促 | 力挫 | 力道 | 力度 | 力行 | 力荐 | 力戒 | 力矩 | 力量 | 力偶 | 力气 | 力钱 | 力求 | 力图 | 力学 | 力战 | 力争 | 力证 | 力主 | 力作 | 力气活 | 力不从心 | 力竭声嘶 | 力所能及 | 力透纸背 | 力挽狂澜 | 力争上游

力不从心
力不从心[lì bù cóng xīn] 心里想做，可是能力够不上 ability falling short of one's wishes; unable to do as much as one wishes to

力主
力主[lì zhǔ] 极力主张 advocate strongly：力主和谈 advocate peace; stand strongly for peace talks因为天气要变，他力主提前出发。As the weather is going to change, he strongly advocates that they start off earlier.

力争
力争[lì zhēng]1.极力争取 strive for; strive to; work hard for; do all one can to：力争上游 strive for the best力争超额完成生产任务 do all one can to overfulfil the production plan 2.极力争辩 argue strongly; contend vigorously：据理力争 persistently reason things out

力争上游
力争上游[lì zhēng shàng yóu] 努力奋斗，争取先进 aim high; strive for the best or for the first place

力作
力作[lì zuò] 精心完成的工力深厚的作品 masterpiece：这个剧本是他晚年的力作。This script was a masterpiece in his later years.

力促
力促[lì cù] 尽力促使 make every effort to promote：力促此事成功 try hard to make it a success

力偶
力偶[lì ǒu]作用于物体上的大小相等、方向相反而且不在一直线上的两个力。力偶能使物体转动或改变转动状态。couple; two equal forces causing rotation by moving in parallel but opposite directions. It can cause rotation or change rotation.

力图
力图[lì tú] 极力谋求；竭力打算 try hard to; strive to：力图实现自己的抱负 try hard to fulfil one's ambition

力学
力学1[lì xué] 研究物体机械运动规律及其应用的学科 mechanics; branch of physics which deals with the law of the motion of material bodies and its application力学2[lì xué]〈书 fml.〉努力学习 study hard：力学不倦 be tireless in studying

力巴
力巴[lì ba]〈方 dial.〉1.外行；不熟练 not adept; awkward; clumsy：力巴话 lay language做庄稼活，他可不力巴。He is not a layman in farm work. 2.外行人 layman亦 also 力巴头 lì·batóu

力度
力度[lì dù]1.力量大小的程度；力量的强度 intensity of force：风的力度足以吹折这棵小树。The wind is strong enough to break this small tree. 2.指曲谱或音乐表演中音响的强度。从弱到强可分为最弱、更弱、弱、中弱、中强、强、更强、最强等。dynamics; effect of varying degrees of loudness or softness in the performance of music: pianissimo, diminuendo, piano, mezzopiano, mezzoforte, forte, crescendo, fortissimo 3.功力的深度；内涵的深度 intensity; depth of intension：这是一部有激情、有力度的好作品。This is a good piece of work with passion and efficacy.

力戒
力戒[lì jiè] 极力防止 strictly avoid; do everything possible to avoid; guard against：力戒骄傲 guard against arrogance力戒急躁 guard against impetuosity

力战
力战[lì zhàn] 努力奋战 fight with all one's might

力所能及
力所能及[lì suǒ néng jí] 自己的能力所能办到的 within one's ability; in one's power：让学生参加一些力所能及的劳动。Let the students do the kind of physical work that they are capable of.

力持
力持[lì chí] 努力坚持 insist on; uphold：力持异议 insist on one's dissenting views力持正义 uphold justice

力挫
力挫[lì cuò] 奋力击败 try one's best to defeat：力挫对手 try one's best to beat one's opponent力挫上届足球冠军 defeat the defending football champion with all their might

力挽狂澜
力挽狂澜[lì wǎn kuáng lán]〈比喻 fig.〉尽力挽回险恶的局势 do one's utmost to stem a raging tide; make vigorous efforts to turn the tables; try one's best to save a desperate situation

力气
力气[lì qi] 筋肉的效能；气力 physical strength; effort：他的力气大，一个人就搬起了这块大石头。He has great strength, and can lift this large stone alone.

力气活
力气活[lì qi huó]（～儿 lì·qihuór）费力的体力劳动 heavy work; strenuous work：打坯是个力气活儿。Making unfired bricks is strenuous work.

力求
力求[lì qiú] 极力追求；尽力谋求 make every effort to; do one's best to; strive to：力求事成 strive to make sth. a success力求提高单位面积产量 strive to raise the per-hectare (per-unit-area) yield

力畜
力畜[lì chù] 用来耕地、运输等的家畜，如牛、马、骡子、驴、骆驼等 draught animal; beast of burden; domestic animals for ploughing land or transporting goods, including cattle, horse, mule, donkey, camel亦 also 役畜 yìchù

力矩
力矩[lì jǔ] 表示力对物体产生转动效应的物理量，数值上等于力和力臂的乘积 moment of force; moment; torque; physical quantity of the rotation caused by a force to a body, with its numerical value equal to the product of the force and the arm of force

力竭声嘶
力竭声嘶[lì jié shēng sī] 声嘶力竭 shout or cry oneself hoarse

力荐
力荐[lì jiàn] 竭力推荐 recommend strongly：力荐贤能 strongly recommend the wise and able people力荐有真才实学的人担任此职 strongly recommend a person with genuine learning for this post

力行
力行[lì xíng] 努力实践 be diligent in action; practise with earnestness：身体力行 practise personally as one says

力证
力证[lì zhèng] 有力的证据 strong evidence; convincing proof

力透纸背
力透纸背[lì tòu zhǐ bèi]1.形容书法遒劲有力 (of handwriting or calligraphy) powerful; forceful; (of calligraphy) of such a dynamic style that the strokes seem to penetrate the paper 2.形容文章深刻有力 (of a piece of writing) powerful; penetrating

力道
力道[lì dào]〈方 dial.〉1.力气；力量 strength; power：力道大 powerful; strong有力道 have strength 2.效力；作用 effect：化肥比粪肥力道来得快。Chemical fertilizers are more effective than manure.

力避
力避[lì bì] 尽力避免 try one's best to avoid or avert：力避被动 try hard to avoid being passive力避事故发生 try hard to avoid accident

力量
力量[lì liang]1. 同 same as 力气 lì·qi：人多力量大。The more people, the greater strength.别看他个子小，力量可不小。He is short, but he has great strength. 2.能力 power; force; ability：尽一切力量完成任务。Do everything in one's power to fulfil the mission. 3.作用；效力 potency; efficacy; strength：这种农药的力量大。This pesticide is strong.

力钱
力钱[lì qian]〈方 dial.〉脚钱 payment to a porter

劝
劝[quàn]（ㄑㄩㄢˋ）（勸）1.拿道理说服人，使人听从 persuade; advise; urge：规劝 remonstrate; expostulate; advise劝导 persuade; advise; exhort劝解 appease; propitiate; mediate他身体不好，你应该劝他休息休息。He is weak in health, so you should talk him into taking a rest. 2.勉励 encourage：劝勉 admonish and encourage相关词组奉劝 | 规劝 | 解劝 | 相劝劝导 | 劝告 | 劝和 | 劝化 | 劝驾 | 劝架 | 劝降 | 劝解 | 劝诫 | 劝进 | 劝酒 | 劝勉 | 劝募 | 劝说 | 劝慰 | 劝诱 | 劝止 | 劝阻

劝勉
劝勉[quàn miǎn] 劝导并勉励 admonish and encourage：互相劝勉 encourage each other

劝募
劝募[quàn mù] 用劝说的方式募捐 solicit contributions：多方劝募，集资百万。After many persuasive efforts, they have raised a million yuan.

劝化
劝化[quàn huà]1.〈佛教 Budd.〉指劝人为善，泛指劝勉感化 (of a Buddhist) urge people to do good; advise and influence; encourage and reform 2.募化 solicit donations for a Buddhist temple; collect alms

劝告
劝告[quàn gào]1.拿道理说服人，使人改正错误或接受意见 advise; urge; exhort; admonish：再三劝告 repeatedly admonish 2.希望人改正错误或接受意见而说的话 advice; warning; exhortation; recommendation; tip：你要多听听大家的劝告。You had better listen to everyone's advice.

劝和
劝和[quàn hé] 劝人和解 mediate; make peace

劝导
劝导[quàn dǎo] 规劝开导 persuade; advise; exhort：听从劝导 take sb.'s advice; defer to sb.'s advice; follow sb.'s recommendations耐心劝导 exhort with patience

劝慰
劝慰[quàn wèi] 劝解安慰 comfort; console; soothe：他多次来信劝慰我，嘱咐我不要泄气。He wrote me many times to console me and ask me not to lose heart.

劝架
劝架[quàn jià] 劝人停止争吵、打架 try to stop a quarrel or fight; conciliate; mediate

劝止
劝止[quàn zhǐ] 同 same as 劝阻 quànzǔ

劝解
劝解[quàn jiě]1.劝导宽解 mollify; appease; propitiate; soothe：经过大家劝解，他想通了。He became convinced after much persuasion from everybody. 2. 同 same as 劝架 quàn∥jià：从旁劝解 appease indirectly

劝诫
劝诫[quàn jiè] 劝告人改正缺点错误，警惕未来 dissuade; admonish; exhort; expostulate：他把我当成亲兄弟一样，时时劝诫我，帮助我。He treats me as his own brother and often gives me warnings and help.亦 also 劝戒 quànjiè

劝诱
劝诱[quàn yòu] 劝说诱导 induce; prevail on; bring around

劝说
劝说[quàn shuō] 劝人做某种事情或使对某种事情表示同意 persuade; advise; talk sb. around to doing sth.; talk sb. into doing sth.; reason with sb.; prevail on sb. to do sth.：反复劝说 make repeated efforts to persuade不听劝说 turn a deaf ear to sb.'s advice

劝进
劝进[quàn jìn] 劝说实际上已经掌握政权而有意做皇帝的人做皇帝 make a formal appeal to a minister or general who holds real power and covets the throne to declare himself king or emperor

劝酒
劝酒[quàn jiǔ]（酒席上）劝人喝酒 (at a banquet) urge sb. to drink：主人举杯频频劝酒。Glass in hand, the host toasted everyone around.

劝阻
劝阻[quàn zǔ] 劝人不要做某事或进行某种活动 dissuade sb. from; advise sb. against doing sth.; talk sb. out of (doing) sth.：好言劝阻 kindly advise sb. not to do sth.极力劝阻 try every means to dissuade sb. from doing sth.

劝降
劝降[quàn xiáng] 劝人投降 induce (the enemy) to capitulate

劝驾
劝驾[quàn jià] 劝人出去担任职务或做客 urge sb. to accept a post or an invitation

办
办[bàn]（ㄅㄢˋ）（辦）1.办理；处理；料理 do; handle; manage; tackle; attend to：办事 handle affairs办公 handle official business办交涉 carry on negotiations办入学手续 go through school entrance formalities 2.创设；经营 set up; operate：办工厂 run a factory勤俭办一切事业。Practice the principle of thrift and hard work in all undertakings. 3.采购；置备 procure; purchase; prepare：置办 purchase (durables)办货 procure (for an organization or enterprise)办酒席 prepare a feast办嫁妆 prepare a dowry 4.惩治 punish (by law); bring to justice：办罪 punish (for a crime)严办 punish with severity首恶必办。The principal perpetrator must be punished.相关词组帮办 | 包办 | 备办 | 补办 | 采办 | 操办 | 查办 | 倡办 | 承办 | 惩办 | 筹办 | 创办 | 催办 | 措办 | 代办 | 督办 | 法办 | 仿办 | 公办 | 官办 | 交办 | 究办 | 举办 | 开办 | 买办 | 民办 | 拿办 | 申办 | 停办 | 协办 | 兴办 | 严办 | 营办 | 照办 | 侦办 | 置办 | 重办 | 主办 | 组办 | 买办资本 | 咄嗟立办 | 临时代办 | 买办资产阶级办案 | 办差 | 办法 | 办稿 | 办公 | 办理 | 办事 | 办学 | 办置 | 办公室 | 办事员 | 办公会议

办事
办事[bàn shì] 做事 handle affairs; work：办事机构 administrative body; working body办事认真 be conscientious in one's work我们是给群众办事的。We work for the masses.

办事员
办事员[bàn shì yuán] 机关工作人员的一种职别，在科员之下 office worker; official rank of government hierarchy, lower than a section member

办公
办公[bàn gōng] 办理公务；处理公事 handle official business; work (usu. in an office)：办公会议 working meeting星期天照常办公。Business is as usual on Sundays.

办公会议
办公会议[bàn gōng huì yì] 一个部门的有关负责人举行会议讨论并处理事务的工作方式 working meeting; regular meeting of department leaders to discuss and handle business

办公室
办公室[bàn gōng shì]1.办公的屋子 office; room for handling official matters 2.机关、学校、企业等单位内办理行政性事务的部门。规模大的称办公厅。department of institute, school or enterprise that handles administrative affairs. Larger ones are called General Office.

办学
办学[bàn xué] 兴办学校 run a school：集资办学 raise funds for a school

办差
办差[bàn chāi]〈旧指 old〉给官府办理征集夫役、征收财物等事 be in charge of government operations, such as collecting taxes and corvée labour

办案
办案[bàn àn] 办理案件 handle a legal case

办法
办法[bàn fǎ] 处理事情或解决问题的方法 way to handle affairs; method：想办法 find a way他不答应，你也拿他没办法。If he does not agree, you can do nothing about it.

办理
办理[bàn lǐ] 处理（事务）；承办 handle; conduct; transact：这些事情你可以斟酌办理。You may handle these matters as you see fit.本店办理邮购业务。Our shop handles mail orders.

办稿
办稿[bàn gǎo] 起草公文 draft an official document

办置
办置[bàn zhì] 置办 buy (durables); purchase

功
功[gōng]（ㄍㄨㄥ）1.功劳（跟‘过’相对 as opposed to ‘demerit’）meritorious service (or deed); merit; achievement：立功 render meritorious service记一大功 cite sb. for outstanding service 2.成效和表现成效的事情（多指较大的 of significant undertaking）result; effect; success：教育之功 the fruits of education功亏一篑 fall short of success for lack of a final effort大功告成 be crowned with success好大喜功 have a fondness for the grandiose 3.（功儿 gōngr）技术和技术修养 skill：唱功 singing skill功架 movements and postures of actors (in traditional opera)基本功 basic skill 4.一个力使物体沿力的方向通过一段距离，这个力就对物体做了功 work, as accomplished by a force that acts on an object and causes it to move through a distance in the direction of the motion of the force相关词组表功 | 唱功 | 成功 | 寸功 | 归功 | 记功 | 居功 | 军功 | 苦功 | 立功 | 练功 | 卖功 | 冒功 | 内功 | 评功 | 气功 | 请功 | 外功 | 武功 | 叙功 | 邀功 | 要功 | 阴功 | 用功 | 幼功 | 战功 | 做功 | 吃功夫 | 电功率 | 丑表功 | 基本功 | 无用功 | 大功告成 | 丰功伟绩 | 歌功颂德 | 急功近利 | 立功赎罪 | 前功尽弃 | 无功受禄 | 汗马功劳 | 劳苦功高 | 事半功倍 | 事倍功半 | 戴罪立功 | 好大喜功 | 计日程功 | 马到成功 | 贪天之功 | 徒劳无功 | 一得之功 | 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针功臣 | 功德 | 功底 | 功夫 | 功绩 | 功架 | 功课 | 功劳 | 功力 | 功利 | 功令 | 功率 | 功名 | 功能 | 功效 | 功勋 | 功业 | 功用 | 功夫茶 | 功夫片 | 功败垂成 | 功成不居 | 功成名就 | 功夫片儿 | 功亏一篑 | 功利主义

功业
功业[gōng yè] 功勋事业 exploits; achievements：建立功业 succeed in one's career

功亏一篑
功亏一篑[gōng kuī yī kuì] 伪古文《尚书·旅獒》：‘为山九仞，功亏一篑。’堆九仞高的土山，只差一筐土而不能完成。 (from the pseudo-historical writing Classics of Documents·Dog from Lu) fail to build a mound for want of one final basket of earth;〈比喻 fig.〉一件大事只差最后一点儿人力物力而不能成功（含惋惜意 in regret）come short of; fall short of success for lack of a final effort

功令
功令[gōng lìng]〈旧时 old〉指法令 decree

功利
功利[gōng lì]1.功效和利益 efficacy and material gain：功利显著 remarkably efficient and beneficial 2.功名利禄 rank, fame and riches：追求功利 seek fame and gain

功利主义
功利主义[gōng lì zhǔ yì] 主张以实际功效或利益为行为准则的伦理观点 utilitarianism, the ethical doctrine that regards actual results or gains as the norms of conduct

功力
功力[gōng lì]1. 同 same as 功效 gōngxiào：草药的功力不能忽视。The efficacy of herbal medicine should not be ignored. 2.功夫和力量 skill and force：他的字苍劲洒脱，颇见功力。His calligraphy is vigorous and flowing, showing considerable skill.

功劳
功劳[gōng láo] 对事业的贡献 contribution to a cause：汗马功劳 toil and hardship in the war; great contribution to a cause or undertaking

功勋
功勋[gōng xūn] 指对国家、人民做出的重大贡献，立下的特殊的功劳 meritorious service rendered to the nation and the people：功勋卓著 exploits立下不朽功勋 have performed immortal feats

功名
功名[gōng míng] 封建时代指科举称号或官职名位 scholarly honour or official rank (in feudal times)：革除功名 strip sb. of his official rank

功夫
功夫[gōng fu]1.本领；造诣 skill; attainment：他的诗功夫很深。He is a poet of great attainment.这个杂技演员真有功夫。This acrobat has superb skills. 2. 同 same as 工夫 gōng·fu

功夫片
功夫片[gōng fu piàn] 表现以武打为主的故事片 gongfu (kung fu) movie

功夫片儿
功夫片儿[gōng fu piān r] 同 same as 功夫片 gōng-fupiàn

功夫茶
功夫茶[gōng fu chá] 福建广东一带的一种饮茶风尚，茶具小巧精致，沏茶、饮茶有一定的程序、礼仪 gongfu tea; tea-drinking custom in Fujian and Guangdong provinces, characterized by small and exquisite tea set, and certain procedures and etiquette in the making and drinking of tea

功底
功底[gōng dǐ] 基本功的底子 grounding in basic skills：功底扎实 have a good grounding in basic skills他的书法有着深厚的功底。He has a good grounding in the basic skills of calligraphy.

功德
功德[gōng dé]1.功劳和恩德 merits and virtues：歌颂人民英雄的功德 extol the merits and virtues of the people's heroes 2.指佛教徒行善、诵经念佛、为死者做佛事及道士打醮等 (of a Buddhist) charitable and pious deeds, including alms-giving, chanting sutras and praying to the Buddha, holding a Buddhist service for the dead; perform Taoist service or ceremony：做功德 hold a Buddhist service

功成不居
功成不居[gōng chéng bù jū]立了功而不把功劳归于自己（语出《老子》二章：‘功成而不居’）claim no credit for one's service (Laozi·Chapter 2: ‘He accomplishes his mission without claiming merit.’)

功成名就
功成名就[gōng chéng míng jiù] 功业建立了，名声也有了 achieve success and win recognition亦 also 功成名立 gōng chéng míng lì 或 or 功成名遂 gōng chéng míng suì

功效
功效[gōng xiào] 功能；效率 efficacy; effect：立见功效 produce immediate effect

功架
功架[gōng jià] 同 same as 工架 gōngjià

功率
功率[gōng lǜ] 功跟完成这些功所用时间的比，即单位时间内所做的功。电能的功率单位有瓦特、千瓦等。机械能的功率单位有千克米/秒、马力等。 rate of work; work done in unit time; power units of electrical energy including watt and kilowatt, and power units of mechanical energy including kilogram-metre/second and horsepower.

功用
功用[gōng yòng] 功能；用途 function; use

功绩
功绩[gōng jì] 功劳和业绩 merits and achievements：功绩卓著 outstanding merit and achievement不可磨灭的功绩 everlasting merit

功能
功能[gōng néng] 事物或方法所发挥的有利的作用；效能 function; effective function of object or method：功能齐全 complete in functions这种药物功能显著。This medicine is most effective.

功臣
功臣[gōng chén] 有功劳的臣子，泛指对某项事业有显著功劳的人 meritorious courtier; (in a broad sense) person who has rendered outstanding service：航天事业的功臣 meritorious staff in the aerospace industry

功课
功课[gōng kè]1.学生按照规定学习的知识、技能 curriculum; knowledge and skills that students are required to learn at school：他在学校里每门功课都很好。He does well in every subject at school. 2.指教师给学生布置的作业 homework：做完功课再看电视。You can watch TV after finishing your homework. 3.佛教徒按时诵经念佛等称为做功课 (in Buddhism) routine rituals such as chanting sutras and praying

功败垂成
功败垂成[gōng bài chuí chéng] 快要成功的时候遭到失败（含惋惜意 in a regrettable tone）fail on the verge of success; suffer defeat when victory is within reach

加
加[jiā]（ㄐㄧㄚ）1.两个或两个以上的东西或数目合在一起 add; plus; two or more things or numbers are joined or united：二加三等于五。Two plus three makes five. or Two and three is five.功上加功 one merit after another 2.使数量比原来大或程度比原来高；增加 increase; make the number bigger or the degree higher：加大 enlarge加强 strengthen加快 quicken; accelerate加速 increase the speed; make it faster加多 increase加急 urgent加了一个人 have one more person 3.把本来没有的添上去 put in; add; append：加符号 put in a mark加注解 append notes to 4. 同 same as 加以jiāyǐ：不加考虑 will not consider严加管束 bring sb. or sth. under strict control注意 NOTE：‘加’跟‘加以’用法不同之点是‘加’多用在单音状语之后。The difference between 加 and 加以 jiāyǐ in usage is that 加 is usu. used after a monosyllabic adverb. 5.(Jiā) 姓 a surname相关词组倍加 | 参加 | 递加 | 附加 | 更加 | 横加 | 交加 | 强加 | 施加 | 外加 | 愈加 | 增加 | 追加 | 附加刑 | 冷加工 | 热加工 | 深加工 | 添加剂 | 跳加官 | 伏特加 | 辛迪加 | 变本加厉 | 黄袍加身 | 火上加油 | 快马加鞭 | 添油加醋 | 添枝加叶 | 添砖加瓦 | 文不加点 | 雪上加霜 | 无以复加 | 欲加之罪，何患无辞加班 | 加倍 | 加点 | 加法 | 加封 | 加工 | 加固 | 加紧 | 加劲 | 加剧 | 加快 | 加料 | 加仑 | 加码 | 加盟 | 加密 | 加冕 | 加强 | 加热 | 加入 | 加深 | 加速 | 加委 | 加以 | 加意 | 加油 | 加之 | 加重 | 加农炮 | 加塞儿 | 加速度 | 加速器 | 加压釜 | 加人一等 | 加农榴弹炮

加之
加之[jiā zhī]〈连词 conj.〉表示进一步的原因或条件 [indicating a further reason or condition] moreover; furthermore：天气闷热，加之窗外车马声不断，简直无法休息。It is sultry, and moreover, there are endless noises of carts and horses outside the window, making it impossible to take a rest.

加人一等
加人一等[jiā rén yī děng]高出别人一等。形容学问、才能等出众。cut above sb.; have better knowledge and talent than others

加仑
加仑[jiā lún] 英美制容量单位，英制1加仑等于4.546升，美制1加仑等于3.785升 gallon; unit of liquid measure equaling to four quarts (3.785 litres) in the United States, and 4.546 litres in Britain

加以
加以[jiā yǐ]1.用在多音的动词前，表示如何对待或处理前面所提到的事物 [used before a polysyllabic verb to indicate that the action is directed towards sth. or sb. mentioned earlier in the sentence]：施工方案必须加以论证。Feasibility studies must be done on the construction plan.发现问题要及时加以解决。Problems should be solved immediately after they are discovered. 注意 NOTE：‘加以’跟‘予以’不同之处是‘予以’可以用在一般名词之前，表示给与，如‘予以自新之路’，‘加以’没有这种用法。The difference between 加以 and 予以 yǔyǐ is that 予以 can be used before a noun to indicate 给与 jǐyǔ, such as 予以自新之路 yǔyǐ zìxīn zhī lù, and that 加以 cannot be used this way. 2.〈连词 conj.〉表示进一步的原因或条件 [for further reason or condition]：他本来就聪明，加以特别用功，所以进步很快。He is clever, and moreover, he is very diligent, so he has made fast progress.

加倍
加倍[jiā bèi]1.增加跟原有数量相等的数量 double; redouble：产量加倍 double the output加倍偿还 double the repayment 2.指程度比原来深得多 put in more efforts：加倍努力 redouble one's efforts加倍的同情 increased sympathy

加入
加入[jiā rù]1.加上；搀进去 add; mix; put in：加入食糖少许 add a little sugar 2.参加进去 join; accede to：加入工会 join a trade union加入足球队 join a football team

加冕
加冕[jiā miǎn] 某些国家的君主即位时所举行的仪式，把皇冠戴在君主头上 coronation; ceremony of crowning the sovereign in some countries

加农榴弹炮
加农榴弹炮[jiā nóng liú dàn pào] 兼有加农炮和榴弹炮弹道特点的火炮，主要用来射击较远距离目标和破坏工程设施 gun howitzer; short cannon, larger than a mortar, firing shells in a high trajectory, chiefly used to shoot at targets in the distance and destroy military works; 简称 abbr. 加榴炮 jiāliúpào

加农炮
加农炮[jiā nóng pào] 炮身长、初速大、弹道低伸的火炮，多用于直接瞄准射击，以及射击远距离的目标 cannon; gun; gun with a long barrel, a fast muzzle velocity and a low trajectory, more used to shoot at targets in the distance

加剧
加剧[jiā jù] 加深严重程度 aggravate; exacerbate：病势加剧。The patient's condition is getting worse.矛盾加剧。The contradictions are sharpening.

加劲
加劲[jiā jìn]（～儿 jiā∥jìnr）增加力量；努力 redouble one's efforts; put more energy into; make a greater effort：加劲工作 work still harder

加压釜
加压釜[jiā yā fǔ] 工业上在高压下进行化学反应的设备，有的附有搅拌或传热装置 compression cauldron; industrial equipment for chemical reaction under high pressure, some with a mixing or heat conduction device亦 also 热压釜 rèyāfǔ 或 or 高压釜 gāoyāfǔ

加固
加固[jiā gù] 使建筑物等坚固 reinforce; consolidate：加固堤坝 strengthen the dam (dyke)加固楼房 reinforce a building

加塞儿
加塞儿[jiā sāi r] 为了取巧而不守秩序，插进排好的队列里 jump in; push into a queue out of turn; jump a queue

加委
加委[jiā wěi]〈旧时 old〉主管机关对所属单位或群众团体推举出来的公职人员办理委任手续 formality of competent authorities for the appointment of a public official recommended by an affiliated department or by a nongovernmental organization

加密
加密[jiā mì] 给计算机、电话、存折等的有关信息编上密码，使不掌握密码的用户无法使用，达到保密的目的 encode; encrypt; encode the relevant information on a computer, telephone or bankbook,etc.so as to prevent unauthorized access

加封
加封[jiā fēng] 贴上封条 put up a strip of paper to seal a door; seal up (a door, document, etc.)加封[jiā fēng]封建时代指在原有的基础上再封给（名位、土地等）(of feudal years) grant additional titles and fiefs (to a noble man)

加工
加工[jiā gōng]1.把原材料、半成品等制成成品，或使达到规定的要求 process; turn raw materials or semi-finished products into products or up to required standards：来料加工 processing with materials supplied by a customer加工成型 processing and forming面粉加工厂 flour mill 2.指做使成品更完美、精致的各种工作 art of making a finished product perfect and exquisite：技术加工 technical improvement艺术加工 artistic improvement

加强
加强[jiā qiáng] 使更坚强或更有效 strengthen; enhance; augment; reinforce：加强团结 strengthen unity加强领导 strengthen leadership加强爱国主义教育 improve the education on patriotism; give more education on patriotism

加快
加快[jiā kuài]1.使变得更快 accelerate; quicken; speed up; become quicker：加快建设进度 accelerate the construction他加快了步子，走到队伍的前面。He quickened his steps until he found himself walking in the van of the contingent. 2.铁路部门指持有慢车车票的旅客办理手续后改乘快车 passenger holding a slow train ticket changes to an express train after going through necessary formalities

加意
加意[jiā yì] 特别注意；非常留意 with special care; with close attention：加意保护 protect with special care加意经营 manage the business with special attention

加料
加料[jiā liào] 把原料装进操作的容器之中；添加原料 feed in raw materials：加料工人 feeding worker自动加料 automatic feeding加料[jiā liào]原料比一般用得多，质量比一般好的（制成品）finished product which is made by using more raw materials and thus acquires better quality

加油
加油[jiā yóu]1.添加燃料油、润滑油等 refuel; fill sth. with lubricant：加油站 gas station 2.（加油儿 jiā∥yóur）〈比喻 fig.〉进一步努力；加劲儿 make more efforts：加油干 work harder; work with more vigour大家为运动员鼓掌加油。The crowd encouraged the players with applause. or The crowd cheered the players on.

加法
加法[jiā fǎ]数学中的一种运算方法。最简单的是数的加法，即两个或两个以上的数合成一个数的计算方法。addition; method of mathematical operations; the simplest is the addition of figures, namely, the calculating method of adding two or more numbers into another number

加深
加深[jiā shēn] 加大深度；变得更深 deepen：加深了解 get a deeper understanding; increase understanding矛盾加深。The contradiction has deepened.

加点
加点[jiā diǎn] 在规定的工作时间终了之后继续工作一段时间 work extra hours：加班加点 work extra shifts and extra hours

加热
加热[jiā rè] 使物体的温度增高 heat up; increase the temperature of sth.

加班
加班[jiā bān] 在规定以外增加工作时间或班次 work overtime; time or shift beyond the established limit：加班加点 work for longer hours; work extra shifts or extra hours加班费（加班得到的报酬）overtime; pay for overtime work; overtime pay; pay for extra hours

加盟
加盟[jiā méng] 加入某个团体或组织 become a member of an alliance or union：因有世界一流球星加盟，该队实力大增。The team is much stronger with the participation of some top players in the world.

加码
加码[jiā mǎ]1.（加码儿 jiā∥mǎr）指提高商品价格 raise the price of commodities; overcharge 2.指增加赌注 raise the stakes in gambling 3.提高数量指标 raise the quota：层层加码 raise the quota at each level

加紧
加紧[jiā jǐn] 加快速度或加大强度 catch up; step up; speed up; intensify：加紧生产 step up production加紧训练 intensify training加紧田间管理工作 intensify field management

加速
加速[jiā sù]1.加快速度 quicken; accelerate; expedite; speed up：火车正在加速运行。The train is speeding up. 2.使速度加快 hasten; accelerate：加速其自身的灭亡 hasten its own destruction

加速器
加速器[jiā sù qì] 用人工方法产生高速运动粒子的装置，是研究原子核和基本粒子性质的工具，如静电加速器、回旋加速器、直线加速器、同步加速器等 accelerator; apparatus that accelerates charged particles to high energies; tool for studying atomic nucleus and elementary particles, such as betatron, electrostatic accelerator, cyclotron, linear accelerator, synchrotron

加速度
加速度[jiā sù dù] 速度的变化与发生这种变化所用的时间的比，即单位时间内速度的变化 acceleration; the rate of change of velocity with respect to time consumed

加重
加重[jiā zhòng] 增加重量或程度 make or become heavier; increase the weight of：加重负担 increase the burden; add to the burden加重语气 speak with emphasis病势加重 patient's condition being worse责任加重了 have greater responsibility

务
务[wù]（ㄨˋ）（務）1.事情 affair; business：事务 business; affairs任务 task; mission; assignment公务 official business; official assignment 2.从事；致力 be engaged in; devote one's efforts to：务农 be engaged in farming好高务远 aim too high; seek for what is beyond one's ability; bite off more than one can chew 3.〈旧时 old〉收税的关卡，现在只用于地名，如曹家务（在河北），商酒务（在河南） taxation point [now used only as part of a geographical name, as Caojiawu (in Hebei) and Shangjiuwu (in Henan)] 4.务必 must; be sure to：务须 must; be sure to除恶务尽。The evils must be eradicated (or rooted out). 5.(Wù) 姓 a surname相关词组报务 | 边务 | 财务 | 常务 | 乘务 | 党务 | 防务 | 服务 | 港务 | 公务 | 国务 | 航务 | 会务 | 机务 | 急务 | 家务 | 教务 | 剧务 | 军务 | 劳务 | 内务 | 侨务 | 勤务 | 任务 | 冗务 | 商务 | 时务 | 事务 | 庶务 | 税务 | 特务 | 外务 | 洋务 | 要务 | 业务 | 医务 | 义务 | 杂务 | 债务 | 政务 | 职务 | 总务 | 乘务员 | 服务器 | 服务员 | 公务员 | 国务卿 | 国务院 | 话务员 | 劳务费 | 勤务兵 | 勤务员 | 司务长 | 义务兵 | 债务人 | 政务院 | 硬任务 | 当务之急 | 服务行业 | 国务委员 | 事务主义 | 义务教育 | 除恶务尽 | 好高务远 | 电子商务 | 义务兵役制 | 中央商务区 | 识时务者为俊杰务必 | 务工 | 务农 | 务期 | 务求 | 务实 | 务须 | 务虚 | 务正

务农
务农[wù nóng] 从事农业生产 be engaged in agricultural work (or farming); be a farmer：回乡务农 return to the home village to do farm work

务实
务实[wù shí]1.从事或讨论具体的工作 deal with concrete matters relating to work 2.讲究实际，不求浮华 be pragmatic

务工
务工[wù gōng]1.从事工业或工程方面的工作 be engaged in industrial or engineering work 2.指投入工力 input of manpower：务工不多，收益不少。A moderate input of manpower brings a good return.

务必
务必[wù bì] 必须；一定要 must; be sure to：同学们都希望听你的学术报告，你务必去讲一次。The students all wanted to listen to your academic lecture. Be sure to give them one.

务期
务期[wù qī] 一定要 must; be sure to：务期必克 be sure to win the battle (or capture a city, etc.)务期有成 make sure to achieve sth.

务正
务正[wù zhèng] 从事正当的职业 do honest work：不务正 not do honest work回心务正 change one's mind and do honest work

务求
务求[wù qiú] 必须要求（达到某种情况或程度） must; be sure to have sth. done：务求善始善终 be sure to begin well and end well务求早日完成任务。Be sure to fulfil the task as early as possible.

务虚
务虚[wù xū] 就某项工作的政治、思想、政策、理论方面进行研究讨论 discuss principles or the political, ideological and theoretical guidelines relating to a certain field of work

务须
务须[wù xū] 务必；必须 must; be sure to：务须准时到达。Be sure to arrive in good time.

劢
劢[mài]（ㄇㄞˋ）（勱）〈书 fml.〉勉力；努力 diligence; effort

劣
劣[liè]（ㄌㄧㄝˋ）1.坏；不好（跟‘优’相对 as opposed to ‘good’or ‘excellent’）bad; inferior; of low quality：劣等 poor; low-grade; of inferior quality劣势 unfavourable or disadvantageous situation; inferior strength or position; weak恶劣 mean; base; abominable; disgusting; despicable低劣 inferior; low-grade优劣 superior or inferior 2.小于一定标准的 minor; smaller than some standard：劣弧 minor arc相关词组卑劣 | 粗劣 | 低劣 | 恶劣 | 顽劣 | 伪劣 | 猥劣 | 芜劣 | 窳劣 | 拙劣劣等 | 劣弧 | 劣迹 | 劣马 | 劣绅 | 劣势 | 劣质 | 劣根性

劣势
劣势[liè shì] 情况或条件比较差的形势 weakness; unfavourable or disadvantageous situation; inferior strength or position：处于劣势 be in an unfavourable position; be weaker; be inferior变劣势为优势 turn a weakness into a strength

劣弧
劣弧[liè hú] 小于半圆的弧 minor arc; arc smaller than a semicircle

劣根性
劣根性[liè gēn xìng] 长期养成的、根深蒂固的不良习性 bad habit; deep-rooted or ingrained bad habit

劣等
劣等[liè děng] 低等；下等 poor; low-grade; of inferior quality：劣等货 low-grade or inferior goods

劣绅
劣绅[liè shēn] 品行恶劣的绅士 evil gentry：土豪劣绅 local tyrants and evil gentry

劣质
劣质[liè zhì] 质量低劣 of low or poor quality; inferior：劣质煤 dross劣质烟酒 inferior tobacco and alcohol

劣迹
劣迹[liè jì]恶劣的事迹（指损害人民的 harmful to the public）evil; misdeed; evildoing：劣迹昭彰 flagrant evildoing, notorious record他的劣迹已被人告发。His misdeed has been reported to the authorities.

劣马
劣马[liè mǎ]1.不好的马 inferior horse; nag 2.性情暴躁不容易驾驭的马 fiery steed; vicious horse; wild horse：制伏劣马 tame a wild horse; break in a wild horse

动
动[dòng]（ㄉㄨㄥˋ）（動）1.（事物）改变原来位置或脱离静止状态（跟‘静’相对 as opposed to‘still’）move; stir; change the place or position of sth.：流动 flow风吹草动。The grass sways as the wind rises.你坐着别动。Sit there and don't move.这东西一个人拿不动。No one can move that single-handedly. 2.动作；行动 act; get moving：轻举妄动 act rashly一举一动 every act and every move只要大家动起来，什么事都能办。Anything can be achieved with our joint efforts. 3.改变（事物）原来的位置或样子 change; alter; shift：搬动 move挪动 shift改动 change动用 employ兴师动众 arouse the masses (to do sth.) 4.使用；使起作用 use; make use of：动笔 take up the pen动手 start work动脑筋 use one's head 5.触动（思想感情）touch (one's heart); arouse; provoke：动心 be touched; be moved动怒 lose one's temper动了公愤 incur public indignation 6.感动 move; touch：这出戏演得很动人。This play is touching. 7.〈方 dial.〉吃；喝（多用于否定式 usu. in the negative）eat or drink：这病不宜动荤腥。Consumption of meat and fish is not advisable for those with this illness.他向来不动酒。He doesn't drink. 8.动不动；常常 easily; frequently; usually; tend to：动辄得咎 be liable to accusation no matter what one does影片一经上演，观众动以万计。Immediately after its release, the film drew audiences of tens of thousands.相关词组摆动 | 暴动 | 被动 | 变动 | 波动 | 搏动 | 簸动 | 策动 | 颤动 | 冲动 | 出动 | 搐动 | 触动 | 传动 | 蠢动 | 从动 | 打动 | 带动 | 地动 | 电动 | 抖动 | 发动 | 翻动 | 反动 | 浮动 | 改动 | 感动 | 更动 | 鼓动 | 滚动 | 撼动 | 行动 | 轰动 | 哄动 | 互动 | 滑动 | 晃动 | 挥动 | 活动 | 机动 | 激动 | 搅动 | 惊动 | 举动 | 开动 | 拉动 | 劳动 | 雷动 | 联动 | 撩动 | 流动 | 律动 | 脉动 | 盲动 | 萌动 | 能动 | 挪动 | 飘动 | 平动 | 启动 | 牵动 | 倾动 | 扰动 | 嚅动 | 蠕动 | 骚动 | 煽动 | 扇动 | 生动 | 松动 | 耸动 | 胎动 | 挑动 | 调动 | 跳动 | 推动 | 妄动 | 舞动 | 翕动 | 噏动 | 响动 | 摇动 | 一动 | 移动 | 引动 | 运动 | 攒动 | 躁动 | 振动 | 震动 | 主动 | 转动 | 自动 | 走动 | 被动式 | 别动队 | 不动产 | 传动带 | 大动脉 | 地动仪 | 电动机 | 电动势 | 多动症 | 发动机 | 反动派 | 肺动脉 | 活动家 | 劳动布 | 劳动节 | 劳动力 | 劳动日 | 劳动者 | 小动作 | 原动机 | 原动力 | 运动场 | 运动会 | 运动量 | 运动学 | 运动员 | 运动战 | 制动器 | 主动脉 | 助动词 | 自动化 | 自动炮 | 自动线 | 总动员 | 半自动 | 活劳动 | 死劳动 | 不动声色 | 大动干戈 | 浮动汇率 | 滚动轴承 | 劳动保护 | 劳动保险 | 劳动对象 | 劳动改造 | 劳动教养 | 劳动模范 | 劳动强度 | 劳动手段 | 劳动条件 | 劳动资料 | 流动资产 | 流动资金 | 无动于衷 | 移动电话 | 移动通信 | 运动健将 | 运动神经 | 主动脉弓 | 自动步枪 | 自动扶梯 | 自动控制 | 自动铅笔 | 半劳动力 | 扁形动物 | 变温动物 | 哺乳动物 | 低等动物 | 飞潜动植 | 高等动物 | 冠状动脉 | 规定动作 | 撼天动地 | 恒温动物 | 环节动物 | 棘皮动物 | 脊索动物 | 脊椎动物 | 甲壳动物 | 节肢动物 | 惊天动地 | 惊心动魄 | 劳师动众 | 冷血动物 | 两栖动物 | 爬行动物 | 腔肠动物 | 全劳动力 | 热血动物 | 蠕形动物 | 软体动物 | 三维动画 | 温血动物 | 线形动物 | 兴师动众 | 原生动物 | 原索动物 | 自选动作 | 按兵不动 | 必要劳动 | 变速运动 | 抽象劳动 | 蠢蠢欲动 | 登山运动 | 垫上运动 | 风吹草动 | 复杂劳动 | 雇佣劳动 | 机械运动 | 极限运动 | 技巧运动 | 简单劳动 | 健美运动 | 具体劳动 | 雷打不动 | 民族运动 | 脑力劳动 | 启蒙运动 | 轻举妄动 | 全能运动 | 群众运动 | 社会活动 | 剩余劳动 | 水上运动 | 太阳活动 | 体力劳动 | 体育运动 | 田径运动 | 纹丝不动 | 闻风而动 | 五卅运动 | 五四运动 | 物化劳动 | 匀速运动 | 劳动生产率 | 自动柜员机 | 自动取款机 | 磁盘驱动器 | 国际劳动节 | 候风地动仪 | 喷气发动机 | 无脊椎动物 | 五一劳动节 | 主观能动性 | 新文化运动 | 太岁头上动土 | 低级神经活动 | 高级神经活动 | 社会必要劳动 | 一二·九运动 | 自由落体运动 | 牵一发而动全身 | 奥林匹克运动会动笔 | 动兵 | 动产 | 动词 | 动弹 | 动荡 | 动感 | 动工 | 动换 | 动火 | 动机 | 动静 | 动力 | 动量 | 动乱 | 动轮 | 动脉 | 动能 | 动怒 | 动气 | 动迁 | 动情 | 动人 | 动容 | 动身 | 动手 | 动态 | 动听 | 动土 | 动问 | 动武 | 动物 | 动向 | 动销 | 动心 | 动刑 | 动摇 | 动议 | 动因 | 动用 | 动员 | 动辄 | 动嘴 | 动作 | 动不动 | 动肝火 | 动滑轮 | 动画片 | 动劲儿 | 动力机 | 动脉弓 | 动摩擦 | 动物学 | 动物油 | 动物园 | 动作片 | 动画片儿 | 动脉硬化 | 动能武器 | 动人心弦 | 动物纤维 | 动眼神经 | 动辄得咎 | 动脉粥样硬化

动不动
动不动[dòng bu dòng] 表示很容易产生某种行动或情况（多指不希望发生的），常跟‘就’连用 [usu. followed by 就 jiù] (of an act or situation, usu. unwished for) occurring frequently, easily; frequently; at every turn; at every move; at the drop of a hat; at the slightest provocation：动不动就感冒 easily catch cold动不动就发脾气 be apt to lose one's temper; quick to anger

动乱
动乱[dòng luàn]（社会）骚动变乱 (social) turmoil; disturbance; upheaval; turbulence

动产
动产[dòng chǎn] 可以移动的财产，指金钱、器物等 movables; movable property; movable assets like cash, household goods, etc.

动人
动人[dòng rén] 感动人 moving; touching：美丽动人 beautiful and touching动人的歌声 enchanting sound of singing

动人心弦
动人心弦[dòng rén xīn xián] 激动人心；非常动人 tug at one's heartstrings; be deeply moving; be exciting：这是个多么动人心弦的场面！What a moving scene!亦 also 动人心魄 dòng rén xīnpò

动作
动作[dòng zuò]1.全身或身体的一部分的活动 movement (of the body or a part of the body); motion; action：这一节操有四个动作。This segment of the exercise is composed of four movements.动作敏捷 quick-limbed; quick in one's movements 2.活动；行动起来 act; start moving：弹钢琴要十个指头都动作。It takes the action of all ten fingers to play the piano.

动作片
动作片[dòng zuò piàn] 以打斗场面为主的故事片 action film

动兵
动兵[dòng bīng] 出动军队打仗 send out troops to fight

动刑
动刑[dòng xíng] 施用刑具 subject sb. to torture; torture

动力
动力[dòng lì]1.使机械作功的各种作用力，如水力、风力、电力、畜力等 power; motive power; force or energy that puts machinery to work, e.g. hydropower, wind power, electric power, livestock power, etc. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉推动工作、事业等前进和发展的力量 impetus; drive; driving force; force stimulating the development of work or a cause：人民是创造世界历史的动力。People are the driving force of world history.

动力机
动力机[dòng lì jī] 发动机 motor; engine

动劲儿
动劲儿[dòng jìn r]〈方 dial.〉使力气exert strength; work hard; make efforts

动向
动向[dòng xiàng] 活动或发展的方向 trend; tendency：思想动向 trends of thought市场动向 market trends侦察敌人的动向 reconnoitre enemy movements

动听
动听[dòng tīng] 听起来使人感动或者感觉有兴趣 interesting or pleasant to the ear; moving; persuasive：娓娓动听 be pleasant to the ear极平常的事儿，让他说起来就很动听。He can make ordinary things sound interesting.

动员
动员[dòng yuán]1.把国家的武装力量由和平状态转入战时状态，以及把所有的经济部门（工业、农业、运输业等）转入供应战争需要的工作 mobilize; cause the armed forces to become ready for service and turn all economic sectors (i.e. industry, agriculture, transportation, etc.) to the needs of war 2.发动人参加某项活动 mobilize; call upon people to participate in a certain activity：动员报告 mobilization speech全体动员，大搞卫生 mobilize everyone to improve on general sanitation

动嘴
动嘴[dòng zuǐ] 指说话 talk; speak：别光动嘴，快干活！Don't just talk. Get down to business.

动因
动因[dòng yīn] 动机；原因 motive; motivation;cause：创作动因 creative motivation贪欲是她作案的直接动因。It was greed that motivated her to commit this crime.

动土
动土[dòng tǔ] 刨地（多用于建筑、安葬等 usu. of civil engineering projects and burials）break ground; start building

动容
动容[dòng róng] 脸上出现受感动的表情 change countenance; be visibly moved：观者无不为之动容。The entire audience was moved.

动工
动工[dòng gōng]1.开工（指土木工程）begin construction (in civil engineering); come under construction：动工不到三个月，就完成了全部工程的一半。Half of the project was completed only three months after construction began. 2.施工 construct; be under construction：这里正在动工，车辆不能通过。This area is under construction and there is no thoroughfare.

动弹
动弹[dòng tan]（人、动物或能转动的东西）活动 (of human being, animal or animated object) move; stir：两脚发木，动弹不得。Both feet went numb and could not move.风车不动弹了。The windmill has stopped.

动心
动心[dòng xīn] 思想、感情发生波动 one's mind is disturbed; one's desire, enthusiasm or interest is aroused：见财不动心 not moved by money经人一说，他也就动了心了。People tried to persuade him, and his interest was aroused.

动态
动态[dòng tài]1.（事情）变化发展的情况 trends; developments; general tendency or course (of events)：科技动态 developments in science and technology从这些图片里可以看出我国建设的动态。These pictures embody the trends of reconstruction of our country. 2.艺术形象表现出的活动神态 dynamism of an artistic image：画中人物，动态各异，栩栩如生。The figures in the painting, with their different bearings, are as vivid as live figures. 3.运动变化状态的或从运动变化状态考察的 dynamic; motional; relating to an object in motion：动态工作点 dynamic operating point动态电流 dynamic current动态分析 dynamic analysis

动怒
动怒[dòng nù] 发怒 lose one's temper; flare up; be enraged; be vexed

动情
动情[dòng qíng]1.情绪激动 get worked up; become excited：她越说越动情，泪水哗哗直流。She got so worked up talking about it that her tears flowed freely. 2.产生爱慕的感情 become enamoured; have one's passions aroused

动感
动感[dòng gǎn] 指绘画、雕刻、文艺作品中的形象等给人以栩栩如生的感觉 (of images in paintings, sculptures, literature, etc.) dynamic; vibrant with life; lively; vivid：塑像极富动感。The sculpture is full of life.

动手
动手[dòng shǒu]1.开始做；做 start work; get to work; get moving：早点儿动手早点儿完。The sooner we start, the sooner we finish.大家一齐动手。Everyone got to work. 2.用手接触 touch; handle：展览品只许看，不许动手。Please just look and don't touch the exhibits. 3.指打人 raise a hand to strike sb.; hit out at：两人说着说着就动起手来了。The two came to blows in the middle of a conversation.

动换
动换[dòng huan] 动弹；活动 move; stir：车内太挤，人都没法动换了。One cannot move in this bus crammed with so many people.

动摇
动摇[dòng yáo]1.不稳固；不坚定 vacillate; waver：动摇分子 wavering (or vacillating) element意志坚定，绝不动摇 never waver in one's determination 2.使动摇 shake：动摇军心 shake the morale of the army环境再艰苦也动摇不了这批青年征服自然的决心。No matter how difficult the situation, nothing can shake these young people's resolve to conquer nature.

动摩擦
动摩擦[dòng mó cā] 接触物体之间保持相对运动时的摩擦 dynamic friction; kinetic friction; running friction; friction between two contacting objects in relative motion

动机
动机[dòng jī] 推动人从事某种行为的念头 motive; intention; inner drive that causes a person to do sth.：动机好，方法不对头，也会把事办坏。Good intentions can also mess things up if the method is not appropriate.

动武
动武[dòng wǔ]使用武力（包括殴打、发动战争）use force; start a fight; come to blows

动气
动气[dòng qì] 生气 take offence; get angry：病中不宜动气。Better not get angry while you are ill.我从来没有看见他动过气。I have never seen him get angry.

动滑轮
动滑轮[dòng huá lún]位置不固定的滑轮，使用时整个滑轮发生位移。使用这种滑轮可以省力。fall block; movable pulley; pulley with unfixed position, providing mechanical advantage by saving energy

动火
动火[dòng huǒ]（～儿 dòng∥huǒr）发怒 get angry; flare up：什么事值得这么动火？What made you flare up like that?他一听这话就动起火来。He got angry upon hearing this.

动物
动物[dòng wù] 生物的一大类，这一类生物多以有机物为食料，有神经，有感觉，能运动 animal; a category of living beings that can move about independently, have specialized sense organs, and usu. feed off other organic substances as food

动物园
动物园[dòng wù yuán] 饲养许多种动物（特别是科学上有价值或当地罕见的动物），供人观赏的公园 zoo; zoological park; place where wild animals (esp. those valuable for science or locally rare species) are kept for public showing

动物学
动物学[dòng wù xué] 研究动物的形态、生理、生态、分类、分布和怎样控制动物的学科 zoology; science that deals with animals, their morphology, physiology, habits, classification, distribution and control

动物油
动物油[dòng wù yóu]从动物取得的油脂，如牛油、猪油、鲸油等。供食用，也可以做润滑剂和化工原料。animal oil; edible oils obtained from animals, e.g. butter (from cows), lard (from pigs), blubber (from whales), etc., and also oils obtained from animals to be used as lubricants and chemical materials

动物纤维
动物纤维[dòng wù xiān wéi] 来源于动物的纤维，如蚕丝、羊毛等 animal fibre; fibres from animals, e.g. silk, wool, etc.

动用
动用[dòng yòng] 使用 put to use; employ; draw on; resort to：动用公款 draw upon public funds动用武力 resort to arms不得随意动用库存粮食。Random drawing upon grain reserves is not allowed.

动画片
动画片[dòng huà piàn] 美术片的一种，把人、物的表情、动作、变化等分段画成许多画幅，再用摄影机连续拍摄而成 animated cartoon; cartoon; motion picture made by filming a series of drawings each showing a stage of movement of a person or an object slightly changed from the one before, so that the figures in them seem to move when the drawings are projected in rapid succession

动画片儿
动画片儿[dòng huà piān r] 同 same as 动画片 dònghuàpiàn

动眼神经
动眼神经[dòng yǎn shén jīng] 第三对脑神经，从大脑脚发出，分布在眼球的肌肉上，主管眼球的运动 oculomotor nerve; third pair of cranial nerves, arise from the cerebral peduncle, and supply most muscles of the eye, controlling movements of the eyeball

动笔
动笔[dòng bǐ] 用笔写或画（多指开始写或画）；落笔 take up the pen; start writing or drawing：好久没动笔了 have not written anything for a long time动笔之前，先要想一想。Think before you start writing.

动肝火
动肝火[dòng gān huǒ] 指发脾气；发怒 get angry; flare up：有话慢慢说，不要动肝火。Take your time to explain and do not get angry.

动能
动能[dòng néng] 物体由于机械运动而具有的能，它的大小是运动物体的质量和速度平方乘积的1/2 kinetic energy; energy a body possesses by virtue of being in mechanical motion, equal to half of the product of the mass of the body and the square of its velocity

动能武器
动能武器[dòng néng wǔ qì]通过发射能够制导的高速弹头，以其整体或爆炸碎片击毁目标的武器。主要用来拦截弹道导弹和攻击军用卫星。动能武器的一些先进技术，也可用于某些常规武器。kinetic energy weapon; weapon that launches high-speed guided warheads containing metal balls, mainly used to intercept ballistic missiles or attack military satellites. Some of the advanced technology for kinetic energy weapons can also be applied to some conventional weapons.

动脉
动脉[dòng mài]1.把心脏中压出来的血液输送到全身各部分的血管 artery; blood vessels that carry blood away from the heart to all parts of the body 2.〈比喻 fig.〉重要的交通干线 artery; main road or channel

动脉弓
动脉弓[dòng mài gōng] 主动脉弓 aortic arch; arch of the aorta

动脉硬化
动脉硬化[dòng mài yìng huà]病，动脉管壁增厚，弹性减弱，管腔狭窄，甚至完全堵塞。多由高血压、血液中胆固醇含量增多等引起。arteriosclerosis; disease characterized by the abnormal thickening of the walls of arteries, narrowing, loss of elasticity or even blockage of the arteries, usu. caused by hypertension or an increase of cholesterol in the blood

动脉粥样硬化
动脉粥样硬化[dòng mài zhōu yàng yìng huà]动脉硬化的一种，大、中动脉内膜出现含胆固醇、类脂肪等的黄色物质，多由脂肪代谢紊乱、神经血管功能失调引起。常导致血栓形成、供血障碍等。atherosclerosis; a kind of arteriosclerosis, with yellow substances containing cholesterol and lipids on the inner walls of large or medium arteries, usu. caused by a fat metabolism disorders and neurovascular disfunction, oft. leads to thrombosis and blockage of blood supply; 亦 also 粥样硬化 zhōuyàng yìnghuà

动荡
动荡[dòng dàng]1.波浪起伏 heaving and subsiding：湖水动荡。The water in the lake rises and ebbs. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉局势、情况不稳定；不平静 (of situation) turbulence; upheaval; unrest; turmoil：社会动荡 social upheaval动荡不安 turbulent; in turmoil动荡的年代 turbulent age

动议
动议[dòng yì]会议中的建议（一般指临时的）motion; (usu. provisional) proposal to be discussed at a meeting：紧急动议 urgent motion

动词
动词[dòng cí] 表示人或事物的动作、存在、变化的词，如‘走、笑、有、在、看、写、飞、落、保护、开始、起来、上去’verb; any of a class of words expressing an action, state of being, or occurrence, e.g. walk, laugh, have, be, look, write, fly, drop, protect, start, rise, climb, etc.

动身
动身[dòng shēn] 启程；出发 go (or set out) on a journey; leave (for a distant place); set off：行李都打好了，明天早上就动身。We've already packed and will leave tomorrow morning.

动轮
动轮[dòng lún] 机车或其他机械上跟动力直接相连的轮子 driving wheel; wheel of a locomotive or other kinds of machinery, that receives power from the engine

动辄
动辄[dòng zhé]〈书 fml.〉动不动就 easily; frequently; at every turn：动辄得咎 be blamed for everything whatever one does动辄恶语相加 swear at sb. on the least pretext

动辄得咎
动辄得咎[dòng zhé dé jiù] 动不动就受到责备或处分 be constantly taken to task; be liable to blame for whatever one does

动迁
动迁[dòng qiān] 因原建筑物拆除或翻建而迁移到别处 mobilize-evacuate; relocate; mobilization of residents into evacuation from dwellings to be demolished or reconstructed：动迁户 relocated household这次拓宽马路，要动迁五百多户居民。In this street-widening project, more than 500 households will be relocated.

动量
动量[dòng liàng]表示运动物体运动特性的一种物理量。动量是一个矢量，它的方向和物体运动的方向相同，它的大小等于运动物体的质量和速度的乘积。momentum; physical quantity of motion of a moving body in the direction of its movement, measured as a product of its mass and velocity

动销
动销[dòng xiāo] 开始销售 begin to sell：刚过春节，空调就已动销。Sales of air-conditioners began soon after the Spring Festival.

动问
动问[dòng wèn]〈客套话 pol.〉请问 may I ask：不敢动问，您是从北京来的吗？Excuse me for asking, but are you from Beijing?

动静
动静[dòng jing]1.动作或说话的声音 sound; voice：屋子里静悄悄的，一点动静也没有。It was quiet in the room; nothing was stirring. 2.（打听或侦察的）情况 movements (learned of or scouted out); happenings; events; conditions; activities：察看对方的动静 observe the activities of the other side一有动静，要马上报告。Report as soon as anything happens.

助
助[zhù]（ㄓㄨˋ）帮助；协助 help; assist; aid：互助 help each other助人为乐 take pleasure in helping others; delight in helping others爱莫能助 be willing to help but unable to do so助我一臂之力 lend me a hand相关词组帮助 | 臂助 | 补助 | 扶助 | 辅助 | 公助 | 互助 | 借助 | 救助 | 捐助 | 匡助 | 内助 | 求助 | 谈助 | 相助 | 襄助 | 协助 | 援助 | 赞助 | 资助 | 互助会 | 互助组 | 语助词 | 自助餐 | 辅助货币 | 拔苗助长 | 推波助澜 | 揠苗助长 | 爱莫能助 | 拔刀相助 | 得道多助 | 失道寡助 | 守望相助 | 个人数字助理助残 | 助词 | 助攻 | 助教 | 助理 | 助力 | 助跑 | 助燃 | 助手 | 助威 | 助兴 | 助战 | 助长 | 助产士 | 助动词 | 助力车 | 助听器 | 助学金 | 助桀为虐 | 助纣为虐

助产士
助产士[zhù chǎn shì] 受过助产专业教育，能独立接生和护理产妇的中级医务人员 midwife; intermediate-level medical worker qualified to practise midwifery, having specialized training in gynecology and childcare, and the ability to carry out emergency measures in the absence of medical help

助兴
助兴[zhù xìng] 帮助增加兴致 liven things up; add to the fun：席间有杂技表演助兴。Acrobatics will be performed at the banquet for added entertainment.您来段京剧给大伙儿助助兴吧！Sing us a Peking Opera aria to liven things up a little.

助力
助力[zhù lì]1.帮助 help; assist：他对于促进双方的协作助力不少。He is of much help to promoting cooperation between the two sides. 2.帮助的力量 help：别人的鼓励是一种助力，别人的批评也是一种助力。Someone else's encouragement is a help, and so is his criticism.

助力车
助力车[zhù lì chē] 装有小型发动机的自行车，因可以借助机械动力代替脚蹬骑行，所以叫助力车 power-assisted bicycle; bicycle fitted with a small motor, using mechanical power to replace pedalling

助动词
助动词[zhù dòng cí]动词的一类，表示可能、应该、必须、愿望等意思，如‘能、会、可以、可能、该、应该、得(děi)、必须、要、肯、敢、愿意’。助动词通常用在动词或形容词前边。‘我要糖’、‘他会英文’里的‘要、会’是一般动词。auxiliary verb that expresses ‘maybe, should, must, or wish’, such as 能 néng, 会 huì, 可以 kěyǐ, 可能 kěnéng, 该 gāi, 应该 yīnggāi, 得 děi, 必须 bìxū, 要 yào, 肯 kěn, 敢 gǎn, 愿意 yuàn·yì. In general, an auxiliary verb is placed before a verb or an adjective. In the sentences‘我要糖 (I want candy)’and ‘他会英文 (He knows English)’, 要 yào and 会 huì are ordinary verbs.

助听器
助听器[zhù tīng qì] 辅助听觉的一种器械，利用声学原理，把声波集中起来送入耳内，或者利用电学原理，把受话器或话筒所接收的声波放大后送入耳内，使重听的人听到声音 audiphone; hearing aid; deaf aid; device designed to bring sound more effectively into the ear. It works on acoustic principles, concentrating sound waves as they enter the ear, or electric principles, amplifying sound waves through a receiver before they enter the ear.

助威
助威[zhù wēi] 帮助增加声势 boost the morale of; cheer (for)：呐喊助威 shout encouragement

助学金
助学金[zhù xué jīn] 政府发给学生的补助金 stipend; grant-in-aid; fixed sum of money for students provided by the government

助战
助战[zhù zhàn]1.协助作战 assist in fighting (a battle) 2.助威 bolster sb.'s morale

助手
助手[zhù shǒu] 不独立承担任务，只协助别人进行工作的人 assistant; helper; aide; person who helps others at work：得力助手 capable assistant; right-hand man

助攻
助攻[zhù gōng]以部分兵力在次要方向上进攻（区别于‘主攻’as compared with ‘main attack’）holding (or secondary) attack

助教
助教[zhù jiào] 高等学校中职别最低的教师 assistant (the lowest rank of college faculty)

助桀为虐
助桀为虐[zhù Jié wéi nüè]〈比喻 fig.〉帮助坏人做坏事 aid King Jie in his tyrannical rule; aid and abet an evildoer亦 also 助纣为虐 zhù Zhòu wéi nüè（桀是夏朝的末了一个王，纣是商朝的末了一个王，相传都是暴君 Both King Jie, the last monarch of the Xia Dynasty, and King Zhou, the last monarch of the Shang Dynasty, were tyrants.）

助残
助残[zhù cán] 帮助残疾人 aid the disabled：开展大规模助残活动 launch a large-scale campaign to aid the disabled

助燃
助燃[zhù rán] 一种物质，本身不能燃烧，在其他物质燃烧时能提供燃烧所需的氧，叫做助燃 combustion-supporting; property of a substance that does not itself burn but can provide the oxygen needed to help other substances burn

助理
助理[zhù lǐ]协助主要负责人办事的（多用于职位名称 usu. used in titles）assistant; one who assists：助理人员 assistant personnel助理编辑 assistant editor助理研究员 assistant research fellow部长助理 assistant minister

助纣为虐
助纣为虐[zhù Zhòu wéi nüè]另见  助桀为虐 zhù Jié wéi nüè

助词
助词[zhù cí] 独立性最差、意义最不实在的一种特殊的虚词 auxiliary word, a kind of unstressed form word 包括 e.g. (a)结构助词，如‘的、地、得、所’ [performing the grammatical functions of structure, such as 的 ·de, 地 ·de, 得 ·de, 所 suǒ] (b)时态助词，如‘了、着、过’ [performing the grammatical functions of tense, such as 了 ·le, 着 ·zhe, 过 ·guo] (c)语气助词，如‘呢、吗、吧、啊’ [performing the grammatical functions of mood, such as 呢 ·ne, 吗 ·ma, 吧 ·ba, 啊 ·a]

助跑
助跑[zhù pǎo] 体育运动中有些项目，如跳高、跳远、投掷标枪或手榴弹，在跳、投等开始前先跑一段，这种动作叫助跑 run-up; approach; preliminary steps in certain sports events, such as high jump, long jump, javelin, and hand grenade

助长
助长[zhù zhǎng]帮助增长（多指坏的方面 oft. derog.）encourage; abet; put a premium on：姑息迁就，势必助长不良风气的蔓延。Overindulgence or being too accommodating encourages evil tendencies.

努
努[nǔ]（ㄋㄨˇ）（、呶、）1.使出（力气） exert (one's efforts); put forth (one's strength)：努力 make efforts; try hard; exert oneself努劲儿 put forth all one's strength 2.凸出 bulge; protrude：努着眼睛 with bulging eyes努着嘴 purse one's lips 3.〈方 dial.〉用力太过，身体内部受伤 injure oneself by overexertion另见  呶 náo相关词组金刚努目努力 | 努责 | 努嘴

努力
努力[nǔ lì] 把力量尽量使出来 make efforts; try hard; exert oneself：努力工作 work hard努力学习 study assiduously大家再努一把力。Let's all make still greater efforts.

努嘴
努嘴[nǔ zuǐ]（～儿 nǔ∥zuǐr）向人撅嘴示意 purse one's lips as a signal：奶奶直努嘴儿，让他别再往下说。Grandma pursed her lips at him, hinting that he should stop talking.

努责
努责[nǔ zé] 医学上指大便或分娩时腹部用力 (med.) use the force of the abdomen muscles while defecating or in labour

劫夺
劫夺[jié duó]用武力夺取（财物或人）seize (a person or his property) by force：劫夺资源 seize resources

劫持
劫持[jié chí] 要挟；挟持 abduct; hold under duress; hijack：劫持飞机 hijack an airplane

劫数
劫数[jié shù] 佛教徒所谓注定的灾难 (of Buddhism) inexorable doom; predestined fate：劫数难逃 cannot escape destiny

劫狱
劫狱[jié yù] 从监狱里把被拘押的人抢出来 break into a jail and rescue a prisoner

劫难
劫难[jié nàn] 灾难；灾祸 disaster：历经劫难 have one's fill of adversities

劬
劬[qú]（ㄑㄩˊ）〈书 fml.〉劳苦；勤劳 toil; diligent：劬劳 fatigue; overwork相关词组劬劳

劬劳
劬劳[qú láo]〈书 fml.〉劳累 fatigue; overwork：不辞劬劳 make light of overwork

劭
劭[shào]（ㄕㄠˋ）〈书 fml.〉1.劝勉 encourage; urge; exhort：先帝劭农。The late emperor encouraged farming. 2.美好（多指道德品质 oft. referring to moral character） excellent; admirable：年高德劭 old and admirable相关词组年高德劭

励
励[lì]（ㄌㄧˋ）（勵）1.劝勉 encourage：勉励 encourage; urge鼓励 encourage; urge奖励 award 2.(Lì) 姓 a surname相关词组策励 | 鼓励 | 激励 | 奖励 | 勉励 | 惕励 | 勖励励志 | 励精图治

励志
励志[lì zhì]〈书 fml.〉奋发志气，把精力集中在某方面 be determined to fulfil one's aspirations：励志读书 study hard with determination励志图强 be determined to make the country strong

励精图治
励精图治[lì jīng tú zhì] 振作精神，想办法把国家治理好 exert oneself to make the country prosperous

劲
