劲[jìn]（ㄐㄧㄣˋ）（勁、劤）1.（劲儿 jìnr）力气 strength; energy：用劲 use more strength手劲儿 strength of one's hand 2.（劲儿 jìnr）精神；情绪 vigour; spirit; drive; zeal：鼓足干劲，力争上游 go all out, and aim high我就喜欢青年人的那股冲(chòng)劲儿。I like the vigour young people display. 3.（劲儿 jìnr）神情；态度 air; manner; expression：瞧他那股骄傲劲儿。Just look at his arrogant expression. 4.趣味 interest; relish; gusto：下棋没劲，不如打球去。Playing chess is not as fun as playing basketball.另见  jìng劲[jìng]（ㄐㄧㄥˋ）（勁）坚强有力 strong; powerful; sturdy：强劲 strong刚劲 bold; sturdy疾风劲草。Sturdy grass withstands high winds.另见  jìn相关词组绷劲 | 苍劲 | 差劲 | 吃劲 | 闯劲 | 带劲 | 得劲 | 对劲 | 费劲 | 干劲 | 刚劲 | 鼓劲 | 后劲 | 虎劲 | 加劲 | 犟劲 | 脚劲 | 叫劲 | 较劲 | 来劲 | 卖劲 | 蛮劲 | 没劲 | 牛劲 | 起劲 | 强劲 | 遒劲 | 韧劲 | 上劲 | 使劲 | 松劲 | 下劲 | 泄劲 | 心劲 | 雄劲 | 用劲 | 有劲 | 摽劲儿 | 冲劲儿 | 醋劲儿 | 寸劲儿 | 动劲儿 | 够劲儿 | 铆劲儿 | 猛劲儿 | 碰劲儿 | 巧劲儿 | 清劲风 | 傻劲儿 | 死劲儿 | 不得劲 | 不对劲 | 疾风劲草 | 一个劲儿 | 一股劲儿劲拔 | 劲敌 | 劲歌 | 劲旅 | 劲升 | 劲头 | 劲舞

劲升
劲升[jìng shēng] 强有力地上升 soar; rise powerfully：股市行情劲升。Stock prices are soaring.

劲头
劲头[jìn tóu]（～儿 jìntóur）1.力量；力气 strength; energy：战士们身体好，劲头儿大，个个都像小老虎。The soldiers are strong and full of vigour, all like little tigers. 2.积极的情绪 vigour; spirit; drive; zeal：看他那股兴高采烈的劲头儿。Look how happy and excited he is.他们学习起来劲头十足。They study with great enthusiasm.

劲拔
劲拔[jìng bá]〈书 fml.〉雄健挺拔 tall and straight：苍松劲拔。Sturdy pines stand tall and straight.

劲敌
劲敌[jìng dí] 强有力的敌人或对手 formidable adversary; strong opponent or contender

劲旅
劲旅[jìng lǚ] 强大而有实力的队伍 strong contingent; crack force

劲歌
劲歌[jìng gē] 节奏强烈有力的流行歌曲 pop song characterized by a strong beat

劲舞
劲舞[jìng wǔ] 节奏强烈有力的现代舞蹈 modern dance characterized by a strong beat

劳
劳[láo]（ㄌㄠˊ）（勞）1.劳动 work; labour：按劳分配 distribute according to one's work; get paid according to work done不劳而获 reap without sowing 2.烦劳（请别人做事所用的客气话 polite term used when asking a favour of sb.）put sb. to the trouble of：劳驾 may I trouble you; will you be so kind as (to do sth.)劳您走一趟。Will you do me a favour by running an errand for me? 3.指劳动者 labourer：劳资双方 labour and capital; between the workers and employers 4.劳苦；疲劳 fatigue; toil：任劳任怨 work hard and bear no grudges about it; bear all the hardships without complaint积劳成疾 break down from constant overwork 5.功劳 exploit; meritorious deed：勋劳 distinctive service汗马之劳 distinctions won in battle; war exploits 6.慰劳 give award in recognition of sb.'s hard work; reward：犒劳 award sb. with a gift劳军 award soldiers for their distinguished service 7.(Láo) 姓 a surname相关词组奔劳 | 伯劳 | 操劳 | 酬劳 | 代劳 | 道劳 | 烦劳 | 告劳 | 功劳 | 积劳 | 犒劳 | 耐劳 | 疲劳 | 偏劳 | 勤劳 | 劬劳 | 徒劳 | 慰劳 | 贤劳 | 效劳 | 辛劳 | 勋劳 | 有劳 | 吃劳保 | 活劳动 | 死劳动 | 半劳动力 | 不劳而获 | 全劳动力 | 任劳任怨 | 徒劳无功 | 五劳七伤 | 心劳日拙 | 一劳永逸 | 鞍马劳顿 | 必要劳动 | 抽象劳动 | 复杂劳动 | 雇佣劳动 | 简单劳动 | 具体劳动 | 脑力劳动 | 剩余劳动 | 体力劳动 | 物化劳动 | 汗马功劳 | 好逸恶劳 | 举手之劳 | 以逸待劳 | 国际劳动节 | 五一劳动节 | 社会必要劳动劳保 | 劳步 | 劳瘁 | 劳动 | 劳顿 | 劳乏 | 劳烦 | 劳方 | 劳改 | 劳工 | 劳绩 | 劳驾 | 劳教 | 劳金 | 劳倦 | 劳军 | 劳苦 | 劳累 | 劳力 | 劳碌 | 劳模 | 劳神 | 劳师 | 劳损 | 劳务 | 劳心 | 劳役 | 劳资 | 劳作 | 劳动布 | 劳动节 | 劳动力 | 劳动日 | 劳动者 | 劳改犯 | 劳什子 | 劳务费 | 劳动保护 | 劳动保险 | 劳动对象 | 劳动改造 | 劳动教养 | 劳动模范 | 劳动强度 | 劳动手段 | 劳动条件 | 劳动资料 | 劳苦功高 | 劳民伤财 | 劳师动众 | 劳燕分飞 | 劳动生产率

劳乏
劳乏[láo fá] 疲倦；劳累 fatigued; weary

劳什子
劳什子[láo shí zi]〈方 dial.〉使人讨厌的东西 nuisance亦 also 牢什子 láoshí·zi

劳作
劳作[láo zuò]1.〈旧时 old〉小学课程之一，教学生做手工或进行其他体力劳动 (of a primary school subject) handiwork or other forms of manual labour 2.劳动，多指体力劳动 perform manual labour：农民们都在田间劳作。The farmers are working in the fields.

劳保
劳保[láo bǎo]1.劳动保险的简称 abbr. for 劳动保险 láodòng bǎoxiǎn 2.劳动保护的简称 abbr. for 劳动保护 láodòng bǎohù

劳倦
劳倦[láo juàn] 疲劳；疲倦 fatigued; tired：不辞劳倦 ignore fatigue他连续工作了一整天也不觉得劳倦。He worked for an entire day without feeling tired.

劳军
劳军[láo jūn] 慰劳军队 greet an army with pleasantries and gifts

劳力
劳力[láo lì]1.体力劳动时所用的气力 labour; labour force 2.有劳动能力的人 able-bodied person：农忙季节要特别注意合理安排劳力。During the peak farming season please pay due attention to proper distribution of the labour force. 3.〈书 fml.〉从事体力劳动 be engaged in physical labour; work with one's brawn (as opposed to ‘one's mind’)

劳务
劳务[láo wù] 指不以实物形式而以劳动形式为他人提供某种效用的活动 labour service; productive activities where labour, not goods, are provided：劳务市场 labour market出口劳务 export labour services劳务输出 export of labour services

劳务费
劳务费[láo wù fèi] 指提供劳动服务所取得的报酬 commission; service charge

劳动
劳动[láo dòng]1.人类创造物质或精神财富的活动 work; human activities to create material and spiritual wealth：体力劳动 manual labour脑力劳动 mental labour 2.专指体力劳动 physical labour; manual labour：劳动锻炼 school oneself through manual labour 3.进行体力劳动 engage in physical labour：他劳动去了。He's out doing manual labour.劳动[láo dong]〈敬辞 pol.〉烦劳 cause sb. trouble (by asking a favour)：劳动您跑一趟。May I trouble you to run an errand for me?

劳动保护
劳动保护[láo dòng bǎo hù] 为了保护劳动者在劳动过程中的安全和健康而采取的各种措施 labour safety; measure taken to protect the safety and health of those doing physical labour; 简称 abbr. 劳保 láobǎo

劳动保险
劳动保险[láo dòng bǎo xiǎn] 工人、职员在患病、年老、丧失工作能力或其他特殊情况下享受生活保障的一种制度 labour insurance; system to protect a worker or employee against illness, old age, loss of work ability, or other circumstances; 简称 abbr. 劳保 láobǎo

劳动力
劳动力[láo dòng lì]1.人用来生产物质资料的体力和脑力的总和，即人的劳动能力 labour force; workforce; labour; human physical and mental capacity applied to producing material resources 2.相当于一个成年人所具有的体力劳动的能力，有时指参加劳动的人 capacity of an adult for physical labour; labourer：全劳动力 able-bodied labourer半劳动力 semi-able-bodied labourer辅助劳动力 labourer doing auxiliary work

劳动对象
劳动对象[láo dòng duì xiàng]政治经济学上指在劳动中被采掘和加工的东西。它可以是自然界原来有的，如地下矿石；也可以是加过工的原材料，如棉花、钢材等。object of labour; (in political economics) things mined or processed through labour, which may be a natural resource such as underground mineral ores, or semi-finished raw materials such as cotton and rolled steel

劳动布
劳动布[láo dòng bù] 用较粗的棉纱、棉线织成的斜纹布，质地紧密厚实，坚实耐穿，多用来做工作服 denim; hard-wearing cotton twill fabric oft. used for making work overalls

劳动强度
劳动强度[láo dòng qiáng dù]劳动的紧张程度。也就是在单位时间内劳动力消耗的程度。labour intensity; amount of labour expended per unit time

劳动手段
劳动手段[láo dòng shǒu duàn] 劳动资料的旧称 former term for 劳动资料 láodòng zīliào

劳动改造
劳动改造[láo dòng gǎi zào] 我国对判处徒刑的犯罪分子实行的一种措施，强迫他们劳动，在劳动中改造他们成为新人 reform (of convicts) through labour; (in China) measure taken to subject convicted criminals to compulsory manual labour in order to transform them into constructive members of society; 简称 abbr. 劳改 láogǎi

劳动教养
劳动教养[láo dòng jiào yǎng] 我国对违反法纪而又可以不追究刑事责任的有劳动力的人实行强制性教育改造的一种措施，对他们采取劳动生产和政治思想教育相结合的方针，帮助他们学习劳动生产技术，树立爱国守法和劳动光荣的观念 re-education through labour; (in China) measure taken to subject an able-bodied person who has violated the law but whose offence does not merit criminal prosecution to compulsory manual labour, along with political and ideological education, so as to help him or her learn production skills and become a patriotic, law-abiding citizen who does not despise physical labour; 简称 abbr. 劳教 láojiào

劳动日
劳动日[láo dòng rì]计算劳动时间的单位，一般以八小时为一个劳动日 workday; working day (generally 8 hours)

劳动条件
劳动条件[láo dòng tiáo jiàn] 指劳动者在劳动过程中所必需的物质设备条件，如有一定空间和阳光的厂房、通风和除尘装置、安全和调温设备以及卫生设施等 working conditions; equipment and other material conditions needed by a labourer in the course of physical labour, e.g. workshop with adequate space and sunshine, ventilation and dust removal, safety and temperature-control, and sanitary facilities

劳动模范
劳动模范[láo dòng mó fàn] 我国授予在生产建设中成绩卓著或有重大贡献的先进人物的一种光荣称号 labour hero; model worker; honorary title conferred on sb. who has distinguished themselves in production, or who has made a major contribution; 简称 abbr. 劳模 láomó

劳动生产率
劳动生产率[láo dòng shēng chǎn lǜ] 单位时间内劳动的生产效果或能力，用单位时间内所生产的产品数量或单位产品所需要的劳动时间来表示 labour productivity; productivity; production per unit of effort; productive effect or capacity of labour per unit time, indicated either by the amount of products produced per unit time, or the amount of time needed for the production of a set number or amount of products亦 also 生产率 shēngchǎnlǜ

劳动者
劳动者[láo dòng zhě] 参加劳动并以自己的劳动收入为生活资料主要来源的人，有时专指参加体力劳动的人 labourer; worker; person who takes part in manual labour and who lives on the income

劳动节
劳动节[Láo dòng Jié] 五一劳动节的简称 abbr. for 五一劳动节 Wǔ-Yī Láodòng Jié

劳动资料
劳动资料[láo dòng zī liào]人用来影响和改变劳动对象的一切物质资料的总和，包括生产工具、土地、建筑物、道路、运河、仓库等等，其中起决定作用的是生产工具。从前叫劳动手段。means of labour; referring to all the materials - tools, land, buildings, roads, canals, warehouses, etc., with production tools playing a decisive role - man uses to influence and change the objects of labour; formerly called 劳动手段 láodòng shǒuduàn

劳工
劳工[láo gōng]1.指工人 labourer; worker：劳工运动 labour movement 2.〈旧时 old〉指被抓去做苦工的人 coolie

劳师
劳师[láo shī]〈书 fml.〉慰劳军队 visit troops with gifts of food, wine, etc.

劳师动众
劳师动众[láo shī dòng zhòng]原指出动大批军队，现多指动用大批人力（含小题大做之意 make a fuss over trifles）(orig.) move a large number of troops

劳役
劳役[láo yì]1.指强迫的劳动 penal servitude; forced labour：服劳役 be sentenced to corvée 2.指（牲畜）供使用 (of draught animal) available：这个村共有十七头能劳役的牛。The village has 17 oxen for use.

劳心
劳心[láo xīn]1.费心；操心 take a lot of trouble; give a lot of care：不为小事劳心。Don't give too much care to trifles. 2.〈书 fml.〉从事脑力劳动 do mental labour; work with one's mind 3.〈书 fml.〉忧心 anxiety; worry

劳损
劳损[láo sǔn]因疲劳过度而损伤 strain：腰肌劳损 back muscle strain脏腑劳损 strain the viscera

劳改
劳改[láo gǎi] 劳动改造的简称 abbr. for 劳动改造 láodòng gǎizào：劳改犯 convict serving a sentence of reform through labour劳改农场 reform-through-labour farm

劳改犯
劳改犯[láo gǎi fàn] 指正在进行劳动改造的犯罪分子 convicted prisoner serving a sentence of reform through labour

劳教
劳教[láo jiào] 劳动教养的简称 abbr. for 劳动教养 láodòng jiàoyǎng：劳教人员 person subjected to re-education through labour劳教农场 reform-through-labour farm

劳方
劳方[láo fāng] 指私营工商业中的职工一方 labour (as opposed to capital or management) in private industry and commerce

劳模
劳模[láo mó] 劳动模范的简称 abbr. for 劳动模范 láodòng mófàn

劳步
劳步[láo bù]〈敬辞 pol.〉用于谢人来访 thanks for coming：您公事忙，千万不要劳步。You are busy with office work, so please don't bother to come.

劳民伤财
劳民伤财[láo mín shāng cái] 既使人民劳苦，又浪费钱财 exhaust the people and drain the treasury; waste manpower and money

劳烦
劳烦[láo fán]〈方 dial.〉烦劳 trouble sb. to do sth.：劳烦尊驾 Would you please ...劳烦您走一趟。May I trouble you to make a trip?

劳燕分飞
劳燕分飞[láo yàn fēn fēi]古乐府《东飞伯劳歌》：‘东飞伯劳西飞燕。’后世用‘劳燕分飞’比喻人别离。according to the ancient yuefu song, Song of the Shrike Flying East, ‘The shrike flew east, and the swallow went west.’ Later this line was used as a metaphor for parting.

劳瘁
劳瘁[láo cuì]〈书 fml.〉辛苦劳累 exhausted from hard work; worn out：不辞劳瘁 be unsparing of oneself; make nothing of hard work

劳碌
劳碌[láo lù] 事情多而辛苦 work hard; toil：终日劳碌 work all day long

劳神
劳神[láo shén]1.耗费精神 tax one's mind; bother; trouble：你身体不好，不要多劳神。You're not feeling well, so please don't worry. 2.〈客套话 pol.〉用于请人办事 When making a polite request：劳神代为照顾一下。Please take care of it for me.

劳累
劳累[láo lèi]1.由于过度的劳动而感到疲乏 tired; run-down; overworked：工作劳累 fatigue from overwork 2.〈敬辞 pol.〉指让人受累（用于请人帮忙做事）cause sb. trouble (when asking for a favour)：劳累你去一趟。I'm sorry but I have to trouble you to make the trip.

劳绩
劳绩[láo jì] 功劳和成绩 merits and accomplishments：劳绩卓著 outstanding performance in work

劳苦
劳苦[láo kǔ] 劳累辛苦 hard work：劳苦大众 toiling masses; labouring people不辞劳苦 be unsparing of oneself

劳苦功高
劳苦功高[láo kǔ gōng gāo] 做事勤苦，功劳很大 have worked hard with high distinction

劳资
劳资[láo zī] 指私营企业中的工人和资产占有者 (of a private firm) labour and capital

劳金
劳金[láo jīn] 店主或地主等付给店员或长工的工钱 pay; wage paid by a shop proprietor to a clerk or a landlord to a farmhand

劳顿
劳顿[láo dùn]〈书 fml.〉劳累 fatigued; wearied：旅途劳顿 fatigued by a journey; travel-weary

劳驾
劳驾[láo jià]〈客套话 pol.〉用于请别人做事或让路 May I trouble you ...; Would you please ...：劳驾，把那本书递给我。May I trouble you to pass that book, please?劳您驾，替我写封信吧！Would you be so kind as to write a letter for me?劳驾，请让让路。Excuse me, would you move over a bit?

劻
劻[kuāng]（ㄎㄨㄤ）[劻勷] (kuāngráng)〈书 fml.〉急迫不安的样子 terrified亦 also 儴 kuāngráng

劼
劼[jié]（ㄐㄧㄝˊ）〈书 fml.〉1.谨慎 prudent 2.努力 hard-working; assiduous

劾
劾[hé]（ㄏㄜˊ）揭发罪状 expose sb.'s misdeeds or crimes：弹劾 impeach (a public official)参劾 present a memorial to the emperor impeaching an official相关词组弹劾

势
势[shì]（ㄕˋ）（勢）1.势力 power; force; influence：威势 power and influence权势 power and position人多势众 superior strength through force of numbers; safety in numbers仗势欺人 rely on sb. else's power and bully people 2.一切事物力量表现出来的趋向 momentum; tendency：来势甚急 come with a vengeance势如破竹 (of momentum) be like splitting bamboo; carry the world before one 3.自然界的现象或形势 outward appearance of a natural object or phenomenon：山势 the lie of a mountain地势 physical features of a place水势汹涌 turbulent flow of water 4.政治、军事或其他社会活动方面的状况或情势 (political, military, social) situation; state of affairs; circumstances：趋势 trend; tendency局势 situation守势 defensive大势所趋 trend of the times; general trend趁势猛追 take advantage of an opportunity to pursue sb./sth. 5.姿态 sign; gesture：手势 gesture姿势 posture; carriage 6.雄性生殖器 male genitals：去势 castration相关词组把势 | 笔势 | 病势 | 财势 | 趁势 | 乘势 | 大势 | 得势 | 地势 | 电势 | 风势 | 攻势 | 国势 | 虎势 | 火势 | 架势 | 就势 | 局势 | 均势 | 来势 | 劣势 | 流势 | 气势 | 强势 | 情势 | 趋势 | 权势 | 弱势 | 伤势 | 声势 | 失势 | 时势 | 手势 | 守势 | 水势 | 顺势 | 态势 | 颓势 | 旺势 | 威势 | 现势 | 销势 | 形势 | 音势 | 优势 | 造势 | 长势 | 仗势 | 阵势 | 肢势 | 姿势 | 走势 | 作势 | 电势差 | 车把势 | 打把势 | 电动势 | 花把势 | 气势汹汹 | 因势利导 | 形格势禁 | 狗仗人势 | 掎角之势 | 拿腔作势 | 趋炎附势 | 审时度势 | 虚张声势 | 装腔作势势必 | 势力 | 势利 | 势能 | 势派 | 势态 | 势头 | 势焰 | 势要 | 势利眼 | 势不可挡 | 势不两立 | 势均力敌 | 势如破竹

势不两立
势不两立[shì bù liǎng lì] 指敌对的事物不能同时存在 be mutually exclusive; be extremely antagonistic; be irreconcilable

势不可挡
势不可挡[shì bù kě dǎng] 来势迅猛，不可抵挡 irresistible; overwhelming

势利
势利[shì li] 形容看财产、地位分别对待人的表现 snobbish：势利眼 snobbery; snobbish attitude势利小人 snob势利之交（以权势、金钱为基础结交的朋友） friendship based on power and wealth

势利眼
势利眼[shì li yǎn]1.作风势利 snobbish attitude; snobbishness; snobbery 2.作风势利的人 snob

势力
势力[shì li] 政治、经济、军事等方面的力量 (of politics, economy, military situation, etc.) force; power; influence

势均力敌
势均力敌[shì jūn lì dí] 双方势力相等，不分高低（敌 di：力量相当 of equivalent strength） match each other in strength

势头
势头[shì tóu] 形势 ②；情势 situation, tendency：他一看势头不对，转身就走。Sensing that the odds were against him, he immediately turned and left.

势如破竹
势如破竹[shì rú pò zhú] 形势像劈竹子一样，劈开上端之后，底下的都随着刀刃分开了 (of a momentum) be like splitting bamboo - with one cut at the top end, the rest splits at the touch of the knife; like a hot knife cutting through butter;〈比喻 fig.〉节节胜利，毫无阻碍 win one victory after another with irresistible force

势必
势必[shì bì]〈副词 adv.〉根据形势推测必然会怎样 certainly will; be bound to：看不到群众的力量，势必要犯错误。Failure to see the strength of the people is bound to lead to error.

势态
势态[shì tài] 态势；情势 state; situation：势态严重 in a serious situation

势派
势派[shì pai]〈方 dial.〉（势派儿 shì·pair）1.排场；气派 manner; style; air：讲势派 put on airs好大的势派。What affectedness! 2.形势 situation; circumstances

势焰
势焰[shì yàn] 势力和气焰（含贬义 derog.） influence and power：势焰万丈 aggressively powerful势焰熏天 overbearing arrogance (like flame darkening the sky)

势能
势能[shì néng] 相互作用的物体由于所处的位置或弹性形变等而具有的能。如水的落差和发条作功的能力都是势能。 potential energy; energy interacting objects derived from position, or elastic change of form, rather than motion, e.g. the drop of water or a coiled spring has potential energy; 亦 also 位能 wèinéng

势要
势要[shì yào]〈书 fml.〉有权势，居要职。也指有权势、居要职的人 enjoy power and position; important and influential persons：势要之家 influential family

勃
勃[bó]（ㄅㄛˊ）（）〈书 fml.〉旺盛 vigorous; thriving; flourishing：蓬勃 vigorous; thriving; flourishing勃发 vigorous相关词组蓬勃 | 克格勃 | 牛溲马勃勃勃 | 勃发 | 勃然 | 勃豀 | 勃谿 | 勃兴 | 勃郎宁

勃兴
勃兴[bó xīng]〈书 fml.〉勃然兴起；蓬勃发展 burgeon; thrive

勃勃
勃勃[bó bó] 精神旺盛或欲望强烈的样子 thriving; vigorous; exuberant; ambitious; being high-spirited and having a lust for life：生气勃勃 full of vitality朝气勃勃 vigorous兴致勃勃 full of zest野心勃勃 overwhelmingly ambitious

勃发
勃发[bó fā]〈书 fml.〉1.焕发；旺盛 thrive; prosper：英姿勃发 dashing and spirited; bright and brave生机勃发 full of life 2.突然发生 break out：战争勃发。War broke out.勃发事件 unexpected incident

勃然
勃然[bó rán]1.兴起或旺盛的样子 vigorously; prosperously：勃然而兴 spring up勃然而起 rise vigorously 2.因生气或惊慌等变脸色的样子 agitatedly; change of expression because of anger, panic, etc.：勃然不悦 become annoyed; irritated勃然大怒 fly into a rage; flare up

勃谿
勃谿[bó xī]〈书 fml.〉家庭中争吵 family quarrel; tiff; squabble：姑嫂勃谿 tiff between the wife and her husband's sister

勃豀
勃豀[bó xī]〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 勃谿 bóxī

勃郎宁
勃郎宁[bó láng níng] 手枪的一种，可以连续射击，因设计人美国的勃郎宁(John Moses Browning)而得名 Browning; a type of automatic pistol, named after its American designer, John Moses Browning

勇
勇[yǒng]（ㄩㄥˇ）1.勇敢 brave; valiant; courageous：勇武 valiant奋勇 bravely越战越勇 one's courage mounts as the battle progresses智勇双全 with both wisdom and courage 2.清朝称战争时期临时招募，不在平时编制之内的兵 temporary recruits in times of war during the Qing Dynasty：散兵游勇 stragglers and disbanded soldiers 3.(Yǒng) 姓 a surname相关词组兵勇 | 沉勇 | 奋勇 | 悍勇 | 神勇 | 骁勇 | 义勇 | 英勇 | 游勇 | 忠勇 | 义勇军 | 余勇可贾 | 急流勇退 | 见义勇为 | 匹夫之勇 | 散兵游勇 | 自告奋勇勇敢 | 勇悍 | 勇决 | 勇力 | 勇猛 | 勇气 | 勇士 | 勇武 | 勇于 | 勇往直前

勇于
勇于[yǒng yú]在困难面前不退缩；不推诿（后面跟动词）[followed by a verb] be brave in; be bold in; have the courage to：勇于负责 be brave in shouldering responsibilities勇于承认错误 have the courage to admit one's mistakes

勇决
勇决[yǒng jué]〈书 fml.〉勇敢而有决断 brave and resolute

勇力
勇力[yǒng lì] 勇气和力量 courage and strength：勇力过人 exceptional courage and strength

勇士
勇士[yǒng shì] 有力气有胆量的人 brave and strong man; warrior

勇往直前
勇往直前[yǒng wǎng zhí qián] 勇敢地一直往前进 march forward courageously; advance bravely

勇悍
勇悍[yǒng hàn] 勇猛强悍 brave and fierce

勇敢
勇敢[yǒng gǎn] 不怕危险和困难；有胆量 brave; courageous：机智勇敢 resourceful and brave勇敢作战 fight bravely

勇武
勇武[yǒng wǔ] 英勇威武 valiant

勇气
勇气[yǒng qì] 敢作敢为毫不畏惧的气魄 courage; nerve：鼓起勇气 pluck up (or muster up) one's courage

勇猛
勇猛[yǒng měng] 勇敢有力 bold and powerful; full of valour and vigour：勇猛冲杀 rush ahead and fight fiercely

勉
勉[miǎn]（ㄇㄧㄢˇ）1.努力 strive; exert oneself：奋勉 exert oneself; make great efforts 2.勉励 encourage; urge; exhort：自勉 spur oneself on互勉 encourage one another有则改之，无则加勉。Correct mistakes if you've made any and guard against them if not. 3.力量不够而尽力做 strive to do what is beyond one's power：勉强 reluctant; unwilling勉为其难 undertake a difficult task beyond one's ability or power; be obliged to do a difficult job相关词组奋勉 | 共勉 | 嘉勉 | 勤勉 | 劝勉 | 慰勉 | 勖勉勉力 | 勉励 | 勉强 | 勉为其难

勉为其难
勉为其难[miǎn wéi qí nán] 勉强做能力所不及的事 undertake a difficult task beyond one's ability or power; be obliged to take on a difficult job

勉力
勉力[miǎn lì] 努力；尽力 exert oneself; try hard; make great efforts：勉力为之 exert oneself to the utmost; do one's best

勉励
勉励[miǎn lì] 劝人努力；鼓励 encourage; urge：互相勉励 encourage each other老师勉励同学继续努力。The teacher urged his students to keep working hard.

勉强
勉强[miǎn qiǎng]1.能力不够，还尽力做 manage with an effort; do sth. with difficulty：这项工作我还能勉强坚持下来。I can manage to go on with this work. 2.不是甘心情愿的 reluctant; grudging：碍着面子，勉强答应下来了。For the sake of his face, (he) agreed reluctantly. 3.使人做他自己不愿意做的事 force a person to do sth.：他不去算了，不要勉强他了。Don't force him to if he is not going. 4.牵强；理由不充足 unconvincing; strained; farfetched：这种说法很勉强，怕站不住脚。The argument is very unconvincing. I'm afraid that it will be untenable. 5.将就；凑合 barely enough：这点儿草料勉强够牲口吃一天。The cattle fodder is barely enough for a single day.

勋
勋[xūn]（ㄒㄩㄣ）（勳）1.功勋 merit; meritorious service; achievement：勋业 contribution; merit; exploit勋劳 meritorious service屡建奇勋 perform one meritorious service after another 2.勋章 medal; decoration：授勋 confer titles or medals相关词组功勋 | 奇勋 | 殊勋 | 元勋勋绩 | 勋爵 | 勋劳 | 勋业 | 勋章

勋业
勋业[xūn yè]〈书 fml.〉功勋和事业 meritorious service; great achievement：建立勋业 make remarkable contributions不朽的勋业 immortal meritorious deeds; monumental service

勋劳
勋劳[xūn láo] 很高的功劳 meritorious service; great contribution：勋劳卓著 outstanding contribution; eminent achievements

勋爵
勋爵[xūn jué]1.封建时代朝廷赐予功臣的爵位 Lord; title of nobility conferred to a man of great merit by the royal court in feudal society 2.英国贵族的一种名誉头衔，由国王授予，可以世袭 hereditary title of honour conferred by the king on members of the British aristocracy

勋章
勋章[xūn zhāng] 授给对国家有贡献的人的一种表示荣誉的证章 medal; badge; emblem of honour awarded by the state to a person who has made great contributions

勋绩
勋绩[xūn jì] 勋劳 meritorious service; outstanding contribution：光辉的勋绩 glorious achievements; remarkable achievements

勍
勍[qíng]（ㄑㄧㄥˊ）〈书 fml.〉强 powerful; strong：勍敌 powerful foe

勐
勐1[měng]（ㄇㄥˇ）〈书 fml.〉勇敢 brave勐2[měng]（ㄇㄥˇ）云南西双版纳傣族地区旧时的行政区划单位 meng; former administrative division in Xishuangbanna, Yunnan Province

勒
勒1[lè]（ㄌㄜˋ）1.〈书 fml.〉带嚼子的马笼头 bridle 2.收住缰绳不让骡马等前进 rein in：悬崖勒马 rein in at the brink of the precipice; stop before it is too late 3.强制；逼迫 force; coerce：勒令 order勒派 force someone to pay levies or do unpaid labour (or corvée)勒索 extort; blackmail 4.〈书 fml.〉统率 command：亲勒六军 command the army personally勒2[lè]（ㄌㄜˋ）〈书 fml.〉雕刻 carve; engrave：勒石 stone carving勒碑 carve on a stone tablet勒3[lè]（ㄌㄜˋ）勒克斯的简称 abbr. for 勒克斯 lèkèsī另见  lēi勒[lēi]（ㄌㄟ）1.用绳子等捆住或套住，再用力拉紧；系紧 tighten up; tie or strap sth. tight：行李没有捆紧，再勒一勒。The luggage is too loose. Tighten it up a bit.中间再勒根绳子就不会散了。Put another string around it in the middle, and it will not break up.袜带儿太紧，勒得腿肚子不舒服。The suspenders are too tight. They cut into the calves. 2.〈方 dial.〉强制；逼迫 force; coerce：他硬勒着大伙儿在地里种烟草。He forced everyone to grow tobacco in the fields.另见  lè相关词组贝勒 | 勾勒 | 羁勒 | 罗勒 | 弥勒 | 悬崖勒马勒逼 | 勒掯 | 勒令 | 勒派 | 勒索 | 勒抑 | 勒诈 | 勒克斯

勒令
勒令[lè lìng] 用命令方式强制人做某事 order; compel by order：勒令停业 be ordered to close down; be ordered to stop doing business; be ordered to suspend business勒令搬迁 be ordered to move out; order someone to move out

勒克斯
勒克斯[lè kè sī] 照度单位，1流明的光通量均匀分布在1平方米面积上的照度，就是1勒克斯 lux; metre-candle; unit of illumination, equal to one lumen per square metre or to the illumination of a surface uniformly one metre distant from a point source of one candela; 简称 abbr. 勒 lè

勒抑
勒抑[lè yì]1.指用压力迫使降低售价 force down the selling price 2.勒索压制 blackmail and suppress

勒掯
勒掯[lēi kèn]〈方 dial.〉强迫或故意为难 force sb. to do sth.; make things difficult for sb. on purpose

勒派
勒派[lè pài] 强行摊派 apportion a levy arbitrarily; force someone to pay levies, or do corvée (or unpaid labour)

勒索
勒索[lè suǒ] 用威胁手段向别人要财物 extort; blackmail：敲诈勒索 extort; blackmail勒索钱财 extort money from someone

勒诈
勒诈[lè zhà] 勒索敲诈 extort; blackmail：勒诈钱财 extort money from someone

勒逼
勒逼[lè bī] 强迫；逼迫 force; coerce

勔
勔[miǎn]（ㄇㄧㄢˇ）〈书 fml.〉勤勉 diligent; hardworking; industrious

勖

勖勉

勘
勘[kān]（ㄎㄢ）1.校订；核对 proofread; collate：勘误 correct errors in a printed work校勘 collate 2.实地查看；探测 go on a fact-finding tour; survey：勘探 prospect勘查 inspect; reconnoitre勘验 examine; inspect相关词组查勘 | 踏勘 | 探勘 | 校勘 | 校勘学勘测 | 勘察 | 勘探 | 勘误 | 勘正

勘察
勘察[kān chá] 进行实地调查或查看（多用于采矿或工程施工前 usu. for mining, engineering or other purposes）reconnoitre; geological prospecting：勘察现场 on-the-spot survey勘察地形 topographical survey亦 also 勘查 kānchá

勘探
勘探[kān tàn] 查明矿藏分布情况，测定矿体的位置、形状、大小、成矿规律、岩石性质、地质构造等情况 explore; prospect a region for mineral resources by verifying its geographical distribution, geological position, shape, size and metallogenetic pattern, as well as the local rock formation and geological structure

勘正
勘正[kān zhèng]校正（文字）proofread

勘测
勘测[kān cè] 勘察和测量 survey：勘测地形 topographical survey

勘误
勘误[kān wù] 作者或编者更正书刊中文字上的错误 correct errors in a book, periodical, etc. by the author or editor：勘误表 errata; corrigenda

勚
勚[yì]（ㄧˋ）1.〈书 fml.〉劳苦 toil; hard work 2.器物的棱角、锋芒等磨损 wear and tear; (of an edge, point, etc.) become worn; become dull or blunt：螺丝扣勚了。The thread of the screw was worn.

募
募[mù]（ㄇㄨˋ）募集（财物或兵员等）(of money, soldiers, etc.) raise; collect; enlist; recruit：募捐 collect donations; solicit contributions募款 raise money (or fund)招募 recruit相关词组化募 | 劝募 | 应募 | 招募 | 征募募兵 | 募股 | 募化 | 募集 | 募捐 | 募兵制

募捐
募捐[mù juān] 募集捐款或物品 solicit contributions; collect donations：为残疾人募捐 collect donations for the disabled募捐赈灾 solicit contributions to relieve the people in calamity-stricken areas

勣

勤
勤[qín]（ㄑㄧㄣˊ）1.尽力多做或不断地做（跟‘懒’或‘惰’相对 as opposed to ‘lazy’）diligent; industrious; assiduous; hardworking; try one's best to do more or keep doing sth.：手勤 diligent勤学苦练 study diligently and train hard人勤地不懒。Where the tiller is tireless the land is fertile. 2.次数多；经常 often; frequent：勤洗澡 take baths regularly夏季雨水勤。It rains often (or frequently) in summer.他来得最勤，差不多天天来。He is the most frequent visitor, coming almost every day. 3.勤务 work; duty; service：内勤 office work外勤 field work 4.在规定时间内准时到班的工作或劳动 (office, school, etc.) attendance; work or labour that requires the working staff to be in their places within the prescribed time：出勤 attend class; be in the workplace缺勤 absent from work or the workplace考勤 check on attendance执勤 be on duty空勤 air duty地勤 ground service or duty 5.(Qín) 姓 a surname相关词组出勤 | 地勤 | 后勤 | 考勤 | 空勤 | 满勤 | 内勤 | 全勤 | 缺勤 | 手勤 | 特勤 | 外勤 | 辛勤 | 殷勤 | 战勤 | 执勤 | 值勤 | 献殷勤 | 克勤克俭勤奋 | 勤俭 | 勤谨 | 勤恳 | 勤苦 | 勤快 | 勤劳 | 勤勉 | 勤勤 | 勤王 | 勤务 | 勤务兵 | 勤务员 | 勤工俭学 | 勤杂人员

勤俭
勤俭[qín jiǎn] 勤劳而节俭 hardworking and thrifty：勤俭建国 build up the country through hard work and frugality勤俭过日子 live industriously and frugally; lead an industrious and thrifty life

勤务
勤务[qín wù]1.公家分派的公共事务 duty; service; public service assigned by an organization 2.军队中专门做杂务工作的人 orderly; person who does odd jobs in an army

勤务兵
勤务兵[qín wù bīng]〈旧时 old〉军队中给军官办理杂务的士兵 orderly; soldier who does odd jobs for officers in an army

勤务员
勤务员[qín wù yuán] 部队或机关里担任杂务工作的人员 one who does odd jobs in the armed forces or government organizations做人民的勤务员 be a servant to the people

勤劳
勤劳[qín láo] 努力劳动，不怕辛苦 diligent; industrious; assiduous; hardworking：勤劳勇敢的人民 diligent and courageous people; industrious and valiant people

勤勉
勤勉[qín miǎn] 同 same as 勤奋 qínfèn：工作勤勉 work diligently or industriously勤勉学习 study hard or diligently

勤勤
勤勤[qín qín]〈书 fml.〉形容诚恳或殷勤 attentive; solicitous; considerate; sincere：雅意勤勤 your kind consideration

勤奋
勤奋[qín fèn] 不懈地努力（工作或学习） diligent; assiduous; industrious; make untiring efforts (in one's work or studies)

勤工俭学
勤工俭学[qín gōng jiǎn xué]1.利用学习以外的时间参加劳动，把劳动所得作为学习、生活费用 part-work and part-study programme; system of allowing students to engage in labour in their spare time, and use the earnings to pay for their studies and cover their living expenses 2.我国某些学校采取的办学的一种方式，学生在学习期间从事一定的劳动，学校以学生劳动的收入作为办学资金 work-study programme; method of operation adopted by certain schools in China, in which students engage in some labour during their studies, and the schools use these earnings as funds for running the school

勤快
勤快[qín kuai] 手脚勤，爱劳动 diligent; hardworking; industrious：手脚勤快 quick and industrious他们很勤快，天一亮，就下地干活。They were very diligent and started work in the fields at daybreak.

勤恳
勤恳[qín kěn] 勤劳而塌实 diligent and conscientious; earnest and assiduous：勤恳地劳动 work diligently or industrially勤勤恳恳地工作 work industrially and conscientiously

勤杂人员
勤杂人员[qín zá rén yuán] 勤务员的总称 orderly; subsidiary staff doing odd jobs

勤王
勤王[qín wáng]〈书 fml.〉1.君主的统治地位受到内乱或外患的威胁而动摇时，臣子发兵援救 (of feudal officials) send troops to rescue the emperor when his dominance is undermined due to the threat of internal disorder or foreign aggression：勤王之师 troops to the rescue of the emperor 2.为王朝尽力 serve the royal house

勤苦
勤苦[qín kǔ] 勤劳刻苦 diligent; hardworking; assiduous：勤苦练习 practice hard勤苦的生活 hard work and plain living

勤谨

勰
勰[xié]（ㄒㄧㄝˊ）〈书 fml.〉协和。多用于人名。xie, harmonious; oft. used in personal names

勷
勷[ráng]（ㄖㄤˊ）另见  [劻勷] (kuāngráng)

勺
勺[sháo]（ㄕㄠˊ）（杓）1.（勺儿 sháor）舀东西的用具，略作半球形，有柄 spoon; ladle：一把勺儿 a ladle; a dipper马勺 ladle铁勺 iron spoon 2.容量单位。10撮等于1勺，10勺等于1合(gě)。 unit of capacity: 10 cuo (10 millilitres) equals one shao (one centilitre); 10 shao equals one ge (one decilitre)另见  杓 biāo相关词组炒勺 | 漏勺 | 马勺 | 脑勺 | 掌勺儿 | 后脑勺儿勺子 | 勺口儿 | 勺状软骨

勺口儿
勺口儿[sháo kou r]〈方 dial.〉指厨师烹调的滋味 taste of dishes prepared by a cook：请尝尝这位师傅的勺口儿怎么样。Please have a taste of the dishes prepared by this chef.

勺子
勺子[sháo zi] 较大的勺儿 ladle; scoop; spoon

勺状软骨
勺状软骨[sháo zhuàng ruǎn gǔ]喉部上方的三角形小软骨，左右各一，位置在环状软骨的后上部。声带附着在勺状软骨前部的突起部分上。 cartilage spatulata; triangular cartilages above the larynx, one on each side of the rear upper part of the cricoid, with the vocal chords attached to their front tips

勼
勼[jiū]（ㄐㄧㄡ）〈书 fml.〉聚集 assemble; gather

勾
勾1[gōu]（ㄍㄡ）（句）1.用笔画出钩形符号，表示删除或截取 make a check mark with a pen to delete or take out: cancel; cross out; strike out; tick off：勾销 liquidate; write off把这篇文章里最精彩的对话勾出来 mark the most interesting dialogues in the article 2.画出形象的边缘；描画 delineate; draw; draw the outline of an image：用铅笔勾一个轮廓 draw an outline with a pencil 3.用灰、水泥等涂抹砖石建筑物的缝 fill up the joints of brickwork or stonework with mortar or cement; point：勾墙缝 point up a brick wall 4.调和使黏 thicken：勾芡 thicken a soup by adding starch 5.招引；引 induce; evoke; call to mind：勾引 seduce; entice; lure勾魂 bewitch; enchant; fascinate这件事勾起了我的回忆。This evoked my memories. or This brought back my memories. 6.结合：勾结 collude with; gang up with勾通 collude with; work hand in glove with 7.(Gōu) 姓 a surname勾2[gōu]（ㄍㄡ）（句）我国古代称不等腰直角三角形中较短的直角边 name given to the shorter leg of a right triangle in ancient China另见  gòu, 句 gōu and jù勾[gòu]（ㄍㄡˋ）（句）1. 同 same as 够 gòu（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）2.(Gòu) 姓 a surname另见  gōu, 句 gōu and jù相关词组里勾外联 | 一笔勾销勾搭 | 勾当 | 勾兑 | 勾画 | 勾魂 | 勾稽 | 勾结 | 勾栏 | 勾阑 | 勾勒 | 勾连 | 勾脸 | 勾留 | 勾描 | 勾芡 | 勾通 | 勾销 | 勾乙 | 勾引 | 勾针 | 勾股形 | 勾魂摄魄 | 勾心斗角

勾乙
勾乙[gōu yǐ] 在报刊书籍的某些词句两端，画上形状像‘乙’的记号 (「」)，表示要抄录下来，作为资料 mark the symbols (「」) like 乙 yǐ at both ends of certain sentences or words in newspapers and books to indicate that they will be taken down as reference materials

勾兑
勾兑[gōu duì] 把不同的酒适量混合，并加添调味酒，进行配制 blend different wines in proper portions and add some seasoning wine to concoct a new wine：勾兑工艺 blending technique

勾勒
勾勒[gōu lè]1.用线条画出轮廓；双钩 draw the outline of; trace the contour of a stroke, leaving the centre hollow 2.用简单的笔墨描写事物的大致情况 give a brief account of; outline：作品善于勾勒场面，渲染气氛。The work is good at outlining scenes to play up the atmosphere.

勾引
勾引[gōu yǐn]1.勾结某种势力，或引诱人做不正当的事 collude with people with certain influence; seduce sb. to engage in illegitimate affairs：他被坏人勾引，变成了一个小偷。Seduced by some bad people, he has become a thief. 2.引动；吸引 arouse; attract：他的话勾引起我对往事的回忆。His words aroused my memories of the past.

勾当
勾当[gòu dàng] 事情，今多指坏事情 (derog.) business; evil deal：罪恶勾当 criminal activities从事走私勾当 engage in smuggling

勾心斗角
勾心斗角[gōu xīn dòu jiǎo] 同 same as 钩心斗角 gōu xīn dòu jiǎo

勾描
勾描[gōu miáo] 勾勒描绘 draw：用细线条把景物的轮廓勾描出来 draw the contours of a scenery with thin lines

勾搭
勾搭[gōu da] 引诱或互相串通做不正当的事 seduce or gang up with each other for an illegitimate purpose：勾搭一起做坏事 gang up to do an unlawful thing几个人整天勾勾搭搭的，不知要干什么。These guys have ganged up all day long, and you can't tell what they are going to do.

勾栏
勾栏[gōu lán] 宋元时称演出杂剧、百戏的场所，后来指妓院 theatre; place where a variety show was given in the Song and Yuan dynasties; referring to brothel in later times亦 also 勾阑 gōulán

勾画
勾画[gōu huà] 勾勒描绘；用简短的文字描写 draw the outline of; delineate; sketch; give a brief account of：勾画脸谱 paint faces for traditional Chinese operas这篇游记勾画了桂林的秀丽山水。The travelogue gives a brief description of the beautiful scenery in Guilin.

勾留
勾留[gōu liú] 逗留 stop over; break one's journey at

勾稽
勾稽[gōu jī] 同 same as 钩稽 gōujī

勾结
勾结[gōu jié] 为了进行不正当的活动暗中互相串通、结合 collude; collude with each other secretly to engage in illegal acts：暗中勾结 collude secretly勾结官府 collude with the government

勾股形
勾股形[gōu gǔ xíng]〈古代 arch.〉称直角三角形 name given to right triangle in ancient China

勾脸
勾脸[gōu liǎn]（～儿 gōu∥liǎnr）画脸谱 paint the face in traditional operas

勾芡
勾芡[gōu qiàn] 做菜做汤时加上芡粉使汁变稠 thicken a soup by adding starch

勾连
勾连[gōu lián]1. 同 same as 勾结 gōujié：暗中勾连 collude secretly他们勾连在一起，干了不少坏事。They have ganged up with each other and done many evil things. 2.牵涉；牵连 implicate; involve：我怀疑这事与他有勾连。I suspect that he is involved in the matter.亦 also 勾联 gōulián

勾通
勾通[gōu tōng] 暗中串通；勾结 collude secretly; collaborate with; gang up with

勾针
勾针[gōu zhēn] 同 same as 钩针 gōuzhēn

勾销
勾销[gōu xiāo] 取消；抹掉 cancel; liquidate, write off：一笔勾销 write off at one stroke; cancel all debts

勾阑
勾阑[gōu lán] 同 same as 勾栏 gōulán

勾魂
勾魂[gōu hún]（～儿 gōu∥húnr）招引灵魂离开肉体（迷信 superstition）snatch the soul from the flesh;〈比喻 fig.〉事物吸引人，使心神不定 captivating; enchanting; fascinating; bewitching：看他那坐立不安的样子，像是被勾了魂似的。He looks so uneasy as if he is possessed.

勾魂摄魄
勾魂摄魄[gōu hún shè pò] 形容事物具有强烈的吸引力，使人心神摇荡，不能自制 captivating; enchanting; fascinating; bewitching; sth. that has such a strong attraction that one is distracted and unable to control oneself

勿
勿[wù]（ㄨˋ）〈副词 adv.〉表示禁止或劝阻，相当于‘不要’ [used in prohibitions, admonitions, etc.] do not; never：切勿上当。Beware of swindlers.请勿入内。No admittance.相关词组格杀勿论勿谓言之不预

勿谓言之不预
勿谓言之不预[wù wèi yán zhī bù yù]不要说没有预先说过。表示有言在先。do not say that you have not been forewarned; do not blame us for not having forewarned you

匀
匀[yún]（ㄩㄣˊ）1.均匀 even; equitable：颜色涂得不匀。The colour is not evenly applied. 2.使均匀 even up; divide evenly：把粉匀匀 even out the powder这两份多少不均，再匀一匀吧。The two portions are not equal. Please even them up. 3.抽出一部分给别人或做别用 take from sth. and give to sb.; take from sth. for some other use; spare：匀出一部分粮食支援灾区 spare part of the grain to support the disaster-stricken areas工作太忙，匀不出时间干家务 be too busy with one's work to spare time for housework相关词组均匀 | 调匀 | 亭匀 | 停匀匀称 | 匀兑 | 匀和 | 匀净 | 匀脸 | 匀溜 | 匀实 | 匀整 | 匀速运动

匀兑
匀兑[yún dui] 匀出来；抽出一部分让给别人 spare; take from sth. and give to others：给他匀兑一间屋子。Please rearrange a room for him.

匀净
匀净[yún jing] 粗细或深浅一致；均匀 (of thickness or colour) uniform; even; neat：这块布染得很匀净。This cloth is evenly dyed.线纺得非常匀净。The yarn is evenly spun.

匀和
匀和[yún huo]（～儿 yún·huor）1.均匀 even; equal; uniform：刚才还在喘气，现在呼吸才匀和了。(He) was panting just a moment ago, but he's breathing steadily now. 2.使均匀 even up; divide evenly：这些苹果大的大，小的小，得匀和匀和再分。There are big and small apples; mix them up first and then divide them evenly.亦 also 匀乎 yún·hu

匀实
匀实[yún shi] 均匀 even; neat; uniform：瞧这布多细密多匀实。Look! How close and uniform the texture of the cloth is!麦苗出得很匀实。The wheat seedlings have come out in uniform density.

匀整
匀整[yún zhěng] 均匀整齐 neat and well-spaced; tidy; even and orderly：字写得匀整 very neat handwriting匀整的脚步 regular strides

匀溜
匀溜[yún liu]（～儿 yún·liur）大小、粗细或稀稠等适中 of the right size, thickness, consistency, etc.：这线纺得真匀溜。The yarn is spun so neatly, all of the same thickness!

匀称
匀称[yún chèn] 均匀；比例和谐 well proportioned; well balanced; symmetrical：穗子又多又匀称。The ears have come out abundantly and uniformly.字写得很匀称 write in a neat hand这人身段匀称。The man is of a well-proportioned build.

匀脸
匀脸[yún liǎn] 化装时用手搓脸使脂粉匀净 rub powder and paint evenly on the face; apply rouge and powder evenly on one's face

匀速运动
匀速运动[yún sù yùn dòng] 物体在单位时间内所通过的距离相等的运动 uniform motion; (of an object) covering an equal distance within a unit of time亦 also 等速运动 děngsù yùndòng

匄
匄[gài]（ㄍㄞˋ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 丐 gài

包
包[bāo]（ㄅㄠ）1.用纸、布或其他薄片把东西裹起来 wrap in paper, cloth or other thin material：包书 cover a book with paper; put a jacket (or cover) on a book包饺子 make jiaozi (dumplings)头上包着一条白毛巾 a white towel wrapped round one's head 2.（包儿 bāor）包好了的东西 bundle; package; pack; packet; parcel：药包 packet of medicine邮包 postal parcel打了个包 wrap things up in a bundle 3.装东西的口袋 bag; sack：书包 schoolbag病包儿 chronic invalid坏包儿 rascal; rogue淘气包儿 mischievous imp 4.〈量词 classifier〉用于成包的东西 package; bundle：两包大米 two sacks of rice一大包衣服 a big bundle of clothes 5.物体或身体上鼓起来的疙瘩 protuberance; swelling; lump：树干上有个大包。There is a big protuberance on the tree trunk.腿上起了个包 a swelling on the leg 6.毡制的圆顶帐篷 yurt; circular felt-covered tent over a collapsible frame：蒙古包 Mongolian yurt 7.围绕；包围 surround; encircle; envelop：火苗包住了锅台。The flames envelop the pot.骑兵分两路包过去。The cavalry outflanks the enemy on both sides. 8.容纳在里头；总括在一起 include; contain：包含 include包罗 embody无所不包 all-embracing 9.把整个任务承担下来，负责完成 undertake a task and assume full responsibility for it：包医 contract for full medical coverage包教 contract for all instruction包片儿（负责完成一定地段或范围的工作）contract for work in a certain locality or field 10.担保 assure; guarantee：包你没错。No problem at all, I assure you.包你满意。Your satisfaction is guaranteed. 11.约定专用 hire; charter：包车 hire (or charter) a car包场 book a whole theatre or cinema包了一只船 hire a boat 12.(Bāo) 姓 a surname相关词组敖包 | 背包 | 草包 | 承包 | 褡包 | 打包 | 掉包 | 豆包 | 发包 | 钢包 | 跟包 | 鼓包 | 荷包 | 红包 | 挎包 | 坤包 | 拎包 | 麻包 | 面包 | 脓包 | 皮包 | 蒲包 | 钱包 | 沙包 | 山包 | 烧包 | 手包 | 书包 | 套包 | 提包 | 调包 | 心包 | 熊包 | 腰包 | 衣包 | 邮包 | 背包袱 | 病包儿 | 放包袱 | 荷包蛋 | 黄包车 | 绞包针 | 空包弹 | 落包涵 | 面包车 | 面包圈 | 皮包骨 | 漆包线 | 软包装 | 纱包线 | 甩包袱 | 丝包线 | 土包子 | 卸包袱 | 硬包装 | 汉堡包 | 急救包 | 蒙古包 | 手提包 | 受气包 | 掏腰包 | 皮包公司 | 一包在内 | 胆大包天 | 狗胆包天 | 归里包堆 | 兼容并包包办 | 包庇 | 包藏 | 包产 | 包场 | 包抄 | 包车 | 包饭 | 包袱 | 包工 | 包公 | 包谷 | 包管 | 包裹 | 包含 | 包涵 | 包伙 | 包机 | 包剿 | 包金 | 包举 | 包括 | 包揽 | 包罗 | 包米 | 包赔 | 包皮 | 包票 | 包容 | 包探 | 包头 | 包围 | 包席 | 包厢 | 包销 | 包养 | 包银 | 包月 | 包孕 | 包蕴 | 包扎 | 包装 | 包子 | 包租 | 包背装 | 包乘制 | 包打听 | 包干儿 | 包身工 | 包围圈 | 包心菜 | 包圆儿 | 包藏祸心 | 包打天下 | 包袱底儿 | 包袱皮儿 | 包罗万象

包举
包举[bāo jǔ] 总括；全部占有 include; encompass：包举无遗 all-encompassing

包乘制
包乘制[bāo chéng zhì]交通运输部门乘务员的一种工作负责制。如铁路部门由司机、副司机、司炉等组成若干包乘组，各组轮流驾驶一台机车，在指定区段值勤并负责保养。transportation contract system; responsibility system instituted by transport departments for train attendants or bus drivers and conductors. For instance, contracting train crews, each consisting of driver, assistant driver and stoker, are organized to take turns in running a train in designated sections, and are each responsible for its operation and maintenance.

包产
包产[bāo chǎn] 根据土地、生产工具、技术、劳动力等条件订出产量指标，由个人或生产单位负责完成 contract with an individual or production unit with responsibility for output quotas based on land, tools of production, technology and labour：包工包产 draw up a production contract for labour and output quota包产到户 fix farm output quotas for each household

包伙
包伙[bāo huǒ] 同 same as 包饭 bāo∥fàn包伙[bāo huǒ] 同 same as 包饭 bāofàn

包公
包公[Bāo gōng]包拯(zhěng)，北宋时进士，曾任开封府知府，以执法严正著称。民间关于他断案的传说很多，尊称他为包公或包青天。小说戏曲中把他描写成刚正严明、不畏权势的清官的典型。Bao Zheng, of the Northern Song Dynasty, passed the highest level of the imperial examinations and served as prefect of Kaifeng, and was famous for his strict enforcement of the law. There are many folk tales about his rulings in lawsuits, for which he is also known as Lord Bao or Just-Minded Bao. In dramas and fiction he appears as the model of an upright official who is never intimidated by the rich and powerful.

包养
包养[bāo yǎng] 为婚外异性（多为女性）提供房屋、金钱等并与之长期保持性关系 provide housing, money, etc. for an extramarital partner (usu. woman) and maintain a long-term sexual relationship with her：包养情妇 provide for a kept woman

包剿
包剿[bāo jiǎo] 围剿 encircle and suppress

包办
包办[bāo bàn]1.一手办理，单独负责 take full responsibility for everything：这件事你一个人包办了吧。You'd better do the whole job yourself. 2.不和有关的人商量、合作，独自作主办理 decide and implement without consulting or cooperating with others; monopolize：把持包办 monopolize everything包办婚姻 arranged marriage包办代替 take over sb. else's work without consulting them

包厢
包厢[bāo xiāng] 某些剧场里特设的单间席位，一间有几个座位，多在楼上 box (at the theatre); small compartment for a group of spectators in a theatre or concert hall, oft. upstairs

包含
包含[bāo hán] 里边含有 contain; embody; include：这句话包含好几层意思。This statement has quite a few implications.

包围
包围[bāo wéi]1.四面围住 surround; encircle：亭子被茂密的松林包围着。The pavilion is surrounded by a thick pine forest. 2.正面进攻的同时，向敌人的翼侧和后方进攻 launch frontal attack and assault the enemy's flanks and rear at the same time 3.指包围圈 ring of encirclement：陷于包围之中 find oneself surrounded

包围圈
包围圈[bāo wéi quān] 军事上指已形成的包围态势的圈子和已被包围的地区 (mil.) encirclement; area under siege：冲出包围圈 break through the enemy encirclement包围圈越缩越小了。The area under siege is getting smaller.

包圆儿
包圆儿[bāo yuán r]1.把货物或剩余的货物全部买下 buy the whole lot：剩下的这点儿您包圆儿吧！Please buy up the remainder! 2.全部担当 assume in its entirety：剩下的零碎活儿我包圆儿了。I'll deal with all that's left of the work.

包场
包场[bāo chǎng] 预先定下一场电影、戏剧等的全部或大部分座位 book most of or the whole theatre or cinema; make a block booking

包头
包头[bāo tóu]1.裹在头上的装束用品（多用于少数民族）head wrapper; head-dress worn by ethnic minorities：青包头 black kerchief 2.（包头儿 bāo·tóur）附在鞋头起保护作用的橡胶、皮革等 protective patch of rubber or leather on the shoe tip：打包头儿 put a patch on the shoe tip

包子
包子[bāo zi]1.食品，用菜、肉或糖等做馅儿，多用发面做皮，包成后，蒸熟 bun stuffed with minced vegetables, meat or sugar inside, wrapped in leavened dough and steamed 2.冶炼金属时盛金属溶液的器具 container for molten metal in metal smelting

包孕
包孕[bāo yùn] 包含 contain; embody; include：她的信里包孕着无尽的思念之情。Her letter is full of nostalgia.

包容
包容[bāo róng]1.宽容 pardon; forgiveness：大度包容 be magnanimous and tolerant一味包容 invariably forgive 2.容纳 contain; hold：小礼堂能包容三百个听众。The small auditorium can seat 300 listeners.

包工
包工[bāo gōng] 按照规定的要求和期限，完成某项生产或建设任务 undertake to complete a task within a time limit and according to specifications：包工包产 contract for a job大楼由承建单位包工。Construction of the high-rise is contracted to a construction unit.包工[bāo gōng] 承包工程的厂商或工头 contractor; person or firm that undertakes jobs (esp. construction) under contract

包席
包席[bāo xí] 订整桌的酒席 order a complete menu：你们是点菜还是包席？Do you wish to order a full menu or choose dishes à la carte?包三桌席 book three tables with full banquet menu包席[bāo xí] 饭馆里指整桌供应的酒席 full banquet menu provided by a restaurant亦 also 包桌 bāozhuō

包干儿
包干儿[bāo gān r] 承担一定范围的工作，保证全部完成 be responsible for a task until it is completed：分段包干儿 divide up the work and assign a part to each individual or group剩下的扫尾活儿由我们小组包干儿。Our team will finish up the last of the job.

包庇
包庇[bāo bì]袒护或掩护（坏人、坏事）shield; harbour (evil doers); cover up (evil deeds)：互相包庇 cover up for each other包庇贪污犯 harbour an embezzler

包心菜
包心菜[bāo xīn cài]〈方 dial.〉结球甘蓝 cabbage

包扎
包扎[bāo zā] 包裹捆扎 wrap up; bind up; pack：包扎伤口 bind up (or dress) a wound待运的仪器都包扎好了。The instruments awaiting shipment are already packed.

包打听
包打听[bāo dǎ tīng]〈方 dial.〉1. 同 same as 包探 bāotàn 2.指好打听消息或知道消息多的人 snooper; gossip monger; Nosy Parker

包打天下
包打天下[bāo dǎ tiān xià] 包揽打天下的重任 undertake to conquer the country single-handedly;〈比喻 fig.〉由个人或少数人包办代替，不放手让其他人干 monopolize a task; exclude others from a task

包抄
包抄[bāo chāo] 绕到敌人侧面或背后进攻 outflank or envelop the enemy：分三路包抄过去 close in on the enemy in a three-pronged attack

包括
包括[bāo kuò]包含（或列举各部分，或着重指出某一部分）include; consist of; comprise; incorporate：语文教学应该包括听、说、读、写四项，不可偏轻偏重。The teaching of language should include four aspects - listening, speaking, reading and writing, and none should be stressed over the others.我说‘大家’，自然包括你在内。When I say‘everyone’, I naturally include you.

包探
包探[bāo tàn]〈旧时 old〉巡捕房中的侦缉人员 police detective

包揽
包揽[bāo lǎn] 兜揽过来，全部承担 assume responsibility for the whole; take on everything：政府部门不可能把各种事务都包揽起来。It is impossible for government departments to manage everything.

包月
包月[bāo yuè] 按月计价付款，如包饭按月付饭钱、包车按月付车钱等 make monthly payment, e.g. monthly payment for meals or a chartered vehicle

包机
包机[bāo jī]1.定期租用飞机 charter a plane：开展包机业务 operate a charter plane business 2.包乘的飞机 chartered plane：一架旅游包机 a chartered tourist plane

包涵
包涵[bāo han]〈客套话 pol.〉请人原谅 excuse; forgive; bear with：唱得不好，大家多多包涵！Excuse me for my poor singing.

包皮
包皮[bāo pí]1.包装的皮儿 wrapping; wrapper 2.阴茎前部覆盖龟头的外皮 prepuce; foreskin; free fold of skin covering the glans of a penis

包票
包票[bāo piào]保单。料事有绝对的把握时，说可以打包票。guarantee slip; warranty; expression of certainty：他一定能按时完成任务，我敢打包票。He will accomplish the task on time, I guarantee.亦 also 保票 bǎopiào

包租
包租[bāo zū]1.为了转租而租进房屋或田地等 rent land or house for subletting 2.不管年成丰歉，佃户都要按照规定数额交租，叫做包租 (old) mandatory fixed rent for farmland (to be paid no matter what the harvest) 3.在一段时期内专由某方租用 hire (a car, boat, etc.) for a period of time; charter：包租汽车 charter a car

包管
包管[bāo guǎn]担保（表示说话的人的自信）assure; guarantee (expression of the speaker's confidence)：包管退换。Merchandise will be exchanged if found unsatisfactory.他这种病包管不用吃药就会好。He is sure to fully recover from this disease without taking any medicine.

包米
包米[bāo mǐ]〈方 dial.〉玉米 maize; corn亦 also 苞米 bāomǐ

包罗
包罗[bāo luó]包括（指大范围）include; cover; embrace：民间艺术包罗甚广，不是三言两语所能说完的。Folk arts cover a wide range, and cannot be described in just a few words.

包罗万象
包罗万象[bāo luó wàn xiàng] 内容丰富，应有尽有 rich in content and complete：这个博览会的展品真可说是包罗万象，美不胜收。The exhibits in this exposition cover all aspects and are a real feast for the eyes.

包背装
包背装[bāo bèi zhuāng] 图书装订法的一种，书页用线或纸捻装订成册，用厚纸或绫绢等包背粘连，纸捻和线不外露 wrapped-ridge binding; a form of book binding where the pages are bound with threads or spills of rolled paper, and the ridge covered with thick paper or silk, so the threads or spills are hidden

包蕴
包蕴[bāo yùn] 包含 contain; embody; include：简短的几句话却包蕴着很深的哲理。The few sentences, though short, contain some profound philosophy.

包藏
包藏[bāo cáng] 包含；隐藏在里面 contain; harbour; conceal：包藏祸心 harbour evil intentions他的眼神包藏着抑郁之情。There is a despondent expression in his eyes.

包藏祸心
包藏祸心[bāo cáng huò xīn] 怀着害人的念头 harbour evil intentions; have bad intentions toward sb.

包袱
包袱[bāo fu]1.包衣服等东西的布 cloth-wrapper 2.用布包起来的包儿 bundle wrapped in a cloth 3.〈比喻 fig.〉某种负担 millstone round one's neck; load; weight; burden：思想包袱 a load (or weight) on one's mind; inhibiting concerns不能把赡养父母看成是包袱。Supporting one's parents should not be considered a burden. 4.指相声、快书等曲艺中的笑料。把笑料说出来叫抖包袱。humorous content in comic dialogue or quick-patter. To say the funny pants is called 抖包袱 dǒu bāo·fu.

包袱底儿
包袱底儿[bāo fu dǐ r]〈方 dial.〉1.指家庭多年不动用的或最贵重的东西 family property, esp. valuables, accumulated over a long time; resources 2.〈比喻 fig.〉隐私 secrets; privacy; private matters：抖包袱底儿 disclose one's secrets 3.〈比喻 fig.〉最拿手的本领 unique skill; consummate skill：抖搂包袱底儿（显示绝技）show off one's special skills

包袱皮儿
包袱皮儿[bāo fu pí r] 包衣服等用的布 cloth-wrapper

包装
包装[bāo zhuāng]1.在商品外面用纸包裹或把商品装进纸盒、瓶子等 packaging; wrap in paper, paper box or bottle：定量包装 packaged in fixed quantities包装商品要注意质量。Due attention should be paid to the quality of commodity packaging. 2.指包装商品的东西，如纸、盒子、瓶子等 packaging materials such as paper, boxes, bottles, etc.：包装美观 attractive packaging运输不慎，包装破损严重。The packaging has been badly damaged by careless transportation.[补义 new sense]〈比喻 fig.〉对人或事物从形象上装扮、美化，使更具吸引力或商业价值 packaging; make sb. or sth. look more beautiful and exciting to appeal to the public or enhance marketability：包装歌星 package a pop star包装体育比赛 presentation of a sports event

包裹
包裹[bāo guǒ]1.包；包扎 wrap up; bind up：用布把伤口包裹起来。Bandage up the wound. 2.包扎成件的包儿 bundle; package; parcel：他肩上背着一个小包裹。He carried a small bundle on his shoulder.我到邮电局寄包裹去。I went to the post office to send a parcel.

包谷
包谷[bāo gǔ]〈方 dial.〉玉米 maize; corn亦 also 苞谷 bāogǔ

包赔
包赔[bāo péi] 担保赔偿 guarantee to pay compensation：包赔损失。Compensation for losses is guaranteed.

包身工
包身工[bāo shēn gōng]1.〈旧社会 pre-1949〉一种变相的贩卖奴隶的形式。被贩卖的是青少年，由包工头骗到工厂、矿山做工，没有人身自由，工钱全归包工头所有，受资本家和包工头的双重剥削。indentured labour; a form of slavery. Young people were lured to work in factories or mines where they were deprived of personal freedom, and their pay was pocketed by the labour contractors. They were thus subjected to dual exploitation of both capitalists and contractors. 2.在包身工形式下做工的人 indentured labourer

包车
包车[bāo chē] 定期租用车辆 hire a vehicle for a set time：包一辆车 charter a vehicle包车[bāo chē]1.个人或机关团体定期租用的人力车或机动车 motor vehicle or rickshaw hired for a set period of time by an individual or an organization：拉包车 pull a private rickshaw包车夫 puller of a private rickshaw门前挤满了包车。Private rickshaws crowded in front of the gate. 2.由若干乘务员负责一列列车或由司机、售票员共同负责一辆公共汽车、电车的使用、保管等任务，叫做包车 contract for a vehicle; crew (drivers and conductors) contracts to be responsible for use and maintenance of a train, bus or trolley bus：包车组 contracting crew

包金
包金[bāo jīn]1.用薄金叶包在金属首饰外面 cover with gold leaf; gild; gold-plate：包金项链 a gilded necklace 2. 同 same as 包银 bāoyín

包银
包银[bāo yín]〈旧时 old〉戏院按期付给剧团或主要演员的约定的报酬 agreed wages paid by a theatre to an opera troupe or its leading stars

包销
包销[bāo xiāo]1.指商人承揽货物，负责销售 have exclusive selling rights 2.指商业机构跟生产单位订立合同，把全部产品包下来销售 contract to be the sole sales agent for a production unit or a firm

包饭
包饭[bāo fàn] 双方约定，一方按月付饭钱，另一方供给饭食 supply meals at a fixed monthly rate; board：学校可为双职工子女包饭。The school provides paid meals for children with working parents.包饭[bāo fàn] 按月支付固定费用的饭食 meals supplied at a fixed monthly rate：孩子在街道食堂吃包饭。Children eat at the neighbourhood canteen for a monthly fee.

匆
匆[cōng]（ㄘㄨㄥ）（怱、悤）急；忙 hastily; hurriedly：匆忙 hurriedly匆促 in a hurry相关词组急匆匆匆匆 | 匆促 | 匆猝 | 匆遽 | 匆忙 | 匆卒

匆促
匆促[cōng cù] 匆忙；仓促 hastily; in a hurry：因为动身的时候太匆促了，把稿子忘在家里没带来。Since we set out too hastily, I forgot to take the manuscript with me.

匆匆
匆匆[cōng cōng] 急急忙忙的样子 hurriedly; in a rush; in haste：来去匆匆 come and go in a hurry行色匆匆 be in a rush getting ready for a journey

匆卒
匆卒[cōng cù] 同 same as 匆猝 cōngcù

匆忙
匆忙[cōng máng] 急急忙忙 in haste; in a hurry：临行匆忙，没能来看你。I left in such a hurry that I didn't have time to visit you.他刚放下饭碗，又匆匆忙忙地回到车间去了。Immediately after he finished eating, he hurried back to the workshop.

匆猝
匆猝[cōng cù] 同 same as 匆促 cōngcù; 亦 also 匆卒 cōngcù

匆遽
匆遽[cōng jù]〈书 fml.〉急忙；匆促 hastily, hurriedly：神色匆遽 wearing a hurried look

匈
匈[xiōng]（ㄒㄩㄥ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 胸 xiōng相关词组匈奴

匈奴
匈奴[Xiōng nú]我国古代民族，战国时游牧在燕、赵、秦以北。东汉时分裂为南北两部，北匈奴在一世纪末为汉所败，西迁。南匈奴附汉，东晋时曾先后建立前赵、后赵、夏、北凉等政权。Xiongnu; Huns, an ancient nomadic people in China who roved about north of the states of Yan, Zhao and Qin during the Warring States Period, split into southern and northern groups during the Eastern Han Dynasty. Defeated by the Han Dynasty towards the end of the 1st century, the northern group moved westward, and the southern group submitted to the authority of the Han. During the Eastern Jin Dynasty, the Xiongnus established the Former Zhao, Later Zhao, Xia and Northern Liang regimes.

匉
匉[pēng]（ㄆㄥ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 砰 pēng

匋
匋[táo]（ㄊㄠˊ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 陶 táo（陶器 earthenware）

匍
匍[pú]（ㄆㄨˊ）另见  见下 below相关词组匍匐 | 匍匐茎

匍匐
匍匐[pú fú]1.爬行 crawl; creep：匍匐前进 crawl forward匍匐奔丧（形容匆忙奔丧）hasten home for the funeral 2.趴 lie prostrate; lie prone：孩子们匍匐在炕上画画儿。Children lay prostrate on the brick bed drawing pictures.有些植物的茎匍匐在地面上。Some plants have trailing (or creeping) stems.

匍匐茎
匍匐茎[pú fú jīng] 不能直立向上生长、平铺在地面上的茎。这种茎的节上长叶和根，如甘薯、草莓等的茎。 stolon; creeping stem that lies on or above the soil surface and bears foliage leaves, as in sweet potato, strawberry, etc.

匏
匏[páo]（ㄆㄠˊ）[匏瓜] (páoguā)1.一年生草本植物，叶子掌状分裂，茎上有卷须。果实比葫芦大，对半剖开可做水瓢。 gourd (Lagenaria siceraria var. depressaw); annual herb having palmately compound leaves and curling tendrils growing from its stem, bearing fruit larger than a calabash and capable of splitting into two to serve as ladles 2.这种植物的果实 fruit of gourd

匐
匐[fú]（ㄈㄨˊ）另见  匍匐 púfú相关词组匍匐 | 匍匐茎

匕
匕[bǐ]（ㄅㄧˇ）1.古人取食的器具，后代的羹匙由它演变而来 a type of ancient spoon (that later developed into the current style of spoon) 2.〈书 fml.〉指匕首 dagger：图穷匕见 when the map is unrolled, the dagger is revealed - the true intention eventually comes to light相关词组图穷匕首见匕首 | 匕鬯不惊

匕首
匕首[bǐ shǒu] 短剑或狭长的短刀 dagger; short or pointed knife

匕鬯不惊
匕鬯不惊[bǐ chàng bù jīng]《周易·震》：‘震惊百里，不丧匕鬯。’匕和鬯，都是古代祭祀用品，‘匕鬯不惊’原指宗庙祭祀不受惊扰，后用来形容军纪严明，不惊扰百姓。The Book of Changes·Thunder,‘The army amazed all in the area of 100 li by not disturbing the sacrificial offerings to people's ancestors at ancestral shrines;’匕 bǐ and 鬯 chàng, ancient sacrificial offerings; (original meaning) sacrificial offerings to ancestors at the ancestral shrines must not be disturbed; (of an army) maintain strict discipline so as not to cause the slightest violation of the people's interests

化
化[huā]（ㄏㄨㄚ） 同 same as 花2  huā：化钱 spend money; cost money化工夫 put in one's time doing sth.; spend time; take time另见  huà化1[huà]（ㄏㄨㄚˋ）1.变化；使变化 change; turn; transform：化脓 suppurate化名 assumed name化装 (put on) make-up顽固不化 be set in one's way泥古不化 stick stubbornly to old rules化整为零 break up the whole into parts化险为夷 transform danger into safety 2.感化 convert; influence：教化 train in good manners潜移默化 imperceptible influence; exert a subtle influence on sb.'s character or way of thinking 3.熔化；融化 melt; dissolve：化冻 thaw化铁炉 cupola furnace太阳一出来，冰雪都化了。The ice and snow melted away when the sun came out. 4.消化；消除 digest：化食 digest化痰止咳 prevent phlegm from forming and stop a cough食古不化 follow the beaten path 5.烧化 cremate; burn：焚化 cremate火化 cremate 6.（僧道）死 (of a Buddhist monk or Taoist priest) die：坐化 (of a Buddhist monk) die in a sitting position, with legs crossed羽化 (of a Taoist) die 7.指化学 short for chemistry：理化 physics and chemistry化工 chemical industry化肥 chemical fertilizer 8.后缀，加在名词或形容词之后构成动词，表示转变成某种性质或状态 [used as a suffix for a noun or an adjective to indicate sth. or sb. is becoming or made to have that attribute]：绿化 make the land green by planting trees, flowers, etc.美化 beautify恶化 worsen电气化 electrification机械化 mechanization水利化 bring farmland under irrigation化2[huà]（ㄏㄨㄚˋ）（僧道）向人求布施 (of a Buddhist monk or Taoist priest) beg for alms：募化 collect alms化缘 beg for alms化斋 beg for alms from door to door另见  huā相关词组白化 | 变化 | 成化 | 丑化 | 醇化 | 磁化 | 催化 | 淡化 | 点化 | 毒化 | 恶化 | 儿化 | 分化 | 焚化 | 风化 | 孵化 | 腐化 | 钙化 | 感化 | 钢化 | 硅化 | 幻化 | 活化 | 火化 | 激化 | 简化 | 僵化 | 焦化 | 教化 | 进化 | 净化 | 开化 | 克化 | 老化 | 理化 | 裂化 | 硫化 | 卤化 | 绿化 | 煤化 | 美化 | 募化 | 奴化 | 欧化 | 膨化 | 歧化 | 汽化 | 强化 | 劝化 | 热化 | 溶化 | 熔化 | 融化 | 乳化 | 软化 | 弱化 | 沙化 | 烧化 | 深化 | 神化 | 熟化 | 炭化 | 碳化 | 糖化 | 特化 | 同化 | 退化 | 蜕化 | 文化 | 物化 | 西化 | 消化 | 驯化 | 衍化 | 演化 | 氧化 | 液化 | 异化 | 硬化 | 优化 | 羽化 | 皂化 | 造化 | 转化 | 坐化 | 白化病 | 昌化石 | 催化剂 | 孵化器 | 灰化土 | 活化石 | 简化字 | 叫化子 | 进化论 | 贫化铀 | 汽化器 | 汽化热 | 文化层 | 文化宫 | 文化馆 | 文化人 | 文化衫 | 氧化剂 | 液化热 | 白热化 | 标准化 | 表面化 | 大众化 | 电气化 | 概念化 | 工业化 | 公式化 | 规范化 | 合理化 | 合作化 | 荒漠化 | 机械化 | 扩大化 | 企业化 | 强告化 | 人格化 | 沙漠化 | 数字化 | 现代化 | 一元化 | 自动化 | 鼻化元音 | 电化教育 | 光化作用 | 简化汉字 | 硫化橡胶 | 软化栽培 | 同化政策 | 同化作用 | 物化劳动 | 消化系统 | 异化作用 | 春风化雨 | 二氧化碳 | 光天化日 | 无机化学 | 一氧化碳 | 有机化学 | 彩陶文化 | 出神入化 | 动脉硬化 | 富营养化 | 黑陶文化 | 龙山文化 | 潜移默化 | 食古不化 | 物理变化 | 仰韶文化 | 碳水化合物 | 无机化合物 | 新文化运动 | 有机化合物 | 农业合作化 | 动脉粥样硬化化除 | 化冻 | 化肥 | 化工 | 化合 | 化解 | 化境 | 化疗 | 化名 | 化募 | 化脓 | 化身 | 化生 | 化石 | 化外 | 化纤 | 化形 | 化学 | 化验 | 化育 | 化缘 | 化斋 | 化妆 | 化装 | 化子 | 化合价 | 化合物 | 化学键 | 化学能 | 化学式 | 化妆品 | 化险为夷 | 化学变化 | 化学电池 | 化学反应 | 化学肥料 | 化学分析 | 化学工业 | 化学平衡 | 化学武器 | 化学纤维 | 化学性质 | 化学元素 | 化雨春风 | 化学方程式 | 化干戈为玉帛

化冻
化冻[huà dòng] 冰冻的江河、土地等融化 (of frozen river, earth, etc.) thaw; melt

化募
化募[huà mù] 募化 beg alms

化合
化合[huà hé] 两种或两种以上的物质经过化学反应而生成另一种物质，如氢与氧化合成水 chemical combination; (of two or more substances) turn into another substance through chemical reaction, e.g. hydrogen and oxygen compounding into water

化合价
化合价[huà hé jià]一定数目的一种元素的原子跟一定数目的其他元素原子化合的性质。通常以氢的化合价等于1为标准，其他元素的化合价就是该元素的一个原子相化合（或置换出）的氢原子数。valence; the quality that determines the number of atoms or groups with which any single atom or group will unite chemically; relative combining capacity of an atom or group compared with that of the standard hydrogen atom;亦 also 原子价 yuánzǐjià; 简称 abbr. 价 jià

化合物
化合物[huà hé wù] 由不同种元素组成的纯净物，有固定的组成和性质，如氧化镁、氯酸钾等 chemical compound, consisting of different elements, fixed in structure and properties, such as magnesium oxide, potassium chlorate, etc.

化名
化名[huà míng] 为了使人不知道真实姓名而用别的名字 use an assumed name：他原叫张杰，化名王成。His name is Zhang Jie, alias Wang Cheng.化名[huà míng] 为了使人不知道真实姓名而用的假名字 alias; assumed name：他原叫张杰，王成是他的化名。His name is Zhang Jie; Wang Cheng is his assumed name.

化境
化境[huà jìng] 幽雅清新的境地；极其高超的境界（多指艺术技巧等 usu. referring to artistic skill, etc.）sublimity; perfection：身入化境 reach perfection他的水墨山水已达化境。He has achieved virtuosity in ink-and-water landscape painting.

化外
化外[huà wài]〈旧时 old〉指政令教化达不到的偏远落后的地方 outside the pale of civilization：化外之民 people outside the pale of civilization化外之邦 states outside the pale of civilization

化妆
化妆[huà zhuāng] 用脂粉等使容貌美丽 make up with rouge, powder, etc.

化妆品
化妆品[huà zhuāng pǐn] 化妆用的物品，如脂粉、唇膏、香水等 cosmetics, including rouge, powder, lipstick, perfume, etc.

化子
化子[huā zi] 同 same as 花子 huā·zi

化学
化学[huà xué]1.研究物质的组成、结构、性质和变化规律的科学，是自然科学中的基础学科之一 chemistry; one of the basic natural sciences, which deals with the composition, structure, properties and rules of change of substances 2.赛璐珞的俗称 popular name for 赛璐珞 sàilùluò：这把梳子是化学的。This comb is made of celluloid.

化学元素
化学元素[huà xué yuán sù] 具有相同核电荷数（即相同质子数）的同一类原子的总称 chemical element; same kind of atom with the same nuclear charge; 简称 abbr. 元素 yuánsù

化学分析
化学分析[huà xué fēn xī]确定物质化学成分或组成的方法。根据分析要求不同，可分为定性分析和定量分析。chemical analysis; determine the chemical composition of a matter by qualitative analysis or quantitative analysis or both

化学反应
化学反应[huà xué fǎn yìng] 物质发生化学变化而产生性质、成分、结构与原来不同的新物质的过程 chemical reaction; process in which one substance is turned into another with different properties, composition and structure

化学变化
化学变化[huà xué biàn huà]物质变化中生成其他物质的变化，如木材燃烧放出光和热剩下灰，铁在潮湿空气中生锈等。发生化学变化时，物质的组成和化学性质都改变。chemical change, in which one substance turns into another, such as burned wood becoming ash after releasing light and heat, iron rusting in wet air, etc. When a chemical transformation occurs, the composition and chemical property of the substance will change too.

化学工业
化学工业[huà xué gōng yè] 利用化学反应生产化学产品的工业，包括基本化学工业和塑料、合成纤维、石油、橡胶、药剂、染料等各种工业 chemical industry; industry producing chemical products via chemical reaction, including primary chemical industry and industries for the production of plastics, synthetic fibres, petroleum, rubber, pharmaceuticals, dyes, etc.; 简称 abbr. 化工 huàgōng

化学平衡
化学平衡[huà xué píng héng] 可逆反应中，正反应和逆反应速度相等，反应混合物里各组成成分百分含量保持不变的状态 chemical equilibrium. In reversible reaction, positive reaction and backward reaction have the same speed and the mixture of the reactions remains unchanged in composition ratios.

化学式
化学式[huà xué shì] 用化学符号表示物质化学组成的式子，包括分子式、实验式（最简式）、结构式、示性式、电子式等 chemical formula; formula expressing chemical composition of substances by chemical symbols, including molecular formula, experimental formula (fraction in lowest terms), structural formula, rational formula, and electronic formula, etc.

化学性质
化学性质[huà xué xìng zhì] 物质在发生化学变化时表现出来的性质，如酸性、碱性、化学稳定性等 chemical property; property that a substance reveals during chemical reaction, such as acidity, alkalinity, chemical stability, etc.

化学方程式
化学方程式[huà xué fāng chéng shì]用化学式表明化学反应的式子。化学方程式中，反应物的化学式写在左边，生成物的化学式写在右边，中间用等号连接，各元素在两侧的原子数相等。如 N?+3H?=2NH?。chemical equation; symbolic representation showing the type and amount of the elementary materials and products of a reaction in which the chemical formula of the elementary materials is on the left, and that of the product is on the right, with both connected by an equal sign, and having equal atomicity of each element on both sides, such as N?+3H?=2NH?;亦 also 化学反应式 huàxué fǎnyìngshì; 简称 abbr. 方程式 fāngchéngshì

化学武器
化学武器[huà xué wǔ qì]利用毒剂大规模杀伤破坏的一种武器，包括毒剂和施放毒剂的各种武器弹药。也指喷火或发烟的军用器械等。chemical weapons; weapons of mass destruction that make use of toxic agents and various weapons and munitions for discharging them; also referring to weapons for ejecting fire or smoke

化学电池
化学电池[huà xué diàn chí]把化学能转变为电能的装置。主要部分是电解质溶液和浸在溶液中的正、负电极。使用时用导线接通两极，得到电流。chemical battery; device for turning chemical energy into electrical energy, mainly consisting of positive and negative electrodes soaking in electrolytes. When in use, the two electrodes are electrically connected to produce an electric current.

化学纤维
化学纤维[huà xué xiān wéi]用高分子化合物为原料制成的纤维。用天然的高分子化合物制成的叫人造纤维，用合成的高分子化合物制成的叫合成纤维。chemical fibre; fibre made of a polymer compound. Those made of natural polymers (compounds) are called artificial fibres; those made of synthetic polymers (compounds) are called synthetic fibres. 简称 abbr. 化纤 huàxiān

化学肥料
化学肥料[huà xué féi liào]以空气、水、矿物等为原料，经过化学反应或机械加工制成的肥料，肥分多，见效快，通常用做追肥。有氮肥、磷肥、钾肥及微量元素肥料等。chemical fertilizer; fertilizer made of air, water, minerals, etc. through chemical reaction or mechanical treatment, characterized by rich nutriment and rapid effectiveness, usu. used for topsoil application, including nitrogenous fertilizer, phosphate fertilizer, potassic fertilizer and trace elements, etc.; 简称 abbr. 化肥 huàféi

化学能
化学能[huà xué néng] 物质进行化学反应时放出的能，如物质燃烧时放出的光和热、化学电池放出的电 chemical energy; energy given out by a substance in a chemical reaction, e.g. burning substances emitting heat and light, and chemical batteries producing electricity

化学键
化学键[huà xué jiàn]分子中相邻原子之间通过电子而产生的相互结合的作用。化学结构式中用短线(-)表示。chemical bond; attraction between atoms in a molecule or crystalline structure, represented by a hyphen in a chemical structural formula

化工
化工[huà gōng] 化学工业的简称 abbr. for 化学工业 huàxué gōngyè

化干戈为玉帛
化干戈为玉帛[huà gān gē wéi yù bó]〈比喻 fig.〉把战争或争斗变为和平、友好 put away the sword; bury the hatchet

化形
化形[huà xíng] 指神话传说中妖魔鬼怪变化形状 (of demons and ghosts in legend) transformation of appearance

化斋
化斋[huà zhāi] 僧道挨门乞讨饭食 (of a Buddhist monk or Taoist priest) beg for a meal from door to door亦 also 打斋 dǎzhāi 或 or 打斋饭 dǎ zhāifàn

化生
化生[huà shēng]1.机体的一种组织由于细胞生活环境改变或理化因素刺激，在形态和机能上变为另一种组织的过程，是机体的一种适应现象。如支气管黏膜的柱状上皮组织长期受刺激变为鳞状上皮组织。metaplasia; transformation of one type of tissue into another, as the body adapts itself to a changed living environment for cells or responds to stimulations from a certain physicochemical factor, such as transformation of the columnar epithelial tissue of bronchial mucosa into lepidote epithelial tissue after long stimulation 2.〈书 fml.〉化育生长 give birth and foster growth：天地化生万物。From heaven and earth come all things in this world.

化疗
化疗[huà liáo] 用化学药物治疗恶性肿瘤 chemotherapy for treating cancer

化石
化石[huà shí]〈古代 arch.〉生物的遗体、遗物或遗迹埋藏在地下变成的跟石头一样的东西。研究化石可以了解生物的演化并能帮助确定地层的年代。fossil; remains, relics or trace of a living thing from a former geologic age, buried underground and petrified, for studying the evolution of living things and helping determine the age of strata

化纤
化纤[huà xiān] 化学纤维的简称 abbr. for 化学纤维 huàxué xiānwéi

化缘
化缘[huà yuán] 僧尼或道士向人求布施 (of a Buddhist monk or nun or Taoist priest) beg for alms

化肥
化肥[huà féi] 化学肥料的简称 abbr. for 化学肥料 huàxué féiliào

化育
化育[huà yù] 滋养；养育 rear; bring up：阳光雨露，化育万物。Sunlight, rain and dew nourish all things on earth.

化脓
化脓[huà nóng] 人或动物体的组织因细菌感染等而生脓 (of human or animal organs) fester; suppurate

化装
化装[huà zhuāng]1.演员为了适合所扮演的角色的形象而修饰容貌 (of an actor) put on make-up for a stage role 2.改变装束、容貌；假扮 disguise oneself：化装舞会 fancy dress ball他化装成乞丐模样。He disguised himself as a beggar.

化解
化解[huà jiě] 解除；消除 resolve; eliminate：化解矛盾 resolve contradictions心中的疑虑难以化解。It's difficult to dispel misgivings.

化身
化身[huà shēn]1.〈佛教 Budd.〉称佛或菩萨暂时出现在人间的形体 incarnation：这本小说的主人公正是作者自己的化身。The hero of this novel is a portrait of the author himself. 2.指抽象观念的具体形象 embodiment：旧小说里把包公描写成正义的化身。The honest and upright official Lord Bao was often described in old novels as justice incarnate.

化除
化除[huà chú] 消除（多用于抽象事物 usu. abstract things）eliminate; dispel; remove：化除成见 dispel prejudices一经解释，疑虑化除 clear up doubts after explanation

化险为夷
化险为夷[huà xiǎn wéi yí] 使危险的情况或处境变为平安 turn danger into safety; head off disaster

化雨春风
化雨春风[huà yǔ chūn fēng]另见  春风化雨 chūnfēng huàyǔ

化验
化验[huà yàn] 用物理的或化学的方法检验物质的成分和性质 physical or chemical examination for testing the composition and property of a substance：化验员 laboratory technician药品化验 drug test化验大便 have one's stools examined

北
北1[běi]（ㄅㄟˇ）四个主要方向之一，清晨面对太阳时左手的一边 north; one of the four main compass directions, to the left of a person facing the rising sun：北头儿 in the north北面 north; northern side; face north北风 north wind; boreas北房 north house城北 north of the city往北去 go north坐北朝南 (of a building) with a southern exposure; (of a posture) facing south北2[běi]（ㄅㄟˇ）〈书 fml.〉打败仗 be defeated：败北 suffer defeat连战皆北 lose several battles successively; suffer repeated defeats追奔逐北（追击败逃的敌军）pursue and attack the defeated enemy相关词组败北 | 东北 | 华北 | 淮北 | 江北 | 口北 | 南北 | 塞北 | 三北 | 西北 | 南北朝 | 河北梆子 | 喝西北风 | 南腔北调 | 南辕北辙 | 泰山北斗 | 山南海北 | 天南地北 | 追奔逐北 | 走南闯北北边 | 北朝 | 北辰 | 北方 | 北非 | 北瓜 | 北国 | 北货 | 北极 | 北欧 | 北齐 | 北曲 | 北上 | 北宋 | 北魏 | 北洋 | 北周 | 北半球 | 北斗星 | 北豆腐 | 北方话 | 北极星 | 北山羊 | 北伐战争 | 北京时间 | 北京猿人 | 北洋军阀

北上
北上[běi shàng] 我国古代以北为上，后来把去本地以北的某地叫北上 go up north; proceed northward. As north was regarded as the upper direction in ancient China, people later called going to a place north of the locality‘going up north’：近日将动身北上。We will set out up north in a few days.

北京时间
北京时间[Běi jīng shí jiān]我国的标准时。以东经120°子午线为标准的时刻，即北京所在时区的标准时刻。Beijing Time (standard time in China); standard time in the Beijing time zone as measured on the meridian 120°east longitude

北京猿人
北京猿人[Běi jīng yuán rén]中国猿人的一种，生活在距今约70-20多万年以前。1927年在北京周口店龙骨山山洞发现了第一颗牙齿化石，1929年发现了第一个完整的头骨化石。Peking man (Sinanthropus pekinensis); a kind of Chinese apeman living approximately 700,000-200,000 years ago; the first fossil of its tooth was discovered in 1927 in a cave at Longgu Mountain at Zhoukoudian of Beijing, followed in 1929 by discovery of the first fossil of its complete skull;亦 also 北京人 Běijīng rén

北伐战争
北伐战争[Běi fá Zhàn zhēng]第一次国内革命战争时期，在中国共产党领导下，以国共合作的统一战线为基础进行的一次反对帝国主义和封建军阀统治的革命战争(1926-1927)。因这次战争从广东出师北伐，所以叫北伐战争。Northern Expedition (1926-1927); anti-imperialist and anti-feudal warlord revolutionary war during the period of the First Revolutionary Civil War (1924-1927) under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party, based on the united front of the alliance between the KMT and CPC. The war, initiated in Guangdong, pushed northward, hence its name.另见  第一次国内革命战争 Dì Yī Cì Guónèi Gémìng Zhànzhēng

北半球
北半球[běi bàn qiú] 地球赤道以北的部分 Northern Hemisphere; the half of the earth north of the equator

北周
北周[Běi Zhōu] 北朝之一，公元557-581，鲜卑人宇文觉所建 Northern Zhou Dynasty (557-581), one of the Northern Dynasties established by Yuwen Jue from the ancient Xianbei people另见  南北朝 Nán-Běi Cháo

北国
北国[běi guó]〈书 fml.〉指我国的北部 northern part of the country：北国风光 northern scenery

北宋
北宋[Běi Sòng]朝代，公元960-1127，自太祖（赵匡胤）建隆元年起，到钦宗（赵桓）靖康二年止。建都汴京（今河南开封）。Northern Song Dynasty (960-1127), dating from the 1st year of the Jianlong reign of Emperor Taizu (Zhao Kuangyin) to the 2nd year of the Jingkang reign of Emperor Qinzong (Zhao Huan), which made Bianjing (present-day Kaifeng, Henan Province) its capital

北山羊
北山羊[běi shān yáng] 哺乳动物，形状似山羊而大，雄雌都有角，雄的角大，向后弯曲，生活在高山地带 ibex (Capra ibex); mammal that lives in mountainous regions, similar to but larger than a goat; both male and female have horns, those of the former bigger, curving up and backwards亦 also 羱羊 yuányáng

北斗星
北斗星[běi dǒu xīng] 大熊星座的七颗明亮的星，分布成勺形，用直线把勺形边上两颗星连接起来向勺口方向延长约五倍的距离，就遇到小熊座α星，即现在的北极星 Big Dipper; the Plough; group of seven bright stars in Ursa Major, resembling a dipper in shape, which would meet the α star in Ursa Minor (the Little Dipper), i.e. Polaris, by extending approximately five times the distance between the two end stars at the side of the‘dipper’at its mouth

北方
北方[běi fāng]1.北 north 2.北部地区，在我国一般指黄河流域及其以北的地区 northern part of the country, esp. the area north of the Yellow River

北方话
北方话[běi fāng huà]长江以北的汉语方言。广义的北方话还包括四川、云南、贵州和广西北部的方言。北方话是普通话的基础方言。northern dialect; Chinese dialect of the areas north of the Yangtze River, which, in a broad sense, also includes the dialects of Sichuan, Yunnan and Guizhou provinces, and north Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, and serves as the basis for putonghua, (common speech of the modern Hans)

北曲
北曲[běi qǔ]1.宋元以来北方诸宫调、散曲、戏曲所用的各种曲调的统称，调子豪壮朴实 powerful and simple melodies in the northern mode of ancient Chinese music, sanqu (type of opera popular in the Yuan, Ming and Qing dynasties with tonal patterns modelled on tunes drawn from folk music) and operas since the Song and Yuan dynasties 2.元代流行于北方的戏曲 northern operas of the Yuan Dynasty (and their derivatives)另见  杂剧 zájù

北朝
北朝[Běi Cháo] 北魏（后分裂为东魏、西魏）、北齐、北周的合称 Northern Dynasties (386-581), namely, Northern Wei（北魏 Běi Wèi, 386-534, which was later split into Eastern Wei 东魏 Dōng Wèi, 534-550, and Western Wei 西魏 Xī Wèi, 535-556）, Northern Qi（北齐 Běi Qí, 550-577）and Northern Zhou（北周 Běi Zhōu 557-581）另见  南北朝 Nán-Běi Cháo

北极
北极[běi jí]1.地轴的北端，北半球的顶点 North Pole; north end of the earth's axis marking the northernmost point of the Northern Hemisphere 2.北磁极，用N来表示 north magnetic pole (indicated by N)

北极星
北极星[běi jí xīng]天空北部的一颗亮星，距天球北极很近，差不多正对着地轴，从地球上看，它的位置几乎不变，可以靠它来辨别方向。由于岁差，北极星并不是永远不变的某一颗星，现在是小熊座α星，到公元14000年将是织女星。Polaris; North Star; pole star; bright star situated close to the north celestial pole, approximately opposite the earth's axis, used to take bearings because it hardly changes its position. Owing to the precession of the equinoxes, Polaris will not remain the pole star indefinitely. At present, it is the α star in Ursa Minor; by the year 14000, Vega (in the constellation Lyra) will serve as the pole star.另见  北斗星 běidǒuxīng

北欧
北欧[Běi ōu]欧洲北部，包括丹麦、挪威、瑞典、芬兰和冰岛等国 North Europe (comprising Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Finland and Iceland)

北洋
北洋[Běi yáng]清末指奉天（辽宁）、直隶（河北）、山东沿海地区。特设北洋通商大臣，由直隶总督兼任。Beiyang, a region that covered the provinces of Liaoning and Hebei and coastal areas of Shandong in the Qing Dynasty that were under the charge of the superintendent of the Northern ports, whose position was concurrently held by the governor-general of Hebei

北洋军阀
北洋军阀[Běi yáng Jūn fá]民国初年(1912-1927)代表北方封建势力的军阀集团，是清末北洋派势力的延续。最初的首领是袁世凯，袁死后分成几个派系，在帝国主义的支持下先后控制了当时的北京政府，镇压革命力量，出卖国家主权，连年进行内战。Northern Warlords (1912-1927); warlord group that represented the northern feudal forces during the early period (1912-1927) of the Republic of China; continuation of the Beiyang forces at the end of the Qing Dynasty that split into several factions after the death of Yuan Shikai, its chieftain in the early days, controlling the then Beijing government, suppressing revolutionary forces, selling out national sovereignty, and waging a protracted civil war with imperialists' support

北瓜
北瓜[běi guā]〈方 dial.〉南瓜 pumpkin

北豆腐
北豆腐[běi dòu fu]食品，豆浆煮开后加入盐卤，使凝结成块，压去一部分水分而成，比南豆腐水分少而硬（区别于‘南豆腐’as compared with‘southern-style bean curd’）northern-style firm bean curd; firm tofu; foodstuff made by adding bittern to boiled soya bean milk, condensing it into lumps with water squeezed out, less watery and more solid in texture than the southern-style bean curd

北货
北货[běi huò] 北方所产的食品，如红枣、核桃、柿饼等 northern food products (such as red dates, walnuts and dried persimmons)

北辰
北辰[běi chén] 古书上指北极星 (as recorded in ancient books) North Star; polar star; pole star; Polaris：众星环北辰。The North Star is surrounded by a myriad of stars.

北边
北边[běi bian]1.（北边儿 běi·bianr）北 north 2. 同 same as 北方 běifāng ②

北非
北非[Běi Fēi] 非洲北部，通常包括埃及、苏丹、利比亚、突尼斯、阿尔及利亚、摩洛哥、西撒哈拉等 North Africa (encompassing Egypt, Sudan, Libya, Tunisia, Algeria, Morocco and the Western Sahara)

北魏
北魏[Běi Wèi] 北朝之一，公元386-534，鲜卑人拓跋珪所建，后来分裂为东魏和西魏 Northern Wei Dynasty (386-534), one of the Northern Dynasties established by Tuoba Gui of the ancient Xianbei people of Mongolian stock, which later split into the Eastern and Western Wei dynasties另见  南北朝 Nán-Běi Cháo

北齐
北齐[Běi Qí] 北朝之一，公元550-577，高洋所建 Northern Qi Dynasty (550-577), one of the Northern Dynasties established by Gao Yang另见  南北朝 Nán-Běi Cháo

匙
匙[chí]（ㄔˊ）匙子 spoon：汤匙 soup spoon茶匙 tea spoon羹匙 broth spoon另见  ·shi匙[shi]（·ㄕ）另见  钥匙(yào·shi)另见  chí相关词组茶匙 | 羹匙 | 锁匙 | 汤匙 | 钥匙匙子

匙子
匙子[chí zi] 舀液体或粉末状物体的小勺 ladle, used to scoop up liquid or powder

匜
匜[yí]（ㄧˊ）〈古代 arch.〉盥洗时舀水用的器具，形状像瓢 ladle for dipping water in the shape of a gourd

匝
匝[zā]（ㄗㄚ）（帀）〈书 fml.〉1. 同 same as 周1  zhōu ②；圈 circle; circumference：绕树三匝 circle a tree three times 2.环绕 surround; encircle; revolve around：清渠匝庭堂。The houses are skirted by a limpid stream. 3.遍；满 all over; complete; full：匝地 all around; everywhere相关词组匼匝 | 密密匝匝匝道 | 匝地 | 匝月

匝地
匝地[zā dì]〈书 fml.〉遍地；满地 all over the ground; everywhere：柳荫匝地。The willow trees cast their shadows all around.

匝月
匝月[zā yuè]〈书 fml.〉满一个月 full month

匝道
匝道[zā dào] 立交桥和高架路上下两条道路相连接的路段，也指高速公路与邻近的辅路相连接的路段 ramp; section of a road connecting with a cloverleaf; section linking an expressway with a byroad

匠
匠[jiàng]（ㄐㄧㄤˋ）1.工匠 craftsman; artisan; workman; handicraftsman; tradesman; artificer; smith：铁匠 blacksmith铜匠 coppersmith木匠 carpenter; joiner瓦匠 bricklayer; tiler; plasterer石匠 stoneman; stonemason; stonecutter能工巧匠 master craftsman; skilled craftsman 2.〈书 fml.〉指在某方面很有造诣的人 person highly skilled in some area; master：宗匠 great master (in literature or art)文学巨匠 literary giant相关词组工匠 | 画匠 | 巨匠 | 篾匠 | 木匠 | 皮匠 | 漆匠 | 巧匠 | 石匠 | 铁匠 | 铜匠 | 瓦匠 | 锡匠 | 鞋匠 | 意匠 | 银匠 | 宗匠 | 花儿匠 | 教书匠 | 泥水匠 | 泥瓦匠 | 别具匠心 | 独具匠心 | 能工巧匠 | 小炉儿匠匠人 | 匠心

匠人
匠人[jiàng rén]〈旧时 old〉手艺工人 craftsman; artisan

匠心
匠心[jiàng xīn]〈书 fml.〉巧妙的心思 ingenuity; craftsmanship：独具匠心 outstanding ingenuity匠心独运 demonstrate inventiveness; show ingenuity

匡
匡[kuāng]（ㄎㄨㄤ）1.〈书 fml.〉纠正 rectify; correct：匡谬 correct mistakes 2.〈书 fml.〉救；帮助 assist; save：匡助 help匡我不逮（帮助我所做不到的）help me to do what I can't 3.〈方 dial.〉粗略计算；估计 roughly estimate：匡一匡 make a guess; give a rough estimate匡计 roughly estimate匡算 roughly calculate 4.料想（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）think; reckon：不匡 not expect 5.(Kuāng) 姓 a surname相关词组匡扶 | 匡计 | 匡救 | 匡谬 | 匡算 | 匡正 | 匡助

匡助
匡助[kuāng zhù] 辅助；扶助 help; assist

匡扶
匡扶[kuāng fú]〈书 fml.〉匡正扶持；辅佐 correct and assist：匡扶汉室 assist the Han Dynasty

匡救
匡救[kuāng jiù] 挽救而使回到正路上来 rescue; save; put sb. or sth. back on the right track

匡正
匡正[kuāng zhèng] 纠正；改正 rectify; correct：匡正时弊 correct the maladies of the times

匡算
匡算[kuāng suàn] 粗略计算 roughly estimate：据初步匡算，今年棉花将增产百分之十二。According to an rough estimate, cotton output will go up by 12 per cent this year.

匡计
匡计[kuāng jì] 粗略计算 calculate roughly; estimate：以每亩增产六十斤匡计，全村能增产粮食十来万斤。A rough calculation based on an increase of 30 kg. per mu puts the total increase in the grain output at about 50,000 kg. for the village as a whole.

匡谬
匡谬[kuāng miù] 纠正错误 correct mistakes：匡谬正俗 correct mistakes and rectify unhealthy tendencies

匣
匣[xiá]（ㄒㄧㄚˊ）（匣儿 xiár）匣子 small box or case; casket：木匣 wooden box梳头匣儿 dressing case两匣点心 two boxes of pastry相关词组暗匣 | 镜匣 | 电匣子 | 黑匣子 | 话匣子匣子 | 匣子枪

匣子
匣子[xiá zi]1.装东西的较小的方形器具，有盖儿；盒子 small box or case with a lid; casket 2.〈方 dial.〉驳壳枪 Mauser pistol

匣子枪
匣子枪[xiá zi qiāng]〈方 dial.〉驳壳枪 Mauser pistol亦 also 匣枪 xiáqiāng或 or 匣子 xiá·zi

匦
匦[guǐ]（ㄍㄨㄟˇ）匣子 box：票匦 ballot box

匪
匪1[fěi]（ㄈㄟˇ）强盗 robber; bandit; gangster; brigand：盗匪 robber; bandit土匪 brigand; bandit; outlaw匪徒 robber; gangster; brigand; bandit匪患 banditry; scourge of banditry剿匪 suppress bandits匪2[fěi]（ㄈㄟˇ）〈书 fml.〉非 not; no：获益匪浅 profit immensely; reap no little benefit匪夷所思 fantastic; bizarre; strange; (of ideas, events, etc.) out of the ordinary相关词组绑匪 | 残匪 | 车匪 | 盗匪 | 股匪 | 惯匪 | 海匪 | 胡匪 | 土匪 | 警匪片匪帮 | 匪盗 | 匪患 | 匪祸 | 匪首 | 匪徒 | 匪穴 | 匪夷所思

匪夷所思
匪夷所思[fěi yí suǒ sī] 指言谈行动超出常情，不是一般人所能想像的 (of speech and behaviour) out of the ordinary; bizarre（夷 yi：平常 ordinary）

匪帮
匪帮[fěi bāng] 有组织的匪徒或行为如同盗匪的反动政治集团 bandit gang; gang of bandits, or reactionary political group engaging in gangster-like activities：法西斯匪帮 fascist gang

匪徒
匪徒[fěi tú]1.强盗 bandit; robber; brigand; gangster; mobster：财物被匪徒抢劫一空。Everything was stolen by the robbers. 2.危害人民的反动派或坏分子 reactionaries or bad elements who harm people

匪患
匪患[fěi huàn] 盗匪造成的祸患 banditry; scourge of banditry

匪盗
匪盗[fěi dào] 盗匪 robber; bandit; brigand

匪祸
匪祸[fěi huò] 同 same as 匪患 fěihuàn

匪穴
匪穴[fěi xué] 敌人、盗匪盘踞的地方 bandits' den or lair; enemy hideaway：直捣匪穴 attack the bandits' den

匪首
匪首[fěi shǒu] 盗匪的头子 bandit chieftain; mob boss

匮
匮[kuì]（ㄎㄨㄟˋ）〈书 fml.〉缺乏 lack; be deficient; be short of：匮乏 be short of匮竭 be deficient; dry up〈古 arch.〉 又同 also same as 柜 guì相关词组穷匮匮乏 | 匮竭 | 匮缺

匮乏
匮乏[kuì fá]〈书 fml.〉（物资）缺乏；贫乏 (of supplies) be short of; be deficient：药品匮乏 shortage of medicine极度匮乏 serious shortage in the supply不虞匮乏 no need to worry about the shortage of supplies

匮竭
匮竭[kuì jié]〈书 fml.〉贫乏，以至于枯竭 poor; impoverished; deficient：精力匮竭 exhausted被困山谷，粮食匮竭。Stranded in the valley, (they) ran out of food.

匮缺
匮缺[kuì quē]〈书 fml.〉缺乏 lack; be short of; be empty of; be devoid of：器材匮缺 be in short supply of equipment能源匮缺 be devoid of energy sources

匹
匹1[pǐ]（ㄆㄧˇ）1.比得上；相当；相配 be equal to; be a match for：匹配 match难与为匹 hard to match 2.单独 single; alone：匹夫 ordinary person匹2[pǐ]（ㄆㄧˇ）（疋）〈量词 classifier〉1.用于马、骡等 [for horses, mules, etc.]：两匹骡子 two mules三匹马 three horses 2.用于整卷的绸或布（五十尺、一百尺不等）(of silk or cloth 50 or 100 chi in length) bolt; bale：一匹绸子 a bolt of silk两匹布 two bolts of cloth 3.〈方 dial.〉用于山 [for mountains]：一匹山 a mountain翻过那匹山就到了。After climbing that mountain we will arrive at our destination.另见  疋 yǎ相关词组布匹 | 马匹 | 单枪匹马 | 奥林匹克运动会匹敌 | 匹夫 | 匹配 | 匹头 | 匹夫之勇 | 匹马单枪

匹夫
匹夫[pǐ fū]1.一个人，泛指平常人 ordinary man：国家兴亡，匹夫有责。Every common man should feel responsible for the well-being of their motherland. 2.指无学识、无智谋的人（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）ignorant or unintelligent person：匹夫之辈 ignorant person

匹夫之勇
匹夫之勇[pǐ fū zhī yǒng] 指不用智谋，只凭个人刚烈的勇气 foolhardiness; reckless physical courage; undisciplined courage lacking wisdom and intelligence

匹头
匹头[pǐ tou]〈方 dial.〉1.指布或绸缎等剪好的成件或成套的衣料 piece of ready-cut cloth or silk for a garment or a suit 2.布匹 bolt of cloth; fabrics

匹敌
匹敌[pǐ dí] 对等；相称 be well matched; be equal to each other：两方势力匹敌。The two sides are of equal force.

匹配
匹配[pǐ pèi]1.〈书 fml.〉结成婚姻；婚配 mate; marry：匹配良缘 get married happily 2.（元器件等）配合 (of components, parts, etc.) matching：功率匹配 of matching power阻抗匹配 matching impedance

匹马单枪
匹马单枪[pǐ mǎ dān qiāng]另见  单枪匹马 dān qiāng pǐ mǎ

区
区[ōu]（ㄡ）（區） 姓 a surname另见  qū区[qū]（ㄑㄩ）（區）1.区别；划分 distinguish; differentiate; discriminate：区分 distinguish; differentiate; discriminate 2.地区；区域 area; region; zone; district：山区 mountainous area解放区 liberated area工业区 industrial district住宅区 residential quarters风景区 scenic area; parkland; tourist resort 3.行政区划单位，如自治区、市辖区、县辖区等 (as an administrative division) autonomous region; district under the jurisdiction of a city; district of a county另见  ōu相关词组白区 | 边区 | 厂区 | 城区 | 地区 | 防区 | 工区 | 管区 | 灌区 | 海区 | 红区 | 郊区 | 教区 | 街区 | 禁区 | 景区 | 军区 | 考区 | 垦区 | 矿区 | 老区 | 盲区 | 牧区 | 赛区 | 山区 | 社区 | 时区 | 市区 | 苏区 | 特区 | 误区 | 辖区 | 小区 | 新区 | 选区 | 学区 | 音区 | 营区 | 园区 | 展区 | 战区 | 专区 | 保税区 | 国统区 | 行政区 | 红灯区 | 解放区 | 自治区 | 标准时区 | 高气压区 | 经济特区 | 首善之区 | 特别行政区 | 中央商务区 | 自然保护区 | 民族区域自治 | 经济技术开发区区别 | 区分 | 区划 | 区间 | 区区 | 区位 | 区域

区位
区位[qū wèi] 地区位置 geographical location：依托海岛的区位优势，积极发展养殖业。Positively develop aquaculture by taking advantage of the waters around the island.

区分
区分[qū fēn] 同 same as 区别 qūbié ①：区分优劣 distinguish between superior and inferior; differentiate superior from inferior严格区分不同性质的矛盾 make a strict distinction between contradictions of different nature; strictly distinguish between different kinds of contradictions

区划
区划[qū huà] 地区的划分 division into districts：行政区划 administrative divisions

区别
区别[qū bié]1.把两上以上的对象加以比较，认识它们不同的地方；分别 distinguish; differentiate; discriminate; set apart; tell the difference between; make a distinction between：区别好坏 distinguish between good and bad; tell good from evil区别对待 discriminate (between); differentiate (between) 2.彼此不同的地方 difference; distinction：我看不出这两个词在意义上有什么区别。I can't see any difference in meaning between the two words.

区区
区区[qū qū]1.（数量）少；（人或事物）不重要 (of number, amount or sum) petty; (of a person or thing) unimportant; of minor importance; trivial; trifling：区区之数，不必计较。You don't have to care about such a pittance.区区小事，何足挂齿！Such a trivial matter is hardly worth mentioning! 2.〈旧时 old〉〈谦辞 hum.〉我（语气不庄重 politely but insincerely）me; my humble self：此人非他，就是区区。It's none other than my humble self.

区域
区域[qū yù] 地区范围 region; area; district：区域性 regional区域自治 regional autonomy

区间
区间[qū jiān] 交通运输、通讯联络上指全程线路中的一段 part of the regular routes or connections for transportation or communication：区间车（某条交通线上只行驶于某一地段的车）shuttle bus; bus travelling only between two points on a certain transportation route

医
医[yī]（ㄧ）（醫、毉）1.医生 doctor (of medicine)：军医 medical officer; army doctor; army surgeon牙医 dentist延医诊治 call in a doctor for diagnosis and treatment 2.医学 medicine; medical science：中医 traditional Chinese medicine西医 Western medicine医科 medical courses in general; medicine他是学医的。He majors in medicine. 3.医治 cure; treat：把我的病医好了 cure me of my illness头痛医头，脚痛医脚，不是根本办法。It's not the essential way to treat the head when the head aches and treat the foot when the foot hurts.相关词组藏医 | 法医 | 国医 | 行医 | 就医 | 军医 | 留医 | 儒医 | 神医 | 世医 | 兽医 | 太医 | 投医 | 西医 | 新医 | 牙医 | 庸医 | 中医 | 法医学 | 赤脚医生 | 全科医师 | 剜肉医疮 | 保外就医 | 讳疾忌医 | 头痛医头，脚痛医脚医道 | 医德 | 医护 | 医家 | 医科 | 医理 | 医疗 | 医生 | 医师 | 医士 | 医书 | 医术 | 医务 | 医学 | 医药 | 医院 | 医治 | 医嘱

医书
医书[yī shū]讲述医学的书籍（多指中医的 usu. in Chin. med.）medical book

医务
医务[yī wù] 医疗事务 medical matters：医务工作者 medical worker

医嘱
医嘱[yī zhǔ] 医生根据病情和治疗的需要对病人在饮食、用药、化验等方面的指示 doctor's advice (or orders) on a patient's diet, drug taking and laboratory tests

医士
医士[yī shì] 受过中等医学教育或具有同等能力、经国家卫生部门审查合格的负医疗责任的医务工作者 practitioner with secondary medical school education or medical practitioner who has the equivalent ability and is qualified after examination by a state medical department for taking medical responsibility

医学
医学[yī xué] 以保护和增进人类健康、预防和治疗疾病为研究内容的科学 medical science; medicine; science and art dealing with the maintenance or improvement of health and the prevention or treatment of diseases;另见  中医 zhōngyī and 西医 xīyī

医家
医家[yī jiā]指医生（多指中医 usu. in Chin. med.）physician：收集各地医家祖传秘方 collect secret prescriptions handed down along family lines

医师
医师[yī shī] 受过高等医学教育或具有同等能力、经国家卫生部门审查合格的负主要医疗责任的医务工作者 certified doctor; person who has received higher medical education or has the equivalent ability and is qualified after examination by a state medical department for taking major medical responsibility

医德
医德[yī dé] 医务人员应该具备的品德 medical ethics：医德高尚 be an ethical doctor

医护
医护[yī hù] 医治和护理 treatment and nursing：医护工作 medical service; medical work医护人员 doctors and nurses经精心医护，病情大有好转。After careful treatment and nursing, the patient's condition has greatly improved.

医术
医术[yī shù] 医疗技术 medical skill; art of healing：医术高明 have superb medical skill

医治
医治[yī zhì] 治疗 cure; treat; heal：急性病应该赶快医治。An acute disease should be treated quickly.

医理
医理[yī lǐ] 医学上的道理或理论知识 principles of medical science; medical knowledge：深通医理 have a profound knowledge of medicine

医生
医生[yī shēng] 掌握医药知识、以治病为业的人 doctor; medical man

医疗
