原生矿物[yuán shēng kuàng wù] 矿床中保持其生成时的形态和成分的矿物，如辉石、石英、方铅矿等 primary mineral; mineral that maintains its original state and elements, e.g. augite, quartz, galenite, etc.

原生质
原生质[yuán shēng zhì] 细胞中有生活力的组成部分，是生命的物质基础，由蛋白质、核酸、脂肪、碳水化合物、无机盐、水等构成 protoplasm; vital part of a cell, which is the basic material of life, including protein, nucleic acid, fat, carbohydrate, inorganic salt, water, etc.

原田
原田[yuán tián]〈方 dial.〉高原上的田地 farmland on a plateau

原由
原由[yuán yóu] 同 same as 缘由 yuányóu

原盐
原盐[yuán yán] 只经过初步晒制或熬制的食盐，一般含杂质较多，多用做工业原料 crude salt; salt preliminarily manufactured through drying or decocting, normally containing lots of residues, and mostly used as raw industrial material

原矿
原矿[yuán kuàng] 开采后未经加工的矿石 raw ore; run-of-mine ore; crude ore

原种
原种[yuán zhǒng] 原来的品种；保持原来的特性、没有变易的品种 protospecies; stock; breed that has retained its original features without any changes：原种肉鸡 stock chicken; stock table hen

原稿
原稿[yuán gǎo] 写成后没有经过他人修改增删的稿子；出版部门据以印刷出版的稿子 original manuscript; master copy; manuscript unpolished by others; manuscript according to which a book is printed and published

原籍
原籍[yuán jí] 原先的籍贯（区别于‘寄籍、客籍’as compared with‘migrant home’and‘temporary home’）ancestral home：原籍浙江，寄籍北京。(His) ancestral home is in Zhejiang Province, and (he) has now settled down in Beijing.

原粮
原粮[yuán liáng] 没有经过加工的粮食，如没有碾成米的稻谷，没有磨成面粉的小麦 unprocessed grain; unhusked grain, e.g. unhusked rice and unground wheat

原索动物
原索动物[yuán suǒ dòng wù]脊索动物的一个亚门。背部有柔软的脊索，以支持身体，如文昌鱼等。protochordate; prochordate; chordate subphylum, having a soft notochord on the back to support the body, e.g. lancelet

原纸
原纸[yuán zhǐ]用来制造各种加工纸的原料纸。质量根据加工要求而不同，如钢纸原纸要求结构松软，吸收液体性能好；誊写蜡纸原纸要求纸质柔韧，纤维细长。body paper; body stock; base paper; raw stock; raw paper of different qualities used to manufacture paper for different purposes. For example, the body paper for making vulcanized fibre paper should be soft and highly absorbent, while stencil paper should have pliable, long and fine fibres.

原线圈
原线圈[yuán xiàn quān] 感应圈、变压器内接电源的线圈 primary coil; coil whose inductor and transformer are connected with an electrical source亦 also 初级线圈 chūjí xiànquān

原罪
原罪[yuán zuì]〈基督教 Christ.〉指人类始祖亚当和夏娃在伊甸园偷吃了上帝禁吃的智慧之果而犯下的罪。传给后世子孙，成为一切罪恶和灾祸的根源。original sin; according to Christianity, sin committed by the first humans, Adam and Eve in Eden, who stole and ate the fruit of knowledge, which was forbidden by God, a sin then passed on to their posterity and being the source of all evil and disaster

原职
原职[yuán zhí] 原来的职务 former post：官复原职 be rehabilitated to one's former post

原色
原色[yuán sè]能配合成各种颜色的基本颜色。颜料中的原色是红、黄、蓝，蓝和黄可以配合成绿，红和蓝可以配合成紫。色光中的原色是红、绿、蓝，红和绿可以配合成黄，红和蓝可以配合成紫。primary colour; basic colours that can combine to produce different shades of colour. In pigment, red, yellow and blue are the primary colours, and blue and yellow combine to produce green while red and blue combine to produce purple. In light, the primary colours are red, green and blue, and red and green combine to produce yellow while the combination of red and blue produces purple.亦 also 基色 jīsè

原著
原著[yuán zhù] 著作的原本（对译本、缩写本、删节本、改编本而言 as opposed to‘translated’,‘simplified’,‘abridged’, or‘adapted’versions）original work; original：翻译作品要忠实于原著。Translation should be faithful to the original.

原蜜
原蜜[yuán mì] 没有经过加工的蜂蜜 unprocessed honey; raw honey

原装
原装[yuán zhuāng]1.原来装配好的 factory-assembled; factory-packed：原装名牌电器 factory-packed brand-name electric home appliances 2.原来包装好的 original packing：原装名酒 liquor in its original packing

原诉
原诉[yuán sù] 在诉讼过程中，被告对原告提出反诉时，称原告提起的诉讼为原诉 original suit; original suit filed by the accuser, so called when the accused countercharges the accuser

原谅
原谅[yuán liàng] 对人的疏忽、过失或错误宽恕谅解，不加责备或惩罚 forgive; pardon; excuse; not blame or punish sb. for his negligence, error or mistake

原貌
原貌[yuán mào] 原来的面貌；本来的样子 original appearance or look; original state：保持原貌 keep sth. as it is; leave sth. in its original state

原配
原配[yuán pèi] 同 same as 元配 yuánpèi

原野
原野[yuán yě] 平原旷野 open country; champaign; weald：辽阔的原野 vast open country山下是肥沃的原野。At the foot of the mountain is a stretch of fertile open country.

原鸡
原鸡[yuán jī]鸟，体形和家鸡相似而小，是家鸡的远祖。雄鸡羽毛颜色美丽，体上部多红色，下部黑褐色。雌鸡体上部暗褐色，尾短。栖息在云南、广西南部及海南岛等山区密林中。jungle fowl, of the genus Gallus and of the pheasant family; remote ancestor of the domesticated chicken, but smaller in physique, the male having beautifully coloured feathers, red-feathered upper body and dark brown lower body, and the female having a dark brown upper body and a short tail, mainly found in the deep forests in mountainous areas of Yunnan Province, southern Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, and Hainan Island

原鸽
原鸽[yuán gē]鸽的一种，身体的上部灰色，颈部有绿紫色的光泽，腹部淡灰色，善飞行。吃谷物及其他植物的种子。rock dove (Columba livia), having grey upper body, lustrous greenish purple neck, and light grey belly; good at flying, and feeding on grains or other plant seeds; 亦 also 野鸽 yěgē

原麻
原麻[yuán má] 纺织上指用做原料的麻类植物的纤维 hemp used in the textile industry

厢
厢[xiāng]（ㄒㄧㄤ）（廂）1.厢房 wing (usu. of a one-storeyed house)：东厢 east wing一正两厢 one central room and two wing rooms 2.（厢儿 xiāngr）类似房子隔间的地方 place similar to a house with partitions：车厢儿 compartment包厢 theatre box 3.靠近城的地区 vicinity of a city：城厢 city proper and the area outside its gates关厢 neighbourhood outside a city gate 4.边；旁（多见于早期白话 oft. used in early vernacular）side：这厢 this side; here那厢 that side; there两厢 both sides相关词组包厢 | 车厢 | 城厢 | 关厢 | 两厢 | 打连厢厢房

厢房
厢房[xiāng fáng] 在正房前面两旁的房屋 wing (usu. of a one-storeyed house); wing room：东厢房 east wing room西厢房 west wing room

厣
厣[yǎn]（ㄧㄢˇ）（厴）1.螺类介壳口圆片状的盖，由足部表皮分泌的物质形成 operculum; disc-shaped lid on the horny shell of snails or mollusks, formed with the secretion of the foot scarfskin 2.蟹腹下面的薄壳 operculum; lid covering the belly of a crab

厥
厥1[jué]（ㄐㄩㄝˊ）失去知觉，不省人事；晕倒；气闭 faint; lose consciousness; fall into a coma：痰厥 faint owing to phlegm blocking the respiratory passage昏厥 syncope; faint厥2[jué]（ㄐㄩㄝˊ）〈书 fml.〉1.其；他的 his or her; its; their：厥后 after that; thereafter厥父 his or her father大放厥词 talk a lot of nonsense 2.乃；才 only then：左丘失明，厥有《国语》。If Zuoqiu Ming hadn't lost his sight, probably we would not now be able to read his Discourse on the States.相关词组昏厥 | 惊厥 | 突厥 | 晕厥 | 大放厥词

厦
厦[shà]（ㄕㄚˋ）（廈）1.（高大的）房子 tall building：广厦 large house; huge building高楼大厦 high buildings and large mansions; high-rises 2.〈方 dial.〉房子里靠后墙的部分，在柁之外 Chinese-style portico; part of a house attached to the back wall and beyond the girder：前廊后厦 having a porch in front of a building and a portico behind it另见  xià厦[xià]（ㄒㄧㄚˋ）（廈）厦门 (Xiàmén)，地名，在福建 Xiamen (Amoy), city in Fujian Province另见  shà相关词组抱厦 | 大厦 | 噶厦 | 后厦 | 商厦

厨
厨[chú]（ㄔㄨˊ）（廚、）1.厨房 kitchen：下厨 cook 2.厨师 cook：名厨 famous chef相关词组帮厨 | 庖厨 | 掌厨厨房 | 厨具 | 厨师 | 厨司 | 厨子

厨具
厨具[chú jù] 做饭菜的用具，如锅、炒勺、菜刀等 cooking utensils, like wok, frying pan, kitchen knife, etc.

厨司
厨司[chú sī]〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 厨师 chúshī

厨子
厨子[chú zi] 指厨师 cook

厨师
厨师[chú shī] 长于烹调并以此为业的人 cook; chef

厨房
厨房[chú fáng]1.做饭菜的屋子 kitchen 2.〈旧时 old〉指厨师 cook

厩
厩[jiù]（ㄐㄧㄡˋ）（廐、廄）马棚，泛指牲口棚 stable; cattle-shed; pen：厩肥 barnyard manure相关词组马厩厩肥

厩肥
厩肥[jiù féi]家畜的粪尿和垫圈的干土、杂草等混在一起沤成的肥料。也叫圈(juàn)肥，有的地区叫圊(qīng)肥。barnyard manure; material that fertilizes land, made of refuse from stables and barnyards, e.g. livestock excreta with litter; also 圈肥 juànféi; called 圊肥 qīngféi in some areas

厮
厮1[sī]（ㄙ）（廝）1.男性仆人（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）man servant：小厮 page-boy; boy servant 2.对人轻视的称呼（多见于早期白话 usu. in early vernacular）(derog.) fellow; guy：这厮 this guy那厮 that guy厮2[sī]（ㄙ）（廝）互相 with each other; together：厮打 tussle厮杀 fight at close quarters (with weapons)厮混 fool around (or about) with sb.; play around (or about) with sb.相关词组耳鬓厮磨厮打 | 厮混 | 厮杀

厮打
厮打[sī dǎ] 相互扭打 tussle：拼命厮打 tussle desperately两个人在门外厮打起来。Outside, the two of them began fighting.

厮杀
厮杀[sī shā] 相互拼杀，指战斗 fight at close quarters (with weapons)：厮杀声 sounds of battle跟敌人厮杀 fight the enemy at close quarters

厮混
厮混[sī hùn]1.彼此生活在一起；相处（多含贬义 oft. derog.）hang out with; chum around with sb.; fool around (or about) with sb.：他整天和那些不三不四的人厮混。He spends all his time fooling around with a group of rather dubious fellows. 2.混合；混杂 mingle; mix：人的喊声、马的叫声、枪声厮混在一起。The sounds of men shouting, horses neighing, and gunshots commingled into one.

厶
厶[sī]（ㄙ）〈书 fml.〉 同 same as 私 sī

去
去1[qù]（ㄑㄩˋ）1.从所在地到别的地方（跟‘来1 ’① 相对 as opposed to ‘come’）go：去路 way of advancing; the way to去向 whereabouts从成都去重庆 from Chengdu to Chongqing他去了三天，还没回来。He has been away for three days, and has not come back yet. 2.离开 leave; depart; be off：去国 leave one's country去世 pass away; depart from this world去职 no longer hold one's post; quit one's job; resign from office去留两便。Go or stay, do as you like. 3.失去；失掉 lose; be out of; be bereft of：大势已去。The situation is beyond salvation. or It's a lost cause. or The game is as good as lost. 4.除去；除掉 get rid of; remove; relieve：去病 prevent or cure a disease去火 relieve internal heat; relieve inflammation去皮 remove the peel or skin这句话去几个字就简洁了。Delete a couple of words, and the sentence will read more concise. 5.距离 be away from：两地相去四十里。The two places are 40 li apart.去今五十年。It was 50 years ago. 6.过去的（时间，多指过去的一年） past (oft. referring to the year just past)：去年 last year去秋（去年秋天）last autumn去冬今春 last winter and this spring 7.〈婉辞 euph.〉指人死 die; pass away; depart; be gone; depart from this world; go to a better place：他不到四十岁就先去了。He passed away before he was 40. 8.用在另一动词前表示要做某事 [used before another verb to indicate a future action] be about to; be going to：你们去考虑考虑。You may go and think about it.自己去想办法。Go and figure out a way for yourself.注意 NOTE：表示离开说话人所在地自行做某件事时用‘去’，表示到说话人所在地参与某件事时用‘来’ when indicating an action of leaving the speaker, use 去, while for an action ofcoming towards the speaker, use 来 lái 9.用在动词或动词结构后面表示去做某件事 [used after a verb or verbal structure to indicate an action that has started] have gone to do sth.：游泳去了 have gone for a swim他听报告去了。He has gone to listen to a report.回家吃饭去了 have gone home for dinner注意 NOTE：⑧⑨的‘去’可以一前一后同时用，表示去了要做某件事，如：他去听报告去了。 去 qù in ⑧⑨ can be used simultaneously before and after a verb or verb-object structure to indicate ‘have gone to do sth.’, e.g. He has gone to listen to a report. 10.用在动词结构（或介词结构）与动词（或动词结构）之间，表示前者是后者的方法、方向或态度，后者是前者的目的 [used between a verbal or prepositional structure and a verb or verbal structure to indicate the former is the way, direction or attitude of the latter, while the latter is the purpose of the former] to; in order to; through; by; from：提了一桶水去浇花 take a bucket of water to water the flowers要从主要方面去检查 conduct an inspection from the principal aspect用辩证唯物主义的观点去观察事物 look at things from a dialectical materialist point of view 11.〈方 dial.〉用在‘大、多、远’等形容词后，表示‘非常…’，‘…极了’的意思（后面加‘了’） [used after an adjective such as 大 dà, 多 duō, 远 yuǎn, etc. and followed by 了 ·le to indicate degree] very; extremely：这座楼可大了去了！What an enormous building!他到过的地方多了去了！He has travelled to countless places! 12.去声 falling tone：平上去入 level tone, rising tone, falling tone and entering tone去2[qù]（ㄑㄩˋ）扮演（戏曲里的角色） play a role; act a part in (a local opera)：在《断桥》中，他去白娘子。He played the role of Lady Bai (White Snake) in The Broken Bridge.去[qù]（ㄑㄩˋ）1.用在动词后，表示人或事物随动作离开原来的地方 [used after a verb to suggest the movement away of the speaker in the middle of an action] away：拿去 take it away捎去 take it (away) with you 2.用在动词后，表示动作的继续等 [used after a verb to indicate continuation of an action] on：信步走去（= 过去）take a leisurely walk towards or up to让他说去（= 下去）。Let him talk on.一眼看去（= 上去）look far ahead; look across相关词组出去 | 故去 | 过去 | 回去 | 进去 | 来去 | 上去 | 失去 | 褪去 | 下去 | 相去 | 过不去 | 过得去 | 豁出去 | 何去何从 | 死去活来 | 来龙去脉 | 掐头去尾 | 颠来倒去 | 翻来覆去 | 过意不去 | 来回来去 | 眉来眼去 | 说不过去 | 说得过去 | 一来二去 | 直来直去去处 | 去火 | 去就 | 去路 | 去年 | 去任 | 去日 | 去声 | 去世 | 去暑 | 去岁 | 去向 | 去雄 | 去职

去世
去世[qù shì]（成年人）死去；逝世 (of an adult) die; pass away; depart from this world; go to a better place; depart; be gone

去任
去任[qù rèn]（官吏）去职 no longer hold the official post; resign from office; relinquish one's official post

去向
去向[qù xiàng] 去的方向 direction in which sb. has gone; whereabouts：不知去向 have no idea where sb. has gone

去声
去声[qù shēng]1.〈古代 arch.〉汉语四声的第三声 falling tone; the 3rd of the four tones in classical Chinese pronunciation 2.普通话字调中的第四声 falling tone; the 4th of the four tones in putonghua pronunciation另见  四声 sìshēng

去处
去处[qù chù]1.去的地方 whereabouts：我知道他的去处。I know where he is. 2.场所；地方 place; spot; site：那里林木幽深，风景秀丽，是一个避暑的好去处。It's an ideal summer resort with the peace and quiet of woods and the beauty of landscape.

去就
去就[qù jiù] 担任或不担任职务 leave or remain in one's post：去就未定。It's not decided whether he will leave or remain in his post.

去岁
去岁[qù suì] 同 same as 去年 qùnián

去年
去年[qù nián] 今年的前一年 year before the present year; last year; yesteryear

去日
去日[qù rì]〈书 fml.〉已过去的岁月 bygone days; past; past times; (of) yore：去日苦多。Many are the days that have gone by.

去暑
去暑[qù shǔ] 驱除暑气 get rid of summer heat：去暑降温 relieve heat and bring in coolness

去火
去火[qù huǒ]〈中医 Chin. med.〉指消除身体里的火气 relieve internal heat：消痰去火 reduce phlegm and relieve internal heat喝绿豆汤，可去火。Mung bean soup can help relieve internal heat.

去职
去职[qù zhí] 不再担任原来的职务 no longer hold the post

去路
去路[qù lù] 前进的道路；去某处的道路 way of advancing; the way to; outlet：挡住他的去路。His way forward was blocked.

去雄
去雄[qù xióng] 果树或玉蜀黍等进行品种间的杂交时，把所选母株的雄蕊去掉 emasculate; castrate; remove the stamens of a maternal plant in the cross-breeding of different strains of fruit, maize, etc.

县
县[xiàn]（ㄒㄧㄢˋ）（縣）行政区划单位，由地区、自治州、直辖市领导 county, an administrative unit under the leadership of a prefecture, autonomous prefecture or a central municipality〈古 arch.〉又同 also same as 悬 xuán相关词组赤县 | 外县 | 掖县 | 应县 | 知县 | 自治县县城 | 县份 | 县志 | 县治

县份
县份[xiàn fèn]县（不和专名连用 not used with specific place names）county：崇信是甘肃东部的一个县份。Chongxin is a county in eastern Gansu Province.

县城
县城[xiàn chéng] 县行政机关所在的城镇 county seat; county town

县志
县志[xiàn zhì] 记载一个县的历史、地理、风俗、人物、文教、物产等的专书 county gazetteer; general records of a county; county annals; special book recording a county's history, geography, customs, important figures, culture, education, resources, etc.

县治
县治[xiàn zhì]〈旧指 old〉县政府的所在地 seat of a county government; county seat

叁
叁[sān]（ㄙㄢ）‘三’的大写 upper case of the numeral ‘three’另见  数字 shùzì

参
参1[cān]（ㄘㄢ）（參）1.加入；参加 join; enter; take part in; participate in：参军 join the army参赛 enter a competition 2.参考 consult; refer to：参看 see (also); cf.参阅 consult; refer to参2[cān]（ㄘㄢ）（參）1.进见；谒见 call to pay one's respects to：参谒 pay one's respects to参拜 pay a courtesy call; formally call on; pay homage to 2.封建时代指弹劾 (in feudal times) impeach an official before the emperor：参劾 impeach参他一本（‘本’指奏章）submit a memorial to the emperor to impeach an official参3[cān]（ㄘㄢ）（參）〈书 fml.〉探究并领会（道理、意义等）penetrate (truth); study and gain an understanding of truth, meaning, etc.：参破 penetrate; understand (mysteries, profundities, etc.)参透 perceive; understand; see through (mysteries, profundities, etc.)另见  cēn and shēn参[cēn]（ㄘㄣ）（參）另见  见下 below另见  cān and shēn参1[shēn]（ㄕㄣ）（參、蓡、葠）人参、党参等的统称。通常指人参。 general term for ginseng and dangshen (Codonopsis pilosula), but oft. referring to ginseng：参茸（人参和鹿茸） ginseng and pilose antler参须 fibrous roots of ginseng参2[shēn]（ㄕㄣ）（參）二十八宿之一 shen, one of the 28 constellations：参商 shen and shang, both of which are among the 28 constellations, but never appear in the sky at the same time另见  cān and cēn相关词组海参 | 人参 | 西洋参参拜 | 参半 | 参差 | 参禅 | 参错 | 参订 | 参股 | 参观 | 参合 | 参加 | 参见 | 参军 | 参看 | 参考 | 参量 | 参谋 | 参拍 | 参评 | 参赛 | 参商 | 参数 | 参天 | 参透 | 参详 | 参校 | 参验 | 参谒 | 参议 | 参与 | 参预 | 参阅 | 参赞 | 参展 | 参战 | 参照 | 参政 | 参酌 | 参考系 | 参议院

参与
参与[cān yù]参加（事务的计划、讨论、处理）partake; participate in; take part in; be a part of; play a part in：参与其事 have a hand in the matter他曾参与这个规划的制订工作。He once participated in formulating this plan.亦 also 参预 cānyù

参军
参军[cān jūn] 参加军队 join the army; join up; enlist; enroll; sign up

参加
参加[cān jiā]1.加入某种组织或某种活动 join a group or an activity; attend; engage in; take part in; participate in; go in for (activities)：参加工会 join the trade union参加会议 attend a meeting参加选举 participate in an election参加绿化劳动 take part in tree planting 2.提出（意见）offer; give; tender (advice, suggestions, etc.)：这件事儿，请你也参加点儿意见。Please come and give us your view on this matter.

参半
参半[cān bàn] 各占一半 half; half-and-half：疑信参半 half believing, half doubting; wavering between belief and doubt

参合
参合[cān hé]〈书 fml.〉参考并综合 consult and sum up：参合其要 draw on the essence of sth.本书参合了有关资料写成。This book was written after consulting and summing up relevant materials.

参商
参商[shēn shāng]〈书 fml.〉1.参和商都是二十八宿之一，两者不同时在天空中出现 shen and shang, two of the 28 constellations that never appear in the sky at the same time;〈比喻 fig.〉亲友不能会面 friends or relatives who are always separated and can never meet 2.〈比喻 fig.〉感情不和睦 estranged and irreconcilable

参天
参天[cān tiān]（树木等）高耸在天空中 (of trees, etc.) reach to the sky; tower：古柏参天 old cypress reaching high up to the sky参天大树 towering tree

参展
参展[cān zhǎn] 参加展览 join in an exhibition (or show)：参展单位 participant in an exhibition参展的商品有一千余种。There are over a thousand kinds of merchandise on display in the exhibition.

参差
参差[cēn cī]1.长短、高低、大小不齐；不一致 different in length, height or size; uneven; not uniform：水平参差不齐 at different levels 2.〈书 fml.〉大约；几乎 nearly; almost：参差是 almost true; almost so 3.〈书 fml.〉差错；蹉跎 go wrong; be delayed; waste time; idle away：佳期参差。The wedding was delayed.

参战
参战[cān zhàn] 参加战争或战斗 enter a war; take part in a battle：参战国 belligerent state参战部队 combat troops

参拍
参拍[cān pāi]1.（物品）参加拍卖 (of goods) be auctioned; be put up for auction：一批在海外收藏多年的书画作品近日回国参拍。A batch of calligraphic works and paintings that have been part of an overseas collection for many years are soon to be brought back to China and put up for auction. 2.参加拍摄 (motion-picture making) join the shooting crew; play a part：这部影片有多名影星参拍。Several film stars are to act in this film.

参拜
参拜[cān bài] 以一定的礼节进见敬重的人或瞻仰敬重的人的遗像、陵墓等 pay a formal call to a respected person; pay homage to the portrait or tomb of a respected person：大礼参拜 present oneself to sb. ceremoniously参拜孔庙 pay homage to Confucius' Temple

参政
参政[cān zhèng] 指参与政治活动或参加政治机构 participate in political activities or join a political organization

参数
参数[cān shù]1.方程中可以在某一范围内变化的数，当此数取得一定值时，就可以得到该方程所代表的图形。如在方程 x2 +y2 =r2 中，当r取得一定值时，就可以画出该方程所代表的圆，r就是圆周的参数。parameter; a variable within certain limits in an equation, whose values determine the figure the equation expresses. For example, in the equation x2 +y2 =r2 , when r, the parameter, takes on a certain value, the circle this equation expresses can be drawn.亦 also 参变数 cānbiànshù 2.表明任何现象、机构、装置的某一种性质的量，如导电率、导热率、膨胀系数等 quantity whose value characterizes any phenomenon, organization or apparatus, e.g., electric conductivity, thermal conductivity, coefficient of expansion, etc.

参校
参校[cān jiào]1.为别人所著的书做校订的工作 modify; proof (a book written by another person) 2.一部书有两种或几种本子，拿一种做底本，参考其他本子，加以校订 check different versions of a book against a master copy

参照
参照[cān zhào]参考并仿照（方法、经验等）consult (a method, experience, etc.) and follow suit：参照执行 carry out by following the example of sth.

参看
参看[cān kàn]1.读一篇文章时参考另一篇 refer to; read another article for reference：那篇报告写得很好，可以参看。The report is well written, and can be used as a reference. 2.文章注释用语，指示读者看了此处后再看其他有关部分 see (used in notes of articles), referring the reader to other relevant parts of an article

参禅
参禅[cān chán] 佛教徒静坐冥想领会佛理叫参禅 (of Buddhists) sit in deep meditation to attain Buddhist truths：参禅悟道 meditate on and gain an understanding of truth

参考
参考[cān kǎo]1.为了学习或研究而查阅有关资料 consult (relevant material for the purpose of study or research); read sth. for reference; refer to：参考书 reference book作者写这本书，参考了几十种书刊。To write this book, the author consulted scores of books and periodicals. 2.利用有关材料帮助了解情况 refer to; look at sth. for information：仅供参考 for reference only 3. 同 same as 参看 cānkàn ②

参考系
参考系[cān kǎo xì] 为确定物体的位置和描述其运动而被选作标准的另一物体或物体系 reference system; reference frame; object or framework relative to which positions and movements of another object are measured亦 also 参照系 cānzhàoxì 或 or 参照物 cānzhàowù

参股
参股[cān gǔ] 入股 become a shareholder; buy shares

参见
参见1[cān jiàn] 同 same as 参看 cānkàn ②（多用于书或文章的注解 usu. used in references）参见2[cān jiàn] 以一定礼节进见；谒见 pay respects to (a superior, etc.)：参见师父 pay respects to one's master

参观
参观[cān guān]实地观察（工作成绩、事业、设施、名胜古迹等）visit; observe (work achievements, what have been accomplished, facilities, places of interest, etc.)：参观团 visiting group参观游览 visit places of interest; go sightseeing参观工厂 visit a factory谢绝参观 visitors not admitted

参订
参订[cān dìng] 参校订正 proofread and correct：这部书由张先生编次，王先生参订。Mr. Zhang collocated the book, and Mr. Wang proofread it.

参议
参议[cān yì]1.〈书 fml.〉参与谋议 participate in consultation; counsel; advise：参议国事 participate in consultation on state affairs 2.官名。明代在布政使、通政使司下设参议一职，清代通政使司下也设参议。民国时期参议多为闲职。official position, which was under the Provincial Administration Commissioner and Office of Transmission during the Ming Dynasty and under the Office of Transmission during the Qing Dynasty. The position became mostly nominal during the period of Republic of China (1912-1949).

参议院
参议院[cān yì yuàn] 某些国家两院制议会的上议院 senate; upper house of the legislature in some countries

参评
参评[cān píng] 参加评比、评选或评定 submit sth. for public appraisal, competition, or selection：参评影片 film nominated for public appraisal参评人员将统一进行外语考试。All the nominated candidates will take a uniformed foreign language test.住宅设计评比共有二十个方案参评。A total of 20 designs have been nominated to compete for the housing design awards.

参详
参详[cān xiáng] 详细地观察、研究 study; ponder over; think over; contemplate：参详了半天，忽有所悟 suddenly understand after much contemplation我先把拟订的计划摆出来，请同志们参详。Please study this plan I've drawn up.

参谋
参谋[cān móu]1.军队中参与指挥部队行动、制定作战计划的干部 staff officer whose job is to assist a commanding officer in directing the troops and making war plans 2.泛指代人出主意 gen. give advice; advise; suggest：这事该怎么办，你给参谋一下。Could you advise me on this matter? 3.指代出主意的人 adviser; counsellor; consultant; one who gives advice：他给你当参谋。Let him be your consultant.

参谒
参谒[cān yè] 进见尊敬的人；瞻仰尊敬的人的遗像、陵墓等 pay one's respects to; pay homage to a respected deceased person (before his or her tomb or portrait)：参谒黄帝陵 pay homage to the Yellow Emperor at his tomb

参赛
参赛[cān sài] 参加比赛 participate in a match or contest：参赛作品 work of a contestant参赛选手 contestant取消参赛资格 debar; disqualify; expel

参赞
参赞[cān zàn]1.使馆的组成人员之一，是外交代表的主要助理人。外交代表不在时，一般都由参赞以临时代办名义暂时代理使馆事务。counsellor; chargé d'affaires; official of an embassy, a major assistant to a diplomatic representative and may act in the latter's place during his absence 2.〈书 fml.〉参与协助 assist; aid：参赞军务 assist in military affairs参赞朝政 assist in affairs of state

参透
参透[cān tòu]看透；透彻领会（道理、奥秘等）see through; perceive; make out; penetrate (truth, mystery, etc.)：参不透 cannot make out参透禅理 fully understand the truth of Buddhist tenets参透机关（看穿阴谋或秘密）see through a trick (a scheme or secret)

参酌
参酌[cān zhuó] 参考实际情况，加以斟酌 consider (a matter) in light of actual conditions; deliberate：参酌处理 handle (a matter) in light of the reality参酌具体情况，制订工作计划 formulate a work plan in light of the specific conditions

参量
参量[cān liàng]数值可以在一定范围内变化的量。当这个量取不同数值时，反映出不同的状态或性能。parameter; quantity as a variable within certain limits, whose value determines the state or characteristics of sth.

参错
参错[cēn cuò]〈书 fml.〉1.参差交错 interlock; crisscross：阡陌纵横参错 labyrinth of footpaths between fields 2.错误脱漏 errors and omissions：传(zhuàn)注参错 errors and omissions in the commentaries on classics

参阅
参阅[cān yuè] 同 same as 参看 cānkàn：写这篇论文，参阅了大量的图书资料。To write this paper, (I) consulted a lot of books and materials.

参预
参预[cān yù] 同 same as 参与 cānyù

参验
参验[cān yàn] 考察检验；比较验证 investigate and check; compare and verify

叆
叆[ài]（ㄞˋ）（靉）[叆叇] (àidài)〈书 fml.〉形容浓云蔽日 overcast; enveloped in cloud：暮云叆。The dusky sky is enshrouded in clouds.

叇
叇[dài]（ㄉㄞˋ）（靆）另见  [叆叇] (àidài)

又
又[yòu]（ㄧㄡˋ）〈副词 adv.〉1.表示重复或继续 [indicating repetition or continuation] again：他拿着这封信看了又看。He took the letter and read it again and again.人类社会的生产活动，是一步又一步地由低级向高级发展。The production activities of the human society develop step by step from a lower stage to a higher stage. 2.表示几种情况或性质同时存在 [indicating the simultaneous existence of more than one situation or property]: (a)单用 [used singly]：五四运动是反帝国主义的运动，又是反封建的运动。The May 4th Movement was an anti-imperialist movement, and an anti-feudal one at that. (b)连用 [used successively]：又快又好 quick and good又香又脆 sweet and crisp 3.表示意思上更进一层 [indicating a progress in meaning]：冬季日短，又是阴天，夜色早已笼罩了整个市镇。The winter day is short, and moreover, it was overcast, so the whole town had already been shrouded in darkness. 4.表示在某个范围之外有所补充 [indicating an addition to a given scope]：生活费之外，又发给五十块钱做零用 give 50 yuan as pocket money in addition to the daily allowance 5.表示整数之外再加零数 [indicating an odd number in addition to a whole number]：一又二分之一 one and a half 6.表示有矛盾的两件事情（多叠用 oft. used reiteratively）[indicating two contradictory things]：她又想去，又想不去，拿不定主意。She hesitated over whether she would go or not. 7.表示转折，有‘可是’的意思 [indicating a turn of meaning like‘but’]：刚才有个事儿要问你，这会儿又想不起来了。I just wanted to ask you about something, but can't remember it for the moment. 8.用在否定句或反问句里，加强语气 [used in a negative sentence or a rhetorical question to add emphasis]：我又不是客人，还用你老陪着吗？I'm not a guest. Why should you keep me company all the time?相关词组玄之又玄 | 赔了夫人又折兵 | 一波未平，一波又起又及

又及
又及[yòu jí]附带再提一下。信写完并已署名后又添上几句，往往在这几句话下面注明‘又及’或‘某某又及’。postscript (PS); also put as 某某又及 mǒumǒu yòují（某某 should be replaced by the writer's name）

叉
叉[chā]（ㄔㄚ）1.一端有两个以上的长齿而另一端有柄的器具 instrument with a handle at one end and two or more pointed prongs at the other; fork：钢叉 steel fork鱼叉 harpoon吃西餐用刀叉。Knives and forks are used when having a Western-style meal. 2.用叉取东西 operate with a fork; fork：叉鱼 spear fish; harpoon fish 3.（叉儿 chār）叉形符号‘×’，一般用来标志错误的或作废的事物 ×- mark to show sth. is wrong or to be deleted; cross out另见  chá, chǎ and chà叉[chá]（ㄔㄚˊ）〈方 dial.〉挡住；卡住 block (up); jam：车辆叉住了路口，过不去了。Traffic was blocked at the crossroads and we couldn't get through.另见  chā, chǎ and chà叉[chǎ]（ㄔㄚˇ）分开成叉(chā)形 separate so as to form a fork; spread apart：叉着腿 stand with legs apart另见  chā, chá and chà叉[chà]（ㄔㄚˋ）另见  排叉儿 páichàr and 劈叉 pǐchà另见  chā, chá and chǎ相关词组交叉 | 劈叉 | 药叉 | 夜叉 | 音叉 | 排叉儿 | 仰八叉 | 三叉神经 | 环形交叉 | 立体交叉 | 平面交叉叉车 | 叉烧 | 叉腰 | 叉子

叉子
叉子[chā zi] 小叉 fork

叉烧
叉烧[chā shāo] 烤肉的一种方法，把腌渍后的瘦猪肉挂在特制的叉子上，放入炉内烧烤。也有把腌渍过的肉过油后再烧烤的 a way of cooking meat by hanging marinated lean pork on special hooks and roasting in an oven; also first frying marinated meat and then roasting; grilled or barbecued (marinated pork)：叉烧肉 grilled pork

叉腰
叉腰[chā yāo] 大拇指和其余四指分开，紧按在腰旁 with hands on hips and thumbs apart from other fingers：两手叉腰站在那里 stand with arms akimbo

叉车
叉车[chā chē] 铲运车 forklift

及
及1[jí]（ㄐㄧˊ）1.达到 reach; amount to：波及 impact; exert an impact on普及 popularize及格 pass an exam, a test, etc.目力所及 as far as the eye can see由表及里 (analyze or dissect matter) from external to internal将及十载。Nearly a decade has passed. 2.赶上 be in time for：及时 timely及早 as soon as possible望尘莫及 trail too far behind to catch up 3.比得上 match：论学习，我不及他。In study I am no comparison with him. 4.〈书 fml.〉推及；顾及 take into account; take care of：老吾老，以及人之老。I care for other people's elders as I care for my own.攻其一点，不及其余 attack sb. for a minor fault while ignoring his or her strengths 5.(Jí) 姓 a surname及2[jí]（ㄐㄧˊ）〈连词 conj.〉连接并列的名词或名词性词组 [connect juxtaposed nouns or noun phrases] and; as well as：图书、仪器、标本及其他 books, instruments, samples and other things注意 NOTE：用‘及’连接的成分多在意义上有主次之分，主要的成分放在‘及’的前面。The character 及 is used to join two or more nouns, with the one following it subordinate in meaning.相关词组比及 | 遍及 | 波及 | 不及 | 齿及 | 触及 | 顾及 | 惠及 | 累及 | 料及 | 旁及 | 普及 | 企及 | 涉及 | 推及 | 危及 | 无及 | 以及 | 又及 | 普及本 | 赶不及 | 赶得及 | 来不及 | 来得及 | 殃及池鱼 | 爱屋及乌 | 猝不及防 | 迫不及待 | 推己及人 | 言不及义 | 鞭长莫及 | 措手不及 | 过犹不及 | 力所能及 | 噬脐莫及 | 望尘莫及 | 愚不可及 | 迅雷不及掩耳 | 风马牛不相及 | 有过之无不及 | 城门失火，殃及池鱼及第 | 及格 | 及冠 | 及笄 | 及龄 | 及门 | 及时 | 及早 | 及至 | 及时雨

及冠
及冠[jí guàn]〈书 fml.〉指男子年满二十岁，到了成年 (of a young man) come of age（冠 guan：古代男子二十岁举行冠礼，戴上成年人戴的帽子 In ancient China, when a man turned 20, a ceremony would be held to crown him with the hat only an adult was entitled to wear.）

及早
及早[jí zǎo] 趁早 at an early date; before it is too late：生了病要及早治。When you are ill, see the doctor as soon as possible.

及时
及时[jí shí]1.正赶上时候，适合需要 timely; in time：及时雨 timely rain; timely help及时播种 sow in good time 2.不拖延；马上；立刻 promptly; without delay：有问题就及时解决。Problems should be solved when and where they occur.

及时雨
及时雨[jí shí yǔ]1.指在农作物需要雨水时下的雨 timely rain：这场及时雨缓解了旱情。It rained just in time to alleviate the draught. 2.〈比喻 fig.〉能在紧急关头解救危难的人或事物 help rendered in the nick of time; timely help

及格
及格[jí gé]（考试成绩）达到规定的最低标准 pass; pass a test, examination, etc.

及笄
及笄[jí jī]〈书 fml.〉指女子年满十五岁 ( of a girl) come of age（笄 ji：束发用的簪子。古时女子满十五岁把头发绾起来，戴上簪子 In ancient China girls at 15 began to wear their hair bound up and held in place by a pin.）

及第
及第[jí dì] 科举时代考试中选。特指考取进士，明清两代只用于殿试前三名 pass the imperial examination, esp. the palace examination which came up with only three successful candidates during the Ming and Qing dynasties：状元及第 become the Number-One Scholar in the palace examination

及至
及至[jí zhì]〈连词 conj.〉表示等到出现某种情况 up to; until：及至上了岸，才知道是个荒岛。We did not know it was a barren isle until we went ashore.

及门
及门[jí mén]〈书 fml.〉正式拜师求学的 come under the tutelage of a teacher：及门弟子 disciple directly taught by a master及门之士 scholar who has finished his studies under a private tutor

及龄
及龄[jí líng] 达到规定的年龄 reach an eligible age：及龄儿童已全部入学。All the school-age children are attending school.

友
友[yǒu]（ㄧㄡˇ）1.朋友 friend：好友 good (or great) friend战友 comrade-in-arms 2.相好；亲近 friendly：友爱 friendship友好 friendly 3.有友好关系的 having friendly relations：友人 friend友邦 friendly nation (or country)友军 friendly army相关词组笔友 | 病友 | 窗友 | 工友 | 故友 | 会友 | 僚友 | 卖友 | 盟友 | 密友 | 幕友 | 难友 | 腻友 | 朋友 | 票友 | 契友 | 亲友 | 网友 | 畏友 | 校友 | 学友 | 益友 | 战友 | 诤友 | 知友 | 执友 | 挚友 | 发烧友 | 够朋友 | 小朋友 | 狐朋狗友 | 酒肉朋友 | 良师益友友爱 | 友邦 | 友好 | 友军 | 友情 | 友人 | 友善 | 友谊 | 友谊赛

友人
友人[yǒu rén] 朋友 friend：国际友人 foreign friend

友军
友军[yǒu jūn] 与本部队协同作战的部队 friendly forces; friendly army

友善
友善[yǒu shàn]〈书 fml.〉朋友之间亲近和睦 friendly; amicable：素相友善 have always been amicable and friendly友善相处 live together amicably

友好
友好[yǒu hǎo]1.好朋友 close friend; friend：生前友好 friends of the deceased 2.亲近和睦 friendly; amicable：团结友好 fraternal unity; unity and friendship友好邻邦 friendly neighbouring country

友情
友情[yǒu qíng] 朋友的感情；友谊 friendly sentiments; friendship：深厚的友情 profound friendship

友爱
友爱[yǒu ài] 友好亲爱 friendly affection; fraternal love：兄弟友爱 fraternal affection团结友爱 fraternal unity

友谊
友谊[yǒu yì] 朋友间的交情 friendship：深厚的友谊 profound friendship

友谊赛
友谊赛[yǒu yì sài] 为了增进友谊、交流经验、提高技术而举行的体育比赛 friendly match; match for enhancing friendship, exchanging experience and improving skills

友邦
友邦[yǒu bāng] 友好的国家 friendly nation (or country)

双
双[shuāng]（ㄕㄨㄤ）（雙、）1.两个（多为对称的，跟‘单’相对 as opposed to ‘single’）two; both; dual：双翅 both wings举双手赞成 hold up both hands for consent男女双方 both the female and male sides 2.〈量词 classifier〉用于成对的东西 pair：一双鞋 a pair of shoes一双手 a pair of hands买双袜子 buy a pair of socks 3.偶数的（跟‘单’相对 as opposed to ‘odd’）even：双数 even numbers双号 even numbers 4.加倍的 double; twofold：双料 extra quality双份 twice as much; double the amount 5.(Shuāng) 姓 a surname相关词组无双 | 福无双至 | 娑罗双树 | 一箭双雕双边 | 双打 | 双方 | 双杠 | 双关 | 双轨 | 双簧 | 双料 | 双抢 | 双亲 | 双全 | 双生 | 双声 | 双数 | 双双 | 双喜 | 双响 | 双向 | 双薪 | 双星 | 双赢 | 双语 | 双重 | 双绉 | 双棒儿 | 双胞胎 | 双宾语 | 双唇音 | 双轨制 | 双簧管 | 双肩挑 | 双人舞 | 双身子 | 双休日 | 双眼皮 | 双鱼座 | 双月刊 | 双职工 | 双子座 | 双管齐下 | 双重国籍 | 双重人格

双亲
双亲[shuāng qīn] 指父亲和母亲 (both) parents; father and mother

双人舞
双人舞[shuāng rén wǔ] 由两个人表演的舞蹈，可以单独表演，也可以是舞剧或集体舞中的一个部分 pas de deux; dance for two performers, which can compose an integral performance, or part of a dance drama or collective dance

双休日
双休日[shuāng xiū rì] 实行每周五天工作制时，每周连续的两个休息日叫双休日（一般为星期六、星期日 usu. Saturday and Sunday）weekend; two successive days off of the five-workday system

双全
双全[shuāng quán] 成对的或相称(chèn)的两方面都具备 complete in both respects; possessing both：文武双全 be well versed in both literary and martial arts父母双全。Both parents are still alive.

双关
双关[shuāng guān] 用词造句时表面上是一个意思，而暗中隐藏着另一个意思 pun; use of a word in such a way as to express one meaning on the surface while hiding another：一语双关 make a pun

双双
双双[shuāng shuāng] 成双成对的 in pairs：我男、女乒乓球队双双获得冠军。Both our men's and women's ping-pong teams won the championship.

双向
双向[shuāng xiàng]指双方互相（进行某种活动）two-way; bidirectional：双向贸易 two-way trade双向服务 two-way service双向选择 two-way decision

双响
双响[shuāng xiǎng]（～儿 shuāngxiǎngr）一种爆竹，火药分装两截，点燃下截后发一声，升到空中后上截爆炸，又发一声。有的地区也叫二踢脚或两响。double-bang firecracker (which goes off twice, once on the ground and then again in the air); also called 二踢脚 èrtījiǎo or 两响 liǎngxiǎng in some regions

双唇音
双唇音[shuāng chún yīn] 双唇紧闭或接近发出的辅音，如普通话语音中的 b, p, m bilabial; consonant formed by closure or near closure of the lips, e.g. p, b, m in putonghua pronunciation

双喜
双喜[shuāng xǐ] 两件喜事（多指同时发生的 oft. simultaneous）double happiness：双喜临门。A double blessing has descended upon the house.

双声
双声[shuāng shēng] 两个字或几个字的声母相同叫双声，例如‘公告 gōnggào、方法 fāngfǎ’ alliterative compound; compound consisting of two or more characters with the same initial consonant, e.g. 公告 gōnggào and 方法 fāngfǎ

双子座
双子座[shuāng zǐ zuò] 黄道十二星座之一 Gemini, one of the 12 signs of the zodiac另见  黄道十二宫 huángdào shí'èrgōng

双宾语
双宾语[shuāng bīn yǔ]某些动词能带两个宾语，一般是一个宾语指人，另一个宾语指事物，如‘我问你一句话’。指人的一个（‘你’）靠近动词，叫做近宾语；指事物的一个（‘一句话’）离动词较远，叫做远宾语。double object; two objects following a verb, usu. one object referring to person while the other referring to things, e.g. ‘I'm asking you a question’ (‘you’ is closer to the verb, so it is called the near object; while ‘a question’ is farther from the verb, so it is the far object)

双打
双打[shuāng dǎ] 某些球类比赛的一种方式，由每组两人的两组对打，如乒乓球、羽毛球、网球等都可以双打 doubles; a certain way of playing games (e.g. tennis, badminton, ping-pong, etc.), in which two pairs of players compete with each other

双抢
双抢[shuāng qiǎng] 指抢收、抢种 rush-harvesting and rush-planting

双数
双数[shuāng shù] 正的偶数 positive even number

双料
双料[shuāng liào]（～儿 shuāngliàor）制造物品用的材料比通常的同类物品加倍，多用于比喻 of reinforced material; (usu. fig.) extra quality：双料搪瓷盆 double-enamelled basin双料冠军 double gold medalist

双方
双方[shuāng fāng] 在某一件事情上相对的两个人或集体 both sides; two parties; two persons or groups in opposition to each other on some matter：男女双方 both the female and male sides缔约国双方 both signatory states

双星
双星[shuāng xīng]1.两个距离很近或彼此之间有引力关系的恒星叫做双星。用肉眼或望远镜能分清是两个星的叫做视双星；用分光的方法才能分清的叫做分光双星。双星中较亮的一颗叫主星，另一颗围绕主星旋转，叫伴星。double star; two stars that are very close or that gravitate towards each other. Those that can be observed with the naked eye or a telescope are known as visual double stars, while those that can only be distinguished by their spectrum are known as spectroscopic double stars. The brighter of the double stars is called the primary star, while the other, rotating around the primary star, is the companion star. 2.指牛郎和织女两颗星 Altair and Vega

双月刊
双月刊[shuāng yuè kān] 两个月出版一次的刊物 bimonthly; publication that is published every two months

双杠
双杠[shuāng gàng]1.体操器械的一种。用两根木杠平行地固定在木制或铁制的架上构成。parallel bars; a pair of wooden bars fixed horizontally parallel on a wooden or iron rack, and used in gymnastics 2.男子竞技体操项目之一，运动员在双杠上做各种动作 men's gymnastics event in which gymnasts execute different movements on parallel bars

双棒儿
双棒儿[shuāng bàng r]〈方 dial.〉双胞胎 twins

双生
双生[shuāng shēng] 孪(luán)生的通称 general term for 孪生 luánshēng

双眼皮
双眼皮[shuāng yǎn pí]（～儿 shuāngyǎnpír）沿着下缘有一条褶儿的上眼皮 double eyelids

双管齐下
双管齐下[shuāng guǎn qí xià] 本指画画时两管笔同时并用 paint a picture with two brushes at the same time;〈比喻 fig.〉两方面同时进行 work along two lines

双簧
双簧[shuāng huáng]1.曲艺的一种，一人表演动作，一人藏在后面或说或唱，互相配合 shuanghuang; two-man show, with one acting in pantomime and the other hiding behind doing all the speaking or singing 2.〈比喻 fig.〉一方出面、一方背后操纵的活动 collaboration, with one performing in view while the other manipulates things behind the scene║亦 also 双 shuānghuáng

双簧管
双簧管[shuāng huáng guǎn] 管乐器，由嘴子、管身和喇叭口三部分构成，嘴子上装有双簧片 oboe; double-reed woodwind instrument, composed of a double-reed mouthpiece, a tube, and a flared opening

双绉
双绉[shuāng zhòu]一种表面有绉纹的织物，常用生丝织成。质地柔软坚牢，主要用于妇女衣着。cr?pe de Chine; soft fabric with crinkles on the surface, usu. woven with raw silk and used as material for womenswear

双职工
双职工[shuāng zhí gōng] 指夫妻二人都参加工作的职工 husband and wife both working; working couple

双肩挑
双肩挑[shuāng jiān tiāo]〈比喻 fig.〉一个人在同一部门同时担任业务和行政两种工作 (of a person) shoulder both operations and administration in the same department：他在厂里既是厂长，又是工程师，是个双肩挑干部。He is not only the manager but also an engineer at the factory.

双胞胎
双胞胎[shuāng bāo tāi] 同一胎内两个婴儿；两人同一胎出生 twins; two babies born at the same time

双薪
双薪[shuāng xīn] 加倍的工资 double pay：发双薪 pay double salary

双语
双语[shuāng yǔ] 同时使用两种语言的 bilingual; using two languages simultaneously：双语教育 bilingual education双语词典 bilingual dictionary

双赢
双赢[shuāng yíng] 双方都能得益 win-win situation; both sides benefit：本着平等互利的精神，谈判取得双赢的结果。The talks ended with win-win results in the spirit of equality and mutual benefit.

双身子
双身子[shuāng shēn zi] 指孕妇 pregnant woman

双轨
双轨[shuāng guǐ] 有两组轨道的复线 double track

双轨制
双轨制[shuāng guǐ zhì] 指两种不同体制并行的制度 double-track system; two-tiered system：某些物资实行国家定价和市场调节的双轨制。Some goods were tagged with dual prices - a state-fixed price, and a price to be regulated by the market.

双边
双边[shuāng biān] 由两个方面参加的；特指由两个国家参加的 bilateral; involving two parties, esp. two countries：双边会谈 bilateral talks双边条约 bilateral treaty双边贸易 bilateral trade

双重
双重[shuāng chóng] 两层；两方面（多用于抽象事物 usu. used for sth. abstract）double; dual; two-sided：双重领导 dual leadership双重任务 double task

双重人格
双重人格[shuāng chóng rén gé] 指一个人兼有的两种互相对立的身份、品质或态度（含贬义 derog.）dual personality; (of a person) having two opposite identities, personalities, or attitudes

双重国籍
双重国籍[shuāng chóng guó jí] 指一个人同时具有两个国家的国籍 dual nationality; (of a person) possessing the citizenship of two countries at the same time

双鱼座
双鱼座[shuāng yú zuò] 黄道十二星座之一 Pisces, one of the 12 signs of the zodiac另见  黄道十二宫 huángdào shí'èrgōng

反
反[fǎn]（ㄈㄢˇ）1.颠倒的；方向相背的（跟‘正’相对 as opposed to‘obverse’）in reverse; in an opposite direction：适得其反。The result is quite the opposite.绒衣穿反了 wear one's sweat shirt inside out (or the wrong side out) 2.（对立面）转换；翻过来 reverse; (of the opposite side) turn over：易如反掌 as easy as turning over one's palm反败为胜 turn defeat into victory; turn the tide物极必反。Things turn into their opposite when they reach the extreme. 3.回；还 return; counter：反光 reflection of light反攻 counter-offensive; counter-attack反问 retort; answer (a question) with question 4.反抗；反对 oppose; combat; be against：反霸 oppose hegemonism反封建 oppose feudalism; be anti-feudal反法西斯 fight against fascism; anti-fascist struggle 5.背叛 rebel; revolt：反叛 revolt; rebel; defect官逼民反。Oppressive governments drive the people to revolt. 6.指反革命、反动派 counter-revolutionaries; reactionaries：镇反 suppress counter-revolutionaries有反必肃。Every counter-revolutionary must be eliminated. 7.类推 analogize; reason by analogy：举一反三 draw inferences from one example 8.反而；相反地 instead; on the contrary：他遇到困难，不但没有气馁，反更坚强起来。Instead of being discouraged in the face of difficulties, he became stronger. 9.用在反切后头，表示前两字是注音用的反切。如‘塑，桑故反’。used after a fanqie in which the two preceding characters are used to indicate the pronunciation of another one (e.g. the pronunciation of 塑 sù is indicated as 桑故反 sāng gù fǎn, meaning the combination of the consonant s in 桑 sāng and the vowel u in 故 gù)另见  反切 fǎnqiè相关词组策反 | 谋反 | 逆反 | 跑反 | 平反 | 逃反 | 违反 | 相反 | 造反 | 镇反 | 唱反调 | 核反应 | 逆反应 | 相反数 | 正反应 | 沸反盈天 | 核反应堆 | 相反相成 | 一反常态 | 拨乱反正 | 出尔反尔 | 高山反应 | 化学反应 | 角弓反张 | 举一反三 | 连锁反应 | 热核反应 | 条件反射 | 义无反顾 | 易如反掌 | 辗转反侧 | 适得其反 | 物极必反 | 一隅三反 | 原子反应堆 | 非条件反射反把 | 反霸 | 反绑 | 反比 | 反驳 | 反哺 | 反侧 | 反差 | 反常 | 反超 | 反衬 | 反刍 | 反串 | 反弹 | 反倒 | 反动 | 反对 | 反而 | 反方 | 反讽 | 反复 | 反感 | 反戈 | 反攻 | 反观 | 反光 | 反话 | 反悔 | 反击 | 反间 | 反剪 | 反诘 | 反抗 | 反口 | 反馈 | 反面 | 反目 | 反派 | 反叛 | 反扑 | 反潜 | 反切 | 反射 | 反身 | 反省 | 反噬 | 反手 | 反水 | 反思 | 反诉 | 反锁 | 反调 | 反胃 | 反问 | 反诬 | 反响 | 反咬 | 反应 | 反映 | 反语 | 反照 | 反正 | 反证 | 反之 | 反坐 | 反比例 | 反冲力 | 反动派 | 反对党 | 反革命 | 反光灯 | 反季节 | 反粒子 | 反批评 | 反潜机 | 反倾销 | 反物质 | 反义词 | 反应堆 | 反映论 | 反证法 | 反作用 | 反唇相讥 | 反腐倡廉 | 反攻倒算 | 反躬自问 | 反客为主 | 反面人物 | 反求诸己 | 反坦克炮 | 反其道而行之 | 反厄尔尼诺现象

反串
反串[fǎn chuàn] 戏曲演员临时扮演自己行当以外的角色 (of an opera actor) take on a role outside one's specialty

反义词
反义词[fǎn yì cí] 意义相反的词，如‘高’和‘低’、‘好’和‘坏’、‘成功’和‘失败’ antonym; word opposite in meaning to another word, e.g.‘tall’and‘short’,‘good’and‘bad’, and‘success’and‘failure’

反之
反之[fǎn zhī] 与此相反；反过来说或反过来做 otherwise; whereas; on the contrary

反作用
反作用[fǎn zuò yòng]1.承受作用力的物体对于施力的物体的作用。反作用力和作用力的大小相等，方向相反，并在同一条直线上。reaction; reciprocal action of an object subjected to a force. Every action has an equal and opposite reaction in the same straight line. 2.相反的作用 reaction effect; counterreaction; retroaction：填鸭式的教学方法只能起反作用。A cramming (or force-feeding) method of teaching can only be counter-productive.

反侧
反侧[fǎn cè]〈书 fml.〉1.（身体）翻来覆去，形容睡卧不安 (of one's body) toss and turn; toss from side to side; sleep uneasily：辗转反侧 toss about in bed; toss and turn 2.不顺从；不安定 defiant; disobedient; insubordinate：反侧之民 rebellious people 3.反复无常 changeable; capricious; unpredictable：天命反侧。The will of God is unpredictable.

反倒
反倒[fǎn dào] 反而 instead; on the contrary：让他走慢点儿，他反倒加快了脚步。Instead of walking more slowly as told, he actually quickened his pace.好心帮助他，反倒落下许多埋怨。Our well-intentioned efforts to help him actually created more complaints.

反倾销
反倾销[fǎn qīng xiāo] 国际贸易中，为保护本国利益，用高额征税的办法反对外国向本国倾销商品 anti-dumping. To protect its interests in international trade, a country levies heavy taxes on foreign goods being dumped on the home market.

反光
反光[fǎn guāng]1.使光线反射 reflect light：反光镜 reflector白墙反光，屋里显得很敞亮。The reflection from the white walls makes the room look bright and spacious. 2.反射的光线 reflection of light：雪地上的反光让人睁不开眼。Reflection from the snow on the ground dazzled me.

反光灯
反光灯[fǎn guāng dēng] 利用反光镜把强烈的光线集中照射的灯，主要用在舞台或高大建筑物上 reflector lamp, which uses reflectors to focus light, usu. used on the stage or on high buildings

反其道而行之
反其道而行之[fǎn qí dào ér xíng zhī]采取跟对方相反的办法行事（见于《史记·淮阴侯列传》）act in a diametrically opposite way; do exactly the opposite. The phrase originated in the Records of the Historian·Biography of Marquis of Huaiyin.

反冲力
反冲力[fǎn chōng lì] 与冲力方向相反的作用力 recoil; reactive force in the opposite direction of an applied force

反击
反击[fǎn jī] 回击 counter-attack; strike back; beat back：反击战 campaign to counter-attack奋起反击 launch a counter-attack

反切
反切[fǎn qiè]我国传统的一种注音方法，用两个字来注另一个字的音，例如‘塑，桑故切（或桑故反）’。被切字的声母跟反切上字相同（‘塑’字声母跟‘桑’字声母相同，都是s），被切字的韵母和字调跟反切下字相同（‘塑’字的韵母和字调跟‘故’相同，都是u韵母，都是去声）。fanqie; traditional method of marking the pronunciation of a Chinese character by using two other characters, the first having the same consonant as the given character and the second having the same vowel and tone. For example, the pronunciation of 塑 sù is indicated as 桑故切 sāng gù qiè (also 桑故反 sāng gù fǎn), meaning a combination of the consonants in 桑 sāng and the vowel u in 故 gù, which is also in the falling tone.

反刍
反刍[fǎn chú]1.偶蹄类的某些动物把粗粗咀嚼后咽下去的食物再反回到嘴里细细咀嚼，然后再咽下 ruminate; (of some artiodactyls) regurgitate coarsely masticated food from the stomach, chew it again more finely before swallowing once more； 通称 popularly called 倒嚼 dǎojiào 2.〈比喻 fig.〉对过去的事物反复地追忆、回味 mull over past events

反剪
反剪[fǎn jiǎn] 两手交叉地放在背后或绑在背后 have one's hands placed or tied behind one's back

反动
反动[fǎn dòng]1.指思想上或行动上维护旧制度，反对进步，反对革命 (of one's mind or action) safeguarding the old system and opposing progress and revolution：反动阶级 reactionary class思想反动 reactionary thinking 2.相反的作用 reaction：从历史来看，党八股是对于五四运动的一个反动。From an historical perspective, stereotyped Party writing was in fact a reaction to the May 4th Movement.

反动派
反动派[fǎn dòng pài] 反对进步、反对革命事业的集团或分子 reactionaries; group or elements opposing progress and the revolutionary cause

反厄尔尼诺现象
反厄尔尼诺现象[fǎn è ěr ní nuò xiàn xiàng]另见  拉尼娜现象 lānínà xiànxiàng

反叛
反叛[fǎn pàn] 叛变；背叛 rebel; revolt; betray：反叛封建礼教 rebel against the feudal ethical codes反叛[fǎn pan] 叛变的人；背叛者 traitor; renegade; rebel

反口
反口[fǎn kǒu] 推翻原来说的话 go back on one's word (or promise); back out：话已说出，不能反口。Since (you) have already said it, you cannot go back on it.

反咬
反咬[fǎn yǎo]（被控告的人）诬赖控诉人、检举人、见证人 (of the accused) falsely incriminate the accuser, informant or witness：反咬一口 make a false countercharge; retort with a false countercharge

反响
反响[fǎn xiǎng] 回响；反应 echo; repercussion; response：她曾经登台演出，反响不一。She used to perform, with conflicting reviews.此事在报上披露后，在社会上引起强烈反响。The incident caused strong public repercussions after the press brought it to light.

反哺
反哺[fǎn bǔ] 传说雏乌长大后，衔食喂母乌 According to legend, a chick will feed its mother when it has grown up.〈比喻 fig.〉子女长大奉养父母 Children support and look after their parents when they grow up：反哺之情 filial piety

反唇相讥
反唇相讥[fǎn chún xiāng jī]受到指责不服气而反过来讥讽对方（《汉书·贾谊传》原作‘反唇而相稽’，稽：计较）answer back sarcastically when unconvinced by criticism, a phrase that stems from 反唇而相稽 fǎn chún ér xiāng jī in History of Han·Biography of Jia Yi；稽 jī meaning argue, dispute

反噬
反噬[fǎn shì]〈书 fml.〉反咬 trump up a countercharge against one's accuser; make a false countercharge

反坐
反坐[fǎn zuò] 指把被诬告的罪名所应得的刑罚加在诬告人身上 retaliation; retribution; sentence the accuser to the punishment facing the person he falsely accused

反坦克炮
反坦克炮[fǎn tǎn kè pào] 弹道低，直射距离大，发射速度快，配有高速穿甲弹的火炮，主要用来射击坦克和装甲车辆 anti-tank gun; gun with low ballistic path, long range and fast fire, equipped with armour-piercing shells, mainly used to attack tanks and armoured cars or vehicles； 旧称 formerly known as 防坦克炮 fángtǎnkèpào 或 or 战防炮 zhànfángpào

反复
反复[fǎn fù]1.一遍又一遍；多次重复 repeatedly; again and again; over and over：反复思考 ponder on; turn sth. over in one's mind again and again反复实践 practise repeatedly 2.颠过来倒过去；翻悔 chop and change; back out; go back on one's word：反复无常 unpredictable; capricious; change like a weathercock说一是一，说二是二，决不反复。I mean what I say and will never change my mind. 3.重复的情况 reversal; relapse; setback：斗争往往会有反复。There are often setbacks in a struggle.

反季节
反季节[fǎn jì jié] 不合当前季节的 out of season：反季节蔬菜 out-of-season vegetables反季节销售 out of season sale亦 also 反季 fǎnjì

反客为主
反客为主[fǎn kè wéi zhǔ] 客人反过来成为主人，多用来比喻变被动为主动 turn from guest to host; (fig.) turn from a passive role into an active one

反对
反对[fǎn duì] 不赞成；不同意 oppose; be against; object：反对侵略 anti-aggression; oppose invasion反对平均主义 combat egalitarianism有反对的意见没有？Are there any objections?

反对党
反对党[fǎn duì dǎng] 某些国家中的在野党 opposition party

反射
反射[fǎn shè]1.光线、声波从一种媒质进入另一种媒质时返回原媒质的现象 reflect; (of light or sound wave) revert to its original medium when entering into another 2.有机体通过神经系统，对于刺激所发生的反应，如瞳孔随光刺激的强弱而改变大小，吃东西时分泌唾液 reflective; reaction of an organism to stimuli by way of the nervous system. For example, the pupil of the eye changes size according to the intensity of light stimulus, and the mouth secretes saliva when eating.另见  条件反射 tiáojiàn fǎnshè and 非条件反射 fēitiáojiàn fǎnshè

反差
反差[fǎn chā]1.照片、底片或景物等黑白对比的差异 contrast between black and white in a photo, negative or scene 2.指人或事物优劣、美丑等方面对比的差异 contrast between good and bad, and the beautiful and the ugly in people or things：今昔对比，反差强烈。There is a striking contrast between the present and the past.

反常
反常[fǎn cháng] 跟正常的情况不同 abnormal; unusual; strange：天气反常 unusual weather态度反常 strange attitude反常现象 abnormal phenomenon反常心理 abnormal psychology

反应
反应[fǎn yìng]1.有机体受到体内或体外的刺激而引起的相应的活动 reaction; action of an organism in response to interior or exterior stimuli 2.化学反应 chemical reaction 3.打针或服药所引起的呕吐、发烧、头痛、腹痛等症状 symptom such as vomiting, fever, headache and stomach-ache as a reaction to injection or medication 4.原子核受到外力作用而发生变化 nuclear reaction; transformation of nuclei under external force：热核反应 thermonuclear reaction 5.事情所引起的意见、态度或行动 response; repercussion; reaction：他的演说引起了不同的反应。His speech elicited varying reactions.

反应堆
反应堆[fǎn yìng duī] 原子反应堆的简称 abbr. for 原子反应堆 yuánzǐ fǎnyìngduī

反弹
反弹[fǎn tán]1.压紧的弹簧弹回；运动的物体遇到障碍物后向相反的方向弹回 (of tightly compressed spring) bounce off; (of a moving object) rebound in the opposite direction after meeting an obstacle 2.〈比喻 fig.〉价格、行情回升 (of price or market conditions) rebound (after a fall)：股市反弹。The stock market rebounds.

反思
反思[fǎn sī] 思考过去的事情，从中总结经验教训 mull over past events to sum up one's experience and lessons：反思过去，是为了以后。To reflect upon the past is to do better in the future.

反悔
反悔[fǎn huǐ] 翻悔 go back on one's word (or promise)：一言为定，决不反悔。Once (I) give my word, I will never go back on it.

反感
反感[fǎn gǎn] 反对或不满的情绪 dislike; be disgusted with; be averse to：你这样说话容易引起他们的反感。Talking like that is likely to antagonize them.

反戈
反戈[fǎn gē] 掉转兵器的锋芒（进行反击），多用于比喻 turn one's weapon around (to counter-attack), oft. used in figurative way：反戈一击 turn one's weapon around to strike those who misled; cross over

反手
反手[fǎn shǒu]1.反过手来；手放到背后 turn one's hand over; have one's hand(s) behind one's back：进了屋反手把门拉上。Shut the door behind you when you enter the room. 2.形容事情容易办到 get sth. done easily：反手可得 easy to obtain

反扑
反扑[fǎn pū]（猛兽、敌人等）被打退后又扑过来 (of a beast of prey or an enemy) pounce on sb. again after being beaten off once

反批评
反批评[fǎn pī píng] 针对别人的批评做出的解释，以表达自己不同的观点（多指学术论争） counter-argument (to express one's different views, usu. in academic debates)

反把
反把[fǎn bǎ]〈方 dial.〉另见  翻把 fān∥bǎ ①

反抗
反抗[fǎn kàng] 用行动反对；抵抗 revolt or resist with action：反抗精神 rebellious spirit; spirit of revolt反抗侵略 resist invasion or aggression哪里有压迫，哪里就有反抗。Where there is oppression, there will be resistance.

反攻
反攻[fǎn gōng] 防御的一方对进攻的一方实行进攻 counter-attack; counter-offensive; (of a defensive party) launch an offensive against an attacking party

反攻倒算
反攻倒算[fǎn gōng dào suàn]指被打倒的地主阶级借反革命势力反过来打击农民，夺取经革命政权分配给农民的土地、财产等。也指被打倒的阶级敌人对群众实行打击报复。counterattack to settle old scores; retaliate; (as of the overthrown landlord class with the support of a counter-revolutionary power) launch a vindictive counter-attack against peasants to seize back the land and properties distributed to them by a revolutionary power; (as of members of an overthrown class) retaliate and take revenge on the masses

反方
反方[fǎn fāng]指辩论中对某一论断持相反意见的一方（跟‘正方’相对 as opposed to‘the proponent side’）(in a debate) con; side that holds a negative view on a topic

反映
反映[fǎn yìng]1.反照 reflect; mirror；〈比喻 fig.〉把客观事物的实质表现出来 reveal the essence of sth.：这部小说反映了现实的生活和斗争。This novel reflects real life and struggle. 2.把情况、意见等告诉上级或有关部门 report on; inform authorities or department concerned of a situation, opinions, etc.：把情况反映到县里 report the situation to county leaders他反映的意见值得重视。Opinions he reported merit attention. 3.指有机体接受和回答客观事物影响的活动过程 reaction; (of an organism) active process of receiving and responding to the impact of actual events

反映论
反映论[fǎn yìng lùn]唯物主义的认识论。辩证唯物主义的反映论认为人的感性、理性的全部认识过程都是客观世界在人脑中的反映。并认为社会实践是认识的基础和检验真理的标准，反映过程是积极的，能动的，辩证发展着的。materialist theory of knowledge. According to the dialectic materialist theory of reflection, the process of man's cognition of both perceptual and rational knowledge is entirely the reflection of the objective world on the human mind. Social practice is the foundation of knowledge and the criterion for testing truth. This process of reflection evolves actively, dynamically and dialectically.

反正
反正[fǎn zhèng]1.指复归于正道 restore things to order; put things back on the right track：拨乱反正 bring order out of chaos 2.敌方的军队或人员投到己方 (of troops or personnel) come over from the enemy's side反正[fǎn zhèng]〈副词 adv.〉1.表示情况虽然不同而结果并无区别 [used to indicate the same result in spite of different circumstances]：反正去不去都是一样。It makes no difference whether (you) go or not.不管你怎么说，反正他不答应。Whatever you say, he will not agree. 2.表示坚决肯定的语气 indicating certainty or resolution：你别着急，反正不是什么要紧的大事。Don't worry; in any event it's nothing important.

反比
反比[fǎn bǐ]1.两个事物或一事物的两个方面，一方发生变化，其另一方随之起相反的变化，如老年人随着年龄的增长，体力反而逐渐衰弱，就是反比 inverse ratio. Of two things or two aspects of the same thing, as one changes, the other changes inversely. For example, as a person's age increases, their physical strength declines. 2.把一个比的前项作为后项，后项作为前项，所构成的比和原来的比互为反比。如9:3和3:9互为反比。When exchanging the positions of the antecedent and consequent of a ratio, the resulting ratio is the reverse of the original one, e.g. 9:3 and 3:9.

反比例
反比例[fǎn bǐ lì] 两个量(a和b)，如果其中的一个量(a)扩大到若干倍，另一个量(b)反而缩小到原来的若干分之一，或一个量(a)缩小到原来的若干分之一，另一个量(b)反而扩大到若干倍，这两个量的变化关系叫做反比例，记作a∝1/b inverse ratio; given two values (a and b), if one (a) increases a number of times, the other (b) decreases by the same proportion, or vice versa; this relationship is called inverse ratio, written as a∝1/b

反水
反水[fǎn shuǐ]〈方 dial.〉1.叛变 defect; turn traitor or renegade 2.反悔；变卦 break a promise; go back on one's words

反求诸己
反求诸己[fǎn qiú zhū jǐ] 指从自己方面寻找原因或对自己提出要求 seek the cause in oneself; impose a demand on oneself

反派
反派[fǎn pài] 戏剧、电影、电视、小说中的坏人；反面人物 villain (in drama, films, television programmes, fiction, etc.); negative character

反潜
反潜[fǎn qián] 对潜入一定海域的敌潜艇进行搜索、封锁、限制或消灭等战斗行动 anti-submarine (action); searching out, enforcing blockades, restricting or wiping out enemy submarines lurking in certain waters

反潜机
反潜机[fǎn qián jī] 海军用来搜索和攻击敌潜艇的飞机 naval plane used to search out and attack enemy submarines

反照
反照[fǎn zhào] 光线反射 reflection of light亦 also 返照 fǎnzhào

反物质
反物质[fǎn wù zhì] 物理学上指原子核由反质子和反中子组成的带负电荷的物质。反核子（反质子和反中子）组成反原子核，反原子核和正电子组成反原子，各种反原子组成各种反物质 (phys.) antimatter; form of matter in which the electrical charge or other property of each constituent particle is the reverse of that in the usual matter of the universe. The antinucleon (antiproton and antineutron) forms an antiatomic nucleus, the antiatomic nucleus and positive electron form an antiatom, and various kinds of antiatoms form various antimatters.

反目
反目[fǎn mù]不和睦（多指夫妻 esp. between husband and wife）fall out：反目成仇 fall out and become enemies

反省
反省[fǎn xǐng] 回想自己的思想行动，检查其中的错误 self-examine; reflect on one's thoughts and actions and examine one's mistakes：停职反省 be suspended from one's duties to carry out a self-examination

反粒子
反粒子[fǎn lì zǐ]正电子、反质子、反中子、反中微子、反介子、反超子等粒子的统称。反粒子与所对应的粒子在质量、自旋、平均寿命和磁矩大小上都相同；如果带电，两者所带电量相等而符号相反，磁矩和自旋的取向关系也相反。反粒子与所对应的粒子相遇就发生湮没而转变为别的粒子。antiparticle; any constituent particle of antimatter; general term for particles as positive electron, antiproton, antineutron, antineutrino, antimesotron, antihyperon, etc. An antiparticle and its corresponding particle are the same in quality, rotation, average lifespan and magnetic torque. When charged, the two have the same electrical charge in reverse directions, and this also applies to magnetic torque and rotation. When an antiparticle and its corresponding particle meet, they will combine and become other particles.

反绑
反绑[fǎn bǎng] 两手绑在背后 bind sb.'s arms behind them

反而
反而[fǎn ér]〈连词 conj.〉表示跟上文意思相反或出乎预料和常情 on the contrary; instead：风不但没停，反而越来越大了。Instead of subsiding, the wind is blowing even harder.你太拘礼了，反而弄得大家不方便。You are too punctilious, which only causes much inconvenience.

反胃
反胃[fǎn wèi] 指食物咽下后，胃里不舒服，恶心甚至呕吐 feel discomfort in the stomach or nausea after ingesting food亦 also 翻胃 fān∥wèi

反腐倡廉
反腐倡廉[fǎn fǔ chàng lián] 反对腐败，提倡廉洁 combat corruption and advocate a clean government

反衬
反衬[fǎn chèn] 从反面来衬托 set off by contrast; serve as a foil for：对英雄的赞美就反衬着对懦夫的嘲讽。Praise for a hero serves to accentuate the ridicule for a coward.

反观
反观[fǎn guān] 反过来看；从相反的角度来观察 conversely; observed from the opposite angle：表面上看轰轰烈烈，反观效果，却未必好。Superficially it appears spectacular, but conversely, it does not necessarily have a good effect.

反讽
反讽[fǎn fěng] 从反面讽刺；用反语进行讽刺 sarcastic retort：文章中充满了强烈的反讽意味。The article is strongly satirical.

反证
反证[fǎn zhèng]1.可以驳倒原论证的证据 disproof; counter evidence 2.由证明与论题相矛盾的判断是不真实的来证明论题的真实性，是一种间接论证 counterevidence; indirect method of proving the truthfulness of a proposition by demonstrating the falseness of its counter argument

反证法
反证法[fǎn zhèng fǎ] 证明定理的一种方法，先提出和定理中的结论相反的假定，然后从这个假定中得出和已知条件相矛盾的结果来，这样就否定了原来的假定而肯定了定理 method of disproof; rebuttal of evidence; proof by contradiction; reduction to absurdity; reductio ad absurdum; a form of refutation showing contradictory or absurd consequences following upon premises as a matter of logical necessity亦 also 归谬法 guīmiùfǎ

反诉
反诉[fǎn sù] 在同一诉讼中，被告向法院对原告提出的诉讼 counterclaim; recriminate; countercharge brought by the defendant against the plaintiff in the same lawsuit

反诘
反诘[fǎn jié] 反问 ask back; counter with a question

反话
反话[fǎn huà] 故意说的跟自己真正意思相反的话 irony; sarcasm; words that are the opposite of what is actually mean

反诬
反诬[fǎn wū] 不承认对方的揭发指摘，反过来诬告对方 false countercharge; deny the charge and make a false countercharge

反语
反语[fǎn yǔ] 同 same as 反话 fǎnhuà

反调
反调[fǎn diào] 指相反的观点、言论 different views or opinions：唱反调 sing a different tune; express opposite views

反超
反超[fǎn chāo] 体育比赛中比分由落后转为领先叫反超 turn the tide; turn defeat into victory in a sports event：中国队在先失一球的情况下，频频发动攻势，以2比1将比分反超。After losing one score, the Chinese team persistently attacked the opposing team's goal, finally turning the tide after tipping the score to 2:1.

反身
反身[fǎn shēn] 转过身子；转身 (of a person) turn round; face about：见她反身要走，我急忙拦住。She turned away and was about to leave when I hastily stopped her.

反躬自问
反躬自问[fǎn gōng zì wèn] 反过来问问自己 ask oneself; examine oneself亦 also 抚躬自问 fǔ gōng zì wèn

反锁
反锁[fǎn suǒ] 人在屋里，门由外面锁上；人在屋外，门由里面锁上 be locked in or locked out

反问
反问[fǎn wèn]1.反过来对提问的人发问 ask back; answer a question with another question：我等他把所有的问题都提完了，反问他一句，‘你说这些问题该怎么解决呢？’After he had asked all his questions, I asked back,‘How would you suggest solving all these problems?’2.用疑问语气表达与字面相反的意义，例如‘难道我不想搞好工作？’ retort; make one's point by reversing the apparent meaning of a sentence with an interrogative voice, e.g.‘You don't think I really want to do a good job?’

反间
反间[fǎn jiàn] 原指利用敌人的间谍使敌人获得虚假的情报，后专指用计使敌人内部不团结 (orig.) provide false information to the enemy through their own spies; sow distrust or dissent among one's enemies：反间计 stratagem of sowing discord among one's enemies

反霸
反霸[fǎn bà]1.指反对霸权主义 oppose hegemonism 2.指反对地方上或行业中的恶霸，特指土地改革运动中清算恶霸地主的罪行 struggle against despots in a locality or trade, esp. the liquidation of the crimes of despotic landlords during the Land Reform (1950-1953)

反面
反面[fǎn miàn]1.（反面儿 fǎnmiànr）物体上跟正面相反的一面 back; reverse side; wrong side：这块缎子正面儿是蓝地儿黄花儿，反面儿全是蓝的。The right side of the satin is dotted with yellow flower patterns against a blue background, while the reverse side is pure blue. 2.坏的、消极的一面（跟‘正面’相对 as opposed to‘positive’）opposite; negative side：反面教员 teacher by negative example反面角色 villain's role 3.事情、问题等的另一面 the other or reverse side of an affair, a problem, etc.：不但要看问题的正面，还要看问题的反面。We must see the negative as well as the positive side of things.

反面人物
反面人物[fǎn miàn rén wù] 指文学艺术作品中反动的、被否定的人物 (of literary and artistic works) villain; negative character; negative role

反革命
反革命[fǎn gé mìng]1.与革命政权对立，进行破坏活动，企图推翻革命政权的 counter revolutionary; engage in disruptive activities in an attempt to overthrow a revolutionary power：反革命活动 counter-revolutionary activities反革命言论 counter-revolutionary opinions 2.反革命分子 counter-revolutionaries：镇压反革命 suppress counter-revolutionaries; crack down on counter-revolutionaries

反馈
反馈[fǎn kuì]1.把放大器的输出电路中的一部分能量送回输入电路中，以增强或减弱输入讯号的效应。增强输入讯号效应的叫正反馈；减弱输入讯号效应的叫负反馈。正反馈常用来产生振荡；负反馈能稳定放大，减少失真，因而广泛应用于放大器中。feedback; process of returning part of the energy of the output circuit of an amplifier to the input circuit to boost the effects of input signals (positive feedback) or to weaken them (negative feedback). Positive feedback is oft. used to produce vibration, while negative feedback has been widely applied in amplifiers for its property of stabilizing amplification and reducing distortion. 2.医学上指某些生理的或病理的效应反过来影响引起这种效应的原因。起增强作用的叫正反馈；起减弱作用的叫负反馈。feedback; physiological or pathological effects that conversely affect their causes, either boosting the effects (positive feedback) or weakening them (negative feedback) 3.（信息、反映等）返回 feedback (of information, reactions, etc.)：市场销售情况的信息不断反馈到工厂。The factory constantly received feedbacks on market sales.

反驳
反驳[fǎn bó] 说出自己的理由，来否定别人跟自己不同的理论或意见 rebut; refute; give one's own reasons for refuting a theory or opinion different from one's own

发
发[fā]（ㄈㄚ）（發）1.送出；交付 deliver; dispatch; send out; hand over; turn over：发货 deliver; dispatch goods发稿 distribute news dispatch; (of manuscripts, etc.) go to the press分发 distribute; issue; dispense; hand out印发 print and distribute 2.发射 launch; project; discharge; fire：发炮 fire shells; open fire百发百中 every shot hitting the bull's-eye; shoot with unfailing precision 3.产生；发生 produce; engender; happen; occur; take place：发芽 germinate; sprout发电 generate (electricity or power)发水 flood发病 (of a disease) come on; (of a person) fall ill; be taken ill; come down with (a disease) 4.表达 express; convey; voice：发表 state; announce; issue; deliver; publish; (of newspapers, journals, etc.) carry发布 issue; promulgate; release发誓 vow; pledge; swear; take an oath发言 speak; address; make a statement; deliver a speech; take the floor 5.扩大；开展 enlarge; expand; extend; broaden; develop; launch; promote; carry out：发展 develop; expand; grow; promote发扬 promote; foster; carry on or forward发育 growth; development 6.因得到大量财物而兴旺 flourish through obtaining a great deal of wealth：发家 build up a family fortune暴发户 upstart; nouveau riche他这两年跑买卖可发了。His travelling around doing business over the past two years has made him quite a fortune. 7.食物因发酵或水浸而膨胀 (of foodstuffs) rise or expand when leavened or soaked：面发了。The dough has risen.发海参 soak sea cucumbers in water 8.放散；散开 (of smoke, scent, etc.) diffuse; disperse：发散 (of rays, etc.) diverge; diffuse挥发 volatilize蒸发 evaporate 9.揭露；打开 expose; unmask; unveil; open; unfold; bring to light; lay bare：发现 find; discover揭发 expose; unmask; disclose; lay bare; bring light to发掘 excavate; unearth; dig 10.因变化而显现、散发 become; turn：发黄 turn yellow发潮 become damp; feel damp发臭 stench; stink发酸 turn sour; taste sour 11.流露（感情）reveal (one's feelings)：发怒 get angry; flare up; fly into a rage发笑 laugh; burst out laughing发愁 worry; be anxious; become sad 12.感到（多指不愉快的情况 oft. an unpleasant condition）feel; sense：发麻 tingle; feel numb发痒 itch; feel itchy嘴里发苦 have a bitter taste in the mouth 13.起程 set out; start a journey：出发 set off; set out; start (off)整装待发 packed up and ready to go; ready to start朝发夕至 start at dawn and arrive at dusk - a short journey 14.开始行动 start doing sth.：发起 initiate; sponsor奋发 rouse oneself; exert oneself; brace oneself先发制人 pre-empt; gain the initiative by striking first; forestall an opponent, enemy, etc. 15.引起；启发 generate; arouse; stimulate; inspire; enlighten; set off; touch off; bring about：发人深省 provide much food for thought; call for deep thought; prompt sb. to think deeply 16.〈量词 classifier〉颗，用于枪弹、炮弹 [of bullets and shells] round：一发子弹 one bullet上百发炮弹 more than 100 rounds of shells另见  fà发[fà]（ㄈㄚˋ）（髮）头发 hair：毛发 hair须发 beard and hair白发 white hair假发 wig; hairpiece理发 have a haircut; have one's hair cut另见  fā相关词组颁发 | 暴发 | 爆发 | 迸发 | 鬓发 | 并发 | 拨发 | 播发 | 勃发 | 阐发 | 出发 | 触发 | 猝发 | 打发 | 大发 | 导发 | 点发 | 多发 | 分发 | 奋发 | 风发 | 复发 | 高发 | 告发 | 毫发 | 核发 | 华发 | 焕发 | 挥发 | 击发 | 激发 | 揭发 | 进发 | 举发 | 开发 | 扣发 | 理发 | 落发 | 毛发 | 美发 | 萌发 | 偶发 | 拍发 | 派发 | 喷发 | 批发 | 启发 | 签发 | 散发 | 沙发 | 缮发 | 生发 | 收发 | 首发 | 抒发 | 胎发 | 烫发 | 头发 | 脱发 | 细发 | 须发 | 削发 | 研发 | 一发 | 益发 | 银发 | 引发 | 印发 | 诱发 | 越发 | 照发 | 征发 | 蒸发 | 转发 | 自发 | 爆发力 | 爆发音 | 出发点 | 挥发油 | 哈里发 | 百发百中 | 爆发变星 | 朝发夕至 | 大发雷霆 | 奋发图强 | 鹤发童颜 | 后发制人 | 结发夫妻 | 怒发冲冠 | 披发左衽 | 先发制人 | 一发千钧 | 擢发难数 | 火力发电 | 借题发挥 | 振聋发聩 | 东窗事发 | 间不容发 | 披头散发 | 千钧一发 | 童颜鹤发 | 一触即发 | 意气风发 | 引而不发 | 整装待发 | 电视发射塔 | 喷气发动机 | 可持续发展 | 牵一发而动全身 | 经济技术开发区发榜 | 发包 | 发报 | 发标 | 发表 | 发兵 | 发病 | 发布 | 发财 | 发车 | 发痴 | 发愁 | 发出 | 发憷 | 发达 | 发呆 | 发单 | 发嗲 | 发电 | 发动 | 发抖 | 发端 | 发凡 | 发放 | 发粉 | 发奋 | 发愤 | 发疯 | 发福 | 发付 | 发绀 | 发糕 | 发稿 | 发还 | 发汗 | 发行 | 发狠 | 发横 | 发花 | 发话 | 发慌 | 发挥 | 发昏 | 发火 | 发急 | 发迹 | 发家 | 发贱 | 发胶 | 发觉 | 发酵 | 发窘 | 发掘 | 发卡 | 发棵 | 发狂 | 发困 | 发蜡 | 发懒 | 发廊 | 发愣 | 发令 | 发落 | 发毛 | 发霉 | 发蒙 | 发面 | 发明 | 发墨 | 发难 | 发蔫 | 发苶 | 发怒 | 发排 | 发胖 | 发配 | 发飘 | 发票 | 发妻 | 发起 | 发情 | 发球 | 发热 | 发轫 | 发散 | 发丧 | 发痧 | 发傻 | 发烧 | 发射 | 发身 | 发生 | 发市 | 发式 | 发事 | 发誓 | 发售 | 发抒 | 发水 | 发送 | 发酸 | 发网 | 发文 | 发问 | 发物 | 发现 | 发祥 | 发笑 | 发泄 | 发型 | 发虚 | 发噱 | 发芽 | 发言 | 发扬 | 发音 | 发引 | 发育 | 发源 | 发愿 | 发运 | 发展 | 发怔 | 发指 | 发作 | 发动机 | 发端词 | 发酵酒 | 发酒疯 | 发刊词 | 发利市 | 发令枪 | 发疟子 | 发脾气 | 发烧友 | 发神经 | 发祥地 | 发言人 | 发洋财 | 发语词 | 发号施令 | 发聋振聩 | 发人深省 | 发扬踔厉 | 发扬光大 | 发纵指示

发丧
发丧[fā sāng]1.丧家向亲友宣告某人死去 announce a death to relatives and friends 2.办理丧事 hold a funeral (procession); arrange a funeral

发事
发事[fā shì] 出事 have an accident; meet with a mishap：发事地点 site or scene of an accident

发人深省
发人深省[fā rén shēn xǐng] 启发人深刻醒悟 set people thinking; provide much food for thought；省 xǐng 也作 also put as 醒 xǐng

发付
发付[fā fù]打发（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）dispatch; send on an errand

发令
发令[fā lìng] 发出命令或口令 give or issue an order or a word of command：发令枪 starting gun or pistol发令开火 give the order to fire

发令枪
发令枪[fā lìng qiāng] 径赛、游泳比赛等开始时，用来发出声音信号的器械，形状像手枪 starting gun or pistol, used to give the signal to start a track event, a swimming competition, etc.

发作
发作[fā zuò]1.（隐伏的事物）突然暴发或起作用 (of latent things) act up; suddenly break out or show effect：胃病发作 have a sudden bout of stomach-ache酒力发作 The liquor began to act up.药性发作。The medicine began to take effect. 2.发脾气 have a fit of anger; flare up; lose one's temper (or control)：心怀不满，借机发作 take the opportunity to give vent to one's spleen他有些生气，但当着大家的面不好发作。He was angry, but as everybody was present, he kept his temper in check.

发傻
发傻[fā shǎ]1.因为某种意外情况出现而目瞪口呆 dumbstruck; dumbfounded 2.说傻话或做傻事；犯傻 speak or act foolishly

发兵
发兵[fā bīng]派出军队（作战）send out troops; dispatch troops (to fight)

发凡
发凡[fā fán] 陈述全书或某一学科的要旨 introduction to (or explanation of) the main idea or points of a book or a subject：发凡起例（说明全书要旨，拟定编撰体例）(of a book) introduction and guide (to the main idea or points, and style of compilation)

发出
发出[fā chū]1.发生（声音、疑问等）produce (a sound, etc.); ask (a question)：发出笑声 give a laugh 2.发表；发布（命令、指示）issue; deliver; publish; give an order; promulgate a decree：发出号召 call for; call on发出通告 issue a public notice 3.送出（货物、信件等）；开出（车辆等）deliver; forward (goods, letters, etc.); dispatch (vehicles, etc.)

发刊词
发刊词[fā kān cí] 刊物创刊号上说明本刊的宗旨、性质等的文章 foreword or introduction in the first issue of a periodical (explaining its aims and character)

发利市
发利市[fā lì shì]〈方 dial.〉1.商店把开门后做成第一笔买卖叫做发利市 make the first transaction of the day after opening shop 2.泛指获得利润 (in a broad sense) profit

发动
发动[fā dòng]1.使开始 start; initiate; launch：发动战争 launch a war发动新攻势 unleash a new attack 2.使行动起来 mobilize; arouse; call into action：发动群众 arouse (or mobilize) the masses 3.使机器运转 start a machine; get a machine started; set a machine going：天气太冷，柴油机不容易发动。It is too cold to start a diesel engine.

发动机
发动机[fā dòng jī]把热能、电能等变为机械能的机器，用来带动其他机械工作。如电动机、蒸汽机、涡轮机、内燃机、风车。motor or engine, a machine, such as a motor, steam engine, turbine, internal combustion engine, or windmill, that converts thermal energy, electric energy, etc., into mechanical energy to produce force or motion; 亦 also 动力机 dònglìjī

发包
发包[fā bāo] 把建筑、加工、订货等任务交给承担单位或个人承包 contract a construction or processing project out to, or place an order with, a unit or individual

发单
发单[fā dān] 同 same as 发票 fāpiào

发卡
发卡[fà qiǎ] 妇女用来别头发的卡子 hair pin

发号施令
发号施令[fā hào shī lìng] 发布命令；指挥 issue orders; give orders; command; boss around

发呆
发呆[fā dāi] 因着急、害怕或心思有所专注，而对外界事物完全不注意 be dazed; in a daze; in a trance; completely ignore what is happening around one due to anxiety, fear, or preoccupation with sth.：他话也不说，眼直直地瞪着，坐在那儿发呆。He sat there, staring blankly, not saying a word.

发售
发售[fā shòu] 出售 sell; put on sale：公开发售 public sale发售纪念邮票 put commemorative stamps on sale

发嗲
发嗲[fā diǎ]〈方 dial.〉撒娇 act spoiled; play the pampered child

发噱
发噱[fā xué]〈方 dial.〉能引人发笑；可笑 amusing; funny; comical

发困
发困[fā kùn] 感到困倦，想睡觉 feel sleepy; feel drowsy：今天起得过早，午饭后有点儿发困。Having got up early this morning, I felt sleepy after lunch.

发型
发型[fà xíng] 发式 hairstyle; hairdo; coiffure; hair fashion

发墨
发墨[fā mò] 指砚台磨墨易浓 (of inkstones) good for grinding an inkstick：这种砚石细腻如玉，发墨也快。This inkstone is as smooth as jade and effective for grinding inksticks.

发奋
发奋[fā fèn]1.振作起来；奋发 activate oneself; bestir oneself; exert oneself; rouse oneself：发奋努力 work hard; exert oneself发奋有为 energetic and promising; with firm resolve to succeed 2. 同 same as 发愤 fāfèn

发妻
发妻[fà qī]指第一次娶的妻子（古诗‘结发为夫妻’，结发指初成年）first wife; woman who was married to a man when both had just come of age and, usu. who remains as his wife into old age. The term is derived from the line in a poem by the Western-Han poet Su Wu (?-60 B.C.):‘United in wedlock when we were both young, we remain husband and wife to this day.’

发家
发家[fā jiā] 使家庭变得富裕 help one's family to become rich：发家致富 become rich; build up a family fortune

发射
发射[fā shè]射出（枪弹、炮弹、火箭、电波、人造卫星等）discharge; shoot; fire (a bullet); transmit (electric waves); launch (a man-made satellite, rocket, etc.)

发展
发展[fā zhǎn]1.事物由小到大、由简单到复杂、由低级到高级的变化 develop; change into a larger, more complex or advanced state：事态还在发展。Events are still developing.社会发展规律 laws governing social development 2.扩大（组织、规模等）expand (an organization, scale, etc.)：发展新会员 recruit (or admit) new members发展轻纺工业 develop or promote the light and textile industries

发市
发市[fā shì] 指商店等一天里第一次成交 (of a shop) make the first transaction in a day's business

发布
发布[fā bù] 宣布（命令、指示、新闻等） issue or release (orders, instructions, news, etc.)：发布战报 issue a war communiqué新闻发布会 news conference; press conference

发廊
发廊[fà láng] 美容理发店，多指小型的个体美容理发店 barber's; hairdresser's; beauty salon

发式
发式[fà shì] 头发梳理成的式样 hairstyle; hairdo; coiffure

发引
发引[fā yǐn]〈古代 arch.〉出殡时送丧的人用绋牵引灵柩作前导，叫作发引。后来也指出殡时抬出灵柩。(of a funeral procession) draw the bier with a cord and lead the way; (later referring to) carry coffin to burial

发怒
发怒[fā nù] 因愤怒而表现出粗暴的声色举动 be enraged; behave crudely due to anger

发怔
发怔[fā zhèng] 发呆 be stupefied; be in a daze or trance; be stunned; stare blankly

发急
发急[fā jí] 着急 become impatient or anxious; lose patience：他还不来，让人等得发急。He still hasn't arrived, and the waiting makes everybody impatient.

发情
发情[fā qíng] 雌性的高等动物卵子成熟前后，生理上要求交配 in heat; (of a female mammal) be sexually receptive and ready for mating：发情期 heat (period); oestrus

发愁
发愁[fā chóu] 因为没有主意或办法而感到愁闷 be worried; feel gloomy about a problem one is not sure how to deal with：你先别发愁，资金问题我来想办法解决。Please don't worry about funds, I will try to find a solution.

发愣
发愣[fā lèng] 发呆 be stunned; be in a trance; be in a daze

发愤
发愤[fā fèn] 决心努力 make a firm resolution; make a determined effort：发愤忘食 be so absorbed in one's work or study as to forget one's meals; work or study so hard as to forget to eat发愤图强 make determined efforts to better oneself; resolve to make one's country strong亦 also 发奋 fāfèn

发愿
发愿[fā yuàn] 表明心愿或愿望 express one's wish or desire：起誓发愿 make a pledge or promise; take an oath

发慌
发慌[fā huāng] 因害怕、着急或虚弱而心神不定 feel disturbed and upset because of fright, anxiety or debility：沉住气，别发慌。Keep calm! Don't be nervous.

发憷
发憷[fā chù]〈方 dial.〉胆怯；畏缩 be timid; recoil; cringe; shrink：初次登台，心里有点发憷。I suffered from stage fright in my first stage appearance.

发懒
发懒[fā lǎn] 因身体或心情不好，懒得动 feel sluggish due to poor health or ill humour

发扬
发扬[fā yáng]1.发展和提倡（优良作风、传统等）develop and promote (fine practice, tradition, etc.)：发扬光大 carry forward; develop; enhance发扬民主 promote democracy发扬勤俭节约、艰苦奋斗的精神 keep up the spirit of diligence, thrift, plain living and hard work 2.发挥 make the most of; make full use of; give full play to：发扬火力，消灭敌人 concentrate firepower to annihilate the enemy

发扬光大
发扬光大[fā yáng guāng dà] 发展提倡，使日益盛大 enhance; develop; carry forward

发扬踔厉
发扬踔厉[fā yáng chuō lì] 指精神奋发，意气昂扬 vigorous and full of spirit; energetic亦 also 发扬蹈厉 fāyáng dǎolì

发抒
发抒[fā shū]表达（意见、感情）express; voice (one's opinions or feelings)：发抒己见 express one's own view; speak one's mind

发抖
发抖[fā dǒu] 由于害怕、生气或受到寒冷等原因而身体颤动 tremble; shake; shiver (with fear, anger or cold, etc.)：吓得发抖 tremble with fear; shake in one's shoes冻得浑身发抖 shiver all over with cold

发报
发报[fā bào] 用无线电或有线电装置把消息、情报等发给收报人 transmit news or information by wireless or wired equipment to receiver

发指
发指[fà zhǐ] 头发竖起来。形容非常愤怒 with one's hair standing on end; (fig.) filled with indignation; bristle or boil with anger：令人发指 make people boil with anger为之发指 make sb.'s hackles up

发挥
发挥[fā huī]1.把内在的性质或能力表现出来 demonstrate the inner property or ability of sth.：发挥积极性 give full play to one's initiative; bring one's initiative into full play; give free reign to one's initiative发挥模范作用 play an exemplary role发挥技术水平 give play to one's technical knowledge or skill发挥炮兵的威力 bring the artillery into play 2.把意思或道理充分表达出来 fully express (an idea or argument)：发挥题意 elaborate (meaning or theme)借题发挥 seize upon a pretext through which to give vent to one's own views or feelings; make use of the topic under discussion to put across one's own ideas (which are unrelated to it)

发排
发排[fā pái] 把稿子交给排印部门排版 send a manuscript to the typesetting and printing departments

发掘
发掘[fā jué] 挖掘埋藏在地下的东西 excavate; unearth; explore sth. buried underground：发掘古物 excavate antiquities发掘宝藏 explore treasures; excavate a precious mineral deposit发掘潜力 tap potential发掘人才 seek out gifted (or talented) people

发放
发放[fā fàng]1.（政府、机构）把钱或物资等发给需要的人 (of a government or an organization) grant, issue and distribute money, goods or materials to people in need：发放贷款 grant (or extend) a loan发放救济粮 distribute (or dole out) relief grains发放经营许可证 issue a business licence 2.发出；放出 release; send up; send out：发放信号弹 send up a signal flare 3.处理；处置（多见于早期白话 mostly in early vernacular）deal with; treat

发散
发散[fā sàn]1.（光线等）由某一点向四周散开 (of rays, etc.) diverge; diffuse：发散透镜 divergent lens 2.〈中医 Chin. med.〉指用发汗的药物把体内的热散出去，以治疗疾病 disperse internal heat with sudorifics to cure disease

发文
发文[fā wén] 发出公文 issue or dispatch a document, etc.：中央三个单位联合发文。Three central government departments issued a joint document.发文[fā wén] 本单位发出的公文 outgoing document：发文簿（登记发文的本子）registration book on outgoing documents, letters, etc.

发明
发明[fā míng]1.创造（新的事物或方法） invent (new things or methods)：发明指南针 invent the compass火药是中国最早发明的。Gunpowder was first invented by the Chinese. 2.创造出的新事物或新方法 newly invented things or methods：新发明 new invention四大发明 four major inventions (the compass, gunpowder, papermaking and printing) 3.〈书 fml.〉创造性地阐发 expound; set forth a theme; develop (an idea, theme, etc.); 同 same as 发挥 fāhuī ②：发明文义 expound the theme of an article本书对《老子》的哲理颇多发明。This book expounds in detail the philosophy of Laozi.

发昏
发昏[fā hūn] 神志不清 feel giddy or dizzy：头脑发昏 feel giddy; lose control of oneself

发标
发标[fā biāo]〈方 dial.〉发威风；发脾气 flare up; throw one's weight about

发棵
发棵[fā kē]〈方 dial.〉（发棵儿 fākēr）1.分蘖 tiller 2.植株逐渐长大 (of plants) grow gradually

发榜
发榜[fā bǎng] 考试后公布考试成绩的名次或被录取者的名单 announce the results of an exam in the form of a list of names in descending order; issue a list of successful candidates：本市高考首批录取新生今起发榜。A list of the first group of students in this city who have passed the entrance exams and enrolled in colleges will be published today.

发横
发横[fā hèng] 发脾气；耍横 explode; flare up; lose control; act in an unreasonable or headstrong way：有理讲理，发什么横？Please try to be rational, why are you acting in such an unreasonable fashion?

发毛
发毛[fā máo]1.害怕；惊慌 be scared; be frightened; get gooseflesh：他从没见过这阵势，心里直发毛。Never having seen such a scenario, he was scared. 2.〈方 dial.〉 同 same as 发脾气 fā pí·qi

发水
发水[fā shuǐ] 闹水灾 (of a river) overflow; flood

发汗
发汗[fā hàn]（用药物等）使身体出汗 induce sweating (through medication)

发泄
发泄[fā xiè]尽量发出（情欲或不满情绪）give vent to; take (one's lust, grievances or discontent) out on sb.：发泄兽欲 vent one's bestial lust发泄私愤 vent personal grudges

发洋财
发洋财[fā yáng cái] 原指在与外国人有关的活动中发财，后泛指获得意外的财物 make a fortune or profit from activities related to foreigners; (in a broad sense) acquire unexpected wealth

发源
发源[fā yuán]（河流）开始流出；起源 (of a river) rise in; originate in (from)：发源地 birthplace; place of origin; source淮河发源于桐柏山。The Huai River rises in the Tongbai Mountain.

发火
发火[fā huǒ]1.开始燃烧 fire; ignite：发火点 firing point; ignition point 2.子弹、炮弹的底火经撞击后火药爆发 detonate; cause the gunpowder inside a bullet or shell to explode after its primer has been struck 3.〈方 dial.〉发生火警；失火 catch fire; be on fire 4.（炉灶）生火容易旺 (of a stove) draw well 5.（发火儿 fā∥huǒr）发脾气 get angry; flare up; lose one's temper：有话好好说，不必发火。Don't get angry, let's talk it over calmly.

发烧
发烧[fā shāo]体温增高。人的正常体温是37℃左右，如超过37.5℃，就是发烧，是疾病的一种症状。have or run a temperature or fever; symptom of a disease when one's body temperature exceeds 37.5℃, while the normal temperature is around 37℃; 亦 also 发热 fā∥rè

发烧友
发烧友[fā shāo yǒu]〈方 dial.〉对某项事业或活动非常迷恋专注的人；狂热的爱好者 devotee; aficionado; buff; fanatic; zealot

发热
发热[fā rè]1.温度增高；产生热量 give out heat; generate heat：恒星本身发光发热。Fixed stars emit light and heat by themselves. 2.发烧 run a fever; have a temperature 3.〈比喻 fig.〉不冷静，不清醒 impulsive; hotheaded：头脑发热 be hotheaded; be impetuous

发物
发物[fā wù] 指富于营养或有刺激性，容易使疮疖或某些病状发生变化的食物，如羊肉、鱼虾等 stimulating food; nutritious foods such as mutton, fish and shrimp, that stimulate or aggravate sores, boils or certain clinical symptoms

发狂
发狂[fā kuáng] 发疯 go mad; crazy; become lunatic (or insane); go berserk

发狠
发狠[fā hěn]1.下决心, 不顾一切 make a determined effort; resolve to do sth.; do sth. at any cost：发狠读书 make a determined effort to study他一发狠，三天的任务，两天就完成了。Through determined effort, he completed a three-day assignment in two days. 2.恼怒；动气 get angry

发现
发现[fā xiàn]1.经过研究、探索等，看到或找到前人没有看到的事物或规律 find out; discover (esp. after studies and explorations of sth. unknown to predecessors)：发现新的基本粒子 discover a new elementary particle有所发明，有所发现，有所创造。Make new inventions and discoveries and create new things. 2.发觉 detect; notice; find out; become aware of：这两天，我发现他好像有什么心事。In the last couple of days I have noticed that he seems to have something on his mind.

发球
发球[fā qiú] 球类比赛时，一方把球发出，使比赛开始或继续 (of a ball game) serve

发生
发生[fā shēng]1.原来没有的事出现了；产生 happen; occur; take place：发生变化 changes taking place发生事故。An accident happened.发生关系 have an affair 2.卵子受精后逐渐生长的过程 gradual development of an embryo (from a fertilized egg)

发电
发电[fā diàn]1.发出电力 generate electricity or power：水力发电 hydropower; water power原子能发电 atomic power; nuclear power 2.打电报 send a telegram; cable

发疟子
发疟子[fā yào zi] 患疟疾 have an attack of malaria; suffer from malarial fever

发疯
发疯[fā fēng]1.精神受到刺激而发生精神病的症状 go mad; suffer from a disease of the brain or disorder of the mind because of traumatic experience 2.〈比喻 fig.〉做事出于常情之外 lose one's head or mind：你发疯啦，这么大热天，还穿棉袄！You're crazy to wear a cotton-padded jacket on such a hot day!

发病
发病[fā bìng] 某种疾病在有机体内开始发生 outbreak or onset of a disease in an organism：发病率 incidence (of a disease)秋冬之交容易发病。People are prone to illness during the time when autumn gives way to winter.

发痧
发痧[fā shā]〈方 dial.〉中暑(zhòng∥shǔ) have a heatstroke or sunstroke

发痴
发痴[fā chī]〈方 dial.〉1.发呆 stupefied; look blank; in a trance; in a daze 2.发疯 go (or become) mad; go crazy; become insane

发神经
发神经[fā shén jīng] 同 same as 发疯 fā∥fēng ②

发祥
发祥[fā xiáng]〈书 fml.〉1.指发生吉祥的事 occurrence of an auspicious event 2.兴起；发生 originate; begin; start; initiate：发祥地 place of origin; birthplace

发祥地
发祥地[fā xiáng dì] 原指帝王祖先兴起的地方，现用来指民族、革命、文化等起源的地方 cradle; place of origin of an emperor or one's ancestor; birthplace (of a nation, a revolution, a culture, etc.)：黄河流域物产丰富，山河壮丽，是我国古代文化的发祥地。The Yellow River Valley, with its rich resources and magnificent landscape, was the cradle of ancient Chinese culture.

发票
发票[fā piào] 商店或其他收款部门开出的收款单据 receipt; invoice

发福
发福[fā fú]〈客套话 pol.〉称人发胖（多用于中年以上的人 usu. of older people）grow stout; put on weight

发稿
发稿[fā gǎo]发出稿件。如通讯社发送电讯稿给报社，编辑部门把书刊、图片等稿件交给出版部门或印刷厂。(of a news agency) dispatch news releases to newspapers; (of an editorial department) submit the manuscripts of books, journals or pictures to a publishing department or the press

发窘
发窘[fā jiǒng] 感到为难；表现出窘态 be abashed; become embarrassed; be ill at ease

发端
发端[fā duān] 开始；开端 start; beginning

发端词
发端词[fā duān cí] 发语词 function word

发笑
发笑[fā xiào] 笑起来 laugh; burst into laughter：引人发笑 make one laugh; provoke laughter; be ridiculous

发粉
发粉[fā fěn]另见  焙粉 bèifěn

发糕
发糕[fā gāo] 用米粉、面粉等发酵做成的糕，有的还加糖、枣儿、青丝等 steamed sponge cake, made of leavened ground rice or flour, sometimes added with sugar, dates or finely cut green plums, etc.

发纵指示
发纵指示[fā zòng zhǐ shì] 放出猎狗，指示方向，要它追捕野兽 unleash hunting dogs after a quarry；〈比喻 fig.〉指挥、调度 command and dispatch; pull strings亦 also 发踪指示 fā zōng zhǐ shì

发绀
发绀[fā gàn]皮肤或黏膜呈现青紫色。由呼吸或循环系统发生障碍，血液中缺氧引起。cyanosis; bluish colouration of the skin or membrane due to poor circulation or inadequate oxygenation of the blood; 亦 also 青紫 qīngzǐ

发网
发网[fà wǎng] 妇女罩头发用的网子 hairnet used by a woman

发聋振聩
发聋振聩[fā lóng zhèn kuì] 发出很大的响声，使耳聋的人也能听见 make a noise loud enough to rouse the deaf and awaken the unhearing；〈比喻 fig.〉用语言文字唤醒糊涂的人 enlighten the ignorant or the benighted through spoken or written words

发育
发育[fā yù] 生物体成熟之前，机能和构造发生变化，如植物开花结果，动物的性腺逐渐成熟 growth; development; the change of function and structure of an organism approaching mature, as plants blossoming and bearing fruit, and maturing of the gonads of animals

发胖
发胖[fā pàng]（身体）变胖 (of body) get fat; put on (or gain) weight

发胶
发胶[fà jiāo] 理发或烫发后用来固定发型的化妆品 hairspray; hair lacquer; cosmetic used to fix a hairstyle after having a haircut or perm

发脾气
