发脾气[fā pí qi] 因事情不如意而吵闹或骂人 quarrel or swear due to dissatisfaction; vent one's spleen on sb. or sth.

发花
发花[fā huā]眼睛看东西模糊不清 (of one's eyes) blurred：饿得两眼发花。I was so hungry that I couldn't see straight.

发芽
发芽[fā yá] 种子的胚发育长大，突破种皮而出 germinate; sprout; (of the embryo of a seed) break through its seed coat

发苶
发苶[fā nié] 委靡不振 dispirited; in low spirits; 同 same as 发蔫 fāniān ②

发落
发落[fā luò] 处理；处置 handle; deal with (an offender)：听候发落 wait for one's decision

发蒙
发蒙[fā mēng] 糊涂；弄不清楚 confused; bewildered; in a muddle; at a loss：一人一个说法，听得我发蒙。Each of you has a different story, making me confused.发蒙[fā méng]〈旧时 old〉教少年、儿童开始识字读书 teach a child to read and write; teach a child his ABC：发蒙读物 primer; beginner's book

发蔫
发蔫[fā niān]1.花木、水果等显现出萎缩 (of flowers, plants, fruits, etc.) fade; wither; droop; shrivel up：几天没浇水，海棠花有些发蔫了。Not having been watered over the past few days, the Chinese flowering crab apple withered. 2.表现出精神不振 spiritless; listless; downcast：他这两天有点发蔫，不像往日爱说爱笑。He looks a bit listless recently, and has not been talking animatedly and laughing merrily as he usually does.

发虚
发虚[fā xū]1.因胆怯或没有把握而感到心虚 feel diffident or lack self-confidence owing to timidity, or uncertainty 2.（身体）显得虚弱 (of body) feel feeble and weak：他病刚好，身子还有些发虚。He has just recovered, and still feels weak.

发蜡
发蜡[fà là] 用凡士林加香料制成的化妆品，抹在头发上，使有光泽而不蓬松 pomade; hair cosmetic made of Vaseline and perfume, rubbed on hair to make it glossy but not fluffy

发行
发行[fā háng] 批发 wholesale另见  fāxíng发行[fā xíng]发出新印制的货币、债券或新出版的书刊、新制作的电影等 (of new currency, bonds, books, periodicals, films, etc.) issue; publish; distribute; release另见  fāháng

发表
发表[fā biǎo]1.向集体或社会表达（意见）；宣布 announce; declare; express one's opinions; air one's views (to a collective or society)：发表谈话 address the public发表声明 issue or make a statement代表团成员已经确定，名单尚未正式发表。The delegate members have been confirmed, but the name list has not yet been officially announced. 2.在刊物上登载（文章、绘画、歌曲等）publish (articles, paintings, songs, etc.) in a periodical：发表论文 publish an academic paper

发觉
发觉[fā jué]开始知道（隐藏的或以前没注意到的事）sense; realize; become aware of (sth. concealed or previously unnoticed)：火扑灭了以后，他才发觉自己受了伤。He did not realize he was injured until after the fire had been extinguished.

发言
发言[fā yán]发表意见（多指在会议上 usu. at a meeting）state one's view：积极发言 take the floor actively发言权 right to speak他已经发过言了。He has already made his speech.发言[fā yán]发表的意见（多指在会议上 made mostly at a meeting）speech; statement：他在大会上的发言很中肯。He made a sincere and pertinent speech at the meeting.

发言人
发言人[fā yán rén] 代表某一政权机关或组织发表意见的人 spokesman; spokesperson; person who speaks on behalf of a government or organization：外交部发言人 spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

发誓
发誓[fā shì] 庄严地说出表示决心的话或对某事提出保证 vow; pledge or promise solemnly：指天发誓 swear by Heaven发誓要为烈士报仇 vow to avenge the martyrs

发话
发话[fā huà]1.给予口头指示；口头上提出警告或要求 give (verbal) orders or instructions; give (verbal) warnings; make a demand：到底该怎么办，你发话吧。Just tell us what to do.人家早发话啦，不许咱再到这里来。They have already given orders to disallow us from coming here again. 2.气冲冲地说出话 snarl

发语词
发语词[fā yǔ cí]文言虚词，用于一篇或一段文章的开头，如‘夫、盖、维’function words such as‘夫 fú, 盖 gài, 维 wéi’used at the beginning of a piece of classical Chinese writing, or a paragraph亦 also 发端词 fāduāncí

发财
发财[fā cái]1.获得大量钱财 obtain a great deal of money or wealth; hit the jackpot：发财致富 become rich; make a fortune升官发财 get a promotion and become rich 2.〈客套话 pol.〉问人在哪里工作称在哪里发财 ask sb. where he or she works by way of asking where he or she makes a fortune

发贱
发贱[fā jiàn] 因不自重而表现出让人看不起的举动 act cheap; cheapen oneself due to a lack of self-respect

发起
发起[fā qǐ]1.倡议（做某件事情）advocate; initiate：发起人 sponsor; initiator他们发起组织一个读书会。They organized a reading association under their sponsorship. 2.发动（战役、进攻等）start or launch (a war, an attack, etc.)：发起冲锋 launch an assault发起反攻 launch a counter-attack

发身
发身[fā shēn] 男女到青春期，生殖器官发育成熟，身体其他各部分也发生变化，逐渐长成成年人的样子，这种生理变化叫做发身 pubescence; stage of physical development during puberty in both males and females when their reproductive organs become mature, and when other parts of their bodies gradually develop, giving them an adult appearance

发车
发车[fā chē]（从车站或停放地点）开出车辆 (from a station or parking lot) dispatch or send off a vehicle：每隔五分钟发车一次 dispatch a bus every five minutes首班车早晨五点半发车。The first bus departs at 5:30 a.m.

发轫
发轫[fā rèn]〈书 fml.〉拿掉支住车轮的木头，使车前进 remove the wooden wedge from underneath a wheel to set a vehicle in motion；〈比喻 fig.〉新事物或某种局面开始出现 new thing or situation starting to emerge：发轫之作 maiden work; work that signals the beginning of one's writing career新文学运动发轫于五四运动。The May 4th Movement ushered in the New Culture Movement.

发达
发达[fā dá]1.（事物）已有充分发展；（事业）兴盛 (of sth.) fully developed; (of a cause) prosper：肌肉发达 muscular; brawny四肢发达 sound in body; physically sound工业发达 well-developed industry; flourishing or thriving industry交通发达 convenient communication; well-developed transportation system 2.使充分发展 enable sth. to develop fully：发达经济 develop or promote the economy发达贸易 develop or promote trade

发运
发运[fā yùn]（货物）运出去 send (goods) by freight：装船发运 ship; load a ship with cargo to be shipped订货已经发运，不日即可收到。The goods ordered have been sent by freight, and will soon reach you.

发还
发还[fā huán]把收来的东西还回去（多用于上对下 usu. to one's subordinate）give (or send) back; return sth.：发还原主 return sth. to its rightful owner; send sth. back to its original owner

发迹
发迹[fā jì] 指人变得有钱有势 (of a poor man) gain fame and fortune; go from rags to riches：发迹变泰 rise to position of power and influence

发送
发送[fā sòng]1.无线电发射机把无线电信号发射出去 transmit radio signals by a radio transmitter 2.发出；送出 send out; dispatch (letters, etc.)：发送文件 dispatch documents这个火车站每天发送旅客在五万人以上。This railway station dispatches over 50,000 passengers every day.发送[fā song] 办丧事，特指殡葬 hold a funeral procession, esp. for a burial

发配
发配[fā pèi]充军（多见于早期白话 oft. in early vernacular）send sb. into exile; be escorted to a remote place for penal servitude

发酒疯
发酒疯[fā jiǔ fēng] 撒酒疯 be drunk and act foolishly; be roaring drunk; be in a drunken fit or brawl

发酵
发酵[fā jiào]复杂的有机化合物在微生物的作用下分解成比较简单的物质。发面、酿酒等都是发酵的应用。ferment; process whereby complex organic chemical compounds are broken down into comparatively simple substances under the influence of a micro-organism, such as leavening dough and brewing wines; 亦 also 酦酵 fā∥jiào

发酵酒
发酵酒[fā jiào jiǔ] 酿造后不经过蒸馏而可以直接饮用的酒，酒精含量较低，如黄酒、葡萄酒等 fermented wine, such as rice wine and grape wine, of low alcohol content, that can be drunk without having gone through a distillation process亦 also 酿造酒 niàngzàojiǔ

发酸
发酸[fā suān]1.食物变酸 (of food) sour or turn sour; taste sour：碱放少了，馒头发酸。Steamed buns taste a little sour if insufficient soda is used in mixing the dough. 2.要流泪时眼睛、鼻子感到不舒适 tingle experienced in one's eyes and nose before breaking down and weeping：看到感人之处，鼻子一阵发酸 feel a tingle in one's nose when reading a particularly moving passage两眼发酸，泪水止不住流了下来 one's eyes tingle as tears begin to roll down one's cheeks 3.因疾病或疲劳而感到肢体酸痛无力 (of limbs or body) feel weak and sore because of illness or fatigue：站了一天了，两腿发酸。I feel weak and sore in the legs after standing the whole day.

发问
发问[fā wèn] 口头提出问题 ask, pose or raise a question

发难
发难[fā nàn]1.发动反抗或叛乱 rise in revolt; start a rebellion：辛亥革命在武昌首先发难。The first attack of the Revolution of 1911 was launched in Wuchang. 2.〈书 fml.〉问难 raise a difficult question; start discussion on a doubtful or difficult point：提问发难 raise questions about one's view

发霉
发霉[fā méi] 有机质滋生霉菌而变质 (of organic substances) go mouldy; become mildewed思想发霉 ossified way of thinking

发面
发面[fā miàn] 使面发酵 leaven dough发面[fā miàn] 经过发酵的面 leavened dough：发面饼 leavened pancake

发音
发音[fā yīn] 发出语音或乐音，也泛指发出声音 pronounce; make sounds; (in a broad sense) enunciate：练习发音 practise pronunciation发音方法 articulation发音[fā yīn] 发出的语音 pronunciation：他的发音很准确。He has good pronunciation.

发飘
发飘[fā piāo] 感觉轻飘飘的 feel light：这把木锨使着发飘。This wooden shovel feels too light.头沉得厉害，脚下有点儿发飘 feel dizzy and a bit shaky

左倾机会主义
‘左’倾机会主义[zuǒ qīng jī huì zhǔ yì]另见  机会主义 jīhuì zhǔyì
